40001001	Wambota anama bafapana akupana Jisas Kraisi amama. Jisas nataga wambota Deviti, Devit nataga wambota anama Abrahami.
40001002	Bafasas ehasas wambota atama Abrahami isima. Nogalomana Abrahami Aisak. Nogalomana Aisaki Jekop. Ea' Jekop ahalomana Judai naloma sahopana owalopana ananimi.
40001003	Juda ahalomana Peres naloma Sira. Mama'wam amamu'wi Tamar. Ea' Peres ahalomana Hesron, ea' Hesron ahalomana Ram.
40001004	Ram nogalomana agilinama Aminadap. Ea' nogalomana Aminadap Nason. Ea' nogalomana Nasoni Salmon.
40001005	Ea' Salmon nogalomana agilinama Boas. Boas mama'wana Rahap. Boas nogalomana agilinama Obet. Obet mama'wana Rut, ea' Obet nogalomana agilinama Jesi.
40001006	Ea' Jesi anan ahalomana dembinai king Devit. Devit naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' Uria nase'akwi nola king Solomon.
40001007	Ea' Solomon nogalomana agilinama Rehoboam, ea' Rehoboam nola Abiya. Ea' nogalomana Abiya agilinama Asa.
40001008	Asa anan ahalomana Jehosafat, nola Jehoram. Ea' Jehoram ahalomana Usia.
40001009	Ea' Usia nola Jotam, Jotam nola Ehas ahalomana Hesekia.
40001010	Hesekia nogalomana agilinama Manase, ea' Manase nola Emon. Emon ahalomana Josaia.
40001011	Ea' Josaia nola Jekonia naloma owapana ananimi maloma ahalomam mama'wam safe' sanda' kalabus sapani wambel Babilon laugoma.
40001012	Esis sofa'as sembalo'as la'ifis sapani Babilon, Jekonia nogalomana ananinai agilinama Sealtiel, ea' Sealtiel nola Serubabel.
40001013	Serubabel anan ahalomana Abiut ea' Abiut nola Eliakim. Nogalomana ananinai agilinama Asor.
40001014	Asor nogalomana agilinama Sadok, ea' Sadok ahalomana Akim. Akim nola Eliut.
40001015	Ea' Eliut nogalomana agilinama Elieser, ea' Elieser ahalomana Matan. Ea' Matani nola Jekop ahalomana Josep.
40001016	Josep anama naso' Maria. Ea' Maria kola Jisas, dei' esis sa'i anan Krais Dembinai God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
40001017	Amam bafapana akupana Jisasi fowa'imi seambam mataga na'ama. Amam amama Abraham nolam magi' matagai mafi'i matagama Devit, amama seambam mataga 14-peleim. Ea' amam amama Devit nolam magi' matagai mafi'i matagama nemaf anama naumbih safi'i sofa' esis Israel safe' sanda' kalabus sape wambel Babilon, amama wapoti' 14-peleim. Ea' amam amama esis Israel sanda' kalabus Babilon solam magi' matagai mafi'i matagama nogota Krais nataga anai, amama wapoti' 14-peleim.
40001018	Fowa' Maria kola Jisas Krais, basef amama mape na'ama. Mama'wana Maria esis sa'i akwa'w kose'a Josep, ea' esis bias ina dei' sandase'ama, ata' owa'etin. Ea' sati Maria kofa' opafa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai akwa'w ea' opafu'w.
40001019	Waulunama'w akwo'unai Josep anan aman bu'unai. Anan nandaiwa'ma neanda'akw ambal aol. Na'ama okom na'i nondambaho' nokwaho'w kopan etin.
40001020	Anan nape ata' okom nandanda'ma amama atom, ea' na'oh nandondo'oh, anona ensel Dembinai natagamana na'ipana na'i, “Josep, ine' akunamena Deviti, ina umbamehenama neao'wa waulu'mina ine'ikwi Maria, owa'. Dei' main, awani inima napei'wi, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai akwa'w.
40001021	Nambimb kola awani aman, awani inima anan nigiambama amam nematawa hiesi ma neakwaha waf aonai asasinai nofa'as sotanimani. Na'ama dei' ine' nenda'managel Jisas. Basef ofagema ma agel anama na'i, anan aman nofa' epes ananisi ma seape andeande'.”
40001022	Amamaga amama hiami mataga na'ama si'i anom basef Dembinai nase'anam malogel anona aman profet fowa'inai, dei' mataga endilisi. Fowa' gani profet anama na'iam na'ama na'i,
40001023	“Owagama ano'w nemata'w awiawai'wi owa' kwease' amani opafu'w. Ea' kola enin awani aman agel ananinai Emanuel.” Agel anama ofagena na'iam na'ama na'i, “God nape naloma ape'.”
40001024	-
40001025	Ea' Josep na'oh nandamboma nanda'am si'i ensel na'ipana. Ea' naila basef amama nao'wakw ea' esis ina sandase'ama sapan etin, owa'. Ata' sape deindei safe'ma akwa'w kola awani aman. Ea' nanda'managel Jisas.
40002001	Maria kola Jisas Betlehem, etap hiagoma Judia. Nogota anama anona aman king Herot dembinai ma gavman nape numafi enis epes sape anona etap hiagoma Judia. Akwa'w kolana ea', anom amam dambami gawaimi owa' mogawa Godi mafi'i laogoma gani aon natefima mafi'i mafi'i mataga Jerusalem ea' mahali'as ma'i,
40002002	“Dei' awani dambaini nataga king dembinai esis Judai nape eti? Afa' ata' wapani gani aon natefima, wati ondo'w anani'wi kwatefi, ea' dei' wafi'i wa'i onda' lotumana ofela agel ananinai.”
40002003	Nemaf anama Dembinai King Herot name' basef amama, okom ananinai aona natanea nafe' na'i nambimb awani inima netaga damben nili'amonana. Ea' esis hiesi sape Jerusalem wapoti' umbamahas sa'i nambimb nemaf aonai notaga.
40002004	Ea' king Herot nefala amam pris hiami dambami maloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi hiami mafi'i ea' nahali'am na'i, “Aman anama Krais God nandandepana nosapa'ana niefi'i, nambimb anan neataga wambel enima?”
40002005	Ea' amam magwamana basef ma'i, “Mama'wana kolana Betlehem, etap hiagoma Judia. Dei' main, anona profet fowa'inai na'i basef mail okwatip ma'i, God na'i,
40002006	‘Ipe' Betlehem etap hiagoma Judia, ipe' ina epes falafipei, owa'. Ipe' ina pape pagi' ma amam gavman dambami mumafi ipe' Judia, owa'. Dei' main, anona Dembinai anona nemaf neataga wambel ipe'inai Betlehem. Anan nope dembinai ma ipe' amam nematawa Ae'ipei Israel ea' numafi ipe' hipei ma peape andeande'.’ ”
40002007	Ea' king Herot nandambaho' etin nofalai amam gawaimi amama mafi'i aon natefima mandambaho' mandatama etifigin nahali'am na'i, “Maina nemaf ipe' pati ondo'w akwama kwataga?”
40002008	Amam ma'ipana ma ea', king Herot nasapa'am mafe' Betlehem na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fo'o pegolopa awani inima. Ama pitilin, pifi'i pi'ipa ae' wapoti'. Ae' wapoti' a'i efe' itilin enda' lotuman efela agel ananinai lu'una wapoti'.”
40002009	Amam mame' basef ananimi ea', mohafel makwaha anan mafe' mati ondo'w akwama fowa' mali' matolo'w gani aon natefima, kwafe' kwali'amam. Ea' kotawa ipat anama ilif awani inima Jisas napeinai.
40002010	Amam mati ondo'w akwama kotawa na'ama ea' wandanifel endilisi.
40002011	Ea' mawis ipat anama mati awani inima naloma mama'wana Maria. Ea' amam mindiwa nembawa motawa manda' lotumana mafela agel ananinai lu'una. Ea' mupalia paus amamumi mowafa hiahaom amama amam matalom otamba lu'wami alogw bu'wami ma'ami mase'anam. Ea' mase'ana gol naloma enin paura sa'i frankinsens, alogw bu'wami ma'ami maloma anom sanda bu'wami sofalam sa'i mer, mase'anam awani inima Jisas.
40002012	Mase'anam ea', God na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina ata' pitanima pefe'ma king Herot, owa'. Ea' pila anona eaf pitanima pefe' wambel ipe'inai.” Ea' amam maila anona eaf motanima mafe' wambel amamunai laogoma.
40002013	Amam amama gawaimi mafe' ea', Josep na'oh nandondo'oh anona ensel Dembinai nafi'mai anan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel ne'wa awani inima neloma mama'wana anani'wi pefe' laogoma etap hiagoma Isip. Ea' pipani Isip ama nambimb peme' ae' i'ipina wapoti', pitanimani. Dei' main, King Herot atuwasi ni'ipa soldia ananimi mogolopa awani inima ma mohan neaga'.”
40002014	Ea' Josep nehafel owamb anama atona nao'wa awani naloma mama'wana Maria safe' Isip laogoma.
40002015	Josep napani Isip ama King Herot naga', ea' nao'was sotanimani si'i anom basef Dembinai God na'ipa anona aman profet, amama dei' mataga mandawalap ma'i, God na'i, “Nogalome ae'anai napani Isip ea' ae' efalana notanima nafi'i.”
40002016	King Herot nogawa amam amama gawaimi ina mutanimani, owa', mambaso'mana mafe' anona eaf. Ea' okom ananinai wandafuna kwapete' na'i noha Jisas neaga'. Dei' anan okom nandanda'ma basef amama amam gawaimi mali' ma'ipanam ma nemaf anama ondo'w kwataga anai. Na'ama dei' nasapa' anom soldia mafe' Betlehema wambel anama nape felefele'i maha awasi amam hiami dei' solam dambaim mafe' mataga afagof biam malo'ami maga' hi'alam.
40002017	Ea' dei' anom basef fowa' God na'ipanam profet Jeremaia mataga endilisi mandawalap.
40002018	Anan na'i, “Esis sape anona wambel Rama same' esis salef. Esis salef sandahowe mehip sa'i uwahipisa awasi sa'i, ‘Ano'w nemata'w Resel kwalopa batawisa'w akwa'usi, kwandaiwa' ma nambimb enis sonda' okom akwo'unai bo'ona awanena, owa'. Dei' main, awasi akwa'usi saga' hi'alas.’ ”
40002019	Josep ata' napani Isip ama King Herot naga', ensel Dembinai Godi nafe' na'ipana ma na'oh nandondo'oh
40002020	na'i, “Ine' hafel ne'wa awani neloma mama'wana anani'wi pitanima pefe' etap hiagoma Israel. Dei' main, amam ma'i meaha awani neaga' maga' hi'alam.”
40002021	Ea' Josep nesafel nao'wa awani naloma mama'wana anani'wi safe' sataga etap hiagoma Israel.
40002022	Ea' Josep name' basefa anona aman Arkelaus king Herot nogalomana nataga nofa' wambel naho'ofana nape dembinai king ma esis Judai. Ea' Josep umbamahana ma neafe' Judia. Ea' na'oh nandondo'oh wapoti', God na'ipana ma neafe' anama etap hiagoma Galili.
40002023	Ea' nafe' nape enin taun sa'uni sofalagon Nasaret si'i anom basef amam profet fowa' ma'iami ma'i, “Owagama esis sofalana si'i Nasaretinai.” Basef amama dei' mataga mandawalap endilisi.
40003001	Nimeguf hiami ma nogota anama anona aman Jon napisi'as embeli nafi'i nape anona etap hiagoma Judia wafiguma fatauguma
40003002	ea' nawalapa basef bu'wami na'i, “Nemaf anama bu'unai ea' felefele' notaga ma epes siowis kingdom heveni. Na'ama dei' ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai pemboma opalef pefe'ma God.”
40003003	Ea' Jon nafe' na'ipasa basef amama si'i anona profet Aisaia fowa' na'iami na'i, “Owagama malogel anona amani noga ni'i anona etap wafiguma fatauguma ni'i basef na'ama ni'i, ‘Pendandomba eaf Dembinai nefe' usi'ina, penda'manana andeande'.’ ”
40003004	Luwaguf Jon nalami sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kamel sanda'am, ea' nowaho' anota let sanda' agwahup mafinina sanda'anai. Gwa'aimi ananimi na' gwamu'wis maloma aupimbel aolupumi.
40003005	-
40003006	Nogota anama amam nematawa sape Jerusalemi saloma hiesi sape etap hiagoma Judia ea' wambel anama felefele'ma walemb Jordan hiagoma, hiesi safi'mai Jona neapisi'as embel. Esis sawalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ea' Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
40003007	Afama Jon nati anom amam dambami esis Judai Farisi maloma anom dambami Sadyusi mafi'i ma mefa' baptais, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' panda' waf aonai si'i awasi iguf awami molaipei. Emi na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi anona nemaf neatagamepa?
40003008	Ipe' pemboma opalef pewa' alafugaha waf aonai ipe'inai, ea' penda' waf bu'unai ma pihi'ambas ipe' pamboma opalef endilisi paila waf bu'unai.
40003009	Ipe' ina ukup mondanda' mi'i, ‘Abraham anan ahalomapa ape'inai’, owa'. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anan la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba amama motaga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
40003010	Tamia'w kwa'oh lawag ofagema. Lawah hiami owa' mola su'utip bu'wami, anona nemaf solam sotopa'am sokwahom mefe'ma nif.
40003011	Ae' dei' apisi'ipa embela pihi'ambas ipe' pamboma opalef pakwaha waf aonai pafe'ma God. Anona aman nambimb nigi'ma ae'i ni'ifi, anan la'ifinai nikila' ae'. Anan nenda' baptaisimepa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope nolomepa nese'epa nif la'ifimi wapoti'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.
40003012	Anan nahapila anol savol lagof ananimi ma niesimba'am wit si'i rais amama andeande'. Ama nefa' bu'wami nuwis nembe'am ipat ananinai. Awami nembefam nofam nif amama lu'wami fandom mape la'ela'efi.”
40003013	Nogota anama Jisas nakwaha etap hiagoma Galili nafi'i walemb Jordan, ea' nafi'mai Jon ama neapisi'ana embel.
40003014	Ea' Jon na'i nosopama Jisas nai'pana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma iapisi'ina, owa'. Ine' nipisi' ae', andeande'. Dei' ine' nafi'mai ae' ma main?”
40003015	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' nenda'meam si'i ae' a'ipina. Afa' biafa onda'am na'ama ma ondahama waf hianai bu'unai, si'i God na'iam.” Ea' Jon na'i a'e napisi'ana.
40003016	Jisas nofa' baptais nakwaha embel walemb nandagiai etin, heven nandausi' ma anan, ea' nati Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anan, si'i amil mai'una nufia' nisila'manai.
40003017	Ea' anona maf na'i natagai heven na'i anom basef na'i, “Aman anama Nogalome ae'anai endilisi. Ae' okom nainailana endilisi. Okom ae'anai bo'ona ma anan.”
40004001	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma ma Satan nagwambana neanda' waf aonai.
40004002	Jisas nape aon si'inai tu'waninai, ina na' gwa'aimi, owa'. Nolomahana.
40004003	Ea' aman anama Satan nagwamba epesi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' kipa otamba amama ma'oh etapi motaga si'i bret.”
40004004	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa Satan, na'i, “Baibel na'i, ‘Bret atona ina nose'asa ambagof namumi epes, owa'. Ape' ukup mopoma basef motaga malogel Godi atom monda'apa meape la'ifipa.’ ”
40004005	Ea' Satan nao'wana nondowasa' Jerusalem nahaponana naitu ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai sanda' lotuwanai ilif.
40004006	Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' nukupa' newa etap. Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘God ni'ipa ensel Ananimi mifi'i muhapilina lagof amamumi mumafina ma otamba ina moha bo'wagah ine'imi, owa'.’ ”
40004007	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anom basef Godi wapoti' mape na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' ina pegwamba dembinai God ipe'inai neanda' waf aonai, owa'.’ ”
40004008	Ea' Satan nao'wana mafe' wapoti' anona halaf launai endilisi nihi'ambana amamaga hiami bu'wami endilisi mape etap hiagoma maloma amam nematawa hiesi.
40004009	Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “I'i ine' nindiwa nembawa netawa neanda' lotu nendanifela ae', ese'ena amamaga amama hiami ine'imi atom.”
40004010	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Satan, nekwahae fo'o. Dei main, Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ipe' penda' lotuma Dembinai God ipe'inai atona ea' penda' opeh ananimi atom.’ ”
40004011	Ea' Satan nakwahona nafe', dei' ensel Godi mafi'i magiambama Jisas mumafiana.
40004012	Jisas name' basefa Jon nanda' kalabus, ea' nehafel nakwaha Nasaret nafe' etap hiagoma Galili.
40004013	Ea' nakwaha wambel ananinai nafe' Kaperneam, nape felefele'ma walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili, anona etap agilinama Sebulun naloma Naptali.
40004014	Ea' nafe' nape etap anama si'i basef fowa' anona profet Aisaia na'iam dei' mataga mandawalap endilisi. Anan nanda' basef amama na'i, God na'i,
40004015	“Etap anama Sebuluni Naptali felefele'ma etap anama eaf nafe' nataga naoh. Etap anama wambel Jordan fisanamb, wambel hiagoma agel lu'unai Galili. Esis wambel anama hiagoma ina sogawa basef Ae'ami, owa'.
40004016	Ea' sape si'i epes isima sape owamb atonai, si'i saga'i. Owagama gani sieti owaf lu'unai niluwi sotologon andeande'.”
40004017	Ea' dei' Jisas nafela maol na'ipasa basef la'ela'ef. Nawalipasa basef amama na'i, “Nemaf anama bu'unai felefele' neataga ma ipe' piowis kingdom heveni. Na'ama dei' ipe' pemboma opalef pefe'ma God.”
40004018	Jisas naila akata nafe' etin walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili, nati amam biam Saimon Pita naloma owalomana Andru. Amam mala anemb magi' agof manda' bisnis.
40004019	Anan nati amam biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pifi'i pembalo'a basef ae'ami pila ae'. Fowa' ipe' pagi agof, ea' dei' ihi'ambepa pefe' pi'ipa enis epes sila ae'.”
40004020	Ea' amam mame'ana mohafel mehip makwaha anemb ma'oh mailana mafe'.
40004021	Ea' Jisas na'i nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele' ea' nati anom amam biam wapoti' Jems naloma owalomana Jon maloma ahalomam amamunai Sebedi. Amam matoma bot mape magundisa anemb amamumi. Ea' Jisas nofala amam biam Jemsi Jon.
40004022	Ea' mohafel mehip makwaha bot mafi'i maila Jisas mafe'. Ahalomam amamunai Sebedi makwahona nape bot.
40004023	Ea' Jisas nafe' etap hiagoma Galili, nafe' na'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi amam nematawa hiesi nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Basef bu'wami anan na'ipasami amama ma'i, “Nemaf anama bu'unai nafi'mai ipe'. Ama ipe' hipei piowis kingdom heveni.” Ea' nanda' epes hiesi awes naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapoti'. Awes main naninani nanda'asi, Jisas la'ifina nanda'as sataga bo'wes.
40004024	Basef Jisasi mohafel mafe'agon etap hiagoma Siria ma nanda' awesisi hiesi sataga bo'wes. Ea' esis Siria wapoti' sofa'ai hiesi awesisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Enis ambagof awami manda'as sahaga sagaol, enis ambagof awami mahas maofas nif, enis same' alop nimanimi lu'wami mahas, enis lagof bo'wagah monda'alasi esis sofa'as safi'mai Jisas nanda'as sataga bo'wes hi'alas.
40004025	Na'ama amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe'. Enis sape etap hiagoma Galili saloma enis sape wambel anama 10-peleina Dekapolis saloma enis sape Jerusalem, enis sape etap hiagoma Judia, saloma enis epes sape walemb Jordan fisanamb esis hiesi sailana safe'.
40005001	Jisas nati esis amam nematawa hiesi ea' nalata anona halaf nape. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafi'i mandatama etifigin malomana.
40005002	Ea' anan nafela basef amama laumi nawalipamom.
40005003	Anan na'i, “Ipe' emi egafipa pegawa ea' ipe' etipa owa' la'ifipama penda' maol bu'unai Godi, dei' ipe' pandanifel pape andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' pawis ea' kingdom heveni.
40005004	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa palef papani, ipe' dei' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, God nambimb nonda' opalef ipe'imi mope bo'om.
40005005	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa mamaipama pape sa'ombel owina enis epes, dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, ipe' anona nemaf pefa' amamaga bu'wami God na'i endilisi ma nease'epam.
40005006	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa ukup mehafel ma'ima'i waf bu'unai, si'i nolomahasa gwa'aimi eap pase'asa embel, dei' ipe' pandanifel pape andeande'. Dei' main? Nambimb God nese'epa waf anama bu'unai ukup maimailanai dende'ma ipe' si'ipamana.
40005007	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa pati enis epes uwahipis, dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, nambimb God niti ipe' uwahipipa.
40005008	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa ukup mape bo'om andeande' ma waf aonai a'epa, dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, ipe' anona nemaf piti God.
40005009	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa panda' maola pahagofa wandaf patalogamas seanda' waf bu'unai, dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, God nambimb nofalepa ni'i ipe' awasi ananipei.
40005010	Ea' ipe' emi egafipa paila waf bu'unai ma enis epes sanda'mepa waf aonai sase'epa nimanimi, dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'. Dei' main, dei' ipe' pawis ea' kingdom heveni.
40005011	Ipe' emi egafipa paila ae' pape na'ama. Enis sandaiwa'ma paila ae' sonda' basef mamumami awami baso'maimi ma ipe'. Ea' sese'epa agof awami endilisi si'i ipe' epes aopei ma sase'epa nimanimi. Esis sonda'epa na'ama dei' ipe' pandanifel ea'.
40005012	Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem pepe pendanifel. Dei' main? Amamaga hiami bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oh heven ilif. Esis isima sanda' waf aonai ma ipe' na'ama etin si'i fowa' gani sanda' waf aonai ma profet amama mape fowa'imi.
40005013	Ipe' si'i sol ama pigiambama epes hiesi sape etapi. I'i sol amama mumbul usihima a'am, owa'etin. Nambimb ipe' penda'am pi'imama usihim wapoti'? Owa'etin. Sol amama mumbul maol a'ama sonda'am, esis sokwahom mefe' etap sofofo'asom.
40005014	Ipe' si'i lam epes hiesi sape etapi pihi'ambas. Anagon taun lu'wagoma natoma halaf ilif ina nape nandambaho', owa'etin.
40005015	Epes ina sakata lamifah sopalo'am ma'oh balata owin, owa'etin. Esis sawamonam balatagw ilifa howealama epes hiesi sape ipat nomon.
40005016	Ea' na'ama etin, ipe' penda' waf bu'unai si'i lamifah ipe'imi mape alihima howealama naep esis amam nematawai hiesi siti waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai ma seafela agel Ahalomepa nape ilifi lu'una.
40005017	Ipe' ina ukup mondanda' mi'i ae' afi'i ma ili'amona mi'uli Godi neloma basef amam profet fowa' gani mawalipasami, owa'etin. Ae' ina afi'i ma ili'amonam, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma endelam iwapani'am enda'am motaga endilisimi.
40005018	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Basef amama mope mefe'ma amamaga mape ilif etapi moloma otaga etap higililam hi'ilam. Anom basef tu'wanima amef sa'usa'umi moloma anom basef bandami mail nomona buk mi'uli Godi, amama mope la'ela'ef hihif na'ama etin mefe'ma maol hianai Godi netaga nendawalap hi'ilana.
40005019	Na'ama i'i emi egafis sili'amona anom basef kwawie'ima basef amama mape mi'uli Godi ma esis sihi'amba enis epesa sonda'am na'ama etin, anona nemaf agof epes isima mefe' sa'osa'om ma kingdom heveni. Ea' emi egfis sila mi'uli Godi andeande'ma sihi'amba enisa sielana, anona nemaf esis sefa' agof lu'wami ma kingdom heveni.
40005020	Na'ama dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, ipe' ukup pepoma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi moloma amam dambami Farisi. I'i waf ipe'inai bu'unai owa' nikila' waf amamunai, anona nemaf ipe' ina pefe' piowis kingdom heveni, owa'etin.
40005021	Ipe' pame' ea' basef amama fowa' gani amam akupipa mofa'ami ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' owa' peha enin epen neaga'. I'i enin neha enin epen nega', epen inima nambimb netagama basefa kot.’
40005022	Dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, emi epen okom wandafuna ma enin sahin owan ananisi, enin nambimb netagama basefa kot. Ea' emi epen ni'ipa enin sahin owan ananini ni'i, ‘Ine' epen falafinai’, enis sonda'mana basef amam Juda dambami mumafi koti. Ea' i'i enin epen ni'ipa enin epen lamana ni'i, ‘Ine' okom nahena endilisi’, epen inima nefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi ma'oma.
40005023	I'i ipe' pi'i pindalali ma God penda' ofa felefele' ma balata anama sondolalima Godanai ma i'i ipe' ukup mopoma anona waf aonai ipe' panda'ana enin sahin owan ea' ukup numbutima ipe', penda'am na'ama.
40005024	Ata' pekwaha ofa ipe'inai nonda'oh felefele'ma balata anama, ipe' ata' pitanima pefe' penandona basef peloma sahin owan ipe'isi pali' panda'mas waf aonai. Ama ea', pifi'i pefa' ofa pefe' pindalali peso' Goda ofa.
40005025	I'i enin epen ni'i neanda'mepa basef, nelomepa pefe' ma ata' pitu eaf, ipe' mehip pese'ana okom pewalapa amama pi'iam peloman, ama basef owa'etin. Na'ama epen inima nenda'epa penda' basefa amama ma jas nonda'epa pefe'ma polisman, ea' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
40005026	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipe' ina nambimb pekwaha ipat anama sanda' kalabusanai ulal, owa'. Ama peagwa amamaga lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'inai hi'ilana, pefe'.”
40005027	Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pame'am ea' basef amama fowa'imi. Ipe' ina penda' waf aonai ma so'a waola enis amam nematawa deindeias, owa'.
40005028	Dei' ae' a'ipipa na'ama a'i, i'i anona aman nieti ano'w nemata'w, ama okom ananinai nehafema akwa'w, aman anama ea' nanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai ma okom ananinai.”
40005029	Ea' Jisas na'ipam anom basef womun etin na'i, “I'i naep ipe'imi mape lagof da'isimi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, pigiam pikwahom. I'i alop tu'wanina ipe'inai nefa' nimanimi, amama aom kwaukwawie'. Ina andeande' ma esis sokwaha alop si'ina ipe'inai hi'ilana neafe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mapoma. Amama anona nemaf pefa' nimanimi awami lu'wami endilisi.
40005030	I'i lagof da'isimi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'am pekwahom. I'i alop tu'wanina ipe'inai nefa' nimanimi, amama aom kwaukwawie'. Na'ama esis sokwaha alop si'ina ipe'inai hi'ilana nefe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mapoma.
40005031	Basef amama fowa' mataga ma'i, i'i anona aman ni'i nili'amona waulu'mana anani'wi, anan ata' ni'i anom basef nonda'am mil anop okwatip nose'akw ma neatopa' dase'ama.
40005032	Dei' ae' a'ipipa a'i, i'i nemata'w akwama owa' konda' waf aonai so'a waolanai, ma waulunama'w neakwaho'w etin, anan nanda' akwa'w kwanda' waf aonai so'a waola anona aman. Ea' emi aman naso' nemata'w fowa' anona aman nali'amona'wi, aman anama nagi' nase'akwi wapoti' nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama.
40005033	Anom basef fowa' gani pame'ami ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Basef amama la'ifimi pa'i endilisi gani ilif, ipe' ina pesambalom, owa'. Basef amama pilam mondahama ipe' pa'iama naep Dembinai.’
40005034	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina pi'i basef la'ifimi endilisi gani ilif, owa'. Ea' ina pi'i ilif hevena penda' anom basef la'ififi, owa'. Dei' main, gani ilif heven balata bu'unai dembinai Godi napoma.
40005035	Ea' na'ama etin ina pi'i etap anae' etina penda' basef ipe'imi la'ifim, owa'. Etap anae' nandahama si'i anona tebol sa'unai God nahapona bo'wagahanai. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' ina pi'i Jerusalema penda' anom basef ipe'imi la'ifimi, owa'. Jerusalem anama taun wambel lu'wagoma dembinai kingi.
40005036	Ipe' ina penda' basef ipe'imi la'ifim pi'i balagah ipe'imi, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' ina la'ifipama penda' anom auf ama balagah ipe'imi meataga afitimi alimi, owa'.
40005037	Ipe' pi'iam pi'i a'e o owa'. Pi'i amama atom. Basef watanieimi, amama mataga epen aonai Satan atona.
40005038	Ipe' pame'am ea' basef amama fowa' gani mataga ma'i, ‘I'i ipe' pepa' peloma enisa seahepa naep o seatalamepa nalelef, ipe' pegwamas pehas wapoti' penda'as sondagwama etin.’
40005039	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina pegwama epes sonda' ipe' aopei, owa'. I'i emi egalin nehepa aomb wa'ol, pendamboma nehepa aomb wa'ol wapoti'.
40005040	I'i anona aman nonda'mepa basef ni'i nefa' siaot ipe'inai, ipe' pese'ana sagwegw ipe'igwi wapoti'.
40005041	I'i anona aman dembinai ma gavman nindinapina ma pefe'mana wiga pelomana anagon fele' si'i nogota atotona, ipe' andeande'ma ata' pefe' pelomanago nehetagw biam laom wapoti'.
40005042	I'i emi epen nefalepa ma anom amamaga, ipe' pese'anam. I'i enin epen ni'i newaolamepa wiaf, ipe' ina pindaiwa'man pesambala basef ananimi, owa'.
40005043	Ipe' pame'am ea' basef amama fowa' gani mataga ma'i, ‘Ipe' pese'asa opalef epes isima sape felefele'ma ipe', ea' ipe' ukup wandafuma naumbih ipe'isi.’
40005044	Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa anom basef a'i, ipe' ukup mimila naumbih ipe'isi pese'as opalef, penda' betena God niegiambama isima sanda'mepa waf aonai.
40005045	Ipe' penda'am na'ama ma peape awasi Godi si'i Ahalomapa nape heven ilifi. Anan nanda' aon alipunai nape ilifa nigiambama epes bu'wasi saloma epes sanda' waf aonai wapoti'. Anan nanda' asaf nalai ma epes isima sape andeande'i saloma isima sanda' waf aonai wapoti'.
40005046	I'i ipe' ukup mila epes isima ukup maimaila ipe' etipa, anona nemaf pefa' amamaga bu'wami maima waf anama? Owa'etin. Amam amama manda' waf aonai maloma mofa' takisi manda' waf anama atona.
40005047	I'i ipe' pinifela isima alupisi ipe'isi etis, ipe' petaga pikila' enisa maina waf bu'unai? Owa'etin. Esis sololama Godi sanda'am na'ama etin.
40005048	Na'ama ipe' pepe bo'wepa endilisi si'i Ahalomepa ipe'inai God nape heven ilif.
40006001	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Ina penda' waf bu'unai ipe'inai ma naep esis epesi ma seatilipa, ma sie'i ipe' epes bu'wipei ma seafela agof ipe'imi, owa'. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, ipe' ina anona nemaf pefa' anom amamaga bu'wami ma Ahalomepa God nape heveni, owa'.
40006002	I'i ipe' pi'i pigiambama enis epes isima kwahusi, ipe' ine' pi'ipa enis epes, owa'. Ipe' ina penda'am si'i waf anama amam mambaso'as ma'i malogof biami mofapula alelefi batagw ma'ipas sali', owa'. Amam manda'am ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi, anama eaf dawalegefa naep epesi seati amam sefela agof amamumi lu'um. Owa', hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, Epes isima safela agof amamumi ea' ma'um amama atom.
40006003	I'i ipe' pigiambama epes isima na'amai kwahusi, ipe' pembaho'as penda'as na'ama. Lagel wa'ana nanda'ami, lagel wa'ana ina nogawam, owa'etin.
40006004	Ipe' pembaho'am penda'am. Ama Ahalomepa ipe'inai nati amamaga amama mape mandambahi'i ea' anan atona nambimb nogwamepam ipe'.
40006005	Maina nemaf ipe' penda' beten, ipe' ina penda'am si'i waf anama amam amama mambaso'ami ma'i malogof biam manda'anai, ma mietu etin nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi o eaf lu'unai dawalegef, ama epes seatolom, owa'. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi amam anona nemaf God ina nogwamama amam amamaga bu'wami ma waf anama, owa'etin. Epes isima satolom ea' ma'um amama atom.
40006006	Nogota anama ipe' pi'i penda' beten, piwis ifagw nomon pewalo utagw ea' penda' betena God Ahalomepa ipe'inai, anan nape anama nandambaho'ma. Anan nati amamaga mape sandambahi'i ma nambimb neagwamipei beten.
40006007	Afama ipe' penda' beten, ipe' ina penda' beten pi'i basef loumi atom si'i epes isima sololama Godi sanda'am, owa'. Esis sa'i sonda' beten launai ma nambimb God neame'as. Owa'etin, God ina name'as.
40006008	Ipe' ina pila waf asasinai, hapainai. Ahalomepa God nape ilif nogawa ea' ma amamaga a'ipei. Nogota anama ipe' ata' owa' pihali'anama, anan nagawam ea'.
40006009	Ipe' penda' beten na'ama pi'i, ‘Ahalomapa ape'inai nape heven ilif, ape' ma'i agel ine'inai nope bo'ona andeande' ma hiesi seafela agel ine'inai lu'una.
40006010	Ape' ma'i nemaf anama bu'unai nifi'i ma epes hiesi siowis kingdom ine'inai. Waf bu'unai esis ine'isi sailana heven, ape' ma'i milana etap anae' wapoti' na'ama etin.
40006011	Dei' ine' nese'apa gwa'aimi mondahama nemaf anae'.
40006012	Ine' nekwahomapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai si'i ape' makwahomasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mapanai.
40006013	Ine' owa' nili'apa mefe'ma amamaga ahifimi meagwamba ape'i. Hapaimi. Netagahipa ma epen aonai.’ ” [Wambel ine'inai noloma pepel ine'inai noloma nafifili ine'inai, amama ine'imi atom la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi.]
40006014	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “I'i ipe' pekwahomasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mepanai, ma Ahalomepa nape heveni nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai wapoti'.
40006015	I'i ipe' owa' pekwahomasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mepanai, Ahalomepa nape heven ina nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai wapoti', owa'etin.
40006016	Maim nimeguf ipe' pekwaha gwa'aimi, ina penda'am si'i amam amama mambaso'mami ma'i malogof biami manda'ami ma manda' amagah amamumi awasim, owa'. Amam manda' amagah aom na'ama ma epes satolom sogawa sa'i amam mokwaha gwa'aimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi amam mofa'am ea' amamaga amama ma danifel amamunai. Epes isima sati waf anama amamunai, ea' ma'um amama atom.
40006017	Maina nemaf ipe' pekwaha gwa'aimi ma penda' betena God, ipe' pesa'opa amagah penda' wel pindisa balagah ipe'imi.
40006018	Ama enis epes ina sogawa ipe' pakwaha gwa'aimi, owa'. Penda'am na'ama ma Ahalomepa nape nandambahi'i anan atona nogawepa. Anan nati amamaga mape mandambahi'i, ma nambimb neagwamipei beten.
40006019	Ipe' ina petama amamaga bu'wami atom ipe'imi pewa'aniam etap anae', owa'. Enis sakowalefi sapisila ifagw sawis sakowalopam, sopafowa motopa'am monda'am aom, waimba nasagiham.
40006020	Dei' ae' a'ipipa pewa'ania amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi mo'omepa gani heven ilif. Anama bamagufi sopafowa ina mototopa'am ea' waimba ina nasagiham, owa'etin endilisi. Ea' sakowalefi ina suwis sokowalopam, owa'.
40006021	Maina wambel amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oma, ea' wambel anama atona anona nemaf ukup ipe'imi wapoti' meapoma.
40006022	Naep nomon ukup ipe'ipi si'i lama alop si'ina ipe'inai. I'i ukup ipe'imi bo'om mope, ea' alop si'ina ipe'inai howalana.
40006023	I'i ukup ipe'imi aom, nambimb alop ipe'inai akutina hi'ilana. Ea' na'ama etin, i'i lam amama mape ukup ipe'imi nomon akutim, anona nemaf owamb anama ea' lu'una endilisi.
40006024	Ina enin epen la'ifina nanda' maol nihapila maol biefina amam dambami biam, owa'etin. Na'ama okom nila anona, anona nesambalona. Ea' anan neme' basefa anona, anona nowa' alafugahana. Ea' na'ama etin, ipe' ina la'ifipa pepe owina God noloma wiga hianai moni hianai, owa'etin.
40006025	Ea' ae' a'ipipa a'i ipe' ina ukup matamea hiahiama ambagof ipe'imi pi'i, ‘Ape' ata' mea' main? Ea' mea' embel maim?’ Owa'. Ipe' ina ukup motamea ma alop ipe'inai pi'i, nambimb ape' monda' main mombaho' alop ape'inai? Ambagof afa'imi ina gwa'aimi atom. Ea' alop ina luwaguf atom, owa'.
40006026	Ipe' ukup mopoma amiguf. Amiguf ina manda' aof mawa gwa'aimi maim, owa'. Amiguf amam ifagw owa'etina mowa'ani gwa'aimi mo'oh, ea' mowa'aniam mofa'am ma'oh ifagw gwa'aimi emi, owa'etin. Ea' Ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heveni, anan nase'am gwa'aimi. Ea' ipe' epes pikila' amiguf amama endilisi.
40006027	Ipe' nambimb emi la'ifina nomonas notanea nawis niwatania anona nemaf wapoti' ma ambal ananinai nope nogota laona wapoti'? Owa'etin.
40006028	Dei' maina nomonas ipe'imi matamea safe' endilisi ma luwaguf maim? Ipe' ata' ukup mopoma afis main salo ande'. Esis sataga salo lu'wis sa'imama? Esis ina sanda' maol, ina sanda' luwaguf maim, owa'etin.
40006029	Dei' ae' a'ipipa fowa' gani anona aman amamaga hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi, ea' sosaf ananinai ina bo'ona si'i afis amama, owa'etin.
40006030	A'e, otalef amama dei' ata' malo aof ama naman etef sotopa'am sokwahom mefe' nif. Otalef amama awami God nofalo'mam. Ea' ipe' amam nematawa pikila' otalef amama. Ea' dei' ipe' pembale'efa basef Godi, bale'ef ipe'inai ina la'ifina, pegawa endilisi anan numafipa wapoti'.
40006031	Ea' ipe' ina ukup motamea hihif endilisi pi'i, ‘Nambimb ape' mea' main? Mea' embel eti? Monda' luwaguf eti?’ Na'ama owa'.
40006032	Epes sape etapi sololama Godi ukup matamea mafe' endilisi ma sogolopam amamaga amama hiami. Ea' Ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heveni anan nogawa ea' amamaga amama a'ipei.
40006033	Ipe' ata' ukup mili' pegolopa waf bu'unai noloma piwis kingdom Ananinai pili', nese'epa amamaga amama ipe' wapoti'.
40006034	Ea' ipe' ina nomonas mopoma amamaga meataga naman, owa'. Nemaf namanifi fendapoma naman atef, ama amamaga amama meataga naman. Amamaga nimanimi matagama nimeguf deindei mandahama nimeguf atona etin. Ipe' ine ukup motamea mefe', owa'.
40007001	Ipe' ina pewaloga enis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'. Ama anona nemaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'.
40007002	Waf ipe' panda'ana pawaloga enis epesanai, anona nemaf waf anama atona God nonda'mepana ipe' wapoti'. Ikwaf anama atona ipe' panda'ana pawalogas God nogwamepana ipe'.
40007003	Dei' maina ipe' pati usan sa'unai nape naep sahin owan ipe'isi, ea' ipe' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi?
40007004	Dei' maina ipe' ata' pali' pa'ipa sahin owan ipe'isi pa'i, ‘Owalome, ae' a'i iwafamena usan sa'unai nape naem ine'inai.’ Ea' hapataf lu'unai nape naep ine'imi. Na'ama owa'.
40007005	Ipe' malogof biamipei pambaso'mami. Ipe' ata' pili' pewafam usan hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi ma piti andeande', pewafamenan usan sa'unai nape naep sahin owan ipe'isi.”
40007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam anom basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “Amamaga bu'wami usi'imi, amama ipe' ina pese' nombagw, owa'. Ea' ipe' ina pekwaha awelep amama bu'wami ipe'imi mefe'ma bogof, owa'. Na'ama mofofo'asom awelep amama bu'wami bo'walelef amamumi ea' nombagw mohepa mea'epa.
40007007	Ipe' pihali' God nambimb nese'epa amamaga amama. Amama ipe' pegolopami nambimb pitolom. Ipe' peha uta, nambimb God nusi'amepana uta.
40007008	Dei' main, emi egafis sohali' Godi, nambimb sofa' amamaga. Emi egafis segolopa amamaga, nambimb seatolom. Ea' emi egafis soha uta, nambimb God nusi'amanasa uta.
40007009	I'i enin awani nihali' ahalomana ma anom gwa'aimi, atuwasi ahaloman nefela anom owap nose'anam? Owa'etin.
40007010	I'i anona awani nihali' ahalomana nease'ana anona eol, anan nambimb ina nose'ana anona yul aonai, owa'.
40007011	Ea' ipe' amam nematawa aopei pase'asa amamaga bu'wami atoma awasi ipe'isi. Ea' endilisi Ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heven nikila' ipe' epes. Anan wapoti' nambimb i save nose'asa amamaga bu'wambu'wami amama sahali' anan emi.
40007012	Maina waf ipe' pa'i esis sanda'mepana ipe'i, ipe' penda'masana na'ama etin. Basef amama ofagema ma mi'uli Godi na'ipa Mosesanai naloma basef God fowa' na'ipa amam profet manda'ami.
40007013	Ipe' pefe' piowis uta sa'unai. Dei' main, anona eaf nafe' nawis wambel aonai hel alihina endilisi uta wapoti' alihina. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safe' saila eaf anama.
40007014	Ea' uta ma eaf nafe' nawis wambel sape namisagoma ina alihina, owa'etin. Uta wapa'mona. Wambel anama sape bo'wes andeande' la'ela'ef. Eaf anama ahifina endilisi ma seafe'. Amam nematawa atona etin esis ea' amama atom sati eaf anama sailana.
40007015	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma amam profet mambaso'mami ma'i mawalipasa basef Godi. Amam mafi'i mambaso'mepa manda' ufunufeni mataga patolom ande' atogon mape bo'om sa'umbilim si'i sipsip. Ea' ukup amamumi nomon aom endilisi ma ipe' ma'i mohambombagepa mohepa si'i nombagw wandafumi. Ea' ipe' ina peme'am, owa'.
40007016	Ipe' piti waf amamunai netaga nendawalap si'i su'utip pail lawah ea' pegawa waf amamunai bo'ona o aona. Epes ina sola su'utip wainim mandelef amama higatagumi, owa'. Ea' esis ina sola su'utip fik si'i ahip anona mandof higatagunai, amama wapoti' owa'. Ea' waf aonai amamunai nataga nandawalap aona si'i su'utip awami.
40007017	Ea' na'ama etin lawah hiami anom bu'wami mola su'utip bu'wami gwa'aimi, ea' lawah awami mail mola su'utip awami numbutimi.
40007018	Lawah bu'wami ina mail mola su'utip awami ea' lawah awami ina mail mola su'utip bu'wami, owa'.
40007019	Lawah hiami owa' mieil mola su'utip bu'wami, amama esis salam saofam nif.
40007020	Na'ama ipe' nambimb piti waf amam profeti netaga nendawalap si'i su'utip mail lawah, ea' pegawa waf amamunai bo'ona o aona.
40007021	Ipe' ina pi'i amam nematawa hiesi hi'alas sofala ae' sa'i Dembinai, pi'i anona nemaf seafe' siowis kingdom heveni, owa'etin. Emi egafis sila okom Ahalomei nape heven ma sielana, esis etis anona nemaf sefe' suwis kingdom heveni. Enis lamasa owa'.
40007022	Nemaf anama amam nematawa hiesi sifi'i si'ipa ae' si'i, ‘Dembinai, Dembinai, ape' mawalipasa basef Godi si'i profet amama mawalipas ea' ma'i agel ine'inai matofa ambagof awami mape epesi! Ape' ma'i agel ine'inai manda' ikwaf naninani la'ifinai si'i God nanda'anai!’
40007023	Nemaf anama ae' iwalipas i'ipas alihis na'ama i'i, ‘Fowa' gani pafi'i pafi'i pataga dei' Ae' ina egawa ipe', owa'. Ipe' epes panda' waf aonai, ipe' si'amae, ipe' fo'o.’
40007024	Emi egafis seme' basef ae'ami ma sielami, esis si'i epen gawainai nala' ipat ananinai netawa etap anama otambaiguma la'ifiguma.
40007025	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', asaf lu'unai nalai, walemb nawisi lu'una embel kolo'walami mafe', uf la'ifinai naluwi, amama makoto'ma ipat anama ea' ina nato, owa'. Epen inima nala otamba lu'wami mosahapana netawa.
40007026	Ea' emi egafis seme' basef ae'ami owa' silam, esis si'i anona aman nahaga nagaoli. Anan nala' ipat ananinai natoma ilifa wesan atona.
40007027	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea' asaf lu'unai nalai, embel mataga, ea' uf naluwi la'ifina, amama maola ipat anama nondokwaef nowa. Ipat anama nato na'oh kwapete' endilisi aona.”
40007028	Nogota anama Jisas na'i basef amama laumi ma hi'alam, esis same' basef ananimi ea' gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi.
40007029	Dei' main, anan ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi ma'ipas, owa'. Anan na'ipasa basef la'ifimi naloma pepel na'ama etin si'i amam agufumi ma'ipas. Amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'ama si'i anan, owa'. Anan la'ifina endilisi nikila'am.
40008001	Ea' Jisas nakwaha halaf anama nilianai, amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe'.
40008002	Ea' anona aman awasinai alop nambo'anai nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele' ma anan na'ipana mehip na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' ni'i a'e, nenda' ae' etaga bo'owe.”
40008003	Ea' Jisas naso' lagelana nahapila anan na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i a'e ma ine' netaga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' etef awes anama aonai nakwahona ea' nataga bo'ona.
40008004	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'. Ine' fo'o nihi'ambana alop ine'inai aman anama pris. Ea' nese'ana amamaga amama anan nendolalima God ea' ine' ninifelana ma nataga bo'wena si'i mi'uli ananinai fowa' Moses na'ipasanai na'i. Ama esis hiesi sitilina sogawa ambo'wena.”
40008005	Jisas nafe' wambel Kaperneam ea' anona soldia dembinai nape. Anan kepten numafi soldia hiami 100-peleim. Ea' nafi'i nahali' Jisas nindinip na'i,
40008006	“Dembinai, aman anama nanda'me maoli awes nanda'ana na'oh ipat ananitai. Bo'wagahi lagof saga' sailana. Alop ananinai ekep mahana kwapete'.”
40008007	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i. “Ae' atuwasi efo'o enda'ana bo'ona.”
40008008	-
40008009	Ea' dembinai soldia anama na'ipana na'i, “Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma ine' neafo'o niwis ipat ae'anai, owa'. Ine' ni'i basef atom, atuwasi anan bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape owina anom soldia dambami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. I'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. Ea' i'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fi'i’, name'e nafi'i. Ea' i'ipa anama agel a'anai nanda'me maoli i'i, ‘Ine' da'a maol anama’, anan name'e nanda'ana. Ine' dembinai. Ea' awes anama atuwasi neme' basef ine'imi ea' nefe'. Dei' ine' ni'i etin, ea' anan ambo'ona wapoti'.”
40008010	Ea' Jisas name' basef ananimi okom natanea na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi saila anan safi'i na'i, “Endilisi etis ae' a'ipipa! Soldia dembinai anama anan ina ipe' Israelinai. Ea' dei' anan nembale'efa ae'. Ina anona aman Israelinai nombale'efa ae' na'ama, owa'etin. Anan nikila' ipe' Israela nembale'efa ae' la'ifina.
40008011	Endilisi ae' a'ipa ipe' Juda hipei, ipe' ina ukup mi'i ipe' etipa pefe' piowis kingdom heveni, owa'. Amam nematawa hiesi lamasi sifi'i gani aon natefima nowala ma naso'ma, isima sefe' siowis anama. Ea' sefe' siowis soloma dambami bafapepa ipe'imi Juda, Abraham noloma Aisak Jekop, sefe' sope etifigin sea' gwa'aimi solomam.
40008012	Ea' ipe' Juda hipai owa'etin. God nandondomba kingdom heveni ma ipe' piowis, owa'etin. Anona nemaf anan negalo'ma ipe' ni'ipipa ni'i pefe' wambel aonai owamb atona napoma. Ea' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami pelef mehip pena' nalelef ipe' tilili talala' kwapete' pepe.”
40008013	Ea' Jisas na'ipa soldia anama dembinai na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Ine' na'i ae' la'ifiwei ma iegiambama aman anama nanda'mena maol ine' neataga bo'ona. Ae' anda'ana bo'ona si'i ine' nambale'efa ae'.” Ea' dei' etef aman anama ambo'ona wapoti'.
40008014	-
40008015	Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat Pitai nati Pita nandagi'mokwi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'unai nifina kwapete'. Ea' natolo'w nahapila lagel akwa'unai awes anama nafe' nakwaha akwa'w. Ea' kohafel kwape kwanda'mana gwa'aimi anan.
40008016	Wambomota felefele' ma owamb esis sofa'ai amam nematawa hiesi ambagof awami mapeisi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami basef bandami atom natofam mafa' mafe'. Anan nanda' esis hiesi awesisi sataga bo'wes hi'alas.
40008017	Anan nanda'am na'ama si'i fowa' gani anona profet Aisaia na'i basef na'i, “Anan atona nofa' awes ape'inai nigiambamapa ma meape bo'wepa.”
40008018	Ea' Jisas nati epes hiesi saitu sindiwapana, ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mefe' anama walemb batupa'manai gani fisana.
40008019	Ea' anona aman dembinai nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' etin anama hiagoma ine' na'i neafe'ma.”
40008020	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw aolopumi ma'oh mala etap wambel amamunai. Amiguf wapoti' mufia' mafe' ilif mala' alegah mapeih gani ilif, ea' ae' owa'etin. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, wambel a'e ma a'oh alo balaga ae'anai.”
40008021	Ea' anona aman alupunai Jisasi nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahalome, ata' igiambamana ma noga' ewana ma nope, ifi'i ilina.”
40008022	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapainai, esis saga'i sondawago esis etis isima saga'i. Ine' owa'. Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
40008023	Ea' Jisas nalata bot anama naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' malomanamai mombo fisana mafe' anona walemb batupa'manai lu'unai.
40008024	Ea' mehip etin uf lu'unai naluwi, embel mohafel mawis bot nomon felefele'ma bot na'i nowala embel. Ea' Jisas na'oh nolola bot.
40008025	Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' minimbalana ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai! Ine' hafel nigiambamafa. Afa' wa'i higililafa owala embel!”
40008026	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pembale'efa pa'i ae' la'ifiwei, owa'etin. Dei' maina ipe' umbamahepa?” Ea' nehafel na'ipa uf naloma embel na'i, “Ipe' tol motah.” Ea' uf faso'mana, embel ina ata' manda' fepo, owa'. Tol motah.
40008027	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi gegelalasom umbamaham kwapete'am ma'i, “Anan emi egafuna? Na'ipa uf naloma embel mame'ana mowala.”
40008028	Jisas nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol walemb batupa'manai anama anona etap esis Gadara sapoma. Ea' anom amam biam ambagof awami mapeimi mafi'mai anan. Amam mape la'ela'ef hi'agilif sawa saga'ima mafi'i. Amam amama epes awami mahasi. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi umbamahasa seafe' eaf anama amam mapoma.
40008029	Ea' mofala Jisas mehip ma'i, “Ine' God Nogalamana. Ine' na'i nenda' maina afa'? Ine' na'i nehafa ofa' nimanimi lu'wami? Nemaf anama na'i niahafanai ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'.”
40008030	Ea' anom bogof hiami maitu ma' gwa'aimi felefele'.
40008031	Ea' ambagof awami mahali' Jisas ma'i, “I'i ine' netofafa, nesapa'afa ofe' uwisa bogof mamuma.”
40008032	Ea' na'ipa ambagof amama na'i, “Ipe' fo'o!” Ea' makwaha amam amama biam mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof mamuma hiami masagih mafa' mafe' mehip mowala awagoma tata mowala mala embel walemb batupa'manai afum hi'alam.
40008033	Ea' amam mumafi bogofi masagih mafe' wambel lu'wagoma ma'ipasa basef amama amam nematawa hiesi ma'ipasa amamaga amama matagama amam amama biam ea' ma'ipasa bogof wapoti' afum hi'alam.
40008034	Ea' epes hiesi wambel anama safi'i sati Jisas sahali'ana sa'ipana mehip sa'i anan nekwaha etap anama asasima nefe' anagon.
40009001	Esis sandaiwa'ma Jisas ea' nafe' nalata anota bot nafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai fisana ea' nataga wambel ananinai ofagama.
40009002	Ea' anom amam mofa'ai anona aman mafi'i. Lagof bo'wagah maga' mailanai ea' tol na'oh lahis. Ea' Jisas natolom nogawa amam mombale'efana ma'i anan la'ifinai ma nigiambama aman anama aonai neataga bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Ine' epen ae'inai! Opaf ine'inai nepe awanena. Waf aonai ine' nanda'anai ae' akwahomenana ea'.”
40009003	Ea' anom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ukup mandanda' na'ama manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anama Jisas nanda' God findiwana na'ipana awagon.”
40009004	Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' ukup ipe'imi mape na'ama?
40009005	Dei' amamaga maim ipe' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipa aman anama awesinai i'i, ‘Ae' ekwahomena waf aonai nanda'anai,’ o i'ipana ie'i, ‘Nehafel nefe'.’ Basef amama nohafel neafe' ipe' pa'i amama ahifima ae'.
40009006	Ae' ataga epen endililsiwei a'i ipe' pegawa ae' la'ifiwei ma eakwahomasa waf aonai hianai amam nematawa sape etapi sanda'anai. Na'ama ae' a'i ihi'ambepa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda' amamaga amama.” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel fela lahis ine'imi fa'am nefe' ipat ine'inai.”
40009007	Ea' anan nohafel nafe' ipat ananinai.
40009008	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi satolona sehafel gegelalasis umbamahas kwapete' sogawa God nagiambama aman anama nase'ana pepel lu'unai. Na'ama esis safela agel Godi lu'una.
40009009	Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel anama nafo'o nati ae' Matyu, anda' basefa buk anae'. Ae' ape ipat anae' mofa' takisanai. Ea' Jisas na'ipi na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.” Ea' ae' ehafel ailana afe'.
40009010	Ea' Jisas naloma alupufai ananifai wape ipat ae'anai wa' gwa'aimi etin, amam hiami manda' waf aonai maloma anom hiami mofa' takisi mafi'i malomafa ma' gwa'aimi.
40009011	Ea' amam Farisi dambami mafi mati Jisas nape nalomafa wa' gwa'aimi, mahali' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina dembinai tisa ipe'inai nape naloma amam mofa' takisi maloma amam amama manda' waf aonai ma' gwa'aimi etifigin?”
40009012	Ea' Jisas name'am na'ipam na'i, “Isima awes a'asi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Ea' isima awes nanda'asi etis safe'ma dokta.
40009013	Anom basef mape buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, God na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' peha mafis pese' ae', owa'. Ipe' piti enis amam nematawa uwahipis pigiambamas, andeande'.’ Ea' ipe' ina pegawa basef amama ofagema, owa'. Dei' pefe' pitalifam pegawam. Dei' main, ae' ina afi'i ma efala epes sanda' waf bu'unai, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efala epes isima sanda' waf aonai etis.”
40009014	Jon aman anama napisi'as embel, alupisi ananisi same' basef ananimi safi'i anama Jisas napoma sahali'ana na'ama sa'i, “Anom nimeguf afa' waloma amam Farisi afa' wakwaha gwa'aimi wape etin wanda' beten. Dei' maina amam alupumi ine'imi owa' meakwaha gwa'aimi si'i afa'?”
40009015	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'i basef womun etin na'i, “I'i enis sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma enis aman nemata'w bias sondase'ama, ipe' pa'i esis alupisi atuwasi sondaiwa'ma gwa'aimi nemaf anama anan naso' nemata'wi nape nalomas? Owa'etin. Ea' nemaf anama anan nokwaha esis nefe' anagon laogoma, esis sokwaha gwa'aimi.”
40009016	“Ina andeande'ma peatopa' lowaf namunai pigundisana neloma anona lowaf apinai, owa'. Na'ama nambimb lowaf anama namunai nendatagah, nehape' apinai pele'atana negal neataga lu'una.” Ea' na'i anom basef womun etin wapoti' na'i,
40009017	“Embel wainim dambaimi ape' ina mowalam agwahup apinai mafinina si'i botowagof, owa'. I'i enin nenda'am na'ama, embel wain netef hianai, nohape' agwahup anama pele'etana ea' wain kolo'olana hi'ilana. Na'ama owa'. Wain dambainai mowalana agwahup dambainai atona. Ma embel moloma agwahup mola andeande'.”
40009018	Jisas ata' nape na'ipas etin, anona aman dembinai esis Judai nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana na'i, “Nogame ae'akwi felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ae' a'i ine' nefe' newamona lagel ine'inai akwa'w ambal natanimai nuwisa'w kohafel kopan.”
40009019	Ea' Jisas nohafel naloma alupumi ananimi malomana mafe' eaf.
40009020	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananifi da'malififa. Awes lu'unai nanda'akwi kwape gamba la'ela'ef afagof 12-peleim.
40009021	Ea' akwa'w okom nandanda' na'i, “I'i ae' esa lagela lowaf ananifi, ae' bo'awe.”
40009022	Ea' Jisas nandamboma natolo'w na'ipa'w na'i, “Nogame ae'inai! Opaf ine'inai nepe la'ifina. Ine' ea' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom dei' anda'ena bo'wena.”
40009023	Ea' Jisas nafe' ipat aman anama dembinai esis Judai nati enis amam nematawa sofapula batagwa nemata'w akwama awiawai'wi afu'w. Ea' epes hiesi salef mehip sa'i sapoma'w.
40009024	Ea' anan na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' si'amae! Akwa'w ina kwaga' endilisi, owa'. Kwa'oh etin.” Ea' esis sanda'iafana.
40009025	Ea' sehafel sawis ande', Jisas nikila'as nawis nomon nahapila lagel akwa'unai nafela'w kohafel ambo'okw wapoti'.
40009026	Ea' basefa nemata'w akwama mafe'agon hi'alagon.
40009027	Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' etin, nati amam biam naep mase'ami magi'mana mofalana mehip ma'i, “Ine' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
40009028	Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis anota ipat nomon, ea', amama mafi'mai anan nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda'epa bo'wepa?” Ea' amam ma'i, “A'e, Dembinai afa'inai.”
40009029	Ea' nasa lagofa naep amamumi na'i, “Ae' egawepa, ipe' pa'i ae' la'ifiwei. Na'ama ae' enda' naep ipe'imi ambo'om wapoti' mondahama pembale'efa ae'.”
40009030	Ea' dei' naep amamumi ambo'om matologon andeande'. Na'ama Jisas na'ipam basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pefe' pi'ipa enis amam nematawa ma anda'epa bo'wepa, owa'.”
40009031	Ea' amam mafe' mawalapa basef ma'ipa amam nematawa hiesi ma'i Jisas nanda' naep amamumi bo'om. Ea' basef amama mafe'agon hi'alagon.
40009032	Amam amama naep mase'ami mafe' etin, esis sofa'i anona aman malogel nase'anai. Anan ambal aonai nanda'ana, na'ama ina noga na'i basef, owa'. Ea' sofa'ana nafi'mai Jisas.
40009033	Jisas natofa ambal anama aonai. Na'ama dei' aman anama na'i andeande'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi ukup matamea ma aman anama sa'i, “Fowa' ape' Israel ina mati anom amamaga amama, owa'etin.”
40009034	Ea' amam Farisi dambami esis Judai mambaso'am ma'i, “Anan natofa ambagof awami ma pepel anan dembinai ma ambagof awami amama.”
40009035	Maol Jisas nanda'anai nape na'ama. Anan nohafel nafe' wambel hiagoma na'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Nafe' nawis ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi na'ipasa siowis kingdom heveni. Anan nagiambama amam nematawa hiesi awes hianai naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
40009036	Ea' nati amam nematawa hiesi uwahipis esis ukup mololas sape umbamahas kwapete'. Ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' enin epen nimafias. Ea' nati esis uwahipis.
40009037	Ea' na'ipa alupisi ananisi anom basef na'i, “Ipe' piti aof hianai gwa'aimi hiami maof ea'. Ea' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiase, kwawie'is.
40009038	Ipe' pihali' Dembinai ofagonama aofi. Pihali'ana ma nosapa' epes hiesi sefe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sembe'am etifigin.”
40010001	Ea' Jisas nofalai alupumi 12-peleim ananimi mafi'mai anan nase'am agof lu'wami nanda'am mataga la'ifima meatofa ambagof awami ea' monda' hiesi awes hianai naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
40010002	Amam amama Aposel 12-peleim Jisasi, agof amamumi amama. Nali'i Saimon agel wa'ana Pita, owalomana ananinai Andru. Ea' Jems Sebedi nogalomana naloma owalomana Jon,
40010003	ea' Filip naloma Bartolomyu, Tomas naloma ae' Matyu anda' basef amae' efa'asa takis. Ea' Jems Alfius nogalomana, Tadius,
40010004	ea' Saimon anan epes hiesi Seloti. Ea' aman anama Judas nawalapa Jisasa amam naumbih ananimi.
40010005	Jisas nasapa' amam amama 12-peleim mafe', nase'ama basef amam na'i, “Ipe' ina pefe'ma epes isima owa' sogawa Godi, owa'. Ea' ina pefe' piwis anona wambel etap esis Samariainai, owa'.
40010006	Ipe' pefe' ma esis epes hiesi Israel etisi sape si'i sipsip higilalam.
40010007	Pefe' pewalapa basef na'ama pi'i, ‘Nemaf bu'unai nafi'i felefele' ea' ma ipe' piowis kingdom heveni.’
40010008	Ipe' penda' awesisi bo'wes pefala saga'i sope namis wapoti', penda' isima awes aonai nanda' alop asasinai nambu'wi sotaga bo'wes. Ea' petofa ambagof awami mapeisi. Pepel Godi ipe' pefa'anai, anama ipe' pefa'ana etin, ina patalana otamba, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' pese'asana etin esis ina sotaloma ipe', owa'etin.
40010009	Ipe' ina pelo' otamba gol silva moloma kapa poket isalef ipe'imi, owa'.
40010010	Ipe' ina pefa' roksak o siaogw biam atom, o su moloma bandefah pandahe'amon pafi'iami, owa'. Dei' main, epes sanda' maoli, andeande'ma sofa' gwa'aimi asasimi.
40010011	I'i ipe' pefe' piowis anona wambel, ata' petologon pegawagon andeande'. Aman wambel anamainai emi egafuna bu'unai nie'i awima ipe', pepe peloma anan atona pefe' ma nemaf anama pekwaha wambel anama pefe'.
40010012	Nemaf anama ipe' pefe' piowis anona ipat, pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sape ipat anama pi'i, ‘Ipe' pepe opalef awanem.’
40010013	I'i enis sape ipat anama bu'wasi senda'mepa waf sie'i a'e ma ipe', nambimb basef ipe'imi opalef awanemami mopomas. I'i owa', hapaimi, basef amama bu'wami motanimani mopomepa la'ela'ef.
40010014	I'i enin epen nendaiwa'ma nease'epa opafa nefa'epa pefe' piowis ipat ananinai ma nindaiwa' ma neame' basef ipe'imi, pehafel pekwaha ipat anama o taun anama ea' pindilamam nombol sopof mail bo'wagah ipe'imi, ma sitilipa sogawa waf aonai asasinai ofagena asasinai atona.
40010015	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemaf anama lu'unai anona nemaf God nowaloga epesanai, niti esis fowa' gani sape Sodom Gomora uwahipis andeande'. Ea' epes isima wambel anamaisi ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Nimanimi awami endilisi anona nemaf motagamas.”
40010016	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' peme', ae' esapa'epa pefe' si'i sipsip pefe' la'afena nombagw wandafumi aolupumi. Na'ama ipe' ukup mondanda' andeande' pefe' pila gawa si'i iguf mafe'. Ea' pila waf bu'unai si'i anona amil ma'unai, ipe' ina ukup mope aoma penda' waf aonai, owa'.
40010017	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma anom amam. Anona nemaf sonda' kotimipa ma amam dambami Juda ea' sehepa nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi.
40010018	Amam mogawa ipe' panda' maol ae'anai ea' mondaiwa'mepa, ea' mofa'epa pefe' pitu naep kinga gavman dambami ma peawalapa basef ae'ami bu'wami ma amam moloma esis amam nematawa ina sogawa Godi pi'ipasam.
40010019	Nemaf anama esis sowalapepa ma basef, ipe' ina umbamehepa pi'i, ‘Nambimb ape' mogwa basef mi'iam mi'imama?’ Owa'. Nogota anama atona God nihi'ambepa maim basef ipe' pewalapam pi'iam.
40010020	Amama ina ipe' etipa pi'iam, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Ahalomepa Godi atona nowalapa basefa malogof ipe'imi.
40010021	Nemaf anama esis hiesi sahin owan sonda' basefa enis sohas soga'. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'ama etina esis nogamas batawiamas asasisi. Ea' nogamas batawisas wapoti' sonda' masa basefa mamasas asasisi enis sohas soga'.
40010022	Anona nemaf epes hiesi wambel hiagoma siti ipe' pila basef ae'ami, ea' opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa Ae' la'ifis situma seatagama nemaf akutainai, anona nemaf God nefa'as sotanimani.
40010023	I'i esis sape anona taun sonda' waf aonaima ipe', pefa' pefe' anona wambel. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ataga epen endillisiwei. Ipe' ina pefe' pembefa maol ae'anai wambel anama Israeli hiagoma, ata' owa', ipe' piti ae' iefi'i.
40010024	Epes sanda' skul etin ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Ea' epen inima agel a'an nanda' maol etini enin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'.
40010025	I'i esis sanda' skuli sope na'ama etin si'i tisa asasinai, esis ukup mi'i andeande'. Ea' i'i enin epen agel a'an nanda' maol etini nepe si'i dembinai ananinai, isima wapoti' andeande'. Ae' Dembiwei Ahalomepa ma wambota ae'anai esis sa'i basef awami ma agel ae'anai sa'i ae' Belsebul. Na'ama anona nemaf esis si'ipipa sonda'mepa agof awami endilisi mikila' agel Belsebul sanda'meana ae'.
40010026	Na'ama ipe' ina umbamehepa ma amam, owa'. Amamaga hiami mape mandambahi'i anona nemaf motaga alihim hiesi sotolom sogawam. Ea' amamaga hiami ata' sambaho'am mapani anona nemaf motaga mondawalap, hiesi sogawam.
40010027	Basef amae' ambahe'am owamb a'ipa ipe' etipami, amama pewalapam pi'iam alip. Ea' basef pame'am sa'iam so'uso'umbili, amama petoma ifagw ilif pewalapam pi'iama amam nematawa some'am.
40010028	Ipe' ina umbamehepama esis soha alop atona neaga'i, ea' anona nemaf esis ina la'ifisa soha ambagof ipe'mi, owa'. Ea' ipe' umbamehepama aman anama la'ifinai ma noha alop si'ina noloma ambagof ipe'imi ma wambel aonai hel.
40010029	Ipe' pegawa epes satala amiguf sa'umi biam ma moni owap wa'anai atotona. Ea' Ahalomepa ipe'inai ina nati anona amil atotona nowai etin, owa'. Numafiam andeande'.
40010030	Ea' neambam auf malo balagah ipe'imi dende' hi'alam.
40010031	Na'ama ipe' ina umbamehepa. Anan okom napoma ipe' pikila' amiguf hiami amama.”
40010032	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Emi egafis sowalapa agel ae'anai ma amam nematawa hiesi, anona nemaf ae' wapoti' ewalapa agof epes isima ma naep Ahalome Godi gani heven.
40010033	Ea' emi egafis sowa' alafuga ae' sindaiwa'me ma owa' sowalape si'ipas naep amam nematawai, na'ama etin anona nemaf ae' wapoti' ewa' alafugahas ma naep Ahalome Godi gani ilif heven.”
40010034	Ea' Jisas na'i anom basef wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'i ae' afi'i etap anae' ma eakolasa ipe' peape opalef awanem, owa'. Ae' efa'i bainat hi'elinai afi'i ma nambimb enis epes sohafel sepa' sealoma enis.
40010035	Ae' afi'i ma enda' waf anama lopa' fitapanai neataga, si'i basef ma'iam ma'i, ‘Anona nemaf anona aman noloma ahalomana ananinai mondawaloga biefim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma mama'wakw ondawaloga biefiwa, ea' mefi'ma'w akwo'ukwi koloma ma'makw kwandagi'mokwi ondawaloga biefiwa.
40010036	Ea' esis sape ipat atotona nambimb esis wambota aman anama sondawaloga seataga naumbih.’
40010037	Emi egafis ukup maimaila ahapas mamasas asasisi etis ma owa' ukup mimila ae', epes isima ina setaga alupisi ae'asi endilisi, owa'. Ea' emi egafis ukup asasimi mohafel mimila awasi asasisi, ma owa' ukup mimila ae', isima ina setaga alupisi ae'si, owa'.
40010038	Ae' efa' nimanimi awami anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Emi egafis owa' senda'am na'ama etin si'i ae' ma sieli, epes isima ina la'ifis setaga alupisi ae'asi, owa'.
40010039	Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom si'i sihapilam tatala'im sigiambama ambagof asasimi, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa' ambagof asasimi sotanimani sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
40010040	Emi egafis sese'epa opalefa sie'i ipe' ae'ipai, esis sase'e opalef ae' wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis sase'e opalefa ae', esis sase'ana opalef God nasapa'e afi'i.
40010041	Ea' emi egafis sieti anona aman profeta sie'i, ‘Aman anama profet nanda' maol Godi. Ape' mose'ana opalef migiambamana,’ epes isima anona nemaf sefa' amamaga bu'wami si'i profet anama nefa'ami. Ea' emi egafis sieti anona aman bu'unai nifi'i ma esis sie'i, ‘Ape' ma'i anan aman bu'unai. Ea' migiambamana mese'ana opalef.’ Epes isima anona nemaf sefa' amamaga bu'wami si'i aman anama bu'unai neafa'ami.
40010042	I'i emi egafis sieti enis epes falafisi wafisi o agufisi ma esis sietilis ukup mimila epes isima Jisasi sigiambamas sese'asa embel maim, ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona nemaf epes isima sefa' amamaga asasimi bu'wami ina higililam, owa'.”
40011001	Jisas na'ipama basef amama alupumi ananimi 12-peleim ma hi'alam, nohafel nakwaha wambel anama nafe' taun wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma Galili nawalipa amam nematawa hiesi na'ipasa basef Godi.
40011002	Jon napisi'as embeli nape nanda' kalabus, ea' name' basefa maol hianai Krais nanda'anai. Ea' dei' Jon nasapa' anom alupumi ananimi mafe'ma Krais.
40011003	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' aman ma'wina nafi'i ea', o ata' mope mohafa anona?”
40011004	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona amamaga amama dei' patolomi pami'ami.
40011005	Isima naep mase'asi asati wapoti', bo'wagah awamisi safe' andeande', awes aonai nanda' alop asasinai nambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah mase'asi same' basef andeande', saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti' ea' kwahusi same' basef bu'wami Godi.
40011006	Emi egafis ukup etifim sombale'efa ae', isima sandanifel endilisi.”
40011007	Ea' alupumi amama Joni mafe' etin, Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa hiesi ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipe' pafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma, pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pati anona aman ina nembale'ef andeande'i si'i anona elifita uf nefa'ana nonda' felifal nalimbi? Owa'etin.
40011008	Pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nala luwaguf bu'wami atumi? Owa'etin. Epes isima sala luwaguf bu'wami atom esis sape ifagw bu'wami king dambami atom mapeimi.
40011009	Dei' ipe' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Ae' a'ipipa, anan profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
40011010	Aman anama ea' ma'una anan atona si'i basef mape Baibeli na'iam. God fowa' gani na'ipa Jisas na'i, ‘Ine' neme', anona nemaf ae' esapa' anona aman nofa' basef ae'ami nili' nefe' nendondombamena eaf ine'inai.’
40011011	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli nikila' amam hiami ma etap anae'. Ea' emi egafis dei' siowis kingdom heveni, epes isima dembesi sikila' Jon. I'i epes isima agof a'asi ma kingdom heveni, esis wapoti' dei' sape dembesi sikila'ana.
40011012	Nogota anama fowa' Jon napisi'as embel ea' nafi'i nagata dei', anom amam la'ifimi ma'i mohambombaga waf epes siowis kingdom heveni. Ea' anom amam la'ifimi dei' mawis mape kingdom anama heveni.
40011013	Amam mawalipasa basefa mi'uli Godi maloma basef amam profeti mawalipasam mape mafi'i mataga nogota Jon nataganai.
40011014	I'i ipe' pi'i a'e ma pembale'efa basef amamumi, dei' pegawa Jon anan si'i Elaija, aman anama fowa' amam profet ma'i niefi'i.
40011015	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah magalipei, peme' basef amama andeande'.
40011016	Ae' indila'wifa ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae'i i'imama? Ipe' pape si'i awasi sandatama etifigin sapoma sofala enis awasi sa'i,
40011017	‘Ape' mandani mufapula batagwa ipe', ea' ipe' ina palemb. Ape' manda' awalef malef matamea, ea' ipe' ina palef.’ Ipe' epes dei' pape etap anae' patotopa' basef si'i awasi isima owa' sealemb selef seatasea,
40011018	Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli nafi'i ina na' gwa'aimi embel wainim, owa'. Ea' pa'i ambal aonai napeina.
40011019	Ae' ataga epen endillisiwei afi'i a' gwa'aimi maloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti aman anama na' gwa'aimi hiami na' embel wain hianai endilisi. Anan alupunai ma amam mefa' takisi maloma amam manda' waf aonai!’ Gawa anama gawa bu'unai Godi sonda' waf bu'unai. Epes isima sa'i na'ama, ea' opeh Godi mihi'ambas gawa Ananinai bu'unai endilisi.”
40011020	Wambel hiagoma taun fowa' Jisas nali' nafe' nanda' ikwaf naninani la'ifinai esis satolom sogawam ea' esis ina samboma opalef safe'ma God, owa'. Na'ama dei' Jisas okom numbutina
40011021	na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ati ipe' Korasinipei paloma Betsaidaipei uwahipipa endilisi. Nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamepa. Epes isima fowa' gani sanda' waf aonai sape wambel biefim Tair naloma Saidon ina sati ikwaf la'ifinai naninani si'i dei' anda'ana wambel ipe'inai, owa'. I'i esis seatolom, fowa' sowaho'am begah pepe'agatami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sihi'amba enis epes esis ea' samboma opalef endilisi safe'ma God. Owa'etin.
40011022	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Anona nemaf God nowaloga esis amam nematawa hiesi, anama nimanimi Tairi soloma Saidoni amama ina lu'um endilisi si'i nimanimi anona nemaf meatagamipei, owa'etin. Anona nemaf anan nieti esis uwahipis ea' ipe' owa'.
40011023	Ea' ipe' Kaperneam, anona nemaf esis sefala agof ipe'imi molata ilif? Owa'etin. God nokwahipa pefe' wambel aonai hel. I'i fowa' gani anona aman nonda' anona pepel la'ifinai wambel anama Sodom si'i anda'ana wambel ipe'inai, epes isima Sodom sope etin. Owa'etin. Saga' hi'alas.
40011024	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama lu'unai God nowaloga epesanai, niti esis fowa' sape Sodomi uwahipis. Ea' ipe' anan ina niti uwahipipa, owa'. Ipe' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami awami endilisi.”
40011025	Nemaf anama Jisas na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ahalome, ine' Dembinai ma ilif etapi. Ine' nambaho' amamaga amama ma esis epes gawaisi sofa' gawa lu'unai, ea' nambomam nihi'ambasam epes isima gawa a'asi falafisi isima sape si'i awasi.
40011026	A'e Ahalome okom ine'inai na'i ea' anama atona.
40011027	Ahalome ae'anai nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam mape lagel ae'anai. Ina enin epen negawa ae' Nogalomana Godi, owa'etin. Anan atona nogawe. Ea' owa' enin epen negawa Ahalome, owa'etin. Ae' Nogalomana ananiwei atowe egawana. Ea' emi egafis ihi'ambasa Ahalomei, isima wapoti' esis etis sogawana.
40011028	Ipe' epes panda' maol numa'unai noma'w nahipei ipe' hipei ipe' pifi'mai ae', enda'epa pepoma noma'w.
40011029	Peme' basef ae'ami pilam penda' waf ae'anai. Waf anama si'i anona lawag ae' ase'epana pewandefana ekaguf ipe'imi. Ea' pelafa gawa ae'anai ma pegawa ae'. Dei' main? Ae' anda' waf sa'umbilinai ma epes, ae' ina afela agel ae'anai atona, owa'. Ipe' pifi'mai ae' ma nambimb pepoma noma'wa ambagof ipe'imi.
40011030	Dei' main? Maol ae' ese'epana pefa'anai, anama ina amamaga nimanimi, owa'. Maol anama andepenai bu'unai endilisi ma niegiambama ipe' epes hipei.”
40012001	Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon, nataga anona aof sawa witanai ea' nawis. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' malomana nolomaham magi anom wit maufi magwa'am.
40012002	Ea' amam Farisi mati waf anama alupumi Jisasi manda'anai ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' niti waf anama alupumi ine'imi manda'anai. Amam mosombala mi'uli ma nemaf anama Sabat mapoma noma'wanai. Dei' maina amam manda'am na'ama?”
40012003	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa basef amama ea' ma waf fowa' gani dembinai king Devit nanda'anai. Nemaf anama Devit naloma alupumi ananimi nolomaham.
40012004	Anan nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret anama amam pris mondolali maso' Godanai. Ea' anan na'ana naso' alupumi ananimi wapoti' ma'ana etin. Ea' mi'uli ape'inai na'i amam pris atom mea'ana. Enis epes owa'. Anan ina naila mi'uli anama, owa'.
40012005	Ipe' patalifa basef amama mape buk mi'uli Godi ea' ma amam pris manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nemaf anama Sabat. Basef amama ma nemaf sapoma noma'wanai amam ina magi'am, owa'. Mumbisila'am mawala mi'uli anama. Ea' amam ina manda' waf aonai, owa'.
40012006	Ae' dei' a'ipipa, enin epen dei' nape na'ae enin nikila' ipat lu'unai Godi.
40012007	Basef mail buk Baibel fowa' amam manda'ami ma'iam na'ama ma'i, God na'i, ‘Ae' ina okom na'i bulmakau mafis pindalalima ae'ami, owa'. Ae' okom na'i ipe' piti sahin owan ipe'isi uwahipis.’ I'i ipe' pegawa basef amama Godi ofagema, ipe' ina pewaloga epes isima owa' sonda' anona waf aonai, pi'i awasi. Owa'etin. Ipe' owa' pegawami.
40012008	Dei' main, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' atowe ape Dembiwei ma nemaf anama Sabata i'ipipa maina maol andeande'ma pila basef penda'ana nemaf anama.”
40012009	Jisas nohafel nakwaha aof anama nafe' nawis anona ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai.
40012010	Ea' nati anona aman lagel aonainai nape ipat anama. Wa'ana naga' dindigina nailana. Anom amam ma'i mogolopa anona eafa meambaso'ma Jisasa anom basef baso'maimi ma monda'mana basef. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' andeande'ma wigiambama enis epes awesisi ma nemaf anae' sapoma noma'wanai, o owa'?”
40012011	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai sipsip ananinai nefe' newala nepe anona nowaga lounai nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai, ipe' pafe' pagianai.
40012012	Waf anama bu'unai. Ea' epes sikila' sipsip endilisi. Ea' na'ama etin ape' monda' waf bu'unai migiambama epes nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai.”
40012013	Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anama lagel aonainai na'i, “Dowa lagel ine'inai usi'ina.” Ea' aman nando lagel ananinai nataga bo'ona wapoti', si'i wa'ana.
40012014	Ea' amam dambami Farisi mohafel mawis ande' munduwa'anima ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas neaga'.
40012015	Jisas nogawa amam ma'i mohana neaga'. Ea' nakwaha wambel anama nafe' ea' hiesi sailana safe', nanda' isima awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
40012016	Ea' na'ipas mehip na'i esis ina sowalapa anan si'iana alihina, owa'.
40012017	Anan na'ipas na'ama etin si'i anom basef God fowa' na'ipa profet Aisaiai. Basef amama mataga endilisi ma'iam na'ama ma'i,
40012018	“Piti aman anama nanda' maola ae'i, ae' andandepana ea'. Nomonas ae'ami maimailana endilisi, okom ae'anai ea' bo'oma anan. Ae' nambimb ese'ana Ambal Bu'unai Ae'anai nuwalipasa basef ae'ami ma neawaloga epes hiesi owa' seagawa ae'i ma waf bu'unai usi'inai.
40012019	Aman anama ina nonda' megah mahas ninifalis ni'ipas diga lu'unai, owa'. Esis ina some' malogel ananinai noga nie'i eaf lu'unai, owa'.
40012020	Anona elifita sa'unai nondola'i anama anan ina nowalona, owa'etin. Ea' anona lam fandona sa'osa'ombel, anama anan ina nehefana noga', owa'. Anan nope nonda' maol la'ela'ef nefe' nefe' neatagama nemaf anama nonda' waf bu'unai nikila' endilisi waf aonai ma neawala.
40012021	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi owa' seagawa ae'i sila basef ananimi sope sohafana ma niegiambamas.”
40012022	Nemaf anama esis sofa'ai anona aman ambal aonai nawisanai safi'mai Jisas. Naep mase'ana malogel ananinai nase'ana, ea' Jisas nanda'ana bo'ona, na'i andeande' naep mati natologon nafe' andeande'.
40012023	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i, “Aman anama anan Devit akunamana?”
40012024	Ea' amam Farisi mame' amama mambaso'am ma'i, “Anan natofa ambagof awami ma pepel anan dembinai ma ambagof awami agilinama Belsebul anan atona.”
40012025	Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamumi na'ipam na'i, “I'i enis epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma anona kantri sondawaloga biefisa sopa', ina nambimb la'ifis, owa'. I'i enis epes wambota atotona sondawaloga biefisa sopa', esis nambimb ina la'ifisa seapa', owa'.
40012026	I'i wambota Satani sondawaloga biefis seapa', nambimb wambota ananinai la'ifis si'imama? Owa'.
40012027	I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma pepel Belsebuli, dei' emi nigiambama epes ipe'isi satofam? Owa'. Dei' epes isima ipe'isi etis sihi'ambepa basef ipe'imi owa' endilisimi.
40012028	Endilisi, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nigiambama ae' atofa ambagof amama awami. Ea' dei' ipe' pegawa nemaf anama piowis wambota Godi numafipa dei' natagamepa ea'.
40012029	Anom basef wapoti' amama. Enin epen ina la'ifina nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman la'ifinai napeinai nonda' wala amamaga ananimi, owa'. Enin ata' nili' nombalo'ana nowa'ana tatala'ina, anan la'ifina ma niowis nokolawefa nefa' amamaga ma'oh ipat aman anama.
40012030	Emi egafis owa' alupisi ae'asi ma owa' sepe la'ela'ef seloma ae', esis naumbih ae'asi. Emi egafis owa' sekolasa sipsip moloma ae', esis satofa sipsip mafa' mafe' atona etin deindei.
40012031	Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa, anona nemaf God nokwaha waf aonai naninani hianai noloma basef findiwaimi hiami amam nematawa sanda'ami hi'ilam. Ea' emi egafis sanda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, anona nemaf God ina nokwahomasam, owa'.
40012032	Emi egafis seanda' anom basef awami findiwama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb God nokwahomasa awami amama asasimi. Ea' emi egafis sanda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, anona nemaf God ina nokwahomasam, owa'. Findiwa aonai la'ela'ef nopais, dei' nogota anae' nefe' anona nemaf nogota nigi' neatagai wapoti' nope la'ela'ef hihif.
40012033	Lawah bu'wami mail mola gwa'aimi bu'wami. Lawah awami mail mola gwa'aimi awami. Dei' main, ape' mati gwa'aimi mailami, mogawa lawah bu'wami awami.
40012034	Ipe' epes aopei si'i iguf mahasi, nambimb ipe' la'ifipa pi'i basef bu'wami? Owa'etin. Maim basef mape si'ima opalef epesi, amama atom esis sawalapama malogof asasimi.
40012035	Epes bu'wasi, esis ukup bu'wami mapeis ea' sawalapa waf bu'unai. Ea' epes awasi waf hianai aonai napeis ea' sawalapa waf aonai atona.
40012036	Dei' ae' a'ipipa. Basef hiami amam nematawa sa'iami, anona nemaf God nohali'asa basef amama ea' nowalogas nemaf anama newaloga epes hiesi anai.
40012037	Basef ipe'imi atom anona nemaf God neme'epamam newaloga ipe' ni'i ipe' epes bu'wipei. Ea' i'i owa', ea' basef amama ipe'imi atom anona nemaf God neme'epamam wapoti' newaloga ipe' ni'i ipe' epes aopei.”
40012038	Ea' nemaf anama anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom Farisi mahali'ana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i ine' nenda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God nanda'anai ma afa' ata' otolona.”
40012039	Ea' Jisas nagwamam basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' panda' waf aonai pewa' alafugaha God. Dei' maina ipe' pa'i piti Ae' enda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai ma ihi'ambepa pepel Godi? Ae' ina ihi'ambepa pepel anama ipe', owa'. Ikwaf anama la'ifinai fowa' God nihi'amba profet Jona atona nambimb ihi'ambepana ipe'.
40012040	Fowa' gani aman anama Jona aol lu'unai nowalo'ana nape opaf nomon nimeguf wanom, owambeh wanom. Ea' na'ama etina ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb epe nimeguf wanom owambeh wanom etap nomon.
40012041	Nemaf anama God newaloga esis amam nematawa esis epes Ninivaisi sohafel sola' basef motanima milipa ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Dei' main, esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona na'ipasami ea' samboma opalef safe'ma God. Ea' dei' anona nikila' Jona nape na'ae.
40012042	Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes, nemaf anama ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwapani gani wa'ol aon nowalama lambihilifinama kohafel koloma ipe' pape na'ae kogwamepa basef motanima milipa kwi'i ipe' epes aopei. Dei' main, kwin akwama kwapani gani etap nafe' notambela ea' kwafi'i kwame' basefa gawa lu'unai dembinai king Solomon nawalipasanai. Ea' dei' anona nikila' Solomoni nape na'ae.
40012043	Nemaf anama anona ambal aonai nakwaha enin epen nawisi nafi'i, anan nafe' anama fatauguma nogolopa anagon na'i neapoma noma'w. Owa'. Ina nati anagona neape, owa'.
40012044	Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' etanima efe' ipat fowa' apeinai.’ Ea' nafi'i nati ipat anama sambefana andeande' sofalo'mana nape wafina.
40012045	Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai anom ambagof awami 7-peleim wapoti' mafi'i mawis mape ipat anama. Ambagof amama awami endilisi manda' waf aonai nikila' waf aonai fowa' nali' nanda'anai. Fowa' epen inima nape awen ea' dei' nape awen endilisi nikila' pe fowa' nali' napeinai. Ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' panda' waf aonai, anona nemaf pepe awepa na'ama etin si'i epen inima.”
40012046	Jisas ata' na'ipasa basef etin esis amam nematawa, mama'wana kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i saitu ande' sa'i si'ipana anom basef.
40012047	Ea' anona aman na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ine' neme', mama'wena ine'ikwi kwaloma anom owapena ine'imi safi'i saitu ande' sa'i solomena si'i.”
40012048	Ea' anan nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Mama'we owape ae'asi emi egafis?”
40012049	Ea' nanda' lagel nendela'wifa amam alupumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “Piti mama'we kwaloma owape ae'asi isima.
40012050	Emi egafis sila okom Ahalome nape heven ilif, ma sila waf ananinai, amama atom si'i mama'we owape henitiame ae'asi.”
40013001	Nemaf anama atona Jisas nakwaha ipat nawis ande' nafe' nape felefele'ma walemb batupa'manai lu'unai.
40013002	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalata natoma anona bot sa'unai, esis saitu akata.
40013003	Ea' na'ipasa basef hiami wamon etini na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb witim si'i rais anona aof.
40013004	Anan nowahom nafe', anom mowa eaf safe'ma ea' amiguf mufia' mafi'i ma'am.
40013005	Ea' anom mowa otambaiguma etap ina lu'una, natoma ilif atogon, ina nowala owin. Ea' mataga mehip.
40013006	Ea' owaf naluwi naham alim masilimb ina mowala etap ea' alim.
40013007	Ea' anom mowala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofenia wit, ea' ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
40013008	Ea' anom mowa mafe' etap bu'unai ea' mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi. Anom mola 100-peleim, anom mail mola 60-peleim, ea' anom mail mola 30-peleim atom.
40013009	Ipe' aligah magalipei ma pame' basef amama, peme'am andeande' ukup okokomam.”
40013010	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' maina ine' na'ipasa basef esis womun etin?”
40013011	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God nihi'ambepa basef ofagema mape mandambahi'i ma ipe' piowis kingdom heveni. Ea' epes isima, owa'etin.
40013012	Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Godi nambimb God nowatanimasam wapoti'. Ea' isima owa' sembale'ami, nambimb basef kwawie'im amama esis sombale'efami, God nondalombasam esis sopan etin.
40013013	Basef ofagema ma ae' dei' a'i basef wamun etinami ma esis, amama. ‘Esis sotologon, ea' ina nambimb siti anom amamaga, owa'. Ea' esis some' basef aligah asasimi ea' ina sogawa ofagema, owa'.’
40013014	Esis sanda'am na'ama ma anom basef fowa'imi mandawalap endilisi. Basef amama anona profet Aisaia fowa' God na'ipanam nanda'ami ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' anona nemaf pegehembe' peme' basef, ea' ina pegawa ofagema. Ipe' petologon la'ela'ef, ea' ina piti anom amamaga, owa'.
40013015	Dei' main, ukup amam nematawa isima mase'as endilisi, aligah asasimi mase'as ukup iwanima seame' basef. Ea' sasopama naep asasimi ma siti amamaga. I'i owa', seme' basef aligah asasimi ma sogawa basef ofagema ma ukup asasimi. Ama esis somboma opalef sila ae' ma enda'as bo'wes wapoti'. Owa'.’
40013016	Ea' ipe' pandanifel. Dei' main, naep ipe'imi ea' mati amamaga, aligah ipe'imi mame' basef.
40013017	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' gani amam profet hiami maloma anom amam manda' waf bu'unai ma'i miti amamaga amama dei' ipe' patulumi, owa'. Ukup amamumi maimailam endilisi ma mame' basef amama ipe' pame'ami. Owa. Amam ina mame'am.
40013018	Ipe' peme' basef ofagema amama womun etina aman anama nowaha olelemb gwa'aimi aof.
40013019	Basef amama ma epes siowis kingdom heveni mape na'ama. Olelemb mowa eafi amama si'i epes isima same' basef amama, esis ina okokoma basef, owa'. Ea' Satan nafi'i nofa' basef amama God nase'asam opalef asasimi nakwahom nafe'.
40013020	Ea' anom mowa mafe' anagon otambaiguma, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi sofa'am mehip sandanifelamam.
40013021	Isima si'i masilimb ina mowala etap owin. Esis sembale'am nogota bandana etin ea' nemanimi matagamas enis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sembale'a basef Godi sanda'as findiwas sahas sanda'masa waf aonai ea' sandahagas satanima.
40013022	Anom mowa mandelef wandafumi la'afen, amama si'i enis epes same' basef sailam safe', ukup matamea ma amamaga amama mape etapi ma ukup maimaila moni maim hiami ea' amama mataga maofania basef Godi. Ea' ina sombale'ef sanda' waf bu'unai la'ifis, owa'.
40013023	Ea' anom mowa etap bu'unai si'i epes isima same' basef bu'wami ma ukup asasimi maimailam sogawama sanda' waf bu'unai. Enis sanda' waf bu'unai si'i olelemb mola 100-peleim, enis si'i mola 60-peleim. Ea' enis si'i mola 30-peleim atom.”
40013024	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anom basef womun etin wapoti' esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb bu'wami gwa'aimi aof ananinai.
40013025	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', owamb esis hiesi sa'ihi, anona aman naumbihinai nafi'i nowaha otalef awami wapoti' aof anama anan do'ok nowaha olelemb bu'wami ea' nafe'.
40013026	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' olelemb amama bu'wami mataga ma monafa mola gwa'aimi, amam manda' maola aman ofagonama aof ea' mati otalef awami mataga mape maloma olelemb bu'wami.
40013027	Ea' mati na'ama, mafi'i ma'ipa anan ma'i, ‘Dembinai, afa' wa'i ine' newaha olelemb bu'wami aof ine'inai. Ea' otalef amama awami malo. Emi newahom mataga?’
40013028	Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Anona aman naumbihinai nanda'am.’ Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ugi otalef amama awami owa'aniam mo'oh atogon?’
40013029	Ea' aman anama na'ipam na'i, ‘Owa'. Na'ama pelalama wit pigiam moloma otalef awami.
40013030	Ipe' kwahowam mope atifima la'isitai, ea' usifa'am. Nogota anama sofa' gwa'aimianai, ae' i'ipa amam manda' maol anama i'ipam i'i, “Ipe' piwa'ania otalef amama awami piwasi'am ondogw mo'oha peofam. Ea' petama wit pefa'am pekolasom mofe' miowis mo'oh ipat ae'anai.” ’ ”
