40013031	Ea' Jisas nase'asa anom basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i nalof su'utipi sa'umi. Anona aman nofa'am nawam aof ananinai.
40013032	Nalelef mastetimi sa'usa'umi. Ina lu'um si'i su'utip gwa'aimi lawah hiami, owa'. Amama sa'usa'um endilisi. Ea' mataga malo, lu'um mikila' gwa'aimi hiami mape aofi. Amam mataga si'i lawag lu'unai ea' amiguf mafi'i mala alegah mail agof.”
40013033	Ea' nawalapa anom basef womun etin wapoti' ma esis na'i, “Epes isima siowis kingdom heveni si'i yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'am kwambomam maloma plaua hiami mala dram lu'unai ea' plaua hiami matef lu'um.”
40013034	Ea' Jisas nawalapa basef amama hiami womun etina amam nematawa isima hiesi. Anan ina na'ipasam alihim, owa'. Na'iam womun etin.
40013035	Anom basef anona aman profet fowa' gani nanda'ami dei' mataga alihim mandawalap mapan. Profet anama na'iam na'ama na'i, “Anona nemaf ae' ie'i malogel i'i basef womun etin. Ae' ie'i basef mape mandambahi'i dambadamba God nanda' ilif etap mafi'i mafi'i mataga dei'.”
40013036	Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha esis amam nematawa hiesi nafe' ipat, ea' alupumi ananimi mafi'mai anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Basef amama womun etina otalef awami mataga aof, ine' newalapa ofagema ma afa'.”
40013037	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Aman nowaha olelemb bu'wami anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.
40013038	Ea' aof anama si'i wambel etap anae' hiagoma. Ea' olelemb amama bu'wami si'i epes siowis kingdom heveni. Ea' otalef awami, amama si'i epes awasi Satani.
40013039	Ea' aman anama naumbihinai nowaha otalef awami, anan Satan. Ea' nogota anama sola gwa'aimianai, anama si'i nemaf akutainai ma etap anae' hiagoma. Ea' amam amama mola gwa'aimi witi, amama si'i amam ensel.
40013040	Nemaf anama amam motama otalef awami mofam nif hi'ilalm na'ama etin si'i nemaf akutainai.
40013041	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei anona nemaf ae' esapa'i amam ensel ae'ami ea' motofa amamaga amama hiami manda' epes sanda' waf aonai moloma amam nematawa isima hiesi sanda' waf aonai muli'amonas seakwaha kingdom Ae'anai.
40013042	Ea' amam ensel mokwaha epes isima sefe' nif lu'wami fandomi sepe nif amama selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sope awes.
40013043	Nemaf anama amam nematawa bu'wasi seataga wanefigeis si'i aon alipunai nalatawi kingdom Ahalomasi. Epes aligah mapaipei, ipe' peame' basef amama andeande'.
40013044	Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anom amamaga satalom otamba hiami sambaho'am ma'oh anona aof etap. Ea' anona aman nafi'i natolom nambaho'am wapoti'. Anan nandanifel endilisi nafe' nofala enis epes safi'i sase'ana moni ma satala amamaga ananimi hi'alam. Ea' nofa' moni anama nafe' natala aof anama.
40013045	Anom basef wapoti', epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona aman nanda' bisnis nagolopa enis ombahigis bu'wasi etis.
40013046	Ea' nati enis bu'wasi endilisi satalis otamba hiami nofala enis epes safi'i ma sase'ana otamba satala amamaga ananimi hi'alam. Ea' nofa' otamba ma isima nafe' natala ombahigis isima fasisi etis.
40013047	Anom basef wapoti'. Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona anemb anom amam mafe' malana nowala walemb batupa'manai lu'unai malimai agof mamumami.
40013048	Ea' anemb anama si'ina ma agof mahende'ana nafi'i akata wata'ita. Ea' mape masifa'ma agof bu'wami atom malo'am holalef. Ea' awami makwahom.
40013049	Ama anona nemaf akutainai etap anae' ea' na'ama etin si'i amam masifa'ma agof bu'wami dei awami dei. Nemaf anama amam ensel mufi'i misifa'mas sanda' waf aonai sape la'afena amam nematawa isima bu'wasi mofa'as mefe'
40013050	mokwahis sefe' nif lu'wami fandomi. Ama seapan nif amama lu'wami sowa selef kwapete'as nalelef tilili talala' sopan la'ela'ef.”
40013051	Ea' Jisas nahali' alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' ea' pegawa basef amama hiami o owa'?” Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “A'e.”
40013052	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Amom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi molafa basef ananimi ma miowis kingdom heveni, amam mandahama si'i anona aman ofagonama ipati. Anan nafe' nawis ipat nomon nofa'ai amamaga bu'wami namumi maloma apimi ea' nofa'am nafi'i.”
40013053	Jisas nawalipam basef amama womun etin ma ea', nakwaha wambel anama
40013054	nafe' wambel ananinai ofagama. Ea' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nasefela basef Godi na'ipasam. Anan na'iam na'ama esis gegelalasis kwapete' sa'i, “Gawa anama naloma pepel anama ma nanda' amamaga si'i God nanda'ami, anan nofa'ana eti?
40013055	A'i aman anama nogalomana aman nala' ifagwi Maria kolanai? Ape' mogawa owalopana ananimi Jems Josep Saimon Judas mape na'ae.
40013056	Henitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'ae. Ea' amamaga amama gawa bu'unai anan nofa'ana eti?”
40013057	Ea' sowa' alafugaha anan. Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet nofa' agel lu'unai wambel hiagoma deindei, sa'i anan dembinai sembale'efana. Ea' ina nofa' agel lu'unai wambel ofagama ananima, wambota ananinai sapoma, owa'.”
40013058	Ea' esis owa' sembale'efana, owa'. Na'ama dei' anan ina nanda' anom amamaga la'ifimi hiami wambel anama, owa'.
40014001	Nemaf anama anona aman agilinama Herot nape dembinai gavmana etap hiagoma Galili. Anan name' basefa maol bu'unai Jisas nanda'anai, ea' name' safela agel Jisasi nafe' lu'una.
40014002	Ea' Herot na'ipa isima sanda'mana maol na'i, “Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli dei' nohafel wapoti' nape la'ifina nanda' maol si'i God nanda'anai.”
40014003	-
40014004	Fowa' basef amama mape na'ama. Herot owalomana Filip waulu'mana anani'wi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahalomana Herot nandalombana'w. Ea' Jon na'ipa Herot na'i, “Ine' naso' nemata'w sahalomenai, ea' nawala mi'uli Godi. Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.” Ea' Herot nandaiwa'ma neali'amona'w ea' na'ipa amam soldia mombalo' Jon mofa'ana mafe' manda'ana nanda' kalabus.
40014005	Herot na'i nohana noga', ea' owa'etin. Dei' main, anan umbamahanama amam nematawa hiesi sa'i Jon anona profet. Na'ama Herot ina nahana, owa'.
40014006	-
40014007	Nafe' ma anona nemaf Herot nofala epes hiesi safi'i sandakolas etifigin nandanifela ma nemaf mama'wana kolanai. Nemaf anama Herodias nogama'w kwafi'i kwawisi nomon kwaitu kwalemb. Esis hiesi satolo'w ea' Herot nandanifela ma akwa'w na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi gani ilif na'iam na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipina, i'i ine' ni'ipa ae' ma ease'ena anom amamaga ae', ese'enam.”
40014008	Ea' akwa'w kwafe'ma mama'wakw kwahali'akw kwafe' kwa'ipa Herot kwa'i, “Dei' etef ae' a'i ine' neha aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli neaga' netopa' balaga nola anona plet nefa'anai nese'eana.”
40014009	-
40014011	Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, opaf Heroti nimanina endilisi. Ea' anan okom na'i basef endilisi gani ilif na'iam la'ifimi, ea' amam nematawa hiesi isima same'ana. Ea' nasapa' anona aman soldia nafe' ipat kalabusanai natopa' bagato'w Joni nala balaga nala anona plet nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'ana kwafe' kwaso' mama'wakw.
40014012	Ea' amam alupumi Joni mafi'i mofa' alop si'ina mafe' mawana hi'agif. Ea' mafe' ma'ipa Jisasa amamaga amama.
40014013	Jisas name' basef amama, anan atona nafe' nakwaha wambel anama nofa' bot nafe' anagon wafiguma epes a'agoma. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa Jisas nafe', sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sailana safe' eaf sa'i sotolona.
40014014	Jisas nafe' nataga akata nati esis hiesi nati uwahipis. Ea' nati epes asasisi awes nanda'asi nanda'as sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
40014015	Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'ae wafiguma ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb. Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel asasima setala gwa'aimi sonda'am sea'am.”
40014016	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina esapa'as sefe', owa'. Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.”
40014017	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aimi ina hiam. Bret lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam ea' ma'um ma'omafa.”
40014018	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fa'am fi'i pese' ae'.”
40014019	-
40014020	Ea' na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sape otalef bu'wami etap. Ea' nafela bret anama lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God ea' nawalam naso' alupumi ananimi mafe' mase'as sa'am dende' alihis andeande'. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tu'wa'wanimi ma'ihi malo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim si'im endilisi.
40014021	Epes sa' gwa'aimi amama hiesi. Esis seamba amam atom mataga 5,000-peleim. Ea' ina seamba awasi nematawa, owa'.
40014022	Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anama mambo fisana. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa isima hiesi safe'.
40014023	Safe'ma ea', anan atona nandowasa' halaf nape nanda' beten nahali' God. Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, anan atona ata' napani halaf ilif.
40014024	Ea' alupumi ananimi mape bot mali' mafe' mape walemb batupa'manai lu'unai la'afen, ea' uf lu'unai naluwi. Ea' naoh fepo mafi'i makwasa bot. Ea' uf wapoti' nalo nakoto'ma bot, nanda'am bumu boma nala.
40014025	Owamb ata' nail etin, felefele'ma lala, Jisas nailam natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma amam.
40014026	Amam mati anan naitu nafi'i embel ilif, umbamaham kwapete' ma'i, anona gamba nailam nafe'. Ea' manda'am wige' ma'oh kwapete'am.
40014027	Ea' Jisas nalomam na'i mehip na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa umbamehepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
40014028	Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai! I'i ine' ma'wina, ni'ipa ae' itu efe'mago ine' embel ilif.”
40014029	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i.” Ea' Pita nakwaha bot natoma nafe' embel ilif nafe'ma Jisas.
40014030	Ea' anan nati naoh mohafel lu'um, umbamahana na'i nowala naoh. Ea' nofala Jisas na'i, “Dembinai! Nigiambame.”
40014031	Ea' mehip etin Jisas nowasa' lagel nahapilana na'ipana na'i, “Ine' owa' nembale'ef la'ifina ni'i ae' la'ifiwei, owa'. Dei' maina ine' nomonas mape biefim?”
40014032	Ea' amam biam malata bot, uf naloma embel mandahagas.
40014033	Ea' amam mape boti mati amamaga amama manda' lotuma Jisas mafela agel Godi lu'una ma'i, “Endilisi etis, ine' nogalomana Godi.”
40014034	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mafe' mataga anagon etap hiagoma Genesaret.
40014035	Ea' enis epes sape etap anama sagawana sa'i anama Jisas. Ea' sasapa' enis safe' sa'ipa enis sape felefele'i hiagoma sofa'ai enis epes awes nanda'asi safi'mai anan.
40014036	Ea' sofa'ai isima awes nanda'asi sa'ipana saisailana sa'i anan ni'i a'e ma isima sohapila lowaf ananinai da'malifina atona. Ea' emi egafis sahapila lowaf ananinai sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
40015001	Nemaf anama anom Farisi esis Judai maloma anom amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas. Ea' mahali'ana ma'i,
40015002	“Dei' maina alupumi ine'imi mumbisila' waf ape'inai akupapa mase'apenai? Ama amam owa' measa'opa lagofa mea' gwa'aimi.”
40015003	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pawala mi'uli Godi ma paila waf ipe'inai atona?
40015004	Ipe' pawala basef God na'iam na'i, ‘Ipe' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pembale'efas pigiambamas. Emi egafis si'i basef awami ma ahapas mamasas asasisi, isima enis epes sohas soga'.’
40015005	Ea' ipe' pambaso'am pa'i anom basef na'ama pa'i, Emi epen nindaiwa'ma nigiambama mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba maim ae'ami andaiwa'ma ese'epam. Ae' andandepama ese'anam God.’
40015006	Ea' ipe' Farisi paloma ipe' enipa pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ipe' pa'i a'e ma epen inima nembaso'ma mamasan, ea' ina nagiambamas. Ipe' panda' waf anama pesambala basef amama Godi na'i migiambama mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'inai atona lu'una.
40015007	Fowa' profet Aisaia nendela'wifa ipe' endilisi, ipe' pa'i basefa malogof biam. Anan nanda'am andeande' dende'ma ipe' na'iam na'ama na'i,
40015008	‘Amam nematawa isima safela agel ae'anai lu'una malogof asasimi atom ande', ea' opalef asasimi mape laogona ae'. Ukup asasimi ina sembale'efa ae', owa'.
40015009	Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'ami. Esis sawalapa mi'uli epes sape etapi sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mi'uli anama basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu safela agel ae'anai atona.’ ”
40015010	Ea' Jisas nofala esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' hipei peme' basef Ae'ami okokomam pegawam andeande'.
40015011	Amamaga gwa'aimi maim ande'ami ipe' pegwa'am mowala nomon, amama ina manda'epa awepa, owa'. Ea' amamaga mape ukup ipe'imi nomon mawisi ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.”
40015012	Ea' alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' negawa amam Farisi mame' basef amama ine'imi mandaiwa'mam opalef aoma ine'?”
40015013	Ea' nagwa basef womun etina amam na'ipam na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai nape heveni nawa amamaga anona aof. Ea' amamaga hiami anan owa' neawami, amama anona nemaf nigiam moloma nombalef masilimb.
40015014	Ipe' kwahowa amam Farisi ata' mopan. Amam si'i amam naep mase'ami ma'i mihi'amba eafa enis epes. I'i esis naep mase'asi si'i sihi'amba eaf enis epes isima naep mase'asi, atuwasi esis hiesi sondakolas dogwas sefe' sowala etin kwambiwag.”
40015015	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ine' ni'i basef amama ofagema womun etina amamaga awami ma afa' ata' weame'am.”
40015016	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' wapoti' nomonas ata' a'epa?
40015017	Ipe' owa' ata' pegawa! Amamaga ande'ami mawis malogofa mowala opalef, amama motanima mawisi ande' mafe' mowala dowah.
40015018	Ea' amamaga mape ipe' nomon, ukup awami maim mataga ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.
40015019	Amamaga awami mape ukup nomon mawisi ande' amama. Ukup awami, waf soha enis seaga', waf sanda' so'a waulanai, ea' sonda' anona waf aonai si'i waf anama so'a waulanai, wal, baso'am, findiwa.
40015020	Waf anama atona nawisi ande' nanda' epes awes. Ea' epes owa' seasa'opa lagof andeande'ma sea' gwa'aimi si'i amam Farisi ma'iam, amama ina manda'as awes, owa'.”
40015021	Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' gani wa'ol etap felefele'ma wambel anama biefina Tair Saidon.
40015022	Ea' ano'w nemata'w Kenani'wi kwafi'i kofalana na'ama kwa'i, “O, Dembinai, ine' akunamana Deviti, ine' niti ae' uwahipiwi. Ambal aonai nahambombaga nogame ae'akwi endilisi ea' kofa' nimanimi endilisi.”
40015023	Ea' Jisas ina nagwama'wa anom basef akwa'w, owa'. Ea' amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai anan ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Nemata'w akwama kwanda'am falafala kwagi'mafa. Ine' sapa'akw kotanima kofo'o!”
40015024	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ipa'w na'i, “God nasapa' ae' afi'i ma epes sape si'i sipsip higilalapi isima esis Israeli etis.”
40015025	Ea' akwa'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' nigiambama ae'.”
40015026	Ea' nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ape' ina mofa' gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi makwahom mafe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
40015027	Ea' akwa'w kwagwamana basef anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i endilisi. Ea' nombagw mafe' owina tebol matatama gwa'aimi mowa etapi magwa'am.”
40015028	Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “O, nemata'w, bale'ef ine'inai lu'unai. Dei' amamaga ina okom na'iami atuwasi meatagamena si'i ine' na'iam.” Ea' nogota anama atona nogama'w akwa'ukwi ambo'okw wapoti'.
40015029	Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' felefele'ma walemb batupa'manai Galili. Ea' nondowasa' anona halaf tol nape.
40015030	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i satagamana sofa'ai esis awes naninani nanda'asi safi'mai anan. Enis bo'wagah awamisi, enis naep mase'asi, bihiguf mondola'asi, enis malogof mase'asi, awes naninani nanda'asi. Esis sofa'as safi'i sambe'as sa'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi ea' nanda'as bo'wes.
40015031	Ea' esis gegelalasisa sati epes isima naep mase'asi satologon, malogof mase'as sa'i, bihiguf mondola'asi ea' usi'im, bo'wagah awamisi ea' bo'om safe'. Ea' dei' esis hiesi safela agel God Israeli lu'una.
40015032	Ea' Jisas nofalai alupumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isima uwahipis. Esis sape salome nimeguf wanom gwa'aimi a'as nolomahas endilisi. I'i ae' esapa'as sefe' etin utagw wambel asasima, siti noga atona sowa so'oh sefe' eaf.”
40015033	Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipana na'ama ma'i, “Anae' wafiguma epes a'agoma. Atuwasi afa' ofa'ai bret eti ma weaso' amam nematawa isima hiesi?”
40015034	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' bret ma'um ma'oh?” Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' bret 7-peleim ma'omafa maloma agof sa'umi kwasala'um.”
40015035	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa sope etap,
40015036	nafela bret 7-peleim maloma agof amama nanifela God nawalom naso' alupumi ananimi ma mease'asam esis amam nematawa hiesi. Amam mase'as hi'alas dende'.
40015037	Ea' sa'am dende' elihis andeande'. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi makolasom maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 7-peleim si'im endilisi.
40015038	Esis amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama, seamba amam atom mataga 4,000-peleim. Ea' esis ina seamba awasi nematawa wapoti', owa'.
40015039	Jisas nasapa'as safe' ea', anan nalata bot nafe' gani wa'ol walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anona etap lu'unai Magadan.
40016001	Ea' anom Farisi maloma anom Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas ma'i mogwambana ma anan ata' nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God nape heven ilifi nanda'anai ma ata' motolona.
40016002	Ea' anan nagwamam anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' pati otaga wambomota felefele'ma owamb ea' pa'i, ‘Otaga nasa'of akwahina. Na'ama atuwasi nogota bo'otama owaf nilowata.’
40016003	Ea' kuhimbita pa'i, ‘Otaga ilagw ea' alialim. Manda'am na'ama ma atuwasi uf nuluwi asaf nolai.’ A'e, ipe' pati ikwaf hianai ilifanai etapanai andeande' ea' dei' ipe' owa' pegawa ikwaf nogota anae' andeande'.
40016004	Ipe' epes hiesi amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' panda' waf aonai pewa' alafugaha God. Dei' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Ea' ae' owa'etina enda'ana potolona, owa'. Ikwaf anama la'ifinai fowa' God nihi'amba profet Jona atona nambimb ihi'ambepana ipe'.” Jisas na'ipam ea', nakwahom nafe'.
40016005	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mataga fisana, ea' amam ukup mase'ama mofa' anona bret nolomam.
40016006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma yis amama amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi!”
40016007	Ea' amam mame' anan na'iam na'ama, amam manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup mase'afa bret na'ihi, dei' na'ipafa.”
40016008	Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamumi na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai ina la'ifina. Dei' maina ipe' panda'ipama pa'i, ‘Afa' bret a'afa?’
40016009	Ipe' ukup ma'i ma bret anama wanifina biefina esis hiesi 5,000-peleis sa'ana ma tu'wanina na'ihi, o owa'? Pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im? Ipe' ata' owa' pegawa?
40016010	Ipe' owa' ukup mi'i bret amama 7-peleim nemaf anama hiesi 4,000-peleis sagwa'anai tu'wanina na'ihi pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?
40016011	Dei' maina ipe' owa' peagawa? Ae' ina a'ipipa bret endilisinai, owa'. Ae' a'i ipe' pindumafuma yis amama amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi.”
40016012	Ea' dei' amam mogawa, anan ina na'ipama yis amama endilisimi, owa'. Anan na'i amam mundumafuma basef amam Farisi maloma amam Sadyusi mawalipasami.
40016013	Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma alupumi ananimi mataga felefele'ma wambel hiagoma Sisaria Filipai. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Amam nematawa esis sogawa ae' ataga epen endilisiwei sogawa maina agel sanda'meana?”
40016014	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Enis sa'i ine' Elaija. Ea' enis sa'i ine' Jeremaia o enina profet.”
40016015	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' emi?”
40016016	Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' Krais, aman anama God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i. Ine' nogalomana God ambal namunai napeinai.”
40016017	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef Pita na'i, “Saimon, ine' nogalomana Jonai, ine' nendanifel endilisi. Dei' main, ina anona aman etapanai nihi'ambena basef amae' na'iam, owa'. Ahalome atona nape heveni nihi'ambenam na'iam.
40016018	Dei' a'ipina endilisi, agel ine'inai Pita, agel anama na'i owap. Nambimb ae' enda' maol la'ifinai ma sios ae'ami motoma owap anama ilif. Ama pepel anama ga'inai ina la'ifina nikila'a amam, owa'etin.
40016019	Ae' nambimb ese'ena ki utainai ine' ma kingdom heveni. Amamaga ine' nehapilam nape na'ae etapi, amama anona nemaf God nohapilam gani heven ilif wapoti'. Ea' maim amamaga ine' nekwahom na'ae etapi, amama anona nemaf God nokwahom gani heven ilif wapoti'.”
40016020	Ea' Jisas na'ipam basef la'ifimi na'i amam ina mi'ipasa basef amama enis epes mi'i Anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, owa'. Mombaho'ana.
40016021	Nogota anama Jisas nali' nahafel nihi'amba alupumi ananimi ma nambimb nofe' niwis Jerusalem ama agufumi Judai mease'ana nimanimi lu'wami. Amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi moloma amam pris dambami nambimb mose'ana nimanimi lu'wami anona mohana noga'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilama anona neafe'ma wanomi ea' notanima nohafel wapoti'.
40016022	Ea' Pita nofa' Jisas nelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, owa'etin. Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma amamaga amama mogatagama ine', owa', hapaimi!”
40016023	Ea' Jisas nandamboma na'ipa Pita na'i, “Ine' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ine' owa' okom ni'i okom Godi, owa'. Okom na'i nomonas epes sape etapi etis. Ine' nehopa eaf ae'anai, Si'amae nefe' alafuga ae'anai.”
40016024	Dei' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' nimanimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. I'i emi egafis si'i sila ae', esis senda'am na'ama etin si'i ae' ma sieili. Ea' sehagofa ukup asasimi ma maina maol esis sa'i senda'anai.
40016025	Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa'as sotanimani sopan andeande' la'ela'ef.
40016026	I'i emi egafis seanda' maol naninani ma sofa' gwa'aimi wiga amamaga hiami etapami atom hegilialami, esis wapoti' hegililas solomam. Dei' amamaga amama anona nemaf migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin. Amama nambimb sefa' amamaga maima seatal ambagof asasimi ma setanima seawambilai ambagof asasimi wapoti'? Owa'etin.
40016027	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, anona nemaf ae' ifi'i elomai amamaga bu'wami pepel nafifili noloma amam ensel ae'ami. Ama nemaf anama, ae' egwamasa amamaga hiami esis amam nematawa hiesi mondahama waf esis sanda'anai hianai.
40016028	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Enis epes dei' saitu na'ae, esis ina nambimb soga' ulal, ata' owa', siti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei eape si'i dembiwai king iefi'i.”
40017001	Nimeguf wanom mafe'ma hi'alam, Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma owalomana Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai. Nao'wa amam atom mape.
40017002	Ea' mati alop ananinai wanifigeina endilisi. Ea' naep ananimi wanefigeim endilisi si'i owaf nowala naso' ea' luwaguf ananimi mataga afitim si'i lamifah mafifil.
40017003	Ea' amam wanom mape dei' atef mati amam biam fowa'imi Moses naloma Elaija mataga maitu ma'i maloma Jisas.
40017004	Amam mati amam wanom, Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'ae andeande'. Ine' ni'i awi, afa' ola' aolah wanom na'ae, anona ine'inai anona Mosesi, anona Elaijai.”
40017005	Anan ata' na'i etin, anom elagw afitimi mafifil endilisi mafi'i mili'akwa amam. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai elagw amama na'i basef na'i, “Anan nogalome ae'anai, ae' okom nainailana endilisi ea' ae' okom nohafel naila waf ananinai. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
40017006	Amam alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, umbamaham endilisi ea' mande' nembawa motawa mande' amagah etap.
40017007	Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amam nasa lagela amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' hafel. Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'.”
40017008	Ea' amam masa'ma naep matologon ea', ina ata' mati enin epen, owa'. Mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam.
40017009	Ea' amam ata' makwaha halaf makini' etin, ea' Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa amamaga amama dei' patulumi, pi'ipa enin epen, owa'. Pefe' dahama dahama nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ma sehe ega' etanima ehafel hi'agif wapoti', pi'ipas.”
40017010	Ea' alupumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' maina amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nifi'i?”
40017011	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “A'e endilisi, Elaija nifi'i nondondomba amamaga hiami motaga bo'om andeande'.
40017012	Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa, anona Elaija nafi'i ea'. Ea' esis amam nematawa ina sogawa anan, owa'. Sa'i anona epen. Esis saila ukup asasimi atom sanda'mana waf aonai endilisi. Ea' anona nemaf sonda'am na'ama etina sease'e nimanimi ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.”
40017013	Jisas na'iam na'ama, ea' alupumi ananimi mogawa anan na'ipama Elaija anan womun etina Jon napisi'as embeli.
40017014	Amam mafe' mataga ma esis amam nematawa hiesi, anona aman nafi'i natagama Jisas nindiwa nembawa notaoma Anan
40017015	na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' ni'i uwahipina so'uso'win aman ae'anai. Enin ambal aonai nanda'ana name' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma alop ananinai. La'ela'ef ambal anama nanda'ana newala nasef nif fandumi nafe' nowala embel la'ela'ef.
40017016	Ae' ao'wana wafe'ma alupumi ine'imi ea' amam ina la'ifima monda'ana bo'ona, owa'.”
40017017	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa ae'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi owa' mope andeande'. Nimeguf ma'um ata' epe elomepa? Nimeguf ma'um wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai ae'.”
40017018	Ea' Jisas nagaola ambal anama aonai ea' nakwaha aman inima so'uso'win ea' dei' etef nataga bo'ona.
40017019	Alupumi Jisasi atom malomana mape, mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' la'ififa ma weatofa ambal anama aonai?”
40017020	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai ata' sa'ona, Amama atom dei' ipe' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. A'e, ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i bale'ef ipe'inai so'ona, nendahama si'i nalelef sa'umi mastetimi lawag, nambimb ipe' pi'ipa halaf nani pi'i, ine' degia nefe' newala gani wa'ol, nendegia nefe'. Ipe' pembale'efa ae' la'ifipa, na'ama dei' la'ifipei ma penda' maolan hianai naninani. [
40017021	Owa' anona eaf peatofa ambagof amama awami, owa'etin. Pekwaha gwa'aimi ma penda' beten, ea' amama atom.”]
40017022	Nemaf anama Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafi'i etin anama etap hiagoma Galili, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amam naumbih ae'ami.
40017023	Ea' amam amama mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam ea', anona neafe'ma wanomi, etanima ehafel wapoti'.” Ea' opalef amam alupumi ananimi nimanim endilisi.
40017024	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mataga anona wambel Kaperneam. Ea' amam mofa' takisa ipat lu'unai Godi mafi'mai Pita mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa ipe'inai anan natala takisa ipat anama?”
40017025	Ea' Pita na'i “A'e.” Pita notanima nafe' nawis anona ipat nomon, ea' Jisas nali' nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' okom na'imama? Amam king dambami etapami mofa' otamba ma takisa wiga maima emi? Amam mofa'asa epes hiesi esis amam nematawa amamisi etis a'a enis epes anona wambota?”
40017026	Ea' Pita na'i, “Ama enis amam nematawa anona wambota.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Na'ama esis epes hiesi kingi ina satala takis, owa'. Sape etin.
40017027	Ea' afa' undumafuma. Na'ama amam miti afa' owa' onda' takis, amam ukup numbutima afa' mi'i afa' epes aofai. Ea' dei' ine' fo'o la huk walemb batupa'manai anama ma niegiai aol anama nali'i ine' newala malogel aoli niti anona moni atona, moni anama dende' ma takisa afa' biafa. Ea' ine' nefa' moni anama nese'amana amam ama neatala takis isima afa' biafa.”
40018001	Nemaf anama amam alupumi Jisasi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Emi nikila' enis nataga dembeni endilisi ma kingdom heveni?”
40018002	Ea' Jisas nofalai enin so'uso'win nafi'mai anan nahaponan naitu la'afena amam.
40018003	Ea' na'ipam, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Emi egafis si'i siowis kingdom heveni, ama sase'ana opalef God si'i awasi isima sa'i sase'ana opalef God, isima sanda'am na'ama anona nemaf siowis kingdom heveni. I'i owa', owa'etin.
40018004	Emi egafis seape sa'umbili owa' seafela agof asasimi lu'um setaga si'i awani inima, epes isima ea' sikila' enis epes seape dembesi ma kingdom heveni.
40018005	Emi egafis sese' opalefa sigiambama enin so'uso'win si'i ini' ma ukup asasimi mopoma ae', esis sase'e opalef ae' wapoti' sagiambame.
40018006	I'i emi egafis seanda' enin epen so'uso'win nembale'efa ae'i nefe' nenda' waf aonai, epes isima sepe na'ama. I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi sofa'as sefe' sokwahis sowala naoh mami lu'wami, esis sope andeande' kwaukwawie'. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'uso'win nekwaha nembale'efa ae', epes isima anona nemaf sope awes endilisi sikila' sowala naoh afisi.
40018007	Ipe' epes etapipei, ae' ati ipe' uwahipipa ma amamaga amama meagwambipei monda'epa penda' waf aonai. Endilisi amamaga amama anona nemaf meatagai, ea' emi egafis sonda'am meatagai, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, anona nemaf sefa' nimanimi.
40018008	I'i lagof o bo'wagah ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'am pekwahom mefe'. Andeande' ma lagof bo'wagah atom mope ma ambal nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Ea' sefa'epa sokwahipa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi la'ela'efi. Anama ina nambimb pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe aopa endilisi.
40018009	Ea' i'i naep ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, pigiam pekwahom. Atom etin mope ma pefa' ambal namunai napeipa peapan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Na'ama naep biam mapomepa mofa'epa mokwahepa pefe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mape la'la'efi. Na'ama ina nambimb pepe andeande', owa'. Pepe aopa endilisi.
40018010	Ipe' pindumafuma! Na'ama pi'i enin epen atitin sa'wini pi'i inima enin falafini, owa'. Dei' main, amam ensel asasimi mape heveni mumafi awasi isima andeande'. Ensel amama la'ela'ef mape felefele'ma Ahalome God nape heveni. [
40018011	Ae' ataga epen endiliswei, ae' afi'i ma eagolopa epes higilalasi efa'as setanimani.]
40018012	Ipe' ukup ma'imama? I'i anona aman numafi anom sipsip 100-peleim ama anona atotona hegililana, aman amama ata' nokwaha sipsip amama 99-peleim mitu mea' otalef anagon dohotagw, anan ata' nefe' nogolopa anona hegilalanai.
40018013	I'i nefa'anai, a'ipipa endilisi, atuwasi nondanifamana. Danifel ananinai nikila' nandanifel ma sipsip amama 99-peleim maituwi.
40018014	Ea' na'ama etin Ahalomepa ipe'inai nape ilif heveni nandaiwa' ma enin epen so'uso'unai higililana, owa'.
40018015	I'i sahin owan sonda' waf aonai ma ine', ine' nefe' nitilin ipe' etipa pepe ea' nihi'amban waf aonai ananinai. I'i enin neme'ena, andeande', si'i ine' nofa'ai enin netanimani wapoti'.
40018016	Ea' i'i enin owa' neme' basef ine'ifi, ni'ipa enis epes bies wapoti' ea' pefe' etin. Ama ipe' bipa o wanipa pefe'ma peame' basef epen inima ma peawaloga basef amama pi'i endilisimi atom.
40018017	Ama i'i enin nindaiwa'ma neame' basef ipe'ifi, ine' ni'ipa esis Kristen hiesi sondatama etifigin ni'ipasan. Ama enin ni'i nindaiwa'ma neame' basefa esis Kristen hiesi wapoti', ine' nekwahin nepe si'i isima owa' seagawa Godi, o si'i amam amama awami mofa' takisi.
40018018	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Amamaga ipe' pahapilam etap anae', amama anona nemaf God nohapilam mape gani ilif heven wapoti'. Ea' amamaga amama ipe' pekwahom etap anae, amama anona nemaf God nokwahom gani heven ilif wapoti'.
40018019	Ea' ae' a'iam endilisi ma ipe' wapoti'. I'i ipe' bipa pape etapi ukup mefe' atifigina anom amamaga, pi'i penda' beten pehali' Goda nease'epa amamaga amama, ea' andeande' Ahalome ae'anai napani ilif heveni nambimb nese'epam ipe'.
40018020	Dei' main, i'i epes bias o wenis ukup mapoma agel ae'anai ma sunduwa'anima sope etifigin, ae' ape alomas.”
40018021	Nemaf anama Pita nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, nimeguf ma'uma'um sahin owan ae'asi sonda'me waf aonai ae', ma eakwahamasana? Nimeguf 7-peleim o ma'um?”
40018022	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'ama na'i, “Ae' ina a'ipina nimeguf amama atom 7-peleim, owa'. Ae' a'i ine' nekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'minanai nimeguf hiami 490-peleim.
40018023	Dei' main, esis siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona dembinai king na'i nogawa wialef mapoma amam manda' maol ananinai mapoma ma'um.
40018024	Ea' anan nanda'am nogawam andeande'ma nonda' amam meagwamana wiaf, ea' sofa' anona aman safe'ma anan. Ea' aman anama nowaola wiafa moni lu'unai 10 milian kina.
40018025	Ea' anan moni a'ana ma neagwan dende'ma niembi wiaf anama anan nowaolamasana. Ea' dembinai king na'ipas na'i esis setala aman anama noloma waulu'mana awasi ananisi ma sonda' maol akupi ea' setala amamaga asasimi wapoti' sofa' moni ma seagwa wiaf anama.
40018026	Ea' aman anama nowafa notawa etapa naep king anama dembinai na'ipana na'ama na'i, ‘Ine' niti ae' uwahipiwi nepe nehafa ae'. Anona nemaf ae' egwamena wiaf anama hi'ilana ma ine'.’
40018027	Ea' dembinai anama nati owahipina nakwahomana wiaf ananinai nafe' wafifina.
40018028	Ea' aman anama nawisi ande' nati anona amam atom manda' maol etini, anan nowaola wiafa moni kwawie'in si'i 10 kina. Ea' nombalo' aman anama nowa'ana sisihina bini'w anani'wi na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' negwame wiaf ine'inai hi'ilana!’
40018029	Ea' aman anama nowafa notawa etap ea' na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i ‘Ine' niti ae' owahipiwi ea' nepe nehafa ae'! Nambimb egwamena wiaf ine'inai hi'ilana.’
40018030	Ea' anan nandaiwa'. Ea' nofa'ana nafe' nanda'ana nanda' kalabus, ama nepe neagwa wiaf anama.
40018031	Amam mandao'oma manda' maoli mati amama, opalef amamumi nimanim endilisi mafe' mawalapa amama ma dembinai amamunai.
40018032	Ea' dembinai nofalai aman anama nanda' maoli ea' na'ipana na'i, Ine' aman nanda' maol aonai. Do'ok ine' naloma ae' nalef, ea' akwaha wiaf anama lu'unai ine'inai hi'alana.
40018033	Ae' ati ine' owahipina, ea' dei' maina ine' owa' nie'i owahipina alupunai ine'inai panda' maol etini?
40018034	Ea' dembinai okom numbutina nase'amana amam amama mumafi kalabusi ma mease'ana nimanimi lu'wami nope nope neagwa wiaf ananinai hi'ialana.
40018035	I'i ukup ipe' hipei owa' peakwaha waf aonai endilisima sahin owan sanda'mipanai, anona nemaf Ahalome ae'anai nape ilif heveni wapoti' nonda'mepam ipe' na'ama etin si'i dembinai nanda'ama aman anama.”
40019001	Jisas na'i basef amama mafe' ea', nakwaha etap anama hiagoma Galili nafe' anona etap hiagoma Judia gani wa'ol walemb Jordan gani fisana.
40019002	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe' ea' nanda' epes hiesi ambo'wes.
40019003	Ea' anom dambami Farisi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana anom basef magwambana ma'i, “Mi'uli ape'inai andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nokwaho'wa okom ananinai atona o owa'?”
40019004	Ea' anan nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Ipe' patalifa basef amama Godi pagawam ea'. Basef amama ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami nanda' epes sataga amam nematawa.’
40019005	Ea' God na'i, ‘Na'ama esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sape deindei, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sope alop atotona.’
40019006	Ea' esis bias sondase'ama sotaga si'i alop etifina. Esis ina ata' sape biasa sape deindei, owa'. Ea' esis God nakolasis sape la'ifis, isima God na'i enin epen ina nehape'as, owa'.”
40019007	Ea' Farisi amama ma'ipana wapoti' ma'i, “Moses na'ipapa mi'uli anama na'i, aman nonda' anom basef mil okwatip nose'akwana nokwaho'w kofe'.”
40019008	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam na'i, “Ipe' patopa' basefi. Dei' Moses na'i a'e ma eaf anama dei' pailana pagalo'ma wauhiamepa patopa' waf dase'amainai. Fowa' gani dambadamba ina anom basef mape na'ama, owa'.
40019009	Ae' a'ipipa a'i, I'i ano'w nemata'w anona amani owa' konda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, ma anan nogolo'makw noso' ano'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi.”
40019010	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i waf anama endilisinai ma owa' neape la'ela'ef noloma akwa'w, dase'ama hapainai. Ea' andeande'ma nemata'w a'ana nope etin.”
40019011	Ea' anan na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ina nambimb amam nematawa hiesi la'ifis sofa' basef amama sombale'am, owa'. Epes isima God nase'as pepel ea', esis etis sofa'am.
40019012	Dei' main, amam na'amaimi mape amam owa' la'ifima mease' nematawai. Ea' anom mamalawa amamuwai olam ea' la'ela'ef mape na'ama. Ea' anom, amam matopa'am alop amamunai. Ea' amam ina la'ifima measo' nematawa, owa'. Ea' anom, okokoma miegiambama epes hiesi siowis kingdom heveni. Na'ama mandaiwa'ma mease' nematawa. Emi aman la'ifina niela basef amama, anan nilam andeande'.”
40019013	Nemaf anama esis sao'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai anan, sa'i anan nowamona lagof ananimi ma awasi isima ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nefalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipa esis owa' sofa'as safi'mai anan.
40019014	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai Ae'. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa siowis kingdom heveni, esis same' basef Godi sailam si'i awasi isima.”
40019015	Ea' nawamona lagof ananimi balagah asasimi, nakwaha esis nafe'.
40019016	Ea' anona aman nafi'i na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' nambimb enda' maina waf bu'unai ma efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”
40019017	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' nahali' ae' ma amamaga amama? Anona aman atotona nape ilifi Anan bu'unai. I'i ine' ni'i nefa' ambal namunai, andeande'ma nila basefa mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosasanai hianai.”
40019018	Ea' aman anama nahali' Jisas na'i, “Maina mi'uli?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, neha enis epes sega' nenda' wal, owa'. Ina neambaso'ma enis epes,
40019019	ine' nepe owina mamasena ine'isi neme' basef asasimi nilam ea' nimafias andeande'. Ine' okom ninila enis sape felefele'ma ine'i, si'i ine' okom nainaila ine' etina ma nimafi ine'.”
40019020	Ea' aman anama ata' sa'unai awaminai na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Mi'uli anama hianai ae' embale'efana ailana afi'i ea'. Dei' maina waf ata' nape?”
40019021	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ine' ni'i neataga bu'winai endilisi, ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi ma enis epes sotalinama nefa' moni anama nenda'ana nese isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani ilif heven. Ea' ine' nifi'i nila ae'.”
40019022	Ea' aman anama sa'unai name' basef amama, okom ananinai nimanina ea' nandamboma megah atogah nafe'. Dei' main, anan amamaga hiamunai.
40019023	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'ama na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, epes isima wiga moni hianaisi, sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis kingdom heveni. Atona etin sefe' siowis.
40019024	Ae' a'i i'ipipa wapoti', anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi sefe' siowis kingdom Godi, sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis. Eaf anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel nuwis nil nagala.”
40019025	Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, amam gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nefa' emi egafis sotanimani seape andeande' la'ela'ef? Owa'etin.”
40019026	Ea' Jisas naniga nati amam na'ipam na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinai ma nonda'am. Anan la'ifinai nonda' amamaga hiami.”
40019027	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' ea' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami, ea' dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina. Afa' anona nemaf ofa' maim amamaga?”
40019028	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Owagama nemaf anama neataga ma amamaga hiami meataga dambaim wapoti', nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, efa' pepel howalagon atoma balata king ae'anai. Nemaf anama ipe' amam ae'ipei pail ae'i ipe' 12-peleipa petoma siaifah bu'wami amam dambami kingi 12-peleim, ea' pewaloga wambotagw 12-peleim amam nematawa ape'isi Isrel.
40019029	Ea' emi egafis ukup asasimi mopoma ae' sokwaha ifagw moloma sahin owan ahapas mamasas batawisas moloma aof amamaga maim asasimi, anona nemaf sofa' amamaga hiami endilisi mikila' asasimi fowa'imi. Ea' anona nemaf sofa' ambagof namumi sopan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
40019030	Ea' epes hiesi dei' sataga sali'i agof lu'womisi, anona nemaf owagama agof a'as sotaga sigi'. Ea' epes isima sataga sagi' owagama sofa' agof lu'wami sotaga sili'.”
40020001	“A'e, epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona aman nafamunagoma anona etap lu'wagoma. Ea' lala kuhimbita atona anan nafe'ma nufa'i anom amam monda' maol aof anama ananinai nawa su'utip mandelef wain napoma.
40020002	Anan nafe' na'i naloma anom manda' maoli ea' nalomam ukup etifima otamba atuwasi meafa'ami, mofa' wan kina atona etina nemaf anama. Ea' nasapa'am mafe' manda' maol aof ananinai.
40020003	Ea' anan nape ma aon nandegiai nape si'i 9 klok, anan nafe' ea' nati anom amam ata' tol maitu etin anama mondowa'anima mapoma.
40020004	Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' wapoti' fo'o penda' maol aof ae'anai ma ease'epa otamba mondendaepa mondahama waf bu'unai.’
40020005	Ea' amam mafe'. Ea' aon nahagasom 12 klok anan nafe' wapoti' ea' nanda'am na'ama etin si'i do'ok nanda'am. Ama aon nasa 3 klok, nafe' nanda'am wapoti' si'i do'ok nanda'am.
40020006	Ea' wambomota 5 klok, nafe' nati anom ata' maitu etin. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' ata' tol paitu etin na'ae nemaf anae' laona?’
40020007	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, ‘Ina anona aman nase'afa maol afa', owa'.’ Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' wapoti' fo'o penda' maol aof ae'anai.’
40020008	Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb aman anama nafomona aofi nafi'i na'ipa aman numafi amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ine' fala manda' maoli amama hiami ea' nese'ama moni amam. Ine' nili' nese amam amama magi' matagai, nese'aman nefe' nefe' netagama amam amama mali' mataga manda' maoli.’
40020009	Ea' amam amama mataga manda' maol wambomota 5 kloki, mataga mofa' wan kina atona etin.
40020010	Ea' amam amama mali' mohafel kuhimbita manda' maoli, mafi'i ukup mandanda' ma'i atuwasi amam mofa' moni lu'unai nikila' anom. Owa'etin. Amam wapoti' mofa' wan kina na'ama etin.
40020011	Ea' manda' megah mahana nafomona aofi.
40020012	Ea' ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Amam amama magi' matagai, amam mafi'i manda' maol nogota bandana si'i awa atitin, ea' ine' nase'ama moni anama na'ama etin si'i afa' ofa'anai. Ea' afa' wali' wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma nemaf launai, ea' owaf nahafa.’
40020013	Ea' anan nagwamana basef anona aman amamunai na'ipana na'ama na'i, ‘Alupinai, ae' ina anda'ena awena, owa'. Afa' biafa wali' wa'iam ea' nomonas atifima pefa' wan kina etin.
40020014	Ine' fa'a moni ine'inai ea' fo'o. Otamba ae' ase'enama ine'i, ea' ikwaf anama atona ae' ese'anama aman anama nagi' nafi'i nanda' maoli, pefa'am dende' etin.
40020015	Ae' anda' maol si'i okom ae'anai na'iana moni ae'anai. Na'ama andeande'. Ae' anda' waf bu'unai ma imafi amam magi' mafi'i wambomota. Na'ama dei' ine' kowalena ma otamba amamumi ma main?’
40020016	Anona nemaf na'ama etin, epes isima dei' sataga sagi'i agof a'asi sotaga agufisi sope sili', ea' epes isima sataga sali' agufisi, anona nemaf agof a'as sotaga sigi'.”
40020017	Jisas na'i nondowasa' Jerusalem, anan nao'wa alupumi ananimi 12-peleim atom mafe'. Amam ata' mafe' etin eaf ea' na'ipam na'i,
40020018	“Peme', dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb anona aman nowalapa ae' ma amam pris dambami moloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ea' monda' kotimi ea' mi'i basef mondame'mam ma mohe eaga'.
40020019	Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sololama Godi ma sonda' findiwae ma basef awami sopagahowe sehe egaga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam anona nefe'ma wanomi, God nefele ma hi'agif etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
40020020	Nemaf anama Sebedi waulu'mana mama'wana Jemsi Jon kwao'wai batawisa'w akwa'umi biam safi'mai Jisas. Ea' kwindiwa nembawa kotawa etap kwa'ipana anom basef.
40020021	Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ine' ni'i anona nemaf netaga dembinai, nemaf anama ae' a'i batawisi amama ae'ami biam mope dembem felefele'ma ine', anona nil wa'ol egagili, ea' anona nil wa'ol da'isinaima.”
40020022	Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, Jisas nagwama'w na'ipa amam na'i, “Ipe' ina pegawa andeande'ma amamaga ipe' pahali'imami, owa'! Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pegwa' embela kap anama dei' ae' egwa' embelanai, o owa'?” Ea' magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wila la'ififa.”
40020023	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, ipe' bipa nambimb pegwa' embela kap anama ae' egwa' embelanai. Ea' pepe lagel da'isinai o egagili ae'ami, amama ina maol ae'anai, owa'. Ahalome atona ni'i esis isima nandandepas ea'i, esis etis sope lagof da'isinai o egagili ae'ami.”
40020024	Ea' alupumi Jisasi tu'wanim 10-peleim mame' amam biam ma'iam na'ama, manda' megah mahama amam sahalomana owalomana.
40020025	Ea' Jisas nofala alupumi Ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai anan, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa, anom king mape dambami ma isima sololama Godi, amam mape ilifa esis endilisi manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amam dambami mape la'ifim endilisi ma manda' esis amam nematawa saila malogof amamumi.
40020026	Ea' waf anama ina nepoma ipe', hapainai. Emi aman nope dembinai ma ipe', anan ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maol etina ipe' hipei.
40020027	Ea' emi aman ni'i notaga dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nopan si'i agel a'anai nanda' maol etin nape owina hiesi.
40020028	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' wapoti' na'ama etin. Ina afi'i ma esis sonda'me maola siegiambame, owa'. Ae' afi'i enda' maola igiambama ipe' hipei. Afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipe' peloma epes hiesi etagahipama waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.”
40020029	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi makwaha wambel anama Jeriko ma'i mefe', amam nematawa hiesi sailana safe'.
40020030	Ea' amam biam naep mase'ami tol mape felefele'ma eaf. Ea' mame' basef sa'i Jisas nafi'i ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
40020031	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sinifalom sa'i mosopama malogof. Owa'etin. Amam mofalana mehip endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai ine' akunamana Deviti, niti afa' uwahipifa!”
40020032	Ea' Jisas naitu nofala amam biam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pa'i ae' enda'mepa main?”
40020033	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ine' newalamafa naep afa'imi ma witi andeande'.”
40020034	Ea' Jisas nati amam owahipim nasa lagof ananimi naep amamumi, ea' dei' etef amam biam mati andeande' wapoti', ea' magi'ma Jisas mafe'.
40021001	Ea' amam mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, mataga Betfage felefele'ma halaf Oliv. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam na'ipam na'i,
40021002	“Ipe' bipa pefe' piwis wambel nanima nape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ae. Ea' piti anona donki sa'unai esis sepana nail naloma noganai ananinai maitu. Ipe' petagahom ea' pefa'am pifi'mai ae'.
40021003	I'i enin epen ni'i nihali'ipa ma anom basef, pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maola anan ama atuwasi nosapa'am mutanimipei mehip.’ ”
40021004	Amamaga amama amam mofa'i donki mataga dende' si'i basef amama fowa' gani anona profet na'iami. Anan na'i,
40021005	“Ipe' pi'ipa epes sape Saioni pi'i, ‘Ipe' piti, dei' king dembinai ipe'inai anona nemaf nifi'mai ipe'. Anan nanda' waf sa'umbilifi, ea' notoma donki noganai nofa'ana nifi'i.’ ”
40021006	Ea' alupumi Jisasi biam mafe' ea' manda'am si'i do'ok na'ipamam.
40021007	Amam mofa' donki anama naloma noganai mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagwegw amamumi matoma ilifa donki amama biam. Ea' Jisas nandegia natoma donki anama.
40021008	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sambe'amonam sagwegw eaf, safela agel ananinai lu'una. Enis satopa' lawah agof apulima motawa felefele'i sase'wiam eaf sofalo'mana.
40021009	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sali' sagi' sanda' la kolo' na'ama sa'i, “Hosana! Ine' akunamana Deviti! Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma ine'. Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma ine' nafi'i agel ananinai nese'ena pepel ma neanda' maol ananinai. Ape' mofela agel dembinai God nape ilifi.”
40021010	Nemaf anama Jisas nafe' nawis wambel Jerusalem, ea' amam nematawa hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete' ea' soga sa'i mehip sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anama anan emi egalina?”
40021011	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' salomanai sa'i, “Aman anama anona profet Jisas, aman nape wambel Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili.”
40021012	Ea' Jisas nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nagalo'ma esis hiesi sanda' bisnis saloma isima satalom ipat anama nomon. Anom amam mati otamba enis epesi ea' mindisila'mam. Ea' Jisas namboma tebol amamumi nakowasom. Enis sanda' bisnisa setala amiguf mai'unamb. Ea' namboma siaifah asasimi nakowasom wapoti'.
40021013	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef mape Baibeli God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma epes hiesi sifi'i sopaina sonda' beten sohali' Ae. Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i ipat sanda' walanai.’ ”
40021014	Jisas ata' napani ipat anama lu'unai nomon, sofa'manai epes isima naep mase'asi bo'wagah maim mondala'asi safi'manai, ea' nanda'as sataga bo'wes.
40021015	Ea' amam pris dembami maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mati anan nanda' maol la'ifinai bu'unai, ea' mame' esis awasi sandanifela anan gani nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i, “Ape' mafela agel akunamana Deviti!” Ea' amam dei' ukup aom kwapete' ma anan.
40021016	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' negawa basef ofagema awasi isima sa'iami?” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “A'e, ae' egawam.” Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pitalifam basef amama mail Baibeli pegawam o owa'.? Basef amama fowa'imi ma'i na'ama ma'i, God, ‘Ine' owagama niwalipa awasi sa'wisi soloma isima ata' agunifisi sa' nomambeh atumi, ea' sofela agel ine'inai.’ ”
40021017	Ea' anan nakwaha amam nawisi ande' nafe' nape anona wambel Betani ea' na'oh owamb anama.
40021018	Ama wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas nohafel notanima nafe' nataga felefele' ma taun anama Jerusalem ea' nolomahana.
40021019	Ea' nati anona lawag fik notawa eaf ea' nafe' natolona. Ea' ina nati anom su'utip mailana, owa'. Apul atom. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' ina ata' anom su'utip milina wapoti'. Owa'.” Ea' mehip lawag anama bowana ea' alina hi'alana.
40021020	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi mati lawag anama alina, gegelalasom endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina lawag anama fik bowana ea' alina mehip?”
40021021	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. I'i ipe' pembale'efa ae' endilisi ma ipe' ina ukup biembiefim mupeipa, nambimb ea' penda'am si'i ae' anda'ama lawag anama fik. Ea' ipe' ina penda' amama atom, owa'. I'i ipe' pi'ipa halaf nanima pi'i, ‘Ine' degia nefe' newala naoh,’ nambimb neme'epa nilam si'i ipe' pa'iam.
40021022	I'i ipe' pembale'ef endilisi ma penda' beten, amamaga amama ipe' panda' betena pa'i pefa'ami, nambimb ipe' pefa'am.”
40021023	Ea' Jisas notanima nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nape nawalipasa basef etin, amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Emi na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' opeh amama?”
40021024	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti' a'i ihali'ipa ma anom basefa ipe' ata' pili' pi'ipa ae' ama atuwasi i'ipipa emi na'ipi ape dembiwei anda' opeh amama.
40021025	Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli, emi na'ipana ma nanda' opeh amama? God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapanai na'ipana?” Ea' mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipana,’ atuwasi anan ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
40021026	Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Enin epen etapanai na'ipana,’ na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa. Afa' umbamahafama esis. Dei' main, esis hiesi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
40021027	Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa ma emi nase'e agel lu'unai anda' opeh amama Ae'ami, owa'.”
40021028	“Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Anona aman nogamana biam. Anan nafe'ma nogalomana dambena ma na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome ae'inai, dei' ine' fo'o nenda' opeha aof ae'anai newa mandelef wainim.’
40021029	Ea' nogalomana nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'.’ Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', namboma okom ea' nafe'.
40021030	Ea' ahalomana nafe' na'ipa anona wapoti' na'ipana na'ama etin si'i do'ok nali' na'i. Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, ‘A'e, ahalome.’ Ea' anan ina naila basef ananimi nafe', owa'.
40021031	Ea' dei' nogamana amama biam ananimi mamanama naila basef ahalomanai?” “Amam ma'i, ‘Nali'i.’ ” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam amama mofa' takisi manda' waf aonai maloma nematawa wanda' waf aonai wanda' so'a wauli esis ea' sefe' suwis wambota Godi numafias sili' ma ipe'.
40021032	Ipe' pegawa aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli. Anan nali' nafi'mai ipe' ea' nihi'ambepa wafa eaf bu'unai, ea' ipe' owa' peambale'efana. Ea' epes isima sanda' waf aonai anom mofa'asa takisi maloma anowa nematawa wanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai esis sembale'efana. Ipe' pati esis sembale'efana na'ama, ea' ipe' ina pamboma opalef pakwaha waf aonai pambalelefana, owa'.
40021033	Ipe' peme' anom basef womun etin. Anona aman dembinai nanda' anona aof nawa wain nahopana. Aof anama nomon anan nanda' anona tang notawa ma sofa'asa su'utip amama wainim, ea' nala' anona ipat launai notawa sope sumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomama aof anama anom amam ma'i monda' maola aof anama mofa' monianai. Ea' nafe' napani anona wambel laoguma.
40021034	Nogota su'utip mailanai, nasapa' anom manda' maola anani mafe'ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Anan na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi aof anama.
40021035	Ea' amam amama manda' maol aofi mofa' amam amama nafomona aof anamai naspa'am mafi'i mombalo'am maham, anona mahana afuna endilisi, anona makwaha otamba mahana, ea' anona mahana etin nafa' nafe'.
40021036	Ea' anan nafomona aofi nasapa' anom amam mafe' wapoti'. Nasapa' amam hiami mikila' amam mali' nasapa'ami. Ea' amam amama manda' maol aofi manda'am na'ama etina amam si'i mali' mafi'i.
40021037	Ea' nagi' nasapa' nogalomana ananinai nafe'ma amam manda' maol aofi. Ea' anan na'iam na'i, ‘Nambimb amam mome' malogel nogalome ae'anai.’
40021038	Owa'etin. Amam mati nogalomana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama etin ma'i, ‘Aman anama anona nemaf nofa' amamaga hiami ahalomanai. Afa' ohana afuna ma afa' atofa ofa' aof anama.’
40021039	Ea' mombalo'ana mofa'ana mawisi aof ande'ana mahana afuna.
40021040	Ea' nambimb aman nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam?”
40021041	Ea' amam pris dembemi maloma amam agufumi Judai magwamana ma'ipana ma'i, “Namanani anan nonda'mam waf aonai endilisi ma amam amama manda' waf aonai noham moga'. Ea' nose'asa aof anama nefe'ma enis epes sumafiana ama nogota gwa'aimi mieilana esis sose'ana anom gwa'aimi anan.”
40021042	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' patalifa basef Godi pegawam o owa'? Basef Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Owap anama mala' ifagwi magwase'ana dei' nataga nape owap nape nali'i ma nembalo' ipat. Dembinai God nanda' amama mataga, ape' matolom bo'om endililsi.’
40021043	Ea' ae' dei' a'ipipa. God nambimb nelefata basefa waf bu'unai ma ipe' piowis kingdom Ananinai ea' nose'asam enis epes nambimb sombale'efana sonda' waf bu'unai. [
40021044	Ea' emi egafis sanda' sisi'ip sowa owap anama, pepe'etas. Ea' i'i owap anama nowa nosali'as, esis loloweas si'i sopof atona.]”
40021045	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi mame' basef amama womun etin Jisas na'iami ma'i anan nondala'wifa amam na'i basef amama.
40021046	Ea' mape magolopa eaf mombalo'ana ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa. Dei' main, esis hiesi sombale'efana la'ifis sa'i Jisas anona profet.
40022001	Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef womun etin wapoti' na'i,
40022002	“Epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anona king dembinai etapanai. Nogalomana ananinai na'i noso' ano'w nemata'w, ea' king anama nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami.
40022003	Nemaf anama seagwa' gwa'aimi anai notaga, anan nasapa' amam amama manda' maola anani mafe' mofalai epes isima fowa' nali' nofalasi seafi'mai gwa'aimi amama. Ea' esis sandaiwa'ma seafi'i.
40022004	Ea' anan nasapa' anom wapoti' manda' maola anani motambel mafe', ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' fo'mago epes isima ae' andandepas sapani ea' pi'ipas na'ama pi'i, “Peme', ae' andandomba gwa'aimi ae'ami ea'. Mafis bulmakau suwafumi maloma mafis amama lu'wami ae'ami, ape' maham. Ea' amamaga hiami mandandombol ma'oh ea'. Ipe' pifi'mai gwa'aimi amama enda'ama nogalome noso' akwa'wi.” ’
40022005	Ea' esis ukup aoma seme'ama seafe' ea' sandamboma safe' deindei ma opeh asasimi. Anona nafe' aof, anona nafe'ma bisnis ananimi.
40022006	Ea' amam mapani mombalo' amama manda' maola kingi manda'am kwapete'am maham afum.
40022007	Ea' king anama neme' amama okom wandafuna nasapa' soldia ananimi mafe' maha amam maha manda' maola anani afum hi'alam. Ea' makata nif maofa wambel amamunai wapoti'.
40022008	Ea' king na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Gwa'aimi enda'ama nogalome noso' akwa'w ea' sandandombam ma'oh ea' epes isima ae' efalasi ina seme' basef ae'ami safi'i, owa'.
40022009	Na'ama dei' ipe' pefe' eaf anama hianai dawalegefa piti isima epes hiesi pi'ipas pefalas sifi'mai gwa'aimi amama lu'wami dase'amaimi.’
40022010	Anan na'iam na'ama, amam manda' maoli mafe'agon gani gani eaf dawalegef mowa'aniesi epes isima matilisi hiesi, epes bu'wasi saloma sanda' waf aonai wapoti'. Ea' safi'i sape ipat anama sondase'ama ma si'ina endilisi.
40022011	Esis sape ea' dembinai king nawis nomona nitilis. Ea' nati anona aman atotona ina nala luwaguf salama nemaf anama dase'amainai, owa'.
40022012	Ea' king na'ipana na'i, ‘Alupinai, dei' maina ine' owa' nela luwaguf amama sandase'amaimi nifi'i niwisi na'ae?’ Ea' anan ina na'i anom basef, owa'.
40022013	Ea' king na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, ‘Ipe' pewa' lagof maloma bo'wagaha ananimi pekwahona nefe' niwis nepe owamb ande'. Owamb anama nambimb anan nowa nelef nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' nepe.’ ”
40022014	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “A'e, God nofala epes hiesi na'ama etin si'i king anama nofalas. Anan nofala hiesi, ea' nandandepa atona etin sifi'i siowis sope solomana.”
40022015	Ea' amam dambami Farisi mafe' manda' basef ma'iam mandame'mama membale'a Jisas mowa'ana. Amam ma'i mome' anom basef ananimi owa' andeande'i ma monda'mana basef mowa'ana si'i sowa' bogof.
40022016	Ea' amam masapa' alupumi amamumi maloma amam Heroti amam mafe'ma Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ine' aman bu'unai na'i basef endilisimi. Ina umbamehena owa'. Ina ni'ipasa anom basef isima enis agof lu'wamisi ea' anom basef isima agof a'asi falafisi, owa'. Ine' na'ipasa basef atifim endilisimi atom ma okom Godi amam nematawa hiesi dende' etin hi'alas.
40022017	Ea' ine' ni'ipafa. Dei' ine' okom nape na'imama? Mi'uli ape'inai na'i andeande'ma ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi o owa'?”
40022018	Ea' Jisas nogawa ea' ma waf baso'omainai amamunai ea' na'i, “Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei, dei' maina ipe' pagwamba ae'?
40022019	Ipe' pihi'ambe anona moni ma ata' itolona.” Ea' mofa'manai anona moni ma natolona.
40022020	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?”
40022021	Ea' ma'i, “Anama Sisari gavman dembinai esis Romi.” Ea' nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari, amama pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.”
40022022	Amam mame'anama basef amama ea' gegelalasom kwapete'am makwahona mafe'.
40022023	Nemaf anama atona anom amam Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amam hiami mombale'ef saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Ea' amam mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana
40022024	ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, fowa' gani Moses na'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana ea' waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akw nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
40022025	Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw awani a'akw naga', nakwaho'w kwape. Ea' owalomana nase'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwapani awani a'akw.
40022026	Ea' owalomana nandatu'ulanai wapoti' nanda'am na'ama etin, ea' anona nandatu'ulomi nase'akw manda'am na'ama etin mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai.
40022027	Amam amama wambota atotona ea' maga' hi'alam. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', akwa'w kwaga' waulu'mam.
40022028	Ea' anona nemaf esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kwaso' amam 7-peleimi emi egafuna nose'akw? Amam 7-peleim mase'akw hi'alam.”
40022029	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Baibel na'iami, owa' pegawa pepel Godi. Ea' ipe' dei' ina pa'i basef endilisimi, owa'.
40022030	Nemaf anama sa'i sokwaha hi'agilif sotanima sohafel wapoti', amam nematawa ina ata' sondase'ama wapoti', owa'. Sopan etin si'i ensel mape heveni.
40022031	Basef amama esis saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', ipe' patalifa basef amama God na'iam mape Baibeli o owa'? Anan na'ipipa na'ama na'i,
40022032	‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki maloma Jekopi.’ Basef amama ma'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isima saga'i, owa'. Anan God epes isima ambal napeis sape namusi.”
40022033	Esis amam nematawa hiesi same' na'ama sohafel gegelalasisa basef ananimi.
40022034	Ea' Jisas nasopama malogofa amam amama dambami Sadyusi ma basef amama. Ea' anom amam Farisi mame' basef amama mondowa'anima mafi'i felefele'ma anan.
40022035	Ea' anona naloma amam nogawa mi'uli Godi andeande' na'i nogwamba Jisasa ni'i anom basef owa' andeande' ma monda'mana basef mowa'ana si'i sowa' bogof. Ea' nahali'ana na'i,
40022036	“Dembinai Tisa, maina mi'uli Godi lu'unai nikila' mi'uli hianai nape nali'i?”
40022037	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ukup ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef ipe'imi pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona.
40022038	-
40022039	Mi'uli anama lu'unai, nali' endilisi. Ea' mi'uli nagi'i anama, ‘Ipe' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i, si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.’
40022040	Basef ofagema ma mi'uli hianai Godi maloma basef amam profet manda'ami hiami mape nomona mi'uli anama biefina.”
40022041	Amam Farisi ata' munduwa'animai etifigin maitu, Jisas nahali'am na'i,
40022042	“Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama ma Krais anan God nandandepana ea' ma nesapa'ana niefi'i? Anan nogalomana emi?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Devit nogalomana.”
40022043	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' maina Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom Deviti ma na'i Krais Anan Dembinai? Ea' Devit fowa' gani na'i,
40022044	‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai Ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel kwahisinai Ae'anai la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf Ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bo'wagah ine'imi.” ’
40022045	Devit fowa' nofala Krais na'i, ‘Dembinai.’ Amama atom dei' Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai.”
40022046	Ea' dei' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nogwamana anom basef Jisas, owa'. Nemaf anama nafe' nafe' owagama wapoti' amam hiami umbamahama meahali'anama anom basef, owa'.
40023001	Ea' Jisas nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiesi saloma amam alupumi 12-peleim ananimi.
40023002	Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Amom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amama Farisi amam maho'ofa Mosesa mawalipasa mi'uli Godi la'ifim.
40023003	Andeande'ma pila basef hiami amam ma'ipipami, ea' ipe' ina penda' waf amam manda'anai, owa' hapainai. Dei' main, amam ma'ipasa basef hiami, ea' amam atom ina mailam, owa'.
40023004	Amam mowatania basef amamumi mawalipasama sielam si'i basef wafimi anom awolef wafimi lu'wami mawamonam matoma ikeguf asasimi, ea' amam ina magiambamas mofa'am ma lagof amamumi, owa'.
40023005	Amamaga hiami manda'ami manda'am etina epes sotolom sinifelom. Amam mala egip lu'unai nail lagof balagah amamumi ma manda' beten ea' manda' sosaf launai nape sagwegw amamumi da'malifima.
40023006	Amam ukup ma'i siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom dambami atom mapoma, ma nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami o anama ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi.
40023007	Amam ma'i hiesi sotoloma sondalalimam sosa'ma agof amamumi anama sandatama sapoma ma ma'i sofalam si'ipam si'i, ‘Dambami tisa’.
40023008	Ea' enis epes ina sofala ipe' si'i ipe' dembipei, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' tisa dembinai ipe'inai atotona ea' ipe' hipei pape si'i sahin owan wambota atotona.
40023009	Ipe' ina pefala enin epen nape etap anae' pi'i Ahalomepa ipe'inai, owa'. Dei' main, aman anama atotona anan Ahalomepa ipe'inai, nape ilif heveni.
40023010	Ea' esis ina sofalepa si'i dembipei tisa, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai tisa ipe'inai Krais atotona, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
40023011	Ea' emi egafis nambimb sotaga dembesi ipe'isi, dei' ata' sili' sope sonda' maol sope owina ipe'.
40023012	Ea' na'ama etin, emi egafis sefela agof asasimi atom, epes isima anona nemaf agof a'as. Ea' emi egafis sonda' agof asasimi mefe' owin, anona nemaf esis sefa' agof lu'wami.”
40023013	“Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pewalo uta ma naep esis amam nematawa ma ina nambimb siowis kingdom heveni, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pafe' pawis nomon, ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sefe' siwis nomon, isima ipe' pasopamas eafa sefe' siowis. [
40023014	Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' malogof biamipei. Ipe' pawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, pawis pakawalopom amamaga awoumi. Panda'am na'ama panda' beten launai etina esis sitilipa si'i ipe' bu'wipei. Anona nemaf God newaloga epes hiesi, enis epes owa' seanda' waf aonai na'amainai sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um, ea' ipe' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.]
40023015	Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' malogof biamipei! Ipe' pafe' hi'agoma naoh etap wambel hiagoma, pifa'ai anona epena notaga alupunai ipe'inai nila basef ipe'imi. Anan ea' nataga alupunai ipe'inai, ea' ipe' panda' anan aona endilisi nikila' ipe' na'ama. Ipe' aopei ma peafe' wambel aonai hel nif fandumi mapoma. Ea' ipe' panda' epen anama nikila' ipe' nenda' waf aonai endilisi nandahama nefe' wambel aonai hel.
40023016	Ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' naep masi'ipei pa'i pihi'ambasa eaf enis epes. Ipe' pawalipas na'ama pa'i, ‘I'i emi egafis si'i agola ipat anama lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, amama falafumi. Ea' emi egafis si'i agola gol amama bu'wami sofalo'ma ipat anama ma si'i senda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, senda'am sila basef si'i sa'i.’
40023017	Ipe' pahaga pagaoli ukup mololaepai ea' naep masi'ipei! Main de'im mape lu'um mikila'? Gol amama sofalo'ma ipat anama amam lu'um o ipat anama bu'unai nanda' gol amama mataga bo'oma naep Godi? Ea' dei' ipat anama atona nikila' gol.
40023018	Ea' ipe' pawalipas wapoti' pa'i, ‘I'i emi egafis si'i balata sofa' mafis saso' Godanai ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, amama falafumi. Ea' emi egafis si'i ofa mafis satoma balata ilifa senda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, esis silam si'i sa'iam.’
40023019	Ipe' naep masi'ipei! Maim amamaga mape lu'um? Ofa mafis mape lu'um o balata nanda' ofa anama nataga bo'ona ma naep Godi, dei' nataga lu'una? Ea' dei' balata nikila' ofa.
40023020	Na'ama dei' emi egafis si'i agel balata anama ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima senda' basef amama la'ifima amamaga matoma balata ilif maloma balata wapoti'.
40023021	Ea' emi egafis si'i agel ipat lu'unai Godi ma si'i sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima sanda' basef asasimi la'ifima ipat anama naloma Anan nape ipat anama.
40023022	Ea' emi egafis si'i heven ilifa sonda' basef asasimi motaga la'ifim, isima sa'i sonda' basef asasimi la'ifima balata bu'unai Godi naloma Aman anama natoma balata anama.
40023023	Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pawaloga nambawa maloma lombo maloma akwal mamumami hiami pase'ana tu'wanim God. Panda'am na'ama ma akwal amama hiami agofuma amama min, dil, kumin. Ea' ipe' pindihi'ama basef amama hiami ma mi'uli God na'iami ma waf bu'unai ma pigiambama epes, piti esis uwahipis, penda' amamaga andeande' ma waf endilisinai. Waf anama hianai neloma waf pindilali pese'ana amamaga maim Godanai, anama pekolasana pihapilana etin pilana.
40023024	Ipe' naep masi'ipei, pa'i pihi'ambasa eaf enis epes! Ipe' panda' maola patofa afi'awa amama sa'umi mail maloh nembawa, ea' mafin anama lu'unai kamel ea' pewalo'ana nalomam.
40023025	Ipe' amam dembipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam malogof biamipei! Ipe' pandombasa kap plet ande'ama atom bo'om. Ea' nomon owa'. Ipe' opalef si'ipama waf sanda' walanai naloma waf anama alop atonai aonai.
40023026	Ipe' Farisi, naep masi'ipei! Ipe' ata' pili' pendombasa kap malep nomonam muli' ma nambimb ande'ema wapoti' meataga bo'om.
40023027	Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' epes malogof biamipei! Ipe' pandahama si'i ifagw sa'umi sawa epes saga'i hi'agilif sanda' pen afitinai saofam. Ea' ande'ama bo'om ma satolom, ea' nomonama si'ima amamaga awami folo'alami mala maloma bihiguf balagah epes saga'i alialimi.
40023028	Ipe' pape na'ama etin. Esis epes sati alop ipe'inai ande' sa'i ipe' panda' waf bu'unai. Ea' nomon waf aonai baso'omunai ma malogof biagufi patopa' basef anai ma mi'uli Godi amama mape si'ima ipe'.
40023029	Ipe' amam pawalipasa mi'uli Godi paloma Farisi, ae' ati uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei. Ipe' panda' hi'agilif amam profet maga'i ea' pefalo'ma ifagw epes isima bu'wasi saga'i sapeimi.
40023030	Ea' ipe' pa'i, ‘I'i afa' fowa' gani ope si'i akusafa afa'isi, afa' ina wiegiambama esis oha amam profet afum, owa'.’
40023031	Ama basef amama atom ipe' pawalapami ofagema ipe'imi atom, pa'i ipe' akusas pagi' patagai saha profet maga'i.
40023032	Ea' ipe' piwatani waf anama aonai esis akusipa sanda'anai hi'ilana!
40023033	Ipe' si'i iguf awami pataga iguf awami mahasi! Anona nemaf God nonda'masa basef lu'wami ea' ni'ipipa pefe' pepe wambel aonai hel. Dei' penda'am pi'imama ma nambimb pefe'ma basef amama? Owa'etin.
40023034	Na'ama Ae' asapa'o anom profet molomago anom amam ukup bu'wami mapeimi molomago anom gawaimi ma Baibeli amam mofo'o motagamepa. Anona nemaf ipe' peham moga', ea' anom ipe' piunda lawah usi'imi tu'wanaimi, anom pepe pela'am nomon ifagw pa'i basef papeimi. Ea' ipe' penda'am petofam anona wambel taun lu'unama ea' petofam mofa' mefe' anona taun ea' petofam pegolopam etin pefe'. Ipe' anona nemaf penda' waf aonai anama.
40023035	Ea' dei' epes isima sape bu'wasi hiesi ma enis sahas saga', ofagema amama hiami anona nemaf mopoma ipe'. Nali'i Abel anan aman bu'unai nafi'i nafi'i natagama aman akutainai profet Sakaraia, Berekia nogalomana, anama akusipa sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi naloma balata saofa mafis saso' Godanai. Amama ofagema anona nemaf mila ipe' etipa.
40023036	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ipe'. Amamaga nimanimi awami ofagema anona nemaf mopoma ipe' epes hipei amam nematawa dei' papani.
40023037	O ipe' Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipe' paha amam profet afumi, pakwaha otamba paha amam God nasapa'am mafi'mai ipe' maga'. La'ela'ef ae' a'i ekolasa ipe' epes hipei si'i awata numa'inai nowa'ani nogami nakolasam mawis mail behenagof ananimi. Owa'etin, ipe' pandaiwa'.
40023038	Ipe' peme'! Dei' wambel ipe'inai anona nemaf aona wafina nope.
40023039	Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' nambimb ina petolowe wapoti' ma nambimb pi'i, ‘Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anama nafi'i agel Dembinai ma nonda'ana nondanifel.’ ”
40024001	Jisas nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nafe' etin, amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai Anan. Amam ma'i mihi'ambana ifagw lu'wami lotumi.
40024002	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pati ifagw amama hiami? Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona nemaf ina anom otamba motoma anom otamba mope, owa'etin. Sagwasi'am sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona etin.”
40024003	Jisas tol nape halaf anama lawah oliv motawama ea' alupumi ananimi atom mafi'mai anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' ni'ipafa amamaga amama nambai' motaga. Maina ikwaf nili' notaga ma afa' ogawa ine' na'i netanima neafi'i ma etap anae' higililana?”
40024004	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa.
40024005	Dei' main, amam hiami anona nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agel ae'anai mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i.’ Ea' anona nemaf mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi some' basef amamumi si'i endilisimi silam.
40024006	Anona nemaf peme' enis sopa' lupulupu' sonda' wandaf ea' enis seme'asa wandaf si'ipipa, ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Amamaga amama anona nemaf meatagai, ea' nemaf akutainai ata' owa'.
40024007	Enis epes sape anama etap hiagoma kantri sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anona kantri. Anona dembinai king nehafel no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king no'wa ananisi wambel hiagoma. Enis epes wambel hiagoma nolomohas sope, ea' enis wambel hiagoma atona etin etap suwambon nokoto'.
40024008	Amamaga amama hiami ata' muli' motaga si'i nimanimi mali' matagama nemata'w kwa'i kola awani.
40024009	Amama motaga ma ea', esis sofa'epa ma sese'epa nimanimi, ea' sehepa pega'. Epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' kwapete' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef Ae'ami na'ama dei' sahepa.
40024010	Nemaf anama amam nematawa hiesi sokwaha sombale'efa Dembinai ea' sondawawalapa etin sose'asas sefe'ma naumbih sohas, ea' epes isima ukup aoma enis.
40024011	Ea' amam profet hiami mambaso'ami motaga mohafel mufi'i mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi.
40024012	Waf aonai anona nemaf netaga lu'una, na'ama amam nematawa hiesi sokwaha waf anama ukup maimaila enis epes mi'i uwahipis.
40024013	Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa ae' la'ifis situ seatagama nemaf akutainai, isima anona nemaf God nefa'as setanimani.
40024014	Ea' anona nemaf esis si'ipasa basef amama bu'wami Godi ma epes hiesi siowis kingdom heveni. Esis si'ipas ganima etap hiagoma hi'ilagon ama amam nematawa hiesi ganima wambel hiagoma ata' sili' seme'am ea' nemaf akutainai notaga.
40024015	Anona nemaf ipe' piti amamaga awami mohambombaga amamaga bu'wami motaga si'i fowa' gani profet Daniel na'i basef mail Baibeli ma'i. Amamaga amama motaga mope anama bo'wagoma nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. (Emi egafis sitalifa basef amama esis sogawa basef ofagema andeande'.)
40024016	Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judia sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw.
40024017	Emi egafis sape ipat ande' felefele' ina ata' setanima siwis sefa'ai amamaga asasimi ipat nomon, owa'.
40024018	Emi egafis sapani aofi, ina ata' setanima sefe' wambel sefa' luwaguf maim asasimi, owa'.
40024019	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sagwa' nomambeh atomi, ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi meataganai.
40024020	Ipe' penda' betena Goda ipe' ina pefa' pefe' nogota anama uf noloma asaf mifi'i o nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai, owa'.
40024021	Nogota anama nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' etap nataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', nimanimi awami amama fowa' gani ina anom na'amaimi mataga, owa'. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' ina anom nimanimi amama motaga, owa'.
40024022	I'i God owa' notopa' nimeguf mefe' bandam, anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi higililas hi'ilas. Owa'etin. God okom napoma epes isima anan nasahe'as ea' dei' natopa' nogota anama bandana.
40024023	Nemaf anama notaga ma i'i enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i anan nape na'ae’, o ‘nani nape gani,’ ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa'. Hapaisi.
40024024	Dei' main, nemaf anama anom amam mombaso'am mi'i amam Krais o mi'i amam profet motaga monda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai si'i God atona nanda'anai. Endilisi i'i amam la'ifim, mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' mohambombagas. Owa'. Hapaisi.
40024025	Peme', ae' ali' a'ipipa ea' ma amamaga amama nimanimi dei' ata' owa' meatagai.
40024026	Na'ama i'i emi egafis si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti, anan nani nape gani epes a'agoma wafiguma fetauguma,’ ipe' ina peme'as pefe'agon, owa'. I'i emi egafis si'i, ‘Ipe' piti nani nape ipat nani nomon’, ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa'.
40024027	Ipe' piti otaga holhol pelepele' holala nataga gani aon natefima ea' howalagon nafe' anama hiagoma aon nowalama naso'ma. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'i, enda'am na'ama etin hiesi sotolowe.
40024028	Mamagoma alop saga'i na'oma, ea' anama atogon anona nemaf komemb mefe' munduwa'anima.
40024029	Nimanimi amama hiami ma nogota anama hi'ilam ea', mehip etin ‘Aon alipunai netaga owamb, ea' aon owambunai wa na'ef ina molo, owa'. Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, amamaga hiami mape otagai ea' bol etin mope.’
40024030	Nemaf anama ondowa mowai, ikwaf ae'anai netaga gani otaga ilif, Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ifi'i. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma selef. Ea' siti ae' eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga howalagon bu'wami Godi moloma pepel Ananinai.
40024031	Ea' alof lu'unai nelef mehip, esapa' amam ensel ae'ami mofe' etap hiagoma aon natefima nowalama wa'owa'ol anama biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganima etap otaga mafe' motambela. Ensel amama mofe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' Ananisi sondatama etifigin.
40024032	Ipe' ukup mi'i anom basef womun etina fig. Ipe' piti lawag anama fik noloma lawah hiami wapoti'. Ipe' piti ilaof nonafa ma basowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele' ma meaof.
40024033	Ea' na'ama etin nemaf anama ipe' piti amamaga amama ali' a'ipipami motaga hi'ilam, ipe' pegawa ae' afi'i aitu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laona, owa'.
40024034	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' papani ina nambimb poga' ulal, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama hiami motaga hi'ilam.
40024035	Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf hegililam hi'ilam, ea' basef ae'ami ina anona nemaf hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.
40024036	-
40024037	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei a'ipipa. Owa' enin epen negawa nemaf anama o nogota anama ae' iefi'ianai. Amam ensel mape heven ilifi wapoti' ina mogawana. Ae' nogalomana Godi wapoti' ina egawana, owa'. Ahalome atona nape ilif anan atona negawa nemaf anama. Waf fowa' sanda'ana nogota anama Noa napenai, ea' na'ama etin si'i esis sonda'ana nemaf anama felefele'ma iefi'i etaga etap anae'.
40024038	Fowa' gani embel lu'wami ata' owa' motagai, nogota anama esis sape sa' gwa'aimi sa' embel amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandase'ama etin safe' safe' sataga nemaf anama Noa nafe' nawis sip.
40024039	Amam nematawa isima ina sagawa nemaf anama, owa'. Esis ukup mase'as sape na'ama etin safe' satagama nemaf anama embel lu'wami mataga mahas muwambu'was saga' hi'alas. Ea' na'ama etina nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'ianai.
40024040	Anama amam biam mondao'oma monda' maol mapani aof, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
40024041	Ea' anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' bret, nemaf anama God nofa' ano'w kofe' nokwaha ano'w kope.
40024042	Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pegawa nambai' Dembinai ipe'inai nifi'i, owa'.
40024043	Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef wamun etin pegawam. I'i ofagena ma ipati nili' nogawa owamb maina nogota nanda' wali neafi'ianai, ama naep motawa notologon nope, nanda' wali ina nafi'i nupisila ipat ananinai nuwis nomon, owa'.
40024044	Ea' ipe' wapoti' naep motawai pepe. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen endililsiwei iefi'i anona nemaf ipe' ina pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf anama, owa'.
40024045	Ipe' hipai penda' waf bu'unai pehafa Ae' si'i aman anama gawainai numafi amam manda' maoli nanda' maol andeande'. Aman anama dembinai ananinai nandandepana ma numafi ananimi manda' maoli ma nease'ama gwa'aimi amam nogota anan na'ianai.
40024046	Nemaf anama dembinai ananinai notanima niefi'ianai, ma niti aman anama nanda' maol andeande', aman anama nondanifel.
40024047	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Dembinai ananinai anona nemaf nonda'ana nope dembinai ma numafi amamaga hiami ananimi.
40024048	Ea' i'i aman anama nonda' waf aonai okom napoma opaf ananinai atona ni'i, ‘Dembinai ae'anai ina nambimb nifi'i ulal, owa'.’
40024049	Ama anan noha amam manda' maol etini nea' gwa'aimi embel la'ifimi noloma amam amama mahaga magaoli.
40024050	Ea' Dembinai ananinai notanima nifi'i anona nemaf aman anama ina ni'i Dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'.
40024051	Ea' nohana negalo'mana nope noloma epes isima sambaso'ami malogof biefimisi. Wambel anama awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete'as sope.
40025001	Nemaf anama epes siowis kingdom heveni si'i anom basef womun etina nematawa awiawai 10-peleiwa. Anona aman na'i noso' ano'w nemata'w, nafe' napani ma notanima nifi'i. Ea' nematawa awama awiawaiwai ohafel ofa' lamifah mandandawa wafe' wa'i witi aman anama eaf o'wana ufi'i.
40025002	Wanowa biawa gawa a'awai ea' wanowa biawa ogawai.
40025003	Awama gawa a'awai ofa' lamifah malomawa wafi'i, ea' awau ina ofa'ai kerosin etifin nalomawa, owa'.
40025004	Ea' awama gawaiwai owala kerosin batowagof ofa'am etifim maloma lamifah awoumi ofa'am etifim wafe'.
40025005	Aman anama ina dei' nafi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Ea' awau hiawai naep nimanim ambeh mahawa wa'oh.
40025006	Wa'oh wafe' wafe' ma amaneta la'efina wame' anona maf nataga na'i, ‘Dei' aman naso' nemata'wi nafi'i. Ipe' pefe' petolona eaf pe'wanai pifi'i.’
40025007	Ea' nematawa awama ohafel, wandondomba lamifah awoumi ma weafe'.
40025008	Ea' nematawa awama gawa a'awai wandaila awama gawaiwai wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Ipe' ata' pese'apa kerosin tu'wanina. Lamifah ape'imi ma'i fendaga'am.’
40025009	Ea' awau wa'ipawa wa'i, ‘Owa'. Kerosin anae' dende'ma ape'. Ipe' fo'o stua petala anona ipe'inai.’
