40025010	Ea' awo ata' wafe' watala kerosin etin, aman anama noso' nemata'wi nafi'i. Ea' nematawa awama wandandombol wapoti', wawis ipat nomon walomana sa' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma aman naso' nemata'wi, ea' uta naso'.
40025011	Ea' awama wafe' watala kerosin otanima wafi'i wagi' wataga, ea' waitu ofalana wa'i, ‘Dembinai, Dembinai, ine' usi'mapai uta.’
40025012	Ea' anan nagwamawa basef na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' owa' eagaupei.’
40025013	Ea' Jisas na'i anom basef wapoti' na'i, ‘Dei' ea' na'ama etin, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pegawa nambai' ae' iefi'i.’
40025014	Nemaf anama ae' etanima iefi'ianai epes siowis kingdom heveni na'ama etin si'i anom basef womun etina anona aman na'i nefe' anagon. Anan nofalai amam amama manda' maola anani mafi'i, nase'ama amamaga ananimi atona etina mumafiam.
40025015	Ea' anan nawalomam moni amam. Anona nase'ana 5,000 kina, anona nase'ana 2,000 kina, anona nase'ana 1,000 kina. Anan nase'am otamba amama dende' ma gawa amamunai ea' nafe'.
40025016	Ea' aman anama nofa' 5,000 kinai mehip etin nanda' maolana ea' nofa' 5,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.
40025017	Ea' aman anama nofa' 2,000 kinai wapoti' nanda' maolan nofa' 2,000 kina wamenai wapoti' naloma fowa'inai.
40025018	Ea' aman anama nofa' 1,000 kinai dembinai ananinai nase'ananai nofa'ana nafe' nala'agon nawa moni anama nambaho'wana etap.
40025019	Ama nogota laona nafe' ea', dembinai amamunai notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i ata' ni'i basef andeande' noloma amam nogawa moni anama anan nase'amanai.
40025020	Ea' aman anama nofa' 5,000 kinai nafi'i ea' nofa'ai 5,000 kina anama anan nanda' maol nofa'anai wapoti' na'ipa dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' nase'e 5,000 kina ea' dei' ine' niti ae' anda' maola moni anama dei' efa' 5,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.’
40025021	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman bu'winai nanda' maol andeande'. Dei' fowa' ine' nimafi amamaga sa'um andeande'. Dei' enda'ena nimafi amamaga lu'wami. Ine' nifi'i nendanifel neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’
40025022	Ea' aman anama nofa' 2,000 kinai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' niti. Ine' nase'e 2,000 kina, dei' anda' maola moni anama, efa' 2,000 kina wamenai wapoti'.’
40025023	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman bu'winai nanda' maol andeande'. Fowa' ine' nimafi amamaga sa'umi andeande'. Dei' enda'ena nimafi amamaga lu'wami. Ine' fi'i nendanifel neloma Dembinai ine'inai.’
40025024	Ea' aman anama nofa' 1,000 kinai anan wapoti' nafi'i na'ipa Dembinai ananinai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' egawa ine' aman la'ifinai nagi amamaga na'i ine'imi atom. Aof anona aman nawamanai anama ine' nafe' nala'am. Ea' anona etap anona aman nowaha olelembanai, ine' nafi'i nagiam.
40025025	Ae' okom napoma ine'. Na'ama ae' umbamahe ma ine', dei' afe' ala'agon ambaho'am 1,000 kina ine'inai amboho'ana nape etap. Amama amamaga ine'imi ea' ine' tanima fa'amo.’
40025026	Ea' Dembinai ananinai nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maoli, ine' aman aowinai endilisi. Ine' ala'uta nainai. Endilisi ine' negawa ae' ala' gwa'aimi anona aman nawam aof ananinai, afe' atopa' wit anona etap anona amani.
40025027	I'i na'ama, dei' nefa'ana nembe'ana benga ae' etanima ifi'i efa'ana neloma anona wamenai wapoti'.
40025028	Ea' ipe' dalombana 1,000 kina aman anama pese'anana nefe'ma aman anama nofa' moni 10,000 kinai.’
40025029	Dei' main? Emi egafis sahapila amamaga amama nambimb sofa' anom wamenai wapoti' ma sefa' hiami. Ea' emi egafis amamaga a'asi, amamaga kwaiyo'um esis sahapilami, amama nambimb endalombasam esis.
40025030	Aman anama wafinai ipe' pekwahona nefe' nuwis ande' akotiguma endilisi. Wambel anama awagoma selef sonda' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete'as sapoma.
40025031	Nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei iefi'i ilumai pepel howalagon ae'anai, ea' amam ensel hiami molome mifi'i. Ama nemaf anama ae' epe etoma balata lu'unai ae'anai ma howalagon mafi'i heveni.
40025032	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma sifi'i sope naep ae'imi. Ea' ae' ihihi'as enda'as situ biefis, si'i aman numafi sipsipi nasifa' sipsip mafe' anagon, meme mafe' anagon.
40025033	Ea' enda' epes sefe' situ wa'ol lagel kwahisinai ae'anai si'i sipsip, ea' epes isima God nondaiwa'masi situ wa'ol lagel eganai si'i meme.
40025034	Ea' ae' dembiwei king i'ipa esis isima sape lagel kwahisinai i'i, ‘Ipe' Ahalome ae'anai nofalo'mepa ma pendanifel, ipe' piwis kingdom Ananinai pefa' amamaga amama ipe'imi fowa' etap owa' ata' neatagai ma'omipei.
40025035	Dei' main, ipe' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape ipe' pase'e gwa'aimi. Pati iap nase'e, pase'e embel a' embel. Ae' afi'i si'i anona wambelinai ipe' pefa'e afe' ifagw ipe'imi.
40025036	Ea' ae' luwaguf maim a'e, ipe' pase'eam anda'am ea' awasiwi ipe' pimafi andeande'. Ae' ape anda' kalabus, ipe' pafo'o patolowe.’
40025037	Ea' esis isima bu'wasi sogwa basef ananimi si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' maina nemaf ape' mati ine' nolomahena mase'ena gwa'aimi ine'? Maina nemaf ine' eap mase'ena ape' mase'ena embel?
40025038	Ea' maina nogota ape' matilina si'i anona wambelinai ape' mofa'ena mafi'i ifagw ape'imi? Ea' maina nemaf ape' matilina lowaf a'ena, mase'ena lowaf?
40025039	Ea' maina nemaf mati awes nanda'ena nape kalabus mafe' matilina?’
40025040	Ea' ae' dembiwei king egwamasa basef i'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Maim opeh bu'wami ipe' panda'ama pagiambama esis sahin owan ae'asi falafisi agof a'asi, amama ipe' ina panda'masam esis etis, owa'. Panda'meam ae' wapoti'.’
40025041	Ea' ae' i'ipa esis saitu lagel eganai wa'ol wapoti' i'ipas, ipe' si'amae fo'o. God nandaiwa'mepa na'i ipe' epes aopei. ‘Ipe' fo'o wambel aonai nif lu'wami ma'oma. Nif anama Ahalome nanda'am mandandombol ma'oma aman aonai Satan naloma ensel ananimi atom.
40025042	Dei' main, ipe' fowa' pati ae' nolomahe ape, ipe' ina pase'e gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' ae' eap mase'ema embel, ipe' ina pase'e embel a' embel, owa'.
40025043	Ea' ae' si'i epen anagon lauguniwei, ea' ipe' owa' pefa'e pefe' ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ea' lowaf a'e ipe' ina pase'e lowaf, ae' awes nanda'e, ape anda' kalabus ea' ipe' ina pafo'o patolowe, owa'etin.’
40025044	Ea' esis wapoti' sogwa basef sohali' ae' si'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' maina nemaf ape' mati ine' gwa'aimi embel a'ena nolomahena, ine' epen anagon lauguninai, ine' lowaf a'ena awes nand'ena, nape nanda' kalabus, ea' ape' owa' mofo'o meatilina?’
40025045	Ea' ae' egwamasa basef esis i'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, maina waf owa' peanda'ana enin epen inima falafini agel a'ani, amama ea' na'ama etin ina panda'meana ae' wapoti', owa'etin.’
40025046	Ea' epes isima anona nemaf sefe' sofa' amamaga awami mape la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' epes isima bu'wasi anona nemaf owagama sofa' ambal namunai sefe' sope anama sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.”
40026001	Jisas nawalipasa basef amama ma hi'alam, ama nogota anama anan na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i,
40026002	“Ipe' pegawa, nimeguf biam atom ata' mape ma nemaf anama sogwa' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova ea' neataga. Nemaf anama anona aman nowalapa ae' ataga epen endililsiwei ma anom amam naumbih mundi ieil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai mohe eaga'.”
40026003	Nemaf anama amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai munduwa'anima mape ipat Kaiafasi, anan pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami.
40026004	Ea' ma'i basef mandame'mama mefe' mondambaho' mombalo' Jisas mohana neaga'.
40026005	Ea' amam mandaiwa'ma meambalo'ana nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami. Na'ama epes hiesi ukup aom ea' sohafel sonda' wandaf.
40026006	Nemaf anama Jisas nape Betani nape ipat anona aman Saimon, fowa' awes aonai nanda' alop ananinai nambo', dei' ambo'ona.
40026007	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anan kwahapila anona botol sanda'ana si'i owap, embel sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai satalona otamba lu'wami nala botol anama. Ea' kwakolo'w sanda anama newala balaga Jisasi ma tebol anan natomama.
40026008	Amam alupumi ananimi mati na'ama, ukup amamumi aom endilisi. Ea' ma'i, “Dei' maina akwa'w kwahambombaga sanda anama nafe' etin?
40026009	I'i afa' ofa'ana enis epes sotalona moni hianai ma afa' ofa'ana oso' epes isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim, andeande'. Owa'etin.”
40026010	Ea' Jisas nogawa ukup amamumi, na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' ukup aom mapoma nemata'w akwama? Owa'. Akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma ae'.
40026011	Isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim sape salomepa nimeguf hiami. Ea' ae' ina ata' elomepa epe nimeguf hiami, owa'.
40026012	Nemata'w akwama kwakolo'wa sanda anama ma alop ae'anai kwanda' amama kondola'wifa felefele'ma esis seawe hi'agif.
40026013	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ganima etap wambel hiagoma anona nemaf si'ipasa basef amama bu'wami Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'umi wapoti' ma ukup meapoma waf bu'unai akwa'w kwanda'meanai.”
40026014	Nogota anama anona alupumi Jisasi 12-peleim agilinama Judas Kariotinai nafe'ma amam pris hiami dambami.
40026015	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i pese'e main petalowe ma ihi'ambepana?” Ea' amam matalifa moni silva 30-peleim mase'ana.
40026016	Ea' nogota anama atona nohafel nanda'am la'ela'ef nagolopa anona eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amama meambalo'ana.
40026017	Nemaf anama sali' sa' anom gwa'aimi sa'i Pasova esis sa' bret anama owa' neatef lu'unai ea' amam alupumi ananimi mafi'mai anan mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat eti ma ine' nea' gwa'aimi amama?”
40026018	Ea' na'i, “Ipe' pefe' taun, pefe'ma anona aman pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai Tisa na'i, “Nemaf dahandahama God nandandepamianai ea' felefele'. Ae' a'i ea' Pasova anama eloma alupumi ae'ami ope ipat ine'inai.” ’ ”
40026019	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi manda'am na'ama si'i anan na'ipam ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi Pasova.
40026020	Ea' owamb anan nape nagwa' gwa'aimi tebol naloma alupumi ananimi 12-peleim.
40026021	Ea' amam mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atuwasi nefe' nihi'amba amam naumbiha ae' efe' eapoma.”
40026022	Ea' ukup amamumi nimanim endilisi, mohafel mahali'ana atona etin ma'i, “Dembinai, ae' o emi?”
40026023	Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anama dei'aol nalome wahapila bret walata dis, anan ea' ma'una, anama atuwasi nowalapa ae' ma naumbih ae'ami.
40026024	A'e, ataga epen endilisiwei, atuwasi enis epes sehe eaga' si'i Buk Baibel na'iama ae'. Ea' aman anama nowalapa ae' ma naumbih, anan uwahipina endilisi. Nambimb nimanimi awami endilisi motagamana. Fowa' mama'wana owa' ata' kolanai, andeande'. Ama anan ina notagama amamaga nimanimi awami. Owa'etin.”
40026025	Ea' aman anama Judas atuwasi nowalapa Jisas amam naumbih anan na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ae' o emi?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' etina na'iam.”
40026026	Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, nafela anona bret, nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' felana pea'ana. Bret anama alop ae'anai.”
40026027	Ea' nafela anona kap embel wain nalanai nanifela God, nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' hipei gwa'am etin.
40026028	Embel amama esimbel ae'ami manda' basef amama Godi ma'i endilisimi atomi mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama ae' ekolo'wama God nokwahomasa waf aonai epes hiesi sanda'anai.
40026029	Ae' a'ipipa, ina ata' etanima ea' embel wain wapoti', owa'. Ae' efe' etaga wambel Ahalomei, ea' anona wain dambainai elomepa anama.”
40026030	Amam manda' anona awaf ea' mawisi mafe' mondowasa' halaf lawah oliv motawama.
40026031	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Atuwasi owamb anae' ipe' pindaiwa'ma pembale'efa ae' pekwahowe. Dei' main, fowa' gani Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, God na'i, ‘Anona nemaf owagama gani, ae' eha aman anama numafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amama mofa' mefe' atona etin.’
40026032	Ea' owa'etin. Nambimb ae' etanima ehafel wapoti' ili'ipa efe' etap hiagoma Galili.”
40026033	Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'ama na'i, “I'i endilisi amam alupumi ine'imi hiemi meambale'efa ine' mi'i mokwahena, hapaimi, ae' embale'efa ine' la'ifiwi ina atuwasi ikwahina, owa'.”
40026034	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, dei' owamb anae' awata ata owa' nondo'am, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
40026035	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Owa'etin. I'i esis soha afa' biafa oga' etin, ae' ina embaho' agel ine'inai, owa'etin.” Ea' alupumi hiami Jisasi ma'iam na'ama etin hi'alam.
40026036	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafe' etin anagon Getsemani lawah hiami oliv motawama. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pepe na'ae, ae' efe' gani wa'ol enda' beten.”
40026037	Ea' anan nao'wa Pita naloma Sebedi batausana Jemsi Jon nao'wam mafe'. Ea' name' opaf ananinai nimanina kwapete' endilisi.
40026038	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Opaf ae'anai nimanina endilisi ma ae' ega'. Ipe' pepe na'ae pindumafuma pepe pehafa ae' eatanimani.”
40026039	Ea' anan nandamboma nafe' fele' nowa nambe' opaf notawa nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome Ae'inai, i'i ine' ni'i a'e, nekwahome nimanimi amama. Ea' ine' nila okom ine'inai atona, Ae' owa'.”
40026040	Nahali'ana ea', nehafel notanima nafe'ma alupumi ananimi mapoma, nati amam ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Pita na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa pepe pehafa ae' o owa'? Nogota a'ipipa a'i pepe pehafa ae' ina laona, owa'. Nogota bandana si'i aua atotona.
40026041	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei motagama ipe'. Endilisi ambagof ipe'mi ma'i a'e ma penda' beten, ea' alop nimanina ala'uta naepa.”
40026042	Ea' anan notanima nafe'ma bif nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai, i'i owa' anona eaf ae' indihi'ama nimanimi amama, ea' hapaimi, ae' efa'am. Ine' nila okom ine'inai atona.”
40026043	Anan nahali'ana ea' nandamboma notanima nafi'i bif amam mapoma nati amam ata' ma'oh etin. Dei' main, naep amamumi nimanim.
40026044	Ea' nakwahom notanima nafe' nanda' beten wenif. Beten anama atona do'ok nali' nanda'anai, notanima nanda'ana wapoti'.
40026045	Ea' notanima nafi'mai amam mapoma na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ata' papoma noma'w pa'oh etin? Peme'! Nogota ae'anai nataga. Dei' nemaf anae' anona aman aonai nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.
40026046	Hafel! Afa' ofe' uti aman anama nihi'ambama ae' ma naumbih ae'ami dei' nafi'i.”
40026047	Jisas ata' naitu na'ipam etin, Judas, anona amam 12-peleim Jisasi, anan nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainahi belep. Amam pris dambami malumai amam agufumi dambami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
40026048	Ea' aman anama nowalapa Jisas, nali' na'ipam nanda' ikwaf nihi'ambam na'i, “Atuwasi ipe' piti ae' iesisi' dalogwanai, aman anama ea' Jisas ma'una. Ipe' pembalo'ana pewa'ana.”
40026049	Ea' anan nafe'ma Jisas mehip na'i, “Owamb bu'unai, Dembinai Tisa.” Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
40026050	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Alupinai, amamaga ine' nafi'i ma na'i nenda'ami, da'am mehip.” Ea' amam mafi'i felefele'ma Jisas mowasa' lagof mombalo'ana.
40026051	Ea' anona aman nape naloma Jisas, nala lagel nagiai bainat ananinai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami, natopa' aliga ananinai pele'atana nowa.
40026052	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Wala bainat notambel nowala napoma. Emi egafis sapa' bainah, anona nemaf bainah mohas soga'.
40026053	Ine' negawa pepel Ahalomei o owa'? I'i ae' ihali'ana, Anan nase'e ensel ananimi hiami endilisi mehip mikila' amam soldia hiami wambotagw 12-peleim. Owa'.
40026054	I'i ae' enda' waf anama, atuwasi basef amama fowa' God na'iam mape buk Baibeli ina mataga alihim dende'ma amam mifi'i mombale'e, owa'.”
40026055	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainahi belep pafi'i si'i pafi'i pa'i pewa' anona aman aonai napa' naloma gavmani? Nimeguf hiami ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami esis amam nematawa hiesi ea' ipe' ina pembale'e.
40026056	Ea' dei' amamaga amama ipe' panda'ami mataga dende'ma basef amama fowa' God na'ipa amam profet manda'am mail buk mataga endilisi.” Ea' alupumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
40026057	Amam amama mombalo' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' ipat anona pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami Kaiafas. Ea' amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma agufumi esis Judai mali' mafi'i mundawa'anima mape.
40026058	Ea' Pita ina nalomam nafe' etin, owa'. Anan nape lougun nagi'mam nafe' nataga endalelemb nawis ipat dembinai prisi nafe' nape naloma amam polisman mapoma nif. Anan na'i nope niti atuwasi maim meataga.
40026059	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Juda mumafi koti, amam hiami ma'i mogolopa enis epesa sombaso'ma Jisas ma anom basefa mohana neaga'.
40026060	Ea' epes hiesi sataga sa'i basef baso'maimi mafe'ma Anan. Ea' esis ina satagama anom basef endilisimi ofagema ma mohana neaga', owa'. Ea' anom amam biam mataga
40026061	ma'i, “Aman anama na'i anom basef na'i, ‘Ae' la'ifiwei ma etalona ipat lu'unai Godi ma etanima ela'ana wapoti' nimeguf wanom.’ ”
40026062	Ea' pris anama dembinai naitu nahali' Jisas na'ama na'i, “Ine' negwa basef amama o owa'? Dei' maina amam ma'ipina basef na'ama?”
40026063	Ea' Jisas ina na'i anom basef, owa'. Ea' pris anama na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi ma agel dembinai Godi nape la'ela'ef hihif, ine' kipa ape'. Ine' Krais nogalomana Godi nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'?”
40026064	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' pa'iam ea' ma'um. Ea' ae' a'ipipa, anona nemaf ipe' piti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, epe lagel da'isinai Godi. Epe otaga ilif etanima ifi'i petolowe.”
40026065	Jisas na'iam na'ama ea', pris anama okom wandafuna ea' nahape' klos amama anan nalami na'iam na'i, “Anan nanda' dembinai God findiwana ma basef awami! Ape' ina ata' mofalai enis epes wapoti' sifi'i si'i anom basefa anan, owa'. Anan na'ipana basef awami ma God, ea' amama dei' pame'anamam ea'.
40026066	Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama?” Ea' amam hiami magwamana basef ma'i, “Anan nanda' waf aonai ea' andeande'ma neaga'.”
40026067	Ea' amam misi'wafa amaga Jisasi mahana lagof amamumi. Ea' anom nakolaombana.
40026068	Ea' masopamana naep ananimi ma'i, “Ine' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i, ine' ni'i basef si'i anona profet na'iami newalapa emi nahena.”
40026069	Pita tol nape endalelemb nomon nape ipat ande'. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwafi'i felefele' ma anan ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ine' wapoti' nape naloma Jisas etap hiagoma Galili.”
40026070	Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi ma naep isima hiesi na'i, “Ae' ina egawa basef amama ine' na'iami, owa'.”
40026071	Ea' nafe' naitu indalelemb nomon felefele'ma uta, ano'w nemata'w kwatolona wapoti' kwa'ipa esis amam nematawa sape felefele' kwa'i, “Aman anama anan nape naloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
40026072	Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi wapoti' ea' na'i, “Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anama.”
40026073	Nogota bandana nafe'ma ea', anom amam maitu felefele' mafi'mai Pita ma'ipana ma'i, “Endilisi, ine' aman naloma esisi. Diga ine'inai nawalapena alihina.”
40026074	Ea' dei' Pita nehafel na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “I'i basef ae'ami ina endilisimi, ae' a'i God nehe' ega'. Endilisi gani ilif, ae' ine egawa aman anama, owa'.” Anan na'iam ea', mehip awata nanda'am.
40026075	Ea' Pita okokoma basef nambati' Jisas na'ipanami na'i, “Awata owa' ata' neanda'am, ine' nembaso'mas ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Ine' owa' negawa Jisase.’ ” Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ande' nalef mehip endilisi.
40027001	Ea' lala kuhimbita atona amam pris dambami hiami maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas neaga'.
40027002	Amam mowa'ana mofa'ana mafe' mase'ana gavman dembinai Pailat.
40027003	Dei' aman anama Judas nawalapa Jisasa amam naumbih nati amam manda' basef mahana Jisasa neaga'. Ea' nati amam mahana manda' amamaga amama, ea' nofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Ea' dei' anan notanima nowambela moni silva anama 30-peleina nafe'ma amam pris amama dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai.
40027004	Ea' na'i, “Ae' anda' waf aonai. Dei' main, awalapa aman anama bu'unai, owa' nonda' waf aonai, atuwasi neaga'.” Ea' amam ma'i, “Amama ina ofagema afa'imi, owa'. Amama ea' ofagema ine'imi atom.”
40027005	Ea' Judas nakwaha moni silva anama ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nafe' anagon nandaha nail mandof ea' afuna.
40027006	Amam pris amama dambami mafela moni anama mofa'ana ma'i, “Moni anama anan natala aman anama afa' wahana naga'i. Ea' afa' ina ombe' moni anama neloma moni na'oh ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'.”
40027007	Ea' amam ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ama moni anama manda'ana matala anona etapa anona aman nala' malohi. Ea' mofa' etap anama ma monda' hi'agilifa sowa epes isima lauginasi safi'i salomas sape saga'i.
40027008	Ea' dei' sofala agiliguma sa'i, “Etap esimbel matalanai.” Agel anama ma etap anama dei' nandape.
40027009	Ea' anom basef fowa' gani God nihi'amba anona aman profet Jeremaia nanda'ami, anama dei' mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Amam mofa' otamba silva 30-peleim, esis Juda sandandepam ma aman anama.
40027010	Ea' moni anama satala anona etapa anona aman nala' malohi, si'i Dembinai na'ipa ae' mehip.”
40027011	Amam mofa' Jisas mafe' naitu naep dembinai gavman Pailati ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai o owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iami endilisimi.”
40027012	Ea' amam pris amama dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai mambaso'mana ma basef hiami, ea' anan ina nagwamam anom basef, o owa'.
40027013	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' name' basef amama hiami manda'menami o owa'?”
40027014	Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef Pailat, owa'. Ea' dembinai gavman gegelalasana kwapete'.
40027015	Nogota anama gavman anama dembinai waf ananinai na'ama. Afagof hiami ma nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami amama sa'i Pasova, anan nakwaha enin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe' wafifina. Emi epen esis amam nematawa hiesi sandandepanai, dembinai gavman na'i a'e nakwahona nafe'ma esis wafifina.
40027016	Nemaf anama anona aman nanda' waf aonai nape nanda' kalabus, agilinama Barabas. Aman anama epes hiesi sagawa anan nanda' waf aonai endilisi.
40027017	-
40027018	Ea' esis amam nematawa sunduwa'anima saitu. Pailat nogawa amam dambami esis Judai kowalama epes hiesi saila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana. Amama atom dei' nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha emi epen nekwaha kalabus nefe'mago ipe'? Ekwaha Barabas o Jisas, esis sa'i Krais Dembinai?”
40027019	Pailat nape ipat anama sanda' kotanai, waulu'mana anani'wi kwanda' basef mafi'mai anan kwa'i, “Ina nenda' anom amamaga awami ma aman anama bu'unai, owa'. Ae' do'ok a'oh owamb andondo'ah atolona ea' efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma Anan.”
40027020	Ea' amam pris amama dambami maloma anom agufumi esis Judai mafela ukup ma esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sohali' Pailata nokwaha Barabas, ea' soha Jisas noga'.
40027021	Ea' Pailat na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Amam amama biam, ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha emi epen nefe'mago ipe'?” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Barabas.”
40027022	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Aman anama Jisas ipe' pa'i Kraisi, ipe' pa'i ae' i'imamana?” Ea' esis hiesi sa'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!”
40027023	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anan nanda' maina waf aonai?” Ea' esis sa'i mehip endilisi sa'i, “Undana lawag hana afuna!”
40027024	Ea' Pailat nogawa basef ananimi ina la'ifim nahianas, owa'. Na'ama esis sohafel sonda' wandaf lu'unai. Ea' Pailat nolai embel nasa'opa lagof ananimi ma naep esis amam nematawa hiesi nihi'ambas na'iam na'i, “Ae' ina ati ofagema owa'etina eha aman anama noga', owa'. Ofagema amama ipe'imi atom.”
40027025	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sagwa basef sa'i, “Ea' ofagema amama mondafi'mai ape' moloma awasi ape'isi.”
40027026	Ea' Pailat nakwaha Barabas nafe'ma esis. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ma moha Jisas mofa'ana mafe' mundana lawag usi'inai ti'wanainai.
40027027	Ea' amam soldia Pailati mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat amam gavmani lu'unai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anan.
40027028	Ea' mowalia luwaguf maim ananimi malamana anona saket akwahinai.
40027029	Ea' mowalo'mana anona mandof higatagunai, malasana'ofana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananinai. Ea' mase'ana anona alifita nahapilana lagel da'isinai ananinai. Amam mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma anan, manda' salamalana ma'i basef findiwaimi ma anan ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai, ine' king dembinai esis Judai!”
40027030	Ea' misi'wafana mandalombana alifita anama mohana timbi tambel balaga ananinai.
40027031	Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket anama, akwahinai malamana klos maim ananimi mofa'ana mafe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
40027032	Amam mohafel mafe' etin, mati anona aman Saimon Sairininai. Ea' amam soldia masapa'ana ma niegiambama Jisas nofa' lawag ananinai.
40027033	Ea' mafe' mataga anagon agiliguma Golgota. Ape' dei' mambomefagel ma'i, Pipitagel Balagaina.
40027034	Ea' mase'ana anom embel wainim mambomom malomana anona marasin numbutinai nea' embel mohagofa ekep pehana. Anan name' embel etin, nandaiwa'mam.
40027035	Amam maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea', manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mondondam atona etin.
40027036	Ea' amam tol mape anama mumafiana.
40027037	Ea' manda' anom basef mail lawag anama ilifunama felefele'ma balaga ananinai. Basef amama sanda' kotami Pailat nanda'ami mai'am na'ama ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA ANAN JISAS, DEMBINAI ESIS JUDAI.”
40027038	Felefele'ma Jisas naila amam soldia maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali. Amam maunda Jisas nail la'afen, ea' maunda amam biam mail wa'owa'ol.
40027039	Ea' enis amam nematawa safe' safi'i esis sanda' salamala anan samboma balagah sa'iam na'ama
40027040	sa'i, “Ine' ewi, ine' netalona ipat anama lu'unai Godi, ma netanima nefelana nimeguf wanom wapoti', dei' nigiambama ine'. I'i ine' nogalomana Godi, nendatagah nisila'i.”
40027041	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam agufumi esis Judai wapoti', hiami malomam manda'ana findiwana na'ama etin si'i eses ma'i,
40027042	“Anan nagiambama enis epes ea' dei' ina nagiambama anan, owa'. Anan dembinai king esis Israeli! Ea' dei' nondatagah lawag ilif nisila'i ma ape' motolona mombale'efana.
40027043	Anan nembale'efa God na'iam na'i, ‘Ae' nogalomana Godi.’ Ea' i'i God okom ninilana, anan nigiambamana.”
40027044	Ea' amam amama biam makowalefi saundam malumana manda'ana findiwana si'i amam agufumi mali' manda'manam.
40027045	Aon nahagasom owamb lu'unai nataga naofenia etap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin nape nafe' nafe' nataga aon nandamboma nape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' nataga howalagon wapoti'.
40027046	Felefele'ma aon nandamboma 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabaktani?” Ape' mambomam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ine' nakwahowe?”
40027047	Ea' enis epes saitu felefele' same' anan na'iam na'ama sa'i, “Anan nofala profet Elaija.”
40027048	Ea' dei' atef anona aman nasagih nafe' mehip nofa' anom mosong mape naohi nalam mowala embel wainimi numbutimi nagiam nasapa'am anona elifita nandowana nafe'ma Jisas nea' embel.
40027049	Ea' enis saitu sa'i, “Ata' ota' kwahowana, ma ata' muti Elaija atuwasi nifi'i notagahona o owa'?”
40027050	Ea' Jisas noga na'i mehip endilisi wapoti' ea' na'i a'e, ea' ambal ananinai nandahi' nafe'ana.
40027051	Ea' lowaf anama lu'unai si'i uta netaol ipat lu'unai Godi nomon palalana gani ilif nowala etap nataga biefina. Ea' suwambon lu'unai nakoto' etap owah lu'wami kokwa'alam.
40027052	Ea' anama sawa epes saga'i hi'agilif mandawisi' ea' amam nematawa hiesi Godi fowa' saga'i sohafel wapoti'.
40027053	Esis sokwaha hi'agilif amama sape. Nemaf anama Jisas nohafel wapoti' esis sefe' suwis Jerusalem, wambel bu'unai God nandandepanai. Ea' epes hiesi satilis.
40027054	Kepten anama dembinai numafi soldia hiami naloma amam soldia mape mumafi Jisasi mati amamaga amama. Nogota anama mati amamaga mataga etap nasol etin napan, umbamaham endilisi ma'i, “Endilisi, aman anama nogalomana Godi.”
40027055	Nematawa hiawai waila Jisasi wakwaha etap hiagoma Galili wafi'i wagiambamana awau waitu laogon watologon.
40027056	Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi. Ano'w agel atona Maria kola Jems naloma Josep. Ea' ano'w kola amam biam Sebedi batausana.
40027057	Ea' wambomota felefele' ma owamb anona aman Arimateainai agilinama Josep nafi'i. Anan amamaga hiamunai anan alupunai naila Jisasi.
40027058	Ea' nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nofa'i alop Jisasi nowana. Ea' Pailat na'ipa amam soldia mehip ma Josep nofa'ana mose'anana.
40027059	Ea' nofa'ana lowaf namunai bu'unai afitinai.
40027060	Ea' nowa'ana nofa'ana nafe' nawis hi'agif ananinai dambainai, fowa' nagwasana nawis anona owap lu'unai. Ea' nasapa'ana nawis nambe'ana na'oh nomon. Ea' dei' namboma anona owap lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta hi'agif anama. Anan nanda'am na'ama ea' nafe'.
40027061	Ea' Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awau agel atona, awau biawa wape wa'ol felefele' ma hi'agif watologon.
40027062	Ama wafilu nemaf sandandomba amamaga gwa'aimi maim anama nafe'ma ea', amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi mafe' matagama Pailat.
40027063	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' ukup mapoma anom basef aman anama nambaso'ami na'iami fowa' anan ata' nape. Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Nimeguf wanom mefe'ma hi'ilam, ae' etanima ehafel wapoti'.’
40027064	Amama atom dei' ine' ni'ipa anom soldia mumafi hi'agif anama andeande'ma nimeguf wanom mefe' hi'ilam. Na'ama amam alupumi ananimi mifi'i mokoalopana mofa'ana mefe' mi'ipa esis amam nematawa mi'i, ‘Anan notanima nehafel hi'agif wapoti'.’ Ea' baso'am anama dei'inai lu'una nikila' nali'i.”
40027065	Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pe'wa anom soldia pefe' pewalo uta hi'agif anama la'ifina, si'i ukup ipe'imi ma'iam dende'ma gawa ipe'inai.”
40027066	Ea' amam mafe' mowalowa hi'agif anama la'ifina, ea' mosao'ma uta masahe'ana manda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai ma epes ina siniga'ana siowis. Ea' ma'ipa anom soldia mape mumafiagon.
40028001	Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat nafe' hi'alana, ea' Sande nemaf nali'ma wik kuhimbita atona felefele'ma aon nielatowi, nematawa awama biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w agel atotona Maria wafi'i ma wieti hi'agif.
40028002	Ea' sowambon lu'unai nasol mehip. Ea' anona ensel Dembinai nisila'i gani heven, nafe' hi'agif nelefata owap anama nowalo uta nafe' na'oh wa'ol ea' natomana.
40028003	Amaga ananinai howalona nafifil endilisi si'i otaga pelele'ala howalagon ea' lu'waguf maim ananimi afitim endilisi si'i ais mandati.
40028004	Ea' soldia amama mumafi hi'agifi umbamaham kwapete'am endilisi mowa ma'oh etap si'i saga'i.
40028005	Ea' ensel anama na'ipa awau biawa na'i, “Ipe' bipa ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ae' egawa ipe' pafi'i pa'i piti Jisas, aman anama esis sahana naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
40028006	Anan ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Notanima nohafel ea' si'i fowa' nali' na'ipipa! Ipe' fi'i ma ata' piti na'ae na'oma. Dei' wafigin nape.
40028007	Dei' ipe' fo'o mehip pi'ipa alupumi ananimi pi'i, ‘Anan nahafel wapoti' ea'. Peme'. Anan nali'ipa nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ipe' fo'o potolona gani.’ Basef ae'ami ea' amama.”
40028008	Ea' awau umbamahawa ea' wandanifel endilisi wapoti', mehip wakwaha hi'agif wasagih wafe'ma wie'ipa amam alupumi ananimi.
40028009	Dei' atef Jisas nati awau eaf nanda'mawa gude na'i, “Nemaf bu'unai ipe'.” Ea' awo wafe' felefele'ma anan wahapila bo'wagah ananimi ma onda' lotuma anan.
40028010	Ea' Jisas na'ipawa na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ipe' bipa pefe' pi'ipa amam owape ae'ami mofo'o Galili. Atuwasi motolowe ganima.”
40028011	Nematawa awama biawa ata' wafe' eaf etin, anom soldia mumafi hi'agifi mafe' mawis taun anama ma'ipa amam pris dambami ma amamaga amama matagai.
40028012	Ea' pris amama maloma agufumi esis Judai ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ea' mase'ama moni hianai nafe'ma soldia amama ea'
40028013	ma'ipam ma'i, “Ipe' pi'iam na'ama pi'i, ‘Owamb afa' wa'ihi, amam alupumi ananimi mafi'i makoalopana mofa'ana.’
40028014	Ama gavman dembinai neme' basefana, afa' onda' okom ananinai awanena ipe' basef a'epa.”
40028015	Ea' amam soldia mofa' moni anama mame' basef amamumi magi'mam. Ea' basef amama ea' mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma esis Juda, ea' ata' sa'iam etin mafi'i matagama dei' sa'iam la'ela'ef.
40028016	Ea' amam alupumi 11-peleim mafe' Galili mataga halaf anama Jisas nali' na'ipam meafe'ma.
40028017	Ea' mati Jisas mafela agel ananinai manifelona. Ea' anom ukup biambiefim mapeim.
40028018	Ea' Jisas nafi'i felefele'ma amam na'ipam na'i, “God nase'eana agel lu'unai ma pepel ilifanai etapanai ea'.
40028019	Na'ama dei' ipe' pefe' wambel hiagoma piwalipa amam nematawa sape wambotogw hiami piwalipasa basef bu'wami ae'ami, penda'as sotaga alupisi ae'asi ma siela basef Ae'ami andeande' ea' pipisi'as embela agel Ahalomei noloma Ae'anai noloma Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.
40028020	Ea' piwalipasa sila basef bu'wami hiami ae'ami fowa' awalipipami ma basef la'ifimi. Endilisi ae' ape alomepa ma nimeguf hiami danda, pefe' pefe' ma nemaf akutainai nogota hi'ilana.”
41001001	-
41001002	Basef amama bu'wamima Jisas Krais, Anan nogalomana Godi. Basef amama mohafel mataga si'i anona profet fowa'inai Aisaia nanda'am mape buk. Aisaia na'i basef amama na'i, “God na'ipa Jisas na'i, ‘Ine' neme'. Anona nemaf ae' esapa' anona aman nofa' basef Ae'ami nili' nefe' nendondombamena eaf ine'inai.
41001003	Anona etap wafiguma fatauguma malogel anona amani anona nemaf ni'i basef na'ama ni'i, “Ipe' pendondomba eafa Dembinai.” ’ ”
41001004	Ea' Jon napisi'as embel nafe' anagon wafiguma fatauguma nawalipasa basef amam nematawa hiesi na'ipas na'i, “Ipa pewa' alafugaha waf aonai pemboma opalef ma God pefa' baptaisa God nekwahomepa waf aonai panda'anai.”
41001005	Ea' esis hiesi sape etap hiagoma Judia saloma amam nematawa hiesi sape Jerusalemi hi'alas safi'mai Jon sa'i some' basef ananimi. Esis sawalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, ea' Jon napisi'as walemb Jordan.
41001006	Jon nala anom klos sanda' auf anom mafis lu'wami kamelim sanda'am, ea' nowaho'am let sanda' agwahup mafisina sanda'anai, nagundisana. Gwa'aimi na' gwamu'wis maloma aupimbel aolupumi.
41001007	Ea' nawalapa basef na'i, “Anona aman nambimb nigi'ma ae' niefi'i, anan la'ifinai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'. Nambimb Anan nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope opalef ipe'imi nomon.
41001008	Ae' apisi'ipa embel atom wafimi ea' Anan owa'. Nambimb Anan nupisi'ipa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nuwisipa nope nolomepa.”
41001009	Nogota anama Jisas nakwaha Nasaret etap hiagoma Galili nafi'i. Ea' Jon napisi'ana embel walemb Jordan.
41001010	Jisas nakwaha embel walemb nandegiai, nati heven uta nandausi' alihina ma Anan, nati Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai anan si'i amil mai'una nufia' nisila'manai.
41001011	Ea' anona maf na'i natagai heven na'i anom basef na'i, “Ine' nogalome. Ae' okom nainailina endilisi. Okom ae'anai bo'ona endilisi ma ine'.”
41001012	-
41001013	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa' Jisas nafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma mafis atom aolupumi maituma nape nimeguf 40-peleim, aon si'inai tu'waninai. Ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana na'i Jisas nonda' waf aonai. Nagwambana ma ea', amam ensel mafi'i mumafi Jisas magiambamana.
41001014	Nemaf anama amam manda' Jon nanda' kalabus, Jisas nafe' etap hiagoma Galili nanda' maol nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi na'ipasam
41001015	na'i, “Nemaf anama felefele' netaga ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias. Na'ama dei' ipe' pemboma opalef pefe'ma God pewa' alafugaha waf aonai.”
41001016	Jisas naila akata nafe' etin walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili, nati amam biam Saimon naloma owalomana Andru. Amam mala anemb magi agof manda' bisinis.
41001017	Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pifi'i pembalo'a basef ae'ami pila Ae'. Fowa' ipe' pagi agof, ea' dei' ihi'ambepa pefe' pi'ipa enis epes sila ae'.”
41001018	Ea' mame'ana makwaha anemb ma'oh, mailana mafe'.
41001019	Ea' nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele' ma akata nati Jems naloma owalomana Jon, Sebedi batausana. Amam matoma bot mape magundisa anemb amamumi.
41001020	Ea' Jisas natolom nofalam mehip mame'ana. Ea' mohafel mehip makwaha amamaga amamumi hi'alam ma'oh, ea' mailana mafe.
41001021	Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi Jems naloma Jon, Saimon naloma Andru mafe' Kaperneam mape. Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, Jisas nao'wam mafe' mawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' na'ipasa basef amam nematawa.
41001022	Esis same' basef ananimi ea' gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi. Anan ina nawalipas si'i amam falafumi ma'ipas, owa'. Anan na'ipasa basef la'ifimi si'i amam agufumi ma'ipas. Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ina mawalipas na'ama si'i anan, owa'.
41001023	Nemaf anama anona aman nape nalomas ipat anama, ambal aonai napeinai ea' mehip etin ambal anama noga na'i mehip na'i,
41001024	“Jisas ine' Nasaretinai, ine' nafi'i na'i nenda' maina afa'? Nafi'i ma nehambombagafa? Ae' egawena ine' aman bu'winai Godi.”
41001025	Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i, “Ine' ambalip aonai, feso'mena kwaha aman anama fo'o.”
41001026	Ea' ambal anama aonai nakoto'ana kwapete'ana nanda'am ge'ala mehip nakwahona nawisi nafe'.
41001027	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasis sandakoto'ma ea' sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amama main de'im? Amama anom basef dambaimi. Anan natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman la'ifinai. Amamaga hiami mame' basef Ananimi. Ambagof awami wapoti' mame' basefana makwaha epes mafa' mafe'.”
41001028	Ea' basef amama ma maol Jisas nanda'ana mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma nape nomona etap hiagoma Galili.
41001029	Jisas naloma alupumi biamibiam ananimi mohafel makwaha ipat anama ea' mafe' wambel Saimoni Endrui ea' mawis ipat amamunai. Jems naloma Jon wapoti' mafe' malomam.
41001030	Ea' esis sa'ipa Jisasa Saimon nandagi'mokwi awasi'w kwa'oh, alop akwa'unai nifina.
41001031	Ea' Jisas nafe'ma akwa'w nahapila lagel akwa'unai nafela'w kwataga bo'okw, kwanda'masa gwa'aimi esis.
41001032	Ea' aon nowala naso', esis sofa'ai epes awes naninani nanda'asi saloma enis ambagof awami mapeisi safi'mai Jisas.
41001033	Ea' esis hiesi sape wambel lu'unai safi'i saitu felefele'ma uta ipat si'ina.
41001034	Ea' Jisas nanda' amam namatawa hiesi awes nanda'asi bo'wes, natofamasa anom ambagof awami mapeisi ea' sataga bo'wes. Ambagof awami mogawa Jisas anan nogalomana Godi. Na'ama nasopama malogof ambagof amama awami faso'mam tol mape.
41001035	Wafilu kuhimbita atona owamb ata' nail, Jisas nohafel nakwaha ipat anama napoma. Anan atona nohafel nafe' anama wafiguma ea' nape nanda' betena God.
41001036	Saimon naloma anom alupumi ananimi mohafel matimana owa', ea' magolopana magi'mana mafe'.
41001037	Magolopana mafe'ma matolona ma'ipana ma'i, “Epes hiesi sagolopena.”
41001038	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Dei' ata' ali'aso, afa' ofe' wambel hianai nape felefele'i. Ae' ata' i'ipasa basef bu'wami esis. Maol anama atona Ae' afi'manai anama.”
41001039	Na'ama nase'asa basef nafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma Galili, nase'asa basef bu'wami nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapaimi natofamasa ambagof awami mape enis epesi mandahi' mawisi mafe'.
41001040	Ea' anona aman awesinai alop nambo'anai nafi'i felefele'ma Jisas nindiwa nembawa notawa na'ipana mehip na'i, “I'i ine' ni'i a'e, nenda' ae' etaga bo'awe.”
41001041	Ea' Jisas nati anan uwahipina nawomana lagela anan na'i, “Ae' a'i a'e ma ine' netaga bo'wena.”
41001042	Ea' dei' atef aman anama alop nambu'wi nataga bo'ona.
41001043	Ea' Jisas dei' etef nasapa'ana na'ipana mehip
41001044	na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'. Ine' fo'o nihi'ambana alop ine'inai ma aman anama pris. Ea' nese'ana amama anan nondolalima God ea' ine' ninifelana ma nataga bo'wena si'i mi'uli Ananinai fowa' Moses na'ipasanai na'i. Ama amam nematawa hiesi sotolona sogawa ine' ambo'wena.”
41001045	Owa'etin. Aman anama na'ipasam mafe'agon hi'alagon amam nematawa hiesi sogawa anan nataga bo'ona. Ea' Jisas ina nafe' nawis anona wambel ma naep hiesi, owa'. Na'ama hiesi sifi'i sili'akwana. Ea' ina nawis anona wambel lu'unai, owa'. La'ela'ef nape anama wafiguma atogon. Ea' nambimb esis amam nematawa sape ganigani safi'mai anan.
41002001	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Jisas notanima nafe' Kaperneam. Ea' esis same' basefa Anan nafi'i nape ipat.
41002002	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandakolas ipat anama napeinai asi'ina ea'. Na'ama uta owa' anagon nogal nopoma sefe' siowisi. Ea' na'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi ma esis.
41002003	Ea' anom amam biamibiam manda' balata malai anona aman lagof bo'wagah maga' mefa'ana ma'i mefe'ma Jisas.
41002004	Ipat asi'inama amam nematawa hiesi saitu sili'akw, ea' ina anagona mofa'ana muwis mofe' felefele'ma Jisas, owa'. Ea' malata ipat ilif ande'ana mapisila bogwan ilif mala aman anama awes nanda'anai naloma lahis nowala nomon Jisas naituma.
41002005	Nogota anama Jisas nati biamibiam nagawa amam mombale'efana ma'i anan la'ifinai ma nigiambama aman anama notaga bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Ine' epen ae'inai. Waf aonai ine' nanda'anai Ae' akwahomenana ea'.”
41002006	Ea' anom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mape mame'ana. Opalef amamumi aoma basef ananimi. Na'ama amam nomonas matamea ma'i,
41002007	“Dei' maina Jisas na'iam na'ama? Anan nanda' God findiwana. Owa' etina anona aman la'ifinai ma neakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai. God atona nakwa waf aonai.”
41002008	Dei' atef Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi negawam okom ananinai, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi mape na'ama?
41002009	Dei' amamaga maim ipe' pa'i ahifima Ae'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipa aman anama awesinai, i'i ‘Ae' ekwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai’, o i'ipana, i'i, ‘fela lahis ine'imi nehafel nefe'.’ Ipe' pa'i maim ahifima ae'?
41002010	Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa ae' ataga epen endelisiwei, la'ifiwei ma ekwahomasa waf aonai hianai amam nematawa sape etap anae' sanda'anai. Ae' a'i ihi'ambepa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda' amamaga amama.” Ea' na'ipana na'i,
41002011	“Ae' a'ipina, ine' hafel fela lahis ine'imi fo'o ipat ine'inai.”
41002012	Ea' esis saitu satolona sati anan nohafel mehip nafela lahis ananimi nefa'am nafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasis kwapete'as, safela agel Godi lu'una sa'i, “Fowa' ape' ina mati anom amamaga si'i na'ama, owa'etin.”
41002013	Ea' Jisas notanima naila akata nafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan na'ipasa basef bu'wami God.
41002014	Jisas nohafel nafe' ea', nati anona aman Livai, Alfius nogalomana nape ipat sanda' takisa. Aman anama nofa'asa otamba amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' Jisas nofalana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.” Ea' nohafel nailana nafe'.
41002015	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi ma' gwa'aimi ipat Livai maloma amam hiami manda' waf aonai. Anom mofa' takisi, anom manda' waf aonai amam maloma Jisas ma' gwa'aimi. Amam amama mailana etin.
41002016	Ea' amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam Farisi mati Jisas na' gwa'aimi naloma amam manda' waf aonai maloma amam amama mofa' takisi. Ea' mahali' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' maina anan nape naloma amam mofa' takisi maloma amam amama manda' waf aonai ma' gwa'aimi etifigin?”
41002017	Ea' Jisas name'am na'ama na'ipam na'i, “Epes bu'wasi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Isima awes nanda'asi etis safe'ma dokta. Ae' ina afi'i ma efala epes isima bu'wasi, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efala isima sanda' waf aonai.”
41002018	Anona nemaf amam amama alupumi Joni maloma anom alupumi Farisi makwaha gwa'aimi ma monda' beten andeande'. Ea' enis epes safi'i sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Dei' maina amam alupumi Joni maloma alupumi amam Farisi makwaha gwa'aimi ma manda' beten, ea' alupumi ine'imi owa' mokwaha gwa'aimi?”
41002019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “I'i enis sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma enis aman nemata'w bias sendase'ama, ipe' pa'i esis alupisi atuwasi sondaiwa'ma gwa'aimi amama? Owa'etin. Nemaf anama esis bias sondase'ama, alupisi asasisi sandanifela sea' gwa'aimi solomas.
41002020	Ea' anona nemaf enis epes sofa' aman anama naso' nemata'wi nefe' laoguma, wila esis sokwaha gwa'aimi, ea' dei' ata' owa'.”
41002021	Ea' Jisas nanda' anom basef wamun etina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma peatopa' lowaf namunai pigundisana neloma anona lowaf apinai, owa'. I'i penda'am na'ama, nambimb lowaf anama namunai pele'etana nehape' apinai nogal notaga lu'una.”
41002022	Ea' na'i anom basef wapoti' na'i, “Ina enin epen nakolo'wa embel wain dambainai agwahup mafinina mowala agwahup apinai si'i botowagof, owa'etin. I'i enin nenda'am na'ama, embel wain motef hiami, mohape' agwahup anama pele'etana ea' wain kolo'olam hi'ilam. Na'ama owa'. Enin nakolo'am agwahup dambainai atona.”
41002023	Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, Jisas nafe' nawis anona aof sawa witanai ea' nawis. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' malomana magi anom wit maufi magwa'am.
41002024	Ea' anom dambami Farisi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Neme'. Alupumi ine'imi manda'am na'ama ma main? Amam mosambala mi'uli ma nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai, Sabat.”
41002025	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam Farisi na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef mape Baibeli ma waf fowa' gani king Devit nanda'anai. Nemaf anama Devit naloma alupumi ananimi gwa'aimi a'am nolomaham. Ipe' pegawa basef amama ea'.
41002026	Nemaf anama Abiata nape dembinai pris nali'ma amam prisi, Devit nolomahana nawis ipat Godi na' bret anama mondolalima Godanai. Mi'uli ape'inai lu'unai na'i amam pris atom mea'ana. Enis epes owa'. Ea' Devit na'ana nagwa'ana naso' alupumi ananimi magwa'ana etin.”
41002027	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam Farisi wapoti' na'i, “God nali' nanda' epes ea' nagi' na'ipasa nemaf sapoma noma'wanai Sabat ama nigiambamas. Ina nanda' epesa sagi'ma basefa Sabat, owa'.
41002028	Ae' atowe ataga epen endilisiwei ape Dembiwei ma amamaga hiami. Ea' ape Dembiwei ma nemaf anama Sabata i'ipipa maina maol andeande'ma pila basef penda'ana nemaf anama.”
41003001	Anona nemaf Jisas nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai, nati anona aman lagel ananinai naga' nail nape.
41003002	Ea' enis safe' sagolopa basef kwamaimi ma senda'mana basef. Ea' satolona naep maimailana ma siti nonda' aman anama bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat?
41003003	Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anama lagel ananinai naga' nailanai na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu naep epes hiesi la'afena sitilina.”
41003004	Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i “Mi'uli lu'unai ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Ape' monda' waf bu'unai nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai o monda' waf aonai? Ape' migiambama esis sope ambal namunai napeis mohas soga'?” Ea' esis ina sa'i anom basef, owa'.
41003005	Ea' Jisas nafela naep natilis tulif ea', nogawa esis opalef mase' sandaiwa'ma seme' basef. Na'ama okom ananinai wandafuna ma esis. Ea' nati esis uwahipis na'ipa aman anama lagel ananinai naga' nailanai na'i, “Dowa lagel ine'inai usi'ina.” Ea' nandowanai nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
41003006	Ea' amam dambami Farisi mohafel mafe' maloma anom amam epes hiami Heroti, ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas noga'.
41003007	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi makawaha wambel anama mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'i etap hiagoma Galili sailana safe'.
41003008	Esis safi'i hiagoma. Enis safi'i wambel hiagoma Judia, enis safi'i Jerusalem, enis safi'i etap hiagoma Idumea, ea' enis sape walemb Jordan gani wa'ol saloma enis safi'i wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidon, esis hiesi safi'mai anan. Same' basefa amamaga Jisas nanda'ami, na'ama safi'mai Anan.
41003009	Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa hiesi endilisi sape. Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Na'ama esis safafa'asowe. Anona bot nola ma ae' ma elata etoma i'ipasa basef.”
41003010	Anan fowa' nanda' hiesi isima awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Ea' dei' awes nanda'asi sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin safe'ma anan sehapilana ma seataga bo'wes.
41003011	Maina nemaf ambagof awami mape epesi mati Anan mogawana, ea' mowa ma'oh etap felefele'ma anan opafunama, ea' mofalana mehip ma'i, “Ine' nogalomana Godi.”
41003012	Ea' na'ipa ambagof awami mehipa amam ina mowalapa Anan mi'ipasana mi'i anan nogalomana Godi, owa'.
41003013	Jisas nafe' nondowasa' halaf, ea' nofala amam amama Anan okom na'iami mafi'mai Anan.
41003014	Ea' nandandepa amam 12-peleima la'ela'ef mope molomana, ama nambimb nosapa'am mefe' mi'ipasa basef. Amam 12-peleim nandandepam Aposel.
41003015	Na'ipam nase'ama pepel ma meatofa ambagof awami mape epesi.
41003016	Amam 12-peleim nandandepami, agof amamumi amama. Saimon agel wa'ana Pita,
41003017	ea' Jems Sebedi nogalomana, naloma owalomana Jon, nase'ama agof wa'am Boanerges. Agel anama ofagema na'ama, nogamana otaga dililu bugalagw.
41003018	Ea' Andru, Filip naloma Bartolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, naloma Jems nogalomana Alfiusi, naloma Tadius naloma Saimon. Aman anama Saimon anan epes hiesi Seloti.
41003019	Ea' Judas Kariotinai, aman anama nafe' nawalapa Jisasa naumbih.
41003020	Jisas nafe' anona ipat, ea' esis hiesi safi'i wapoti'. Ea' naloma alupumi ananimi ina ata' ma' gwa'aimi, owa'.
41003021	Esis wambota Jisasi same' basef amama ma Anan naloma alupumi ina ma' gwa'aimi, ea' safi'i sa'i so'wana. Ea' sa'i, “Anan ambagof awami manda'ana dei' nahaga nagaol.”
41003022	Anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mapani Jerusalem makini'i mambaso'am ma'i, “Ambal aonai Belsebul nape Jisas. Ea' Anan natofa ambagof awami ma pepel Belsebuli.”
41003023	Ea' Jisas nofalai esis safi'i saitu felefele'ma anan na'ipasa anom basef womun etina esis na'i, “Satan ina natofa anan atona, owa'.
41003024	I'i enis anona wambel hiagoma esis etis sondawaloga biefisa sopa', ina nambimb la'ifis, owa'. Esis sandawaloga biefis ea' ina la'ifis.
41003025	I'i enis epes hiesi anona wambota sape ipat atotona sondawaloga epes biefis sopa', esis sandawaloga biefis, ina nambimb sope la'ifis, owa'. Sandawaloga biefis ea'.
41003026	I'i wambota Satani sondawaloga biefis sopa', ina la'ifis, owa'.”
41003027	“Enin epen ina la'ifina nefe' nuwis ipat anona aman la'ifinai napeinai nokowalefa nefa' amamaga ananimi, owa'. Enin ata' nili' nombalo'ana ma nowa'ana tatala'ina, anan la'ifina ma niowis nokowalefa nefa' amamaga ma'oh ipat aman anama.”
41003028	-
41003030	Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mambaso'am manda' findiwana ma'i, “Anona ambal aonai nagiambama Jisas nanda' maol ananinai.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi etis ae' a'ipipa, anona nemaf God nokwaha waf aonai naninani hianai noloma basef findiwaimi hiami amam nematawa sanda'ami hi'ilam. Ea' emi epen nenda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, God anona nemaf owa'etin endilisi ma nokwaha findiwa anama aonai ma epen inima nanda'anai, owa'. Findiwa aonai la'ela'ef nopein dei' nefe' anona nemaf wapoti' la'ela'ef nope.”
41003031	Nemaf anama Jisas naloma epes hiesi sape salomana ipat nomon. Ea' mama'wana kwaloma owapana ananimi safi'i sataga saitu ande'. Ea' sa'ipa enis sawis sa'ipana sa'i Jisas nuwisi ande' nefe'ma esis.
41003032	Ea' isima hiesi sape salomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' neme', mama'wena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi safi'i saitu ande' sa'i solomena si'i.”
41003033	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Mama'we owape ae'asi emi egafis?”
41003034	Ea' Anan nati esis amam nematawa sape salipana na'ipas na'i, “Piti mama'we kwaloma owape ae'asi isima.
41003035	Emi egafis saila okom Godi ma sila waf Ananinai, isima mamase owape henitiame ae'asi.”
41004001	-
41004003	Anona nemaf Jisas nasefela opeh wapoti' nanda'am nawalipa amam nematawa hiesi felefele'ma walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili. Ea' esis hiesi safi'i salipana sape. Ea' nalata natoma anona bot nala embel walemb batupa'manai anama, ea' esis saitu akata felefele'ma walemb anama. Ea' nase'asa basef hiami womun etin na'ama na'i, “Ipe' peme'! Anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb witim si'i rais anona aof.
41004004	Anan nowahom nafe', anom mowa eaf safe'ma ea' amiguf mufia' mafi'i ma'am.
41004005	-
41004006	Ea' anom mowa etap otambaiguma, etap ina lu'una, owa'. Kwaie'una. Natoma ilif atogon ina nowala owin, owa'. Ea' olelemb witim mataga mehip ea' masilimb ina mowala etap, owa'. Ea' owaf naluwi naham, otamba maofam alim.
41004007	Anom mowala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofenia wit, ea' ina malo andeande' mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
41004008	Ea' anom mowa mafe' etap bu'unai, ea' mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi. Anom mola 30-peleim, anom 60-peleim ea' anom mola 100-peleim.”
41004009	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' aligah magalipei peme' basef amama andeande' ukup mopomam.”
41004010	Jisas atona nape, alupumi 12-peleim ananimi maloma enis sape salomanai safi'i sahali'ana ma basef amama womun etin.
41004011	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God nihi'ambepa basef ofagema mape mandambahi'i ma epes siowis wambota Ananinai numafias. Dei' God nihi'ambepa basef amama ofagema alihim. Ipe' pame'am pegawam ea'. Esis isima sololama Godi owa'. Esis same' basef womun etin.
41004012	Ama anom basef mape Baibeli mandawalap ma'iam ma'i, ‘Esis nimeguf hiami sotologon, ea' ina sati anom amamaga, owa'. Ea' esis some' basef aligah asasimi, ea' ina sogawa ofagema, owa'. I'i sogawam ofagema, esis somboma opalef ma ae' ekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Owa'etin.’ ”
41004013	Ea' Jisas nahali' esis na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef amama womun etin dei' apipami? Ea' nambimb ipe' pegawa basef womun etin hi'ilam pi'imama? Owa'etin.
41004014	Dei' aman anama nowaha olelemb, anan si'i anona na'ipasa basef Godi.
41004015	Olelemb mowa eafi amama si'i epes same' basef amama, ea' Satan nagi basef amama God nase'asam mape opalef asasimi nakwahom nafe'.
41004016	Ea' anom mowa mafe' anagon otambaiguma, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi sofa'am mehip sandanifelamam.
41004017	Epes isima si'i masilimb ina malo mowala etap owin. Esis sembale'ef nogota bandana etin ea', nambimb nimanimi matagamas enis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma sembale'am basef Godi sanda'as findiwas sahas, sanda'masa waf aonai ea' satanima safe'.
41004018	Ea' anom mowala mandelef wandafumi la'afen, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi sailam safe',
41004019	ea' amamaga hiami nimanimi maloma amamaga hiami esis satolom kowalasami baso'maimi maloma moni wiga maima esis sa'i sofa'ami hiami mape etapi, amama mataga maofenia basef Godi. Ea' ina sombale'ef sanda' waf bu'unai la'ifis, owa'. Sowa si'i gwa'aimi owa' molo andeande'.
41004020	Ea' anom mowa etap bu'unai si'i epes isima same' basef bu'wami sembale'am sanda' waf bu'unai. Enis si'i mola gwa'aimi 30-peleim, enis si'i mola 60-peleim, ea' enis si'i mola 100-peleim.”
41004021	Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin na'i, “A'i epes sakata lamifah sopalo'am ma'oh owina balatagw o sopalo'am mandambaho' ma'oh baket? Owa'. Esis sawamonam balatagw ilif.
41004022	Amamaga hiami mandambahi'i, anona nemaf motaga alihim epes hiesi sotolom sogawam. Ea' amamaga hiami ata' sambaho'am mapani, anona nemaf motaga mondawalap, epes hiesi sogawam.
41004023	Ipe' aligah magalipei pame' basef, peme'am andeande'.”
41004024	Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Basef ipe' pame'ami, amama pegawam andeande'. Maim basef maloma maina waf ipe' panda'masam enis epes, ikwaf anama atona anona nemaf God nogwamepana ipe', ea' nowatanimipa anom wapoti'.
41004025	Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Godi, nambimb God nowatanimasam wapoti'. Isima owa' sembale'ami, nambimb basef kwawie'im amama esis sembale'ami, God nondalombasam esis ea' sopan etin.”
41004026	Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias, si'i anom basef womun etin dei' ae' a'ipipami. Anona aman nowaha olelemb gwa'aimi aof ananinai.
41004027	Ea' nafi'i nape wambel na'oh owambeh hiami nape nimeguf hiami mafe' ea' olelemb amama nawami mataga malo lu'um ma'imama? Anan ina nogawa mataga ma'imama, owa'.
41004028	Etap atona nanda' olelemb amama mataga malo mola gwa'aimi bu'wami mail. Soh atom mali', ea' afis mataga ea' gwa'aimi mandanda' lu'um mail.
41004029	Ea' matagama lu'um akom andeande' ea' maof. Nemaf anama sala' gwa'aimianai nataga, aman anama nanda' maol naloma nogwatop.”
41004030	Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias na'ama etin si'i main? Ae' indila'wifam si'i maim basef wamon etin?
41004031	Nalelef mastetim so'uso'umi. Ina lu'um si'i su'utip gwa'aimi lawah hiami mawam etapi, owa'. Nalelef so'uso'um endilisi. Anona aman nawam etap
41004032	ea' mataga malo lu'um mikila' gwa'aimi hiami mape aofi. Amam mataga si'i lawag lu'unai, agof mandalana mafe'agon ganigani. Ea' amiguf mafi'i mala alagah mandambaho'ma owaf mail agof.”
41004033	Ea' Jisas na'ipas basef womun etin si'i nali' na'ipasami. Na'ipas nendala'wifa amamaga hiami nagi'ma gawa asasinai nafe' netambel.
41004034	Anan ina na'ipasa anom basef alihima esis, owa'. Na'iam womun etin. Ea' nambimb alupumi ananimi atom malomana mape, na'ipam alihima ofagema basef womunaimi.
41004035	Nemaf anama atona, wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' ofe' anama walemb lu'unai batupa'manai anama gani fisana.”
41004036	Ea' amam makwaha esis amam nematawa hiesi mafe' bot anama Jisas natumanai mofa'ana mafe'. Enis epes sofa' anom bogw maloma bot anama mafe'.
41004037	Ea' anona uf lu'unai naluwi, naoh manda'am fepoh, mafe' mawis bot nomon ea' na'i si'inama embel.
41004038	Ea' Jisas na'oh nalola bot nagi'ma nola komboto'w na'oh. Ea' amam mafe' minimbalona ma'ipana ma'i, “Tisa dembinai, afa' wa'i a' owala. Ine' negawafa, owa'?”
41004039	Ea' Jisas nohafel ninifala uf na'ipa embel naoh na'i, “Uf neloma embel ipe' petah.” Ea' uf faso'mana, embel ina ata' manda' fepo. Tol motah.
41004040	Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, 'Ipe' umbamahepa ma main? Ipe' pembalo'a basef Godi pa'i Ae' la'ifiwei, owa'?
41004041	Ea' amam mati na'ama, umbamaham kwapete'am endilisi, ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anan emi egafuna? Na'ipa uf naloma embel mame'ana mowala.”
41005001	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi nafe' nataga anagon wa'ol walemb batupa'manai anama etap esis Gerasa sapoma.
41005002	-
41005003	Anan nakwaha bot nisila'i, mehip anona aman ambagof awami mapeinai nafi'mai Anan. Aman anama nape na'oh la'ela'ef hi'agilif sawa epes saga'i sapoma nafi'i.
41005004	Esis sali' sombalo'ana sumafiana, sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah la'ela'ef. Owa'etin. Anan nahape'am etin. Ina enin epen la'ifina nembalo'ana la'ifina nope, owa'. Ea' sen wapoti' ina la'ifina, owa'.
41005005	La'ela'ef owamb alip nape nafe' hi'agilif halafutagw, nafe' na'i mehip nafe'. Nafela otamba hi'elimi natotopa' alop ananinai.
41005006	Anan ata' nati Jisas nafi'i laogon, nasagih nafi'i nindiwa nembawa notawamana.
41005007	-
41005008	Ea' Jisas nogawa aman anama ambagof awami mapeinai. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ambagof aopei, ipe' pekwahona pefe'.” Na'ama anan noga' na'i mehip na'i “Jisas, ine' nogalomana Dembinai God nape ilif endilisi, ine' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina endilisi gani ilifa agel Godi, ine' owa' nese'e nimanimi ae'.”
41005009	Ea' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agel ine'inai emi?” Ea' anan na'i, “Afa' ambagof aofai hiafai. Dei' agel afa'inai ambagof hiami.”
41005010	Ea' nahali' Jisas mehip na'i, “Ina netofafa ofe' anona etap laugoma, owa'.”
41005011	Ea' anom bogof hiami maitu ma' gwa'aimi anona domota felefele'.
41005012	Ea' ambagof amama mofala Jisas ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Ine' netofafa ofe' uwisa bogof mamuma.”
41005013	Ea' Jisas na'i a'e mam, makwaha aman anama mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof mamuma hiami 2,000-peleim masagih mafe' mehip mowala anagon awagoma tata mowala embel walemb batupa'manai ma' embel afum hi'alam.
41005014	Ea' amam mumafimi masagih mafe' ma'ipasa basef amama wambel anama lu'unai amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' ma'ipas sape aof wapoti' ma amamaga amama amam matulumi.
41005015	Ea' safi'mai Jisas sati aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai, dei' ambo'ona nomonas bu'wami mapeina andeande' nowaho' lowaf nape. Amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea' esis umbamahas.
41005016	Ea' esis sati amamaga amama sa'ipas ma amamaga amama mataga aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai. Ea' sa'ipas amamaga matagama bogof wapoti'.
41005017	Ea' esis hiesi sa'ipa Jisas mehip sa'i nokwaha etap anama asasima nefe' anagon.
41005018	Ea' Jisas nalata bot, aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.”
41005019	Ea' Jisas ina na'i, owa'. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nefe'ma esis wambota atona ine'inai ni'ipasa amama Dembinai nanda'minami nati uwahipina ma nanda'ena bow'ena.”
41005020	Ea' aman anama nafe' nawalapa basef amama na'ipasam wambel 10-peleina Dekapolisa amamaga Jisas nanda'manami. Ea' esis amam nematawa gegelalasis kwapete'as ukup matamea mafe'.
41005021	Jisas nofa' bot notanima nambo walemb batupa'manai anama nafe' fisana gani wa'ol, ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sape satagamana. Anan nape felefele'ma akata,
41005022	anona aman Jairus numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nafi'i. Anan nati Jisas ea' nindiwa nembawa notawamana, felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi.
41005023	Ea' na'ipana mehip na'i, “Nogame ae'akwi felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ae' a'i ine' nefe' newamona lagel ine'inai akwa'w ambal notanimai nuwisa'w kohafel kopan.”
41005024	Ea' Jisas nalomana mafe'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safe' sagi'mam sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin saitu sindiwapana.
41005025	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape kwalomas, awes lu'unai nanda'akwi kwape gamba la'ela'ef afagof 12-peleim.
41005026	Akwa'w kwafe'ma dokta hiesi sase'akw nimanimi, ea' kwakwaha otamba akwa'umi hi'alama dokta isima hiesi ma senda'akw bo'okw, owa'etin. Awasi'w kwape na'ama la'ela'ef.
41005027	Ea' kwame' basefa Jisas nafela enis epes awes nanda'asi ambo'wes. Ea' kwaloma amam nematawa hiesi kwafi'i alafuga Jisasi kwahapila lowaf ananinai.
41005028	Dei' main, akwa'w okom na'i, “Ae' esa lagela lowaf ananinai, ae' bo'awe.”
41005029	Kwahapila lowaf ananinai etin mehip esimbel pele'atam ea' kwame' alop akwa'unai nataga bo'ona.
41005030	Dei' atef Jisas name' alop ananinai kwofalina, name' anona pepel ananinai nakwahona nafe'ma nanda' enin epen bo'wen. Na'ama nandamboma la'afena esis hiesi na'i, “Emi nasa lagela Ae'?”
41005031	Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' natilis o owa' amam nematawa isima hiesi saitu sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin salomafa? Dei' maina ine' ata' na'i, ‘Emi nasa lagela ae'?’ ”
41005032	Ea' Jisas nandamboma natologon na'i niti epen inima nahapilani.
41005033	Ea' nemata'w akwama kogawa amamaga amama matagama'wi, ambo'okw ea' umbamaha'w kwapete'akw. Ea' kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa felefele'ma Anan, kwawalapa amamaga kwa'iam alihim.
41005034	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ine' fo'o, opaf ine'inai nope awanena. Esimbel ine'imi fataom, dei' awes ine'inai ahi'alana.”
41005035	Jisas ata' na'ipakw etin, nati anom amam makwaha ipat Jairusi mafi'i ma'ipa Jairus ma'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi kwaga' ea'. Amama atom dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o ekep pehana, owa', hapainai.”
41005036	Ea' Jisas ina nembe' aligah name'amam basef amama amamumi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina umbamehena, owa'. Nembale'efa Ae' la'ifiwei.”
41005037	Ea' Anan ina na'i a'e ma amam nematawa hiesi solomana siowis ipat anama, owa'. Anan nao'wa Pita Jems naloma owalomana Jon amam atom mawis malomana.
41005038	Mafe' mataga ipat Jairusi, Jisas nati esis salef mehip sa'i sapoma'w kwapete'as.
41005039	Ea' nawis nomon na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' palef patapea kwapete'epa? Akwa'w ina kwaga' endilisi, owa'. Kwa'oh etin.”
41005040	Ea' esis sanda' iafana kwapete'as ama na'iam na'ama. Ea' nagalo'ma esis sawisi ande'. Anan nao'wa ahaloma'w naloma mama'wakw saloma alupumi ananimi mape malomanai, esis etis safe' sawis nomon awani inima naga' na'oma.
41005041	Ea' nahapila lagel akwa'unai na'ipakw na'i, “Talita kumi.” Ape' mamboma basef amama ma'i, “Nemata'w sa'ukwi, ae' a'ipina, ine' dei' hafel.”
41005042	Ea' mehip nemata'w akwama afagof 12-peleim mahape'akwi kohafel kwafe' esis satolo'w, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as.
41005043	Ea' Jisas na'ipas mehipa siela basef ananimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipa enin epena amamaga amama, owa'.” Ea' na'ipa esisa sese'akwa anom gwa'aimi kogwa'am.
41006001	Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel anama nafe' wambel ananinai ofagama Nasaret naloma alupumi ananimi.
41006002	Nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat nataga, nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa, same'ana sohafel gegelalasis sa'i, “Aman anama nofa' basef amama eti? Emi nase'ana gawa anama? Emi nagiambamana ma dei' nanda' pepel anama si'i God nanda'anai?
41006003	Ape' magawa aman anama fowa' nanda' kamda nala' ifagw. Anan Maria nogaloma'w atona, nape wambeli. Anan sahalomam Jems naloma Josep, Judas naloma Saimon. Henitiamana ananiwai wape walomapa na'ae.” Esis sa'iam na'ama opalef aoma anan, ea' sowa' alafugahana.
41006004	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Anona profet nofa' agel lu'unai anona wambel, sa'i anan dembinai safela agel ananinai sombale'efana. Ea' ina nofa' agel lu'unai wambel ananinai ofagama, wambota ananinai sapoma, owa'.”
41006005	Na'ama Anan ina nanda' anom amamaga la'ifimi wambel anama, owa'. Anan nasa lagofa enis awes nanda'asi atona etin nanda'as bo'wes.
41006006	Amam nematawa wambel Nasaretisi owa' sembale'efa Anan. Na'ama Anan nomonas matamea mafe'. Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel ananinai Nasaret nafe' na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa wambel hiagoma nape felefele'i.
41006007	Ea' nofala alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai Anan ea' nase'am agof lu'wami nanda'am la'ifima meatofa ambagof awami, ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom.
41006008	-
41006009	Na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pefa' gwa'aimi isalef moni molomepa, owa'. Ipe' pela su pehapila bandefah pendahe'amon pefe'. Ina pefa' siogw biam atom, owa'. Pefa' atona etin mondondaepa.”
41006010	Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pefe' petaga anona wambel, i'i enis si'i a'e ma pefe' piowis ipat asasinai, ipe' pepe ipat anama atona palomas. Ea' pekwahona pehafel pefe'.
41006011	I'i anona wambel owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi some' basef ipe'imi, ipe' penda'am na'ama. Pekwaha wambel anama pindilama nombol mail bo'wagah ipe'imi ma sitilipa sogawa waf aonai ofagena asasinai atona.”
41006012	Ea' nasapa'am mafe' biam atom makwaha basef ma'i, “Ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai, pemboma opalef pefe'ma God.”
41006013	Ea' matofa ambagof awami mape epesi. Ea' mofa' wel bu'wami makolo'ma esis awes nanda'asi hiesi sataga bo'wes.
41006014	Dei' anona gavman king Herot name' basefa maol anama Jisas nali' nanda'anai. Dei' main, agel Jisasi nataga lu'una nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' enis amam nematawa sa'i, “Jon napisi'as embeli dei' nohafel wapoti' nape la'ifina nanda' maol si'i God nanda'anai.”
41006015	Ea' enis epes sa'i, “Anan profet Elaija fowa'inai.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Anan anona profet si'i profet amama fowa' ganimi.”
41006016	Gavman anama king Herot name' na'ama ea' na'i, “Jon fowa' ae' atopa' bagato'wana, ea' dei' notanima nohafel wapoti' nanda' maol Jisasi.”
41006017	-
41006018	Fowa' Herot nali' naso' nemata'w owalomana Filipi agili'wa Herodias. Ea' sahalomana Herot nandalombana'w. Ea' Jon nati waf anama na'ipana na'i, “Ine' naso' nemata'w sahalomenai, ea' nawala mi'uli Godi. Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.” Ea' Herot nasapa' anom amam mafe' mombalo' Jon mofa'ana mafe' manda'ana nanda' kalabus.
41006019	-
41006020	Ea' Herodias kwame' basef amama, okom aona endilisi ma Jon, kwa'i kohana afuna, ea' owa'etin. Herot anan umbamahanama Jon ea' numafiana andeande'. Amama atom akwa'w ina la'ifikwa kohana neaga', owa'. Herot nogawa Jon aman bu'unai Godi. Nemaf anama anan name' basef Jon na'ipanami, anan nomonas matamea, ea' umbamahana. Anan okom na'ina'i endilisi ma neame' basef ananimi.
41006021	Ea' dei' Herodias kwagolopa anona eaf ma kohana neaga'. Herot nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma okom nopoma nemaf anama mama'wana kolana. Anan nanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma anom dambami magiambamana ma maol gavmani maloma anom dambami mumafi amam soldia maloma anom dambami mape etap hiagoma Galili.
41006022	Ea' amam dambami maloma Herot mape ma' gwa'aimi, ano'w nemata'w sa'ukwi awiawai'wi kwawisi nomon kwaitu kwalemb. Akwa'w Herodias nogama'w. Ea' Herot naloma amam dambami ukup maimaila akwa'w endilisi. Ea' na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' ese'ena maim amamaga? Ine' ni'ipiam ae' ma ese'enam.”
41006023	Ea' Herot na'iam endilisi gani ilif na'i, “I'i ine' nihali' ae' ma ease'ena anom amamaga ine', ae' ese'enam. Ea' ine' ni'i ae' eawala amamaga ae'ami hiami ma'oh anama iliakwagoma ese'ena tu'wanim, ae' a'i a'e ma ese'enam. Ine' tu'wanim, ae' tu'wanim, dende'am etin.”
41006024	Ea' akwa'w kwawisi ande' kwafe' kwahali' mama'wakw akwa'ukwi kwa'i, “Ae' atuwasi i'ipa Herot efa' maim amamaga?” Ea' mama'wakw kwa'ipakw kwa'i, “Ine' ni'ipana ni'i nefa'ai balaga Jon napisi'as embeli.”
41006025	Ea' kwandamboma kwawis nomon mehip kwahali' Herot kwa'i, “Dei' atef ae' a'i ine' neha Jon napisi'as embeli noga' netopa' balaga nola anona plet nefa'anai nese'eana.”
41006026	Akwa'w kwa'iam na'ama, opaf Heroti nimanina endilisi. Ea' anan okom na'i basef endilisi gani ilif na'iam la'ifimi ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape salomana sa' gwa'aimi same'ana. Ea' ina ata' nosambala basef akwa'umi, owa'.
41006027	Mehip Herot nasapa' anona soldia nafe'ma noha Jon noga' nofa' balaga nafi'i. Soldia anama nafe' ipat sanda' kalabusanai natopa' bagato'w Joni nofa' balaga
41006028	nala anona plet nofa'ana nafi'i naso' Herodias nogama'w kofa'ana kwafe' kwase' mama'wakw.
41006029	Ea' alupumi Joni mame' basef amama, mafi'i mofa' alop si'ina mafe' mawana hi'agif.
41006030	Amam Aposel Jisasi dei' motanima mafi'i mandakolas malomana. Ea' mape manifa maol mafe' manda'anai ma'ipana basef hiami amam ma'ipasami.
41006031	Enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i safe' ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi ina ata' anona nogotama meagwa' gwa'aimi, owa'. Na'ama Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Wale, afa' atofa ofe' anagon wafiguma ma ata' tol opoma noma'w.”
41006032	Ea' mofa' bot mafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma, amam atom mafe'.
41006033	Owa'etin. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sogawa amam mafe'ma. Ea' esis hiesi sakwaha wambel hiagoma asasima sasagih safe' anama ea' sali' sataga anama amam ma'i meafe'ma.
41006034	Ea' Jisas nafe'ma nisila' akata, nati esis hiesi. Natilis ina anona aman nape numafias, owa'. Esis sape si'i sipsip owa' enin epen nimafiase, ea' nati esis uwahipis nawalipasa basef bu'wami hiami.
41006035	Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wape na'ae wafiguma ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb.
41006036	Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel aof asasinai deindei sape felefele' setala gwa'aimi maim sea'am.”
41006037	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' utalai bret ama 200 kina ose'esam? 200 kina otamba amama dondo' ma epen nenda' maol aomb 8-peleim nofa'am.”
41006038	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' bret ma'ufina na'oh? Ata' fo'o petolona.” Ea' mafe' matolona ma'i, “Bret lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam hi'imi ma'oh.”
41006039	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sefe' oto otowa otalef bu'wami.”
41006040	Ea' sape safe' si'i amam ma'ipas, enis sataga 100-peleis, enis 50-peleis, na'ama etin.
41006041	Ea' Jisas nafela bret anama wa'ana atona naloma agof biam naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalana naso' alupumi ananimi mafe' maso' esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alas. Ea' nafela agof wapoti' nawalom nase'am mase'asam.
41006042	Esis sa'am elihis hi'alas.
41006043	Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim bret anama.
41006044	Esis amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama epes hiesi. Seamba amam atom mataga 5,000-peleim.
41006045	Dei' atef Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi mofa' bot mali' mafe' walemb batupa'manai lu'unai anama mambo fisana mafe' Betsaida. Ea' nasapa' amam nematawa hiesi safe' deindei.
41006046	Nasapa'as safe', anan nandowasa' halaf nape na'i nonda' beten.
41006047	Wambomota alupumi ananimi mape bot ata' mala walemb batupa'manai lu'unai la'afen. Ea' Jisas atona naitu akata.
41006048	Ea' nati uf lu'unai nalo nafi'i anama amam ma'i meafe'ma, ea' nakoto'ma amam manda' pul masasapa' bot ekep paham endilisi. Owamb ata' nail etin felefele'ma leala, Jisas nailam natoma embel ilif nafe'ma amam. Ea' na'i nikila'am nefe'.
41006049	Ea' mati anan naitu nafi'i embel ilif ea' ma'i anona gamba nailam nafe', ea' manda'am wi ge' ma'oh kwapete'am.
41006050	Dei' main, amam hiami matolona ea' gegelalasom. Ea' mehip Jisas nalomam na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa, umbamehepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
41006051	Ea' nalata bot nape nalomam, dei' atef uf faso'mana opalef amamumi gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi, ea' mape ukup matamea mafe'.
41006052	Dei' main, amam ina ata' ukup mape andeande'ma mogawa basef ofagema ma bret anama Jisas nase'asama esis hiesi sa'am, owa'. Ukup amamumi mase'am.
41006053	Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mowala mambo walemb batupa'manai anama mafe' mataga anona etap lu'wagoma Genesaret. Ea' mowa' bot nail,
41006054	misila'i mafe' ea', esis mehip sati Jisas ea' sagawana.
41006055	Ea' sasagih safe' anama hiagoma ganigani. Esis same' basefa Jisas napoma, ea' sefa' awes nanda'asi balatagw sofa'as safi'mai anan.
41006056	Wambel hiagoma lu'wagon sa'ogon, naloma anama hiagoma Jisas nafe'ma, esis sambe' isima awes nanda'asi sa'oh la'afen. Ea' sofala Jisas mehip ni'i a'e ma isima sohapila lowaf ananinai da'malifinama atona. Ea' emi egafis sahapilanai sataga bo'wes wapoti' hi'alas.
41007001	Amam Farisi maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, makwaha Jerusalem mafi'mai Jisas malipana.
41007002	Ea' mati anom alupumi Jisasi ma' gwa'aimi owa' mosa'opa lagof mea' gwa'aimi si'i amam Farisi ma'iam, owa'. Ea' amam Farisi ma'i alupumi Jisasi lagof amamumi alogw mailam.
41007003	Dei' main, amam Farisi maloma esis Juda hiesi hi'alas saila mi'uli anama esis akupasi. I'i esis sesa'opa lagof andeande', sea' gwa'aimi. I'i owa', owa'.
41007004	Esis safe' maket setanima sifi'i, ma owa' sesa'opa lagof, ina sea' gwa'aimi, owa'. Esis saila mi'uli hianai naninani si'i mi'uli anama sofa'ana akupas asasisi. Sasa'opa kahi sospas, dis saloma belegw atom ama saila mi'uli akupasi.
41007005	Na'ama amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dei maina alupumi ine'imi owa' mila mi'uli amam akupami? Lagof amamugumi alogw mailam magwa' gwa'aimi.”
41007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Fowa' gani profet Aisaia nendela'wifa ipe' endilisi, ipe' pa'i basefa malogof biamipei. Anan nanda'am andeande' dende'ma ipe' na'iam na'ama na'i, God na'i, ‘Amam nematawa isima safela agel ae'anai lu'una malogof asasimi atom, ea' opalef asasimi mape laogona ae'. Ukup asasimi ina sembale'efa Ae', owa'.
41007007	Esis ina sawalipasa basef ae'ami, owa'. Esis sawalapa mi'uli epes sape etapi, sambaso'mas sa'i, “Mi'uli anama basef Godi.” Ea' sanda' lotu safela agel ae'anai etin.’ ”
41007008	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pakwaha mi'uli Godi ea', dei' paila waf epes sape etapi atona la'ifipa.”
41007009	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa andeande' pa'i penda' waf bu'unai atona, owa'etin. Dei' pesambala mi'uli Godi ma paila waf ipe'inai atona.
41007010	Fowa' gani Moses nawalipasa mi'uli anama na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipe' pinifela mamasepa ipe'isi pembale'efas pigiambamas.’ Anom wapoti' na'iam na'i, ‘Emi egafis si'i basef awamima ahapas mamasas asasisi, isima enis epes sohas soga'.’
41007011	Ea' ipe' pambaso'am pa'i anom basef na'ama pa'i, Emi nindaiwa'ma nigiambama mamasan ni'ipas ni'i, ‘Otamba maim ae'ami andaiwa'ma ease'epam, ae' andandepama ease'anam God.’
41007012	Ea' ipe' Farisi paloma ipe' pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ipe' pa'i a'e ma epen inima nembaso'ma mamasan, ea' ina nagiambamas, owa'.
41007013	Na'ama ipe' paila mi'uli fowa' gani pefa'ana akupipa ipe'imi, panda' waf anama pesambala basef amama Godi na'i ape' migiambama mamasapa. Ea' panda' waf ipe'inai atona panda' waf aonai la'ela'ef na'ama ina andeande', owa'.”
41007014	Ea' Jisas nofalai amam nematawa hiesi wapoti' safi'mai anan ea' na'ipas anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' hipei peme' basef ae'ami okokomam pegawam andeande'.
41007015	Amamaga gwa'aimi maim ande'ami ipe' pegwa'am mowala mape nomon, amama ina monda'epa awepa, owa'. Ea' amamaga mape ukup ipe'imi nomon mawisi ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa. [
41007016	Ipe' aligah magalipei, ipe' peme' basef amama.]” Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'ama,
41007017	nakwaha amam nematawa isima hiesi nafe' nawis ipat. Ea' alupumi ananimi atom mape mahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema womun etin do'ok na'ipasami.
41007018	-
41007019	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina ata' pegawa! Amamaga gwa'aimi maim mape ande'i ina monda'epa awepa, owa'. Gwa'aimi amama sa'am mowala opalef nomon ea' mafe' sakam mafe' mowala dowah. Ea' ukup ipe'imi ina aom, owa'.” Jisas na'ipasa basef amama na'i, “Gwa'aimi mamumami hiami hi'alam bu'wami atom mogwam.”
41007020	Ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Amamaga mape epes opalef nomoni, ukup awami maim mataga ande', amama atom manda'epa awepa.
41007021	Amamaga awami mape ukup nomon epesi mawisi ande' na'ama. Waf naninani aonai, ukup awami, waf sanda' so'a waulanai, wal, soha enis seaga'i,
41007022	sohambombaga waf dase'amainai, waf kowalasanai, waf sa'i sofa' amamaga hiami ma esis etis, baso'amunai naninani aonai, sesambala basef, simbisambas, sa'i basef awami, ukup aoma enis epes, findiwa, safela agof asasimi atom lu'um, waf gawa a'anai.
41007023	Waf anama naninani aonai, anama nape nomon ukup epesi nawisi ande' nanda'epa awepa.”
41007024	Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel anama, nafe' Tair nafe' nawis anona ipat. Anan nandaiwa'ma enin epen negawa anan nape na'ama. Owa'. Anan ina nandambaho'.
41007025	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwame' basefa anan nape na'ama. Nemata'w akwama nogama'w akwa'ukwi sa'ukwi ambal aonai napai'w. Ea' mama'wakw mehip kwafi'mai Jisas kwindiwa nembawa kotowa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi.
41007026	Akwa'w Finisiai'wi anona etap hiagoma Siria. Akwa'w ina Judai'wi, owa'. Kwa'i diga Griki. Ea' kwahali' Jisas mehipa netofama'wa ambal aonai nape nogama'w akwa'ukwi.
41007027	Ea' na'ipakw anom basef womun etin na'i, “Ape' ata' mose'asa gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi sili'. Ape' ina mofa' gwa'aimi awasi ape'isi makwahom mafe'ma nombagw, owa'.”
41007028	Ea' akwa'w kwagwamana basef Anan kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i endilisi. Ea' nombagw mafe' owina tebol matatama gwa'aimi mowa etapi magwa'am.”
41007029	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' na'iam na'ama andeande'. Ea' tanima fo'o. Ambal aonai nakwaha nogamena ine'ikwi nawisi nafe' ea'.”
41007030	Ea' akwa'w kotanima kwafe' ipat akwa'unai, kwati nogama'w akwo'ukwi tol kwa'oh lahis, ambal aonai nakwaho'w nawisi nafe'.
41007031	Dei' Jisas nohafel nakwaha wambel Tair, ea' nafe' nawis la'afena wambel Saidon. Ea' nakwaha Saidon nafe' etin nataga walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Galili ea' nafe' la'afena wambel 10-peleina Dekapolis.
41007032	Ea' esis sao'wai anona aman nafi'mai Jisas, aligah mase'ana afega ananinai dindigina. Ea' ina na'i andeande', owa'. Na'ama esis sofala Jisas ma nesa lagela anan nonda'ana bo'ona.
41007033	Ea' Jisas nao'wana amam biam mafe' makwaha esis amam nematawa hiesi amam atom mape. Ea' nasapa' faguf biam ananimi mawis aligah aman anama, wa'owa'ol. Ea' nisi'waf nasa faf afega aman anama,
41007034	ea' Jisas naniga nati heven ilif, okom Ananinai nataga mehip, na'iam na'ama diga Hibrui na'i, “Efata.” Basef ofagema amama ma'i, “Ine' aligah mogal neme' basef ni'iam andeande'.”
41007035	Ea' aligah magal, afega anainai nataga bo'ona ea'. Dei' na'i andeande'.
41007036	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'ama esis ina si'ipasa amamaga amama ma enin epen. Nape na'ipasa basef la'ifimi timbitambel. Owa'etin. Esis sawalapam sa'ipasam timbitambel seme'am.
41007037	Ea' esis gegelalasis endilisi sa'i, “Amamaga hiami Anan nanda'ami nanda'am bo'om etin. Anan nanda' esis aligah mase'asi same' andeande', esis malagof mase'asi sega sa'i andeande'.”
41008001	Anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi sandakolas wapoti' sa'i seme' basef Jisasi. Ea' esis gwa'aimi a'as. Na'ama Jisas nofala alupumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i,
41008002	-
41008003	“Ae' ati esis amam nematawa isima uwahipis. Esis sape salome nimeguf wanom gwa'aimi a'as nolomahas endilisi. I'i ae' esapa'as sefe' etin utagw wambel asasima, siti noga atona sowa so'oh sofe' eaf. Enis safi'i laogoma.”
41008004	Ea' alupumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Anae' wafiguma epes a'agoma. Atuwasi afa' ofa'ai bret eti weaso' amam nematawa isima hiesi sea'am? Afa' bret ina hiana, owa'.”
41008005	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' bret ma'una na'oh?” Amam ma'i, “7-peleina na'omafa.”
41008006	Ea' na'ipa esis amam nematawa sape etap, Anan nafela bret 7-peleina, nanifela God nawalona naso'am alupumi ananimi ma mase'asam esis amam nematawa hiesi. Amam mase'as hi'alas dende'.
41008007	Ea' anom agof sa'umi hi'imi wapoti' ma'oh. Ea' Anan nafelam nanifela God, naso'amam mese'as wapoti'.
41008008	Ea' esis sa'am, dondo' elihis. Ea' alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi makolasam maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 7-peleim.
41008009	Amam nematawa sa' gwa'aimi amama sataga hies seamba amam atom mataga 4,000-peleim. Ea' Jisas nasapa'as safe'
41008010	ea' mehip Anan nalata bot naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' anona etap lu'unai Dalmanuta.
