41008011	Ea' amam Farisi mafi'i ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma Jisas. Amam ma'i mogwambana ma muti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Na'ama ma'ipana ma'i anan nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God nape heveni nanda'anai. Amam ma'i anan nihi'ambamama anan nape pepel Godi ma dei' nanda' amamaga amama.
41008012	Ea' Jisas name' ambal ananinai nemanina ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'finai? Ae' owa'etina enda'ana pitolona, owa'.”
41008013	Ea' nakwaha amam notanima nalata bot nafe' fisana.
41008014	Amam alupumi Jisasi ukup mase'ama mofa' bret hianai nolomam. Amam mofa' atotona nala bot
41008015	Ea' Jisas naumbalom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma yis amama amam Farisi maloma yis Heroti.”
41008016	Ea' mame' Anan na'iam na'ama, manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ukup mase'afa bret na'ihi dei' na'ipafa na'ama.”
41008017	Ea' Jisas nogawa basef amamumi na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'i, ‘Ipe' bret a'epa?’ A'i ipe' ukup mase'epa, owa' ata' pegawa?
41008018	Ipe' naep mati, ea' ipe' owa' ata' piti anom amamaga. Ea' aligah mapeipa, ea' ipe' ine' peme' basef, owa'. Ukup mase'epa.
41008019	Nimbewa' awala bret 5-peleina ma epes isima 5,000-peleis, ama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi pakolasom paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?” Ea' amam ma'i, “12-peleim.”
41008020	“Ea' nimbewa' awala bret 7-peleina ma tukwakwanimi ma'ihi patatamam paolo'wam holalef ma'um si'im?” Ea' amam ma'i, “7-peleim.”
41008021	Ea' Anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' dei' ina pegawa, ata' owa'.”
41008022	Amam mafe' mataga Betsaida, sao'wamanai anona aman naep mase'anai nafi'mai Jisas ea' sa'ipana mehipa nesa lagel ananinai nonda'ana bo'ona.
41008023	Ea' nahapila lagel anan naep mase'anai, nofa'ana nakwaha wambel nawis ande' nisi'wafa naep ananimi, nasa lagela anan nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' nati ambasif o ata' owa'?”
41008024	Ea' aman anama natologon na'i, “Ae' ati enis epes ea' atilis si'i lawah mafe'.”
41008025	Ea' Jisas nasa lagel wapoti', naep ananimi dei' mataga bo'om, natologon andeande'.
41008026	Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana nafe' ipat ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' owa' nefe' niwis wambel ni'ipasa ae' anda'ena ambo'wena, owa'. Ine' nefe' usi'ina ipat ine'inai.”
41008027	Ea' Jisas nohafel naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' felefele'ma wambel hiagoma Sisaria Filipai. Amam mafe'ma eaf, nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman emi egafuwi?”
41008028	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Ea' enis sa'i ine' Elaija. Ea' enis sa'i ine' enina profet, fowa'inai.”
41008029	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' pa'i ae' emi egafuwi?” Ea' Pita nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i.”
41008030	Ea' na'ipama basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa ae' pi'ipa enis pi'i ae' Krais, owa'.”
41008031	Ea' Jisas nasefela basef ananimi nawalipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb agufumi Judai mose'e nimanimi lu'wami. Amam moloma amam pris dambami moloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Nambimb mondaiwa'me mose'e alafugah mohe ega' ma nimeguf biam ea', meafe'ma wanomi ehafel wapoti'.”
41008032	Anan nawalapa basef amama alihima amam. Ea' Pita nofa'ana nelefata nasa gemba ea' na'ipana basef la'ifimi ma basef amama Jisas na'ipasami.
41008033	Ea' Jisas nandamboma nati alupumi ananimi, nanda' megahaha Pita na'i, “Ine' si'i Satan. Dei' main, ine' owa' okom nopoma okom Godi. Ukom ine'inai si'i ukup epes sape etapi etis. Si'amae nefe' alafuga ae'anai.”
41008034	Ea' Jisas nofalai esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Anan saloma alupumi ananimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i emi egafis si'i sila Ae', esis ata' seho'ofa ukup asasimi atom mowala, sefe' owin ama God ea' ina umbamahasa enis epes sohas soga', owa'. Ae' efa' nimanimi ma anda' maol Godi nambimb sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Epes isima senda'am na'ama etin si'i Ae' ma sigi'ma ae'. I'i owa', owa'etin.
41008035	Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom, si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' eloma basef bu'wami Godi ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa'as sotanimani sopan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
41008036	Emi egafis senda' maol naninani sofa' gwa'aimi wiga amamaga hiami etapami atom hegilialami, esis wapoti' hegililas solomam. Dei' amamaga amama anona nemaf migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin.
41008037	Epes isima anona nemaf sofa' amamaga maima seatala ambagof asasimi ma sitanima sowambilami wapoti'? Owa'etin.
41008038	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aonai sakwaha sombale'efa God. Emi egafis ambagof aoma ae' sondafa'me eloma basef ae'ami, anona nemaf ae' wapoti' ambal aona epes isima endafa'mas nemaf anama ae' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami la'ifimi mafifili Ahalomei elomai amam ensel bu'wami Godi wapoti'.”
41009001	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, enipa paitu na'ae nambimb ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Enipa piti pepel Godi nifi'i ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Ananinai numafias.”
41009002	Nimeguf wanom wanom mafe'ma ea', Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai. Nao'wa amam atom mape, ea' mati alop Ananinai nandati na'ana nafifil endilisi.
41009003	Luwaguf maim ananimi mataga afitim endilisi. Ina anona aman etapanai la'ifina nanda' luwaguf maim mataga efitim na'ama, owa'.
41009004	Ea' mati amam biam fowa'imi, Elaija naloma Moses mataga maitu ma'i maloma Jisas.
41009005	-
41009006	Pita naloma Jemsi Jon umbamaham endilisi, ea' Pita na'i nie'iami anom basef, ea' anan ina ata' okom napoma basef na'i ni'iami, owa'. Ea' na'iam na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' wape na'ae andeande'. Ata' ola' anom aolah wanom, mondandafa. Ine' anona, Moses anona, Elaija anona.”
41009007	Ea' anom elagw maofeniam. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai elagw amama na'i basef na'i, “Anan Nogalome ae'anai, Ae' okom nohafel nainailana endilisi. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
41009008	Dei' atef alupumi Jisasi wanom matologon mehip ganigani, ina mati enin epen, owa'. Mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam.
41009009	Ea' amam ata' makwaha halaf makini'i etin, Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' ina pewalapa amamaga amama dei' patulumi pi'ipa enin epen, owa'. Pefe' dahama dahama nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ma sehe ega' etanima ehafel hi'agif wapoti', pi'ipas.”
41009010	Ea' amam mahapila basef amama mape, manda'ipama ma'i, “Basef amama Jisasi notanima nohafel hi'agif, ofagema ma'imama?”
41009011	Ea' mahali'ana Jisas ma'i, “Dei' maina amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i Elaija fowa'inai ata' nili' nifi'i?”
41009012	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Endilisi. Elaija nifi'i nondondomba amamaga hiami motaga bo'om andeande'. Ea' basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i dembinai anona nemaf notaga epen endilisinai nope ni'imama? Amama ma'i anan neme' nimanimi awami ma esis sowa' alafugahana.
41009013	Dei' a'ipipa, anona Elaija nafi'i ea'. Ea' esis saila ukup asasimi atom, sanda'mana waf aonai endilisi si'i anom basef mape buk Baibeli ma'iam.”
41009014	Jisas naloma alupumi wanom mafi'i mati anom alupumi tu'wanim 9-peleim mapani, ea' mati amam nematawa hiesi saitu felefele'ma amam. Ea' mati anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma alupumi Jisasi 9-peleim.
41009015	Amam nematawa isima hiesi sati Jisas nafi'i, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as, sasagih safe'ma Anan sanifelona.
41009016	Ea' Jisas nahali' amam alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' palomam pa'i main pandahihianamam?”
41009017	Ea' anona aman nape la'afena amam nematawai nagwamana basef Jisas na'i, “Dembinai tisa, so'uso'win aman ae'anai anona ambal aonai napein, malogel nase'an. Na'ama efa'an afi'mai ine'.
41009018	Nimeguf hiami ambal anama aonai nahapilan tatala'in nakwahin newa etap. Ea' apah nataga malogel, nalelef ananimi dindigim dogw, ea' alop ananinai dindigina endilisi. Ae' a'ipa alupumi ine'imi a'i motofa ambal anama aonai nefe', ea' amam ina la'ifim.”
41009019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa ae'. Nimeguf ma'um ae' ata' epe elomepa? Nimeguf ma'um wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai ae'.”
41009020	Ea' esis sao'wamana awani inima anan. Ambal anama aonai nati Jisas, mehip nakoto'an kwapete'an nafe' newa etap na'oh, apah afitimi mataga sisih malogel ananinai.
41009021	Ea' Jisas nahali' ahalomana na'i, “Nogalomena ine'inai, awes anama nanda'an nape nimeguf ma'um?” Ea' anan na'ipana na'i, “Fowa' ata' awani nape la'ela'ef na'ama etin.
41009022	Nimeguf hiami ambal aonai nakwahin newala nasef nif fandumi, o newala embel na'i nohan afin. I'i ina la'ifinai, niti ape' owahipipa nigiambamapa.”
41009023	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' nahali'i na'ama? Emi epen nembale'efa Ae' endilisi, enin la'ifina nenda' opeh bu'wami mamumami hiami.”
41009024	Ea' ahalomana ma nogalomana anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Ae' embale'efa ine' kwaukwawie'. Dei' nigiambame ma eambale'efena la'ifiwi endilisi.”
41009025	Ea' Jisas nati amam nematawa hiesi safi'i saitu salipana felefele', na'ipa ambal anama aonai mehip na'i, “Ine' ambal aonai nasopama aligahi malogel awani inima, ine' nekwaha so'uso'win inima nefe'. Netanima niefi'mani owa'.”
41009026	Ea' ambal anama aonai nakoto'an mehip nakwahin nandahi' nafe'. Ea' awani inima nandati si'i naga'i ea' hiesi satilin sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Enin naga' ea'.”
41009027	Ea' Jisas nahapila lagel ananinai nafelan ea' bo'wen naitu.
41009028	Alupumi Jisasi atom malomana mawis anona ipat mape, mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Dei' maina afa' owa' la'ififama weatofa ambal anama aonai?”
41009029	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' penda' beten pembale'efa God atona, ipe' la'ifipama peatofa ambal anama aonai. Owa' anona eaf petofana. Beten atona.”
41009030	-
41009031	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi makwaha anama mapoma mafe' mataga etap hiagoma Galili mawis mafe' anagon mape. Dei' main, Jisas na'i nope nondambaho' nolomama neawalipama basef ananimi. Na'ama nandaiwa'ma anona aman nogawa anama amam mafe' mapoma. Anan nawalipama basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof naumbih ae'ami mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilam meafe'ma wanomi, etanima ehafel efa' ambal namunai wapoti'.”
41009032	Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama, ea' amam ina mogawa ofagema, owa'. Ea' amam umbamahama meahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema.
41009033	-
41009034	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Kaperneam, mafe' mawis ipat nomon, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i maim basef do'ok wafi'i eaf?” Do'ok mafi'i eaf, amam ma'i basef hiami ma'i nambimb emi nepe nili' dembinai ma amam. Na'ama amam ina magwamana anom basef, owa'. Tol mape etin.
41009035	Ea' Jisas nape etap nofala amam mafi'i mape felefele' na'ipam na'i, “Emi epen ni'i netaga dembinai nepe nili', enin ata' nili' netaga si'i nanda' maola anasi, netaga nagi' endilisi ma naep epesi.”
41009036	Ea' Jisas nafilai enin so'uso'win nahaponan naitu la'afena amam nahapilan na'ipam na'i,
41009037	“Emi egafis sese' opalefa siegiambama enin sa'usa'win si'i ini' ma okom ananinai nopoma Ae', esis sase'e opalef Ae' wapoti' sagiambame. Ea' emi egafis sigiambama ae'i, ina sagiambama Ae' atowe, owa'. Esis sagiambama anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.”
41009038	Ea' Jon nogwa basef na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' wati anona aman nanda' maol natofa ambagof awami ma agel ine'inai. Ea' anan ina nagalo'ma afa', owa'. Ea' dei' wa'i owa'mana.”
41009039	Ea' Jisas na'ipa Jon na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipana na'ama, owa'. Emi epen nanda' maol bu'unai ma agel Ae'anai, enin ina ni'ipasa basef awami ma Ae', owa'.
41009040	Emi egafis owa' naumbih afa'isi, esis alupisi afa'isi.
41009041	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, emi egafis sitilipa si'i ipe' epes ae'ipei ma siegiambamepa sese'epa anom amamaga kwauwie'im si'i embel kwaie'um pea'am, anona nemaf God nogwamasam amamaga bu'wami si'i presen.”
41009042	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama na'i, “I'i emi egafis senda' enin epen so'uso'win nembale'efa ae'i, nefe' nenda' waf aonai, nambimb epes isima sofa' nimanimi awami. I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi sokwahis sowala naoh loumi, sope andeande' kwaukwawie'. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'wiso'win nekwaha nembale'efa ae', epes isima sepe awes endilisi sikila' isima sewala naoh laumi afis.
41009043	I'i lagof ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'am pekwahom mefe'. Ea' lagel atona etin nope, ma pefa' ambal namunai nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama lagel anama nanda' waf aonai nope, nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.” [
41009044	“Wambel anama endihip sa'usa'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina hi'gilalam, owa'.”]
41009045	“Ea' i'i bo'waga ipe'inai nonda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, petopa'ana pekwahona. Ea' bo'waga atotona nope, ma pefa' ambal namunai nopeipa pepan andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama bo'waga anama nonda'epa penda' waf aonai nope nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.” [
41009046	“Wambel anama endihip sa'usa'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina higilalami, owa'.”]
41009047	“I'i naep ipe'imi monda'epa pewa ma waf aonai, pigiam pekwahom. Atona etin mope ma piwis wambota Godi numafipa, pepe andeande' la'ela'ef. Na'ama naem anama nonda'epa panda' waf aonai nope, nofa'epa pefe' wambel aonai nif fandumi mape la'ela'efi.”
41009048	“Wambel anama endihip so'uso'umi namumi mape la'ela'ef magwa epesi, ea' nif amama wapoti' ina higilalami, owa'.”
41009049	-
41009050	“Anona nemaf epes hiesi some' nimanimi lu'wami si'i nif monda'as sope bo'wes andeande'. Sol usihimi bu'wami ma gwa'aimi, ea' sol owa' usihim, nambimb penda'am pi'imama usihim wapoti'? Ipe' panda' sola gwa'aimi usihim. Ea' ipe' na'ama etin si'i sol usihimi, pepe opalef ipe'imi etifim peloma sahin owan hiesi pigiambamas penda' waf bu'unai.”
41010001	Ea' Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' anona etap hiagoma Judia nambo walemb Jordan gani fisana. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Anan wapoti', nase'asa basef si'i la'ela'ef nawalipasam.
41010002	Ea' anom Farisi mafi'i mahali' Jisasa anom basef magwambana ma'i, “Mi'uli ape'inai andeande'ma anona aman nondaiwa'ma nemata'w anani'wi nokwaho'w o owa'?”
41010003	Ea' Jisas nagawamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Moses nase'epa maina mi'uli?”
41010004	Amam magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Moses na'i a'e ma anona aman ni'i nokwaha akwa'w, nonda' anom basef mil okwatip nose'akwana nokwaho'w kofe'.”
41010005	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' patotopa' basefi. Dei' Moses nanda'mepa mi'uli anama.
41010006	Fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami, ‘Nanda' epes sataga amam nematawa.’
41010007	'Na'ama esis bias ina ata' sope si'i sape deindei, owa'. Aman nokwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sope alop atotona.
41010008	Ea' esis bias sondase'ama sotaga si'i alop etifina.’ Esis ina ata' sape biasa sape deindei, owa'.
41010009	Ea' esis God nakolasis sape la'ifis, isima God na'i enin epen ina nehape'as, owa'.”
41010010	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mawis mape ipat, mahali'ana ma waf anama sandase'amainai.
41010011	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Emi egalin nakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nose' ano'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi.
41010012	Ea' na'ama etin, emi egafu'w kokwaha anona kose' anona aman wapoti', akwa'w kwawala waf bu'unai kwatopa' dase'ama kwanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai ma anan nali' nase'akwi.”
41010013	Ea' esis sau'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anan nowamona lagof ananimi ma awasi isima ma ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi mati amama ea' minifalis esis sofa'as sifi'mai Anan.
41010014	Ea' Jisas nati amam ma'i manda' na'ama, anan okom aona ma amam ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai ae'. Esis amam nematawa siowis wambota Godi numafias same' basef ananimi sailam si'i awasi isima.
41010015	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, emi egafis sindaiwa'ma siowis wambota Godi numafias ama sese'ana ukup asasimi ma God si'i awasi isima sa'i aho'mana, epes isima sanda'am na'ama ina nambimb suwis wambota Godi numafias, owa'.”
41010016	Ea' Anan nafela awasi isima nahapilas satoma bo'wagah ananimi nawamona lagof ananimi balagah asasimi na'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas.
41010017	Jisas nohafel nafe', anona aman nasagih nafi'mai anan nindiwa nembawa notawa nahali'ana na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' nambimb enda' maina waf bu'unai ma efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”
41010018	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' na'i Ae' bu'uwei? God atona Anan bu'unai.
41010019	Ine' negawa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai na'i, ‘Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai neha enis soga' nenda' wal, owa', ine' owa' nembaso'ma enis epes ama nenda' kotimas etin, ea' ina nembaso'ma enis epes ma nefa' anom amamaga asasimi, owa'. Ine' nepe owina mamasena ine'isi neme' basef asasimi nilam ea' numafias andeande'.’ ”
41010020	Ea' aman anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Tisa, mi'uli anama hianai ahapilana ailana fowa' ata' awani afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”
41010021	Ea' okom Jisasi nohafela anan nainailana, na'ipana na'i, “Ine' anona waf bu'unai atotona ata' owa' neanda'anai. Ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi hiami enis epes sotaluma nefa' moni anama nenda'ana neso' isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani heven ilif. Ea' nembale'efa ae' nila ae'.”
41010022	Ea' aman anama neme' basef amama nandaiwa'ma nonda'am nose' enis epes kwahusi. Ea' okom ananinai nimanina endilisi nandamboma megah atogah nafe'. Dei' main? Anan amamaga hiamunai.
41010023	Ea' Jisas natologon ganigani na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Epes isima wiga moni hiamisi sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' suwis wambota Godi numafias. Atona etin sefe' siowis.”
41010024	Ea' amam mohafel gegelalasoma basef amama na'ipamami. Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef wapoti' na'i, “Owape ae'ipei, eaf nafe' anamai ina andipana, owa'. Ahifina.
41010025	Anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi sefe' siowis wambota Godi numafias sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma sefe' siowis. Eaf anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel nuwis nil nagala.”
41010026	Ea' alupumi ananimi mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am endilisi manda'ipama ma'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nofa' emi egafis setanimani? Owa'etin.”
41010027	Ea' Jisas nati amam na'ipam na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinai ma nonda'am. Anan la'ifinai ma nonda' amamaga hiami.”
41010028	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami, dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina.”
41010029	-
41010030	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Endilisi, ae' a'ipipa na'ama a'i, Ipe' emi egafipa ukup ipe'imi mopoma Ae' eloma basef bu'wami Godi pekwaha ifagw moloma sahin owan ahapas mamasas batawisas moloma aof amamaga maim ipe'imi, anona nemaf pefa' amamaga amama hiami endilisi, mikila' ipe'imi amamaga fowa'imi. Ea' enis epes nambimb sehepa sonda'mepa waf aonai. Ea' anona nemaf nogota bu'unai neataga, pefa' ambagof namumi pepan andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
41010031	Ea' epes hiesi dei' sataga sali'i agof lu'wamisi, anona nemaf agof a'as sotaga sigi'. Ea' epes isima sataga sagi'i anona nemaf owagama sofa' agof lu'wami sotaga sili'.”
41010032	Esis saila eaf safe' sondowasa' Jerusalem, Jisas nafe' nali'as. Ea' alupumi ananimi mailana mafe'. Amam mogawa Anan nafe' Jerusalem, na'ama dei' amam gegelalasom. Enis epes sagima amam, esis umbamahas. Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi atom mafe' mape anagon dei, na'ipama amamaga amama nambimb meatagamasi.
41010033	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme'. Dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb anona aman nowalapa ae' ma efe'ma amam pris dambami moloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ea' monda' kotimi ea' mi'i basef mondame'mam mohe ega'. Ea' monda'e efe'ma esis sololama Godi ma
41010034	sonda' salamala ae' sonda' findiwae sisisi'wafe sopagahowe sehe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'alam, anona nefe'ma wanomi etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
41010035	Ea' Jems naloma Jon, Sebedi batawisana mafi'i mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, afa' biafa wa'i uhali'ina ma anom basef ea' nenda'mafam afa' biafa.”
41010036	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pa'i enda'mepa main?”
41010037	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Anona nemaf ine' netaga nefa' agel lu'unai mafifili gani wambel Godi, nemaf anama afa' wa'i ine' nenda'afa ope dembifai wil olomena wa'owa'ol, anona nil wa'ol egagili ea' anona nil wa'ol da'isinaima.”
41010038	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa ina pegawa andeande'ma amamaga amama pahali'imami, owa'! Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pea' embela kap anama dei' ae' eagwa' embelanai, o owa'?” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama ea' na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' bipa la'ifipama pefa' baptais amama dei' efa'ami o owa'?”
41010039	Ea' magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Afa' wila la'ififa.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Endilisi, kap anama dei' ae' ea' embelanai, ea' baptais amama nambimb efa'ami amama ipe' nambimb pefa'am.
41010040	Ea' peape lagel da'isinai o eganai ae'ami, amama ina maol ae'anai, owa'. God atona ni'i esis isima nandandepas ea'i, esis etis sope lagof da'isinai egagili ae'ami.”
41010041	Ea' alupumi tu'wanim 10-peleim mame' amam biam ma'iam na'ama, manda' megah maham Jems naloma Jon.
41010042	Ea' Jisas nofala alupumi Ananimi 12-peleim mafi'mai Anan, na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa epes sololama Godi sa'i agufumi asasimi dambami, amam mape ilifa esis manda'as kwapete'as. Ea' amam dambami mape la'ifim endilisi manda' esis amam nematawa saila malogof amamumi.
41010043	Ea' waf anamai ina nepoma ipe', hapainai. Emi aman nope dembinai ma ipe'i, anan ata' nili' nope si'i nanda' maola ipe' hipai.
41010044	-
41010045	Emi aman ni'i nope nili', anan nepe owina ipe' hipai nonda'mepa opeh ipe'imi. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ina afi'ima esis sonda'me opeh sigiambame, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma sehe ega' etala ipe' peloma epes hiesi etagahipama waf aonai nowa'ipei. Ea' emi egelin ni'i notaga dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nopan si'i agel a'anai nonda'masa maol hiesi.”
41010046	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jeriko. Ea' ma'i mokwaha Jeriko mefe' moloma amam nematawa hiesi, mataga eaf nawis wambel, ea' anona aman naep mase'anai Bartimeus, nogalomona Timeusi, tol nape felefele'ma eaf. Anan nape nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim.
41010047	Bartimeus name' basefa Jisas Nasaretinai nafi'i nape, ea' nofalana mehip na'i, “Jisas, ine' akunamana Deviti, niti ae' uwahipiwi!”
41010048	Ea' esis hiesi sinifalona sa'i, “Ine' feso'mena.” Ea' anan fala etin nape na'i, “Jisas ine' akunamana Deviti, nitolowe uwahipiwi.”
41010049	Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu na'i, “Kipana nifi'mai ae'.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Nomonas la'ifim. Hafel! Fi'i Jisas nofalinai.”
41010050	Ea' anan nakwaha saket ananinai nohafel mehip nafe'ma Jisas.
41010051	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapoti'.”
41010052	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei ma anda'ena bo'wena wapoti'.” Ea' mehip naep matiana andeande' nagi'ma Jisas nafe' eaf.
41011001	Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mondowasa' mataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' mataga Betani naloma Betafage wambel biefina ea' mataga halaf lawah oliv motawama. Ea' Jisas nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam
41011002	na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' wambel nanima nape gani wa'ol felefele'ma na'ae pefe' piwis wambel anama, piti anona donki so'unai sapana nail. Ina dei' enin epen natomana, ata' owa'. Petagahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
41011003	I'i enin epen nihali'ipa ni'i, ‘Ipe' pafi'i panda'am na'ama ma main?’ Ea' ipe' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolana atuwasi nosapa'ana notanimamipei mehip.’ ”
41011004	-
41011005	Ea' amam biam mafe' mati anona donki sa'unai sapete'ana nail ipat uta ande' felefele'ma eaf. Amam ata' matagahona etin, enis saitu felefele' sahali'am sa'i, “Dei' maina ipe' patagaha donki anama?”
41011006	Ea' ma'ipas si'i Jisas do'ok na'ipam. Ea' sa'i a'e ma amam mofa' donki anama.
41011007	Ea' mofa'ana mafi'mai Jisas, mawamona sagwegw amamumi matoma donki anama Jisas natomam.
41011008	Ea' esis hiesi sambe'amonam sagwegw eaf. Enis satopa'i lawah motawa aof felefele'i sase'wiam eaf sofalo'mana.
41011009	Esis hiesi sali' sagi' sanda' la kolo' safe' na'ama sa'i, “Hosana. Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma ine'. Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma ine' nafi'i agel Dembinai.
41011010	Dei' awi ine' nafi'i, nape Dembinai ma ape' nimafiapa si'i fowa' gani Devit nape dembinai numafias. Hosana. Ape' mosa'ma agel Godi nolata ilif endilisi.”
41011011	Ea' Jisas nawis Jerusalem nafe' nawis ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai. Nawis nati amamaga nafe'ma hi'alam, aon na'i nowala, nao'wa alupumi 12-peleim ananimi mafe' Betani.
41011012	Wafilu Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mohafel makwaha Betani mafi'i etin, Jisas nolomahana.
41011013	Ea' naitu nati anona lawag agilinama fik notawa laogon felefele', nati apul atom. Ea' nafe' felefele' nagolopa su'utip. Ea' ina nati anom mailana, owa'. Nati apul atom. Nogota anama mailanai ata' owa'.
41011014	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ina ata' nela anom su'utip milina wapoti', owa'”. Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama na'ipa lawagami.
41011015	Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga Jerusalem, ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nagolo'ma esis hiesi sanda' bisnisi saloma isima satalom ipat anama nomoni sawisi ande'. Anom amam mati otamba enis epesi mindisila'mam. Ea' Jisas namboma tebol amamumi nakowasom. Enis sanda' bisnisa setal amiguf mai'unamb. Ea' namboma siaifah asasimi nakowasom wapoti'.
41011016	Ea' nanda'imagon na'i, “Ina ata' sofa' anom amamaga amama suwisi nomon wapoti' ipat anama sandatama sapoma, owa'.”
41011017	Ea' na'ipasa basef Godi mail Baibeli na'i, “Ipat Ae'anai nopoma esis sape ganima wambel hiagomai ma sifi'i sopaina sonda' beten sohali' Ae'. Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i sanda' walanai.”
41011018	Amam nematawa hiesi gegelalasisa basef ananimi. Amama atom pris amama dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi umbamahama anan. Ea' magolopa eafa mohana neaga'.
41011019	Ea' wambomota Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi makwaha Jerusalem mafe'.
41011020	Wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mati lawag anama fik bowana alina, soh maloma nombalef alim hi'alam.
41011021	Ea' Pita natolona okom napoma Jisas na'iami basefa lawag anama ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai tisa, ine' niti lawag anae' nambati' ine' na'ipanai, alina hi'alana.”
41011022	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pembale'efa God.
41011023	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis owa' ukup bimbiefim mopeis ma esis ukup etifim sembale'a basef Ae'ami endilisi si'ipa halaf nani si'i, ‘Ine' degia nefe' newala naoh,’ endilisi God nambimb nonda'am motaga si'i esis ukup ma'iam.
41011024	Na'ama a'ipipa, I'i ipe' pi'i penda' betena pehali Goda anom amamaga, pembale'efa God endilisi penda' beten pi'i, ‘Endilisi, afa' nambimb ofa'ami,’ ma nambimb pefa'am si'i pa'iam.
41011025	Nemaf anama ipe' pitu penda' beten, pekwahomasa waf aonai enis sanda'mepanai. Ama Ahalomepa nape heven ilifi nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai wapoti'. [
41011026	I'i pindaiwa'ma peakwahomasa waf aonai enis epes sanda'mepanai, Ahalomepa nape heveni ina nekwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, owa'etin.]”
41011027	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafi'i Jerusalem wapoti', ea' nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Anan ata' nafe' etin, amam pris dambami maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam agufumi Juda mafi'mai Anan.
41011028	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' nefa' agel maina dei' nanda' maol anama? Emi na'ipina ma nepe dembinai nanda' maol anama?”
41011029	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti', a'i ihali'ipa ma anom basefa ipe' ata' pili' pi'ipa ae', ma atuwasi i'ipipa emi na'ipi ape dembiwei anda' maol anama.
41011030	Jon napisi'as amam nematawa hiesi, emi na'ipana nanda' maol anama? God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapanai na'ipana? Ipe' pegwam pi'ipiam.”
41011031	Ea' mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipana,’ Anan atuwasi ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
41011032	Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Epes sape etapi sa'ipa Jon napisi'asi,’ na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa.” Dei' main, esis hiesi sa'i Jon anan profet dembinai. Ea' amam umbamahama esis.
41011033	Ea' magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa emi nase'e agel lu'unai na'ipi anda' maol anama.”
41012001	Ea' Jisas nanda' anom basef womun etina esis na'i, “Anona aman dembinai nanda' anona aof nawa wain nahopana. Aof anama nomon anan nanda' anona tang notawa ma sofa'asa su'utip amama wainim, ea' nala' anona ipat launai notawa sope sumafiagon. Ea' nakwahomama aof anama anom amam ma'i monda' maolanana. Ea' anan nafe' napani anona wambel laugoma.
41012002	Ama nogota su'utip mailanai, nafamona aof anamai nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi ma aof anama.
41012003	Ea' mombalo'ana mahana matofana notanima nafe'.
41012004	Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti' ma mose'ana anom su'utip. Ea' mombalo'ana wapoti' mahana mawala balagana manda'ana kwapete'ana.
41012005	Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti', ea' mahana afuna, ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anom hiami mafe'. Ea' maham etin anom afum.
41012006	Ea' nagi' nasapa' aman atotona napani wapoti'. Anama nogalomana ananinai. Okom ananinai nohafel nainailana endilisi. Ea' na'iam na'i, ‘Nambimb, amam mome' malogel nogalome ae'anai.’
41012007	Ea' amam mati nogalomana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama etin ma'i, ‘Aman anama anona nemaf nofa' amamaga hiami ahalomanai. Afa' ohana afuna, ma afa' atofa ofa' aof anama.’
41012008	Ea' mombalo'ana mahana afuna makwaha alop ananinai nawis na'oh aof ande'.
41012009	Ea' nambimb anan nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam? Nambimb nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, nose'asa aof anama nefe'ma enis.
41012010	Ipe' patalifa basef Godi pegawam ea'. Basef Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Owap anama mala' ifagwi magwasi'ana dei' nataga nape owap nape nali'i nembalo' ipat.
41012011	Dembinai nanda' amama mataga, ape' matolom bo'om endilisi.’ ”
41012012	Ea' amam agufumi esis Judai mogawa anan na'i basef amama womun etini mondola'wifa amam. Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' makwahona mafe'.
41012013	Ea' amam agufumi Judai masapa'am anom Farisi maloma anom amam Heroti mafe'ma Jisas ma'i mome' anom basef ananimi owa' andeande'i ma monda'mana basef mowa'ana si'i sowa' bogof.
41012014	Ea' amam mafi'i makikipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, afa' ogawena ine' aman na'i basef endilisimi. Ina ni'ipasa anom basef isima enis agof lu'wamisi ea' anom basef isima agof a'asi falafisi, owa'. Ine' na'ipasa basef atifim endilisimi atom ma okom Godi amam nematawa hiesi dondo' etin hi'alam.
41012015	Mi'uli ape'inai na'i andeande'ma ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai ma esis Rom, o owa'?” Ea' Jisas negawam baso'am amamunai na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pagwamba ae'? Fa'mai anona moni atotona ata' itolona.”
41012016	Ea' mofa'mananai ma natolona nahali'am na'i, “Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?” Ea' ma'i, “Amama Sisari gavman dembinai.”
41012017	Ea' nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.” Ea' amam gegelalasom ukup matamea ma Anan.
41012018	Anom amam Sadyusi amam hiami ma'i saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Ea' mafi'mai Jisas mahali'ana ma'i,
41012019	“Dembinai Tisa, fowa' gani Moses nanda' anom basef mail buki ma ape' ma'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana, ea' waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akw nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
41012020	Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw awani a'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
41012021	-
41012022	Ea' owalomana nagi' nase'akw, naga' nakwaho'w kwape awani a'akw. Ea' owapam mandatu'umai manda'am na'ama etin, mase'akw maga' etin hi'alam mafe' mafe'ma matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amam amama wambutaim ina mola enis awasi, owa'. Maga' etin hi'alam. Ea' waulu'mam kwagi' kwaga' kwagi'mam.
41012023	Ea' nemaf anama esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kope nemata'w emi'wi? Amam 7-peleim maso'akw etin hi'alam kwape waulu'mam amamu'wi.”
41012024	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Baibel na'iami, owa' pegawa pepel Godi.
41012025	Nemaf anama saga'i sokwaha hi'agilif sohafel wapoti', amam nematawa ina ata' sondase'ama wapoti', owa'. Sopan etin si'i ensel mape heveni.
41012026	Basef amama saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', ipe' patalifa basef mail buk Baibeli, fowa' gani God na'ipa Mosesami. Basef amama ma'i nif ilalowa mataga ma lawag so'unai fandonai. Basef amama God na'ipa Moses na'i, ‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, maloma Jekopi.’
41012027	Basef amama ma'i Dembinai, Anan ina God epes saga'i, owa'. Anan God epes isima ambal napeis sape namusi. Ea' basef ipe'imi ina endilisimi. Ipe' ina pegawam andeande', owa'.”
41012028	Anona aman nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nafi'i, name' amam ma'i maloma Jisas mandahihianama basef. Ea' name' Jisas nagwamama basef bu'wami atom. Ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Mi'uli Godi ape' membale'efanai hianai. Ea' maina mi'uli lu'unai nikila' mi'uli hianai nape nali'i?”
41012029	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Mi'uli nali'i anama. ‘Ipe' Israel, ipe' peme'! Dembinai God ape'inai, Anan atona Dembinai.
41012030	Nomonas ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef moloma pepel ipe'imi pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona.’
41012031	Ea' mi'uli nafe'ma bifi anama. ‘Ipe' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.’ Owa' anona mi'uli nikila' mi'uli anama biefina, owa'. Mi'uli anama biefina ape' mombale'efanai ea' anama atona.”
41012032	Ea' aman anama na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'iam andeande'. God atona Anan Dembinai, Anan atona nape. Owa' anona aman nope dembinai si'i Anan.
41012033	Mi'uli lu'unai nali'i anama. Nomonas ipe'imi mohafela anan mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana opalef moloma gawa moloma pepel ipe'inai hi'ilana. Na'ama andeande'. Ea' mi'uli nagi'i anama. Ipe' piti uwahipis ukup mimila emi egafis sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipe' ukup maila ipe' etipa. Na'ama andeande'. I'i ape' mila mi'uli anama biefina, waf anama bu'unai nikila' gwa'aimi mafis maim mose'anam Godi ata' bo'om andeande'.”
41012034	Jisas name' aman anama nagwa basef si'i aman gawa bu'unai. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ina ata' nogota laona ma niowis wambota Godi numafina, owa'.” Ea' amam hiami umbamahama meahali' Jisasa anom basef wapoti'.
41012035	Ea' Jisas nape felefele' ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa na'i, “Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ma'i, ‘Krais, aman anama God nandandepana nasapa'ana niefi'i, Devit akunamana.’ Ea' ma'i Krais aman atona etapanai. Dei' maina ma'iam na'ama ma Krais?
41012036	Ambal Bu'unai Godi fowa' gani nafela Devit na'i ‘Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bo'wagah ine'imi.” ’
41012037	King Devit fowa' gani nofala Krais na'i, ‘Anan Dembinai.’ Amama atom dei' Krais ina aman nogalomana Deviti atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai.” Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandanifel same' basef Ananimi.
41012038	Ea' Jisas nawalipasa basef na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Amam ma'i mowaho'a luwaguf laumi atom mofe'ma esis sotoloma si'i amam dambami manda' waf bu'unai. Amam ma'i mope anama esis hiesi sandatama sapoma ma sotoloma sefela agof amamumi sinifelom.
41012039	Amam amama ukup ma'i mope siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom, dambami atom mapoma nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi o anama epes hiesi sandatama sapoma nimeguf amama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma hiesi sotolom.
41012040	Ea' amam mawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, mawis makowalopam amamaga awaumi. Ea' mohafel maitu manda' beten launai atona wafinai esis sotolom si'i amam bu'wami. Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes hiesi. Enis epes owa' senda' waf aonai na'amainai anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um, ea' amam mofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.”
41012041	Jisas nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai, nape felefele'ma bokis amama sala moni nalami. Anan nape nati amam nematawa safi'i sala moni nowala bokis amama. Amam nematawa isima hiesi moni hianaisi sala moni hianai.
41012042	Ea' ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwafi'i kwala moni sa'unai biefina si'i 10 toea newala bokis isima.
41012043	Ea' nofala alupumi ananimi mafi'i na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwala moni lu'unai nikila' moni hianai amam nematawa hiesi salanai.
41012044	Epes isima hiesi moni hianai na'omas, sala tu'wanina atona nowala bokis. Ea' nemata'w akwama, moni a'akw endilisi, akwa'w kwala moni ako'unai hi'alana. Ea' owa' anona ne'oh kweatala gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' moni akwa'unai biefina so'unai nikila' moni hianai esis salanai.”
41013001	Jisas nape nomon ipat anama lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' na'i nokwaha ipat anama nawisi ande', anona alupunai ananinai nafi'i na'ipana na'i, “Tisa, ine' niti ifagw amama bu'wami. Sanda' otamba lu'wami sanda'am bu'wami atom.”
41013002	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i na'ama, na'i, “Ine' nati ifagw amama lu'wami? Anona nemaf ina anom otamba mondatoma la'ifim etin mope, owa'. Sowowalom atona etin hi'ilam mo'oh.”
41013003	Jisas nape halaf anama lawah oliv motawama ea' nati ipat lu'unai Godi notawa to'wan wa'ol. Ea' Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon naloma Andru atom mafi'mai Anan mahali'ana ma'i,
41013004	“Ine' ni'ipafa amamaga amama nambai' motaga'? Maina ikwaf nili' notaga ma afa' ogawa amamaga amama felefele'ma motaga si'i dei' na'ipafa?”
41013005	Ea' Jisas na'ipama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa.
41013006	Dei' main, amam hiami anona nemaf mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'i agel ae'anai mi'i, ‘Ae' ma'uwi ae' Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i.’ Ea' anona nemaf amam mombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi some' basef amamumi si'i endilisimi silam.
41013007	Anona nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'unai hianai notaga ea' ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Amamaga amama anona nemaf motaga ea' nemaf akutainai ata' owa'.
41013008	Enis epes sape anama etap hiagoma kantri sofela wandaf sopa' soloma anona kantri. Anona king nohafel no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona king no'wa ananisi wambel hiagoma. Enis epes wambel hiagoma atona etin etap bol etin nope, ea' enis epes hiesi sape wambel hiagoma nolomohas sope. Amamaga amama hiami ata' muli' motaga si'i nimanimi mali'i ma nemata'w kwa'i kola awani. Ea' nimanimi anona nemaf migi' meatagai lu'um endilisi mikila' amama mali'i.
41013009	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Anona nemaf sonda' kotimipa ma gavman dambami asasimi. Ea' sehepa nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Ipe' pame' basef ae'ami paila ae'i amama atom dei' sondaiwa'mepa sonda'epa pitu naep kingi moloma gavman dambami ma peawalapa basef ae'ami bu'wami pi'ipasam.
41013010	Alupisi ae'asi ata' sili' sofe' wambel hiagoma si'ipa amam nematawa hiesi some' basef bu'wami Godi mili'.
41013011	Nemaf anama esis sowalapepa sofa'epa pefe'ma kot, ipe' ina umbamehepa pi'i, ‘Atuwasi afa' wi'i maim basef?’ Owa'. Maim basef God niesi'ipami ma nogota anama atona, amama ipe' pewalapam. Amama ina basef ipe'imi atom, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nowalapama ipe' pi'iam.
41013012	Anona nemaf esis hiesi sahin owan sondanda'ma kot, sohas soga'. Ea' ahapas sonda'am na'ama etina esis nogamas asasisi. Ea' batawisas wapoti' sonda' kotima mamasas asasisi enis sohas soga'.
41013013	Anona nemaf epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef ae'ami na'ama dei' sahepa. Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa Ae' situ la'ifis sotaga nemaf akutainai, isima anona nemaf God nefa'as sotanimani.
41013014	Anona nemaf ipe' piti amamaga mohambombaga amamaga bu'wami motaga mope nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. God nandaiwa' endilisi ma amamaga awami mope nomon ipat Ananinai.” (Emi egafis setalifa basef amama, esis sogawa basef ofagema andeande'.) “Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judia sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw.
41013015	Ea' emi egafis sape ipat ande' felefele' ina ata' setanima suwis sefa'ai amamaga asasimi ipat nomon, owa'. Esis sofa' sefe' mehip.
41013016	Emi egafis sapani aofi, ina ata' setanima sefe' wambel sefa' luwaguf maim asasimi, owa. Esis sofa' sefe' mehip.
41013017	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sagwa' nomambeh atomi Ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.
41013018	Ipe' penda' betena amamaga amama nimanimi ina motagamepa nogota anama uf noloma asaf mifi'i.
41013019	Nogota anama nimanimi lu'wami endilisi meataganai. Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' etap nataga nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', nimanimi amama lu'wami ina anom na'amaimi mataga, owa'. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' ina anom nimanimi amama motaga, owa'.
41013020	I'i God owa' nenda' nimeguf mefe' bandam, anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi hegililas hi'ilas. Owa'etin. God okom napoma epes isima anan nasahe'as ea dei' nanda' nogota anama bandana.
41013021	Nemaf anama notaga ma i'i enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Ipe' piti Krais, God nandandepana nasap'ana nafi'i, anan nape na'ae,’ o ‘Nani nape gani,’ ipe' ina pembale'efas, owa' hapaisi.
41013022	Anona nemaf anom amam mombaso'am mi'i amam Kraisi o mi'i amam profeti, motaga monda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai si'i God atona nanda'anai. Endilisi i'i amam la'ifim, mombaso'ma amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea' mohambombagas. Owa'.
41013023	Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Ae' ali' a'ipipa ea'ma amamaga amama nimanimi dei' ata' owa' meatagai.
41013024	Nimanimi amama hiami ma nogota anama hi'ilam ea', mehip etin ‘aon alipunai netaga owamb, ea' aon owambunai wa na'ef ina molo, owa'.
41013025	Ea' ondowa mowai otaga ilif, amamaga hiami la'ifimi mape otagai ea' bol etin mope.’
41013026	Nogota anama esis amam nematawa siti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga howalagon bu'wami Godi moloma pepel Ananinai.
41013027	Nogota anama Ae' iefi'ianai esapa' ensel amama Ae'ami mofe' etap hiagoma aon natefima nowalama wa'owa'ol anama biafigin biafigin mefe'agon hi'ilagon ganima etap otaga nafe' notambilima. Ensel amama mefe' mofa'ai esis amam nematawa God nasahe'as ea'i Ananisi sondakolas etifigin.
41013028	Ipe' okokoma anom basef womun etina lawag anama fik. Ipe' piti ilaof monafa ma masowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele'ma meaof.
41013029	Ea' na'ama etin nemaf anama piti amamaga amama ali' a'ipipami motaga, ipe' pegawa ae' afi'i aitu felefele'ma uta. Ina ata' nogota laona, owa'.
41013030	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae' ata' papani ina pega' ulal, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama motaga hi'ilam.
41013031	Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf hegililam hi'ilam, ea' basef Ae'ami ina anona nemaf hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.
41013032	Owa' enin epen negawa nemaf anama amamaga amama meataganai, owa'. Amam ensel mape heveni maloma ae' Nogalomana Ananiwei ina ogawa, owa'. God atona nogawa nemaf anama.
41013033	Ipe' ina pegawa amamaga amama nambai' motaga, owa'. Na'ama pindumafuma, ukup motamea andeande' pepan.
41013034	Ipe' peme' anom basef womun etin dei' ie'ipipami. Nemaf anama Ae' etanima iefi'ianai si'i anona aman nakwaha ipat ananinai nafe' anagon. Anan nofalai amam manda' maola anani mafi'i nawaloga maol nase'am atona etina mumafi amamaga ananimi. Ea' na'ipa aman numafi utai ma numafiana andeande'.
41013035	Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Ipe' ina pegawa nambei' Dembinai numafi ipati niefi'i. Nambimb nifi'i wambomota o amaneta o kwafolimbuta awatagw meada'am o kuhimbita atona, ipe' ina pegawam, owa'.
41013036	Na'ama Anan nifi'i mehip niti ipe' ata' pe'eh etin.
41013037	Basef amama ae' ase'epam ipe'i amama ae' a'ipa amam nematawa hiesi. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe ma amamaga ae' a'ipipami meataga.”
41014001	Anona nemaf bu'unai sa'i Pasova ma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sagwa' anona bret owa' neatef lu'unai. Nimeguf biam ata' mape ma nemaf anama bu'unai sa'i sea' gwa'aimi Pasova ea' notaga. Nemaf anama amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom pris dambami ma'i mondambaho' miti anona eaf ma mombalo' Jisas mohana neaga'.
41014002	Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami afa' ina ombalo'ana, hapainai. Na'ama epes hiesi ukup aom sohafel sonda' wandaf.”
41014003	Nemaf anama Jisas nape Betani, nape ipat anona aman Saimoni. Fowa' awes aonai nanda' alop ananinai nambo', dei' ambo'ona. Jisas ata' nape na' gwa'aimi etin nalomana, ea' ano'w nemata'w kwahapila anona botol sanda'ana si'i otam, sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai satalom otamba lu'wami mala botol anama, agilinama nad. Ea' kopalia botol anama kwakolo'am mowala balaga Jisasi.
41014004	Ea' enis epes sape satolom sa'i, “Dei' maina kwakolo' sanda amama mafe' etin?” Ea' esis ukup numbutim kwapete'as ma akwa'w,
41014005	ea' sa'i, “Dei' afa' ofa'am enis epes sose'afa moni nikila' 300 kina sotalom ofa'ana oso' epes isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim, andeande'.” Esis ukup numbutim endilisi mapoma nemata'w akwama.
41014006	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' kwaho'w. Ipe' ina ukup aoma akwa'w, owa'. Akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma Ae'.
41014007	Isima gwa'aimi maim a'asi la'ela'ef sape salomepa. Maina nemaf pi'i pigiambamas pese'as moni, andeande' pese'asana. Epes isima sape salomepa nimeguf hiami, ea' ae' owa'. Ae' ina elomepa epe nimeguf hiami, owa'.
41014008	Maol anama akwa'w kwogawana, kwanda'ana. Felefele'ma nambimb esis sehe ega' ma sowe hi'agif. Okom ako'unai napoma felefele'ma ae' ega'. Na'ama dei' kofa'ai sanda amama kwafi'i kwakolo'am mowala balaga ae'anai kwakolo'am mowala alop ae'anai ma kwandondomba ae' ma seawe.
41014009	Endilisi Ae' a'ipipa, ganima etap anae' wambel hiagoma anona nemaf si'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi, si'ipasa basef ako'umi wapoti' ma ukup mopoma waf bu'unai akwa'w kwanda'meanai.”
41014010	Amam amama Jisasi 12-peleim anona amamunai agilinama Judas Kariotinai nafe'ma amam pris hiami dambami. Anan na'i ni'ipama Jisas atona napoma mofe' mombalo'ana.
41014011	Amam mame' basef ananimi mandanifel endilisi. Ea' ma'i basef mandame'mam na'ama ma'i, “Andeande', afa' ose'ena anona moni.” Ea' Judas na'i nefe' nogolopa anona eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amama mombalo'ana.
41014012	Nemaf anama sali' sa' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova esis sa' bret anama owa' neatef lu'unai, nemaf anama saha sipsip noganai sondolalima Goda sonda' gwa'aimi amama si'i afagof hiami sanda'am. Ea' alupumi Jisasi mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat enima ma afa' ofe' onda' gwa'aimi amama?”
41014013	-
41014014	Ea' Jisas na'ipa ananimi biam na'i, “Ipe' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'unai, piti anona aman eaf nofa' embel malep lu'unai. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat anama anan nefe' niowisanai. Ea' pihali' kofagena ma ipat anama pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, rum ae'anai nape eti? Anan na'i no'wa afa' atofa alupufai ope onda' gwa'aimi amama Pasova.’
41014015	Ea' nihi'ambepa rum anama lu'unai nape ilif, ea' sandombana tebol siaifah ma'oh etifim. Ipe' pendondombamafa gwa'aimi rum anama.”
41014016	Ea' amam mafe' mawis wambel anama mati amama si'i Jisas nali' na'ipami ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi amama Pasova rum anama.
41014017	Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Jisas naloma alupumi 12-peleim mafe' mataga ipat anama
41014018	Mawis ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai dei' nape nalomafa na' gwa'aimi, atuwasi nefe' nihi'amba amam naumbiha Ae' efe' eapoma.”
41014019	Amam mame' na'ama ukup amamumi nimanim ea' mahali'ana atona etin ma'i, “Ae' o emi?”
41014020	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anona afa'inai 12-peleim naloma ae' wahapila bret walata disi, ea' anama atona.
41014021	Ae' ataga epen enidilisiwei, naman enis epes sehe ega', si'i Buk Baibel na'iama Ae'. Ea' aman anama nowalapa Ae' ma naumbih, anan uwahipina endilisi. Nambimb nimanimi awami endilisi motagamana. Fowa' mama'wana owa' ata' kolanai, andeande'. Ama anan ina notagama nimanimi amama awami, owa'.”
41014022	Jisas nalomam ata' mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, nafela anona bret, nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona nase'am na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' felana pea'ana. Bret anama alop Ae'anai.”
41014023	Ea' nafela anona kap embel wain nalanai nanda' beten nanifela God naso' amam hiami ma' embel etin.
41014024	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Embel amama esimbel Ae'ami manda' basef amama God na'i endilisimi atomi motaga la'ifim. Ae' ekolo'wama igiambama amam nematawa hiesi.
41014025	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' etanima ea' embel wain wapoti', owa'. Efe' etaga wambel Godi, ea' anona wain dambainai.”
41014026	Amam manda' anona awaf ea' mawisi mafe' mondowasa' halaf lawah oliv motawama.
41014027	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi na'i, “Fowa' gani Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, God na'i, ‘Anona nemaf owagama gani, Ae' eha aman anama numafi sipsipi noga'. Ea' sipsip amama atuwasi mofa' mofe' atona etin.’ Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, atuwasi ipe' pekwaha pembale'efa ae' pefa' pefe' atona etin, si'i fowa' gani God na'iam.
41014028	Ea' nambimb ae' etanima ehafel wapoti', ili'ipa efe' etap hiagoma Galili.”
41014029	Ea' Pita nagwamana na'i, “I'i amam hiami ine'imi mokwahina, hapaimi, ae' owa'.”
41014030	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina basef endilisi, dei' owamb anae', awata ata' owa' nonda'am bif, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisas.’ ”
41014031	Ea' Pita na'ipana mehip na'i, “I'i esis sohafa, afa' biafa oga' etin. Ae' ina embaho' agel ine'inai, owa'.” Ea' alupumi hiami Jisasi ma'iam na'ama etin hi'alam.
41014032	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' mataga anona etap Getsemani, ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pepe na'ae. Ae' efe' gani wa'ol enda' beten.”
41014033	Ea' Jisas nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon mafe' malomana. Ea' opaf Jisasi aona kwapete'ana.
41014034	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Opaf ae'anai nimanina endilisi ma ega', nomonas ae'ami aom endilisi. Ipe' pepe na'ae pindumafuma pepe pehafa ae' etanimai iefi'i.”
41014035	Ea' Jisas nandamboma nafe', nambe' opaf na'oh etap nanda' beten. Na'i notofa amamaga awami amama anan atuwasi meatagamanai.
41014036	Ea' nahali' God na'i, “Aba Ahalome, ine' la'ifinai ma nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam. Nekwahome nimanimi amama. Ea' nila okom ine'inai atona, ae' owa'.”
41014037	Anan nahali'ana ea', nohafel notanima nafe'ma alupumi ananimi mapoma. Nafe' natolom ea', nati amam ma'oh maga' mafe'. Ea' nofala Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon, ipe' ata' owa' pepe, pa'oh etin a'amon? Dei' maina ipe' owa' la'ifipama pepe pehafa ae'? Nogota ina ata' laona ma ie'ipipa a'i pepe, owa'.
41014038	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pepe penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei meatagamepa. Endilisi ukup ipe'imi ma'i awima penda' beten, ea' alop owa' la'ifina, ala'uta naepa ma penda beten pelome.”
41014039	Jisas na'ipam na'ama ma ea', notanima nafe' nanda' beten. Nahali'anama basef amama atom nali' nahali'anamami.
41014040	Nahali'ana ea' nandamboma notanima nafi'i amam mapoma nati ata' ma'oh. Ea' ninimbalom mohafel ma'i, “Atuwasi afa' wi'ipana maim basef?” Ambeh maham ea' ma'oh maga' mafe'.
41014041	Ea' anan nandamboma notanima nafe' wapoti' nanda' beten si'i do'ok nali' nanda' beten bif. Ea' notanima nafi'mai amam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' papoma noma'w pa'oh etin? Dei' ipe' koh ea', hafel. Dei' nemaf anae' anona aman nifi'i nulumai anom amam awami mufi'i mowa' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.
41014042	Hafel! Afa' ofe' uti aman anama nihi'ambama ae' dei' nafi'i.”
41014043	Jisas ata' naitu na'ipam etin, anona aman nafi'i. Aman anama Judas anona amam 12-peleim alupumi ananimi nafi'i nalumai amam hiami mahapila bainahi belep malomana mafi'i. Amam pris dambami malumai amam agufumi dambami esis Judai masapa'am mafi'i.
41014044	Aman anama nawalapa Jisasi, nali' na'ipam nanda' ikwaf nihi'ambam na'i, “Atuwasi piti ae' iesisi' dalogwanai, aman anama ea' Jisas ma'una. Ipe' pembalo'ana pewa'ana andeande' pefa'ana pefe'.”
41014045	Amam ata' mataga etin, Judas nafe'ma Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa.” Ea' nasisi' dalogwana.
41014046	Ea' amam membalo' Jisas.
41014047	Ea' anona aman naitu felefele'ma Jisasi nagiai bainat naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami, natopa' aliga ananinai pele'atana nowa.
41014048	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam naumbih na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainah maloma belep pafi'i pa'i pewa' anona aman aonai nanda' wal napa' naloma gavmani?
41014049	Nimeguf hiami ae' ape alomepa felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami ma esis aman nematawa hiesi, ea' ipe' owa' pembale'e. Ea' dei' paila basef mape Baibeli pafi'i pewa'e si'i basef fowa' gani ma'iam. Ae' a'i basef amama dei' motaga endilisi mola' gwa'aimi.”
41014050	Ea' alupumi ananimi hiami makwahona mafa' mafe' hi'alam.
41014051	Ea' anona aman sa'unai nagi'ma Jisas nafi'i nowaho' anona lowaf afitinai ea' amam mahapila bainah maloma belep ma'i mombalo'ana.
41014052	Ea' anan nakwaha lowaf atona na'oh ea' nafa' nafe' etin.
41014053	Amam mofa' Jisas mafe'ma pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami. Anan naloma amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam hiami mandakolas etifigin.
41014054	Ea' Pita ina nalomam etin nafe', owa'. Anan nagi'mam nafe' nawis endalelemba pris anama dembinai ea' nape naloma amam polisman mapoma nif.
41014055	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami Juda hiami mumafi koti ma'i mogolopa enis epesa sombaso'mana ma anom basefa moha Jisas neaga'. Ea' amam ina mati enis, owa'.
41014056	Esis hiesi sambaso'mana ma anom basef ea' ina sa'i endilisimi mafe' etifigin, owa'. Sa'iam mafe' deindei.
41014057	Ea' amam maitu mambaso'mana ma anom basef na'ama ma'i,
41014058	“Afa' wame' Jisas na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ipat lu'unai Godi epes sanda'anai, nambimb Ae' etalona, ma nimeguf wanom ea' efelona notawa wapoti'. Ea' Ae' ina enda' lagof epesi efelona, owa'.’ ”
41014059	Basef amama amam ma'iami ina ma'i endilisimi mafe' etifigin, owa'. Ma'iam mafe' deindei.
41014060	Ea' pris anama dembinai naitu la'afen nahali' Jisas na'ama na'i, “Ine' negwa basef amama, o owa'? Dei' maina amam ma'ipina basef na'ama?”
41014061	Ea' Jisas nasopama malogel naitu. Anan ina nagwamana basef anan, owa'. Ea' pris anama dembinai nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Ine' Krais aman anama God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'? Ine' nogalomana Godi ape' manda' lotumanai, o owa'?”
41014062	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' ma'uwi. Ea' anona nemaf ipe' piti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei epe lagel da'isinai Godi, epe otaga ilif itanimai ifi'i petolowe.”
41014063	Jisas na'iam na'ama, ea' pris anama okom wandafuna, ea' nahape' lowaf anama nalanai na'iam na'i, “Ape' ina ata' mofalai enis epes wapoti' sifi'i si'i anom basefa anan, owa'.
41014064	Anan nanda' God findiwana ea' amama pame'am. Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama?” Ea' amam hiami ma'i anom basef mandame'mam ma'i, “Anan nanda' waf aonai afa' ohana nega'.”
41014065	Ea' anom mohafel misisi'wafana masopama naep ananimi mahana ma'ipana ma'i, “Ni'i basef si'i profet newalapa emi nahena.” Ea' amam polisman mafi'i mahana mofa'ana mafe'.
41014066	-
41014067	Ano'w nemata'w kwanda'mana maol pris anama dembinai kwafi'i kwati Pita napoma nif ipat ande'. Ea' kwaitu kwatolona kogawana kwa'ipana na'ama kwa'i, “Enina ine' nape naloma Jisas Nasaretinai.”
41014068	Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'ipakw na'i, “Owa'. Ae' ina egawa basef ofagema ine' na'iami.” Ea' anan nohafel nafe' felefele'ma endambel uta, anona awata nonda'am.
41014069	Ea' nemata'w akwama kwatolona kwa'ipas isima saitu felefele'i wapoti' kwa'ipas na'ama kwa'i, “Aman anama wapoti' alupunai Jisasi.”
41014070	Ea' Pita na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' ina egawana, ae' owa'.” Nogota bandana ea' enis saitu felefele'i sa'ipa Pita wapoti' sa'i, “Endilisi, ine' alupinai naloma amam Jisasi. Ine' wapoti' aman Galilinai.”
41014071	Dei' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “Endilisi ilif, ae' ina egawa aman anama ipe' pa'ianai, owa'.”
41014072	Anan na'iam ea', awata nanda'am bif ea' Pita okokoma basef do'ok Jisas na'ipanami na'i, “Awata owa' ata' nonda'am bif, ine' nembaso'mas ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Owa' negawea.’ ” Ea' Pita okom napoma basef amama ea' nalef mehip.
41015001	Kuhimbita atona amam pris dambami maloma anom dambami Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom Juda dambami mumafi koti, amam hiami mandakolas maila basef etifim. Amam mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe' maso' gavman dembinai Pailat.
41015002	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai o owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iami endilisimi.”
41015003	Ea' amam pris dambami mambaso'ma Jisasa basef hiami.
41015004	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Ine' owa' negwa anom basef? Ine' neme'. Amam manda'mena basef hiami ma ine'.”
41015005	Ea' Jisas ina nagwa anom basef wapoti', owa'. Na'ama Pailat okom natanea.
41015006	Nemaf anama esis Juda sanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova. Afagof hiami ma nemaf anama Pailat nanda'am na'ama. Anan nakwaha anona nape kalabusi nafe' wafifina. Emi epen esis amam nematawa sa'ianai, Pailat name'asa nakwahona nafe'mas.
41015007	Nogota anama anona aman nape kalabusi agilinama Barabas. Anan nanda' kalabus naloma anom amam mapa' maloma gavmani maha enis saga'i.
41015008	Ea' esis hiesi safi'i saitu sofala Pailat sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nekwaha anona aman nape kalabusi nifi'mai ape' wafifina, si'i afagof hiami nanda'am.”
41015009	Ea' nagwamasa basef na'i, “Dei' ae' ekwaha king dembinai ipe' Judai nefe'mago ipe', o emi?”
41015010	Dei' main, Pailat anan nogawa amam pris dambami kowalama epes hiesi saila basef Jisasi ukup aom atom mapomana dei' manda' kotimana.
41015011	Ea' amam mafela ukup ma esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sohali' Pailata nokwaha Barabas atona nufi'mai esis.
41015012	Ea' Pailat na'iam wapoti' na'ama na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pefalona pa'i king dembinai esis Judai, ipe' pa'i ae' enda' i'imamana?”
41015013	Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!”
41015014	Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Dei' main? Anan nanda' maina waf aonai?” Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Undana lawag hana afuna!”
41015015	Ea' Pailat naila ukup asasimi, nakwaha Barabas nafe'ma esis na'ipa amam soldia ma mopagaha Jisas mofa'ana mefe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
41015016	Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mawisi ipat gavmani lu'unai. Ea' mofala anom soldia hiami mafi'i munduwa'anima ma anan,
41015017	malamana saket akwahinai. Ea' mofa'ai anona mandof higatagunai manogana mala'watefana si'i hat mowalo'manana balaga ananinai.
41015018	Ea' maitu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai, ine' king dembinai esis Judai!”
41015019	Ea' amam mahana anona elifita balaga ananinai, misisi'wafana mindiwa nembawa motawa mafela agel ananinai etin.
41015020	Manda'ana findiwana ma ea', mowalimana saket anama akwahinai, malamana lowaf ananinai mofa'ana mafe'ma mundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
41015021	Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ata' mafo'o eaf la'afen ea' matagama anona aman Saimon Sairininai nafi'i. Batausana ananimi biam, Aleksanda naloma Rufus. Saimon napani aolop nafi'i na'i nefe' Jerusalem. Ea' amam soldia masapa'ana nofa' lawag Jisasi. Ea' nofa'ana nafe'.
41015022	Ea' mofa' Jisas mafe' mataga anagon agiliguma Golgota. Ape' dei' mambomefagel ma'i, Pipitagel Balagaina.
41015023	Ea' mase'ana anom embel wainim mambomom malomana anona marasin agilina mer ma nea' embel mohogofa ekep pehana. Ea' anan ina na'i a'e na'am, owa'. Nandaiwa'mam.
41015024	Ea' maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' manda' satu ma luwaguf maim ananimi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mondandam atona etin.
41015025	Kuhimbita aon ata' natefi naili 9 klok, soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' maundana lawag anama.
41015026	Amam mofa' anona pepa basef amama do'ok amam Juda mambaso'ma Jisasami Pailat nanda'am mail ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA KING ESIS JUDAI.” Amam manda' basef amama mail balaga Jisasi lawag ilif.
41015027	Felefele'ma Jisas naima, amam soldia maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali. Amam maunda Jisas nail la'afen, ea' maunda amam biam mail wa'owa'ol. [
41015028	Na'ama si'i anom basef Baibel na'iami dei' mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Anona nemaf esis ukup mopoma anan noloma amam amama manda' waf aonai.”]
41015029	Ea' enis amam nematawa safe' safi'i eaf sanda' salamala anan samboma balagah sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Ine' ewi, ine' aman netala ipat anama dembinai Godi, ma netanima nefelona nela'ana nimeguf wanom,
41015030	dei' nigiambama ine' nendatagah nisila'i.”
41015031	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi hiami malomam maitu manda'ana findiwana ma'i, “Anan nagiambama enis epes ea' dei' ina nagiambama anan, owa'.
41015032	I'i aman anama Krais Dembinai esis Israeli, anan nokwaha lawag nisila'i ma motolona mombale'efana.” Amam biam saundam maloma Jisasi wapoti' manda'ana findiwana ma basef awami.
41015033	Aon nahagasom owamb lu'unai nataga etap hiagoma esis Judai akotigin. Owamb nape nafe' nafe' ma aon nasa nape 3 klok wambomota. Ea' aon howalagon wapoti'.
41015034	Aon nasa nape 3 klok, Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” Ape' mambomam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “God ae'inai, God ae'inai, dei' maina ine' nakwahowe?”
41015035	Enis epes saitu felefele' same' anan na'iam na'ama sa'i, “Peme'. Anan nofala profet Elaija.”
41015036	Ea' anona aman nasagih nafe' nofa' anom mosong mape naohi nalam mowala embel wain numbutimi nagiam nasapa'am anona elifita nandowana nafe'ma Jisas nea' embel. Ea' aman anama na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' ata' ota' muti Elaija atuwasi nifi'i notagahona nisila'i o owa'?”
41015037	Ea' Jisas na'i mehip endilisi naga' ea'.
41015038	Ea' dei' lowaf anama lu'unai si'i uta nail ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nomon palalana gani ilif nowala etap nataga biefina.
41015039	Ea' kepten anama dembinai numafi soldia hiami, naitu felefele'ma Jisas nati anan naga' na'ama ea' na'iam na'i, “Endilisi, aman anama nogalomana Godi.”
41015040	Ea' anowa nematawa waituwi laogon watologini awama. Ano'w Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w agel atona Maria mama'wana Josep naloma Jems sa'unai kwaloma ano'w Salomi.
41015041	Fowa' Jisas ata' nape Galili, awo waila anani ma wagiambamana ma anom amamaga gwa'aimi maim. Anowa hiawai wapoti' walomana ondowasa' Jerusalem.
41015042	Ea' wambomota felefele'ma owamb, Josep Arimateainai nafi'i.
41015043	Anan dembinai ma kot esis Judai, agel lu'unai. Nape nohafa nemaf bu'unai notaga ma hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias. Dei' sandandomba amamaga gwa'aimi maima naman nemaf anama Sabat notaga. Ea' Josep nafe' nawis naitu naep Pailati. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'. Nahali'ana ma nofa'ai alop Jisasi nawana.
41015044	Ea' Pailat gegelalasona okom na'i Jisas ina dei' afuna endilisi, ata' owa'. Ea' nofala anona dembinai soldia nafi'i nahali'ana na'ama na'i, “Jisas naga' ea' o owa'?”
41015045	Soldia anama na'ipana na'i, “Jisas naga' endilisi ea'.” Ea' Pailat na'ipa Josep na'i, “Ine' nefe' nefa' alop Jisasi.”
41015046	Fowa' nanda' anona hi'agif nagwasa owap lu'unai nagal nawis nomon. Ea' dei' anan na'i nowa Jisas hi'agif anama. Ea' nafe' notala anona lowaf afitinai nafi'i natagaha alop Jisasi nisila'i ma nanda' lowaf anama nowa'ana ma ea', nasapa'ana nawis hi'agif anama nalana nomon. Ea' namboma anona owap lu'unai nafe' nowalo uta hi'agif anama.
41015047	Anowa nematawa biawa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria mama'wana Josepi, awau waitu watologon wati anama Josep nawa Jisas.
41016001	Nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai nafe' hi'alana, Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Maria mama'wana Jems kwaloma Salomi watala anom wel alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Awau wa'i ofa'am ofe' ondisa alop Jisasi.
41016002	Wafilu nemaf Sande, kuhimbita atona awau ofa' wel amama wafe' hi'agif.
41016003	Awau ata' wafe' etin eaf, wanda'ipama na'ama wa'i, “Atuwasi emi nigiambamafa nelefata owap anama nowalo utai?”
41016004	Ea' watologon, wati owap anama lu'unai ina ata' nape nowalo uta, owa'. Enin epen nafe' nausi'ana nafe' na'oh wa'ol.
41016005	Awau wawis hi'agif nomon, wati anona aman sa'unai tol nape uta wa'ol lagel da'isinaima. Nala anona lowaf launai afitinai. Na'ama awau gegelalasowa kwapete'awa umbamahawa.
41016006	Ea' anan na'ipawa na'ama na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Ae' egawepa ipe' pafi'i pegolopa Jisas Nasaretinai, esis saundana naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Anan notanima nohafel ea', ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Ipe' piti na'ae sofa'ana sawisi salana nalama. Dei' wafigin nape.
41016007	Ea' ipe' fo'o pi'ipa alupumi ananimi ea' pi'ipa Pita nalomam na'ama pi'i, ‘Jisas nali'ipa nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ipe' pefo'o petolona si'i nimbewa' na'ipipa.’ ”
41016008	Ea' wakwaha hi'agif wawisi ande' wasagih wafe'. Awau umbamahawa wanda'am bombol etin. Ea' awau ina wa'ipasa basefa enis epes, owa'.
41016009	[Jisas notanima nohafel Sande kuhimbita atona, ea' nali' natagama Maria Makdalai'wi, fowa' natofama'wa ambagof awami 7-peleim mapai'wi.
41016010	Akwa'w kwafe' anagon alupumi Jisasi mapoma. Ukup amamumi nimanim endilisi, mape malef.
41016011	Ea' kwa'ipam kwa'i, “Ae' ati Jisas notanima nohafel wapoti' nape namunai.” Amam mame' basef amama ako'umi, ea' ina meme' basef akwa'umi ma'i endilisimi, owa'.
41016012	Amama mataga ea', anom alupumi Jisasi biam makwaha wambel lu'unai maila eaf nafe' aolopi mafe'. Ea' Jisas nandati na'ana nafe' natagamam.
41016013	Amam biam matolona motanima mafe' mawalapa basef amama ma anom alupumi Ananimi mapani, ea' amam ina mombale'efam, owa'.
41016014	Amama mafe'ma ea', alupumi 11-peleim Jisasi mape ma' gwa'aimi etin, Jisas nafe' natagamam. Nimbewa' enis satolona notanima nohafel wapoti' ea' sa'ipa amam ma Anan nahafel ea'. Owa'. Amam ina membale'efas ma'i sa'i endilisi, owa'. Ma'i opalef amamumi maso'. Na'ama Jisas na'ipama basef la'ifimi.
41016015	Ea' na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pefe' wambel hiagoma pi'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi ma amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas.
41016016	Emi egafis sembale'efa ae' sofa' baptais, anona nemaf God notanima nefa'asi wapoti' ea' Ananisi. Ea' isima owa' sembale'ifi, anona nemaf God nonda'mas kota basef lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
41016017	God nambimb nonda' esis isima sembale'efi sotaga la'ifisa sonda' ikwaf hianai naninani si'i anan nanda'anai. Ea' sohali' Ae' ma enda'as sotaga la'ifisa sili'amona ambagof awami mapeisi, ea' si'i anona diga hianai dambainai.
41016018	Ea' sohapila iguf mahasi lagof asasimi ea' ina mohas soga', owa'. Ea' sea' embel numbutimi wapoti', esis ina soga', owa'. Ea' enis owa' seambale'efi, sea' embel amama, esis soga'. Ea' nambimb esis isima sembale'ifi sosa lagofa enis epes awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.”
41016019	Dembinai Jisas nawalipas na'ipas ea', God nofa'ana nalata heven. Ea' nofa' agel lu'unai nape lagel da'isinai Godi.
41016020	Ea' alupumi Ananimi mafe' gani wambel hiagoma mawalapa basef Godi. Anan nanda'am mataga la'ifim manda' ikwaf hianai naninani si'i God nanda'anai. Enis epes sati maol anama amam manda'anai sa'i, “Endilisi, God nagiambama amam ea' ape' magawa basef Ananimi endilisimi.”]
42001001	O dembinai Tiofilus, fowa' amam hiami manda' basef hiami mail buk ma amamaga hiami God nanda'am mataga la'afena afa'i.
42001002	Fowa' dambadamba Jisas nafela opeh nanda'am ea' amam dambadamba mali' mati amamaga amama naep amamumi dei' mawalipafa basef amama ea' afa' wanda'am mail buk.
42001003	Ae' dambadamba ali' ahali' enisa basef amama afi'i afi'i dei' egawam andeande' si'i fowa' mataga, anom amam mihi'ambamam dei' ae' egawa basef amama ofagema. Amama atom dei' ae' elagen andeande'ma enda' anom basef mefe'mago ine', dembinai Tiofilus.
42001004	Anda'ama ine' neagawa andeande' basef amama ofagema esis sawalipanami endilisimi atom.
42001005	Nemaf anama anona king Herot dembinai gavamani numafi etap hiagoma Judia, anona aman pris nape, agilinama Sekaraia. Anan wambota Abiya, anan aman dembinai fowa'inai. Sekaraia waulu'mana Elisabet. Akwa'w kwataga wambota Aroni.
42001006	Esis bias Sakaraia Elisabet sape bo'wes ma naep Godi saila mi'uli ananinai hianai hi'alana. Ea' saila basef Godi andeande' basef ofagema a'as.
42001007	Ea' Elisabet asa'w ea' esis bias awasi a'as, ahages ea'.
42001008	Nogota anama amam hiami wambota Sakaraiai nemaf amamunai nataga ma meanda' maol Godi, ea' Sekaraia nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nanda' maol nondolalima God.
42001009	Amam maila waf amamunai mandandepana ma niowis ipat anama nomon nofa' amamaga amama nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami.
42001010	Nogota anama anan nawis naofa amamaga, esis amam nematawa hiesi sanda' lotuwi sandatama sape sanda' beten ande'.
42001011	Ea' Sekaraia nati anona ensel dembinai Godi nataga naitu balata wa'ol lagel da'isinai. Balata anama amam pris mondolalima Goda amamaga amama alogw bu'wami ma'ami.
42001012	Ea' Sekaraia natolona gegelalasana ombamahana nomonas matamea ma ensel anama.
42001013	Ea' ensel anama na'ipana na'ama na'i, “Sekaraia, ina umba mohena, owa'. God name'enama beten ine'inai ea'. Waulu'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet nambimb kola enin awani aman ine'inai. Ea' ine' nefalana agel ananinai Jon.
42001014	Okom ine'inai nambimb nope andeande' nendanifela awani inima. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi wapoti' sondanifa so'uso'uni inima netaga.
42001015	Dei' main, enin anona nemaf netaga dambeni nefa' agel lu'unai ma naep Dembinai. Enin ina nea' embel wainim moloma embel la'ifimi, owa'. Enin ata' nape opaf mama'wanai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina si'ina nonda'ana la'ifina.
42001016	Anona nemaf enin netaga damben nomboma amam nematawa hiesi Israeli ma nefa'as sotanimani seafe'ma God Dembinai asasinai.
42001017	Enin nili' nefe'ma Dembinai nefa' pepel Godi ma neanda' maol ananinai si'i fowa' Elaija nofa'ana nanda'anai. Ea' nomboma opalef ahapasi mefe'ma awasi ma esis ukup mi'imi'ias. Ea' nomboma epes isima sosambala basef Godi ma sofa' nomonas bu'wami ma niegiambamas nonda'as sondandombam seapoma Dembinai neafi'i.”
42001018	Ea' Sekaraia nahali' ensel anama na'i, “Ae' atuwasi iti maina ikwafa eagawa basef amama meataga endilisi? Ae' hagewe ea' waulu'mi wapoti' ea' hage'w.”
42001019	Ea' ensel nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' Gebriel, aitu naep Godi. Anan atona nasapa'e afi'i a'ipina basef amama bu'wami.
42001020	Ine' name'am etin, ine' owa' nembale'a basef ae'ami. Na'ama etin dei' malogel ine'inai nese'ena, ina nambimb ni'i, owa'etin. Ea' nefe' nefe' neatagama amamaga amama ae' a'ipinami meatagamena. Basef amama ae'ami nambimb meataga na'ama etin anona nemaf God na'ianai.”
42001021	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sape sohafa Sekaraia ande' ukup matamea sa'i, “Main natagamana nape nogota laona ipat lu'unai Godi nomon?”
42001022	Anan nawisi ande', ina na'i anom basefa esis, owa'. Na'ama esis sogawana sa'i anan nati anom amamaga mandati na'ami ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Ea' anan nape nanda'masa lagel atona na'ipasa amamaga, ea' malogel ananinai nase'ana nape.
42001023	Maol Sakaraiai hi'alana, notanima nafe' wambel ananinai.
42001024	Anan nape anom nimeguf, waulu'mana anani'wi Elisabet a' opafu'w. Ea' kwandambaho' etin kwape ipat aomb wanemb biamb kwa'i na'ama kwa'i,
42001025	“Dei' Dembinai okom na'ina'i ae' ma nagiambame na'ama. Fowa' ae' asawe, ambal ae'anai aona ma esis amam nematawa ea' dei' owa'etin.”
42001026	Elisabet opafu'wa aomb wanemb biamb ea', dei' anona aon wapoti' wanemb wanemb. Dei' God nasapa' ensel anama Gebriel nafe' anona wambel Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili.
42001027	-
42001028	Wambel anama ano'w nemata'w awiawai'wi kwape, agel akwa'unai Maria. Ina dei' kwase' anona aman, ata' owa'. Dei' sandandepa'wa kweaso' anona aman agilinama Josep. Anan nataga wambota anama akunamana king Deviti. Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma akwa'w na'i, “Nemaf bu'wafi, nemata'w. Dembinai God okom na'ina'i ine' endilisi. Anan nofalo'mena nape nalomena la'ela'ef numafina.”
42001029	Maria kwame' basef amama okom akwa'unai a' nimanina endilisi. Okom akwa'unai natanea na'i, “Basef amama ofagema mataga mi'imama?”
42001030	Ea' ensel anama na'ipa'w na'i, “Maria, ina ombamohena, owa'. Okom Godi bo'onama ine'.
42001031	-
42001032	Ine' neme'. Nambimb ine' opafina nela enin awani aman. Ea' nenda'mana agel Jisas. Anona nemaf anan nope aman dembinai, sefela agel ananinai lu'una. Ea' sofala Anan nogalomana God nape ilifi. Anona nemaf dembinai God nenda' awani inima nofa' agel lu'unai nepe dembinai king si'i fowa' gani Devit nape king. Devit anan wambota anama dei' awani inima neataganai.
42001033	Anona nemaf enin nepe dembinai king numafi epes hiesi Jekopi la'ela'ef. Enin etin nepe dembeni la'ela'ef ma amamaga hiami moloma epes ananisi.”
42001034	Ea' Maria kwa'ipa ensel anama kwa'i, “Amama meataga mi'imama? Ae' ina dei' aso' anona aman, ata' owa'etin.”
42001035	Ea' ensel anama nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ambal Bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ine', pepel God nape ilifi nose'alina. Ea' dei' awani inima nambimb nelani enin bo'wen. Ea' esis nambimb sefela agel ananinai lu'una sofalana si'i Anan Nogalomana Godi.
42001036	Neme', amani'mina ine'ikwi Elisabet akwa'w hage'w ea', dei' ea' opafu'w. Fowa' esis sa'i, ‘Akwa'w asa'w, ea' dei' akwa'w opafu'w aomb wanemb wanemb akwa'umi mafe' ea'.
42001037	Owa' anom amamaga ahifima God nonda'am, owa'etin.”
42001038	Ea' Maria kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' ape anda' maol Dembinai. Ae' a'i Anan nonda'meam motaga si'i ine' na'i.” Ensel anama na'ipakw na'ama ma ea', nakwaho'w nafe'.
42001039	Nemaf anama Maria kohafel mehip kondondomba amamaga kondowasa' anona wambel nape halafutagw anona etap hiagoma Judia,
42001040	kwafe' kwawis ipat Sakaraiai kwanda'makwa nemaf bu'wafi Elisabet.
42001041	Elisabet kwame' Maria ata' kwanda'makwa gude etin, awani Elisabeti fete' etin nape opaf akwa'unai nomon. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi si'inama akwa'w,
42001042	koga kwa'i mehip kwa'i, “God nofalo'mena nanda'ena nandanifel endilisi. Danifel ine'inai nikila' danifel anowa nematawa ofa'anai. Ea' awani inima nambimb nelan, enin wapoti' God nofalo'mana nonda'ana nondanifel.
42001043	Ae' gegelalasowe ma God okom bo'oma ae' nanda'e endanifel ma nanda' ine' mama'wana Dembinai ae'anai nafi'mai ae'.
42001044	Neme', aligah ae'ami ata' mame' nemaf bu'wafi ine'inai atona, batawin nape opaf ae'anai nendanifel fete' etin nape.
42001045	Ine' nandanifel endilisi, nembale'efa basef Dembinai na'ipinami nambimb meataga na'ama etin si'i anan nali' na'ipina.”
42001046	Ea' Maria kwanda' anona awaf kwa'i, “Ae' a'i basefa Anan Dembinai afela agel ananinai lu'una. Okom ae'anai napoma basef amama,
42001047	God nofa'e etanimani. Dei' andanifel ma anan.
42001048	Dei' main? Ae' nemata'w anda' maol Ananinai, ae' falafuwei, ea' anan okom napoma ae' nagiambame. Ipe' peme'. Dei' epe anona nemaf owagama wapoti' epes hiesi sigi' seatagai la'ela'ef sehafel seapani sofale si'i, ‘Dembinai God nagiambame nase'e danifel.’
42001049	Dei' main, God la'ifinai endilisi nanda'me amamaga pepel ma ae' eafela agel ananinai lu'una nape andeande' la'ela'ef.
42001050	Okom dahowinai ananinai nape la'ela'ef ma emi egafis umbamahasa sa'i sila Anan. Ea' nape la'ela'ef naloma epes isima sope na'ama etin dei' awasi bafasas ehasas anona nemaf seatagai.
42001051	Lagel ananinai nanda' amamaga la'ifimi. Ea' ukup asasimi ma'i esis etis sofa' agof lu'wami ea' nali'amonas safe' gani gani hiagoma.
42001052	Anan natalogofa amam king dambami ea' nafela agofa isima sape owina enis epes.
42001053	Anan nase'asa amamaga bu'wami ma isima nolomahasa waf bu'unai, ea' epes isima amamaga hiamisi, natofam mafe' etin.
42001054	-
42001055	Anan okom napoma basef na'aim ananimi endilisimi la'ela'ef mope owagama gani. Amama fowa' gani na'iam naloma bafapapa akupapa. Basef amama fowa' gani na'ipa Abraham naloma wambota ananinai owagama sigi' setagai. Ama anona nemaf neati esis uwahipisa niegiambamas la'ela'ef. Anan nagiambama ape' Israel manda' maol Ananinai.”
42001056	Maria kwape kwaloma Elisabet aomb wanemb, ea' kotanima kwafe' wambel akwa'unai.
42001057	Nemaf anama nataga ea' Elisabet kola so'uso'win aman.
42001058	Esis wambel atona saloma esis wambota akwa'unai seme' basef ma Dembinai nati owahipi'w endilisi ma kola awani inima. Ea' esis sandanifel saloma'w.
42001059	Nimeguf 7-peleim mafe' mali'mana ea', nemaf nafe'ma 8i, esis safi'i sa'i seatopa'mana alop ananinai, ea' sa'i sofalana agel Sekaraia si'i ahalomana.
42001060	Ea' mama'wana kwa'i, “Owa'. Ape' monda'mana anona agel Jon.”
42001061	Ea' esis sa'ipakw sa'i, “Owa', esis wambota ine'inai tagasi ina enis sanda' agel anama Jon, owa'etin.”
42001062	Ea' sanda' lagof atom sahali' ahalomana sa'i anan ni'i nonda'mana maina agel.
42001063	Ea' Anan nanda' logel atona na'ipas sofa'ai anota selet ma nonda' agel nogalomanai. Ea' nanda'ana na'i, “Agel ananinai Jon.” Ea' esis gegelalasis kwapete'.
42001064	Anan ata' nanda' agel etin, noga na'i malogel ananinai, afega ananinai neawi andeande', nandanifel nafela agel Godi lu'una.
42001065	Ea' esis hiesi wambel anama umbamahas. Ea' dei' amamaga amama gatom mafe' wambel hi'agoma nape halafutagw etap hi'agoma Judia.
42001066	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa amamaga amama, ukup asasimi matamea mafe' sa'i, “Anona nemaf awani inima nepe ni'imama?” Dei' main, esis sogawa pepel la'ifinai Dembinai nape nalomana.
42001067	Awani inima Jon ahalomana Sekaraia, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina anan ea' nawalapa basef Godi si'i amam profet fowa' gani mawalipasam na'i,
42001068	“Ae' a'i ape' mofela agel Godi Dembinai lu'una, God ape' Israeli. Anan nafi'i nagiambama ape' amam nematawa ananipai. Ea' natagahepa makwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
42001069	Ea' nandandepa anona aman la'ifinai nambimb nofa'apa nokwahamapa waf aonai meatanimani. Fowa' gani Devit nanda' opeh Godi, ea' dei' aman anama nofa'apa motanimani, anan akunamana Deviti.
42001070	Basef amama si'i fowa' gani nawalapama amam profet bu'wami ananimi ma'iam malogof amamumi.
42001071	Ma'i anona nemaf anan nofa'apa meatanimani mokwaha lagof esis naumbih ape'isi soloma epes isima ukup aom endilisi ma ape'i.
42001072	Fowa' gani anan na'i anona nemaf nieti akusapa ape'isi fowa'isi uwahipis nigiambamas. Ea' anan okom nopoma basef bu'wami fowa' gani na'iam endilisi mope owagama gani.
42001073	Anan na'i basef amama endilisimi atom na'iam la'ifimi gani ilif naloma akunamapa ape'inai Abraham.
42001074	Ma anan na'i notagahepa ma lagof esis naumbih ape'isi ma meanda'mana opeh ananimi, ina umbamohapa, owa'.
42001075	Anan na'i basef amama ma ape' mope etap anae' monda' opeh ananimi nimeguf hiami danda mefe' mefe' meatagama meaga'. Ma naep ananimi monda' opeh amama ma waf ananinai bu'unai andeande'.
42001076	Ea' ine', awani ae'inai, basef ine'imi amama. Anona nemaf sofalena profet nanda' opeha God pepel hianainai. Dei' main, nambimb ine' nefe' nili'ma Dembinai nenda'mana eaf ananinai.
42001077	Ama neawalipa amam nematawa ananisi seagawa anan nefa'as seatanimani. Ama neakwaha waf aonai asasinai.
42001078	God ape'inai nati esis uwahipis endilisi dei' nakwahamasa waf aonai asasinai. Anan nambimb nosapa'i howalagon mape heveni mifi'mai ape' molomapa mope la'ela'ef.
42001079	Ama howalama epes sape akoti, ea' isima ga' na'i neatagamasi. Ama nenindina ape' ma meape eaf opalef awanami.”
42001080	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', awani inima nataga damben la'ifina ea' okom ananinai negawa. Anan nape etap wafiguma epes a'agoma nape nape ma nemaf anama nataga nandawalap alihinama naep esis Israeli.
42002001	Anona nemaf anona aman gavman dembinai esis Romi Sisar Ogastus nape, nanda' anona mi'uli gavmani na'ama. Anan na'i nofa' agofa esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma esis Rom sumafiagoma mil buk gavmani.
42002002	Nemaf anama dambadamba anan nali' nofa' agof. Nemaf anama anona aman Kwirinius nape gavman dembinai ma etap hiagoma Siria.
42002003	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safe' wambel ofagama asasima ma sonda' agof asasimi.
42002004	Josep anan aman wambota Deviti. Ea' nakwaha Nasaret nape etap hiagoma Galili, nondowasa' nafe' wambel Deviti Betlehem. Wambel anama nape etap hiagoma Judia.
42002005	Ea' Josep nafe' naloma ano'w nemata'w Maria, esis sandandepana'w sa'i nese'akw ma esis bias sonda' agof asasimi. Ea' akwa'w opafu'w.
42002006	Esis bias ata' sapani etin wambel Betlehem, nemaf akwa'w kolanefi a' nataga.
42002007	Ea' kwali' kola awani aman ako'uni nali'i. Ipat sa'ohanai asi'ina. Ea' dei' kowa'ana lowaf kwalana nomon bokis gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malama.
42002008	Felefele'ma wambel anama anom amam mumafi sipsipi mape wa'ol mumafi sipsip mape owamb.
