42002009	Ea' anona ensel nafi'i nalumai howalogon Dembinai, howalama amam ea' umbamaham endilisi.
42002010	Ea' ensel anama na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Peme', ae' ifa'mipei basef bu'wami ipe', amama monda' amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas sondanifal endilisi.
42002011	Dei' nemaf anae' ano'w nemata'w kwape Betlehem wambel Deviti kola enin awani aman. Anan aman anama nokwahomepa waf aonai nofa'epa peatanimani. Anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, anan Dembinai.
42002012	Ipe' pefe' piti awani inima pegawan na'ama. Piti sanda' lowaf so'unai sowa'ana salana na'oh bokis isima sala gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malami.”
42002013	Ensel anama na'ias na'ama ma ea', mehip anom ensel hiami si'i ami misila'i gani heven mataga maloma ensel anama ea' mandagala mafela agel Godi ma'i,
42002014	“Ape' mafela agel God nape gani ilif endilisi lu'una. Pepel howalogon ananinai atona. Ea' epes emi sape etapi God okom bo'ona ma esis, opalef asasimi mope awanem.”
42002015	Ea' amam ensel makwaha amam mumafi sipsipi motanima malata heven. Ea' amam mumafi sipsipi manda'ipama etin ma'i, “Wale, ata' ofe' Betlehem uti amamaga anama Dembinai nihi'ambafami.”
42002016	Ea' mohafel mehip mafe' mati Maria kwaloma Josep sape. Awani salana na'oh bokis nomon sala gwa'aimi bulmakauwi malami.
42002017	Amam matolona ea' mawalapa basef ensel na'ipamami ma awani inima.
42002018	Ea' amam nematawa same' basef amama amam ma'iami, esis hiesi same' basef amama gegelalasis ea' nomonas matamea.
42002019	Ea' Maria kwame' basef amama hiami okokomam mape okom akwa'unai.
42002020	Ea' amam amama motanima mafe' mafela agel Godi lu'una ma'i anan dembinai bu'unai. Amam mandanifela amamaga amama hiami mame'am matulumi mataga si'i ensel na'ipamami.
42002021	Nemaf nafe'ma 8i nataga, nemaf anama amam ma'i motopa'mana alop awani. Ea' matopa'mana alop awani inima amani. Ea' sofalana agel Jisas si'i ensel nali' na'ipakwanai nogota anama owa' ata' kofa' opaf.
42002022	Nemaf anama nataga ea' ma esis sonda' awani inima noloma mama'wana sondolali sonda' ofa setaga bo'wes si'i basef mail mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai na'iam. Ea' esis mamasana sao'wana safe' sondowasa' Jerusalema sose'ana awani inima Dembinai Goda naep ananimi.
42002023	Esis sanda'am na'ama si'i basef mape buk Baibeli ma'iama mi'uli Dembinai ma'i, “Awasi amam wali' dambadamba olami, amama ipe' pefalam pi'i amam dembinai Godi atom.”
42002024	Ea' bias sa'i sondolalima God sila basef mail mi'uli anama Dembinai fowa' gani na'ipa Moses na'i, “Esis bias sofa' amiguf mai'unamb biam, o sofa' ambegof sa'umi biam.” Ea' sefa'am sanda'am na'ama.
42002025	-
42002026	Ea' anona aman nape Jerusalemi agilinama Simeon. Anan naila waf bu'unai Godi andeande'. Anan nape nahafa nogota anama God nifi'i nigiambama esis Israel nokwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ea' ambal bu'unai Godi nape okom ananinai nihi'ambana anan ina nambimb noga' ulal, owa'. Anan ata' nepe niti Krais, Dembinai nandandepana nosapa'ana nafi'i.
42002027	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelana nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi. Ea' esis mamasana Jisasi sao'wana safi'i sandolalimana si'i mi'uli Godi na'iam.
42002028	Ea' sanda'am etin, Simeon nandalombasana lagof ananimi nanifela God nafela agel ananinai lu'una na'iam na'ama na'i,
42002029	“Dembinai, nahapila pepel hianai ae' anda' opeha ine'. Dei' ine' nenda' opaf ae'anai nupe awanena ea' ega' efo'o si'i basef endilisi atomi fowa' gani na'iami.
42002030	Naep ae'ami atilin ea' awani aman inima ine' nasapa'ana nafi'i nofa'apa meatanimani. Na'ama dei' ine' nekwaha ae' ega' efo'o.
42002031	Ine' nanda' awani inima natagama amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea'.
42002032	So'uso'win inima si'i anona howalagon howalama epes isima sololama Godi nihi'ambas. Ama nonda' amam nematawa ine'isi Israel sofa' agof lu'wami.”
42002033	Ea' mamasana Jisasi gegelalasis ukup asasimi matamea ma basef amama Simeon na'iami.
42002034	Ea' Simeon na'ipasa basef bu'wami nanda'as la'ifis ea' na'ipa mama'wana Jisasi na'ama na'i, “Ine' neme'. Awani inima God nandandepan ea' ma nahambombaga enis amam nematawa Israel sowa' alafugaha enini. Ea' enis epes nofa'as sokwaha waf aonai siefi'mai enin. Enin si'i anona ikwaf God nanda'anai ma enis epes hiesi sosambala basef ananimi sondaiwa'mana.
42002035	Awani inima napoma newalapa nomonas hiami mape mandambahi'i motaga alihim. Maria, ine' nambimb okom nimanina si'i anona bainat hi'alinai notopa' okom ine'inai.”
42002036	Ea' ano'w nemata'w profet agili'wa Ana kwape kwalomas. Ahaloma'w ako'unai Fanuel. Wambota lu'unai akunama'wi Asa. Akwa'w ahage'w endilisi. Fowa' kwase' aman kwalomana sape afagof 7-peleim.
42002037	Ea' waulunama'w naga'. Ea' kwape etin, kwafe' kwafe' dei' afagof akwa'umi mataga 84-peleim. Akwa'w ina kwakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi anom nimeguf, owa'etin. Akwa'w kololama gwa'aimi kwape kwanda' beten ea' kwanda' lotu kwahapila opeh Godi kwanda'am kwafe' owamb alip.
42002038	Nemaf anama dei' atef akwa'w kwafi'i anama Simeon naloma Josep Maria saituma kwanifela God. Enis wapoti' saitu na'ama sape sehafa nemaf anama nambimb God nigiambama esis sape Jerusalemi nofa'as setanimani seape wafifis. Ea' akwa'w wapoti' kwa'ipasa basefa so'uso'win inima.
42002039	Esis Josep naloma Maria sanda'am sailam ea' opeh ahalomana si'i Dembinai fowa' gani na'iama mi'uli ananinai ea' satanima safe' Nasaret asasima ofagama etap hiagoma Galili.
42002040	Ea' so'usowin Jisas nataga dambena la'ifina ma gawa hianai. Ea' God okom nainailana nagiambamana etin nanda'ana la'ifina.
42002041	Afagof danda mamasana Jisasi sondowasa' safe' Jerusalema sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sofalam sa'i Pasova.
42002042	Afagof Jisasi dei' mataga 12-peleim mahape'ana ea' sao'wana sondowasa' Jerusalem saila waf asasinai si'i afagof danda sanda'anai.
42002043	Ama nimeguf amama Pasovaimi hi'alam, esis mamasana satanima safe'. Ea' sa'usa'win ina nafe' nalomas, owa'. Sakwahona napani Jerusalem. Esis ina sagawa anan napani, owa'.
42002044	Sa'i nali' nafe' naloma enis epes safe'. Esis safe' anona nemaf si'ina hi'alana, ea' sagolopana la'afena esis wambota atona saloma esis alupisi.
42002045	Esis mamasana sagolopana sati owa'etin, ea' satanima safe' Jerusalem sagolopana.
42002046	Esis bias sagolopana safe' nimeguf wanom. Ea' satolona nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi. Anan nape naloma amam Juda gawaimi mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Nape nagahembe'ma basef amomumi ea' nahali' amam.
42002047	Amam dambami maloma esis hiesi same' basef ananimi, gegelalasoma basef maloma gawa ananinai nagwamama basef amam.
42002048	Ea' mamasana satolona nape la'afena amam dembemi nalomam mape ea' gegelalasam kwapete'. Ea' mama'wana kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Nogalome, dei' maina ine' nanda' na'ama ma afa'? Ahalomena naloma ae' opalef afa'imi nimanim endilisi ma wagolopena.”
42002049	Ea' anan nagwamas na'ipas na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' bipa pagolope pafe' hi'alagon? Ae' dei' ape anda' opeh ipat Ahalome Godi, amama ipe' pegawam o owa'?”
42002050	Ea' esis ina sogawa basef anan na'ipasami ofagema, owa'.
42002051	Ea' Jisas nafe' naloma esis bias safe' Nasaret, name' esis naila abasef asasimi nimeguf hiami. Ea' mama'wana anani'wi okom napoma basef hiami ma amamaga amama matagama sa'usa'win akwa'uni nape okom akwa'unai.
42002052	Jisas ea' nataga dambena. Ea' gawa ananinai nataga lu'una andeande' bo'ona, ea' God naloma epes wapoti' satolona ambo'ona endilisi.
42003001	Anona afagel anona gavman dembinai esis Romi Taiberius Sisar nape dembinai ma etap hiagoma esis Romi afagof 14-peleim hi'alama anona afagel wapoti', nafe'ma 15-peleim, Pontius Pailat ata' nape dembinai gavmana etap hiagoma Ituria naloma Trakonitis wambel hiagoma Herot ata' nape dembinai numafi wambel hianai etap hiagoma Galili. Ea' Lisanias nape dembinai gavman numafi wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma Abilene.
42003002	Ea' afagel anama atona Anas naloma Kaiafas amam biam pris dambami mape mali'ma pris hiami. Nogota anama ma afagel anama basef Godi mafi'mai Jon, Sekaraia nogalomana nape anona etap wafiguma fatauguma.
42003003	Ea' nafe' anama hiagoma walemb Jordan na'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa. Na'ipasa somboma opalef sowa' alafugaha waf aonai sofa' baptais ma God nokwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
42003004	Anon nawalapa basef amama Godi si'i profet Aisaia fowa' gani nawalapam nanda'am mail buk Baibeli ma'i, “Anona etap wafiguma fatauguma, malogel anona amani anona nemaf noga ni'i, ‘Pendondomba eaf Dembinai, penda' ana nefe' usi'ina.
42003005	Pewam gambiwah asiasinuguma ma si'igin dondo' etin, petopa' halalef laumi bandami hiami ma mowala dondo'am. Dilindila'ma penda'agon usi'igin. Ea' ufiawa amama manda' lotasila'ma sonda'am andeande'.
42003006	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas anona nemaf siti God nagiambama enis amam nematawa nofa'as sotanimani.’ ”
42003007	Hiesi amam nematawa safi'mai Jon ama sa'i nupisi'as embel. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' panda' waf aonai, si'i awasi iguf awami molaipei. Emi na'ipipa ma pa'i pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi anona nemaf na'i neatagama ipe'i?
42003008	Ea' dei' a'ipipa. Penda' waf bu'unai ma pihi'ambas ipe' pamboma opalef endilisi paila waf bu'unai. Ipe' ina ukup mondanda' mi'i, ‘Abraham anan ahalomapa ape'inai’, owa', hapaimi. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God anan la'ifinai ma nonda' otamba amama motaga epes si'i awasi Abrahami.
42003009	Tamia'w nandandombol na'oh neatopa' lawah ofagem nombalefima. Maim lawah owa' mil mola su'utip bu'wami, amama anona nemaf solam sokwahom mefe'ma nif.”
42003010	Anan na'iam ea', esis hiesi sahali'ana sa'i, “Ape' nambimb monda' main?”
42003011	Ea' Jon na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Emi epen siaogw biam atumi nese'anana anona enin siot a'ani, ea' emi gwa'aimi ma'omani inima nenda'am newalogam wapoti'.”
42003012	Ea' anom amam mofa' takisi mafi'mai Jon ma'i nupisi'am embel ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, nambimb afa' onda' main?”
42003013	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pefa' otamba mondahama si'i gavman na'ipipam. Ipe' ina pefa' anom wapoti', owa'.”
42003014	Ea' anom soldia mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Afa' nambimb onda' main?” Anan nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pembaso'ma epes piumbelis penda'as umbamohas penda'mas basef pelela'epasa moni asasinai, owa'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi mope awanema otamba ipe'imi dondo'ma ikwaf amam dambami mandandepami.”
42003015	Ea' dei' nomonas esis amam nematawai hiesi mohafel la'ifim, ea' ukup mandanda'ma Jon sa'i, “Jon anan Krais, ma'una God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i?”
42003016	Ea' Jon nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'i, “Ae' apisi'ipa embel atom. Ea' anona aman nambimb niefi'i, anan la'ifinai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'etin. Nambimb anan nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope opalef ipe'imi nomon ea' nese'epa nif wapoti'.
42003017	Anan nahapila anona savol lagof ananimi ma niesimba wit si'i rais amama nisimba'am andeande'. Nefa' wit bu'unai nuwis nembe'am ipat ananinai. Ea' tukwakwanimi awami nembefam nofam nif amama lu'wami fandom la'ela'ef mapani.”
42003018	Ea' Jon nawalapa anom basef hiami wapoti' ma neafela ukup asasimi ma sonda' waf bu'unai. Ea' nawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi.
42003019	Ea' Jon na'ipana basef la'ifimi aman anama Herot, gavman dembinai asasinai, ma waf aonai hianai anan nanda'anai. Anan nandalombana Herodias nemata'w sahalomana nase'akwi, ea' nanda' waf aonai hianai wapoti'.
42003020	Dei' nowatani anona waf aonai wapoti' ma nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus.
42003021	Jon napisi'a amam nematawa hiesi ma ea', napisi' Jisas wapoti'. Jisas nofa' baptais ea', anan ata' nanda' beten etin ea', heven uta nandausi'.
42003022	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nisila'i si'i amil mai'una nufia' nisilamanai. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai heven ilif na'i anom basef na'i, “Ine' Nogalome ae'inai. Ae' okom nohafel nainailina endilisi. Okom ae'inai bo'ona ma ine'.”
42003023	Nemaf anama Jisas nasefela opeh nanda'am, afagof ananimi mataga felefele'ma 30-peleim. Esis amam nematawa ukup mandanda' etin ma'i anan nogalomana Josepi.
42003024	Bafapana Jisasi agufuma amama. Josep, anan Heli nogalomana. Ea' Heli, Matat nogalomana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogalomana. Livai, Melki nogalomana. Melki, Janai nogalomana. Ea' Janai, Josep nogalomana.
42003025	Josep, Matatias nogalomana. Matatias, Emon nogalomana. Emon, Nahum nogalomana. Ea' Nahum, Esli nogalomana. Ea' Esli, Nagai nogalomana.
42003026	Nagai, Mat nogalomana. Mat, Matatias nogalomana. Ea' Matatias, Semen nogalomana. Ea' Semen, Josek nogalomana. Josek, Joda nogalomana.
42003027	Joda, Joanan nogalomana. Joanan, Resa nogalomana. Resa, Serubabel nogalomana. Serubabel, Sealtiel nogalomana. Sealtiel, Neri nogalomana.
42003028	Neri, Melki nogalomana. Melki, Adi nogalomana. Adi, Kosam nogalomana. Kosam, Elmadam nogalomana. Elmadam, Er nogalomana.
42003029	Er, Josua nogalomana. Ea' Josua, Elieser nogalomana. Ea' Elieser, Jehoram nogalomana. Jehoram, Matat nogalomana. Ea' Matat, Livai nogalomana.
42003030	Livai, Simeon nogalomana. Ea' Simeon, Juda nogalomana. Juda, Josep nogalomana. Ea' Josep, Jonam nogalomana. Jonam, Eliakim nogalomana.
42003031	Eliakim, Melea nogalomana. Melea, Mena nogalomana. Mena, Matata nogalomana. Matata, Natan nogalomana. Natan, Devit nogalomana.
42003032	Devit, Jesi nogalomana. Jesi, Obet nogalomana. Obet, Boas nogalomana. Boas, Salmon nogalomana. Salmon, Nason nogalomana.
42003033	Nason, Aminadap nogalomana. Aminadap, anan Atmin nogalomana. Atmin, Arni nogalomana. Arni anan Hesron nogalomana. Hesron, Peres nogalomana. Peres, Juda nogalomana.
42003034	Ea' Juda anan Jekop nogalomana. Jekop anan Aisak nogalomana. Aisak, Abraham nogalomana. Abraham, Tera nogalomana. Tera, Nahor nogalomana.
42003035	Nahor, Seruk nogalomana. Seruk, Reu nogalomana. Reu, Pelek nogalomana. Pelek, Eber nogalomana. Eber anan Sela nogalomana.
42003036	Sela anan Kenan nogalomana. Kenan, Arpaksat nogalomana. Arpaksat, Siem nogalomana. Siem, Noa nogalomana. Noa, Lamek nogalomana.
42003037	Lamek, Metusela nogalomana. Ea' Metusela, Enok nogalomana. Enok, Jaret nogalomana. Jaret, Mahalalel nogalomana. Mahalalel, Kenan nogalomana.
42003038	Kenan, Enos nogalomana. Enos, Set nogalomana. Set, Adam nogalomana. Adam, God nogalomana. Bafapana Jisasi ea' ma'um.
42004001	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'inama Jisas ea' nakwaha walemb anama Jordan nandegiai natanima nafe'. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa'ana nafe' anona etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma.
42004002	Jisas nape anama nimeguf hiami ea' Satan nafi'i nagwambana aon si'inai tu'waninai. Jisas ina na' gwa'aimi, owa'. Nolomahana.
42004003	Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' kipa owap anama na'oh etapi notaga si'i bret.”
42004004	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'i bret atona ina nose'asa ambagof namumi epes, owa'.”
42004005	Ea' Satan nao'wana mafe' anona halaf launai endilisi nihi'ambana amamaga hiami bu'wami mape etap hiagoma maloma amam nematawa. Nihi'ambana la'ifina mehip etin.
42004006	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Amamaga hiami pepel amama amam king hi'alam mumafiami maloma epes hiesi agel lu'unai, amamaga bu'wami hiahaom maim, amamaga amama hiami God nase'eami ae'ami. Ea' dei' i'i ese'anam enin epen, ae' ese'anam.
42004007	I'i ine' nindiwa nembawa netawa nenda' lotu ma ae', amamaga amama ine'imi atom.”
42004008	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ipe' penda' lotuma Dembinai God ipe'inai atona, ea' penda' opeh ananimi atom.’ ”
42004009	Ea' Satan nao'wana nondowasa' Jerusalem nahaponana naitu ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai ilif. Ea' Satan na'ipana na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' Nogalomana Godi, dei' netoma nukupa' newa etap.
42004010	-
42004011	Dei' main, anom basef Godi mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘God ni'ipa amam ensel Ananimi mifi'i muhapilina lagof amamumi mumafina ma otamba ina moha bo'wagah ine'imi, owa'.’ ”
42004012	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anom basef Godi wapoti' mape na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' ina pegwamba Dembinai God ipe'inai nonda' waf aonai, owa'.’ ”
42004013	Satan nagwambana ma ea', nakwaha Jisas nafe' nohafana ma anona nemaf nifi'i neagwambana wapoti'.
42004014	Pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape opaf Jisasi ea' natanima nafe' etap hiagoma Galili. Ea' same' basef gato mafe' anan mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel hiagoma Galili.
42004015	Anan nawalipasa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safela agel ananinai lu'una.
42004016	Ea' Jisas nafe' Nasaret taun anama ofagama, fowa' anan ata' so'uso'win napoma. Nape ea' nemaf anama Sabat esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai si'i la'ela'ef nanda'am. Anan naitu natalifa basef Godi, ea' sase'ana anona pepa lounai.
42004017	Pepa anama anom basef Godi fowa' gani profet Aisaia nanda'am mailanai. Anan naofa pepa anama nati anom basef natalifam ma'i na'ama ma'i,
42004018	“Ambal bu'unai Dembinai nape ae'. Ea' nandandepe ma eawalapa basef bu'wami ma epes isima kwahusi amamaga a'ami. Nasapa'e afi'i ma ewalapa basef na'ama i'i, ‘Ipe' panda' kalabusi pekwaha kalabus pefe' wafifipa. Ipe' epes naep masi'ipei, ipe' piti andeande' wapoti'. Anan nasapa'e afi'i iegiambama isima sofa' nimanimi seape andeande'.
42004019	Ea' i'ipasa basef hiesi ma nogota anama bu'unai ma Dembinai niti uwahipis nigiambamas seape andeande'.’ ”
42004020	Ea' Jisas nambomefa pepa anama nase'anana anona aman numafi ipati ea' anan nape. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sape nomoni sati anan atona.
42004021	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pame' ae' atalifa basef Godi fowa'imi etin ea', dei' mataga alihim endilisi mandawalapa ae'.”
42004022	Ea' esis hiesi safela agel ananinai lu'una sa'i anan aman bu'unai ea' gegelalasisa basef bu'wami mataga malogel ananinai. Ea' esis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Aman anama Josep nogalomana?”
42004023	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Endilisi etis ipe' nambimb penda' basef amama womun etina ae' pi'i, ‘Dokta, ine' nenda' alop ine'inai notaga bo'ona nili', ea' pi'i wapoti' pi'i waf anama nali' nanda'ana Kaperneam, anama ape' mame'ana ea'. Ine' dei' nenda'ana notaga na'ae wambel ofagama ine'ima.’ ”
42004024	Ea' anan na'iam na'ama wapoti' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Anona profet epes ina sase'ana opalef same' basef ananimi wambel ofagama ananima, owa'.
42004025	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Nogota anama fowa' gani Elaija napenai owaf atona naluwi, asaf ina ata' nalai afagof wanom aomb wanemb wanemb, owa'etin. Ea' nolomahas lu'unai nataga ganima hiagoma. Nogota anama nematawa hiawai Israeliwai amam maga' mialifawa wapen.
42004026	Ea' God ina nasapa' Elaija nafe'ma anowa awamai, owa'etin. Anan nasapa'ana nafe'ma ano'w nemata'w kwape Serafat, wambel nape anona etap lu'wagoma Saidon. Ea' akwama ato'w.
42004027	Ea' nogota anama anona awes aonai nataga nanda' alop esis amam nematawa Israeli alop pambo'. Ea' ina enin epen asasini nataga bo'wen, owa'etin. Anona aman Naman Siriainai ea' anan atona nataga bo'ona.”
42004028	Ea' esis hiesi sape ipat anama same' basef amama, nomonas wandafum kwapete'a Jisas.
42004029	Ea' sohafel sagalo'mana nawisi taun ande'. Taun anama asasinai natoma halafuta ilif. Ea' sofa'ana safe' halafuta anama sa'i sogwale'ana nowala tata.
42004030	Ea' anan nisila' esis hiesi nafe'.
42004031	Ea' Jisas niliana Kaperneam anona taun nape etap hiagoma Galili. Anan nape ea' nemaf anama Juda sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat, anan nawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawalipasa basef Godi.
42004032	Same'ana sa'i anan nofa' agel lu'unai dei' na'ipasa basef la'ifimi. Ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi.
42004033	Anona aman ambafuh manda'anai nape ipat anama, ambal aonai napaina. Anan na'i mehip endilisi na'iam na'i,
42004034	“E! Jisas ine' Nasaretinai, na'i nifi'i nenda' maina ape'? Ine' nafi'i ma nehambombagapa? Ae' egawa ine' nogalomana God bu'winai andeande'.”
42004035	Ea' Jisas ninifalona na'ama na'i, “Ine' aonai awinai sopama malogel kwaha aman anama.” Ea' ambalip anama nakwahona nowa etap la'afena esis hiesi nawisi nafe', ina ata' nahambombagana wapoti', owa'etin.
42004036	Esis hiesi gegelalasis sandakoto'ma sanda'ipama sa'i, “Amama maim basef? Anan natofa ambagof awami na'ipam si'i anona aman la'ifinai nofa' agel lu'unai. Ambagof awami mame' basefa anan, makwahona mafa' mafe'.”
42004037	Ea' basef amama nanda' amamaga amama la'ifimi mafe'agon hi'alagon wambel nape felefele'i.
42004038	Saimon nandagi'mokwi awesi'w alop ako'unai nifina kwapete'. Ea' Jisas nohafel nakwaha ipat anama sanda' kolasanai, nafe' nawis ipat Saimoni. Ea' sahali'ana ma niegiambama'w.
42004039	Ea' anan nafe' naitu felefele'ma akwa'w natofa awes anama nafe' nakwaha akwa'w. Ea' kohafel mehip kwanda'masa gwa'aimi esis.
42004040	Aon newala naso', esis amam nematawa sofa'ai enis awes naninani nanda'asi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas. Ea' nasa lagofas atona etin nanda'as bo'wes hi'alas.
42004041	Ea' ambagof awami hiami makwaha esis hiesi mawisi mafe' ea'. Ambagof amama awami mofalana mehip ma'i, “Ine' nogalomana Godi.” Amam mogawa anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ea' Jisas ninifalom na'i ina ata' mi'i anom basef, owa'. Mosopama malogof.
42004042	Kuhimbita atona Jisas nakwaha wambel anama nafe' anagon wafiguma fetauguma epes a'agoma. Esis safe' sogolopana satolona safe'ma anan. Esis sa'i anan ina nokwaha esis nofe', owa'. Sa'i sembalo'ana nope la'ela'ef nolomas.
42004043	Ea', na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i ewalapa basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. A'i ewalapa basef amama anagon taun hianai wapoti'. Dei' main, God nasapa'e afi'i enda' maol anama atona.”
42004044	Ea' nafe' nawalapa basef Godi ifagw esis Juda sai basef sapeimi nawalapam nafe' etap hiagoma Judia.
42005001	Anona nemaf Jisas naitu akata walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Genesaret naloma amam nematawa hiesi sala'ambemana sape same' basef Godi.
42005002	Ea' nati bogw sa'umi biam mala embel felefele'ma nimbap walemb batupa'manai. Ea' amam mowafa agufi mandani' mafe' masa'opa anemb amamumi.
42005003	Ea' Jisas nalata natoma bot Saimoni ea' na'ipana na'i, “Sapa' bot nokwaha bandagoma nefe' laogoma.” Ea' Jisas natoma bot nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa.
42005004	Anan na'ipas ea' na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ine' sapa' bot nofo'o walemb embel laogoma ea' pekwaha anemb mowala pewafai anom agof.”
42005005	Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Dembinai, do'ok owamb laona afa' wanda' maol lu'unai ea' ina wagi anom agof, owa'. Ea' na'ipa ae' na'ama, dei' ekwaha anemb mowala.”
42005006	Ea' mokwaha anemb mowala mowafai agof hiami. Ea' anemb ma'i pele'etama agof hiami endilisi.
42005007	Ea' amam mofalai alupumi amamumi mape anona boti mafi'i magiambama mowafai agof malam bogw biam si'ima agof ma'i mowala.
42005008	Saimon Pita nati na'ama, ea' nindiwa nembawa natawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' kwaha ae', fo'o. Ae' aman aowei, anda' waf aonai!”
42005009	Dei' main, anan naloma amam malumanai mati agof mowafami umbelimi endilisi. Ea' amam gegelalasom nomonas matamea.
42005010	Batausana Sebedi biam Jems naloma Jon maloma Pita mandau'umai wapoti' gegelalasoma agof amama. Ea' Jisas na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ina umbamehena, owa'. Dei' atef nesafela maolan nenda'ana la'ela'ef ni'pa enis epes sila Ae'.”
42005011	Ea' amam manda' bogw mafe' bandagoma, makwaha amamaga amamumi hi'alam ma'oh, ea' mailana mafe'.
42005012	Nogota anama Jisas nape anona taun, anona aman awesinai alop nambu'anai nape. Anan nati Jisas nafi'i, nande' nembawa natawa etap na'ipana mehip na'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' ni'i awi, nenda' ae' etaga bo'owe.”
42005013	Ea' Jisas nasa lagel alop aman anamai na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i a'e ma ine' netaga bo'wena.” Ea' dei' atef awes anama aonai nakwahona ea' nataga bo'ona.
42005014	Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen ni'i ae' anda'ena bo'wena, owa'. Ine' fo'o nihi'ambana alop ine'inai ma aman anama pris. Ea' nese'ana amamaga amama anan nondolalima God ea' ine' ninifelona ma nataga bo'wena si'i mi'uli ananinai fowa' gani Moses na'ipasanai na'i. Ama esis hiesi sogawa ine' ambo'wena.”
42005015	Owa'etin. Diga basefa amamaga amama Jisas nanda'manam aman anama gatom mafe' ganigani. Fowa' ina hiesi same' basef amama, owa'. Dei' hiesi endilisi. Amama atom dei' epes hiesi safi'i ma some' anona nonda eses awes nanda'as setaga bo'wes.
42005016	Ea' nimeguf hiami Jisas nafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma ma nape nanda' beten.
42005017	Anona nemaf Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ea' anom Farisi maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi tol mape. Anom mafi'i wambel hianai etap lu'unai biefina Judia naloma Galili. Ea' anom mafi'i Jerusalem. Ea' pepel Dembinai Godi nape Jisas, ama nanda' epes awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.
42005018	Ea' anom amam mofa' anona aman lagof bo'wagah maga' mailanai, na'oh lehis mofa'ana mafi'i. Ea' ma'i mofa'ana mefe' muwis ipat mombe'ana felefele'ma Jisas.
42005019	Ea' si'igina amam nematawa hiesi. Amam ina mati anona eafa mofa' aman anama muwis nomon, owa'. Ea' malata ipat ilif mihianama bogwan ilif mala aman anama awes nanda'anai naloma lehis nowala nomon la'afena amam nematawa mambe'ana na'oh naep Jisasi.
42005020	Nogota anama Jisas natolom nogawa amam mombale'efana la'ifinai ma niegiambama aman anama awes nanda'anai. Ea' na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Ine' epen ae'inai. Waf aonai ine' nanda'anai ae' akwahomenana ea'.”
42005021	Ea' amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi atom ukup atifim mandanda' ma'i, “Aman anama emi egafuna nanda' God findiwanai? Owa'etina anona aman la'ifinaima nekwaha waf aonai. God atona nakwaha waf aonai.”
42005022	Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi mape na'ama?
42005023	Dei' amamaga maim ipe' pa'i ahifima ae'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipa awes nanda'anai i'i, Ae' ekwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai o i'ipana i'i, fela lehis ine'imi nehafel nefe'. Basef amama ma nefela lehis ananimi, ipe' pa'i amama ahifima ae'.
42005024	Ea' ae' a'i ipe' pegawa ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, la'ifiwei ma ekwaha waf aonai hianai amam nematawa sape etapi sanda'anai. Ae' a'i ihi'ambepa ae' la'ifiwei ma enda' amamaga amama.” Ea' anan na'ipa aman anama awes nanda'anai na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ine' hafel fela lehis ine'imi fa'am nefe' ipat ine'inai.”
42005025	Jisas na'ipana etin na'ama, nohafel naitu nafela lehis ananimi naep amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' ata' nafe' etin eaf, nandanifel nafela agel Godi lu'una nafe' ipat ananinai.
42005026	Ea' amam nematawa isima hiesi gegelalasis kwapete'as umbamahas endilisi safela agel Godi lu'una sa'i, “Dei' ape' mati anona waf dambainai fowa' owa' meatolonai.”
42005027	Amama mataga ea', Jisas nohafel nafe' nati anona aman nofa' takisi tol nape ipat sofa' takisanai, agilinama Livai. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
42005028	Ea' nohafel nailana nafe'. Amamaga hiami ananimi nakwahom ma'oh.
42005029	Ea' Livai nanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ipat ananinai nanifela Jisas. Ea' amam hiami manda' waf aonai mofa' takisi maloma anom amam wapoti' mape ma' gwa'aimi maloma amam biam.
42005030	Ea' anom Farisi maloma anom amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, amam Farisi, mape manda' megah maham ma amam alupumi Jisasi ma'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pape pa' gwa'aimi paloma amam mofa' takisi maloma amam amama manda' waf aonai? Na'ama ina andeande', hapaimi.”
42005031	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Isima awes a'asi ina safe'ma dokta, owa'. Esis bu'wasi. Ea' isima awes nanda'asi etis safe'ma dokta.
42005032	Ae' ina afi'i ma efala epes sape andeande'i somboma opalef, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efala epes sanda' waf aonai etis somboma opalef sokwaha waf aonai sefe'ma God.”
42005033	Ea' enis epes sa'ipa Jisas na'ama sa'i, “Alupumi Joni maloma alupumi amam Farisi ukup mapoma basef Godi. Ea' anom nimeguf wikifah hiami amam mololama gwa'aimi monda' beten etin. Ea' alupumi ine'imi owa' monda' waf anama. Amam ma' gwa'aimi embel maim nimeguf hiami.”
42005034	Ea' nagwamas na'i basef womun etin na'i, “I'i enis sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma enis aman nemata'w bias sondase'ama, ipe' ina la'ifipama penda' esis alupisi sondaiwa'ma gwa'aimi nemaf anama anan naso' nemata'wi nape nalomas, owa'etin.
42005035	Ea' nemaf anama anan naso' nemata'wi nokwaha esis nafe' anagon laogoma, esis sakwaha gwa'aimi.”
42005036	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anom basef womun etina luwaguf na'i, “Ina andeande'ma petopa' lowaf namunai pesana neloma anona lowaf apinai, owa'. I'i enis sonda'am na'ama, lowaf ina noloma apinai na'ama etin, owa'. Namunai pele'etana etin.
42005037	Ea' ina enin epen nakolo'wa embel wainim dambaimi agwahup apinai mafinina, si'i botowagof, owa'. I'i enin nenda'am na'ama, wain netef hiana, nohape' agwahup anama pepe'etana ea' wain kolo'olana aona hi'ilana.
42005038	Ea' wain dambainai sakolo'wana agwahup dambainai atona.
42005039	Ea' emi noga' wain apinai enin ina atuwasi okom ni'i wain dambainai, owa'. Enin na'i, ‘Wain apinai bu'unai nikila' dambainai.’ ”
42006001	Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, Jisas nafe' anagon ea' nataga anona aof sawa witanai nawis. Ea' alupumi ananimi mafe' malomana, ea' magi anom wit maufi moka'isam lagof amamumi magwa'am.
42006002	Ea' anom Farisi mahali'am ma'i, “Ina penda'am na'ama ma nemaf anae' Sabat mapoma noma'wanai, owa'. Dei' maina panda'am na'ama?”
42006003	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa basef amama ma waf fowa' gani dembinai King Devit nanda'anai. Nemaf anama Devit naloma alupumi ananimi nolomaham
42006004	anan nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon na' bret anama amam pris mondolali maso' Godanai. Ea' na'ana naso' alupumi ananimi wapoti' ma'ana etin. Ea' mi'uli ape'inai na'i amam pris atom mea'ana.”
42006005	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ape Dembiwei ma nemaf anama Sabata i'ipipa maina maol andeande'ma pila basef penda'ana nemaf anama.”
42006006	Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Sabat nataga. Ea', Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nape na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa. Ea' anona aman nape nalomas, lagel da'isinai ananinai aona naga' nail.
42006007	Amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma anom Farisi ma'i mogolopa anona eafa meambaso'ma Jisasa anom basef baso'maimi ma monda'mana basef. Ea' manda'ana naep di'inde'ana. Ma'i muti anan nonda' aman anama bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat o owa'?
42006008	Ea' Jisas nogawa nomonas amamumi, na'ipa aman anama lagel aonainai na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu naep hiesi la'afena esis seatilina.” Ea' anan nohafel naitu.
42006009	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma mi'uli ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Nemaf ana'e ape' monda' waf bu'unai o monda' waf aonai? Na'i ape' migiambama epes ambal namunai napeis o mohas soga'?”
42006010	Ea' natologon tulif amam nematawa hiesi, na'ipa aman anama na'i, “Dowa lagel ine'inai usi'ina.” Ea' nando lagel nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
42006011	Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi opalef wandafum kwapete' endilisi ma anan. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' nambimb onda' maina Jisas?”
42006012	Anona nemaf Jisas nandowasa' nafe' halafutagw nanda' betena God. Ea' owamb anama laona anan nape nanda' beten nafe' ea' lala.
42006013	Aon natefi, anan nofala alupumi ananimi hiami mafi'i. Amam 12-peleim nandandepam Aposel.
42006014	Anona Saimon, ea' Jisas nanda'mana agel wa'ana Pita. Ea' Andru, owalomana Saimoni. Ea' Jems naloma Jon, Filip naloma Bartolomyu,
42006015	Matyu naloma Tomas ea' Jems nogalomana Alfiusi. Ea' Saimon anan epes hiesi Seloti.
42006016	Ea' Judas nogalomana Jemsi, naloma Judas Kariotinai, aman anama nawalapa Jisasa naumbih ananimi.
42006017	Ea' Jisas niniala naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' anagon bembe'agoma, do'ok esis alupisi hiesi ananisi safi'i sali' saituma. Ea' epes hiesi safi'i. Enis safi'i wambel hiagoma Judia ea' enis safi'i wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidon nape felefele'ma naoh, enis safi'i Jerusalem.
42006018	Esis safi'i ma some' basef ananimi ma natofa awes nanda'asi. Ea' esis amam nematawa ambagof awami mahambombagasi safi'i, Jisas nanda'as bo'wes wapoti'.
42006019	Pepel ananinai nafe' nanda' esis hiesi bo'wes. Ea' dei' esis hiesi sa'i sombale'efana.
42006020	Jisas nati amam alupumi ananimi na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' kwahupei otamba maim a'ipei, ipe' pawis ea' wambota Godi numafipa. Amama atom dei' ipe' pandanifel pape.
42006021	Ipe' epes nolomahipei, dei' pandanifel pape andeande'. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' pea' gwa'aimi elihipa endilisi. Ipe' epes opalef nimanima palef, dei' pandanifel pape andeande'. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' pandanifel pinda'iaf.
42006022	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Nambimb enis epes siti ipe' pila ae', esis opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Ea' sowa' alafugaha ipe' sese'epa agof awami endilisi si'i ipe' epes aopai sindaiwa'mepa sogalo'mepa.
42006023	Nemaf anama esis sonda'epa na'ama, ipe' pendanifel pialemb etin. Dei' main, amamaga hiami bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oh heven ilif. Fowa' gani akupas bafapas asasisi sanda' amam profet aom na'ama etin.
42006024	Ipe' otamba wiga maim hiamipei, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamipei. Dei' main, ipe' dei' pefa'am ea' amamaga monda'epa pandanifelamami.
42006025	Ipe' dei' pa' gwa'aimi elihipei, pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamipei. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' nolomehepa. Ipe' dei' panda'iafi, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga awami nimanimi meatagamepa. Dei' main, anona nemaf ipe' pelefa penda'aga endilisi.
42006026	Ipe' dei' epes hiesi hi'alas safela agof ipe'mi sa'i ipe' bu'wipei, ipe' pindumafuma ma amamaga nimanimi lu'wami meatagamipei. Dei' main, fowa' akusas bafasas asasisi sa'ipam na'ama etina amam profet mambaso'mami ma'ipasa basef Godi. Sanda'mamam na'ama etin, safela agof amamumi.
42006027	Ea' ipe' pame' basef ae'ami, ipe' ukup mimila naumbih ipe'isi, penda'masa waf bu'unai isima opalef aoma ipe'i.
42006028	Ipe' pihali' Goda nonda'mas waf bu'unai ma epes isima sanda'mepa waf aonai. Ea' penda' betena epes isima sanda'epa aopei.
42006029	I'i emi egelin nehepa aomb wa'ol, pendamboma nehepa wa'ol wapoti'. I'i emi egelin nefa'epa saket ipe'inai, ina pinda'imana, owa'. Pese'ana wapoti'.
42006030	I'i emi egefin nefalepama anom amamaga, ipe' pese'anam. Ea' i'i emi egefin nefa' amamaga ipe'imi, ipe' owa' pi'ipana mehipa negwamepam, owa'.
42006031	Maina waf ipe' pa'i esis sanda'mepana ipe'i, ipe' penda'masana na'ama etin.
42006032	I'i ipe' ukup mimila epes isima ukup maimaila ipe' etipa, nambimb pefa' maim amamaga bu'wami ma waf anama? Owa'etin. Epes sanda' waf aonai esis sanda'ana na'ama etin. Ukup maimaila epes isima ukup maimailasi.
42006033	I'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma isima sanda' waf bu'unai atona ma ipe'i, nambimb emi nefela agof ipe'imi? Owa'etin. Epes isima sanda' waf aonai esis wapoti' sanda' waf na'amainai.
42006034	I'i ipe' pese'asa anom amamaga epes isima ipe' pegawa esis nambimb seagwamepami, anona nemaf emi nefela agof ipe'imi? Owa'etin. Epes sanda' waf aonai wapoti' sase'asa anom amamaga enis sanda' waf aonai, ma esis seatanima seafa'am na'ama etin mondagwama si'i sali' sase'asam.
42006035	Ea' ipe' ukup mila naumbih ipe'isi, penda'mas waf bu'unai esis pese'asa amamaga. Ipe' ina ata' pi'i anona nemaf esis sogwamepam, owa'. Ipe' penda'as na'ama anona nemaf God la'ifinai nape ilifi nese'epa amamaga lu'wami bu'wami ma pepe awasi ananipei. Dei' main, anan na'i uwahipis esis isima owa' seanifelonae saloma isima sanda' waf aonai.
42006036	Ahalomepa ipe'inai na'i uwahipis esis sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama etin si'i anan nati esis uwahipis.
42006037	Ipe' ina pewaloga enis epes si'i anona jas dembinai nawaloga basef kot lu'unai, owa'. Ama anona nemaf God ina nowalogepa, owa'. Ipe' ina pembaso'ma enis epes, owa'. Ama anona nemaf God ina nombaso'ma ipe' wapoti', owa'. Ipe' pekwaha waf aonai enis sanda'ma ipe'anai. Ama anona nemaf God nogwam nokwaha waf aonai ipe'inai.
42006038	Ipe' pese'asa amamaga enis epesa God nose'epa amamaga ipe'. Anona nemaf anan nose'epa amamaga hiami si'im mosaminiala ma ipe'. Ikwaf ipe' pease'asana enis epesi, ikwaf anama atona God nese'epana ipe'.”
42006039	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa anom basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “A'i enin epen naep mase'ani la'ifinama nihi'ambaman eaf enin epen naep mase'ani? Owa'etin. Atuwasi esis bias sondakolas dogwas sefe' sowala etin kwambiwag.
42006040	Epes sanda' skul etini ina sape dambes sikila' tisa asasinai, owa'. Esis sanda' skul sambefan ea', sotaga na'ama etin si'i tisa asasinai.
42006041	Dei' maina ipe' pati usan sa'unai nape naep sahin owan ipe'isi, ea' ipe' owa' pegawa hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi?
42006042	Dei' maina ipe' ata' pa'ipa alupisi pa'i, ‘Owalome, ae' a'i iwafamenana usan sa'unai nape naem ine'inai.’ Ea' ine' hapataf lu'unai anama nape naep ine'imi. Ipe' malogof biamipei pambaso'mami. Ipe' ata' pili' pewafa hapataf lu'unai nape naep ipe'imi, ma piti andeande' pewafamenan usan sa'unai nape naep alupisi ipe'isi.
42006043	Lawag bu'unai ina nola gwa'aimi awami, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin lawag aonai ina nola gwa'aimi bu'wami, owa'.
42006044	Ape' mati gwa'aimi mailami, mogawa lawah bu'wami awami. Ape' ina mola su'utip fik si'i ahip anona mandof higataunai, owa'. Ea' ina mola su'utip wainim anona mandof pipi'embin, amama wapoti' owa'.
42006045	Epes na'ama etin. Epes bu'wasi, esis ukup bu'wami mapeis ukup asasimi sawalapa waf bu'unai. Ea' epes awasi waf hianai aonai napeis ukup asasimi. Ea' sawalapa waf aonai atona. Dei' main, waf bu'unai aonai nape si'ina ukup asasimi, anama atona dei' malogof mawalapana nawisi ande'.
42006046	Dei' maina ipe' pa'i ae' Dembiwei, Dembiwei, ea' ipe' owa' pila malogel ae'anai?
42006047	Emi egafis sifi'mai ae' sieila malogel ae'anai, dei' ae' indila'wifa waf ananinai ma ipe' pegawana.
42006048	Epen inima si'i anona aman nala' ipati. Anan nandoma olalef mowala gani etap owin otamba ma'oma. Ea' nala' ipat netawa etap anama otambaiguma la'ifiguma. Ea' asaf lu'unai nalai, walemb nawisi lu'una embel kolo'walami mafe', ipat ina nandagwamba, owa'. Dei' main? Aman anama nanda'ana la'ifina.
42006049	Ea' emi egefin name' basef ae'ami owa' nilam, inima si'i anona aman nala' ipat falafunai. Anan nanda'ana nala'ana etin natoma etap atona ilif. Ea' anom nimeguf mafe' ea' walembeh mawisi embel magwale'ana nowa aona hi'alana.”
42007001	Jisas na'ipasa basef amama laumi esis amam nematawa seme'am ma hi'alam, ea' nafe' nataga anona wambel Kaperneam.
42007002	Anona aman dembinai nape. Anan kepten numafi soldia hiami 100-peleim. Anona nanda' maola anani awes nanda'ana felefele'ma neaga'. Ea' kepten okom nainailana.
42007003	Ea' name' basefa Jisas nasapa' anom agufumi Judai mafe' mofala Jisasa nifi'i nonda' aman anama bo'ona.
42007004	Ea' mafe' matagama Jisas ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Kepten anama aman bu'unai, andeande'ma ine' nigiambamana nenda' aman nanda' maolananai bo'ona.
42007005	Dei' main, anan okom nainaila ape' Juda nala' ipat ape' ma'i basef mapeinai.”
42007006	Ea' Jisas nafe' nalomam nafe' nataga felefele'ma ipat ea', Kepten anama nasapa' anom alupumi mofa'ai basef ananimi mafi'i ma'ipa Jisas na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' nefo'o owa', hapaimi. Ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefo'o niwis ipat ae'anai, owa'.
42007007	-
42007008	Amama atom ae' wapoti' ina bo'owe ma efe'mago ine', owa'. Ine' ni'i etin, atuwasi anan bo'ona. Dei' main, ae' ape owina anom soldia dambami mumafi mase'e maol. Ea' ape ilifa anom soldia ae'ami imafiam. I'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fo'o’, name'e nafe'. Ea' i'ipa anona i'i, ‘Ine' fi'i’, neme'e nafi'i. Ea' i'ipa anama agel a'anai nanda'me maoli i'i, ‘Ine' da'a maol anama’, anan name'e nanda'ana. Ine' dembinai. Ea' awes anama atuwasi neme' basef ine'imi nefe'. Dei' ine' ni'i etin, ea' anan ambo'ona wapoti'.”
42007009	Jisas name' basef ananimi okom natanea ea' nandamboma na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sagi'ma anani na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, soldia dembinai anama anan ina ipe' Israelinai. Ea' dei' nembale'efa ae'. Ina anona aman Israelinai nembale'ef na'ama, owa'etin. Anan nikila' ipe' Israela nembale'efa ae' la'ifina.”
42007010	Ea' amam amama kepten nasapa'am mafi'i motanima mafe' ipat mati aman anama nanda' maola kepteni ambo'ona.
42007011	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', Jisas nafe' anona wambel Nain. Alupumi ananimi maloma enis amam nematawa hiesi safe' salomana.
42007012	Anan nafe' felefele'ma uta sawis wambel anama, ea' nati enis sofa' enin so'uso'win naga'i safi'i sa'i sowan. So'uso'win inima mama'wan alifi'wi. Akwa'w kola enin etin, waulunama'w a' naga'. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sape wambel anama safi'i salomai akwa'w.
42007013	Dembinai nati akwa'w, okom ananinai na'i uwahipi'w ea' na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' nelef owa'.”
42007014	Ea' anan nafe' felefele' nasa lagela bokis salanami. Ea' amam mofa'ai bokis amama maitu. Ea' Jisas na'i, “Souso'win, ine' neme'! Ae' a'ipina, ine' hafel.”
42007015	-
42007016	So'uso'win inima naga' ea'i nehafel nape na'i. Ea' Jisas naso'akwan mama'wan anani'wi. Na'ama esis umbamahas endilisi safela agel Godi sa'i, “Anona aman profet dembinai nataga ea' la'afena ape'. God nafi'i ma nigiambama ape' amam nematawa ananipai.”
42007017	Ea' basef amama ma maol Jisasi mafe'agen hi'alagon anama etap hiagoma Judia ea' anama hiagoma wapoti'.
42007018	Alupumi Joni ma'ipana amamaga amama pepel anama Jisas nanda'anai. Ea' Jon nofala alupumi biam ananimi
42007019	nasapa'am mafe' mahali' Dembinai Jisas ma'i, “Ine' aman ma'wina nafi'i o ata' mope mohafa anona?”
42007020	Amam matagama Jisas ea' ma'i, “Jon napisi'as embeli nasapa' afa' biafa wafi'mai ine', anan na'i nogawa, ‘Ine' aman ma'wina nafi'i o ata' mope mohafa anona?’ ”
42007021	Nemaf anama atona Jisas nanda' amam nematawa awes naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Anan natofamasa ambagof awami mapeisi. Hiesi naep mase'asi nanda'masam mati andeande'.
42007022	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pitanima pefe' pi'ipa Jona amamaga amama dei' patolomi pami'ami. Isima naep mase'asi sati wapoti', bo'wagah awamisi safe' andeande'. Isima awes aonai nanda' alop asasinai nambu'wi ambo'wes, aligah mase'asi same' basef andeande', saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti' ea' kwahusi same' basef bu'wami Godi.
42007023	Emi egafis ukup etifim sombale'efa ae', isima sondanifel endilisi.”
42007024	Amam biam mofa'ai basef Joni motanima mafe'. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa ma Jon na'i, “Fowa' ipe' pafe' anona etap fatauguma wafiguma epes a'agoma pafe' pati main? Pafe'ma pati anona aman ina nembale'ef andeande' si'i anona elifita uf nefa'ana nanda' felifal? Owa'etin.
42007025	Ea' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman nala luwaguf bu'wami atumi? Owa'etin. Epes isima sotala amamaga bu'wami atumi ma moni hianai sala luwguf bu'wami atumi, epes isima sape ifagw bu'wami king dambami atom mapeimi.
42007026	Dei' ipe' pafe' pati main? Pafe' pati anona aman profet? Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, anan profet dembinai nikila' profet hiami hi'alam.
42007027	Aman anama ea' ma'una anan atona si'i basef mape Baibeli na'iama God fowa' gani na'iam na'i, ‘Ine' neme', anona nemaf ae' esapa' aman nofa' basef Ae'ami nili' nefe' nendondombamena eaf ine'inai.’
42007028	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Jon dembinai nikila' amam hiami ma etap anae'. Ea' emi egafis dei' siowis wambota Godi numafias, isima dembesi sikila' Jon. Ea' emi egafis agof a'asi ma wambota Godi, esis wapoti' dei' sape dembesi sikila'ana.”
42007029	Ea' amam mofa' takisi maloma epes hiesi same' basef Jisasi esis sa'i, “A'e, waf Godi andeande'.” Dei' main, Jon atona napisi'asi.
42007030	Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi ina mofa' baptaisa Jon, owa'. Amam manda'am na'ama dei' mandamboma mowa' alafugaha eaf bu'unai God nihi'ambamanai.
42007031	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Dei' ae' indili'wifa ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae'i i'imama? Ae' i'ipipa maim basef womun etina pegawa waf ipe'inai?
42007032	Ipe' pape si'i enis awasi sandakolas sapoma sofala enis awasi sa'i, ‘Ape' mandanifel mufapula batagwa ipe', ea' ipe' ina palemb. Ape' manda' awalef malef matamea, ea' ipe' ina palef.’
42007033	Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli nafi'i, ina na' gwa'aimi embel wainim, owa'. Ea' pa'i ambal aonai napaina.
42007034	Dei' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei afi'i a' gwa'aimi maloma embel wain, ea' patolowe pa'i, ‘Piti anan aman na' gwa'aimi hiami, na' embel wain hianai endilisi. Anan alupunai ma amam mefa' takisi maloma amam manda' waf aonai!’
42007035	Ea' emi egafis sila gawa bu'unai Godi, esis isima sihi'ambapa gawa anama Godi bu'unai endilisi ma sombale'efana!”
42007036	Anona aman Farisi nahali' Jisasa nifi'i nea' gwa'aimi nolomana. Ea' nafe' ipat anama Farisi nalomana ma' gwa'aimi.
42007037	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape taun anama kwanda' waf aonai. Akwa'w kwame' basefa Jisas na' gwa'aimi ipat anama. Ea' kofa' anona botol bu'unai si'i owap embel sanda alogw bu'wami ma'anai kwafi'i.
42007038	Ea' kwawis kwafe' kwaitu alafuga Jisasi felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi kwalef. Ea' embif akwa'umi maluwi mowala bo'wagah Jisasi ea' kwanda' auf balagaimi kopati' embif akwa'umi, kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ananimi kwanda' lotumana. Ea' kwakolo' sanda anama bo'wagah ananimi.
42007039	Ea' Farisi anama nahali' Jisas nafi'i nati amama, nomonas ananimi matamea na'i, “I'i aman anama endilisi anan profet, anan nogawa nemata'w akwama kwahapila anani, nogawa waf akwa'unai. Dei' main? Akwa'w kwanda' waf aonai.”
42007040	Ea' Jisas nagwamana nomonas amama Farisi anama na'ipana na'i, “Saimon, ae' a'i i'ipina anom basef.” Ea' Saimon na'i, “Tisa, ine' walapa basef ine'imi.”
42007041	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Amam biam anona wiaf napoma amoma anona aman otamba hiamunai. Anona nowaola wiafa 100 kina ea' anona 10 kina atona.
42007042	Amam biam ina la'ifima meagwa wiaf anama, owa'. Ea' dei' aman anama nakwahomoma wiaf anama amam biam. Ea' amam biam nambimb emi okom ninila anan endilisi nikila' anona?”
42007043	Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' a'i aman anama nase'ana wiaf lu'unai 100 kinai.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ine' nawalogam andeande'.”
42007044	Ea' nandamboma nati nemata'w akwama na'ipa Saimon na'i, “Ine' niti nemata'w akwama? Ae' afi'i awis ipat ine'inai. Ine' owa' nase'e embel esa'opa bo'wagah ae'ami, owa'etin. Ea' nemata'w akwama kwasa'opa bo'wagah ae'ami ma embif maluwi naep akwa'umi. Ea' kopati'am balaga akwa'unai.
42007045	Ine' owa' niesisi' ae'. Ea' do'ok ae' afi'i awis etin, akwa'w kwape kwasisi' bo'wagah ae'ami la'ela'ef kwape kwafi'i kwataga dei'.
42007046	Ine' owa' neanda' wel nekolo'am ma balaga ae'anai. Ea' akwa'w kwakolo'am bo'wagah ae'ami embel sanda bu'unai.
42007047	Na'ama dei' ae' a'ipina. Akwa'w okom nainaila ae' endilisi. Waf anama okom nainaila ae'anai nihi'ambapa waf aonai akwa'unai hianai ae' akwahomakwana hi'alana. Emi epen God nokwahoman waf aonai ananinai kwasala'una, epen inima enin nambimb ina okom ninila God endilisi.”
42007048	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ae' akwahomena waf aonai ine'inai.”
42007049	Ea' amam mape ma' gwa'aimi malumanai mape ukup matamea manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anama emi egafuna na'i la'ifina ma nokwaha waf aonai?”
42007050	Ea' Jisas na'ipa nemata'w akwama na'i, “Ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom God nakwahomena waf aonai ine'inai nofa'ena netanimani. Ine' fo'o, ea' opaf ine'inai nope awanena.”
42008001	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', Jisas nafe' wambel hiagoma na'ipasa basef bu'wami amam nematawa sape taun anama wambel hiagomai. Na'ipasa basef amama bu'wami ma nambimb siowis wambota Godi numafias. Alupumi ananimi 12-peleim maloma
42008002	anowa nematawa safe' salomana. Nematawa awama fowa' awes nanda'awa Jisas natofamawa ambagof awami nanda'awa bo'owa. Ano'w Maria sofala'w sa'i Makdalai'wi, fowa' natofama'wa ambagof awami 7-peleim mapai'wi.
42008003	Ea' ano'w Joana nemata'w anona aman numafi ipat Heroti, agel ananinai Susa. Ea' ano'w Susana kwaloma anowa nematawa hiawai wapoti' wafe' walomana. Awo wagiambama anan naloma alupumi ananimi ma otamba gwa'aimi maim awaumi.
42008004	Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape safi'i taun hiagoma, safi'i sandakolas safi'mai Jisas. Ea' anan nase'asa basef hiami womun etin na'ama na'i,
42008005	“Anona aman nafe' nowaha olelemb witimi si'i rais anona aof. Nowahom nafe', anom mowa eaf safe'ma. Enis epes safe' safofo'asom ea' amiguf mufia' mafi'i ma'am.
42008006	Ea' anom mowa anagon otambaiguma. Ea' mataga ea' etap owa' embelina. Masilimb ina mowala ea' alim.
42008007	Anom mowala la'afena mandelef wandafumi mataga malomam maofenia wit, ea' amam ina mail mola gwa'aimi, owa'.
42008008	Ea' anom mowa mafe' etap bu'unai ea' mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi. Anom mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi hiami 100-peleim.” Jisas na'iam na'ama ma ea', na'ipas mehip na'i, “Ipe' aligah magalipei, peme'am andeande' ukup mopomam.”
42008009	Ea' amam alupumi Jisasi mahali'anama basef ofagema womun etini.
42008010	Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “God nihi'ambepa basef ofagema mape mandambahi'i ma ipe' piowis wambota Ananinai numafipa. Ea' enis epes owa'. God ina nihi'ambas basef amama ofagema, owa'. Ama esis ‘ina some' basef amama alihim, owa'. Some' basef womun etin nambimb sotologon, ea' ina siti anom amamaga, owa'. Esis some' basef, ea' ina sogawa ofagema, owa'.’ ”
42008011	Basef womun etini ofagema na'ama. Olelemb amama si'i basef Godi.
42008012	Anom mowa eafi amama si'i epes isima same' basef, ea' Satan nafi'i nofa' basef amama God nase'esam mape opalef asasimi ma esis ina sembale'efa God nofa'as seatanimani, owa'.
42008013	Anom mowa mafe' anagon otambaiguma, amama si'i enis epes same' basef Godi ea' sofa'am mehip sandanifelamam. Ea' isima si'i masilimb ina mondala mowala etap owini. Esis sembale'am nogota bandana etin ea', Satan nagwambas sanda' waf aonai ea' satanima sakwaha sombale'efa God.
42008014	Anom mowala mandelef wandafumi la'afen, amama si'i epes isima same' basef sailif safe' ea', anom nimanimi mamumami maloma moni main naloma anom danifel maim etapami, amamaga amama mase'ala esis. Ea' ina sombale'efa God sanda' waf bu'unai la'ifis, owa'.
42008015	Ea' anom mowa etap bu'unai, si'i enis same' basef bu'wami sembale'am la'ifis. Opalef asasimi bo'om same' basef Godi sailam. Esis sape la'ifis sanda' waf bu'unai la'ela'ef, isima sape si'i olelemb mataga malo mail mola gwa'aimi andeande'i.
42008016	Epes ina sakata lamifah sopalo'am ma'oh owina baket o balata owina, owa'. Esis sawamonam balatagw ilifa epes isima suwisi siti howalagon.
42008017	Amamaga hiami hi'alam mape mandambahi'i anona nemaf motaga alihiguma hiesi sotolom sogawam. Ea' amamaga hiami ata' sambaho'am ma'ihi, anona nemaf motaga mondawalap, hiesi sogawam.
42008018	Ea' ipe' pindumafuma peme' basef andeande'. Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Godi, nambimb God nowatanimasam wapoti'. Ea' isima owa' sembale'ami, anona nemaf basef kwawie'im amama esis sombale'am, God nondalombasam esis sopen etin.”
42008019	Nemaf anama mama'wana Jisasi kwao'wa owapana safi'mai anan. Amam nematawa hiesi sandakolasi sili'akwana ea' esis ina safe' felefele'ma anan, owa'.
42008020	Ea' enis epes sape salomanai sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' neme', mama'wena ine'ikwi kwaloma owapena ine'imi safi'i saitu ande', sa'i solomena si'i.”
42008021	Ea' nagwamasa basef isima hiesi na'ipas na'i, “Esis amam nematawa isima some' basef Godi sailam, isima mama'we sahin owan ae'asi.”
42008022	Anona nemaf Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi malata anona bot. Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Afa' ofe' anama walemb batupa'manai gani fisana.” Ea' amam malata bot mafe'.
42008023	Bot anama nafe' etin, Jisas ambeh mahana na'oh nolola. Ea' anona uf lu'unai naluwi walemb batupa'manai anama, embel kolo'walam mawis bot nomon na'i si'inama embel felefele'ma mowala.
42008024	Ea' mafe' minimbalana ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i ahegililafa.” Ea' anan nohafel ninifala ufi embel. Ea' uf faso'mana, embel ina ata' manda' fepo, owa'. Tol motah.
42008025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Bale'ef ipe'inai nape eti?” Amam umbamaham ukup matamea. Ea' manda'ipama ma'i, “Anan emi egafuna? Na'ipa uf naloma embel mame'ana mowala.”
42008026	Ea' Jisas naloma alupumi mafe' mataga anagon esis Gerasa sapoma, anama nape wa'ol walemb batupa'manai fisana etap hiagoma Galili.
42008027	Ea' Jisas nakwaha bot nisila' nafe' akata, anona aman nape taun anamai nafi'mai anan. Anom ambagof awami mapeinai. Anan ina nowaho' anona lowaf nape andeande' anona ipat, owa'etin. Fowa' anan aona nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Nape nafe' hi'agilif atom.
42008028	-
42008029	Anona ambal aonai nahapilana tatala'ina. Esis sombalo'ana sumafiana nimeguf hiami sanda' seni hankap sowa'ana lagof bo'wagah, owa'. Nahape'am etin. Ea' ambal anama aonai nofa'ana nafe' anama epes a'agoma. Aman anama nafi'i nati Jisas, nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi. Ea' Jisas na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' ambal aonai, nekwaha aman anama ine' fo'o.” Ea' nofalana mehip endilisi na'i, “Jisas, ine' Nogalomana dembinai God nape ilif endilisi, ine' na'i nenda' maina ae'? Ae' a'ipina mehip, ine' owa' nese'e nimanimi ae'.”
42008030	Ea', Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Agel ine'inai emi?” Ea' anan na'i, “Agel ae'inai ambagof hiami.” Dei' main, ambagof awami hiami mafe' mawisana.
42008031	Ea' ambagof amama mofala Jisas mehip timbitambel ma'i, “Ina netofafa ofe' owala hul launai owa' nowala neatambili, owa'.”
42008032	Ea' anom bogof hiami maitu ma' gwa'aimi anona domota felefele'. Ea' ambagof awami ma'ipa Jisas mehip ma'i, “Ine' ni'i a'e ma afa' ofe' uwis bogof mamuma.” Ea' na'i aho'mam.
42008033	Ambagof awami amama makwaha aman anama mawisi mafe' mawisa bogof. Ea' bogof mamuma hiami masagih mafe' mehip mowala awagoma tata, mowala embel walemb batupa'manai afum hi'alam.
42008034	Ea' amam mumafi bogofi mati amamaga matagama bogof, masagih mafe' ma'ipasa amamaga amama amam matulumi amam nematawa sape tauni saloma sail aof felefele'i wapoti'.
42008035	Ea' esis safe'ma sieti amamaga amama. Safi'mai Jisas sati aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai dei' makwahona ea' ambo'ona okom bu'unai napaina andeande' nowaho' lowaf tol nape felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi. Amam nematawa hiesi satolona ea' esis umbamahas.
42008036	Ea' epes isima sati amamaga amama, sa'ipas sa'i waf Jisas nanda'ana aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai dei' ambo'ona wapoti'.
42008037	Ea' epes hiesi sape anama Gerasai hiesi umbamahas endilisi. Ea' sa'ipa Jisas sa'i, “Ine' nekwaha ape' fo'o.” Ea' Jisas nalata bot anama notanima nafe'.
42008038	Aman anama fowa' ambagof awami mapeinai nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena.” Ea' Jisas nasapa'ana na'i,
42008039	“Ine' tanima fo'o wambel ine'inai, ni'ipasa amamaga hiami God nanda' maina ine'ami.” Ea' aman anama nafe' nawalapa basefa amamaga amama ma amam nematawa hiesi sape taun anamai amamaga Jisas nanda'manam anani.
42008040	Jisas notanima nafi'i, enis amam nematawa hiesi sape sohafana. Ea' sanda'mana nemaf bu'unai sandanifela ma nafi'i.
42008041	-
42008042	Ea' anona aman nataga agilinama Jairus. Anan numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai. Nogamana nemata'w atoto'w afagof akwa'umi 12-peleim felefele' kwa'i koga'. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi, nahali'ana mehip na'i, “Ine' nifi'i ipat ae'anai.” Ea' Jisas nafe' esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin saitu sindiwapana.
42008043	Anan ata' nafe' etin, ano'w nemata'w kwafi'mai anan. Awes lu'unai nanda'akwi kwape gamba afagof 12-peleim. Otamba akwa'uimi hi'alama kwatal dokta hiami. Owa' anom la'ifima monda'akw kotaga bo'okwe, owa'etin.
42008044	Ea' kwafe' felefele'ma alafuga ananinai, kwasa lagela saket Jisasi da'malifinama. Kwanda'am na'ama, mehip etin esimbel pele'atam, ea' ina ata' maluwi wapoti', owa'etin.
42008045	Ea' Jisas nahali'as na'i, “Emi nasa lagela ae'?” Ea' esis hiesi sa'i etin etin sa'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, amam nematawa isima hiesi saitu sanda' gwagwasi'ma etin salomafa.”
42008046	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ame' pepel ae'anai nakwahowe nafe'ma nonda' enin epen bo'wen. Ae' egawa enin epen nasa lagel alop ae'anai.”
42008047	Ea' nemata'w akwama kogawa akwa'w ina atuwasi kondambaho'w ma anan, owa'. Na'ama akwa'w umbamaha'w kwafi'i kwindiwa nembawa kotawa etap felefele'ma naep amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' kwawalapa basef ofagema akwa'umi ma dei' kwasa lagela anan ea' ambo'okw. Ea' kwa'i, “Awes ae'anai ahi'alana owa'etin.”
42008048	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Nogame, dei' ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei. Amama atom dei' anda'ena bo'wena. Ine' fo'o opaf ine'inai nope awanena.”
42008049	Anan ata' na'i etin, anona aman nakwaha ipat Jairusi nafi'i na'ipa Jairus na'ama na'i, “Nogamena ine'ikwi kwaga' ea'. Amama atom dei' ina nenda' Dembinai Tisa nofo'o ekep pehana, owa', hapainai.”
42008050	Ea' Jisas name'as na'ipa Jairus na'i, “Ina umbamohena, owa'. Nembale'efa ae' la'ifiwei, ama atuwasi nogamena ine'ikwi kohafel wapoti'.”
42008051	-
42008052	Ea' Jisas nafe' nataga ipat Jairusi ea' ina na'i a'e ma amam nematawa hiesi suwis ipat anama, owa'. Nao'wa Pita naloma Jon Jems atom maloma mama'wakw ahaloma'w etis safe' sawis salomana. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape ande' salef mehip sa'i sapoma'w. Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' ina pelef, owa'. Tol pepe. Akwa'w ina kwaga' endilisi, owa'. Kwa'oh etin.”
42008053	Ea' esis sanda'iafana kwapete'. Esis sogawa akwa'w kwaga' endilisi.
42008054	Ea' Jisas nahapila lagel akwa'unai nofala'w na'i, “Sa'ukwi, ine' hafel.”
42008055	Ea' ambal akwa'unai notanima nafi'i nawisa'w wapoti' kohafel mehip. Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis mamasa'w na'i, “Ipe' so'akwa anom gwa'aimi.”
42008056	Ea' sati amama, gegelalasis endilisi nomonas matamea. Ea' Jisas na'ipas mehipa siela basef ananimi na'i, “Ipe' ina pi'ipa enin epena amamaga amama, owa'.”
42009001	Nemaf anama Jisas nofalai alupumi 12-peleim ananimi mandakolas mafi'i nase'am agof lu'wami nanda'am la'ifima meatofa ambagof hiami awami ea' monda' hiesi awes hianai naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
42009002	Ea' nasapa'am mafe' ma'ipasa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias ea' manda' epes awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
42009003	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pefa' anom amamaga bandefah isalef gwa'aimi moni, owa', hapaimi. Ipe' ina pefa' siogw biagw atogw, owa'. Pefa' atona etin mondandaepa.
42009004	I'i pefe' piowis anona ipat, ipe' pepe ipat anama atona. Ea' pekwaha wambel anama pefe'.
42009005	I'i esis owa' sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pekwaha wambel anama pindila'ma usas etap mail bo'wagah ipe'imi ma esis sitilipa sogawa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ofagena asasinai atona.”
42009006	Ea' alupumi Jisasi makwaha anama mapoma mafe' wambel anama hiagoma ma'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Ea' magiambama epes awes nanda'asi sape wambel hiagomai manda'as bo'wes wapoti'.
42009007	Gavman dembinai king Herot numafi etap hiagoma Galili name' basefa amamaga amama hiami mataga, ea' ina nogawam andeande' ea' nomonas matamea mafe'. Dei' main, enis epes sa'i, “Jon notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.”
42009008	Ea' enis sa'i anom basefa Elaija profet fowa'inai sa'i, “Anan nohafel wapoti'.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Anona aman profet fowa'inai notanima nohafel wapoti'.”
42009009	Ea' Herot na'i, “Jon ae' atopa'mana. Ea' aman anama ame' basefanai, anan emi egafuna?” Ea' nape la'ela'ef na'i niti Jisas.
42009010	Aposel alupumi Jisasi motanima mafi'i ma'ipa Jisasa amamaga maol amam manda'ana. Ea' anan nao'wam makwaha enis epes, amam atom mafe' anona taun Betsaida.
42009011	Ea', esis amam nematawa hiesi sogawa anama napoma sagi'mana safe'. Safi'mai anan, nanda'mas nemaf bu'unai nandanifel ma esis safi'i. Ea' nawalipasa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' nanda' epes awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes.
42009012	Wambomota felefele'ma owamb alupumi ananimi 12-peleim mafi'i ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nesapa'as sofo'o wambel aof sape felefele'i ma sogolopa gwa'aimi sogolopa sea'oma. Dei' main, anae' afa' wapoma wafiguma epes a'agoma.”
42009013	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pese'as gwa'aimi.” Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' gwa'aimi owa' hiame. Bret lagel wa'ana atona maloma agof biam ea' amama atom ma'oh. Ea' ine' na'i afa' ofe' utalai gwa'aimi ma amam nematawa isima hiesi?”
42009014	Amam atom hiami 5,000-peleim mape. Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' pi'ipa esis amam nematawa sope sefe' oto otowa sotagama wambotagw 50-peleis etis.”
42009015	Ea' manda' amam nematawa hiesi sape.
42009016	Ea' Jisas nafela bret anama lagel wa'ana atona naloma agof biam, naniga nati heven ilif nanifela God. Ea' nawalana naso' alupumi ananimi maso' esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alas.
42009017	Sa'am elihis dondo', alupumi ananimi matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleim si'im endilisi.
42009018	Anona nemaf Jisas atotona nanda' beten, alupumi ananimi mape malomana nahali'am na'i, “Esis amam nematawa sa'i ae' aman emi egafuwi?”
42009019	Ea' amam magwa basef na'ama ma'i, “Enis sa'i ine' Jon aman napisi'as embeli. Ea' enis sa'i ine' anona profet fowa'inai netanima nehafel wapoti', ea' enis sa'i ine' Elaija.”
42009020	Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Dei' ipe' pa'i Ae' emi egafuwi?” Ea' Pita nagwa basef na'i, “Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i.”
42009021	Ea' Jisas na'ipam mehip na'i amam ina mi'ipasa basef amama enis epes mi'i anan Krais, owa'.
42009022	Ea' na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma anom agufumi dambami moloma anom dambami pris maloma anom mawalipasa mi'uli Godi nambimb mowa' alafugaha ae', mohe ega'. Ama nimeguf biam hi'ilama anona neafe'ma wanomi, God nefele etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
42009023	Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' efa' nimanimi anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Emi egafis si'i sila Ae', esis senda'am na'ama etin si'i Ae' la'ela'ef nimeguf danda ma sieili. Ea' sesambala ukup asasimi ma maina maol esis sa'i seanda'anai.
42009024	Dei' main, emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom, si'i sihapilam tatala'im, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma Ae' ma sesambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf ambagof asasimi God nofa'ami sotanimani sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
42009025	I'i emi egefis senda' maol naninani ma sefa' gwa'aimi hiahaom amamaga hiami etapami atom higilialami, esis wapoti' awes higililas selomam. Dei' amamaga amama nambimb migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin.
42009026	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. I'i emi egafis ambagof aoma Ae' sondafa'me eloma basef Ae'ami, Ae' wapoti' ambal aona epes isima endafa'mas nemaf anama Ae' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami mafifili Ae'ami, elomai mafifili howalagon Godi maloma amam ensel Godi wapoti'.
42009027	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, enipa paitu na'ae nambimb ina pega' ulal, ata' owa'. Enipa nambimb piti epes siowis wambota Godi numafias.”
42009028	Jisas na'ipasa basef amama ma ea', nimeguf amama 8-peleim mafe'ma ea', anan nao'wa Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon, nao'wam mondowasa' anona halaf launai ma nonda' beten.
42009029	Anan nape nanda' beten etin, amaga ananinai nataga nandati na'ana, ea' luwaguf nalami mataga afitim endilisi howalagon.
42009030	-
42009031	Ea' amam biam fowa'imi Moses naloma Elaija mataga maloma nafifili pepel ilifanai ea' maitu ma'i malomana. Amam ma'i ma nambimb Jisas nila okom Godi ma nokwaha etap anae' noga' gani Jerusalem.
42009032	Pita naloma alupumi biam ananimi amam naep nimanim endilisi ma'i mo'oh etin. Ea' mohafel mati nafifili Jisasi maloma amam amama biam maitu malomana.
42009033	Amam biam ma'i mokwaha Jisas mefe', ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wape na'ae fafas. Afa' ola' anom aolah wanom mondandaepa. Ine' anona, Moses anona, Elaija anona.” Pita ina nogawa andeande'ma na'i basef amama, owa'.
42009034	Anan ata' na'i basef etin, anom ilagw maofenia amam ea' umbamaham.
42009035	Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai ilagw nomon na'i, “Anama anan Nogalome ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea'. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi.”
42009036	Malogel anama na'i ea', amam mati Jisas atona naitu nalomam. Ea' amam malogof maso', ina ma'ipa enis epesa amamaga amama matulumi, owa'.
42009037	Naman wefilu amam makwaha halaf anama makini', ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai Jisas eaf.
42009038	Anona aman naitu la'afena esis na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ahali'ina mehip a'i, ine' niti nogalome ae'anai uwahipina. Ea' anan atotona.
42009039	Anona ambal aonai nahapilana la'ifina ea' na'i mehip endilisi. Ea' naolana kwapete' endilisi, ifat nataga sisih malogel ananinai. Ambal anama nahambombaga alop ananinai endilisi, ea' ina nakwahona, owa'. Napaina la'ela'ef.
42009040	Ea' ae' dei' ahali' alupumi ine'imi ma motofa ambal anama aonai nefe'. Ea' amam ina la'ifim.”
42009041	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ama na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa owa' pembale'efa Ae'. Ea' opalef ipe'imi owa' mope andeande'. Nimeguf ma'um ae' ata' epe elomepa wapoti' ma efa' nimanimi ipe'imi? Ipe' fa'an pifi'mai Ae'.”
42009042	Nogalomana ata' nafi'i etin, ambal anama aonai naolana nafe' nowa etap nakoto'ana kwapete' endilisi. Ea' Jisas ninifala ambal aonai nanda' aman anama so'uso'win bo'ona ea' nase'anan notanima nafe'ma ahalomana ananinai.
42009043	Amama atom dei' amam nematawa hiesi sati pepel lu'unai Godi gegelalasis kwapete' endilisi. Esis ata' nomonas matamea mafe'ma etina amamaga amama Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'ama na'i,
42009044	“Ipe' pembe' aligah andeande'ma basef dei' ae' a'ipipami. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei nambimb felefele' anona aman nose'asa ae' efe'ma lagof amam naumbih ae'ami.”
42009045	Alupumi Ananimi mame' basef amama ea' ina mogawa ofagema, owa'. Dei' main, mandambaho'ma amam. Ea' amam umbamahama meahali'ana ma basef amama ofagema.
42009046	Ea' alupumi Jisasi mandahihianamam ma'i emi nepe dembinai amamunai.
42009047	Ea' Jisas nogawa nomonas amama mape opalef amamumi, ea' nasa'mai enin sa'usaw'in nafi'i naitu nalomana.
42009048	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Emi egafis sese' opalefa sigiambama enin sa'usa'win si'i ini'i ma ukup asasimi mopoma Ae', esis sase'e opalef Ae' wapoti' sagiambame. Ea' emi egafis sagiambama Ae'i, esis saso' opalef Anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'. Dei' main? Emi egafis sepe agof a'asi la'afena ipe' hipei, esis sape dembesi sali'ma ipe'.”
42009049	Ea' Jon nagwamana basef na'ama na'i, “Dembinai, afa' wati anona aman natofa ambagof awami ma agel ine'inai. Anan ina nagi'mafa. Ea' dei' wati watalagamana.”
42009050	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ipe' ina petalagamana, owa'. Dei' main? Emi egafin ina naumbih ipe'ini, inima alupunai ipe'inai.”
42009051	Nogota God na'i nofa' Jisas nolata heven nafi'i felefele', ea' Jisas okom la'ifim na'i nefe' Jerusalem.
42009052	Ea' nasapa' anom amam mali' mofa' basef ananimi mafe'. Mafe' mawis anona wambel esis Samariai ma meandondomba amamaga ananimi.
42009053	Ea', esis wambel anama sowa' alafugaha Jisas sandaiwa'ma sofa'ana sofe' ipat asasinai. Dei' main? Esis sogawa anan na'i nefe' Jerusalem.
42009054	Ea' alupumi amama biam ananimi Jems naloma Jon mati waf anama ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i afa' ofalai nif fandumi misila'i hevena fendo epes isima?”
42009055	Ea' Jisas nandamboma ninifala amam biam.
42009056	Ea' mafe' anona wambel.
42009057	Amam ata' mafe' eaf etin, anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' elomena. Ea' ofe' etin anama hiagoma ine' na'i neafe'ma.”
42009058	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Nombagw aolopumi ma'oh mala etap wambel amamunai. Amiguf wapoti' mufia' mafe' ilifi mala' alegah mapeih gani ilif, ea' ae' owa'etin. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei wambel a'e ma a'oh alo balaga ae'anai.”
42009059	Ea' na'ipa anona aman na'i, “Ine' nifi'i nila ae'.” Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' a'i ata' epe imafi ahalome, ata' igiambamana ma noga' ewana ma nope ea' ifi'i ilina.”
42009060	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Hapainai, sowago esis etis isima saga'i. Ea' ine' fo'o newalapa basefa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias.”
42009061	Ea' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ilina. Ea' ine' ata' ni'i a'e ma ae' efe'ma esis wambota ae'anai inifelis i'i nemaf bu'unai ma esis sili'?”
42009062	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Emi egafin nehafel nili' nenda' maol aofi ma nendamboma niti alafuga ma neakwaha maol ananinai, enin ina la'ifina nenda' maola ni'ipas siowisa wambota Godi numafias, owa'.”
42010001	Dembinai nandandepa anom alupumi ananimi 72-peleim nasapa'am mafe' biam atom mali'ana mafe'. Anan nasapa'am mafe' taun wambel hiagoma anan na'i neafe'agoma.
42010002	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' piti aof hianai gwa'aimi hiami maof ea'. Ea' epes sanda' maoli owa' hiase, kwawie'is. Ea' ipe' penda' beten pihali' Dembinai ofagonama aofi. Pihali'ana ma nosapa' epes hiesi sefe' sonda' maola sola gwa'aimi ananimi sembe'am etifigin.
42010003	Ipe' fo'o. Peme', ae' esapa'epa pefe' si'i sipsip nogami la'afena nombagw wandafumi aolopumi.
42010004	Ipe' ina pefa' paos manisi soloma brasbeli su, owa'. Ipe' ina penda'masa nemaf bu'unai enis amam nematawa eaf, owa'. Pefe' mehip.
42010005	I'i ipe' pefe' piwis anona ipat, ata' pili' pi'i na'ama pi'i, afa' wa'i God nonda' opalef ipe' hipei pape ipat anae' mope awanem.
42010006	I'i enin epen opaf awanena nepe ipat anama, ea' basef bu'wami ipe'imi mopoma epen inima. I'i owa', hapaimi, basef amama bu'wami motanimani mopomepa la'ela'ef.
42010007	Ipe' peape ipat anama atona. Ina pepe pefe' ifagw mamumami, owa'. Pepe ipat anama atona pea' gwa'aimi embel esis sasi'ipami. Dei' main, epes sanda' maoli andeande'ma mofa' otamba ma maol amam manda'anai.
42010008	I'i ipe' pefe' piwis anona taun ama esis sofa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pefa' gwa'aimi esis sase' ipe'ami.
42010009	Ea' penda' isima awes nanda'asi bo'wes wambel anama. Ea' pi'ipa esis pi'i, ‘Nemaf anama felefele'ma neataga ma ipe' piowis wambota Godi numafipa.’
42010010	Ea' ipe' i'i pefe' piwis anona taun ama esis owa' seafa'epa pefe' ifagw asasimi, ipe' pefe' pitu eaf taun anama pi'i,
42010011	‘Etap ma taun anama ipe'inai maila bo'wagah afa'imi, ea' afa' upati'am motanima mefe'mago ipe'. Ama ipe' ukup mondanda' pegawa basef amama andeande'. Nemaf nataga felefele'ma epes siowis wambota Godi. Ea' ipe' pandaiwa'.’
42010012	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama lu'unai God nowaloga epesanai anan anona nemaf niti esis fowa' gani sape Sodomi uwahipis andeande'. Ea' epes isima wambel anama anan ina niti uwahipis, owa'. Nimanimi lu'wami endilisi anona nemaf motagamas.”
42010013	“Ae' ati ipe' Korasinipei paloma Betsaidaipei uwahipipa endilisi! Nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamepa. Epes isima fowa' gani sanda' waf aonai sape wambel biefina Tair naloma Saidoni, esis ina sati ikwaf la'ifinai naninani si'i dei' anda'ana wambel ipe'inai, owa'. I'i esis siti pepel anama, esis sowaho'am begah pepe'atami si'i luwaguf tol sope nif agambeh. Ama sihi'amba enis epes esis samboma opalef endilisi safe'ma God. Owa'etin.
42010014	Anona nemaf God nowaloga esis amam nematawa hiesi, niti esis fowa' gani sape Tair naloma Saidoni uwahipis andeande'. Ea' ipe' owa'. Anona nemaf pefa' nimanimi awami endilisi.
42010015	Ea' ipe' Kaperneam, anona nemaf esis sefela agof ipe'imi molata ilif? Owa'etin. Anona nemaf God nokwahipa pefe' pewala wambel aonai hel.”
42010016	“Emi egafis seme' malogof ipe'imi, esis same' malogel Ae'anai wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis sese'epa alafugah ipe', esis saso' alafugah ma Ae' ea' sase'ana alafugah Anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.”
42010017	Ea' amam amama mafe' manda' maoli 72-peleim motanima mafi'i mandanifel endilisi ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wahapila agel ine'inai, ambagof awami mame' basef afa'imi.”
42010018	-
42010019	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ati Satan nowai heven si'i otaga holala ma dililimbugwalag. Peme', ae' ase'epa pepel ipe' ma nambimb la'ifipa pefa'asa iguf awami wandafumi moloma awisiguf. Ama la'ifipa pili'amona epen aonai Satan naloma pepel hianai ananinai. Ea' ina nambimb anom amamaga mohambombagepa, owa'.
42010020	Ea' ipe' ina pendanifel ma ambagof awami mame' basef ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' pendanifel ma God nanda' agof ipe'imi mail buk ananinai gani heven ilif.”
42010021	Nogota anama atona Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapa danifela opaf Jisasi ea' Jisas na'i, “Ahalome, ine' Dembinai ma ilif etapi. Ae' afela agel ine'inai anifelina. Dei' main? Ine' nambaho' amamaga amama ma esis epes gawaisi sofa' gawa lu'unai, ea' nambomam nihi' ambasam epes isima gawa a'asi falafisi isima sape si'i awasi. Ahalome, okom ine'inai na'i, ea' amama atom.
42010022	Ahalome ae'anai nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam mape lagel ae'anai. Ina enin epen negawa ae' Nogalomana Godi, owa'etin. Anan atona nogawe. Ea' owa' enin epen negawa Ahalome, owa'. Ae' Nogalomana ananiwei atowe egawana. Ea' emi egafis ihi'ambasa Ahalomei, isima wapoti' esis etis sogawana.”
42010023	Ea' anan nandamboma nati alupumi ananimi atom mape malomana na'ipam na'i, “Epes sati amamaga ipe' patulumi esis sandanifel.
42010024	Dei' main? Fowa' gani amam king dambami hiami maloma amam profet hiami ma'i miti amamaga amama dei' ipe' patulumi. Owa'. Ukup amamumi maimailam endilisi ma mame' basef amama ipe' pame'ami, owa'. Amam ina mame'am.”
42010025	Anona aman gawainai nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nohafel na'i nogwamba Jisas nememe'mana. Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' enda' maina nambimb efa' ambal namunai eape andeande' la'ela'ef?”
42010026	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Maim basef mapoma mi'uli Godi? Ine' natalifam na'imama?”
42010027	Ea' anan nagwamana basef na'i, “Ukup ipe'imi mohafela Dembinai God ipe'inai mimilana na'ama. Ukup ipe'imi mimilana hi'ilam, pese'ana ambagof opalef moloma pepel ipe'inai pese'anam hi'ilama Dembinai God atona. Ea' ukup mimila enis epes sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.”
42010028	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Amama ine' nagwa basef andeande'. Ine' nenda'am na'ama ma nambimb neape ambal namunai la'ela'ef.”
42010029	Aman anama na'i nondanda' agel ananinai atona nope bo'ona. Ea' na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Epes sape felefele'ma ae'i, esis emi egafis?”
42010030	Ea' Jisas nagwamana anom basef na'i, “Anona aman nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' nakini' Jeriko. Ea' anom manda' wali matolona eaf, mahana kwapete'ana mola'ipana amamaga hiami luwaguf maim ananimi. Amam manda'am na'ama makwahona mafe'. Anan nataga si'i naga'i.”
42010031	Nemaf anama anona aman pris naila eaf anama nafe'. Ea' nati aman anama, nisila'ana naila eaf wa'ol atogon nafe'.
42010032	Ea' anona aman wambota Livai naila eaf anama nafi'i wapoti'. Nafi'i nati aman anama nisila'ana naila eaf wa'ol atogon nafe'.
42010033	Ea' anona aman Samariainai naila eaf anama nafi'i natagama aman anama. Anan natolona nati owahipina endilisi.
42010034	Ea' nafe' felefele'ma anan nakolo'wa wel marasin naloma embel waina melegw ananimi, ea' nowa'manam. Ea' nafelana nawamonana natoma donki ananinai nofa'ana nafe' nahaponana nape ipat esis fi'ife' sapeinai ea' na'ipa aman numafi ipati ma numafiana andeande'.
42010035	Ama wafilu anan nase'ana otamba siliwa biam aman numafi ipat anamai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nimafi aman anama andeande'. Ama i'i enin moni ine'inai nese'anana, nambimb itanimai egwamenana.’ ”
42010036	Jisas na'ipana basef amama ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' ine' okom nape na'imama? Amam wanom maila eaf mafi'i, emi nanda'am si'i aman nape felefele'ma aman anama amam awami mahanai?”
42010037	Ea' nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama Samariainai nati anan uwahipina nagiambamana.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fo'o nenda'am na'ama etin.”
42010038	Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' eaf, ea' nataga anona wambel nafe' nawis. Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Marta kofa'ana kwafe' ipat akwa'unai.
42010039	Owama'w akwa'ukwi agili'wa Maria. Maria kwafi'i kwape felefele'ma bo'wagah Dembinai, kwame' basef ananimi.
42010040	Ea' Marta kwanda' maol hianai ma kwandondomba gwa'aimi. Okom natanea ma amamaga mamumami. Ea' kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' niti uwahipiwi. Owame ae'akwi kwa'waha ae' atowe anda' maola andondomba gwa'aimi. Ine' kipa'w kufi'i kwigiambame.”
42010041	Ea' Dembinai nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Marta, Marta, okom ine'inai napoma amamaga mamumami ma opaf ine'inai nafe' aona ma amamaga hiami.
42010042	Ea' waf bu'unai atotona ine' a'ena. Maria kwa'i kofa' amamaga amama bu'wami mikila' anom. Ina enin epen la'ifinama nili'amona amamaga amama bu'wami ma akwa'w, owa'.”
42011001	Anona nemaf Jisas nanda' beten nape anagon. Nanda' betena hi'alan, anona alupunai ananinai na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' nihi'ambafa onda' beten si'i fowa' Jon nihi'amba alupumi ananimi.”
42011002	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Nemaf anama ipe' pi'i penda' beten, ipe' pi'iam na'ama pi'i, ‘Ahalomapa, ape' ma'i agel ine'inai nope bo'ona ma hiesi sefela agel ine'inai lu'una. Ape' ma'i nemaf anama bu'unai nifi'i ma epes hiesi siowis wambota ine'inai numafias.
42011003	Dei' ine' nese'apa gwa'aimi mondahama nemaf anae'.
42011004	Ine' nekwahomapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Dei' main? Ape' wapoti' makwahomasa waf aonai enis sanda'mapanai. Ine' owa' nili'apa mefe'ma amamaga ahifimi meagwamba ape'i.’ ”
42011005	Ea' na'ipam anom basef womun etin na'i, “I'i anona aman alupunai ipe'inai nefe' nie'ipa alupunai ananinai owamb amaneta ni'i, ‘Alupinai, ine' se'e bret wanifina
42011006	ma imafi alupunai ae'anai nafi'i natagama ae', ea' ae' gwa'aimi a'e ma imafiana.’
42011007	Ea', aman anama napani ipat nomon nagwa basef na'ipana na'i, 'Ae' andaiwa'ma nese'e noma'w ae', owa'. Ae' awasi sa'oh ea' ao'was ma'oh lehis. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma esafel ease'ena gwa'aimi, owa'.’
42011008	Ae' a'ipipa, aman ahalomai ipat ina okom napomana na'i aman anama alupunai ananinai ma nohafel nease'ana gwa'aimi, owa'. Anan okom aona ma name' aman anama falafala la'ela'ef napomana. Amama atom dei' nohafel nase'ana amamaga hiami anan nahali'anami.
42011009	Dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' pihali' God, nese'epa amamaga. Amama ipe' peagolopami, nambimb pitolom. Ipe' peha uta, nambimb God nusi'amepana.
42011010	Dei' main, emi egafis sohali' Godi, sofa' amamaga. Emi egafis sogolopa amamaga, nambimb sotolom. Ea' emi egafis seha utai, nambimb God nuwisi'amasana esis.
42011011	I'i enin so'uso'win nehali' ahalomana ma anona aol, anan ina nambimb nose'an anona yul aonai, owa'.
42011012	I'i so'uso'win nihali' ahalomana ma anona kofemb, nambimb nose'ana anona aunil aonai? Amama wapoti', owa'.
42011013	Ea' ipe' amam nematawa aopei pase'asa amamaga bu'wami atoma awasi ipe'isi, ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heven ilifi anan wapoti' nambimb nose'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai esis sahali'anai.”
42011014	Ea' Jisas nogalo'mana ambal aonai nape nasopama malogel anona amani. Nafa' nafe', ea' aman anama ambo'ona noga na'i. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ukup matamea ma aman anama nataga bo'ona.
42011015	Ea' enis epes sa'i, “Anan natofa ambagof awami ma pepel anan dembinai ma ambagof awami agilinama Belsebul.”
42011016	Ea' enis epes sa'i sogwambana sofalana sa'i anan ata' nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai nafi'i heveni ma sotolona sogawa endilisi God nagiambamana.
42011017	Ea' anan nogawa ukup asasimi na'ipas na'i, “I'i enis epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma sondawaloga biefis sopa', ina nambimb la'ifis, owa'. I'i enis epes wambota atona sondawaloga biefis sopa, esis ina nambimb la'ifis sopa', owa'.
42011018	I'i wambota Satani sondawal biefis sopa', nambimb wambota anama la'ifis sopa' si'imama? Owa'etin. Ipe' pa'i ae' atofa ambagof awami ma pepel ambal aonai Belsebul. Na'ama ae' dei' a'ipipa basef amama.
42011019	I'i endilisi ae' atofa ambagof awami ma pepel Belsebuli, dei' emi nigiambama epes ipe'isi satofam? Owa'. Dei' epes isima sihi'ambepa basef amama ipe'imi owa' endilisimi.
42011020	Pepel Godi atona nagiambama ae' atofa ambagof awami. Na'ama dei' ipe' pegawa nemaf anama epes siowis wambota Godi numafias nataga ma ipe' ea'.”
42011021	“I'i anona aman la'ifinai nohapila wambawa maim nopoma ipat ananinai andeande', amamaga ananimi hiami mopen andeande'.
42011022	Ea' i'i anona aman la'ifinai endilisi nikila' aman anama ma anan notaga la'ifina nifi'i nonda' wandaf nolomana nikila'ana wambawa maim aman anama nawamona okomami, nofa' amamaga ananimi nowalogam mefe'ma anom amam.
42011023	Emi egafis owa' alupisi ae'asi owa' sepe la'ela'ef neloma ae'i, esis naumbih ae'asi. Ea' emi egafis owa' sekolasa sipsip moloma ae'asi, esis satofa sipsip mafa' mefe' atona etin.
42011024	Nemaf anama anona ambal aonai nakwaha enin epen nawisi nafi'i, anan nafe' anama fatauguma nogolopa anagon na'i neapoma noma'w. Nagolopagon owa' niti anagone ea' ni'i, ‘Ae' etanima efe' ipat fowa' apeinai.’
42011025	Ea' nafi'i nati ipat anama sambefana andeande' sofalo'mana nape.
42011026	Ea' notanima nafe' nao'wai anom ambagof awami 7-peleim wapoti' mafi'i mawis mape ipat anama. Ambagof amama awami endilisi manda' waf aonai nikila' waf aonai fowa' nali' nanda'anai. Fowa' epen inima nape awen, ea' dei' nape awen endilisi nikila' pe fowa' nali' napeinai.”
42011027	Jisas ata' na'i basef amama etin, enis epes hiesi safi'i salipana. Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwape la'afena esis kwa'i na'ama kwa'i, “Nemata'w akwama fowa' kolaena ma kwase'ena nomambeh ine'i, akwa'w kwandanifel.”
42011028	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Owa'etin. Ipe' amam nematawa pame' basef Godi ma pagi'mami, ipe' pandanifel ea'.”
