42011029	Amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sandakolas sape, Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa dei' pape etap anae', ipe' epes aopei. Dei' pa'i piti anona ikwaf la'ifinai. Ae' owa' enda'ana. Ikwaf anama fowa' gani God nihi'amba profet Jonai atona anona nemaf ihi'ambepana ipe'.
42011030	Anona profet Jona nataga si'i anona ikwaf nihi'amba esis amam nematawa Ninivaisi. Ea' na'ama etina ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ataga ape si'i anona ikwaf Godi ma ipe' amam nematawa pape nogota anae'.
42011031	Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes, nemaf anama ano'w nemata'w kwin dembe'wi kwapani gani wa'ol aon nowalama lambihilifinama kohafel koloma ipe' pape na'ae kogwamepa basef motanima milipa kwi'i ipe' epes aopei. Dei' main, kwin akwama kwapani gani etap nafe' netambela, ea' kwafi'i kwame' basefa gawa lu'unai dembinai king Solomon nawalipasanai. Ea' dei' anona nikila' Solomon nape na'ae.
42011032	Nemaf anama God nowaloga esis amam nematawa esis epes Ninivaisi sohafel sola' basef motanima milipa ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Dei' main? Esis Ninive same' basef Godi Jona na'ipasami, ea' samboma opalef sakwaha waf aonai safe'ma God. Ea' dei' anona aman nikila' Jona nape na'ae.
42011033	Epes ina sokata lamifah nomon ifagw sosapa'am sombaho'am mafe' owina maloh, owa'etin. Esis sawamonam matoma balatagw ilifa sawis sati howalagon.
42011034	Naep nomon ukup ipe'imi si'i lama alop si'ina ipe'inai. I'i ukup ipe'imi bo'om mupe, alop si'ina ipe'inai nififil hi'ilana. Ea' i'i ukup ipe'imi aom, nambimb alop ipe'inai hi'ilana akutina.
42011035	Dei' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama nafifili nape nomona ipe'i akotina.
42011036	I'i alop ipe'inai nififil hi'ilana, ina anagon kwaie'ugun akotigin, owa'. Ea' nambimb alop ipe'inai howalana hi'ilana endilisi si'i lamifah matoma mafifil mafifimipa.”
42011037	Jisas nanda' basef amama hi'alam, anona aman Farisi nofalana na'i nifi'i nea' gwa'aimi nolomana. Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis nomon ipat natoma tebol.
42011038	Ea' Farisi anama nati anan nafe' nape na' gwa'aimi owa' nesa'opa lagof muli' si'i waf amam Farisi mailanai. Ea' anan okom natanea ma waf anama.
42011039	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ipe' Farisi, ipe' pandombasa kapi plet ande'am atom andeande'. Ea' nomon owa'. Ipe' opalef nomon si'ipama waf walanai naloma anona waf aonai wapoti'.
42011040	Ipe' epes ukup mahipei. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, God nanda' amamaga ande'am, nomonam wapoti'.
42011041	Ea' amamaga mala nomon kahi plegw ipe'imi, amama ipe' penda'am pese' epes kwahusi pigiambamas. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb amamaga hiami ambo'om andeande'.
42011042	Ipe' Farisi uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami nambimb meatagamipei. Ipe' pawaloga nambawa lombo maloma akwal mamumami hiami pase'ana tu'wanim God. Ea' ipe' pindihi'ama waf bu'unai ukup maimaila Godanai ukup mase'epana nape. Waf anama naloma waf pindalali pese'ana amamaga maim Godanai, anama pekolasana pihapilana etin pilana.
42011043	Ipe' Farisi, ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Ukup ipe'imi mase'epa pa'i pepe siaifah bu'wami naep epesi nomon ifagw pa'i basef papeimi. Ea' esis amam nematawa seanifelipa sonda'mepa nemaf bu'unai ipe' anama epes hiesi sandatama sapoma.
42011044	Ae' a'i uwahipipa endilisi ma nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Ipe' si'i hiegilif mape mandambaho' etap owin, epes ina sogawam, owa'. Esis satoma safe' ilif ande' atogon.”
42011045	Anona aman gawainai nawalipasa mi'uli Godi nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'iam na'ama, na'i basef la'ifimi na'i afa' epes aofai.”
42011046	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipe' amam dembipei gawaipei pawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ipe' wapoti' ma nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Ipe' panda' amamaga nimanimi mapei'as esis amam nematawai, noma'w nahas. Ea' ipe' owa' pigiambamas pefa' nimanimi amama lagof ipe'imi, owa'etin.
42011047	Ae' a'i uwahipipama nimanimi awami anona nemaf meatagamipei! Esis akusipa ipe'isi saha amam profet maga', ea' ipe' pala' hi'agilif amamumi.
42011048	Waf anama nawalapa basef alihim na'i ipe' pa'i a'e ma esis saha amam profet fowa'imi maga'. Ea' dei' pala' hi'agilif amamumi,
42011049	panda'am na'ama si'i God anan gawa bu'unai napeinai na'i, ‘Anona nemaf ae' esapa' anom profet moloma Aposel mefe'mago esis, ea' soha anom moga' ea' anom sonda'am kwapete'am.’
42011050	Ea' dei' amam nematawa nogota anae'isi, anona nemaf God nose'asa nimanimi ma ofagema amama saha profet hiami afum hi'alam fowa' gani dambadamba God nanda' ilif etap ea' nafi'i nataga nogota anae'.
42011051	Nali'i esimbel mali'i Abeli nafi'i natagama profet esimbel Sakaraiai sahana afuna la'afena ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai naloma balata saofa mafis sase' Godami. Amama ofagema nambimb mila ipe' etipa dei' pape etap anae'.
42011052	Ipe' amam gawaipei pegawa mi'uli Godi, ae' a'i uwahipipa ma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf meatagamipei. Dei' main, ipe' pakwaha ki anama pefa' gawanai. Ipe' etipa ina pawisi' uta pawis nomon, owa'. Ipe' pahopa eafa enis sa'i siowis nomoni.”
42011053	Ea' Jisas nakwaha ipat anama nawis ande', amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi wandafum kwapete'am endilisi ma magolopa anona eafa meanda'mana basef. Amam ma'i mogwamba malogel ananinai ma basef mamumami mahali'anami.
42011054	Amam mape mati anan la'ela'ef ma'i mome' anan ni'i anom basef motaga malogel ananinai ma monda'mana kot.
42012001	Nemaf anama do'ok enis amam nematawa hiesi endilisi safi'i sonduwa'anima endilisi sandafofo'asanama etin bo'wagah asasimi. Ea' Jisas nali' na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma yis amama amam Farisi. Basef ofagema ma yis amama ma'i waf baso'mainai ma'i malogof biam.
42012002	Amamaga mape mandambahi'i, anona nemaf motaga alihim. Amamaga mandambaho' mape, anona nemaf hiesi sotolom alihim.
42012003	Ea' basef hiami ipe' panda'am owambi anona nemaf sotolom alip. Ea' basef ipe' pa'iam so'uso'umbili ifagw nomoni, nambimb sotoma ifagw ilif sowalapam alihim.
42012004	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' a'ipipa na'ama. Ipe' owa' umbamohepama esis soha alop atona neaga'i ea' anona nemaf esis ina la'ifisa sonda' anom amamaga wapoti', owa'.
42012005	Ea' ae' ata' i'ipipa aman ipe' umbamiehipamanai. Anama nohepa peaga'i, ea' anona nemaf wapoti' la'ifinai ma neakwahipa pefe' wambel aonai hel. Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' umbamiehipamanai, aman anama atona.
42012006	Ipe' pegawa, epes satala amiguf sa'umi wanom biam otamba 2 toea. Ea' God ina okom mase'ana anona amil sa'unai na'amainai, owa'.
42012007	Endilisi, Anan neambam auf malo balagah ipe'imi God neambam dondo' hi'alam. Ipe' owa' umbamehepa. Anan okom napoma ipe' pikila' amiguf hiami amama sa'umi.
42012008	Ae' a'ipipa, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Emi egafis sewalapa agel Ae'anai ma amam nematawa hiesi, anona nemaf ae' ewalapa agof epes isima ma naep amam ensel Godi.
42012009	Ea' emi egafis sowa' alafugaha Ae'i naep amam nematawai, anona nemaf ae' ewa' alafuga esis ma naep amam ensel Godi.
42012010	Emi egafis seanda' anom basef awami findiwama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, nambimb God nokwahomasa awami esis sanda'ami. Ea' emi egafis sanda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi, anona nemaf God owa'etin endilisi ma neakwaha findiwa anama aonai ma epes isima.
42012011	Nambimb esis sofa' ipe' pefe' piowis ifagw amama esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi o sofa'epa pefe'ma naep amam dembemi gavman moloma agufumi monda'mepa kot, ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Ipe' ina pi'i, ‘Nambimb ape' mi'i basef mi'imama? Nambimb mi'i maim basef?’ Owa'.
42012012	Dei' main, nogota anama atona Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambepa maim basef atuwasi peagwami.”
42012013	Anona aman atotona ma amam nematawa hiesi anan na'ipa Jisas na'ama na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ine' ni'ipa sahalome ae'anai nowaloga amamaga amama ahalomafai nese'e amamaga wa'am.”
42012014	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' andaiwa'! Emi nandandepa ae' ma epe eawaloga amamaga ma ipe'? Owa'etin.”
42012015	Ea' anan na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma ipe' ina kowalepama anom amamaga. Epen amamaga hiamini endilisi, ina nefa' ambal namunai ma amamaga amama ananimi, owa'.”
42012016	Ea' nase'asa anom basef womun etin na'i, “Aof anona aman otamba hiamunai nola gwa'aimi hiami.
42012017	Aman anama okom napoma anan atona na'i, ‘Dei' ae' ata' enda'am i'imama? Ae' ifagw a'e ma etama gwa'aimi ae'ami hiami imbe'am mea'ome.’
42012018	Ea' na'i, ‘Ae' enda'am na'ama. Etala ifagw ae'ami ea' ila' dambaimi lu'wami mikila' fowa'imi. Ama nambimb ikolasom ewa'aniam gwa'aimi wit hiami moloma amamaga hiami bu'wami ae'ami mo'oh ifagw amama.
42012019	Ea' i'ipa ae' i'i, “Ine' nape andeande'. Amamaga hiami bu'wami mape mondahama afagof hiami. Ea' dei' nepoma noma'w nea' gwa'aimi embel nendanifel nepe.” ’
42012020	Ea' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' aman nahaga nagouli! Dei' owamb anae' igi ambal ine'inai nega'. Ea' amamaga amama hiami ine' nanda'am nandondombam ma'ihi, amama nambimb emi nefa'am?’
42012021	Amama na'ama etin si'i epes satama amamaga hiami asasimi atom sambe'am ma'oh. Esis amamaga a'asa naep Godi.”
42012022	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina ukup motamea mefe' ma ambagof ipe'imi ea' pi'i, ‘Ape' ata' mea' main?’ Owa'. Ipe' ina ukup motamea ma alop ipe'inai pi'i, 'Nambimb ape' monda' main mombahe' alop ape'inai?’ Owa'.
42012023	Dei' main, ambagof afa'imi ina gwa'aimi atom. Ea' alop ina luwaguf atom, owa'.
42012024	Ipe' ukup mopoma amiguf. Amiguf owa' mowa gwa'aimi, mola' gwa'aimi. Ea' owa' mefa' gwa'aimi membe'am ifagw amamumi. God atona nase'am gwa'aimi. Ea' ipe' epes pikila' amiguf amama endilisi.
42012025	Ipe' emi atuwasi la'ifina okom natanea nawis niwatania anona nemaf wapoti' ma ambal ananai nope nogota laona wapoti'? Owa'etin.
42012026	I'i ipe' owa' la'ifipama penda' anom amamaga sa'usa'umi na'ama, dei' maina ipe' ukup ipe'imi motamea ma anom amamaga mamumami wapoti'?
42012027	Ipe' ata' ukup mopoma afis. Amam ina manda' maol ina manda' luwaguf maim, owa'etin. Ea' ae' a'ipipa, fowa' gani anona aman amamaga hiamunai Solomon nanda' sosaf hianai ma luwaguf ananimi, sosaf ananinai ina bo'ona si'i afis amama, owa'etin.
42012028	Otalef amama dei' ata' motawa aof ama naman atef sotopa'am sokwahom mefe' nif. Otalef amama awami God nofalo'mam. Ea' ipe' amam nematawa pikila' otalef amama. Ea' dei' ipe' pembale'efa basef Godi, bale'ef ipe'inai ina la'ifina, ipe' pegawa endilisi anan numafipa andeande' wapoti'.
42012029	Ea' ipe' ina ukup motamea pi'i, ‘Nambimb mea' gwa'aimi embel eti?’ Owa'. Ipe' ina ukup aom motamea ma amamaga amama, owa'.
42012030	Epes sololama Godi ukup matamea mafe' endilisi ma sogolopa amamaga amama hiami. Ea' ahalomepa ipe'inai nape heveni anan nogawa ea' amamaga amama a'ipei.
42012031	Ipe' ata' ukup mili' pegolopa waf bu'unai noloma piwis wambota Godi numafipa pili', ea' nese'epa amamaga amama ipe' wapoti'.
42012032	Ipe' epes si'i sipsip kwaie'umi ina umbamohepa, owa'. Ahalomepa ipe'inai okom bo'ona ma ipe' piowis wambota ananinai numafipa.
42012033	Ipe' pese'asa amamaga hiami ipe'imi ma enis epes sotalomepam, ea' pefa' otamba pewalogam pese' isima kwahusi pigiambamas. Ipe' penda' maol pegolopa paos otambaimi anona nemaf owa' motaga aom. Ipe' pekolasa otamba wiga maim amamaga bu'wami atom heven ilif nemaf owa' hegilialami. Anama sakowalefi ina suwis sokowalopam, owa'. Sopafowa maim owa' meatotopa'am hiahaom, owa'.
42012034	Dei' main, maina wambel amamaga bu'wami ipe'imi ma'oma, wambel anama atona anona nemaf ukup ipe'imi wapoti' meapoma.
42012035	Ipe' penda' luwaguf ipe'imi bandam, pewaho' legw, ea' pekata lamifah pendondombol pindumafuma pepe.
42012036	Ipe' pepe si'i epes sape sahafa aman dembinai asasinai na'i nokwaha gwa'aimi lu'wami sandase'amai notanima nifi'i. I'i nifi'i noha uta ipat ananinai, esis suwisi'manana mehip.
42012037	Andeande'ma amam manda' maoli mundumafuma mope miti dembinai amamunai nifi'i notoloma mondanifel. Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nambimb dembinai nili' nowaho' lowaf bandana nowaho' let, ama nonda'mam gwa'aimi. Ea' ni'ipam motoma tebol ea' anan nifi'i nease'am gwa'aimi.
42012038	Anan nifi'i amaneta la'afina o noloma awatagw muli' meanda'am, o maina nogota, ma nieti amam mundumafuma mope, amam mondanifel.
42012039	Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef womun etin. I'i ofagenama ipati nili' nogawa nogota nanda' wali neafi'ianai ma nundumafuma nope, nanda' wali ina nambimb nifi'i nupusila ipat ananinai nuwis nomon, owa'etin.
42012040	Ipe' wapoti' pundumafuma pepen. Dei' main? Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ifi'i anona nemaf ipe' ina pegawa pi'i ifi'i ulal nemaf anama, owa'.”
42012041	Ea' Pita na'i, “Dembinai, basef amama womun etini ine' nase'afam afa' atofa, o esis amam nematawa hiesi wapoti'?”
42012042	Ea' Dembinai na'i, “Emi egafis gawaisi sape sanda' maol andeande' panda' waf bu'unai? Epes isima dembinai asasinai nambimb nondandepas ma sumafi ananimi manda' maoli ma sease'ama gwa'aimi amam nogota dembinai na'ianai.
42012043	Anona nemaf dembinai asasinai notanima nifi'i ma nieti esis isima sanda' maol andeande', esis isima sendanifel.
42012044	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, dembinai ananinai anona nemaf nondandepasa sope dambesi sumafi amamaga ananimi hiami.
42012045	Ea' i'i epes isima ukup mapoma opalef asasimi atom ea' si'i, 'Dembinai ape'inai ina nambimb nifi'i ulal, owa'etin.’ Ama esis sohafel soha enis amam nematawa sanda' maoli, sa' gwa'aimi embel da gwa' sonda' spak sape.
42012046	Esis i'i sonda'am na'ama, dembinai asasinai nambimb notanima nifi'i anona nemaf esis isima ina nambimb si'i dembinai nifi'i ulal, ata' owa'. Dembinai nifi'i nogota anama esis ukup mease'asanama. Nifi'i nohambombaga esis isima endilisi, ea' nonda'asa sope soloma epes owa' seambale'efa Godi seapoma.
42012047	Emi egafis sanda' maola anani, esis segawa ea' ma okom dembinai asasinai, ea' esis owa' seandondomba amamaga siela nomonas dembinai, anona nemaf dembinai nohas mehip endilisi.
42012048	Ea' emi egafis sanda' maoli owa' seagawa okom dembinai asasinai ma seanda' waf nendahama esis sefa' nimanimi, nambimb dembinai nohas sa'ombel. Ea' emi egafis enis sease'asa amamaga hiami, anona nemaf epes isima si'ipas sogwamasam amamaga wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis enis sease'asa amamaga hiami sase'as sumafiami, anona nemaf epes isima si'ipas sogwamasam wapoti' mikila' fowa' sali' sase'asami.
42012049	Ae' afi'i ma ekata nif etap anae' ea' a'i nif amama dei' fendom lu'um. Owa', ata' owa'.
42012050	Ea' ae' okom na'i efa' anom baptais. Dei' ae' owa' ata' efa'am, okom ae'anai aona endilisi ma ehafa efa' baptais amama.
42012051	Ipe' pa'i ae' afi'i ma indiwa wandaf hianai netaga etap anae' ma hiesi sope opalef awanem? Owa'. Ae' a'ipipa, ae' afi'i ma ewala epes esis amam nematawa hiesi.
42012052	Ama dei', anona nemaf wapoti' epes wanis bias sope ipat atotona wambota atotona sondawaloga biefis. Wenis soloma bias sifitap ea' bias soloma wenis sifitap ea' na'ama etin.
42012053	Nambimb esis sondawaloga, anona aman noloma ahalomana ananinai mondawaloga biefim, ea' ano'w nemata'w koloma mama'wakw ondawaloga biefiwa, ea' mefi'makw ako'ukwi koloma ma'makw kwandagi'mokwi ondowaloga biefiwa.”
42012054	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis amam nematawa wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pati otaga natefi gani aon newalama, mehip ipe' pa'i, ‘Atuwasi asaf a' nelai’ ea' asaf a' nalai.
42012055	Ea' ipe' pati uf la'ifinai naluwi aon natopa'ima wa'ol nataga, ipe' pa'i, ‘Atuwasi owaf a' nuluwi la'ifina.’ Endilisi, naluwi la'ifina na'ama etin.
42012056	Ipe' epes pa'i malogof biamipei! Ipe' pati ikwaf hianai ilifanai etapanai andeande', ea' dei' ipe' owa' peagawa ikwaf nogota anae' andeande'.”
42012057	“Dei' maina ipe' owa' powaloga waf bu'unai?
42012058	Nemaf anama ipe' pefe' peloma epen inima na'i nenda' kotimipei, ipe' ata' pefe' eaf, nogota anama pese'ana okom pewalapa amama pi'iam peloman. Na'ama epen inima nenda'epa penda' basefa amama ma jas nonda'epa pefe'ma polisman ea' monda'epa penda' kalabus.
42012059	Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina nambimb pekwaha ipat anama sanda' kalabusanai ulal, owa'. Ama peagwa amamaga lu'wami sa'umi ma wiaf ipe'inai hi'ilana, pefe'.”
42013001	Nemaf anama atona enis epes sape sa'ipa Jisasa enis epes Galilisi. Nemaf anama fowa' esis sape sondolalima God sanda' ofa etin, gavman dembinai Pailat nahas saga'.
42013002	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ipe' ukup mandanda'mas ma'i epes isima sa'i sikila' enis epes Galilisi sanda' waf aonai, ama ofagema amama atom dei' sofa' nimanimi amama saga'?
42013003	Ae' a'ipipa owa'etin endilisi! I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalefa waf aonai ipe'inai, anona nemaf ipe' hipei pega' na'ama etin si'i esis.
42013004	Dei' si'i main enis epes isima 18-peleis wambel anama Siloam ipat launai nato nahas saga' hi'alas? Amama ipe' pa'i waf aonai asasinai nikila' waf aonai enis epes sape Jerusalemi?
42013005	Owa'etin. I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, anona nemaf ipe' hipei pega' na'ama etin si'i esis.”
42013006	Ea' Jisas nawalapa anom basef wamon etin na'i, “Anona aman nawa anona lawag fik aof ananinai nawa wain. Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', su'utipa lawag anama owa' nili.
42013007	Ea' na'ipa anan nanda' maol aof anamai na'i, ‘Neme'. Afagof wanom ae' afi'i agolopa su'utip lawag anama fik, owa' nili. Na'ama dei' ine' lena. Dei' main netawa nefa' ifat atona etap etin?’
42013008	Ea' anan nanda' maol aofi nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' ata' kwahona notawa afagel anae' atona. Ama ata' ela' etap noloma umba bulmakaum esembe'ana.
42013009	Ama iti nambimb niema su'utip afagel anae' o owa'. I'i owa', wila ine' nelena.’ ”
42013010	Nemaf anama esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai Jisas na'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa anona ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nomon.
42013011	Ea' ano'w nemata'w ambal aonai napei'wi kwape, ambal anama aonai nanda'akw awasi'w kwape afagof 18-peleim ea' alafuga akwa'unai nondala'akw, ina kohafel kwaitu andeande', owa'etin.
42013012	Ea' Jisas natolo'w nofala'w kwafi'i na'ipakw na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' atofa awes ine'inai dei' nataga bo'wena.”
42013013	Anan nasa lagel ananinai nemata'w akwama ea' mehip kwaitu usi'ikw. Ea' kwafela agel Godi lu'una.
42013014	Ea' aman anama numafi ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai okom wandafuna ma Jisas nanda'akw kwataga bo'okw nemaf anama sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' anan na'ipa esis amam nematawa na'i, “Nimeguf amama wanom wanom sanda' maolanami. Ea' dei' ipe' pi'i aman anama notofamepa awes ipe'inai, andeande'ma pifi'i nemaf anama sanda' maolananai. Ea' ipe' ina pifi'mai maol anama ma nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai.”
42013015	Ea' Dembinai nagwamana basef na'i “Ipe' amam pa'i malogof biamipei! Peme! Nemaf mapoma noma'wanai ipe' hipei pafe' ifagw bulmakauwi ma patagaha bulmakau maloma donki ipe'imi pao'wam mafe' ma' embel.
42013016	Ea' nemata'w akwama kwataga wambota Abrahami, Satan nowa'akw la'ifikw kwape afagof 18-peleim. Ea' dei' nemaf anama mapoma noma'wanai ae' a'i etagaha mandof nowa'akwi ma kweape wafifi'w.”
42013017	Jisas na'iam na'ama, nanda' esis naumbih ananisi ambagof aom kwapete'. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sandanifel endilisi ma amamaga bu'wami la'ifimi hiami anan nanda'ami.
42013018	Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti na'i, “Epes siowis wambota Godi numafias si'i main? Ae' indila'wifam i'imama?
42013019	Amama si'i anom nalelef so'uso'umi ape' mofalam ma'i mastet. Anona aman nofa' nalelef amama nawam aof ananinai. Anom nimeguf mafe' ea' mataga malo si'i lawah lu'wami ea' amiguf mafi'i mala' alegah mailam.”
42013020	Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' a'i indila'wifa epes siowis wambota Godi numafias i'imama?
42013021	Ae' indila'wifama anom yis ano'w nemata'w kofa'am kwambomam maloma plaua hiami. Ea' mafe' mawis plawa hiami manda'am matef lu'um.”
42013022	Jisas nafe' wambel hiagoma lu'wagoma sa'ogoma nape felefele'ma eaf nafe' Jerusalemi nawalipasa basef esis amam nematawa, ea' nafe' okom na'i nefe' Jerusalem ea' nafe'.
42013023	Ea' anona aman na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i ihali'ina ma epes isima anona nemaf God nofa'as seatanimani. Isima hiesi o kwaie'wis?” Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i,
42013024	“Ipe' pepe la'ifipa penda' maol lu'unai endilisi, pefe' piwis uta sa'unai. Dei' main, epes hiesi anona nemaf si'i suwis nomon, ea' owa' la'ifisi.
42013025	Anona nemaf ofagena ma ipati nohafel nowalowa uta ipat anama. Ea' ipe' pifi'i pitu peha uta ande' pefalana na'ama pi'i, ‘Dembinai, usi'amapa uta.’ Ea' nogwamepa basef ni'i, ‘Ipe' enimaipei? Ae' owa' egaopei, ipe' enimaipei?’
42013026	Ea' pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Ape' mape ma' gwa'aimi embel malomena, nape nawalapa basef na'ipapa wambel ape'inai.’
42013027	Ea' anan anona nemaf nogwa basef ni'i, ‘Ipe' enimaipei? Ae' owa' egaopei. Ipe' epes panda' waf aonai, ipe' si'amae!’
42013028	Anona nemaf ipe' piti Abraham noloma Aisak noloma Jekop moloma profet amama hiami mope wambel Godi ea' ipe' owa'. Ipe' nogalo'mepa pepe ande'. Anama pelef mehip pena' nalelef tilili talala' kwapete' pepe.
42013029	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sifi'i gani aon natefima nowalama naso'ma noloma anama wa'owa'ol esis sope sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami wambel Godi.
42013030	A'e endilisi, enis epes dei' sataga sagi'i agof a'asi, anona nemaf sefa' agof lu'wami sope sili'. Ea' enis dei' sataga sali'i sofa' agof lu'wami anona nemaf agof a'as setaga sigi'.”
42013031	Nogota anama atona anom amam Farisi mafi'mai Jisas ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nekwaha wambel anae' fo'o anagon. Dei' main, Herot na'i nehena nega'.”
42013032	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fo'o pi'ipa aman anama nanda' do'ufi douf si'i nombat aolopunai pi'ipana pi'i, ‘Dei' naman wapoti' ae' etofa ambagof awami mape epesi, ea' enda' awes nanda'asi setaga bo'wes. Anom nimeguf mefe' ea', nemaf nefe'ma wenifi hi'ilana, embefa maol ae'anai hi'ilana.’
42013033	Ea' dei' naman bimb ae' efe' enda' maol anama. Ina andeande'ma esis soha anona profet noga' anona wambel, owa'. Sehana noga' Jerusalem atagon.
42013034	Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ipe' paha amam profet afumi, pakwaha otamba paha amam God nasapa'am mafe'mai ipe'i, la'ela'ef ae' a'i ekolasa ipe' epes hipei si'i awata numa'inai nowa'ani nogami nakolasom mawis behenagof ananimi. Owa'etin, ipe' pandaiwa'.
42013035	Ipe' peme'! Dei' ipat bu'unai naloma wambel ipe'inai atuwasi wafina notawa etin. Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ina petolowe wapoti' ma nambimb pie'i, ‘Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma aman anama nafi'i agel Dembinai.’ ”
42014001	Anona nemaf esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat Jisas nafe' naloma anona aman Farisi na' gwa'aimi ipat ananinai. Ea' esis sanda'ana naep di'indi'ana endilisi.
42014002	Anona aman lagufi bo'wagah malatawana kwapete'i nape Jisas opafunama.
42014003	Ea' Jisas nati aman anama, nahali' amam gawaimi mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi na'i, “A'i afa' onda' aman awes nanda'anai bo'ona nemaf anama Sabat mapoma noma'wanai, o owa'?”
42014004	Ea' amam masopama malogof. Ea' nahapila aman anama nanda'ana bo'ona nasapa'ana nafe'.
42014005	Ea' Jisas nahali'am na'i, “I'i anona aman ipe'inai awani ananini o anona bulmakau ananinai sowala hul lounai nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai, a'i aman anama ahalomas asasinai nefe' nigiasi mehip nemaf anama o owa'? Endilisi, nefe' nigiasi.”
42014006	Ea' amam basef a'am.
42014007	Ea' Jisas nati esis safi'mai gwa'aimi amama sa'i sope siaifah bu'wami matawa sali'i bo'wagoma atogon. Ea' na'ipasa basef womun etin na'i,
42014008	“I'i anona aman nofalepama anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sonda'ama aman naso' nemata'wi ma pefe', ipe' owa' pefe' petoma pili' siaifah bu'wami amam dambami atom matomami, owa'. Na'ama aman anama nofo'o nofalai anona aman agel lu'unai nikila' agel ine'inai.
42014009	Ama aman anama nofalena nifi'i ni'ipina ni'i, ‘Ine' kwahomana sia inima bu'wani aman anae'.’ Nonda'am na'ama, ine' ambal aona endilisi. Ea' nonda'ena nefe' nepe nigi'i ipat basagaf.
42014010	Ea' i'i anona aman nofalena nefe' nea' gwa'aimi nelomana, ine' nefe' nepe nigi' ipat basagaf. Nenda'am na'ama ma atuwasi nofalena nie'i, ‘Alupinai, ine' nifi'i nepe nili' bo'ogoma!’ Anan nonda'am na'ama, atuwasi nefa' agel lu'unai ma naep epes isima hiesi sa' gwa'aimi salominai.
42014011	Dei' main, epes emi egafis sefela agof asasimi atom, God nonda'as sisila'. Ea' epes emi egafis senda' agof asasimi misila'i, anona nemaf God nefela agofa esis.”
42014012	Ea' Jisas na'ipa aman anama nahali'ana nafe'ma gwa'aimi amama na'i, “I'i ine' nenda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami o sa'umi, ine' owa' nefala alupisi soloma sahin owan wambota ine'isi wambel atona amamaga hiamisi, owa'. I'i nenda'am na'ama, nambimb esis sofalena ma nefe' nea' gwa'aimi ifagw asasimi, ea' sogwamena gwa'aimi ine'imi.
42014013	Ine' nenda' gwa'aimi lu'wami, nefala isima kwahusa amamagai, bo'wagah awomisi, naep mase'asi.
42014014	Epes isima ina la'ifisa sogwamena gwa'aimi ine', owa'. I'i ine' nenda'am na'ama, nendanifel nepe andeande'. Ea' anona nemaf God nogwamena amamaga amama bu'wami nemaf anama epes isima sanda' waf bu'unai saga'i sohafel wapoti'.”
42014015	Anona aman asasinai na' gwa'aimi nalomas name' basef amama, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Emi egafis sepe sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami wambel Godi, esis sendanifel.”
42014016	Ea' Jisas na'ipana basef womun etin wapoti' na'i, “Anona aman na'i nonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami. Ea' nofalai epes hiesi safi'mai gwa'aimi amama.
42014017	Nemaf danda' endilisi ma gwa'aimi amama mataga, ea' nasapa' anona nanda' maola anani nafe' na'ipa epes isima fowa' nofalasi. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i. Amamaga hiami mandandombam mape ea'.’
42014018	Ea' epes isima hiesi atona etin sohafel sa'i basef sa'i esis ina safe', owa'. Anona aman na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' andaiwa'ma efo'o. Ata' efe' etopa'ma aof ae'anai.’
42014019	Ea' anona na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' atala bulmakau 10-peleim monda' maol mowala etap, ea' dei' efe' endondomam. Ea' ae' ina efo'o.’
42014020	Ea' anona na'i, ‘Dei' etef ae' aso' nemata'w. Na'ama ae' ina efo'o, owa'.’
42014021	Ea' aman anama nanda'mana maoli notanima nafe' na'ipa dembinai ananinai ma amama. Ea' ofagenama ipati opaf wandafuna ea' na'ipa nanda'mana maoli na'i, ‘Ine' mehip fo'o eaf hianai lu'unama sa'onama ma taun anama ea' nefa'ai isima falafisi, naep mase'asi, lagof bo'wagah awomisi ine' ne'wasi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'anai.’
42014022	Ea' aman anama nanda' maolananai na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' aila basef ine'imi ea', ati ipat ina dei' si'ina, ata' owa'.’
42014023	Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' fo'o eaf hianai lu'unama sa'onama nila indalelemb nefe' aof ea' ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi sifi'i suwisi nomon ipat ae'anai ma si'ina.
42014024	Ae' a'ipina endilisi, epes isima hiesi fowa' ali' efalasi, dei' andaiwa' ma sea' gwa'aimi ae'ami.’ ”
42014025	Amam nematawa hiesi safi'i saloma Jisas, ea' nandamboma na'ipas na'i,
42014026	“Emi egafis sifi'mai Ae', ma esis owa' sesambala mamasas wauhiamas wauhupawa batawisas asasisi soloma sahin owan wambota asasinai, ea' ambagof asasimi wapoti', esis ina nambimb sepe la'ifis sepe alupisi ae'asi, owa'.
42014027	Ae' efa' nimanim awami anda' maol Godi sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Emi egafis owa' senda'am na'ama etin si'i ae' ma sieili, epes isima ina la'ifis setaga alupisi ae'asi, owa'.
42014028	Enin epen ipe'ini i'i nenda' anona ipat lu'unai nolata ilif, enin nenda'am ni'imama? Enin ata' nope nomonas motamea andeande' nili' ma nogawa andeande' otamba amama nanda' ipatami. Nambimb otamba ananimi mondahama ipat anama hi'ilana o owa'?
42014029	I'i owa'etina nenda' amama meali', ma nili' nonda' simen etina owa' nonda' ipat anama hi'ilana. Nambimb epes hiesi satolonai si'i basef aman anama sonda' findiwana
42014030	si'iam si'i, ‘Epen inima nasefela ipat anama, ea' enin owa' la'ifin nembefanae.’
42014031	Anom basef wapoti' amama. I'i anona aman dembinai king ni'i nofe' nopa' noloma anona king, anan ata' nope okom notanea andeande'. Soldia ananimi 10-tausen etin, ea' king anama nagi'i anan nifi'i noloma soldia ananimi hiami 20-tausen. Ea' king anama nali'i na'i ata' nili' nogawa na'ama. Anan nambimb nopa' noloma king anama nagi'i la'ifinama notofam o owa'?
42014032	Anan nonda'am na'ama ma i'i nogawa anan ina la'ifina, naumbih ananimi ata' mopani laogon, nili' nosapa' anom amam mofe'ma anan mofalana mi'ipana basef mi'i wandaf hapainai.
42014033	Ea' ipe' na'ama etin. Ipe' emi egafipa owa'etina pewa' alafugah ma amamaga ipe'imi ma pesambalom, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipa pepe alupipei ae'ipei, owa'.
42014034	Ipe' pegawa sol amama bu'wami. Ea' i'i sol amama mumbul owa' usihim, owa'etin. Nambimb ipe' penda'am pi'imama usihim wapoti'? Owa'.
42014035	Sol amama ina bo'oma ape' monda'am aof, o mokwahom moloma umba bulmakaum, owa'etin. Ape' mokwahom etin. Emi egafipa aligah magalipei pame' basefi, pilam.”
42015001	Epes hiesi saloma anom mofa' takisi maloma enis epes sanda' waf aonai safi'i felefele'ma Jisas same' basef ananimi.
42015002	Ea' amam Farisi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi manda' megah mahama anan ma'i, “Aman anama naloma epes isima sanda' waf aonai nofalas alupisi nalomas na gwa'aimi.”
42015003	Ea' Jisas nase'ama basef amama womun etin na'ipam na'i,
42015004	“I'i anona aman ipe'inai numafi anom sipsip 100-peleim ama anona atotona hegililana, aman anama ata' nokwaha sipsip amama 99-peleim mitu mea' otalef anagon, anan ata' nefe' nogolopa anona hegilalanai. Nogolopana nafe' nafe' natolona nafelana
42015005	nowandefana ekaf ananinai, nandanifel nefa'ana nafi'i.
42015006	Nafi'i nataga ipat ananinai, nofalai esis alupisi ananisi saloma esis wambel atona sandakolas etifigin. Ea' na'ipas na'i, ‘Ipe' pendanifel peloma ae'! Anona sipsip ae'anai hegilalana, ea' ae' afe' agolopana atolona efa'anai ea'.’ ”
42015007	Dei' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa na'ama etina esis amam nematawa sape heven ilifi sandanifel ma epes isima 99-peleis ambo'wes, ina sanda' waf aonai ma sotanima somboma opalef, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen nenda' waf aonai ni'i nemboma opaf, esis sape heven ilifi sondanifel endilisi ma enin. Danifel asasinai nikila' sandanifela epes isima sape bu'wasi.
42015008	I'i ano'w nemata'w anona moni 10-peleina siliwa anona atotona higililana, atuwasi konda' maina kogolopana kwutolona? Akwa'w kwakata lam kombefagon ipat nomon kogolopana andeande' hi'alagon kofe' kofe' ma kwatolona.
42015009	Akwa'w kwatolona ea', kofala esis alupisi wambel akwa'unai sondakolasi ea' kwi'ipas kwi'i, ‘Ipe' pendanifel peloma ae'! Anona moni ae'anai higilalana, ea' dei' agolopana afa' atolona etanima efa'anai ea'.’
42015010	Dei' ae' a'ipipa na'ama etin si'i amam ensel Godi mandanifela enin epen nanda' waf aonai nemboma opaf nafe'ma God.”
42015011	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Anona aman batausan biam.
42015012	Aonama awagufunai nafe' na'ipa ahalomana ananinai na'i, 'Ahalome, ae' okom napoma otamba maim amamaga afa' ofa'ami ma nemaf ine' nega'. Dei' ae' a'i efa' tu'wanim ae'ami. Ine' niwalom biefim newalogamafam afa' biafa. Ae' a'i ine' nese'eam dei'.’ Ea' ahalomam nawaloga amamaga hiami ananimi mafe'ma amam batausana biam.
42015013	Ea' ina ata' nogota laona aonama awagufunai nefa' amamaga hiami ananimi nafe' napani anona wambel laogoma ea' nase'asam amamaga hiami ananimi ma waf naninani aonai anan naila okom ananinai na'i neanda'anai. Ea' otamba ananimi hi'alama ma waf aonai.
42015014	Anan nakwaha otamba ananimi hi'alam, nogota nolomahasanai nataga lu'una etap anama hiagoma hi'alagon. Ea' anan amamaga a'ana nape wafina.
42015015	Ea' anan nafe' nanda' maola anona aman etap anamainai. Aman anama nasapa'ana nafe' etap ananinai ma numafi bogof ananimi.
42015016	Bogof amama ma' su'utip lawahim, ea' anan wapoti' na'i nea' su'utip amama ma opaf ananinai. Anan ina enis sase'ana gwa'aimi, owa'.
42015017	Anan nape na'ama anom nimeguf, okom ananinai nogawa andeande' ea' na'iam na'i, ‘Amam hiami manda' maola ahalome ae'anai amam gwa'aimi hiami endilisi. Ea' ae' ape na'ae nolomahe endilisi.
42015018	Hapaimi, ae' atuwasi ehafel efe'ma ahalome ae'anai. Ea' i'ipana i'i, “Ahalome, ae' anda' waf aonai ma God ine' wapoti'.
42015019	Dei' ae' ina aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefala ae' nogalomena ine'iwei, owa'. Ine' nenda'e epe si'i anona nanda'mena maoli.” ’
42015020	Ea' nohafel nafe'ma ahalomana. Ea' anan ata' nafi'i laogon ahalomana natolona, okom nainailana endilini nasagih nafe' nahapilana nombalo'ana nasisi' dalogw.
42015021	Ea' nogalomana na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahalome, ae' anda' waf aonai ma God ine' wapoti'. Ae' ina ata' aman bu'uwei ma ine' nefala ae' ni'i nogalomena ine'iwei, owa'etin.’
42015022	Ea' ahalomana na'ipa amam manda' maola anani na'i, ‘Ipe' fa'ai lowaf bu'unai launai namunai ae'anai pefa'ana pifi'i ulal pewaho'manana anan. Ea' pelamana anona ring faf ananinai, pelamana su bo'wagah ananimi.
42015023	Fa'ai bulmakau noganai anama lu'unai gigititi'i pehana ma ape' mea'ana mondanifel molomana.
42015024	Dei' main, nogalome anama ae'anai andowelamana si'i naga'i, ea' dei' ambal napaina wapoti'. Anan higilalana ea', dei' matolona wapoti'.’ Ea' esis sandanifel salomana.
42015025	Ea' nogalomana dembenama napani aof nafi'i. Ea' anan nafi'i nataga felefele'ma ipat, name' maguf sanda' musik salemb.
42015026	Ea' nofala anona nanda' maoli nahali'ana na'i, ‘Esis sanda' main?’
42015027	Ea' anan nanda' maoli na'ipana na'i, ‘Owalomena ine'inai notanima nafi'i, ea' ahalomena ine'inai nandanifel nalomana, na'ama dei' naha anona bulmakau lu'unai. Dei' main, anan notanimai ina ata' nape aona, owa'. Nape andeande'.’
42015028	Ea' nogalomana dembenama okom wandafuna ea' nandaiwa'ma nuwis nomon ipat. Ea' ahalomana nawisi ande' na'ipana mehipa nuwis nomon, owa'etin.
42015029	Anan nagwamana basef ahalomana na'i, ‘Afagof hiami ae' ahapila maol ine'inai si'i agel a'e anda' maol atona. Ae' ina esambala basef mi'uli ine'imi anona nemaf, owa'. Ea' ine' owa' nese'e anom amamaga so'umi atom si'i meme noganai ma eandanifel eloma alupisi ae'asi, owa'etin.
42015030	Ea' sa'usa'uni anama ine'inai anan nase'awa amamaga hiami ine'imi ma awau nematawa gembaiwai. Ea' dei' notanimai, ine' okom napomana dei' nahamana bulmakau anama anan.’
42015031	Ea' ahalomana na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome, la'ela'ef afa' biafa wape etifigin. Ea' amamaga ae'ami amama ine'imi atom.
42015032	Ea' dei' afa' ondanifel, opalef afa'imi mope bo'om. Dei' main, owalomena anama ine'inai fowa' nafe' laogon si'i naga'i, ea' dei' nafi'i nataga ambal napaina wapoti'. Anan higilalana, ea' dei' afa' watolona wapoti'.’ ”
42016001	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Anona aman amamaga hiamunai nao'wa anona ananinai numafi opeh ananimi nape. Ea' enis safi'mai anan sambaso'mana anan nanda'mana opehi ma basef sa'i, ‘Numafi maol ine'imi anan nakwaha otamba hiami ine'imi mafe' etin.’
42016002	Ea' nofala aman anama numafi maoli nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dei' maina basef anama ae' ame'ama ine'? Ine' nefe' niamba amamaga ae'ami mape lagel ine'inai newalapam. Ina ata' nepe nimafi maol ae'anai wapoti', owa'.’
42016003	Ea' numafi maoli okom natanea na'i, ‘Ae' nambimb ata' enda'am i'imama? Dembinai na'i nigalo'me ma epe imafi maol dei'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi ma ewala etap. Ea' ambal aona indaila enis epesa gwa'aimi maim.
42016004	Ea' ae' okom natanea ma anom amamaga eanda'ama nambimb epes sofa'e efe' ifagw asasimi ma nemaf anama dembinai nigalo'me ma maol anama dei' anda'anai.’
42016005	Ea' nofala amam hiami atona etin wialef mataomami mafi'mai anan. Anona aman nali' nafi'manai nahali'ana na'i, ‘Ine' wialef ma'um mapoma dembinai ae'anai?’
42016006	Ea' anan na'i, ‘Darep wel lu'wami 100-peleim.’ Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' mehip nepe niti tiketa wiaf nenda' amefa darep 50-peleim atom mil.’
42016007	Ea' anona nataga nahali'ana na'i, ‘Wialef ine'imi ma'um?’ Ea' anan na'i, ‘Begah witim 100-peleim.’ Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nefa' tiket anama wiaf ine'inai nailanai ea' nenda' 80-peleim.’
42016008	Ea' aman dembinai nafela agela aman anama aonai numafi maoli. Dei' main, anan nanda' waf gawainai si'i aman nomonas mapeinai. Epes ukup asasimi maimaila amamaga maim mape etap anae' esis sanda' maola waf gawainai si'i epes nomonas mapeisi sikila' epes sape howalagon owa' segawa andeande'i.”
42016009	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ma moni wiga maim ma'oh etap anae', ipe' penda' enis amam nematawa sotaga alupisi ipe'isi. Ea' i'i nemaf esis sohapila wiga monianai hi'ilana, anona nemaf God nofa'epa pefe' ifagw mape ilif heveni pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
42016010	Emi egafis sumafi amamaga sa'umi andeande', anona nemaf sumafi amamaga lu'wami andeande' wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis sembaso'am, owa' seanda' maol andeande'ma amamaga sa'usa'umi, anona nemaf esis ina senda' amamaga lu'wami andeande' wapoti', owa'etin.
42016011	I'i ipe' owa' pimafi moni wiga maim mape etap anae', anona nemaf emi nese'epa amamaga bu'wami endilisi pimafiam? Owa'etin endilisi.
42016012	I'i ipe' owa' pimafi amamaga enis epesi, emi nese'epa amamaga ipe'imi atom pimafiam? Owa'etin.
42016013	Ina enin epen nanda' maoli la'ifin nihapila maol biefina amam dambami biam, owa'etin. Na'ama okom nila anona, anona nesambalona. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' ina la'ifipa pepe owina God noloma wigai moni wapoti', owa'.”
42016014	Amam Farisi mame' basef amama hiami Jisas na'iami, amam manda'mana salamal etin. Dei' main, amam ukup maimaila moni atona.
42016015	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' panda' maol ma epes hiesi sitilipa si'i ipe' epes bu'upei. Ea' God nogawa ukup ipe'imi nomon. Amamaga epes safela agofami satalom otamba lu'wami, amama falafumi atoma naep Godi.
42016016	Basef amam profet mawalipasami maloma basef mail mi'uli God nase' Mosesanai amama amam mawalipasam la'ela'ef mape mafi'i metambel nogota Jon nataganai. Ea' nogota anama Joni nafi'i nataga dei' basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias, amama mape mafe' mataga wambel hiagoma. Ea' epes hiesi la'ifis sanda' maol mehip ma sefe' siowis wambota Godi numafias.
42016017	Anom basef tu'wanima amef sa'usa'umi moloma anom basef bandami mail nomona buk mi'uli Godi ina anona nemaf mefe' higililam hi'ilam, owa'etin. Mope la'ela'ef hihif na'ama etin. Ea' etap naloma otaga anona nemaf hegililam.
42016018	Emi egalin nakwaha waulu'mana anani'wi ma nease' ano'w nemata'w wapoti', anan nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama nali' nase'akwi. Ea' emi egalin naso' ano'w nemata'w fowa' anona aman nagalo'makwi aman anama nagi' nase'akwi wapoti' nanda' waf aonai so'a waola nemata'w akwama.
42016019	Anona aman amamaga hiamunai nape. La'ela'ef anan nala siaogw bu'wami atom luwaguf bu'wami satalom otamba lu'wami. Ea' nimeguf hiami nefa' gwa'aimi bu'wami atom nape andeande' endilisi.
42016020	Ea' felefele'ma ipat ananinai anona aman kwahunai nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim nape, agilinama Lasarus. Alop ananinai si'ina ma maselis.
42016021	Enis epes sofa'ana safi'i na'oh felefele'ma ipat aman anamai. Anan na'i notatama gwa'aimi tukwakwanimi mowa ma'oh tebol owinam aman anama amamaga hiamunai ma ata' nea'am nease' opaf. Ea' nombagw mafi'i mapalo'mana maselis ananimi afegah amamumi.
42016022	Anom afagof mafe'ma ea', aman anama falafunai naga', ea' anom ensel mofa'ana mafe' mahaponana nape wambel bu'unai felefele'ma Abraham. Ea' aman anama amamaga hiamunai anan wapoti' naga, sawana.
42016023	Ea' nafe' wambel aonai hel nofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' natologon nalata ilif, nati Abraham napani laogon endilisi, Lasarus nape nalomana.
42016024	Ea' nofalana na'i, ‘Ahalome Abraham, ine' niti uwahipiwi nesapa' Lasarus nufi'i nola faf ananinai tu'wanina atona embel nupihi'ame afega ae'anai. Ae' ame' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma nif amae'.’
42016025	Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Nogalome, ine' okom nondanda'ma fowa' ata' nape naminai etap anae' nefa' amamaga bu'wami atom. Ea' Lasarus nofa' amamaga hiami awami. Ea' dei' wambel ana'e opaf ananinai nape bo'ona, ea' ine' nefa' nimanimi lu'wami.
42016026	Ea' anom amamaga wapoti' mape. La'afena ape' maloma ipe' God nanda' anona kwambiwag lu'unai. Na'ama epes sape na'ae ma sa'i sotopa' kwambiwag anama seafo'o ma ipe', esis ina la'ifis. Ea' epes sapani na'amai, esis ina la'ifisa sotopa'i kwambiwag siefi'mai ape', owa'etin.’
42016027	Ea' aman anama na'i, ‘Ahalome, ae' a'i ine' nesapa'o Lasarus notanima nofo'o ipat ahalome ae'anai.
42016028	Ae' anom owape wanom biam mape. Ama Lasarus ni'ipama basef la'ifimi ma momboma opalef. Na'ama amam wapoti' mufi'i wambel anae' mofa' nimanimi lu'wami.’
42016029	Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'. Owapena ine'imi mome'ago basefa Moses noloma amam profet migiambamam. Amam mome'ago basef amama.’
42016030	Ea' na'ipana na'i, ‘Ahalome Abraham, owa'etin. Ina nambimb mome'am, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen naga'i nehafel hi'agif nefe'ma amam, nambimb meme'ana momboma opalef.’
42016031	Ea' Abraham na'ipana na'i, ‘Owa'etina meame' basefa Moses noloma amam profeti, ea' nambimb enin epen naga'i nitanima nehafel hi'agif, amam ina mombale'efana wapoti', owa'.’ ”
42017001	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Endilisi amamaga amama meagwambipei motagamepa ma penda' waf aonai. Endilisi amamaga anona nemaf miatagai, ea' emi egefis sonda' amamaga amama awami motaga, ae' ati esis uwahipis endilisi. Dei' main, esis anona nemaf sefa' nimanimi lu'wami.
42017002	I'i enis epes sofa' epes isima sepa' owap lu'unai nil bagafowa asasimi, sofa'as sefe' sokwahis sowala naoh mami lu'wami ma afis, esis ata' sepe awes. I'i epes isima senda' enin so'uso'win nekwaha nembale'efa Ae', epes isima anona nemaf sepe awes endilisi sikila' sewala naoh afis.
42017003	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. I'i owalomepa ipe'inai nonda' waf aonai, pi'ipana basef mehipa nokwahana. Ama i'i anan nemboma opaf, ipe' pekwahomana waf aonai ananinai.
42017004	I'i anan nonda'mepa waf aonai ma ipe' la'ela'ef 7-peleif nemaf atotona, ama anan netanima nifi'mai ipe' 7-peileif ni'i, ‘Ae' amboma opaf.’, ipe' pekwahomana waf aonai anan nanda'anai.”
42017005	Ea' amam Aposel Jisasi ma'ipa Dembinai amamunai ma'i, “Ine' nenda' afa' ombale'efena la'ififa wikila' wali' ombale'efena.”
42017006	Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “I'i bale'ef ipe'inai so'ona nendahama si'i nalelef sa'umi mastetimi lawag, nambimb ipe' pi'ipa lawag nanima su'utip mailanai pi'i, ‘Ine' degia neloma ofagena nefe' newala naoh embel nomon,’ ea' nila basef ipe'imi.”
42017007	“I'i anona aman ipe'inai nofa' anona aman nanda' maola anan nowala etap aof o numafi sipsip, ea' wambomota notanimai nifi'i ipat, atuwasi dembinai numafi anani ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ine' fi'i mehip nepe nea' gwa'aimi’? Owa'etin.
42017008	Atuwasi ni'ipana ni'i, ‘Ine' nendondomba gwa'aimi ae'ami, newaho' let, nenda'me gwa'aimi ae' nili' nefa'am nifi'i. Ma ili' ea'am, ine' nigi' nea' ine'imi.’
42017009	Ea' atuwasi anan ninifela aman anama nanda'mana maoli ma nila basef ananimi? Owa'etin.
42017010	Ea' ipe' wapoti' na'ama etin. I'i ipe' penda' amamaga hiami hi'ilam si'i God na'ipipa, ipe' pi'i basef pi'i, ‘Afa' wanda' maoli aofai. Amamaga afa' wanda'ami, amama maol afa'imi atom.’ ”
42017011	Ea' Jisas nafe' eaf na'i nefe' Jerusalem, nafe' la'afena etap hiagoma biefigin Samaria naloma Galili.
42017012	Anan nataga anona wambel, ea' amam 10-peleim awes aonai nanda' alop amamunai nambo' mafi'i eaf ata' maituwi laogon,
42017013	mofalana mehip ma'i, “Jisas, Dembinai, ine' niti uwahipifa!”
42017014	Ea' Jisas natolom na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' fo'o pihi'amba alop ipe'inai ma amam pris.” Amam ata' mafe' etin, alop amamunai nataga bo'ona.
42017015	Anona aman amamunai nati alop ananinai bo'ona, notanima nafe' noga na'i mehip nafela agel Godi.
42017016	Ea' natambe nowafa notawa etap felefele'ma bo'wagah Jisasi nanifelona. Anan ina Judainai, owa'. Anan Samariainai.
42017017	Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Ae' a'i ipe' 10-peleipa ambo'wepa etin. Dei' 9-peleim emuma?
42017018	Amam motanima mifi'i mefela agel Godi? Aman anama anona wambelinai, anan atotona.”
42017019	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel fo'o. Ine' nembale'efa ae', amama atom dei' nataga bo'wena wapoti'.”
42017020	Anom Farisi mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Maina nogota nemaf anama bu'unai notaga ma ape' miowis wambota Godi numafiapa?” Ea' anan nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Amama esis ina satolom naep, owa'.
42017021	Esis ina anona nemaf si'i, ‘Piti, amama mape na'ae, o mape gani, owa'etin.’ Peme'! Amama mape opalef ipe'imi nomon ea'.”
42017022	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Anona nemaf notaga, opalef ipe'imi pelef endilisi pi'i, ‘Ape' ma'i aman anama notaga epen nofa' alop epesi ata' nifi'i notaga ulala ata' mutolona.’ Owa'etin. Ipe' ina petolowe, owa'.
42017023	Ea' nambimb enis epes si'ipipa si'i, ‘Piti nani nape gani,’ enis si'i ‘Piti anan nape na'ae.’ Ea' ipe' ina peme'as pigi'mas, owa'. Hapaisi.
42017024	-
42017026	Ipe' pegawa pelele'ala ma otaga dilulum bogwalag pele' pele' nafe'agon hi'alagon. Ea' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, anona nemaf enda'am na'ama etina nemaf ae' iefi'ianai. Ea' ae' ata' ili' efa' nemanimi hiami ma epes anai'isi dei' sowa' alafugahe. Waf fowa' gani sanda'ana nogota anama Noa napeinai, ea' na'ama etin si'i anona nemaf esis sonda'ana nemaf anama felefele'ma ifi'i etaga etap anae'.
42017027	Sa' gwa'aimi, sa' embel, amam nematawa sindikikila'ma sandase'ama etin safe' safe' sataga nemaf anama Noa nafe' nawis sip. Ea' embel lu'wami mataga maha esis amam nematawa hiesi afis hi'alas.
42017028	Esis sanda' waf na'ama etin si'i nogota anama Lot napeinai wapoti'. Sa' gwa'aimi, sa' embel, satala amamaga sase'asam safe'ma enis satalom, sawa amamaga aof, sala' ifagw.
42017029	Ea' Lot nakwaha Sodom nafe', ma nemaf anama atona nif maloma otamba salfa fandumi mowai heven si'i asaf nalai ea' mahambombaga amam nematawa hiesi saga' hi'alas.
42017030	Ea' na'ama etina nemaf anama ae' ataga epen endilisiwei iefi'ianai.
42017031	Nemaf anama emi epen neape ipat andi'i felefele'i, ina ata' netanima nuwis nefa'ai amamaga ananimi ipat nomon, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin epen napani aofi, ina ata' netanima nefe' ipat, owa'.
42017032	Ipe' nomonas mondanda'ma Lot waulu'mana.
42017033	Emi egafis si'i sili'akwa ambagof asasimi, ambagof asasimi anona nemaf higililam. Emi egafis sesambala ambagof asasimi, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi mope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
42017034	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama owamb amam biam mo'oh ipat lehis atifim, God nofa' anona, anona nokwahona nope.
42017035	Anowa nematawa biawa onda' maola plaua onda' bret, atuwasi God nofa' ano'w, nokwaha ano'w kope.”
42017036	[Amam biam meape aofi, atuwasi God nofa' anona, nokwaha anona nope.]
42017037	Alupumi ananimi mame' basef amama mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, amama anona nemaf motaga eti?” Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Anama alop saga'i sa'oma, ea' anama atogon anona nemaf komemb mufi'i mondowa'anima.”
42018001	Ea' Jisas nase'am basef wamon etin alupumi ananimi ma nihi'ambam monda' beten nimeguf hiami ma amam ina ala'uta neam, owa'.
42018002	Ea' anan na'iam na'i, “Anona dembinai jas nape anona taun. Anan ina umbamahana ma God, ina okom napoma enis epes wapoti', owa'.
42018003	Ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwape taun anama. La'ela'ef akwa'w kwafi'mai jas anama kwa'ipana kwa'i, ‘Naumbih ae'asi sa'i sohambombaga ae'. Ine' ata' nigiambame ma kot.’
42018004	Jas anama nali' nandaiwa'ma niegiambama'w. Nogota launai nafe' ea', okom ananinai ma'i, ‘Ae' ina umbamahema God, ea' ina ila basef epesi, owa'.
42018005	Ea' nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwase'e nimanimi ae'. Ea' hapaimi, ata' igiambama akwa'w mehipa kot. Na'ama kwafi'i la'ela'ef konda' okom nalowe.’ ”
42018006	Ea' Dembinai na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' peme' basefa jas anama aonai.
42018007	Epes isima God nandandepas ea' ananisi, esis salef sakokowe la'ela'ef owamb alip. Dei' God nigiambamasa kot o owa'? Anan nigiambamas. Anan ina ni'ipas mamumami, owa'.
42018008	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nambimb nigiambamas mehip. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ea' anona nemaf ae' iefi'i, nemaf anama iti amam nematawa etapesi sembale'efa ae', o owa'?”
42018009	Enis epes ukup mapoma esis etis sa'i esis epes bu'wasi sanda' waf bu'unai, ea' sa'i enis sanda' waf aonai. Epes isima Jisas nase'asa basef womun etin na'i,
42018010	“Anom amam biam ma'i mofe' monda' beten ipat lu'unai Godi. Anona Farisi, anona aman nofa' takisi.
42018011	Farisi anama naitu okom napoma anan atona nanda' beten na'ama na'i, ‘Ae' anifelina God, ama ae' ina si'i enis epes sanda' waf aonai. Esis sambaso'mas sofa' wiga hiahaom enis epesi, sanda' waf aonai, sanda' waf aonai so'a waulanai. Ae' anifelina ma ae' ina si'i aman nanima aonai nofa' takisi.
42018012	Wikifah hiami ae' akwaha gwa'aimi nimeguf bifa anda' beten. Ea' amamaga hiami ae' efa'ami, awala tu'wanim amamaga ase'enam ine'.’ ”
42018013	-
42018014	“Ea' aman anama nefa' takisi naituwi laogon nandaiwa'ma niniga niti heven ilif, owa'. Naha mafata ananinai la'ela'ef na'i, ‘God, ae' aman anda' waf aonai, ine' niti ae' owahipiwi nigiambame.’ Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, aman anama nofa' takisi na'iam na'ama, anan bo'ona ma naep Godi. Ea' aman anama nali' nanda' beteni, owa'. Dei' main, emi egafis sefela agof asisimi atom, nambimb God nonda' agof asasimi mowala. Ea' emi egafis senda' agof mowala, nambimb God nefela agof asasimi lu'um.”
42018015	Esis sao'wamanai enis awasi sofa'as safi'mai Jisas, sa'i anan nowamona lagofa ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Ea' alupumi ananimi mati isima ea' minifalis esis sofa'as sifi'mai anan.
42018016	Ea' Jisas nofala awasi isima safi'i felefele'ma anan ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' kwahowas awasi isima sifi'mai ae'. Ipe' ina pindaiwa'mas. Fa'asi sifi'mai Ae'. Dei' main, esis amam nematawa siowis wambota Godi numafias esis same' basef ananimi sailam si'i awasi isima.
42018017	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi. Emi egafis si'i a'e ma siowis wambota Godi numafias ama sese'ana ukup asasimi ma Anan si'i awasi isima sa'i a'e mana, isima sanda'am na'ama nambimb siowis wambota Godi numafias. I'i owa', owa'etin.”
42018018	Anona agilinai Judainai nahali' Jisas na'i, “Tisa bu'winai, ae' nambimb enda' maina efa' ambal namunai epe andeande' la'ela'ef?”
42018019	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' maina ine' na'i Ae' bu'uwei? God atona bu'unai.
42018020	Ine' negawa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai na'i, ‘Ina nenda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, ina neha enis epes soga' nenda' wal, owa', ina nembaso'ma enis epes, ine' neme' basef mamasinai nembale'am nilam ea' nimafias andeande'.’ ”
42018021	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Mi'uli anama hianai ahapilana ailana fowa' ata' sa'owe afi'i afi'i ataga dei'.”
42018022	Ea' Jisas name' basef amama na'ipana na'i, “Ine' anona waf bu'unai atotona ata' owa' neanda'ana. Ine' fo'o nese'asa amamaga ine'imi hiami enis epes sotaluma ine' nefa' moni anama nenda'ana neso' isima kwahusi. Nenda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf nefa' amamaga bu'wami gani heven ilif. Ea' nifi'i nembale'efe ae' nila ae'.”
42018023	Anan name' basef amama, opaf ananinai nimanina endilisi. Anan amamaga hiamunai. Na'ama dei' anan okom nimaninai.
42018024	Ea' Jisas natolona na'i, “Epes isima hiahaom moni hianaisi, sanda'am ahifim endilisi ma siowis wambota Godi numafias. Atona etin sefe' siowis.
42018025	Anona mafin lu'unai kamel nuwis nil nagala sagundisa luwagufanai, anama wila ma niowis. Ea' amam nematawa amamaga hiamisi i'i suwis wambota Godi, sonda'am ahifim endilisi ma siowis. Maol anama ahifina endilisi nikila' maol kamel niowis nil nagala.”
42018026	Ea' epes isima same' na'ama sa'i, “I'i na'ama, anona nemaf God nofa' emi egafis setanimani sopen andeande' la'ela'ef? Owa'etin.”
42018027	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Amamaga epes owa' la'ifisa seanda'ami, amama God atona la'ifinama nonda'am.”
42018028	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Neme', afa' wakwaha amamaga afa'imi hiami ea' dei' wafi'i wambale'efa basef ine'imi wailina.”
42018029	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipe' emi egafipa pekwaha ifagw ipe'imi ma penda' maola epes siowis wambota Godi numafias,
42018030	anona nemaf God nogwamepa amamaga hiami mikila' amama pali' pefa'ami. Anona nemaf nogota bu'unai neataga, ipe' pefa' ambagof namumi ma peape andeande' la'ela'ef.”
42018031	Ea' Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi 12-peleim na'ipam na'i, “Peme', dei' afa' ondowasa' Jerusalem. Ama basef amama hiami amam profet fowa' gani manda'am mail buki ma'i ae' ataga epen endilisiwei motaga alihim mondawalap hi'ilam.
42018032	Nambimb amam monda'e efe'ma enis epes sololama Godi. Ea' sonda'e findiwae sehe sonda'me waf aonai sisisi'wafe sopagahowe sehe ega'.
42018033	Ama nimeguf biam mefe' hi'ilam ama anona nefe'ma wenifi ae' etanima ehafel wapoti'.”
42018034	Ea' amam alupumi ananimi ina mogawa basef amama, owa'. Basef ofagema ma'iam ata' mandambaho'ma amam, ea' ina ukup mandanda'mam andeande'ma amamaga Jisas na'i neanda'ami, owa'.
42018035	Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma anona wambel Jeriko, ea' anona aman naep mase'anai nape eaf wa'ana dawalegef nandailasa gwa'aimi moni maim.
42018036	Ea' name' esis hiesi safi'i sikila'ana safe', nahali'as na'i, “Esis sanda' main notaga?”
42018037	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai anama dei' nafi'i nikila'ena nafe'.”
42018038	Ea' nofalana na'i, “Jisas, ine' akunamana Deviti, niti ae' uwahipiwi!”
42018039	Epes isima sali' safi'i sinifalana na'ama sa'i, “Ine' feso'mena!” Ea' anan fala etin nape na'i, “Ine' Devit akunamana, niti ae' uwahipiwi.”
42018040	Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu na'ipas na'i, “Kipana nifi'mai ae'.” Anan nafe' felefele', Jisas nahali'ana na'i,
42018041	“Ine' na'i ae' enda'mena main?” Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' a'i iti andeande' wapoti'.”
42018042	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Naep ine'imi miti. Ine' nembale'efa ae' la'ifina. Amama atom dei' nataga bo'wena wapoti'.”
42018043	Ea' mehip naep matiana andeande', naila Jisas nafe' eaf nafela agel Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa sati amama safela agel Godi wapoti'.
42019001	Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis Jeriko, na'i nefe'.
42019002	Ea' anona aman amamaga hiamunai nape, agel ananinai Sakius anan agilinai ma amam amama mofa' takisi.
42019003	Anan na'i niti Jisasa nogawana anan emi egafuna. Ea' amam nematawa wambelisi hiesi saitu sili'akw. Sakius anan bandabandanai, ea' ina nati Jisas, owa'.
42019004	Ea' nasagih nali' nafe' nalata natoma anona lawag fik ama niti Jisas niefi'i.
42019005	Ea' Jisas nataga anama naniga nati ilif na'ipana na'i, “Sakius, dei' ae' efe' epe ipat ine'inai. Ine' sila'i mehip.”
42019006	Ea' nisila'i mehip okom ananinai nandanifel, nao'wa Jisas nafe' ipat ananinai.
42019007	Ea' esis amam nematawa sati amama, ukup aom endilisi sa'i basef mamumami sa'i, “Anan nafe' nape ipat anona aman nanda' waf aonai.”
42019008	Ea' Sakius nehafel naitu na'ipa Dembinai na'i, “Dembinai, ine' neme'. Dei' ae' a'i ewala amamaga hiami ae'ami la'afen na'ama etin, ea' ese'as tu'wanim isima kwahusi. I'i ae' embaso'ma enin epena ekwalopa amamaga ananimi, nambimb ae' egwamana hiami bifibif.”
42019009	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' God nefa' amam nematawa sape ipat anae'i sotanimani ea'. Dei' main, aman anama wapoti' akunamana Abrahami.
42019010	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' afi'i ma egolopa epes higilalasi efa'as setanimani.”
42019011	Esis same' basef amama, ea' Jisas nafe' nataga felefele'ma Jerusalem, ea' epes hiesi ukup ma'i dei' atef God nifi'i numafi epes Ananisi nupe dembinai ma esis ea' epes hiesi sotolona. Na'ama Jisas na'i basef amama womun etin
42019012	na'i, “Anona aman dembinai na'i nefe' anona wambel laogoma ma esis sonda'ana nope king. Anona nemaf anan notanima nifi'i.
42019013	Ea' nofalai anom amam 10-peleim manda' maol ananinai, ea' natambe' moni 20 kina nandahama amam. Ea' na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' penda' maolana moni anama pefe' petagama ae' etanima iefi'i.’
42019014	Ea' esis wambel atona aman anamai ukup aoma anan endilisi. Ea' nafe' sasapa' anom amam magi'mana mafe' ma'i, ‘Ape' mandaiwa'ma ine' nepe king ma ape'.’
42019015	Owa'etin. Esis sanda'ana nataga nape king dembinai nape anom nimeguf, notanima nafi'i. Ea' na'i, ‘Falai amam amama manda' maoli fowa' ae' ase'ama moni. Ae' a'i ata' egawa moni wamanai ma'ufina amam hiami atona etin mofa'anai.’
42019016	Ea' nali'i nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maol 20 kina anama ine'inai anda' maolanana dei' efa'ai 200 kina wamanai.’
42019017	Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maol andeande'. Ine' nimafi moni anama kwawie'una andeande'. Dei' ese'ena agel lu'unai ine' ma nimafi taun lu'wagoma 10-peleina.’
42019018	Ea' anona nafe'ma biami nafi'i na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' anda' maola 20 kina ine'inai dei' etanima efa'ai 100 kina wamanai wapoti'.’
42019019	Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ae' enda'ena nimafi taun lu'wagoma 5-peleina.’
42019020	Ea' anona nagi'i nafi'i wapoti' na'ipana na'i, ‘Dembinai, 20 kina ine'inai anae'. Ae' ewa'ana hankisip ambe'ana na'oh.
42019021	Ae' egawa ine' aman la'ifinai. Anom amamaga enis epes sambe'am ma'ihi, amama ine' nefa'am. Gwa'aimi enin epen nawami, amama ine' nala'ami. Na'ama ae' ombamahe ma ine'. Ea' dei' ewa'ana moni anama na'omena.’
42019022	Ea' dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nanda' maoli, ine' epen awinai natotopa' basefi. Basef ine'imi atom ewalogena. Dei' ine' negawa ae' aman la'ifiwei ala' gwa'aimi anona aman nawami.
42019023	I'i ine' negawa na'amai, dei' nefa'ana nembe'ana benga ae' etanima ifi'i efa'ana neloma anona wamanai wapoti'.’
42019024	Ea' na'ipa esis saitu na'ama felefele'i na'i, ‘Ipe' dalombana 20 kina aman anama pese'anana aman anama nofa' moni 200 kinai.’
42019025	Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, ‘Dembinai, anan nofa' 200 kina ea'.’
42019026	Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis sohapila amamaga amama nambimb ese'asa anom amamaga wapoti' esis. Ea' emi egafis owa' sehapila anom amamaga, amamaga kwawie'um esis sahapilami, amama nambimb ae' endalombasam.
42019027	Ea' esis isima satago naumbih ae'asi, sandaiwa'ma ae' epe dembiwei king asasiwei imafias, ipe' fa'as fi'i na'ae pehas ma naep ae'ami.’ ”
42019028	Jisas na'i basef amama ea' nali' nafe' naila eaf nafe' Jerusalemi nondowasa'.
42019029	Ea' nataga Betfagei Betani wambel anama felefele'ma halaf anama oliv motawama ea' nasapa' alupumi ananimi biam mali' mafe'.
42019030	Na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' wambel nanima nape gani wa'ili felefele'ma na'ae. Pefe' piwis piti anona mafin donki sa'unai esis saundana nail. Ina dei' enin epen natomana, ata' owa'. Petagahona pefa'ana pifi'mai ae'.
42019031	I'i enin epen nihali'ipa ni'i, ‘Patagahona ma main?’ ea' pegwaman pi'ipan pi'i, ‘Dembinai afa'inai na'ipafa na'i nonda' maolanana.’ ”
42019032	Ea' amam biam mafe' mati amamaga amama na'ama etin si'i do'ok na'ipam.
42019033	Ea' matagaha mandofa donki anama sa'unai. Matagahona etin, amam mumafi donki anamai ma'ipam ma'i, “Dei' maina ipe' patagaha donki anama?”
42019034	Ea' amam ma'ipam ma'i, “Dembinai na'i nonda' anona maolanana.”
42019035	Ea' amam mofa' donki anama mafi'mai Jisas mawamona sagegw amamumi matoma ilifa donki anama.
42019036	Ea' magiambama Jisas nalata natoma donki anama nafe', ea' esis amam nematawa sa'i sefela agel ananinai lu'una. Ea' dei' sambe'amanam sagegw sase'wiam eaf sofalo'mana.
42019037	Anan nafi'i felefele'ma eaf nakini'i halaf lawah oliv motawama, alupusi ananisi hiesi sandanifel, ukup mapoma amamaga amama pepel fowa' nanda'anai. Ea' sanda' la kolo' sa'oh mehip, safela agel Godi lu'una.
42019038	Sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mefela agel God nape ilifi lu'una, howalagon anan atona. Ma'i anan nofalo'ma ine' dembinai king nafi'i agel Ananinai nese'ena pepel ma nenda' maol Ananinai. Esis sape heveni opalef awanem.”
42019039	Ea' anom dambami Farisi mape maloma epes hiesi ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' ninifala alupusi ine'isi ma ata' sosopama malogof.”
42019040	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, i'i esis seasopama malogof, atuwasi otamba atom ma'oh etapi mope mi'i mehip.”
42019041	Ea' Jisas nataga felefele'ma Jerusalem natologon nalopagon. Nalopa esis amam nematawa sape taun anamaisi.
42019042	Ea' na'i, “I'i dei' nemaf anae' atona ipe' pegawa basef ofagema ma pepe opalef awanem, amama andeande'. Owa'etin. Basef amama ata' mandambahe', dei' ipe' owa' ata' pegawam.
42019043	Anona nemaf netaga, naumbih ipe'isi sifi'i sola' indalelemb sonda' wandaf sili'akwepa. Ea' sili'akwepa endilisi ma anama hiagoma.
42019044	Ea' sehepa sohambombagepa endilisi, peloma awasi ipe'isi sape nomona wambel ipe'inai. Esis sohambombaga wambel awagon hi'ilagon endilisi, ea' ina nambimb otamba sala' ifagwami mondapapei'ma etin mope, owa'. Mo'oh deindei'. Dei' main? Ipe' owa' pegawa nemaf dei' God niefi'anai ma nefa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande', owa'.”
42019045	Ea' Jisas nehafel nawis ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ea' nagalo'mas amam amama manda' bisnisi matala amamaga ipat anama nomon.
42019046	Anan na'ipam na'i, “Basef mape Baibeli, God na'i, ‘Ipat ae'anai nondapoma esis sifi'i sopama sonda' beten sohali' Ae'.’ Ea' ipe' panda'ana nataga si'i sanda' walanai.”
42019047	Nimeguf hiami Jisas nawalipasa basef ipat anama nomon. Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam agufumi Judai maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi magolopa eafa mohana neaga'.
42019048	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ukup bo'om endilisi ma seame' basef ananimi. Na'ama amam ina mati anona eafa meahana, owa'.
42020001	Anona nemaf Jisas nape nase'asa basef amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma agufumi amam Judai mafi'mai anan.
42020002	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' ni'ipafa. Ine' nanda' maol anama ma pepel eminai? Emi na'ipina dei' nape dembinai nanda' maol anama?”
42020003	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' wapoti' a'i ihali'ipama anom basef pi'ipiam.
42020004	Aman anama Jon napisi'as embeli, God nape heveni na'ipana napisi'as o enin epen etapani na'ipana?”
42020005	Ea' amam mame' basef amama manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' wi'i, ‘God nape heveni na'ipa Jon napisi'asi’, atuwasi anan ni'ipafa ni'i, ‘Dei' maina ipe' owa' pembale'efana?’
42020006	Ea' afa' wi'i, ‘Enin epen nape etapanai na'ipana’, na'ama esis amam nematawa sohafa. Dei' main, hiesi sa'i Jon anona profet dembinai.”
42020007	Ea' magwamana basef Jisas ma'i, “Afa' ina ogawana.”
42020008	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Na'ama etin ae' ina i'ipipa ma emi nase'e agel lu'unai anda' maol anama Ae'anai, owa'.”
42020009	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef amama womun etin esis amam nematawa na'i, “Anona aman nanda' anona aof nawa wain. Ea' nakwahomana aof anama anom amam monda' maolana aof anama mofa' monianai. Ea' nafe' napani nogota launai anona wambel laogoma.
42020010	Ama nogota su'utip mailanai, anan nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe'ma amam manda' maol aof ananinai. Anan na'i amam mose'ana anom su'utip gwa'aimi ma aof anama. Ea' amam mahana matofana notanima nafe'.
42020011	Ea' nafamona aofi nasapa' anona nanda' maoli nafe' wapoti' ma amam, ea' mahana wapoti' manda'ana aona matofana nafa' nafe'.
42020012	Ea' nasapa' anona nafe'ma wenifi. Ea' amam mahana makwahona nawis ande'.
42020013	Ea' anan nafamona aofi na'i, ‘Ae' ata' enda' main? Nogalome ae'anai ae' okom nainailana, esapa'ana nofo'o. Nambimb mome' malogel ananinai o owa'?’
42020014	Ea' amam mati nogalomana ananinai nafi'i, manda'ipama etin ma'i, ‘Aman anama anona nemaf nofa' amamaga hiami ahalomanai. Afa' ohana ma afa' atofa ofa' aof anae'.’
42020015	Ea' mahana makwahona nawis aof ande'ana, mahana afuna. Ea' nambimb anan nafamona aofi nonda' maina amam?
42020016	Nambimb nifi'i noham afum hi'ilam, nose'asa aof anama nofe'ma enis epes.” Esis same' basef amama sa'i, “Waf anama aonai endilisi. Afa' wandaiwa'mana.”
42020017	Ea' Jisas natilis andeande' na'ipas na'i, “Ea' na'ama etin si'i basef amama mape Baibeli ma'i, 'Owap anama amam mala' ipati magalo'mana, dei' nataga owap nape nali'i ma nembalo' ipat.’ Basef amama ofagema ma'i main?
42020018	Emi egafis hilili'ilamas sowa owap anama, pepe'etas. Ea' i'i owap anama nowa nesali'as, loloweas si'i sopof atona.”
42020019	Ea' amam agufumi esis Judai mogawa Anan na'i basef amama womun etini mondela'wifa amam. Ea' ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa hiesi.
42020020	Ea' amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam pris dambami manda'ana naep di'indi'ana ma mombalo'ana mofa'ana. Ea' masapa' anom amam mafi'i matolona. Amam amama manda' doufindouf mambaso'am ma'i amam manda' waf endilisinai. Owa'etin. Amam ma'i mombalo'a Jisasa anom basef na'iami ma moso' anan neafe'ma gavman dembinai ma nonda' kotimana.
42020021	Ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, ape' mogawena basef ine'imi bu'wami atom na'ipasam esis amam nematawa. Ine' na'i basef atifima epes isima hiesi agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi na'ama etin hi'alas. Ine' na'ipasa basef maloma waf bu'unai Godi endilisi ma epes hiesi.
42020022	Mi'uli ape'inai na'iam na'imama? Ape' mose'ana takis Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi o owa'?”
42020023	Jisas negawa ea' ma baso'am amamunai. Ea' na'ipam na'i,
42020024	“Ipe' pihi'ambe anona moni ma ata' itolona. Ambal naloma agel anama mailanai eminai?” Ea' ma'i, “Amama gavman dembinai Sisar esis Romi.”
42020025	Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amamaga Sisari, amama pese'anam Sisar. Ea' amamaga Godi, pese'anam God.”
42020026	Ea' amam ina la'ifima mombalo'ana ma anom basefa naep esis amam nematawa hiesi, owa'. Amam ukup matamea ma basef amama na'ipamami, ea' masopama malogof tol mape.
42020027	Anom Sadyusi mafi'mai Jisas. Amam hiami mombale'ef saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'.
42020028	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, fowa' gani Moses nanda' anom basef mail buki ma ape' ma'i, ‘I'i anona aman noga' ma anan awasi a'ana, waulu'mana ata' kope, owalomana ananinai nose'akwa nola enis awasi ma soho'ofana.’
42020029	Ea' fowa' amam wambota atotona 7-peleim mape. Nali'i sahalomam nase'akw so'uso'win a'akw naga' nakwaho'w kwape.
42020030	Ea' owalomana nafela'w nase'akw.
42020031	Ea' anona owalomana la'efinai wapoti' nanda'am na'ama etin, ea' anona natu'ulanai nase'akw manda'am na'ama etin mafe' matagama owagufunai akutainai. Amam amama wambutaim 7-peleim ina mola enis awasi, owa'. Maga' etin hi'alam.
42020032	Anona nemaf nemata'w waulu'mam kwagi'mam kwagi' kwaga'.
42020033	Ea' anona nemaf esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', nemata'w akwama kope nemata'w emi'wi? Amam 7-peleim mase'akw hi'alam.”
42020034	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam nematawa nogota anae'isi dei' sandase'ama.
42020035	Ea' emi egafis God na'i bo'wes andeande'ma sotanima sohafel wapoti' sope namusi nemaf anama etap dambainai neataga ina sendase'ama, owa'.
42020036	Esis ina soga' wapoti', owa'. Sopen si'i ensel Godi. Sotanima sohafel hi'agilif wapoti'. Na'ama sope awasi Godi.
42020037	Basef amama ma saga'i sotanima sohafel wapoti', amama fowa' gani Moses nihi'ambepam nif ilalowa mataga lawag sa'unai fandonai, ma'i anan nofala Dembinai na'i ‘Ae' God Abrahami, Aisaki, naloma Jekopi.’
42020038	Basef amama ma'i God ina Dembinai ma epes isima saga'i, owa'. Anan Dembinai ma epes isima sape namusi. Dei' main, epes hiesi sape namisa naep Godi hi'alas.”
42020039	-
42020040	Jisas na'iam na'ama, amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi umbamahama mohali'ana ma anom basef wapoti'. Ea' anom magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' na'iam andeande'.”
42020041	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amam ma'i Krais, God nasapa'ana nafi'i anan akunamana Deviti. Ma'i Krais aman atona falafunai si'i epes sape etapi. Dei' maina amam ma'iam na'ama ma Krais?
42020042	Buk anama Songi Devit na'i na'ama na'i, 'Dembinai God na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai,
42020043	la'ela'ef nefe' netagama anona nemaf ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina ine' si'i sia bo'wagah ine'imi maituma.” ’
42020044	Devit fowa' gani nofala Krais na'i anan Dembinai. Amama atom Krais ina aman atona falafunai, owa'. Anan Dembinai. Dei' maina Devit nofala Krais akunamana ananinai?”
42020045	Amam nematawa hiesi ata' sape same' basef amama, Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i,
42020046	“Ipe' pindumafuma amam amama mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Amam ma'i mundawisam luwaguf bu'wami atom mefe', si'i dambami atom mandawisami. Ma'i enis epes sotolom sondalalimam sonda'mam nemaf bu'unai sinifelom anama lu'wagoma ma naep hiesi sandatama sapoma ma sefela agof amamumi lu'um. Ea' amam ukup ma'i siaifah amama motawa mali'i atom, dambami atom mapoma, nomon ifagw esis Juda hiesi sa'i basef sapeimi o anama hiesi sandakolasam nimeguf amama sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami.
42020047	Amam amama mawis ifagw amama nematawa alifiwai, manda' wala amamaga awoumi. Ea' manda' beten launai etina esis sotolom si'i amam bu'wami. Anona nemaf God nowaloga epes hiesi, enis epes owa' seanda' waf aonai na'amainai sofa' nimanimi kwawie'um ea' amam mofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi.”
42021001	Ea' Jisas nape ipat lu'unai Godi natologon tulif nati enis epes moni hianaisi sakwaha moni nowala bokis moni nalami soaso' God.
42021002	Ea' nati ano'w nemata'w alifi'wi kwala moni sa'unai biefina newala bokis amama.
42021003	Ea' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, nemata'w akwama alifi'wi kwa'waha moni lu'unai nikila' otamba hiami esis amam nematawa hiesi sakwahomi.
42021004	Epes isima hiesi moni hianai na'omas sakwaha tu'wanina atona newala bokis. Ea' nemata'w akwama moni a'akw endilisi kwa'waha moni akwa'inai hi'alana. Ea' owa' anona no'oh kweatala gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' moni akwa'inai biefina sa'unai nikila' moni hianai esis sakwahonai.”
42021005	Anom alupumi Jisasi ma'i basefa ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma'i, “Esis sofalo'ma ipat anama otamba bu'wami amamaga bu'wami esis amam nematawa sase'anam Godi.” Ea' Jisas na'i,
42021006	“Amamaga amama dei' patulumi, anona nemaf dahandahama neataga, ina anom otamba mandapapei'ma etin la'ifima mopan, owa'. Sugulatam sowalom hi'ilam mofe' mo'oh atona etin hi'ilam.”
42021007	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, maina nemaf amama motaga? Maina ikwaf nili' netaga ma afa' weagawa amama felefele' motaga?”
42021008	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma pepe. Na'ama enis epes sombaso'mepa. Epes hiesi anona nemaf sifi'i si'i agel ae'anai si'i, ‘Ae' ea' ma'uwi.’ Ea' enis si'i, ‘Dei' nemaf nafi'i felefele' ea'.’ Ipe' ina pefe' pila esis, owa'. Hapeimi.
42021009	Anona nemaf peme'asa basefa wandaf lu'unai hianai ea' enis si'i sondaiwa'ma amam gavman dambami mumafias sonda' wandaf. Nemaf anama ipe' ina umbamohepa, owa'. Amamaga amama ata' mili' motaga, ea' nemaf akutainai ina notaga mehip, ata' owa'.”
42021010	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Enis epes sape etap hiagoma sefela wandaf sopa' soloma esis sape anona etap hiagoma. Anona aman dembinai king no'wa enis wambel hiagoma ananisi sopa' soloma anona dembinai king no'wa ananisi anona wambel hiagoma.
42021011	Anona nemaf sowambon lu'unai nokoto' etap hiagoma. Anagon nolomeahas lu'unai neatagamas, wambel hiagoma ea' awes lu'unai notaga wambel hiagoma. Esis anona nemaf siti gani ilif ikwaf lu'unai neatagama amamaga mamumami monda' epes umbameahahas endilisi.
42021012	Amamaga amama hiami ina motaga mehip, ata' owa'. Esis sili' sombalo' ipe' paila basef ae'ami. Ea' sonda'epa kwapete'epa. Sonda'mepa kot nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi ea' sonda'epa penda' kalabus. Ea' sofa'epa pefe' sohaponepa pitu naep amam king moloma gavman dambami. Ipe' pefela agel ae'anai paila basef ae'ami. Amama atom sonda'epa na'ama.
42021013	Sonda'mepa waf anamanai si'i anona eafa pewalapa basef bu'wami pi'ipasam.
42021014	Ea' ipe' pihapila nomonas ipe'imi mope la'ifim, ama ipe' ina ukup mopoma anom basef pi'i pegwamasam mehip, owa'.
42021015	Dei' main, nemaf anama ae' atowe enda' basef mope malogof ipe'imi ese'epa gawa bu'unai ma epes isima ina la'ifisa seagwa basef amama ae' iesi'ipami, owa'.
42021016	Ehasepa mamasepa sahin owan esimbel atom ipe'isi soloma alupisi, esis wapoti' anona nemaf sowalapepa ma naumbih ipe'isi. Ea' soha enipa pega'.
42021017	Anona nemaf epes hiesi wambel hiagoma opalef aoma ipe' endilisi. Esis sati ipe' paila basef ae'ami, na'ama dei' sahepa.
42021018	Ea' ipe' ina nambimb pega', owa'etin. Ina anona auf atotona nape balagah ipe'imi higililana, owa'.
42021019	Ipe' pepe la'ifipa ma anona nemaf pefa' ambal namunai.
42021020	Nemaf anama ipe' piti soldia hiami esis naumbih sifi'i sonauli' Jerusalem, ipe' pegawa nambimb felefele'ma taun anama lu'unai neataga aona.
42021021	Nemaf anama amam nematawa sape etap hiagoma Judiai sofa' sefe' sondowasa' halafutagw. Ea' esis amam nematawa sape nomon Jerusalemi sokwaha wambel anama sofa' sefe' laogon. Ea' isima sape aof wambel anama, ina ata' sefe' suwis, owa'.
42021022	Dei' main, nemaf anama God nogwamasa awami isima sanda' waf aonai si'i basef hiami mail buk Baibeli mondawalap alihim endilisi.
42021023	Nematawa opafuwai waloma awama awasi ata' sa' nomagof atomi, ae' a'i awau uwahipiwa endilisi ma nogota anama ofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Nimanimi amama aom endilisi motaga etap anae' ma okom wandafunai Godi nambimb neafe'ma epes isima.
42021024	Enis, bainat nohas soga'. Enis, naumbih sonda' kalabusimas sofa'as sefe' sope etap anae' hiagoma hi'ilagon. Ea' epes isima sololama Godi sotaga sofa'asa wambel anama Jerusalem bo'wagah asasimi sumafiagon. Ea' sope la'ela'ef sefe' na'ama etina nemaf God nandandepanai ma nogota asasinai hi'ilana.”
42021025	“Nemaf anama ikwaf hianai notagama aon alipunai owambunai neloma ondowa. Etap anae' amam nematawa hiesi sape anona etap lu'unai hiagoma gegela'asis kwapete'as. Esis umba mohas kwapete'as ma naoh lu'wami mohafel lu'um mowa bililig etin ea' sowa selef.
42021026	Ea' ondowa maim mape gani ilifi mondakoto' bolatin mofe' mifi'i mope. Na'ama esis amam nematawa hiesi umbamohas kwapete'as sowa so'oh etap si'i saga'i. Esis ukup mopoma amamaga amama ma'i meataga etap anae'.
42021027	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Nemaf anama siti ae' eloma elagw otaga ilif ifi'i eloma amamaga mafifili bu'wami Godi moloma pepel ananinai.
42021028	Nemaf anama amamaga amama mohafel, ipe' pitu piniga. Dei' main, nemaf anama felefele'ma neataga God notagahipa ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai nofa'epa petanimani.”
42021029	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef womun etin na'i, “Ipe' piti lawag anama fik noloma lawah hiami wapoti'.
42021030	Ipe' piti elif monafa ma masowa, pegawa nogota anama nelemb ea' felefele'ma meaof.
42021031	Ea' na'ama etin, i'i ipe' piti amamaga amama ae' ali' a'ipipami motaga, ipe' pegawa nemaf anama Krais a' nifi'i nupe dembinai numafi epes hiesi Ananisi felefele'ma neataga.
42021032	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, amam nematawa dei' ata' papani ina nambimb pega' mehip, ata' owa', ipe' piti amamaga amama hiami motaga hi'ilam.
42021033	Otaga noloma etap hiagoma anona nemaf a' higililam hi'ilam, ea' basef ae'ami ina hi'ilam, owa'. Mope la'ela'ef hihif.
42021034	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' nemaf anama ae' iefi'ianai. Na'ama penda' waf aonai penda' waf alop atonai, pea' embel la'ifimi hiami ukup motamea ma nimanimi mamumami etapami atom. I'i waf anama nose'elipa hi'ilipa, nemaf anama ae' iefi'ianai notagamepa mehip si'i sakwaha wambawa saha mafis.
42021035	Nemaf anama notaga ma amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagomai ganigani hi'alas na'ama etin.
42021036	La'ela'ef pindumafuma pepe ma ina penda' waf aonai anama, owa'. Pepe penda' beten la'ela'ef ma God nose'epa pepel pitu la'ifipama pihi'ama amamaga amama ma'i meatagamipei. Ama pitu la'ifipa ma ae' ataga epen endilisiwei isimba'epa ewalogepa.”
42021037	Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef Jisas nape nawalipa esis amam nematawa ipat lu'unai Godi nomon, ea' owamb nafe' na'ihi halaf anama oliv motawama.
42021038	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sohafel kuhumbita atona safi'mai anona seme' basef ananimi ipat lu'unai Godi la'ela'ef.
42022001	Felefele'ma nemaf anama Pasova sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami esis Juda sogwa' bret owa' neatef lu'unaia felefele'ma netaga.
42022002	Ea' amam pris maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi magolopa eafa moha Jisas neaga'. Dei' main, amam umbamahama esis amam nematawa.
42022003	Ea' Satan nawis okom Judasi Kariotinai. Anan amam 12-peleim alupumi Jisasi.
42022004	Ea' Judas nafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma amam plisman dambami mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi. Amam amama ma'i basef mandame'mama Judas nogolopa eafa nease'ama Jisas nofe' lagof amamumi.
42022005	Ea' mandanifel ma'i basef mandame'mama mose'ana anom otamba Judas.
42022006	Ea' anan na'i a'e ma basef amamumi, ea' nafe' nagolopa eafa nihi'ambama Jisas amam meambale'ana. Anan nahafa anona nemaf ma owa' enis amam nematawa sope solomana.
42022007	Nemaf anama nataga esis Juda sa'i sonda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami sea' anona bret owa' neatifi. Anama sa'i soha anom sipsip nogami hiami ma sonda' gwa'aimi amama Pasova.
42022008	Ea' Jisas nasapa' Pita naloma Jon na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefe' pendondombamafa gwa'aimi amama Pasova ma afa' weagwa'am.”
42022009	Ea' amam mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' na'i afa' ofe' ondondomba ipat enima?”
42022010	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Peme', ipe' pefe' piwis gani wambel lu'unai, atuwasi piti anona aman nofa' embel malep lu'unai nitilipa eaf. Ea' pigi'mana pefe' piwis ipat anama anan nefe' niowisanai.
42022011	Ea' pihali' ofagena ma ipat anamai pi'i, ‘Tisa afa'inai na'ipafa na'i, ipat anama sapeinai netawa eti? Anan na'i no'wa afa' atofa alupufai ope onda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova.’
42022012	Ea' anan nihi'ambepa rum anama lu'unai nape ilifi, tebol siaifah ma'oh etifim. Ipe' pendondomba gwa'aimi rum anama.”
42022013	Ea' amam mafe' mati amamaga amama na'ama etin si'i Jisas nali' na'ipamam ea' mandondomba gwa'aimi amama Pasova.
42022014	Nogota a' nataga ma sogwa' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova, Jisas nao'wa alupumi ananimi mafi'i mape, anan nafe' nape felefele'ma tebol.
42022015	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ae' okom na'i ata' ea' gwa'aimi amama Pasova elomepa uli', ma atuwasi efa' nimanini awami.
42022016	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ina ata' ea' gwa'aimi amama Pasova wapoti', owa'. Anona nemaf basefa gwa'aimi amama Pasova ofagema motaga mondawalap alihim anama wambel Godi, eagwa'am wapoti'.”
42022017	Ea' anan nafela anona kap embel wain nalami nanifela God na'i, “Ipe' fela embel amama pendandamam.
42022018	Ae' a'ipipa, dei' anona nemaf wapoti' ae' ina ea' embel wainim elomepa, owa'. Anona nemaf epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias wambel Ananinai, ae' ea' embel wain anama wapoti' elomepa.”
42022019	Ea' anan nafelai bret nanifela God nawalona nase'am na'i, “Bret anama alop ae'anai. [Ae' ase'epana ma iegiambamepa. Penda'am la'ela'efa ukup mopoma ae'.”
42022020	Amam ma'am hi'alam, nanda'am na'ama etina anona kap embel wain nalami, na'i, “Wain embel amama esimbel ae'ami manda' basef Godi dambaimi endilisimi mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama ae' ekolo'wama iegiambamepa.]
42022021	Ea' ipe' piti aman anama na'i nowalapa ae' ma amam naumbih ae'ami, nape na' gwa'aimi nalome tebol amae'.
42022022	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, naman ega' si'i eaf fowa' gani God nandandepanai. Ea' aman anama neawalape ma amam naumbih, ae' ati uwahipina endilisi. Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami motagamana.”
42022023	Anan na'iam na'ama, alupumi ananimi atom mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Epen afa'ini emi atuwasi neanda' waf anama?”
42022024	Amam alupumi Jisasi ma'i anom basef mandahihi'anamam ma'i, “Emi nepe dembinai afa'inai?”
42022025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Amom king dambami ma esis hiesi sololama Godi sape lu'wagoma, mape dambami asasimi manda'as kwapete'as. Amam mumafi esis la'ifim, ea' ma'i esis sofalam agof lu'wami si'i manda' waf bu'unai migiambamasi.
42022026	Ea' ipe' ina penda'am na'ama, owa'. Emi egalin ni'i nope dembeni ma ipe', anan ata' nope si'i amama agof a'ami si'i isima sanda' maoli ma segiambamepa.
42022027	Emi epen dambeni nikila' enis epes? Epen natoma na' gwa'aimi teboli o epen nanda' gwa'aimi nefa'am nafe'manai? Ea' ae' ape alomepa si'i nanda' maoli ma iegiambamepa.
42022028	Fowa' amamaga amama magwamba ae'i, nimeguf amama ipe' pape palome, ipe' ina pakwahowe, owa'etin.
42022029	Ahalome ae'anai nase'e agel lu'unai na'ipi ape dembiwei, imafi enis epes. Ea' na'ama etin ae' ese'epa agof lu'wami i'ipipa pepe dembipei king pimafi enis epes.
42022030	Nemaf anama ipe' pepe dembipei king peloma ae' pea' gwa'aimi embel pelome tebol ae'ami wambel Godi. Ea' pepe siaifah bu'wami amam dambami kingi, pewaloga epes wambotagw 12-peleim ape'isi Israel.”
42022031	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Saimon, Saimon, ine' neme'. God na'i a'e ma Satan nogwamba ipe' ma penda' waf aonai si'i sandilama rais ama bu'wami mafe' anagon awami mafe' anagon.
42022032	Owa'etin. Ae' anda' betena egiambamena ma nembale'efa ae' la'ela'ef. Atuwasi nemboma opaf nenda' owapena ine'imi motaga la'ifim.”
42022033	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' andandombam elomena weafe' kalabus. Ea' ae' andandombam ega' ealomena wapoti'.”
42022034	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Pita, ae' a'ipina endilisi! Atuwasi owamb anae' awata ata' owa' neanda'am, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
42022035	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam na'i, “Fowa' ae' asapa'epa pandailagof pafe', ipe' ina pefa' paos moni nalami maloma brasbeli su, owa'. Pafe' etin. Nemaf anama anom amamaga a'epa o owa'?” Amam magwam ma'i, “Owa'etin.”
42022036	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ea' emi dei' aman paos moni nalami ma'omanai anan nefa'am. Ea' brasbel wapoti' na'ama etin. Aman bainat a'anai anan nose'asa saket ananinai enis sotalona, notala anona bainat.
