42022037	Dei' main, anom basef ma ae' felefele'ma motaga mondawalap. Anom basef mail Buk Baibeli fowa' gani ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Esis ukup ma'i ae' epen aowei atowe.’ Ae' a'ipipa endilisi! Basef amama felefele' motaga endilisi ma nimanimi lu'wami atuwasi motaga ma ae'.”
42022038	Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' niti. Afa' bainah biam amae'.” Ea' nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ea' amama.”
42022039	Ea' Jisas nakwaha taun nawis ande' nafe' halaf lawah oliv motawama si'i la'la'ef nanda'am. Ea' alupumi ananimi magi'mana mafe'.
42022040	Anan nataga na'ama na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' penda' betena amamaga meagwambaipei ina motagamepa, owa'.”
42022041	Ea' nakwaha amam nindiki'ah nafo'o felefele', nogota bandana si'i aman nakwaha anona otam nafe' nowama. Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa nanda' beten na'i,
42022042	“Ahalome, ine' ni'i a'e, nekwahome kap anama. Ea' ine' nila okom ine'inai atona, ae' owa'.” [
42022043	Ea' anona ensel nafi'i heven ilif nase'ana pepel.
42022044	Jisas name' nimanimi ea' aom endilisi, ea' nanda' beten la'ifinai endilisi, agwah mandana si'i esimbel malo etap.]
42022045	Anan nanda' beten ea' nohafel nafe'ma alupumi ananimi. Ea' nati amam ukup nimanim ambeh maham ma'oh etin.
42022046	Ea' na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'oh? Ipe' hafel penda' beten. Na'ama amamaga meagwambipei mafi'i fele' ea' motagamepa.”
42022047	Jisas ata' na'i etin, amam hiami mafi'i. Aman anama sofalana sa'i Judas, anan alupunai amam 12-peleim Jisasi, nafi'i nali'ma amam. Anan nafi'i felefele'ma Jisasa neasisi' dalogw ananimi.
42022048	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Judas, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Ine' nasisi'i nihi'amba amam naumbih ae'ami?”
42022049	Alupumi ananimi mape malomana mati amam naumbih Jisasi ma'i mombalo'ana mohana ea' mahali' Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i afa' oham bainah?”
42022050	Ea' anona alupunai ananinai naha anona aman nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami ea' natopa' aliga da'isinai pele'atana nowa.
42022051	Ea' Jisas na'ipana mehip na'i, “Kwaha waf anama.” Ea' Jisas nasa lagel aliga aman anamai, nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
42022052	Ea' Jisas na'ipa agufumi Judai maloma amam pris dambami maloma amam dambami mumafi polisman hiami mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi, mafi'i ma'i mombalo'ana. Ea' na'i, “Ipe' pefa'ai bainahi belep pafi'i si'i pa'i pewa' anona aman nanda' wandaf naloma gavmani?
42022053	Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ae' ape alomepa ipat lu'unai Godi awalapa basef bu'wami ma esis amam nematawa hiesi, ea' ipe' owa' peambale'e. Ea' dei' nogota anae' nemaf ipe'inai. Dei' waf anama owambunai a' nikila' ae'.”
42022054	Ea' amam mombale'ana mofa'ana mafe' mawis ipat pris dembinai. Ea' Pita ina nalomam nafe' etin, owa'. Nagi'mam nafe' nape laogon.
42022055	Amam makata nif indalelemb anama nomon ipat napoma mapomam. Ea' Pita nape nalomam.
42022056	Ea' ano'w nemata'w kwanda' maoli kwati anan napoma nif. Ea' kwatolona kwa'i, “Aman anama wapoti' anan nape naloma Jisas.”
42022057	Ea' Pita na'i, “Ehae', ae' owa'.” Anan na'i, “Nemata'w, ae' ina egawa anan, owa'.”
42022058	Ea' nogota bandana hi'alana, anona aman nati Pita na'i, “Ine' wapoti' ine' aman epes hiesi ananisi.” Ea' Pita na'i, “Aman, ae' owa'.”
42022059	Ea' nogota bandana si'i aua atitin, anona aman na'i basef la'ifimi na'i, “Endilisi etis, aman anama wapoti' nape naloma anan. Dei' main, anan wapoti' Galilinai atona.”
42022060	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Ehae', ae' owa' eagawa basef amama ine' na'iami.” Anan ata' na'iam etin, awata nanda'am.
42022061	Ea' Dembinai nandamboma nati Pita, ea' okom Pitai nandanda' ma basef amama do'ok Dembinai na'ipanam na'i, “Owamb anae' awata ata' owa' neanda'am, ine' atuwasi nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'iam wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
42022062	Ea' Pita nawisi nafe' ande' nalef mehip.
42022063	Amam mumafi Jisasi manda' anan findiwana mahana.
42022064	Amam mapete' anona lowaf mambaho'mana naep mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' ni'i basef profeti newalapa emi nahena.”
42022065	Ea' manda' basef hiami awami wapoti' ma anan.
42022066	Ama aon natefi amam agufumi esis Judai maloma amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, amam hiami mondowa'anima mape. Ea' mofa' Jisas mafi'mai amam mahali'ana ma'i,
42022067	“Ine' ni'ipafa. Ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “I'i ae' ipipa, ina atuwasi pembale'efam owa'.
42022068	Ea' i'i ihali'ipa ma anom basef, ipe' ina pegwam, owa'.
42022069	Ea' dei' anona nemaf wapoti' ae' ataga epen endilisiwei epe wa'ol lagel da'isinai Godi.”
42022070	Ea' amam hiami ma'i, “Dei' ine' God Nogalomana a'amon?” Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' pa'iam ea' ma'um.”
42022071	Ea' amam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ata' ome' maim basef wapoti'? Owa'. Malogel ananinai atona na'i basef amama afa' wame'am ea'.”
42023001	Ea' amam dambami hiami mohafel mofa' Jisas mafe'ma dembinai gavman Pailat.
42023002	Ea' ma'i mombaso'mana manda'mana basef ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anama nanda' waf aonai nafela ukup epes hiesi ma sonda' wandaf soloma gavman. Anan nandaiwa'ma epes sese'ana takisa gavman dembinai Sisar ea' na'ipapa na'i anan atona anona dembinai king Krais.”
42023003	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai Judai o owa'?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Basef amama ine' na'iam endilisimi.”
42023004	Ea' Pailat na'ipa amam pris dambami maloma esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ae' ina ati anom amamaga awami ma epen anama, owa'. Ina ati anona waf aonai ma aman anama enda'mana anom basef, owa'.”
42023005	Ea' amam manda'mana basef Jisasi ma'ipana basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Anan nase'asa basef esis amam nematawa hiesi nanda'as sehafel la'ifis sa'i sonda' wandafa ganima hiagoma Judia. Anan nanda'i maol gani etap hiagoma Galili ea' nafi'i nataga na'ae.”
42023006	Pailat name' basef amama sa'i anan nanda' maol etap hiagoma Galili ea' nahali' amam na'i, “Aman anama anan Galilinai?”
42023007	Amam ma'ipana ea' negawa Jisas anan Galilinai gavman dembinai Herot numafiagoma. Ea' Pailat nasapa'ana nafe'ma Herot. Nogota anama Herot ata' napani Jerusalem.
42023008	Herot nati Jisas nandanifelamana endilisi. Anan name' basefa anan nogota launai, ea' na'i notolona. Anan name' basefa maol Jisas nanda'anai ea' na'i Jisas ata' nonda' anona pepel si'i God nanda'anai ma ata' notolona.
42023009	Ea' Herot nahali'anama amamaga hiami. Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef anan, owa'.
42023010	Amam pris dambami maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi mafi'i maitu felefele' manda'mana kot baso'manai la'ifinai endilisi.
42023011	Ea' Herot nao'wa amam soldia ananimi manda' Jisas findiwana ma basef awami. Ea' mofa'ai anona lowaf bu'unai mowahe'amonana masapa'ana notanima nafe'ma Pailat.
42023012	Fowa' Herot naloma Pailat manda' naumbih, ea' dei' nemaf anama mataga alupumi.
42023013	Ea' Pailat nofalai amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sandakolas.
42023014	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' fa'ai aman anama pa'i nafela ukup epes hiesi nahambombagasa sanda' wandafi sifi'mai ae'. Do'ok ahali'ana ma amamaga amama ma naep ipe'imi pame'e. Ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ma aman anama ma amamaga amama ipe' panda' basefami, owa'.
42023015	Dembinai gavman Herot wapoti' na'ama etin. Dei' main, anan nasapa'ana netanima nafi'mai ape'. Ipe' pegawa aman anama ina nanda' anona waf aonai ma ape' mohana neaga', owa'etin.
42023016	Ea' atuwasi ehana etin ekwahona nefe' wafifina.” [
42023017	Ea' waf esis Judai nape na'ama. Afagof danda nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova gavman dembinai Pailat natagaha anona nanda' kalabusi nafe' wafifina ma esis.]
42023018	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i, “Ha aman anama ma noga', ea' tagaha Barabas nifi'mai ape'.”
42023019	Aman anama Barabas anan napa' naloma amam gavmani ma taun anama lu'unai ea' naha enin epen naga'. Ea' dei' sanda'ana nanda' kalabus.
42023020	Pailat na'i nokwawa Jisas nefe' wafifina, ea' nahali'as wapoti'.
42023021	Ea' sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana noga', hana noga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”
42023022	Ea' Pailat netambel nahali'as wenif wapoti' na'i, “Dei' nanda' maina waf aonai? Ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ofagena napoma aman anama ma ape' mohana neaga', owa'etin. Ea' ae' i'ipa amam soldia mohana mopagahona ea' ekwahona nefe' wafifina.”
42023023	Owa'etin. Esis sa'i mehip sa'i anan nohana noga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ea' basef asasimi mikila' basef Pailati.
42023024	Ea' Pailat nasopama malogel ananinai naila ukup asasimi.
42023025	Aman anama nanda' wandaf naloma gavmani naha enin epen naga'i, sanda'ana nape nanda' kalabus, Pailat nakwahona nafe'mas wafifina. Ea' nagi'ma ukup asasimi nakwahona nafe'mas wafifina ea' nase'asa Jisas nafe'ma esisa amam soldia mefa'ana mafe' mohana noga'.
42023026	Amam soldia mofa' Jisas mafe' ea' mati anona aman Saimon, anan anona etap hiagoma Sairini, napani aolop nafi'i na'i nefe' nuwis wambel taun lu'wagoma. Ea' masasapa'ana nowandefa lawag anama usi'inai tu'wanainai ekaf ananinai nofa'ana naila Jisas nafe'.
42023027	Ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sagi'mana ea' anowa nematawa wapoti' wafe' walef watawea wafe' wa'i uwahipina ma anan.
42023028	Ea' Jisas nandamboma na'ipawa na'i, “Ipe' nematawa Jerusalemipei, ipe' ina pelopa ae', owa'. Ipe' pelopa ipe' peloma awasi ipe'isi'.
42023029	Dei' main, anona nemaf netaga ma enis epes si'i, ‘Awau nematawa asawai, ea' awama owa' weaso' nomambeha awasi, awama nambimb ope andeande' ondanifel.’
42023030	Nemaf anama esis si'ipa halafutagw ma mowai mopei'as mose'elis. Ea' esis si'ipa dohotagw mose'elis.
42023031	Dei' esis sanda' waf aonai ma lawag namunai. Ea' anona nemaf lawag anama notaga alina, esis sonda' maina waf?”
42023032	Ea' amam soldia mofa' amam biam manda' waf aonai ma'i moham moga' moloma Jisas.
42023033	Ea' safe' sataga anagon sofalagon sa'i Pipitagel Balagaina. Anama amam soldia maunda Jisas lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ea' maunda anom biam manda' waf aonai manda' wali mandolam mail wa'olwa'ol Jisas nail la'afen.
42023034	Ea' Jisas na'ipa God na'i, “Ahalome, ine' nekwahomama waf aonai amam manda'meanai. Amam ina mogawa andeande' amamaga amama manda'meam ae'i, owa'.” Ea' amam soldia manda' satu ma luwaguf maim Jisasi ma emi nikila' nefa'am mandandamam atona etin.
42023035	Ea' esis amam nematawa saitu sape satolona ea' amam agufumi esis Judai manda' salamalana manda'iafana ma'i, “Anan nagiambama enis epes. Ea' endilisi anan Krais God nandandepana, ata' nigiambama anan atona nondatagah nisila'i.”
42023036	Amam soldia wapoti' manda' salamalana manda'iafana. Ea' mafi'i felefele'ma anan ma'i mose'ana anom embel wainim numbutimi.
42023037	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “I'i endilisi ine' king Judai, ine' ata' nigiambama ine' etina.”
42023038	Anom basef mail lawag anama ilifa balaga ananinai ma'iam ma'i, “AMAN ANAMA DEMBINAI KING ESIS JUDAI.”
42023039	Ea' anona aman nanda' waf aonai nail wa'ol na'i basef findiwaimi ma Jisas na'i, “Ine' Krais endilisi, ine' ata' nigiambama ine' nili' ea' nigiambamafa wapoti'.”
42023040	Ea' anona nail wa'oli na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' nefa' nimanimi na'ama etin si'i aman anama. Ine' owa' umba mehenama Gode?
42023041	Amam soldia maha afa' oga' andeande' wandahama waf aonai afa' wanda'anai. Ea' aman anama ina nanda' waf aonai, owa'etin.”
42023042	Ea' nandamboma na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Jisas, anona nemaf ine' netaga dembinai king, nemaf anama ine' okokoma ae'.”
42023043	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, ine' dei' nepe nelome wambel bu'unai Paradais.”
42023044	Aon na'i naho'walom, awamb lu'unai nataga naofenia etap hiagoma esis Judai nape nafe' nafe' nataga aon nandamboma nape gani 3 klok wambomota. Ea' owaf naluwi wapoti'.
42023045	Ea' anona lowaf lu'unai si'i uta nail ipat lu'unai God nomoni palalana hi'alana nandawal nataga biefina.
42023046	Ea' Jisas noga na'i mehip na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai, ae' ese'enago ambal ae'anai nofo'o lagel ine'inai.” Anan na'iam na'ama ma ea', a' naga'.
42023047	Ea' kepten numafi amam soldiai naitu nati amamaga amama mataga, ea' nafela agel Godi na'i, “Endilisi, aman anama bu'unai.”
42023048	Ea' amam nematawa isima hiesi safi'i sandakolasa sati amamaga amama mataga, satolom ea' saha mefetagw asasimi sihi'ambasa ukup asasimi aom endilisi ea' setanima safe'.
42023049	Esis alupusi hiesi Jisasi saloma anowa nematawa wafi'i etap hiagoma Galili waila Jisas wafi'i, esis saitu laogon felefele' sati amamaga amama.
42023050	Anona aman agilinama Josep anan Arimateainai etap hiagoma Judia. Anan aman bu'unai, dembinai ma amam mumafi esis Juda hiesi.
42023051	Anan ina na'i a'e ma amam dambami Juda moha Jisas noga', owa'. Anan nape nohafa nemaf bu'unai neataga ma epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias.
42023052	Aman anama nafe'ma Pailat nahali'ana ma nefa'ai alop Jisasi neawana.
42023053	Ea' nafe' natagaha alop Jisasi nisila'i, nanda' anona lowaf afitinai nowa'ana ma nombafana, nasapa'ana nawis hi'agif anama nalana nomon. Hi'agif anama sagwasana nawis anona owap lu'unai. Fowa' esis ina dei' sawa enin epenagon, ata' owa'.
42023054	Nemaf anama sa'i sogolopa gwa'aimianai. Nemaf sapoma noma'wanai sa'i Sabat felefele'ma neataga.
42023055	Nematawa awama Galiliwai nimbewa' waloma Jisas wafi'i, awau do'ok wagi' waila Josep wafe' wati hi'agif anama. Ea' wati nomon na'ama Josep nawa Jisasa.
42023056	Watolona ea' otanima wafe' ifagw awaumi, wandondomba wel maloma amamaga alogw bu'wami ma'ami ma bimb ofa'am ofe' hi'agif undisa alop Jisasi. Nemaf anama Sabat nataga, wapoma noma'w si'i mi'uli Godi na'i.
42024001	Wafilu nemaf anama Sande nali'ma wik, kuhimbita atona awau ohafel wafe' hi'agif. Agufuwama awama. Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma ano'w awau agel atona Maria mama'wana Jemsi waloma Joana ea' waloma anowa wapoti'. Ea' ofa' wel maim alogw bu'wami ma'ami awau wali' wandondombami, ofa'am wafe' hi'agif.
42024002	Ea' watologon, wati owap anama ina ata' nape nowalo uta, owa'. Enin epen nafe' nawisana nafe' na'oh wa'ol.
42024003	Wawis nomon ea' awau ina wati alop Dembinai Jisasi, owa'etin.
42024004	Ea' awau ukup matamea mafe'ma amama. Ea' mehip wati anom amam biam mataga felefele'ma awou. Luwaguf amamumi membal endilisi.
42024005	Ea' awau umbamahawa endilisi windiwa balagah wati etap. Ea' amam ma'ipawa ma'i, “Ipe' pafi'i pagolopa aman anama ambal napeinai ma na'ae epes saga'i ma main?
42024006	Anan ina ata' nape na'ae, owa'. Ea' nohafel ea'! Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama fowa' nali' na'ipipemi. Nemaf anama ata' nape nalomepa ganima etap hiagoma Galili na'ipipa na'i,
42024007	‘Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Esis nambimb sese'e efe'ma amam manda' waf aonai, munde lawag usu'inai tu'wanainai. Ma nimeguf biam hi'ilam, anona nemaf wapoti' etanima ehafel.’ ”
42024008	Ea' awau ukup mandanda'ma basef amama fowa' na'iami.
42024009	Ea' wakwaha hi'agif otanima wafe' wa'ipa amam alupumi ananimi 11-peleim maloma enis alupusi hiesi ananisi wapoti' ma amamaga amama.
42024010	Nematawa awama wanowa Maria Makdalai'wi kwaloma Joana kwaloma ano'w Maria Jems mama'wana. Awau wape waloma anowa nematawa wa'ipa amam Aposel 11-peleim.
42024011	Ea' amam ma'i awau wambaso'mam wa'i basef atom wafimi. Owa' meme'awai.
42024012	Ea' Pita nohafel nasagih nafe' hi'agif natambe' nati nomon ea', nati luwaguf mowa'anami atom ma'oh. Ea' notanima nafe' ipat okom ananinai nataneama amamaga amama matagai.
42024013	Nemaf anama atona anom amam biam alupumi Jisasi mohafel mafe' anona wambel sa'unai felefele' agilinama Emeus. Eaf anama nakwaha Jerusalem nafe' Emeusi kilomita 11-peleina.
42024014	Amam mafe' ea' manifa amamaga amama dei' matagai.
42024015	Amam ma'iam mandahahali'mam mafe', ea' Jisas atona nataga felefele' nafe' nalomam.
42024016	Ea' naep amamumi walufum, ina mati Jisas mogawana, owa'.
42024017	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pa'i main pafe'?” Nahali'am na'ama, ukup amamumi aom maitu.
42024018	Ea' anona amam biam Kliopas nahali'ana na'i, “Epes hiesi sape Jerusalemi sati amamaga amama mataga nemaf anae' sogawam. Ea' ine' etina owa' negawai.”
42024019	Anan na'iam na'ama, Jisas nahali'am na'i, “Main de'im?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Amamaga amama matagama Jisas Nasaretinai. Anan dembinai profet na'ipa esis amam nematawa basef bu'wami. Anan la'ifinai ma nawalipasa basef amama nanda' maol la'ifinai ma naep Godi naloma epes wapoti'.
42024020	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma agufumi ape'imi mase'ana nafe'ma amam gavman dambami. Ea' amam gavman manda'mana basef mohana naga'. Ea' maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
42024021	Ea' fowa' afa' ukup ma'i endilisi wa'i, ‘Aman anama notagaha ape' Israel meape wafifipa.’ Ea' anom basef wapoti'. Amamaga amama mataga ea' nemaf dei'inai nafe'ma wanifi.
42024022	Dei' anowa nematawa afa'iwai wanda'afa gegelalasofa kwapete'afa. Kuhimbita atona ohafel wafe' hi'agif,
42024023	ea' awo ina wati Jisas, owa'etin. Ea' otanima wafi'i wa'iam wa'i, ‘Afa' wati anom ensel si'i wa'oh wandanda'ah watolom ma'ipafa ma'i.” Anan nohafel nape namunai.” ’
42024024	Ea' anom amam afa'imi mafe' hi'agif mati amamaga na'ama etin si'i awau wa'iam. Ea' anan ina matolona, owa'.”
42024025	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa nomonas a'ipei. Ukup ipe'imi ea' mase'epa, ina pembale'a basef hiami amam profeti, owa'.
42024026	Krais anan ata' nili' nofa' nimanimi ea' nigi' nofa' pepel howalagon ananinai nigi'.”
42024027	Ea' nali' nasefela basef hiami Baibelimi amam profet maloma Moses manda'ami nawalipamam. Na'ipam basef amama hiami ma'i anan nawalipamam ofagema hi'alam.
42024028	Ea' amam mafe' mataga felefele'ma wambel anama ma'i meafe'ma. Ea' Jisas na'i ata' nefe' etin,
42024029	ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nepe nelomafa. Aon nowala felefele'ma owamb.” Ea' nawis nape nalomam.
42024030	Amam ma'i mea' gwa'aimi, anan nape nalomam nafela bret nanifela God nawalona nase'amana.
42024031	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma amam ea' naep amamumi pele'atam dei' mogawana. Ea' nohafel nafe' nakwaha amam matimana owa'.
42024032	Ea' ma'i, “Afa' wafi'i eaf ukup afa'imi ea' mohafel endilisi ma anan nawalapa basef mape Baibeli na'ipafam nogota anama.”
42024033	Amam ma'iam na'ama ea', dei' atef mohafel motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ea' mati alupumi 11-peleim Jisasi maloma enis alupusi amamisi sandatama sape.
42024034	Ea' sa'ipa amam biam sa'i, “Endilisi etis Dembinai notanima nohafel! Saimon natolona ea'.”
42024035	Ea' amam biam ma'ipasa amamaga amama do'ok matolom eafi. Ma'ipasam ma'i, “Anan nalomafa wape nawala bret watolona ea' ogawana.”
42024036	Esis ata' sa'i basef amama atom, Jisas naitu la'afena esis na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'i opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
42024037	Ea' satolona sohafel gegelalasis kwapete' umbamahas. Esis sa'i sati anona gamba.
42024038	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' gegelalasipa kwapete'epa ma main? Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi matamea?
42024039	Ipe' piti lagufi bo'wagah ae'ami. Ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi ape si'iwi. Ipe' pesa lagofa ae' peme'e. Gambefah ina alop naloma bihitagof mapeis si'i pati mape alop ae'anai, owa'.”
42024040	Anan na'iam na'ama ma ea', nihi'ambasa lagofi bo'wagah ananimi.
42024041	Ea' sandanifela sati anan. Ea' esis gegelalasis kwapete' ukup matamea, owa' ata' seambale'efanai. Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' anom gwa'aimi o owa'?”
42024042	Ea' sase'ana anona aol tu'waninai saofanai.
42024043	Nandalombasana na'ana ama naep asasimi.
42024044	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' ae' ata' ape alomepa, a'ipipa ea' ma basef hiami mail buk Baibeli ma mi'uli God fowa' gani naso' Mosesanai. Buk anama amam profeti maloma Buk Songi, basef amama hiami ma'i ae'. Basef amama hiemi dei' mataga endilisi mandawalap alihim.”
42024045	Anan nihi'ambas andeande'ma ukup asasimi ma segawa basef mail Buk Baibeli.
42024046	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Fowa' gani amam manda' basef amama mail buk Baibeli ma'i Krais nefa' nimanimi sohana noga' ma nimeguf bi'am hi'ilam anona neafe'ma wanomi, notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
42024047	Ama agel ananinai anona nemaf alupusi ananisi sili' sowalapa basef Jerusalem ea' si'ipasam amam nematawa hiesi hi'ilas sape wambel hiagomai ma seamboma opalefa God nokwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
42024048	Ipe' pati amamaga amama matagamai ma nambimb pi'ipa amam nematawa hiesi.
42024049	Ipe' peme! Anom amamaga la'ifimi fowa' Ahalome na'iam endilisi na'i niesi'ipami felefele' miefi'imipei. Ipe' pepe la'ela'ef taun anama pefe'ma petaga nemaf anama la'ifimi amama misila'i heven ilifi meafi'mai ipe'.”
42024050	Jisas nao'wa esis amam nematawa hiesi safe' sataga felefele'ma Betani ea' nasa'ma lagof malata nofalo'masa nonda'as la'ifis.
42024051	Anan ata' nofalo'mas etin, God nagiana nakwaha esis nalata heven ilif.
42024052	Ea' sanifelana sanda' lotumana ea' sandanifel endilisi sotanima safe' Jerusalem sandanifel la'ela'ef sape.
42024053	Ea' la'ela'ef sape ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai safela agel ananinai lu'una endilisi.
43001001	Fowa' gani dambadamba anom Basef epen nape. Ea' Basef epen anama nape naloma God. Ea' epen anama agilinama Basef anan atona God.
43001002	Fowa' dambadamba epen anama agilinama Basef naloma God nape.
43001003	Anan nanda' epes ea' nanda' amamaga hiami. Owa' anom amamaga motaga anona eaf, owa'etin. Epes saloma amamaga matagai hiami anan atona nanda'am mataga.
43001004	Ambal namunai napaina nape epen anama ea' ambal anama nanda' epes howalas.
43001005	Howalagon anama nanda' owamb howalagon. Ea' owamb ina naofeniagon, owa'.
43001006	Anona aman nataga, agilinama Jon, God nasapa'ana nafi'i.
43001007	Anan nafi'i ma neawalapa basef. Dei' nawalapa basefa howalagon anama ma epes hiesi some' basef ananimi sembale'efana.
43001008	Jon nawalapa basef amama anan ina nagwapin anama nanda' epes hiesi howalas, owa'. Anan nali' nafi'i ma neawalapa basef alihima nagwapin anama endilisinai nafi'i etap anae' nanda' epes howalas.
43001009	Nagwapin anama nanda' epes howalas endilisi nafi'i etap anae' ma dei' nogota anae'.
43001010	Fowa' gani anan nanda' etap anae' nataga, dei' nafi'i nape etap anae'. Ea' esis amam nematawa etapasi ina segawana, owa'.
43001011	Anan nafi'i nataga ofagama etap hiagoma esis Juda, ea' epes hiesi Ananisi ina sogawana sa'i sofa'ana sembale'efana, owa'etin.
43001012	Ea' esis emi egafis amam nematawa seambale'efanai, nese'asa esis agofa setaga awasi Godi.
43001013	Esis ina sataga awasi Godi ma waf bu'unai mamasas solasi, owa'etin. Esis ina sataga awasi Godi si'i ukup mamasasi ma'i ma selas, owa'. God atona nanda'as sataga awasi ananisi.
43001014	Basef mataga epen ea' anan nape la'afena ape', ea' wati howalagon pepel Ananinai. Howalagon anama pepel Nogalomana atona, Ahalomana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ape' mati amama nagiambamapa etin nanda'apa la'ifipa ma nihi'ambapa waf endilisinai nape si'ina ma anan.
43001015	Ea' Jon nawalapa basefa anan na'ama na'i mehip na'i, “Anan aman anama fowa' ali' a'ipipana a'i. Anan nigi'ma ae' neafi'i, anan nape nali'ma ae'. Dei' main, mama'we ata' owa' kolae anan fowa'inai napen ambal namunai.”
43001016	Ape' hiapai mofa' amamaga bu'wami hiami mapoma anan atona. Waf anama nagiambamapa etin nanda'apa la'ifipa nanda'am mape na'ama etin nimeguf hiami.
43001017	Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli Moses ea' Moses nawalipas. Ea' Jisas Krais nikila' Moses nagiambamapa etin ma waf endilisinai.
43001018	Owa' anona epen nieti Gode. Owa'etin. Nogalomana anama Godi atotona natolona. Anan na'ama etin si'i God. Anan nape felefele' endilisi naloma Ahalomana ea' nawalapa basef ofagema ma ape' nihi'ambapa God.
43001019	Anom amam dambami Judaimi mapani Jerusalem masapa'i anom amam mafe' mahali' Jon. Anom pris maloma anom Livai mumafi ipat Godi, amam mapani Jerusalem mafi'i mahali' Jon ma'i, “Ine' emi egafina?”
43001020	Ea' Jon ina nambaho'a basef, owa'. Anan nagwamam nawalapa basef alihim na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ina Krais God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i, owa'.”
43001021	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Dei' ine' enina profet fowa'inai agilinama Elaija?” Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Ea' ma'i, “Dei' ine' aman anama Profet ape' mape mohafanai?” Ea' nagwamama basef na'i, “Owa'.”
43001022	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' ine' emi? Ama afa' utanima ofe' wi'ipa dambami masapa'afa wafi'i. Ine' na'i ine' etina na'i maim basef, ine' emi?”
43001023	Ea' Jon nagwa basef si'i fowa' profet Aisaia na'iam na'i, “Ae' anona maf atona na'i anona etap fatauguma wafiguma na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Pendondomba eaf Dembinai!’ ”
43001024	-
43001025	Ea' anom Farisi dambami Judai masapa'am mafi'i mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' Krais God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i o, ine' Elaija o, ine' enina Profet dembinai? I'i ine' owa' Krais, owa' Elaija, enina Profet, dei' ine' napisi'asa embela main?”
43001026	Ea' Jon nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Ae' apisi'as embel atom wafimi, ea' anona aman nape la'afena ipe', ina pegawana.
43001027	Aman anama nigi'ma ae' niefi'i. Ae' ina epen bu'uwei ma eatagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'. Anan dembinai endilisi, nikila' ae'.”
43001028	Basef amama mataga anona wambel Betani walemb Jordan fisana, Jon napisi' esis amam nematawa.
43001029	Wafilu Jon nati Jisas nafi'mai anan na'ipas na'ama na'i, “Ipe' piti aman anama anan si'i mafin sipsip nogalomana Godi. Anan nambimb nokwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi sanda'anai.
43001030	Anan ma'una anama ea' nafi'i. Anama fowa' ae' a'ipipa a'i, ‘Anona aman nigi'ma ae' niefi'i, anan nali'ma ae'. Dei' main, anan nali' nape ea' ae' selai agi' ataga.’
43001031	Ae' ina egawa anan epen emi egalina, ata' owa'etin. Ae' afi'i apisi'ipa embela eawalapa aman anama dembinai ma ape' amam nematawa Israel.”
43001032	Ea' Jon nawalapa basef alihim na'i, “Ae' ati Ambal Bu'unai Godi nakwaha heven nisila'i si'i amil mai'una nisila'i ea' nafe' nape nomona anan.
43001033	I'I God owa' nie'ipi basef amama ae' ina egawa anan, owa'. Ea' God nasapa'e afi'i ma iepisi'asa embel anan na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' niti Ambal bu'unai Ae'anai nisila'i ma ea' aman anama ea' ma'una. Anan nambimb nesapa'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope nolomepa.’
43001034	Ae' atolona endilisi awalapa basef alihima anan a'iam a'i, anama anan Nogalomana Godi endilisi.”
43001035	Wafilu Jon nafe' naitu wapoti' na'ama ea' alupumi ananimi biam malomana mape.
43001036	Ea' nati Jisas nafo'o, na'ipa alupumi ananimi nihi'ambama Jisas na'i, “Piti, anan si'i sipsip nogalomana Godi.”
43001037	Ea' alupumi ananimi mame' na'ipam na'ama, mafe' maila Jisas.
43001038	Ea' Jisas nandamboma nati amam mailana na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pa'i pifi'i pegolopa main?” Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Rabai, ine' nape maina ipat?” Agel anama “Rabai” ape' mambomana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa.”
43001039	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ata' fi'i ma petologon.” Ea' mafe' ipat anan napeinai. Nemaf anama atona wambomota aon nandamboma napani gani wa'ol 4 klok, ea' malomana mapani.
43001040	Amam mame' basef amama Jisasi Jon fowa' nali' na'iami mailana. Amam agilinama Saimon Pita naloma owalomana Andru.
43001041	Andru nali' name' basef Jisasi atom, netambel nagolopa Saimon, ea' na'ipana na'i, “Afa' wati Mesaia ea'.” Ape' dei' mamboma agel anama Mesaia ma'i Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
43001042	Ea' Andru nao'wa Saimon nafi'mai Jisas natolona na'i, “Ine' Saimon nogalomana Joni. Anona nemaf agel ine'inai nefala Sifas.” Agel anama “Pita” na'i owap.
43001043	Wafilu Jisas na'i nefe' etap anama hiagoma Galili. Ea' nagolopa Filip natolona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nila ae'.”
43001044	Filip nafi'i wambel anama atona Pita naloma Andru mafi'ima, Betsaida.
43001045	Ea' Filip nafe' nagolopa Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama fowa' gani Moses nanda' basefa mi'uli God na'ianai, ea' amam profet wapoti' manda' basef ma'ianai, aman anama ma'una afa' watolona. Anan Jisas Nasaretinai, Josep nogalomana.”
43001046	Ea' Nataniel nahali' Filip na'i, “Dei' anom amamaga bu'wami mataga mafi'i Nasaret?” Ea' Filip na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fi'i nitolona.”
43001047	Ea' Jisas nati Nataniel nafi'mai anan na'ipana na'i, “Niti aman anama Israelinai endilisi, aman bu'unai. Anan owa' ni'i anom basef baso'maimi.”
43001048	Ea' Nataniel na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ine' negawe na'imama?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Do'ok Filip ina dei' nofalena, ata' owa'etin, ae' ali' atilina nape lawag fik ofagena. Nogota anama atilina.”
43001049	Ea' Nataniel nagwamana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' nogalomana Godi endilisi. Ine' dembinai King ape' Israeli.”
43001050	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'i, “Do'ok ae' atilina nape lawag ofagena fik. Amama atom dei' ine' nombale'efa ae'. Endilisi, anona nemaf ine' niti anom amamaga la'ifimi mikila' amama.”
43001051	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona nemaf ipe' piti heven nindowsi' negal ea' amam ensel Godi molata misila'i ae' ataga epen endilisiwei.”
43002001	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma wenif, anona aman naso' ano'w nemata'w wambel anama Kana nape etap anama hiagoma Galili. Ea' mama'wana Jisasi kwape kwalomas kwati sandase'ama.
43002002	Esis sofala Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi wapoti' mafi'i mati sandase'ama.
43002003	Ea' embel wain hi'alam. Ea' mama'wana Jisasi kwafi'i kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Esis embel wain a'as.”
43002004	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Mama'we, maol anama ina ae'anai. Nogota ae'anai ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'.”
43002005	Ea' kwa'ipa amam manda' maola anan naso' nemata'wi kwa'i, “I'i anan nie'ipipa anom basef, ipe' peme'ana.”
43002006	Anom maloh lu'wami ma'oh felefele' ma anama. Maloh amama esis Juda saila mi'uli Godi sasa'ofami. Maloh amama wanom wanom otamba sanda'ami si'i dram lu'wami.
43002007	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam manda' maoli na'i, “Ipe' pilai embel pekolo'wam maloh amama ma si'im endilisi.” Ea' amam molam si'im si'i anan na'ipam.
43002008	Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Dei' nelai tu'wanim pefa'am pefe' pese'anam aman numafi gwa'aimi.” Ea' mofa'mana embel mafe'.
43002009	Dembinai numafi gwa'aimi embel amama name'am, ea' mataga bo'om si'i wain, ea' anan ina negawa embel amama amam mola embel atom, owa'. Ea' amam manda' maola anan mogawam. Ea' anan dembinai nofala aman anama naso' nemata'wi
43002010	na'ipana na'i, “Epes hiesi ata' sali' sase'asa wain anama bu'unai nali' sa'ana ea' sagi' sofa'masi wain anama aonai kwaikwaie'. Ea' ine' owa'etin. Ine' nambaho'wa wain anama bu'unai na'ihi dei'aol nagi' nefa'ana nafi'i.”
43002011	Anama pepel la'ifinai nali'i si'i God atona nanda'anai, dambadamba Jisas nanda'ana wambel Kana etap anama hiagoma Galili. Anan nihi'amba asisa pepel howalagon Ananinai. Ea' alupumi ananimi mombale'efana.
43002012	Amama hi'alam, Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi miniala Kaperneam maloma mama'wana anani'wi kwaloma owapana ananimi wapoti' ea' sape na'ama anom nimeguf.
43002013	Nemaf anama sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova felefele'ma neataga, Jisas nondowasa' Jerusalem.
43002014	Ea' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nati epes satama mafis amama sipsip bulmakau amiguf mai'unamb ea' enis satalom otamba sindisisila'mam.
43002015	Ea' Jisas nafela anona mandof strin natopagas nanda' anep wip si'i bolam. Ea' natopaga epes isima natofas natofamasa amamaga amama asasimi sipsip maloma bulmakau wapoti' mawis mafe' ande'. Ea' nakowasom otamba moni esis sindisisila'mami nakwahom, namboma tebol asasimi nakolo'asam.
43002016	Ea' na'ipa amam amama matala mai'unamb na'i, “Ipe' fa'a amamaga amama fo'o. Ipe' ina penda' ipat Ahalomei netaga si'i ipat maket, owa'.”
43002017	Ea' alupumi ananimi ukup mandanda'ma anom basef mape Baibel ma'iam ma'i, “Ae' okom nohafel endilisi ma enda' maol la'ifinai endilisi ma imafi ipat ine'inai neape andeande'.”
43002018	Ea' amam Juda mati anan nanda'am na'ama, ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' ata' nihi'ambafa anona ikwaf si'i God atona nanda'anai ma weagawa ine' agel lu'unai ma nanda'am na'ama ma afa'.”
43002019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' penda'ana ipat anama lu'unai Godi aona, nambimb ae' etanima ela'ana notawa wapoti' nimeguf wanom.”
43002020	Ea' amam Juda ma'ipana ma'i, “Ipat anama sanda'ana sala'ana afagof hiami 46-peleim, ea' ine' na'i nimeguf wanom etin nela'ana wapoti' a' amon?”
43002021	Ea' ipat anama Jisas na'ianai ina na'i ipat anama endilisinai lu'unai Godi, owa'. Anan na'i alop ananinai.
43002022	Nemaf anama God nafelana wapoti' hi'agif sawanama, nogota anama amam alupumi ananimi ukup mapoma basef amama ananimi fowa' na'iami. Ea' dei' mombale'efa basef amama mape Baibel maloma basef amama Jisas fowa' na'iami.
43002023	Jisas nape Jerusalem ama nimeguf amama Pasovaimi, esis amam nematawa hiesi sati ikwaf la'ifinai anan nanda'anai ea' sembale'efana.
43002024	Ea' Jisas negawa nomonas asasimi epes hiesi. Na'ama anan ina nembale'efas, owa'.
43002025	Anan ina gawa a'ana ma enis sie'ipana ma waf epesi, owa'etin. Anan negawa epes hiesi ea' negawa ukup opalef asasimi.
43003001	Anona aman agilinama Nikodemus, anan Farisi agel lu'unai ma esis Juda. Anan nape dembinai asasinai.
43003002	Anona owamb nafi'mai Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ape' mogawa ine', God nasapa'ena nafi'i si'i Dembinai Tisa. I'i owa' God nope noloma anona epen, anan ina la'ifina neanda' maol anama la'ifinai ine' nanda'anai, owa'.”
43003003	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, emi epen God owa' nendan netaga dambaini, enin ina nambimb niowis wambota Godi numafian, owa'etin.”
43003004	Ea' Nikodemus nahali'ana na'i, “Dei' amama hagasi sonda'am si'imama ma solas seataga dambais wapoti'? Esis sotanima suwis opalef mamasasi nomon, ama nambimb otanima olas wapoti'?”
43003005	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'ipina endilisi, i'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi owa' nenda'an dambaina embel, ina nambimb la'ifin niowis wambota Godi, owa'etin. Ea' i'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nolan dambain, enin wilama niowis wambota Godi.
43003006	Amamaga mataga alop atonai, amama alop atopumi si'i ano'w nemata'w kola awani. Ea' amamaga Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'ami, amama mataga si'i Ambal Bu'unai.
43003007	Ina nomonas natanea a'ipina na'ama a'i petaga dambaipa wapoti' si'i epes solaipa, owa'.
43003008	Uf naluwi si'i nalo nafe' ganigani. Ine' name' uf atona, ea' ina negawa anama nalo nafi'ima nafe'ma, owa'. Epes hiesi Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'as sataga dambais, esis sataga na'ama etin.”
43003009	Ea' Nikodemus nagwamana basef na'i, “Amamaga amama nambimb motaga mondawalap mi'imama?”
43003010	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Dei' si'i main? Ine' Dembinai Tisa nawalipasa basef esis Juda, ea' ine' owa' negawa amamaga amama?
43003011	Endilisi ae' a'ipina, afa' wa'i amamaga afa' wagawami, ea' wawalapa amamaga amama watolomi. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha basef amama afa' wawalapami.
43003012	Ae' a'ipipa amamaga amama etapami, ea' ipe' ina pegawam pembale'efam, owa'. I'i ae' iea'ipipa amamaga ilifami, nambimb ipe' pegawa pembale'efam pi'imama? Owa'etin.
43003013	Ina enin epen etapani nealata gani heven, owa'. Ae' atowe. Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei ea' ae' atowe akwaha heven isila'i, ae' ma'uwi.
43003014	Fowa' Moses nafela anona yul nanda' kapa nanda'anai nail anona lawag ilif. Nanda'ana anama wafiguma fatauguma. Anama na'ama etina anona nemaf sefela ae' ataga epen endilisiwei sundi ieil anona lawag ilif.
43003015	Ama epes emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, anona nemaf sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43003016	Endilisi, God Nogalomana ananinai atotona nape. Owa'etin. Ea' anan okom nainaila amam nematawa hiapai mape etapi. Ea' nase'apai Nogalomana ananinai atotona ma emi egafis sombale'efanai sope andeande', ina sega'ma waf aonai, owa'. Sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43003017	God ina nasapa' Nogalomana ananinai nafi'i etap anae' ma neanda'mapa basef, owa'. Anan nasapa'ana nafi'i ma nofa' ape' epes hiapai mape etapi motanimani.
43003018	Emi egafis sembale'efa anan, esis anona nemaf basef kot lu'unai a'as. Ea' emi egafis owa' seambale'efana, epes isima hegililas ea' ma kot anama lu'unai aonai. Dei' main? Esis sandaiwa'ma seambale'efa Nogalomana atotona Godi, na'ama epes isima hegililas hi'alas.
43003019	Basef ofagema ma kot lu'unai anama na'ama. Howalagon nafi'i nataga etap anae', ea' esis ukup maimaila waf anama etapanai atona si'i sape owamb, sandaiwa'ma howalagon. Dei' maina esis sandaiwa'? Esis sanda' waf aonai na'ama dei' sandaiwa'.
43003020	Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, sowa' alafugaha howalagon, esis sandaiwa'ma sifi'mai howalagon ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai neandawalap. Ea' dei' umbamahas sandaiwa'.
43003021	Emi egafis sanda' waf endilisinai safi'mai howalagon ma enis epes sitilis seagawa esis sape la'ifis la'ela'ef saloma God sanda' opeh ananimi.”
43003022	Basef amama hi'alam, Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi mafe' etap hiagoma Judia ea' mafe' anama taun a'agoma. Ea' nape nalomam napisi' esis amam nematawa embel.
43003023	Ea' Jon nape wambel anama Inon felefele'ma anona wambel Salim. Anama walemb lu'unai netaha, esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i anama, ea' anan napisi'as embel.
43003024	Nemaf anama dembinai King Herot ina dei' nanda' Jon nanda' kalabus, ata' owa'.
43003025	Ea' amam alupumi Joni ma'i anom basef mape la'afena amam maloma anona aman Judainai. Amam ma'i basefa waf anama esis Juda sasa'of sowando' alogwa seape bo'wesa naep Godi.
43003026	Ea' alupumi Joni mafe'ma anan ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai Tisa, aman fowa' nape naloma ine'i gani wa'ol walemb Jordani ine' nawalapa basef na'ianai, aman anama dei' amam nematawa hiesi safe'ma anan napisi'as embel.”
43003027	Ea' Jon na'ipam na'i, “I'i God nape heveni owa' nease'ana anom amamaga anona epen, epen anama ina la'ifina neanda' anona maol, owa'.
43003028	Ipe' pegawa basef amama fowa' ae' a'iami a'i ae' ina Krais, God nandandepe nasapa'e afi'i, owa'. Ea' God nasapa'e ali' afi'mai Krais.
43003029	I'i anona aman nese' ano'w nemata'w, nemata'w akwama ea' anani'wi nase'akwi. Ea' alupunai aman anama nendanifela naitu name' basefa aman anama dei' nase'akwi nafi'i. Dei' na'ama etina ae' andanifel endilisi ma okom ae'anai, andanifela Dembinai Jisas.
43003030	Agel Jisasi nelata lu'una, ea' agel ae'anai nowala sa'ona.”
43003031	Aman nafi'i ilifi anan nape ilifa amamaga hiami. Ea' aman nataga etapi anan etapanai na'i basef etapami atom. Ea' aman nafi'i heveni anan nape ilifa amamaga hiami.
43003032	Anan na'i basef nawalapa amamaga amama hiami natolom negawam ea'i. Ea' ina enin epen neme' basef amama anan na'iami, owa'etin.
43003033	Emi egafis seme' basef ananimi ma sailam, esis sa'i a'e ma basef amama sihi'ambasam alihim ea' sa'i basef Godi endilisimi atom.
43003034	Aman anama God nasapa'ana nafi'i anan nawalapa basef Godi. Ea' God nase'ana Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape si'inama anan.
43003035	Ahalomana God okom nainaila Nogalomana ea' nase'ana amamaga hiami ma lagof ananimi.
43003036	Emi egafis sembale'efa Nogalomana ananinai, epes isima dei' sefa' ambal namunai ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' emi egafis sewa' alafugama Nogalomana ananinai, epesisima ina nambimb sefa' ambal namunai sepe andeande' la'ela'ef, owa'etin. Dei' main, okom wandafunai Godi napomas la'ela'ef.
43004001	Nemaf anama amam Farisi dambami Judai mame' anom basef na'ama ma'i, “Jisas napisi' alupusi hiesi nikila' isima Jon napisi'asi.”
43004002	Ea' Jisas atona ina napisi'as, owa'. Amam alupumi ananimi atom mapisi'as.
43004003	Ea' Jisas negawa amam Farisi mame' basef amama. Ea' anan nakwaha etap anama Judia netanima nafe' etap hiagoma Galili wapoti'.
43004004	Eaf anama anan nailana nafi'i, nafe' la'afena etap hiagoma Samaria.
43004005	Ea' nafe' nataga anona wambel nape Samaria taun anama agiliguma sa'i Sikar. Anama nape felefele'ma Jekop fowa' gani nase'anagoma nogalomana ananinai Josep.
43004006	Ifata sela embelanai fowa' gani Jekop nanda'anai nape wambel anama. Nogota anama nemaf aon nahagasom. Jisas nafi'i laogon na'ama napoma noma'w ifata anama sela embelanai.
43004007	Ea' ano'w nemata'w Samariai'wi kwafi'i kwa'i kola embel, ea' Jisas natolo'w nahali'akwa kwease'ana anom embel.
43004008	Alupumi ananimi mafe' wambel lu'unai ma motala gwa'aimi.
43004009	Ea' nemata'w akwama kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Ine' Judainai, ea' ae' nemata'w Samariaiwei. Dei' maina ine' nahali'ima embel na'i Ae' ese'ena embel nea'am?” Dei' main, esis Juda ina saloma esis Samaria sanda' kolas etifigin, owa'etin. Esis sanda' naumbih.
43004010	Ea' Jisas nagwama'wa basef akwa'w na'i, “I'i ine' okom nopeina ma neagawa anom amamaga bu'wami pressen God na'i neasi'inami, ama ine' negawa aman anama nahali'inai ma embel, ine' nihali'anama anom embel ambal namunai napaimi Anan nese'enam.”
43004011	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman dembinai, ifata anae' launai nowala gani owin. Ine' baket a'ena ma nela embel. Dei' ine' nela embel amama ambal namunai napaimi enima?
43004012	Akunamapa ape'inai Jekop nagwa' embelana nao'wa batausana ananisi saloma mafis bulmakau sipsip maim asasimi sagwa' embela. Dei' ea' nakwahona napoma ape'. A'i ine' nikila' anan ama nese'apa embel ambal namunai napaimi?”
43004013	Ea' Jisas nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Emi egafis sea' embel amama, nambimb eap nese'as wapoti'.
43004014	Ea' emi egafis sea' embel amama ae' a'i iese'asami, esis ina nambimb eap nese'as wapoti' ma nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef sope, owa'etin. Embel amama ae' ase'asami nambimb mataga si'i embel mataga etin mawai lae'la'ef mape ma nomon opalef asasimi sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.”
43004015	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, ine' se'e embel amama ma ae' ina ata' eap nese'e etanima ifi'i na'ae ma ela embel wapoti', owa'.”
43004016	Ea' Jisas na'ipa'w na'i, “Ine' fo'o falai waulunamena ine'inai nili' ea' pitanima pifi'i na'ae.”
43004017	Ea' kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' wauluname a'e.” Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ine' na'i ine' waulunamena a'ena, amama ine' na'i endilisi.
43004018	Endilisi ine' fowa' wauhupina ine'imi wanom biam. Ea' aman anama dei' ine' nape nalomanai anama ina waulunamena ine'inai, owa'. Basef amama ine'imi endilisi.”
43004019	-
43004020	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Aman dembinai, dei' ae' egawena, ine' enina profet. Esis bafapapa ehasapa ape'isi safe' sandakolas sape halaf anama sanda' lotuma. Ea' ipe' Juda pa'i wambel esis sanda' lotuwagoma anama napani Jerusalem.”
43004021	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nembale'efa ae'. Anona nemaf neataga ipe' ina pefe' penda' lotuma Ahalome halaf anama, o penda' lotumana Jerusalem atogon, owa'etin.
43004022	Ipe' panda' lotuma amamaga ipe' owa' peagawami. Ea' ape' Juda manda' lotuma amamaga ape' mogawami. Basef ofagema ma ape' manda' lotu amama. God nofa' amam nematawa setanimani, amama matagama ape' Juda atepa.
43004023	Ea' anona nemaf na'i neataga, dei' nataga ea' ma amam nematawa emi egafis sanda' lotu endilisi sonda' lotuma Ahalomapa Goda Ambal Bu'unai ananinai noloma waf bu'unai endilisi. Anan nagolopa amam nematawa na'amaisi ma sonda' lotumana.
43004024	God anan ambal namunai. Na'ama amam nematawa emi egafis si'i sonda' lotumana endilisi, esis sanda' lotumana andeande'ma ukup moloma ambagof asasimi ma waf endilisinai.”
43004025	Ea' nemata'w akwama kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' egawa aman anama Mesaia sofalana sa'i Krais, God nandandepana nosapa'ana niefi'i. Nemaf anama anan niefi'i, nowalapam ni'ipapa amamaga hiami.”
43004026	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ae' ea' ma'uwi, dei' a'i alomena.”
43004027	Anan na'ipa akwa'w na'ama, ea' alupumi ananimi motanima mafi'i. Ea' amam ukup matamea ma anan naloma ano'w nemata'w naitu na'i. Ea' amam ina anona nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' na'i nefa' main? Ama dei' naloma'w na'i?” Owa'.
43004028	Ea' nemata'w akwama kwakwaha baket kola embelanai na'oh, kotanima kwafe' taun anama. Ea' kwa'ipa esis kwa'i,
43004029	“Ipe' pifi'i piti anona aman nawalapai amamaga hiami fowa' ae' anda'ami na'ipiam hi'alam. Anan Krais a' amon?”
43004030	Esis same' na'ama, sakwaha wambel safi'i sati Jisas.
43004031	Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'ipana mehip ma'i, “Ine' ata' nea' gwa'aimi.”
43004032	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Ae' anom gwa'aimi ma'oh, amama ipe' owa' pegawame.”
43004033	Ea' alupumi ananimi atom mape manifam ma'i, “Enis sofa'manai anom gwa'aimi?”
43004034	Ea' Jisas nawalapem basef na'ipam na'i, “Gwa'aimi ae'ami amama. God nasapa'e afi'i. Dei' ae' a'i ila okom ananinai atona enda' maol ananinai efe' embefana hi'ilana. Maol anama si'i gwa'aimi ae'ami.
43004035	Ipe' pa'iam pa'i, aomb biamibiam ata' mape ma nogota anama gwa'aimi meofanai neataga. Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' ata' sa'ma naep petologon aof tulif. Gwa'aimi maof ea' ma seala'am.
43004036	Emi egafis sela' gwa'aimi, esis sefa' otamba ma maol anama sanda'anai. Ea' sowa'ani gwa'aimi amama ambal namunai napeimi mope la'ela'ef. Ea' epes isima sawami saloma enis sala'ami sonda'kolas etifigin sondanifel.
43004037	Na'ama dei' basef gawaimi amama mataga endilisi etin, ma'i, ‘Enin epen nawamagon aof anama, ea' enin nafe' nala'am.’
43004038	Ae' asapa' ipe' pafe'ma pela'a gwa'aimi aof anama fowa' ipe' owa' peanda' maolananai. Enis epes sanda' maola aof anama, ea' ipe' pela'am gwa'aimi atona etin enis sanda'am sawami.”
43004039	Akwa'w do'ok kwa'i Jisas nawalapa amamaga akwa'w fowa' kwanda'ami, nawalapam na'ipakwam alihim. Ea' esis Samaria amam nematawa hiesi sape taun anama same' basef akwa'imi sembale'efa Jisas.
43004040	Ea' esis safi'mai anan sahali'ana mehip sa'i ata' nope nolomas. Ea' napani nimeguf bif nalomas wambel anama.
43004041	Ea' epes hiesi wapoti' wambel anama same' basef ananimi sembale'efana.
43004042	Ea' sa'ipa akwa'w sa'i, “Dei' ape' ina mame' basef ine'imi atom mombale'efam, owa'. Ape' mame' basefa aman anama ea' mogawa anan atona nofa' amam nematawa hiesi etapasi sotanimani.”
43004043	Nimeguf bif hi'alam, Jisas nakwaha wambel anama ea' nafe' etap hiagoma Galili.
43004044	Fowa' Jisas anan atona nawalapa basef na'iam na'i, “Anona profet ina nofa' agel lu'unai wambel ofagama ananima, owa'.”
43004045	Ea' dei' nafe' nataga etap anama hiagoma Galili, esis sondanifel ma anan nafi'i. Dei' main, esis fowa' safe' Jerusalema nemaf bu'unai Pasovainai ea' satolom segawa amamaga hiami anan nanda'am nemaf anama mandawalap alihim.
43004046	-
43004047	Anan netanima nafe' wapoti' nataga anona wambel Kana etap hiagoma Galili. Wambel anama fowa' namboma embel mataga si'i wain. Ea' anona agilinai nanda' maola dembinai kingi, nape Kana. Nogalomana ananinai awes nanda'ana na'oh anona wambel Kaperneam felefele'ma neaga'. Ea' agilinai anama name' basefa Jisas nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nafi'i etap hiagoma Galili, ea' nafe'ma Jisas nahali'ana mehipa neafe' nonda' nogalomana ananinai bo'ona.
43004048	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “I'i ipe' hipei piti ikwaf la'ifinai si'i God atona nanda'anai, ipe' pembale'efa ae'. I'i owa', owa'etin.”
43004049	Ea' anan nanda' maola dembinai kingi na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' nifi'i mehip. Na'ama nogalome ae'anai noga'.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Nogalomena ine'inai atuwasi nope namunai ambal nopaina.”
43004050	-
43004051	Ea' aman anama nombale'efa basef Jisasi nafe'. Anan ata' nafe' etin, amam manda'mana maoli mafi'i matolona eaf ma'ipana ma'i, “Nogalomena ine'inai ambo'ona nehafel nape.”
43004052	Ea' nahali'ama maina nogota nogalomana ananinai nehafel bo'ona andeande'. Ea' ma'i, “Nambati' aon nandamboma alop nifina ambo'ona.”
43004053	Ea' ahalomana ananinai negawa nambati' nogota anama atona Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nogalomena ine'inai ambo'ona.” Ea' agilinai anama nembale'efa Jisas naloma esis amam nematawa ananisi wapoti'.
43004054	Fowa' Jisas nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nafe' nataga etap hiagoma Galili, ea' dei' nanda' ikwaf anama la'ifinai. Ikwaf anama nafe'ma bifi nanda' so'uso'win inima bo'wen.
43005001	Jisas nape Galili ea', nondowasa' Jerusalem naloma esis Juda sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami ma nomonas meapoma Dembinai God.
43005002	Wambel anama nomon felefele'ma uta lu'unai sipsip mawisanai anama anona walemb batupa'manai sa'unai notah. Agilinama esis sofalana diga Hibrui sa'i Betesda. Walemb batupa'manai anama wa'owa'ol sala' ifagw sanda' ilagwalef wanom biam mape.
43005003	Ilagwalef amama la'ela'ef epes isima hiesi awes nanda'asi sape saloma enis naep mase'asi saloma bo'wagahi lagof maga' mailasi. [Esis sape la'ela'ef sahafa embel mandambombol manda'am de'inda'.
43005004	Anom nimeguf anona ensel Dembinai Godi nafi'i nowala walemb batupa'manai anama nanda' embel mandambombol. Emi egafin awes nanda'asi nili' nefe' newala embel, netaga bo'wen wapoti'.]
43005005	Anona aman nape awes lu'unai nanda'ana nape nalomas afagof hiami 38-peleim.
43005006	Ea' Jisas natolona tol na'oh ea' negawa aman anama awes nanda'anai na'oh na'ae afagof hiami. Na'ama nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' na'i atuwasi netaga bo'wena, o owa'?”
43005007	Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Aman dembinai, nemaf anama embel mandambombol ina enis epes safele salae ewala embel, owa'. Ae' atowe anda'am a'i efe' ea', enis epes sali' sowala sikila'e.”
43005008	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu nefa' lehis ine'imi nitu nefe'.”
43005009	Dei' atef anan nataga bo'ona. Na'ama anan nohafel naitu nafela lehis ananimi ea' nafe'.
43005010	Nemaf anama amama mataga, anona nemaf Sabat esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' amam dambami esis Judai mati aman anama nataga bo'ona nafela lehis ananimi nofa'am naitu nafe' naep amamumi nemaf anama Sabat. Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Dei' nemaf ape' mapoma noma'wanai, mi'uli ape'inai na'i owa' ma ine' nefela lehis nefa'am neafe', owa'.”
43005011	Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Aman anama nanda'e bu'uwei anan na'ipi na'i, ‘Fela lehis ine'imi nefa'am nefe'.’ ”
43005012	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Emi egalin na'ipina na'i, ‘Ine' fela lehis ine'imi nefa'am nefe'?’ ”
43005013	Aman anama ina negawa emi egalin nanda'ana bo'ona, owa'etin. Dei' main? Jisas nafe' nandambaho' naloma amam nematawa hiesi wambel anama.
43005014	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Jisas natolona ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Dei' ine' ambo'wena ea'. Ea' ine' owa' nitanima nefe' nenda' waf aonai wapoti, owa'. Na'ama amamaga awami endilisi motagamena.”
43005015	Ea' nafe' na'ipa amam Juda na'i, “Aman anama nanda'e bu'uwei anan Jisas.”
43005016	Ea' dei' amam Juda ukup aoma nanda' aman anama awes nanda'ana nataga bo'ona nehafel nofa' lehis na'ohami nafe' nemaf anama Sabat. Na'ama dei' mohafel manda'mana waf aonai mogolopana ma meahana.
43005017	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Ahalome ae'anai nanda' maol nimeguf hiami nafi'i notambel dei' nemaf anae' Sabat wapoti'. Ea' ae' wapoti' anda' maol si'i anan.”
43005018	Ea' amam Juda ukup wandafum endilisi ma'i mohana neaga'. Amam ma'i anan nosambala basefa mi'uli ma nemaf anama Sabat sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i God anan ahalomana ananinai endilisi. Ea' amam ma'i, “Anan na'i anan nataga na'ama etin si'i God.”
43005019	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef amam na'i, “Ae' a'i endilisi a'ipipa. Ae' nogalomana Godi ae' atowe ina la'ifiwei ma enda' anom amamaga ma okom ae'anai atona, owa'. Ae' anda' amamaga amama ati Ahalome nanda'ami, ea' amama atom. Dei' main, amamaga hiami ahalome nanda'ami, amama ae' Nogalomana wapoti' dei' anda'am.
43005020	Ahalome ae'anai okom nainaila ae' Nogalomana ananiwei nihi'ambe amamaga hiami anan nanda'ami. Anona nemaf nihi'ambe anom amamaga lu'wami mikila'. Na'ama nambimb ipe' gegelalasipa endilisi ma amamaga amama lu'wami meataga.
43005021	Ahalome nafela esis saga'i sohafel wapoti' ma nease'as ambal namunai. Ea' dei' na'ama etin ae' Nogalomana ananiwei wapoti' ae' ase'as ambal namunai epes ae' okom na'iasi.
43005022	Endilisi, Ahalome God ina nawaloga enin epen si'i sanda'masa koti sanda'am, owa'. Maol hianai ma neawaloga epes anan nase'eam ae' Nogalomana ananiwei.
43005023	God nanda'am na'ama ma dei' esis amam nematawa hiesi safela agel ae' Nogalomanai ananiwei lu'una na'ama etin si'i safela agel Ahalomei lu'una. Emi egafis owa' seafela agel ae' Nogalomanai lu'una, amama ina safela agel Ahalomei God nasapa'e afi'i lu'una, owa'.
43005024	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Emi egafis seme' basef ae'ami ma sembale'efa anan nasapa'e afi'i, isima sefa' ambal namunai ea' ma seape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Esis ina sanda' basef lu'wami ma kot, owa'. Esis sefa' ambal namunai nikila'a ga'.
43005025	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, nemaf anama na'i neataga, dei' nataga ea' ma esis sa'i seame' maf ae'anai, ae' Nogalomana Godi. Emi egafis seme' ae'i, nambimb sefa' ambal namunai ma seape bo'wes endilisi la'ela'ef.
43005026	Ambal namunai nape Ahalome atona. Ea' nanda' ae' Nogalomana ananiwei ea' ae' wapoti' ambal namunai napaiwei na'ama etin.
43005027	Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. Na'ama God nase'e agel lu'unai ma eawaloga epesa kot ma basef lu'wami.
43005028	-
43005029	Ipe' ina ukup hiahiama amama, owa'. Nemaf anama dahandahama ni'i neataga, amam nematawa hiesi saga'i sawas sape hi'agilifi anona nemaf seme' maf ae'anai sohafel sokwaha hi'agilif suwisi ande'. Ea' emi egafis sanda' waf bu'unai, anona nemaf sohafel wapoti' sofa' ambal namunai sepe bo'wes la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf setanima sehafel sonda' basef lu'wami ma kot.”
43005030	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anom amamaga ma nomonas ae'ami atom, owa'. Basef ae' ame'ama Ahalome, amama atom ailam awalapama esis ewalogas ma kot. Ea' basef amama ma kot ae'anai amama bo'om andeande'. Dei' main, ae' ina anda'ama aila nomonas ae'ami atom, owa'. Ae' anda'ama aila nomonasa aman anama nasapa'e afi'i.
43005031	I'i ae' ewalapa basefa ae' atowe, na'ama ipe' pi'i basef amama ae' a'iami ina endilisi, owa'. Pi'i basef amama baso'maimi.
43005032	Anona nape dei' nawalapa basefa ae'. Na'ama ae' dei' egawa basef amama na'iama ae' endilisi.
43005033	Fowa' ipe' pasapa' basef mafe'mago Jon. Anan nawalapa basef endilisimi ma ae'.
43005034	Ea' dei' ae' ina efala enis epes etapasi ma sowalapa basefa ae' siegiambame, owa'. Ae' a'i God nofa'epa pitanimani pifi'mai anan. Dei' a'i basef amama.
43005035	Aman anama Jon si'i anona nagwapina nafifima amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' ukup ipe'imi ma'i a'e ma ipe' pendanifel nogota anama bandana ma howalagon anama Joni ea' pembale'efa basef ananimi.
43005036	Maol anama la'ifinai Ahalome nase'eama na'i imafiana enda'ana hi'ilana anama atona ae' dei' anda'ana. Anama maol la'ifinai nikila' maol Joni nawalapa basef ofagema ma ae'. Dei' main, maol anama Ahalome nasi'ianai ma eanda'ana hi'ialana ae' anda'anai nihi'amba esis amam nematawa segawa Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i.
43005037	Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i, anan atona nawalapa basef ofagema ma ae'. Fowa' gani pafi'i pataga dei' ipe' ina pati Anan pame' maf ananinai, owa'.
43005038	Ea' basef ananimi wapoti' amama ina mape ukup ipe'imi, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' owa' peambale'efe God nasapa'e afi'i.
43005039	Ukup ipe'imi mandanda' ma'i basef amama mape Buk Baibel mase'epa ambal namunai ipe' ma peape bo'wepa la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' ipe' patalifa basef amama peagawam ea' panda' maol lu'unai pagolopa basef amama hiami. Basef amama Baibelimi ma'i ae' mawalape. Owa'etin.
43005040	Ipe' pandaiwama pifi'mai ae' pefa' ambal namunai peape bo'wepa la'ela'ef hihif.
43005041	Ae' ina okom na'i epes etapasi seafela agel ae'anai lu'una, owa'.
43005042	Ae' egawa ukup ipe'imi ina maimaila God, owa'.
43005043	Ae' afi'i agel Ahalome ae'anai, ea' ipe' ina pase'e opalef ipe'imi ma ae', owa'. Anona nemaf anona aman nifi'i ma agel ananinai atona, ipe' pi'i a'e pese'ana opalef anan.
43005044	Ukup ipe'imi ma'i mefa' agof lu'wami ma sahopepa owapepa ipe'imi atom. Ea' God owa'. Na'ama ipe' pembale'efe pi'imama? Owa'etin.
43005045	Ipe' ina ukup mendanda' mi'i anona nemaf ae' enda' kotimipa ma Ahalome God, owa'etin. Aman nenda' kotima ipe', anan Moses, aman anama ipe' pa'i anona nemaf nigiambamepa.
43005046	Ipe' pembale'efa basef ananimi, pembale'efa basef ae'ami wapoti'. Dei' main, anan nanda' basef ma'i ae' mail Buk Baibel.
43005047	Ea' ipe' owa' peambale'efa basef anan nanda'ami ma ae', owa'. Nambimb ipe' pembale'efa basef ae'ami pi'imama? Owa'etin.”
43006001	Amama mataga ea' Jisas nafe' nambo walemb batupa'manai anama Galili fisana. Walemb batupa'manai anama sa'i Taiberias.
43006002	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan. Dei' main, esis sati ikwaf naninani la'ifinai anan nandana ma nanda' isima awes naninani nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Ea' sailana safe'.
43006003	-
43006004	Nemaf anama lu'unai sanda' gwa'aimianai sa'i Pasova felefele' ma neataga. Ea' nondowasa' halaf anama nao'wa alupumi ananimi mape.
43006005	Ea' Jisas natologon ganigani nati amam nematawa hiesi endilisi safi'mai anan. Ea' nahali' Filip na'i, “Afa' ata' otala bret eti ma oso' amam nematawa amama sea'ana?”
43006006	Jisas nagwambana na'iam na'ama. Anan negawam ea' amamaga anan na'i neanda'ami.
43006007	Ea' Filip nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i afa' otala bret 200 kina, ina atuwasi dondo'ma epes isima hiesi sea'ana, owa'.”
43006008	Ea' anona amam alupumi Jisasi Andru, Saimon Pita sahalomana, na'ipa Jisas na'i,
43006009	“Anona aman awomunai nahapila bret so'umi 5-peleim maloma agof so'umi biam ma'oh na'ae. Ea' amama ina dondo'ma epes isima hiesi, owa'.”
43006010	Ea' Jisas na'ipa alupumi na'i, “Kipa esis amam nematawa hiesi sope etap.” Anama otalef bu'wami mapoma. Ea' amam atom mataga 5,000-peleim mape otalef amama.
43006011	Ea' Jisas nafela bret amama nanifela God ea', nase'asam esis sape etapi. Ea' nanda'am na'ama etina agof wapoti'. Nase'asam sa'am elihis andeande' si'i do'ok nolomahas.
43006012	Sa'am elihis ea', tukwakwanimi ma'oh. Ea' anan na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Ipe' petatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi. Na'ama mo'oh etin.”
43006013	Ea' alupumi mafe' matatama tukwakwanimi ma'ihi maolo'wam holalef lu'wami 12-peleima bret amama.
43006014	Ea' esis amam nematawa sati ikwaf anama la'ifinai Jisas nanda'ana sa'iam sa'i, “Endilisi, anan profet anama sa'i niefi'i etap anae'.”
43006015	Ea' Jisas negawa ukup asasimi sa'i sifi'i sohapilana sonda'ana netaga nope si'i anona dembinai kinga numafias. Ea' anan atona notanima nondowasa' halaf ilif.
43006016	Wambomota felefele'ma owamb, alupumi Jisasi mowala walemb batupa'manai
43006017	malata anona bot mafe' walemb batupa'manai ma'i mombo wambel Kaperneam. Ea' owamb natagamam la'afen, ea' Jisas ina dei' nafi'i natagamam, ata' owa'.
43006018	Ea' uf lu'unai naluwi, naoh mohafel manda'am fetawa fepo endilisi.
43006019	Amam manda' pul mafe' nogota launai si'i kilomita 6-pelein, ea' mati Jisas naitu nafi'i embel ilif walemb batupa'manai anama nafi'i nataga felefele'ma bot nafe'ma. Ea' amam umbamaham endilisi.
43006020	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' la'ifipa, umbamehepa owa'. Ae' atowe ma'uwi ailipa afi'i.”
43006021	Ea' ma'i nakwaha embel nalata bot. Ea' bot nafe' mehip nataga anama amam ma'i meafe'ma.
43006022	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi nambati' sapani walemb batupa'manai fisana, esis segawa ea' sa'i, “Nambati' alupumi ananimi atom malata bot anama ea' mafe'. Ea' anan ina nafe' nalomam, owa'etin. Ina anona bot nail naloma anama, owa'. Atotona nala.”
43006023	Ea' anogw bogw wapoti' Taibiriasigwi mafi'i felefele'ma na'ama anan nape nanifela God sagwa gwa'aimi amama.
43006024	Ea' esis amam nematawa sati Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi amam ina ata' mape, owa'. Ea' safe' salata anogw bogw safe' Kaperneam sagolopa Jisas.
43006025	Esis sagolopana ma satolona gani wa'ol walemb batupa'manai anama fisana sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai Tisa, ine' nambai' nafi'i na'ae?”
43006026	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ipe' ina ukup ma'i pepel ae' anda'anai dei' pafi'i pa'i petolowe, owa'etin. Ipe' ukup mapoma bret atona pagwa'anai ma opalef ipe'imi si'im, amama atom dei' pagolope pafi'i.
43006027	Ipe' ina penda' maola pefa' gwa'aimi amama awami folo'olami, owa'. Ipe' penda' maola gwa'aimi bu'wami sagwa'am mape bo'om andeande' la'ela'ef. Gwa'aimi amama ambal namunai nape la'ela'ef. Gwa'aimi amama, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei, ae' atowe nambimb ese'epam ipe'. God nase'e agel lu'unai nesahe'e ea' ma enda' maol anama lu'unai.”
43006028	Ea' sahali'ana sa'i, “Dei' ape' monda' maol main ata' nili'ma monda' maol Godi?”
43006029	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Maol Godi na'ama. Ipe' pembale'efa ae', God nasapa'e afi'i.”
43006030	Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nihi'ambapa maina pepel la'ifinai ma ape' matolona meambale'efena? Ine' nanda' maina maolan?
43006031	Ehasapa ape'isi fowa' gani sagwa' anom gwa'aimi agilima sa'i mana etap anama wafiguma fatauguma si'i basef mape Baibeli ma'iam ma'i, ‘Anan nase'asa gwa'aimi mafi'i heveni sa'am.’ ”
43006032	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, Moses ina nase'epa gwa'aimi amama mafi'i heveni, owa'. Ahalome ae'anai atona nasi'ipei gwa'aimi amama endilisimi.
43006033	Gwa'aimi amama God nasi'ipami amama ae' akwaha ilif isila'i ma ase'asa ambal namunai esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.”
43006034	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, dei' ine' nese'apa gwa'aimi amama mope la'ela'ef.”
43006035	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' atowe ae' gwa'aimi bret ambal namunai bu'unai napaiwei. Emi egafis siefi'mai ae'i ina nambimb nolomahas, ea' emi egafis seambale'efa ae'i, esis ina nambimb eap nese'as wapoti' ma embel, owa'etin.
43006036	Ae' ali' a'ipipa, ipe' patolowe ea' ipe' ina pembale'efa basef bu'wami ae'ami, owa'.
43006037	Emi egafis Ahalome nase'eas ae'i, isima nambimb sifi'mai ae'. Emi egafis si'i seafi'mai ae'i, ae' ina anona nemaf egalo'mas, owa'etin endilisi.
43006038	Ae' ina akwaha heven isila'i ma iela okom ae'anai atona, owa'etin. Ae' afi'ima iela basefa okom anan nasapa'e afi'i.
43006039	Okom aman anama nasapa'e afi'i nape na'ama. Esis amam nematawa hiesi anan nase'eas ae'asi, ae' ina ekwaha enin atitin nefe' higililan, owa'etin. Ae' efelas wapoti' sehafel hiagilif nemaf akutainai.
43006040	Okom Ahalome ae'anai nape na'ama. Amam nematawa emi egafis seme' basef ae'ami seambale'efa ae'i, esis anona nemaf sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' efelas wapoti' sehafel hi'agilif nemaf akutainai.”
43006041	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' atowe si'i gwa'aimi akwaha heven isila'i.” Anan na'iam na'ama, esis Juda opalef aoma anan sa'i basef hiami ma anan.
43006042	Esis sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Dei' si'i main? Aman anama Jisas anan Josep nogalomana. Ahalomana mama'wana ananisi ape' mogawas. Dei' maina anan na'i, ‘Ae' akwaha heven isila'i?’ ”
43006043	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef esis na'i, “Ipe' ina ukup motamea pi'i basef amama, owa'.
43006044	Ina enis epes la'ifisa esis etis sifi'mai ae', owa'. Ahalome nasapa'e dei' afi'i. I'i anan nefela nomonas asasimi. Epes isima nambimb sifi'mai ae', ea' anona nemaf ae' efelas sehafel nemaf akutainai.
43006045	Basef anona profet na'iami mape buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘God anona nemaf nuwalipas amam nematawa hiesi.’ Ea' ae' a'ipipa, amam nematawa emi egafis seme' basefa Ahalome ae'anai ma seagawa anan, esis sifi'mai ae'.
43006046	Ina enin epen atitin nati Ahalome, owa'. Fowa' ae' ape aloma God afi'i etap anae' ae' atowe atolona.
43006047	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi atom. Emi egafis sembale'efa ae', esis dei' sefa' ambal namunai sepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43006048	Ae' si'i bret ambal namunai napaiwei.
43006049	Fowa' gani ehasepa ipe'isi sa' gwa'aimi amama mana etap anama wafiguma fatauguma, dei' saga' ea'.
43006050	Gwa'aimi amama dei' makwaha heven misila'i amama na'ama. Emi egafis seagwa'ami, esis ina anona nemaf saga', owa'etin. Sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43006051	Ae' si'i bret ambal namunai napaiwei akwaha heven isila'i ape etap anae'. Emi egafis sea' bret anama, esis sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Bret anama ae' nambimb iese'esana, amama alop ae'anai eso' amam nematawa etapasi ma sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.”
43006052	Ea' amam Juda ma'i basef mehip mandahihianama Jisas la'afena amam atom ma'i, “Dei' si'i maina aman anama na'i nease'apa alop ananinai ape' mea'ana?”
43006053	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, ae' ataga epen endilisiwei. I'i ipe' pindaiwa'ma pea' alop neloma esimbel ae'ami, ipe' ina nambimb pefa' ambal namunai, owa'etin.
43006054	Emi egafis, sea' alop noloma esimbel ae'ami, amama dei' sefa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif ea' efelas wapoti' sehafel hi'agilif nemaf akutainai.
43006055	Dei' main? Alop ae'anai si'i gwa'aimi endilisimi, ea' esimbel ae'ami endilisimi ma seagwa'am.
43006056	Emi egafis seagwa' alop noloma esimbel ae'ami, esis sope la'ifis soloma ae', ea' ae' epe la'ifiwi elomas.
43006057	Ahalome ambal namunai napainai nasapa'e afi'i, ea' ae' dei' ape ambal namunai Ahalomei. Ea' na'ama etina emi egafis seagwa' alop noloma esimbel ae'ami esis nambimb sofa' ambal namunai sope la'ela'ef ma pepel ae'anai.
43006058	Bret anama nakwaha heven nisila'i anama ae' atowe. Fowa' gani ehasepa ipe'isi sagwa' mana ea' esis saga'. Ea' emi egafis sogwa bret anama nafi'i heveni, esis sofa' ambal namunai sope la'ela'ef hihif.”
43006059	Jisas na'ipas na'ama nawalipas nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai wambel Kaperneam.
43006060	Enis alupisi Jisasi hiesi same' basef amama ea' sa'i, “Basef amama ahifima ape'. Emi egafis nambimb sefa'am silam? Owa'etin.”
43006061	Ea' Jisas negawa alupusi ananisi sandaiwa'ma basef amama. Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Basef amama ma'i mohambombaga ukup ipe'imi?
43006062	I'i ipe' piti ae' ataga epen endilisiwei etanima ilata ilif fowa' apanima, nambimb ipe' gegelalasipa kwapete'epa.
43006063	Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nese'epa ambal namunai pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' waf hianai epes sanda'anai ina nagiambamepa, owa'etin. Basef amama atom ae' a'iami, amama mataga Ambal Bu'unai Godi amama ambal namunai napaimi mape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43006064	Ea' enipa ina pembale'efa basef ae'ami, owa'.” Dei' main? Jisas fowa' dambadamba nagawa emi egafis owa' seambale'efanai ea' nagawa emi egalin nambimb ni'ipa naumbih nihi'ambama anan napoma.
43006065	Ea' na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Amama atom ae' a'ipipa ma ina enis epes la'ifisa seafi'mai ae', owa'. Ahalome ae'anai nefela nomonas asasimi, sifi'mai ae'. I'i owa', owa'etin.”
43006066	Nemaf anama enis alupusi ananisi hiesi sakwahona sotanima safe' deindei, ina ata' sape salomana wapoti', owa'.
43006067	Ea' Jisas nahali' alupumi ananimi 12-peleim na'i, “Ipe' wapoti' pa'i pekwaha ae' pitanima pefe', a' amon?”
43006068	Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, afa' okwaha ine' ofe' eti wila emi? Basef ine'imi atom ma'ipafa ma weape ambal namunai andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43006069	Afa' ombale'efa ina ea' ogawa endilisi ine' aman Godi bu'unai endilisi, nasapa'ena nafi'i.”
43006070	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' esahe'a ipe' 12-pelaipa ea' ae'ipei. Ea' anona ipe'inai ambal aonai napainai.”
43006071	Jisas na'i anona amamunai amam 12-peleim agilinama Judas, anan Saimon Kariotinai nogalomana. Anan nape naloma alupumi Jisasi 12-peleim, ea' anona nemaf nefe' nihi'ambam naumbih Jisasi anan napoma.
43007001	Amamaga mataga ea', Jisas nafe' nowalona etap hiagoma Galili. Esis Juda dambami asasimi mape etap hiagoma Judia ma'i mohana noga'. Na'ama anan ina ata' nafe' nape etap asasinai, owa'. Nape Galili atogon.
43007002	Ea' felefele' ma nemaf anama esis Juda sanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma ukup meapoma God. Ea' sala' aolah sa'uhi sapoma sanda' gwa'aimi amama.
43007003	Ea' owapana Jisasi ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nekwaha na'ae nefe' etap hiagoma Judia, ma alupusi seati maol la'ifinai ine'inai si'i God nanda'anai.
43007004	I'i anona aman ni'i epes hiesi sogawa maol ananinai, anan ina nondambaho' nonda'ana, owa'. Ine' na'ama etin, nekwaha wambel ine'inai nefe'ma epes hiesi sitilina seati maol ine'inai ma sogawena.”
43007005	Owapana ananimi ina mombale'efana, owa'. Ea' dei' ma'ipana basef amama.
43007006	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Nimeguf hiami ipe'imi atom, ea' nemaf ae'anai dahandahama ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'. Nogota ae'anai neataga ae' efe' Jerusalem.
43007007	Ae' awalapa waf aonai epes etapasi sanda'anai. Ea' dei' ukup asasimi aoma ae'. Ea' ukup asasimi ina aoma ipe', owa'.
43007008	Ipe' pili' pendowasa' pefe'ma gwa'aimi amama. Ae' ota'. Dei' ae' ina endowasa', ata' owa'. Dei' main, nogota ae'anai ina dei' nataga.”
43007009	Anan na'ipam na'ama ma ea', ata' napani Galili.
43007010	Ea' owapana Jisasi mondowasa' mafe' Jerusalema gwa'aimi amama lu'wami. Amam mali' mafe', anan wapoti' nagi'mam nondowasa' ma gwa'aimi amama. Ea' anan ina nafe' nandawalap, owa'etin. Anan nandambaho' etin nafe'.
43007011	Nemaf anama sanda' gwa'aimi amama amam dambami Juda mape naep motaoma Jisas. Ea' mahali' esis ma'i, “Aman anama nape eti?”
43007012	Amam nematawa hiesi esis etis sanda'ipama anan sa'osa'ombel. Enis sa'i, “Anan aman bu'unai.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Owa', anan nambaso'ma epes hiesi.”
43007013	Ea' ina enin epen nawalapa basef na'iam alihima Jisas, owa'. Dei' main, esis hiesi umbamahasa amam agufumi esis Judai.
43007014	Esis sape sanda' gwa'aimi amama nimeguf wanom, ea' Jisas nafi'i nape ande' felefe'ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai nawalipasa basef esis.
43007015	Amam agufumi Judai gegelalasom endilisi mahali'as ma'i, “Anan ina nafe'ma skul. Emi egalin nase'ana gawa anama?”
43007016	Ea' Jisas nagwamam na'ipam na'i, “Gawa anama ina gawa ae'anai, owa'. Gawa anama anona amani nasapa'e afi'i.
43007017	I'i enin epen okom ni'i neanda' maol Godi si'i anan na'ianai, nambimb epen inima negawa basef ae' awalipasami mataga God o mataga Ae' atowe.
43007018	Emi egafis sie'ipasa gawa ananinai atona, esis sa'i enis epes seafela agof asasimi lu'um. Ea' emi egafis sonda' maola sefela agel anan nasapa'as safi'i, esis epes bu'wasi, sa'i basef endilisimi atom. Basef baso'maimi ina mapomas, owa'.
43007019	Fowa' Moses nase'epa mi'uli Godi ipe', ea' owa' enin epen dei' nape nalomepa nila mi'uli anama, owa'etin. Dei' maina ipe' pa'i pehe ega'?”
43007020	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sagwamana basef sa'ipana sa'i, “Ambal aonai napaina. Emi egalin na'i nehena nega'?”
43007021	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' anda' pepel atotona ea' dei' ipe' gegelalasipa.
43007022	Ea' ipe' patopa'mam alop nogamepa ipe'imi nemaf anama Sabat papoma noma'wanai. Dei' main? Ipe' paila mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai. Moses atona ina nali' na'ipipa panda' waf anama, owa'. Dambadamba waf anama nali' natagama amam agufumi Judai fowa'imi mali'i.
43007023	Ipe' patopa'mam alop nogamepa nemaf anama Sabat ama ipe' ina pewala mi'uli anama God naso' Moses anai. Dei' maina ipe' ukup aoma ae' ma anda' anona aman bo'ona endilisi nemaf anama Sabat?
43007024	Ipe' ina pewaloga amamaga penda'am naep atom, owa'. Ipe' pewalogam ukup ipe'imi ma waf bu'unai atona peagawa waf esis sanda'anai bo'ona o aona.”
43007025	Enis epes Juda sape Jerusalemi same' basef amama ananimi sahali'as sa'i, “Anan ma'una anama dambami ape'imi ma'i mohana neaga'?
43007026	Anan nape nawalipasa basef alihiguma ea' amam agufumi ina magwamana anom basef, owa'. Amama endilisi a' amon? Amam dambami ape'imi mogawa aman anama Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i?
43007027	Ape' mogawa aman anama nataga etap anae' ape'inai. Ea' anona nemaf owagama Krais neafi'i, ina enin epen negawa anan neatagama, owa'.”
43007028	Ea' Jisas ata' nape ande' felefe'ma ipat lu'unai Godi nawalipas na'i mehip na'i, “Endilisi, ipe' pegawa ae' atagama wambel ae'ainai. Ea' ae' ina afi'i etin aila okom ae'anai atona, owa'. Anan nasapa'e afi'i anan endilisinai. Ipe' ina pegawana, owa'.
43007029	Ea' ae' egawana. Dei' main, fowa' ae' alomana wape etifigin ea' anan nasapa'e afi'i.”
43007030	Esis same' basef amama ananimi, opalef aoma anan sa'i sefa'ana sonda'mana basef. Owa'etin. Dei' main, nemaf anama ananinai ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'.
43007031	Epes hiesi sape na'ae same'ana sembale'efana sa'i, “Nemaf anama Krais niefi'i, Anan nonda' maol la'ifinai. Maol Kraisi nambimb nikila' maol aman anama nanda'anai?”
43007032	Amam Farisi mame' esis amam nematawa hiesi sa'i basef so'umbelifi ifima ma Jisas. Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi masapa' anom polisman mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi mafi'i mefa'ana.
43007033	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ata' elomepa epe nogota bandana ea' etanima efe'ma Anan nasapa'e afi'i.
43007034	Ipe' nambimb pegolopa ae', owa'. Gani ae' nambimb iapanima, ipe' ina la'ifipa peafo'o, owa'.”
43007035	Ea' amam Juda atom manda'ipama ma'i, “Aman anama na'i nefe' eti ma afa' weagolopana? Anan nambimb nefe'ma esis Juda afa'isi saloma esis Grik sapoma ea' niwalipa esis Grik, a' amon?
43007036	Ea' na'i, ‘Ipe' pegolopa ae' ea' ina nambimb petolowe, owa'.’ Ea' na'iam wapoti' na'i, ‘Ipe' ina la'ifipa piti ae' eapoma, owa'.’ Basef amama ofagema ma'i main?”
43007037	Nemaf anama lu'unai akutainai ma esis Juda sanda' gwa'aimi amama, Jisas naitu na'i mehip na'i, “Emi egafis eap nese'as sifi'mai ae' sea' embel.
43007038	Emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i sotaga si'i basef mail Buk Baibeli ma'iam ma'i, ‘Emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, esis nambimb embel ambal namunai napeimi motaga opalef asasimi nomon ea' kolo' etin muwisi ande'.’ ”
43007039	Basef Jisasi ofagema ma'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi anona nemaf esis sembale'efana sofa'ana nupe nolomas. Nemaf anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi ine' dei' nape naloma enis epes sembale'efanai, ata' owa'. Dei' main, Jisas ata' owa' noga' nohafel wapoti' nofa' agel lu'unaima howalagon ananinai, ata' owa'.
43007040	Ea' enis amam nematawa same' basef amama sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anama anan dembinai Profet ape' mape mohafanai.”
43007041	Ea' enis sa'i, “Dei' Krais nataga etap hiagoma Galili? Owa'etin.
43007042	Basef mail Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Krais owagama notaga wambota Deviti wambel Betlehem, Devit fowa' napoma.’ ”
43007043	Ea' epes hiesi sandawal biefis sa'i Jisas emi egafuma.
43007044	Ea' enis sa'i sefa'ana nefe' nonda' basef, ea' owa'. Ina enis sefa'ana, owa'.
43007045	Amama mataga ea', polisman amama mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi motanima mafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi mapoma. Ea' dambami amama mahali' amam polisman ma'i, “Dei' maina ipe' owa' pewa' Jisas pefa'ana pifi'i?”
43007046	Ea' amam ma'i, “Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' owa' enin epen nawalapa basef si'i anan na'iam, owa'.”
43007047	Amam Farisi magwamama basef ma'i, “Anan nambaso'mepa wapoti', a' amon?
43007048	-
43007049	Ina anona dembinai o anona Farisi nembale'efana, owa'. Ea' amam nematawa isima hiesi, ina sogawa mi'uli Godi, owa'. Isima anona nemaf God nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.”
43007050	-
43007051	Ea' Nikodemus fowa' nafe'ma Jisasi, anan dembinai naloma amam dambami Farisi, nahali'am na'i, “Afa' andeande'ma owaloga anona aman etin wi'i anan nanda' waf aonai, o owa'? Mi'uli afa'inai na'i na'ama na'i, afa' uli' uhali'ana ma weagawa waf ananinai neloma maol ananinai, ea' wi'i anom basef.”
43007052	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' wapoti' Galilinai? Owa'etin. Ine' ata' niti basef mail Buk Baibeli ea' nitalifam. Ama nambimb neagawa ina anona profet nataga etap hiagoma Galili, owa'etin.”
43007053	Amam amama hiami mafe' ifagw amamumi atona etin,
43008001	ea' Jisas nondowasa' nafe' halaf lawah oliv motawama.
43008002	Ea' kuhimbita atona netanima nafe' ande' felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Esis amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan ea' nape nawalipasa basef.
43008003	Ea' amam dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi maloma amam Farisi mati ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a waol kwaloma anona aman kwa'oh mao'wakw mafi'i. Ea' ma'ipakw kwaitu la'afena amam hiami matolo'w.
43008004	Ea' ma'ipa Jisas ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nemata'w akwama afa' watolo'w kwaloma anona aman kwanda' so'a waola waf aonai.
43008005	Mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'ipafa na'i afa' okwaha otamba oha nematawa wanda' waf anama oga'. Ine' okom nape na'imama?”
43008006	Amam ma'i mogwambana. I'i anan owa' neagwamama basef andeande', monda'mana basef. Ea' Jisas natambe' notawa nanda' faf ananinai nanda' anom basef mail etap.
43008007	Amam maitu mope mahali'ana ma basef hiami, ea' nehafel naitu na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' emi egafipa owa' peanda' waf aonai, ipe' pili' pekwaha otam peha akwa'w.”
43008008	-
43008009	Ea' anan natambe' wapoti' nanda' anom basef mail etap. Amam mome' basef amama ananimi ea' mandamboma atona etin matanima mafe'. Amam hagami mali' mafe' ea' awomimi magi' mafe'. Mafe' atona etin makwaha akwa'w ato'w kwaitu.
43008010	Ea' Jisas nehafel naitu nahali'akw na'i, “Dei' amam amama mafe' eti? Owa' anona aman ni'i nenda'mena basef?”
43008011	Ea' akwa'w kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, owa'. Mafe' hi'alam.” Ea' na'ipakw na'i, “Ae' na'ama etin si'i amam. Ae' ina anda'mena basef, owa'. Ine' fo'o, ea' ina netanima nenda' waf aonai wapoti', owa'.”
43008012	Ea' Jisas na'ipa amam nematawa wapoti' na'i, “Ae' si'i howalagon nafi'i etap. Emi egafis siela ae' esis ina nambimb sefe' akota eaf asasinai, owa'. Esis sope howalagoma ambal namunai nupais.”
43008013	Ea' amam Farisi ma'ipana ma'i mogwambana anom basef ma'i, “Dei' ine' na'i basefa ine' etina. Na'ama afa' ina ombale'efena, owa'. Basef ine'imi ina endilisimi, owa'.”
43008014	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipasa basefa ae'. Ea' dei' basef amama ae'ami endilisimi atom. Dei' main, ae' egawa ae' ataga afi'ima ea' egawa anama anona nemaf eafe'ma. Ea' ipe' ina pegawa anama ae' ataga afi'ima, o anona nemaf eafe'ma, owa'.
43008015	Ipe' pawaloga epes si'i epes etapasi sawalogas. Ea' ae' owa'. Ae' ina ewaloga enin epen, owa'.
43008016	I'i ae' ewaloga enis epes, ae' ewalogas andeande' endilisi. Dei' main? Ina ae' atowe ape, owa'. Ae' ape aloma Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i. Na'ama afa' biafa wawalogas andeande' endilisi.
43008017	Anom basef mail mi'uli ipe'inai ma'i, ‘I'i anom amam biam mie'i basef etifim, basef amama amamumi endilisimi atom.’
43008018	Basef amama ma ae' afa' biafa wa'iam, ae' aloma Ahalome ae'anai nasapa'e afi'i.”
43008019	Ea' amam mahali'ana ma'i, “Ahalomena ine'inai nape eti?” Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' ina pegawa ae', ea' ipe' ine' pegawa Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'. I'i ipe' pegawa ae, ipe' pegawa Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'. Owa'etin.”
43008020	Ea' Jisas ata' nawalapa basef anama nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai ma rum sambe' otamba moni sanda' ofa anai na'oma. Ea' ina anona aman nafe' nombalo'ana nofa'ana ma neanda' basef, owa'. Dei' main, nogota ananinai ata' owa' neataga.
43008021	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' nambimb ekwahipa efe'. Ea' ipe' pegolope ea' ina petolowe, owa'. Ipe' pepe pega' ma waf aonai ipe'inai. Dei' main, anama ae' eafe'ma, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipa peafo'oma, owa'.”
43008022	Ea' amam Juda manda'ipama ma'i, “Anan na'i nefe' eti, ma afa' ina la'ififa weafo'o? Dei' maina anan na'i na'ama? Anan na'i nondaha anan atona?”
43008023	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pape etap anae'. Ea' ae' ape ilif. Wambel ipe'inai etap anae', ea' ae' owa'.
43008024	Ae' a'ipipa ea'. Nambimb ipe' pega' ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ata' la'ela'ef napaipa. I'i ipe' owa' peambale'efa ae', aman God nasapa'e afi'i, nambimb ipe' pega' ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai la'ela'ef napaipa.”
43008025	-
43008026	Ea' amam mahali'ana ma'i, “Ine' emi egafina?” Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Si'i fowa' ali' a'ipipa. Ae' la'ifiwei ma i'ipipa basef hiami ipe' ma ienda' kotimipa ma basef hiami amama a'ipipami. Ea' anan nasapa'e afi'i, anan endilisinai. Basef ananimi ae' ame'am ea' a'ipipam ipe' hipei pape etapi.”
43008027	Amam ina mogawa Jisas na'ipama Ahalomana ananinai, owa'.
43008028	Na'ama Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Nambimb ipe' pesa'ma ae' ataga epen endilisiwei piundi il lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ilif. Nemaf anama ipe' pegawa basef amama ma'i ae' atowe ea' ma'uwi si'i ali' a'ipipa. Ea' pegawa ae' ina anda' maol ae' atowe a'ianai, owa'. Basef Ahalome na'ipiami, amama atom a'iam a'ipipam.
43008029	Anan nasapa'e afi'i nape nalome. Anan ina nakwahowe ae' atowe ape, owa'. Dei' main, la'ela'ef ae' aila okom ananinai anda' maol.”
43008030	Jisas ata' na'ipam etin, hiesi sambale'efana.
43008031	Ea' Jisas na'ipa esis Juda sambale'efana na'i, “I'i ipe' pembale'efa basef ae'ami pilam, ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi.
43008032	Ea' ipe' nambimb pegawa basef endilisimi ea' amama atom motagahipa pepe wafifipa.”
43008033	Ea' esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Ape' akupana Abrahami. Ape' ina agof a'apa mape owina enis epes, owa'etin. Dei' maina ine' na'ipapa na'i basef endilisimi matagahepa mape wafifipa?”
43008034	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis sape sanda' waf aonai, waf anama newa'as sape si'i agof a'asi sape owina enis epes.
43008035	Epes isima agof a'asi sape sanda' waf aonai ina sape andeande' ma wambota ananinai la'ela'ef, owa'. Ea' esis sape batausana ananisi endilisi, esis sape wambota ananinai andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43008036	I'i Ae' Nogalomana Ananiwei etagahipa panda' waf aonai newa'epa la'ifipa, nambimb pepe andeande' wafifipa endilisi.
43008037	Ae' egawa ipe' pataga wambota Abrahami. Ea' ipe' pa'i pehe ega'. Dei' main, basef amama ae'ami ina mape nomonas ipe'imi, owa'.
43008038	Ae' awalapa basef amama ma amamaga ae' aloma Ahalome ae'anai watolom, ea' a'ipipa basef amama, ea' ipe' panda'am si'i pame' ahalomepa ipe'inai na'ipipa.”
43008039	-
43008040	Esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Bafalamapa ape'inai Abraham.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “I'i ipe' Abraham batawisanai, ipe' penda' maol Abrahami. Owa'etin. Ea' pa'i mehipa pehe eaga'. Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi atom ame' God na'ipiami. Abraham ina nanda' waf anama si'i ipe' pa'i pehe ega', owa'etin.
