43008041	Ipe' panda' waf ahalomepa ipe'inai nanda'anai.” Ea' esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Mamalapa ape'iwai ina wanda' so'a waol olapa, owa'. Ahalomapa ape'inei God atona.”
43008042	Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “I'i God ahalomepa ipe'inai, ukup ipe'imi mimila ae'. Ina ae' atowe ela okom afi'i, owa'etin. Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i ape na'ae.
43008043	Dei' maina ipe' owa' peagawa basef ae'ami? Ipe' ina la'ifipama peme' basef ae' a'iemi pielam, owa'.
43008044	Ahalomepa ipe'inai Satan ea' ipe' paila nomonas ananimi atom. Fowa' dambadamba nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei', anan naha epes saga', ea' nowa' alafugama basef endilisimi. Nomonas ananimi ina mapoma basef endilisimi, owa'. Anan nambaso'mas nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef. Basef baso'maimi anan na'iami, amama si'i diga ananinai. Dei' main, anan epen nambaso'ami ea' ofagenama basef baso'maimi hiami.
43008045	Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi atom. Amama atom dei' ipe' pandaiwa'ma peambalefa ae'.
43008046	Emi egafis sape la'afena ipe'i la'ifipa ma peawalapa anona waf aonai atotona ae' anda'anai? Owa'etin. I'i ae' ie'ipipa basef endilisimi, dei' maina ipe' owa' peambale'efa ae'?
43008047	Epes Godi same' basef ananimi. Ea' ipe' ina epes Godi, owa'. Ipe' enipa epes. Na'ama ipe' owa' peme' basef ananimi.”
43008048	Ea' esis Juda sagwamana basef sa'i, “Ape' ma'i endilisi ine' Samariainai naumbih ape'inai ea' ambal aonai napaina.”
43008049	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ambal aonai owa'etin. Ea' ae' afela agel Ahalome ae'anai ea' ipe' panda' agel ae'anai nowala.
43008050	Ae' ina anda' maola enis epes seafela agel ae'anai lu'una, owa'. Ea' anona dembinai nanda' maol na'i enis epes seafela agel ae'anai, Ahalome nape dembinai jas.
43008051	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi atom. Emi egafis sembale'efa basef ae'ami sielam, esis ina anona nemaf soga', owa'. Sope la'ela'ef hihif.”
43008052	Ea' esis Juda same' basef amama sa'i, “Dei' ape' mogawa ine' ambal aonai nape nomonas ine'imi. Abraham fowa' gani naga' ea' amam profet fowa'imi wapoti' maga'. Ea' ine' na'i, emi egafis seambale'efa basef ine'imi esis ina soga', owa'.”
43008053	Ea' sahali'ana wapoti' sa'i, “Ine' nikila' bafalomapa ape'inai Abraham? Anan naga' ea' amam profet wapoti' maga'. Ea' ine' na'i ine' emi egafina?”
43008054	-
43008055	Ea' Jisas nagwa basef na'ama na'i, “I'i ae' efela agel ae'anai lu'una, agel ae'anai wafinai si'i basef wafimi. Ea' Ahalome ipe' pa'i God ipe'inai, anan nafela agel ae'anai lu'una. Ipe' ina pegawana, owa'. Ae' atowe egawana. I'i ae' i'i owa' eagawana, a'i basef baso'maimi si'i ipe' pambaso'am. Owa'etin. Ae' egawana aila basef ananimi.
43008056	Abraham bafalomepa ipe'inai, anan nandanifel ma nati nogota ae'anai nataga, si'i nati ae' ma nandanifel endilisi.”
43008057	Ea' esis Juda sa'ipana sa'i, “Afagof ine'imi ata' owa' 50-peleim, ine' na'i nati Abraham?”
43008058	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'ipas na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, fowa' gani Abraham mama'wana ata' owa' kolanai, ae' ali' ape.”
43008059	Esis same' basef ananimi, ea' amam Juda mafe' mafela otamba ma'i mokwahom mohana, ea' Jisas nakwaha ipat lu'unai Godi nandambaho' nawisi ande' nafe'.
43009001	Jisas nafe' eaf ea' nati anona aman naep mase'anai. Fowa' mama'wana kolana naep mase'ana nape na'ama etin la'ela'ef.
43009002	Ea' alupumi ananimi mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, dei' maina aman anama naep mase'ana? Anan nanda' waf aonai o esis mamasana ananisi sanda' waf aonai selana?”
43009003	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ofagema ma anan naep mase'ana ina mamasana sanda' waf aonai o anan nanda' waf aonai, owa'. Anan naep mase'ana ma maol Godi notaga lu'una nondawalap. Amama atom dei' naep mase'ana.
43009004	Dei' ea' alip, nogota anama ape' monda' maola anan nasapa'e afi'i. Owamb neataga ina ata' monda' maol, owa'etin.
43009005	Ae' ata' ape etap anae' ape si'i nagwapin howalagon ipe'iwei ipe' hipei pape etapi.”
43009006	Jisas na'ipam na'ama, ea' nisi'wafa apah nandisam maloma etap. Ea' nasemanam naep aman anama.
43009007	Ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nefe' nesa'opa naep embel walemb batupa'manai anama Siloam.” Basef ofagema ma agel anama na'i, nasapa'ana nafe'. Ea' aman anama nafe' nasa'opa naep ananimi, ma ata' netanimani, naep matiana andeande' bo'ona.
43009008	Esis wambel atona saloma enis fowa' sati anan nape eaf nandailasa otamba gwa'aimi maim sahali'as sa'i, “Anan aman anama ma'una fowa' nape eaf nandailasa gwa'aimi maim?”
43009009	Ea' enis sa'i, “Anan ma'una.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Owa'. Anona aman anama. Ea' amaga ananinai si'i anan.” Ea' aman anama atona fowa' naep mase'anai na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.”
43009010	Ea' esis sahali'ana mehip sa'i, “Ine' nanda' maina dei' nati andeande'?”
43009011	Ea' anan nagwamas na'i, “Anona aman agel ananinai Jisas nanda' etap maloma apah ananimi nambomam nanda'meam naep ae'ami. Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' nefe' nesa'of walemb batupa'manai Siloam.’ Ea' afe' asa'of ea' naep mati.”
43009012	Ea' sahali'ana sa'i, “Aman anama nape eti?” Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina egawa napoma, owa'.”
43009013	Esis sao'wa aman anama fowa' naep mase'anai safe'ma amam Farisi.
43009014	Nemaf anama esis sapoma noma'wanai Sabat, anama atona Jisas nanda' etap maloma apah nambomam nanda'mana naep ananimi ea' naep matiana.
43009015	Ea' amam Farisi mahali'ana wapoti' ma'i, “Anan nanda'mena maina dei' naep mati?” Ea' aman anama nagwamam na'i, “Anan nanda' etap maloma apah ananimi nanda'meam naep ae'ami, ea' afe' asa'opa naep ea' dei' naep mati.”
43009016	Ea' anom Farisi ma'i, “Aman anama ina naila mi'uli ma nemaf anama Sabat, owa'. Na'ama dei' anan ina aman Godi, owa'.” Ea' anom Farisi ma'i, “Anona aman nanda' waf aonai ina la'ifina ma neanda' maol la'ifinai si'i God nanda'anai, owa'.” Ea' amam Farisi mandawal biefim.
43009017	Ea' mahali' aman anama fowa' naep mase'anai wapoti' ma'i, “Ine' negawana na'imama? Aman anama nanda' naep ine'imi mati.” Ea' aman anama na'i, “Anan profet.”
43009018	Ea' amam dambami esis Judai ina mombale'efana ma'i endilisi, owa'. Ea' mofalai mamasana ananisi safi'i mahali'as.
43009019	Ea' mahali'as ma'i, “Aman anama nogalomepa ipe'inai? Aman anama ipe' pa'i naep ananimi mase'anai fowa' mama'wana kolana? Dei' anan nati andeande' na'imama?”
43009020	Esis mamasana sagwamama basef sa'i, “Afa' ogawa anan nogalomafa afa'inai. Ea' ogawa fowa' mama'wana kolana naep mase'ana.
43009021	Ea' afa' ina ogawa dei' anan nati, nati andeande' na'imama. Emi nanda' naep ananimi matiana, afa' ina ogawa. Anan dambena ea', afa' wa'i ipe' pihali' anan ni'ipipa.”
43009022	Esis mamasana ananisi umbamahasa amam agufumi Juda. Dei' sa'iam na'ama. Dei' main, amam agufumi Juda ma'i basef mandame'mam ea' ma'i, emi egafis si'i basefa Jisas si'i anan Krais, amam mogalo'mas ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ma ina sonda' lotu sealomas wapoti', owa'.
43009023	Amam ma'iam na'ama dei' mamasana ananisi umbamahas sa'i, “Anan dambena ea'. Pihali' anan ni'ipipa.”
43009024	Ea' amam mofalai aman anama wapoti' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' ni'i basef endilisimi atom, God natilina. Afa' ogawa aman anama Jisas, anan aman aonai.”
43009025	Ea' anan nagwamam na'i, “Ae' ina egawa waf ananinai aonai o owa'. Ea' ae' egawa endilisi, fowa' naep ae'ami mase'e ea' dei' ati andeande'.”
43009026	Ea' mahali'ana ma'i, “Anan nanda'mena maina dei' nanda' naep ine'imi mati?”
43009027	Anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Do'ok ae' a'ipipa ea', ea' ipe' ina pame'e, owa'. Dei' maina pa'i peme' basef amama wapoti'? Ipe' wapoti' pa'i petaga alupipei ananipei pilana?”
43009028	Ea' amam ma'i basef wandafumi ma anan ma'i, “Ine' aman alupinai ananinai. Ea' afa' alupufai Mosesi.
43009029	Afa' ogawa God fowa' gani na'ipa Moses ea' aman anama afa' ina ogawa waf ofagena ananinai anan nataga eti?”
43009030	Ea' anan nagwamama basef na'i, “Amama amamaga maim? Ipe' ina pegawa anan nataga eti, ea' anan nanda' naep ae'ami mati.
43009031	Ape' mogawa God ina name' esis sanda' waf aonai, owa'. Anan name' emi egafis sanda' maol ananinai safela agel ananinai ma seame' basef ananimi.
43009032	Fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ina anom basef ma'i anona aman mama'wana kolana ea' nataga naep mase'ana ma anona nemaf anona aman nonda' naep mitiana, owa'etin.
43009033	I'i aman anama ina aman Godi, anan ina nambimb nenda' anom amamaga. Owa'etin. Anan aman Godi.”
43009034	Ea' amam magwamana basef ma'i, “Endilisi, fowa' mama'wena kolaena ine' nanda' waf aonai atona. Ea' ina niwalipafa, owa'.” Ea' amam magalo'mana ipat anama esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai, ina ata' nolomas nonda' lotu wapoti', owa'.
43009035	Ea' Jisas name' basefa amam magalo'mana nape ande' ea' nagolopana natolona nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' nembale'efa aman anama nataga epen endilisinai?”
43009036	Ea' nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, aman anama emi? Ni'ipiana ma embale'efana.”
43009037	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Dei' ine' natolona ea'. Anan epen anama dei' na'i nalomanai.”
43009038	Ea' na'i, “Dembinai, dei' embale'efena.” Na'iam na'ama ea', nindiwa nembawa netawa etap nanda' lotumana.
43009039	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' afi'i etap anae' ma eawaloga epes hiesi hi'ilas. Ama esis naep mase'asi nambimb seati andeande' ea' isima naep matiasi ea' naep mease'as.”
43009040	Ea' anom Farisi mape malomana mame' basef amama mahali'ana ma'i, “Amama maim basef? Ine' na'i afa' naep mase'afa wapoti' a' amon?”
43009041	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “I'i ipe' naep mease'ipei, ipe' waf aonai a'epa. Owa'etin. Ipe' pa'i, ‘Afa' wati.’ Na'ama waf aonai ipe'inai ata' napomepa.”
43010001	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, emi egafis owa' suwisi uta endalelemb sipsipi ma esis situ siwisi anagon, epes isima sanda' wali.
43010002	Epen anama bu'unai nawisi utai, anan numafi sipsipi.
43010003	Aman numafi utai nawisi'amana uta ma numafi sipsip. Amam sipsip mame' malogel ananinai. Anan nofala agofa sipsip ananimi, ea' nao'wam mawisi ande'.
43010004	Nao'wa sipsip ananimi hiami mawisi ande' hi'alam ea' nali' nafe', amam magi'mana mafe'. Dei' main? Amam mogawa maf ananinai.
43010005	Ea' sipsip ina magi'ma anona epen, owa'. Na'ama mondafa'mana mofa' mefe' atona etin. Dei' main? Amam ina mogawa maf ananinai, owa'.”
43010006	Ea' Jisas na'ipasa basef womun etin na'ama, ea' esis ina sogawa basef ofagema, owa'.
43010007	Ea' Jisas na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Endilisi ae' a'ipipa, ae' si'i uta sipsip miawisanai.
43010008	Amam fowa' mumafi sipsipi, amam hiami manda' wali ea' sipsip ina mame' maguf amamumi, owa'.
43010009	Ae' si'i uta. Emi egafis siwisi ae' nomon, God nefa'as seatanimani. Esis suwis suwisi sea' gwa'aimi bu'wami.
43010010	Amam makualifi ina mafi'i ma meanda' anona maol, owa'. Amam mafi'i ma makualef mohas saga' mohambombagas. Ae' afi'i ma ipe' peape andeande' ambal namunai nopeipa si'ipa endilisi.
43010011	Ae' aman bu'uwei imafi sipsipi, a'i a'e ma eaga' ma iegiambama sipsip imafiam.
43010012	I'i anona aman nenda' maola neafa' otamba atomi ma numafi sipsip amamai, anan okom ni'i nofa' otamba atom. Anan ina nambimb numafi sipsip andeande', owa'. Anan ina aman endilisi numafi sipsipi, owa'. Maina nemaf niti nombagw maitu aolupi mufi'i, anan umbamohana nokwaha sipsip atom mitu nofa' nefe'. Ea' nombagw amama muwis moha sipsip mofa' mefe' atona etin.
43010013	Aman anama nanda' maola otamba atomi, nambimb niti nombagw amama mufi'i, ea' umbamohana nofa' nefe'. Dei' main, anan nanda' maola otamba atom, ea' nandaiwa' ma numafi sipsip andeande'.
43010014	Ae' aman bu'uwei imafi sipsip andeande'i. Ae' egawa sipsip ae'ami ea' sipsip mogawa ae'.
43010015	Ea' na'ama etin si'i Ahalome ae'anai negawa ae', ae' egawa anan. Ae' a'i a'e ma ega' iegiambama sipsip ae'ami.
43010016	Ae' anom sipsip maitu anagon. Amam ina maitu nomon endalelemb amama, owa'. Amam maitu endalelemb anagon. Ae' okom na'iam endilisi anona nemaf efa'am mifi'i mome' maf ae'anai ekolasom mitu endalelemb etifigin ea' ae' atowe imafiam.
43010017	Ae' a'i ega' ma ieigiambama sipsip ae'ami ma nambimb ehafel eape namowe wapoti'. Amama atom Ahalome ae'anai okom nainaila ae' endilisi.
43010018	Ina anona aman noha ambal ae'anai ega', owa'etin. Okom ae'anai atona a'i nambimb eaga'. Ae' efa' agel lu'unai ma ega' eahafel wapoti'. Ahalome ae'anai na'ipi basef la'ifimi ea' a'i enda'am na'ama.”
43010019	-
43010020	Esis Juda same' basef amama ea' sandawaloga biefis. Hiesi sa'i, “Ambagof awami mapaina ea' nahaga nagaol endilisi. Dei' maina ipe' pame' basef ananimi?”
43010021	Ea' enis sa'i, “Anona aman ambagof awami mapainai ina na'i anom basef si'i anan na'iami, owa'. Anan ambagof awami mapainai, ina la'ifinama nenda' aman anama naep mase'anai niti wapoti', owa'etin.”
43010022	-
43010023	Nogota anama nomanamb lu'wami mataga si'i asaf atona nalai, esis Juda sanda' anom gwa'aimi lu'wami ma seanda' lotu lu'unai gani Jerusalem. Ea' Jisas nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi ilafunama fowa' gani Solomon nala'anai.
43010024	Ea' amam Juda mafi'i maitu malipana ma'i, “Ine' nanda' opalef afa'imi mataga nomonas biefim. Maina nemaf ni'ipafa alihim? I'i ine' Krais, dei' ni'ipafa basef alihim.”
43010025	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa ea', ipe' ina pembale'efa ae', owa'. Ae' anda' ikwaf hianai la'ifinai ma agel Ahalomei, ikwaf anama nihi'ambepa ae' emi egaliwi.
43010026	Ea' ipe' ina sipsip ae'ipai, owa'. Ipe' enipa sipsip. Na'ama dei' ipe' ina pembale'efa ae', owa'.
43010027	Sipsip ae'ami mame' maf ae'anai ea' egawa amam ea' amam maila ae'.
43010028	Ae' ase'am ambal namunai ma meape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Amam ina moga', owa'etin. Ina enin epen la'ifina neatagahom lagof ae'ami nefa'am, owa'etin. Amam mope lagof ae'ami la'ela'ef hihif.
43010029	Ahalome ae'anai nase'e sipsip amama ae'ami. Ina enin epen anona nemaf la'ifina neatagahom lagel Ahalomei nefa'am, owa'etin. Dei' main, Ahalome ae'anai la'ifinai endilisi nikila' epes hiesi.
43010030	Ae' aloma Ahalome, afa' biafa wape atotofa.”
43010031	Ea' amam Juda mafe' mafela otamba wapoti' ma'i mokwahom mohana afuna.
43010032	Ea' Jisas na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ihi'ambepa ikwaf hianai la'ifinai nataga Ahalomei ea' patolona. Ea' ukup ipe'imi mapoma maina ikwaf ae' ali' anda'anai dei' pa'i pekwaha otamba pehe?”
43010033	Ea' amam Juda magwamana basef ma'i, “Afa' ina wakwaha otamba wa'i ohena nanda' ikwaf anama hianai, owa'. Ine' aman falafunai nanda' findiwa, na'i ine' etina God. Ea' afa' wa'i ohena otamba.”
43010034	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Anom basef Godi mail mi'uli ipe'inai ma'iam ma'i, God na'i, ‘Ae' a'ipipa ea' a'i, ipe' si'i anom god.’
43010035	-
43010036	Fowa' basef Godi mafe'ma epes isima ma'i, ‘God na'i, ipe' atona etin si'i god.’ Basef amama ina malo, owa'. Mape la'ela'ef mandawalap endilisi. Ahalome ae'anai atona nesahe'e nanda'e ape bo'wawe ananiwei atowe nasapa'e afi'i etap anae'. Ea' a'i ae' Nogalomana ananiwei. Dei' maina ipe' pa'i ae' anda' God findiwana?
43010037	I'i ae' ina anda' maol Ahalome ae'anai, andeande'ma ipe' pindaiwa' ma pembale'efa ae'.
43010038	I'i ae' enda' maol ananinai ma i'i ipe' owa' peambale'efa ae', hapaimi. Ipe' piti ikwaf la'ifinai anda'anai, ea' pegawa Ahalome nape nalome, ape alomana.”
43010039	Ea' amam Juda ma'i mombalo'ana ma mowa'ana. Owa'etin. Anan nakwahom ea' nafe'.
43010040	Ea' Jisas notanima nambo walemb Jordan fisana nafe' nataga anama fowa' dambadamba Jon napisi'as embel ea' nape anama.
43010041	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan. Esis sa'i, “Jon owa' nonda' anona ikwaf la'ifinai, ea' basef ananimi hiami na'iama Jisas, amama endilisimi atom.”
43010042	Ea' amam nematawa hiesi sombale'efa Jisas anama.
43011001	-
43011002	Anona aman awes nanda'anai agel ananinai Lasarus. Anan naloma hanitiamana ananiwai biawa, Maria kwaloma Marta sape wambel anama Betani. Maria akwama ato'w nambimb kwokolo'wam sanda balaga Dembinai ma konda' auf balaga ako'unai kwundisamana bo'wagah ananimi.
43011003	Ea' awau wasapa' basef mafe'ma Jisas wa'i, “Dembinai, aman anama ine' okom nainailanai awes nanda'ana na'oh.”
43011004	Ea' Jisas name' basef amama na'i, “Ina awes nanda'ana ma neaga', owa'. Anan awes nanda'ana ma esis sefela agel ae' Nogalomana Godi, ea' sefela agel Godi wapoti'.”
43011005	Ea' Jisas okom nainaila Marta kwaloma owama'w Maria waloma Lasarus.
43011006	Anan name' basefa Lasarus awes nanda'ana, ea' anan ata' napani nimeguf biam wapoti' wambel anama napanima.
43011007	Nimeguf biam mafe'ma ea', na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'i, “Afa' dei' otanima ofe' etap hiagoma Judia.”
43011008	Ea' alupumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai tisa, nimbewa' esis Juda sa'i sokwaha otamba sehena afina, ea' dei' ine' na'i netanima nefe' anama wapoti', a' amon?”
43011009	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'i, “Nemaf atotona awa 12-pelain nape. Emi egafis safe' alipi esis ina sowa, owa'. Dei' main, esis sati hauguma etap anae' howalagon safe' andeande'.
43011010	Ea' i'i esis seafe' owamb, atuwasi sowa. Dei' main? Esis nagwapin howalagon a'as.”
43011011	Jisas na'ipam na'ama ma ea', na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Alupunai afa'inai Lasarus anan na'oh. Ae' atuwasi efe' etap hiagoma Judia ma inimbalona.”
43011012	Ea' alupumi ananimi magwamana basef ma'i, “Dembinai, i'i anan no'oh etin, nambimb ambo'ona.”
43011013	Do'ok Jisas nali' na'ipam na'i Lasarus na'oh, na'i Lasarus naga' endilisi. Ea' alupumi ananimi ukup ma'i anan ata' na'oh etin.
43011014	Dei' Jisas na'ipam alihim na'i, “Lasarus naga' endilisi.
43011015	Ae' andanifel ma ae' ina alomana wape atagon nemaf anan naga'anai. Ama ipe' atuwasi peambale'efa ae'. Dei' afa' ofe'ma anan na'oma.”
43011016	Ea' Tomas agel wa'ana Didimus na'ipa anom alupumi Jisasi na'i, “Afa' ofe' wapoti' ma oga' olomana.”
43011017	Lasarus naga' ea' sawana. Nimeguf biamibiam mafe' ea', Jisas nafi'i nataga. Anan nogawa Lasarus sawana nape hi'agif nimeguf biamibiam.
43011018	-
43011019	Wambel anama Betani nape felefele'ma Jerusalem, si'i kilomita wenifin. Ea' amam Juda hiami mafi'i ma monda' opalef hanitiamana biawa Marta kwaloma Maria mope awanema anan hanitinamawa naga'.
43011020	Marta kwame' basefa Jisas nafi'i etin, kwafe' kwatolona eaf, ea' Maria ata' kwapani ipat.
43011021	Ea' Marta kwafe'ma Jisas kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' nepe na'ae, hanitiname ae'inai ina noga', owa'.”
43011022	Ea' akwa'w kwa'ipana wapoti' kwa'i, “Ae' egawa ine' dei' atef nihali' Goda maim amamaga, anan nise'enam.”
43011023	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Hanitinamena nambimb nehafel wapoti'.”
43011024	Ea' Marta kwagwamana basef kwa'i, “Ae' egawa anan anona nemaf nehafel wapoti' nemaf akutainai anama epes hiesi saga'i seahafel wapoti'anai.”
43011025	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Ofagema epes seahafel wapoti' ma sofa' ambal namunai, ae' atowe. Emi egafis seambale'efa ae'i, anona nemaf saga' ea' sehafel wapoti' sefa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef.
43011026	Emi epes ata' sape namisa seambale'efa ae'i, esis sope andeande'. Ina ata' soga' wapoti', owa'etin. Sope la'ela'ef hihif. Ine' nembale'efa basef amama?”
43011027	Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “A'e Dembinai, ae' embale'efa ine' Krais, God nandandepena nasapa'ena nafi'i. Ine' nogalomana ananinai, fowa' anan na'i nifi'i etap anae'.”
43011028	Akwa'w kwa'ipana na'ama, kotanima kwafe'ma owama'w Maria kwa'ipakw sa'osa'ombel kwa'i, “Dembinai Tisa nafi'i nataga nofalena.”
43011029	Maria kwame' basef amama etin, kohafel mehip kwafe'mana.
43011030	Jisas ina dei' nawisi wambel lu'unai la'afen, owa'. Ata' napani wambel di'inai do'ok Marta kwatagamana.
43011031	Amam Juda mape maloma Maria nomon ipat awaunai ma'i monda' okom akwa'unai la'ifina. Ea' amam mati Maria kwahafel mehip kwafe'. Amam ukup ma'i akwa'w kwafe' hi'agifa kwa'i kwealopana. Ea' magi'mokw mafe'.
43011032	Ea' Maria kwafe'ma anama Jisas napoma kwatolona kundiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' nepe nelomapa, hanitiname ae'inai ina noga', owa'.”
43011033	Jisas nati akwa'w kwape kwalef etin ea' nati amam Juda mafi'i maloma'w malef wapoti'. Ea' nati esis uwahipis opaf ananinai aona endilisi na'i nelef etin.
43011034	Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' pawana eti?” Ea' esis sa'ipana sa'i, “Dembinai, fi'i netologon.”
43011035	Ea' anan nalef.
43011036	Amam Juda mati anan nalef na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' petolona! Anan okom nainailana endilisi.”
43011037	Ea' anom ma'i, “Aman anama ma'una nanda' aman anama naep mase'anai ma dei' naep matiana. Anan la'ifinai ma fowa' nili' nifi'i ma niegiambama aman anama, dei' nope o noga'?”
43011038	Ea' Jisas opaf nimanina endilisi nafe' nataga hi'agif anama lu'unai sagwasogon nawis owap lu'unai. Ea' sanda' anona owap lu'unai sowalo uta.
43011039	Ea' na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' lefatana owap anama nowalo utai.” Ea' Marta haniti'mana aman anama naga'i kwa'i, “Dembinai, anan nape nimeguf biamibiam ea'. Dei' alogw awami ea' mana.”
43011040	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Fowa' ali' a'ipina dei' i'ipina wapoti', i'i ine' nembale'efa ae', atuwasi niti nafifili pepel Godi.”
43011041	-
43011042	Ea' esis selefatana owap anama ea' Jisas naniga nati ilif na'i, “Ahalome, ae' anifelina ma name'e. Ae' egawa ine' name'e la'ela'ef ea' ae' a'iam na'ama ma esis amam nematawa saitu anae' sembale'efa ae', ine' nasapa'e afi'i.”
43011043	Jisas nanda' beten na'ama ea', nofalana mehip na'i, “Lasarus, hafel niwisi ande'.”
43011044	Ea' aman anama nohafel nawisi ande'. Ea' bo'wagah maloma lagof amaga ananimi sanda' lowaf sowa'ana. Ea' Jisas na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' tagahamana luwaguf amama ea' pekwahona nefe' wafifina.”
43011045	Amam Juda hiami mafi'i mati Maria maloma'w malef, ea' mati amama do'ok Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' mombale'efana.
43011046	Ea' anom mafe'ma amam Farisi ma'ipama amama Jisas do'ok nanda'ami.
43011047	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi hiami mofala anom dambami mafi'i mandakolasa monda' kot. Ea' ma'i, “Afa' atuwasi onda' maina aman anama nanda' ikwaf anama la'ifinai hianai?
43011048	I'i ope weatolona ma nonda' la'ifimi amama, nambimb hiesi sombale'efana. Ea' amam Rom nambimb mifi'i mohambombaga ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai noloma ape' Juda hiapai wapoti'.”
43011049	Ea' anona aman agilinai Judai agelinama Kaiafas, anan dembinai pris nape nali'ma pris hiami ma afagel anama na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' ina pegawa anom amamaga, owa'etin.
43011050	Ipe' ina dei' pegawa anom basef, owa'. I'i aman atotona neaga'ma amam nematawa hiesi, na'ama andeande'ma ipe'. Afa' wandaiwa' ma esis seahambombaga ape' Juda. Na'ama epes hiesi ape'isi Juda higililas hi'ilas.”
43011051	Anan ina na'i basef amama ma okom ananinai atona, owa'etin. Anan nape pris dembinai afagel anama. Ea' na'i basef Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipanami si'i profet na'i Jisas noga' ma nigiambama esis Juda hiesi.
43011052	Kaiafas na'i Jisas ina noga' nigiambama esis Juda etis, owa'. Anan noga' ma nigiambama epes Godi hiesi sape safe' etap hiagomai hi'ilas nefa'as sotanimani, ea' nonda'as sotaga epes hiesi wambota Godi atotona.
43011053	Nemaf anama atona amam agufumi Judai mali' ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Jisas noga'.
43011054	Anan nafe' nandambaho' etin felefele'ma anama wafiguma fatauguma ma wambel anama Efraim. Nape na'ama naloma alupumi ananimi.
43011055	Ina nogota laona ma esis Juda seagwa' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova, owa'. Ea' esis Juda hiesi sakwaha wambel asasinai safe' Jerusalem atogon. Safe'ma siela basef Godi fowa'imi sosa'of sotofa alogwa sondondomba alop asasinai ma God nieti esis bo'wes andeande' ma seagwa' gwa'aimi amama.
43011056	Esis sape ipat lu'unai Godi nomon sagolopa Jisas ea' sahali'as sa'i, “Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Anan atuwasi nifi'mai gwa'aimi amama o owa'?”
43011057	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi hiami mali' ma'i mehip ma'iam ma'i, “Emi egafis sogawa Jisas napoma si'ipafa ofe' ombalo'ana ma weanda'mana basef.”
43012001	Nimeguf wanom wanom ata' mapoma esis Juda sonda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova. Nemaf anama Jisas nataga wambel Betani, alupunai Lasarus napoma. Fowa' naga'ma Jisas nafelana nohafel wapoti'.
43012002	Ea' sanda'mana gwa'aimi Jisas. Marta kwanda' gwa'aimi, ea' Lasarus nape nalomas sape sa' gwa'aimi saloma Jisas.
43012003	Ea' Maria kwahapila anona kap si'inama sanda bu'wami agilima nad satalom otamba hiami. Ea' kwahapilam kwakolo'wam kwasa'opa bo'wagah Jisasi kwanda' auf balaga ako'unai kwandisamana bo'wagah ananimi. Ea' ipat anama si'inama alogw bu'wami ma sanda amama.
43012004	Ea' anona alupunai Jisasi Judas Kariotinai kowalana ma sanda amama nandaiwa'ma kwakolo'wam kwasapalom. Aman anama nambimb neawalapa Jisas ni'ipa amam naumbih ma meahana.
43012005	Ea' Judas na'ipas na'i, “I'i afa' ofa' sanda amama enis epes sose'afa moni 300 kina sotalom ofa'ana oso' epes isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim, wila. Owa'etin.”
43012006	Ea' Judas okom ananinai ina na'i nigiambama isima kwahuwisi, owa'. Anan na'iam na'ama ma nonda' wal nofa' otamba amama. Dei' main, anan numafi bek anama Jisas naloma alupumi ananimi maolo' otamba amamimi matolo'ma. Ea' hihif Judas nakoalopam otamba amama.
43012007	-
43012008	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ipe' owa' pi'ipakwa basef amama, owa'. Andeande'ma akwa'w kwakolo'wa sanda amama ma nambimb nemaf anama eaga'anai ma seawe. Isima kwahusa gwa'aimi maim sape salomepa nimeguf hiami. Ea' ae' ina epe elomepa nogota laona, owa'.”
43012009	Esis Juda hiesi same' basefa Jisas nape Betani. Ea' safi'i sa'i sotolona ea' sa'i siti Lasarus wapoti', nimbewa' naga'ma Jisas nafelana nehafel wapoti'.
43012010	Ea' amam pris dambami ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Lasarus neaga' wapoti'.
43012011	Dei' main, enis Juda hiesi sati Lasarus netanima nehafel ambal napaina. Amama atom dei' sakwaha amam dambami Juda safe' saila Jisas sembale'efana.
43012012	Wafilu epes hiesi safi'mai gwa'aimi amama Pasova, same' basefa Jisas ata' nafi'i etin Jerusalem.
43012013	Ea' satopa' agof lawahim apulima sahapilam safi'i satagamana eaf. Ea' soga sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hosana. Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma ine'. Ape' ma'i God nofalo'ma ine' nafi'i agel ananinai nese'ena pepel nenda' opeh ananimi. Ine' king dembinai ape' Israeli.”
43012014	-
43012015	Ea' Jisas nagolopa donki atotona noganai natolona nandagia natomana nafe' si'i fowa' anom basef Godi mail buk Baibeli ma'i, “Ipe' wambel Saion, ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Dembinai king ipe'inai anona nemaf notoma donki noganai nofa'ana nifi'i.”
43012016	Nemaf anama alupumi Jisasi ina mogawa basef amama ofagema ma'i Jisas, owa'. Ama nogota anama Jisas naga' ma nahafel wapoti' notanima nolata ilif, wila amam mogawa basef amama ma'i anan. Ea' amam ukup mapoma amama epes isima sanda'manam anan wapoti'.
43012017	Enis epes sali' sati Jisas nofala aman anama na'i Lasarus napani hi'agif nehafel wapoti'. Ea' sa'ipa hiesi ma basef amama Lasarusi.
43012018	Ea' epes hiesi same' basefa Jisas nanda' ikwaf anama lu'unai nafela Lasarus hi'agif. Ea' dei' safe' satolona.
43012019	Ea' amam Farisi manda'ipama ma'i, “Opeh afa'imi ina la'ifim, owa'. Afa' agof a'afa. Piti amam nematawa hiesi safi'mai anan atona hi'alas.”
43012020	Epes hiesi safe' Jerusalem ama gwa'aimi amama lu'wami sonda' lotuma God. Ea' anom Grik wapoti' mafe' malomas.
43012021	Anona aman alupunai Jisasi Filip anan Betsaidainai etap hiagoma Galili. Amam Grik mafi'mai gwa'aimi amama ea' mafi'mai Filip ma'ipana ma'i, “Dembinai, afa' wa'i uti Jisas.”
43012022	Ea' Filip nafe' na'ipa Andru, amam biam mafe' ma'ipa Jisas.
43012023	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ae' ataga epen endilisiwei afi'i. Nogota anama nataga ea' God nihi'amba epes hiesi ma nafifili pepel ae'anai.
43012024	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi, i'i olelemb witimi owa' mowa etap nomon, olelemb amama mo'oh etifim. Ea' i'i mowa mowala etap nomon, wila amama motaga molo mil hiami.
43012025	Emi egafis ukup mopoma ambagof asasimi atom, si'i sihapilam la'ifim, anona nemaf ambagof asasimi higililam. Ea' emi egafis ukup mopoma ae' ma sosambala ambagof asasimi etap anae', anona nemaf God nofa'as sotanimani sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43012026	Emi egafis si'i sonda' opeh ae'ami, esis sila ae'. Mamagoma ae' eapoma, isima sanda' opeh ae'ami esis sope soloma ae'. Ea' emi egafis sonda' opeh ae'ami, Ahalome ae'anai nambimb nefela agof asasimi motaga lu'um.”
43012027	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Dei' opaf ae'anai nataga aona. Ae' basef owa'etina ie'iam. Atuwasi ae' i'i, ‘Ahalome, nekwahome nimanimi amama ma'i meatagama ae' dei'i?’ Owa'. Ae' afi'i nogota anae' ape etap anae' ma opeh amama atom ae' enda'ama sehe ega'.
43012028	Ahalome, ine' nenda'ama epes hiesi sefela agel ine'inai lu'una.” Ea' anona maf na'i nataga heven na'i, “Ae' anda'ama sefela agel ae'anai notaga lu'una, ea' atuwasi enda'ana notaga lu'una wapoti'.”
43012029	Ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi saitu same' maf anama sa'i, “Owa', otaga dililiwala.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Anona ensel na'ipana anom basef.”
43012030	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Maf anama ina na'i ma niegiambama ae', owa'. Anama na'i ma nigiambama ipe'.
43012031	Dei' Ahalome God nawaloga wafa amam nematawa hiesi sape etap anae' ea' natofa dembinai aonai numafi etap anae'i.
43012032	Nambimb esis sundi il etin lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ilifa nambimb ihindi'ai esis amam nematawa hiesi sifi'mai ae'.”
43012033	Jisas na'ipas na'ama ma nihi'ambas sogawa eaf anan nambimb neaga'anai.
43012034	Ea' esis sagwamana basef sa'i, “Mi'uli ape'inai na'i na'ama na'i, Krais anan nope la'ela'ef hihif. Dei' maina ine' na'i, ‘Anan nataga epen endilisinai nambimb sundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ilif?’ Dembinai nataga epen endilisinai, anan emi egafuna?”
43012035	Ea' Jisas nagwamasa basef na'i, “Nogota ata' bandana ma nogwapin nafifili nope nolomepa. Dei' ipe' pefe' howalagoma. Na'ama owamb neatagamepa. Emi egafis seafe' owambi, esis ina sogawa anama seafe'ma, owa'.
43012036	Ae' ape si'i nogwapin ipe'iwei. Ipe' pembale'efa nogwapin anama ma petaga awasi nogwapin nafifili.” Jisas na'ipas ea', nakwaha esis nafe' nandambaho'mas.
43012037	Jisas nanda' ikwaf la'ifinai hianai, ea' esis satolona. Ea' esis ina sembale'efana, owa'.
43012038	Si'i basef amama fowa' gani profet Aisaia na'iami dei' mataga mandawalap alihim ma'i, “Anona nemaf epes emi egafis sombale'efa basef afa'imi? Esis siti pepel Godi esis emi egafis? Owa'etin.”
43012039	-
43012040	Esis ina la'ifisa sombale'efa Jisas. Dei' main, profet anama Aisaia nanda' anom basef Godi wapoti' ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Anan nanda' naep asasimi mase'as nanda' ukup asasimi mase' ma ina anona nemaf sotologon ea' ukup asasimi wapoti' ina anona nemaf sogawa ma seamboma opalefa ae' enda'as bo'wes, owa'etin.”
43012041	Fowa' gani Aisaia nati pepel howalogon Jisasi ea' na'iam na'ama ma anan atona.
43012042	Amam agufumi hiami mombale'efa Jisas. Ea', amam umbamahama amam Farisi dambami. Ea' amam ina mawalapa basef ma'ipasam alihim, owa'. Umbamahama amam Farisi mogalo'mama ina ata' moloma esis Juda monda' lotu wapoti', owa'.
43012043	Amam agufumi amama ukup ma'i epes seafela agof amamumi atom lu'um. Ea' amam ina ukup ma'i God nefelam agof amamumi, owa'.
43012044	Ea' Jisas na'ipas mehip na'i, “Emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, esis ina sembale'efa ae' atowe, owa'. Sembale'efa anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.
43012045	Emi egafis siti ae'i esis sati anan nasapa'e afi'i wapoti'.
43012046	Ae' afi'i etap anae' si'i anona nogwapin ma emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, esis ina sope owamb, owa'.
43012047	Emi egafis seme' basef ae'ami ma owa' seambale'efam sielam, ae' ina anona nemaf ewaloga esis, owa'. Dei' main? Ae' ina afi'i etap anae' ma eawaloga epes etapasi, owa'. Ae' afi'i ma efa'as sotanimani.
43012048	Emi egafis sewa' alafugama ae'i ma esis owa' seambale'efa ae', anona nemaf anona dembinai jas nowaloga esis. Nemaf anama akutainai basef amama atom ae' a'iami mowaloga epes isima.
43012049	Dei' main? Ae' ina a'i anom basefa okom ae'anai atona na'iami, owa'. Ahalome ae'anai atona na'ipi basef amama mehip ea' a'ipasam. Ea' anan nasapa'e afi'i a'iam si'i okom ananinai na'iam.
43012050	Ae' egawa basef ananimi mawalapa ambal namunai ma ipe' pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif. Na'ama basef ae' a'ipasami amama atom si'i Ahalome na'ipiami.”
43013001	Nemaf anama lu'unai esis Juda sa' gwa'aimi amama Pasova owa' ata' notagai. Jisas nogawa nogota ananinai nataga ea' ma nokwaha etap anae' nefe'ma Ahalomana. Ea' okom ananinai nainaila epes ananisi sape etapi endilisi. Na'ama dei' nihi'ambasa okom ananinai lu'unai nainailas.
43013002	Ea' wambomota anan naloma alupumi mape ma' gwa'aimi amama. Ea' Saimon nogalomana Judas Kariotinai nalomam mape. Ea' aman aonai Satan nali' nafela nomonas Judasi ma nefe' nihi'amba amam naumbih ma Jisas napoma.
43013003	Ea' Jisas nogawa Ahalomana nanda' anan la'ifina ma numafi amamaga hiami. Ea' nogawa anan nape naloma God nafi'i ea' nambimb notanima nefe'mana wapoti'.
43013004	Ea' nohafel natagaha siot launai ananinai nowaha' anona taul.
43013005	Ea' nakolo' embel anom dis nafe' notawa nasa'opamafa bo'wagah afa' alupufai ananifai ea' nanda' taul anama nowaha'anai nandisamafa bo'wagah.
43013006	Nasa'opamafa bo'wagah nafe', natagama Saimon Pita. Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, nesa'opame bo'wagah ae'ami, owa'.”
43013007	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' owa' negawa opeh amama ae' dei' anda'ami. Anona nemaf ine' negawam.”
43013008	Ea' Pita na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Owa'. Ine' owa' nesa'opa bo'wagah ae'ami, owa'.” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' owa' easa'opamena bo'wagah ine'imi, ina nambimb nepe alupinai ae'inai, owa'.”
43013009	Ea' Saimon Pita nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ina nesa'opame bo'wagah atom, owa'. Nesa'ope hi'ili lagof balaga wapoti' motaga bo'om.”
43013010	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Emi egafis sasa'of ea', esis ina atuwasi sesa'of wapoti', owa'. Esis bo'wes ea'. Ipe' hipei ipe' bo'wepa ea'. Anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bo'ona andeande'e.”
43013011	Dei' main? Anan nogawa emi egafuna nambimb nefe' ni'ipa naumbih ananimi ma nihi'ambamama neapoma. Ea' na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' hipei ambo'wepa andeande', ea' anona ipe'inai atotona ata' owa' bo'onai.”
43013012	Anan nasa'opamam bo'wagah amamumi ea', nala siot ananinai nafe' natoma felefele'ma tebol. Ea' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pegawa opeh amama ae' anda'mepami o owa'?
43013013	Ipe' pefale tisa o Dembiwei, na'ama andeande'. Ae' ea' ma'uwi, basef amama endilisimi atom.
43013014	Ae' dembiwei tisa ipe'iwei. Ae' do'ok asa'opa bo'wagah ipe'imi. Ea' ipe' wapoti' pesa'opa bo'wagah ipe'imi atona etin.
43013015	Ae' ea' ihi'ambepa waf anama ae'anai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama etin si'i ae' anda'am.
43013016	Dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi atom. Emi egafis agof a'asi sanda' opeh etin, esis ina sape ilifa dembinai asasinai, owa'. Ea' anona dembinai nasapa' enin epen nafi'i, inima ina nikila' dembinai anama ananinai, owa'.
43013017	Dei' ipe' pegawa waf anama ea'. I'i pilana andeande', pendanifel.
43013018	Ae' ina a'i ipe' hipei pefe' pewalapa basef pi'ipa naumbiha ae', owa'. Ipe' bo'wepa ea'. Ae' egawepa andandepepa ea'. Ea' basef Godi mail buk Baibeli atuwasi motaga endilisi ma anona aman nowalapa ae' ma naumbih ae'ami. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, 'Aman anama nea' gwa'aimi nealumai anona nemaf nigi bo'waga nofa'asa ae'.’
43013019	Ae' dei' ape a'ipipa basef amama ma waf anama ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'etin. Ama nambimb notaga nondawalap, ipe' pembale'efa ae' ea' ma'uwi.
43013020	Ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi, emi egafis soso' opalefa enin epen ae' asapa'an nafi'i, esis soso' opalefa ae'. Ea' emi egafis soso' opalefa ae'i, esis soso' opalefa Ahalome ae'anai wapoti' nasapa'e afi'i.”
43013021	Jisas na'ipafa basef amama ea', okom ananinai nimanina endilisi. Ea' na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' a'ipipa endilisi, anona afa'inai atuwasi nefe' nihi'amba naumbih ma ae' eapoma.”
43013022	Ea' alupufai ananifai wanda' tima etin wape. Afa' ina ogawa Jisas na'i emi.
43013023	Ae' alupuwei Jisasi, anan okom nainaila ae'i ape felefele'ma Anan.
43013024	Ea' Saimon Pita nanda' balaga na'ipi na'i, “Ine' hali'ago Anan na'i emi.”
43013025	Ea' ae' indiki'ah afe' felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana a'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i emi?”
43013026	Ea' Jisas nagwame na'i, “Ae' atuwasi ela bret dis eso' anona, ea' ma'una anan.” Ea' nala bret dis naso' Judas Kariotinai Saimon nogalomana.
43013027	Ea' ata' nahapila bret etin, aman aonai Satan nawisana okom ananinai nomon. Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Opeh ine' na'i neanda'ami, da'am mehip.”
43013028	Afa' alupufai Jisasi wape wa' gwa'aimi, afa' ina ogawa basef Jisasi ofagema, owa'.
43013029	Judas numafi otamba afa'imi. Na'ama anom alupumi Jisasi ukup ma'i Jisas na'ipana ma nefe' notala anom gwa'aimi ma nonda' gwa'aimi amama o na'ipana na'i nose'asa otamba isima kwahusi.
43013030	Ea' Judas ata' nahapila bret etin, nafe' nawis ande' mehip. Ea' owamb nataga.
43013031	Judas nafe' nawis ande', Jisas na'ipafa na'ama na'i, “God nafela agel ae'anai lu'una. Ea' dei' ae' anda' epes siti nafifili pepel ananinai sefela agel ananinai lu'una ma opeh ae' anda'ami. Esis sefela agel ae'anai ae' ataga epen endilisiwei lu'una. Ea' sefela agel Ahalome Godi ma maol ae' anda'anai wapoti'.
43013032	Amama atom Ahalome God wapoti' nefela agel ae'anai lu'una dei' atef.
43013033	Ipe' so'upei, ae' elomepa ope nogota bandana efe'. Ipe' atuwasi pegolopa ae' ea' ina petolowe, owa'. Anama ae' eafe'ma, ipe' ina la'ifipama nambimb peafo'o, owa'. Basef amama atom fowa' a'ipa amam Juda, dei' a'ipipam wapoti'.
43013034	Dei' ase'epa mi'uli ae'anai dambainai ma ipe' ukup ipe'imi mimila ipe' atona etin si'i okom ae'anai nainailipa. Ea' na'ama etin, ukup ipe'imi mimila ipe' atona etin.
43013035	I'i ukup ipe'imi mimila ipe' atona etin, nambimb epes hiesi sogawa ipe' alupipei ae'ipei.”
43013036	Ea' Saimon Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' nefe' eti?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Anama dei' ae' eafe'ma, ina nambimb nigi'mi nefo'o, owa'. Ea' owagama ine' nigi'mi nefo'o.”
43013037	Ea' Pita nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ae' ina la'ifiwi ma dei' igi'mina efo'o? Ae' a'i a'e ma ega' ma iegiambamena.”
43013038	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' na'i a'e endilisi ma neaga' ma niegiambama ae' a' amon? Ae' a'ipina endilisi, dei' owamb anae' awata ata' owa' neanda'am, ine' nembaho' agel ae'anai ni'i wenif ni'i, ‘Ae' owa' egawa Jisase.’ ”
43014001	Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi ina mohafel nimanim, owa'. Ipe' pembale'efa God, pembale'efa ae' wapoti'.
43014002	Ipat Ahalome ae'anai alihina satopa' rum hiami mape mandandaepa. I'i owa', fowa' ae' a'ipipa. Endilisi, ae' efe' endondomba wambel ipe'inai.
43014003	I'i ae' efe' endomba wambel ipe'inai, anona nemaf etanimani efa'epa pefe' pepe pelome. Ea' anama ae' eapoma, ipe' wapoti' pepe anama atagon pelome.
43014004	Ea' ipe' pegawa eaf ae' iefe'anai ma wambel anama.”
43014005	Ea' Tomas nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, afa' owa' ogawai ine' nefe' eti? Afa' ina ogawa eaf anama ine' na'i neafe'ma.”
43014006	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ae' atowe eaf ofagewe ma basef endilisimi moloma ambal namunai. Owa' enin epen la'ifina nefe' neatagama Ahalome anona eaf, owa'etin. Ea' ae' atowe.
43014007	I'i ipe' pegawa ae', pegawa Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'. Ea' dei' patolona. Dei' atef patolona pegawana.”
43014008	Ea' Filip nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' nihi'ambafa Ahalomena ine'inai afa' ea' mondahama afa'.”
43014009	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Filip, nogota launa ape alomepa, ine' owa' ata' negawa ae'? Emi egafis sati ae', esis sati Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'. Dei' maina ine' ata' na'i, ‘Ae' ihi'ambepa Ahalome ae'anai ipe'?’
43014010	Ine' nembale'efa ae' ma negawa ae' aloma Ahalome afa' atofa, ae' ape anan, anan nape ae'? Basef ae' a'ipapami, amama ae' ina efa'ama okom ae'anai atona, owa'. Ahalome nape ae' ea' anan atona nanda' opeh ananimi hiami.
43014011	Ipe' pembale'efa basef amama. Ae' ape Ahalome, Ahalome nape ae'. I'i owa', ipe' ukup mopoma opeh la'ifimi hiami anda'ami. Ipe' piti opeh amama, pembale'efa ae'.
43014012	Basef endilisimi atom dei' a'ipipa. Emi egafis sembale'efa ae'i, opeh hiami dei' anda'ami, esis wapoti' anona nemaf esis sonda'am. Ama anona nemaf sonda' opeh lu'wami endilisi mikila' opeh ae'ami. Dei' main? Ae' efe'ma Ahalome.
43014013	Amamaga hiami ipe' penda' beten pihali'ana agel ae'anai, anona nemaf ae' enda'am. Ama Ahalome nofa' agel lu'unai ma opeh ae' nogalomana ananiwei anona nemaf enda'am.
43014014	Amamaga ipe' pehali' ae' ma agel ae'anai, pembale'efa ae' endilisi, nambimb enda'am.
43014015	I'i ipe' ukup mimila ae' endilisi, ipe' pila mi'uli ae'enai andeande'.
43014016	Ama nambimb ihali' Ahalome, ma nisi'ipei anona nigiambamepa nonda'epa la'ifipa. Anan nope noloma ipe' la'ela'ef hihif.
43014017	Anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i basef endilisimi. Esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ina anona nemaf sotolona sogawana sofa'ana, owa'. Ea' ipe' pegawana ea' nape nalomepa, ea' nambimb nope nolomepa.
43014018	Ae' ina ikwahipa tol pepe etin, si'i awasi amama alifisi ahapas mamasas a'asi, owa'etin. Nambimb ae' ifi'mipei.
43014019	Nogota bandana esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ina nambimb sotolowe wapoti', owa'. Ea' ipe' petolowe. Ae' ape ambal namunai napaiwe, ea' na'ama etin ipe' pepe ambal namunai nupaipa.
43014020	Nemaf anama ipe' pegawa ae' ape Ahalome, ape nomona ipe', ipe' pape ae'.
43014021	Emi egafis sefa' mi'uli ae'anai silana andeande'i, esis ukup maimaila ae' endilisi. Nambimb Ahalome ae'anai okom nila esis. Ea' ae' wapoti' okom ninila esis ea' etaga endawalapa esis alihiwi.”
43014022	Jisas na'iam na'ama ea' anona Judas ina anama Kariotinai, owa', anona epen, na'ipa Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, dei' maina ine' na'i nihi'ambafa ine' netaga nendawalap alihinama afa', ea' ine' owa' nihi'ambasa ine' alihinama esis saila waf etapanai?”
43014023	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Emi egafis ukup mimila ae' endilisi, esis anona nemaf sila basef ae'ami andeande'. Ea' Ahalome ae'anai okom ninila esis. Ea' afa' biafa ufi'mai esis ope olomas la'ela'ef hihif.
43014024	Emi egafis sandaiwa'ma ae'i, esis ina anona nemaf sila basef ae'ami andeande', owa'. Ea' basef amama ipe' pame'ami, amama ina ae'ami, owa'. Amama basef Ahalome God nasapa'e afi'i.
43014025	Nogota anama ae' ata' ape alomepa a'ipipa basef amama hiami.
43014026	Ea' anan nigiambamepa ma nonda'epa la'ifipa, anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Anama Ahalome nambimb nesapa'ana nifi'i ma agel ae'anai. Ea' nowalipipa ma amamaga hiami, nefela nomonas ipe'imi ma ukup mopoma basef hiami ali' a'ipipami.
43014027	Ae' a'i ikwahipa. Ea' ae' ina enda'epa umbamahepa ukup awiaom pepan si'i amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sanda'am, owa'. Dei' anda'epa pepe ukup awanem endilisi. Ukup ipe'imi ina mohafel aom, owa'. Ina umbamahepa, owa'.
43014028	Ipe' pame'am ea' basef amama do'ok a'ipipami. Ae' ikwahipa efe'. Nambimb itanimamipei ifi'i. I'i ipe' ukup mila Ae' endilisi, ipe' pendanifel ma Ae' efe'ma Ahalome. Dei' main? Ahalome Anan dembinai nikila' Ae'.
43014029	Amamaga amama ina dei' mataga, ata' owa'. Ea' ae' ali' a'ipipa ma nemaf anama amamaga amama meataganai ipe' pegawa ea' pembale'efa ae'.
43014030	Ae' ina nambimb i'i basef hiami elomepa, owa'. Dei' main? Aman dembinai aonai numafi etap anae' anama dei' nafi'i. Anan ina nambimb la'ifinama nonda'me anom amamaga, owa'etin.
43014031	Ea' ae' a'i esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sogawa ae' okom nainaila Ahalome endilisi. Na'ama dei' anda'am na'ama etin si'i anan na'ipi. Ea' dei' afa' ofe'.
43015001	Ae' si'i lawag wain si'ina endilisi. Ahalome ae'anai Anan si'i ofagenama aofi. Aof anama sawa lawah su'utip wainim gwa'aimi mailami.
43015002	Agof hiami su'utip owa' mielami, amama Ahalome natopa'am nakwahom. Ea' anom agof mail mola gwa'aimi amama anan nandombasom natopa'am bandam ama nambimb mope bo'om mil mola gwa'aimi hiami andeande'.
43015003	Basef amama Ae' a'ipipami monda'epa pataga bo'wepa ea'.
43015004	Ipe' pepe ae' ea' ae' nambimb epe ipe'. I'i agof atom wafim, ina mola gwa'aimi, owa'. I'i agof owa' mondala la'ifim lawag si'ina, amam ina molo andeande', mil mola gwa'aimi, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin si'i ipe'. I'i ipe' owa' pepe peloma ae', ipe' wapoti' ina pela anom gwa'aimi, owa'etin.
43015005	Ae' si'i lawag si'ina, ipe' si'i agof. Emi egafis sope Ae' ma Ae' ape esis, nambimb sola gwa'aimi hiami. I'i ipe' pekwaha Ae', ipe' etipa ina nambimb penda' anom amamaga, owa'.
43015006	Emi egafis owa' seape ae'i, esis sogalo'mas si'i satopa' agof alimi. Ama satamam saofam nif fandom hi'alam.
43015007	I'i ipe' pepe ae' ma basef ae'ami mope nomona ipe', ipe' pihali' ae' ma maim basef pendahama ukup ipe'imi ma'iam, anona nemaf amamaga amama motagamepa na'ama etin.
43015008	I'i ipe' pela gwa'aimi hiami, Ahalome ae'anai nofa' agel lu'unai. Ama pihi'amba amam nematawa hiesi ipe' pepe alupipei Ae'ipei.
43015009	Ahalome okom nainaila Ae', ea' na'ama etin Ae' okom nainaila ipe'. Ipe' la'ela'ef pepe okom ae'anai la'afena pegawa okom ae'anai nainailipa endilisi.
43015010	I'i ipe' pila mi'uli ae'anai andeande', nambimb pepe okom ae'anai nomon si'i ae' aila mi'uli Ahalome andeande'ma ape okom ananinai nomon.
43015011	Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ma a'i danifel anama ae'anai nepe nelomepa ea' danifel ipe'inai nepe opalef ipe'imi si'im.
43015012	Mi'uli ae'anai anama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi atona etin si'i ae' okom nainailipa.
43015013	Emi egafis ukup mimila alupisi ma sokwaha ambagof asasimi atom soga', ma sigiambama alupisi asasisi, waf anama nikila' waf bu'unai hianai.
43015014	I'i pila mi'uli a'ipipanai andeande' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei.
43015015	Epen agel a'ani dembinai ananinai ina na'ipana basef alihima maol anan nienda'anai, owa'. Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef hiami Ahalome ae'anai na'ipiami. Na'ama dei' ae' ina efalepa epes falafipei agof a'ipei, owa'. Ae' efalepa alupipei endililsi.
43015016	Ipe' ina pali' pesaho' ae' ipe'iwei, owa'. Ae' ali' andandepepa ea' ae'ipei. Ea' anda'epa panda' opeh bu'wami. Ama pefe' penda' opeh bu'wami si'i lawah mola gwa'aimi ma opeh bu'wami ipe'imi mope andeande'. Penda'am na'ama ma i'i ipe' penda' beten pihali' Ahalome ma anom amamaga agel ae'anai, anan nose'epa.
43015017	Ae' ase'epa mi'uli ipe' na'ama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi atona etin.
43015018	I'i esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai si'i sonda'mepa naumbih, ipe' pegawa esis fowa' sali' sanda'ma ae' naumbih wapoti.
43015019	I'i ipe' epes etapipei, esis saila waf etapanai ukup mimilipa si'i ipe' epes asasipei etipa. Ea' ipe' ina epes etap anae'ipei, owa'. Ae' esahe'epa ea' ma pekwaha waf etapanai. Ea' dei' esis saila waf etapanai sonda'mepa naumbih.
43015020	Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama ae' a'ipipa emi andeande'. Basef amama ma'i Ae' Dembiwei ipe'iwei ma'i epen agel a'ani nanda' opeh etini, enin ina nape ilifa dembinai ananinai, owa'. Ae' sali' sanda'me waf aonai, ea' nambimb esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, sonda'epa awepa wapoti'. I'i esis sila basef ae'ami, nambimb esis siela basef ipe'imi wapoti'. Owa'etin.
43015021	Esis ina sogawa Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i, owa'. Ipe' ukup mopoma agel ae'anai, ea' ae'ipei. Ea' esis saila waf etapanai sonda' amamaga awami hiami ma ipe'.
43015022	I'i ae' owa' ifi'i ie'ipasa basef amama, esis ofagema ma waf aonai a'as. Owa'etin. Dei' esis owa' anona eafa sombaho'a waf aonai asas sanda'anai, owa'.
43015023	Emi egafis sonda'me naumbih, esis sonda' naumbiha Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'.
43015024	Esis saila waf etapanai ina sati anona aman nanda' opeh mandahama opeh ae' anda'ami, owa'. I'i ae' owa' enda 'opeh amama, esis ofagenama waf aonai a'as. Ea' dei' sati opeh ae'ami la'ifimi ea' sowa' alafugaha ae' ukup aom endilisi ma ae' aloma Ahalome ae'anai wapoti'.
43015025	Ea' waf anama asasinai nafe' na'ama etin si'i anom basef mail mi'uli esis Judai ma'i, ‘Esis ukup aoma ae' etin. Ae' basef ofagema a'e.’
43015026	Ea' Anan nigiambamepa nonda'epa la'ifipa, Anan napani naloma Ahalome nambimb nifi'i. Ea' Ae' nambimb esapa'ana nifi'mai ipe'. Anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapa basef endilisimi. Nemaf anama Ae' esapa'ana nifi'mipei, nowalapa basefa ae'ami.
43015027	Ae' a'ipipa, ipe' wapoti' nambimb pi'i basef ae'ami pewalapama esis. Dei' main, ipe' fowa' dambadamba pati asefela maol anda'ana palome pape la'ela'ef pafi'i pataga dei'.”
43016001	Ea' Jisas na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' dei' a'ipipa basef amama hi'alam ma ipe' ina pekwaha pembale'efa ae', owa'.
43016002	Anona nemaf esis sogalo'mepa ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi. Anona nemaf notaga ma emi egafis sehepa pega', esis ukup mondanda' si'i sanda' maol bu'unai Godi. Owa'etin.
43016003	Fowa' esis ina sogawa Ahalome naloma ae' wapoti', owa. Na'ama esis sanda' waf anama aonai.
43016004	Ea' dei' a'ipipa ea' ma amamaga amama. Ama nemaf anama neataga ma esis sonda'epa na'ama, ipe' ukup mondanda'ma basef amama dei' a'ipipami.
43016005	Fowa' Ae' ape alomepa Ae' ina a'ipipa ma amamaga amama, owa'. Ea' dei' ae' efe'ma anan anama nasapa'e afi'i. Ina anona aman ipe'inai nahali'i na'i, ‘Ine' nefe' eti?’ Owa'.
43016006	Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ea' ma ipe'. Ea' dei' opalef ipe'imi nimanim endilisi.
43016007	Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi. Ae' ikwahipa efe' ma igiambamepa pepe andeande'. I'i ae' owa' eafe', dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nonda'epa la'ifipa, ina nambimb nifi'mai ipe', owa'. I'i ae' efe', esapa'ana nifi'mai ipe'.
43016008	Nemaf anama niefi'ianai, nihi'amba esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ma sogawa basef ofagema ma waf aonai noloma waf bu'unai noloma wafa God nowaloga epes hiesi ma nonda'masa basef.
43016009	Waf aonai ofagena asasinai na'ama. Esis ina sombale'efa ae', owa'.
43016010	Waf ofagena bu'unai na'ama. Ae' efe'ma Ahalome ea' ipe' ina petolowe wapoti', owa'.
43016011	Basef ofagema ma kot na'ama. Aman dembinai aonai ma epes etapasi, anan faso'mana ma kot anama ma basef lu'wami God dei' nanda'manami.
43016012	Ae' basef hiami ma a'i ie'ipipa emi, ea' ipe' ina la'ifipama pefa'am dei', ata' owa'.
43016013	Nemaf anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i basef endilisimi atomi niefi'i, nihi'ambepa ma basef hiami endilisimi. Anan ina nowalapa basef nomonas ananimi atom, owa'. Basef name'am ea', amama atom nowalapam ni'ipipam. Ama ni'ipipa amamaga amama ma'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai.
43016014	Ea' nofa' basef ae'ami nowalapama ipe' ma nowalapa agel ae'anai.
43016015	Amamaga Ahalomei Ae'anai hiami, amama ae'ami. Ea' dei' Ae' a'iam a'i nambimb Ambal Bu'unai Godi nofa' basef Ae'ami ni'iam nowalapama ipe'.
43016016	Nogota bandana ipe' ina nambimb petolowe wapoti', owa'. Ea' nambimb ipe' petolowe wapoti'.”
43016017	Anom alupumi ananimi, amam atom manda'ipama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Maim basef ofagema amama anan na'ipafa emi? Anan na'i, nogota bandana afa' ina nambimb otolona, ea' nambimb otolona wapoti'. Na'i nefe'ma Ahalomana. Afa' ina ogawa basef amama ofagema, owa'.”
43016018	Ea' amam ma'iam wapoti' ma'i, “Nogota anama bandana anan na'ianai, amama amamaga maim? Afa' ina ogawa basef amama na'iam na'ama, owa'.”
43016019	Ea' Jisas nogawa amam ma'i mohali'ana, ea' na'ipam na'i, “A'i ipe' pahali'ima basef amama ofagema ae' a'iami. Ae' a'iam na'ama. Nogota bandana ipe' ina petolowe, owa'. Ea' nambimb ipe' petolowe wapoti'.
43016020	Endilisi ae' a'ipipa. Nambimb ipe' pelef mehip pendahowe. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sondanifel. Ea' ipe' opalef nimanim. Owa'etin. Opalef ipe'imi nimanim ea' nambimb mondamboma monda'epa pendanifel endilisi.
43016021	Nemata'w opafu'wi ma kwa'i kola awani akwa'w kwame' nimanimi kogawa nogota bandana ma kola awani nataga ea'. Na'ama opaf akwa'unai nimanina. Akwa'w kolana ea', akwa'w ina ata' okom nandanda'ma nimanimi amama wapoti', owa'. Akwa'w kwandanifel etin kwapoma so'uso'win nataga nape etap ea'.
43016022	Ipe' na'ama etin, dei' ipe' opalef nimanim. Ea' nambimb ae' itilipa wapoti', opalef ipe'imi bo'om. Ina enin epen la'ifina nogalo'ma danifel anama ipe'inai, owa'.
43016023	Nemaf anama ipe' ina pihali'i ma anom amamaga atom, owa'. Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa basef endilisimi ipe'. I'i ipe' pihali' Ahalome ma maim amamaga ma agel ae'anai, nambimb nese'epam.
43016024	Fowa' ipe' ina pahali'ana ma pefa' anom amamaga agel ae'anai, owa'. Dei' pihali'anamam, pefa'ama opalef ipe'imi bo'om endilisi.
43016025	Ae' dei' a'i basef amama womun etina ipe'. Ea' ae' ina nambimb ata' i'ipipa basef womun etin, owa'. Nemaf anama ae' ewalapam alihim i'ipipam ipe' ma Ahalome.
43016026	Ama nemaf anama ipe' pihali' Ahalome ma agel ae'anai. Ae' ina ata' i'ipipa na'ama i'i ae' atowe ihali'ana ma nigiambamepa, owa'.
43016027	Ahalome atona okom nainailipa endilisi. Dei' main, ipe' ukup maimaila ae' endilisi, ea' ipe' pembale'efa ae' pegawa ae' ape aloma God afi'i.
43016028	Fowa' gani ae' ape aloma Ahalome ea' akwahona afi'i etap anae'. Dei' ae' a'i ekwaha etap anae' etanima efe'ma anan.”
43016029	Ea' alupumi ananimi ma'i, “Dei' ine' na'ipafam alihim, ina ata' na'i basef womun etin, owa'.
43016030	Dei' afa' ogawa ina ata' nape nehafa enin epen nihali'ina nili', owa'etin. Ine' negawa amamaga hiami ea'. Amama atom dei' afa' wambale'efa ine' nape naloma God nafi'i.”
43016031	Ea' Jisas nagwamama basef na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' dei' pembale'efa ae' a' amon?
43016032	Ipe' peme'. Nogota felefele' notaga, endilisi nataga ea' ma sogalo'ma ipe' hipei atona etin pefe' wambel ipe'inai. Ea' pekwaha ae' atowe epe. Ea' ina ae' atowe epe, owa'. Ahalome nape nalome.
43016033	Ae' a'i ipe' pepe pelome opalef ipe'imi mope awanem. Na'ama dei' a'ipipa basef amama. Etap anae' ipe' peme' opalef nimanim. Pepe la'ifipa! Dei' main, ae' agalo'ma waf aonai etapanai ikila'ana ea'.”
43017001	Jisas na'i basef na'ama ma ea', naniga nati heven ilif nanda' beten na'i, “Ahalome, nogota nataga ea'. Dei' ine' nese'e agel lu'unai ae' nogalomena ine'iwei, ma atuwasi la'ifiwi ma efela agel ine'inai lu'una.
43017002	Dei' main? Ine' nendandepe ea' ma ape Dembiwei ali'ma epes hiesi ese'as ambal namunai epes isima hiesi ine' nasi'iesi. Ambal anama nenda' esis sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43017003	Ambal namunai anama ofagena anama. Esis sogawa ine' etina God endilisinai ea' sogawa endilisi ae' Jisas Krais, ine' nasapa'e afi'i.
43017004	Opeh amama ine' nasapa'e afi'i ma eanda'ami, ae' anda'am hi'alam. Ea' dei' afela agel ine'inai lu'una ma naep esis amam nematawa etapasi.
43017005	Ahalome, fowa' etap anae' owa' ata' notagai ae' ape alomena efa' agel lu'unai. Dei' ine' nese'e agel anama lu'unai si'i fowa'.
43017006	Ae' awalapa agel ine'inai ea' a'ipa epes isima ine' naso' ae'asi ma etap anae'. Epes isima ine'isi naso' ae'asi. Esis saila basef ine'imi andeande'.
43017007	Dei' sogawa amama hiami ine' nase'eam ae'i hi'alam, amama mafi'mai ine' etina.
43017008	Basef hiami ine' nasi'iami, amama ae' a'ipasam ea' sofa'am sogawa endilisi fowa' ae' ape alomena afi'i. Ea' sombale'efa basef amama ine' nasapa'e afi'i.
43017009	Dei' ae' anda' betena igiambama esis. Ae' ina anda' betena igiambama esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai, owa'. Ae' anda' betena igiambama epes isima ine' naso' ae'asi. Dei' main? Isima esis ine'isi si'isi.
43017010	Ea' epes ae'asi, isima ine'isi etis. Epes hiesi ine'isi hi'alas isima ae'asi. Ea' enis epes siti epes isima ae'asi ea' dei' sogawa nafifili pepel ine'inai.
43017011	Dei' ae' ina ata' epe etap anae' wapoti', owa'. Ea' esis sope etap anae'. Ea' ae' efe'mago ine'. Ahalome bu'unai endilisi, ine' nimafi esisa sope la'ifisa pepel anama ine'inai, nali' nasi'ianai. Ine' nenda'am na'ama ma esis sope wambota atotona si'i afa' biafa wape atotofa.
43017012	Nogota anama ae' ape aloma esis, ae' emafias sape pepel ine'inai, pepel anama ine' nasi'ianai. Ae' emafias andeande' ea' ina enin atitin higilalan, owa'. Aman hegilialanai, anan atona nambimb nefe' wambel aonai ma basef ine'imi mail buk Baibeli motaga endilisi mondawalap.
43017013	Ae' dei' ata' ape etap anae' a'i basef amama ma danifel ae'anai nepe si'ina opalef asasimi. Ea' dei' efe'mago ine'.
43017014	Basef ine'imi, ae' ase'asam ea'. Esis amam nematawa sanda'ma esis naumbih sanda'as awes. Dei' main? Esis ina saila waf etap anae'inai si'i ae' wapoti' ina etap anae'iwei, owa'.
43017015	Ae' ina anda' beten ahali'ina ma nogalo'mas etap anae', owa'. Ae' anda' betena ine' nimafiasa aman aonai ina nohambombagas, owa'.
43017016	Esis ina saila waf etapanai si'i ae' wapoti' ina etap anae'wei, owa'.
43017017	Basef ine'imi amama endilisimi. Ine' nenda' esis sotaga ine'isi etis bo'wes ma basef amama.
43017018	Fowa' ine' nasapa'e afi'i ape la'afena esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai. Dei' na'ama etin ae' wapoti' asapa' esis ae'asi sofe' la'afena esis isima saila waf etapanai.
43017019	Ine' nigiambame epe ine'iwei atowe ma igiambama esis wapoti' sotaga bo'wes andeande' ine'isi etis.
43017020	Ae' ina anda' betena igiambama esis amama atom, owa'etin. Ae' anda' betena agiambama epes isima anona nemaf some' basefa esisa sombale'efa ae'.
43017021	Ahalome, ae' anda' betena esis isima hiesi sope ukup etifim si'i ine' Ahalome nape naloma ae' ea' ape alomena. Ea' na'ama etin, anda' betena esis sope afa' biafa. Ama amam nematawa saila waf etapanai sombale'efa ine' etina nasapa'e afi'i.
43017022	Fowa' ine' nase'e agel lu'unai naloma la'ifimi ine'imi ase'esam esisa sope ukup etifim si'i afa' biafa wape ukup etifim.
43017023	Ine' nape naloma ae', ae' ape aloma esis, ea' na'ama etin ae' okom na'i esis sotaga ukup etifim endilisi. Ama esis amam nematawa etapasi sogawa ine' nasapa' ae' afi'i, ea' ine' okom nainaila esis endilisi si'i ine' okom nainaila ae'.
43017024	Ahalome, ae' okom na'i esis amam nematawa ine' nasi'iasi sefe' sope solome wambel ae' eapoma. Ae' okom na'i esis siti pepel la'ifinai noloma nafifili ae'anai, anama ine' nasi'ianai. Fowa' etap anae' ata' owa' notagai nogota anama ine' okom naila ae'. Ea' nase'e pepel nafifili anama.
43017025	Ahalome bu'unai endilisi, esis amam nematawa saila waf etapanai ina sogawa ine'. Ea' ae' egawa ine'. Ea' esis amama alupisi sogawa ine' nasapa'e afi'i.
43017026	Ae' awalapa agel ine'inai ea' ma esis. Ea' ae' ewalapana etin la'ela'ef hihif. Ama esis sofa' waf anama ukup maimaila epes hiesi si'i ine' okom nainaila ae' ma ae' epe nomona esis.”
43018001	Jisas nanda' beten nahali' Ahalomana ea', naloma alupufai ananifai wafe' owala wambo walemb Kidron fisana lawah hiami oliv motawama. Nao'wafa wafe' anama.
43018002	Anan Judas nogawa anama ma atuwasi neafe' nihi'amba amam naumbih ma Jisas napoma. Dei' main? Nimeguf hiami Jisas nao'wafa wape etifigin wapoma anama.
43018003	Ea' Judas nafi'i nao'wa anom soldia maloma anom polisman. Soldia amama maloma polisman amama, amam pris dambami maloma amam Farisi masapa'am mafi'i. Amam polisman maloma soldia mefa' bagah nagwahis lamifah maloma amama sapa'ami mefa'am mafi'i anama.
43018004	Ea' Jisas nogawa amamaga hiami atuwasi meatagamanai. Ea' nafe' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' pagolopa emi?”
43018005	Ea' magwamana basef ma'ipana ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.” Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi.” Ea' Judas na'i nihi'ambamam Jisas, anan naitu nalomam wapoti'.
43018006	Ea' Jisas ata' na'ipam etin na'i, “Ae' ma'uwi”, ea' mandahagas mowa motawa etap.
43018007	Ea' Jisas nahali'am wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pagolopa emi?” Ea' ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai.”
43018008	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Doko' ae' a'ipipa a'i ae' ea' ma'uwi. I'i ipe' pegolopa ae', pihapili pekwaha amam mefe' wafifim.”
43018009	Ea' Jisas dei' na'ipam na'ama naila basef amama fowa' na'iami ma motaga alihim endilisi. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Amam amama fowa' ine' nasi'iami, ina anona atotona higililana, owa'.”
43018010	Ea' Saimon Pita nahapila anona bainat nagianai naha anona aman Malkus nanda'mana maola pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami. Ea' natopa' aliga da'isinai ananinai nowa.
43018011	Ea' Jisas na'ipa Pita mehip na'i, “Ine' tanima la bainat nowala let. Ae' ea' embela kap Ahalome nasi'ianai.”
43018012	Ea' amam soldia maloma dembinai amamunai maloma amam polisman Judai hiami mombalo' Jisas manda' mandof mowa' lagofana.
43018013	Ea' mao'wana nali' nafe' ma Anas, Kaiafas fafomana. Afagel anama Kaiafas dembinai pris nape nali'ma pris hiami.
43018014	Aman anama Kaiafas nali' na'ipa amam agufumi Juda na'i, “I'i aman atotona noga' ma nigiambama ape' Juda hiapai, waf anama andeande', waf bu'unai.”
43018015	Ea' Saimon Pita naloma ae' alupuwei Jisasi wagi'ma Jisas wafi'i. Pris anama dembinai nogawa ae'. Ea' ae' awis aloma Jisas ipat nomon
43018016	ea' Pita tol naitu uta endalelemb ande'. Ae' etanima awisi ande' a'ipa ano'w nemata'w kumafi utai ea' ao'wa Pita wawis nomon.
43018017	Ea' nemata'w kumafi utai kwa'ipa Pita kwa'i, “Ine' wapoti' alupinai aman anama, o owa'?” Ea' anan nagwama'wa basef na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
43018018	Amam manda' maola pris anama dembinai maloma anom polisman amam hiami nomanamb mam makata nif maitumam mahi'am. Ea' Pita wapoti' nalomam naitumam.
43018019	Ea' pris anama dembinai Anas nahali' Jisas ipat nomon. Nahali'ana ma alupumi ananimi maloma basef anan nawalipasami.
43018020	Ea' Jisas nagwamana na'i, “Ae' awalipasa basef ae'ami alihiguma ma epes hiesi etapasi. Ae' awalipas nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef. Ea' awalipas ipat lu'unai Godi wapoti', ipat anama esis Juda hiesi sandakolas etifigin. Basef ae' a'iami ina mandambaho', owa'.
43018021	Dei' maina ine' nahali' ae'? Dei' nihali' esis same' basef awalipasami. Esis sogawam.”
43018022	Jisas na'i basef amama, anona polisman naitu felefele' nakola aombana na'ipa Jisas mehip na'i, “Ine' owa' negwamana basef amama dembinai pris.”
43018023	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anom basef awami, ine' ni'ipa amam hiami na'ama. Owa'etin. Ae' a'i basef endilisimi dei' nahe ma main?”
43018024	Mandelef ata' mapomana lagof Jisasi ea' Anas nasapa'ana nafe'ma pris anama dembinai Kaiafas.
43018025	Saimon Pita tol naituma nif mahi'ana, esis sa'ipana sa'i, “A'i ine' alupinai ananinai?” Ea' anan na'i, “Ae' owa'.”
43018026	Ea' anona aman nape felefele'ma Pita, anan nanda' maola pris anama dembinai. Anan amam atom wambota atona aman anama do'ok Pita nahana natopa' aliganai. Ea' na'ipa Pita na'i, “Endilisi, ae' ati ine' nape naloma Jisas ganima lawah oliv motawama.”
43018027	Ea' Pita nambaho' agel Jisasi na'i wapoti' na'i, “Ae' owa'.” Anan ata' na'i etin, awata nanda'am.
43018028	Ea' kuhimbita atona amam Juda mofa' Jisas makwaha ipat Kaiafasi, mofa'ana mafe' ipat gavman dembinai. Ea' amam Juda ina mafe' mawis ipat anama Romi, owa'. Amam ma'i, “Na'ama mofa' alogw awami ea' ina naman mea' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova, owa'.”
43018029	Amam ukup mandanda' na'ama ea' maitu ande' ea' Pailat nafi'mai amam na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pa'i penda'mana kot ma main?”
43018030	Amam magwamana basef ma'i, “I'i aman anama owa' nonda' waf aonai, ape' ina mofa'ana nifi'mai ine', owa'.”
43018031	Ea' Pailat na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' etipa pefa'ana penda'mana basef mondahama mi'uli ipe'inai. Ae' owa', andaiwa'.” Ea' amam Juda magwamana ma'i, “Mi'uli ipe' Romi na'i owa' ma moha enin epen noga', owa'.”
43018032	Amamaga amama amam Juda manda'ami ina mataga etin, owa'. Amama mataga maila basef amama Jisas nali' na'iami motaga endilisi. Dei' main? Anan nali' na'i, “Nambimb esis sehe ega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”
43018033	Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat natanima nawis ipat lu'unai gavmani nomon. Ea' nofala Jisas nafi'i nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' king dembinai esis Judai?”
43018034	Ea' Jisas nahali'ana na'i, “Basef amama mataga okom ine'inai atona o enis epes sa'ipinama ae'?”
43018035	Ea' Pailat nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' okom na'i ae' wapoti' ae' Judaiwei? Owa'. Epes ine'isi saloma amam pris dambami, esis etis sombalo'ena sowa'ena nafi'mai ae'. Ine' nanda' maina waf?”
43018036	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Ae' ina Judaiwei king imafi epes etapesi, owa'. I'i ae' epe king etap anae', alupumi ae'ami manda' opeh ae'ami migiambama ae' mopa' ma esis Juda ina la'ifisa sombale'e. Owa'.”
43018037	Ea' Pailat na'i, “Na'ama ine' enina king dembinai?” Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “Ine' na'i ae' anowe dembiwei king. Basef amama endilisimi. Mama'we kolae ma epe king dembiwei. Ae' afi'i etap anae' ma iwalipasa basef endilisimi. Emi egafis sonda' waf endilisinai, esis seme' basef ae'ami.”
43018038	Ea' Pailat nahali'ana na'i, “Basef amama endilisimi, maim basef?” Pailat na'iam na'ama ea' notanima nawis ande' esis Juda sapoma na'ipas na'i, “Ae' ina ati anom amamaga awami ma anan, owa'. Ina ati anona waf aonai ma eanda'mana basef, owa'.
43018039	Ea' waf ipe' Judai, ma panda' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova, ae' akwaha enin epen nanda' kalabusi nafe'mago ipe'. Dei' ipe' pa'i ae' ekwaha king Dembinai ipe' Judai nefe'mago ipe', o emi?”
43018040	Ea' esis sagwamana basef la'ifimi sa'i, “Owa'etin, anan owa'. Ine' nekwaha Barabas nifi'mai ape'.” Aman anama Barabas anan nakowalefi naha epes saga'i.
43019001	Ea' gavman dembinai Pailat nao'wa Jisas nafe' na'ipa amam soldia mopagahona.
43019002	-
43019003	Mapagahona ma ea', mala'watefa anona mandof higatagunai si'i anona hat mowalo'manona balaga ananinai, malamana anona lowaf akwahinai. Ea' mafe'ma anan timbi tambel ma'ipana ma'i, “Nemaf bu'unai ine' dembinai king Judai!” Amam manda' salamalana manda'ana findiwana na'ama, makola aombana.
43019004	Ea' Pailat nawis ande' wapoti' na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Ipe' peme'! Ae' dei' efa'ana afi'mai ipe' ma pegawa ae' ina ati anona waf aonai ma anan enda'mana basef, owa'.”
43019005	Ea' Jisas nawis ande'. Hat anama manda' mandof higatagunai manda' sana'ofana si'i hat napomana balaga ananinai ea' lowaf akwahinai napomana. Ea' Pailat na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' piti aman anae'.”
43019006	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma polisman amamumi ata' matolona, ma'iam mehip ma'i, “Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai! Undana nil lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai!” Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Ipe' etipa fa'ana undandago. Ae' owa', ae' ina ati anona waf aonai anan nanda'anai ma enda'mana basef, owa'.”
43019007	Ea' amam Juda magwamana basef ma'i, “Anan na'i anan Nogalomana Godi. Ea' mi'uli afa'inai na'i anan noga'.”
43019008	Fowa' Pailat umbamahana etin, ea' dei' name' basef amama atom, umbamahana endilisi.
43019009	Ea' nawis nomon ipat anama nahali' Jisas na'i, “Ine' nataga nafi'i eti?” Ea' Jisas ina nagwamana anom basef, owa'.
43019010	Ea' Pailat na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nandaiwa'ma ni'ipi anom basef? Ine' negawa ae', o owa'? Ae' la'ifiwei ma ekwaha ine' nefe' etin o i'ipas sehena nega' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.”
43019011	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i God nape heven ilifi owa' nease'ena pepel ine', ine' etina ina la'ifina ma netalogofa ae', owa'. I'i nehe ega', waf anama aonai. Ea' amam amama mofa'e afi'mai ine', waf amamunai aonai lu'unai endilisi, nikila' waf aonai ine' nanda'anai.”
43019012	Pailat name' basef amama atom, ea' na'i notagaha Jisas nefe' wafifina. Ea' esis Juda sofalana mehip sa'i, “I'i ine' netagaha aman anama nefe' wafifina, ina alupinai ma Sisar gavman dembinai esis Romi, owa'. Emi egalin na'i enin etin king dambeni enin naumbih Sisari.”
43019013	Pailat name' basef amama atom, nofa'ai Jisas nawisi nataga ande' ea' nape anona sia amam dambami jas mapeinai. Anama alihiguma sa'i otamba atom ma'oma. Eaf anama diga Hibrui sa'i Gabata.
43019014	Nemaf anama esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aimi ma naman sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasova. Ea' aon nahagasom nape 12 klok, Pailat na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “Piti dembinai king ipe'inai naitu anae'.”
43019015	Ea' esis Juda sa'ipana mehip sa'i, “Fa'ana, fa'ana, undana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.” Ea' Pailat nahali'as na'i, “Ipe' pa'i ae' iundana king dembinai ipe'inai lawag?” Ea' amam pris dambami magwamana basef ma'i, “Ape' owa' anona dembinai king, Sisar atona anan dembinai king ape'inai.”
43019016	Ea' Pailat nakwahomasa Jisas esis Juda ma siundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
43019017	Ea' amam soldia mowa' Jisas mofa'ana mafe'. Ea' Jisas atotona nofa' lawag ananinai nafe' nakwaha wambel lu'unai nawis ande' nafe' nataga anagon agiluguma Pipitagel Balagaina. Diga Hibrui sa'i Golgota.
43019018	Anama amam maundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai naloma anom amam biam. Anona nail wa'ol, anona nail wa'ol, Jisas nail la'afen.
43019019	Gavman dembinai Pailat nanda' anom basef nofa'am nanda'am mail lawag anama ilif. Basef ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Jisas Nasaretinai, anan King esis Judai.”
43019020	Esis Juda hiesi sati basef amama satalifam. Dei' main, anama amam maunda Jisas naila nape felefele'ma Jerusalem. Ea' basef amama ma'i diga Hibrui, Latini, naloma diga Griki, ma'i diga wenifina.
43019021	Amam pris dambami esis Judai ma'ipa Pailat ma'i, “Ina nenda' basef amama ni'i, ‘Dembinai king esis Judai’, hapaimi. Ine' nenda' basef ni'i, ‘Anan na'i, Ae' dembiwei King esis Judai.’ ”
43019022	Ea' Pailat nagwamama basef na'i, “Basef ae' anda'am ea' mondape na'ama la'ela'ef.”
43019023	Amam soldia maunda Jisas ea', mofa' luwaguf ananimi matambe'am biami biam mofa'am mandandam. Ea' mofa' siot ananinai wapoti'. Siot anama esis ina sagundisana, owa'. Sanda'ana nape si'ina.
43019024	Amam manda'ipama ma'i, “Afa' ina owala siot anama, owa'. Afa' onda' pilai satu ma emi nikila' nefa'ana.” Amam ma'iam na'ama maila anom basef fowa'imi mape Buk Baibel dei' mataga mandawalap alihim. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Amam matambe' luwaguf ae'ami mafe'ma amam atona etin ea' manda' satu ma emi nikila' nefa'am.” Ea' amam soldia manda'am na'ama etin.
43019025	-
43019026	Mama'wana Jisasi kwaloma owama'w akwa'ikwi waloma ano'w nemata'w Maria kwaso' Klopasi waloma Maria Makdalai'wi awau biawai biawa waitu felefele'ma lawag Jisas nailanai. Ea' Jisas nati mama'wana anani'wi kwaloma ae' alupunai ananiwei okom nainaila ae'i, afa' biafa waitu felefele'ma anan. Ea' na'ipa mama'wana na'i, “Mama'we, aman anama nogalomena ine'inai.”
43019027	Ea' na'ipa ae' alupuwei ananiwei na'i, “Nemata'w akwama mama'wena ine'ikwi.” Nogota anama ae' Jon efa'akw kwafe' ipat ae'anai ma imafia'w la'ela'ef kwape.
43019028	Ea' Jisas nogawa maol hianai ananinai ahi'alana, ea' okom na'i anom basef mape Buk Baibel motaga mondawalap. Ea' na'i, “Ae' eap nase'e ma embel.” Anan na'iam na'ama naila basef amama Baibelimi.
43019029	Ea' ano'w nemba'w si'ikwa embel wain numbutimi kwa'oh. Ea' amam mofa' anom mosong mape maoh si'i elefi'w mowala wain embel amama magiam masapa'am elifita mandowana mandolamanana malogel Jisasi ma nea' embel.
43019030	Anan nagwa' wain embel amama ea' na'i, “Maol anama hi'alana ea'.” Ea' nitimale' balaga nail nowalana ambal nandahi' nafe' anan ea' afuna.
43019031	Nemaf anama dei' esis Juda sape sandandomba gwa'aimi maima naman sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova. Nemaf anama dei' Sabat lu'unai nikila' Sabat anom nimeguf hiami. Ea' amam Juda mandaiwa' ma amam wanom mila lawah amama nemaf anama lu'unai Sabat. Ea' mafe' mahali' Pailata amam soldia mofe' mindiwa bo'wagah amamumi towam ma maga' ulala motagahom misila'i.
43019032	Ea' amam soldia mafe' anama maham mail. Ea' mati anona nail wa'ol mindiwa bo'wagahana ea' afuna. Ea' mafe'ma anona wa'ol mindiwa bo'wagahana.
43019033	Ea' mafe'ma Jisas nail, mati anan afuna endilisi. Ea' amam ina mindiwa bo'wagah ananimi, owa'.
43019034	Ea' anona soldia nanda' wamba'w napisila lambeh Jisasi wa'ol. Ea' mehip etin esimbel maloma embel kolo'alam mawisi.
43019035	Ae' ati amama naep ae'ami a'ipipa basef amama. Ea' basef amama ae'ami endilisimi atom. Ae' egawa basef amama a'ipipa emi endilisimi a'ipipa ma ipe' wapoti' pembale'efana.
43019036	-
43019037	Fowa' basef mail Buk Baibel ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Anona nemaf bihiguf ananimi ina totoweam, owa'etin.” Ea' anom basef wapoti' ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Anona nemaf esis siti aman anama sopisilana wamba'w.” Amam soldia manda'am na'ama maila basef amama atom mail Buk Baibel mataga mandawalap alihim.
43019038	Josep Arimateainai anan alupunai naila Jisasi, ea' anan umbamahana ma amam Juda. Ea' nembale'efa Jisas okom atom mape mandambaho'. Ea' anan nafe' nahali' Pailata alop Jisasi. Ea' Pailat na'i a'e, ea' Josep nafe' nofa' alop Jisasi nafe'.
43019039	-
43019040	Anan Josep nafe' naloma Nikodemus, anama fowa' nafe' nati Jisas anona owamb. Nikodemus nofa'ai anona marasin bu'unai sanda'ana ifat lawahi, agilinama mer naloma alos. Marasin anama hianai nimanina endilisi, 30 kilo. Ea' amam biam mafe' mofa' alop Jisasi manda' luwaguf afitimi maloma marasin anama mowa'ana, maila waf esis Judai.
43019041	Felefele'ma anama mali' maunda Jisas naila anona aof nape. Aof anama anona owap lu'unai nagali na'oh wa'ol si'i hi'agif lu'unai nape. Anama esis ina dei' nawa enin epenagon, ata' owa'.
43019042	Nemaf anama esis Juda sape sandondomba gwa'aimi maima naman sonda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova. Ea' amam mofa' alop Jisasi mawana hi'agif anama nape felefele'.
43020001	Owamb ata' nail, felefele'ma kuhimbita ma nemaf Sande Maria Makdalai'wi kohafel kwafe' hi'agif. Ea' kwati owap ina ata' masopama uta hi'agif, owa'. Enin epen nelefatana naitu gemba.
43020002	Ea' kotanima kwasagih kwafi'mai ae' aloma Saimon Pita wapoma, ae' alupuwei Jisasi anan okom nainaila ae'. Ea' kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Enis epes safe' sofa' Dembinai nakwaha hi'agif safe'. Ea' afa' ina ogawana safe' sambe'ana enima.”
43020003	-
43020004	Ea' ae' aloma Pita wasagih wafe' wataga hi'agif anama. Wasagih wafe', ea' ae' ikila' Pita ali' afe' ataga hi'agif anama.
43020005	Ea' atambe' ati luwaguf atom ma'oh nomon ea' ina awis, owa'.
43020006	-
43020007	Ea' Saimon Pita nagi'mi nafi'i nataga ea' nawis hi'agif nomon. Ea' nati luwaguf sowa'anam ma'oh, maloma anona lowaf manda'ana mowa' balaganai. Lowaf anama somagwiana sambe'ana na'oh anagon. Ea' luwaguf amama anom ma'oh dei'.
43020008	Ea' ae' ali' afe' hi'agif anama agi'mana awis nomon ati amamaga amama embale'efana.
43020009	Nogota anama afa' ina ogawa basef mail buk Baibel ma'i Jisas noga' notanima nohafel wapoti', owa'.
43020010	Ea' afa' biafa otanima wafe' ipat.
43020011	Maria ato'w kwaitu kwalopana hi'agif ande'. Kwaitu kwalopana, kwatambe' kwati hi'agif nomon,
43020012	kwati ensel biam mala luwaguf afitimi mape anama do'ok alop Jisasi na'oma. Amam biam anona nape balaga Jisasi nafe'ma, anona bo'wagah mafe'ma.
43020013	Ea' mahali'akw ma'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nalopa main?” Ea' akwa'w kwagwamama basef kwa'i, “Enis epes sofa' Dembinai ae'anai safe' ea' ina egawa anama safe' sambe'anama, owa'.”
43020014	Kwa'ipama basef amama ma ea', kwandamboma ea' kwati Jisas naitu naloma'w. Ea' ina kogawa anan kwa'i Jisas, owa'.
43020015	Ea' Jisas nahali'akw na'i, “Nemata'w, dei' maina ine' nalef? Ine' nagolopa emi?” Akwa'w okom na'i anona nanda' maol aofi. Ea' kwa'ipana kwa'i, “Dembinai, i'i ine' nefa'anama, ni'ipi anama nefa'ana nafe' nambe'anama.”
43020016	Ea' Jisas na'ipakw na'i, “Maria.” Ea' kwandamboma kwati anan kwa'ipana diga Hibrui kwa'i, “Rabonai.” Basef ofagema ma'i Dembinai Tisa.
43020017	Ea' anan Jisas na'i, “Ina nihapila alop ae'anai, owa'. Dei' main? Ae' ina dei' etanima afe'ma Ahalome gani ilif, ata' owa'. Ine' nefe'ma owape ae'ami ni'ipam ni'i, Ae' etanima elata ilifa Ahalome ae'anai, Ahalomepa ipe'inai. Efe'ma God Dembinai ae'anai, God Dembinai ipe'inai.”
43020018	Ea' akwa'w kwafe'ma alupufai ananifai wapoma kwa'ipafa kwa'i, “Ae' ati Dembinai ea'!” Ea' kwa'ipafa basef amama anan na'ipakwa emi.
43020019	Nemaf anama Sande owamb, afa' alupufai Jisasi wandatama wafe' etifigin owalo uta wape anona ipat nomon. Afa' umbamahafama amam dambami esis Judai. Ea' Jisas nafi'i naitu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
43020020	Na'ipafa basef amama ea', nihi'ambafa lagof maloma lambeh ananimi. Ea' afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai, wandanifel ma anan endilisi.
43020021	Ea' na'ipafa wapoti' na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem. Ae' dei' a'i esapa'epa pefe' pi'ipasa basef Godi si'i Ahalome nasapa'e afi'i a'ipipa.”
43020022	Na'ipafa amama ma ea', naolamafa ambip na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi.
43020023	I'i ipe' pekwaha waf aonai emi egafis sanda'anai, God wapoti' nokwahomasana. I'i ipe' owa' peakwaha waf anama aonai, God wapoti' ina anona nemaf nokwamasana, owa'.”
43020024	Anona ma afa' 12-peleifa alupufai Jisasi, Tomas agel wa'ana Didimus. Ofagena agel anama sa'i mama'was atoto'w kolam biagasi. Nemaf anama Jisas nafi'i natolofa, Tomas ina nape nalomafa, owa'.
43020025	Ea' enofa alupufai ananifai wafe' wa'ipana wa'i, “Afa' wati Dembinai afa'inai ea'.” Ea' Tomas na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' owa' iti melegwa lagof ananimi sahana nigufa, ma esa faf ae'anai ma niguf mawisa ea' esapa' lagel ae'anai nuwis nomon lambeh ananimi, ea' embale'efana. I'i owa', owa'.”
43020026	Nimeguf 8-peleim mafe'ma ea', afa' alupufai Jisasi wape anona ipat nomon, owalo uta wape. Nemaf anama Tomas wapoti' nape nalomafa. Ea' Jisas nawisi naitu nalomafa na'ipafa na'i, “Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
43020027	Ea' na'ipa Tomas na'i, “Ine' nesa faf ine'inai ma ae' anae'. Ea' niti lagof ae'ami. Nesapa' lagel ine'inai nuwis lambeh ae'ami nomon. Ina okom bimbiefina nopeina, owa'. Nembale'efa ae' endilisi.”
43020028	Ea' Tomas na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, God ae'inai.”
43020029	Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' natolowe ea', dei' nembale'efa ae'. Ea' emi egafis ina satolowei, sembale'efa ae'i, esis sondanifel endilisi.”
43020030	Jisas nanda' ikwaf hianai la'ifinai pepel naninani ma naep alupufai ananifai. Basefa pepel ananinai ina anda'ana hi'alana nape buk anae', owa'.
43020031	Anda' basef amama tu'wanim atoma pepel anama ma ipe' pembale'efa Jisas anan Nogalomana Godi, anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Ae' anda'am na'ama ma pembale'efa anan Jisas pefa' ambal namunai pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
43021001	-
43021002	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', afa' wati Jisas wapoti'. Basef ma'i na'ama. Jisas natagamafa gani walemb batupa'manai lu'unai Taiberias. Anofa afa' ondowa'anima etifigin wapoti' agof afa'imi alupufai Jisasi amama. Saimon Pita naloma Tomas agel wa'ana Didimus maloma Nataniel, anan Kanainai, etap hiagoma Galili. Amam maloma ae' nogalomana Sebedi aloma sahalome Jems waloma amam biam Jisasi ondowa'anima wape etifigin.
43021003	Ea' Saimon Pita na'ipafa na'i, “Ae' a'i efe' igi agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i, “Olomena ofe' etin.” Ea' wafe' walata anona bot wafe' wa'i ugi agof wafe' wanda'am owamb anama si'ina ea' afa' ina wagi anom agof, owa'etin.
43021004	Wafilu kuhimbita atona Jisas nafe' naitu walemb batupa'manai anama akata ea' afa' ina ogawa anan Jisas, owa'.
43021005	Ea' nofalafa na'i, “Awami alupipei, ipe' pagi anom agof?” Ea' wagwamana basef wa'i, “Owa'etin.”
43021006	Ea' na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' ata' pela anemb mowala bot anama wa'ol lagel da'isineima. Ea' atuwasi pigi anom agof.” Ea' afa' wa'i ola anemb, owafai agof hiami. Ea' ina la'ififa wiegiai anemb mulatowi motoma bot nomon, owa'. Dei' main? Agof hiami endilisi mala anemb anama si'ina.
43021007	Ae' alupuwei Jisasi anan okom nainaila ae', a'ipa Pita a'i, “Nanima Dembinai afa'inai.” Saimon Pita do'ok natagaha saket ananinai na'oh ea' nanda' maol, ea' name' basef amama nala saket wapoti' nukupa' nowala embel walemb batupa'manai nopaul nafe' embel.
43021008	Ea' afa' watoma bot wagi'mana wagiai anemb si'inama agof. Afa' ina wail laogona akata, owa'. Si'i 100 mita.
43021009	Wafe' wataga akata, wati anom nif fandom ma'oh ea' wati anom agof masef nif maloma anona bret.
43021010	Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' fa'ai anom agof dei' pagiami.”
43021011	Ea' Saimon Pita nalata bot anama nagiai anemb mafi'i akata. Anemb anama si'inama agof lu'wami atom 153-peleim. Ea' ina pele'atam, owa'.
43021012	Ea' Jisas na'ipafa na'i, “Ipe' fi'i ma ata' pea' gwa'aimi.” Afa' ina anona la'ifina ma nohali'ana nie'i, “Ine' emi?” Owa'etin. Dei' main, afa' ogawa anan Dembinai afa'inai.
43021013	Ea' Jisas nafi'i nofa' bret nase'afa, agof wapoti' na'ama etin.
43021014	Fowa' Jisas nohafel wapoti', nali' nafe'ma afa' alupufai ananifai watolona nimeguf bif. Ea' dei' watolona wapoti' wenif.
43021015	Afa' wa' gwa'aimi ea', Jisas na'ipa Saimon Pita na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili endilisi nikila' anom alupumi amama?” Ea' anan na'i, “A'e, Dembinai. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nese'ama gwa'aimi sipsip nogami ae'ami.”
43021016	Ea' Jisas nahali'ana wapoti' na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili endilisi?” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “A'e, Dembinai. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nimafi sipsip ae'ami.”
43021017	Jisas nali' nahali'ana bif ea' dei' nahali'ana wapoti' wenif na'i, “Saimon nogalomana Joni, ine' okom nainaili?” Ea' Pita okom nimanina na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' negawa amamaga hiami. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainailina.” Ea' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nese'am gwa'aimi sipsip ae'ami.
43021018	Endilisi ae' a'ipina, fowa' ine' ata' so'uso'win, ine' nowaho' let ea' nafe' mamagoma nomonas ine'imi ma'i neafe'ma. Ea' anona nemaf ine' netagama hagena, ine' nesa'ma lagof ine'imi ma anona aman nowaho'mena let nohapilina nefe' anama ine' nandaiwa'ma neafe'ma.”
43021019	Jisas na'ipana na'ama ma nihi'ambam eaf anama ma soha Pita noga' ma epes hiesi sefela agel Godi lu'una. Ea' dei' Jisas na'ipana na'i, “Nila ae'.”
43021020	Ea' Pita nandamboma nati ae', alupuwei Jisas okom nainailei, agi'mam afi'i. Ae' ma'uwi fowa' afa' wape wa' gwa'aimi ma indisi'ah felefele'ma Jisas ahali'ana a'i, “Dembinai, atuwasi emi ni'ipa naumbih ma nihi'ambama ine' neapoma?”
