43021021	Ea' Pita nati ae', nahali' Jisas na'i, “Dembinai, aman anama anona nemaf nope ni'imama?”
43021022	Ea' Jisas nagwamana basef Pita na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anan nope ambal nopaina nope nefe' nefe' anama ae' etanimani, amama ina maol ine'inai, owa'. Ine' nila ae'.”
43021023	Ea' basef baso'maimi wafimi amama mafe'ma afa' alupufai Jisasi ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Aman anama anona nemaf ina noga', owa'.” Ea' Jisas ina na'ipafa basef amama esis sa'iami, owa'. Basef amama kwamaimi. Jisas na'i basef amama atom na'i, “I'i ae' i'i anan nope nefe' nefe' ma nemaf ae' etanimani, amama ina maol ine'inai, owa'.”
43021024	Aman anama alupunai Jisasi ea' ae' ma'uwi. Ae' a'ipipa basef amama ma amamaga amama Jisas nanda'ami dei' anda'am mape buk anae'. Ape' Kristen mogawa basef amama ae' anda'ami endilisimi atom.
43021025	Jisas nanda' anona maol hianai wapoti'. I'i enis epes sonda' basefa maol Jisasi hi'ilana nil, ae' a'i etap anama hiagoma owa' anagona buk hianai no'oh, owa'etin. Asi'igin endilisi.
44001001	Alupinai Tiofilus, buk anama fowa' ae' anda'anai anda' basefa amamaga hiami Jisas nanda'ami nawalipa esis amam nematawa
44001002	ma dambadamba nali' nanda'am ea' nafi'i natagama nemaf anama God nofa'ana nalata gani heven ilif. Fowa' Jisas owa' ata' nolata heven ilif, Anan nali' nase'ama basef amama na'ipam mehipa maol amam aposel amama Anan nandandepami. Anan nase'ama maol amama pepel anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi.
44001003	Fowa' saha Jisas nefa' nimanimi lu'wami naga' ea' notanima nohafel wapoti' nafe' natagama alupumi ananimi. Ea' nape aon si'inai tu'waninai nanda' pepel hianai ma nihi'ambam mogawa endilisi anan nofa' ambal namunai nape. Nimeguf amama Anan nawalipasa epes hiesi siowis wambota Godi numafias.
44001004	Anan ata' nape nalomam na'ipam mehip na'i, “Ipe' dei' ina pekwaha Jerusalem ulal, owa'. Pepe pehafa amamaga amama Ahalome na'i endilisi niesi'ipami. Amama fowa' ae' a'ipipami.
44001005	Fowa' Jon napisi' amam nematawa hiesi embel. Ea' ipe' nambimb God nonda' baptaisimipa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.”
44001006	Nemaf anama amam alupumi Jisasi mandatama etifigin mahali'ana ma'i, “Dembinai, a'i nambimb nogota anae' ine' nenda' ape' mofa' agof lu'wami ma motofa esis naumbih ma afa' atofa umafi wambel hiagoma afa'ima?”
44001007	Ea' anan na'ipam na'i, “Amama ina amamaga ipe'imi ma pegawa nogota anama ma nimeguf Ahalome nandandepami, owa'. Anan atona numafi amama.
44001008	Ea' basef ipe'imi amama. Nambimb Ambal Bu'unai Godi nifi'mai ipe', nemaf anama pefa' pepel Ananinai, pewalapa basef Ae'ami Jerusalem ea' ganima etap hiagoma Judia ea' ganima etap hiagoma Samaria, ea' pefe' anama etap wambel hiagoma hi'ilagon.”
44001009	Jisas na'i basef amama hi'alam, esis ata' saitu satiligini etin, sati Anan nandegia nakwaha etap nalata ilif. Ea' anom elagw mofa'ana mafe' ea' ina satolona wapoti', owa'.
44001010	Anan nafe' ea', esis ata' saitu satologon etin ilif otaga, ea' dei' atef anom amam biam mola klos afitimi mondokwama mataga malomas maitu.
44001011	Ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa Galilipei, ipe' ina pitu piti otaga ilif, owa'. Jisas anama dei' God nofa'ana nakwahipa ea' nofa'ana nalata heven ilif. Anona nemaf notanima nifi'i petolona na'ama etin si'i dei' paitu patolona nalata heven ilif.”
44001012	Ea' esis sakwaha halaf anama lawah oliv motawama, sotanima safe' Jerusalem. Halaf anama ina laogona Jerusalem, owa', felefele'. Kilomita atotona si'i esis Juda safe' safi'i nemaf anama sabat sapoma noma'wanai.
44001013	Esis sotanima safi'i Jerusalem, safe' sawis ipat ea' safe' sape ipat ilif esis sapeinai. Agof amamumi amama. Pita naloma Jems naloma Jon a Andru a Filip naloma Tomas naloma Bartolomyu Matyu ea' Jems, Alfius nogalomana, Judas, Jems nogalomana ea' Saimon anan wambota Seloti.
44001014	Amam alupumi Jisasi mandatama etifigin nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ama manda' beten maloma anowa nematawa saloma akwa'w Maria Jisas mama'wana saloma owapana Jisasi wapoti'. Esis hiesi sape sanda' beten etifigin.
44001015	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', esis Kristen 120-peleis hiesi sandatama etifigin sape ea' Pita nohafel naitu na'i,
44001016	“Sahin owan ae'ipei, anom basef mail buk Baibel fowa' gani Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipa dembinai king Devit ma'iam na'ama ma'i aman anama Judas anona nemaf nonda' waf aonai ma nihi'amba Jisas naumbih Ananimi. Eaf ina naso', owa'. Nagal. Basef amama mataga alihim. God atona na'i, dei' basef amama mataga mandawalap. Fowa' Judas ina dei' nanda' waf aonai nawalapa Jisasa amam, ata' owa', nogota anama
44001017	Jisas nandandepana anan alupunai afa'inai nanda' maol anama Jisasi naloma afa'.”
44001018	“Moni Judas nofa'ana waf anama aonai ananinai natala anona etap. Anan nafe' etap anama nowa opaf pe'ana kolo'alanai hi'alana afuna.
44001019	Ea' epes hiesi sape Jerusalem sogawa amama. Ea' diga asasinai sofala anama agiliguma sa'i Akeldama. Ape' ma'i etap anama esimbel kolo'alami ma'oma.”
44001020	Dei' main, Pita na'i basef amama mape Buk Song ma'i, “ ‘Ipat ananinai anan nope wafina. Ina anona aman napaina, owa'.’ Ea' anom basef mape Buk Songi ma'i wapoti' ma'i, ‘Anona aman anona nemaf noho'ofana nofa' maol ananinai.’
44001021	-
44001022	Ea' dei' ape' mondandepa anona aman ape'inai noho'ofana ma mowalipasa basef amama Jisas notanima nohafel wapoti'. Ape' mondandepa anona ma amam amama mape maloma ape' ma nemaf anama Dembinai Jisas nape nalomapa. Nemaf anama Jon nawalipasa basef Godi napisi' amam nematawa embel nafi'i nafi'i nataga ma nemaf anama God nofa' Jisas nalata heven ilif nakwahepa.”
44001023	Pita na'iam na'ama, ea' esis Kristen sandandepa amam biam. Anona Josep, agel wa'ana Barsabas, ea' agel wa'ana wapoti' sa'i Jastus. Ea' anona Matias.
44001024	Ea' esis sanda' beten na'ama sa'i, “Dembinai, ine' negawa ukup epes hiesi. Ine' nendandepa amam amama biam nihi'ambapa maina aman
44001025	nofa' maol aposel noho'ofa aman anama Judas. Anan nakwaha maol anama nafe' wambel aonai ma God nogwamana waf aonai ananinai.”
44001026	Ea' esis sanda' agof amam biam mail otamba biam. Ea' sala otamba amama mala anona malep si'i tin sakoto'mam sati otam nali' nataga agel Matias. Ea' sanda' anan nanda' maol naloma amam aposel 11-peleima monda' maol Godi.
44002001	Nemaf anama lu'unai Pentikos nataga, esis hiesi sembale'efana sandatama etifigin sape ipat atotona.
44002002	Ea' dei' atef same' anona maf lu'unai nanda'am nafi'i heven. Maf anama name' si'i uf la'ifinai naluwi ea' ipat anama esis sapeinai si'inama maf anama.
44002003	Ea' sati nif ilelowa si'i melisigah pepe'atam mafe' matoma esis hiesi atona etin hi'alas.
44002004	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'inama esis atona etin hi'alas, sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani wambel hiagoma. Ambal Bu'unai Godi anama nanda'am mataga malogof asasimi.
44002005	Ea' enis Juda sanda' lotuma Godi safi'i ganima etap hiagoma safi'i sape Jerusalem.
44002006	Esis hiesi same' maf anama ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi safi'i sondowa'anima sape. Ea' epes isima hiesi atona etin same' esis sembale'efanai sa'i basef Godi ma diga naninani hianai. Ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as endilisi ma same' diga asasinai.
44002007	Esis sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ea' ukup matamea hiahiam. Ea' sa'iam sa'i, “Amam amama Galilimi atom, ea' dei' ma'i diga ape'inai atona etin.
44002008	Dei' maina ape' hiapai atona etin mame' amam ma'i diga ape'inai dende' si'i ape' mame'ama mamasapa ape'isi? Ape' mafi'i etap anama hiagoma anama,
44002009	-
44002010	Partia, Midia Elam ea' Judia, Kapadosia naloma Pontus Esia Frigia Pamfilia Isip ea' ape' anona etap hiagoma Mesopotamia ea' esis ganima Libia felefele'ma wambel Sairini. Ea' anepa ape' wambel Rom mafi'i mape na'ae.
44002011	Ape' Juda maloma enis epes maila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwanai ea' ape' etap hiagoma Krit Arebia, ape' hiapai mame' amam mawalapa basefa pepel maol Godi ma diga hianai naninani.”
44002012	Ea' esis hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as, esis ukup matamea mape hiahiam. Esis etis sandahali'ma sa'i, “Amamaga amama mataga ma'imama?”
44002013	Ea' enis sanda' iafam sa'i, “Amam ma' embel wain hianai ea' mahaga magaol dei' ma'i basef mamumami.”
44002014	Ea' Pita nohafel naitu naloma amam aposel 11-peleim ea' noga na'i mehip nawalapa basefa esis amam nematawa hiesi na'i, “Ipe' Juda alupipei paloma ipe' amam nematawa hipei ipe' pape Jerusalem, ipe' pembe' aligaha basef ae'ami, ma pegawa amamaga amama.
44002015	Ipe' pa'i amam amama manda' spak, owa'. Dei' ata' kuhimbita aon ata' natefi nail etin si'i 9 klok.
44002016	Ea' amamaga amama mataga si'i anona profet Joel fowa' gani na'i,
44002017	‘God na' i, felefele' ma nimeguf akutaimi Ae' ese'as Ambal Bu'unai Ae'anai nope amam nematawa hiesi. Ea' efela esis batawisipa ipe'isi sowalapa basef si'i amam profet ma'iam. Ea' ihi'amba amam so'umi ipe'imi mondanda'oh motolom naep mose'am mope motolom, ea' ese'ama mo'oh mondanda'oh motolom amam hagami ipe'mi ma ihi'ambam waf ae'anai.
44002018	Nimeguf amama ae' ese'asa Ambal Bu'unai ae'anai nope esis amam nematawa ae'asi sanda' maol ae'anai nefelas sowalapa basef Ae'ami si'i fowa' amam profet manda'ami.
44002019	Ea' enda' anona ikwaf notaga gani otaga ilif, enda' anona ikwaf notaga na'ae etap. Anama na'ama. Enda' nogoh hiami otaga, enda' esimbel, nif fandumi mataga etap anae'.
44002020	Ea' emboma aon alipunai notaga owamb owambunai notaga akwahina si'i esimbel. Ea' enda'am i'i nemaf Dembinai nigi' notaga. Nemaf anama ananinai lu'unai endilisi. Dembinai nihi'ambapa pepel nafifili Ananinai.
44002021	Nemaf anama ata' owa' neataga emi egafis sofala agel Dembinai, nofa'as sotanimani.’ ”
44002022	Ea' Pita na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' epes Israelipei, ipe' peme' basef amama. Dei' i'ipipa aman anama Jisas Nasaretinai. Ipe' pegawa maol ahalomana la'ifinai naloma pepel anama God nanda'anai la'afena ipe' ma lagel aman anama. Amama mihi'ambepa andeande' aman anama God nasapa'ana nafi'i.
44002023	Fowa' gani God nogawa ea' nail okom Ananinai atona nanda' aman anama nefe' nope lagof ipe'imi. Ea' amam amama mololama mi'uli Godi sanda' waf aonai, amam magiambama ipe' pembale'ana paundana nail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' pahana naga'.
44002024	Ea' God nafelona nohafel wapoti' nakwaha ekep pahana ma naga'i. Dei' main, ga' anama ina la'ifina ma nombale'ana, owa'.
44002025	Fowa' gani Devit na'i basefa Jisas na'i, ‘Ae' ati Dembinai ae'anai nape nalome wa'ol lagel ae'anai da'isinai la'ela'ef. Na'ama dei' ina enis epes la'ifisa sanda'me anom nimanimi, owa'.
44002026	Amama atom dei' okom ae'anai nandanifel. Ae' i'i basef bu'wami i'i, ae' egawa endilisi nambimb anona nigiambame epe andeande'.
44002027	Dei' main, anona nemaf ina nekwaha ambal ae'anai nefe' nepe anama epes saga'i sapoma, owa'. Ea' ina nambimb nekwaha aman anama bu'unai nanda' maol ine'inai alop ananinai folo'olana, owa'.
44002028	Ine' nihi'ambe eaf nafe' natagama ambal namunai. Anona nemaf ine' nepe nelome endanifel endilisi.’ ”
44002029	Ea' Pita na'ipas wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' sahope owape ae'ipei, dei' ae' a'i ewalapa basef i'ipipana aman anama akunamapa ape'inai Devit. Anan fowa' gani naga' sawana, dei' hi'agif ananinai ata' nape la'afena ape'. Basef amama Devit ina na'iama anan atona, owa'.
44002030	Aman anama Devit anan profet ea' nogawa God na'i basef la'ifimi na'i endilisi gani ilif na'ama ma anona nemaf nonda' bafalomana Deviti notaga nope dembinai king si'i Devit fowa' nape king.
44002031	Fowa' gani Devit ata' nape, anan nogawa amama God na'i anona nemaf neanda'ami. Na'ama dei' anan na'i dembinai Krais anona nemef noga' notanima nohafel wapoti'. Anan na'iam na'i, ‘Anona nemaf God ina nokwahona nope anama saga'i sapoma hi'agif alop ananinai folo'olana, owa'.’
44002032	Aman anama Jisas God nafelana notanima nohafel wapoti'. Ea' afa' hiafai wati amama dei' wa'iam.
44002033	Dei' God nafelona nohafel nalata gani heven ilif ea' nape lagel da'isinai Godi. Anan nofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi ma Ahalomana, si'i fowa' Ahalomana na'ipana na'i endilisi nese'ana. Amama atom dei' Jisas nase'asam esis amamaga amama dei' patolom pame'am ea'.
44002034	Dei' main, Devit ina nalata heven, owa'. Ea' anan fowa' gani na'i basef na'i, ‘Dembinai na'ipa Dembinai ae'anai na'ama na'i, “Ine' nepe lagel da'isinai ae'anai ma nepe Dembinai neloma ae'.
44002035	Nepe na'ama nefe' nefe' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bowagah ine'imi ine' nikila'as.” ’ ”
44002036	Ea' dei' Pita na'iam na'ama na'i, “Dei' ape' Israel mogawa isima andeande'. Aman anama Jisas ipe' paundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai pahana naga', dei' God nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”
44002037	Esis same' basef amama, maha opalef asasimi endilisi. Ea' sa'ipa Pita naloma anom aposel sa'i, “Ipe' sahopapa, dei' ape' monda' maina mope andeande'?”
44002038	Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' hipei pemboma opalef ipe'imi pila God ea' ipe' hipei atona etin pefa' baptaisa agel Dembinai Jisas Krais ma God nokwaha waf aonai ipe'inai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb God nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope nolomepa.
44002039	Fowa' gani God na'i basef la'ifimi endilisimi atom na'i nese'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope noloma ipe' peloma awasi ipe'isi soloma esis amam nematawa hiesi ata' sape lauguni anona nemaf sigi' seatagai. God Dembinai ape'inai na'iam ma nose'as Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope noloma epes isima. Epes amama atom anona nemaf Anan nofalas sotanimani.”
44002040	Pita ina na'ipasa basef amama atom, owa'. Na'ipasa anom basef hiami wapoti' na'ipas basef la'ifimi ma nafela ukup asasimi na'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama pefa' nimanimi lu'wami peloma amam nematawa dei'isi sanda' waf aonai.”
44002041	Ea' epes emi egafis sofa' basef Pitai sombale'efam, esis sofa' baptais. Nemaf anama God nowa'ani epes hiesi wambota ananinai sataga hias 3,000-peleis sataga Kristen, ea' sape saloma esis isima amam nematawa sombale'efanai.
44002042	Amam nematawa isima sataga Kristen dambaisi esis la'ifis endilisi ma same' basef amam aposel mawalipasami sandagiambanama etin enis sahin owan sape etifigin etin sa' gwa'aimi sanda' beten etifigin atogon.
44002043	Nimeguf hiami God nanda' ikwaf lu'unai ma pepel hianai nataga lagof amam aposeli. Ea' amam nematawa hiesi umbamahas endilisi sape.
44002044	Ea' esis hiesi sombale'efa Kraisi sandatama etifigin atogon. Amamaga asasimi gwa'aimi maim hiami, ina asasimi atona etin, owa'. Amamaga amama hiesi atom.
44002045	Ea' esis sombale'efanai enis sase'asa etap asasinai naloma anom amamaga asasimi mafe'ma enis epes satalamasam. Ea' sofa' otamba ma amamaga sotambel sanda'am sase' epes isima gwa'aimi a'asi kwahusi.
44002046	Ea' esis hiesi nimeguf la'ela'ef safe' ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' safe' sa' gwa'aimi ifagw asasimi atona etin. Esis sandanifel ukup bo'om sose'as gwa'aimi ma sigiambama enis epes ea' sandanifel sa' gwa'aimi etifigin.
44002047	La'ela'ef esis safela agel Godi lu'una, ea' opalef esis amam nematawa hiesi sape andi'i bo'oma esis Kristen nimeguf hiami. Ea' nimeguf la'ela'ef Dembinai nofa' enis amam nematawa sotanimani sape saloma epes hiesi isima sombale'efanai.
44003001	Nogota anama esis Kristen sanda' betenanai, Pita naloma Jon mafe' ipat lu'unai Godi ma'i monda beten. Nemaf anama ea' wambomota 3 klok.
44003002	Ea' anona aman bo'wagah mondala'anai nape anama, mama'wana anani'wi fowa' kolana nape na'ama la'ela'ef. Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef esis sanda'ana sofa'ana sahaponana nape ipat lu'unai Godi ande' felefele'ma uta sa'i bu'unai. Sanda'ana na'ama ma nondailasa moni gwa'aimi maima esis amam nematawa safe'ma lotu.
44003003	Aman anama nati Pita naloma Jon ma'i mofe' muwis ipat anama, nahali' amam biam ma mose'ana anom otamba anan.
44003004	Ea' Pita naloma Jon mati anan titi titi ea' Pita na'i, “Ine' ata' niti afa' biafa.”
44003005	Ea' nandamboma nati amam, okom na'i mose'ana anom amamaga.
44003006	Ea' Pita na'i, “Ae' otamba siliwa gol a'e, ea' amamaga bu'wami a'i atuwasi iesi'inami amama. Ae' a'i pepel Jisas Krais Nasaretinai atona a'ipina, dei' hafel nitu nefe'.”
44003007	Ea' nahapila lagel da'isinai aman anama aonai nafelona. Ea' mehip etin bo'wagah maloma nembawa ananimi la'ifim mataga bo'om.
44003008	Ea' anan nitipa' nafe'. Ea' nalomom mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nandanifel kwapi' etin naitu nalemb nafe' nafela agel Godi lu'una.
44003009	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sati anan nafe' nafela agel Godi
44003010	ea' sogawana sa'i anan ma'una aman anama bo'wagah mandola'anai, fowa' nape la'ela'ef uta anama sa'i bu'unai ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nape nandailasa moni maim. Esis sati anan bo'ona sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ukup matamea.
44003011	-
44003012	Aman anama nandanifel ma nataga bo'ona ea' nahapila Pita naloma Jon ea' esis sasagih safi'i ma sotolona ilaf anama sa'i ilaf Solomoni. Pita nati epes isima, na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' epes Isrel, dei' maina ipe' gegelalasipa ma amamaga amama mataga? Dei' maina ipe' pati afa' biafa? Pa'i pepel afa'inai naloma waf bu'unai afa'inai atona wanda' aman anama nataga bo'ona nohafel nafe'? Owa'.
44003013	God anama bafapapa ape'imi Abraham naloma Aisak naloma Jekop manda' lotumanai, anan atona nanda'ana nataga bo'ona nafela agel Jisasi, nanda' maola Anani. Anan aman anama atona ipe' pandaiwa'mana pase'ana amam agufumi gavmani ma mahana naga'. Dembinai Pailat na'i notagahona nifi'i, owa'. Ipe'pandaiwa'mana pewa' alafugahana.
44003014	Ipe' pewa alafugaha aman bu'unai Godi. Ea' pahali'a Pailat mehipa anona aman aonai naha epes saga'i, ea' nakwahomepanai.
44003015	Aman bu'unai ofagena ma ambal namunai, anama ea' pahana naga'. Ea' God nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ea' afa' biafa wape amam ananifai owalapa basefa amama, wati anan nape namona endilisi.
44003016	Afa' biafa ombale'efa Jisas. Anan atona nafela bale'ef afa'inai, pepel ananinai atona nanda' aman anama bo'ona naep ipe'imi hipei. Pepel Jisasi atona dei' nanda' aman anama bo'ona endilisi patolona pegawana.
44003017	Endilisi, alupipei, ae' egawa ipe' ina pegawa andeande'ma dei' panda' waf anama aonai ma Jisas, owa'. Amam agufumi ipe'imi wapoti' amam na'ama etin.
44003018	Fowa' gani God nawalapa basefa amam profet hiami ma Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i. Basef amama ma'i Krais nome' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' waf anama dei' ipe' panda'anai, anama nandahama basef amama amamumi mataga mandawalap alihim.
44003019	Dei' ipe' pemboma opalef pila Goda nokwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.
44003020	Ipe' penda'am na'ama, nambimb Dembinai nese'epa pepel namunai ma ambagof ipe'imi. Ama nambimb nosapa' Krais nofi'mai ipe'. Aman anama fowa' gani God nandandepana ma ipe' ea'i, Anan Jisas.
44003021	Dei' napani heven nohafa nemaf anama God nonda' amamaga hiami motaga dambaimi wapoti'. Si'i fowa' gani na'ipipa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom ma amam profet ananimi bu'wami.
44003022	Amama si'i fowa' Moses na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘God Dembinai ipe'inai, anona nemaf nefela anona sahalomepa ipe'inai, nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'. Ipe' peme' basef ananimi hiami pilana.
44003023	Ea' emi egafis sondaiwa'ma some' basefa profet anama, esis ina ata' sope wambota Godi, owa'. Nambimb sefe' anagon.’
44003024	Ea' amam profet hiami, Samuel naloma amam profet mataga magi'ma anani, hiami ma'iama nimeguf amama dei' mataga.
44003025	Basef Godi endilisimi atom amam profet dei' ma'ipa ipe' pembale'am pilam. Fowa' gani God na'i basef la'ifimi amama naloma bafasepa ipe'isi. Dei' basef amama mataga alihim ma migiambama ipe' wapoti'. Fowa' gani anan na'ipa Abrahama anona nemaf Jisas notaga na'i, 'Anona nemaf bafasena ine'isi etis ae' igiambamas amam nematawa hiesi sope etap hiagoma i'ipasa basef bu'wami Ae'ami.’
44003026	Ea' God nandandepa aman anama nanda' maol ananinai, nasapa'ana nali' nafi'mai ipe' ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma pemboma opalef atona etin pekwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.”
44004001	Pita naloma Jon ata' ma'i maloma esis amam nematawa, amam pris maloma kepten dembinai ma amam soldia mumafi ipat lu'unai Godi maloma amam Sadyusi mafi'i.
44004002	Amam mogawa amam biam mawalapa basef ma'ipasa Jisas notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti'. Ea' ma'i epes hiesi sali' saga'i anona nemaf sohafel wapoti'. Amam dambami Juda ma'i basef amama amam biam ma'iami ina endilisi. Na'ama amam mandaiwa'mam endilisi ma ma'i basef amama.
44004003	Ea' dei' amam mafi'i mombalo' amam biam wambomota aon nowala. Ea' manda'am manda' kalabus owamb anama mahafa wefilu kuhimbita.
44004004	Esis amam nematawa hiesi same' basef amama Jisas nohafel hi'agif wapoti' sombale'efana. Amama atom dei' esis sombale'efanai sataga hias, amam atom mataga felefele'ma 5,000-peleim.
44004005	Nemaf nagi'i amam dambami Judaimi maloma agufumi esis Judai maloma amam Juda mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, mandakolas etifigin Jerusalem.
44004006	Dembinai pris Anas nape nali'ma pris hiami naloma Kaiafas maloma Jon Aleksander ea' anom amam wapoti' wambota Anasi mafi'i hi'alam mandakolas etifigin maloma amam dambami Juda.
44004007	Ea' amam hiami manda' amam aposel biam maitu naep amamumi mahali'am mehip ma'i, “Ipe' pefa' maina pepel pa'i maina agel dei' panda' amamaga amama? Kiam!”
44004008	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina ma Pita nanda'ana la'ifina na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' Israel amam dembipei peloma ipe' agufipei,
44004009	ipe' dei' pahali' afa' biafa ma wanda' waf bu'unai wagiambama aman anama bo'wagah awomunai. Ipe' pa'i pegawa anan nataga bo'ona na'imama.
44004010	Ipe' hipei peme' basef ae'ami pegawa andeande'. Esis hiesi Israel wapoti' seme'ama sogawam andeande' ma pepel agel Jisas Krais Nasaretinai atona dei' aman anama ambo'ona endilisi nohafel naitu naep ipe'imi. Jisas ipe' paundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai pahana afuna, ea' dei' God nafelana nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
44004011	Basef amama mail Buk Baibeli ma aman anama ma'i, ‘Owap anama ipe' pala' ifagwi pandaiwa'mana pelefatana na'oh, dei' nandamboma nataga nape nali' nanda' ipat anama la'ifina.’
44004012	Ina anona epen la'ifina nofa'apa motanimani, owa'. Ea' anan atona. Ama ganima etap hiagoma, fowa' gani dei' wapoti' God ina nawalapa agela anona aman ma nigiambamapa nefa'apa motanimani, owa'. Ea' Anan atona.”
44004013	Amam agufumi mati Pita naloma Jon maitu la'ifim ma'i basef amama. Ea' agufumi mogawa amam biam ina manda' skul, owa'. Amam lelaimi atom. Ea' amam agufumi ukup mohafel kwapete'am ukup matamea ma amam. Ea' mogawa amam biam ma'i fowa' mape maloma Jisas.
44004014	Ea' agufumi Judai amama mati aman anama nali' bo'wagah mondala'anai dei' nataga bo'ona naitu naloma Pita naloma Jon. Ea' amam ina ma'i anom basef magwamamam amam biam, owa'.
44004015	Ea' ma'ipa amam biam ma mokwaha ipat anama mandakolasanai muwis ande'. Amam biam mawis ande', amam atom ma'i basef mandame'mam ma'i,
44004016	“Afa' nambimb ata' onda' amam amama biam wi'imama ma osopama malogof? Dei' main, amam manda' maol la'ifinai si'i God nanda'anai ea' epes hiesi sape Jerusalemi sogawam. Afa' ina la'ififa ma ombaso'mas wi'i, ‘Amam ina manda' maol anama’, owa'.
44004017	Afa' wi'i basef la'ifimi ma amam biam ina ata' mi'ipasa basef wapoti' enis epesa agel anama, owa'. Na'ama basef amama mefe'agon hi'ilagona esis amam nematawa hiesi.”
44004018	Ea' agufumi motanima mofala amam biam mawisi wapoti' ma'ipam basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Ipe' bipa ina ata' pi'ipasa basef amama ma agel Jisasi, ina ata' piwalipasa agel Jisasi ma enis amam nematawa, owa'.”
44004019	Ea' Pita naloma Jon magwama basef ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha basef Godi ma ugi'ma basef ipe'imi, na'amai andeande'ma naep Godi? Ipe' ata' ukup mondanda'ma amama pegawam pewalogam.
44004020	Afa' biafa ina feso'mafa malogof, owa'. Afa' owalapa basef hiami ma amamaga watolom wame'am.”
44004021	-
44004022	Ea' agufumi mowatania anom basef la'ifimi ma'ipam amam biam ma mosopama malogof, ea' makwahom mafe'. Esis hiesi safela agel God lu'una ma amamaga amama sati amam biam manda'ami. Na'ama agufumi amama Judai ina mati anom basef ofagema ma mose'ama nimanimi amam, owa'. Aman anama amam biam manda'ana nataga bo'ona, afagof ananimi mikila' 40-peleim.
44004023	Agufumi Judai matagaha amam biam motanima mafe'ma esis sombale'efanai, ea' ma'ipasa basef hiami amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai ma'ipamami.
44004024	Esis same'am ea', hiesi ukup etifim sanda' beten safela agel Godi na'ama sa'i, “Dembinai, ine' nahapila ilif etapi, ine' nanda' etap otaga naoh maloma amamaga amama hiami mape.
44004025	Fowa' gani ine' nanda' akunamapa ape'inai Devit na'i basef. Anan nanda' maol ine'inai ea' Ambal Bu'unai Ine'inai nafelona nahali'as na'i, ‘Dei' maina esis owa' Judaisi ukup wandafum endilisi? Dei' maina esis epes hiesi ukup aom endilisi ma Dembinai? Owa'. Esis ina la'ifis, owa'.
44004026	Amam king ganima etap hiagoma mandandombol maloma amam agufumi mandatama mape etifigin manda' wandafa motofa dembinai God noloma Krais Dembinai, God nondandepana nosapa'ana nifi'i. Owa', ina la'ifim.’
44004027	Herot naloma Pontius Pailat maloma enis epes hiesi owa' Judaisi saloma esis Israel saila basef amama Deviti sanda' kolas wambel anama atona sasombala basef Jisasi, aman anama bu'unai nanda' maol ine'inai, fowa' gani nesahe'ana ea'.
44004028	Esis sandakolas sape etifigina sonda' amamaga hiami si'i fowa' gani ine' la'ifina okom ine'inai na'i neataga dei'.
44004029	Dembinai, ine' okom nepoma basef hiami wandafumi esis sa'iami ea' nigiambama afa' wanda' maol ine'inai. Nenda'am na'ama ma afa' otaga la'ififa endilisi owalapa basef ine'imi, ma afa' ina umbamahafa, owa'
44004030	Ine' newamona lagof ine'imi nihi'amba esis ine' la'ifinai ma nigiambama esis awes nanda'asi sotaga bo'wes wapoti'. Ea' nenda' pepel ine'inai neloma ikwaf naninani la'ifinai ma agel Jisasi, Anan bu'unai nanda'mena maoli.”
44004031	Esis sanda' betena ea', same' ipat anama sapeinai nandakoto'. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi si'inama esis hiesi sataga la'ifis ea' sawalapa basef Godi. Esis ina umbamahasa amam agufumi Judai, owa'.
44004032	Epes hiesi sombale'efi ukup etifim. Ina enin epen atitin nati anom amamaga ananimi atom, owa'. Amamaga hiami asasimi, amama esis hiesi.
44004033	Amam aposel mawalapa basef ma'ipasama Jisas Dembinai ape'inai notanima nohafel, ea' basef amamumi la'ifim endilisi. Ea' God nagiambamas endilisi ma epes isima hiesi sombale'efana.
44004034	Esis sandagigiambanama etin. Ea' ina enin epen atitin la'afena esis amamaga gwa'aimi maim a'an, owa'. Esis hiesi ofagesa etapi ifagwi, esis sase'asam enis epes satalom sase'asa otamba. Ea' sofa'ai otamba amama safi'i,
44004035	sase' amam aposel. Ea' amam manda'am maso' isima gwa'aimi hiahaom a'asi.
44004036	Ea' anona aman agel ananinai Josep amam aposel manda'mana anona agel Barnabas. Agel anama ofagena na'ama, “Epen nenda' ukup epesi la'ifim.” Anan anona Livai, aman anama ailan Saiprusinai.
44004037	Anan nase'asa etap ananinai enis epes satalona sase'ana otamba nofa'am nafi'i naso' amam aposel.
44005001	Anona aman agilinama Ananaias, anan nape naloma waulu'mana anani'wi Safaira. Anan nase'asa anona etap asasinai enis epes satalona.
44005002	Ea' nofa' otamba tu'wanim atom nase'amama aposel, tu'wanim ma'oma esis. Anan nambaso'ma amam na'i otamba ea' ma'um nase'amama si'im. Waulu'mana wapoti' kogawa amama.
44005003	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias, ine' na'i a'e ma Satan nafi'i nawis nape si'ina ma okom ine'inai ma dei' nambaso'ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nambaho' otamba tu'wanim ma etap anama?
44005004	Fowa' esis ata' owa' sotala etap, nogota anama ata' etap ine'inai atona. Ama dei' satalona ea', otamba ine'imi nimafiam. Dei' maina ine' okom na'i waf anama aonai? Ina nambaso'ma afa' atofa, owa'. Ine' nambaso'ma God.”
44005005	Ananaias name' basef amama, nowa etap afuna. Ea' esis same' basef amama ma naga', umbamahas kwapete' endilisi.
44005006	Ea' anom amam so'umi mafi'i mofa' alop ananinai mowa'ana lowaf mofa'ana mafe' mawana.
44005007	Ama nogota bandana awa wenifin nafe', akwa'w waulu'mana kwafi'i kwawisi. Akwa'w ina kogawa amamaga matagama anan, owa'.
44005008	Ea' Pita na'ipakw na'i, “Ipe' pefa' moni anama nandahama etap anama ea' ma'una?” Ea' akwa'w kwambaso'mana kwa'i, “Ma'una anama atona.”
44005009	Ea' Pita na'ipakw na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' bipa pa'i basef baso'maimi pandame'mam pambaso'ma Ambal Bu'unai Dembinai? Neme'! Amam amama mefa' waulunamena ine'inai mafe' mawana, amam mafi'i maitu uta. Atuwasi mofa' ine' wapoti' nigi'mana nefe'!”
44005010	Ea' mehip akwa'w kowa etap felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai afu'w. Ea' amam so'umi mawisi nomon mati akwa'w afu'w ea' mofa'akw mafe' mawa'w felefele'ma waulunama'w akwa'unai.
44005011	Ea' esis Kristen hiesi saloma esis amam nematawa same' basefa amamaga amama, ea' umbamahas kwapete'!
44005012	Amam aposel manda' pepel naninani hianai si'i God nanda'anai la'afena esis amam nematawa. Ea' epes isima hiesi sombale'efanai ukup etifim sandatama etifigin sape atogon ilaf ipat Solomoni felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai.
44005013	Enis amam nematawa hiesi umbamahas, ea' ina safi'i sandatama etifigin salomas, owa'. Ea' isima sape ande'i safela agof esis Kristeni sa'i esis epes bu'wasi.
44005014	Ea' enis amam nematawa hiesi sombale'efa dembinai, ea' safi'i timbi tambel sawisa epes hiesi Ananisi la'ela'ef sape.
44005015	Esis saloma enis epes wapoti' sati pepel anama amam aposel manda'anai. Ea' sofa' awesisi safi'i sambe'as sa'oh ande' eaf, salas balatagw mamumami sofa'as safi'i. Esis ukup ma'i, i'i Pita ina nefe'ma esis, ea' hapaimi. Esis sa'i owaf nonda' ambal ananinai atona nefe' naolo'mas.
44005016	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi wambel hiagoma sape felefele'ma Jerusalemi wapoti' safi'i sandatama etifigin salomas. Esis sofa'ai awesisi safi'i salomai epes isima ambagof awami mapaisi mahambombagasi. Ea' epes isima hiesi sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
44005017	Ea' pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami naloma amam amama hiami alupumi ananimi amam Sadyusi, amam kowalam endilisi ma maol bu'unai amam aposel manda'anai. Dei' main amam mati esis hiesi saila basef amamumi.
44005018	Amama atom dei' amam mohafel mombalo' amam aposel mase'am kalabus lu'wami.
44005019	Ea' owamb anona ensel Dembinai nafi'i nawisi' uta lu'unai endalelemba kalabus ea' nafelai amam aposel mawisi ande' na'i,
44005020	“Ipe' fo'o pitu ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai nomon pewalapa basefa amam nematawa hiesi ma waf hianai dambainai ma ambal namunai.”
44005021	Ea' amam aposel mame' basef amama, kuhimbita mafe' ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai ma'ipa esis amam nematawa. Pris anama dembinai naloma amam alupumi ananimi mafi'i mofalai agufumi hiami Israeli mafi'i mandakolas etifigin. Ea' masapa' basef mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, mofa'ai amam aposel mafi'i.
44005022	Ea' amam plisman mafe' ipat sanda' kalabusa, ina mati amam aposel, owa'. Ea' motanima mafe' ma'ipa amam dambami ma'i,
44005023	“Afa' wati uta ipat kalabusi sowalowana la'ifina, ea' amam plisman mumafianai maitu mumafi utagw hiami andeande'. Afa' wawisi' uta wawis nomon, ina wati enin epen, owa'.”
44005024	Ea' kepten numafi ipat Godi naloma amam pris dambami mome' basef amama ea' nomonas matamea hiahias ma'i, “Maim amama atuwasi dei' motaga?”
44005025	Amam mape nomonas matamea mafe', anona aman nafi'i nataga na'ipam na'i, “Peme', amam amama ipe' panda'am mape kalabusi dei' maitu nomon felefele'ma ipat lu'unai Godi ma'ipasa basef esis amam nematawa.”
44005026	Ea' kepten naloma amam plisman mafe' mofa'ai amam aposel mafi'i. Ea' amam ina maham, owa'. Amam umbamaham ma'i, “Na'ama esis amam nematawa sokwaha otamba sohafa.”
44005027	Amam mofa'ai amam aposel maitu naep amam dambami esis Judai la'afen. Ea' pris anama dembinai nape nali'ma amam prisi na'ipam na'i,
44005028	“Afa' wa'ipipa basef la'ifimi wa'i ipe' ina pewalapa basef pi'ipasam amam nematawa ma agel anama, owa'. Ea' ipe' panda' basef amama mape mafe'agon hi'alogon Jerusalem asi'igina basef ipe'imi. Ea' pa'i basef mailafa pa'i ofagema afa'imi, afa' waha aman anama naga'.”
44005029	Ea' Pita naloma amam aposel magwa basef ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' ina ugi'ma basef epesi, owa'. Afa' ugi'ma basef Godi atom.
44005030	Ipe' paunda Jisas lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' pahana naga'. Ea' God anama bafapapa ape' Juda manda' lotumanai nafelona nohafel wapoti' hi'agif.
44005031	Ea' God nofa'ana nalata ilif nahaponana nape lagel da'isinai ananinai. Ea' nape agilinai ma nigiambama ape' Israel hiapai. Anan na'i nofa'apa ma momboma opalef mila God nokwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
44005032	Dei' afa' waloma Ambal Bu'unai Godi wawalapa basefa amamaga amama hiemi afa' watolom ogawami. God nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ea' ma amam nematawa saila basef ananimi.”
44005033	Amam mame' basef amama, ukup wandafum kwapete'am endilisi ma'i moha amam aposel moga'.
44005034	Ea' anona dembinai naitu la'afena amam dambami esis Judai, anan Farisi agilinama Gameliel anan dembinai tisa mawalipasa mi'uli Godi, ea' esis amam nematawa sanifela agel ananinai. Na'ipa amama mokwaha amam aposel miowis ande' nogota bandana.
44005035	Ea' na'ipa amam dambami Juda na'i, “Ipe' amam Israelipei, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma amam amama. Ipe' ata' ukup mi'i andeande' pili'.
44005036	Ipe' pegawa nogota anama fowa', anona aman Teudas nohafel na'i, ‘Ae' aman dembiwei, agiliwei.’ Ea' amam hiami felefele' ma 400-peleim mafe' mailana. Ea' enis epes sahana naga' ea' amam mombale'efanai mafa' mafe' atona etin. Ea' maol amamunai nowala.
44005037	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nogota anama gavman nofa'asa agof esis amam nematawa hiesi, anona aman Judas Galilinai nohafel nambomefa ukup enis epes hiesi. Ea' safe' sailana safela wandaf sapa' saloma gavman sa'i sogalo'mana. Ea' sahana naga' wapoti' ea' epes isima hiesi sombale'efanai safa' safe' atona etin hi'alas.
44005038	Na'ama dei' ae' a'ipipa, ipe' umbamehepama amam amama pekwahom mopano. I'i amam monda' maola epes etis, nambimb maol anama aonai nowala si'i maol amam biam do'ok ali' a'ipipami.
44005039	Ea' i'i God atona nonda' amam la'ifima basef amama, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipama pesopama amam, owa'. Na'ama ipe' pepa' peloma God!”
44005040	Ea' amam dambami Juda maila basef Gamelieli ma'i, “Afa' oham etin.” Ea' mofala amam aposel mafi'i, ma'ipa amam plismana moham. Ea' ma'ipam basef la'ifimi ma'i, “Ipe' ina ata' pi'i basef amama ma agel Jisasi wapoti', owa'.” Ea' makwaha amam mafe'.
44005041	Ea' amam aposel makwaha amam dambami Juda mumafi koti ea' mafe' mawis ande'. Manifela God na'i aho'ma mofa' nimanimi ma agel Jisasi.
44005042	Amam ina makwaha maol anama mawalipasa basef bu'wami ma Jisas Anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, owa'. Nimeguf hiami amam mawalipa esis amam nematawa hiesi ipat lu'unai Godi, ifagw asasimi wapoti'.
44006001	Nogota anama esis alupusi saila Jisasi sataga hias endilisi. Ea' esis Juda hiesi enis sa'i diga Griki safitap saloma enis Juda sa'i diga Hibrui ea' sa'i, “Nimeguf hiami ipe' pagiambama esis amam nematawa isima gwa'aimi maim a'asi, ea' anowa nematawa alifiwai ape'iwai owa'.”
44006002	Ea' amam aposel 12-peleim mati nimanimi amama ea' mofalai esis alupusi isima hiesi safi'i ma'ipas ma'i, “I'i afa' okwaha maol anama owalipasa basef Godi ma otambe'am gwa'aimi, na'ama ina andeande', owa'.
44006003	Ipe' Kristen alupipei, ipe' ata' pendandepa anom amam 7-peleim la'afena ipe' mape andeande'ma naep esis amam nematawai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape napaim si'inama amam nomonas bu'wami mapaimi. Ama afa' onda'am mopoma mumafi maol anama.
44006004	Ea' afa' opoma onda' beten etin ea' wi'ipasa basef Godi amam nematawa wigiambamas.”
44006005	Amam nematawa hiesi ukup ma'i basef amama. Ea' sandandepa Stiven, anan nembale'efa Jisasi ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina nape si'inamana. Ea' sandandepa Filip naloma Prokorus maloma Nikanor naloma Timon naloma Parmenas naloma Nikolas. Aman anama Nikolas Antiokinai, fowa' nafi'i naila waf esis Judai.
44006006	Ea' esis hiesi sanda' amam amama maitu felefele'ma naep amam aposeli mawamona lagofa amam manda'mam betena monda' maol anama.
44006007	Ea' basef Godi mafe'agon hi'alogon. Amam nematawa hiesi sape Jerusalemi sataga alupusi Jisasi sataga hias endilisi. Ea' pris amama hiami wapoti' mombale'efa Jisas mailana.
44006008	God nandahowema Stiven nagiambamana. Ea' nanda'ana la'ifina, nanda' ikwaf la'ifinai hianai naninani la'afena esis amam nematawa.
44006009	Ea' anom amam mohafel ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Stiven. Amam amama fowa' manda' maol mape owina enis epes ea' dei' mape wafifim. Ea' sofalana amam wambel Sairini naloma Aleksandria anona etap hiagoma Silisia naloma etap hiagoma Esia.
44006010	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'ana gawa bu'unai Stiven. Amam amama hiami ma'i basef mandahihianama maloma Stiven ea' amam ina la'ifima mi'i basef mikila'ana, owa'.
44006011	Ea' manda' anona waf baso'maimi ma moha Stiven noga'. Ea' mofa'ai anom amam mase'am anama otamba ma'i basef ma'i, “Afa' wame' anan na'i basef nanda' Moses findiwana ea' nanda' God findiwana wapoti'.”
44006012	Ea' amam mafela opalef esis amam nematawai saloma amam agufumi asasimi maloma amam mawalipasa mi'uli Godi. Ea' esis safe'ma Stiven sombalo'ana sofa'ana safe'ma amam dambami Juda mumafi koti.
44006013	Ea' sanda' anom amam maitu ma mambaso'mana ma anom basef baso'maimi. Amam amama ma'i, “La'ela'ef aman anama na'i basef awami ma ipat lu'unai Godi naloma mi'uli fowa' gani God na'ipa Mosesanai.
44006014	Ape' mame' anan na'i, ‘Aman anama Jisas Nasaretinai nambimb nohambombaga ipat anama lu'unai Godi ea' nonda' anona waf dambainai noho'ofa waf hianai fowa' gani Moses na'ipapanai.’ ”
44006015	Ea' amam hiami manda' kolas etifigin ipat esis Juda sanda' kotanai mati Stiven ea' mati amaga ananinai nafifil nataga si'i amaga anona enseli.
44007001	Ea' pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami nahali' Stiven na'i, “Basef amama endilisi?”
44007002	Ea' Stiven na'ipama basef na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan paloma ipe' ahape wapoti' ipe' peme' ae'. Fowa' gani bafalomafa afa'inai Abraham nape etap hiagoma Mesopotamia ina dei' nafe' wambel Haran, ata' owa'. Nogota anama God Dembinai nihi'ambana nafifili howalagon ea' natagamana.
44007003	Ea' God na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nekwaha wambel etap ine'inai neloma sahin owan ine'isi nefe' anagon laogoma nepe anona etap hiagoma ae' a'i ihi'ambenagoma.’
44007004	Ea' dei' Abraham nakwaha etap hiagoma Kaldia ea' nafe' nafe' nataga nape wambel Haran. Ahalomana ananinai naga' ea' God nasapa'ana nafi'i nape etap anae' dei' ape' mapeinai.
44007005	God ina dei' nase'ana anona etap anama Abraham ma nefa'ana, ata' owa'. Anona etap kwaie'una wapoti', owa'. Ea' God na'i basef endilisimi atoma anona nemaf owagama anan ea' nose'ana etap anama anona nefa'ana noloma esis bafasana ananisi owagama sigi' seatagai sefa'ana ea' sepaina. Nogota anama Abraham so'uso'win ata' a'ana God na'ipana basef amama.
44007006	Na'ipana na'i, ‘Wombota bafasena ine'isi owagama sigi seatagai sope anona etap enis epesi. Ea' epes hiesi isima enis owagama sonda' epes hiesi ine'isi aowes sonda' maol ahifinai agof a'as sope owina esis ea' sonda'as kwapete'as sope sefe' sotaga nogota launai afagof 400-peleim.
44007007	Ea' anona nemaf ae' egwamasa waf aonai esis Isip sonda'as kwapete'asi.’ Ea' God na'i, ‘Anona nemaf owagama wapoti' epes isima hiesi ine'isi sokwaha etap anama hiagoma sifi'i sope sonda' lotuma ae' etap anae'.’
44007008	Ea' God na'ipa Abraham basef la'ifimi endilisi ma Abraham notopa' alop ananinai. Ea' Abraham name' basef amama nailam natopa' alop ananinai ea' nola Aisak nogalomana ananinai ma nataga nimeguf 8-peleim, ea' Abraham natopa'mana alop ananinai. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' Aisak nataga ahalomana Jekopi, ea' Jekop ahalomana bafapapa amama dambami 12-peleim.
44007009	Amam bafapapa 11-peleim nomonas aom kowalama Josep. Na'ama masapa'ana mafe' mofa' otambana enis epes Isip sao'wana nafe' nanda' maol aonai agel a'ana nape owina esis. Ea' sofa'ana safe' hiagoma Isip. Ea' God nape nalomana.
44007010	Anan nagiambamana nahagofam nimanimi hiami ananimi nape bo'ona. Nemaf anama anan na'i basef naloma king Isipinai Fero, God nase'ana gawa bu'unai na'i basef nalomana ma nanda' king Fero okom nainailana. Ea' dei' king anama nanda'ana nataga nape dembinai gavmana etap hiagoma Isip ea' numafi amamaga hiami ma ipat anan kingi wapoti'.
44007011	Anom nimeguf mafe' ea', nolomahas lu'unai nataga etap hiagoma Isip anama hiagoma nafe'agon hi'alagon nafe' nataga etap hiagoma Kenan wapoti' ea' esis sefa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' esis bafasapa ape'isi sape Kenani ina ata' sofa' anom gwa'aimi, owa'.
44007012	Ea' Jekop name' basef sa'i gwa'aimi ma'oh gani etap hiagoma Isip. Ea' nasapa' amam bafapapa ape'imi mali' mafe' dambadamba.
44007013	Ea' magi' motanima mafe'ma bif ea' Josep na'ipa amam sahopam ananimi na'i, ‘Ae' Josep.’ Dei' king nogawa amam wambota Josepi mafi'i.
44007014	Ea' Josep nasapa' basef mafe' nofalai ahalomana Jekop nakwaha etap anama lu'unai Kenan nagi'mana nafe' Isip naloma esis wambota ananinai hiesi sataga 75-peleis.
44007015	Na'ama Jekop nakini' Isip naloma bafapapa ape'imi. Anom afagof mafe' ea', amam maga'.
44007016	Amam maga' ea', sefa'am sotanima safe' wambel Sekem sawam hi'agif anama fowa' gani Abraham nakwana otamba natalogoma ma awasi Hemoi.
44007017	Felefele'ma nemaf anama God na'i basef ananimi fowa' na'ipa Abraham ami mataga alihim, epes ape'isi Israel sataga amam nematawa hiesi endilisi sape etap anama hiagoma Isip.
44007018	Ea' anona aman dambainai nataga dembinai king Isipunai, anan ina nogawa fowa' Josep nape dembinai ma Isip, owa'.
44007019	King anama nambaso'mas nase'asa maol ahifinai ma epes hiesi ape'isi. Anan nanda' waf aonai ma esis bafasapa ape'isi, anan la'ifina endilisi na'i esis sokwaha awasi asasisi sope ande' ma afis.
44007020	Nogota anama Moses mama'wana kolana. Anan so'uso'win bu'unai endilisi. Ea' mamasana sumafiana andeande' ipat asasinai ma aomb wanom.
44007021	Ea' sofa'ana safe' sambaho'ana na'oh aolop ande'. Ea' king Fero nogamana anani'wi kwafi'i kwatolona kofa'ana nape si'i nogaloma'w akwa'unai endilisi.
44007022	Ea' Moses nanda' skul nefa' gawa hianai esis Isipi ea' nataga aman dembinai nanda' maol naninani na'i basef la'ifimi ma seme'am sailam.
44007023	Moses nape dambena ma afagof 40-peleim ea', okom na'i esis wambota ananinai Israel ea' nafe' natilis.
44007024	Nati anona Isipinai naha anona Israelinai nanda'ana kwapete'ana endilisi. Ea' nagiambama Israelinai naha aman anama Isipinai afuna.
44007025	Ea' anan okom na'i 'Epes ae'asi nambimb sogawa God nagiambama ape' ma lagof Mosesi ma nokwahepa mope andeande'.’ Owa'. Esis ina sagawa God nandandepa Mosesa nigiambamas, owa'.
44007026	Wafilu Moses notanima nafe' natilis wapoti' ea' nati anom biam amam atom Israel mapa' wapoti'. Ea' nohape'am na'ipam na'i, ‘Ipe' etipa sahalomana owalomana penda'am na'ama owa'. Dei' maina ipe' pahambomaga ipe' etipa?’
44007027	Ea' aman anama naha anona aman Isrelinai na'ipa Moses na'i, ‘Emi na'ipina ma nepe dembinai ma newaloga afa'?
44007028	A'i ine' na'i nehe si'i nambati' naha aman anama Isipinai naga'?’
44007029	Moses neme'ana na'ama, anan umbamahana nafa' nafe' anona etap hiagoma Midian laogoma. Nakwaha wambel ananinai nafe' nailas nape naloma esis Midian ea' nase' nemata'w nola awasi bias.
44007030	Afagof 40-peleim mafe'ma ea', anona ensel Dembinai natagamana anona etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma felefele'ma halaf Sainai. Ensel nape nomona nif ilelowa fandom mataga anona lawag so'unai.
44007031	Ea' Moses natolom okom ananinai natanea ma amama. Ea' nafe' felefele'ma natolom andeande', Dembinai na'ipana na'i,
44007032	‘Ae' God amam bafapena ine'imi manda' lotumei. Ae' God Abraham naloma Aisak Jekop fowa' gani manda' lotumei.’ Ea' Moses gegelalasana umbamahana ma natologon.
44007033	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Tagaha su mape bo'wagah ine'imi. Etap anae' ine' dei' naituma etap ae'anai.
44007034	Ae' ati amam nematawa hiesi ae'asi sefa' nimanimi lu'wami etap anama hiagoma Isip. Ae' ame' lef asasinai ea' dei' bo'wes isila'i ma igiambamasa etofa nimanimi amama asasimi sope. Na'ama dei' ine' hafel. Ae' a'i esapa'ena netanima nefe' Isip.’
44007035	Moses aman anama atona fowa' sosambalana sa'i, ‘Emi na'i ine' nepe dembinai ma newalogapa?’ Dei' aman anama atona God nasapa'ana nafe' si'i dembinai ma numafias nofa'as sotanimani. God nanda'ana la'ifina ma anama ensel natagamana nalomana na'i ma lawag anama so'unai.
44007036	Moses nao'was safe' sakwaha Isip, nanda' pepel naninani ma ikwaf naninani si'i God nanda'anai ma etap hiagoma Isip ea' naoh embel akwahimi ea' anama etap wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma ma afagof amama 40-peleim.
44007037	Moses aman anama ma'una anan na'ipa esis Israel na'i, ‘Anona nemaf God nosapa' anona sahalomepa ipe'inai nonda'ana nope profet si'i ae'.’
44007038	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', esis Israel safe' sandakolas etifigin anama wafiguma fatauguma Moses aman anama atona nape nalomas. Anan nape naloma bafapapa ape'imi wapoti'. Anan nape naloma ensel anama nase'ana basef Godi halaf anama Sainai ea' nofa' basef amama ambal namunai na'ipapa.
44007039	Ea' bafasapa ape'isi sandaiwa'ma some' basef ananimi, owa'. Esis sosambalona ea' sa'i sotanima sefe' Isip ukup maimailagon.
44007040	Ea' sa'ipa aman anama Aron sa'i, ‘Aman anama Moses nofa'apai Isip mafi'i, ina mogawana nafe' nape eti? Ea' ine' da'mapa anona god baso'amunai ape'inai ma anan nope numafiapa.’
44007041	Nemaf anama esis sanda' anona bulmakau ea' sondolalima god anama baso'amunai. Ea' sandanifel ma god anama sanda'ana lagof asasimi atom.
44007042	Ea' God nase'asa alafuga esis nakwaha esisa sonda' lotu sefela agofa aon owambunai alipunai maloma ondowa, si'i basef mape buk profeti ma'iam ma'i, ‘Ipe' epes Israel, ipe' paha bulmakau maloma sipsip pendolali ma ae' pape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma afagof 40-peleim? Owa'!
44007043	Ipe' pefa' ipat selinai panda' lotuma Molokanai, ea' pefa'ana naloma ikwaf si'i ondo'w god baso'amunai Refani, ambagof god baso'amunai hianai ipe' panda'ana panda' lotumana. Na'ama anona nemaf ae' egalo'mepa pefe' pepe laogoma peloma wambel Babilon gani wa'ol.’
44007044	Fowa' gani bafasapa ape'isi sape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma, nogota anama sowalo'a sel si'i ipat sanda' lotuwanai. Ipat anama nihi'ambapa anama God napainai. Ipat anama God na'ipasa basef ananimi. Esis sala' ipat anama selinai nandahama ikwaf anama God fowa' nihi'amba Mosesanai. God na'ipana ma nanda'ana na'ama etin.
44007045	Ea' amam bafapapa ape'imi mafi'i maloma Josua ma mofa' etap lu'unai enis epesi. Ea' God nagalopa esisa naep esis bafasapa ape'isi. Nemaf anama sofa'ai ipat anama selinai, sanda'ana na'ae la'ela'ef nape nafi'i nafi'i nogota Devit nataga king.
44007046	Devit nanda' waf bu'unai ma God nagiambamana nanda'ana la'ifina. Ea' nanda' betena Goda anan na'i howalagon anona ipat bu'unai ma God anama fowa' gani Jekop nanda' lotumanai.
44007047	Ea' nogalomana Solomon nanda' ipat anama lu'unai Godi nala'ana.
44007048	Owa'. Dembinai Edilisinai ina nape ifagw amama epes sala'am lagof asasimi, owa'. Basef amama mail Buk Baibeli si'i anona profet na'iam na'i,
44007049	‘Dembinai na'i na'ama na'i, “Heven si'i balata Ae' apeinai, etap anae' Ae' ahapona bo'wagah matomama. Maina ipat nambimb pelana ma Ae'? Owa'. Ae' ina epoma noma'w ipat anama. Owa'.
44007050	Lagof ae'ami atom anda' amamaga amama hiami hi'alam,” ’
44007051	Ipe' epes pesambala basefi. Ipe' owa' pegawa basef Godi si'i enis epes owa' sogawa Godi. Ipe' pandaiwa' ma peme' basef Godi ma opalef aligah ipe'imi. La'ela'ef ipe' pesambala Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ipe' panda'am na'ama etin si'i fowa' gani bafasepa ehasepa ipe'isi sanda'am.
44007052	Amam profet hiami fowa' gani mapani esis akusepa ipe'isi sanda' waf aonai ma amam hiami saham sanda'am aom. Saha amam profet ma'ipasa Aman Bu'unai anona nemaf neafi'i. Ea' dei' ipe' pawalapana ma amam naumbih mahana naga' ea'.
44007053	Fowa' gani God nase'epa mi'uli ananinai ipe'. Ea' amam ensel atom ma'ipipa mi'uli anama, ea' ipe' ina pame'ana pailana, owa'.”
44007054	Amam mame' basef amama maha opalef amamumi endilisi. Amam mona' nalelef tilili telele' ukup wandafum endilisi ma Stiven.
44007055	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina endilisi, naniga nati heven ilif. Nati nafifili Godi ea' nati Jisas naitu lagel da'isinai Godi.
44007056	Ea' Stiven na'ipam na'i, “Peme'! Ae' ati heven nandawisi' ea' Dembinai nataga epen endilisinai naitu lagel da'isinai Godi.”
44007057	Ea' amam ma'i basef la'ifimi mehip endilisi masopama aligah amamumi mandaiwa'ma mome' basef amama. Ea' mohafel masagih mafe' etin mombalo' Stiven.
44007058	Ea' mogwasi'ana nawis ande'. Amam do'ok mali' mambaso'mana basefi mowalia siaogw amamumi mambe'am wa'ol felefele'ma anona aman so'unai naituma agilinama Sol. Mowaliam ma'oh mokwaha otamba mehip maha Stiven.
44007059	Makwaha otamba mahana etin, nanda' beten na'ama na'i, “Dembinai Jisas, ine' fa'ago ambal ae'anai!”
44007060	Ea' nindiwa nembawa notawa na'i mehip na'i, “Dembinai, ine' owa' negwamama waf anama aonai ma amam, owa'.” Stiven na'iam na'ama, ea' naga'.
44008001	Ea' Sol okom atotona naloma amam maha Stiven naga'i. Nogota anama esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'ma esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi, sahas sase'asa nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' amama atom dei' esis sombale'efanai safa' safe' anama etap hiagoma Judia naloma Samaria. Ea' amam aposel atom ata' mapani la'ela'ef Jerusalem.
44008002	Anom amam maila waf Godi andeande'i mofa' Stiven mawana malopana endilisi.
44008003	Ea' Sol nafela maol nanda'ana naha esis Kristen. Anan nafe' nawis ifagw hiami atona etin nofa'ai amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efa Kraisi. Ea' nahonde'as nofa'as nafe' nanda'as sanda' kalabus.
44008004	Esis Kristen safa' safe' wambel hiagoma sawalapa basef bu'wami Godi sa'ipasam.
44008005	Ea' Filip nowala nafe' anona wambel etap hiagoma Samaria nawalipasa basef bu'wami na'i Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.
44008006	Amam nematawa hiesi same' basefa anan ea' sati ikwaf la'ifinai hianai naninani anan nanda'anai ea' seme'am andeande'ma basef ananimi.
44008007	Ikwaf anama na'ama. Amam nematawa hiesi ambagof awami mapaisi, ambagof amama malef wigo' kwapete'am endilisi ea' makwaha esis mawisi mafa' mafe'. Ea' epes isima lagof bo'wagah awamisi, enis isima bihiguf mondala'asi, esis hiesi sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
44008008	Ea' dei' esis wambel anama sofa' danifel lu'unai.
44008009	Ea' anona aman nape wambel anama agilinama Saimon. Aman anama fowa' nanda' ambagofi nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nataga dei' nemaf anama. Ea' nanda' ukup esis amam nematawa Samariaisi ukup matamea mafe'. Anan Saimon na'iam na'i, “Ae' aman dembiwei.”
44008010	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi agof a'asi saloma agufisi, esis hiesi seme'am andeande' basef Saimoni. Sa'iam sa'i, “Aman anama anan nofa' pepel anama dembinai Godi sofalana sa'i pepel lu'unai.”
44008011	Ea' esis la'ifisa saila basef ananimi. Dei' main, nimeguf hiami anan nanda' waf naninani hianai la'ifinai nanda' ambagof nahapila mu'uhup. Ea' satolom ukup matamea mafe'.
44008012	Ea' Filip nawalipasa basef bu'wami esis hiesi. Nawalipasa agel Jisas Kraisi ma siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' sombale'efa basef amama sofa' baptais. Esis amam nematawa wapoti'.
44008013	Ea' aman anama Saimon wapoti' nembale'efa Jisas ea' nofa' baptais nape naloma Filip. Anan nati Filip nanda' ikwaf anama la'ifinai naninani ea' okom natanea nafe'.
44008014	Amam aposel mape Jerusalemi mame' basefa esis Samaria sefa' basef Godi. Na'ama masapa' Pita naloma Jon mafe'ma esis.
44008015	Amam biam mafi'i mataga manda' betena God nigiambamasa sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai.
44008016	Dei' main, Ambal Godi ina dei' nape nalomas, ata' owa'. Esis sofa' baptais etina agel Dembinai Jisas.
44008017	Ea' amam biam mawamona lagofa esis ea' sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napais.
44008018	Ea' Saimon nati aposel amama biam mawamona lagof atoma esis sofa' Ambal Godi. Na'ama anan nofa' moni ananinai nafi'mai amam na'ipam na'i,
44008019	“Ipe' bipa pese'e pepel anama ma ae' wapoti' ma ae' i'i ewamona lagofa enin epen, nefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi.”
44008020	Ea' Pita nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Ae' a'i otamba ine'imi moloma ine' pefe' wambel aonai hel. Amamaga bu'wami God nase'asam etin si'i presen, amama ine' okom na'i wilama netalom otamba ine'imi? Owa'.
44008021	Ine' owa' bo'wena neanda' maol anama Godi afa' wanda'anai. Owa'! Dei' main, okom ine'inai ina bo'onama naep Godi, owa'.
44008022	Ine' newa' alafugama waf anama aonai ine'inai nemboma opaf nefe'ma God. Ea' nenda' betena Dembinai ma nokwaha waf aonai nape okom ine'inai.
44008023	Dei' main, ae' ati ine' kowalena endilisi ma presen bu'unai God nase'afa anai. Ea' ae' egawena, waf anama aonai nembale'ena la'ela'ef nape si'i kalabus.”
44008024	Ea' Saimon nagwa basef na'i, “Ipe' bipa penda' betena Dembinai ma anan nigiambame. Na'ama amama ipe' pa'iami motagame.”
44008025	Ea' Pita naloma Jon ma'ipasa basef ea' na'ipasam maloma amamaga amama Dembinai nagiambamam ea'. Ma'ipasam ea', motanima mafe' Jerusalem. Ata' nafe' eaf, mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi etap hiagoma esis Samaria.
44008026	Ea' anona ensel Dembinai na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' nefe' lambihilifinama kwa'waha Jerusalem nikini'i Gasa. Eaf anama fowa' esis safe'anai. Dei' owa'. Eaf anama nape anama wafiguma fatauguma epes a'agoma.”
44008027	Ea' Filip nohafel nafe'. Ea' natagama anona aman Itiopiainai eaf anama. Anan aman dembinai numafi otamba hiami ma kwin akwama dembe'wi gavman kumafi esis etap hiagoma Itiopia, sofala'w sa'i Kandasi. Aman anama anom amam matopa'mona alop ananinai. Nimbewa' nafi'i Jerusalema nanda' lotu,
44008028	dei' na'i notanima nefe'. Anan natoma karis ananinai si'i wilkar ea' natoma nati basef mape buk Baibeli fowa' gani profet Aisaia nanda'am ea' nafe'.
44008029	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' fo'o felefele'ma aman anama nefe' neloma karis nanima.”
44008030	Ea' Filip nasagih nafe' felefele'ma karis anama, ea' name' aman anama natalifa basef amama Aisaia nanda'ami. Ea' Filip nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' negawa basef amama ofagema dei' natalifam nafi'i?”
44008031	Ea' aman anama nagwamana basef na'i, “I'i enin epen owa' nihi'ambe, dei' egawa basef amama i'imama?” Ea' na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ine' letowi netoma karis neloma ae'.”
44008032	Basef amama tu'wanim Godi anan natalifimi ma'iama Jisas ma'i, “Esis sao'wana nafe' si'i sipsip ama sa'i sohana noga'. Anan si'i sipsip noganai esis sahapilana satopa'mana awif ananimi, tol napan. Ea' na'ama etina aman anama, ina na'i anom basef, owa'.
44008033	Esis sasambalona endilisi ea' ina sanda'mana basef andeande' ma kot ananinai, owa'. Anan awasi bafasana a'ana ma enis epes sitilis si'ipa enis epesa esis, owa'. Dei' main, sahana naga' ma ina ata' napan etap anae' wapoti', owa'.”
44008034	Ea' aman anama Ithiopianai na'ipa Filip na'i, “Ae' a'i ihali'ina. Profet anama na'i emi ma dei' nanda' basef amama? Na'iama anan atona o na'iama anona epen?”
44008035	Ea' Filip na'i basef nawalapama aman anama. Nahafel na'ipama basef amama tu'wanim Godi aman anama na'iami mafe' mafe' ea' nawalapai basef bu'wami Jisasi.
44008036	Amam biam mafe', matagama anona dumb. Ea' aman anama na'ipa Filip na'i, “Niti dumb notah anama. Ine' na'i a'e ma ae' efa' baptais?”
44008037	[Ea' Filip na'i, “I'i ine' nembale'efa Dembinai endilisi ma okom ine'inai, wila.” Ea' nagwamana basef na'i, “Ae' embale'efa Jisas Krais anan nogalomana Godi.”]
44008038	Na'iam ea', karis notawa ea' Filip naloma aman anama dembinai misila' mafe' mowala dumb anama. Ea' Filip napisi'ana.
44008039	Ea' amam biam makwaha dumb mandegiai wata'ita, mehip Ambal Bu'unai Dembinai nofa' Filip ea' nafe'. Ea' aman anama Ithiopiainai ina ata' natolona wapoti', owa'. Ea' anan nandanifel endilisi naila eaf ananinai nafe'.
44008040	Ea' Filip nafe' nataga Asdot. Anan nafe' taun anama hiagoma ganigani nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Nafe' nafe', notanima nafe' nataga taun Sisaria.
44009001	Fowa' basef amama ata' owa' motagae, nogota anama Sol nanda'am na'ama. Anan na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi ma naha esis alupusi saila Dembinai nohas soga'. Ea' nafe'ma pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami.
44009002	Na'ipana ea' pris anama nanda' basefa pas mafe'ma agufumi hiami mumafi ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi wambel Damaskus. Ea' nase'ana pasa basef amama Sol. Ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “I'i Sol niti enis amam nematawa saila eaf anama dambainai sape Damaskusi, nonda' kalabusimas nombale'as nefa'as sefe' Jerusalem.”
44009003	Ea' Sol nafe' nataga felefele'ma Damaskus, mehip anona nafifili howalagon nafi'i nisila'i heven ea' mafifimana.
44009004	Ea' nowa na'oh etap ea' name' anona maf na'ipana na'i, “Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nahambombaga ae'?”
44009005	Ea' Sol nahali'ana na'i, “Dembinai, ine' emi egafina?” Ea' maf anama na'i, “Ae' Jisas ine' nahambombaga ae'.
44009006	Dei' ine' hafel nefe' niwis taun lu'unai. Nambimb anona aman nifi'mai ine' ni'ipina amamaga ine' nambimb neanda'ami.”
44009007	Ea' amam mafe' maloma Soli mame' maf anama ea' ina mati anona epen, owa'.
44009008	Ea' Sol nohafel na'i niti, owa'. Nati owamb atona. Ea' amam mahapila lagof ananimi mofa'ana mafe' mawis Damaskus.
44009009	Anan nati owamb atona nape nimeguf wanom ea' ina na' gwa'aimi embel maim, owa'.
44009010	Ea' anona alupunai Jisasi nape na'ama Damaskus, agilinama Ananaias. Ea' na'oh nandondo'oh nati Dembinai nofalana na'ipana na'i, “Ananaias!” Ea' anan na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ape na'ae.”
44009011	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel fo'o eaf anama sa'i usi'inai nefe' ipat Judasi ea' niti anona aman Tarsusinai, agilinama Sol. Dei' anan nanda' beten nape.
44009012	Sol nali' na'oh nandondo'oh ea' nati anona aman agilinama Ananaias atuwasi nifi'i nuwisi nowamona lagofa anona nonda' naep miti andeande' wapoti'.”
44009013	Ea' Ananaias nagwamana basef na'i, “Dembinai, ae' ame' basef hiami ma epen anama, waf aonai hianai anan nanda'ana esis amam nematawa ine'isi gani Jerusalem.
44009014	Anan nofa' agel lu'unai ea' ma amam pris dambami ma nombalo' amam nematawa sanda' betena agel ine'inai wambel anae' ma nanda' kalabusimas.”
44009015	Ea' Dembinai na'ipana nasapa'ana na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Aman anama nambimb nonda' maol Ae'anai. Ae' andandepana ea' ma nefe' ni'ipasa basefa agel ae'anai enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi soloma amam dambami king asasimi moloma esis Israel wapoti'.
44009016	Nambimb ae' ihi'ambana nimanimi lu'wami nefa'ami ma nowalapa agel ae'anai. Na'ama ine' dei' fo'o netolona.”
44009017	Ea' Ananaias nafe' nawis ipat anama nomon nasa lagofa Sol na'i, “Sahalome Sol, Dembinai Jisas natagamena eaf nogota anama ine' nafi'i na'ae. Dei' nasapa'e afi'mai ine' ma niti andeande' wapoti' ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nope si'inama ine'.”
44009018	Ea' amamaga mape masopama naep Soli si'i dunduf mafe' mehip makwaha naep Soli mowa. Ea' naep ananimi mati wapoti', nohafel nofa' baptais.
44009019	Ea' na' gwa'aimi nataga la'ifina wapoti'. Sol nape anom nimeguf naloma amam alupumi Jisasi Damaskus.
44009020	Ea' dei' atef nafe' ifagw hiami esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nawalapa basef Jisasi na'i, “Jisas anan nogalomana Godi.”
44009021	Epes hiesi same' basef ananimi ea' sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i, “Aman anama nahambombaga amam nematawa sofala agel Jisasi wambel Jerusalem. Ea' dei' nafi'i na'ae ma nowa' esis nonda' kalabusimas nofa'as sefe'ma amam pris dambami. Ea' ma'una aman anama atona.”
44009022	Ea' pepel Soli nataga la'ifina nihi'amabas ma basef nawalipasami. Ea' esis Juda sape Damaskusi same' basefa anan. Esis ina la'ifisa sogwa anom basef si'ipanam, owa'. Anan la'ifina nihi'ambas endilisi na'i, “Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”
44009023	Nimeguf hiami mafe'ma ea', amam Juda ma'i basef mandame'mama moha Sol noga'.
44009024	Ea' Sol name' basef amama amamumi. Ea' amam Juda hiami mape mumafi utagw hiami ma taun anama owamb alip wapoti' ma ma'i moha Sol noga'.
44009025	Ea' amam alupumi Soli mofa'ana owamb mafe' malata endalelemb nomon. Ea' malana nape anona holaf lu'unai mapana mandelef malana nisila' endalelemb ande'.
44009026	Sol nafe' Jerusalem ea' na'i nondakolas noloma esis alupusi Jisasi. Ea' esis hiesi umbamahasana. Esis ina sombale'efana sa'i anan alupunai Jisasi, ata' owa'.
44009027	Ea' Barnabas nao'wana mafe'ma amam aposel ea' na'ipama Sol nati Dembinai eaf ma Dembinai na'ipana basef anan. Ea' Barnabas na'ipam na'i anan la'ifina nawalapa basef na'ipasama agel Jisasi Damaskus, dei' anan ina ata' umbamahana, owa'.
44009028	Ea' dei' sogawa anan wambota atona Jisasi nalomas nape la'afena esis. Anan la'ifina nanda' maol nafe' Jerusalem anama hiagoma nawalapa basefa agel Dembinai. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'.
44009029	Na'ipasa basef Godi naloma amam Juda magawa diga Griki ea' na'i basef nalomam mandahihianama. Ea' amam mandaiwa'ma basef ananimi magolopa eafa mohana noga'.
44009030	Amam Kristen sahin owan mogawa amama, ea' mofa' Sol mafe' makini Sisaria. Ea' masapa'ana nafe' nape wambel Tarsus.
44009031	Dei' esis amam nematawa Kristen sape etap anama hiagoma Judia naloma Galili naloma Samaria sape opalef awanem sape andeande' ea' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis. Esis sape owina Dembinai ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'as sataga la'ifis opalef asasimi. Ea' esis Kristen sataga hias.
44009032	Pita nafe' wambel anama hiagoma ea' nakini' nafe' taun anama Lida wapoti' nape naloma esis amam nematawa Godi sape wambel anama.
44009033	Ea' nati anona aman Inas. Alop bihiguf ananimi maga'ana, tol na'oh nala lehis nape nogota laona afagof 8-peleim.
44009034	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Inas, dei' Jisas Krais nanda'ena bo'wena wapoti'. Ine' hafel nendondomba lehis ine'imi andeande'.” Pita na'ipana ea' dei' etef nohafel.
44009035	Ea' epes hiesi wambel anama biefina Lida naloma Saron satolona samboma opalef safe'ma Dembinai.
44009036	Anona wambel Jopa ano'w nemata'w kwaila Jisasi kwape, agel akwa'unai Tabita. Diga esis Griki sofala'w sa'i Dorkas, agel anona mafin sa'i dia. La'ela'ef akwa'w kwanda' waf bu'unai ma kwagiambama esis amam nematawa kwahusi ma gwa'aimi maim.
44009037	Nemaf anama awes nanda'akw kwaga'. Ea' sasa'opa alop akwa'unai ma sowa'w. Ea' sofa'akw sambe'akw kwa'oh rum ilifanai.
44009038	Wambel Lida nape felefele' ma Jopa. Ea' esis alupusi Jisasi same' basefa Pita nape Lida, sasapa' amam biam mafe'ma anan mahali'ana na'ama ma'i, “Ine' nifi'mai afa'. Ni'i ota' ota' owa'.”
44009039	Ea' Pita nohafel nafe' nalomam, ea' mafe' mataga mofa'ana mafe' rum anama ilif akwa'w kwa'oma. Nematawa hiawai alifiwai wafi'i waitu felefele'ma Pita wape walopa'w. Ea' wihi'ambana klos sagwegw maim akwa'w Dorkas kwagundisami nimbewa' la'ela'ef ata' kwape kwalomawa.
44009040	Ea' Pita nagolo'ma esis amam nematawa sawisi ande', nindiwa nembawa notawa nanda' beten. Ea' namboma amaga ananinai nafe'ma alop nemata'wi na'i, “Tabita, ine' hafel.” Ea' akwa'w naep mati kwati Pita kohafel kwape.
44009041	Ea' Pita nahapila lagel akwa'unai nafela'w kwaitu. Ea' nofalai esis amam nematawa sombale'efa Godi saloma nematawa awama alifiwai, naso' akwa'w kotanima kwafe'ma esis.
44009042	Basef amama mafe' anama hiagoma wambel Jopa ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi same'am sombale'efa Dembinai.
44009043	Pita nape wambel anama Jopa nimeguf hiami. Anan nape naloma anona aman nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi agel ananinai Saimon.
44010001	Anona aman nape Sisaria agilinama Kornilius, anan agilinai kepten numafi soldia 100-peleim. Soldia amama hiami sofalam sa'i soldia Italimi.
44010002	Anan aman nanda' lotu naloma epes hiesi ananisi sape ipat ananinai sanda' lotu ma God. Anan nase'as moni maina esis Juda kwahusi otamba maim a'asi. Ea' la'ela'ef nanda' betena God.
44010003	Anona nemaf wambomota aon nasa 3 klok, anan nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh mape mataga alihim endilisi. Nati anona ensel Godi nafi'mai anan na'ipana na'i, “Kornilius.”
44010004	Ea' Kornilius natolona umbamahana endilisi na'i, “Dembinai, ine' na'i main?” Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “God name' beten ine'inai ea', okom na'i waf ine' nanda'anai nase'as moni maim nagiambama amam nematawa amamaga a'asi. Ea' God ata' okokomam.
44010005	Dei' ine' nesapa' anom amam mofo'o Jopa mogolopa anona aman agilinama Saimon agel wa'ana Pita. Mi'ipana nifi'i na'ae.
44010006	Aman anama nape ipat Saimoni, anan nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi. Ipat ananinai notawa felefele'ma naoh mafe' motambela.”
44010007	Ensel na'ipa Kornilius ea' nafe'. Ea' Kornilius nofalai amam biam ananimi manda'mana maoli maloma anona soldia. Soldia anama nanda' lotu ma God la'ela'ef nape nanda' maola Kornilius.
44010008	Ea' Kornilius na'ipa amam amama wanom andeande'ma basef amama hi'alam ea' nasapa'am mafe' wambel anama Jopa.
44010009	Ea' amam wanom mohafel mafe' ma'oh eaf. Lala mohafel mafe' mataga felefele'ma Jopa. Nogota anama aon nahagasom Pita nalata natoma ipat ande' ilifa nanda' beten.
44010010	Ea' nolomahana na'i nea' gwa'aimi ea' esis ata' sanda'am. Ea' anom amamaga matagamana si'i na'oh nandondo'oh.
44010011	Nati otaga ilif nandawisi' ea' anom amamaga si'i lowaf lu'unai endilisi misila'i ilif mowalai. Anom amamaga mahapila da'malifinama biefigin biefigin malana nisila'i.
44010012	Amamaga mala lowaf anama nomoni, mafis amamaga hiami, amiguf mamumami mape aolopi, maloma iguf mamumami hiami.
44010013	Ea' anona maf na'ipa Pita na'i, “Pita, ine' hafel neha mafis nea'am.”
44010014	Ea' Pita na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai, ae' owa' endilisi. Ae' ina a' anom mafis ape' Juda ma'i awami, owa'.”
44010015	Ea' maf anama na'ipana wapoti' na'i, “Amamaga God na'i bu'wami, amama ina ni'i awami, owa'.”
44010016	Amama matagamana wenif na'ama ea' mehip motanima malata otaga heven ilif wapoti'.
44010017	Ea' Pita okom natanea ma amamaga amama si'i na'oh dondo'oh, na'i, “Amama ae' atulumi ofagema main de'im?” Anan okom natanea nape ea' amam amama Kornilius nasapa'am mafi'i mataga mahali'asa ipat Saimon napeinai. Ea' mowala mafi'i maitu uta.
44010018	Ea' mofalana ma'i, “Saimon agel wa'ana Pita anan nape na'ae?”
44010019	Pita ata' nape okom natanea nape ma amamaga amama ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipana na'i, “Neme'! Amam amama wanom ma'i mogolopa ine'.
44010020	Ine' hafel nisila' nefe' nelomom. Ine' owa' okom nope hiahiana, owa'. Ae' asapa'am mafi'i.”
44010021	Ea' Pita nisila'ma amam amama na'ipam na'i, “Aman anama ipe' pagolopanai ae' ea' ma'uwi. Ipe' pafi'mai main?”
44010022	Ea' ma'ipana ma'i, “Kornilius anan kepten dembinai numafi soldia 100-peleim hiami, nasapa'afa wafi'i. Anan aman nanda' waf bu'unai nanda' lotuma Godi. Esis Juda hiesi sa'i, ‘Anan aman bu'unai.’ Anona ensel Godi na'ipana ma nofalena nefe' ipat ananinai, ma ata' nome' anom basef ine'imi.”
44010023	Ea' Pita na'ipam mawis ipat nomon nao'wam numafiam mape owamb anama. Wafilu nohafel nafe' nalomam. Anom amam Kristen Jopaimi mafe' malomana.
44010024	Amam mohafel mafe' ma'oh owamb atotona eaf ea' mafe' mataga Sisaria. Ea' Kornilius nape nahafa amam. Anan nali' nofalai esis wambota ananinai saloma alupusi ananisi endilisi sondowa'anima sape.
44010025	Ea' Pita nafi'i na'i nuwisi ipat ea' Kornilius nafi'i natagamana nindiwa nembawa felefele'ma bo'wagah Pitai na'i nefela agel ananinai.
44010026	Ea' Pita nafelona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel. Ae' wapoti' epen atowe si'i ine'.”
44010027	Ea' Pita naloma Kornilius ma'i ea' mawis ipat nomon nati amam nematawa hiesi sandatama etifigin sapan.
44010028	Ea' Pita na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pegawa ea' mi'uli ape' Judai ma'i owa' ma ape' mefe' muwis ifagw o mope moloma enis epes owa' Judaisi, owa'. Ea' God nihi'ambe ma enis epes owa' Judaisi si'i ipe' na'ae na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina nendafa'ma enin epen ni'i enin nanda' waf aonai, owa'.’
44010029	Ea' ae' ina esambala basef amama God na'ipiami, owa'. Ea' ame' fala ipe'inai afi'i. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, ‘Ipe' pefale afi'i ma main?’ ”
44010030	Ea' Kornilius nagwamana na'i, “Amamaga natagama ae'i ma dei' nimeguf wenif mafe' ea', amama na'ama. Ae' ape anda' beten ipat ae'anai nogota aon nasa 3 klok. Nogota ea' na'ama etin si'i dei'. Anda' beten ape ea', ati anona aman naitu felefele'ma naep ae'ami, luwaguf maim ananimi mafifil endilisi.
44010031	Ea' nofale na'i, ‘Kornilius, God name' beten ine'inai ea', okom na'i amamaga hiami ine'imi nase'asam epes isima amamaga a'asi.
44010032	Ea' ine' nesapa' anom amam mofe' Jopa mofalai Saimon agel wa'ana Pita. Aman anama nape naloma anona aman Saimon ipat ananinai, nandondomba agwafuh bulmakaumi. Anan nape felefele'ma naoh mafe' motambela.’
44010033	Ea' dei' atef ae' asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ine' ea' dei' ine' nanda' waf bu'unai nafi'i. Dei' ape' hiapai mafi'i mape na'ae ma naep Godi ma meme' basef hiami Dembinai nasi'inami ma ni'ipapam.”
44010034	Ea' Pita na'iam na'i, “Endilisi, dei' ae' egawa okom Godi anan ina okom na'i wambota epes hiesi Judai etis, owa'.
44010035	Anan okom nainaila emi egafis sanda' lotuma anan sanda' waf bu'unai.
44010036	Ipe' pegawa basef amama God na'iam mafe'ma ape' epes hiesi Israeli. Anan nawalapa basef bu'wami Jisas Kraisi, Anan Dembinai ma amamaga hiami maloma epes hiesi nanda'apa mataga ukup etifim maloma God opalef mape awanem malomana.
44010037	Ipe' pegawa, fowa' Jon nawalapa basefa esis samboma opalefa waf aonai ma sefa' baptais. Nogota anama basef mafe' etap hiagoma Galili ea' mataga anama etap hiagoma Judia.
44010038	Basef amama, basef Jisas Nasaretinai. God nandandepana na'ama. Anan nase'ana Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai naloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai. Ea' nafe' wambel hiagoma ganigani nagiambama esis amam nematawa. Ea' dei' God nape nalomana nanda' epes hiesi saila pepel Satani ambo'wes wapoti'.
44010039	Ea' ae' afi'i aloma amam wanom afa' wawalapa basefa amamaga amama pepel anan nanda'anai gani Jerusalem naloma etap anama hiagoma ape' Juda mapoma. Ea' esis saundana lawag sahana naga' ma waf anama.
44010040	Nimeguf biam hi'alam ea' mafe'ma wanomi God nafelona nohafel wapoti' nawalapana alihina.
44010041	God ina nihi'ambasana Juda hiesi satolona, owa'. Nihi'amba afa' atofa fowa' God nandandepafa ma owalapa basef ananimi. Anan notanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ea' wa' gwa'aimi walomana.
44010042	Anan na'ipafa basef la'ifimi ma wi'ipa esis amam nematawa owalapa basef alihim na'ama. God nandandepa aman anama ma nope aman nonda'masa basefa epes isima sape namisi soloma isima saga' ea'i.
44010043	Amam profet hiami ma'iama anan na'ama ma'i, ‘La'ifimi agel ananinai atona God nakwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa emi egafis sembale'efanai.’ ”
44010044	Pita ata' na'i basef amama atom, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai ma amam nematawa hiesi same' basef Godi napais.
44010045	Amam amama Judaimi mombale'efi mafi'i malumai Pitai mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am ma mati God nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai etin si'i presena esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
44010046	Amam Juda mame' esis sa'i diga naninani safela agel Godi ea' amam gegelalasom kwapete'am. Ea' Pita na'i,
44010047	“Ina enin epen la'ifina nindaiwa'ma sipisi' amam nematawa isima embel, owa'. Esis sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ama etin si'i ape'.”
44010048	Ea' na'ipasa basef la'ifimi ma esis na'i, “Ipe' pefa' baptaisa agel Jisas Kraisi.” Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' ata' nepe nelomapa anom nimeguf wapoti'.”
44011001	Ea' amam aposel maloma esis sahin owan sombale'efanai sape anama Judia hiagomai same' basef amama ma enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi wapoti' sefa' basef Godi sembale'efana.
44011002	Ea' Pita notanima nondowasa' Jerusalem, enis epes Juda sombale'efa basef Godi sape. Esis saila waf fowa'inai la'ifisa sa'i amam hiami mombale'efanai mila mi'uli esis Judai ma motopa' alop amamunai. Ea' sasambalana mehipa basef ananimi.
44011003	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nafe' nawis ifagw amam owa' Judaimi meatopa' alopi na' gwa'aimi nalomam.”
44011004	Ea' Pita na'ipasa basef ma amamaga amama hiami mataga. Nali' na'ipasa basef dambadamba mali'i nailam nafe' nafe' nambefam. Ea' na'i,
44011005	“Ae' ape taun Jopa anda' beten ape ea' okom ae'anai nandamboma ati anom amamaga si'i andondo'oh. Anom amamaga lu'wami misila'i ilif si'i lowaf launai endilisi. Amamaga mahapila lowaf anama da'malifinama biefigin biefigini mahapilana malana nisila'i heven ilif ea' nafi'mai ae'.
44011006	Ea' ae' a'i ata' egawa amama andeande', atologon nomon lowaf anama ati amamaga mamumami hiami mape nomona lowaf anama. Ati mafis hiamu mamumami maitu etapi mafis aolopumi maloma iguf amiguf amamaga mape aolopi.
44011007	Ea' ame' anona maf na'ipi na'i, ‘Pita, ine' hafel neha anom mafis nea'am.’
44011008	Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, ae' andaiwa' endilisi! Fowa' ae' ata' so'uso'win afi'i ataga dei' ae' ina agwa' anom amamaga awami, owa'.’
44011009	Ea' maf anama nafi'i ilif wapoti' bif na'i, ‘Amamaga God nanda'am mataga bu'wami, amama ina ni'i awami, owa'.’
44011010	Amamaga amama matagama ae' wenif ea' motanima malata heven ilif hi'alam.
44011011	Dei' atef amam amama wanom mafi'i mataga ipat anama afa' wapeinai. Anona aman nape Sisariai nasapa'am mafi'mai ae'.
44011012	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipi na'i, ‘Ina okom netanea, owa'. Ine' fo'o noloma amam.’ Amam sahope amama wanom wanom mafe' malome. Ea' afa' wafe' wawis ipat aman anama
44011013	na'ipafa ma nati ensel naitumana nomon gani ipat ananinai na'ipana na'i, ‘Ine' nesapa' anom amam mefe' Jopa mi'ipa Saimon agel wa'ana Pita ma nifi'mai ine'.
44011014	Ama ni'ipina anom basef ine' ma basef amama etoma God nigiambama ine' neloma esis wambota ine'inai soloma esis sanda' maol ine'imi ma nofa'epa petanimani.’
44011015	Ea' ae' afela basef a'iam, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nisila'mai esis, nafi'i na'ama etin si'i nali' nafi'mai ape' Juda dambadamba.
44011016	Ea' ae' okokoma basef amama Dembinai wapoti'. Amama ma'i, ‘Jon napisi'as embel ea' ina embel atom, owa'. Atuwasi pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nupaipa.’
44011017	Fowa' ape' mombale'efa Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ape' si'i presen. Ea' dei' ae' emi egafuwi ma la'ifiwi i'ipa God niapani?”
44011018	Esis same' basef amama Pita na'ipasami ea' ukup mase'asa basef amama asasimi safela agel Godi sa'i, “Dei' ape' mogawa God namboma opalef esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi ma esis wapoti' safe'ma anan sope ambagof namumi.”
44011019	Fowa' amam maha Stiven naga'i manda' nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis Kristen amam nematawa mahas. Ea' esis sembale'efanai safa' safe' ganigani ea' sataga anona wambel Antiok safe' anona etap hiagoma biefigin Saiprus naloma Fonisia sawalapa basef Godi ma esis Juda etis.
44011020	Ea' anom amam Saiprusimi maloma anom Sairinimi mafe' Antiok mawalapa basef amama ma esis Grik wapoti'. Amam mawalapa basef bu'wami ma dembinai Jisas Krais.
44011021	Ea' pepel Dembinai atona nape naloma amam, amama atom dei' amam nematawa hiesi samboma opalef safi'mai Dembinai.
44011022	Ea' esis amam nematawa Kristen sape Jerusalemi same' basef amama ea' sasapa' Barnabas nafe' Antiok.
44011023	Anan nafe' nataga nati God nanda' esis bo'wesa waf bu'unai numafias nandanifamas. Nafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sope la'ifis sila Dembinai.
44011024	Barnabas anan aman bu'unai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina nembale'efa God andeande'. Ea' nagiambama esis amam nematawa hiesi ma sembale'efa Dembinai ea' sawisi epes hiesi Godi.
44011025	Ea' Barnabas nafe' Tarsus nagolopa Sol.
44011026	Natolona ea', nofa'ana nafi'i Antiok. Ea' amam biam mape afagel atotona maloma esis Kristen amam nematawa sape Antioki mawalipa epes hiesi ma basef Godi. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila Jisasi, enis epes sofalas agel anama Kristen dambadamba wambel anama Antiok.
44011027	Nogota anama anom profet mape Jerusalemi makini' Antiok.
44011028	Anona profet esis sofalana sa'i Agabus, Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaina ea' nawalipasa basefa nolomeahas lu'unai nambimb neataga etap wambel anama hiagoma. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', aman anama Klodius nataga nape gavman dembinai esis Rom, nogota anama nolomahas nataga si'i fowa' Agabus na'iam.
44011029	Ea' esis amam nematawa saila Jisas Kraisi sa'i basef sandame'mama sefa' anom otamba mefe'ma esis alupusi sahin owan sape Judai ma sigiambas. Esis Kristen atona etin ukup ma'i otamba ma'omasi sawalom sase'asa tu'wanim hiami mafe'ma esis sape Judiai. Enis otamba hiami sase'asa hiami ea' enis otamba kwawie'im sase'asa kwawie'im. Hiesi sanda'am na'ama etin.
44011030	Esis sanda'am na'ama, sasapa' Barnabas naloma Sol mofa' otamba amama mafe'ma amam agufumi mumafi esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi.
44012001	Nogota anama dembinai king Herot naha enis amam nematawa Kristen sefa' nimanimi.
44012002	Ea' na'ipa anom soldia ananimi maha Jems, Jon sahalomana bainat mahana naga'.
44012003	Ea' anan nati esis Juda sandanifel ma amama ea' nanda' kalabusima Pita wapoti' nemaf anama esis Juda sanda' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa' bret wafinai owa' neatifi.
44012004	Anan nombalo' Pita nanda'ana nanda' kalabus. Ea' nanda'ana nafe'ma soldia wambotagw biami biam mumafiana. Herot okom na'i ota' Pita nape wambota atotona soldia biami biami mumafiana ma esis Juda sope sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami sa'i Pasova ma hi'ilam, nefa'ai Pita nuwisi ande'ma naep amam nematawa hiesi sotolona ma nohana noga'.
44012005	Pita ata' napani kalabus amam soldia mape mumafiana. Ea' la'ela'ef esis Kristen sanda' beten la'ifisa God numafia Pita.
44012006	Wafilu Herot na'i nofa' Pita nefe' ma kot. Ea' nemaf anama owa' ata' notaga ulal owamb anama Pita na'oh la'afena anom soldia biam. Amam mowa' Pita sen biefina. Anom soldia maitu mumafi uta ipat anama sanda' kalabusanai.
44012007	Ea' mehip ensel Dembinai nataga naloma howalagon nawis ipat sanda' kalabusanai nomon. Ea' ensel naha lambeh Pitai ninimbalona na'ipana na'i, “Ine' hafel mehip.” Ea' sen pele'atana etin lagof Pitai nowa na'oh etap.
44012008	Ea' ensel na'ipana na'i, “Ine' waho' let nugundisa lowaf la su bo'wagah ine'imi.” Ea' Pita nanda'am si'i ensel na'ipana. Ea' ensel na'ipana wapoti' na'i, “La siot ine'inai nila ae' nifi'i.”
44012009	Ea' Pita nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusanai nomon nagi'ma ensel anama nafe'. Ea' anan ina nogawa amamaga amama ensel nanda'ami na'i endilisi, owa'. Pita na'i si'i na'oh nandondo'oh etin.
44012010	Amam biam mafe' makwaha amam plisman maitu mali'i mafe' mikila' anom wapoti' ea' mafe' mataga uta lu'unai sonda' ainambanai. Uta anama nafe' tauni. Ea' uta anama lu'unai nandawisi' etina amam biam. Ea' amam makwaha kalabus mawisi ande' mafe' anona eaf. Ea' mehip ensel nandambaho'ma Pita nafe' anagon.
44012011	Ea' okom Pitai nataga alihina nogawa na'i, “Dei' ae' egawa endilisi. Dembinai nasapa'i ensel ananinai nafi'i natagahowe ma lagel king Heroti ma awami amama hiami esis Juda ukup ma'i seanda'me emi.”
44012012	Anan negawa amama ea', nafe' ipat Mariai, Jon Mak mama'wana nati esis Kristen sandakolas etifigin sape ipat anama atona sape sanda' beten.
44012013	Ea' Pita nafe' naitu naha uta ande', ano'w nemata'w kwanda'masa maoli agili'wa Roda kwafi'i kwa'i kuwisi' uta.
44012014	Ea' kwame' maf Pitai kogawana, okom akwa'unai bo'ona kwandanifel ea' ina kwawisi' uta, owa'. Kwasagih kotanima kwafe' nomon kwa'ipas kwa'i, “Pita nani naitu uta ande'!”
44012015	Ea' esis sa'ipakw sa'i, “Ine' okom nahaga nagaolinai.” Ea' akwa'w la'ifikw kwa'iam kwa'i, “Endilisi, anan naitu ande'.” Ea' esis sa'i, “Anama ensel ananinai atona.”
44012016	Ea' Pita ata' naitu naha uta wapoti'. Ea' esis same'ana safe' sawisi' uta satolona, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'asa anan.
44012017	Ea' Pita nanda' lagel atona na'ipas na'i “Feso'mepa.” Ea' na'ipasa amamaga amama Dembinai nofa'ana nakwaha ipat sanda' kalabusainai nao'wana nawisi ande'. Ea' na'i, “Ipe' kipago Jems nolomago sahin owan ama amamaga amama.” Ea' nakwaha esis notanima nawisi ande' nafe' anagon.
44012018	Ea' lala kuhimbita, amam soldia matimana owa' mohafel gegelalasom kwapete'am ukup matamea ea' ma'i, “Pita nafe' eti?”
44012019	Ea' Herot wapoti' nafe' nagolopa Pita, owa'. Ina natolona nofa'anai, owa'. Ea' nandamboma nahali' amam soldia nanda' kotimama noham moga'. Ea' Herot nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nafe' nakini' napani wambel Sisaria.
44012020	Anan okom numbutinama esis amam nematawa sape wambel lu'unai biefina Tair naloma Saidon. Ea' enis epes Tair naloma Saidon sandakolas safi'mai anan. Ea' sali' sagolopa Blastus, nanda' maola dembinai kingi. Ea' sonandana basef salefa sonda' okom anama wandafunai noga'. Dei' main, epes sape wambel anama biefina sofa' gwa'aimi ma etap hiagoma kingi.
44012021	Anona nemaf Herot nandandepanai anan nandausa sosaf dembinai kingi ea' nape natoma balata kingi nanda' basef lu'wami ma esis.
44012022	Ea' esis seme'ana sa'i mehip sa'i, “Anama maf anona dembinai si'i god. Anan ina maf anona epeni, owa'!”
44012023	Ea' Herot ina ata' nafela agel Godi, owa'. Na'ama dei' atef ensel Dembinai nahana. Ea' asagof iguf so'uso'umi mahana mahahape' alop ananinai ea' afuna.
44012024	Ea' basef Dembinai mataga la'ifim mafe' wambel hiagoma ma epes hiesi sombale'efana.
44012025	Barnabas naloma Sol manda' maol God nase'amanai hi'alana Jerusalem ea' motanima mafe' Antiok mao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomam.
