44013001	Esis amam nematawa Kristen sape Antioki anom amam mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi mape. Anom profet maloma anom tisa mawalipasa basef Godi isima sembale'efanai. Agof amamumi amama. Barnabas naloma Saimon agel wa'ana Niger, Lusius, anan wambel Sairininai maloma Sol maloma Manain anan alupunai Heroti gavman dembinai.
44013002	Esis Kristen sakwaha gwa'aimi sanda' lotuma God atona sape. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ipas na'i, “Ipe' pendandepa Barnabas naloma Sola maol anama ae' efalam andandepam meanda'anai.”
44013003	Ea' esis sakwaka gwa'aimi sanda' beten, sawamona lagofa amam biam sasapa'am mafe'.
44013004	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasapa' amam biam mafe' makini' anona wambel Selusia. Ea' malata anona sip mefa'am mafe' anona ailan Saiprus.
44013005	Ea' mataga Salamis, mawis nomon ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ma'ipasa basef bu'wami Godi, Jon Mak wapoti' nape nalomam nagiambamam.
44013006	Amam mafe' mataga wambel hiagoma nape ailan anama Saiprusi, ea' mafe' mataga wambel Pafos nape di'inai. Ea' mati anona aman anan Judainai. Anan nanda' ambagof nanda' amamaga mamumami baso'maimi. Anan profet nambaso'ma esis hiesi, agilinama Barjisas.
44013007	Anan alupunai ma dembinai gavman agilinama Sergius Paulus. Sergius Paulus anan nomonas okom bu'unai napainai. Anan nofalai Barnabas naloma Sol mafi'i ma anan neme' basef Godi ma amam.
44013008	Ea' aman anama agel ananinai diga Griki sa'i Elimas, nanda' ambagofi nasambala basef amam biam ma'iami. Na'i nomboma okom gavman anama dembinai ma ina nambimb nembale'efa basef Godi.
44013009	Ea' aman anama Sol, sofalana Poli, anan pepel la'ifinai Ambal Bu'unai Godi napainai. Ea' anan natiti Elimas na'ipana na'i,
44013010	“Ine' awani nogaloma Satani! Ine' naumbih ma waf anama hianai bu'unai! Waf anama baso'mainai hianai aonai si'ina ma ine' endilisi! Ine' nimeguf hiami nambomefa basef endilisimi bu'wami Dembinai mataga baso'maimi. Dei' maina ine' nandaiwa'ma nekwaha waf aonai ine' nanda'anai?
44013011	Ea' dei' ine' neme'. Dei' Dembinai nehena lagel ananinai ea' atuwasi naep ine'imi mose'ena. Ea' ine' atuwasi niti aon alipunai, owa'. Ea' nepe na'ama etin anom nimeguf.” Pol na'iam na'ama ma ea', mehip anom amamaga si'i elagw owamb nasopama naep Elimasi. Ea' naha ganigani nafe' nogolopa enis epesa sohapila lagof ananimi ma sihi'ambana eaf.
44013012	Ea' gavman anama dembinai nati amamaga amama gegelalasona endilisi ma basef Dembinai ea' dei' nembale'efa Jisas.
44013013	Pol naloma amam malomanai makwaha wambel Pafos ea' mefa' nefa'am mafe' anona wambel Perga nape anona etap hiagoma Pamfilia. Ea' aman anama Jon nakwaha amam notanima nafe' Jerusalem.
44013014	Ea' makwaha wambel anama Perga mafe' mataga anona wambel Antiok nape etap hiagoma Pisidia. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nemaf anama Sabat esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai amam mafe' mawis ipat Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' matoma balata.
44013015	Ea' anona aman natalifa basefa mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai maloma basef amam profet ma'iami ea' amam agufumi Judai masapa' basef mafe'ma Pol naloma amam manda' maol etini ma'iam ma'i, “Alupipei, ipe' i'i anom basefa monda' ukup esis amam nematawai motaga la'ifim, ipe' awi kiam.”
44013016	Ea' Pol nohafel nafela lagel na'i basef na'i, “Ipe' Israel hipei paloma ipe' enipa epes panda' lotuma Godi, ipe' peme' basef ae'ami.
44013017	God dembinai esis Israeli, anan nandandepa esis akusapa ape'isi ma nemaf anama esis safe' sailas sapani etap hiagoma Isip ea' anan nanda'as sataga epes hiesi wambota lounai. Anom nemeguf mafe'ma ea', pepel Ananinai atona nofa' esis sakwaha etap anama safi'i.
44013018	Ea' anama wafiguma fatauguma nofa' nimanimi ma waf esis sanda'anai ma afagof amama 40-peleim.
44013019	Ma etap hiagoma Kenan anan nahambombaga lain 7-peleina amam nematawa hiesi ea' nase'asa etap anama nafe'ma esis Israel,
44013020	ea' sahapila etap anama sape afagof amama 450-peleim. Ea' anan nafela amam dambami esis Israeli ea' amam mumafi esis sape satagama nemaf aman anama profet Samuel nataga.
44013021	Nemaf anama esis sawa salef sa'i sofa' anona king dembinai, ea' God nase'asa anona aman Sol, Kis nogalomana. Aman anama nataga wambota Benjamini. Ea' anan nape king dembinai ma afagof hiami 40-peleim.
44013022	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', God nali'amona king Sol, nanda' Devit nataga nape king asasinai. Anan na'ipasa aman anama Devit na'i, ‘Devit nogalomana Jesi, okom ae'anai nainailana. Anan nambimb nila okom ae'anai atona na'iami.’
44013023	Ea' God nanda'am na'ama si'i fowa' na'iam na'i nonda'am. Ama wambota Deviti owagama God nefela Jisas, aman anama nofa' ape' Israeli.
44013024	Fowa' Jisas ata' owa' nifi'i, nogota anama aman anama Jon nawalapa basef na'ipa esis Israel hiesi ma somboma opalef sokwaha waf aonai sefe'ma Goda sefa' baptais.
44013025	Ea' felefele'ma Jon na'i nonda' maol ananinai hi'ilana, anan na'i, ‘Ipe' ukup ma'i ae' ma'imama? Ae' ina aman anama dembinai ipe' pape pembale'efanai, owa'. Ipe' peme'! Aman anama owagama nila ae' niefi'i, anan bu'unai nikila' ae'. Ae' ina bu'uwei ma etagaha mandelefa su ananimi, owa'.’
44013026	Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' epes hiesi pataga wambota Abrahami, enipa owa' Judaipei panda' lotuma Godi, peme'. Dei' basef amama God nasapa'am mafi'mai ape' hiapai. Basef amama ma anan nambimb nofa'apa mokwaha waf aonai motanimani.
44013027	Ea' esis sape Jerusalemi saloma amam agufumi asasimi, esis ina sogawa aman anama nofa'apa motanimani, owa'. Esis ina sogawa andeande' basef amama amam profet fowa' ma'iami, owa'. Anom agufumi matalifam Sabat nimeguf hiami sapoma noma'wanai. Ea' ina sogawam, owa'. Basef amama atom mataga endilisi nemaf anama esis sanda' kotima Jisas sa'i anan aman aonai ma sahana noga'.
44013028	Esis ina sati anom basef ofagema waf aonai ma sohana noga', owa'. Ea' sofalai gavman dembinai Pailat ma ni'i a'e ma mohana noga' etin.
44013029	Esis sanda'am hi'alam amamaga amama si'i fowa' amam profet ma'i basef manda'am mape buk Baibeli ma'iama anan. Nimeguf wanom mafe'ma ea', esis satagaha anan nisila'i lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' sawana anona hi'agif.
44013030	Ea' God nafelona wapoti'.
44013031	Esis isima hiesi sakwaha etap hiagoma Galili ea' salomana sondowasa' Jerusalemi, esis satolona nimeguf hiami. Dei' epes isima safe' sawalapa basefa ape' Israela anan.
44013032	Ea' ape' dei' ma'ipipa basef bu'wami ipe'. Amamaga amama fowa' God na'iama na'i nose'asas akusipa ape'isi,
44013033	ea' ma'um amama dei' God naso' ape' awasi ananipai ma nafela Jisas nape namunai. Nafela Jisas si'i basef mape buk Baibel Buk Song nafe'ma bifi ma'iam na'ama. God na'i, ‘Ine' nogalome ae'inai. Nemaf dei'inai ae' ataga ahalomena ine'iwei.’
44013034	Dei' God nafelona wapoti' hi'agif, ea' anan ina ata' notanima nofe' hi'agif wapoti' folo'olana, owa'. Ea' na'ama etin si'i God na'iam wapoti' na'i, 'Nambimb ae' igiambamepa i'ipipa basef amama endilisimi Ae'ami. Fowa' basef amama a'iam ea' ma a'i i'ipanam Deviti, amama i'ipipa ma Ae' pepe pe bu'unai.’
44013035	Ea' si'i anom basef mape Buk Sami ma anan wapoti' ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Ina nambimb ni'i a'e ma aman anama nonda' maol ine'inai andeande' folo'olana, owa'.’
44013036	Ape' mogawa Devit nahapila maol naila okom Godi la'afena esis amam nematawa sape saloma anani. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', anan naga' nafe' naloma amam bafapana ananimi ea' folo'walana.
44013037	Ea' aman anama God notanima nafelona wapoti', anan ina folo'walana, owa'.
44013038	Amama atom dei' ae' a'i ipe' sahin owan pegawa basef ape'imi amama. Aman anama nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai.
44013039	Mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesanai anama ina la'ifina ma nokwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ma pepe wafifipa andeande', owa'. Na'ama aman anama nakwaha waf hianai aonai ma ipe' emi egafipa pembale'efa anan, ma pepe wafifipa bo'wepa ma naep Godi.
44013040	Dei' ipe' pegawa waf ipe' panda'anai andeande' bo'ona o aona? Na'ama amamaga amama awami mifi'mai ipe' si'i amam profet fowa' ma'iami ma'i,
44013041	‘Ipe' panda' basef findiwaimi, ipe' petologon ukup matamea mefe' ea' awepa. Ae' anda' anona maol la'ifinai ma nimeguf ipe' ata' papeimi. I'i enin epen ni'ipipa maol anama, ipe' ina atuwasi pembale'efa maol anama, owa'.’ ”
44013042	Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ma'i muwis mofe' ea' esis amam nematawa sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Nemaf anama Sabat nigi'i ape' ma'i ipe' bipa pitanima pifi'i pi'ipapa basef amama wapoti'.”
44013043	Ea' esis sakwaha ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai sawisi ande' ea' esis Juda hiesi saloma enis epes hiesi sagi'mam. Esis isima saila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuwanai. Ea' amam biam mase'asa basef esis hiesi ma sape la'ifis sembale'efa God nanda' waf bu'unai ma ape' nagiambamapa etin.
44013044	Nimeguf wanom wanom atotona mafe'ma ea' Sabat nemaf nagi'i, amam nematawa sape wambel anamai safi'i sandakolasa same' basef Godi. Amam nematawa isima felefele'ma hi'ilas wambel anama.
44013045	Na'ama esis Juda sati amam nematawa hiesi sandakolasi, ea' ukup kowalam endilisi. Ea' sa'i basef awami ma Pol sa'i anan nambaso'mas.
44013046	Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas ina umbamaham, owa'. Amam la'ifim ma'ipasam alihim ma'i, “Endilisi, afa' ata' wi'ipipa basef Godi ipe' Juda pili'. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha basef amama. Amama ipe' pa'iam pa'i, ‘Ape' mandaiwa'ma mofa' ambal namunai ma mope andeande' la'ela'ef.’ Ipe' pa'i na'ama dei' ipe' peme'. Afa' dei' okwaha ipe' ofe' ugi'ma epes owa' Judaisi wi'ipasa basef amama.
44013047	Dei' main, Dembinai na'ipafa mehipa anom basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Ae' anda' ipe' si'i howalogon ma enis epes owa' Judaisi. Ama ipe' pigiambama esis amam nematawa sape wambel hiagomai ma etap anae'. Ama owagama efa'as sotanimani.’ ”
44013048	Ea' enis epes owa' Judaisi same' basef amama sandanifel endilisi. Esis sandanifela basef Dembinai safela agel Ananinai. Ea' amam nematawa isima God nosahe'asi ma sope namisi la'ela'ef, isima sombale'efa Jisas.
44013049	Ea' basef Dembinai mafe'agon hi'alagon anama hiagoma.
44013050	Na'ama esis Juda safela anowa nematawa agufuwai wanda' lotuma Godi waloma anom agufumi mape taun anama lu'wagoma saha Poli naloma Barnabas sanda'am kwapete'am. Ea' sagalo'mam wambel asasinai.
44013051	Ea' amam mandila'ma sopof mail bo'wagah amamumi ma mola ikwafa waf aonai napoma esis. Ea' mohafel mafe' Aikoniam.
44013052	Esis alupusi sombale'efa Jisasi sandanifel endilisi ea' pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape si'ina esis.
44014001	Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mafe' mataga Aikoniam mafe' mawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai mawalapa basef si'i mali' manda'am. Amam mawalapa basef bu'wami ea' esis Juda hiesi saloma enis epes owa' Judaisi sombale'efa God.
44014002	Ea' enis epes Juda ina sombale'efa God, owa'. Esis safela ukupa enis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi ea' sanda' epes isima opalef aoma esis Kristen.
44014003	Amam biam mapani nogota launai Aikoniam ea' mawalapa basef Dembinai la'ifim alihim. Amam ina umbamaham, owa'. Ma'ipasa basefa Dembinai nandahomas endilisi nagiambamas. Ea' Dembinai nanda' amam biam mataga la'ifim manda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani hianai. Ea' dei' esis sogawa basef amama endilisimi atom.
44014004	Ea' esis amam nematawa taun anama sandawaloga biefis. Enis opalef atifim saloma esis Juda, ea' enis saloma amam aposel biam ukup etifim.
44014005	Esis epes ina Judaisi saloma esis sanda'ipama sa'i basef sandame'mam saloma amam agufumi asasimi ea' sa'i sonda' Pol naloma Barnabas aom. Sa'i sokwaha otamba soham afum.
44014006	Ea' amam biam mogawa amama mafa' mafe' etap hiagoma Likonia ma wambel biefina Listra naloma Derbe ea' anona wambel felefele'ma anama.
44014007	Amam manda' maol mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma esis sape wambel anama.
44014008	Anona aman nape wambel anama Listra, bo'wagah ananimi maga' mailana. Fowa' anan ata' nape opaf mama'wanai bo'wagah ananimi maga' mailana nape na'ama. Aman anama ina naitu nafe' kwaukwawie', owa'.
44014009	Ea' anan name' Pol na'i basef ea' Pol natolona titi nogawana na'i aman anama nembale'efa Goda notaga bo'ona wapoti'.
44014010	Ea' natolona titi na'i basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, “Ine' hafel nitu.” Ea' nohafel mehip naitu ea' nafe'.
44014011	Amam nematawa hiesi sati amama Pol nanda'ami ea' sa'i mehip diga Likoniai na'ama sa'i, “Amam god dambami ape'imi biam mataga si'i epes misila'a ape'!”
44014012	Barnabas sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Sus. Ea' Pol anan aman nanda' basef atomi. Ea' sofalana sa'i anona dembinai Hermes.
44014013	Ipat esis sanda' lotuma Susi notawa ande' taun anama. Ea' pris nondolalima Susi nofa' anom bulmakau suwafumi maloma enis afis sowalo'ami ea' nafi'i uta anama tauni. Anan nalumai esis amam nematawa sa'i sondolali sonda' ofa ma amam biam.
44014014	Amam aposel Barnabas naloma Pol mame' esis sa'i basef na'ama, amam mawala luwaguf maim amam malami. Ea' masagih mafe' mawala esis amam nematawa la'afena esis ma'ipas mehip ma'i,
44014015	“Ipe' epes, dei' maina panda'am na'ama? Afa' wandaiwa'. Afa' biafa ina God dembifai, owa'. Afa' epes atofa etin si'i ipe' wawalipipa basef bu'wami. Wawalipipa ma ipe' pekwaha god anama falafunai baso'maimi ma pefe' pembale'efa God ambal namunai nape la'ela'efi. Anan nanda' otaga ilif naloma etap maloma epes hiesi saloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma amamaga hiami mape.
44014016	Endilisi fowa' nimeguf hiami nape nati amam nematawa hiesi saila waf asasinai.
44014017	Ea' anan ina nape nandambahi'i, owa'. Anan nihi'ambapa waf ananinai ma nanda' waf bu'unai ma ape'. Anan napani heven nanda' asaf nalai ma ipe' ea' nanda' amamaga gwa'aimi bu'wami mataga dende' nimeguf amamumi. Ea' nowapoti'mipa gwa'aimi ipe', nanda' opalef ipe'imi mandanifel.”
44014018	Amam ma'ipasa basef amama, manda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma'ipas ina sandolalimam sanda' ofamam, owa'.
44014019	Anom Juda mape Antiok naloma Aikoniam mafi'i Listra mafela ukup asasimi amam nematawa. Ea' dei' esis sakwaha otamba saha Pol sa'i endilisi anan afuna ea' sahonde'ana nawisi na'oh ande' taun anama.
44014020	Ea' esis sombale'efa Godi safi'i saitu salipana, nohafel wapoti' ea' nafe' nawis taun anama. Wafilu nafe' naloma Barnabas mafe' Derbe.
44014021	Pol naloma Barnabas mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi taun anama ea' mafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi sataga alupusi Jisasi. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', motanima mafe' wambel anama Listra naloma Aikoniam naloma Antiok.
44014022	Ea' manda' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis. Amam ma'ipasa basef la'ifimi na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' pepe la'ifipa pembale'efa dembinai God. Ape' meme' mofa' nimanimi mamumami lu'wami ma muwis nomon wambota Godi numafiapa.”
44014023	Ea' mandandepa agufumi mumafi esis Kristeni mandanda' ma sios amama hiami. Amam makwaha gwa'aimi manda' betena manda' esis sope la'ifisa lagel Dembinai anama sembale'efana.
44014024	Ea' amam mafe' la'afena anona etap hiagoma Pisidia, mafe' mataga anona etap hiagoma wa'ol Pamfilia.
44014025	Amam mawalapa basefa epes sape Pergai ea' makini' Atalia.
44014026	Anama Atalia malata sip ea' nefa'am mafe' Antiok. Wambel anama fowa' esis Kristen sandandepam mapoma lagel Godi ma nandahomam manda' maol anama dei' manda'anai hi'alana. Ea' dei' motanima mafi'i wambel anama.
44014027	Amam mataga Antiok mofala esis mowa'anias sandakolas etifigin ma'ipasa basefa maol Dembinai nape nalomam nagiambamam manda'anai. Ea' ma'i, “God nanda' eaf nagala esis amam nematawa hiesi enis owa' Judaisi ma sombale'efa Krais.”
44014028	Ea' mapani anom nimeguf hiami maloma esis sembale'efa Krais sailana.
44015001	Anom amam mape Judiai makini' mataga Antiok ma'ipama basef esis Kristen sahin owan sape anama. Ma'ipasa basef ma'i, “I'i ipe' amam owa' pila mi'uli God fowa' gani na'ipa Mosesanai ma owa' petopa' alop ipe'inai, anona nemaf God ina nofa'epa pitanimani, owa'.”
44015002	Amam ma'iam na'ama, manda' ukup Poli Barnabasi wandafum endilisi ma'i basef la'ifimi mandahihianamam maloma amam Judaimi. Ea' esis Kristen sandandepa Pol naloma Barnabas maloma anom amam mombale'efa Kraisi wapoti' mondowasa' Jerusalem ma'i basef amama monandonam maloma amam aposel maloma agufumi siosi.
44015003	Esis Kristen sasapa'am mafe' ea' mafe' la'afena etap hiagoma Fonisia naloma Samaria. Ma'ipasa basef esis Kristen sape etap anama biefina ma sogawa God namboma ukupa enis epes owa' Judaisi. Esis Kristen same' basef amama manda' esis sandanifel endilisi.
44015004	Amam mafe' mataga Jerusalem, amam aposel maloma esis amam nematawa Kristen saloma agufumi asasimi sohafel sandalalamam sanda'mam gude amam. Ea' Pol naloma Barnabas mohafel ma'ipasa basefa maol hianai God nagiambamama manda'anai.
44015005	Ea' anom Farisi mombale'efa Kraisi mohafel ma'ipa esis ma'i, “Ipe' petopa'mama alop amamunai, pi'ipama mila wafa mi'uli God fowa' gani na'ipa Mosesanai.”
44015006	Ea' amam aposel maloma agufumi mumafi maol Godi mandakolas etifigin mape monandona basef amama.
44015007	Amam ma'i basef hiami ma ea', Pita nohafel naitu na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' pegawa fowa' God nawaloga maola afa', ea' Anan nasahe'e ae' ea' ewalapa basef bu'wami ananimi ma enis epes owa' Judaisi seme'am sembale'efa God.
44015008	God nogawa opalef esis amam nematawa hiesi ea' nihi'ambafa okom Ananinai wila ma esis. Anan nihi'ambapa na'ama ea' nase'asa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai esis si'i fowa' nali' nase'apana ape'.
44015009	Anan ina nanda' anona wafa ape' ea' nonda' anona waf esis, owa'. Esis sembale'efa God amama atom opalef asasimi mataga bo'om si'i afa'.
44015010	Dei' maina ipe' pa'i pegwamba God? Ipe' ina pese'asa amamaga amama nimanimi esis Kristen sofa'am, owa'. Fowa' amam bafalomapa maloma ape' wapoti', ina la'ifipama mofa' nimanimi amama ma matopa' alop ape'inai, owa'.
44015011	Ape' mogawa eaf anama Dembinai Jisas nagiambamapa etin, dei' God nofa'apa matanimani ea' ananipai, ape' maloma esis wapoti'.”
44015012	Pita na'iam na'ama ea' esis sandatama etifigin ina sa'i anom basef, owa'. Ea' sape same' basef Barnabas naloma Pol ma'ipasami. Amam biam mawalapa basef hiami ma God nanda'am la'ifim manda' amamaga pepel hianai ma naep esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi.
44015013	Amam ma'ipasa ea', Jems na'iam na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan, ipe' peme' basef ae'ami.
44015014	Simeon na'ipapa ma dambadamba God nihi'ambapa nali' nati esis amam nematawa owa' Judaisi uwahipis nofa'ai enis sotanimani sope ananisi.
44015015	Ea' basef fowa' gani God na'ipa amam profet mape buk Baibeli na'ama etin si'i amama. Basef amama ma'iam ma'i,
44015016	‘Anona nemaf ae' etanima iefi'i, ipat anama Deviti natuwi, anama efelona notawa wapoti'. Amamaga ipat anamai aom, amama anona nemaf enda'am motaga dambaim wapoti' ea' efelona natawa.
44015017	Ae' enda'am na'ama ma esis soloma enis epes sololama Godi wapoti' sogolopa Dembinai, isima hiesi efalasi ea' ae'asi.
44015018	Fowa' gani endilisi Ae' Dembiwai awalapa basef amama.’
44015019	Dei' okom ae'anai nape na'ama. Epes hiesi owa' Judaisi samboma opalef safe'ma God ea'i, ape' ina mose'asa nimanimi esis, owa'.
44015020	Ape' monda' anom basef mofe'ma esis mi'ipas mi'i ina sea' gwa'aimi maim sondolalimama god baso'amunai, owa'. Amama alogw awami ma'ami. Esis sihi'amago waf aonai anama so'a waulanai ea' ina sea' mafis saham sowa' bagafowa afumi, owa'. Ina sea' esimbela anom mafis amama moloma anom mafis wapoti', owa'. Ae' a'i ape' monda'masa basef amama atom mofe'ma esis.
44015021	Dei' main, ape' mogawa fowa' gani nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' ma amam mawalapa basef God fowa' naso' Mosesami ofagema amama atom mawalipasam taun anama hianai. Matalifam ifagw hiami ape' Juda ma'i basef mapeimi nimeguf hiami sapoma noma'wami.”
44015022	Ea' amam aposel maloma agufumi mumafi maol Godi maloma esis Kristen hiesi sa'i basef etifim sandandepa anom amam biam asasimi mefe' Antiok maloma Pol naloma Barnabas. Amam amama agufumi Judas agel wa'ana Barsabas naloma Sailas. Amam biam agof lu'wami la'afena esis Kristen. Ea' sa'i sosapa'am mofe' Antiok moloma Pol noloma Barnabas.
44015023	Esis sase'ama anom basef mail pepa ma lagof amam biam Judas naloma Sailas ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Afa' aposel agufufai sahopepa afa'ipei, afa' dei' wanda'ago basef amama mafe'mago ipe' sahin owan owa' Judaipei. Ipe' pape wambel Antioki ma etap hiagoma Siria naloma Silisia, afa' wa'i nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.
44015024	Afa' wame'am enis epes afa'isi safo'o sanda'epa pehafel gegelalasipa kwapete'epa ma basef asasimi, sanda'epa umbamahepa ukup matamea. Esis sanda'am na'ama sa'i somboma ukup ipe'imi. Ea' afa' ine' wa'ipas safo'o sanda'epa na'ama, owa'.
44015025	Afa' wame' basef amama ea' wa'ipasa ukup mape atogon wa'i basef wandame'mam. Ea' wandandepa amam amama biam ma osapa'am mefe'mago ipe' malomago biam ape' ukup mailam endilisi, Barnabas naloma Pol.
44015026	Amam biam ina umbamahama enis epes soham moga' mefela agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi monda' maol ananinai, owa'.
44015027	Afa' dei' wasapa'ago Judas naloma Sailas ama nambimb mi'ipipa basef amama atom afa' wa'iam wanda'am mail pepa mafe'mago ipe'.
44015028	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape nalomafa wa'i basef wandame'mam na'ama. Afa' ina ose'epa anom nimanimi pefa'am, owa'. Waf anama atona ipe' penda'ana.
44015029	Ipe' ina pea' mafis saham sondolali ma god baso'amunai, owa'. Ipe' ina pea' esimbela anom mafis, owa'. Ipe' ina pea' mafis sowa' bagafowa ma afumi, owa'. Ea' pihi'ama waf anama so'a waulanai aonai. I'i ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma pihi'ama waf anama, andeande' ipe' penda' waf bu'unai pepe andeande'.”
44015030	Ea' esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi sasapa'am mafi'i Antiok, makolasai esis Kristen etifigin mase'asa pas amama.
44015031	Ea' esis satolom sandanifel ama basef amama bu'wami manda'as sataga la'ifisa bale'ef.
44015032	Judas naloma Sailas amam profet. Dei' ma'ipasa basef hiami bu'wami esis Kristen, manda'as sataga la'ifis mafela ukup asasimi.
44015033	Amam ata' mapani anom nimeguf Antiok, esis Kristen sanda'mam nemaf bu'unai ma amam mape opalef awanem. Ea' sasapa'am mutanima mafe'ma esis sasapa'am mafi'i.
44015034	Ea' Sailas na'i nopani Antiok.
44015035	Ea' Barnabas naloma Pol ata' mapani Antiok maloma anom amam hiami wapoti' mawalapa basef bu'wami Dembinai mawalipasam.
44015036	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Pol na'ipa Barnabas na'i, “Afa' biafa otanima ofe' uti esis Kristen sahin owan taun anama hiagoma fowa' wafe' wawalapa basef Dembinaima. Ofe' ogawas, sape andeande' o owa.”
44015037	-
44015038	Ea' Barnabas na'i no'wa Jon agel wa'ana Mak nofe' nolomam. Ea' Pol nandaiwa'ma anan nofe' nolomam. Dei' main, aman anama fowa' nakwaha amam gani Pamfilia notanima nafe'. Ina nalomam etin mafe' mambefa maolan, owa'.
44015039	Amam biam manda' migimigaha amama ea' dei' ina ata' manda' maol etifigin, owa'. Ea' Barnabas nao'wa Jon Mak nafe' nalomana malata anona sip mafe' anona ailan Saiprus.
44015040	Ea' Pol nao'wa Sailas nalomana mafe'. Ea' esis Kristen hiesi sasapa'am sa'i, “Okom lu'unai Dembinai nope nolomepa nigiambamepa numafipa.”
44015041	Ea' Pol nafe' la'afena etap anama hiagoma Siria naloma Silisia naloma Sailas mafe' manda' esis Kristen sataga la'ifis.
44016001	Pol naloma Sailas mafe' mataga Derbe ea' makwaha Derbe mafe' Listra. Wambel anama anona aman alupunai nembale'efa Jisasi nape, agilinama Timoti. Anan mama'wana ano'w nemata'w Judai'wi, akwa'w wapoti' kombale'efa Jisasi. Ea' ahalomana anona epen Grikinai.
44016002	Esis Kristen sahin owan Listra naloma Aikoniam sa'i waf Timoti nanda'anai bu'unai.
44016003	Pol na'i Timoti nefe' nolomana. Amama atom dei' nao'wana natopa'mana alop. Pol okokoma esis Juda sape na'amai na'i, “I'i Timoti owa' neatopa' alop, esis ina nambimb sila basef ananimi, owa'.” Na'ama dei' naila waf esis Judai natopa'mana alop. Dei' main, esis hiesi sogawa Timoti ahalomana anan Grikinai.
44016004	Nimeguf hiami amam maitu mafe' wambel hiagoma ma'ipasa basef esis. Basef amama fowa' amam aposel maloma agufumi ma'iam mandame'mam Jerusalemi, amama dei' ma'ipasam esis Kristen ea' ma'ipas ma'i, “Ipe' pila basef amama.”
44016005	Ea' dei' esis Kristen sombale'efa Jisasi sataga la'ifis endilisi ea' wambota esis Kristeni sataga sandanda nimeguf hiami sataga hias endilisi.
44016006	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasopama amam mawalapa basefa esis sape etap hiagoma Esiai. Ea' mafe' la'afena etap hiagoma biefina Frigia naloma Galesia.
44016007	Ea' mape anona etap hiagoma Misia, mafe' mataga felefele' ma anona etap hiagoma nafe' notanimaima Bitinia ma'i muwis etap anama ma mawalapa basef Godi etap anama hiagoma. Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Jisasi na'ipapa na'i owa'.
44016008	Ea' amam mawis etap hiagoma mafe' Misia misila'agon makini' mafe' Troas.
44016009	Owamb anama Pol nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh nati anona aman Masedoniainai naitu nofalai Pol na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ine' newala nimbuwi naoh ea' nifi'i Masedonia nigiambamapa.”
44016010	Ea' Pol nati amama, afa' mehip wandoga eaf wafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia. Afa' ogawa God nofalafa ma owalapa basef bu'wami ananimi ma esis.
44016011	Ea' walata sip wambel anama Troas ea' wafe' usi'ifa Samotres. Wefilu wafe' Neapolis.
44016012	Ea' wakwaha wambel anama wafe' Filipai, anama fowa' esis Rom safi'i sapoma. Wambel anama lu'unai ma etap hiagoma Masedonia. Ea' wape anama anom nimeguf.
44016013	Wape anama, nemaf anama sabat nataga wafe' wawis endalelemb uta ande' ma wambel anama wafe' anona walemb. Afa' wa'i wambel anama esis Juda sanda' beten sapoma. Wape anama, wati anowa nematawa ondowa'anima wape etifigin ea' afa' wafe' wape walomawa wa'i.
44016014	Ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Lidia kwanda' lotuma God kwape kwalomawa. Dembinai namboma okom akwa'inai kwame' basef amama Pol na'ipakwami. Akwa'w Taiatairai'wi, kwanda' maol kwanda' bisnisa luwaguf akwahimi.
44016015	Ea' kofa' baptais kwaloma esis sape ipat atona wapoti'. Akwa'w kofa' baptais, kwa'ipafa basef kwa'i, “I'i ipe' ukup mi'i ae' embale'efa Dembinai endilisi, ipe' fi'i pepe peloma ae' ipat ae'anai.” Ea' akwa'w la'ifikw kwao'wafa wafe' waila basef akwa'umi.
44016016	Anona nemaf afa' wafe' anama esis sanda' beten sapoma, wati ano'w nemata'w kwafi'i kwatolofa eaf. Akwa'w agel a'akw kwape owina anom amam kwanda' maolana amam. Nemata'w akwama anona ambal aonai napai'w ea' nawalapa basefa amamaga nambimb meatagai. Akwa'w kwahali' ambal anama ma basef mamumami ea' nagwama'wa basef. Ea' dei' amam amama dambami akwa'umi mofa' otamba hiami ma akwa'w kwanda'am na'ama.
44016017	Nemata'w akwama kwagi'ma Pol kwaloma afa', kofalafa timbi tambel kwa'i, “Amam manda' maola God nape ilif endilisi ma'ipapa basefa eaf God nofa'apa mutanimani.”
44016018	La'ela'ef nemata'w akwama kwanda'am na'ama etin nimeguf hiami. Ea' Pol okom aona endilisi ma akwa'w, nandamboma na'ipa ambal anama napai'wi na'i, “Ae' a'ipina agel Jisas Kraisi, kwaho'w nemata'w akwama ea' fo'o!” Ea' dei' atef ambal anama nakwaha akwa'w ea' nafe'.
44016019	Ea' nogota anama amam mumafia'wi mogawa ofagema ma eaf anama mofa' otambanai owa'. Ea' dei' mombalo' Pol naloma Sailas mahonde'am mafe'ma sandowa'anima ma mi'ipa amam agufumi mumafi koti mapoma.
44016020	Ea' ma'ipam ma'i, “Amam amama biam Judaimi, amam mafela ukup awami esis amam nematawai ma wambel ape'ima.
44016021	Ea' mawalapa basefa anona waf ape' epes Romipai mandaiwa'manai. Mi'uli ape'inai nandaiwa'ma ape' mila waf anama amamunai, owa'.”
44016022	Ea' esis amam nematawa wapoti' sambaso'ma amam biam. Ea' amam dambami mumafi koti mowaliam siogw amamumi ma mopagahom.
44016023	Ea' amam mapagahom mehip timbi tambel ea' manda'am manda' kalabus. Ma'ipa aman naitu numafi utai mehipa nope numafiam andeande'.
44016024	Ea' anan name' basef la'ifimi na'ama, nanda'am mapani rum anama nape la'afen atogon ipat anama sanda' kalabus sapeinai. Ea' nowa' bo'wagah amamumi sen, mail anona endap lu'unai.
44016025	Owamb la'afina amanota Pol naloma Sailas manda' beten manda' awalef mafela agel Godi ea' enis epes sanda' kalabusi same' manda'am.
44016026	Ea' mehip suwambon lu'unai nakoto' olalef mombalo' ipat anama sanda' kalabus sapeinai. Ea' utagw mandawisi', sen nowa' esis hiesi sanda' kalabusi nandatagah.
44016027	Ea' anan numafi esis sanda' kalabusi nohafel nati utagw ipat sanda' kalabus sapeinai mandawisi', na'i sanda' kalabusi sawisi safa' safe'. Ea' nagiai bainat ananinai na'i noha anan noga'.
44016028	Ea' Pol na'ipana mehip na'i, “Ai, ine' owa' nehambombaga ine'! Afa' hiafai wape na'ae!”
44016029	Ea' anan numafi kalabusi mehip nofalasa nogwapin sofa'ana safi'i ea' nasagih nafi'i nawisi nomon Pol naloma Sailas mapoma. Anan umbamahana endilisi ilaus mana nape nindiwa nembawa notawa opalefima amam biam.
44016030	Ea' nofa' amam biam mawis ande' nahali'am na'i, “Ipe' dembipei, ae' enda' maina nambimb God nofa'e itanimani?”
44016031	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' nembale'efa Dembinai Jisas, ama nambimb God nofa'ena netanimani. Ea' neloma wambota ine'inai wapoti' na'ama etin.”
44016032	Amam ma'ipana basef Godi naloma epes isima sape ipat ananinai.
44016033	Ea' dei' atef owamb anama atona anan nofa' amam nasa'opamam esimbela melegw amamumi sahama. Ea' mehip anan naloma wambota awasi waulu'mana ananisi sofa' baptais.
44016034	Ea' nofa'am mafe' ipat ananinai nase'ama gwa'aimi. Ea' anan naloma esis hiesi sape ipat ananinai sandanifel endilisi ma sombale'efa God.
44016035	Ea' lala, amam dambami manda'masa koti masapa' plisman amamumi mafi'i ma'i, “Ipe' kwaha amam amama biam mofo'o.”
44016036	Ea' anan numafi kalabusi nofa' basef amama nafe'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Amam dambami manda'masa koti masapa' basef mafi'mai ipe' apefe'. Na'ama dei' ipe' pekwaha kalabus pefe' ea' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.”
44016037	Ea' Pol na'ipa amam plisman na'i, “Afa' biafa Romufai, amam ina manda' kotimafa andeande'ma miti anona waf aonai ma afa' biafa, owa'. Amam mahafa etina naep esis amam nematawai. Ea motofa afa' ofe'? Owa'! Amam ata' mifi'i mo'wafa uwis ande'.”
44016038	Ea' amam plisman mofa' basef amama mafe'ma amam amama dambami manda'masa koti, mame' basef ma'i amam biam Romumi ea' umbamaham.
44016039	Ea' mafe'ma amam biam maolai amam mawisi ande' ma'i basef bu'wami malomam. Ea' ma'ipama mokwaha wambel anama mefe' anagon.
44016040	Ea' makwaha ipat sanda' kalabus sapeinai mawisi mafe' ipat Lidiai mati esis Kristen ma'ipasa basef manda'as sataga la'ifis ea' mafe'.
44017001	Amam biam mafe' mataga anona wambel Amfipolis ea' makwahagon mafe' mataga Apolonia. Ea' makwaha wambel anama wapoti' ea' mafe' mataga Tesalonaika. Anona ipat lu'unai esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai notawa wambel anama.
44017002	Ea' Pol nanda'am na'ama etin si'i la'ela'ef nanda'am ea' nafe' nawis ipat anama nalomas. Amam biam mape wikifah wanom ama nimeguf amama wanom sapoma noma'wanai sabat, ea' Pol na'i basef Godi mail buk Baibelia nalomas.
44017003	Anan nawalapa basef ofagema Godi na'ipasam na'i, “Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i anan nofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma naga' notanima nohafel wapoti'.” Ea' anan na'i, “Jisas anama dei' ae' awalapa basefanai, anan Krais.”
44017004	Ea' enis amam nematawa Judaisi sombale'efa Krais ea' saila Pol naloma Sailas sawis wambota Godi. Enis Grik sanda' lotuma Godi hiesi saloma anowa nematawa dembiwai hiawai esis wapoti' sawis wambota Godi saila amam biam.
44017005	Ea' esis Juda kowalas opalef aoma esis hiesi sombale'efa basef Pol naloma Sailas ma'ipasami. Na'ama esis sofa' anom amam awami manda' waf aonai. La'ela'ef amam mape anama esis sandakolas etifigin sapoma. Ea' sa'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sape wambel anama safela ukup asasimi ma sopa'. Ea' safitap endilisi sa'i basef lupa'aimi safe' sawisi uta sawis ipat Jesoni ma suwis sogolopa Pol naloma Sailas. Sa'i sofa'am muwisi ande'ma sose'am amam nematawa hiesi.
44017006	Ea' esis ina sati amam biam, owa'. Ea' sahonde'ai Jeson ipat anama naloma anom Kristen mafe'ma amam agufumi wambel anama. Esis sa'ipa agufumi amama mehip sa'i, “Amam amama biam manda' waf aonai nataga etap hiagoma ea' dei' mafi'i mape na'ae.
44017007	Ea' Jeson nao'wam mape ipat ananinai. Amam mosambala lo dembinai gavman Romunai, ma'i anona king dembinai nape agel ananinai Jisas.”
44017008	Esis amam nematawa hiesi saloma agufumi wambelimi same' basef amama, sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i mehip.
44017009	Ea' dei' agufumi manda' Jeson naloma anom Kristen amama mali' matala kot motagaha amam mafe' wafifim.
44017010	Owamb nataga amam Kristen masapa' Pol naloma Sailas mafe' anona wambel Beria. Amam mafe' mataga Beria, mafe' mawis ipat lu'unai esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai.
44017011	Epes sape Beriai ukup mohafel endilisi same' basef sanda' waf bu'unai sikila' esis sape Tesalonaikai. Dei' main, esis Beria sofa' basef sandanifelamam endilisi. Ea' la'ela'ef satalifa basef mail buk Baibeli ma sogawa basef Pol na'ipasami endilisimi o owa'.
44017012	Ea' dei' amam nematawa Juda hiesi sombale'efa Krais. Ea' anowa nematawa hiawai agof lu'wami waloma anom Grik hiami wapoti' sembale'efana.
44017013	Ea' anona nemaf esis Juda sape Tesalonaikai same' basef ma'i Pol nawalapa basef Godi Beria. Ea' safe' safela ukup esis amam nematawa sape Beriai aom.
44017014	Na'ama dei' atef amam Kristen masapa' Pol nakini' nafe' naoh akata. Ea' Sailas naloma Timoti atom mape Beria.
44017015	Ea' amam mofa' Pol mafe' eaf maitumana mafe' mahaponana Atens. Amam motanima mafe' ea', Pol nasapa' basef mafe'ma Sailas naloma Timoti na'i, “Ipe' bipa pifi'mai ae' mehip.”
44017016	Pol nape nahafa amam biam Atens ea' nati wambel anama nati god baso'amunai hianai endilisi. Ea' okom nandaiwa' endilisi ma esis sanda' lotuma anama.
44017017	Ea' nimeguf hiami anan nafe' ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai na'i basef hiami naloma esis Juda saloma enis isima sanda' lotuma Godi. Nalomas sa'i basef sandahihianamam nahagofa ukup asasimi. Ea' nimeguf hiami nafe' anama esis sandatama etifigin sapoma na'i basef hiami nalomas sa'i sandahihianamam saloma enis safi'i sapani.
44017018	Anom amam tisa mogawa gawaimi anom Epikurian maloma anom Stoik ma'i basef mandahihianamam maloma Pol ma'i, “Aman anama okom nahaga nagaoli na'i basef mamumami, anan na'i ni'i main?” Pol nawalapa basef bu'wami Jisasi na'ipasa Jisas nohafel hi'agif. Ea' anom amam ma'i, “Anan na'i nowalapa basefa anom god dambami anona wambili?”
44017019	Ea' amam magawa gawai mefa' Pol mafe' maloma anom gawaimi mandatama etifigin anona domota agel Areopagus. Amam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i ogawa basef amama dambaimi ine' nawalapama esis amam nematawai.
44017020	Afa' wagahembe'ma basef ine'imi ma ogawam. Owa', anom basef. Ea' dei' afa' wa'i ogawa basef amama ofagema.”
44017021	Esis Atens hiesi saloma epes anona wambelisi safi'i sape Atensi, ina safi'i sanda' anona maol, owa'. Esis sape nimeguf hiami sape sa'i basef atom dambaimi ma seme' anom basef dambaimi.
44017022	Ea' Pol naitu la'afena amam gawaimi mandatama etifigin halaf Areopagusi na'ipasam na'i, “Ipe' epes Atensipei, ae' ati ipe' la'ifipa endilisi ma amamaga hiami panda' lotumami.
44017023	Do'ok ae' afo'o ati amamaga amama ipe' panda' lotumami ea' ati anona otam ipe' panda' ofa panda' lotumanai wapoti', esis sanda' anom basef mail otam anama ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘god anama ape' owa' mogawa agilinamae.’ Ipe' panda' lotuma anama ipe' owa' pegawa agilinama, dei' ae' awalapa basef alihim a'ipipana.
44017024	God nanda' etap naloma ape' epes maloma amamaga mape etap anae', anan Dembinai ma ilif etapi. Anan ina nape nomona ifagw lotumi epes sanda'am lagufi, owa'.
44017025	Anan atona nase'asa ambal namunai naloma hiami epes hiesi. Ea' Anan ina anom amamaga a'ana ma epes sigiambamana sose'ana anom amamaga, owa'.
44017026	Aman atona anan God nanda' epes amam nematawa hiesi sataga etap anae'. Ea' nanda'as sape etap hiagoma. Anan atona nanda' nimeguf ma'uma'um mandahama esis sape eti. Ea' nandandepa etap nafe' neatambela naloma wambel asasima.
44017027	God nanda'am na'ama ma esis sogolopa anona sombale'efana. I'i esis sogolopana sefe' sombale'efana o owa'? Anan ina nape laogona ape' hiapai atona etin, owa'. Nape felefele'ma ape' hiapai.
44017028	Si'i anona aman ipe'inai na'i basef na'i, ‘Ape' mofa' ambal namunai ma anan ea' nase'apa pepel, dei' maitu mafe'.’ Si'i anom amam gawaimi ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Ape' wapoti' awasi ananipai.’ ”
44017029	Ea' Pol na'ipam wapoti' na'i, “Ape' mape awasi Godi. Na'ama ape' ina ukup mi'i anan si'i ambal atona epes sanda' otamba gol siliwa sanda'anai, owa'. Anama ina ukup epesi atom ma'i sanda'ana gawa asasinai, owa'.
44017030	Fowa' gani epes owa' seagawanai, God ina na'i basef mamumami ma amamaga hiami esis sanda'am nogota anama, owa'. Ea' dei' anan na'ipas na'i mehip epes hiesi ma wambel etap hiagoma na'i, ‘Ipe' pemboma opalef pila Ae'.’
44017031	Anan nandandepa anona nemaf ea' ma nonda' basefa kot, nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai. Basefa kot ananinai mofe' bo'om andeande'. Anan nandandepa anona aman ea' ma nohapila kot anama. Aman anama naga' ea' God nafelona wapoti' hi'agif. Amama atom dei' epes hiesi sape etap hiagomai sogawa basef amama endilisimi atoma anan anona nemaf nonda'mas kot anama.”
44017032	Esis same' basef amama ma epes sohafel wapoti' hi'agif ea' enis sa'i basef sanda' iafana. Ea' enis sa'i, “Wila, ape' ma'i nambimb mome' basef ine'imi wapoti' ma amamaga amama.”
44017033	Ea' Pol nakwaha amam mogawa gawai mandatama etifigin mapeinai ea' nafe'.
44017034	Ea' enis epes kwaie'wis sombale'efa Jisas saila Pol safe'. Epes isima Dionisius, anan nagawa gawai ma amam mandatama etifigin Areopagus naloma ano'w nemata'w agili'wa Damaris saloma enis epes wapoti'.
44018001	Ea' Pol nakwaha Atens nafe' anona wambel Korin.
44018002	Ea' nati anona aman Judainai agilinama Akwila. Mamasana solana nataga Pontus. Nimbewa' nakwaha etap hiagoma Itali nafi'i naloma waulu'mana Prisila. Dei' main, Klodius nape dembinai gavman Romunai na'ipa esis Juda mehipa sokwaha Rom sotanima sefe'. Ea' Pol nafe' na'i niti esis bias.
44018003	Ea' nape nanda' maol naloma esis. Dei' main, anan nanda' maol anama atona naloma esis sofa' otamba maima sagundisa sel sanda'am sala' ifagwami.
44018004	Nimeguf hiami esis Juda sapoma noma'wanai, Pol nafe' ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai ea' na'i nofela ukup asasimi ma sombale'efa Jisas, esis Juda saloma esis Grik wapoti'.
44018005	Sailas naloma Timoti makwaha etap hiagoma Masedonia mafi'i Pol napoma, nogota anama Pol nakwaha maol anama nagundisa sel ea' la'ela'ef nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi nimeguf hiami. Nawalapa basef la'ifimi esis Juda na'ama na'i, “Jisas anan Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i.”
44018006	Ea' esis Juda sosambala basef ananimi sanda' anan findiwana. Ea' nanda'masa anona ikwaf nihi'ambasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Nandilama sopof usas mail luwaguf ananimi ma'oma esis na'ipasa basef la'ifimi na'i, “I'i ipe' hegililipa, ofagema ipe'imi atom. Ae' basef a'e ma amama. Dei' ae' efe'ma iwalipa amam nematawa isima owa' Judaisi.”
44018007	Ea' Pol nakwaha ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawisi ande' nafe' anona ipat notawa felefele'ma ipat anama ea' nape la'ela'ef. Ipat anama anona amani, agel ananinai Titius Jastus. Aman anama nogawa God nanda' lotumanai.
44018008	Anona aman agilinai numafi lotu esis Judai Krispus. Anan naloma esis wambota ananisi hiesi sombale'efa Dembinai. Ea' esis Korin hiesi same' basef Pol nawalipasami sombale'efa Jisas sofa' baptais.
44018009	Anona owamb Pol nati anom amamaga si'i na'oh nandondo'oh, Dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ina umbamahena nesopama malogel, owa'. Newalapa basef ni'iam.
44018010	Dei' main, ae' ape alomena. Amam nematawa hiesi sape taun wambel anama esis ae'asi. Na'ama ina enin epen nehafel nehambombagena, owa'.”
44018011	Ea' Pol nape wambel anama Korin nogota launai afagel si'inai tu'waninai ea' na'ipasa basef Godi nawalipasam.
44018012	Anona nemaf anona aman agilinama Galio nataga nape gavman dembinai ma etap hiagoma esis Grik sapoma. Nogota anama esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'mam sombalo' Pol sofa'ana safe'ma kot sambaso'mana sa'i,
44018013	“Aman anama nafela ukup esis amam nematawai ma sosambala basefa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ape'inai sanda' lotuma Goda anona waf.”
44018014	Pol na'i nogwa basef, Galio na'ipa esis Juda na'i, “I'i aman anama nowala lo nonda' anona waf aonai ma pa'i penda'mana basef, ae' eme' basef ipe'imi.
44018015	Ea' owa'. Ipe' pafi'i pahali'ima enda' kota basef maloma anom agofa mi'uli ipe'inai atona. Ea' hapaimi, ipe' etipa penandondombam. Ae' andaiwa'ma eme' kota amamaga na'amaimi, owa'.”
44018016	Ea' anan natofa esis sakwaha kot safe'.
44018017	Ea' esis sombalo' Sostenes agilinai numafi lotu esis Judai, sahana felefele'ma anama esis wambelisi sanda' kota. Ea' Galio ina okom napoma amamaga amama, owa'. Nape natolom etin.
44018018	Pol ata' nape nimeguf hiami wambel anama Korin naloma esis Kristen. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis nakwahis nalata sip. Sip nakwaha wambel anama na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Siria. Akwila naloma Prisila safe' salomana. Nemaf anama Pol owa' ata' nolata sip, anan natopa' auf balaga wambel anama Senkria. Dei' main, anan na'i basef la'ifimi naloma Goda na'i nonda' anom amamaga.
44018019	Esis safe' sataga Efesus, Pol nakwaha esis Prisila kwaloma Akwila wambel anama. Ea' anan atona nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai naloma esis Juda sa'i basef nawalipasa basef Godi ma nefela ukup asasimi sombale'efa Jisas.
44018020	Ea' sa'ipana sa'i, “Ine' nepe nogota laona nelomapa.” Ea' na'i, “Ae' nambimb wila.”
44018021	Ea' na'i nemaf bu'unai ma esis na'i, “I'i God ni'i aho'me, anona nemaf itanimai ifi'i itilipa.” Ea' nakwaha Efesus nafe' sip.
44018022	Sip nafe' nail Sisaria, Pol nisila' nafe' Jerusalem nanda'mas nemaf bu'unai naloma esis Kristen hiesi. Ea' nafe' Antiok.
44018023	Pol napani nogota launai kwaukwawie' Antiok ea' notanima nafe' wapoti' anona wambel hiagoma ganigani ma etap hiagoma Galesia naloma Frigia fowa' nali' nafe'ma. Ea' nanda' maol nanda' esis Kristen hiesi sataga la'ifis ma sombale'efa Krais.
44018024	Anona Judainai aman Aleksandriainai nafi'i nape Efesus. Agel ananinai Apolos. Anan na'i basef bu'wami atom, nogawa buk Baibel andeande'.
44018025	Fowa' enis sawalipana ma eaf Dembinai ea' dei' la'ifina endilisi ma na'ipas andeande' amamaga Jisas nanda'ami. Ea' anan nogawa basefa baptais Joni atom.
44018026	Ea' nafe' ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nawalipasa basef. Anan ina umbamahana ma esis amam nematawa, owa'. Prisila kwaloma Akwila same' anan sao'wana safe' ipat asasinai sihi'ambana anom basef wapoti' ma eaf Godi ma nogawa basef ofagema.
44018027	Ea' Apolos na'i nefe' esis Krik sapoma ea' esis Kristen sape Efesusi sanda' okom ananinai nataga la'ifina ma nanda'as na'ama. Esis sanda' anom basef mafe'ma esis Kristen Grikisi sa'ipasa sofa'ana. Apolos nafe' nataga Grik sapoma, nati enis amam nematawa sombale'efa Jisasi. Fowa' God nati uwahipis nagiambamas sembale'efana. Dei' Apolos nanda' maol nagiambama Kristen isima andeande' nanda'as sataga la'ifis ma sombale'efa Krais.
44018028	Anan la'ifina endilisi ma nagwa basef esis Judai ma naep esis amam nematawai. Anan la'ifina nalomas nandahihianama natalogofas nikila'as. Ama nihi'ambamasa basef alihima buk Baibela Jisas Anan Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i.
44019001	Apolos nape Korin, nogota anama Pol nafe' wambel anama nape nomona halafutagw ea' nafe' nataga Efesus nati enis Kristen.
44019002	Ea' nahali'as na'i, “Fowa' ipe' pembale'efa Jisas pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi?” Ea' esis sa'i, “Ata' owa'. Ape' ina mame' basefa anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi Holi Spirit nape, owa'.”
44019003	Ea' Pol na'ipas na'i, “Dei' ipe' pefa' baptaisa main?” Ea' sa'i, “Ape' mofa' baptais Joni.”
44019004	Ea' Pol na'i, “Fowa' Jon napisi'as embeli na'iam na'i, ‘Ipe' pemboma opalef pewa' alafugaha waf aonai pefe'ma God pefa' baptais. Ea' pembale'efa aman anama Dembinai nambimb nigi'ma ae' nifi'i. Aman anama anan Jisas.’ ”
44019005	Esis same' basef amama, sembale'efa Dembinai Jisas sofa' baptaisa agel Ananinai.
44019006	Ea' Pol nawamona lagofa esis, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafi'mai esis nafelas sa'i diga naninani sawalapa basef si'i amam profet ma'iami.
44019007	Esis seamba epes isima sataga felefele'ma 12-peleis.
44019008	Ea' Pol nafe' nawis ipat esis Juda sa'i basef sapeinai nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi. Anan nanda'am na'ama etin nape aomb wanemb. Ina umbamahana, owa'. Anan la'ifina na'ipas. Anan naloma esis sape sa'i basef etin, na'ipasa nefela ukup asasimi ma sogawa siowis nomon wambota Godi numafias la'ela'ef.
44019009	Ea' enis sasopama opalef la'ifis endilisi, ina sombale'efa Jisas, owa'. Esis sa'i basef awami ma eaf Dembinai ma naep esis amam nematawai. Ea' dei' Pol nakwaha esis hiesi nao'wa esis Kristen etis safe' salomana. Ea' Pol nawalapa basef nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ipat anama Tiranusi, anama sawalipasa basefa.
44019010	Ea' nanda'am na'ama etin nape afagof biam. Esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagoma Esiai wambel hiagoma same' basef Dembinai, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
44019011	God nagiambama Pol nanda' pepel la'ifinai hianai si'i God nanda'anai.
44019012	Esis sati amama, sofa' hankisip luwaguf maima sanogam alop Poli, sofa'as safe'ma esis awes nanda'asi. Esis sanda'am na'ama, awes hianai hi'alana ea' ambagof awami makwaha esis mafe'.
44019013	Ea' anom Juda mafe' ganigani manda' bisnisa maol anama matofa ambagof awami. Mati maol Pol nanda'anai ma'i motofa ambagof awami ma waf anama. Ma'iam na'ama atona etin ma'i, “Agel Jisas anama Pol nawalapa basefanai, afa' wa'ipipa mehip endilisi ma pekwaha epes isima piwisi ande'.”
44019014	Ea' anona aman Judainai pris dembinai agel ananinai Skeva. Nogamana ananimi 7-peleim manda' waf anama ma'i motofa ambagof awami ma agel Jisasi.
44019015	Ea' aman anama ambal aonai napainai nagwa basefa amam na'ama na'i, “Ae' egawa Jisas naloma Pol. Ea' ipe' emi egafipa? Ae' ina egawepa.”
44019016	Ea' aman anama ambal aonai napainai fete'ana nalatawa amam ea' naham nanda'am aom kwapete'am nahambombaga alop amamunai nahape' luwaguf maim amamumi makwaha ipat anama mafa' mafe' alop wafifina.
44019017	Ea' epes hiesi sape Efesusi, Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisi wapoti' same' basef amama ea' umbamahas kwapete'as. Ea' safela agel Dembinai Jisasi lu'una.
44019018	Amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efanai safi'i sawalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai sa'iana.
44019019	Ea' isima hiesi sanda' naoh awami mamumami satamai buk amama hiami sanda' mu'uhup ma'akw naoh mailanai saofana nifa naep esis amam nematawai. Esis seamba otamba ma'um ma satala buk amama mataga 50,000 kina.
44019020	Sanda' waf anama, ea' basef Dembinai mataga la'ifim mawalapai pepel Ananinai nataga lu'una endilisi mafe'agon hi'alagon.
44019021	Amama mafe' ea', okom Poli nohafel la'ifina na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Masedonia esis Grik sapoma ea' nefe' Jerusalem. Anan na'iam na'i, “Ae' efe' anama ea' efe' iti Rom wapoti'.”
44019022	Ea' nasapa' amam biam magiambamanai Timoti naloma Erastus mafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia. Ea' Pol ata' nape etap hiagoma Esia anom nimeguf wapoti'.
44019023	Nogota anama enis epes sanda' naumbih saloma eaf bu'unai Dembinai sanda' aga lu'unai sindininifama sa'i mehip.
44019024	Anona aman agilinama Demitrius, aman anama nanda' amamaga hiami ma anona kapa siliwa. Anan ofagonama nanda' bisnis nanda' ifagw so'uso'umi endilisi manda' kapa siliwa manda'ami. Ea' mandati si'i ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma god nemata'w akwama Artemis. Ea' nase'ama maol amam manda' maol siliwai mofa' otamba lu'wami.
44019025	Ea' natagama amam amama maloma anom amam manda' maol atifina si'i amam manda'anai na'i, “Ipe' pegawa ape' mofa' otamba lu'wami maol anama atona.
44019026	Ea' aman anama Pol na'ipa amam nematawa hiesi saila anona waf namboma ukup asasimi, amama ipe' patolom pegawam! Anan ina nanda'am na'ae Efesus atogon, owa'. Anan nanda'am mafe'agon hi'alagon felefele'ma etap hiagoma Esia anama hiagoma. Anan na'i, ‘Amam god ape' manda' lagof manda'ami, amama ina god endilisimi, owa'.’
44019027	Basef amama Poli nambimb mohambombaga maola bisnis ape'imi. Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Basef amama ananimi mohambombaga ipat lu'unai god ape'ikwi nemata'w dembe'wi Artemis. Ea' kotaga falafu'wi ma naep esis amam nematawai ma ukup asasimi. Dei' esis sape etap hiagoma Esiai hiesi saloma epes hiesi sape etap hiagomai wapoti' sanda' lotuma god ape'ikwi nemata'w akwama ato'w. Ea' basef Poli ma'i mohambombaga agel lu'unai akwa'unai.”
44019028	Amam manda' maoli mame' basef amama, ukup amamumi wandafum endilisi moga ma'i mehip ma'i, “Artemis ape' Efesusi akwa'w ato'w Dembe'wi agel lu'unai.”
44019029	Ea' epes hiesi sape taun anama sanda'am sa'i mehip endilisi. Ea' sohafel safe' anama sondowa'anima sa'i basefa. Sahondo' Gaius naloma Aristarkus Masedoniaimi mafi'i maloma Poli mafe' maloma esis.
44019030	Pol na'i nefe' ni'ipa esis amam nematawa la'afisa, ea' esis Kristen sili'akwana.
44019031	Anom amam mape gavman dambami ma etap hiagoma Esiai amam alupumi Poli masapa' basef mafe'ma anan. Ea' ma'ipana mehipa ina nefe' nuwis anama sandatama sape sanifa basefa, owa'.
44019032	Amam nematawa isima epes hiesi ukup asasimi ea' mololas endilisi. Enis soga sa'i mehip sa'i anom basef, enis sa'i anom basef. Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi ina sogawa esis safi'i sandakolasa main.
44019033	Esis Juda sasapa' Aleksander nafe' la'afena esis saitu sa'i basefa. Ama sa'i anan ni'ipasa anom basef. Ea' Aleksander nafela lagel na'i nogwamasa basef esis amam nematawa.
44019034	Ea' satolona sogawa anan Judainai. Na'ama dei' hiesi sandame'mam na'ama etin sakolasa malogof atom sa'i, “Artemis ape' Efesusi akwa'w ato'w dembe'wi agel lu'unai.” Esis sa'i mehip na'ama etin sape la'ela'ef nogota launai awa biefina.
44019035	Ea' kaunsel agilinai esis Efesusi na'ipasa basef la'ifimi esis amam nematawa na'i, “Ipe' epes Efesusipei, esis hiesi sape wambel hiagoma sogawa Efesus taun ape'inai numafi ipat lu'unai sanda' lotuma god dembe'wi Artemisi, taun anama numafi otam nowai heven ilifi.
44019036	Ina anona aman nasambala basef amama, owa'. Ipe' feso'mepa pepan. Ipe' ina penda' anom amamaga mehip, owa'.
44019037	Ipe' pefa'ai amam amama biam mafi'i na'ae. Ea' amam ina makowalopa anom amamaga ma ipat lu'unai ape' manda' lotuwanai, owa'. Amam ina ma'i basef findiwami ma god nemata'w ape'ikwi, owa'.
44019038	I'i Demitrius noloma amam manda' maola anani mi'i monda' basefa epen emi, anona nemaf monda'ama kot. Amam jas mape. Amam Demitriusami mi'ipam.
44019039	I'i ipe' penda' anom basef wapoti', penandonam anama sandatama sa'i basefa nogota anama dambami gavman mape meme' basef.
44019040	Amam dambami gavman Rom nambimb monda'mapa basef o owa'? Ape' ina mogawa. Dei' maina ape' mafela wandaf manda'ana dei' nemaf anae'? Ofagema owa'etin endilisi ma amamaga amama. I'i amam dambami Rom mihali'apa ma amamaga ofagema ma mandakolas anama, ape' ina anom basefa mogwam, owa'.”
44019041	Kaunsel agilinai na'iam ea', nasapa' esis amam nematawa safe'.
44020001	Esis sa'i basef awanami, Pol nofalai esis Kristen safi'mai anan, na'ipasa anom basef nanda' opalef asasimi mataga la'ifim. Ea' nanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis nakwahis nafe' etap hiagoma Masedonia.
44020002	Anan nafe' anama hiagoma nawalipasa basef hiami esis Kristen nanda' opalef asasimi mataga la'ifim. Ea' nafe' nataga etap hiagoma esis Grik sapoma.
44020003	Anan nape aomb wanom etap anama. Na'i nofa' sip nefe etap hiagoma Siria ea' nogawa esis Juda sa'i basef sandame'mama sohana noga'. Ea' nanindifa okom ananinai na'i notanima nefe' nuwis etap hiagoma Masedonia la'afen.
44020004	Sopater Beriainai, Pirus nogalomana nafe' nalomana. Ea' amam biam Tesalonaikaimi Aristarkus naloma Sekundus naloma Gaius Derbeinai. Naloma Timoti maloma amam biam Esiaimi Tikikus naloma Trofimus, amam amama mafe' maloma Pol.
44020005	Amam mali'afa mafe' mape mohafafa Troas.
44020006	Nimeguf amama esis Juda sagwa' gwa'aimi saloma bret owa' niatifi, yis a'anai. Nimeguf amama mafe'ma hi'alam, afa' walata anona sip wakwaha Filipai ea' wafe'. Wafe', nimeguf wanom biam mafe' hi'alam watagama amam mali' mafi'i Troas mape wik si'ina.
44020007	Nemaf Sarere owamb afa' wandakolas waloma esis Kristen ma' gwa'aimi atogon ea' mofa' komunion gwa'aimi Jisasi. Naman Pol na'i nefe'. Na'ama nawalipasa basef nafe' nafe' akita amanota.
44020008	Rum anama lamifah hiami motaol anama ape' mandatama etifigin mapoma ilif.
44020009	Ea' anona aman so'unai agilinama Yutikus natoma windoa. Pol ata' na'i basef mafe' etin, Yutikus ambeh mahana naep ma'i mose'ana na'oh ea' na'oh nelola endilisi. Rum anama wenifina nape ilifi la'afen, anan nowai gani ilif laogoma nafe' etap. Ea' esis sisila' safe' sofa'anai ea' sati afuna endilisi.
44020010	Ea' Pol nisila' nasisil nowa natoma aman anama so'unai nahapila lagel ananinai na'iam na'i, “Ipe' ina pehafel gegelalasipa ukup aom, owa'. Ambal ata' napaina.”
44020011	Ea' Pol nao'was sotanima salata ipat ilif wapoti', nawala bret sa'ana. Ea' Pol na'i basef laumi wapoti' nalomas nafe' nataga lala. Ea' Pol nakwahis nafe'.
44020012	Aman anama so'unai nape namunai ambal napaina ea' sofa'ana safe' sambe'ana ipat ananinai, opalef asasimi ambo'om wapoti'.
44020013	Afa' wali' wafe' walata sip ea' wafe' wataga Asos. Afa' wa'i ogolopa Pol Asos ofa'ana ofe' sip. Dei' main, do'ok Pol nali' na'ipafa basef na'i nili' nefe' etap notaga Asos.
44020014	Ea' Pol nafi'i natolofa wambel anama Asos ea' ofa'ana wafe' sip wafe' Mitilini.
44020015	Ea' sip nofa'afa wakwaha Mitilini wa'oh ama lala wataga felefele'ma anona ailan Kios. Ea' wa'oh lala wafe' wataga anona ailan Samos. Ea' wa'oh lala wafe' wataga Miletus.
44020016	Pol nanindifa okom ananinai la'ifina na'i amam mikila' Efesus. Anan nandaiwa'ma nope etin anom nimeguf etap hiagoma Esia, owa'. Na'i nefe' ulal Jerusalem nemaf anama sa'i Pentikos.
44020017	Afa' wataga Miletus, Pol nasapa' basef mafe' Efesus nofala amam agufumi esis Kristeni mufi'mai anan.
44020018	Ea' mafi'i matagamana na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' pegawa ma waf ae' ali' anda'ana nemaf nali'i dambadamba anama ae' ataga etap hiagoma Esia la'ela'ef ape alomepa.
44020019	Ipe' pegawa nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef esis Juda sa'i basef sa'i sogolope sehe ega'. Amama atom ae' efa' nimanimi magwamba ae'. Owa'. Ae' anda' agel ae'anai nafe' owin endilisi, efa' nimanimi ea' embif maluwi naep ma anda' maol Dembinai.
44020020	Ea' ae' ina umbamahe ma awalapa basef hiami ma agiambamepa, owa'. Anama ipe' pandakolas awalipipa ea' awalipipa ifagw ipe'imi nomon wapoti'. Amama ipe' pegawam.
44020021	Ae' a'i basef la'ifimi ma esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti' ma sowa' alafugaha waf aonai somboma opalef sefe'ma God, sombale'efa dembinai ape'inai Jisas.
44020022	Ea' ipe' peme', dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'anai aila anan atona. Amama atom dei' ae' efe' Jerusalem. Nambimb maim motagame ganima, ae' ina egawa amamaga amama, owa'.
44020023	Ae' egawa amama atom. Anama ae' afe'ma, wambel hiagoma Ambal Godi nihi'ambe basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, ‘Ine' nambimb niti esis sese'ena nimanimi ea' sonda'ena nenda' kalabus.’
44020024	Ea' ae' ina okom napoma ambal ae'anai atona nope, owa'. Ea' ina la'ifiwi ma ihapila ambal ae'anai la'ifina, owa'. Ae' a'i ila eaf anama ilana efe' embefana. Ae' a'i enda'ana hi'ilana andeande' maol anama Dembinai Jisas nasi'ianai. Maol anama ewalapa basef bu'wami Godi nagiambamapa na'a nofa'apa motanimani.
44020025	Ea' ipe' peme'. Fowa' ae' afe' la'afena ipe' hipei awalapa basefa epes hiesi siowis nomona wambota Godi numafias. Ea' dei' egawa, namanani ipe' hipei ina piti amaga ae'anai wapoti', owa'.
44020026	Ea' dei' ae' a'ipipa. I'i enin epen ipe'ini awen higililan, amama ina ofagema ae'ami, owa'. Ofagema ipe'imi atom.
44020027	Dei' main, ae' ina umbamahe ma a'ipipa basefa okom hianai Godi, owa'. A'ipipam hi'alam.
44020028	Ipe' pimafi ipe' andeande' ea' pimafi esis amam nematawa isima Ambal Bu'unai Godi nandandepepa ea' ma pimafiasi. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' ma pimafi esis Kristen sios Godi andeande' si'i sanda' maoli sumafi sipsip andeande'. God natala esis Kristen ea' ma esimbel ananimi atom.
44020029	Ae' egawa atuwasi ikwahipa efe', nambimb anom amam awami si'i nombagw wandafumi mufi'i motaga la'afena ipe' ea' mohambombaga esis Kristen si'i nombagw maha sipsip.
44020030	Ea' enis epes ipe'isi etis sohafel si'i basef baso'maimi atoma somboma ukup esis Kristeni sefe' silas.
44020031	Ipe' dei' pindumafuma andeande' la'ela'ef. Ipe' ukup mopoma amama afagof amama wanom la'ela'ef owamb alip ae' ina apoma noma'w ma awalipipa afela ukup ipe' hipei atona etin, owa'. Awalipipa aloma embif maluwi naep ae'ami.
44020032	Dei' anda'epa ukup mopoma God noloma basef ananimi. Basef amama ma'ipipa Anan okom nainailipa ma nagiambamepa etin. Amama la'ifima monda'epa petaga la'ifipa mose'epa amamaga bu'wami atom God nase'asam amam nematawa anan nanda'as bo'wes ea' Ananisi etis.
44020033	Ae' ina kowalema otamba siliwa gol luwaguf maim enin epeni, owa'.
44020034	Ipe' etipa pegawa ae' atowe anda' maol agiambama ae' aloma amam mape malumai ma anom amamaga a'afa.
44020035	Maol hianai ae'anai, ae' ahi'ambepa ma ape' monda' maol la'ifipa migiambama isima emi egafis owa' la'ifisa sigiambama esesi. Ea' ape' ukup mopoma basef amama Dembinai Jisas na'iami. Anan na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Danifel enin epen nese'as amamaga anasi nikila' danifel epen inima nefa'ami. God nofalo'ma epen inima nikila' inima nefa'asi.’ ”
44020036	Pol nanda' basef amama ma ea', nindiwa nembawa nanda' beten naloma agufumi amama.
44020037	Amam hiami malef kwapete'am mandalulupatanima ea' mombalo' Pol masisi'amana dalogw.
44020038	Doko' Pol nali' na'i basef na'i, “Atuwasi ipe' ina piti amaga ae'anai wapoti', owa'.” Amam mame' basef ananimi hiami hi'alam. Ea' basef amama tu'wanim atom manda' opalef amamumi nimanim endilisi. Ea' maitumana nafe' nalata sip.
44021001	Afa' wakwaha agufumi wafe' walata sip nakwaha Miletus ea' nafe'. Afa' usi'ifa wafe' naoh wataga Kos. Ama wafilu wafe' wataga Rodes. Ea' wakwaha Rodes wafe' wataga Patara wakwaha sip anama ukila'i wape.
44021002	Ea' wati anona sip na'i nefe' Fonisia ea' walata anama nakwaha anama ea' nafe'.
44021003	Ea' wati ailan anama Saiprus wikila'agon nape da'isinaima. Afa' wafe' wataga etap hiagoma Siria ea' wafe' wataga wail Tair. Esis sa'i sowafa hiahaom ma sip anama wambel anama.
44021004	Ea' afa' wafe' wagolopa enis Kristen watilis ea' wape walomas wik si'ina. Ea' Ambal Godi nafela ukup esis Kristeni ma sa'ipa Pola ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'.
44021005	Nogota afa'inai hi'alana wambel anama, wa'i a' ofe'. Amam Kristen maloma awasi nematawa amamisi saitumafa wafe' wawis ande'ma taun anama. Ea' ape' mindiwa nembawa manda' beten naoh akata.
44021006	Ea' esis sa'i basef sandanifel salomafa ma mondaso'ama lagof etin ea' sotanima safe' ifagw asasimi, afa' wafe' sip.
44021007	Afa' wafe' sip wakwaha Tair wafe' wataga Tolemes. Ea' wape wanda'masa nemaf bu'unai esis Kristen wape walomas nemaf atotona.
44021008	Ama wafilu wakwaha Tolemes wafe' wataga Sisaria wakwaha sip ea' wafe' ipat anona aman Filip nawalipasa basef Godi wape walomana. Anan anona ma amam amama 7-peleimi fowa' mandandepam Jerusalemi ma magiambama amam aposel.
44021009	Anan nola nematawa biawai biawa, ina dei' waso' amam, ata' owa'. God nase'awa gawa wawalapa basef ananimi si'i profet.
44021010	Afa' wape Sisaria anom nimeguf wapoti' ea' anona profet agilinama Agabus nakwaha etap hiagoma Judia nakini'i Sisaria.
44021011	Anan nafi'mai afa' nofa' let Poli nowa' bo'wagah maloma lagof ananimi atom. Ea' na'iam na'ama na'i, “Spirit Ambal Godi na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Amam Juda mape Jerusalemi nambimb mowa' aman anama ofagenama let anama. Ea' mose'ana nefe'ma lagof anom amam mololama Godi.’ ”
44021012	Afa' wame' basef amama ea' waloma esis wambel anamaisi wapoti' wa'ipa Pol mehip wa'i anan ina nefe' Jerusalem, owa'.
44021013	Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' palef endilisi ma panda' okom ae'anai aona? Ae' ina andandombama enda' kalabus etin, owa'. Ae' andandombama eaga' wapoti' Jerusalema efela agel Dembinai Jisasi.”
44021014	Ea' afa' ina la'ififama osambala okom ananinai, owa'. Ea' afa' ukup mase'afa ma basef amama wa'i, “Okom Dembinai notaga.”
44021015	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', afa' wandondomba amamaga afa'imi ma ofe' Jerusalem.
44021016	Ea' enis alupusi saila Jisasi Sisariaisi safe' salomafa. Esis saitumafa wafe' ipat Nasoni, anan Saiprusinai nataga Kristen fowa'inai. Anan na'i afa' atuwasi ope ipat ananinai.
44021017	Ea' wafe' wataga Jerusalem, esis Kristen sandanifela sofa'afa.
44021018	Ama wafilu nemaf gi'maifi Pol nafe' nalomafa ma niti Jems. Ea' amam agufumi hiami ma esis Kristeni mape malomana.
44021019	Pol nanda'mam nemaf bu'unai ea' na'ipama amamaga hiami ma God nagiambamana nanda'am la'afena esis amam nematawa epes hiesi sololama Godi.
44021020	Amam mame'am ea', mafela agel Godi lu'una. Ea' ma'ipa Pol ma'i, “Sahalomafa, ine' negawa esis Juda tausen hiesi endilisi sombale'efa Jisas sataga Kristen. Ea' Kristen isima hiesi la'ifis endilisi ma saila mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai.
44021021	Ea' enis epes sambaso'mas sa'ipasa ine' na'ama sa'i, ‘Pol na'ipa esis Juda safe' sape salomas anona wambel enis epes hiesi owa' Judaisi. Na'ipasa esis sokwaha mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai.’ Anan na'i, ‘Ipe' ina petopa' alopa amam so'umi ipe'imi ea' ipe' ina ata' pilana wapoti' waf fowa'inai, hapainai.’ Enis epes some' basef ine' na'iami dei' sa'iam na'ama.
44021022	Ape' mogawa endilisi atuwasi esis Kristen Judaisi some' basefa ine' nafi'i nataga. Na'ama dei' afa' ata' onda'am wi'imama?
44021023	Ea' afa' wa'i wi'ipina anona wafa ine' nenda'ana na'ama. Afa' anom amam biamibiam ma'i basef endilisimi maloma Goda monda' anom amamaga.
44021024	Ea' ine' ne'wa amam pila waf anama nenda'epa petaga bo'wepa ma naep Godi. Ine' netal otamba amamumi wapoti' amam migi'ma waf esis Judai ma mando balagah amamumi. Ine' nenda'am na'ama, epes hiesi sogawa basef amama esis sanda'menam ine'i, amama baso'maimi atom. Ea' sogawa ine' naila mi'uli anama.
44021025	Ea' esis Kristen owa' Judaisi, ape' manda' basef mafe'masi ma'ipasa basef amama fowa' mowa'ami. Esis sindumafuma sope andeande' na'ama. Esis ina sea' mafis saham saso' god baso'amunai ea' ina sea' esimbel ea' ina sea' mafis amama sowa' bagafowa ma afumi ea' ina sonda' waf aonai so'a waulanai, owa'.”
44021026	Ea' Pol nao'wa amam amama ma wafilu naila waf hianai ma nonda' anan nataga bo'ona ma naep Godi noloma amam. Anan nanda'am na'ama nafe' nawis ipat lu'unai Godi na'ipa amam pris. Na'ipama nemaf anama atuwasi anan no'wa amam amama mifi'i ma amam pris monda' ofa mondolali ma amam atona etina motaga bo'oma naep Godi.
44021027	Nimeguf amama 7-peleim felefele'ma hi'ilam, anom Juda mape etap hiagoma Esiai mati Pol nape nomon ipat lu'unai Godi ea' mafela ukup esis amam nematawa hiesi ma mombale'ana.
44021028	Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i, “Ipe' epes Israelipei, pigiambamapa aman anama na'ipa epes hiesi wambel hiagoma nasambala epes hiesi Israela mi'uli anama Godi fowa' gani Moses nawalipasanai naloma ipat lu'unai Godi wapoti'. Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Anan nao'wai enis epes owa' Judaisi safi'i sawisi nomon ipat anama sanda'ana aona.”
44021029	Dei' main, fowa' amam mati anona aman Trofimus Efesusinai owa' Judainai nape naloma Pol taun anama. Ea' amam ukup ma'i Pol nao'wana mafe' mawis nomon ipat anama. Owa'etin. Mambaso'mas.
44021030	Ea' amama atom dei' esis hiesi sape Jerusalemi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as ma basef amama sa'i sonda' wandaf. Ea' sasagih safi'i sondowa'anima sawis ipat nomon sombalo' Pol sahonde'ana nawisi ande'. Ea' mehip etin sowalowa utagw ipat anama.
44021031	Esis sa'i soha Pol noga', ea' basef mafe' matagama soldia dembinai numafi amam soldiai. Basef ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Esis Jerusalem hiesi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'as sa'i sonda' wandaf.”
44021032	Ea' mehip anan nao'wa anom soldia masagih makini' ma esis hiesi. Ea' amam Juda mati anan ofisa dembinai nao'wa amam soldia, makwaha Pol ina ata' mahana wapoti', owa'.
44021033	Soldia anama dembinai nafi'i felefele' nombalo' Pol na'ipa amam soldia mowa' lagof ananimi sen biefina. Ea' nahali' esis na'i, “Anan emi? Anan nanda' main?”
44021034	Amam nematawa hiesi sohafel sa'i basef. Ea' esis ina sagwam mafe' etifigin, owa'. Sagwam mafe' deindei. Ea' sanda' salamala Pol sa'i sohana sa'i mehip, ea' ofisa dembinai ina nogawa basef ofagema asasimi, owa'. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ma mo'wa Pol nafe' nuwis ipat amam soldiai.
44021035	Ea' Pol nafe' nataga bulasan salata ipat anama, esis amam nematawa la'ifis endilisi ma sohana. Na'ama amam soldia mafelona mofa'ana mafe'.
44021036	Ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi sa'i mehip sa'i, “Hana ma afuna, hana ma afuna!” Ea' amam soldia mafelana mefa'ana mafe' ma'i muwis ipat.
44021037	Amam soldia ma'i mofa' Pol mofe' muwis ipat amamunai nomon, ea' Pol nahali' ofisa dembinai na'i, “Ae' a'i i'ipina anom basef o owa'?” Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Ine' negawa diga Griki?
44021038	Ae' a'i ine' aman Isipinai fowa' nogota anama nafela wandaf napa' naloma gavmani ea' nao'wa amam 4,000-peleim mahapila bainahi nao'wam mafe' anama wafiguma epes a'agoma.”
44021039	Ea' Pol na'i, “Owa'. Ae' aman Judaiwei. Wambel ae'anai Tarsus etap hiagoma Silisia. Ea' ae' aman anona wambel lu'unai agel lu'unai. Ine' ni'i awi, ae' i'ipasa anom basef esis amam nematawa.”
44021040	Ea' soldia anama na'i aho'mana na'i. Pol naitu bulasan anama, nafela lagel nanda'ana de'inda' ma esis amam nematawa sosopama malogof. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef diga Hibrui.
44022001	Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahin owan poloma ahape, ipe' peme'. Ae' a'i egwa basefa' ipe' dei' ma pegawa ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai, owa'.”
44022002	Esis same' Pol na'i diga Hibrui ea' malogof mase'as sape, ina ata' sanda'am de'inda', owa'.
44022003	Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' Juda. Mama'we ae'akwi kolae wambel Tarsus etap hiagoma Silisia, na'ama ae' ataga dambewe wambel lu'unai anama. Ae' anda' skula dembinai tisa Gameliel ea' nawalipi andeande'ma mi'uli anama hianai amam bafapapa ape'imi. Na'ama ae' okom nohafel la'ifiwi ma aila God si'i ipe' dei' pailana.
44022004	Fowa' ae' anda' maol ahambombaga epes saila eaf anama sombale'efa Dembinaianai. Na'ama aha esis amam nematawa wapoti', a'i ehas soga'. Ea' ewa'as sen efa'as afe' ipat sanda' kalabusanai.
44022005	Pris dembinai naloma amam agufumi hiami esis Judai mogawa andeande'ma mowalapa basef amama endilisimi. Amam mase'e pas manda'asa amam sahin owan amamisi Juda sape Damaskus, ea' ae' afe' Damaskus a'i embalo' esis sape wambel anama ewa'as sen. Ae' a'i efa' esis saila eaf anama sefe' Jerusalem sofa' nimanimi ma amam plisman mohas.
44022006	Ae' afe' ataga felefele'ma Damaskus, aon nahagasom 12 klok. Mehip anagon howalagon nisila'i ilif heven howalagona ae'.
44022007	Ea' ewa etap ame' anona maf na'i na'ama na'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nahambombaga ae'?’
44022008	Ea' ae' agwa basef a'i, ‘Dembinai, ine' emi?’ Ea' na'ipi na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas Nasaratiwei ine' nahambombage.’
44022009	Amam malome maituwi mati howalogon ea' amam ina mame' malogola aman anama na'ipei, owa'.
44022010	Ea' ae' a'i, ‘Dembinai, dei' ae' atuwasi enda' main?’ Ea' Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' hafel nefe' niwis Damaskus ama atuwasi anona aman nofo'o ni'ipina maol hianai Godi na'i ine' neanda'menanai.’
44022011	Howalagon endilisi, na'ama ae' ina ati anom amamaga, owa'. Naep mase'e. Ea' amam amama maitu maloma ae' mahapila lagof ae'ami mofa'e afe' Damaskus.
44022012	Anona aman nape Damaskus agilinama Ananaias. Aman anama naila mi'uli Godi andeande'. Amam nematawa Juda sape Damaskus sa'i anan aman bu'unai.
44022013	Anan nafi'i naitu felefele' ma ae' na'ipi na'i, ‘Owalome Sol, dei' naep inewapoti'.’ Ea' nogota anama atona naep ae'ami mati wapoti'.
44022014	Ea' na'i, ‘God bafapapa ape'imi anan nandandepena ma negawa okom Ananinai ma niti Aman bu'unai. Ama nenda' maol Godi ma neme' basef Ananimi mataga malogel Ananinai.
44022015	Nambimb ine' newalapa basef Ananimi ni'ipa amam nematawa hiesi ma amamaga amama ine' name'am natolom.
44022016	Dei' maina ine' ata' nape nehafana etin? Ine' hafel nefalona nosa'opena nokwahomena waf aonai ine' nanda'anai ma nefa' baptais!’
44022017	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', ae' etanima afi'i Jerusalem, ea' awis anda' beten nomon ipat lu'unai Godi sanda' lotuwanai, si'i a'oh andando'oh.
44022018	Ea' ati Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' mehip nekwaha Jerusalem nefe'. I'i ine' newalapa basef Ae'ami na'ae, ina nambimb seme'ena, owa'.’
44022019	Ea' a'ipa Dembinai a'i, ‘Dembinai, na'ama owa'. Esis sogawa ae' fowa' afe' ifagw hiami esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi embalo' esis amam nematawa hiesi sombale'efa ine' ahas.
44022020	Fowa' esis saha Stiven naga', aman na'ipasa basefa ine' nogota anama aitu felefele' okom ae'anai bo'onama amama. Ae' aitu imafi siogw amamumi amam mahana.’
44022021	Dembinai na'ipi na'i, ‘Ine' fo'o. Nambimb ae' esapa'ena nefe' eaf laogoma ma enis amam nematawa hiesi owa' Judaisi sogawa ae'i.’ ”
44022022	Esis Juda same' basef Poli mafe' matagama basef amama ma'i epes isima ina Judaisi. Ea' esis sa'i mehip sa'i, “Epes amama ina mope etap, owa'. Hana ma afuna!”
44022023	Ea' esis sa'i mehip sowali siogw lagof asasimi sakwaha sopof nalata ilif.
44022024	Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'ipa amam soldia mehipa mo'wana mofe' muwis ipat amam soldiai nomon. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia mohana ma nowalapa basef amama ofagema. Anan na'i nogawa andeande' dei' maina esis sofalana na'ama.
44022025	Ea' amam mowa'ana ma mohana anona let ea' Pol nahali' anona kepten dembinai naitu felefele' na'ama na'i, “A'i lo na'i ipe' wila ma penda' basef na'ama ma aman anama Romunai? Ae' Romuwei. Ipe' ina dei' panda'me kot ea' ma dei' ipe' pahe. Waf anama andeande'?”
44022026	Ea' kepten anama name' basef amama, nafe' na'ipa soldia anama dembinai na'i, “Ine' na'i nanda' main? Aman anama anan Romunai!”
44022027	Ea' soldia anama dembinai nafi'mai Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' kipa ae'. Ine' aman Romunai?” Pol nagwamana basef na'i, “A'e.”
44022028	Ea' soldia anama dembinai na'i, “Ae' akwaha otamba hiami atala pepa ma ataga aman Romuwei.” Ea' Pol na'i, “Ae' owa'. Mamase esis Romisi. Ea' ae' wapoti' Romuwei.”
44022029	Ea' amam amama mahali'ana ma'i meahanai, owa'. Amam umbamaham mandafa'mana. Ea' soldia anama dembinai okokoma Pol anan Romunai ea' na'ipama mowa'ana sen. Ea' anan wapoti' umbamahana.
44022030	Wafilu soldia anama na'i nogawa andeande' amam Juda ma'i basefa maina waf Pol nanda'anai. Ea' soldia anama natagahamana sen ea' nasapa' basef mafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti mifi'i mondowa'anima mope. Ea' anan nao'wa Pol nafi'i nahaponana naitu naep amamumi.
44023001	Pol nati amam Juda dembami mumafi koti la'ifina ea' na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' afe' naep Godi ea' okom ae'anai bo'ona nafe'ma naep Godi, afi'i ataga dei'. Basef mape opaf ae'anai nomoni ma'iami ma'ipi basef mihi'ambe ma waf ae' anda'anai ina aona, owa'.”
44023002	Anan na'iam na'ama, pris dembinai Ananaias nape nali'ma pris hiami na'ipa amam maitumana felefele' ma maha malogel ananinai.
44023003	Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' aman aonai si'i anom endalelemb awami sanda' pen bu'unai afitinai sandisam ande' atogini. Atuwasi God nehena. Ine' nape na'ae naila mi'uli anama Godi ma nanda' kotima ae', ea' ine' etina nesambala mi'uli anama ma dei' na'ipam mahe!”
44023004	Ea' amam maitu felefele' ma'ipana ma'i, “Ine' na'i basef findiwama aman pris dembinai Godi?”
44023005	Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' ina egawa a'i anan pris dembinai, owa'. Dei' main, basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, ‘Ipe' ina pi'ipa agilinai numafi ipe'i pi'ipana basef awami, owa'.’ Amama ae' egawam.”
44023006	Ea' Pol nogawa amam Juda dambami mumafi koti anom Sadyusi, anom Farisi. Na'ama anan na'ipam mehip na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' Farisiwei ea' ahalome ae'anai Farisinai. Ae' embale'ef a'i endilisi anona nemaf epes saga'i sohafel wapoti', dei' ape ehafa nemaf anama. Ofagema amama atom dei' esis sanda' kotima ae'.”
44023007	Anan na'ipama basef amama, ea' amam atom mafitap la'afena amam Farisi maloma Sadyusi ea' mandawal biefim.
44023008	Dei' main, amam Sadyusi membale'ef ma'i epes saga'i owagama ina sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'. Amam ma'i ensel owa', ambagof owa'. Ea' amam Farisi membale'efa ambagof maloma ensel maloma epes saga'i sohafel wapoti' endilisi.
44023009	Amama atom amam ma'i mehip. Ea' anom dambami mawalipasa mi'uli Godi amam Farisi mohafel maitu ma'iam mehip na'ama ma'i, “Afa' wati aman anama basef ofagema a'ana. I'i anona ambal bu'unai o anona ensel ni'ipana ma ni'ipasa basef amama, andeande'.”
44023010	Ea' fitap nataga lu'una, soldia dembinai umbamahana ma Pol, na'i na'ama amam hiami mandawal biefimi mohonde'ana pele'atana biefina afuna. Ea' na'ipa amam soldia ananimi mikini' mombalo' Pol la'afena amam mofa'ana mofe' ipat amamunai.
44023011	Wafilu owamb Dembinai nafi'i naitu felefele'ma Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nitu la'ifina. Ina umbamehena, owa'. Fowa' nawalapa basef ae'ami Jerusalem, ea' nambimb ine' newalapam na'ama etin wambel lu'unai Rom wapoti'.”
44023012	Ea' wafilu kuhimbita amam Juda mandakolas ma'i basef mandame'mama mape atogon ma'i endilisi ilifa moha Pol afuna. Amam ma'i ina mea' gwa'aimi embel muli', na'ama ota' ma mohana afuna, ea' mea'am.
44023013	Amam ma'i endilisi ilif mandame'ma basef amama, amam hiami mikila' 40-peleim.
44023014	Amam mafe'ma amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Juda ma'ipam ma'i, “Afa' wa'i basef wandame'mama oha Pol afuna. Afa' wa'i endilisi ilif ina ata' wea' gwa'aimi embel, ota'ma oha Pol afuna.
44023015	Na'ama dei' ipe' peloma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti pesapa' basef mefe'ma soldia dembinai Romunai ma nofa'i Pol nifi'mai ipe'. Ipe' pembaso'mana pi'i, ‘Afa' wa'i ata' ome' basef ofagema Poli andeande'.’ Ea' afa' wandandombam wape. Anan ina nifi'i notanimai ma ipe', ata' owa', afa' uli' ohana afuna.”
44023016	Ea' taganamana Poli name' amam Juda ma'i mofe' mopoma Pol eaf ma mohana noga', nafe' ipat amam soldiai nawis na'ipa Pol.
44023017	Ea' Pol nofala anona soldia dembinai na'i, “Akwolanago aman anama so'unai nefe'mago kepten dembinai ma amam soldia hiami. Anan anom basefa na'i ni'ipanam.”
44023018	Ea' soldia anama nao'wana nafe'ma kepten dembinai na'ipana na'i, “Aman anama nanda' kalabusi Pol nofala ae' na'ipi ao'wai aman anama so'unai nafi'mai ine'. Anan anom basef ni'ipinam.”
44023019	Ea' kepten anama nahapila lagel ananinai nao'wana nafe' wa'ol, amam atom mape nahali'ana na'i, “Ine' na'i ni'ipi maim basef?”
44023020	Ea' so'unai na'ipana na'i, “Amam Juda ma'i basef mandame'mam ea' ma ma'i mohali'ina ma naman nefa' Pol nefe'ma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti. Amam mambaso'am ma'i ata' mohali' Pol atona ma basef ofagema ananimi.
44023021	Ea' ina nila basef amamumi, owa'. Dei' main, anom amam amamumi hiami mikila' 40-peleim ma'i basef la'ifimi mandame'mam ma'i endilisi ilif ina mea' gwa'aimi embel, owa'. Ota' ma muli' moha Pol afuna. Amama atom dei' amam mape eaf mohafana. Amam mandondombam mape mohafa ine' ma ni'i aho'ma basef amamumi.”
44023022	Ea' Kepten anama nasapa' anan so'unai nafe' na'ipana basef la'ifimi na'i, “Ina nefe' ni'ipa enin epen atitina basef amama, owa'.”
44023023	Ea' kepten anama nofala anom soldia dambami biam na'ipam na'i, “Ipe' bipa pefa'ai soldia hiami 200-peleim moloma anom soldia 70-peleim matoma hos ea' 200-peleim mahapila wambawai. Ipe' pendondombama pefe' Sisaria atuwasi owamb 9 klok.
44023024	Ea' pendondomba anom hosa Pol wapoti' notomam ea' pefa'ana andeande' pefe'ma gavman dembinai Feliks.”
44023025	Kepten anama nanda' anom basef mafe'ma Feliks na'ama ma'i,
44023026	“Ae' Klodius Lisias anda' basef amama mafe'mago ine' gavman dembinai nape nali'i Feliks. Nemaf bu'unai.
44023027	Amam Juda ma'i mombalo' aman anama ma'i nohana noga'. Na'ama ae' ame'anama basef anan na'i anan aman Romunai. Ea' ae' aloma amam soldia wafe' watagama amam Juda wandalombamana lagof amamumi.
44023028	Ae' a'i ata' egawa basef ofagema amam mambaso'amanami, na'ama ae' ao'wana akini' ma amam Juda dambami mumafi koti.
44023029	Ea' ma'ipi anom basefa mi'uli amamunai mambaso'mana ma basef amama. Na'ama amam ina manda' kotimana ma anom amamaga ma ohana noga', o onda' kalabusimana, owa'.
44023030	Na'ama dei' anom basef matagama ae' ma amam ma'i anom basef mandame'mama ma'i mohana noga'. Ea' dei' ae' mehip asapa'ana nafe'mago ine'. Ea' ae' a'ipa amam amama mambaso'manai ma mofo'o mowalapa basef alihima naep ine'imi ma ine' negawa amamaga amama amam ma'i monda' kotimanami.”
44023031	Ea' amam soldia mame' basef mofa' Pol mafe' anona wambel Antipatris owamb.
44023032	Lala soldia amama motanima mafe' ifagw amamumi Jerusalem. Ea' amam 70-peleim matoma hos atom mofa' Pol mafe' Sisaria.
44023033	Mafe' mataga Sisaria, mase'ana pas basef amama gavman dembinai ea' mofa'ai Pol wapoti' nafi'i naitu naep ananimi.
44023034	Ea' dembinai gavman anama nafi'i nati pas amama ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ine' etap lu'unai agel lu'unai eti?” Ea' Pol na'ipana na'i, “Ae' Silisiaiwei.”
44023035	Ea' anan na'ipa Pol na'i, “Nambimb amam amama mambaso'ma ine'i mufi'i motaga, ae' eme' basef ine'imi.” Ea' na'ipa amam manda' kalabusima Pol ipat lu'unai gavman dembinai Heroti.
44024001	Nimeguf wanom biam mafe' ea', pris dembinai Ananaias nakini' nafe' Sisaria naloma anom agufumi Judai ea' anona aman Tertulus aman nogawa mi'uli gavman nalomam nafi'i. Amam hiami ma'ipa gavman dembinai Filiksa basef amama ma'i monda' kotima Polami.
44024002	Ea' gavman anama nofalai Pol nafi'i, Tertulus nanda' basef findiwama anan. Ea' na'ipa Feliks na'i, “Ine' aman dembinai Feliks, ine' nagiambama ape' Juda ma mape nogota launai andeande' ea' wandaf main owa'etin. Okom bu'unai ine'inai nagiambama esis wambota ape'inai ma dei' mape andeande' mikila' fowa' mali' mape.
44024003	Ea' ape' mape wambel hiagoma opalef ape'imi mape bo'oma ine'. Ea' nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef manifelina ma amama.
44024004	Na'ama ae' andaiwa'ma ahapilina nogota laona. Dei' ahali'ina ma neme' basef ape'imi bandami.
44024005	Ape' mogawa aman anama nanda'mapa amamaga awami hiami. Ea' nanda' naumbih nafela ukup awami naloma esis Juda hiesi napa' nalomas etap hiagoma wambel hiagoma. Anan agel lu'unai ma epes isima sapa' sawala epes hiesi ape'isi ma epes sape deindei'i, sa'i epes Nasareti.
44024006	Ea' anan na'i nonda' ipat lu'unai sanda lotuma Godanai aona wapoti'. Na'ama ape' mombale'ana ma'i monda' kotimana ma mi'uli ape'inai.
44024007	Ea' kepten dembinai Lisias nafi'i, anan la'ifinai nahonde'ana lagof ape'imi.
44024008	Anan na'i mehip ape' manda' kotima anan mifi'i motaga naep ine'imi. I'i dei' ine' nihali' aman anama, atuwasi ine' negawa endilisi basef ananimi ma ni'i amamaga hiami ape' manda' kotimanami.”
44024009	Ea' amam Juda dambami wapoti' magiambama anan mambaso'ma Pol mawalapam ma'iam ma'i, “Basef amama endilisimi atom.”
44024010	Ea' gavman dembinai nanda' balaga nahali' Pol nogwa basef na'ama na'i, “Ae' egawa afagof hiami ine' nanda' jas nape dembinai gavman numafi ape' Juda hiapai. Na'ama dei' okom ae'anai bo'ona, endilisi ma egwa basef amama ihi'ambena ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai, owa'.
44024011	I'i ine' nihali' esis, atuwasi neme' basef amama dei' ae' a'i i'ipinami. Nimeguf ata' 12-peleim mafe' ea' ae' ali' afe' Jerusalem anda' lotu.
44024012	Ea' amam Juda ma'i monda' kotima ae' mati ae' ina a'i anom basef afitapam aloma enin epen nomon ipat lu'unai Godi, owa'. Amam ina mati ae' afela ukup asasimi ma sopa' ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi nomon o anagon nomona wambel anama lu'wagoma, owa'.
44024013	Ea' basef amama esis dei' sanda' kotimiami, esis ina atuwasi la'ifis sowalapa anom basef ofagema ma ine' negawa, owa'.
44024014	Na'ama ae' a'i ewalapa basef amama atoma ine'. Eaf anama esis Juda etis sandaiwa'manai sa'i waf anama sawala wambotagwanai ina endilisinai. Waf anama endilisinai ae' ahapilana ailana. Ae' aila eaf anama anda' lotu ma God amam bafapapa ape' Juda hiapai manda' lotumanai. Ae' ahapila basef hiami mape mi'uli Godi naloma basef hiami amam profet fowa' manda'ami.
44024015	Ae' embale'efam ape ehafa God owagama nefela esis saga'i, epes isima bu'wasi soloma isima sanda' waf aonai wapoti'. Amam manda' kotima ae' wapoti' mombale'ef mape mohafa God na'ama etin.
44024016	Ea' la'ela'ef ae' anda' maol lu'unai ma epe andeande' ma malogel nape opaf ae' nomoni ina nihi'ambe anona waf aonai ae' anda'anai, owa'. Ae' anda' maola waf aonai a'e ma naep Godi naloma naep epesi wapoti'.
44024017	Ae' ape anom afagof anona wambel ea' etanima afi'i Jerusalem ma epes hiesi ae'asi. Ae' efa'ai moni maina igiambama isima kwahusi ea' eha anom mafis endalalima God ese'ana.
44024018	Anda'am na'ama ma anda' waf bu'unai, waf aonai a'e ma naep Godi. Ea' esis satolowe. Ina enis amam nematawa hiesi sape salome afela opalef enis epes sanda' salamala naninani, owa'etin.
44024019	Na'ama enis Juda sape etap hiagoma Esiaisi safi'i sombale'e. I'i esis anom basefa ae', dei' andeande'ma sifi'i na'ae naep ine'imi sonda' kotimi.
