44024020	I'i owa', amam amama mi'ipina anom basefa amamaga awami amam mati ae' anda'ami, nemaf anama fowa' aitu naep amam Juda dambami mumafi koti.
44024021	Anom basef etifim na'ama. Nemaf anama aitu la'afena amam, ae' ega a'i, ‘Ae' embale'efa God nefela esis saga'i sohafel wapoti', ea' amama atom ipe' dei' panda' kotima ae' ma naep ipe'imi.’ ”
44024022	Feliks nogawa andeande'ma bale'ef naloma waf sa'i eaf esis Kristeni. Ea' na'ipa esis Juda ma ata' sope sohafana. Anan na'i, “Ota' ma soldia dembinai Lisias nikini'i, ae' enandonama basef amama ipe'imi.”
44024023	Ea' na'ipa anona soldia dembinai ma ata' nonda' Pol nuwis nope kalabus nope wafifina etin. Ea' na'i aho'ma esis alupusi ananisi sifi'i sigiambamana ma amamaga.
44024024	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', Feliks nao'wa waulu'mana anani'wi Drusila safi'i. Drusila akwa'w ano'w Judai'wi. Ea' Feliks nofala Pol na'i neme' anom basef ananimi. Ea' Pol nafi'i na'ipana basef ofagema ma esis sombale'efa basef Jisas Kraisi.
44024025	Na'ipana waf bu'unai ma epes sumafi alop asasinai andeande' ma owagama God nonda' kotima epes hiesi. Na'iam na'ama, Feliks umbamahana. Ea' na'i, “Ine' fo'o. Nambimb anona nemaf, efalena wapoti'.”
44024026	Feliks nape nohafa anom amamaga wapoti'. Anan na'i nambimb Pol nose'ana anona moni ma nokwahona nofe' wafifina. Na'ama la'ela'ef anan nofalana nafi'i na'i nalomana.
44024027	Afagof biam mafe'ma hi'alam, Festus nofa' maol Filiksi. Ea' Feliks na'i ata' nonda' ukup esis Judai mope andeande'. Ea' ata' nanda' Pol nape nanda' kalabus.
44025001	Festus nafi'i nofa' maol nape dembinai gavman numafi etap hiagoma fowa' Feliks numafiagoma. Nape nimeguf wanom ea', nakwaha wambel Sisaria nondowasa' Jerusalem.
44025002	Ea' amam pris dambami maloma agufumi Judai mafi'mai anan mambaso'ma Pol.
44025003	Ma'ipa Festus mehip ma'i, “Ine' nigiambamafa nesapa' aman anama nifi'i anae'.” Dei' main, amam ma'i mondambaho' mope eafa mohana noga'.
44025004	Ea' Festus nagwa basef na'ipam na'i, “Pol nanda' kalabus nape wambel Sisaria. Nambimb ae' etanima efe' ganima.
44025005	Ea' amam agufumi ipe'imi mifi'i mikini'i moloma ae'. I'i aman anama nanda' waf aonai, amam monda' kotimana.”
44025006	Festus nape nalomam nimeguf 8-peleim o 10-peleim, ea' nakini' wambel Sisaria. Wafilu nafe' nawis ipat sandakota na'ipa amam soldia mo'wa Pol mifi'i.
44025007	Ea' amam Juda makwaha Jerusalem mape mahafa Pol nafi'i makini'i maitu felefele'ma anan mambaso'mana basef hiami nimanimi. Ea' amam manda'mana basef etin, basef ofagema amamumi ina anom.
44025008	Ea' Pol nagwa basef na'i, “Ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai ma mi'uli ape' Judai, ipat lu'unai Godi, o mi'uli Sisari wapoti', owa'etin.”
44025009	Na'ama Festus na'i nonda' ukup esis Judai mope bo'om. Ea' nahali' Pol na'i, “Ine' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama nambimb eme'enama basef ine'imi gani?”
44025010	Ea' Pol na'i, “Ipat anae' ae' dei' aituanai, anae' ipat Sisari sanda' kota. Ipat anae' atona peme' basefa kot ae'anai. Ine' etina negawa, ae' ina anda' anona waf aonai ma esis Juda, owa'.
44025011	I'i ae' anona waf aonai ma enda' anom amamaga awami mondahama ae' ega', andeande'ma amam mohe ega'. I'i basef amama amam manda' kotima ae'ami owa' endilisimi, ina andeande'ma dembinai gavman nese'e efe'ma lagof amamumi, owa'. Dei' ae' efala gavman dembinai Sisar neme' kot ae'anai.”
44025012	Ea' Festus ata' na'i basef naloma amam dambami ananimi, na'ipa Pol na'i, “Ine' nefala Sisar ama neme' kot ine'inai, ine' fo'mago Sisar.”
44025013	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', dembinai king Agripa nafi'i naloma ano'w nemata'w Bernaisi esis bias safi'i Sisaria sa'i sonda'mana nemaf bu'unai Festus.
44025014	Esis sape Sisaria nimeguf hiami ea' Festus nawalapa basef na'ipanam king Agripa ma Pol. Anan na'i, “Anona aman fowa' napani Feliks nanda'ana dei' nanda' kalabus.
44025015	Fowa' ae' apani Jerusalem, amam pris dambami maloma agufumi esis Judai mambaso'mana mahali' ae' ma i'i endilisi anan aman aonai ma noga'.
44025016	Ea' ae' agwamama basef na'ama a'i, ‘Ape' Rom waf anama a'apa ma mose'ana nimanimi na'a enin epen, owa'. I'i basef milan, enin ata' nili' nitu nonda' basefa naep esis isima sanda' kotimani ma ape' ata' mose'ana nogota ma enin negwa anom basefa esis sanda' kotimani.’ ”
44025017	Nemaf anama amam agufumi Judai mafi'i na'ae, ina apoma noma ma eme' basefana, owa'. Nemaf gi'mainai ae' afe' ape ipat sanda' kota a'ipa esisa sofa' aman anama nafi'i.
44025018	Ea' amam manda' kotima anan mafi'i maitu mambaso'mana. Ea' amam ina ma'i anom basef endilisimi ma waf aonai masindinana a'i amam monda' kotimanami, owa'.
44025019	Amam mandahihianama anom basef malomana ma waf esis sanda' lotuwanai ea' anona aman naga'i, Jisas. Ea' Pol na'i aman anama nape namunai ambal napaina.
44025020	Ae' a'i egolopa basef amama ofagema andeande', na'ama okom ae'anai ina egawa, owa'. Ae' ina la'ifiwi, owa'. Ea' ahali'ana a'i, “Ine' na'i nefe' Jerusalem ama nambimb eme'enama basef ine'imi gani?
44025021	Ea' Pol na'i anan nope kalabus ama nambimb gavman dembinai ape'inai Sisar neme' basef ananimi. Ae' a'i anan nope kalabus ea' esapa'ana nefe'mago Sisar.”
44025022	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “Ae' atowe a'i eme' basef ananimi.” Ea' Festus na'ipana na'i, “Naman ine' neme'ana.”
44025023	Wafilu Agripa naloma nemata'w akwama Bernaisi safi'i sanda' sosaf hianai ma sefela agof asasimi lu'um. Ea' sawis ipat lu'unai sandatama etifigin sape sa'i basef nomon saloma amam soldia dambami mali'i maloma amam agufumi taun anama. Ea' Festus na'ipas mehip sao'wa Pol nafi'i.
44025024	Ea' Festus na'i, “King Agripa, naloma ipe' epes hipei pape paloma ape', ipe' pati aman anama. Esis amam nematawa hiesi Juda sape Jerusalemi saloma sape na'ae wapoti' sanda' kotimana naep ae'ami. Esis sa'ipi basef laifimi sa'i ehana afuna. Sa'i 'Ina nope, hana afuna.’
44025025	Na'ama ae' ati anan ina nanda' anom amamaga awami ma noga', owa'. Ea' anan nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome' kota anan. Amama atom ae' a'i basefa esapa'ana nofo'o.
44025026	Ea' ae' ina ati anom basefa anan mataga alihima enda' anom basefa pas esapa'am mofe'ma Sisar, owa'. Ea' dei' king Agripa ae' au'wai aman anama nafi'mai ine' neloma ipe' hipei wapoti'. Afa' ome' basef ananimi andeande'ma nambimb ae' egawama enda' anom basef mil pas.
44025027	Dei' main, ina andeande'ma esapa'ana nofe' etin. Afa' onda' anom basef sanda' kotimanami mil pepa mefe' molomana, andeande'.”
44026001	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Dei' ine' negwa basef amama amam mambaso'mena.” Pol nafela lagel na'i basef ananimi na'i,
44026002	“King dembinai Agripa, ae' a'i egwa basef amama hiami amam Juda mambaso'ma ae'ami. Ae' okom na'i andeande'ma a'i ewalapa basef ae'ami ma naep ine'imi.
44026003	Dei' main? Ine' negawa andeande'ma waf ape' Judai naloma amamaga ape' ukup mapomam mafe' deindei'mami. Amama atom dei' ae' a'i ine' neme' basef ae'ami, okom ine'inai ina iwanina mehip, owa'.
44026004	Fowa' ape afi'i afi'i dei' fe' anama ae'anai esis Juda hiesi sogawa. Fowa' ata' sa'owe ape etap ae'anai ea' afe' ape Jerusalem wapoti'.
44026005	Fowa' gani esis sogawa ae'. I'i ukup asasimi mi'i a'e, sowalapa basef amama ma waf ae' anda'anai. Esis sogawa ae' aila waf epes hiesi ape' Farisi. Waf anama ahifina endilisi, nikila' waf hianai anona lotu ape'inai.
44026006	Ea' basef ofagema ma kot na'ama. Ae' embale'ef endilisi ma God nefela saga'i sohafel wapoti', amama atom. Ae' embale'ef ape ehafa God nonda' amamaga amama motaga si'i fowa' na'ipa akupapa ape'imi Judai. Amama atom dei' esis sanda' kotimi.
44026007	Wambotagw apa'imi 12-peleim manda' lotuma God owamb alip ea' mombele'ef endilisi mape mohafa amama atom. Dei' a'ipa ine' dembinai king, ae' wapoti' embale'ef ape ehafa amama. Ea' na'ama esis Juda sambaso'me.”
44026008	Pol na'ipa king Agripa ea' nandamboma na'ipa amam Juda na'i, “Dei' maina ipe' pa'i basef ina endilisimi ma God owagama nefela esis isima saga'i wapoti? Ipe' pembale'efa basef amama.
44026009	Fowa' ae' wapoti' okom na'i ae' enda' amamaga hiami ma ehagofa agel Jisas Nasaretinai.
44026010	Ae' anda'am na'ama etina enis epes gani Jerusalem. Amam pris dambami mase'e pepel anda' kalabusima amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Nemaf anama amam pris dambami ma'i moha enis Kristen soga', ae' wapoti' a'i a'e.
44026011	Ea' nimeguf hiami ae' ase'as nimanimi Kristen isima ahas nomon ifagw esis Juda sa'i basef sapeimi hiami. Ae' a'i enda' esisa sonda' Dembinai findiwana ma sokwaha basef Dembinai. Ae' okom wandafuna endilisi ma esis, ailas afe' anona wambel laogoma lu'wagoma.
44026012	Efa' pepela amam pris dambami masapa'e afe' Damaskus.
44026013	Ae' a'ipa ine' dembinai king, ma aon nahagasom ae' aila eaf afe', ati howalogon nisila'i heven nikila' aon alipunai. Howalagon nafi'i nolalowe aloma amam mafe' malumai.
44026014	Afa' hiafai wa'oh etap ea' ae' ame' anona malogel na'i diga Hibrui na'i, ‘Sol, Sol, dei' maina ine' nanda' maol nahambombaga ae'? Ine' nanda' maol naha anama ina negawa. Dei' nefa' nimanimi bolam si'i anona naha bulmakau ananimi bolam nanindinama nafe' andeande'.’
44026015	Ea' ahali'ana a'i, ‘Dembinai ine' emi?’ Ea' Dembinai na'i, ‘Ae' Jisas, ine' nahambombage.
44026016	Ea' ine' hafel nitu. Ae' afi'mai ine' ma amamaga amama. Ae' a'i esahe'ena ma nihapila maol ae'anai, newalapa basefa amamaga ine' natoloma ae'i. Ea' amamaga amama owagama ae' ihi'ambenam.
44026017	Nambimb ae' etagahina lagof esis epes hiesi ine'isi Juda ea' etagahina ma lagof isima enis epes sololama Godi wapoti'. Ae' esapa'ena nefe'ma epes isima.
44026018	Ama newala naep asasimi ma esis sowa' alafugaha akota waf aonai somboma opalef sifi'mai howalagon ma sokwaha pepel Satani sifi'mai God. Esis sombale'efa ae' ma ekwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama sofa' amamaga bu'wami soloma enis amam nematawa God nanda'as bo'wes ananisi etisi.’
44026019	Dembinai king Agripa, ae' ati amamaga amama mataga heveni ea' ina esambala basef amama, owa'.
44026020	Ae' ali' awalapa basefa esis amam nematawa sape Damaskusi ea' awalapama epes sape Jerusalemi ea' awalapama esis sape etap hiagoma Judia ea' afe' awalapama isima sololama Godi wapoti'. Ae' awalapa basefa penda' maol peloma waf bu'unai nendahama epes somboma opalef sefe'ma God.
44026021	Ae' anda'am na'ama ea' ofagema amama atom dei' esis Juda sombale'e ipat lu'unai Godi sa'i sehe ega'.
44026022	Na'ama God nagiambame afi'i afi'i ataga dei' aitu na'ae ea' awalapa basef a'ipa epes hiesi agof a'asi saloma ipe' agufipei wapoti'. Ae' ina ewalapa anom basef, owa'. Awalapa basef amama Godi atom fowa' amam profet maloma Moses ma'iami ma amamaga owagama meatagai.
44026023	Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, ‘Dembinai Krais ata' nofa' nimanimi, ma nambimb notanima nohafel hi'agif nili'ma epes hiesi. Ama Anan nowalapa basefa epes hiesi sogawam si'i howalagon nikila'i nififima esis ananisi soloma isima sololama Godi wapoti'.’ ”
44026024	Pol na'ipas na'ama ea', Festus noga na'i basef la'ifimi na'ama na'i, “Pol, ine' okom nololaina! Ine' nati buk hiami natalifam nogawam dei' gawa anama lu'unai nanda'ena okom nololaina!”
44026025	Ea' Pol nagwamana na'i, “Ine' aman dembinai Festus, ae' ina okom nololae, owa'. Ae' okom napaewe dei' a'i endilisi.
44026026	Ine' dembinai king negawa hi'alam amamaga amama hiami. Ea' ae' dei' awalapam a'iam ae' ina umbamahe, owa'. Ae' egawa amamaga amama hiami ina mandambaho'ma naep maloma aligah ine'imi, owa'. Ine' natolom negawam ea'. Dei' main, amamaga amama ina mataga mandambaho', owa'.
44026027	Dembinai king Agripa, ine' nembale'a basef Godi amam profet fowa' mawalipasami o owa'? Ae' egawa ine' nembale'am!”
44026028	Ea' king Agripa na'ipa Pol na'i, “Nogota anama bandana ine' na'i nenda'e etaga Kristen?”
44026029	Ea' Pol na'i, “Nogota bandana o laona andeande'. Ae' anda betena God na'ama. A'i nambimb ine' neloma epes isima hiesi dei' pame' basef ae'ami petaga Kristen na'ama etin si'i ae'. Ea' sen anama nowa' ae'i, andaiwa'ma nowa'epa.”
44026030	Pol na'iam na'ama ea', dembinai king nali' nohafel naitu naloma Bernaisi saloma gavman dembinai saloma epes isima sape salomasi.
44026031	Ea' sawis ande'. Esis etis sanda'ipama sa'i, “Aman anama ina nanda' anom amamaga awami ma noga' o nonda' kalabus, owa'.”
44026032	Ea' Agripa na'ipa Festus na'i, “I'i aman anama ina nofala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome'anama kot, ine' netagahana nofo'o wafifina.”
44027001	Ea' anom dambami Rom ma'i basef mandame'mama afa' ofa' sip ofe' etap hiagoma Itali. Ea' anom dambami masapa' Pol naloma enis epes sanda' kalabusi ma anona soldia dembinai Julius numafias. Anan anona amam soldia gavman dembinai Sisari.
44027002	Ea' afa' walata anona sip nafi' Adramitiumi. Sip anama na'i nefe' anona wambel nape naoh amama etap hiagoma Esia. Afa' wafe' ea' anona aman Aristarkus Tesalonaikainai ma etap hiagoma Masedonia nafe' nalomafa.
44027003	Wafilu wafe' wail anona wambel Saidon. Ea' aman anama Julius numafi Pol nanda' waf bu'unai ma anan. Na'i aho'ma anan nefe' niti alupusi ananisi ma nofa' gwa'aimi maima esis.
44027004	Afa' wakwaha Saidon wafe' ea' uf naluwi anama afa' wa'i weafe'ma. Ea' wafe' anona ailan Saiprus wa'ol uf a'agoma.
44027005	Ea' wafe' watopa' naoh wafe' felefele'ma etap hiagoma Silisia naloma Pamfilia ea' wafe' watagama anona wambel Maira etap hiagoma Lisia.
44027006	Wambel anama Julius nati anona sip nafi'i Aleksandria na'i nefe' etap hiagoma Itali. Ea' na'ipafa wafe' walata sip anama.
44027007	Wafe', sip anama nafe' sa'osa'ombel ama anom nimeguf hi'alam. Wanda'am noma'w nahafa ea' wataga felefele'ma anona wambel Nidus. Uf nalo lu'una nili'akwafa ea' ina ata' wafe' mehip, owa'. Ea' wafe' anona ailan Krit wa'ol uf owa'ma felefele'ma etap Salmone da'malifinama.
44027008	Wanda'am noma'w nahafa ea' waila naoh atom wafe' felefele'ma akata ailan anama Krit. Wafe' nogota laona ea' wataga anona wambel Fasiguma Sip Naila. Anama felefele'ma wambel lu'wagoma Lasea.
44027009	Nimeguf hiami mafe' hi'alam, nemaf anama esis Juda sakwaha gwa'aimianai hi'alana ea' anom nimeguf wapoti'. Nogota anama naoh manda'am fepo. Ina nogota bo'onama sip neafe', owa'. Ea' Pol na'ipasa basef esis na'ama na'i,
44027010	“Ipe' amam, peme'. I'i dei' afa' weafe'ma, nambimb otagama nimanimi ea' amamaga hiami higililam. Ina hiahaom maim atom moloma sip higililam, owa'. Ambagof afa'imi wapoti' nambimb higililam. Ae' egawam endilisi.”
44027011	Ea' Julius name' dembinai kepten anama numafi amam manda' maol sipi naloma aman anama ofagenama sipi ina mame' basef Pol na'iami, owa'.
44027012	Basis amama sip nafe' naima ina bo'wagon ma sip nilagon nogota anama uf naluwianai, owa'. Ea' amam hiami mape sip ma'i anom basef mandame'mama ma'i mokwaha wambel anama mafe'. I'i amam la'ifim, ma'i mefe' motaga ulal basis amama Finiks ea' mope anama nogota anama launai uf lu'unai naluwianai. Basis amama Finiks mape ailan anama Krit. Anama bo'wagoma ma sip nofe' nondambaho'ma uf naluma. Basis amama mape la'afena aon natefima nowalama.
44027013	Sape nogota bandana nafe' ea' uf so'unai nalo nafi'i aon natopa' nowalama ea' ina la'ifina, owa'. Ea' amam ma'iam ma'i atuwasi amam mofe' andeande' si'i ukup amamumi ma'i. Na'ama magiai anka nalatai ea' wafe' waila naoh atom felefele'ma bandagoma ailan anama Krit.
44027014	Nogota laona uf la'ifinai sa'i taleo naluwi nalo nafi'i ailan anama Krit.
44027015	Namboma sip anama ea' ina la'ifina neafe' anama uf nalu nafi'ima, owa'. Ea' wapoma uf atona nefa' sip nafe'.
44027016	Wafe' anona ailan wa'ol uf a'agoma sofalagon sa'i Kauda. Wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma owa' bot so'unai nail la'ifina.
44027017	Ea' amam magiai bot anama so'unai nalatai sip ilif ea' mowa' sip la'afen ma anom mandelef la'ifina nail. Amam umbamaham endilisi ma mefe' mieil anama wesan aonai na'oma, felefele'ma etap hiagoma Libia, Afrika. Ea' matagahai sel mikila'i.
44027018	Uf naloma naoh makoto'ma afa' mehip. Wafilu magi' anom hiahaom nimanimi makwahom mowala naoh.
44027019	Ama nemaf nafe'ma wenifi manda' lagof amamumi atom makwaha anom amamaga sel mandelef maim manda' sip nimaninai.
44027020	Nimeguf hiami afa' ina ata' wati aon ondowa, owa'. Uf lu'unai atona endilisi nakoto'mafa wape na'ama etin. Ea' wa'i nambimb ina ofe' otaga anagon andeande', owa'. Wa'i higililafa etin.
44027021	Nimeguf hiami amam ina ata' ma' gwa'aimi ea' Pol nohafel naitu la'afena amam na'i, “Ipe' peme'. Fowa' ipe' andeande'ma peme' basef ae'ami ma afa' ina okwaha Krit ufi'i ulal. I'i onda'am na'ama, afa' ina dei' ofa' nimanimi amama, ea' amamaga hiahaom maim afa'imi higililam, owa'.
44027022	Ea' dei' a'ipipa afela ukup ipe'imi mope la'ifim. Ina nambimb anona aman afa'inai nefe' higililana, owa'. Sip atona higililana.
44027023	Dei' maina ae' egawa amama? Ae' aman Godi anda' lotuma anani. Do'ok owamb anona ensel Ananinai nafi'i naitu felefele'ma ae'
44027024	na'ipi na'i, ‘Pol, ine' owa' umbamehena, owa'. Ine' nambimb nefe' nitu naep gavman dembinai Sisar. Ea' ine' neme', epes hiesi isima sape salomena sipi, isima God nambimb nigiambamas. Ea' ina atuwasi enin higililan, owa'.’
44027025	Dei' main, ae' embale'efa God anan nambimb nonda' amamaga amama motaga si'i na'ipiam.
44027026	Ea' afa' ata' ofe' wil anona ailan anama otamba ma'oma.”
44027027	Owambeh amama wikifah biam tol wala etin wafe' naoh amama Adriai. Owamb la'afen aon nahagasom amam mumafi hiahaom sipi mogawa ma'i sip nafe' nataga felefele'ma anona ailan.
44027028	Ea' mala mandof si'i ikwaf nowala naoh mondola'wifagon nihi'ambam na'i 40 mita, laogon atona. Ea' wafo'o felefele', walana wapoti' mondala'wifagon na'i 30 mita, ina laogon, owa'.
44027029	Ea' amam umbamaham ma'i, “Na'ama mofe' etin la'ifim mope anom otamba anama otambaiguma.” Ea' makwaha anka biefina biefina nowala sip anama naila ma mombalo'a sip nail. Ea' amam ukup ma'i aon alipunai ata' nitefi mehip.
44027030	Amam manda' maol sipi ma'i ata' magolopa eafa mokwaha sip mefe'. Ea' mala bot so'unai nowala mambaso'am ma'i mokwaha anona anka nowala sip anama naila.
44027031	Ea' Pol na'ipa dembinai soldia Julius naloma amam soldia na'ipam na'i, “I'i amam amama owa' mope sip la'la'ef, atuwasi ipe' awepa higililipa.”
44027032	Ea' amam soldia matopa' mandelefa bot so'unai anama nowala naoh.
44027033	Ea' felefele'ma aon na'i nitefi, Pol na'ipam basef amam hiami. Anan na'i nonda'am motaga la'ifim mea' anom gwa'aimi. Ea' na'i, “Nogota launai ipe' pape etin ina pa' anom gwa'aimi ea' pape umbamahepa ma amamaga amama meatagamipei. Ipe' pape etin nimeguf amama 14-peleim ea' pafi'i pataga nemaf dei'inai.
44027034	Dei' a'ipipa mehip, a'i ipe' ata' pea' anom gwa'aimi ma petaga la'ifipa. Peme', ina atuwasi anom amamaga motaga mohambombagepa, owa'. Pepe andeande'.”
44027035	Anan na'iam na'ama, nafela anona bret naep amamumi nanda' beten nanifela God, nawalona na'ana.
44027036	Ea' amam hiami ukup bo'om ma' gwa'aimi wapoti'.
44027037	Afa' hiafai wape sip wataga 276-peleifa hiafai.
44027038	Amam ma'am ea', makwaha wit mowala naoh ama sip ata' sofalina.
44027039	Aon natefima lala, amam mati anona etap ea' amam ina mogawa etap anama akata, owa'. Amam mati anom basis sip nafe' naila nondola' nawis endilisi. Ma'i i'i la'ifim, dei' monda' sip nondowasa' wesan akata.
44027040	Ea' matopa' mandelefa anka anama hianai makwahom mala naoh. Ea' matagaha mandof manda'am mowa' stiaimi, mandola sela uf nofa' sip nafe' akata.
44027041	Ea' sip la'afina dogwala wesan la'ifina nail. Nali'ma la'ifina endilisi nape otamba. Ea' naoh mowa maha sip nagi'ma ea' kwa'alana.
44027042	Ea' amam soldia ukup amamumi ma'i moha amama manda' kalabusi afum hi'ilam, ama amam ina ata' mopaol mofa' mefe', owa'.
44027043	Ea' dembinai soldia Julius na'i nigiambama Pol. Ea' na'ipam na'i ina moham afum, owa'. Mope. Ea' na'ipa amam amama mogawa paoli ma motoma mukupa' mopaol mofe' akata.
44027044	Ea' anom mololama paoli, mohapila palag maim la'if'im moloma endah sip anama kokwa'alami mohapilam tol mola naoh mofa'am mofe' akata. Afa' wame' basef ananimi wanda'am na'ama, dei' afa' hiafai wafe' be'efa wataga waitu naoh akata.
44028001	Afa' wafe' wataga andeande' akata, ea' wame' esis sa'i ailan anama Malta.
44028002	Epes sape wambel anamai sanda'mafa waf bu'unai endilisi. Asaf nalai ea' nomanamb mafa. Ea' sakata nif sa'ipa afa' hiafai wafe' wapoma nif.
44028003	Ea' Pol nafe' nafela nif nawamonam. Ea' anona yul nahasi nape nif mahi'ana nawisi ande' nona' lagel Poli nalelef yuli mawis nomon.
44028004	Ea' esis amam nematawa wambelisi sati yul anama nana' lagel Poli nail, esis sa'i, “Endilisi, aman anama naha epes saga'i. Anan ina afuna naoh embel, owa'. Ea' god anama ape'inai nagwa waf andeande'i nandaiwa'ma nope ambal namunai wapoti.”
44028005	Ea' Pol niali' lagel yul pele'atana nafe' nowala nasef nif ea' anan ina awesina, owa'.
44028006	Ea' esis sape sahafana sa'i siti lagel nolata ea' anan nowa afuna, owa'. Esis sape satolona ea' ina sati anom amamamaga matagamana, owa'. Ea' samboma ukup sa'i basef sa'i, “Ahalomafa, Pol anon anona dembinai god.”
44028007	Etap nape felefele'ma anama afa' wapoma etap anama anona aman dembinai numafi esis sape ailan anamai, agilinama Publius. Aman anama nofa'afa wafe' ipat ananinai numafiafa andeande' wape walomana nimeguf wanom.
44028008	Publius ahalomana awesina na'oh. Alop ananinai nifina ea' naka embel atom. Ea' Pol nafe' nasa lagel alop ananinai nataga bo'ona wapoti'.
44028009	Amama mataga ea', enis epes sape ailan anamai hiesi awes nanda'esi safi'mai anan nanda'masa beten sataga bo'wes wapoti'.
44028010	Ea' esis sase'afa amamaga bu'wami wa'i weafe', sase'afa amamaga hiami afa' leifamami ea' sofa'am sambe'mafam sip afa' weafi'anai.
44028011	Afa' ata' wape aomb wanom ailan anama. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' walata sip anama nail ailan anama nogota anama uf lu'unai naluwi. Sip anama Aleksandriai atona. Agilinama sa'i sahalomana owalomana amam atom mape mambap atona. Amam amama nogamana biam anona god baso'omunai Sus. Ea' afa' wakwahogon wafe'.
44028012	Wafe' wataga Sirakyus wape nimeguf wanom.
44028013	Wakwaha anama wafe' wataga Regium. Ama nemaf nagi'i uf lu'unai nalo nafi'i aon nowalama, ea' wataga anom basis Puteoli.
44028014	Wambel anama afa' wati enis Kristen. Ea' sa'ipafa wape walomas wik si'inai. Wape ea' wafe' Rom.
44028015	Esis Kristen sape Romi same' basefa afa' wafi'i, enis safi'i sotambel Maket wambel Apiusi, ea' enis safi'i sotambel wambel agel anama sa'i ifagw wanom sanda' fi'i fe' sapeimi. Ea' satolofa eaf. Pol nati esis, nandanifel nanifela God okom ananinai bo'ona.
44028016	Afa' wafe' wataga Rom, gavman Romunai na'i aho'ma Pol atona nope anona ipat noloma anona soldia numafiana nope la'ela'ef.
44028017	Nimeguf wenif mafe'ma ea', Pol nofalai amam agufumi Judai mafi'i mandatama etifigin. Ea' na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' sahope, ae' ina anda' anom amamaga ahambombaga epes ape'isi ma esambala waf amam bafapapa ape'imi, owa'. Ea' amam dambami Judai manda' kalabusima ae' Jerusalem ea' manda'e afi'i lagof amam Romi.
44028018	Amam Rom mame' basefa kot ae'anai, ae' basefa waf aonai ofagema owa'etina moha ega'. Ea' ma'i motagahe.
44028019	Ea' amam Juda mosambala basef amama. Na'ama dei' ae' eaf a'e ma efe' wafifiwi. Ea' efala gavman dembinai Sisar ma nome' kot ae'anai. Ea' ae' ina enda' kotima epes ae'asi ma anom amamaga, owa'.
44028020	Basef ofagema amama atom dei' efalepa pafi'i. Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef. Ae' embale'ef ape ehafa anan anama ape' Israel hiapai mape mohafanai. Ae' embale'efanai. Amama atom ofagema ma dei' manda' sen anama mowa'e.”
44028021	Ea' amam ma'ipana ma'i, “Anom Judaimi ina manda' anom basef mafi'i ma ma'ipafa ine', owa'. Ea' ina anona aman Judainai nafi'i nape na'ipafa andeande'ma na'i anom basef awami ma ine', owa'.
44028022	Ea' afa' wa'i ome' okom ine'inai atoma malogel ine'inai. Afa' ogawa, wambel hiagoma esis amam nematawa sanda' basef awami ma epes hiesi wambota anama.”
44028023	Ea' amam mandandepa anona nemafa amam hiami mafi'i ipat Poli. Ea' mafi'i kuhimbita mape mape mataga wambomota, anan na'i basef ofagema nawalipam. Ea' nawalapa basef alihima epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Anan nawalapa anom basefa mi'uli fowa' gani God naso' Mosesanai maloma basef Godi amam profet fowa' ma'iami. Ama basef amama anan na'ipama basef la'ifimi nafela ukup amamumi ma mombale'efa Jisas.
44028024	Anom mombale'efana ma basef ananimi, ea' anom owa' mombale'efana.
44028025	Ea' ukup mape na'ama ea' mafe'. Do'ok Pol nali' na'ipama anom basef na'ama na'i, “Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'i endilisi etisa amam akupapa ape'imi ma malogel profet Aisaia. Fowa' anan na'i na'ama na'i,
44028026	‘Ine' fo'mago esis amam nematawa isima ni'ipas na'ama ni'i. Anona nemaf ipe' pepe peme' basef, ea' ipe' ina pegawa ofagema, owa'. Ipe' pepe naep motawa ea' ipe' ina piti anom amamaga pegawam, owa'.
44028027	Dei' main, ukup epes amam nematawa isima mase'as ea'. Ukup asasimi aoma some' basefa aligah asasimi, sasopama naep asasimi. I'i owa', esis siti amamaga ea' some' basef aligah asasimi ma ukup mopoma basef ofagema samboma opalef sotanima sifi'mai ae' ma enda' esis bo'wes wapoti', owa'.’ ”
44028028	Ea' Pol na'ipam basef akutaimi na'i, “Dei' ae' a'i ipe' pegawa basefa God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf aonai motanima mufi'mai anan. Amama anan nasapa'am mafe'ma esis amam nematawa sololama Godi. Esis isima nambimb sila basef amama, ea' ipe' owa'.”
44028029	Pol na'ipam basef amama, amam dambami Juda mafe'. Ea' ma'i basef lu'wami ma'iam mandahihianamam la'afena amam atom.
44028030	Amama mafe'ma ea', Pol nape la'ela'ef afagof biam si'im ipat anama anan natalonai ea' nase'as opaf nanda'mas waf bu'unai epes hiesi safi'i satolonai.
44028031	Anan nawalapa basef bu'wami ma epes siowis wambota Godi numafias. Ea' nawalipasa basefa dembinai Jisas Krais. Anan ina umbamahana, owa'. Nawalapam na'iam alihim ea' ina enin epen nafi'i na'ipana na'i owa'.
45001001	Ae' Pol ape owina Krais Jisas anda' maola anan atona. God nofale ma enda' maol aposel ea' nosahe'e ma ewalapa basef bu'wami ananimi.
45001002	-
45001004	Basef amama mape na'ama. Fowa' gani God nanda' basef la'ifimi ea' na'ipa amam profet Ananimi mawalipasam manda'am mail buk Godi. Basef amama ma'i Nogalomana ananinai, Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anan nataga epen endilisinai nataga wambota aman dembinai king Deviti. Ea' dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapana alihina ma pepel Godi, anan Nogalomana Ananinai endilisi. Ambal anama nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
45001005	Lagof Jisasi atom God nagiambame nanda'e la'ifiwi anda' maol aposela afela agel Jisas Kraisi lu'una. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf amam nematawa hiesi sembale'efana sila basef ananimi.
45001006	Ipe' wapoti' pape paloma amam nematawa isima Kraisi. Ipe' pame' fala Jisas Kraisi ea' pailana pape Ananipei.
45001007	Ipe' epes Romipei, God okom nainailipa nofalepa pape amam nematawa Ananipei etipa. Ae' anda' basef amama mafi'mipei. Ae' a'i God Ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais migiambamepa monda'epa la'ifipa opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
45001008	Ae' a'i ata' ili' i'i basef amama. Ae' anifela God ae'anai ma agel Jisas Kraisi, anifelona ma ipe' wapoti'. Dei' main, esis etap gani hiagoma sa'i basef amama ma ipe' pembale'efana.
45001009	-
45001010	God nogawa maina nemaf anda' betenanai okom ae'anai napoma ipe' anda'mepa beten. Ae' anda' maol Godi aloma okom ae'anai si'ina awalipasa basef bu'wami ma Nogalomana ananinai. Beten ae'anai nape na'ama. Fowa' nimeguf hiami ahali'ana ma efo'o ietilipa. Owa'etin. Dei' wapoti' ahali'ana ma Anan ni'i awi, a'i nonda'me anona eaf efo'o ietilipa.
45001011	Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma anona nemaf efo'o ietilipa ma enda'epa petaga la'ifipa ease'epa anom amamaga bu'wami Ambal Godi nasi'ipam etini.
45001012	Amama na'ama. Ae' a'i bale'ef ae'anai nigiambama ipe' ea' bale'ef ipe'inai nigiambama ae' nenda' ae' etaga la'ifiwi. Amama monda'apa motaga la'ifipa opalef ape'imi na'ama etin.
45001013	Ae' a'i ipe' alupipei ata' pegawa nimeguf hiami ae' a'i efe'mago ipe' ea' afi'i ataga dei'. Ea' anom amamaga mahopa eafa ae'. Fowa' ae' agiambama enis epes owa' Judaisi sape anagoni sataga Kristen saitu la'ifis. Ea' dei' a'i ata' igiambama ipe' wapoti' si'i agiambama esis.
45001014	Ae' wiaf notaome ma igiambama epes hiesi sombale'efa Krais. Wiaf anama na'ama. Krais natalowe maol lu'unai dei' ae' egwamana igiambama epes isima hiesi ma sogawa waf bu'unai Godi. Epes gawaisi soloma isima gawa a'asi wapoti'.
45001015	Amama atom dei' opaf ae'anai nohafel endilisi ma ewalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma ipe' epes Romipei wapoti'.
45001016	Ae' ina umbamahe ambal aona ewalipasa basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Ae' embale'efa basef amama bu'wami la'ifiwi endilisi. Dei' main, amama pepel Godi nofa' emi egafis seambale'efanai sotanimani. Esis Juda sembale'efana sali' ea' ipe' hipei owa' Judaipei pagi'.
45001017	Dei' main, basef amama bu'wami Godi ma'ipapa waf bu'unai ananinai. Anama na'ama. I'i ape' mombale'efa Jisas la'ifipa endilisi, God ni'i ape' bo'wepa andeande'. Ina anona eafa ape' meataga bo'wepa andeande' ma naep ananimi, owa'etin. Bale'ef atona. Eaf si'i Baibel na'i, “Emi egafis sembale'efa Godi, Anan ni'i esis bu'wasi andeande' sope namusi la'ela'ef.”
45001018	Dei' owagama wapoti' okom numbutinai Godi nape nafi'i heven notaga nondawalap alihina ma waf hianai aonai epes sanda'anai. Anan nogwamasa nimanimi lu'wami ma epes isima hiesi sowa' alafugaha waf bu'unai Ananinai sanda' waf aonai dei' sahagofa basef endilisimi Ananimi.
45001019	Dei' main, waf hianai Godi ina nandambaho', owa'. Maina waf dende' ma gawa epesi God nihi'ambasana nataga alihina nandawalap.
45001020	Fowa' dambadamba God nanda' amamaga hiami mataga nogota anama nafi'i nataga dei', esis sati amamaga anan nanda'ami. Amamaga amama esis wilama sogawa ma anona waf hianai Godi esis owa' la'ifisa seatolona naepi. Amama na'ama. Esis satolona endilisi waf Godi ofagena, Anan Dembinai nikila' amam dambami hiami mape etapi. Esis sati waf anama naloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai nape la'ela'ef. Ea' amama atom dei' esis ina anona eafa sondahali' sombaho'a waf aonai esis sanda'anai sie'i, “Afa' owa' ogawae.” Owa'etin.
45001021	Esis sogawa God nape ea' esis ina sogawa sa'i Anan bu'unai endilisi ma sosa'ma agel Ananinai lu'una o sinifelona, owa'. Ukup asasimi mapoma amamaga falafumi atom ea' opalef asasimi ina mataga andeande', owa'. Mataga aom endilisi.
45001022	Esis aligah maso'as sa'iam sa'i, “Ape' mogawai,” ea' esis sataga ukup mahaga magaola waf bu'unai.
45001023	Ea' sase'ana alafugaha God owa' neaga'i naloma agel lu'unai Ananinai. Esis ina sanda' lotumana sanifelona, owa'. Sambala lawah maim falafumi atom mataga god baso'omainai asasinai mandati si'i amiguf, mafis, iguf maim maloma epes owa' seape namusi la'ela'efi, ea' sanda' lotumam sanifelom.
45001024	Esis sandaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugahana. Amama atom dei' Anan nakwaha esis ea' ukup asasimi mohafel la'ifim manda'as sanda' waf hianai aonai. Sanda so'a waol sahambombaga alop asasinai.
45001025	Dei' main, esis ukup maso'asa basef Godi endilisimi ea' sagi'ma basef baso'maimi atom maho'ofa basef endilisimi Ananimi. Ea' sanda' lotuma amamaga amama God nanda'ami, ea' Anan, sesambalona. God Anan bu'unai ofagonama amamaga amama hiami, ape' mafela agel ananinai lu'una la'ela'ef endilisi.
45001026	-
45001027	Ea' God nakwaha esis saila ukup epesi atoma sanda' waf aonai ambagof aomanai. Sanda' waf anama aonai naho'ofa waf daso'amainai. Nematawa waila waf ikiakanai waloma anowa nematawa. Anom amam wapoti' manda'am na'ama etin. Ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi maimaila anom amam malomam monda' waf aonai. Ea' waf anama nahambombaga ukup maloma alop amamunai mandahama waf aonai amam manda'anai.
45001028	Ukup asasimi atom sandaiwa'ma sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nape natilis saila ukup awami asasimi atoma sanda' waf naninani aonai owa' andeande'ma epes seanda'anai.
45001029	-
45001030	Esis sanda' waf hianai naninani aonai nape si'ina ma esis. Ukup mohafel maimaila sofa' amamaga hiami ma esis etis. Waf aonai agufuma anama. Ukup kowalepa amamaga bu'wami awami, ukup aoma soha enis epes, saha enis epes saga', migimigah sambaso'ama sofa' anom amamaga enis epesi ea' sanda' maola saha epes. Waf anama aonai asi'ina endilisi ma esis. Ea' sanda'ipama sa'i basef sawalapama sola'masa basef enis epes ma naep epes hiesi. Esis sataga naumbih saloma God, sa'i basef la'ifimi safela agof asasimi atom. Ukup mandanda' ma waf naninani aonai dambainai. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi.
45001031	Esis ina sagawa waf bu'unai ea' sa'i basef andeande', ea' ina saila basef amama asasimi andeande', owa'. Esis ina ukup maimaila enis epes satilis uwahipis, owa'.
45001032	Basefa mi'uli Godi bu'unai na'ama na'i, “Epes sanda' waf na'amainai esis soga'.” Epes isima sogawa mi'uli anama, owa'etin. Sanda' waf anama aonai atona. Ea' ina sanda'ana etin, owa'. Safela agofa enis epes sanda' waf anama aonai sandanifamas.
45002001	Ipe' emi egafipa pa'i enis epes sanda' waf aonai, ofagema ipe'imi atom. Peme', ipe' pa'i basef na'ama, ipe' wapoti' panda'am si'i esis sanda'am. Dei' main, isima ipe' pa'i basef na'ama, ipa panda' waf aonai si'i pa'i esis sanda'anai.
45002002	Ape' mogawa God anona nemaf nonda' kotima epes sanda' waf anama aonai ma basef endilisimi atom.
45002003	Ipe' emi egafipa pa'i enis epes sanda' waf naninani aonai, ipe' wapoti' panda' waf anama. Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Ipe' anona nemaf la'ifipama pindihi'ama basef God nonda' kotimasami pefa' pefe'? Owa'etin.
45002004	God nanda'epa andeande' endilisi, ea' ata' nape nohafepa nogota launai, ina nagwamepa waf aonai nase'epa nimanimi ulal, owa'. Waf anama bu'unai Godi ipe' ukup ma'i falafunai? Anan nanda'mepa waf anama bu'unai ma ata' pemboma opalef. A'i ipe' pegawa amama?
45002005	Ipe' pesambala basefi, dei' ina ata' pamboma opalef, owa'. Ipe' petagama nimanimi lu'wami mupei'ipa. Ama nemaf okom wandafunai Godi notaga alihina ma kot nowaloga epes hiesi ma basef endilisimi ananimi.
45002006	“Nemaf anama anan nowalogamasa waf epesi atona etin, nogwamasana nondahama waf esis sanda'anai.”
45002007	Enis epes sape la'ifis la'ela'efa waf bu'unai sagolopa eafa sofa' agof lu'wami, siti nafifili ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Epes isima God anona nemaf nonda'as sope andeande' la'ela'ef.
45002008	Ea' enis ukup mapoma esis etis sowa' alafugaha basef endilisimi saila waf aonai. Epes isima anona nemaf God okom wandafuna endilisi nindaiwa'masa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
45002009	Epes isima hiesi sanda' waf aonai anona nemaf nimanimi lu'wami motagamas. Esis Juda sili' ea' isima owa' Judaisi wapoti' sigi' solomas.
45002010	Ea' God anona nemaf nose'asa pe bu'unai ma nafifili noloma agof lu'wami moloma opalef awanemi epes isima hiesi sanda' waf bu'unai. Esis Juda sili' ea' isima owa' Judaisi sigi'.
45002011	Dei' main, Anan nowaloga epes hiesi ma ikwaf bu'unai atona.
45002012	Anan okom na'i na'ama. Emi egafis owa' seagawa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, esis sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf higililas. Ea' epes Juda sogawa mi'uli anama ea'i ma dei' sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf nowalogasa mi'uli anama atona.
45002013	Ina epes isima same' mi'uli etini sataga bo'wes andeande'ma naep Godi, owa'. Emi egafis same' basefa saila mi'uli anama, amama atom anona nemaf God ni'i esis bo'wes andeande'.
45002014	Epes isima ina Judaisi, waf asasinai na'ama. Esis mi'uli a'as, ea' maina nemaf saila basef mape nomon opalef asasimi, waf anama nataga si'i mi'uli asasinai. Esis mi'uli Godi a'as, ea' endilisi saila waf anama ma opalef asasimi.
45002015	Waf anama asasinai nihi'ambapa basefa mi'uli anama mape ukup asasimi. Ea' basef mape opalef asasimi nomon, amama wapoti' mihi'ambapa na'ama etin. Dei' main, ukup asasimi ma'iam mihi'ambas alihim na'ama. Anom nimeguf manda' kotimasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ea' anom nimeguf ukup asasimi ma'i andeande' na'ama etin si'i waf esis sanda'anai.
45002016	Amama anona nemaf motaga na'ama etina nemaf anama God nowaloga waf hianai epes hiesi sanda'anai. Nemaf anama Anan ni'i wila ma Jisas Krais nope dembinai nogwaloga waf hianai asasinai nandambahi'i noloma basef sa'iam sambahe'ami. Basef bu'wami Godi ae' awalapami amama atom.
45002017	Ipe' pefala pa'i ipe' Juda pembale'efa mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai la'ifipa nigiambamepa pihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi. Ea' ipe' pefela agof ipe'imi pa'i, “Ape' mogawa God endilisinai.”
45002018	Ea' ipe' pegawa okom God na'i penda'ana ma pila waf mi'uli anama ma ukup mi'i waf bu'unai pilana.
45002019	Ipe' pegawana pa'i ipe' epes pegawa basef Godi ma pi'ipa epes isima naep maso'asi ea' pape si'i nagwapina epes isima sape akoti ma pihi'ambas.
45002020	Ipe' epes gawaipei pawalipa isima gawa a'asi saloma enis epes owa' Judaisi sape si'i awasi ata' sa'wisi. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa pa'i basef endilisimi hiami maloma gawa hianai nape mi'uli anama pelafana pegawana.
45002021	Basef amama atom hiami mali'i dei' motanima mila ipe'. Ipe' pawalipa enis epes ea' ipe' owa' ata' pili' piwalipa ipe' etipa? Ipe' pawalipasa basef enis epes pa'i, “Ipe' ina penda' wal, owa'”, ea' ae' a'i ipe' wapoti' panda' wali?
45002022	Ipe' pawalipasa basef ma enis epes pa'i, “Ipe' ina pehambombaga waf daso'amainai, owa'.” Ea' ipe' wapoti' panda' waf anama aonai? Ipe' pandaiwa'ma god baso'omainai ea' pakowalopam amamaga ma'oh ifagw epes sanda' lotuma god anama baso'omainai. Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.
45002023	Ipe' pefela agof ipe'imi atom lu'um pa'i, “Ape' mogawa mi'uli Godi fowa' naso' Mosesanai.” Ea' ipe' pimbisila' mi'uli anama panda' waf anama atona dei' pahambombaga agel Godi.
45002024	Waf ipe' panda'anai aona si'i basef mail buki ma'iam ma'i, “Ofagema ipe' Judai atom, dei' esis owa' Judaisi sa'i basef sanda' agel Godi findiwana.”
45002025	I'i ipe' Juda pembale'efa mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai pilana endilisi, waf anama patopa' alopanai bu'unai. Ea' i'i ipe' pimbisila' mi'uli anama, petaga si'i epes owa' Judaisi ea' petaga na'ama etin si'i ipe' owa' peatopa' alopi.
45002026	Epes isima owa' Judaisi seatopa'masa alopi, esis sape na'ama. I'i esis sila waf anama hianai bu'unai ma mi'uli anama, nambimb sogawa God sotaga si'i isima satopa'mas alopi ma naep Godi.
45002027	Endilisi esis owa' Judaisi nambimb sofa' basef mila ipe' Juda. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa mi'uli anama Godi nape buki ea' patopa' alop ipe'inai ea' pimbisila' mi'uli anama. Ea' esis isima owa' seatopa' alopi saila mi'uli anama.
45002028	I'i ipe' epes Judaipei patopa' alop atona, ipe' ina Juda endilisipei, owa'. Ea' waf anama patopa' alopanai ina waf endilisinai ma ipe', owa'.
45002029	Ipe' epes hipei Juda. I'i opalef ipe'imi motaga dambaim, ipe' Juda endilisipei. Waf patopa' alopanai, God nanda'ana opalef ipe'imi nomon. Amama ina matagama basefa mi'uli nail buki, owa'. Ambal Godi atona nanda'am. Emi egafis senda'am na'ama, esis agof a'asa naep epesi. Ea' esis agof lu'uma naep Godi atom.
45003001	Dei' esis Juda sikila' enis epes owa' Judaisi ma maina waf bu'unai? Maina waf bu'unai natagama waf anama satopa' alopanai?
45003002	Waf bu'unai hianai natagamana. Waf nali'i anama. God nali' nase'asa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom esis Juda ma sumafiam silam.
45003003	Endilisi, enis ina sombale'efa basef amama andeande'. Ea' dei' ata' si'i main? A'i waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai anona nemaf nonda' God nokwaha basef endilisimi Ananimi?
45003004	Owa'etin. Ape' mi'i basef mi'i, epes hiesi sambaso'ami, ea' God atona na'i basef endilisimi la'ela'ef nanda' maol andeande' si'i Baibel na'iam, “Amam nematawa hiesi seme' basef ine'imi si'i endilisimi atom. Nemaf anama enis epes si'i sonda'mena basef, ine' nikila'as.”
45003005	-
45003006	Dei' i'ipipa anom basef ape' epes ukup ma'iami. Basef amama na'ama. Dei' ata' mama? I'i waf aonai ape' manda'anai nawalapa waf bu'unai Godi nataga alihina, ape' nambimb mi'iam mi'imama? Mi'i God nanda' waf aonai okom wandafunai nogwamapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai? Owa'etin. I'i God nonda' waf aonai, dei' Anan nowaloga waf amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai ma main? Owa'etin.
45003007	Enis epes ukup ma'i etin sambaso'am sa'i na'ama sa'i, “I'i epes hiesi siti waf aonai ape' manda'anai noloma waf Godi endilisinai ma sowalogana, sogawa waf Godi nikila' waf ape' manda'anai. Ea' waf ape' manda'anai nawalapa agel Godi lu'una. Ea' na'ama God ina nambimb nogwamapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai, owa'.” Owa'etin. Epes isima sambaso'ami.
45003008	I'i ape' mila basef amama baso'maimi, mefe' mefe' mi'i, “Awi, ape' monda' waf aonai ma muwalapai waf bu'unai Godi.” Endilisi, enis epes sambaso'am sa'i basef findiwama ae' sa'i ae' a'iam na'ama. Owa'etin. Epes isima sa'i basef amama, anona nemaf God nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
45003009	Dei' si'i main? Basef amama do'okimi ma'i main? Ma'i ape' Juda mikila' enis epes owa' Judaisi ma waf bu'unai? Owa'etin. Ae' ihi'ambepa basef ea', waf aonai nase'ala ape' hiapai, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
45003010	Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, “Ina enin epen bo'wen andeande' nape, owa'etin.
45003011	Ina enin epen negawa waf bu'unai. Ina enin epen nanda' maol nagolopa God, owa'.
45003012	Epes hiesi sololama eaf bu'unai sataga epes sanda' waf aonai. Ina enin epen nanda' waf bu'unai, owa'. Ina enin atitin bo'wen.
45003013	Malogof asasimi mandahama si'i hi'agilif sawa epes saga'i, mindihianama alihim mape. Esis sa'i basef hiami baso'maimi maloma basef hiami mamumami ma sahambombaga enis epes si'i numbut nape igufi naha epes saga'i.
45003014	La'ela'ef ukup asasimi wandafum endilisi sa'i basef awami atoma sase'a nimanimi enis epes.
45003015	Esis mehip saha enis epes saga'.
45003016	La'ela'ef sahambombaga epes hiesi sase'asa nimanimi hiami.
45003017	Opalef asasimi ina mape awanem seape opalef atifim soloma enis epes, owa'.
45003018	Esis ina ukup maimaila God umbamahasana ma saila waf Ananinai, owa'.”
45003019	Ea' dei' ape' mogawa maim basef Godi mape mi'uli Anan fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'i ape' Juda mope owina mi'uli anama milana. Ea' ina la'ifipa mailana andeande', owa'. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina ni'i, “Ae' epen bu'uwei andeande',” owa'etin. Ape' epes hiapai ganima hiagoma, ofagema mapoma ape' ma naep Godi anona nemaf nowaloga ape' nowalapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
45003020	Dei' main, waf anama maila mi'uli anama, owa' enin epen atitin anona nemaf nefa' agel epen bu'unai andeande' ma naep Godi, owa'. Mi'uli anama nihi'ambapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
45003021	Ea' dei' waf bu'unai Godi nataga alihiguma nandawalap. Anama ina nataga nagi'ma waf saila mi'uli fowa' gani God naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Anama nataga anona eaf na'ama. Basef hiami Godi mail buki mawalapai waf anama. Anom mail mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ea' anom amam profet hiami manda'anai.
45003022	Waf anama na'ama. Emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas Kraisi, isima God nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi. Ea' ape' epes hiapai mombale'efa Kraisi, God nanda'apa na'ama etin, esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
45003023	Ape' epes hiapai manda' waf aonai mumbisila' mi'uli Godi ea' ina la'ifipama anona nemaf muti mafifili bu'unai Ananinai, owa'.
45003024	Ea' God nati ape' uwahipipa nandahomapa. Ape' mombale'efa Krais Jisas ea' God na'i ape' epes bu'upai. Ape' ina mase'ana anom amamaga matalona, owa'. Anan nagiambamapa ma Krais Jisas ea' natagahepa natalapa ma mape wafifipa.
45003025	God nihi'ambasana Krais Jisas alihina ma amam nematawa hiesi na'ama. Anan naga' esimbel ananimi malo mali'amona okom wandafunai Godi ma nakwaha waf aonai emi egafis sembale'efanai. Ga' Krais Jisasi atona dei' God nihi'ambapa waf bu'unai na'ama. Fowa' nanda' esis amam nematawa sa'osa'ombemas ea' ina nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.
45003026	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ma dei' nihi'ambapa waf bu'unai ananinai nataga alihiguma. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa Anan bu'unai endilisi na'i emi egafis sembale'efa Jisasi sataga epes bu'wasi.
45003027	Ea' dei' ape' eaf a'apa ma mefela agof ape'imi atom lu'um, owa'. Eaf anama ea' naso'. Main de'im mahefa eaf anama? A'i waf anama maila mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai? Owa'etin! Waf mombale'efa Jisasanai atona nahopa eaf anama.
45003028	Ape' mogawa emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas atona, God na'i esis sataga epes bu'wasi andeande'. Ea' esis ina saila mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'.
45003029	Dei' mama? A'i God Anan Dembinai esis Judai atona? Owa'etin. Anan Dembinai esis isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
45003030	Dei' main, God anan anama atona. Anan na'i basef atifim mafe'ma epes hiesi. Emi egafis sembale'efa Krais Jisasi, nambimb God ni'i esis epes bu'wasi andeande, esis Juda saila waf satopa' alopanai saloma isima owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
45003031	Amama atom dei' bale'ef anama ape' ina mi'i ape' matopa' basefa mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ape' mombale'efa Krais Jisas dei' mawalapa basef ofagema ma mi'uli anama.
45004001	Ape' mi'i basefa Abraham akunamapa ape' Judai mi'imama? Anan nanda' maina God na'i anan epen bu'unai?
45004002	Endilisi Abraham ina nataga epen bu'unai ma nanda' maol bu'unai, owa'. Ea' ina nafela agel ananinai lu'una ma naep Godi, owa'. Anan nembale'efa God na'i epen bu'unai.
45004003	Baibel na'iam na'imama? Na'iam na'ama na'i, “Abraham nombale'efa God ea' God nati bale'ef ananinai na'i anan epen bu'unai.”
45004004	Ape' mogawa epes sanda' maoli ma sofa' amamaga ma maol sanda'anai, amamaga amama ina mi'iam mi'i mofa'am etin si'i presen, owa'. Amama amamaga satopa' maolami.
45004005	Na'ama God ina nati maol bu'unai epes sanda'anai ma ni'i esis epes bu'wasi, owa'. Anan nati emi egafis sembale'efana la'ifisi ma nefalas sanda' waf aonai sataga epes bu'wasi. Ea' God nati bale'ef asasinai dei' na'i esis epes bu'wasi.
45004006	Fowa' Devit wapoti' nanda' anom basef mail buk Baibela emi egafis God natilis na'i epes bu'wasi, isima sandanifel. Esis ina sanda' maol, owa'. Sembale'efana etin dei' na'i esis epes bu'wasi.
45004007	Devit nanda' basef amama na'i, “Emi egafis God nakwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai, epes isima sandanifel.
45004008	Emi egafis Dembinai owa' okom nopoma waf aonai esis sanda'anai isima sandanifel.”
45004009	Epes isima Devit na'i sandanifel, epes isima satopa' alopi etis? Owa'etin. Isima owa' seatopa' alopi wapoti'. Dei' main, do'ok ae' a'ipipa Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, “Abraham nembale'efa God ea' God nati bale'ef ananinai na'i anan epen bu'unai.”
45004010	Dei' Abraham nape na'imama God okom napomana na'i epen bu'unai? Anan nali' natopa' alop ea' o ata' owa' neatopa' alop? Anan ina dei' natopa' alopa God na'i anan epen bu'unai, ata' owa'.
45004011	Fowa' gani Abraham nali' nembale'efa God nofalana epen bu'unai. Ea' nagi' natopa' alop. Waf anama natopa' alopanai anona ikwaf God nihi'ambana na'ama na'i nemaf anama ata' owa' neatopa' alopanai God na'i anan epen bu'unai. Amama atom dei' anan nataga akunamas epes hiesi sombale'efa Godi owa' seatopa' alopi. Esis sembale'efa God atona dei' nofalas epes bu'wasi.
45004012	Ea' anan akunamas epes isima Juda satopa' alopi wapoti'. Ea' esis ina satopa' alop atona, owa'. Esis saila bo'wagah Abrahami sombale'efa God si'i fowa' anan nembale'efana nogota anama ata' owa' neatopa' alop.
45004013	Fowa' gani God na'i basef endilisimi atom naloma Abraham na'i, “Ae' anona nemaf ese'ena etap hiagoma ine' neloma esis bafasena akusena ine'isi wapoti'.” Na'ama Abraham ina naila mi'uli anama God na'i noso' Mosesanai ma dei' na'i basef endilisimi nalomana na'ipana basef amama, ata' owa'. Abraham nali' nembale'efa God dei' nofalana epen bu'unai na'ipana basef amama.
45004014	Anom basef ma'ipapa amama mali'i na'ama ma'i, I'i epes sila mi'uli Godi ma sofa' amamaga amama God nease'asami, anona nemaf waf anama mombale'efa Godi nowala ea' basef endilisimi amama God na'iam nalomas wapoti' owa' la'ifim, owa'.
45004015	Dei' main, mi'uli anama nawalapa okom wandafunai Godi ma nose'as nemanimi isima sosambala basefa mi'uli anama. I'i ape' owa' mila basefa mi'uli anama, God okom wandafunai napomapa. I'i mi'uli anama owa', God ina ni'i epes sumbisila' mi'uli anama satopa'ana, owa'.
45004016	Abraham nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' God na'ipana basef amama endilisimi atom bu'wami ma ape' mogawa endilisi God na'ipas basef amama wapoti' na'i ape' hiapai bafalomapa Abrahami, nase'apam etin si'i presen. Ina nase'asa epes isima saila mi'uli anama atona, owa'. Emi egafis sembale'efa God na'ama etin si'i Abrahami, esis wapoti'. Anan nali' nembale'efa God nataga bafalomapa nali' endilisi ma ape' hiapai emi egafipa dei' magi' membale'efa God.
45004017	Si'i Baibel na'i, God fowa' gani na'ipa Abraham na'i, “Ae' enda'ena nepe bafalomasa epes hiesi.” Abraham anan bafalomapa ape'inai ma naep Godi. Anan nembale'efa God atona nase'asa ambal namunai epes saga'i, ea' nofala amamaga hiami ata' owa' meatagai si'i mataga mape ea'.
45004018	Abraham ina dei' nati amamaga amama God na'ipanam na'i neanda'ami. Ea' anan nembale'ef endilisi si'i natolom ea'. Amama atom dei' nataga “Bafalomas esis amam nematawa hiesi.” Si'i fowa' God na'iam na'i, “Anona nemaf owagama epes hiesi wambota ine'inai sotaga na'ama.”
45004019	-
45004020	Abraham hagona felefele'ma afagof 100-peleim, alop ananinai nowafa si'i naga'i. Ea' waulu'mana Sara hage'w wapoti' asa'w ina la'ifikwa kola awasi, owa'. Abraham okom napoma amama, ea' bale'ef ananinai ina nowala, owa'. Anan nembale'ef la'ifina ma basef God na'i endilisimi nalomana ma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Bale'ef atona nanda'ana la'ifina ea' nafela agel Godi lu'una.
45004021	Anan nembale'efa God endilisi ma nogawa Anan la'ifinai ma nonda'am na'ama si'i fowa' na'i nonda'ama basef amama endilisimi.
45004022	Amama atom God okom napoma bale'ef ananinai ea' na'i, “Anan epen bu'unai.”
45004023	Fowa' anona profet nanda' basef amama mape Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, “God okom napoma anan epen bu'unai.” Amam profet ina manda' basef amama ma Abraham atona, owa'.
45004024	Manda'ama ape' wapoti'. Ape' membale'efa God nafela Jisas Dembinai ape'inai nohafel hi'agif. Amama atom God nati bale'ef ape'inai ea' na'i ape' epes bu'upai.
45004025	God nasapa' Jisas nafi'i naga'ma nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Ea' nafelona hi'agifa na'i ape' epes bu'upai.
45005001	Basef ofagema mape mali'i amama, bale'ef ape'inai atona dei' God nofalapa epes bu'upai. Amama atom dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nanda'apa mape opalef etifim awanem maloma God.
45005002	Anan atona eafa ape' mombale'efana mope nomona okom Godi nainaila ape' endilisi nandahomapa nefa'apai dei' mape andeande'. Ape' mogawa endilisi mape mohafa anona nemaf God nofa'apa mope molomana miti nafifili Ananinai. Bale'ef anama nanda'apa mandanifel ma amama.
45005003	Ape' ina mandanifela amama atom, owa'. Ape' mandanifela nimanimi meatagamapa wapoti'. Dei' main, ape' mogawa mofa'ama monda'apa la'ifipa.
45005004	I'i ape' mitu la'ifipama amamaga amama meagwamba ape'i, God ni'i aho'mapa. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa endilisi Anan naila basef ananimi andeande' ma nigiambamapa mope mohafa nafifili pepel ananinai anona nemaf neatagai.
45005005	I'i ape' mogawa endilisi na'ama, bale'ef ape'inai ina anona nemaf hegililana, owa'. Dei' main, God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai ea' waf okom nainailapa nape lu'una opalef ape'imi.
45005006	Amama na'ama. Fowa' ape' ina la'ifipa ma monda' waf bu'unai, nogota anama God nandandepana Krais naga'ma ape' mowa' alafugaha Godi.
45005007	Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Enin epen na'i nega'ma nigiambama emi egalin na'i nila mi'uli Godi? A'i ina enis si'i a'e, owa'. Ea' i'i enin epen bo'wen endilisi, enin wila ma nega' nigiambama enin epen bu'wani.
45005008	Ape' ata' manda' waf aonai, Krais naga' nagiambamapa. Ea' dei' God nihi'ambapa okom lu'unai nainaila ape' nandawalap alihina.
45005009	Anan naga' esimbel ananimi malo dei' God nofalapa epes bu'upai. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa endilisi Krais natagahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi.
45005010	Fowa' ape' ata' mape naumbih Godi, ea' dei' nanda'apa mataga alupipai ananipai opalef etifim malomana. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma Nogalomana Ananinai naga'ma ape'. Amama atom dei' ape' mape alupipai Godi mogawa endilisi Krais nape namona ma anona nemaf nofa'apa motanimani mofe' molomana mope.
45005011	Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Ape' mandanifel ma God. Dei' main? Fowa' ape' mape naumbih Ananipai ea' dei' Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nali'amona naumbih ape'imi nanda'apa mataga alupipai malomana. Ea' dei' mandanifel ma Anan.
45005012	Ape' mogawa amama. Aman atotona nali' nanda' waf aonai, dei' waf aonai nape opalef amam nematawa etapasi hiesi. Ea' dei' waf aonai nefa'ai ga' nafi'i, dei' ga' naha epes hiesi saga'. Dei' main, epes hiesi sanda' waf aonai.
45005013	Fowa' gani nogota anama God ata' owa' nose'anai mi'uli Ananinai Moses, waf aonai nali' nataga nape etap anae'. I'i basefa mi'uli anama owa'etin, dei' God ina nawaloga epesa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.
45005014	Ea' ga' nataga nape nogota anama Adami nafi'i nataga nogota Mosesi. Epes isima hiesi ina sogawa mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ea' ga' natagamas saga' hi'alas. Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli Ananinai Adam, ea' Adam natopa'ana. Enis epes ina satopa'ana si'i Adam natopa'ana, owa'. Ea' ga' natagamas saga' wapoti'. Aman anama Adam nanda' ikwafa aman anona nemaf neatagai.
45005015	Waf God nandahomapa anai ma Jisas Krais naloma waf aonai Adam nanda'anai ina na'ama etin, owa'. Aman anama Adam atotona nanda' waf aonai, dei' nanda' epes hiesi saga'. Ea' God nandahomapa, waf anama nataga lu'una endilisi ma aman atotona Jisas Krais. Ea' ape' dei' mofa' amamaga amama presen Godi nikila' ga' anama ea' nataga lu'una endilisi ma nandahoma epes hiesi.
45005016	Waf bu'unai God nandahomapa anai anama ina nape etifigin naloma waf aonai aman anama atotona nanda'anai, owa'. Aman anama nanda' waf atotona aonai. Ea' God nawalogapa epes hiapai na'i, “Ipe' awepa hi'alepa endilisi.” Ape' manda' waf aonai hianai ea' God okom nainailapa nandahomapa na'i ape' epes bu'upai.
45005017	Aman anama atotona nanda' waf aonai. Amama atom dei' ga' nataga ma epes hiesi ma aman anama atona. Ea' maol aman anama atotona Jisas Krais nanda'anai lu'una endilisi nikila' ga' ma nagiambama epes isima hiesi. Epes isima owagama sope namisi ma sope dembesi si'i king. Epes isima God nandahomas endilisi.
45005018	Dei' ape' mape na'ama. Fowa' waf aonai atotona nanda' ape' hiapai higilalapa. Ea' na'ama etin waf bu'unai atotona natagahepa ma waf aonai nanda'apa dei' mape namepa.
45005019	Aman atotona nosambala basef Godi dei' ape' hiapai mape manda' waf aonai. Ea' na'ama etin aman bu'unai atotona naila basef amama andeande' dei' ape' hiapai mataga epes bu'upai ma naep Godi.
45005020	Ea' mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai natagama esis sogawa waf esis sanda'anai aona satopa' mi'uli anama. Ea' esis ina sakwaha waf anama aonai, owa'. Sanda'ana hianai endilisi. Ea' eaf God nandahomasanai nataga lu'una endilisi ma esis.
45005021	Fowa' waf aonai nataga lu'una ma ape' hiapai dei' maga'. Ea' dei' waf God nandahomapa anai nikila' waf anama aonai. Anan nandahomapa ea' nofalapa amam nematawa bu'upai ma mofa' ambal namunai nape la'ela'ef ma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais.
45006001	Enis epes sambaso'mas sa'i na'ama. Sa'i ape' monda' waf aonai la'ela'ef ma waf God nandahomapanai notaga lu'una. Ape' mi'iam na'ama o owa'?
45006002	Owa'etin. Waf aonai atotona, dei' ape' maga'. Dei' maina ape' ata' monda' waf aonai atona? Owa'etin, hapainai.
45006003	Ipe' pegawa ape' emi egafipa mofa' baptaisa mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais mofa' baptaisa ga' Ananinai.
45006004	Baptais anama ape' la'ifipa maloma ga' Jisasi, God nawapa maloma Krais hi'agif. Pepel bu'unai Ahalomanai atona nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif. Ea' na'ama etina ape' mohafel wapoti' mape la'ifipa manda' waf dambainai ma ambal namunai etap anae'.
45006005	Ape' la'ifipa maloma Kraisa ga' anama ananinai si'i Anan naga'. Ea' na'ama etin anona nemaf ape' motaga la'ifipa mohafel wapoti' molomana.
45006006	Ape' mogawa opalef apimi ape'imi maga' mail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai maloma Krais ea' God natofa waf aonai nanda' maol nape alop ape'inai. Amama atom dei' ape' ina mape owina waf aonai wapoti', owa'.
45006007	Dei' main, anona aman naga'i, ina ata' nape owina waf aonai wapoti', owa'.
45006008	Ape' maga' maloma Krais. Ea' mogawa endilisi aona nemaf mope ambal namunai molomana wapoti'.
45006009	Ape' mogawa God nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif. Amama atom Anan ina anona nemaf noga' wapoti', owa'. Ga' ina la'ifina natofa Anan, owa'.
45006010	Anan naga' nemaf atotona ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai ea' ma'um. Ga' anama atona Anan nahambombaga pepel anama ma waf aonai nafe' hi'alana. Anan dei' nape ambal namunai naila okom Godi atona.
45006011	Ea' na'ama etina ipe' wapoti' ukup mopoma ipe' pakwaha waf aonai si'i epes saga'i. Ipe' ukup mopoma ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas pape namipei paloma God.
45006012	Ipe' ina pi'i aho'ma waf aonai nope notaga la'ifina numafi ipe', owa'. Na'ama waf anama aonai nohonde'epa ea' pila waf alop atonai.
45006013	Ipe' ina pese' lagof bo'wagah ipe'imi mefe'ma penda' waf aonai, owa'. Pese' ipe' pefe'ma God atona moloma ukup ipe'imi hi'ilama anan atona si'i epes sotanima sohafel hi'agif wapoti' sape namisi. Ipe' pese'ana alop wa'ana hi'ilana Goda penda' waf bu'unai.
45006014	Ipe' pegawa waf aonai ina ata' nape lu'unama ipe' wapoti', owa'. Dei' main, ipe' dei' ina ata' pape owina mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ma pilana, owa'. Ipe' pape owina waf Godi atona okom nainailapa ma nandahomapa.
45006015	Ea' dei' ape' ata' monda'am mi'imama? Ape' ina mape owina mi'uli anama God fowa naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ape' dei' mape owina waf anama God nandahomapa etin. Ea' dei' ape' monda' waf aonai? Owa'etin endilisi!
45006016	I'i ipe' pese' ipe' etipa penda' maol pepe owina aman emi, ipe' la'ifipa ma pilana. I'i ipe' pese' opalefa waf aonai, ipe' pape owina waf anama nonda'epa pega'. Ea' i'i ipe' pese' opalefa waf bu'unai pepe owina God petaga bu'upei ma naep ananimi.
45006017	Endilisi, fowa' ipe' pape owina waf aonai nanda'epa panda'ana. Ea' God nanda'epa pape owina basef ananimi pailam ea' pase'ana opalef hi'alama paila basef amama ipe' pefa'ami. Ea' ape' manifela God.
45006018	Anan natagahepa ma pepel waf aonai, dei' pataga epes panda' maol pape owina waf bu'unai natagahepa ma waf aonai.
45006019	Ukup ipe'imi ina dei' la'ifim, owa'. Amama atom dei' aila ukup ape' epesi a'iam alihim a'i. Fowa' ipe' ata' pase' alop ipe'inai wa'ana pape owina waf aonai naninani naloma waf hianai sosambala mi'uli Godi ea' nandepa panda'ana. Ea' dei' peso' alop wa'ana hi'ilana pepe owina waf bu'unai ma pepe epes Godi etipa.
45006020	Fowa' ipe' ata' pape owina waf aonai, nogota anama ipe' ata' pape peloloma waf bu'unai.
45006021	Ipe' pefa' amamaga maim bu'wami ma waf aonai fowa' panda'anai, ma dei' ipe' ambagof aoma waf anama? Owa'etin. Waf anama nawalapai ga' atona.
45006022	Ea' dei' God natagahepa ma waf aonai nanda'epa pape panda' maola anan pape owina anan la'ela'ef. Maol anama nola gwa'aimi amama. Ipe' pepe bo'wepa ananipei etipa ma pefa' ambal namunai pepe andeande' la'ela'ef.
45006023	Waf aonai nagwamasa awami ma isima sanda' maola waf aonai. Awami amama. Esis anona nemaf soga' etin higililas. Ea' God dei' nase'apai presen bu'unai etin, anama ambal namunai nape la'ela'efi ma mope la'ifipa moloma Krais Jisas.
45007001	Ipe' alupipei, ipe' pegawa mi'uli ma waf daso'amainai ea'. Ea' pegawa andeande'ma basef amama dei' a'ipipami. Nogota anama epen ata' nape namin, enin ata' nape owina mi'uli anama.
45007002	Basef ofagema ma mi'uli anama amama. I'i ano'w nemata'w kwaso' amani, ma anan ata' nopan namunai, mi'uli anama ata' newa'ana naloma akwa'w ata' sape etifis. I'i waulunama'w noga', mi'uli anama newa'asi pele'atana kwape wafifi'w.
45007003	Ea' i'i anan aman ata' nope ambal napaina ma waulu'mana kofe' kweaso' anona aman, sofala'w si'i akwa'w kwanda' waf aonai. Ea' i'i aman akwa'unai noga', mi'uli anama ina ata' newa'as etifis wapoti', owa'. Akwa'w kwandatagah kwape wafifi'w. Esis ina si'i basefa akwa'w si'i akwa'w kwanda' so'a wauli, owa'.
45007004	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' a'i i'ipipa basef amama ofagema. Ape' hiapai mape la'ifipa maloma Krais ea' amama atom dei' maga' ea'. Dei' mi'uli anama God fowa' nase' Mosesanai ina ata' nowa'apa la'ifipa wapoti', owa'. Ape' mape la'ifipa paloma Jisas aman God nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ea' monda' maol ananinai atona.
45007005	Fowa' ata' mape la'ela'efa opalef apimi, mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai nafilai ukup awami ma alop ape'inai. Ea' manda' maola waf aonai nawalapai ga'.
45007006	Ea' ape' dei' maga' maloma Krais makwaha amamaga mowa'apa la'ifipa. Ea' mi'uli anama ina ata' nowa'apa wapoti', owa'. Mape wafifipa. Dei' ape' ina ata' manda' maol maila mi'uli anama amam manda'ana nail buki, owa'. Ape' manda' maola waf dambainai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nanda'anai.
45007007	Mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai nape na'ama. Dei' ape' ata' mi'iam mi'imama? Mi'i mi'uli atona waf aonai o owa'? Owa'etin! Mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai nihi'ambe maina waf aonai ofagena ma egawana. Waf anama kowalasanai nape na'ama. Mi'uli anama na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ina kowalena ma anom amamaga anona amani, owa'.” I'i mi'uli anama owa' nihi'ambe na'ama, ae' ina egawa waf aonai kowalasanai, owa'.
45007008	Mi'uli anama si'i anama eafa waf aonai nefela okom nanda' ae' kowalema amamaga hiami. I'i mi'uli anama owa'etin, ae' waf aonai a'e.
45007009	-
45007010	Fowa' gani mi'uli anama ata' owa', nogota anama ata' ape okom nase'e lolaiwi ma waf aonai. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' basef ofagema ma mi'uli anama mafi'mai ae' ea' waf aonai nohafel nafe' ambal ae'anai ea' nahe aga'ma mi'uli anama. Do'ok li' God nanda' mi'uli ananinai ma nefela ambal namunai ea' ae' ine' efa' ambal namunai ma mi'uli anama, owa'. Mi'uli anama nahe aga' etin.
45007011	Dei' main, waf aonai nasopama eafa mi'uli anama ea' nambaso'me. Mi'uli anama nafela okoma ae' nihi'ambe waf aonai nahe aga'.
45007012	Ea' ape' mogawa mi'uli atona anan bo'ona andeande'. Basef amama hiami mape mi'uli anama bo'om wapoti'.
45007013	A'i mi'uli anama bu'unai nahe aga'? Owa'etin! Waf aonai atona nahe aga'. Ea' amamaga amama si'i anona eafa waf aonai nahe aga' ma waf anama aonai ofagena nataga nandawalap. Ea' mi'uli anama nihi'ambapa waf aonai ofagena, waf anama aona endilisi.
45007014	Ape' mogawa mi'uli anama nafi'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambapa okom Ananinai. Ea' ae' okom apinai nape ina aila okom Godi, owa'. Waf aonai nembale'e anda' maola waf anama aonai.
45007015	Ea' dei' ae' ina egawa waf ofagena anda'anai, owa'. Waf ae' okom na'ina'iana a'i enda'anai, anama ina anda'ana, owa'.
45007016	Okom ae'anai atona a'iam na'ama a'i aho'ma mi'uli anama bu'unai ma eme'ana ilana. Owa'etin. Ina ailana, owa'. Ae' andaiwa'ma enda' waf aonai. Ea' anda' waf anama atona.
45007017	Ea' ina ae' atowe anda'ana, owa'. Waf aonai nape opaf ae'anai nomon, anama atona nanda'am.
45007018	Ae' egawa opaf ae'anai nomon, ina anom nomonas bu'wami mape, owa'. Opaf anama apinai ae'anai atona nahambombage. Endilisi, ae' okom na'i enda' waf bu'unai atona, owa'. Ina la'ifiwi anda'ana, owa'.
45007019	-
45007020	Waf bu'unai okom na'i enda'anai, anama ina anda'ana, owa'. Ea' waf aonai andaiwa'ma eanda'anai, anama atona anda'ana. Ea' ae' egawa ina ae' aila okom anda' amama, owa'. Waf aonai nape opaf ae'anai nomon, anama atona nanda'e anda'am.
45007021	Amama atom dei' ati waf na'amainai nape ae'. Okom na'i enda' waf bu'unai, ea' waf aonai nape opaf ae'anai na'ipi anda'am.
45007022	Okom atona ae'anai dei' nainaila endilisi mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai andanifamana.
45007023	Ea' ati anona waf nape alop si'ina wa'ana ae'anai nomon. Ea' waf anama napa' naloma mi'uli anama nape okom ae'anai. Waf anama atona nape alop wa'ana ae'anai nembalo' ae' nanda'e anda' maola waf anama aonai.
45007024	Ea' uwahipiwi! Ae' epen danifel a'e, okom nimaninaiwei. Emi egalin netagahowe ma opaf apinai dei' nahe aga'i?
45007025	Ae' anifela God! Anan atona nanda' Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai natagahowe ape wafifiwi. Dei' ape na'ama. Okom ae'anai atona, ape owin mi'uli anama, ea' opaf apinai ape owina pepel waf aonai.
45008001	Basef amama mali'i ofagema amama. Ape' amam nematawa mape la'ifipa maloma Krais Jisas, ina ata' anom basef dei' ma God nonda'mapa basef lu'wami mofa' nimanimi ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai, owa'etin.
45008002	Dei' main, pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'apa ambal namunai ape', anan natagahepa ma pepel waf aonai naloma pepel naga'i. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma Krais Jisas atona ea' mape la'ifipa ma anan dei' mape wafifipa.
45008003	Maol anama mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai owa' la'ifina nonda'ana, God nanda'ana. Dei' main, opalef ape' epesi ina la'ifim. Dei' God nanda' maol anama na'ama. Nasapa'i Nogalomana Ananinai atona nafi'i nataga si'i ape' epes manda' waf aonai. Ama nokwahomapa waf aonai hi'alana. Anan nafi'i ma nokwaha waf aonai ape' epesi noloma nimanimi ma waf anama ea' God nase'anam mapoma anan atona. God nanda'am na'ama dei' nanda' basefa waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
45008004	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma ape' mofe' mila waf bu'unai nape mi'uli anama. Dei' main, ape' dei' ina mafe' maila fe' anama opalef apimi, owa'. Mafe' maila fe' dambainai Ambal Bu'unai Godi.
45008005	Epes saila waf opalef apimi safi'i, ukup asasimi mape la'ifim maila amamaga amama opalef apimi maimailami. Ea' epes emi egafis safe' saila Ambal Bu'unai Godi, ukup asasimi mape la'ifim maila amamaga okom Ambal Bu'unai na'iami.
45008006	I'i ukup epes isima mapoma amamaga awami ma opalef apimi asasimi, amama mawalapai ga' higililas. Ea' emi egafis ukup asasimi la'ifim mopoma amamaga Ambal Godi, epes isima dei' nape ambal namunai opalef mape awanem.
45008007	Emi egafis ukup mila waf apinai, isima sataga naumbih Godi. Dei' main, esis ina sape owina mi'uli hianai Godi, owa'. Ina la'ifisa sila mi'uli anama, owa'.
45008008	Emi egafis sape owina waf apinai, epes isima ina la'ifisa sonda' waf God okom na'ianai, owa'.
45008009	I'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nupaipa, ipe' ina ata' pape owina waf anama apinai aonai ma okom apinai, owa'. Ipe' pape owina waf Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ea' emi egafis Spirit Ambal Kraisi owa' nopaisi, isima ina epes Kraisi, owa'.
45008010	Waf aonai fowa' panda'anai naha alop ipe'inai ma anona nemaf pega'. Ea' i'i Krais nape nomona ipe', ipe' pape namipei. Dei' main, Krais nanda'epa pataga bo'wepa ma naep Godi.
45008011	Fowa' God nafela Jisas notanima nohafel hi'agif. Ea' Ambal ananinai nagiambamepa na'ama. Ipe' epes emi egafipa Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaipa nomon, nase'epa ambal namunai alop ipe'inai wapoti'. Ipe' paga' ea', dei' anan nanda'epa pape namipa.
45008012	Ipe' alupipei wambota Kraisi, anom basef magi'ma amama ma'i Krais natalepa ma maol lu'unai dei' ape' anona wiaf ata' notaomapa ma mila okom Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ea' ape' wiaf a'apa ma mofe' mila opaf anama apinai, owa'.
45008013	I'i ipe' pefe' pila waf anama opaf apinai, anona nemaf ipe' pega'. I'i ipe' peha waf aonai ipe'inai noga' ma pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi, anona nemaf pepe namipa.
45008014	Emi egafis saila wafa Ambal Bu'unai Godi, isima dei' sape awasi Godi wambota ananinai.
45008015	Dei' main, ipe' ina pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nowa'epa la'ifipa si'i sanda' kalabusi ma ata' umbamehepa wapoti', owa'. Ipe' pefa' Ambal Bu'unai anama nanda'epa pataga awasi Godi. Pepel Ambal Bu'unai atona dei' mofalana ma'i, “Ahalomapa! Ahalomapa!”
45008016	Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nape la'ifina ma ape' nagiambama ambagof ape'imi ea' dei' mawalapa basef ma'iam alihim, mape awasi Godi.
45008017	Ape' mape awasi Godi. Ea' anona nemaf mofa' amamaga bu'wami Ahalomapai moloma amamaga anan nambe'ama Krais numafiami mofa'am moloma Krais. I'i dei' ape' mofa' nimanimi molomana, anona nemaf mofa' pe bu'unai endilisi nonda'apa mififil molomana.
45008018	Ae' okom na'i pe anama bu'unai anona nemaf notaga nondawalapa ape' gani ilif heven, anama anona nemaf nikila' endilisi nimanimi amama ape' dei' mefa'am nogota anae'.
45008019	Amamaga hiami lu'wami so'umi God nanda'ami maloma ape' epes wapoti' maniga mati endilisi ea' mape mohafa nogota ape'inai ma awasi Godi anona nemaf sotaga sondawalap alihis.
45008020	Dei' amamaga amama lu'um so'um maloma ape' epes ata' mape wafifipa, maol a'apa. Ina ape' atepa mola ukup manda'am mape, owa'. God atona nanda'apa mape na'ama nahopapa mape owina anan mape mohafa amamaga lu'wami anona nemaf na'i neanda' ma ape'ami.
45008021	Dei' amamaga awami amama hiami mowa' amamaga God nanda'ami maloma ape' epes wapoti' mowa'apa manda'apa folo'walapa aopa. Ea' anona nemaf God notofa amamaga amama awami ea' mofa' nafifili Ananinai mupe wafifipa andeande'. Mofa' amama God nandandepam mapoma wambota ananinai.
45008022	Ape' mogawa amamaga hiami lu'wami so'umi God nanda'ami mame' nimanimi si'i nemata'w kwa'i kola awani. Ea' amamaga amama malef kwapete' mape mafi'i mataga dei'.
45008023	Ea' ina amamaga amama atom, owa'. Ape' mogawa ape' epes ananipai wapoti', God okom na'i anona nemaf owagama nigiambamapa ma mope andeande'. Ea' dei' anan nali' nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Ambal Anama nase'apana etin. Ea' ape' wapoti' mame' nimanimi mawal malef mape mohafa anona nemaf God nonda'apa motaga awasi Ananipai endilisi. Nemaf anama nese'apa alop dambainai namunai.
45008024	God nofa'apa motanimani dei' mombale'afana mape mohafana nonda'apa motaga endilisi dahama dahama ma amamaga amama bu'wami. Ea' amamaga mape mohafami matolom ea', ape' ina ata' mope mohafam wapoti', owa'. I'i enin epen niti amamaga amama nape nehafami ea', dei' maina ata' nepe nehafam wapoti'? Owa'.
45008025	Ea' amamaga ape' ata' owa' meatulumi ape' mogawa endilisi anona nemaf mofa'ami, amama ape' ukup la'ifim mapomam ea' mape mohafam.
45008026	-
45008027	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi wapoti' nafi'i nagiambama ape' owa' la'ifipai nanda'apa la'ifipa. Maina nemaf ape' ukup owa' la'ifima mogawa basef amama mahali'anami, Ambal Ananinai nanda' beten nagiambamapa. Anan nanda' beten ea' anan ina nanda' beten nahali'ana ma anom basef, owa'. Nawal nalef etin nanda' beten. Ea' God nogawa ukup epesi hi'alam nogawa okom Ambal Ananinai wapoti'. Dei' main, nemaf anama Ambal Ananinai nanda' beten na'ama, Anan naila okom Godi nanda' betena ape' epes Ananipai.
45008028	Maim amamaga ma'i meatagamapai, bu'wami awami hiami, God nanda'am manda' maol atom migiambama ape' epes ukup maimaila anani. Ape' epes nofalapa ea' ma monda' maol Ananinai mila okom Ananinai.
45008029	Dei' main, epes isima God fowa' nogawas ea' nosahe'asa sotaga sondati na'ama etin si'i Nogalomana Ananinai ma Anan notaga nope si'i sahalomas dembinai ma esis sahin owan wambota ananinai.
45008030	Epes isima fowa' nosahe'as ea', Anan nofalas wapoti'. Ea' isima nofalas ea'i, Anan na'i esis epes bu'wasi ananisi etis ma naep Ananimi ea' nase'as pepel nafifili ananinai ma anona nemaf seandati si'i Anan.
45008031	Ape' mame' basefa amamaga amama bu'wami God nanda'mapami dei' muwataniam mi'imama? I'i God nagiambamapa, dei' anona nemaf ina enis la'ifisa sohambombagapa, owa'etin.
45008032	Anan ina umbamahanama nase'apai Nogalomana ananinai, owa'. Anan nasapa'anai nafi'i ma nagiambama ape' hiapai. Na'ama dei' anona nemaf Anan nose'apai anom amamaga hiami wapoti' moloma anan.
45008033	Ape' epes nasahe'apa ea', anona nemaf emi egafis si'i ape' epes aopai manda' waf aonai? Owa'etin. God atona na'i ape' epes bu'upai andeande'.
45008034	Anona nemaf ina enis epes sofalapa si'i ape' epes aopai ma God nogwamapa waf aonai ape'inai, owa'. Dei' main, Krais Jisas naga' notanima nohafel wapoti'. Ea' anan nape lagel da'isinai Godi nape la'ifinai ea' nanda' beten nagiambamapa wapoti'.
45008035	Anona nemaf main de'im melefatapa ma mokwaha okom Kraisi nainailapai? I'i nimanimi motagamapa ma mofa' nimanimi ma nolomohapa, klos luwaguf maim a'apa o enis sohapa sonda'apa awepa ma i'i amamaga awami mi'i mohambombagapa, ma enis sohapa moga', anona nemaf amamaga amami melefatapa ma okom Kraisi nainailapa? Owa'etin.
45008036	Endilisi, amamaga na'amaimi anona nemaf motagamapa si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Ape' mape amam nematawa Ine'ipai, amama atom dei' nimeguf hiami sa'i sohapa moga'. Satelepa si'i sipsipa sa'i sohapa moga' etin.”
45008037	Ea' amamaga amama hapaimi. Krais anan okom nainailapa endilisi ea' la'ela'ef nanda'apa la'ifipa mikila' amamaga amama endilisi.
45008038	Ae' egawa endilisi ina anom amamaga la'ifima anona nemaf melefatapa ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'etin. Nemaf anama ape' moga' o mope, anan okom nainailapa la'ela'ef. Amam ensel maloma amamaga la'ifimi mamumami mape mumafi etapi, opa'wagufeh, ma'akw, naoh, ambagof awami mamumami wapoti' amamaga dei' mapani ea' anom anona nemaf migi' meatagai, amamaga la'ifimi awami,
45008039	amamaga pepel aonai nape ilif etap owini, anom amamaga migi' meafi'i, amamaga amama hiami ina anona nemaf la'ifima melefatapa ma okom lu'unai Godi, owa'etin. Anan okom nainailapa la'ela'ef nihi'ambapa amama ma Krais Jisas Dembinai ape'inai.
45009001	Basef amama ae' a'iemi endilisi, ae' aman Kraisi ea' ina ambase'am, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambe nalome umafi basef mape opaf nomoni mihi'ambe ma'ipi a'i basef endilisimi atom.
45009002	Basef amama na'ama. Opaf ae'anai nimanina endilisi ea' okom na'i nataga aona la'ela'ef.
45009003	Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma a'i God nofa'ai esis alupusi esimbel ae'ami Israel sotanimani. I'i anona eaf nope, ae' enda' betena Kraisa ae' hegigili eho'ofa esis sefe' wambel bu'unai heven, ea' ae' owa'.
45009004	Ape' Israel God nandandepapa ea', nanda'apa mataga awasi ananipai ea' na'i aho'ma miti' nafifili ananinai. Anan na'i basef ananimi endilisimi atom nalomapa ea' nase'apa mi'uli bu'unai ananinai naloma waf endilisinai monda' lotumanai. Ape' mofa' basef amama God na'i endilisimi atomi.
45009005	Bafapapa akupapa ape'imi dambami mali'i amama ape'imi atom. Ea' esimbel ape'imi atom, Krais nataga epen, anan God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i, nape nali'ma epes saloma amamaga hiami numafiam. Anan God endilisinai ea' mefela agel ananinai la'ela'ef. Endilisi.
45009006	Ea' basef amama God na'ipa esis Israel na'i endilisimi atom ina higilalam etin, owa'. Epes sataga wambota Israeli, hiesi ina Israel endilisi God nandandepas ananisi etis, owa'. Esis ina sombale'efana.
45009007	Ea' ape' ina mi'iam na'ama mi'i, “Esis sataga esimbel Abrahami esis hiesi sombale'efa God sape batawisana ananisi,” owa'. Enis ina sombale'efa Anan, owa'. Fowa' gani God na'ipana na'ama na'i, “Esis esimbel Aisaki atom owagama sofa' agel wambota ine'inai.”
45009008	Amama na'ama. Enis batawis Abrahami ina awasi Godi, owa'. Isima sataga basef amama God na'i endilisimi atom na'ipa Abrahamami, agel napomas ea' bafasana Abrahami endilisi.
45009009	Basef amama endilisimi atom ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Nemaf anama andandepana ea', anona nemaf itanimai ea' Sara kola awani aman.”
45009010	Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Bafapana biam Rebekai ahalomam atotona ea' Aisak atona ahalomapa ape'inai.
45009011	-
45009012	Na'ama God okom na'i ea' ma waf nandandepa epesi. Anan ina okom na'i maol epes sanda'anai ea' nandandepas, owa'. Bafasana amama biam ata' mape nomona opaf akwa'unai God na'ipakw na'i, “Nali'i dembinai nope owina awagufunai nagi'i. Sahalomana anona nemaf nonda'mana maol owalomana.” God naila okom ananinai atona dei' na'ipakw na'ama. Anan ina okom na'i anona maol bu'unai aonai amam anona nemaf monda'anai, owa'. Anan naila okom ananinai atona na'i basef na'ama.
45009013	Amama si'i Baibel na'i, “Ae' okom nainaila Jekop, ea' Iso andaiwa'mana endilisi.”
45009014	Ea' ape' dei' ata' mi'i main? Mi'i, “God nanda' waf aonai?” Owa'etin!
45009015	Anan fowa' na'ipa Moses na'i, “Endilisi, anona nemaf ae' i'i uwahipis emi egafis i'i uwahipisi ea' igiambama emi egafis ae' okom na'i igiambamasi.”
45009016	Ea' ape' ina mi'i ukup epesi atom maloma maol epesi atona sanda' God nagiambamapa, owa'. God atona nati ape' uwahipipa dei' okom Ananinai atona nagiambamapa etin.
45009017	Ea' Baibel na'i God na'ipa dembinai king Fero na'ama na'i, “Ae' a'i ihi'ambasa pepel ae'anai epes hiesi ma anona nemaf sowalapa agel ae'anai ma etap hiagoma. Amama atom dei' afelena nanda' amamaga amama.”
45009018	Ape' mogawa i'i God ni'i nigiambama enin epen etin, anan nigiambaman. Ea' i'i nosopama okom enin epen, anan nosopama okom ananinai.
45009019	Ea' anona ma ipe' atuwasi ni'ipa ae' na'ama ni'i, “I'i na'ama, dei' maina God ata' na'iam etin na'i epen ofagema mapomana waf aonai anan nanda'anai? Emi la'ifina nesambalo' okom Godi? Owa'etin.”
45009020	Ipe' epes emi egafipa ma pi'i pinifala God? Owa'. A'i malep sanda' nombol sanda'anai la'ifina ninifala aman anama nanda'anai ni'i, “Dei' maina ine' nanda'e na'ama?” Owa'etin.
45009021	Aman nanda' malihi nefa'ai anona etap nanda' maloh biam, anona maol bu'unai, anona falafunai maol aonai. Endilisi amama andeande'.
45009022	God wapoti' nanda'am na'ama etin si'i aman nanda' malihi. Fowa' nanda' epes sataga ea' naila okom ananinai atona na'i aho'ma enis epes sefe' eaf hagililasanai. Esis safe' eaf anama, ea' anan ina nagwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai ulal, owa'. Anan ata' nanimbelis nape nohafas nogota laonai ma anona nemaf nohambombagas. Dei' main, anan na'i nowalapa okom wandafunai ananinai notaga alihina noloma pepel ananinai ma epes hiesi sogawana.
45009023	Anan na'i nowalapam motaga alihim amamaga nafifili bu'unai ananinai ma enis epes anan nati uwahipis sogawam. Epes isima anan naila okom ananinai atona fowa' nandandepasa nose'asa nafifili esis.
45009024	Amama ma'i ape' atepa. Anan nofalapa ea'. Ina nofala enis Juda etis, owa'. Nofala enis owa' Judaisi wapoti'.
45009025	Basef amama aman profet Hosea fowa' gani nanda'ami wapoti' ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Esis amam nematawa isima fowa' ina epes ae'asi, anona nemaf i'i epes isima ae'asi, ea' epes isima fowa' ae' owa' okom ninilas ese'asa opaf, anona nemaf okom ninilas.
45009026	Ea' wambel ali' a'ipas a'i, ‘Ipe' ina epes ae'ipei’, anona nemaf wambel anama atona sofalas si'i, ‘Awasi God nape namunai la'ela'ef ananisi.’ ”
45009027	Fowa' profet Aisaia nanda' ikwafa esis Israel na'ama na'i, “I'i esis Israel sotaga hias endilisi si'i wesan na'oh naoh akata, ea' hapaisi. Anona nemaf Dembinai nofa'ai kwawie'is nofa'as sotanimani nokwahomasa waf aonai.
45009028	Anan anona nemaf nonda'masa basef la'ifimi notopa'am mehip nogwamasa nimanimi epes hiesi etapasi hi'ilas.”
45009029	Ea' na'ama etin si'i fowa' Aisaia na'iama esis amam nematawa Israel na'i, “I'i Dembinai la'ifinai numafi amamaga hiami owa' neasopama nimanimi epes isima sape etap anae', anona nemaf ape' motaga higililapa si'i wambel anama biafina Sodom naloma Gomora. Owa'etin. Anan nasopamam ea'.”
45009030	Dei' ape' ata' mi'iam mi'imama? Ape' mi'iam na'ama mi'i, “Esis owa' Judaisi ina sanda' maol lu'unai ma sefa' waf bu'unai, esis sefa'am ea'. Esis sembale'efa God sefa' waf anama bu'unai.
45009031	Ea' esis Israel sanda' maol lu'unai ma saila mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai ma sefa' waf anama bu'unai, esis ina sefa'ana, owa'.”
45009032	Dei' main, esis sandaiwa'ma sembale'efana sofa' waf bu'unai. Esis ukup ma'i sonda' maol atona sefa'ana. Na'ama sandasisi'ip anona owap sowa.
45009033	Amama si'i Baibel na'i, “Peme! Ae' ambe' anona owap wambel lu'unai esis Israel agel Saion. Owap anama pepel napaina nohambombaga epes sondasisi'ip sowa. Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa aman anama, anona nemaf esis ina ukup aom, owa'. Sope sondanifel.”
45010001	Alupipei, okom ae'anai na'iam endilisi anda' betena anona nemaf God nofa' esis Israel nefa'as nokwahomas waf aonai sotanimani.
45010002	Ae' egawa esis andeande' ea' a'i amama. Esis ukup mohafel endilisi sanda' maol la'ifinai ma sila God, ea' esis ina sogawa basef Godi endilisimi andeande', owa'.
45010003	-
45010004	Esis ukup mahamahasa waf God nanda'anai ma ni'i ape' epes bu'upai. Ea' sanda'am sawalapa waf bu'unai asasinai atona saila mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai. Ea' esis ina safe' owina Goda na'i ape' epes bu'upai, owa'. Ea' Krais nafi'i nataga ea'. Amama atom dei' ape' ina ata' mape owina mi'uli anama, owa'. Anan nafi'i nawalapa amam nematawa emi egafis sembale'efa basef Ananimi dei' God nofalas na'i esis amam nematawa bo'wes andeande'.
45010005	Waf anama epen naila mi'uli anama ma God na'i anan bu'unai, Moses fowa' gani na'iam na'ama na'i, “Emi egafis saila waf anama hianai andeande' hi'alana, anona nemaf esis sefa' ambagof namumi ma saila mi'uli anama.”
45010006	Ea' waf emi egafis sembale'efa God sa'i Anan bu'unai, waf anama na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' owa' ukup mi'i opalef ipe'imi mi'i, ‘Anona nemaf emi egalin nefe' nilata heven?’ ” ma nihali' Krais nisila'i, owa'.
45010007	Ea' ipe' owa' pi'iam na'ama pi'i, “Anona nemaf emi egalin nefe' newala wambel epes saga'i?” nihali' Krais notanimani. Na'ama wapoti' owa'.
