45010008	Ea' basef amama ma epes sembale'efa God na'i esis bo'wes ma'i main? Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Basef amama mape felefele'ma ipe', mape maloguf maloma opalef ipe'imi.” Basef ape' mombale'am mawalapam ma'iam amama.
45010009	I'i ipe' pewalapa basef amama alihim pi'i Jisas anan Dembinai ma pembale'efa God opalef ipe'imi pi'i God nafelona nohafel hi'agif wapoti', anona nemaf God nofa'ai ipe' wapoti' pitanimani.
45010010	Dei' main, ape' mombale'ef opalef ape'imi God na'i ape' amam nematawa mataga bu'upai andeande' ea'. Ea' mawalapa bale'ef ape'inai malogof ape'imi God nofa'apa nokwahomapa waf aonai motanimani.
45010011	Amama si'i Baibel na'i, “Emi egafis sembale'efa anani, anona nemaf epes isima ina ukup aom, owa'.”
45010012	Esis Juda saloma isima owa' Judaisi ea' na'ama etin, God Anan Dembinai atotona ape' hiapai. Ea' anan nagiambamapa nase'apa waf bu'unai etina emi egafis sofalona,
45010013	si'i Baibel na'i, “Emi egafis sa'i agel Dembinai ma sofalona, nofa'as nokwahomas waf aonai sotanimani.”
45010014	Ea' i'i esis owa' seambale'efa anan anona nemaf sofalana sogawana si'imama? Owa'etin. Ea' esis i'i owa' seame' basefa Anan, nambimb sombale'efana si'imama? Ea' i'i enis owa' sie'ipasa basef esis, dei' sogawam si'imama? Owa'etin.
45010015	I'i God owa' nosapa'i amam amama, dei' amam mefe' mowalapam mi'imama? Owa'etin. Si'i Baibel na'i na'ama na'i, “Ahalomafa! Maol anama epes sofa'i basef bu'wami ae'ami sifi'i, anama bu'unai endilisi!”
45010016	Ina Israel hiesi saila basef amama bu'wami Godi, owa'etin. Fowa' profet anama Aisaia na'i na'ama na'i, “Dembinai, anona nemaf emi egafis sembale'ef basef amama esis seme'ama afa'? Owa'etin.”
45010017	Ape' mogawa, ape' hiapai mame' basef bu'wami ea' amama atom mafela bale'ef ape'inai. Ea' dei' basef amama mataga maina eaf? Amama mataga amam mawalapa basef Kraisi atom.
45010018	Ea' ae' a'iam na'ama. A'i esis ina same' basef amama bu'wami? Owa'etin. Esis same'am ea', si'i Baibel na'i, “Basef mafe' mandahama wambel hiagoma mafe'agon hi'alagon.”
45010019	Ae' etambel a'iam. A'i esis Israel sogawa basef amama bu'wami o owa'? Owa'etin. Esis sogawa. Moses nali' na'i basef amama na'i, “God na'ipa esis Israel na'i, ‘Ae' efa' enis amam nematawa falafisi, esis ina epes la'ifis sataga epes endilisisi, owa'. Ae' efa'asi igiambamas falafis anona nemaf ipe' kowalepama waf bu'unai ae' enda'masana esis. Ae' efa'ai epes isima owa' seagawa ae'i ea' anona nemaf ipe' pitilis ukup aomas.’ ”
45010020	Aisaia ina umbamahana ma na'iam nawalapam, owa'etin. Anan nawalapam na'iam alihim na'ama na'i, “Epes isima owa' seagalopa ae', dei' satolowe ea'. Epes isima owa' seahali' ae', dei' ataga andawalapa esis.”
45010021	Ea' esis Israel anan ina na'ipas na'ama, owa'. Anan na'ipas anom basef na'i, “God na'i, ‘Epes isima satopa' basef sosambala basefi. Nogota launai endilisi ae' efalas anda' lagof iwaumasi. Owa'etin.’ ”
45011001	Dei' a'i ihali'ipa, God nali'amona Israel hiesi epes ananisi? Owa'etin! Ae' wapoti' Israeliwei esimbel Abrahami, wambota Benjamini.
45011002	Epes hiesi isima Godi anan fowa' nandandepas ea', ina nali'amonas, owa'. Ipe' pegawa basef Elaijai mail Baibeli. Elaija nanda' beten nanda' kotima esis Israela God, na'i na'ama na'i,
45011003	“Dembinai, esis saha amam profet maga'. Ea' sahambombaga balatagw ine'imi sondolaliminama. Ea' ae' atowe ata' la'ela'ef ape profet anda' maola ine'. Dei' esis sagolopa ae' ma sehe ega'.”
45011004	Ea' God nagwamana maim basef Elaija? Anan na'ipana na'i, “Ae' efa'ai epes hiesi 7,000-peleis ae'asi, isima ina sanda' lotuma god baso'amunai Baal, owa'.”
45011005	Amama na'ama etin si'i dei' wapoti' epes isima tu'wanis sape, God fowa' nati uwahipis nandahomas etin. Amama atom dei' nosahe'as sape epes ananisi etis.
45011006	Anan nati uwahipis nagiambamas etin nandandepas. Anan ina okom na'i anona maol bu'unai esis sanda'anai nandandepas, owa'etin. I'i esis sonda' maol bu'unai ma God nosahe'as, anan ina nati uwahipis nagiambamas etin nandandepas, owa'. I'i na'amai, waf anama nati uwahipisanai anama falafunai atona, owa' endilisinai.
45011007	Dei' ape' ata' mi'iam mi'imama? Waf anama God nati epes na'i bo'wes andeande', anama esis Israel sanda' maol lu'unai ma sa'i sofa'anai, ina sofa'ana, owa'. Fowa' God nandandepa esis tu'wanis etis ea' amama atom sofa'ana. Na'ama esis Israel hiesi opalef asasimi maso'as ea',
45011008	si'i buk Baibel na'i, “God nanda' opalef asasimi si'i sa'oh. Nanda' naep asasimi ina mati ea' esis ina same' basef ofagema, owa'etin. Sape na'ama etin safi'i sataga dei'.”
45011009	Devit wapoti' na'i basef amama atoma waf opalef esis Israeli maso'as ea' na'i, “Ae' a'i nemaf anama esis sope sea' gwa'aimi lu'wami atom, God nowa'as nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai si'i mandelef sambe'am mail alialefa mowa' mafis, ea' si'i isalef waiwa sanda'am mapoma mafis.
45011010	Ae' a'i naep asasimi motaga walufuma ina nambimb siti. Ae' a'i ine' nenda' nimanimi mindiwa alafugah asasimi ma la'ela'ef sope na'ama etin.”
45011011	Dei' ae' ahali'ipa. Esis Juda hiesi sandasisi'ip sowa hegililas? Owa'etin! Esis sololama eaf sanda' waf aonai, amama atom dei' God notanima nofa' enis epes owa' Judaisi sotanima safe'ma anan. God nanda'am na'ama ma esis Juda ata' siti waf anama bu'unai nanda'masana esis sololama Anani ma anona nemaf esis Juda kowalasa waf anama bu'unai God nanda'masanai.
45011012	Esis Juda sowa' alafugaha God, amama atom dei' anan nagiambama amam nematawa hiesi etapasi sape wambel hiagomai. Esis Juda sololama waf Godi, amama atom dei' God nagiambama isima owa' Judaisi nofa'as sotanimani. Ea' nemaf anama esis Juda hiesi dende'ma ikwaf God okom ma'ianai sotanima sifi'mai anan, esis epes hiesi owa' Judaisi, God nigiambamas endilisi ma nofa'ai hiesi sotanimani.
45011013	Dei' ese'epa anom basef ipe' etipa owa' Judaipei. God nasapa'e afe'ma anda' maola esis owa' Judaisi si'i ipe'. Ea' andanifela maol anama bu'unai dei' anda'anai.
45011014	Maol anama ae' okom na'iana endilisi ma efela esis Juda wambota ae'asi ma kowalasa ipe' dei' pape andeande' paloma God. Ama ae' efa' esis Juda tu'wanis etis sotanimani sifi'mai God.
45011015	Anan nowa' alafuga ma esis, amama atom dei' nofa'ai enis epes etap hiagoma sataga okom atotona salomana. Ama anona nemaf God nose'as opafa esis Juda sotanimani sifi'mai anan, sondanifel endilisi. Nagiambama epes hiesi etap hiagoma sotanima sope andeande' sondanifel si'i sondanifel ma enis epes saga' sotanima sohafel wapoti'.
45011016	Waf anama esis Juda anona nemaf sotanima sefe'ma God si'i basef wamon etin na'ama ma'i, i'i bret tu'wanina nali'i sanda'ana sase'anana Godi bo'ona, bret si'ina wapoti' Godi bo'ona atona. I'i esis sose'ana nombalef lawagim God, agufunama si'ina wapoti' Godi atona.
45011017	God nindiwam nelefata anom agof lawah oliv ea' nofa'ai anona agela anona lawag oliv aolupunai nuwataniana lawag anama sawana aof. Ipe' owa' Judaipei, ipe' si'i agel lawag anama aolupunai. Amama atom dei' ipe' pefa' amamaga maim bu'wami mataga ma epes isima Juda si'i agel lawag anama aolupunai nofa' ifata nombalef lawag sawana nape aofi.
45011018	Dei' ipe' owa' Judaipei ina pi'i ipe' etipa bu'upei pikila' esis Juda si'i agof amama God nindiwam, owa'. Ipe' ine pi'i ipe' bu'upei ea' esis epes awasi, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' ina penda' nombalef la'ifim, owa'. Nombalef atom monda' ipe' la'ifipa.
45011019	A'i ipe' pi'iam na'ama pi'i, “God nindiwa agof amama ma nowatani ape' si'i anona agel lawaginai.”
45011020	Wila, andeande', ea' esis Juda ina sembale'efana, amama atom dei' nahape'as. Ea' ipe' pembale'efana dei' pape la'ifipa ma anan. Ea' ipe' owa' pefela agof ipe'imi pi'i ipe' etipa bu'upei, owa'. Ipe' umbamahepa pindumafuma andeande'.
45011021	Fowa' God ina na'i aho'ma esis Juda si'i agof amama lawag sawam aof mape la'ela'ef, owa'. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama nonda'mepas na'ama etin si'i nanda' esis.
45011022	Ea' ipe' ukup ma'i andeande' okom biefim Godi uwahipimi maloma wandafumi wapoti'. Epes sakwaha waf ananinai, na'ipasa basef la'ifimi. Ea' ipe' God na'i uwahipipei, i'i ipe' pila uwahipimi amama, andeande'. I'i owa', anona nemaf notopa'epa wapoti'.
45011023	I'i esis Juda sokwaha waf aonai sosambala God, anona nemaf nofa'as sotanimani si'i nowatania agof amama fowa' nindiwami. Endilisi, God la'ifinai ma nonda'ami na'ama.
45011024	Ipe' pegawa fowa' ipe' ata' papani etin si'i lawag oliv aolupunai, ea' God nanda' anona maola ipe' natopa' anona agela lawag anama ea' nowataniana anona lawag oliv bu'unai sawana aofi. God nanda' maol anama. Endilisi, anona nemaf nofa' esis Juda sotanimani si'i agof nindiwam lawag sawana aof nuwataniam motanima mope lawag anama ananinai si'ina si'i notawa. Maol anama ina ahifina ma Anan, owa'.
45011025	Alupipei, ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' ukup mohaga mogaola basef amama fowa' mandambahi'i dei' mandawalap alihim. Na'ama ipe' ukup mi'i ma ipe' etipa pi'i, “Ape' mogawa.” Basef amama fowa' mandambahi'i na'ama. Esis Israel opalef asasimi maso'as, ea' ina maso'as la'ela'ef mape, owa'. Mefe' mefe' mondahama nogota anama esis owa' Judaisi hiesi sifi'i sefe'ma God dende' ma ikwaf okom ananinai ma'ianai.
45011026	Anona nemaf esis Israel hiesi God nofa'as nokwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai sotanima sifi'mai Anan si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Anona nemaf aman anama nofa'as sotanimani, nupani wambel Saion nifi'i notagaha waf aonai esis wambota Jekopi sanda'anai, waf aonai sesambala basef Godi.
45011027	Anona nemaf ekwaha waf hianai aonai esis sanda'anai, i'ipasa basef endilisimi atom i'iam elomas.”
45011028	Esis Juda sosambala basef bu'wami Godi, sataga naumbih ananisi saho'ofa ipe' owa' Judaipei nofa'epa petanimani. Ea' God fowa' nandandepas ea' okom nainailas. Dei' main, anan okom napoma bafasas asasimi ma basef amama endilisimi atom fowa' gani na'iam nalomam.
45011029	I'i God nondandepa enin epen nose'an presen bu'unai, anona nemaf anan ina nosambala basef amama ni'ipan ni'i hapaimi noho'ofam, owa'etin. Basef amama mope la'ela'ef.
45011030	Fowa' ipe' owa' Judaipei pesambala basef Godi. Ea' esis Juda wapoti' sosambala basef amama. Amama atom dei' ipe' pefa' okom dahowinai Godi.
45011031	Ea' na'ama etin dei' esis Juda wapoti' sosambala basef ama dei' sofa' okom anama dahowinai Godi si'i ipe'.
45011032	God nanda' epes hiesi sope owina waf anama sosambala basef ma anan anona nemaf niti esis hiesi uwahipis nigiambamas na'a.
45011033	Ahalomafa! Okom Godi naloma gawa ananinai bu'unai lu'una endilisi. Ape' epes ina la'ifipa endilisi ma mogawa ofagema basef ananimi moloma okom ananinai hianai, owa'etin. Ape' owa' la'ifipa ma mowalapa basefa anan okom na'iami. Ea' ape' owa' mogawa waf hianai ananinai, owa'.
45011034	Endilisi etis, si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Emi egafis sogawa okom Dembinai? Emi egafis sase'ana nomonas anan?
45011035	Emi egafis sase'ana amamaga anan ama anona nemaf negwamasam? Owa'etin.”
45011036	Anan nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam mape ilif etapi numafiam. Ea' amamaga amama mape ma mefela agel ananinai atona. Ape' epes hiapai hi'ilapa mefela agel ananinai la'ela'ef. Endilisi.
45012001	Alupipei, basef amama hiami mali'i endilisimi atom. Amama atom dei' ahali'ipa ma basef la'ifimi ma ipe' ukup mi'i okom lu'unai Godi nainaila ape' nati ape' uwahipipa. Ea' pindilali ma Anan si'i fowa' saha mafis sase'ana pese'ana alop ipe'inai si'ina hi'ilana. Alop ata' nope namona la'ela'ef pese'anana God atona hi'ilana ea' ananinai si'ina, si'i waf Anan okom na'ianai. Ipe' penda'am na'ama, penda' lotu endilisi ma God ukup ipe'imi nomon.
45012002	Ipe' ina pepe na'ama etin si'i saila waf etapanai, owa'. Ipe' pi'i aho'ma God nonda' ukup ipe'imi nomon motaga dambaima waf ipe'inai notaga dambaina wapoti'. Penda'ama pegawa waf endilisinai God okom na'ianai. Waf anama bu'unai atona.
45012003	God nagiambamas na'a, amama atom dei' a'ipipa atona etin. Ipe' pegawa waf naloma gawa ipe'inai nape na'imama, ipe' ina ukup mi'i ipe' etipa bu'upei endilisi, owa'. Ipe' ata' pewaloga ipe' andeande' pendahama bale'ef ipe'inai God nasi'ipanai.
45012004	Ape' mogawa alop ape'inai atotona, ea' sa'osa'ona hianai. Ea' anama hianai ina nanda' maol etifina, owa'. Nanda'ana deindei'.
45012005	Ea' na'ama etin ape' amam nematawa hiapai mape la'ifipama paloma Jisas Krais, ape' si'i alop atotona. Ea' ape' hiapai atona etin si'i mandagigiambama etin maloma anona alop wa'awa'ana hianai.
45012006	God nandahomapa etin nase'apa presen amamaga bu'wami ananimi maloma gawa naninani. I'i God nefela okom enin epeni ma newalapa anom basef, enin newalapam mondahama bale'ef ananinai.
45012007	Emi egafis sigiambama esis sahin owani, esis senda' maol anama endilisi sigiambama alupusi. Emi egafis gawaisi ma sihi'ambas si'i tisa, esis senda'ana endilisi sihi'ambas.
45012008	Ea' emi egafis segawa ma sefela ukup enis epes, esis senda' maol anama endilisi sefela ukup asasimi. Emi egafis sese'an amamaga enin alupini, esis sese'an hiam. Emi egafis sumafi anona maol, ukup asasimi mohafel endilisi ma maol anama sanda'anai. Emi egafis siti enin alupini uwahipin ma sigiambaman simafian, esis sendanifel sigiambaman.
45012009	Ipe' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan, ipe' ukup milas endilisi. Ipe' ina pembaso'am, owa'. Ipe' pewa' alafugah endilisi ma waf aonai, pepe la'ifipa endilisi ma waf bu'unai.
45012010	Ipe' pese'asa opalef esis sahin owan ukup milas endilisi. Ipe' hipei atona etin pefela agof isima enis epes etis.
45012011	Ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa la'ela'ef ukup mohafel endilisi penda' maol Dembinai.
45012012	Ipe' pepe pehafa Dembinai nigiambamepa. Ea' pendanifel etin pupe. I'i nimanimi meatagamepa, pitu la'ifipa. Ea' penda' beten nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef.
45012013	I'i amam nematawa Godi amamaga a'as, pigiambamas pese'asam. I'i epes anona wambel laugunasi sifi'i setagamepa, pimafias andeande'.
45012014	Epes sonda' waf aonai ma ipe', penda' beten pihali' Goda nigiambamas sope andeande'. Penda' betena esis. Ea' ipe' ina penda' beten pihali' Goda nohas, owa'.
45012015	Epes isima sondanifel, ipe' pendanifel pelomas. Ea' isima salifi, pelef pelomas.
45012016	Ipe' ukup mopoma sahin owan ipe'isi hi'ilas pepan opalef etifim pelomas, si'i ukup mapoma ipe' etipa. Ipe' ina ukup mi'i ipe' etipa pi'i dembipei, owa'. Pefe' peloma epes isima falafisi. Ipe' ina ukup mi'i ipe' etipa gawaipei, owa'.
45012017	I'i epes sonda' waf aonai ma ipe', ina pegwamasa waf aonai esis, owa'. Ipe' ukup mopoma waf bu'unai ma naep epes hiesi penda'ana.
45012018	Ipe' ina ukup mi'i wandaf, owa'. I'i ipe' la'ifipa, pepe opalef etifim pelomas hi'ilas.
45012019	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ina pegwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'mepa anai, owa'. Ipe' pese'as sefe'ma Goda okom wandafunai nopoma esis ama nogwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'mepa anai. Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'i, “Sogwamasa waf aonai ma enis epes sanda' waf aonai, amama maol ae'anai. Ae' atowe anona nemaf egwamasa waf anama aonai esis sanda'mepanai.” Dembinai na'i na'ama.
45012020	Ea' ipe' penda'am si'i Baibel na'i, “I'i naumbih ipe'isi nolomohas, pese'asa gwa'aimi esis. I'i eap nose'as, pese'asa embel. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, anona nemaf penda' esis ambagof aoma waf aonai esis sanda'mapanai.”
45012021	Ea' dei' a'ipipa, ipe' ina pepe piti waf aonai nikila' ipe', owa'. Penda' waf bu'unai ma pehagofa waf anama aonai.
45013001	Epes hiesi sope owina amam gavman. Ape' mogawa ina anona gavman nataga na'a, owa'. Maol hianai gavmani nataga lagel Godi atona. Ea' gavman amama hiami mapani, God atona nanda'am mape.
45013002	I'i emi egafis sesambala basef gavmani, esis sesambala waf Godi wapoti'. I'i emi sesambala amam, anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi awami ma waf anama esis sanda'anai.
45013003	Amam gavman ina mapoma maumbelis epes isima sanda' waf bu'unai, owa'. Amam mapoma maumbelis epes isima sanda' waf aonai. I'i ipe' pindaiwa'ma umbamehepama amam gavman, penda' waf bu'unai atona ma amam anona nemaf minifela agof ipe'imi.
45013004	Amam gavman manda' maol Godi magiambamepa pepe andeande'. I'i ipe' penda' waf aonai, ipe' umbamehepamam. Ipe' pegawa bainat anama amam gavman mahapilanai, ina mahapilana na'a, owa'. Manda' maol Godi ma mogwa nimanimi awami ma isima sanda' waf aonai.
45013005	Na'ama dei' ape' mope owina gavman. Ea' ina umbamehepama nimanimi awami atom ea' mila basef amamumi, owa'. Ape' mila basef mape opalef ape'imi nomon ma'iami monda'am na'ama.
45013006	Amama atom dei' ipe' panda' takis. Dei' main, amam gavman manda'mana maol Godi la'ifim mumafi maol anama atona la'ela'ef.
45013007	Ipe' maol anama napomepa ma pese'am amamaga mamumami enis epes, pese'am. Amam mofa'asa takis, pese'ama takis. Amam mofa'asa moni maima motala waf mi'uli gavmani, pese'am. Dembemi hiami manda' maol bu'unai nandahama epes sefela agof amamumi, pefe' owina amam. Ipe' pendanifel ma pefela agofa anom amam, pefela agof amamumi.
45013008	Ipe' ina pewaola anona wiafa moni main notaol ama enin epen, owa'. Ea' anona wiaf atotona notaol ma ape' la'ela'ef. Wiaf anma ukup ipe'imi mimila sahin owan hiesi. Dei' main, emi egafis ukup maimaila enis epes, esis saila mi'uli anama Godi endilisi.
45013009	Ape' mogawa mi'uli anama na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ine' owa' nehambombaga waf daso'amainai ea' owa' neha enis amam nematawa soga', owa' nokowalef, ea' ina kowalena ma amamaga enis epesi, owa'.” Mi'uli anama naloma mi'uli hianai napani wapoti', ofagena anama atona na'i na'ama na'i, “Ine' okom ninila enis epes na'ama etin si'i ipe' ukup mapoma ipe' etipa.”
45013010	Emi egafis ukup maimaila enis epes sase' opalefa esis isima ina sanda' waf aonai ma esis, owa'. Emi egafis ukup maimaila enis epes esis saila mi'uli anama endilisi.
45013011	Ae' a'i ipe' penda' waf anama. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa nogota anae' mapeinai. Nogota anae' ipe' pekwaha koh pehafel. Ipe' pegawa fowa' ape' mataga mombale'efana dambaipa, nemaf anama God na'i nefa'apa motanimani ata' napani laogon, ea' dei' nataga felefele'.
45013012	Owamb na'i hi'ilana ea' felefele'ma lola notaga. Na'ama andeande'ma ape' mokwaha waf hianai aonai owambunai ma monda' waf bu'unai alipunai pepe la'ifipa si'i mofa' walitapa mahagasa wandafa waf aonai.
45013013	Ape' mope andeande' si'i epes sape alipi. Ina mea' embel la'ifimi mohaga mogaol ea' mopan mi'i basef wandafumi, owa'. Ape' ina monda' waf so'a waolanai monda' salamala basef awami. Ape' ina monda' migimigah mopa' ea' kowalepa ma amamaga enis epesi, owa'.
45013014	Ea' dei' pefa' Dembinai Jisas Krais ea' pindawisana si'i luwaguf amama lu'wami sanda' wandafami pefa'ama pelam. Ipe' ina ukup motamea pila ukup awami alop atonaimi, owa'.
45014001	Emi egafis sembale'efana, bale'ef asasinai owa' la'ifina, isima ipe' pese'as opalef ipe'imi pefa'as pifi'i piwisi amam nematawa Kristen. Ea' ina pi'i pifitap pelomasa basef mamumami, owa'.
45014002	Enis epes sembale'afana la'ifis, sa' gwa'aimi mamumami hiami. Ea' bale'ef enis epesi ina la'ifina na'ama ina sa' mafis maim, owa'.
45014003	Ea' epes isima sa' gwa'aimi mamumami, ina ukup aom mopoma epes isima owa' sea' mafisi, owa'. Ea' epes isima owa' sea' mafisi ina ukup aom mopoma epes isima sa' gwa'aimi mamumami sanda' waf aonai, owa'.
45014004	Ipe' ina pewaloga enin epen nanda' maola enin epen, owa'. I'i enin nitu la'ifina maol ananinai o newa, amama maol anan Dembinai numafi epen inima. Enin anona nemaf nitu la'ifin. Dei' main, Dembinai ananinai atona nonda'an nitu la'ifin.
45014005	Enin epen okom napoma anona nemaf lu'unai endilisi nikila' anom nimeguf hiami. Ea' enin epen na'i nimeguf hiami na'ama etin. Epes isima hiesi atona etin sowaloga ukup asasimi motamea.
45014006	Emi egafis ukup mi'i anona nemaf bo'ona endilisi, esis ukup ma' i Dembinai dei' sanda'am na'ama. Ea' emi egafis sa' gwa'aimi mamumami, esis ukup ma'i Dembinai ea' sa'am. Dei' main, esis sanifela God sa'am. Ea' epes isima owa' sea' gwa'aimi mamumami hiami, ukup ma'i Dembinai, dei' sandaiwa'ma anom gwa'aimi. Isima wapoti' sanifela God.
45014007	Ape' mogawa la'afena ape' ina enin epen nape etap anae' naila okom ananinai atona nape, owa'. Ea' ina enin epen naila okom ananinai atona naga', owa'.
45014008	I'i ape' mope, monda' maola mofela agel Dembinai. I'i moga', moga'ma mofela agel Dembinai. Ea' i'i ape' mope namepa o moga', ape' wambota Dembinai atepa.
45014009	Ea' amama atom Krais naga' notanima ambal napaina nohafel wapoti' ma nape Dembinai ma epes isima saga'i saloma isima ata' sape namusi.
45014010	Dei' maina ipe' pawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma waf asasinai ea' pa'ipas basef nimanimi? Na'amai owa'. Ipe' pegawa anona nemaf ape' hiapai hi'ilapa mitu gani God nope nowaloga epes hiesi ea' nowaloga ape'.
45014011	Amama si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Dembinai na'iam na'ama na'i, ‘Ae' a'i endilisi, anona nemaf epes hiesi sindiwa nembawa sotawa sonda' lotuma ae' hi'ilas, ea' sowalapa basef alihim si'iam si'i ae' God endilisiwei.’ ”
45014012	Ea' ape' mogawa ape' hiapai atona etin anona nemaf mi'ipa Goda waf hiami ofagena ape' manda'anai.
45014013	Ea' ipe' ina pewaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma waf esis sanda'anai wapoti', hapaimi. Ape' ukup mi'i na'ama mi'i ape' ina monda' anona wafa monda' owalomapa ape'inai nowa nonda' waf aonai, owa'.
45014014	Dembinai Jisas nawalipi egawa amama. Ina anom amamaga gwa'aimi mafis maim aom, owa'. Okom epeni atona na'i anom amamaga aom ea' nendaiwa'ma nogwa'am, amama motaga aoma anan.
45014015	I'i ipe' pea' anom gwa'aimi ea' dei' pehambombaga enis epes sahin owan ipe'isi, ipe' pegawa, ipe' ukup ina maimaila sahin owan ipe'isi, owa'. Krais naga' ma nofa'ai epes isima ipe'isi sahin owan. Ea' ipe' ina pehambombagas ma gwa'aimi ipe'imi.
45014016	Ipe' ina penda' anona waf enis sahin owan Kristen sitilipa nenda' ukup asasimi aom, owa'. I'i ipe' pi'i waf anama bu'unai, ipe' ina penda'ana naep asasimi, hapainai.
45014017	Waf anama sa' gwa'aimi embelanai, anama ina ofagena ma siowis wambota Godi numafias, owa'etin. Anama waf bu'unai naloma opalef awanemi maloma waf sandanifelamanai atona. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'apai waf anama.
45014018	Emi egafis sape sanda' maola Kraisi ma owa' sonda' anona waf nonda' Kristen ukup aom, anona nemaf God okom bo'ona ma waf asasinai ea' enis epes wapoti' sogawa esis epes bu'wasi.
45014019	Dei' ape' mila waf hianai nonda' ape' mope opalef etifim, ea' waf bu'unai hianai nonda' bale'ef sahin owani notaga la'ifina.
45014020	Ina ukup mopoma gwa'aimi atom ea' pehambombaga maol Godi, owa'. Endilisi, amamaga hiami gwa'aimi bu'wami. Ea' i'i ipe' pea' anom gwa'aimi monda' enin epen newa nenda' waf aonai, ipe' wapoti' panda' waf aonai.
45014021	Ina andeande'ma pea' mafis moloma embel wain gwa'aimi maim, o penda' maim amamaga monda' owalomepa nowa ma waf aonai, owa'.
45014022	Ukup ipe'imi atom mi'i moloma Goda amamaga amama monda' owalomepa nowa. Epes ukup mopoma anom amamaga bu'wami, ukup asasimi ina manda' kotimasa amamaga gwa'aimi maim amama, owa'. Esis sandanifel.
45014023	Ea' emi egafis ukup biefima sea'am, ofagema asasimi atom. Dei' main, esis ina sombale'ef la'ifis ma sa'am, owa'. Amamaga hiami epes owa' sombale'efa God sanda'ami, amama awami.
45015001	Ape' epes mombale'efana la'ifipa, maol ape'inai anama ma migiambama epes isima bale'ef owa' la'ifinai. Esis ina la'ifisa sofa' nimanimi asasimi, isima ape' migiambamas mofa' nimanimi asasimi molomas. Ape' ina mila ukup ape'imi atom, owa'.
45015002	Ape' hiapai atona etin monda' maol migiambama epes sape felefele'ma ape' ma anona nemaf sofa' waf bu'unai sotaga la'ifis.
45015003	Ape' mogawa Krais wapoti' ina naila okom ananinai atona, owa'. Waf aonai natagamana si'i Baibel na'i, Krais na'ipa God na'i, “Epes sa'i basef findiwama ine' ea' basef amama atom mafi'i mase'ala ae'.”
45015004	Dei' main, basef hiami fowa' amam manda'am mail Baibeli manda'am mawalipa ape'. Basef amama monda'apa motaga la'ifipa mi'i endilisi God nigiambamapa ma mope andeande'.
45015005	Ape' mofa' pepel ma God atona nanda'apa mataga la'ifipa mombale'efana. Ae' a'i anan nigiambamepa pila waf Krais Jisasi endilisi pefa' ukup etifim.
45015006	Ama ipe' pepe opalef etifim ea' malogof etifim pefela agel Godi, anan Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais Ahalomana.
45015007	Ea' ipe' hipei ukup mimila esis sahin owan pese'asa opalef esis si'i Krais wapoti' nase'apa okom ape', ma epes hiesi sefela agel Godi lu'una.
45015008	Ae' a'ipipa na'ama. Krais nafi'i nataga nanda' maol nape owina nagiambama esis Juda. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma nihi'ambasa God na'i basef endilisimi atom. Basef amama endilisimi atom fowa' na'iam naloma dambami bafasas akupas asasimi mandawalap alihim.
45015009	Krais nanda' maol anama ma nagiambama esis sololama Godi owa' Judaisi wapoti' sogawa God na'i esis uwahipisa sefela agel ananinai lu'una, si'i Baibel na'iam na'i. David na'ipa God na'i, “Anona nemaf ae' ewalapa basef i'i agel ine'inai ma enis epes owa' Judaisi sololama ine'i. Ea' enda' anom awalef efela agel ine'inai.”
45015010	Ea' anom basef Baibeli ma'iam na'ama wapoti' ma'i, “Ipe' epes fowa' peloloma Godi, pendanifel peloma esis wambota Ananinai.”
45015011	Ea' anom basef Baibelimi ma'iam na'ama wapoti' ma'i, “Ipe' hipei fowa' peloloma Godi, pefela agel Dembinai. Penda' anom awelef pefela agel Ananinai.”
45015012	Ea' Aisaia wapoti' na'iam na'i, “Anona nemaf anona aman notaga wambota Jesi. Aman anama notaga nope Dembinai ma esis sololama Godi numafias ea' sombale'efana si'i endilisi anona nemaf anan nigiambamas.”
45015013	Ape' mogawa endilisi God nagiambamapa ma mope andeande'. God anan ofagonama amama. Dei' ae' a'i ipe' pembale'efana nonda' danifel lu'unai noloma opalef awanemi motaga si'ima ipe'. Ea' a'i pepel Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nonda'epa pegawa endilisi God nigiambamepa ea' piti pepel Ananinai.
45015014	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, opaf ae'anai egawa endilisi ma ipe' panda' waf bu'unai la'ela'ef ea' pegawa gawa hianai naninani. Ea' ipe' wila ma pese'asa nomonas bu'wami sahin owan.
45015015	Ea' anom basef ali' a'ipipa amama la'ifimi atom. Ea' ae' ina umbamahe ma a'ipipa basef amama, owa'. A'i efela ukup ipe'imi. Dei' main, God nase'e okoma ae' nagiambame na'a.
45015016	Ea' anan nanda'e ape anda' maola Krais Jisas anda'am la'afena esis sololama Godi owa' Judaisi. Anda' maol si'i amam mondolali ma Godi awalapa basef bu'wami ananimi. Ae' a'i efa'ai epes isima owa' Judaisi sifi'mai Anan ea' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nonda'as sotaga epes Godi etis bo'wes andeande' ese'anas Anan si'i ofa anan okom na'iami endilisi.
45015017	Ae' ape la'ifiwi aloma Krais Jisas ea' andanifel ma anda' maol Godi.
45015018	Krais atona nase'e pepel anda' maol anama. Anan nagiambame nanda'e la'ifiwi afe' anda' maol anama lu'unai awalipa esis owa' Judaisi ma silana some' basef ananimi. Ae' andaiwa'ma i'ipipa anom basef, owa'. Amama atom.
45015019	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'e pepel ananinai nanda'e la'ifiwi ma anda' ikwaf la'ifinai naninani. Epes hiesi sati maol anama ea' same' basef Godi sailam. Damba damba anda'am Jerusalem awalapa basef bu'wami ma Krais afe' laogoma hi'alagon etambili etap hiagoma Ilirikum.
45015020	Fowa' damba damba afi'i ataga dei' ae' okom na'i endilisi ma enda' maol Godi ewalapa basef Ananimi bu'wami anagon esis ata' owa' sogawa Kraisi. Ae' andaiwa'ma igi' efe' ewalapam anagon enis epes sali' safe' sawalipasam, owa'.
45015021	Ea' ae' a'i ewalapam si'i basef mail Baibeli ma'iam, “Epes isima owa' enis sefe' sie'ipasa basefa Anan, anona nemaf seme'am sogawana. Ea' epes isima owa' seame' basefanai, anona nemaf seme'am sogawa Anan.”
45015022	Fowa' anda' maol anama awalipasa basef Kraisi. Maol anama nahopa eaf ae'anai nimeguf hiami ea' ina afe'mago ipe', ata' owa'.
45015023	Ea' dei' maol ae'anai hi'alana na'ae. Afagof hiami ae' okom na'i endilisi ma efe'mago ipe'.
45015024	Amama atom dei' a'i ata' ili' efo'o iti ipe' ea', efe' etap hiagoma Spen. Ea' a'i ata' ipan elomepa anom nimeguf nogota laona endanifel elomepa ea', ipe' pigiambame pitumi pehapone eaf nafe' Speni.
45015025	Ea' dei' a'i efe' Jerusalem enda' maol igiambama esis amam nematawa Godi.
45015026	Esis Kristen sape etap hiagoma Masedoniai saloma esis Kristen Griki sa'i basef sandame'mam ea' ma sowala amamaga asasimi sonda' tu'wanim mefe' Jerusalem, soso' esis amam nematawa Godi amamaga a'asi.
45015027	Endilisi ukup asasimi atom ma'iam ea' dei' sanda'am na'ama. Ea' ae' a'i esis sowaolamasa anona wiaf notaoma esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi. Fowa' esis Juda sali' sawalipasa basef Godi ma sagiambama ambagof esis isima owa' Judaisi sape etap hiagoma Masedonia saloma esis Grik sapoma. Amama atom dei' andeande'ma esis sogwamasa wiaf anama esis Judai ma amamaga magiambama alopami.
45015028	Ea' ae' a'i ata' enda' maol anama hi'ilana nili'. A'i ata' ese'asa amamaga amama bu'wami esis Jerusalem sofa'am andeande', ila eaf Speni efo'o itilipa.
45015029	Ae' egawa nemaf anama efe'mago ipe', amamaga bu'wami Kraisi mope si'ima ae' efo'o etagamepa i'ipipam.
45015030	Ape' mombale'efa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, ea' mogawa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela ukup ape'imi ma maimaila esis sahin owan ape'isi. Amama atom dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi a'i ipe' penda' maol lu'unai peloma ae' ma penda' betena God ma ae'.
45015031	Ipe' penda' betena Anan nigiambama ae' notagahowe ma lagof enis epes sape etap hiagoma Judiai owa' sombale'efa Kraisi. Ea' ipe' penda' betena God nonda' epes Ananisi sape Jerusalemi sondanifel ma maol anama agiambamas asa'as otamba amama.
45015032	I'i God ni'i a'e, efo'o etagamepa epe endanifel endilisi elomepa ata' epoma noma'w mope opalef awanem.
45015033	God Anan ofagonama opalef awanemi. Ae' a'i Anan nope nolomago ipe' hipei. Endilisi.
45016001	Ae' a'ipipa ma pimafi Fibi andeande', akwa'w heniti'mafa afa'ikwi kwanda' maol kwagiambama esis Kristen sape Senkria.
45016002	Fibi kwape la'ifikwa Dembinai. Ea' ipe' peso' opalefa akwa'w si'i waf bu'unai ape' amam nematawa Godi manda'anai. I'i akwa'w okom nimanina ma anom amamaga, ipe' pigiambama'w. Dei' main, akwa'w kwagiambama ae' wapoti'.
45016003	Ipe' penda'mas nemaf bu'unai Akwila naloma waulu'mana Prisila ea' pi'ipaso danifel ae'anai. Esis bias ape' mandao'oma manda' maol etin Krais Jisasi. Fowa' esis sandandombol endilisi ma sagiambama ae'. Nemaf anama enis sa'i sehe, esis ina umbamahas, owa'.
45016004	Sa'i awi ma soga' sigiambama ae' epe namowe. Ea' ina ae' atowe anifela esis bias, owa'etin. Esis Kristen hiesi fowa' sololama Godi wapoti', sanifelis.
45016005	Ea' ipe' pese'asa nemaf bu'unai ma danifela ae'anai esis Kristen isima safe' sandatama etifigin sape ipat asasinai. Ea' pi'ipago Epainetus nemaf bu'unai ae'anai anan alupunai ae'anai endilisi. Anan nali' nombale'ef Krais nali'ma epes hiesi etap hiagoma Esia.
45016006	Ipe' penda'makwago nemaf bu'unai Maria. Akwa'w kwanda' maol lu'unai ma kwagiambamepa.
45016007	Ipe' pese'amo danifel noloma nemaf bu'unai ae'anai ma amam amama Andronikus noloma Junias, amam wapoti' Judaimi si'i ae'. Amam manda' kalabus maloma ae'i. Amam aposel ma'i amam biam manda' maol bu'unai Godi. Amam mali'ma ae' mombale'efa Krais.
45016008	Ipe' pi'ipago Ampliatusa nemaf bu'unai ma danifel ae'anai. Anan alupunai ae'anai endilisi ma nape la'ifinama Dembinai.
45016009	Pi'ipago Urbanus nemaf bu'unai ae'anai, anan nanda' maol atotona naloma ae' ma maol Kraisi. Ea' i'ipago Stakisa nemaf bu'unai wapoti'. Anan alupunai ae'anai endilisi.
45016010	Ea' pi'ipago Apelesa nemaf bu'unai ae'anai, anan agel nandawalapana naila Krais endilisi. Pi'ipasago danifel ma nemaf bu'unai ae'anai ma esis sape ipat atotonai Aristobulusi.
45016011	Pi'ipago Herodiona nemaf bu'unai ae'anai, anan Juda wapoti' si'i ae'. Pi'ipasago danifel ma nemaf bu'unai ae'anai esis wambota atotona Narsisusi sombale'efa Dembinai.
45016012	Pi'ipawago nemaf bu'unai ae'anai ma Trifina kwaloma Trifosa, awo biawa wanda' maol lu'unai Dembinai. Pese'akw nemaf bu'unai ae'anai ma Persis, akwa'w alupu'wi ae'akwi endilisi, kwanda' maol lu'unai ma Dembinai.
45016013	Pi'ipago Rufusa nemaf bu'unai anan epen bu'unai naloma mama'wana anani'wi ae' wapoti' efala'w mama'we.
45016014	Pi'ipasago danifel ae'anai ma nemaf bu'unai ma Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, maloma Hermas, ea' esis Kristen sape saloma esis.
45016015	Ipe' pi'ipasago nemaf bu'unai neloma danifel ae'anai ma Filologus noloma Julia, ea' Nereus noloma heniti'mana anani'wi, ea' Olimpas, soloma esis amam nematawa hiesi Godi sape saloma esisi.
45016016	Waf anama ape' amam nematawa Godi, ipe' hipei atona etin pese'asa lagof esis sahin owan hiesi pinifelis. Amam nematawa Kristen hiesi sape na'ae sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai sandanifamepa.
45016017	Alupipei, ae' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi pindumafuma andeande' pepoma enis epes sanda' waf aonai sanda' ipe' Kristen pendawal biefipa sosambala basef amama ipe' pefa'ami. Waf anama esis sanda' epes hiesi sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' pese'as alafugah epes isima.
45016018	Esis ina sanda' maola Dembinai ape'inai Kraisi, owa'etin. Saila ukupa alop asasinai atona. Sanda' basef atom usiusihimi ma sambaso'ma opalef sa'ipa epes isima owa' sogawa andeande' waf aonai o bu'unai.
45016019	Ipe' paila God, dei' epes hiesi sogawepa ea'. Amama atom dei' ae' andanifel ma ipe'. Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa waf bu'unai endilisi, ea' ipe' ina pegawa waf aonai, owa'.
45016020	God anan ofagonama opaf awanena, nogota bandana ma nofa'asa Satan nofe' owina bo'wagah ipe'imi. Ae' ahali' God anda' betena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigiambamepa na'a nope la'ela'ef nolomepa.
45016021	Wanda' maol atini Timoti anan nasapa'ago danifel ma nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'. Lusius naloma Jeson naloma Sosipater, amam Juda wapoti' si'i ae', amam wapoti' masapa' nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.
45016022	Ae' Tertius, efa' malogola Pol anda'ago basef amama. Ae' asapa' basefa nemaf bu'unai mafe'mago ipe' ma agel Dembinai ape'inai.
45016023	Gaius nasapa'ago danifel nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'. Anan numafi ae' Pol andeande' ipat ananinai, ea' numafi esis Kristen hiesi wapoti' safi'i sandatama etifigin na'ae. Erastus anan nanda' maola gavman numafi otamba taun wambel anama, ea' sahalomapa ape'inai Kwartus, amam biam masapa'o basefa danifel nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.
45016024	[Ae' anda' betena Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigiambamepa na'a numafipa ma nope nolomago ipe' hipei. Endilisi.]
45016025	-
45016026	Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una. Anan la'ifinai ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma basef bu'wami ananimi awalapami, amama basef bu'wami ma'i Jisas Krais. Basef amama fowa' nimeguf hiami ata' mape mandambaho', ea' dei' mataga alihima basef amama fowa' amam profet manda'ami afa' wawalapam alihim. God nape namunai la'ela'ef na'i basef la'ifimi ma basef amama bu'wami dei' mataga mandawalap alihima epes hiesi etap anama hiagoma ma esis hiesi sembale'efana.
45016027	Anan atotona nogawa endilisi. Ape' mefela agel ananinai la'ela'ef. Jisas Krais atona nogiambamapa monda'am na'ama. Endilisi.
46001001	-
46001002	Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisi anda' maol ananinai. Okom Godi atona nofale nandandepe anda' maol anama. Ae' aloma owalomapa Sostenes wape na'ae wasapa' danifel ma nemaf bu'unai nefe'mago ipe' amam nematawa Kristen pape Korin. Ea' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'. Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas, God nanda'epa pape bo'wepa nofalepa nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei etipa. Afa' biafa wase'epa danifel ma ipe' paloma epes hiesi ma wambel hiagoma sofala agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, Anan Dembinai ma ape', esis wapoti'.
46001003	Afa' biafa wa'i God ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais migiambamepago na'a monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
46001004	Ae' anifela God la'ela'efa ipe'. Dei' main, ipe' pape la'ifipama Krais Jisas ea' God nandahomepa pape andeande'ma Anan atona.
46001005	Ipe' pape la'ifipama Krais pape andeande' endilisi ea' pefa' basef hiami pa'iami maloma gawa hianai bu'unai naninani.
46001006	Dei' main, basef amama bu'wami Kraisi afa' wawalapami mataga alihim mandawalap la'ifima opalef ipe'imi.
46001007	Ea' dei' ipe' pape ukup mohafel endilisi pehafa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihina. Nemaf anama pape pehafana pefa' presen hianai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'epana na'a.
46001008	Jisas Krais nambimb nonda'epa ma pepe la'ifipa la'ela'ef pefe' petagama nemaf akutainai. Nemaf anama Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais niefi'ianai ipe' basef ofagema a'epa nemaf anama.
46001009	God nanda' amamaga ananimi hi'alam andeande' nofalepa ma pepe la'ifipa opalef etifim peloma nogalomana Ananinai Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
46001010	Ipe' sahin owan, a'ipipa basef la'ifimi ma agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais na'ama. Ipe' pepe wambota atona endilisi pepe opalef etifim. Penda'am na'ama ma ipe' pepe andeande' opalef etifim endilisi ma ipe' ina pendawal biefipa.
46001011	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, enis epes wambota Kloei sa'ipi sa'i ipe' etipa pafitap.
46001012	Ae' a'i na'ama. Ipe' hipei atona etin pa'iam na'ama. Enis sa'i, “Ape' epes Poli.” Enis sa'i, “Ape' epes Apolosi.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Ape' epes Pitai.” Ea' enis sa'i, “Ape' epes Kraisi.”
46001013	Ipe' panda'am na'ama ma main? Ipe' pa'i Krais nandawal wa'awa'ana? Ea' pa'i ae' Pol saunde lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ma agiambamepa? Owa'etin. Ipe' ina pefa' baptaisa agel ae' Poli, owa'.
46001014	Ae' fowa' anda' baptaisima amam amama ipe'imi biam, Krispus naloma Gaius atom. Ae' anifela Goda ina anda' baptaisima enis epes ipe'isi wapoti', owa'.
46001015	Amama atom dei' enin epen ina ni'ipipa ni'i ipe' pefa' baptaisa agel ae'anai, owa'.
46001016	(Endilisi, anda' baptaisima esis wambota Stefanasi wapoti', ea' ae' ina okom na'i enis wapoti', owa'.)
46001017	Dei' main, Krais ina nasapa'e afi'ima enda' baptaisima enis epes, owa'. Anan nasapaho'ma ewalapa basef bu'wami Ananimi i'iam. Ae' ina ewalapam i'iam ila anona gawa amam gawaimi ma'ianai, owa'. Na'ama epes si'i basefa lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai Krais naga'manai si'i basef amama falafumi atom.
46001018	Endilisi, epes isima sape eaf higililanai, esis ukup ma'i basefa lawag anama usi'inai tu'wanainai saunda Kraisanai sa'i basef amama falafumi atom. Ea' ape' amam nematawa dei' God nape nofa'apa motanimani mogawa basef amama pepel Godi atona.
46001019	Si'i Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, “Anona nemaf ae' ehambombaga gawa epes isima gawaisi. Ea' emboma ukup epes isima gawaisi sa'i nomonas mamumami hiahiami mapaisi.”
46001020	Dei' amam gawaimi monda' mi'imama? Ea' amam gawaimi mogawa gawa hianai monda' main? Epes isima etap anae'i sa'i basef sapa'am sandahihianamam sonda' main? Owa'etin. God nanda' gawa epes isima etap anae'isi nataga falafunai si'i gawa epes isima sahaga sagaoli.
46001021	Dei' main, God Anan gawainai na'i epes etapasi ina la'ifisa sogawa Anan ma gawa anama asasinai atona, owa'. God nahopa eaf asasinai. Ea' anan okom na'i nofa'ai amam nematawa sombale'efanai sotanimani. Esis sombale'efa basef amama wa'ipasami epes etapasi sa'i wafimi gawa a'ami. Esis sembale'efa basef amama ea' God nefa'as sotanimani.
46001022	Esis Juda ukup maimaila siti ikwaf la'ifinai ea' esis Grik ukup ma'ima'i sofa' gawa hianai lu'unai.
46001023	Ea' afa' wawalapa basefa Krais naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Basef amama mahopa eaf esis Juda sandaiwa'mam sa'i basef awami. Ea' esis Grik ukup ma'i basef amama wafimi gawa a'ami.
46001024	Ea' amam nematawa God nofalapai, esis Juda saloma esis Grik wapoti', basef amama ma'i Krais Anan pepel naloma gawa anama Godi.
46001025	Dei' main, basef amama Godi epes sa'i “Gawa a'ami wafimi”, amama gawaimi atom lu'wami mikila' gawa epesi. Ea' amamaga amama epes sa'i “Awami falafumi Godi”, amama la'ifim endilisi mikila' pepel epesi.
46001026	Alupipei ae'ipei, ipe' ata' ukup mi'i fowa' damba damba God nofalepa ma pembale'efa Krais. Ipe' hipei ina enis epes hiesi la'afena ipe' epes gawaisi ma etap anae', owa'. Owa' enis hiesi agof lu'wamisi. Owa' enis hiesi dembesi la'ifisi, owa'.
46001027	Ea' God okom ananinai atona nandandepa enis epesa sope Ananisi etis. Epes isima etapasi sa'i gawa a'asi, ea' God nandandepas ea' ma sonda' epes gawaisi ambagof aom. Ea' epes isima etapasi hiesi sa'i falafisi owa' la'ifisi, isima God nandandepas ea' ma sonda' epes isima dembesi la'ifisi ambagof aom.
46001028	Anan nandandepa epes isima amam nematawa etapasi sa'i owa' la'ifisi, falafisi etis agof a'asi. Anan nandandepasa nohambombaga amamaga amama moloma epes isima la'ifisi agufisi etap anai'isi.
46001029	Nanda'am na'ama ma enis epes ina la'ifisa sefela agof asasimi atom lu'uma naep Godi, owa'.
46001030	God nahapona ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas ea' God nanda' Krais nape ofagonama gawa ape'inai. Anan atona eaf ape'inai ma God nanda'apa mope bu'upai ma naep ananimi ma mope ananipai atepa. Anan atona natalepa nakwahepa ma waf aonai ma mape wafifipa.
46001031	God nanda'am na'ama ma anom basef mail Baibeli ma'iam ma'i, “Emi egafis si'i sefela agof asasimi, esis sondanifel ama Dembinai atona.”
46002001	Alupipei ae'ipei, fowa' afe'mago ipe' awalapa basef endilisimi Godi ma ipe', ina awalapam a'iam aloma gawa ae'anai lu'unai, ma basef bu'wami a'ipipami, owa'.
46002002	Dei' main, okom ae'anai na'i na'ama. Nemaf anama ae' ape alomepa ina ata' okom napoma anom basef, owa'. Okom nase'e ma anom amamaga. Ae' okom napoma Jisas Krais atona, Anan naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
46002003	Amama atom nemaf anama ape alomepa, ae' owa' la'ifiwei. Ae' umbamahe etin ape.
46002004	Ea' basef a'iama basef bu'wami Kraisi, amama ina a'iama gawa ae'anai aloma epesa efa'ipei, owa'. Ae' ihi'ambepa pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona.
46002005	Anda'am na'ama ma ipe' ina ukup maimaila gawa epesi dei' pembale'efa God, owa'. Anda'ama ipe' ukup mohafel mimila pepel Godi atona dei' pembale'efana.
46002006	Endilisi ae' awalapa basef gawa napaimi ma emi egafis sembale'efa God la'ifisi sanda' waf Ananinai. Ea' gawa anama ina gawa etapanai, o gawa amam agufumi ma etap anae' anona nemaf hegililam, owa'.
46002007	Basef gawaimi ae' awalipasami, awalipasa basefa gawa Godi atona. Gawa anama fowa' nape nandambaho'ma epes, fowa' gani God ata' owa' nonda' etap anae' Anan nandandepa gawa anama ma ape' mofa' nafifili Ananinai.
46002008	Owa' anona aman atotona agilinai ma etap anae' nogawa basefa gawa anama, owa'. I'i amam mogawana, dei' ina maunda Dembinai lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai, owa'. Anan agel lu'unai endilisi.
46002009	Ea' ae' a'i basefa gawa anama si'i Baibel na'i, “Amamaga maim God nandondombam ea' ma emi egafis ukup maila Anan endilisi, amama mikila' ukup epesi. Esis ina la'ifisa same'am satolom sagawama ukup maloma naep aligah asasimi, owa'.”
46002010	Ea' God nawalapa amamaga amama mandawalapama ape' ma Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Ambal Godi nagolopa amamaga hiami mape mandamabahi'i, ea' nogawa waf Godi nape nandambahi'i.
46002011	Dei' emi egafis segawa ukup epesi? Owa'. Ambagof epesi atom mogawam. Ea' na'ama etin, ina enin epen nagawa okom Godi, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona nagawana.
46002012	Ape' ina mofa' spirit ambal etapanai, owa'. Ape' dei' mofa' Ambal Bu'unai nape naloma God nafi'i ma mogawa amamaga maim God nase'apam na'ai.
46002013	Basef amama ina gawa epesi sa'ipiam, owa'. Amama basef Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapameam. Dei' a'ipasa basef amama awalapam a'iama Ambal Bu'unai Godi awalipa epes isima Ambal Godi napaisi.
46002014	Ea' emi egafis Ambal Bu'unai Godi a'asi, esis ina la'ifisa sofa' amamaga amama bu'wami mataga Ambal Godi, owa'. Epes isima ukup ma'i amama sa'i falafumi sanda' ki de'iafam. Esis ina segawam, owa'. Dei' main, Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nawalipasa amama ofagema ma ape' mogawam.
46002015	Emi egafis Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaisi, esis sowaloga amamaga hiami. Ea' ina enis epes la'ifisa sowaloga wafa epen inima Ambal Godi napaini, owa'.
46002016	Si'i Baibel na'i, “Dei' emi egafis sogawa okom Dembinai ma nambimb la'ifisa si'ipana anom basef? Owa'etin.” Ea' dei' ape' okom Kraisi napaipa.
46003001	Alupipei, fowa' ae' ina a'ipipa basef si'i a'ipasam epes isima saila okom Ambal Bu'unai Godi, owa'. A'ipipam si'i a'ipasam epes isima ukup maso'asa basef ofagema Godi, si'i awasi ata' sa' nomagof atomi.
46003002	Fowa' ase'epa nomagof atom. Ina dei' ase'epa gwa'aimi la'ifimi, ata' owa'. Dei' main, ipe' ina la'ifipa, ata' owa'. Ae' a'iam endilisi, ipe' dei' wapoti' ata' owa'.
46003003	Dei' main, ipe' ata' pape la'ela'ef paila waf etapanai. Endilisi, waf anama nawalapai waf kowalasanai naloma ukup aoma sahin owan ma basef safitapami ata' mape la'ela'efa ipe'. Amama mihi'amba ape' hiapai ipe' ata' paila waf anama aonai etapanai. Waf anama epes etapesi atona.
46003004	Enin epen na'i, “Ae' epen Poli.” Enin na'i, “Ae' epen Apolosi.” Waf anama nawalapa ipe' ata' pape si'i epes paila waf etapanai atona.
46003005	Ipe' ata' ukup motamea andeande'. Apolos emi egafuna? Ae' Pol emi egafowe? Afa' biafa wanda' maoli atofa. Dembinai nase'afa maol nandandafa. Ea' maol anama afa' biafa wanda'anai, eaf anama atona dei' ipe' pembale'efa Krais. Ape' hiapai manda' maol anama God nasi'ipami.
46003006	Ae' ali' awalipipa basef Godi si'i ewaha olelemb gwa'aimi, ea' Apolos nagi' nakolo' embel nasa'opam. Ea' God atotona nanda'am mataga.
46003007	Ea' dei' epen inima newaha olelemb gwa'aimi, enin agel a'ana. Ea' epen nakolo' embel nasa'opami enin wapoti' agel a'ana, ea' God nanda' gwa'aimi amama matagai, Anan nefa' agel lu'unai.
46003008	Ea' epen inima newaha olelemb gwa'aimi naloma epen inima nakolo' embel nasa'opami, esis bias sanda' maol anama atona. Ea' esis bias atona etin anona nemaf sofa' amamaga mandahama maol sanda'anai.
46003009	Afa' biafa wanda' maol etifinama God. Ea' ipe' si'i aof Ananinai. Ea' ipe' si'i ipat Godi.
46003010	God nandahome. Ea' Anan nanda' ae' ataga ape si'i epen gawainai nanda' ifagwi. Ea' awa olaf nape nali'i ea' enis sala' ipat natomana. Ea' epes hiesi atona etin sundumafuma andeande' sola' ipat notoma olaf anama.
46003011	Ipe' pegawa God nanda' Jisas Krais nape nali' si'i olaf notawa nali'i. Amama atom ina ata' enin epen la'ifina newa anona olaf wapoti', owa'etin.
46003012	I'i emi egafis si'i sola' ipat notoma olaf anama ilifi sola'ana, esis sonda' gol sola'ana o sonda' siliwa sola'ana, o sonda' anom otamba salatamami sola'ana, o sonda' lawah o sonda' walol o otalef alimi sola'ana.
46003013	Nemaf anama Krais niefi'ianai maol anama epes hiesi sanda'anai notaga nondawalap alihina nope bo'ona o aona. Nemaf anama notaga noloma nif lu'wami. Ea' nif amama mondo maol anama hianai ma epes hiesi atona etin hi'ilasa sogawa maol asasinai bo'ona o aona.
46003014	I'i enin epen nola' ipat notoma olaf anama ilifi ma nif owa' fendona, anona nemaf nefa' anom amamaga bu'wami.
46003015	Ea' i'i ipat epen nanda' maoli fendona hi'ilana, anona nemaf ina nefa' amamaga bu'wami, owa'. Endilisi God nofa'ana notanimani, ea' amamaga a'ana nepe na'a si'i epen netanima nandalo' nifi.
46003016	Ipe' pegawa o owa'? Ipe' etipa si'i ipat lu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nomona opalef ipe'imi.
46003017	I'i emi egafis sohambombaga ipat anama Godi, anona nemaf God nohambombaga epes isima. Dei' main, ipat anama Ananinai bo'ona andeande'. Anama ea' ipe' etipa.
46003018	Na'ama ipe' pembaso'ma ipe' etipa. I'i emi egalin ipe'inai okom ni'i enin gawaini si'i epes etapasi sofalasi, epen inima andeande'ma nemboma okom ananinai ata' netaga okom nahaga nagaolani nili' ma nambimb netaga epen gawaini endilisi.
46003019	Dei' main, gawa etapanai anama falafunai si'i basef epes ukup maso'asi sa'iami ma naep Godi. Si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “God nofa' epes gawaisi ma waf gawainai naninani asasinai atona baso'omainai si'i epes saha mafis esalef.”
46003020	Ea' Baibel na'iam wapoti' na'ama na'i, “Dembinai nogawa nomonas epes gawaisi falafumi atom.”
46003021	Ea' enin epen ina nefela agof ape' epesi, owa'. Amamaga hiami ipe'imi atom.
46003022	Pol naloma Apolos naloma Pita, amam ipe'imi atom. Etap anae' naloma ambal namunai naloma ga' naloma amamaga dei' mapani, anona nemaf migi' meatagai, amama hiami ipe'imi atom.
46003023	Ea' ipe' epes Krais Jisasi ea' Anan Godi.
46004001	Ipe' pegawa afa' wanda' maol Kraisi umafi basef endilisimi Godi fowa' mape mandambahi'i dei' mataga mandawalap alihim.
46004002	I'i aman dembinai nose'ana maol enin epena nimafianai, enin nimafiana nenda'ana andeande' hi'ilana.
46004003	I'i ipe' pewaloga waf ae'anai ma enis epes sonda'me kot sowaloga waf ae'anai, ae' okom na'i amama falafumi atom. Ae' wapoti' ae' atowe ina awaloga waf ae'anai, owa'.
46004004	Endilisi, basef mape opaf ae'anai nomon ma'iami ae' ina ati anona waf aonai anda'anai, owa'. Ea' amama ina mihi'ambe endilisi ma i'i, “Ae' epen bu'uwei andeande',” owa'. Anona nemaf Dembinai atona nowaloga waf ae'anai.
46004005	Ea' dei' nogota dende'anai ata' owa'. Ipe' owa' pewaloga waf enin epen nanda'anai, owa'. Ipe' ata' pepe pehafa nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai. Nemaf anama anan nowalapai amamaga hiami mandamabaho' mape akoti motaga mondawalap howalagoma. Nemaf anama Anan nowalapa ukup epes hiesi mape mandambahi'i motaga mondawalap alihim. Ea' God ni'ipapa basef ananimi ape' hiapai atona etin mondahama maol ape' manda'anai, bo'ona o aona.
46004006	Alupipei, ae' okom na'i igiambamepa. Amama atom ae' aloma Apolos wihi'ambepa basef amama do'ok a'ipipami ofagema ma waf afa'inai. Afa' wanda'am na'ama ma ipe' pelafa waf ape'inai basef amama ofagema ma'iam ma'i, “Ipe' ina pimbisila' mi'uli anama, owa'.” Ea' dei' ipe' ina pesambala basef pefela agola anona aman, owa'.
46004007	Alupipei, ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Emi nanda'epa pape dembipei pikila' enis epes? Amamaga amama hiami God atona nase'epam. Ea' ipe' ina pesambala basef pi'i ipe' etipa dembipei la'ifipei, owa'. Amamaga amama hiami ipe'imi, God atona nase'epam.
46004008	Endilisi, opalef ipe'imi si'im ea'! Ipe' amamaga hiamipei si'ipa dende'! Ipe' pikila'afa pataga dembipei king! Uwahipipa! Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma petaga pepe dembipei king nambimb ope dembifai king olomepa!
46004009	Ae' okom na'i na'ama a'i God nanda' afa' aposel si'i epes sape agof a'asi sagi' endilisi. Epes hiesi hi'alas sape ilif etapi saloma amam ensel wapoti' satolofa wandahama epes isima atuwasi sohas seaga'i.
46004010	Afa' wape si'i epes ukup maso'asi ma ofela agel Kraisi, ea' ipe' pape epes gawaipei ma waf Ananinai. Afa' owa' la'ififa, ea' ipe' la'ifipa. Ipe' agof lu'wami, afa' agof a'afa.
46004011	Fowa' gani wapoti' nafi'i nataga nogota anae' wape nolomahafa batag fafatimufa endilisi, ea' luwaguf hiahaom a'afa. Esis sumagwi lagof sahafa etin. Afa' wambel a'afa ma ofe' weape andeande'.
46004012	Wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi ma lagof afa'imi atom. Esis sa'i basef sanda'afa findiwafa ea' afa' la'ififa ofalo'mas wagwamasa basef bu'wami atom. Esis sanda'afa aofa, wape la'ififa watilis, afa' ina wagwamas, owa'.
46004013	Esis sa'ipafa basef awami endilisi ea' afa' wagwamasa basef awanemi sa'osa'ombel. Wataga si'i alufuta awasimi endilisi ma etap hiagoma si'i alogw maimailami, si'i etap awagoma alufuta nana'oma. Fowa' gani wape na'ama etin wafi'i wataga dei'.
46004014	Ae' ina anda' basef amama ma monda'epa ambagof ipe'imi aom, owa'. Ae' okom nainailipa si'i awasi ae'ipei, a'i iwalapa nomonas ipe'imi.
46004015	I'i endilisi ipe' amam mowalipipa basef Kraisi 10,000-peleim ea' hapaimi, ahapepa ipe'imi ina hiam, owa'. Waf Krais Jisasi atona ae' atowe ape ahalomepa ipe'iwei, ipe' pataga batawisi ae'ipei ma basef bu'wami Godi awalipipami.
46004016	Amama atom dei' afela ukup ipe'imi ma pila waf ae'anai pefe'.
46004017	Ea' asapa' Timoti nafe'mago ipe'. Anan nogalome ae'anai wanda' maol Dembinai. Anan numafi maol anama andeande'. Ae' okom nailana endilisi, dei' asapa'ana ma nambimb nefela ukup ipe'imi ma basef mihi'ambepa fe' pe ae'ami aila waf Kraisi. Ae' awalipa esis amam nematawa Godi sape wambel anama hiagoma ma basef maloma waf ae'anai ea' amama atom.
46004018	Ipe' enipa ukup ma'i ae' nambimb ina efo'o itilipa ea' dei' pesambala basef ae'ami.
46004019	Owa'etin. I'i Dembinai ni'i a'e, na'ama efe'mago ipe' mehip. Ea' ae' ina efe'mago ipe'ma egawa basef amam masambala basef ae'ami ma'iami atom, owa'. Basef amamumi hapaimi. Ae' a'i efo'o egawa waf naloma maina maol Godi amam manda'anai.
46004020	Dei' main, ofagema amama ma epes isima suwis wambota Godi numafias, amama ina amamaga ma'iam etin, owa'. Amama ina basef atom, owa'. Amama pepel Godi atona.
46004021	Ipe' ukup ma'i maina waf, pa'i efa'ago bumbulita okom wandafunai efo'o ma ihi'ambepa, o pa'i efa'ago waf okom nainailipa efe'mepago? Amama nomonas ipe'imi atom.
46005001	Anom basef matagama ae' ma'i waf anama aonai so'a waolanai napoma ipe'. Waf aonai endilisi nahambombaga daso'amai, waf anama epes isima sololama Godi ina sanda' anona waf aonai na'amai, owa'etin. Waf anama na'ama. Anona aman naso' nemata'w komafianai ahalomana nase'akwi.
46005002	Dei' ipe' ata' patopa' basef pafela agof ipe'imi atom ma waf anama aonai ma main? Na'ama owa'. Andeande'ma opalef ipe'imi mope si'ima lef ipe'inai ma pelopa waf anama aonai. Ipe' pili'amona aman anama nanda' waf anama ma ina ata' nope wapoti' nolomepa, owa'.
46005003	Endilisi, alop ae'anai nape laogona ipe', ea' ambal ae'anai nape nalomepa. Ae' si'i endilisi ape alomepa ma awaloga waf aman anama nanda'anai aonai.
46005004	Dei' a'iam na'ama. Nemaf anama ipe' pendakolasanai ma agel Dembinai Jisasi, ambal ae'anai noloma pepel Dembinai ape'inai Jisasi amama mope molomepa nemaf anama.
46005005	Ape' miliamonago aman anama nefe'mago Satana nohambombaga alop noloma okom apinai ananinai. Monda'am na'ama ma God nofa'ai ambal aman anama nemaf Dembinai akutainai.
46005006	Ipe' patopa' basef pafela agof ipe'imi atom lu'um pati waf anama aonai napomepa, amama ina waf bu'unai, owa'etin. Ipe' pegawa ea' basefa mi'uli anama ma yis amama manda' bret natifi na'i, “Yis kwawie'im manda' bret hianai hi'alana natef lu'una.”
46005007	Ea' ipe' pekwaha yis amama apimi ma pepan si'i bret dambainai yis a'anai, si'i endilisi ipe' pataga epes dambaipei. Dei' main, sipsip sondolali sahanama gwa'aimi lu'wami Pasovai anan Krais, esis sahana naga' ea', si'i sondolali gwa'aimi mafis maima God.
46005008	Ape' monda' gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova, ape' ina mofa' yis amama apimi, owa'. Amama si'i waf aonai. Ape' mofa' bret wafinai yis a'anai, amama si'i waf ukup bu'wamunai basef endilisimi.
46005009	Anom basef ali' anda'am mafe'ma ipe', a'iam na'ama. “Ipe' ina pefala epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai pi'i alupusi, owa'.”
46005010	Ae' ina a'iama pekwaha epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai, o epes isima kowalasa amamaga enis epesi o epes isima sanda' wali o sahambombaga enis epesi soloma isima sanda' lotuma god baso'omunai, owa'. I'i ipe' pi'i pekwahis endilisi, pekwaha etap anae' hi'ilana.
46005011	Ea' basef dei' anda'ami ofagema na'ama. I'i anona aman ipe' pefalona owalomepa ipe'inai nonda' waf aonai so'a waolanai o kowalanama amamaga enis epesi o nonda' lotuma god baso'omunai, ni'i basef neso' alafuga enis epes, nea' embel nohaga nogoul, nonda' wal, nohambombaga enis epes, ipe' ina pefalona alupunai ipe'inai pi'i basef pelomana, owa' hapainai. Ipe' ina pea' gwa'aimi peloma epes na'amaisi wapoti', owa'.
46005012	-
46005013	Maol sowaloga epes sape ande'ma siosi ina maol ae'anai, owa'. God atona anona nemaf nowaloga waf epes isima. Ea' maol sowaloga epes sape nomoni, amama maol ipe'inai, ipe' penda'ana. “Ipe' galo'manago aman aonai nape la'afena ipe' nanda' waf aonai.”
46006001	I'i enin epen la'afena ipe' nenda' basef mila enin epen, ina andeande'ma epen inima netopa'ma esis amam nematawa Godi sope ma nefe' nenda' kota naep amam dembemi jas mololama Godi. Na'ama owa'. Andeande'ma epen inima ambal aona nefe' nenda' kota naep amam jas mololama Godi.
46006002	Ape' amam nematawa Godi anona nemaf mowaloga waf epes hiesi etapasi hi'ilas. Ipe' pegawa amama o owa'? A'i ipe' owa' la'ifipama ata' pewaloga basef so'umi mamumami ipe'imi?
46006003	Ape' anona nemaf mowaloga waf amam enseli wapoti'. Ipe' pegawa amama o owa'? Amama atom dei' la'ifipa endilisi ma pewaloga basef amamaga ipe'imi.
46006004	Ea' i'i ipe' anom basefa amamaga ipe'imi, ipe' pendandepa anom amam agof a'ami ma sios ma mowaloga basef amama.
46006005	Ae' anda' basef amama ma monda' ambagof ipe'imi aom. Dei' main? Gawaimi ipe'imi hiami mape la'afena ipe' amam la'ifima mowaloga anom basef motaga la'afena sahin owan bias ipe'isi.
46006006	Ea' dei' enin epen alipini nanda' kotima sahin owan ananini ma naep amam dembemi jas owa' mombale'efa Kraisi.
46006007	Ipe' panda' kotima esis alupisi ea' amama atom dei' sihi'amba ae' ipe' pewa ea'. Dei' maina owa' pepe pitilisa sonda'mepa waf aonai? Ea' owa' pi'i aho'mas sofa' anom amamaga ipe'imi?
46006008	Penda'am na'ama owa'. Ea' ipe' panda' waf aonaima enis epes pefa' amamaga asasimi! Ipe' panda' waf na'amai ma esis alupusi endilisi ipe'isi etis.
46006009	Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, anona nemaf ina sefe' wambel Godi, owa'. Ipe' pegawa amama o owa'? Na'ama ipe' pembaso'ma ukup ipe'imi atom. Epes sanda' waf aonai ma so'a waola enis amam nematawa saloma epes isima sanda' lotuma god baso'omunai saloma epes sahambombaga waf daso'amainai saloma amam amama ukup ma'i waf nematawainai saloma amam amama manda' waf aonai maloma anom amami
46006010	saloma isima sanda' wali saloma epes kowalasa amamaga enis epesi sa'i sofa'am etini saloma epes isima sa' embel sahaga sagaol saloma epes isima sa'i basef awami findiwaimi ma enis epes ea' isima sanda' wal sahambombaga epesi, epes isima na'amaisi ina anona nemaf sefe' wambel Godi, owa'etin.
46006011	Fowa' enipa panda' waf anama. Ea' dei' God nasa'opepa nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei etipa si'ipa. God nanda'epa pataga epes bu'upei ma naep Ananimi. Anan nanda'epa na'ama etina agel Dembinai Jisas Kraisi ma Ambal Bu'unai God ape'inai.
46006012	Endilisi, anom basef mape ma'i, “Amamaga hiami andeande'ma ae' enda'am.” Ea' amamaga amama nambimb enda'ami ina migiambame, owa'. Basef amama ma'i, “Amamaga hiami andeande'ma enda'am.” Basef amama mape, ea' ae' ina i'i aho'ma anom amamaga mope lu'um mombale'e, owa'.
46006013	Ea' enis epes sa'i, “Gwa'aimi amama, alopi atom ea' alop napoma nea' gwa'aimi atom.” Ea' amamaga amama biefim, alop naloma gwa'aimi, anona nemaf God nohambombagam atom hi'ilam. God ina nanda' alop ape'inai ma nonda' waf aonai so'a waolanai, owa'. Anan nanda'ana nonda' maol Ananinai atona bu'unai. Ea' Anan Dembinai ma alop ape'inai numafiana.
46006014	Ama pepel Ananinai atona nafela Dembinai nohafel hi'agif ea' anona nemaf na'ama etina nofelapa mohafel hi'agif wapoti'.
46006015	Alop ipe'inai alop wa'wa'ana Kraisi atona. Amama ipe' pegawam o owa'? Ea' dei' ipe' pa'i ae' etopa' anona alop wa'awa'ana Kraisi esana noloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli? Owa'etin!
46006016	Amam emi egafim mofa' alop amamunai mosana noloma alop ano'w nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli, amam mataga alop etifina maloma akwa'w. Ipe' pegawa amama o owa'? Dei' main, Baibel na'iam ea' waf anama daso'amainai bu'unai na'i, “Esis bias sataga alop etifina ma waf anama.”
46006017	Ea' emi egafis sope la'ifis soloma Dembinai, sataga ukup etifim salomana, si'i epen atotona.
46006018	Ipe' pekwaha waf aonai so'a waolanai pefa' pefe'. Anona waf hianai aonai sanda'ana alop ande' atogon. Ea' epen nanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai nanda' waf aonai ma alop ananinai atona.
46006019	Alop ipe'inai ipat bu'unai Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ipe' pegawa amama a owa? Ambal anama nosahe'epa ea' nape nomona ipe'. Ipe' ina ipe' etipa, owa'. Ipe' ananipei etipa si'ipa.
46006020	God natalepa ma maol lu'unai endilisi. Amama atom dei' pefela agel ananinai lu'una ma alop ipe'inai.
46007001	Dei' a'i egwamepa basef amama pahali'iami panda'am mafi'i. I'i anona aman owa' noso' ano'w nemata'wi, andeande'.
46007002	Ea' waf naninani aonai ma so'a waolanai nape. Ea' dei' andeande'ma amam nematawa hiesi atona etin sondase'ama deindei.
46007003	Alop amani akwa'w waulu'mana kumafiana. Aman ina nonda'imana ni'i ananinai, owa'. Ea' na'ama etina alop waulu'manai, alop anan waulunama'w akwa'unai. Akwa'w wapoti' ina kunda'imana kwi'i akwa'unai, owa'.
46007004	Nemata'w ina kope dembe'wi kumafi alop akwa'unai, owa'. Aman akwa'unai numafiana. Ea' na'ama etina aman ina nope dambenai numafi alop ananinai, owa'. Akwa'w waulu'mana kumafiana.
46007005	Ipe' bipa pandase'ama ea' anan ina newa' alafuga akwa'w nonda'ima alop ananinai, owa'. Ea' akwa' wapoti' ina kowa' alafuga anan, owa'. Ea' i'i ipe' ukup mope etifima pihi'ama alop nogota bandana ma penda' beten, ipe' pi'i aho'ma penda' beten endilisinai. Ea' penda' alop nondaloma wapoti'. Na'ama ukup mose'epama pimafi alop andeande' ea' Satan nogwambepa penda' waf aonai.
46007006	Basef amama ae'ami ma amam nematawa sandaso'ama mape na'ama. Ea' basef amama ina la'ifima pilam la'ifipa, owa'. Amama basef kwaie'um a'ipipam agiambamepa.
46007007	Ae' okom na'i ipe' amam nematawa hipei pepe si'i ae' Pol apan, owa' eso' nemata'w. Ea' God nase'as amamaga bu'wami presen mandandas deindei'. Anona anona presen, anona anona presen.
46007008	Ea' esis amam nematawa owa' seandaso'amai saloma nematawa alifiwai amam maga' makwahowa wapani, amama na'ama. I'i ipe' pepe etin si'i ae', andeande'.
46007009	Ea' i'i owa' la'ifipama pepe andeande' pimafi opalef moloma alop ipe'inai andeande', pendase'ama. Waf ipe' pandaso'amainai, anama andeande' nikila' waf ukup mohafel la'ifipa ma waf aonai so'a waolanai.
46007010	-
46007011	Ea' esis amam nematawa sandaso'ama ea'i, ae' a'ipasa mi'uli anama. Anama ina mi'uli ae'anai atona, owa'. Mi'uli anama Dembinai. Ano'w nemata'w ina kokwaha aman akwa'unai, owa'. Ea' akwa'w kwi'i kokwahona, kope na'a. I'i owa', kotanima kofe'ma anan wapoti' kolomana kope okom etifina. Ea' anona aman wapoti' ina nokwaha waulu'mana anani'wi, owa'.
46007012	Ea' dei' a'ipa ipe' na'ama a'i. Basef amama ina basef Dembinai, owa'. Amama dei' a'ipipa na'ama a'i i'i fowa' esis bias owa' ata' sombale'efa Krais ma sandaso'ama sili', ma dei' anan nagi' nembale'efa Kraisa akwa'w kwi'i aho'ma kose'ana kolomana kope, anan ina nokwaho'w owa'.
46007013	I'i akwa'w ato'w dei' kugi' kombale'efa Kraisa nase'akw, ma ni'i a'e nope noloma'w, akwa'w ina kokwahona, owa'.
46007014	Dei' main, aman owa' nombale'efa Kraisi nape la'ifina naloma waulu'mana kombale'efa Krais, anan nataga andeande' si'i God nandandepana ea'. Ea' nemata'w owa' kombale'efa Kraisi kwape kwaloma anan nombale'efa Krais, akwa'w kwataga andeande' si'i God nandandepa'w ea'. I'i owa', anona nemaf sola awasi, ina anona nemaf sotaga bo'wes, owa'. Ea' dei' sape andeande' si'i God nandandepas ea'.
46007015	Ea' emi epen owa' nembale'efa Kraisa ni'i nekwaha waulu'mana o waulunama'w, enin nefe'. I'i waf anama notaga na'ama ma esis isima ipe'isi sahalomepa o owalomepa aman nemata'w, esis ina ata' la'ifis sape si'i sanda' kalabus, owa'. God nofalapa ma mila wafa opaf awanena.
46007016	Nemata'w, ine' anona nemaf la'ifinama nigiambama waulunamena notaga Kristen o owa'? Amama ine' owa' neagawam. Ea' ine' aman wapoti', anona nemaf la'ifinama nigiambama waulu'mena ine'ikwi kotaga Kristen o owa'? Amama ine' owa' neagawam.
46007017	Maim opeh bu'wami Dembinai naso' enin epen, enin nepe la'ela'ef nenda' amama atom nali' nanda'ami. Ae' a'ipas mi'uli anama etina esis Kristen hiesi sios sape wambel hiagoma.
46007018	A'i anona aman amam mali' matopa'mana alop ananinai ma God dei' nofalana? Wila' anan ina nofana melet anama alop ananinai wapoti' nombaho'ana, owa'. Ea' aman emi ina meatopa'mana alop ananinai ma God dei' nofalana, amam ina motopa'mana alop ananinai, owa'.
46007019	Waf matopa' alopanai naloma waf owa' meatopa' alopanai wapoti' falafunai atona. Ea' waf saila mi'uli Godi anama waf endilisinai.
46007020	Ipe' papoma maina maol bu'unai God dei' nofalipei, pepoma anama atona la'ela'ef.
46007021	I'i ipe' agof a'ipei panda' maol pape owina enis epes ma dei' God nofalipei, ipe' ina ukup aoma amam, owa'. Ea' i'i anona eafa pekwaha maol anama pepe wafifipa, na'ama andeande' pekwahona.
46007022	Dei' main, emi egafis agof a'as sanda' maol sape owina enis epes, dei' epes isima Dembinai nakwahomas waf aonai sepe wafifis ea' Ananisi etis. Ea' na'ama etina epes sape wafifis owa' seape owina enis epes, dei' Dembinai nofalas ea' sanda' maola Krais.
46007023	God natalepa ma maol lu'unai Ananinai. Ea' ipe' ina pepe owina epes etapasi penda' maolanas, owa'.
46007024	Ipe' alupipei, maina maol epen inima nali' nanda'anai ma God dei' nofalan enin nepoma maol anama atona ma naep Godi.
46007025	Amam nematawa isima ata' owa' seandaso'amai, ae' mi'uli Dembinai owa'ma ie'ipas ea' awalapa nomonas ae'ami atom a'ipipa. Anan nati uwahipiwi nagiambame ea' nanda'e anda' maol Ananinai andeande'. Ea' ipe' peme' basef ae'ami andeande'.
46007026	Ama nogota anae' dei' nimanimi lu'wami mataga, na'ama ipe' andeande'ma ipe' hipei pepe na'ama etin si'i dei' pape.
46007027	Ine' nali' naso' nemata'w ea', ina nokwaho', owa'. I'i ine' ata' owa' neaso' nemata'wi, ina okom ni'i ano'w nefa'akw owa'.
46007028	Ea' i'i ine' nefa' nemata'w, ina nanda' waf aonai, owa'. Ea' i'i nemata'w awiawai'wi kwoso' aman, akwa'w ina kwanda' waf aonai, owa'. Ea' amam nematawa sandaso'amai esis anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi lu'wami etap anae'. Andaiwa'ma nimanimi amama meatagamepa.
46007029	Ipe' alupipei, a'i basef ae'ami ofagema na'ama. Dei' nogota anae' ea' bandana ma etap anae' na'i higililona. Amama atom dei' ipe' amam paso' nematawai pepe si'i nematawa a'ipei.
46007030	Ea' epes isima sawa salifi sope si'i isima owa' sowa salifi. Epes sandanifel sope si'i isima ina sandanifeli. Ea' isima satala amamaga sope si'i sumafi amamaga amama na'a, owa' asasimi.
46007031	Epes isima sanda' maola amamaga etapami, sope si'i isima owa' ukup mimila amamaga etapami. Dei' main, ape' mogawa, ina nogota laona, amamaga amama hiami moloma etap anae' anona nemaf mefe' hil'ilam.
46007032	Ae' a'i ipe' opalef mope awanem, andaiwa'ma amamaga mamumami mohambombaga ukup ipe'imi. Amam owa' measo' nematawai ukup matamea ma maol Dembinai ma'i monda' amamaga Dembinai okom na'iami.
46007033	Ea' amam amama maso' nematawai, ukup amamumi matamea ma amamaga etapami atom. Ma'i monda' hiahaoma awo wauhiamawa ukup awaumi ma'iami.
46007034	Ea' ukup amamumi mandawal biefim. Ea' nemata'w awiawai'wi ata' owa' kweaso' aman, okom natanea endilisi ma maol Dembinai. Akwa'w okom na'i konda' maola Dembinai atona. Ea' nemata'w kwaso' amani, okom natanea ma amamaga etapami atom kwa'i konda' waf waulunama'w okom na'ianai.
46007035	Ae' a'i basef amama ma igiambamepa pepe andeande'. Amama ina mohopa eaf ma ipe', owa'. Ae' a'i ipe' pepe andeande' penda' waf bu'unai penda' maol Dembinai atona ma anom amamaga ina momboma ukup ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' pepe ukup etifim endilisi.
46007036	I'i anona aman okom na'i anan ina nanda' waf bu'unai ma nemata'w awiawai'wi esis sandandepamana'wi ea' okom ananinai nohafema akwa'w ma owa' nieti anona eaf, anan nila okom ananinai nose'akw, ea' andeande'. Anan ina nanda' waf aonai, owa'. Esis bias sondase'ama.
46007037	I'i anan owa' okom biefina ma akwa'w, nope la'ifina okom ananinai andeande' ni'iam ni'i akwa'w kope etin, na'amai andeande'.
46007038	Ea' emi aman naso' nemata'w anani'wi ea', anan nanda' waf bu'unai. Ea' emi aman ata' owa' nease'akwi, anama nanda' waf bu'unai endilisi.
46007039	I'i anona aman naso' nemata'wi ina dei' naga', nemata'w akwama anani'wi ata' kwape la'ifikw kwalomana. Ea' i'i waulunama'w akwa'unai noga', ina ata' anom amamaga motagamo'w, owa'. Akwa'w okom na'i kwoso' aman dambainai wapoti', wila kose'ana. Ea' akwa'w koso' aman Kristen.
46007040	Ea' ae' okom na'i na'ama. I'i akwa'w kope na'a, kondanifel endilisi. Koso' aman dambainai, ina kwandanifel, owa'. Okom ae'anai a'i basef amama ea' ae' okom na'i ae' wapoti' efa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape ae' nihi'ambe basef amama.
46008001	Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa mafis saham sapefelam god anama baso'omunai. Endilisi, “Ape' hiapai mogawa”, si'i ipe' pa'iam. Gawa anama atona wafinai nafelai waf safela agof asasimi atom. Ea' i'i ape' ukup mimila sahin owan, amama migiambamapa motaga Kristen la'ifipai.
46008002	I'i anona aman okom ni'i anan gawainai, owa'. Anan owa' ata' nogawa andeande'.
46008003	Ea' emi epen okom nainaila Godi, God nogawa epen inima ea' ananinai atona.
46008004	Waf sa' mafis saham sondolali saso' god baso'omunai ina waf endilisinai, owa'. Waf anama ikwaf atona wafinai. Ina god baso'omunai nape, owa'. God endilisinai anan atona nape.
46008005	Endilisi, amamaga hiami sofalam sa'i, “Dembami.” I'i endilisi ma amam amama sofalam sa'i, “god baso'omunai” mope ilif etap,
46008006	ea' hapaimi. God ape' manda' lotumanai atotona nape. Anan God ahalomapa, anan atona ofagonama amamaga hiami. Anan ofagema ape' mape etap anae', manda' maol ananinai atona. Ea' Dembinai atotona nape, anan Jisas Krais. Lagel ananinai atona dei' God nanda' amamaga hiami mataga mape. Krais atona nanda' ape' mataga mape dambaipai.
46008007	Ea' enis epes ina sagawa amama, owa'. Epes isima fowa' saila god baso'omunai. Ea' dei' sa' mafis amama sondolali saso' god baso'omunai, ukup asasimi mapoma mafis amama sa'i, “Amama endilisimi,” ea' sa'am. Ea' basef mape opalef asasimi nomon ma'iami mihi'amba esis sanda' waf aonai ea'. Dei' main, esis ina ukup matamea andeande' sa'am, owa'.
46008008	Ea' gwa'aimi amama ina mofa'apa mefe' felefe'ma God, owa'. I'i ape' mundaiwa'ma gwa'aimi amama, ape' ina nambimb mope awepa ma naep Godi, ea i'i mea' mafis amama, ape' ina nambimb motaga bu'upai mikila' fowa' mape, owa'. Ape' mape wafifipa ma mi'uli anama fowa'inai na'i gwa'aimi amama.
46008009	Ea' ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama amamaga amama ipe' pape andeande' panda'ami monda' epes isima owa' la'ifisi sowa ma waf aonai.
46008010	Ine' epen negawai, i'i nefe' ipat anama sanda' lotuma god baso'omunai nepe nea' gwa'aimi, ma enin epen okom ananinai owa' la'ifinai ma bale'ef ananinai nitilina. Atuwasi nefela okom ananinai nea' gwa'aimi amama saso' godami, o owa'? Ape' ina mogawana.
46008011	Ine' okom na'i epen inima bale'ef ananinai ina la'ifina ma Krais naga' nofa'an netanimani. Na'ama gawa ine'inai nenda'ana newa ma waf aonai.
46008012	Ukup enis sahin owan alupusi ina la'ifim, owa'. I'i ipe' penda' waf anama aonai pehambombaga bale'efa ukup asasimi, ipe' panda' waf anama ma Krais atona.
46008013	Ea' i'i gwa'aimi maim monda' alupunai ae'anai newa ma waf aonai, ae' ina ata' ea' mafis amama wapoti', owa', hapaimi. Na'ama enda' enin newa ma waf aonai.
46009001	Dei' ae' a'i ihali'ipa efela ukup ipe'imi. Ipe' pa'i ae' ape wafifiwi ape aposel ati Dembinai Jisas ea' o owa'? Ae' anda' anama atona dei' ipe' pataga Kristen, o owa'? Endilisi.
46009002	I'i enis epes ukup ma'i ae' ina aposel, hapaisi. Ipe' wila. Ipe' pembale'efa Dembinai pape la'ifipama Anan. Amama atom dei' ipe' etipa si'i anona ikwaf nihi'ambepa pegawa ae' ape aposel anda' maol Dembinai.
46009003	Ea' anom epes mape manifa ae' ma'i ae' endilisiwei o falafuwei. Ea' agwamama basef na'ama.
46009004	Endilisi afa' aposel andeande'ma ofa' gwa'aimi maima maol afa' wanda'anai.
46009005	Ea' andeande'ma oso' nematawa Kristen ofe' olomawa si'i anom aposel maloma amam owapana Dembinai Jisasi maloma Pita manda'am.
46009006	Ina andeande'ma ae' eloma Barnabas atofa onda' maola ofa' otamba afa'imi, ea' enis epes ipe' etipa pigiambamas pimafiasa otamba. Na'ama owa'.
46009007	Maina aman nanda' maol soldia anan atona notala gwa'aimi maim ananimi? Ea' emi epen nawa gwa'aimi aof ama anan ina nofa' gwa'aimianai? Emi epen nimafi bulmakau ma anan ina nea' nomagofa amam? Owa'etin.
46009008	Ae' aila ukup epesi a'iam na'ama? Owa'. Mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'iam na'ama etin.
46009009	Moses nanda' basef mape mi'uli Godi ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Bulmakau manda' maol mafa'asa olelemb witim mandilamam ma'i mea' anom, ipe' ina pesopama malogof amamumi, owa'.” Ipe' pa'i God okom napoma amam bulmakau atom a' amon? Owa'etin.
46009010	Anan okom na'i ape' wapoti'. Basef amama ma'iama ape' atepa. God okom na'i waf anama. Epen nawa nelemb etap ananinai neloma emi epen nela gwa'aimi maof ea'i, anan okom na'i opaf ananinai ma nefa' amamaga tu'wanima maol anama.
46009011	Afa' wanda' maol Godi wape na'ama etin. Afa' wawa amamaga bu'wami Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'afami la'afena ipe'. Ea' ipe' wilama pese'afa anom amamaga pigiambama alop afa'inai ma amama ina ahifima ipe', owa'.
46009012	Ipe' pase'am amamaga anom amam mawalipipa basef Godi, ea' afa' dei' wape wa'imama? Afa' wapoti' pese'afa amamaga ipe'imi, andeande'. Dei' main, afa' wali' wanda' maol wagiambamepa. Ea' amamaga amama afa' wa'i aho'ma ofa'ami, afa' ina ofa'am, owa'. Fowa' dambadamba afa' wali' wafe'mago ipe' wafi'i wafi'i wataga dei', afa' wandaiwa'ma owahopa eafa basef bu'wami Kraisi. Amama atom afa' wandaiwa'ma ofa'am. Amama atom dei' nimanimi hiami matagamafa.
46009013	Dei' ipe' ukup mi'i anom basef. Amam manda' maol ipat lu'unai Godi mofa' gwa'aimi ipat anama. Ipe' pegawa amam manda' maola balata anama sondolalima mafisanai ma God, amam wapoti' mofa' mafis to'wanima balata anama.
46009014	Ea' na'ama etin Dembinai nanda' mi'uli anama nape. Emi amam mawalapa basef bu'wami Godi, amam ata' mofa' amamaga ma esis amam nematawa sofa' basef bu'wami ma sigiambama alop amamunai.
46009015	Ea' ae' ina efa' anom amamaga amama, owa'. Dei' wapoti' ina anda' basef amama ma i'ipipa ae' andeande'ma efa' anom amamaga ma ipe', owa'. Andeande'ma ae' ili' ega'. Ae' andanifel anda' maol Godi agiambamepa ea' ina efa' anom amamaga amama. Andaiwa'ma anin epen netofa danifel ae'anai ma efela agel ae'anai ma waf anama, owa'.
46009016	Ea' ae' ina efela agel ae'anai atona awalapa basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Ae' owa' anona eafa esopama malogela i'ipasam, owa'. Okom ae'anai nahafel endilisi ma a'i i'ipasam etin. I'i ae' owa' ewalapa basef amama bu'wami, na'ama God nese'e nimanimi lu'wami.
46009017	I'i okom ae'anai atona enda' maol anama Ananinai, owagama efa' otamba ma maol anama. Owa'etin. Ae' owa' anona eaf, anda'am etin. Dei' main, anama anona maol God nase'eana ae' anda'anai.
46009018	Owagama efa' maima anama anda'anai? Ae' efa' amamaga amama bu'wami na'ama. Ae' anda' waf anama bu'unai atona. Amamaga ae' wila ma efa'ama maol anama, amama ina efa'am, owa'. Ae' awalapa basef bu'wami Godi ase'asam na'a. Ae' ina efalasa amamaga otamba maima sese'e si'i mi'uli Godi na'iam, owa'.
46009019	Ae' ina anda' maol ape owina anin epen, owa'. Ae' ape wafifiwi. Ea' okom ae'anai atona anda' ae' ape si'i afe' owina epes hiesi ma efa'ai hiesi sondahama ikwafa pepel ae'anai sefe'ma God.
46009020	Amama atom dei' naep esis Judai ataga si'i Juda, ma efa'ai enis Juda. Ae' ina afe' owina mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai, owa'. Ea' naep isima sape owina mi'uli anama, ae' wapoti' afe' owina mi'uli anama ma efa'ai epes isima sefe'ma God.
46009021	Ea' naep epes isima sololama mi'uli anama ina Judaisi, ataga si'i epes isima sololama mi'uli anama ma efa'ai epes isima sefe'ma God. Ea' ae' ina okom nase'e ma mi'uli Godi, owa'. Dei' aila mi'uli Kraisi.
46009022	Ama naep epes isima ina la'ifisi, ataga si'i esis ama efa'ai epes ina la'ifisi. Ae' ataga si'i efa' waf epes hiesi endondomba iaguf hiami ma efa' enis epes sotanimani.
46009023	Ae' anda' maol anama ma efela agel basef bu'wami Godi ma anona nemaf efa' amamaga amama bu'wami epes isima saila basef amama sofa'ami eloma enis epes Godi wapoti'.
46009024	Ipe' pegawa epes sasagih sandahawaipama etini hiesi sasagih safe' ea' etitin nikila'as nefa' amamaga bu'wami. Ipe' pegawa amama o owa'? Ea' ipe' wapoti' pesagih mehipa pefa' amamaga amama bu'wami.
46009025	Emi egafis sa'i sisagih sikila' ikwaf anama, sanda' maol la'ifinai endilisi sandameme'ma alop asasinai nimeguf hiami. Epes isima sanda'am na'ama ma sofa' amamaga bu'wami kwaie'um mape nogota bandanai. Ea' ape' Kristen manda'ama mefa' amamaga bu'wami mape la'ela'ef hihifi.
46009026	Amama atom ae' asagih. Ea' ina ati ganigani, owa'. Naep mati ikwaf atona asagih afe' mehip ikila' hiesi ataga ikwaf anama ma efa' amamaga bu'wami. Ae' ape si'i anona aman nanda' boksen napa'i, ina nakwaha lagof mafe' ganigani noha uf atona, owa'.
46009027	Ae' la'ifiwi aha alop ae'anai nataga la'ifina nape owina okom ae'anai. Na'ama ewalapa basef bu'wami ma enis epes, ea' owagama ae' ina efa' amamaga bu'wami, owa'.
46010001	Alupipei, ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' ukup mose'epama amamaga amama. Esis bafasapa hiesi Israel sape owina elagw amama mali'as safe' ea' hiesi safe' bo'wagah asasimi sowala sambo naoh embel akwahimi
46010002	sawisa elagw maloma naoh embel safe'. Amama mondola'wifa sofa' baptais sape saloma Moses salomana nao'was safe'.
46010003	Ea' esis hiesi sa' gwa'aimi amama God nase'asami,
46010004	sa' embel amama God nase'asami. Esis sa' embela owap anama God nase'asami nafe' nalomas. Owap anama nondola'wifa Krais atona.
46010005	Ea' God nandaiwa'ma hiesi sape saloma esis. Amama atom dei' saga' hi'alas etap anama wafiguma.
46010006	Ea' amamaga amama hiami mataga mihi'ambapa si'i anona ikwafa ape' motolom mogawa ma ape' ina ukup mimila amamaga awami si'i esis fowa' sanda'am, owa'.
46010007	Ipe' ina ukup mimila god baso'omunai si'i esis fowa' sanda'am, owa'. Baibel na'i esis na'ama na'i, “Amam nematawa sape sanda' gwa'aimi embel sa'am sohafel salemb etin sanda' salamal ki de'iaf sape.”
46010008	Ape' wapoti' ina monda' waf anama aonai so'a waolanai si'i esis fowa' sanda'am, ama nemaf atotona esis 23,000-peleis saga' hi'alas.
46010009	Ea' ape' ina mogwamba God si'i esis fowa' sagwambana ma iguf awami mahasa saga' hi'alas, owa'.
46010010	Ipe' ina ukup aom mi'i diga wandafunai peloma God si'i esis fowa' sanda'manam God, ma ensel anama naha epes saga'i nafi'i nahas saga' hi'alas, owa'.
46010011	Amamaga amama hiami matagama esis, amama si'i anona ikwafa ape' dei' mape nogota anae' felefele'ma na'i hi'ilana. Amama si'i anona ikwafa ape' motolona mundumafuma andeande'. Na'ama monda' waf aonai si'i esis.
46010012	Ea' emi egafis si'i esis etis situ la'ifis, esis sundumafuma andeande'. Na'ama sowa ma waf aonai.
46010013	Amamaga meagwamba ipe'i, amama ina anom deiam, owa'. Amama na'ama etin si'i gwamba matagama epes hiesi. God naila basef ananimi endilisimi nanda' amamaga ananimi andeande'. Anan ina nambimb ni'i aho'ma amama meagwamba ipe'i motagama ipe' mikila' pepel ipe'inai, owa'. Nemaf anama amama motagamepa, God nonda' anona eafa nigiambamepa pitu la'ifipa.
46010014	Ipe' alupipei endilisi ae'ipei, ipe' pekwaha waf anama pailana god anama baso'omunai, pewa' alafugaha anan.
46010015	Ipe' pegawa, dei' a'ipipa. Ipe' etipa pewaloga basef amama ae'ami.
46010016	Kap anama aman numafi lotuwi nofalo'mana, anama na'ama. Ape' manifela Goda kap anama nakolasa ape' maloma esimbel Kraisi. Endilisi etis bret anama ape' mawalonai, anama nakolasepa maloma alop Kraisi.
46010017	Bret atotona. Amama mihi'ambapa amam nematawa hiapai mape si'i alop atotona. Dei' main, ape' hiapai mandakolas mandao'oma ma' bret atotona.
46010018	Ipe' ukup ata' mopoma esis Israel. Epes isima sa' gwa'aimi mafis sondolali ma God balata anama sandatama sape etifigin saloma Goda balata anama.
46010019	Basef ofagema do'ok a'ipipami ma'i main? Gwa'aimi mafis maim sondolalima god baso'omunai endilisimi? Amam god anama baso'omunai endilisimi? Ae' a'iam na'ama? Owa'etin.
46010020	Ae' a'iam a'i amamaga esis sololama Godi sondolalima god baso'omunai, ina sondolali ma God, owa'. Ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' pendakolas peloma god anama baso'omunai, owa'.
46010021	Ipe' ina pea' embela kap Dembinai noloma kap god baso'omunai wapoti', owa'. Ea' ina pea' gwa'aimi balata Dembinai moloma gwa'aimi balata sondolali ma god baso'omunai wapoti', owa'.
46010022	Ape' ina monda' maol molomas ma god baso'omunai monda' okom Dembinai aona ma ape', owa'. Ape' ina mi'i ape' la'ifipai mikila' Dembinai, owa'.
46010023	Ipe' pa'i, “Andeande'ma monda' amamaga mamumami hiami.” Amama endilisi, ea' ina amama hiami magiambamapa, owa'. Ipe' pa'i, “Andeande'ma monda' amamaga mamumami hiami.” Ea' ina amamaga hiami manda'apa mataga la'ifipa ma bale'ef, owa'.
46010024	Ipe' ina ukup mopoma ipe' etipa pindumafuma pepe andeande', owa'. Ipe' ukup mopoma enis epes wapoti' ma pigiambamas sope andeande'.
46010025	Mafis hiami satalom stowa, amama ipe' penda'am. Ina ukup mope hiahiam pindahahali'mam, owa'.
46010026	Dei' main, “Etap anae' naloma amamaga hiami, amama Dembinai atom.”
46010027	I'i enin epen owa' neambale'efa Kraisi nefalepa ni'i pefe' pelomana pea' gwa'aimi ma pi'i peafe', andeande'. Pefe' pea' gwa'aimi amama enin nandandombama neasi'ipami. Ipe' ina ukup motamea hiahiam pendahahali'mam, owa'.
46010028	Ea' i'i enin epen nili' ni'ipipa ni'i, “Mafis amama sondolalima god baso'omunai”, ipe' pegawa basef ananimi ina pea'am, owa' hapaimi. Ipe' pi'i uwahipin epen inima.
