46010029	Ae' ina a'i ipe' peme' basef mape opalef ipe'imi nomon ma'iami pilam, owa'. A'i pila basef mape opaf ananinai nomon ma'iami epen inima na'ipipei. Na'ama enin epen ni'i, “Ae' ape wafifiwei. Dei' maina okom enin epen ina la'ifina nohopa ae'?
46010030	I'i ae' inifela Goda ea'am, dei' maina enin epen nehopa ae' ma ea' mafis amama anifela Godami? Na'ama ae' andaiwa'.”
46010031	Dei' ae' egwa basefa epen inima. I'i ipe' pi'i pea' gwa'aimi embel maim o penda' maim amamaga, penda'ama pefela agel Godi atona lu'una.
46010032	Ipe' ukup mopoma epes hiesi, esis Juda soloma esis owa' Judaisi, soloma amam nematawa isima Godi. Ea' ipe' ina penda' anona waf nonda' esis sowa ma waf aonai, owa'.
46010033	Si'i ae' wapoti' anda' maol lu'unai ma igiambama epes hiesi ma ukup mi'i waf bu'unai hianai ae' anda'anai. Ae' ina anda'am agiambama ae' imafi ae' atowe, owa'. Anda'ama agiambama amam nematawa hiesi ma God nofa'as sotanimani.
46011001	Ipe' okokoma waf ae'anai pila ae' si'i ae' okokoma waf Kraisi ailana.
46011002	La'ela'ef ipe' okokoma ae' paila basef amama hiami a'ipipami. Basef amama efa'ami dei' a'ipipam ipe'. Amama atom dei' anifelipa a'i panda' waf bu'unai endilisi.
46011003	Dei' ae' a'i ipe' pegawa basef amama. Agilinai amam hiami anan Krais atona ea' agilinai ako'unai waulunama'w atona ea' agilinai Kraisi God atona.
46011004	I'i emi aman Ambal Bu'unai Godi nefelona na'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet o nanda' beten ama siti anan nase'ala balaga, aman anama nanda' agel Kraisi nowala.
46011005	Ea' emi nemata'w wapoti' Ambal Godi nafelo'w kwa'ipasa basef Godi si'i profet o kwanda' beten ama owa' kose'ala balaga ako'unai, akwa'w wapoti' kwanda' agel waulunama'wi aona. Amama na'ama etin si'i kwando balaga ako'unai hi'alana.
46011006	I'i nematawa owa' ose'ala balagah awaumi, awo otopa'am bandam. Waf ape' hiapai nape na'ama. I'i ambagof aoma weatopa'am bandam o ondowam hi'ilam, ape' ma'i waf anama aonai nanda' nematawa ambagof aom. Dei' amama atom andeande'ma awo ose'alom.
46011007	Amam ina mose'ala balagah amamumi, owa'. Dei' main, God nanda' amam mandati si'i Anan ama mowalapai pepel lu'unai Ananinai. Ea' nematawa wawalapai pepel lu'unai amami.
46011008	Dei' main, God ina nanda' amana alop nemata'wi, owa'. Anan nanda' nemata'wa alop amani.
46011009	Ea' amama wapoti', God ina okom na'i nemata'w dei' nanda' amana nagiambama akwa'w, owa'. Anan okom na'i aman dei' nanda' nemata'wa kwagiambamana.
46011010	Amama atom dei' nematawa ose'ala balagah awaumi ondola'wifa ope owina amam wauhupawa awoumi. Awo ose'alam ombaho'ama umbamahawa ma amam ensel motolowa.
46011011	Ape' mape la'ifipama Dembinai mape na'ama. Ina nemata'w ato'w kope aman a'akw aman atona nope nemata'w a'ana, owa'.
46011012	God nanda' nemata'wa alop amani ea' na'ama etin dei' nanda' amam mataga alop nematawai. Ea' God ofagonama amamaga amama hiami hi'alam.
46011013	Dei' ipe' etipa ata' pewaloga basef amama. I'i nematawa ina ose'ala balagah awaumi onda' betena God, amama andeande' o owa'?
46011014	Waf ape'inai amam nematawai atona nihi'ambepa na'ama. I'i amam balagah laumi, amama manda'am ambagof aom.
46011015	Ea' i'i nematawa balagah mopaiwa, andeande', balagah si'i sosaf bu'unai awaunai. Dei' main, God atona nase'awa balagah laumi awo ma moso'ala balagah awaumi.
46011016	Ea' i'i emi epen nesmbala basef amama, anan negawa ape' ina maila anona waf, owa'etin. Maila waf anama atona. Ea' esis amam nematawa Godi hiesi dei' sailana na'ama etin.
46011017	Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef ma ipe', ea' ae' ina efela agof ipe'imi, owa'. Nogota anama pandakolas panda' lotu, amama mahambombagepa.
46011018	A'i ili' i'ipipa amama. Nogota anama ipe' pandakolas panda' lotu, ipe' pandawal etin. Ae' ame' basefa ipe' na'ama. Ea' ae' okom na'i endilisi ipe' pandawal, o owa'?
46011019	Endilisi, ipe' pandawal etin pa'i waf anama bu'unai ma emi egafis saila basef endilisi sotaga sondawalap alihis? Owa'etin.
46011020	Nemaf anama ipe' hipei pandakolas, ipe' ina pefa' gwa'aimi Dembinai, owa'.
46011021	Ipe' hipei atona etin mehip pali' pa' gwa'aimi ipe'imi atom. Ea' anin nolomahan nape, ea' enin epen na' embel wain hianai nahaga nagaol.
46011022	Ipe' ifagw a'epama pea' gwa'aimi embel maim? Ipe' pa'i amam nematawa Godi isima awasi falafisi etis? Ipe' pa'i penda' enis epes gwa'aimi a'asi ambagof aom? Dei' atuwasi i'i maim basefa ipe'? Efela agof ipe'imi? Owa'etin. Amamaga amama ipe' panda'ami ae' ina anifelipa efela agof ipe'imi, owa'.
46011023	Basef amama ae' a'ipipami amama ae' efa'ama Dembinai atona. Amama na'ama. Owamb anama Judas nase'ama Jisas nafe' lagof amam naumbih, ma owamb anama Dembinai Jisas nafela bret
46011024	ea' nanifela God nawalona na'i, “Anama alop ae'anai, ase'epana agiambamepa. Ipe' penda'am na'ama etin ukup okokoma ae'.”
46011025	Amam ma'am hi'alam, Anan nafelai anona kap embel malanai nanda'am na'ama etin na'i, “Kap anama basef la'ifimi dambaimi ae'ami endilisimi atom. Basef amama esimbel ae'ami atom malo magiambamepa. Nimeguf hiami danda ipe' penda' amama pea' embel, penda'am na'ama ma ukup okokoma ae'.” Fowa' Jisas na'ipa alupumi ananimi na'ama.
46011026	Nimeguf hiami ipe' pea' bret naloma kap embel amama, ipe' pewalapa basefa Dembinai naga' motaga alihim mefe' mefe' motagama nemaf Anan niefi'ianai.
46011027	I'i enin epen owa' okokom mili' andeande' ma nea' gwa'aimi amama bret naloma embela kap Dembinai nea'am na'a, enin nanda' waf aonai ma alop noloma esimbel Dembinai, ea' epen inima ofagema mopoma enin etin.
46011028	Ape' hiapai ata' muli' nomonas motamea andeande' mea' bret noloma embel kap amama.
46011029	Dei' main, i'i epen owa' nomonas motamea andeande' ma basef ofagema ma alop Dembinai ma enin nea' gwa'aimi embel na'a, ofagema mapoma epen inima etin.
46011030	Amama atom dei' amam nematawa hiesi ipe'isi owa' la'ifis ea' awes hianai nanda'as ea' enis saga' ma waf anama.
46011031	I'i ape' muli' nomonas motamea andeande', anona nemaf ina anom ofagema motagama ape', owa'.
46011032	Ea' i'i Dembinai nihihi'a waf ape'inai ma nogwa waf aonai ma ape', amama Anan nase'apa nimanimi nanda'apa mope andeande' ma anona nemaf ina higililapa moloma epes saila waf etapanai, owa'.
46011033	Ea' dei' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, maina nemaf ipe' pendakolasa pea' gwa'aimi Dembinai, ipe' ata' pepe pehafa enis sifi'i.
46011034	I'i emi egafis nolomohas, esis ata' sili' sea' gwa'aimi ifagw asasimi. Na'ama God nonda'mepa basefa ipe'. Basef amama tu'wanim mapani ata' owa' i'ipipami, maina nemaf efe'mago ipe', i'ipipam.
46012001	Ipe' alupipei, ae' a'i enda'mepago basef amama ma presen amamaga bu'wami Ambal Bu'unai Godi naso' ipe' atona etinami. Dei' main, andaiwa'ma enipa ipe' ukup mololaipa ma amama.
46012002	Ipe' pegawa ma fowa' ipe' ata' pape awepa ma pape panda' waf aonai pelolama God, nogota anama ipe' ukup maila god baso'omainai maima mahonde'ipei pailam owa' moga mie'i.
46012003	Ea' ipe' pegawa emi epen Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelan na'i basef, ina ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas owagama higililana,” owa'. Ea' emi epen Ambal Bu'unai Godi a'ani, enin ina anona nemaf ni'i basef ni'i, “Jisas Anan Dembinai,” owa'.
46012004	Presen anama bu'unai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'apana na'ai, anama hianai naninani. Anama Ambal Godi atona nase'apana.
46012005	Maol Dembinai hianai naninani nape, ea' Dembinai atotona nape numafiana.
46012006	Waf hianai naninani manda' maolanai, ea' God atotona nase'apa pepel epes hiapai ma la'ifipa monda' maol anama hianai.
46012007	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapa pepel ananinai ma epes hiesi atona etina nagiambama hiesi.
46012008	Epen atitin Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'an pepela nihi'ambamasa gawa hianai bu'unai naninani ma nowalapa basefa epes hiesi. Ea' enin epen Ambal Bu'unai Godi anama atona nase'ana pepela newalapa basef ofagema waf Godi ma esis amam nematawa sogawam andeande'.
46012009	Ea' enin epen Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nagiambaman nembale'efa God nataga la'ifin nanda' maol ananinai andeande'. Ea' enin epen nefa' pepela nigiambama epes isima awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes. Ambal Bu'unai anama atona.
46012010	Ea' enin epen Ambal Godi nagiambaman nase'an pepela nenda' amamaga la'ifimi si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' enin epen Ambal Godi nafelan na'i basef Godi. Enin epen nefa' gawa ma newaloga ambagof mamumami hiami, bu'wami o awami. Ea' enin negawa ma na'i diga naninani hianai. Ea' enin epen negawa ma nemboma basefa diga naninani.
46012011	Ambal Bu'unai Godi anama atona nanda' maol nawalapa presen anama hianai. Ama okom ananinai atona nase'as presen anama bu'unai nafe'ma epes hiesi atona etin.
46012012	Alop ape' epesi etifina ea' wa'awa'ana hianai ea' alop anama hianai lu'una sa'ona nafe' nail alop si'ina atotona. Krais wapoti' na'ama etin.
46012013	Dei' main, ape' hiapai mofa' baptaisa Ambal Bu'unai Godi atotona. Nanda'apa mataga alop atotona, esis Juda saloma esis owa' Judaisi saloma esis sape wafifisi, saloma esis agof a'asi sape owina enis epes wapoti'. Ape' hiapai mofa' Ambal Godi atotona nape nalomapa la'ela'ef.
46012014	Ape' mogawa alop ina etifina, owa'. Alop wa'awa'ana hianai.
46012015	I'i bo'waga ni'i, “Ae' ina lagol ape alop si'ina, owa'.” I'i bo'waga anama ni'i basef na'amani, ina andeande', owa'. Basef amama hapaimi. Bo'waga nape alop si'ina anama atona.
46012016	Ea' aliga wapoti' ni'i, “Ae' ina naep ape alop si'ina, owa'.” I'i aliga ni'iam na'ama, ina andeande', owa'. Basef amama hapaimi. Aliga nape alop si'ina anama atona.
46012017	I'i alop hianai si'ina ea' naep atom hi'ilam, dei' neme' basef ni'imama? Owa'. I'i alop hianai si'ina aligah atom mope hi'ilana, dei' neme' alogw ni'imama?
46012018	Ea' alop ina nataga si'i na'ama, owa'. God atona fowa' nogawa okom na'i alop atona etin lu'una sa'ona dei' nanda'ana nape nandahama si'i okom ananinai atona na'iam.
46012019	I'i alop wa'ana nope anona alop etifina hi'ilana, alop anama si'ina ina nape alop endilisinai, owa'.
46012020	Alop ina nataga nandanda' na'ama, owa'. Alop wa'awa'ana sa'osa'ona hianai, ea' alop si'ina etifina.
46012021	Naep ina la'ifima mi'ipa lagof mi'i, “Afa' wandaiwa'ma ipe' pepe pelomafa. Afa' atofa ope, andeande'.” Ea' balaga wapoti' ina la'ifima ni'ipa bo'wagah ni'i, “Ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' pepe pelome, owa'. Ae' atowe epe, andeande'.” Owa'etin.
46012022	Alop anama wa'awa'ana falafuna ape' ma'i owa' la'ifina, i'i anama owa' nondala nope, anona nemaf alop anama si'ina ina la'ifina, owa'.
46012023	Ea' alop anama wa'ana ape' ambagof awamunai, ape' mofalo'mana endilisi mumafiana andeande'.
46012024	Ea' alop wa'awa'ana owa' ambagof awamunai, anama ape' ina mofalo'mana mumafiana na'ama, owa'. Alop anama wila ma nandala nape. God atona nasa alop anama wa'awa'ana hianai nail etifigin nataga alop atotona. Alop wa'awa'ana hianai agof a'anai God nandana nataga bu'unai.
46012025	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma alop anama ina anona nemaf nondawal wa'awa'ana, owa'. Alop anama hianai wa'awa'ana nimafiana atona etin.
46012026	I'i alop wa'ana neme' ekepehana, alop hianai si'ina atuwasi neme' ekepehana na'ama etin. I'i enis epes sinifela wa'ana, hianai si'ina nondanifel hi'ilana nolomana.
46012027	Amama atom dei' ipe' hipei pape alop Kraisi si'ina. Ea' ipe' hipei atona etin alop wa'awa'ana ananinai atona.
46012028	God nahapona enis epes ananisi sape na'ama ma sios. Mali'i aposel, sagi'i profet, safe'ma wenifi, esis tisa sawalipasa basef ofagema Godi. Ea' sagi'ma amama epes isima sanda' betena sanda' la'ifimi si'i God nanda'ami. Ea' epes isima sanda' awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapoti' ea' esis isima sagiambama enis epesi, saloma amam mumafi maol siosi naninani hianai saloma isima sogawa ma si'i diga naninani hianai.
46012029	Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? Ipe' pa'i amam hiami mape aposel atom? Pa'i amam hiami mape profet atom? Ipe' pa'i amam hiami mape tisa atom? Pa'i esis hiesi sanda' amamaga la'ifimi si'i God nanda'ami?
46012030	Pa'i esis hiesi sofa' presen anama bu'unai ma sonda' awes nanda'asi sataga bo'wes wapoti'? Pa'i esis hiesi sogawa ma si'i diga naninani hianai? Pa'i hiesi sogawa ma somboma basefa diga anama naninani? Owa'etin.
46012031	Ea' ipe' hipei ukup mohafela pefa' presen amamaga bu'wami mali'i. Ea' dei' a'i ihi'ambepa anona eaf bu'unai nikila' endilisi presen anama hianai.
46013001	I'i ae' egawa ma i'i diga naninani epesi soloma enseli wapoti' ma ae' owa' okom mimilas ese'asa okom igiambamas, basef ae'ami falafumi atom si'i saha olef wata malef etini.
46013002	I'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nose'e presen amamaga bu'wami nefele ma ewalipasa basef Godi ma egawa okom hiami Godi mape mandamabahi'i hi'ilam, ama egawa gawa hianai wapoti', ma embale'efa God la'ifiwi endilisi ma la'ifiwi ma i'ipama halafutagw mindiki'ah mefe' gani to'wan, ea' ae' owa' okom ninila esis amam nematawa endilisi, ae' falafuwei atowe.
46013003	I'i ae' ese'asa amamaga hiami ae'ami hi'ilama esis isima kwahusima hiahaom ma enda' maol Godi i'i aho'ma enis epes sandaiwa'ma Godi si'i sehe sofe nif ega'. Ea' ae' owa' okom ninilas ese'as opaf, ea' hapaimi. Anona nemaf amamaga amama hiami ina migiambame, owa'etin.
46013004	Emi egafis ukup maila enis epes endilisi, esis sanda' waf bu'unai na'ama. Esis ina mehip sagwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'masanai, owa'etin. Esis sape satilis. Esis sati epes hiesi uwahipis sagiambamas. Esis ina kowalasa epes amamaga hiamisi, owa'etin. Ea' ina safela agof asasimi atom, esis ina ukup ma'i esis etis, owa'etin.
46013005	Esis ukup maimailas sape andeande'. Esis ina ukup mapoma amamaga asasimi endilisi, owa'etin. Esis ina ukup wandafum mehip, owa'. Ea' ina ukup mapoma waf aonai enis epes sanda'masanai, owa'etin.
46013006	Esis ina sandanifel ma waf aonai ikiakanai, owa'etin. Esis sandanifel ma waf endilisinai bu'unai atona.
46013007	Nimeguf hiami dondol esis sanda' waf anama na'ama. Esis ukup mape awanema maina nemaf sefa' nimanimi lu'wami. Esis sagiambama epes alifisi saloma epes isima ena la'ifisa sagiambama esis etisi. Esis sombale'efa God endilisi sape sehafana ma nigiambama esis soloma enis wapoti'. Esis saitu la'ifisa nimanimi matagamas.
46013008	Waf anama ukup maimaila enis epes endilisi, anama anona nemaf ina higililana, owa'etin. Ea' waf anama Ambal Godi nafelapa ma mowalapa basef ananimi, anama anona nemaf higililana hi'ilana. Presen anama bu'unai ma epes sogawa sa'i diga naninani, diga anama anona nemaf hi'ilana. Presen anama epes sogawa ma waf Godi, gawa anama anona nemaf hi'ilana wapoti'.
46013009	Dei' main, dei' ata' mogawa gawa tu'wanina atona. Presen anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelasa sowalapa basef ananimi si'i profet, basef amama wapoti' ata' tu'wanim atom.
46013010	Ea' anona nemaf amamaga God okom na'i meataga migi' endilisi motaga, nemaf anama amamaga amama dei' motaga tu'watu'wanim atuwasi hi'ilam.
46013011	Fowa' ae' ata' ape si'i awani a'i basef si'i awani. Ae' ameme'ma amamaga si'i awani. Ea' nemaf anama ataga dambewe, akwaha waf anama fowa' ape so'uwe anda'anai.
46013012	Dei' mati amamaga mataga, ea' ina mandawalap alihim endilisi, ata' owa'. Mataga si'i mapela embel mati ambal atona. Ea' anona nemaf owagama nemaf dahandahama motaga, muti naep alihim. Dei' ata' egawa tu'watu'wan atom. Ea' nemaf anama egawa amama endilisi si'i God nogawa ae'.
46013013	Dei' waf wenifina nape, anama na'ama. Waf mombale'efa Kraisi naloma waf mope mohafa God, waf ukup maimailasanai. Waf anama wenifina. Ea' nali' endilisi, waf ukup maimailasanai.
46014001	Ipe' la'ifipa pili' ukup mila epes hiesi pese'asa opalef esis. Ea' ukup ipe'imi mohafel endilisi ma pefa' presen anama bu'unai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'apanai. Ea' presen nali'i ma ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa pefa'anai, anama na'ama. Presen Ambal Godi nefelepa ma pewalapa basef Godi si'i profet.
46014002	Ape' mogawa emi egafis sa'i basefa diga naninani esis ina sa'ipa anom basef epes, owa'. Sa'i saloma God atona. Dei' main, ina enis epes sagawa diga anama, owa'. Pepel Ambal Godi atona esis sa'i basef amama fowa' mape mandambahi'i.
46014003	Ea' emi egafis Ambal Godi nafelasa sa'i basef Godi si'i profet, epes isima sa'ipam sanda'am sa'ipasam sanda'as la'fisa sombale'efa Dembinai ea' sa'ipas safelasa sonda' waf bu'unai nonda' opalef asasimi awanem.
46014004	Emi egafis sa'i basefa diga naninani, esis sanda' esis etis sataga la'ifis. Ea' emi egafis Ambal Godi nafelas sawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, isima sanda' esis amam nematawa Kristen sataga la'ifis.
46014005	Ae' okom na'i ipe' hipei pi'i basefa diga naninani. Ea' emi egafis Ambal Godi nafelasa sowalapa basef Godi si'i profet, esis sikila' epes isima sa'i basefa diga naninani owa' sombomam si'iam alihim. Dei' main, i'i epen inima owa' nembomam ni'iam alihim, basef amama ina migiambama esis amam nematawa Kristen sotaga la'ifis, owa'. Ea' i'i nembomam alihim, basef amama migiambamas sotaga la'ifis.
46014006	Alupipei, ipe' ukup mopama basef amama andeande'. I'i ae' efe'mago ipe' ma i'i basefa anona diga, atuwasi igiambamepa petaga la'ifipa pi'imama? Owa'etin. Ea' i'i embomam i'ipipa anom basef God nihi'ambepam i'ipipa gawa bu'unai ipe' iwalipipama basef ofagema Godi si'i profeta Ambal Godi nefela ae' ie'ipipami.
46014007	Amamaga ambal a'ami, si'i batagw moloma gita, amama na'ama etin si'i diga anama hianai. I'i amam owa' mogal melef monda' maguf mamumami motaga, atuwasi membe' aligah mogawa maguf amamumi alihim mi'imama? Owa'etin.
46014008	I'i bugel alof owa' nogal ni'i alihina, amam monda' wandafi mundamafuma mope mondandombola wandaf mi'imama? Owa'etin.
46014009	Ipe' wapoti' na'ama etin. I'i ipe' pi'i basefa anona diga esis owa' sogawanai, atuwasi sogawa basef amama ofagema si'imama? Owa'etin. Atuwasi basef ipe'imi mefe' hi'ilam etin.
46014010	Endilisi, naninani nape etap anae'. Ea' ina anona diga falafunai atona, owa'. Basef ofagema mape diga naninani hianai.
46014011	I'i ae' owa' egawa basef ofagema enin epen na'iami, atuwasi anan okom nopoma ae' ni'i ae' epen a'i anona diga anona wambel. Ea' ae' wapoti' okom napoma enin, i'i na'i anona diga anona wambel.
46014012	Ipe' wapoti' na'ama etin. Ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi ma pefa' presen anama bu'unai Ambal Godi nasi'ipanai. Ea' ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa endilisi ma pefa' presen anama nagiambama eses Kristen sotaga la'ifis.
46014013	Ea' epen emi na'i basefa anona diga, anan nenda' betena Goda nese'an gawa nemboma basefa diga anama.
46014014	Dei' main, i'i enda' betena anona diga, ambal ae'anai atona nanda' beten, ea' okom ae'anai nape etin.
46014015	Ea' dei' enda'am i'imama? Ae' enda' betena ambal ae'anai eloma okom ae'anai wapoti'. Ae' enda' awalefa ambal ae'anai eloma okom ae'anai wapoti'.
46014016	-
46014017	I'i ipe' pinifela Goda ukup ipe'imi atom, ama epen owa' nefa' presen anama bu'unai Ambal Godi nasi'ipanai, dei' anan negawa ni'imama ma beten anama ipe'inai ma nie'i endilisi? Owa'etin. I'i ipe' penda' beten pi'i basef bu'wami endilisi, ina pigiambama epen inima netaga la'ifin, owa'. Dei' main, anan ina negawa basef amama ipe'imi, owa'.
46014018	Ae' anifela God nimeguf hiami ma ae' a'i basefa diga naninani. Ipe' ina la'ifipama pikila' ae' ma presen anama, owa'.
46014019	Ea' nemaf anama epe eloma esis amam nematawa mondakolas, ae' a'i i'i basefa amef bandami wenifim biefima okom ae'anai ihi'amba esisa sogawam. Ea' i'i ae' i'ipasa basefa amef laumi motaga hihif si'i 10,000 peleima anona diga na'iami, ea' hapaimi, falafumi atom.
46014020	Ipe' alupipei, ipe' ina pepe ukup motamea si'i awasi, hapaimi. Waf aonai, ipe' ukup bo'om motamea andeande' ukup mose'epam si'i awasi. Ea' nomonas ipe'imi motaga si'i epes dembesi.
46014021	Anom basefa mi'uli Godi mail buk ma'i, “Dembinai na'i, anona nemaf Ae' enda' enis epes anona wambota sa'i anona diga efelas si'ipasa basef ae'ami epes isima ae'asi, ea' esis ina nambimb sila basef amama, owa'.”
46014022	Dei' mogawa presen anama pa'i basefa diga naninani, anama ina ikwaf God nanda'ana esis sombale'efanai, owa'. Anan nanda'ana epes isima owa' sombale'efanai. Ea' presen anama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelepa pawalapa basef ananimi si'i profet, anama ina ikwaf God nase'asana epes isima owa' seambale'efanai, owa'. Anama ikwaf isima sembale'efanai etis.
46014023	Ea' i'i esis amam nematawa Godi hiesi sondowa'anima etifigin ama ipe' hipei pi'i basefa diga naninani ma enis epes owa' sefa' presen anama o enis owa' seambale'efa Kraisi sifi'i sope solomepa, si'i, “Ipe' pahaga pagaoli.”
46014024	Ea' i'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nefela ipe' hipei ma pewalapa basef Godi si'i profet ea' enin epen owa' nembale'efa Kraisi o owa' negawa basef Godi andeande'i nifi'i niwis, basef ipe' hipei atuwasi moha okom epen inima ea' moha opaf ananinai ma maina waf napaini.
46014025	Basef hiami mape mandambaho' okom ananinai, amama atuwasi motaga mondawalap alihima enin nifi'i nindiwa nembawa nitimalo' nefela agel Godi nowalapa basef na'ama ni'i, “Endilisi, God nape nalomepa.”
46014026	Ipe' alupipei, dei' basef amama akutaimi ae'ami mape na'ama. Nemaf anama pendowa'anima, presen anama hianai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasi'ipanai napoma ipe' hipei na'ama. Enin epen nenda' anona awaf, enin epen ni'i anom basef Godi niwalipipa, enin epen God nase'ana anom basefa nowalapam, ea' enin epen negawa ma ni'i anona diga, ea' enin epen negawa ma nemboma basef ma diga anama. Ipe' penda' amamaga amama hiami ma pigiambama esis amam nematawa Godi sotaga la'ifis.
46014027	I'i enis ukup mohafela si'i basefa anona diga, bias o wenis si'i basef atona etin. Ea' ma'um amama. Ea' ina sokolasa malogof si'i, owa'. Si'iam atona etin. Amama ea' ma'um. Ea' enin epen atitin nemboma basef amama.
46014028	Ea' i'i owa' enin epena nembomam, epen inima na'i nie'i basefa anona diga feso'man nepan ma basef amama maina nemaf sanda' lotuanai. Atuwasi enin etin ni'iam neloma God.
46014029	Ea' amam profet biam o wanom Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelama mowalapa basef Ananimi, amam mowalapam. Ea' anom amam mowaloga basef amama.
46014030	I'i enin epen tol nepe lotu neme' basefa God nihi'amban anom basefa epen inima, aman anama nali' naitu nawalapa basefi feso'mona nope.
46014031	Ipe' hipei Ambal Godi nafelepa pawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, ipe' pewalapam atona etin pi'iam deindei' ma epes hiesi seme'am okokomama monda'as sotaga la'ifis.
46014032	Emi egafis sofa' presen anama Ambal Godi nafelasa sowalapa basef ananimi si'i profet, sumafi presen anama andeande'.
46014033	Dei' main, God ina ofagenama sa'i basef mamumami, owa'. Anan nanda' waf bu'unai opalef etifim mape awanem. Wambel hiagoma esis amam nematawa Godi sondowa'anima sape,
46014034	awau nematawa ina witu wi'i basef, owa'. Awo feso'mawa ope etin. Sios amam nematawa Godi waf ea' anama atona. Nematawa ina ope uli'ma sios, owa'. Ope owin si'i mi'uli Godi na'iam.
46014035	I'i awo wi'i ogawa anom basef ofagema, atuwasi ofe'ma ifagw awaumi ohali' wauhupawa mi'ipawa. I'i ano'w nemata'w konda' basef ipe' sios pandakolas, waf anama ina andeande'.
46014036	Dei' a'i ihali'ipa. Ipe' ofagepama basef Godi? Ipe' etipa pefa' basef Godi ea' enis amam nematawa owa'? Owa'etin.
46014037	I'i emi egafis ukup mi'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafelasa sawalapa basef Godi si'i profet, o si'i esis sefa' anona presen bu'unai, esis sogawa basef amama dei' anda'mepami, amama mi'uli Dembinai.
46014038	I'i esis sindaiwa'ma basef amama, ipe' wapoti' pindaiwa'ma esis.
46014039	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ukup ipe'imi mohafel endilisi ma Ambal Godi nefelepa pewalapa basef ananimi si'i profet. Ea' ipe' ina pesopama eafa pie'i basefa diga naninani, owa'.
46014040	Nemaf anama ipe' amam nematawa pendowa'anima penda' lotu, ipe' penda' maol andeande'ma lotu ipe'inai notaga bo'ona.
46015001	Ipe' alupipei, dei' ae' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi wapoti' ma basef amama bu'wami Godi ali' a'ipipami. Ipe' pefa' basef amama atom dei' manda'epa pembale'ef paitu la'ifipa.
46015002	Ae' a'ipipa basef amama bu'wami. I'i ipe' pembale'am andeande', God nofa'epa pitanimani. I'i owa', pembale'am ina pailam.
46015003	Basef ali' ai'ipami, amama ae' fowa' ali' efa'ami. Amama na'ama. Krais naga'ma nakwaha awami ape' manda'ami, si'i Baibel fowa' na'iam.
46015004	Ea' esis sofa'ana salana hi'agif. Ama nimeguf biam mafe' ea' nafe'ma wanomi, God nafelona wapoti' si'i Baibel na'iam.
46015005	Ea' nali' natagama Pita ea' nagi' natagama alupumi aninimi 12-peleim.
46015006	Ea' nataga nandawalapa esis amam nematawa Kristen hiesi satolona, isima alupusi saila anan hiesi endilisi sikila' 500-peleis. Dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe', a'i alupusi isima hiesi dei' enis sape, enis saga' ea'.
46015007	Ea' natagama Jems natolona. Ea' natagama amam aposel hiami matolona.
46015008	Ea', ae' agi' endilisi atolona wapoti', natagama ae' si'i awani mama'wan kolan awen.
46015009	Dei' main, ae' si'i so'uso'win falafuwei la'afena amam aposel. Ae' ina dei' bo'awe ma epes sofale si'i ae' aposel, owa'. Dei' main, anda' maol ahambombaga amam nematawa Godi.
46015010	Ea' God atona okom nainaili nigiabame na'a nanda'e ape andeande'. Ea' dei' ae' ape. Anan nigiambame na'a, ae' anda' maol ape. Nanda'e la'ifiwi anda' maol Ananinai ikila' anom aposel. Ea' ina ae' atowe anda' maol, owa'. God nagiambame na'a, amama atom dei' ape anda' maol anama la'ela'ef.
46015011	Ea' basef amama, ae' anda'ana o amam aposel manda'ana, basef amama bu'wami atom. Afa' hiafai wawalipipam ea' amama atom ipe' pame'am pembale'efam.
46015012	Afa' la'ela'ef wawalapa basefa Krais naga' ma God nafelona nohafel wapoti'. Dei' maina ipe' enipa pa'i basef amama pa'i, “Epes saga'i ina anona nemaf sotanima sohafel wapoti', owa'.”?
46015013	Ipe' enipa pa'i endilisi esis saga'i ina sotanima sohafel, owa'. I'i basef ipe'imi endilisimi, Krais wapoti', God ina nafelona, owa'. Owa'etin.
46015014	I'i endilisi God owa' nofela Krais, dei' basef amama afa' wawalapami falafumi atom ea' waf ipe' pembale'efa Krais falafunai atona wafinai.
46015015	I'i na'ama, anom basef wapoti'. Dei' afa' otaga amam wambaso'ami wawalapa basef Godi. Dei' main, afa' wa'i basef alihim wawalapama God nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif wapoti'. Ea' i'i endilisi God owa' nofela saga'i, anan ina nafela Krais wapoti', owa'.
46015016	Ipe' enipa pa'i God ina nofela epes saga'i, owa'. I'i basef ipe'imi endilisimi, God ina nafela Krais wapoti', owa'etin.
46015017	I'i endilisi God owa' nofela Krais, dei' waf ipe' pembale'efa Krais ina la'ifina nigiambamepa, owa'. Falafunai atona. Dei' ipe' ata' papoma waf aonai la'ela'ef.
46015018	Ea' epes isima sape la'ifisi ma Kraisi saga'i, esis wapoti' hegililas hi'ilas.
46015019	Ape' mombale'efa Krais ea' mape mohafa Anan. I'i mombale'efana mope mohafana anae', nimeguf mape etap anae', mope aom endilisi mope migi'. Andeande'ma epes hiesi si'i uwahipis enis epes, ea' ape' mombale'efana si'i uwahipipa endilisi. Owa'etin.
46015020	Ina na'ama, owa'. Krais naga' dei' endilisi God nafelona nohafel wapoti'. Anan nohafel na'ama nali'ma epes saga'i si'i gwa'aimi mali' maof aofi.
46015021	Dei' main, anona aman atotona nali' nawalapai waf epes saga'i, ea' na'ama etin anona aman nagi' nawalapai eaf anama saga'i sohafel wapoti'.
46015022	Amamaga amama na'ama. Epes hiesi Adami hiesi saga'. Ea' na'ama etina epes isima hiesi sape la'ifisa Kraisi, anona nemaf God nonda'as sotanima sohafel wapoti' sofa' ambal namunai ma sope namusi.
46015023	Ape' epes hiapai atona etin mope mohafa nogota ape'inai. Aman nali'i, Anan Krais. Anan si'i gwa'aimi mali' maufi. Ea' nemaf anama notanima niefi'ianai, ape' hiapai ananipai mohafel wapoti'.
46015024	Ea' nemaf akutainai notaga ma amamaga hiami awami higililam hi'ilam. Nemaf anama Krais nohambombaga la'ifimi hiami mamumami bu'wami awami mape ilif etapi hi'ilam, ea' nose'apa la'ifimi ananimi ma numafi amamaga hiami mefe'ma Ahalomana God.
46015025	Dei' main, Krais nope Dembinai King nefe' nefe' notagama nemaf Anan nohagofa naumbih hiami mofe' owina bo'wagah ananimi.
46015026	Anan nili' nohagofa naumbih amama hiami ea' nigi' nohagofa ga' endilisi si'i nautamana ananinai nape nagi'i.
46015027	Dei' main, fowa' God na'iam na'ama na'i, “Anona nemaf ae' enda' amamaga hiami moloma epes hiesi wapoti' sefe' owina Anan.” Basef amama ma'i God nanda' amamaga hiami mefe' owina Krais atona. Ea' mogawa basef amama ma'i amamaga hiami amama ina ma'i God, owa'. Anan nanda' amamaga amama hiami mape owina Krais.
46015028	Nemaf anama amamaga amama hiami mefe' owina Krais hi'ilam, ea' Nogalomana Godi atotona nefe' owina Anan nali' nanda' amamaga amama mafe' owina Krais. Ea' God nope nili' endilisima amamaga hiami moloma epes hiesi wapoti'.
46015029	Enis epes sati waf bu'unai enis Kristen sanda'anai sape la'ifisa naumbih sahas saga' ea' epes isima satilis sombale'efa Krais sofa' baptais. I'i epes saga'i anona nemaf owa' sohafel wapoti', epes isima sofa' baptaisa epes sa'i anona nemaf sogawa sotaga sope si'imama? I'i endilisi ma epes saga'i anona nemaf owa' sohafel wapoti', dei maina isima sofa' baptaisa epes saga'i? Owa'etin.
46015030	Afa' wapoti', la'ela'ef enis epes sa'i sohambombagafa. I'i epes isima sa'i owa' sotanima sohafel, dei' maina afa' wanda'am wape na'ama? Owa'etin.
46015031	Alupipei endilisi, ae' andanifel ma pape la'ifipama Krais Jisas Dembinai ape'inai. Ea' anom basef wapoti' endilisimi atom si'i amama. Nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef ae' ape si'i aga'i.
46015032	Ae' ape Efesus, anda' wandaf aloma mafis mape aolupi lu'wami. Amama atuwasi efa' amamaga bu'wami i'imama? I'i endilisi esis saga'i owa' sotanima sohafel, si'i anom amam gawaimi ma'i, “Hapaisi, ape' mea' gwa'aimi moloma embela naman meaga'.”
46015033	Na'ama enis epes sombaso'mepa. Anom basef gawaimi ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “I'i mofe' moloma epes sanda' waf aonai, esis sohambambaga waf bu'unai ape'inai.”
46015034	Dei' ipe' pekwaha ukup amama masi'ipei, pitanimani ukup mopan andeande'. Ipe' ina penda' waf aonai wapoti', owa'. Ae' enda'epa ambagof aoma anom basef dei' a'ipipami. Enis epes ipe'isi ina dei' sogawa God endilisi, ata' owa' etin. Ofagema amama ipe' etipa.
46015035	Ea' anona aman atuwasi nohali' ae' na'ama ni'i, “Esis saga'i anona nemaf sohafel si'imama? Anona nemaf sofa' maina alop sohafel wapoti'?”
46015036	Anan nahali'ma basef na'ama okom nahaga nagaol. Dei' main, ape' mawa olelemb witim o amamaga, amama owa' meaga'i nambimb amama ina mope namum, owa'.
46015037	Amamaga amama mawami, amama ina mataga etifim si'i agof o soh maim, owa'. Ape' mawa nalelef atom o anom gwa'aimi.
46015038	Ea' God atona nanda' nalelef amama pepe'am mataga malo manda' soh afis maim magi' mataga mail si'i Anan atona okom na'i meataga. Ea' Anan atona nanda' lawah si'im maloma soh maima amamaga hiami ma gwa'aimi amama atona etin deindei'.
46015039	Alop hianai deindeiana ambagof mapainai ina etifina, owa'. Alop epesi anona alop, mafisi anona alop. Amigufi anona alop, agufi anona alop.
46015040	Ea' amamaga mape ilif heveni maloma mape etapi amama hiami mape. Ea' sosafa amamaga, sosaf naninani. Sosaf etapanai anona sosaf.
46015041	Aon alipunai anona sosaf, owambunai anona sosaf. Ondowa anona sosaf, ea' ondowa wapoti' hiami mamumami.
46015042	Waf epes sa'i sohafel wapoti', anama na'ama etin. Alop ape' dei' mawanai, anama nambimb aona folo'olana. Alop nohafel wapoti', anama ina anona nemaf aona, owa'. Nope bo'ona la'ela'ef.
46015043	Alop ape' mawanai, anama aona folo'olana. Alop notanima nohafel wapoti', anama bo'ona endilisi. Alop mawanai anama ina la'ifina, owa'. Alop nohafel wapoti', anan la'ifina.
46015044	Alop anama mawanai, etapanai. Ea' alop notanima nohafel wapoti', ilifanai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi numafiana. Alop anama biefina ilifanai etapanai nape.
46015045	Baibel wapoti' na'i, “Aman nali'i Adam nataga ambal namunai napaina.” Ea' Adam nagi' natagai nataga Ambal Bu'unai ma nase'as ambal namunai epes hiesi.
46015046	Ea' alop ilifanai ina nataga nali', owa'. Alop etapanai nataga nali'. Ea' alop anama ilifanai nataga nagi'.
46015047	Aman nali'i, God nanda' etap nanda'ana nataga ambal napaina. Ea' aman nagi' natagai, Anan aman ilifanai.
46015048	Ape' epes hiapai etapapai, ape' mandati na'ama etin si'i aman anama God nanda' etap nanda'anai. Ape' epes hiapai ilifapai anona nemaf motaga mundati na'ama etin si'i aman anama nafi'i heveni.
46015049	Dei' ata' mape si'i aman anama etapanai ea' anona nemaf mope na'ama etin si'i aman anama nafi'i heveni.
46015050	Ipe' alupipei, dei' a'ipipa basef amama bu'wami. Epes etapasi anona nemaf ina la'ifisa siowis wambel Godi, owa'. Amamaga etapami higililami ina anona nemaf la'ifima mope la'ela'ef, owa'.
46015051	-
46015052	Ipe' peme'! Dei' ae' a'i ewalapa anom basef mali' mape mandambahi'i ma ipe'. Anona nemaf ape' hiapai ina moga', owa'. Mehip alof akutainai nelef, ape' hiapai mondamboma moho'of mondati na'apa. Dei' main, alof anama nelef ea' esis saga'i sohafel, anona nemaf ina ata' soga' wapoti', owa'. Ea' mope etap anae' wapoti' mondamboma moho'of mondati na'apa.
46015053	Dei' main, alop anama mawanai anona nemaf notaga namona nope andeande' la'ela'ef.
46015054	Endilisi, alop anama mawanai anona nemaf notaga dambaina nope andeande' la'ela'ef. Ea' alop anama na'i anona nemaf nohafel nondati na'ana nofa' ambal namunai nope la'ela'ef. Nemaf anama anom basef Baibelimi motaga mondawalap ma'i, “God nahagofa ga' nikila' wandaf nanda'am hi'alam.”
46015055	“Ine', ga', pepel ine'inai enima? Ea' wamba'w ine'inai hi'elinai enima? Owa'etin.”
46015056	Wamba'w saga'manai nataga ma waf aonai ea' pepel ma waf aonai nataga na'ama. Ape' epes hiapai matopa' basefa mi'uli Godi hi'alapa. Amama atom dei' mi'uli anama nawalapai pepel ma waf aonai.
46015057	Ape' munifela God. Ama pepel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atona God nagiambamapa nanda'apa la'ifipa ma dei' mikila' wandafa muli'amona waf aonai.
46015058	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, pepe la'ifipa andeande'. Ina umbamehepa petambel, owa'. La'el'ef pepe la'ifipa penda' maol Dembinai. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa maol anama panda'ana ma Dembinai, ina anona nemaf nowala etin, owa'.
46016001	Dei' ae' anom basefa otamba ipe' pa'i pekolasoma peso' esis amam nematawa Godi. Ae' ali' ihi'ambas eaf sonda' maol anama ma esis Kristen Galesiaisi sandakolas deindei' ea' dei' a'i ipe' penda'am na'ama etin.
46016002	Sande nimeguf hiami ipe' hipei atona etin ukup mi'i otamba pefa'ama wik nali'i ea' pewaloga otamba amama pembe'am dende' ma ipe' pefa'am mo'oh dei pimafiam ifagw ipe'imi. Ama anona nemaf ipe' ina penda' maol lu'unai pegolopa otamba, owa'.
46016003	Anona nemaf ae' etagamepa, ipe' pendandepa anom amama mofa' otamba amama mofe' Jerusalem. Ama ae' i'ipama basef amoma mofa'am esapa'am mefe'.
46016004	I'i andeande'ma efe' wapoti', amam mofe' molome.
46016005	Anona nemaf ae' efo'o ili' ewala etap hiagoma Masedonia, ea' efo'o etagamepa. Dei' main, ae' okom na'i ata' ili' ewala etap hiagoma Masedonia efe'.
46016006	Ae' okom na'i ata' epe anom nimeguf elomepa. Ae' ina egawa, epe elomepa nimeguf ma'um nogota naoh mohafel lu'um ea' efe' maina wambel, ipe' pigiambame pimafi ma amamaga, pitumi pehapone eaf.
46016007	Ipe' pegawa ae' andaiwa'ma efo'o itilipa nogota bandana, owa'. I'i Dembinai ni'iam na'ama, a'i epe anom nimeguf elomepa.
46016008	Ea' ae' a'i epe na'ae Efesus efe' etagama nemaf anama Pentikos.
46016009	Dei' main, God nausi'ame eaf nagal alihina ma enda' maol bu'unai eloma amam nematawa hiesi samboma opalef sembale'efa God endilisi. Ea' hiesi sandaiwa'ma sonda' maol anama.
46016010	I'i Timoti nofo'o notagamaepa, ipe' pimafiana andeande' ma anan nope opaf bo'ona la'afena ipe'. Dei' main, anan nape nanda' maol Dembinai si'i ae' ape anda'ana.
46016011	Na'ama enin epen okom ni'i Timoti falafunai nese'ana alafuga, na'ama owa'. Ipe' penda' opaf ananinai nope awanena pese'ana amamaga pigiambamana pitumana pehaponana eaf ma opaf ananinai bo'ona nifi'mai ae'. Ae' epe ehafana noloma enis alupusi.
46016012	Basef sahalomapa ape'inai Apolos mape na'ama. Nimeguf hiami a'ipana a'i anan ata' nolomago anom alupumi ata' mofo'o mitiago ipe', ea' anan nandaiwa' endilisi ma nofo'o dei'. Nambimb anan niti Dembinai nonda' eaf, anan nofo'o.
46016013	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pitu la'ifipa pembale'efa Krais. Ipe' ina umbamehepa, owa'. Pitu la'ifipa.
46016014	Amamaga hiami ipe' penda'ami, ipe' ukup mimila God noloma epes hiesi.
46016015	Ipe' pegawa wambota Stefanasi sali' sataga Kristen sali'ma esis Grik hiesi. Ea' esis ukup ma'ima'i endilisi la'ela'efa sanda' maol sagiambama epes Godi. Alupipei, ae' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi
46016016	pepe owina epes isima soloma emi egafis sandao'oma sanda' maol anama.
46016017	Dei' ae' endanifel ma Stefanas naloma Fortunatus maloma Akaikus amam mafi'mai ae'. Dei' main, ipe' ina nambimb la'ifipama pifi'i na'ae, owa'. Amam dei' migiambame maho'ofepa mafi'mai ae'.
46016018	Amam manda' opaf ae'anai nape bo'ona magiambame ataga la'ifiwi ea' magiambama ipe' wapoti'. Ea' andeande'ma ipe' pefela agof amam na'amaimi.
46016019	Ea' amam nematawa Godi sape deindei' etap anama hiagoma Esia sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai. Akwila naloma Prisila saloma esis amam nematawa Godi sandakolas etifigin ipat asasinai, esis wapoti' sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai endilisi ma agel Dembinai.
46016020	Alupusi hiesi sape na'ae sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'. Waf amam nematawa Godi, ipe' hipei atona etin pese'ama lagof etin pelomago sahin owan ipe'isi.
46016021	Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagel ae'anai atona anda'mepago basef amama bandami atom. Ae' anda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'.
46016022	I'i emi egafis sendaiwa'ma soso' opalefa esis Dembinai, okom ae'anai a'i anona nemaf God nohambombagago epes isima hegililas. Dembinai ape'inai, ae' okom nohafel endilisi a'i ine' fi'i.
46016023	Ae' a'i okom Dembinai Jisasi nainaila ipe' nigiambamepa na'a nope nolomago ipe' nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa.
46016024	Ae' a'i okom lu'unai ae'anai nainaila ipe'i nefe'mago ipe' hipei palome mape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas.
47001001	Ae' Pol, God nandandepe aposel Krais Jisasi. Ae' aloma owalomapa Timoti wasapa'ago basef amama ma ipe' amam nematawa Godi pape Korin pelomago amam nematawa hiesi Godi si'isi sape anama hiagoma esis Grik sapoma.
47001002	Ae' a'i God Ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais migiambamepa na'a petaga la'ifipa monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
47001003	Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una, anan God Ahalomana Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Anan Ahalomapa ape'inai, ofagonama okom nainailapa nati ape' uwahipipa. Anan God nanda' opalef nimanimi ape' hiapai mape awanemi.
47001004	Nimanimi hiami matagamapa anan nanda'apa opalef mape awanem. Nanda'am ama dei' ape' wila ma monda' opalef epes isima nimanimi mamumami matagamasi mope awanem si'i God nali' nagiambamapa.
47001005	Nimanimi lu'wami Krais nali' nofa'ami dei' ape' wapoti' mofa'am. Ea' na'ama etin opaf awaninai lu'unai ananinai dei' nase'alepa.
47001006	I'i dei' enis epes sose'afa nimanimi, amama magiambamepa monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem anona nemaf God nokwahomepa waf aonai nofa'epa pitanimani. Nemaf anama God nonda' opalef afa'imi mope awanem, Anan nanda' opalef ipe'imi awanem wapoti' ma pitu la'ifipama pefa' nimanimi amama si'i afa' ofa'ami.
47001007	Afa' ogawa endilisi wa'i ipe' paitu la'ifipa. Dei' main, afa' ogawa ipe' pefa' nimanimi palomafa ea' na'ama etin anona nemaf pefa' opalef awanimi pelomafa wapoti'.
47001008	Ipe' alupipei, afa' wa'i ipe' ata' pegawa nimanimi enis epes sase'afam gani etap hiagoma Esia. Nimanimi amama lu'wami endilisi ea' mahagofa afa', mikila' pepel afa'inai. Ea' afa' ukup ma'i endilisi nambimb afa' oga'.
47001009	Wameme'ma nimanimi amama lu'wami ea' ogawa wa'i endilisi etis afa' oga'. Ea' amama matagamafa ma afa' ina ukup ma'i pepel afa'inai atona, owa'. Amama matagamafa ma afa' ukup mopoma pepel Godi atona, anama nafela epes saga'i.
47001010	Esis sase'afa nimanimi lu'wami sanda'afa aofa endilisi sa'i sohafa oga', ea' God nofa'afa otanimani. Ea' anona nemaf nigiambamafa wapoti'. Ukup afa'imi la'ifim ombale'efana endilisi ma anona nemaf nigiambamafa ma anom nimanimi lu'wami wapoti'.
47001011	Ama dei' beten ipe' panda'mafanai etin, God nonda'mafam na'ama. Ea' God nambimb nogwa beten amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai ma anan nofalo'mafa nigiambamafa na'a. Ama atuwasi amam nematawa hiesi ukup mopoma afa' ma sinifela Goda amamaga amama anan nanda'ami.
47001012	Afa' wandanifel ma amamaga amama. Basef mape opalef ape'imi nomon mawalapa basef amama ma'ipafa wafe' waf bu'unai andeande' ma waf opalef bu'wami God naso' afa'. Gawa epes etapasi ina nawalapa waf anama ma afa', owa'etin. God nati uwahipifa endilisi nagiambamafa na'a dei' wanda' waf na'ama. Wanda' waf anama na'ama la'afena epes hiesi sape etap anae' ea' wanda'am na'ama hianai ma ipe'.
47001013	-
47001014	Afa' ina wanda' anom basef ahifimi ma ipe', owa'. Wanda'am dende' si'i ipe' pitalifam pegawami. Dei' ipe' ina pegawa waf afa'inai andeande', ata' owa'. Ea' ae' okom na'i ipe' anona nemaf pegawa endilisi waf afa'inai hianai. Nemaf anama Dembinai Jisasi, ipe' pendanifela afa' na'ama etin si'i afa' anona nemaf ondanifel ma ipe'.
47001015	Ae' egawa endilisi basef ali' a'ipipami ma waf bu'unai ipe'inai. Ea' fowa' ali' anda' okom na'i efe'mago ipe' igiambamepa bifa ata' pegawa waf Godi wapoti'. Ea' ae' ina afo'o.
47001016	Ae' okom na'i ata' ili' efe'mepago ea' ekwahipa efe' etap hiagoma Masedonia ma nambimb ekwaha Masedonia etanimai ifi'mipai wapoti' ma pigiambame pesapa'e efe' etap hiagoma Judia.
47001017	Ipe' pa'i maim basef? Ae' a'iam ea' ma enda'am na'ama, ea' aho'ofa basef amama anda' dambaimi maho'ofam? O i'i ae' okom ni'i enda' anom amamaga, moho'ofam i'i basef biefim “A'e” neloma “Owa'” wapoti' si'i epes etapasi sa'iam? Owa'etin.
47001018	God anan nanda' amamaga andeande' na'i endilisi. Basef hiami afa' wasi'ipami endilisimi atom na'ama etin. Afa' ina wa'i anom basef biefim, “A'e” naloma “Owa'” mape etifigin, owa'etin.
47001019	Nogalomana Godi Jisas Krais, ae' aloma Sailas waloma Timoti wawalapa basef ananimi, anan ina na'i na'ama na'i, “A'e” naloma “Owa'” atom, owa'. Krais na'i a'e etin.
47001020	Basef God na'iami ofagema mandawalap ma'i Krais atona, anan na'i a'e etin. Amama atom dei' ape' ma'i agel Jisas Kraisi atona ea' ma'i, “Endilisi” ma basef amama God na'i endilisimi atom mafela agel ananinai lu'una.
47001021	-
47001022	God atona nanda'afa wataga la'ififa, ipe' wapoti', ea' mape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais. Anan nanda'mapa ikwaf ananinai ape' nosahe'apa ma mope ananipai atepa ea' nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nomon opalef ape'imi. Ambal anama God nase'apanai nali' ma amamaga tu'wanim hiami bu'wami God na'i anona nemaf nease'apami.
47001023	Ae' a'i basef endilisimi atoma naep Godi. Ae' andaiwa' ma ese'epa nimanimi ipe'. Na'ama fowa' ae' ina afo'o Korin, owa'.
47001024	Afa' ina wape wali'ma wihi'ambepa waf ipe' pembale'efa God, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' etipa paitu la'ifipa pembale'efana. Ea' dei' afa' wanda' maol walomepa ma onda'epa pendanifel.
47002001	Okom ae'anai a'iam endilisi na'ama a'i, ae' ina ata' etanima efe'mago ipe' wapoti' enda' opalef ipe'imi nimanim, owa'.
47002002	I'i enda' opalef ipe'imi nimanim, emi egafis sonda'e endanifel? Owa'etin. Ipe' etipa, ea' anda' ukup ipe'imi aom.
47002003	I'i ipe' pendanifel, andeande'. Waf anama bu'unai. Ea' i'i ae' efo'o ma penda' opaf ae'anai nimanina, na'ama andaiwa'. Ea' amama atom fowa' ali' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'. Dei' main, ae' egawa ipe' endilisi na'ama. I'i ae' endanifel epe, ipe' hipei wapoti' pendanifel.
47002004	Endilisi anda'mepago basef amama ma nemaf anama opaf ae'anai ame' nimanimi lu'wami ea' alef hihif. Ae' ina anda' basef amama ma mese'epa opalef nimanim, owa'. Anda'ama ipe' pegawa ae' okom nainailipa endilisi.
47002005	I'i enin epen ofagena nenda' opaf nimaninai netaga, enin ina nanda' opaf ae'anai atona nimanina, owa'. Enin nanda' ipe' hipei opalef nimanim wapoti'. Ae' a'i basefa ipe' hipei ea' enipa owa'. Ina a'ipipa. Andaiwa' ma i'i basef la'ifimi endilisi ma waf aonai anan nanda'anai, owa'. Amama atom dei' a'iam na'ama ma enipa owa'.
47002006	Nimanimi ipe' epes hipei pese'anami ea' mandahama anan.
47002007	Ea' dei' penda' anona wafa anan. Andeande'ma pekwaha waf aonai ananinai pigiambamana notaga la'ifina penda' opaf ananinai awanena. Na'ama nimanimi lu'wami endilisi monda' okom ananinai aona ea' nokwaha Dembinai.
47002008	Amama atom dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi pihi'amba anan ipe' ukup maimailana.
47002009	Fowa' anda' basef amama mail okwatip a'ipipago ma egawa waf ipe'inai. Anda'am na'ama a'i egawa ipe' paila basef ae'ami la'ila'ef o owa'?
47002010	I'i ipe' pekwaha waf aonai enin epen nanda'anai, endilisi ae' wapoti' ekwahomanana. Waf anama aonai akwahanai okom ae'anai na'i na'ama. Ae' ina egawa okom Kraisi na'i na'imama, ea' i'i andeande'ma ae' ekwahomanana naep Kraisi, ekwahomanana endilisi ma igiambamepa pepe andeande'.
47002011	Ae' anda'am na'ama ma Satan ina anona nemaf nombaso'mapa nikila'apa, owa'. Dei' main, afa' ogawa okom ananinai nambaso'ami.
47002012	Fowa' Dembinai nanda' eaf nafe' ae' afe' ataga wambel Troasa awalapa basef bu'wami Kraisi.
47002013	Ea' opaf ae'anai ina nape awanena, owa'. Dei' main, ae' ina ata' ati owalome ae'anai Taitus, owa'. Ea' akwaha esis Troas afi'i ataga anona etap hiagoma Masedonia.
47002014	Ea' dei' afa' wanifela God. Anan la'ela'ef nagiambamafa wape la'ififa waloma Krais ea' wali'amona wandafa waf aonai. Ama maol afa'inai God nawalapa basef ea' enis epes sogawa basef Kraisi. Gawa anama anan si'i alogw bu'wami ma mafe'agon hiagoma.
47002015	Endilisi afa' si'i alogw bu'wami ma mataga Krais mafe'ma God. Alogw amama mafe' la'afena epes isima dei' God nakwahomas waf aonai nofa'as sotanimani, isima sape eaf nafe' heveni saloma isima sape eaf higililasanai wapoti'.
47002016	Ama wambota anama epes sape eaf higililasanai, alogw amama hi'apimi si'i saga'i. Ea' wambota anama sape eaf nafe' heveni, alogw amama bu'wami mase'as ambal namunai. Ea' dei' afa' ukup ma'i maol anama Godi wa'i ina enis epes la'ifisa onda'ana, owa'. Ea' afa' la'ififa wanda'ana.
47002017	Dei' main, afa' ina si'i enis epes hiesi safe'agon hi'alagona sanda' maola basef Godi ma sofa' amamaga asasimi atom, owa'. Afa' wanda' maol anama Godi na'ama. Afa' ina wambaso'am etina maol Godi, owa'. Afa' wanda'am waila eaf bu'unai atona hi'alana, wape la'ififa waloma Krais. God nasapa'afa wafi'i wawalapa basef mafe' andeande'ma naep ananimi.
47003001	Basef amama do'okimi ipe' pa'i afa' wafela agof afa'imi atom lu'una wapoti' si'i anom amam mambaso'mepa manda'am? O pa'i afa' owa' la'ififa wanda'am si'i amama ose'epa anom basef mail pasi enis epes sanda'ami ma sefela agof afa'imi? O ipe' wapoti' nambimb penda' anom basef mil pasa pigiambamafa? Owa'etin.
47003002	Basef mail pasi sefela agof afa'imi si'i ipe' etipa. Basef amama mail la'ifim nomon ukup afa'imi. Ama epes hiesi sotalifam sogawam.
47003003	Ipe' pandawalap alihipa, pas amama ea' ipe' etipa. Krais atona nanda' basef maila pas amama. Anan nandandepafa nase'afa pas amama wafo'o wasi'ipami. Anan ina nanda' ing nufandiam, owa'. Anan nufandiama Ambal Bu'unai God nape namunai. Anan ina nufandiam mail anona owap wa'anai si'i buk, owa'. Nufandiam mail ukup ipe'imi nomon.
47003004	Basef amama ofagema na'ama. Krais nagiambamafa endilisi ea' ombele'ef la'ififa ma God wape na'ama.
47003005	Endilisi afa' atofa ina la'ififa ma onda' maol anama, owa'. God atona nanda'afa la'ififa ma wanda' maol anama ananinai.
47003006	Ea' anan atona nanda'afa la'ififa ma wanda' maola eaf basef dambaimi God na'i endilisimi atom. Basefa mi'uli anama ina sanda'am mail pas atom, owa'. Amama Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nawalapami. Basef sanda'am mail pas atom maha epes saga', ea' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nanda'as sofa' ambal namunai sope namis.
47003007	God nanda' basef amama fowa'imi ma mi'uli Ananinai mail otam wa'anai si'i buk. Maol Godi amam manda'ami, amama matagama ga' naloma nafifili ananinai bu'unai wapoti'. Nali' damba damba nafifili anama nanda' amaga Mosesi nafifil endilisi. Ea' nagi' nataga so'uso'una. Anama la'ifinai endilisi ma esis Israel ina la'ifisa siti amaga ananinai, owa'.
47003008	Ea' nafifiil ma maol Godi Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nanda'anai lu'una endilisi nikila' anama fowa'inai.
47003009	Maol fowa'inai nawaloga epes hegilolas, anama nawalapai nafifili Godi. Ea' maol anama dei'inai nanda' epes sataga bo'wes ea' God na'i esis bo'wes andeande'. Maol anama dei' nawalapai nafifili ananinai lu'una endilisi nikila' anama nali'i.
47003010	Endilisi, nafifili fowa'inai ina nafe' na'ama etin si'i dei'inai, owa'. Fowa'inai falafunai atona ea' dei'inai lu'unai nikila' endilisi.
47003011	Maol anama dei' na'i hegililonai, anama fowa' nataga naloma nafifili Godi. Ea' nafifili dei'inai ma maol anama nape la'ela'ef lu'una endilisi nikila' anama nali'i.
47003012	Afa' wanda' maol Godi ogawa basef amama dambaimi God na'iam endilisimi atom ea' wape ohafa nahafifili anama anona nemaf notagamafa. Ea' afa' ina umbamahafa, owa'. Afa' la'ififa endilisi.
47003013	Afa' ina wape si'i Moses, owa'. Anan nawala lowaf amaga ananinai nambaho'ana ma esis Israel ina siti nafifili anama nefe' so'uso'umbela hi'ilana, owa'.
47003014	Ea' ukup asasimi mase'as endilisi. Dei' main, esis la'ela'ef satalifa basef mail Baibeli fowa' God na'i endilisimi atom. Nemaf mamana satalifa basef amama, lowaf anama wa'anai nape amaga Mosesi ata' nape la'ela'ef nasopama ukup asasimi nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Ina nandatagah, owa'. Ama Krais atona, God nahape' lowaf anama.
47003015	Fowa' satalifa basef Moses nanda'ami safi'i sataga dei', lowaf anama ata' nase'ala opalef asasimi la'ela'ef.
47003016	Ea' emi egafis somboma opalef sefe'ma Dembinai, dei' lowaf anama nendatagah.
47003017	Dembinai anama anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi. I'i Ambal Dembinai nope enin epen, ina ata' anom amamaga mili'akwa enin, owa'. Enin nape wafifin.
47003018	Ea' ape' hiapai dei' mape amagah wafimi, nafifili bu'unai Dembinai nafifima ape', ape' mififima enis epes. Ape' mape na'ama dei' Ambal Bu'unai Godi naho'ofa waf ape'inai ea' mandati si'i Dembinai ma nafifili anama nataga lu'una la'ela'ef nafe' etin nape. Amama mataga Dembinai atona, anan Ambal Bu'unai Godi.
47004001	God na'i afa' uwahipifa dei' nase'afa maol anama. Ea' dei' afa' ina otanima ma maol anama, owa'.
47004002	Afa' owa' alafugah ma waf ambagof awami sandambaho' sanda'ami. Ina ata' wape wafe' waf anama baso'mainai oho'ofa waf ombaso'masa basef Godi wa'iam, owa'. Afa' wawalapa basef endilisimi alihima naep Godi ma epes hiesi seme'am sogawa basef mape opalef asasimi nomon ma'iami.
47004003	I'i basef amama bu'wami Godi wawalapami mondambaho', mandambaho'ma epes isima safe' eaf hegilalasanai.
47004004	God baso'omunai ma etap anae' nasopama opalefa epes isima owa' sembale'efa Godi. Ama basef amama bu'wami ofagema ma nafifili Kraisi ina muwis nomona opalef asasimi, owa'. Esis ina sati Krais nandati na'a si'i God, owa'.
47004005	Dei' main, afa' ina wawalapa basefa afa' ofela agof afa'imi lu'um, owa'. Afa' wawalapama Krais Jisas atona anan Dembinai. Afa' waila waf Jisasi dei' agof a'afa wape owina ipe' wanda' maol wagiambamepa.
47004006	Fowa' gani God nati owamb atona na'i, “Lala notaga.” Dei' na'ama etin nanda' nafifili ananinai nataga ma afa' nanda' opalef afa'imi mafifil endilisi. Nafifili anama nihi'ambapa gawa ma nafifili pepel Godi nape la'ela'ef. Ape' mati anama ma waf Jisas Kraisi nafifili nataga amaga ananinai.
47004007	Ea' amamaga amama bu'wami nafifili naloma pepel Godi, anama nape opalef afa'imi nomon, afa' si'i maloh sanda' etap sanda'ami. Ama mihi'amba epes hiesi sogawa pepel anama Godi atona. Afa' owa'.
47004008	Fe' pe waf afa'inai fowa' dei' wapoti' nape na'ama. Anama hiagoma wafe'ma la'ela'ef nimanimi matagamafa, ea' amam ina mahambombagafa endilisi, owa'. Amamaga hiami masopama ukup afa'imi, ea' ukup afa'imi ina higilalam hi'alam, owa'.
47004009	Enis epes sahafa sanda'afa aofa, ea' God ina nakwahofa, owa'. Esis sahafa hihif owa wa'oh etap, owa'etin. Ina afufa endilisi, owa'.
47004010	La'ela'ef afa' ofa' nimanimi ma ga' Jisasi alop afa'inai wafe'. Wanda'am na'ama ma ambal namunai nape Jisasi wapoti' notaga alihina alop afa'inai.
47004011	Dei' main, afa' wanda' maol Jisasi. Amama atom dei' nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef enis epes sa'i sohafa ofa' nimanimi oga'. Sanda'afa na'ama ma ambal namunai nape Jisasi notaga nondawalap alop afa'inai.
47004012	Ea' dei' epes isima sa'i sohafa oga' ma ipe' pembale'efanai pefa' ambal namunai pepe andeande'.
47004013	Baibel na'i, “Ae' embale'efa God. Amama atom dei' awalapa basef alihim a'iam.” Afa' wambale'efa God na'ama etin si'i Baibel na'i dei' wawalapa basef wa'iam.
47004014	Dei' main, afa' ogawa God nafela Dembinai Jisas nohafel hi'agif, anan nofela ape' wapoti' moloma Jisas ea' nofa' afa' oloma ipe' nokolasepa atogon mofe' mope felefele' molomana.
47004015	Amamaga amama nimanimi hiami matagamafa ma wigiambamapa. Afa' wafe' wa'ipasa basef God nigiambamas na'a mefe' motaga la'ela'ef mefe'agon hi'ilagon. Ea' esis sonda' beten sinifela God sefela agel ananinai lu'una.
47004016	Afa' ukup mapoma amama dei' ina otanima ma maol Godi, owa'. Endilisi, pepela alop afa'inai la'ela'ef na'i nowafa hi'ilana. Ea' opalef afa'imi mataga dambaim wapoti' nimeguf hiami hihif.
47004017	Nimanimi amama matagamafai amama sa'osa'om endilisi ea' mape nogota bandana. Nimanimi amama anona nemaf mowalapai nafifili bu'unai endilisi gani heven la'ela'ef hihif. Pe anama bu'unai anona nemaf nikila' endilisi nimanimi amama so'umi dei'imi.
47004018	Dei' main, afa' ina wati la'ifipa amamaga satolom naepi, owa'. Amamaga owa' seatolom naepi, watolom la'ififa. Dei' main, amamaga satolom naepi, amama anona nemaf mope nogota bandana. Ea' amamaga amama owa' seatolom naepi, amama mape la'ela'ef hihif.
47005001	Dei' afa' ogawa na'ama. Nemaf anama ipat anama sowalo' selanai sanda'ana etap anae' nondatal aona, ea' hapainai. Afa' anona ipat God na'i nose'afanai dambainai. Ipat anama epes ina sanda'ana sala'ana lagof asasimi, owa'. Anama napani heven ea' notawa la'ela'ef hihif.
47005002	Dei' afa' wape alop afa'inai si'i ipat notawa etap anae', ea' opalef nimanim wape. Afa' ukup ma'ima'i endilisi ma ipat anama afa'inai nape heveni ma anona nemaf nose'ala alop afa'inai si'i luwaguf.
47005003	I'i afa' ola luwaguf amama, alop afa'inai ina anona nemaf nope wafina, owa'.
47005004	Nimeguf hiami afa' ata' wape etap anae' wape la'ela'ef hihifa ipat anama sowalo' selanai ea' opalef nimanim alop atona wafina wape. Afa' ina wandaiwa'ma okwaha alop dei'inai, owa'. Afa' wa'i undausa alop dambainai si'i luwaguf ama alop anama na'i naga'i anona nemaf nondamboma notaga ambal namunai endilisi.
47005005	God atona nandondombafa ma ofa' alop anama dambainai ea' nase'afa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Ambal anama nali'ma amamaga amama hiami nanda'ami ma na'i anona nemaf nose'afam afa' ea' ogawa endilisi anona nemaf nose'afam.
47005006	Ea' dei' amamaga amama la'ela'ef manda' opalef afa'imi motaga la'ifim. Afa' ogawa alop afa'inai ata' si'i ifagw afa' wapeimi. Ama nogota anae' wape alop anae', ina dei' wape waloma Dembinai ma wambel ananinai, ata' owa'.
47005007	Dei' ata' ombale'efana wafe'. Afa' ina dei' watolona, ata' owa'.
47005008	Ea' afa'ogawa opalef afa'imi mape la'ifim, ukup mohafel endilisi ma okwaha alop dei'inai ofe' ope oloma Dembinai wambel afa'inai.
47005009	I'i ope olomana ilif o ope etap anae', hapaimi. Afa' la'ela'ef ukup mali' mahafel la'ififa wila okom Dembinai atona.
47005010	Ape' mogawa endilisi anona nemaf ape' hiapai motaga ma kot anama Kraisi. I'i ape' monda' waf bu'unai o waf aonai nogota anama ata' mape alop ape'inai. Owagama ape' hiapai atona etin mofa' amamaga amama bu'wami o awami mogwama waf anama ape' manda'anai.
47005011	Afa' umbamahafa ma Dembinai. Amama atom dei' wanda' maola wafela nomonas epesi ma sembale'efana. Naep Godi afa' wape alihifa ea'. Ae' okom na'i na'ama a'i waf afa'inai nandawalap alihina basef mape opalef ipe'imi nomon ma'iami.
47005012	Basef amama afa' ina wa'i ofela agof afa'imi atoma ipe' pi'i afa' amam bu'ufai, owa'. Wa'i onda' eafa ipe' pendanifela afa' ma naep enis epesi. Wanda'am na'ama ma ipe' la'ifipa ma pegwamasa basef epes isima sandagala ma enis epes etina alop atona owa' sendanifela waf bu'unai asasinai.
47005013	I'i endilisi afa' ope si'i ukup mahaga magaoli, hapaifai. Afa' wanda'am na'ama ma ofela agel Godi. I'i endilisi afa' ukup mopomas andeande', afa' wanda'am na'ama ma wagiambamepa.
47005014	Okom Kraisi nainailapai nafelafa ma maol amama. Dei' main, afa' ukup ma'i mogawa endilisi na'ama. I'i aman atotona noho'ofa ape' hiapai ma naga', amama si'i ape' hiapai maga' ea'.
47005015	Ea' anan naho'ofa ape' hiapai naga' ma ape' epes mope namepa ma ina ukup motamea ma ape' atepa, owa'. Ape' ukup ma'i aman anama naho'ofapa naga' ma notanima nohafel wapoti', ukup ma'i maol ananinai la'ela'ef.
47005016	Amama atom dei' afa' ina ata' waila opaf apinai wawaloga waf enin epeni, owa'. Endilisi, fowa' waila wafa opaf apinai wawaloga Krais na'ama. Ea' dei' owa'.
47005017	Emi egafis sope soloma Kraisi, God nanda' esis sataga dambais endilisi. Dei' peme' andeande'. Waf anama apinai asasinai hi'alana. Dei' saila waf dambainai.
47005018	God atona ofagonama waf anama epes sataga dambais. Fowa' ape' ata' mape naumbih malomana, ea' Krais nataga nanda'apa mape opalef etifim maloma God. Ea' God nase'afa maol anama ma wigiambama anona onda' esis naumbih ananisi sotaga opalef etifim solomana.
47005019	Basef afa'imi na'ama. Krais atona God nanda' maol nanda' epes hiesi sakwaha waf naumbihinai sataga opalef etifim salomana. Anan ina ata' okom na'i waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'. Ea' nase'afa maol anama ma owalapa basef ananimi ma nonda' esis naumbih sotaga opalef etifim solomana.
47005020	Ea' afa' dei' ofa' malogel Kraisi wawalapa basef ananimi. Amama na'ama etin. God atona nofala epes hiesi ma basef la'ifimi malogof afa'imi. Ea' waho'ofa Krais wa'ipas na'ama wa'i, “Ipe' pekwaha waf naumbihinai ma petaga opalef etifim peloma God.”
47005021	Aman anama ina nanda' waf aonai ea' God nakolasa awami ape'imi hiami mafe'ma anan atona ea' ofagema ape'imi mapoma anan atona nofa'am. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais mefa' waf ananinai bu'unai.
47006001	Afa' wanda' maol Godi wandao'oma walomana. Dei' wa'ipipa basef la'ifimi na'ama wa'i, “God nagiambamepa na'a. Na'ama ipe' ukup mose'epa waf anama nagiambamepa na'a, owa'.”
47006002	Peme'. God na'i na'ama na'i, “Nemaf ae' ati uwahipipanai anama ame' basef ipe'imi. Nemaf anae' ae' agiambamepa a'i efa'epa petanimani.” Peme'! Dei' God nati uwahipipa. Dei' God na'i, “Ae' ekwahomepa waf aonai efa'apa pitanimani.”
47006003	Afa' wandaiwa'ma epes si'ipafa basef awami ma maol Godi afa' wanda'anai. Amama atom dei' wandaiwa'ma onda' anom amamaga ma waf aonai monda' enis sondasisi'ip sowa, owa'.
47006004	Ea' la'ela'ef wihi'amba epes hiesi wanda' maol Godi. Dei' wihi'ambas na'ama. Waitu la'ififa endilisi ma nimanimi mamumami ma amamaga ma'i mohambombagafa.
47006005	Esis sahafa sanda'afa wanda' kalabus. Esis naumbih sanda'afa aofa sa'ipafa awagon. Afa' wanda' maol lu'unai endilisi. Ina wa' gwa'aimi wape wa'oh andeande', owa'.
47006006	Wanda' waf bu'unai ea' wahapila gawa bu'unai, opalef awanem waitu la'ififa ma nimanimi. Wanda' waf bu'unai ma enis epes. Ofa' pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi, wanda' waf anama endilisi ma ukup maimaila enis epes wagiambamas. Ina wa'i basef malogof atom, owa'.
47006007	Wawalapa basef endilisimi wanda' maol waloma pepel Godi. Afa' waila waf bu'unai si'i wahapila amamaga wapa'ami lagof biam da'isinai iganai.
47006008	Enis epes safela agof afa'imi ea' enis sandaha basefafa. Enis sa'i basef awami sa'i sase'afa alafugah ea' enis sa'ipasa basef enis epesa waf bu'unai afa' wanda'anai. Esis ukup ma'i sa'i afa' epes wambaso'ami ea' esis etis epes sambaso'ami. Afa' wa'i endilisi.
47006009	Wanda'am na'ama, ina enin epen negawa afa', ea' hiesi sogwafa. Afa' si'i epes waga'i, ea' owa'etin. Afa' ata' wape namofa. God ata' nahafa bolam nanindinafa, wandanifel ea' anan ina nahafa afufa, owa'.
47006010	Afa' opalef nimanim endilisi, ea' la'ela'ef wandanifel. Wape si'i isima amamaga a'asi kwahusi ea' wase'asa amamaga afa'imi ma epes hiesi. Afa' amamaga a'afa si'i isima kwahusi, ea' waf bu'unai Godi nihi'ambafa wape si'i amamaga hiamifai.
47006011	Ipe' Korin alupipei, ae' a'i basef hiami bu'wami mape okom ae'anai awalapama ipe' alihim hi'alam, ae' okom nainailipa endilisi si'i alupisi ae'asi.
47006012	Ae' ina opaf aona ma ipe' esambalipa, owa'. Ae' okom nainailipa endilisi. Ea' ipe' opalef aoma afa. Ea' ina mape opalef etifim endilisi, owa'.
47006013	Dei' ae' ahalomepa, ipe' si'i awasi ae'ipei. Ipe' ukup mimili si'i ae' okom nainailipa endilisi.
47006014	Epes isima owa' sombale'efa Godi, ipe' ina pelomas pepe pefe' etifigin atogon, owa', hapaisi. Dei' main, waf anama bu'unai ina nape etifigin naloma waf anama sosambala basef Godi, owa'. Dei' maina owambi alip mandakolas etifigin? Owa'etin.
47006015	Pa'i Krais naloma Satan mape mefa' ukup etifim? Owa'etin. Dei' epes isima sembale'efa Godi saloma epes isima owa' sombale'efa Godi sofa' nomonas etifim, anona nemaf esis sonda' maina waf? Owa'etin. Ina sanda' anona waf bu'unai, owa'.
47006016	Dei' a'ipipa basef amama afela ukup ipe'imi. Ea' ina andeande'ma mokolasa ipat lu'unai Godi noloma amamaga baso'maimi sanda'am sanda' lotumami, owa'. Ipe' pegawa ape' atepa si'i ipat anama God napainai nomon. Si'i fowa' Anan na'iam na'i, “Owagama ae' epe elomas efe' la'afena esis ea' epe God asasiwei ea' esis wapoti' sepe epes ae'asi.”
47006017	Ea' Dembinai na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ipe' pekwaha esis pefe' pepe anagon. Ea' ipe' ina pihapila amamaga alugumi awami, owa'. Ama atuwasi ese'epa opaf ae'anai efa'epa petanimani.
47006018	Ama epe Ahalomepa ipe'iwei ipe' pepe awasi amam nematawa ae'ipei. Dembiwei ofagewema pepel hianai a'iam na'ama.”
47007001	Ipe' alupipei afa'ipei endilisi, ape' mofa' basef amama Godi endilisimi la'ifimi. Ea' mokwaha amamaga amama awami mape nomona alop naloma ambagof ape'imi ea' mope bu'upai umbamahepama God mila waf bu'unai.
47007002	Ipe' dei' pese'afa opalef ipe'imi. Afa' ina wanda' enin epen ipe'ini awen o wahambombaga enin, ola'ipa enin epena amamaga ananimi, owa'.
47007003	Ae' awalapa basefa ipe', ina a'ipipa a'i ofagema ipe'imi atom, owa'. Ae' a'iam a'i afa' wase'epa opalef afa'imi ipe'. Wanda'am na'ama ma i'i ipe' pega', afa' oga' olomepa. I'i pepe namipa, afa' wapoti' ope namofa olomepa.
47007004	Ae' okom na'i endilisi ipe' pape andeande'. Andanifel endilisi ma ipe'. Nimanimi hiami matagama ae' ea' okom ae'anai nape naloma ipe', amama atom dei' manda' opaf ae'anai nape awanena andanifel endilisi.
47007005	Fowa' afa' wafi'i otaga etap hiagoma Masedonia, alop afa'inai ina napoma noma'w owa'. Nimanimi mamumami hiami matagamafa, sa'i basef la'ifimi safitap salomafa. Ea' umbamahafa ukup matamea.
47007006	Ea' God nanda' epes isima opalef nimanimi sataga laifis nasapa' Taitus natagamafa nanda'afa wataga la'ififa.
47007007	Ina Taitus atona natagamafa dei' God nanda'afa la'ififa, owa'. Ipe' panda' Taitus nataga la'ifina, amama atom dei' God nanda'afa wataga la'ififa wapoti'. Taitus na'ipafa na'i ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi ma pa'i petolowe ea' opalef ipe'imi malefa fowa' pase'e nimanimi ae'. Ea' ukup ipe'imi mohafel endilisi ma pepe opalef etifim pelome. Amama atom dei' andanifel endilisi ikila' fowa'.
47007008	Endilisi ae' egawa basefa pas anda'am mali' mafo'o manda' opalef ipe'imi aom, ea' ae' ina opaf aona ma amama, owa'. Endilisi, fowa' ae' okom nimanina ea' dei' owa'etin. Ae' egawa pas amama manda' opalef ipe'imi nimanim, ea' amama nogota bandana atona.
47007009	Ea' dei' ae' andanifel. Ina andanifel ma basefa pas amama manda' ukup ipe'imi nimanim, owa'. Ae' andanifel ma amama manda'epa pamboma opalef pafe'ma God. Ae' egawa God atona nawalapai nimanimi amama ipe'imi ma nagiambamepa. Dei' ipe' pegawa afa' ina wanda'epa aopa, owa'.
47007010	Waf Godi na'ama. Nimanimi maim anan nawalapami manda'apa mamboma opalef mafe'ma anan nokwahomapa waf aonai nofa'apa motanimani. Ea' mape andeande'. I'i opalef nimanima waf etapanai, anama aonai nawalapai waf saga' safe' wambel aonai.
47007011	Ipe' ukup mi'i andeande' ma nimanimi amama ipe'imi. God nanda'am mawalapai waf bu'unai naninani hianai ma ipe'. Amama mafelepa pahafel ulala pekwaha waf aonai ipe'inai. Ipe' ambagof aoma epen inima ipe'ini nanda' waf aonai, amama atom dei' umbamehepama basef a'ipipama okom wandafunai Godi. Opalef ipe'imi malef endilisi ma pa'i petolowe ea' la'ifipama pegalo'ma epes isima sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' pagalo'ma epen inima napani laogon. Panda'am na'ama ma pihi'amba epes hiesi waf aonai ofagena a'epa ma amamaga mali' matagamapei.
47007012	Ea' endilisi fowa' anda'mepago amefa basef amama mail okwatipi ae' ina okom na'i epen inima nanda' waf aonai, a'i inima nefa' nimanimi ma waf anama, owa'. Ae' a'i waf ipe'inai notaga nondawalap alihina ma naep Godi ma pegawana andeande' na'ama. Ipe' ukup maimailafa endilisi. Amama atom ae' fowa' anda'mepago basef amama.
47007013	Waf anama ipe'inai nanda'afa wandanifel nanda'afa wataga la'ififa. Ea' ina afa' atofa wandanifel, owa'. Taitus wapoti' nandanifel endilisi. Dei' main, ipe' hipei panda' ambal ananinai napoma noma'w. Afa' wati amama atom, wandanifel endilisi.
47007014	Nimbewa' afela agof ipe'imi lu'uma naep Taitusi ea' dei' ae' ina ambal aona ma waf anama, owa'. Basef hiami afa' wa'ipipami amama endilisimi. Ea' na'ama etin basef afa' wali' wafela agof ipe'imi ma naep Taitusi, amama wapoti' mataga mafe' alihim, amama endilisimi.
47007015	Fowa' anan nali' nafe'mago ipe', ipe' hipei pase'ana opalef paila basef ananimi umbamahepa ma pesambalom. Anan okom nape na'i amama la'ela'ef dei' okom ananinai nainailipa endilisi.
47007016	Dei' ae' andanifel endilisi ma egawa ipe' hipei panda' waf hianai andeande' la'ela'ef.
47008001	Ipe' alupipei, dei' a'i i'ipipa ma pegawa waf esis sios Kristen hiesi sape anona wambel etap hiagoma Masedonia sanda'anai. God nagiambamas na'a nihi'ambas waf bu'unai sagiambama enis epes kwahusi.
47008002	Nimanimi lu'wami matagama esis ea' amama magwamba opalef asasimi endilisi. Ea' nogota anama esis sape amamaga a'as endilisi. Ea' esis sofa' danifel lu'unai nalomam. Ea' esis ukup ma'i enis Kristen kwahusi, satama otamba maim hiami ma sigiambamas.
47008003	Ae' egawam ea' awalapam a'iam mandawalap alihim. Amama amamaga kwawie'im ma'omasi esis wilama sose'asam, esis sase'asam. Ea' ina sase'asa amama atom, owa'. Sase'asa anom hiam wapoti. Ea' sataga kwahusi endilisi ma amamaga. Esis saila ukup asasimi atom, ea' dei' sase'asam.
47008004	Ea' esis la'ifis endilisi ma afa' wi'i aho'ma sonda' maol Godi soloma enis Kristen sigiambama epes Godi kwahusi sape etap hiagoma Judia.
47008005	Fowa' afa' ukup ma'i na'ama wa'i nambimb esis sose'as anom otamba. Ea' esis sali' saso' esis etisa Dembinai saila okom Godi sase'afa opalef asasimi afa' wapoti ma sose'afa anom otamba sigiambama esis Kristen kwahusi.
47008006	Fowa' Taitus nafela maol anama ma ipe' pagiambama Kristen amama atom. Amama atom dei' afa' la'ififa ma anan nigiambamapa ma pembefa maol anama hi'ilana.
47008007	Alupipei, amamaga hiami ipe' panda' waf bu'unai endilisi, pikila' enis epesa waf anama. Ipe' pembale'efa God la'ifipa. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'epa gawa nafelepa ma pewalapa basef bu'wami ananimi. Ipe' pahafel endilisi ma panda' maol Godi ea' ukup maimailafa wapoti'. Ipe' panda' waf anama bu'unai na'ama. Dei' afa' wa'i ipe' penda' anona waf bu'unai wapoti'. Pigiambama esis Kristen kwahusi pese'as anom amamaga na'a.
47008008	Dei' ae' ina a'ipipa la'ifimi, owa'. Do'ok a'ipipa ma waf esis Kristen sape Masedoniai sanda'anai. Esis sape kwahusi endilisi ea', ukup mahafel endilisi ma sagiambama enis epes na'a. Dei' a'ipipa basef amama ma ewaloga waf ipe'inai ukup maimailasanai. Ae' a'i egawa waf anama nape bo'ona endilisi si'i enis Kristen, o owa'?
47008009	Endilisi, ipe' pegawa eaf dembinai Jisas Krais nagiambamapa na'a. Eaf anama na'ama. Fowa' anan amamaga hiamunai, ea' dei' nataga wafinai endilisi. Nagiambamepa na'a nataga nape kwahunai, amama atom dei' ipe' pefa' waf bu'unai naloma amamaga hiami bu'wami.
47008010	Okom anama ae'anai dei' awalapana ma ipe'. Afagel do'okinai ipe' pali'a enis epes ukup mohafela pagiambama enis epes kwahusi ea' panda'am pali'.
47008011	Amama atom dei' penda'am pembefam. Ipe' fowa' ukup mohafel endilisi ma pagiambamas. Ea' dei' wapoti' na'ama etin penda'am hi'ilam dende' na'ama etina amamaga ma'omepa.
47008012	I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama God natolom na'i waf bu'unai ma okom ananinai. Ea' amamaga a'ipei, hapaimi. God nogawam.
47008013	Ae' ina a'ipipa pigiambama enis sope andeande'ma ipe' pepe aopa, owa'. A'i ipe' hipei pepe dende' na'ama etin.
47008014	Dei' nogota anae' amamaga ipe'imi amama magiambama epes isima amamaga a'asi. Ama anona nemaf ipe' amamaga a'epa, amamaga asasimi motanima migiambama ipe' amamaga a'epa. Penda'am na'ama ma pepe dende'epa na'ama etin.
47008015	Amama si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Epen nefa' amamaga hiami, amama ina hiam si'im endilisi, owa'. Ea' epen nefa' amamaga kwawie'im, enin ina kwahuna anom amamaga, owa'.”
47008016	Ae' anifela God, anan nafela okom Taitusi ea' nomonas etifim si'i ae'. Ea' okom nohafel endilisi ma nigiambamepa.
47008017	Anan ina naila basef afa'imi atoma osapa'ana nafe'mago ipe', owa'. Anan okom nohafel wapoti' ma maol anama. Ea' dei' okom ananinai atona na'i nefe'mago ipe'.
47008018	Ea' afa' nambimb osapa' anona alupunai nofo'o nolomanago. Dei' main, aman anama agilinaima esis Kristen hiesi nanda' maol nawalapa basef bu'wami Godi.
47008019	Ina amama atom, owa'. Esis sios hiesi sandandepana ma nefe' nolomafa ofa' otamba ipe'imi ma wigiambama Kristen isima kwahusi. Afa' ukup ma'ima'i maol anama afa'inai. Afa' onda'ana ofela agel Dembinai atona ma wihi'amba epes hiesi sogawa opalef afa'imi mohafela wigiambamas.
47008020	Afa' wandaiwa'ma enin epen ni'i basef awami ma waf afa' wanda'ana umafi otamba amama hiami ipe' paloma enis epes panda' ofa mami. Amama atom dei' afa' wa'i osapa' owalomafa anama nifi'i nefe'mago ipe'.
47008021	Afa' ukup ma'i onda' waf bu'unai atona ma epes hiesi. Ina naep Dembinai atom, owa'. Naep epesi wapoti'.
47008022	Ea' afa' wa'i osapa' anona aman owalomafa afa'inai nifi'i nolomago amam biam. La'ela'ef afa' watolona wandondomana ma maol hianai nanda'anai naninani. Ea' wati anan okom nohafel endilisi ma nanda'ana. Dei' anan nogawepa endilisi na'i ipe' panda' waf bu'unai atona. Ea' anan la'ifina endilisi ma nigiambamepa umafi otamba amama afa' ofa'am ofo'o.
47008023	Taitus ipe' pegawana. Afa' wandao'oma wanda' maol etin ma wagiambamepa. Alupumi biam mofo'o molomanai mofa' malogof esis sios hiesi mofo'o. Amam manda' maol Kraisi mafela agel ananinai.
47008024	Ea' ipe' pihi'ambanago waf ukup mimila enis epes. Penda'am na'ama ma amam wanom ama esis Kristen hiesi sogawa endilisi waf anama ipe'inai, ma sogawa wapoti' afa' wa'i endilisi nambimb ipe' pigiambama esis kwahusi.
47009001	Ipe' pegawa maol bu'unai pigiambama esis amam nematawa Godi amamaga a'asi. Ea' ae' ina enda' anom basefa amama, owa'.
47009002	Ae' egawa, opalef ipe'imi mohafela panda' maol anama ea' la'ela'ef afela agof ipe'imi ma naep esis Kristen sape etap hiagoma sape Masedonia. A'ipas na'ama a'i, “Afagel nali'i esis Grik sape Korini sandondombam ea' ma sonda' maol anama.” Ea' esis Kristen sape Masedonia same' basef amama ma ipe' ukup mohafel ma maol anama. Dei' amama mafela ukup esis Kristen sape Masedoniai hiesi ma sonda'am wapoti'.
47009003	Ea' ae' andaiwa'ma basef afa' wafela agof ipe'imi ma esis Kristen Masedoniai motaga falafumi atom, owa'. Amama atom dei' esapa' owapepa ipe'imi wanom mofe'mago ipe'. Andeande'ma ipe' pendondombam, pepe si'i a'ipipam.
47009004	I'i owa', enis Masedonia sifi'i solome siti ipe' ata' owa' pendondombam, afa' ambagof aom ma amama ea' ipe' wapoti' pelomafa. Dei' main, afa' wali' wa'ipipas wa'i ipe' panda'am pandondombam ea'.
47009005	Ea' ae' okom na'i i'ipa amam alupumi wanom mehipa muli' mofo'o motagamepa ma mondondomba otamba amama ma'um pali' pa'iam pa'i pese'asami. Ea' penda'am na'ama ma nemaf ae' efo'o pendondomba otamba amama hiami mo'oh. Amama afa' ina wasapa'epa mehip pembe'am, owa'. Ukup ipe'imi atom pendanda' ma pese'asam.
47009006	Ipe' ukup mopoma enin epen nawa gwa'aimi kwawie'im. Anona nemaf enin nela' kwawie'im. Epen nawa hiami anona nemaf nela' hiami.
47009007	Ea' ipe' hipei ata' pili' ukup motamea andeande' atona etin ea' pila nomonas amama atom pese'as amamaga. Na'ama enin epen okom aona nese'as amamaga ananimi o enin epen ni'i enis epes si'ipan mehipa nese'as na'ama, owa'. Dei' main, God okom nainaila epes isima sandanifel sase'as amamaga.
47009008	God Anan wilama nese'epa amamaga bu'wami hiami ipe' ma nambimb ipe' si'ipamam endilisi. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma nimeguf hiemi ipe' penda'am peso' enis epes ina hi'ilam, owa'. Mo'oh la'ela'ef. Ea' ipe' amamaga hiamipei penda' opeh bu'wami hiami mamumami ma pigiambama enis epes wapoti'.
47009009	Si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Epes isima sase'as amamaga hiami epes isima amamaga a'asi. Ea' epes hiesi ukup mapoma waf bu'unai asasinai la'ela'ef hihif.”
47009010	La'ela'ef God nase'as olelemb gwa'aimi hiami epesa sawam aof. Ea' nase'as gwa'aimi mamumami hiami epesa sagwa'am. Ea' nambimb nese'epa amamaga ipe' wapoti' ma pese'asam enis epes. Ama amamaga amama ipe'imi motaga lu'um endilisi ma pese'asam wapoti', si'i enin epen nawa olelemb gwa'aimi ma anom nimeguf mafe' ea', nala' gwa'aimi hiami endilisi nefa'am.
47009011	Nambimb ipe' pefa' amamaga hiami ma la'ela'ef la'ifipama peso' alupusi kwahusi ma amamaga hiami. Nemaf mamana afa' ofa' amamaga amama ipe'imi ma oso'asam alupusi isima, waf bu'unai ipe'inai nanda' esis sanifela God.
47009012	Ipe' penda'am na'ama ma pigiambama alupusi isima amam nematawa Godi ma waf anama, ipe' panda' opeha pagiambama epes isima kwahusi. Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Ipe' panda' waf anama pafela epes hiesi ma sefela agel Godi sinifelona endilisi.
47009013	Waf anama ipe'inai nandawalap alihiguma nihi'amba epes hiesi ma ipe' paila basef Godi andeande'. Ea' enis epes wapoti' sefela agel Godi lu'una ma ipe' paila basef bu'wami Kraisi pawalapama pagiambama esis saloma enis epes wapoti' hi'alas.
47009014	Ea' esis nambimb ukup mimilipa endilisi ma sonda' betena ipe'. Dei' main, esis sogawa waf Godi nagiambamepa na'a nape lu'una endilisi ma ipe'.
47009015	Waf anama God nase'apanai, anama lu'una endilisi. Ea' ape' basef a'apa ma mi'ipa epes a waf anama bu'unai Godi. Ape' minifela Goda waf anama Ananinai.
47010001	Ae' Pol ahali'ipa nimanis aila waf Kraisi so'umbilinai si'i anan nanda' okom ananinai nefe' owina epes hiesi. Dei' anifelipa ma anom amamaga etifim. Enis epes sambaso'me sa'ipi na'ama sa'i, “Anan ata' nape naloma ape' nanda' anan nafe' sa'osa'ona nafe' owin, ea' nogota anama nafe' napani laogon nanda' basef la'ifimi ma ape'.”
47010002	Ae' ihali'ipa na'ama. Anona nemaf ae' etagamepa, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama pehafa ae' i'ipipa basef la'ifimi si'i ae' okom na'i ewalapama enipa. Ae' ewalapama ipe' pa'i afa' wafe' waila waf aonai etapanai.
47010003	Endilisi, afa' wape wafe' etap anae', ea' ina wape wanda' wandaf si'i epes etapasi sapa', owa'.
47010004	Amamaga hiami sapa'ami afa' wahapilami amam ina etapami, owa'. Amama pepel Godi, la'ifinai ma notala endalelemb pepel naumbih Seteni.
47010005	Afa' wahagofa nomonas epes isima owa' endilisisi. Ea' waf hianai nasopama eafa epes sa'i sogawa Godi, anama afa' wahagofana wasopamana wapoti'. Ea' afa' wali'amona nomonas hiami ape' epesi ma onda'am bo'om mila okom Kraisi.
47010006	Afa' wandandombol wape ohafa ipe'. Ama i'i ipe' pila basef hiami afa'imi, afa' nambimb ogwamasa nimanimi awami emi egafis sosambala basef Godi.
47010007	Ipe' pati amamaga mape naep ipe'imi atom ande' atogon, nomon owa'. Dei' piti amamaga ofagema. I'i emi egafis sope la'ifis si'i esis epes Kraisi, esis sogawa afa' wapoti' wape epes Kraisi.
47010008	Dembinai nase'afa agof lu'wami afa' ma onda' maol anama ananinai, amama monda' bale'ef ipe'inai notaga la'ifina. Amama ina mohambombagepa, owa'. Ama ae' i'i efela agof afa'imi atoma maol anama Dembinai, nambimb ae' ina ambal aona ma amama, owa'.
47010009	Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma ipe' pi'i ae' aumbelipa etina anom pasa basef amama ae'ami, owa'.
47010010	Dei' main, enis epes sa'i, “Pasa basef ananimi nimanim endilisi ea' la'ifim endilisi. Ea' anan nafi'i natagamapa ma matolona naep ape'imi, ina la'ifina ea' basef ananimi falafumi atom.”
47010011	Epes sa'i basef na'ama, ata' ukup mi'i andeande' sogawa na'ama. Afa' wape laogon ea' wanda' basefa pas atoma ipe'. I'i afa' ope olomepa, onda' waf anama atona basef amama atom si'i wanda'am mail pas.
47010012	Afa' ukup hiahiam dei' wandaiwa' ma wi'i afa' wandati na'ama etin si'i epes safela agof asasimi atom lu'wami, owa'. Epes isima sawaloga waf asasinai ma ikwaf ukup asasimi atom. Ea' sawalogam na'ama. Esis isima owa' sogawai, ukup mololasi.
47010013	Ea' afa' wandaiwa'ma usila' ikwaf afa'inai ma ofela agof afa'imi ilif endilisi, owa'. Afa' wa'ila ikwaf God nawalogafa nase'afa maol ananinai. Afa' waila amama ea' wafe' wataga ma ipe' wanda' maol anama. Ea' wafela agof afa'imi ma maol anama atona.
47010014	Afa' wame' basefa God wailam wafo'o watagama ipe' dende' ma alol anan nandandepamafagoma. Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola maol anama ma wawalipipa basef ananimi, owa'. I'i afa' owa' ome' basef Ananimi na'ipipami ugi'mam, afa' umbisila' alol. Owa'etin. Afa' wafo'o ofa'ago basef bu'wami atom Kraisi watagamepa.
47010015	Ea' afa' ina umbisila' alola ofela agof afa'imi atoma anona maol enis epes sanda'anai, owa'. Afa' ukup matamea la'ifim na'ama. Maol anama afa' wanda'anai, ipe' nambimb pembale'efa Krais la'ifipa pikila' fowa' pali' pambale'efana. Ea' maol anama nataga lu'una la'afena ipe' nikila' fowa'inai. Afa' wa'i onda'ana la'ela'ef nendahama ikwaf God nase'afanai.
47010016	Wa'iam na'ama ma afa' ata' ofa' basef bu'wami Godi ofo'o laogon anona etap nape alafugaha ipe' ganima wa'ol. Ama afa' ina umbisila' ofe'ma maol anama amani ofela agof afa'imi anona maol aman anama nanda'ana ea', owa'.
47010017	“Epen nindanifel, enin nendanifel ma Dembinai atona.”
47010018	Dei' main, ape' mogawa emi egafis sefela agof asasimi atom, esis agof a'asa naep Dembinai, owa'. I'i Dembinai nefela agof anis epesi, dei' epes isima etis sofa' agof endilisi.
47011001	Ae' a'i ipe' pekwaha aho'ma ata' enda' anom basef falafumi kwawie'im. Ipe' ata' kwahowae.
47011002	Dei' main, God okom nainaila epes endilisi ma na'i nondandepasa sope ananisi etis. Ama waf anama atona ae' okom nainaila ipe' endilisi. Ae' andandepepa ea' ma peso' anona aman atotona, anan Krais. Ae' a'i ese'epa pefe'ma Anan si'i nemata'w awiawai'wi kwape bo'okw endilisi.
47011003	Ea' ae' umbamahe. Na'ama ukup ipe'imi aom ea' pekwaha waf anama pepan andeande' ukup mopoma Krais atona si'i fowa' gani yul anama gawainai nambaso'ma Iv.
47011004	Dei' main, enis epes safi'i satagama ipe' sawalapa basefa anona Jisas, anan ina Jisas anama afa' wawalapa basef wa'ianai, owa'. Ea' ipe' dei' pefa' anona ambal, ina Ambal Bu'unai Godi fowa' ipe' pefa'anai, owa'. Ea' ipe' pefa' anom basef, ina basef amama bu'wami Godi pefa'ama afa', owa'. Epes isima safi'i sambaso'mepa sa'i anom basefa anona Jisas la'afena ipe', ea' pa'i aho'ma epes isima pandagalamas pa'i basef asasimi bu'wami.
47011005	Ipe', peme'e! Ae' ina okom na'i ae' gawa a'e ape la'afena amam “aposel amama ipe'imi mali'i,” owa'.
47011006	Endilisi ae' ina egawa endilisi ma waf anama ewalapa basef, owa'. Ea' hapaiwei, gawa ae'anai ma basef Godi ina bandana, owa'. Nimeguf hiami ma waf hianai afa' wanda'anai wihi'ambepa gawa anama hianai ma ipe'.
47011007	Ipe' pegawa nimeguf amama ae' awalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma ipe', ae' ina efa' anom otamba ma amama, owa'. Anda' waf anama anda' ae' afe' owin afela ipe'. Dei' main? A'i waf anama anda'anai aonai o bu'unai?
47011008	Ae' efa' otamba maima enis Kristen sios sape anagon laogon sagiambame anda' maola agiambamepa. Waf anama si'i efa' amamaga asasimi etin.
47011009	Fowa' ape alomepa ata' ipe'imi amamaga a'e, nogota anama ae' ina ahali'ipa ma amamaga amama, owa'. Dei' main, amam alupumi makwaha etap hiagoma Masedoniai mafi'i matagamepa muwapanimi amamaga amama ae' owa'i. Ea' ina ahali'ipa ma pase'e otamba maim, owa'. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' enda'am na'ama etin ina ihali'ipa ma anom amamaga, owa'.
47011010	Basef endilisimi Kraisi mape ae', amama endilisimi atom. Ea' anom basef wapoti' endilisimi atom na'ama. Anama hiagoma esis Grik sapoma ina anona nemaf anona aman atotona la'ifina ma nohopa eafa ae' efela agel ae'anai ma waf anama efa' otamba maima ipe', owa'.
