47011011	Pa'i ae' afela agel ae'anai na'ama ma main? Pa'i ae' ina okom nainailipa ea' dei' afela agel ae'anai? Owa'. God nogawe ea', okom ae'anai nainailipa.
47011012	Ea' anom amam ma'i mogolopa eafa mofela agof amamumi atom ma'i motaga na'ama etin si'i afa' ma naep epesi. Ea' anda' maola ahopa eaf amamunai. Ae' anona nemaf enda'am na'ama etin epe.
47011013	Amam amama aposel mambaso'ami manda' maol baso'omunai. Amam mondola'wifa etina amam aposel Kraisi, ea' mambaso'ami.
47011014	Ea' ipe' ina pehafel gegelalasipa ma amama, owa'. Ape' mogawa Satan atona nandala'wifa ensel nafifili nafe' hiagoma.
47011015	I'i amam manda' maol ananinai wapoti' mondola'wifa sanda' maol bu'unai waf bu'unai, amama ina anom amamaga manda'apa gegelalasepa, owa'. Anona nemaf amam mofa' nimanimi awami mondahama maol amam manda'anai.
47011016	Do'ok ali' a'iam, dei' a'iam wapoti'. A'i enin epen ina okom ni'i ae' okom nololae, owa'. Ea' dei' ae' a'i ipe' ata' pi'i aho'me i'i basef si'i epen okom nonolani. Pi'i aho'ma ma ae' efela agel ae'anai endanifel nogota bandana.
47011017	Ae' ina aila Dembinai a'i basef amama, owa'. Ae' a'i si'i okom nololaiwei ma la'ifiwi efela agel ae'anai atona.
47011018	Epes hiesi saila waf etapanai safela agof asasimi atom, ea' ae' a'i enda'am wapoti'. Dei' i'ipipa anom basef si'i epen okom nololani.
47011019	Ipe' hipei gawaipei etipa. Ea' ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi pa'i aho'ma esis ukup mololasi sa'ipepa basef mamumami falafumi ma ipe'.
47011020	Endilisi, ipe' ina pa'i aho'ma esis isima ukup mololasi etis, owa'. Ipe' pa'i aho'ma amam emi egafum mombaso'ami mafi'i mefa'epa pafe' owina amam. Amam mefa' amamaga hiami ipe'imi mafela agof amamumi atoma ma makolaombepa. Amam manda'epa na'ama dei' pa'i aho'mam
47011021	Amam manda' waf aonai nikila' afa'. Ea' afa' ina la'ififa onda' waf anama amam manda'anai, owa'. Dei' ae' ata' i'i basef si'i epen okom nonolani. I'i enin epen la'ifina nefela agel ananinai atona, ae' wapoti' na'ama etin.
47011022	I'i amam Hibruimi, ae' wapoti'. Amam epes Israelimi, ae' wapoti'. Amam wambota Abrahami, ae' wapoti'.
47011023	Ae' dei' a'i si'i epen okom nololani endilisi. I'i amam monda' maol Kraisi, ae' wapoti' anda' maol Kraisi ikila' amam. Nimanimi lu'wami, amama ae' ikila' amam ea' kalabus wapoti' anda' kalabus ikila'am. I'i enis epes soham hihif endilisi, amama wapoti' ikila'am endilisi. Nimeguf hiami ae' felefele' ma ega'.
47011024	Wanom biam Juda sahe wip mehip hiami timbi tambel 39-peleim.
47011025	Nimeguf wanom sahe ala'ota. Anona nemaf sahe otamba. Galafowa aom nimeguf wanom ea' aowe naoh embel. Ea' nemaf si'ina atotona owamb si'ina atotona ae' alemb ala naoh embel la'afen.
47011026	La'ela'ef ae' afe' laogoma eaf lounai. Ae' a'i higilili ewala walembeh hiami afe'ma. Amam amama manda' waf aonai manda' wali mafe' eafi ma'i mohe. Esis esimbel etifim Judaisi sa'i sohambombage ea' epes isima owa' Judaisi wapoti' sa'i sehe. Enis epes sa'i sehe taun ea' anama etap wafiguma wapoti', naoh embel wapoti'. Ea' anom alupumi mambaso'ami wapoti' ma'i mohambombage.
47011027	Ae' efa' nimanimi lu'wami mamumami. Owambeh hiami la'ela'ef ina a'oh andeande', owa'. Nimeguf hiami ina a' gwa'aimi embel maim, owa'. Eap nase'e nolomahe a'i ega' etin. Anom nimeguf hiemi elelama gwa'aimi, luwaguf maim a'e nomanamb mae.
47011028	Ea' ina amama atom, owa'. Nimeguf hiami ae' okom natanea nafe' ma esis Kristen hiesi sape hiagomai sape sa'imama? Sembale'efana la'ifis, o owa'?
47011029	Emi egafis owa' la'ifis, ae' wapoti' ina ame' la'ifiwi, owa'. Ea' emi egafis sowa ma waf aonai, ae' wapoti' efa' namanimi alomas.
47011030	I'i ae' efela agel ae'anai, afelona ma amamaga maim mihi'ambepa mawalapa ae' owa' la'ifiwi.
47011031	God, anan God Dembinai Jisasi Ahalomana wapoti', ape' mefela agel ananinai la'ela'ef! Anan nogawa basef amama do'ok ali' a'iami ina ambaso'am, owa'.
47011032	Fowa' wambel Damaskus, dembinai gavman nape owina dembinai king Aretas anan nanda' amam maitu mumafi uta endalelemb sawis taun Damaskusi. Anan na'i nombale'e.
47011033	Ea' anom alupumi mafi'i manda'e atolo'w halaf malae ewala uta so'unai endalelemba taun anama ande'. Amama atom dei' akwaha lagof gavman anama ea' afa' afe'.
47012001	Ina anona eaf wapoti', owa'. Ea' ae' efela agel ae'anai atona wapoti'. Anda'am na'ama ina la'ifima migiambamapa, owa'. Ea' hapaimi, ae' enda'am. Dei' ae' a'i i'i basefa enin epen na'oh nandondo'oha basef mape mandambahi'i God nawalapameam ma ae'.
47012002	Ae' egawa anona aman Kraisi, basef ananimi mape na'ama. Fowa' afagof 14-peleim mafe'ma ea', God nofa'ana nalata ilif heven nafe'ma wenifiguma gani ilif. Aman anama ambal atona nalata o naloma alop nalata, ina egawana. God atona nogawana.
47012003	Ea' ae' egawa aman anama God nofa'ana nalata ilif heven. Aman anama ambal atona nalata o alop napaina nalata ae' ina egawana. God atona nagawana.
47012004	Gani ilif heven anan name' basef hiami mamumami epes owa' la'ifisa si'iama diga, God nandaiwa' ma epes sowalapami.
47012005	Ae' a'i efela agel aman anama lu'una. Agel ae'anai owa'. Ae' i'iam i'i ae' owa' la'ifiwi, ea' amama atom efela agel ae'anai.
47012006	Endilisi, i'i ae' efela agel ae'anai atona, ae' ina si'i epen okom nololani, owa'. Dei' main, a'i endilisi etin. Owa'etin. Ae' andaiwa'. Na'ama enin epen ni'i ae' epen bu'uwei endilisi ikila' waf fe' pe ki ae'anai. Ae' a'i ipe' piti waf ae' anda'anai peme'e ma basef ae' a'iami. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' pegawa waf ae'anai andeande'.
47012007	Basef amama God nihi'ambeam ae' lu'um endilisi. God nandaiwa'ma efela agel ae'anai endilisi, owa'. Amama atom dei' nase'e anom amamaga si'i higata nape alop ae'anai ekep pahe. Amama anona ensel Satan nasapa'ana nafi'i ma nanda' ae' ekep pahe. Amama manda' agel ae'anai nowala.
47012008	Ae' anda' betena Dembinai wenifa anan ata' notofa amamaga manda'e ekep pahae, epan andeande'.
47012009	Ea' anan na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Ae' agiambamena na'a, waf anama la'ifinai ma ine'. Dei' main, pepel ae'anai anama nanda' maol la'ifinai endilisi ma epes owa' la'ifisi.” Ea' ae' dei' ina ata' okom aona, owa'. Ae' andanifel endilisi ma amama ma pepel Kraisi napaiwe.
47012010	Amama atom dei' maol anama Kraisi etin, ae' ina la'ifiwi, owa'. Esis sanda'me waf aonai ea' sanda'me nimanimi mamumami hiami, enis sahambombage. Ea' hapaimi. Ae' andanifel ma amamaga amama. Nemaf anama ae' owa' la'ifiwi, nogota anama ae' la'ifiwi endilisi.
47012011	Basef amama aho'ma'iami amama basef falafalafumi a'iam si'i epen okom nololani. Ea' ipe' pefela ae' dei' a'iam na'ama. I'i ipe' pefela agel ae'anai, anama waf bu'unai. Owa'etin. Endilisi, ae' epen falafuwei, ea' ina afe' owina amam amama “Aposel ipe'imi” mali'i, owa'etin.
47012012	Ae' anda' okom ae'anai la'ifina ea' anda' ikwaf la'ifinai hianai la'afena ipe', awalapai ikwaf hianai aposeli. Amama na'ama. Amama la'ifimi si'i God nanda'ami mataga hiami mamumami la'afena ipe' mandahama maol Godi. Sati pepel anama, esis gegelalasis kwapete'as. La'ifimi amama mihi'ambepa ae' aposel endilisiwei.
47012013	Ipe' ina pape owina enis Kristen sios sape ganigani, owa'. Ipe' palomas pape dende' etina waf hianai ae' anda'mepanai. Ea' anona waf aonai anda'mepana ipe' etipei ma esis owa', anama na'ama. Ae' ina a'ipipama anom amamaga ipe'imi, owa'. Dei' ae' ati uwahipipa, ipe' pekwahome waf aonai anama anda'mepanai.
47012014	Dei' andandombam efe'mago ipe' ma wenif, ea' ae' ina nambimb efa' amamaga ipe'imi, owa'. Dei' main, ae' andaiwa'ma efa' amamaga ipe'imi, owa'. A'i efa'ai ipe' etipa. Ipe' pegawa, ipe' si'i awasi ae'ipei. Ina andeande'ma esis awasi sogolopa amamaga sigiambama mamasas asasisi, owa'. Esis mamasas etis, sanda' maol sagolopama amamaga sagiambama awasi.
47012015	Ae' okom na'iam endilisi ma ekwaha amamaga hiami ae'ami ea' elelama ambal ae'anai ekwahona igiambamepa. Ae' okom na'i na'ama. Waf ae' okom nanailipanai nataga nape lu'una endilisi la'ela'ef nikila' fowa'. Ea' waf ipe' ukup maimilianai nowala sa'osa'ona endilisi la'ela'ef nape.
47012016	Ea' ipe' pegawa fowa' ae' ina ase'epa nimanimi ipe', owa'. Ea' enis sa'i na'ama sa'i, “Endilisi anan ina nofa' amamaga ape'imi alihim, ea' anan aman nakikipapa ma waf baso'mainai ea' nefa'apa mailana.”
47012017	Endilisi fowa' asapa' anom amam mafe'mago ipe'. Dei' si'i main? Ae' ina ambaso'mepa efa' anom amamaga ma lagof ipe'imi. Owa'.
47012018	Ae' afela Taitus a'ipana nafe'mago ipe'. Ea' asapa' owalomapa anama nafo'o nalomanago. Taitus ina nambaso'am nefa' amamaga ipe'imi, owa'. Afa' dei' waila waf bu'unai ukup etifim. Ipe' pegawa afa' waila eaf atotona wafe'.
47012019	Ipe' ina pi'i afa' wanda' basef amama hiami wali' wa'iami wa'ipipa waf afa'inai ina aona, ea' wanda' waf bu'unai atona, owa'. Afa' wape epes Kraisi wanda' basef amama ma naep Godi. Alupipei endilisi ae'ipei, afa' wanda' basef amama hi'alama monda' ipe' pembale'efa God petaga la'ifipa.
47012020	Ae' umbamahe a'iam na'ama a'i nabimb efo'o etaga ma itilipa ina pepe bo'wepa si'i okom ae'anai na'i efo'o iti ipe' pepe bowepa, owa'. Ea' ipe' wapoti' nambimb piti ae' ina epe bo'awe si'i pa'i piti ae' epe, owa'. Na'ama waf naninani hianai nope. Basef lopa' fitapaimi, waf kowalepa ma anom amamaga, migimigah, findiwa, daha basef, sasambala basef, basef manda'as sanda hape'ma sape deindei'. Ea' ipe' ina peme' andeande'ma pila ukup etifima waf sanda' lotuwanai, owa'. Paila ukup deindei'. Ae' umbamahema amama.
47012021	Nemaf anama ae' efe'mago ipe', God ae'anai nambimb nonda' agel ae'anai nowala ma naep ipe'imi ma alopa ipe' amam nematawa hipei fowa' panda' waf aonai owa' pemboma opalef pefe'ma Gode. Ma ipe' owa' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai so'a waolanai ma opalef awami maloma amamaga awami fowa' pali' panda'ami. Ae' umbamahema amama.
47013001	Nambimb ae' efe'mago ipe' ma wenif. “I'i enis epes sombaso'ma enin epena anom basef, ama i'i enis epes bias o wenis si'i basef etifima waf anama, basef amama endilisimi atom.”
47013002	Fowa' ae' ali' afo'o bif ape alomepa, ae' a'ipa enipa mehip a'iam na'ama a'i, “Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'.” Dei' ape laogon a'ipipago wapoti' na'ama a'i nemaf anama ae' efo'o wapoti', ina iti enis soloma ipe' pali' panda' waf aonai i'i bu'upei, owa'. Ewalogepa ili'amonepa mehip.
47013003	Nemaf anama atona ae' ewalipipa, ipe' pegawa endilisi si'i Krais na'i basef mataga malogel ae'anai. Ipe' pegawa endilisi. Krais ina falafunai ma nanda' maol nalomepa, owa'. Anan la'ifinai.
47013004	Endilisi, fowa' anan ina la'ifina endilisi ma dei' saundana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai sahana naga', owa'. Ea' pepel Godi atona nafelona dei' nape dambainai. Afa' walomana, afa' wapoti' owa' la'ififa. Ea' pepel atona Godi dei' afa' wape dambaifai walomana ea' nambimb owalapa pepel atona la'afena ipe'.
47013005	Ipe' la'ela'ef pewaloga opalef ipe'imi pewalogam andeande'. Ipe' pembale'efa God endilisi o owa'? Ipe' pewaloga ipe' etipa. Ipe' pegawa Krais Jisas nape opalef ipe'imi o owa'? I'i ata' owa', ikwaf ipe'inai ina dei' pafe' pataga dende', ata' owa'.
47013006	Ae' egawa a'i dei' ipe' pegawa ikwaf afa'inai wafe' wataga dende'.
47013007	Dei' afa' wanda' betena God nigiambamepa ma ina penda' anona waf aonai, owa'. Afa' ina wanda' betena ipe' na'ama ma otaga ondawalap alihifa ma naep epesi ma si'i ikwaf afa'inai dende', owa'. Afa' wanda'ana ma ipe' penda' waf bu'unai andeande', ea' afa' hapaifai. Afa' wandawalap alihifa ma naep epes hiesi sambaso'am sa'i ikwaf afa'inai ina nafe' nataga, owa'.
47013008	Ipe' pegawa afa' ina onda' anom amamaga ma mohagofa basef endilisimi, owa'. Afa' la'ififa ma wanda' maola wa'ipasa basef endilisimi atom.
47013009	Maina nemaf afa' wame' ina la'ififa ea' ipe' pape la'ifipa, afa' wandanifel endilisi. Ea' afa' wanda' betena God la'ela'efa nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa bo'wepa andeande'.
47013010	Dei' ape laogon anda'ago basef amama mafe'mepago ma main? Ae' anda'am na'ama ma nambimb efo'o epe elomepa ae' ina i'ipipa basef la'ifimi endilisi ma pepel Dembinai nasi'ianai, owa'. Pepel anama enin ina nase'eam ma nohambombaga ipe', owa'. Anama nonda bale'ef ipe'inai notaga la'ifina.
47013011	Kristen alupipei, dei' embefa basef hi'ilam a'i nemaf bu'unai inifelipa. Ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa endilisi ma petaga bo'wepa andeande'. Ea' peme' basef ae'ami. Ipe' pefa' ukup etifim ea' pepe opalef etifim awanem. God, anan ofagonama waf ukup naloma opalef awanemi nope nolomepa.
47013012	Waf ape'inai amam nematawa hiapai atona etin Godi, pese'ama lagof pelomago esis alupusi.
47013013	Amam nematawa hiesi Godi sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ma ipe'.
47013014	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas Krais niti uwahipipa nigiambamepago na'a ma okom Godi bu'unai nainailipa. Ea' a'i Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nope noloma ipe' hipei ma pelomana opalef etifim pepe.
48001001	Ae' Pol aposel Jisas Kraisi anda' basef amama. Ina anona aman nandandepe ma enda' maol aposel, owa'. Ahalomapa God nafela Jisas Krais nohafel hi'agif amam atom mosahe'e ma ape aposel awalipasa basef Godi.
48001002	Esis Kristen sahin owan hiesi sape na'ae salome, wanda'mepago danifela ipe' Kristen hipei pape wambel hianai etap hiagoma Galesia.
48001003	Ae' a'i Ahalomapa God noloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai monda'epa petaga la'ifipa migiabamepa na'a ma opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
48001004	Jisas Krais naila okom Ahalomapa Godi naga' ma naso' ambal ananinai nafe' ma God nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Anan nanda'am na'ama natagahepa ma waf aonai hianai dei' nape etap anae'.
48001005	Ae' a'i amam nematawa hiesi sefela agel Godi lu'una ma nafifili ananinai atona la'ela'ef. Endilisi.
48001006	Ae' gegelalasowe ma ipe' pakwaha waf bu'unai God nofalepa, naloma Jisas Krais nagiambamepa na'a. Dei' ipe' pakwaham mehip paila anom basef dambaimi.
48001007	Basef bu'wami Godi amama atom. Ina anom basef wapoti', owa'. Dei' maina a'ipipa basef amama? Ae' egawa enis epes samboma basef bu'wami Kraisi ma ukup ipe'imi dei' sanda' ipe' ukup mololaepa.
48001008	Ea' i'i ae' o enin epen o anona ensel nifi'i ilif heveni ni'ipipa anom basef owa' dende' ma basef amama afa' wa'ipipami, epen inima peme'an owa', hapaini. Ae' a'i anona nemaf God nokwahin newala wambel aonai hel.
48001009	Basef amama wali' wa'ipipam ea', dei' a'ipipam wapoti'. I'i emi egafis si'ipipa anom basef owa' mefe' dende' si'i basef amama bu'wami Godi pagi'mami, ae' a'i epes isima God nokwahis sowala wambel aonai hel.
48001010	Ipe' ukup mape ma'imama ma basef amama? Pa'i ae' a'iama enis epes sinifelowe sefela agel ae'anai? Owa'. Ae' a'i God atotona opaf bo'onama ae'. Ipe' pa'iam pa'i a'iama enis epes sinifelowe? Owa'. I'i enda' maola ai'ipa enis epesa opalef bo'oma ae', ae' ina aman anda' maola Kraisi, owa'. Ae' ambaso'ami. Owa'. Ae' anda' maola Krais atona.
48001011	Sahin owan alupipei ae'ipei, ae' a'i ipe' pegawa basef ae'ami. Basef bu'wami Godi awalipipami, amama ina mataga okom enin epeni, owa'.
48001012	Ae' ina efa'ama enin epen, owa'. Ina enin epen nawalipi basef amama ofagema, owa'. Jisas Krais atona nawalipi basef amama bu'wami.
48001013	Waf fowa' anda'anai, esis sa'ipipana pegawana ea'. Fowa' anda' lotu ma God aila waf esis Juda sanda'anai. Ae' la'ifiwi ahambombaga esis Kristen epes Godi la'ifiwi. Ae' ina atilis uwahipis, owa'. Anda' maol la'ifiwi ma ahas hi'ilas.
48001014	Ae' ikila' epes hiesi Juda alomas aol atona, ikila'asa aila waf esis Juda sanda' lotuma Godi. Enis ina sailana la'ifis ea' ae' ailana la'ifiwi hi'alana. Ea' la'ifiwi endilisi ma aila waf fowa'inai amam akupapa manda'anai. Ae' ailana andeande' endilisi ikila'as.
48001015	-
48001016	Ea' fowa' gani mama'we ata' owa' kolae, God nagiambame na'a nosahe'e nofale ma enda'mana maol. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' nemaf anama anan na'i nihi'ambe Nogalomana Ananinai ma iwalipasa basef bu'wami ananimi isima sololama Godi, nemaf anama ae' ina afe' ahali' enin epena maol anama, owa'.
48001017	Ae' ina afe' wambel Jerusalem ati amam God nali' nandandepama manda' maol aposeli, owa'. Nemaf anama atona afe' etap hiagoma Arebia. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' etanima afe' Damaskus.
48001018	Afagof wanom mafe'ma ea', afe' Jerusalem ati Pita ape alomana wikifah biam.
48001019	Ea' ae' ina ati anom aposel, owa'. Ati Jems atona, Dembinai Jisas owalomana.
48001020	Ae' a'ipipa endilisi ma naep Godi nogawa basef amama anda'ami, amama endilisimi atom. Ae' ina ambaso'mepa, owa'.
48001021	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea' afe' anona wambel nape etap biefina hiagoma Siria naloma Sialisia.
48001022	Nemaf anama esis Kristen sape etap hiagoma Judia ina sogawa ae' andeande', ata' owa'.
48001023	Esis same' basef atoma enis epes sa'i, “Aman anama fowa' nahambombagapa maloma basef Kraisi, nandaiwa'ma bale'ef ape'inai ea' dei' owa'etin. Anama nawalapa basef amama atom fowa' nahambombagami.”
48001024	Ea' God nagiambame embale'efana. Amama atom dei' safela agel Godi lu'una.
48002001	Afagof hiami 14-peleim mafe'ma ea', ae' afe' Jerusalem wapoti'. Aloma Barnabas wafe' etin. Ae' ao'wa Taitus wapoti' nafe' nalomafa.
48002002	God nihi'ambe na'ama ea' afe'. Basef amama bu'wami awalapam esis anona wambota owa' Judaisi ihi'ambama esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi wapoti'. Ea' aloma amam agufumi atom mape, ihi'ambamam. Ae' andaiwa'ma maol fowa' anda'anai naloma dei' anda'anai notaga falafunai atona, owa'.
48002003	Taitus anan alupunai ae'anai, amam mogawa anan aman Grikinai. Ea' amam ina matopa'mana alop si'i amam Juda manda'am, owa'. Ma'i aho'ma anan.
48002004	Basef amama Taitus natopa' alop o ina natopa' alop mataga na'ama. Fowa' amam mambaso'ami ma'i amam Kristen sahin owan endilisimi motopa' alop amamunai. Ea' mandambaho' mawisi nomona ape' Kristen ma'i miti waf bu'unai Jisas Krais nase'apana ape' mape la'ifipama Anan. Ea' dei' natagahepa ma waf aonai mape wafifipa. Amam ma'i mogawa waf anama mape wafifipa ea' ma'i muli'akwapa mope owina basef amamumi fowa'imi.
48002005	Ape' ina ma'i aho'ma mila basef amamumi, owa'. Dei' main, ape' ma'i mumafi basef bu'wami endilisimi mope andeande'ma ipe' pembale'efam.
48002006	Amam agufumi esis Kristen sa'i agufumi asasimi, ae' andaiwa'ma efela agof enis epesi, owa'. A'i agof hiami falafumi atom. God ina nati alop ande' nowalogas, owa'. Anan nati ukup epesi nomon nawalogas. Amam ina ma'ipi anom basef wapoti' ma iwalipasam, owa'.
48002007	Ea' amam mogawa God nase'e maol anama ma awalipasa basef bu'wami esis owa' Judaisi, si'i nase'anana Pita nawalipa esis Juda.
48002008	God nandandepa Pita nanda'ana nataga la'ifina ma nanda' maol aposel nawalapa basef Godi ma esis Juda. Ea' na'ama etina God nandandepe nanda'e la'ifiwi ma enda' maol aposel awalipasa basef ananimi isima owa' Judaisi.
48002009	Esis Kristen sa'i agufumi asasimi Jems naloma Jon naloma Pita. Amam mogawa God nagiambame na'a nase'e maol anama. Ea' manda'afa alupufai onda' maol atotona Godi. Ea' amam wanom ma'i aho' maso'afa lagof aloma Barnabas mihi'amba esis afa' waloma amam wape opalef etifim wanda' maol Godi atona. Ea' amam wanom ma'i aho'ma ondawalagatanima ma afa' biafa ofe' ma esis owa' Judaisi, ea' amam mafe'ma esis Juda.
48002010	Amam ma'ipafa basef amama atom ma'i afa' biafa ope wigiambama esis Kristen sape Jerusalemi kwahusi, otamba maim a'asi. Maol anama ae' okom na'iana endilisi.
48002011	Nemaf anama Pita nafi'i wambel Antiok, ae' esambala basef ananimi ma naep esis Kristen hiesi. Dei' main, anan nanda' waf aonai.
48002012	Nali' nafi'i nape naloma esis Kristen owa' Judaisi na' gwa'aimi nalomas. Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nati amam amama Juda Jems nasapa'am mafi'i, Pita umbamahana ma amam Juda la'ifima maila waf anama matopa' alopanai. Ea' nandamboma natanima nakwaha esis Kristen owa' Judaisi, ina ata' na' gwa'aimi nalomas wapoti', owa'.
48002013	Enis Kristen Juda wapoti' umbamahas sakwaha esis owa' Judaisi saila Pita. Barnabas wapoti' umbamahana nanda'am na'ama etin si'i esis.
48002014	Nogota anama ae' ati waf anama amam manda'anai, ina maila waf bu'unai dende'ma basef bu'wami Godi endilisimi, owa'. Ea' a'ipana naep epes hiesi a'i, “Ine' Judainai. Ea' dei' ine' naila waf anona wambota epes sololama Godi. Waf ape' Judai, ine' nakwahona ea'. Dei' maina ine' la'ifina endilisi ma nanda' epes hiesi saila waf ape' Judai? Na'ama ina andeande', owa'.
48002015	Ape' mataga wambota Judai, ape' ina mataga epes isima owa' Judaisi sanda' waf aonai, owa'.
48002016	Ape' mogawa God ina okom napoma epen inima nembale'efa mi'uli ananinai ea' nanda' epen inima bo'wen andeande', owa'. Epen nembale'efa Jisas Kraisi atona, God nofalan na'i bo'wen andeande'. Ape' wapoti' mombale'efa Jisas Krais ea' God na'i ape' epes bu'upai Ananipai ma mombale'efa Krais. Ea' mi'uli owa'. Dei' main, ina enin epen naila mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesanai, dei' God nofalan na'i enin bo'wen andeande', owa'.
48002017	Ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais dei' God nofalapa epes bu'unai Ananipai. I'i basef amama endilisimi, dei' mape ma'imama? Epes siti ape' owa' mila mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai, atuwasi sofalapa si'i ape' epes aopai si'i isima owa' Judaisi. I'i esis si'ipapa na'ama, ape' ina mi'i Krais nafela ape' manda' waf anama aonai, owa'.
48002018	I'i ae' ali' akwaha waf ape owina mi'uli Godi ea' itanimai ila mi'uli anama wapoti', amama mawalapa ae' aman atopa' mi'uli anama.
48002019	Dei' main, mi'uli anama nahe si'i aga'. Ina la'ifina nefela ae' wapoti', owa'. Dei' nahe aga' ma etaga epe namowe efa' ambal namunai ila okom Godi. Ea' ae' ape la'ifiwi ma Krais aga' ail alomana lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
48002020	Ae' ina ape namowe ma ambal ae'anai atona, owa'. Krais atona nape namunai opaf ae'anai. Dei' ape etap anae', ape aila pepel Nogalomana Godi embale'fa Anan atona. Anan okom nainaili endilisi, naso' ambal Ananinai God ma nagiambame.
48002021	Ae' ina ewa' alafugama waf God nagiambamapa na'a, owa'. I'i mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai nonda' epes sotaga bo'wes andeande' ma naep Godi, dei' waf Krais naga'manai falafifunai atona ofagena owa'.”
48003001	Ipe' Galesia ukup masi'ipei. Afa' wawalipipa basef alihima Jisas Krais naga'ma ipe' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai, wawalipipam alihim endilisi si'i patolom naep ipe'imi. Dei' ata' emi namboma ukup ipe'imi mase'epa?
48003002	Ae' a'i ihali'ipa ma basef etifim. Fowa' ipe' pefa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape opalef ipe'imi, ipe' paila waf si'i mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai na'iam pefa'ana o pame' basef bu'wami Godi atom pembale'efam pefa'ana?
48003003	Endilisi, ae' ati ipe' ukup masi'ipei. Ipe' pafela maol panda'ana la'ifipa ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi, ea' dei' pa'i penda'ana pembefana pepel ipe'inai atona. Na'ama aom.
48003004	Dei' amamaga amama nimanimi fowa' ipe' pefa'ama maol bu'unai Godi pefa'am na'a? Owa'. Ae' a'i amama ina matagamepa na'a, owa'.
48003005	Maina eaf dei' God nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nanda' ikwaf la'ifinai la'afena ipe'? Ambal Godi na'i ipe' paila mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai nanda' ikwaf anama, o Ambal Godi na'i pame' basef bu'wami Godi pembale'efam pailam nanda' ikwaf anama?
48003006	Ipe' ata' ukup mopoma Abraham. Anan si'i anona ikwafa waf bu'unai pembale'efa God. Basef Baibelimi ma'iam alihim ma'i, “Abraham nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' God na'i anan aman bu'unai.”
48003007	Ea' dei' ipe' pegawa, emi egafis sembale'efa God ma basef bu'wami Ananimi, epes isima bafasana awasi endilisi Abrahami.
48003008	Fowa' gani basef Baibelimi ma'iam alihima anona nogota owagama God nonda' esis owa' Judaisi sombale'efa anan, sotaga bo'wes ma naep ananimi. Fowa' basef Baibelimi ma'ipa Abrahama basef bu'wami Godi. Mihi'ambana ma'i, “Owagama God nonda' ine' ma nigiambama epes hiesi sape etapi sotaga bo'wes sope andeande'.”
48003009	Abraham nembale'efa God ea' God nofalo'mana na'ipana basef bu'wami Ananimi. Dei' God nofalo'ma emi egafis sembale'efa anan ni'ipasa basef bu'wami ananimi na'ama etin si'i fowa' na'ipa Abraham.
48003010	Emi egafis ukup mapoma waf saila mi'uli esis Juda sailanai dei' sape owina okom wandafunai Godi. Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Emi egafis la'ela'ef owa' sila basef hiami mail mi'uli Godi hi'ilam andeande', isima sape owina okom wandafunai Godi.”
48003011	Dei' basef amama mataga mandawalap alihim. Ina enin epen atitin naila mi'uli Godi nataga bo'wena naep Godi, owa'. Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Emi egafis sembale'efa Godi esis etis sataga bo'wes ma naep ananimi ma sape andeande' la'ela'ef.”
48003012	Ea' waf ofagena saila mi'uli anama Godi ina nape atogon si'i waf sembale'efa God, owa'etin. Basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i anom basef la'ifimi ma mi'uli anama ma'i, “Emi egafis saila basef hiami mail mi'uli anama hi'ilana andeande', epen inima nape namina naila basef amama hiami hi'alam.”
48003013	Ea' Krais natagahepa ma okom wandafunai Godi nape mi'uli ananinai. God nanda' nimanimi ma awami ape' manda'ami hiami nakolasom mafe'ma anan atona, ea' ofagema amama mapoma anan atona nofa'am. Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'i, “Emi egafis saundas sahas sail lawah usi'imi tu'wanaimi, amama atom sape owina okom wandafunai Godi.”
48003014	Krais Jisas nanda'am na'ama ma nanda' amamaga bu'wami God na'ipa Abrahamami motagama enis epes sololama basef Godi. Nanda'am na'ama ma ape' mombale'efa basef bu'wami ma mofa' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai si'i fowa' na'i basef endilisimi atom.
48003015	Ipe' Kristen sahin owan, a'i i'ipipa anom basef womun etina waf ape' manda'anai. I'i anom amam mi'i anom basef la'ifimi endilisim atom, ina enin epen la'ifina nehape'am nowataniam, owa'. Mope la'ifim la'ela'ef.
48003016	Fowa' gani God naloma Abraham ma'i basef la'ifim endilisimi atom bafalomana ananinai anona nemaf neataga, si'i waf ape' epes sa'i basef endilisimi atom. Basef mail Baibeli ina ma'i, “Ine' neloma bafasena ine'isi.” Owa'etin. Amama ma'i epes hiesi. Ea' basef mail Baibeli ma'i, “Ine' neloma bafalomena ine'inai.” Amama ma'i epen atotona, anan Krais.
48003017	Basef ae' a'ipipami ofagema na'ama. Fowa' gani God na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi atom owagama mola gwa'aimi. Ea' afagof hiami 430-peleim mafe' ea', God nase'as mi'uli ananinai naso' Mosesanai. Mi'uli anama ina la'ifina nehape' basef la'ifimi amama mali'i God na'i endilisimi atom, owa'.
48003018	Dei' main, God nanda' waf bu'unai ma ape' nofa'apa makwaha waf aonai motanimani. I'i mi'uli anama nowalapai waf anama bu'unai, dei' basef God na'i endilisimi atom owa'etin. Amama owa'. Fowa' God na'i basef endilisimi atoma waf anama bu'unai nagiambama Abraham na'a nofa'ana notanimani.
48003019	Dei' God nase'apa mi'uli anama ma main? Fowa' gani God nali' na'ipasa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom. Nagi' nowatani mi'uli anama nihi'ambapa ofagema ma waf aonai nataga alihina. Ea' God na'i mi'uli anama nope nifi'i notambel nogota anama Abraham bafalomana neataganai. Fowa' God na'i basef amama la'ifimi endilisimi atom ma bafalomana anama. God na'ipam mi'uli anama amam ensel ea' ma'ipa epesa aman nape la'afen, anan Moses.
48003020	I'i epen atitin nepe, aman nape la'afeni maol a'ana. Ea' i'i epes hiesi sope, anan nope la'afena esis. Ea' God anan atona nape.
48003021	Ipe' pa'i basef amama mail mi'uli esis Juda sailanai ma'i mosambala basef la'ifimi God na'i endilisimi atom o owa'? Owa'etin. Dei' main, ape' hiapai mape etapi manda' waf aonai. I'i God nease'apa anona mi'uli ma mofa' ambal namunai, ape' meataga epes bu'unai mope andeande' ma mila mi'uli anama. Owa'etin. Basef mail buk Baibeli ma'i waf aonai ape' manda'anai membalo' ape' hiapai.
48003022	Amamaga mamumami mombalo'apa mape etap anae'. Waf aonai anama nombalo'apa mapoma anona nemaf ape' mombale'efa Kraisi mofa' amama bu'wami. Amama fowa' gani God na'i basef endilisimi atom ma anona nemaf noso' esis sembale'efa Kraisi sefa'am.
48003023	Fowa' gani waf anama sembale'efa Jisas Kraisanai ina dei' nataga, ata' owa'. Nemaf anama mi'uli esis Juda sailana nembalo'apa la'ifipa mape si'i kalabus mape mape ma dei' nemaf anama God nihi'ambapa alihima ape' mombale'efa Jisas Krais.
48003024	Mi'uli anama si'i enin epen nimafiapa nefa'apa mafe'ma Kraisa mombale'efana ma God nofalapa epes bu'unai Ananipai.
48003025	Dei' nemaf anama mataga ma mombale'efa Krais. Ea' mi'uli anama ina ata' nimafiapa wapoti', owa'.
48003026	Ipe' pembale'efa Krais Jisas. Amama atom dei' ipe' hipei pataga awasi Godi, pape la'ifipa paloma Krais Jisas.
48003027	Ipe' hipei pefa' baptais ma pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais. Ea' dei' pefa' waf ananinai si'i pewahe'a lowaguf.
48003028	Dei' ina enis epes sape dambesi ma enis epesa naep Godi, owa'. Esis Juda ina sape dambesa isima owa' Judaisi, emi egafis agof a'asi ina sape owina epes agufisi, amam ina mape dambema awau nematawa, owa'. Ipe' hipei pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais pataga etifipa.
48003029	I'i ipe' epes Kraisi endilisi, ipe' awasi Abrahami pembale'efa Kraisa anona nemaf God nofa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande' si'i basef amama la'ifimi fowa' na'i endilisimi atom naloma Abraham ma'iami.
48004001	Basef ae'ami mape na'ama. Nogalomana nali'i anama owagama nofa' amamaga ahalomanai. Ea' anan ata' sa'ona sanda'ana nape owina anona aman dembinai. Ea' endilisi amamaga hiami ahalomanai, nogalomanai atom.
48004002	Nemaf anama nogalomana ata' so'uso'win, nape owina agufumi mumafianama gwa'aimi otamba maim nafe' nafe'ma nemaf ahalomana nandandepanai nataga. Nemaf anama amam ina ata' mumafiana wapoti', owa'.
48004003	Ape' wapoti' mape na'ama etin si'i nogalomana anama. Fowa' ape' ata' owa' mombale'efa basef Godi andeande', nogota anama ata' manda' maol mape owina mi'uli Godi naso' Moses anai o ambagof awami dembemi mumafi amamaga hiami mape ilif etapi.
48004004	Ea' nogota anama God na'ianai nataga, anan nasapa' Nogalomana ananinai nafi'i etap anae'. Ano'w nemata'w kolana nataga epen nape owina mi'uli esis Juda sailanai.
48004005	Natagahepa ma mi'uli anama nembalo'apa ea' natalepa ma mape wafifipa. Nanda'am na'ama ma God dei' nefa'apa numafiapa mape awasi ananipai endilisi.
48004006	Ape' mape awasi ananipai. Amama atom dei' God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Nogalomanai nawis opalef ape'imi. Ambal anama nalef nofalana na'i, “Ahalome, Ahalome!”
48004007	Dei' ipe' ina pape panda' maol pape owina enis epes agof a'epa, pape owina ambagof amama awami, owa'. Ipe' awasi ananipai. Owagama God nose'epa amamaga bu'wami hiami nandondombam ma'omepa nease'epam.
48004008	Fowa' ipe' owa' ata' pegawa God, pape panda' maol aonai pape la'ifipa pail ambagof awami etapami. Amam ina endilisimi, owa'.
48004009	Dei' ipe' pegawa God. Ea' endilisi, Anan nogawa ipe'. Ea' dei' emi ata' nanda'epa petanima pafe' paila ambagof amama awami ina la'ifimi? Na'ama ina bo'om, owa'. Dei' maina ipe' pa'i pepe owina ambagof amama wapoti'? Hapaimi.
48004010	-
48004011	Ae' okom na'i ipe', umbamahe. Dei' maina ukup ipe'imi ma'ima'i bo'om mapoma afagel dambainai naloma aon dambainai maloma nogota asaf owaf mataganai maloma anom nimeguf pa'i lu'wami panda' lotuma Godami? Amama hapaimi. Na'ama maol ae' anda'anai agiambamepa notaga nalo.
48004012	Dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi a'i ipe' pekwaha nomonas amama pape owina mi'uli anama. Ae' ina ape owina mi'uli Godi, owa'. Ape wafifiwi. Ea' pepe wafifipa si'i ae'. Dei' main, ae' embale'efa Krais si'i ipe'. Fowa' ipe' ina panda'me anona waf aonai, owa'.
48004013	Ipe' pegawa fowa' dambadamba afe'mago ipe', alop ae'anai ina la'ifina, owa'. Ape alomepa anom nimeguf, awalapa basef bu'wami Godi a'ipipam.
48004014	Awes lu'unai nanda'e ea' alop ae'anai aona. Amama manda'epa nimanipa. Ea' ipe' ina patolowe pandafa'me pewa' alafugae, owa'. Ipe' pandanifelame si'i pandanifel ma anona ensel Godi, o si'i Krais Jisas atona.
48004015	Fowa' ape alomepa ipe' pandanifel endilisi. Ea' dei' danifel ipe'inai hi'alana. Ea' fowa' ipe' pandanifel endilisi na'ama pa'i ukup ma'i, I'i ipe' la'ifipa, pese'e naep ipe'imi esam.
48004016	Ea' dei' ukup mape ipe' ma'imama ma'ae? Ae' si'i nautamepa ma a'ipipa basef amama endilisimi? Ae' ina egawa, owa'.
48004017	Endilisi, enis epes sambaso'mami ukup mohafel mehip sa'i somboma ukup ipe'imi ma pila basef asasimi. Ea' ukup asasimi ina bo'om, owa'. Esis ina sagiambamepa ma basef Godi, owa'. Sandaiwa'ma ipe' peme' basef ae'ami. Sanda'am na'ama ma ipe' ukup mohafel la'ifima pila esis etis.
48004018	I'i esis ukup mohafel la'ifima waf bu'unai ma sigiambamepa la'ela'ef, na'ama andeande'. Ea' i'i sonda'am na'ama nimeguf anama atom ae' ape alomepa, ina andeande', owa'. Ea' sonda'am nimeguf amama ikwahipa efe', andeande'.
48004019	Ipe' awasi alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom aona si'i nematawa wame' nimanimi ola awasi. Ame' okom aona ma ipe' efe' efe' etaga ma nogota anama Krais notaga nondawalap alihina opalef ipe'imi nomon ea'ae' okom bo'ona.
48004020	Ae' ati uwahipipa! Dei' ae' okom natanea nafe'mago ipe' endilisi. Ae' ina egawa igiambamepa i'imama? Ea' okom nainailipa a'i dei' epe elomepa i'ipipa anom basef bu'wami naep ipe'imi. Ea' owa'.
48004021	Ipe' pa'i pepe owina mi'uli anama fowa' God naso' Mosesanai. Dei' a'i ihali'ipa ma anom basef. Ipe' pegawa basef ofagema ma mi'uli anama o owa? Dei' a'ipipa.
48004022	Si'i basef mail Baibeli ma'i, kwanda'mana maoli Abraham nola awasi amam biam. Anona Hega kolanai. Ea' anona waulu'mana endilisi Sara kolanai.
48004023	Nogalomana kwanda'mana maoli Hega kolanai si'i ape' epes sandaso'ama sola awasi. Ea' nogalomana Sara kolanai natagama basef la'ifimi God na'i endilisimi atom.
48004024	Nematawa awama biawa ondola'wifa basef endilisimi atom biefim. Nemata'w akwama Hega kondola'wifa basef mataga halaf Sainai. Awasi ako'usi anona nemaf agof a'as sonda' maol etin sope owina enis epes.
48004025	Akwa'w kondola'wifa halaf Sainai, nape anona etap hiagoma Arebia, ea' akwa'w basef womun etina wambel anama Jerusalem dei' nape etap anae'. Dei' main, akwa'w kwape kwanda' maol la'ifikw kwaloma awasi akwa'usi sape owina pepel si'i esis Juda sape Jerusalemi sape owina mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai.
48004026	Ea' wambel ape'inai Jerusalem nape gani ilif. Emi egafis sape wambel anama ina sape owina mi'uli anama, owa'. Sandatagah sape wafifis.
48004027	Dei' main, Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, “Nemata'w, ine' nemata'w asinai ma owa' nela awasi, ine' dei' nindanifal ni'i mehip. Ine' ata' owa' neme' nimanimi si'i sola awasi same'ami, ine' nega ni'i mehip! Nemata'w asa'wi anona nemaf kola awasi hiesi kwikila' nemata'w kwaso' aman kolasi.”
48004028	Dei' ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' awasi Godi pataga si'i basef la'ifimi God na'i endilisimi atom si'i Aisak.
48004029	Fowa' nogota anama awani aman nataga waf anama sandaso'amainai nase'ana nimanimi awani aman inima God atona nanda'an nataga pepel Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Amama na'ama etin dei' wapoti'. Esis sape owina mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai sase'apa nimanimi ape' awasi Godi.
48004030	Dei' buk Baibel na'iam na'imama? Na'iam na'i, “Galo'makwo nemata'w akwama agel a'akwi kwanda' maol na'a kwape owina enis epes kolomago nogaloma'w akwa'unai. So'uso'win inima anona nemaf ina nefa' amamaga ahalomanai noloma so'uso'win nataga nemata'w kwape wafifi'wi, owa'.”
48004031	Ea' dei' ape' Kristen alupipai, ina si'i awasi wataga nemata'w akwama kwape owina enis epes, owa'. Ape' si'i awasi wataga nemata'w akwama wafifi'wi.
48005001	Krais atona natagahepa mape wafifipa. Amama atom dei' ipe' pitu la'ifipa. Ina ata' pi'i aho'ma enis epes si'ipipa pitanima pepe pila mi'uli anama esis Juda sailanai wapoti', owa'.
48005002	Peme', ae' Pol a'ipipa amama. I'i ipe' pi'i aho'ma amam motopa'mepa alop, Krais ina nagiambamepa, owa'.
48005003	A'i i'ipa ipe' amam hipei wapoti'. Emi aman ni'i aho'ma motopa'mana alop ananinai, anan nila mi'uli anama hianai hi'ilana.
48005004	I'i ipe' pa'i pila mi'uli anama ma nambimb God ni'i ipe' epes bu'upei, ipe' pakwaha Krais pefalana bounai, ea' pelolama waf God nagiambamapa na'a pakwahona.
48005005	Ea' owa' etin. Ape' mombale'efa Kraisa pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi. Ea' mogawa endilisi mape mohafa anona nemaf God ni'i ape' bu'upai ma okom ananinai.
48005006	Emi egafis sepe la'ifisa Krais Jisas, waf anama matopa' alopanai o owa' motopa' alopanai anama falafunai atona owa' la'ifina. Ea' waf sombale'efa Krais atona nawalapai waf ukup maimailasanai. Amama bu'wami endilisi mikila'.
48005007	Fowa' ipe' pape panda' waf bu'unai pailana andeande'. Ea' dei' ata' emi nahopa eafa ipe' ma owa' pila basef endilisimi wapoti? Emi namboma ukup ipe'imi pakwaha basef amama?
48005008	God ina nanda'epa na'ama, owa'. Anan nofalepa pafi'mai anan.
48005009	Anom basef ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Anom yis manda' bret natifi, amama manda' bret hianai nataga lu'una.”
48005010	Ae' alomepa ukup etifim mape la'ifim maloma Dembinai. Ea' egawepa ipe' nambimb ina pila anom basef, owa'. Pila okom ae'anai atona. Ae' ina egawa aman anama namboma ukup ipe'imi, owa'. Ea' hapainai, anan nanda' waf aonai anona nemaf God nose'ana nimanimi.
48005011	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i endilisi ae' awalipipa ma basef amama patopa' alopanai, dei' maina esis sa'i sose'e nimanimi? I'i ae' i'ipipa basef amama, esis ina si'i sehe, owa'. Ea' ae' a'ipipa basef bu'wami ma Krais naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Ea' esis ukup aom sa'i sose'e nimanimi.
48005012	Amam amama mamboma opalef ipe'imi, andeande'ma motopa'mama alop anama tu'wanina amamunai atona hi'ilana!
48005013	Endilisi ipe' sahin owan, God nofalipei ma pepe wafifipa andeande'. Na'ama ipe' ukup mi'i, ape' mape andeande' wafifipa, dei' andeande'ma monda' waf alop atona. Ipe' ina ukup mi'i na'ama owa'. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi penda' maol etifigin pindagigiambanama.
48005014	Dei' main, mi'uli God naso' Mosesanai hianai nape nomona basef amama atom ma'i, “Ipe' ukup mimila epes isima hiesi si'i ukup maila ipe' etipa.”
48005015	I'i ipe' penda' lopa' fitap nope la'afena ipe' etipa, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama ipe' hipei pendakolas pesa pewala etin!
48005016	Basef ae' a'iami amama. Ipe' pembale'efa Ambal Bu'unai Godi pefe'. I'i ipe' pilam penda'am na'ama, ina anona nemaf pila waf apinai, owa'.
48005017	Ape' mogawa opaf apinai na'i nohogofa Ambal Bu'unai Godi, ea' Ambal Godi na'i nohogofa opaf apinai. Amam biam mandahihianama mafitap mape. Ea' amamaga ipe' pa'i pienda'ami ina la'ifipama panda'am, owa'.
48005018	I'i ipe' pila Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona, ipe' ina ata' pila mi'uli esis Juda sailanai, owa'.
48005019	Waf opaf apinai epes hiesi sogawana ea' nape alihina. Anama na'ama. So'a waol, waf aonai, ukup mohafema waf aonai,
48005020	sandagala sanifela god baso'omunai, sanda' mu'uhup, sanda' ufial ma'akw, waf nefala enis naumbih, ukup mapoma esis etis, lopa' fitap, waf kowalasa anom amamaga enis epesi, ukup wandafum, basef wandafumi sondaha pepe'ma biefis, sowala wambotagw,
48005021	ukup aoma kowalasa amamaga enis epesi, sanda' spak sahaga sagaol, sa' gwa'aimi maloma embel la'ifimi hiami ma sanda' awalef awami, ea' waf naninani aonai na'ama. Fowa' a'ipipa dei' i'ipipa wapoti'. Emi egafis sanda' waf anama aonai, anona nemaf ina sefe' suwis wambel Godi, owa'.
48005022	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapai waf bu'unai na'ama. Waf ukup maimaila enis epes, danifel, opalef awanemi, waf nape natilisa sonda'mena waf aonai, waf sati uwahipisanai, waf ukup bo'oma enis epes nigiambamas, nanda' amamaga andeande' ma naep epesi God wapoti',
48005023	waf so'umbilanai, naloma waf ukup bo'omi mapaisa sumafi alop andeande'. Owa' anom basefa mi'uli atotona nape lu'una nikila' waf anama bu'unai, owa'.
48005024	Emi egafis Krais Jisasi saunda opalef apimi mail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai maloma waf naninani ukup mohafemanai naloma naninani aonai.
48005025	Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nase'apa ambal namunai napaipa. Ea' dei' ape' mila waf ananinai mefe'.
48005026	Ape' ina mosambala basef mefela agof ape'imi atom, mi'i basef moloma alupusi ape'isi mondahihianamama anona waf, owa'. Ape' ina kowalapa ma enis epes soloma amamaga asasimi, owa'.
48006001	Sahin owan, ipe' i'i piti enin epen ipe'ini nenda' anona waf aonai, ipe' enipa pape la'ifipama Ambal Bu'unai Godi pigiambaman pi'ipan so'uso'umbel. Ipe' hipei atona etin pindumafuma andeande' ma waf ipe' panda'anai. Na'ama Satan nogwamba ipe' wapoti'.
48006002	Ipe' pigiambama sahin owan ipe'isi ma pefa' nimanimi asasimi. Penda' waf anama nefe' nondahama mi'uli Kraisi endilisi.
48006003	I'i enin epen okom ni'i nembaso'am ni'i enin agel lu'unai ma enin agel a'an, epen inima nambaso'ma okom ananinai atona.
48006004	Epes hiesi atona etin ata' sowaloga maol asasinai deindei', bo'ona o aona. I'i bo'ona, epen inima nindanifel ma maol anama ananinai. Ea' enin maol a'ana newaloga maol enin epeni.
48006005	Amam nematawa hiesi atona etin anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi asasimi deindei'.
48006006	Emi egafis sefa' basef Godi, esis ukup mi'i sowaloga amamaga bu'wami asasimi sose'ana tu'wanim mefe'ma epen gawainai nawalipami.
48006007	Ipe' ina pembaso'ma ipe' etipa pi'i God okom nase'anai gawa a'anai, owa'. I'i enin epen newa anom amamaga aof ananinai, anona nemaf amamaga amama atom nitanima nela'am wapoti'.
48006008	I'i epen inima nenda' maol neloma wafa opaf apinai ananinai, nambimb waf anama atona nonda' epen inima awen nega' hegililan. Ea' emi egafis senda' maol seloma waf Ambal Bu'unai Godi, nambimb Ambal anama nowalapai ambal namunai ma epes isima sope andeande' la'ela'ef.
48006009	Amama atom dei' ape' ina ala'uta napa ma monda' waf bu'unai, owa'. Monda'ana la'ela'ef. I'i bihiguf ape'imi monda' maol la'ifina, anona nemaf mola' gwa'aimi bu'wami endilisi.
48006010	I'i ape' muti eaf bu'unai, monda' waf bu'unai ma epes hiesi migiambamas atona etin. Ape' monda'ana na'ama etin la'ifipa esis sahin owan sombale'efa Dembinai mikila' manda'ana enis epes.
48006011	Ipe' piti amef amama lu'wami dei' ahapila pen lagel ae'anai anda'mepami.
48006012	Anom amam la'ifim endilisi ma'i motopa'mepa alop ipe'inai. Dei' maina amam manda'am na'ama? Ma'i mofa' agof lu'wami ma naep epesi. Amam ukup ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Na'ama enis epes sogawa afa' si'i afa' wawalipasa basefa Jisas Krais naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' sohafa oga'.”
48006013	Ina enis epes saila mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesani andeande', owa'. Amam matopa' alop amamunai wapoti', ina mailana andeande', owa'. Ma'i motopa' alop ipe'inai ma mofa' agof lu'wami ma mi'ipa epes hiesi mi'i, “Amam Galesia mofa' ikwaf anama matopa' alop amamunai.”
48006014	Ea' ae' owa'etin. Andaiwa' ma epes sefela agel ae'anai lu'una, owa'. Ae' andanifel ma efela agela Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais atona, anan naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai. Lawag anama Kraisi atona, dei' waf etapanai naga' nomon opaf ae'anai, dei' ae' si'i epen naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ma naep epes sape etapi.
48006015	Waf anama matopa' alop o owa' motopa' alop, anama falafunai atona. Ea' God nanda'apa mataga dambaipa, waf anama endilisinai.
48006016	Emi egafis saila basef amama ae' a'i opalef asasimi mope awanem, ea' ae' a'i God niti uwahipis nigiambamas soloma epes Israel hiesi Godi.
48006017	Basef akutaimi amama. Ae' andaiwa' ma anona aman nose'e nimanimi wapoti', owa'. Dei' main, amam amama mahe melegw amama Jisasi mape alop ae'anai.
48006018	Ipe' alupipei, ae' a'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nigiambamepa na'a pepe andeande'. Dei' okom Ananinai nope molomago ambagof ipe'imi. Endilisi.
49001001	Ae' Pol okom Godi atona nandandepe ataga aposel Jisas Kraisi ma anda' maol ananinai awalapa basef ananimi. Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' epes Godi pape Efesusi, ipe' pembale'efa Krais Jisas andeande' pape la'ifipa palomana.
49001002	Ae' a'i God ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais migiambamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa pepe opalef awanem.
49001003	Ape' ata' minifela Ahalomapa God, ahalomana Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais! Ama Krais atona anan nase'apa amamaga hiami bu'wami atom mape otaga ilifi magiambamapa ukup maloma ambagof ape'imi ma fe' pe ki ape'inai mope andeande'.
49001004	Dei' main, fowa' God ina dei' nanda' etap anae', ata' owa', nemaf anama nosahe'apa ea' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais. Mape amam nematawa Godi ma waf aonai ofagema a'apa.
49001005	Anan okom nainailapa endilisi. Amama atom Anan nali' okom na'i nosahe'apa nofa'apa numafiapa mataga si'i awasi ananipai. Anan naila okom Ananinai atona nanda'ama lagel Jisas Kraisi atona.
49001006	God nanda'am na'ama ma ape' mefela agel Ananinai minifelona ma waf bu'unai Anan nanda'anai nagiambamapa na'a. Waf anama nawalapa pepel nafifili Ananinai. Anan nagiambamapa na'a nase'apa nogalomana okom Ananinai nainailana endilisi, ea' mape la'ifipa malomana.
49001007	Krais atona naga' natagahepa ma waf aonai natalepa esimbel Ananimi. Ea' nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Anan nanda'am na'ama si'i okom Godi nainailapa endilisi ma waf nagiambamapa na'a.
49001008	Waf anama nase'apana si'ina endilisi. Nase'apana naloma gawa hianai naloma gawa mogawa maina waf bu'unai o aonai.
49001009	-
49001010	Okom ananinai atona na'i nigiambamapa ea' nihi'ambapa basef ananimi mali' mandambaho' mape okom Ananinai atona. Basef amama mape na'ama. Anan nali' okom na'i Krais nope Dembinai ma amamaga hiami mape ilif etapi hi'ilam maloma epes wapoti'. Nogota anama anan atona okom na'ianai notaga, God nose'ana amamaga amama mofe' lagel Kraisi atona ma Anan atona nope Dembinai ma amamaga amama hi'ilam maloma epes wapoti'.
49001011	God nanda' amamaga amama hi'alam naila fowa' damba damba Anan okom na'iam. Ea' nosahe'apa mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais. Dei' main, Anan naila okom ananinai si'i fowa' damba damba okom na'iam.
49001012	Ape' Juda atepa mogawa endilisi mape mohafa Krais, God nandandepapa na'ama ma monda' epes hiesi sefela agel Ananinai lu'una. Agel anama ananinai bu'unai endilisi.
49001013	Ea' dei' ipe' wapoti', nemaf anama peme' basef endilisimi bu'wami Godi, nofa'epa petanimani pembale'efa Krais pape la'ifipama anan. Nogota anama ipe' pembale'efa Krais, God nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nosahe'epa. Ambal Bu'unai anama si'i anona ikwaf God nanda'mepanai ma nihi'ambepa na'ama.
49001014	Nihi'ambepa ape' mogawa endilisi la'ela'ef mopoma anona nemaf nose'apa amamaga bu'wami ape' epes ananipai. Anan nose'apam nemaf anama notagahepa nofa'apa mofe' mope molomana. God nanda'am na'ama ma ape' monda' epes hiesi sefela agel ananinai lu'una, agel anama bu'unai endilisi.
49001015	-
49001016	Basef do'okimi endilisimi atom. Amama atom dei' la'ela'ef anda'mepa beten ipe'. Nemaf anama nali'i ame' basefa waf ipe'inai pembale'efa Dembinai Jisasa ukup bo'om ea' maimaila amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Ae' anda'am nemaf anama afi'i afi'i ataga dei', ae' ina akwahipa ma beten, owa'etin. Ae' okom na'i ipe' anda' beten anifela Goda ipe'.
49001017	Jisas Krais anan Dembinai ape'inai. Ae' anda' beten la'ela'ef nimeguf hiami ahali' God, Anan Dembinai Jisas Kraisi, Anan Ahalomapa ape'inai nafifili pepel napainai. Anda' beten ahali'ana ma nose'epa gawa bu'unai ukup ipe'imi pegawa basef Godi ofagema mandawalap alihima ipe'. Ama pegawa God andeande'.
49001018	Ae' anda' beten ahali'ana ma nonda' ukup ipe'imi pegawa waf bu'unai ma amamaga bu'wami Anan nofalepa pape pehafami. Ma pegawa ambal namunai mape la'ela'ef noloma wambel Godi nahopagoma howalagon endilisima. Amama God nandondomba ma anona nemaf na'i nose'apa moloma epes ananisi endilisi.
49001019	Anda' beten ahali'ana ma ipe' pegawa pepel ananinai la'ela'ef nanda' maola opalef nomon ape' epes mombale'efanai. Amama lu'um endilisi. Amama na'ama etin si'i pepel ananinai lu'unai
49001020	nanda'ama nafela Jisas nohafel nakwaha ga' ananinai. La'ifimi amama atom God nanda'ana nape wa'ol lagel ananinai da'isinai gani heven.
49001021	Ea' Krais dei' nape Dembinai ilif endilisi ma dembemi agufumi hiami maloma pepel hianai. Anan nikila' agof lu'wami hi'alam epes dei' sape nogota anae', ea' isima sope nogota nigi' neatagai wapoti'.
49001022	God nanda' amamaga hiami mape owina Anan atona. Ea' nanda'ana nape dembinai ilif endilisi ma epes hiesi saloma amamaga hiami ma nagiambama esis sios hiesi sembale'efanai.
49001023	Esis sembale'efanai si'i alop si'ina Kraisi. Anan nape anama hiagoma numafi amamaga hiami hi'alam nape nomona esis sembale'efanai hiesi si'isa Anan atona endilisi.
49002001	Basef ipe'imi mape na'ama. Fowa' ipe' panda' waf naninani aonai nahepa paga'. Dei' main, ipe' ina pagawa God, owa'. Pesambalona panda' waf aonai.
49002002	Nogota anama ipe' ata' paila waf aonai atona etapanai ea' paila basefa aman aonai. Anan la'ifinai numafi pepel aonai nape la'afen numafi etap naloma otaga. La'ifimi amama mataga aman anama aonai dei' numafi epes isima sesambala basef Godi.
49002003	Fowa' ape' hiapai manda' waf aonai si'i epes isima sesambala basef Godi sanda'ami, maila nomonas opaf apinai atona. Ape' maila opaf apinai ma ukup ape'imi atom. Amama atom dei' ata' mape owina okom wandafunai Godi, si'i enis epes etapasi.
49002004	Ea' God nati owahipipa endilisi ape' epes, okom lu'unai nainailapa.
49002005	Amama atom dei' nanda'apa mataga namepa. Ape' mape si'i saga'i ma waf aonai. Ea' nanda'apa mataga namepa mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Krais. Amama okom lu'unai Godi nagiambamepa nefa'epa pitanimani.
49002006	God nafelapa mape namepa maloma Jisas Krais, mofa' agel lu'unai mape la'ifipa maloma anan, ea' ukup mapomana ilif heven.
49002007	God nanda'apa na'ama ma nogota anae' dei' nafe' nafe' notaga owagama nihi'ambas okom ananinai nainailapa nigiambamapa na'a, ma epes hiesi soloma ensel hiami sogawa okom anama ananinai lu'unai endilisi nandawalap alihina ma ape' na'ama. Anan nanda'apa mape la'ifipa maloma Krais Jisas.
49002008	Dei' main, God nagiambamepa na'a, amama atom dei' nofa'epa pitanimani pembale'efa Krais. Amamaga amama ina ipe' etipa panda'am, owa'etin. God atona nase'epam na'a.
49002009	Amama ina si'i amamaga ipe' panda' maol pefa'ami, owa'. Ea' ina enin epen etitin la'ifina nefela agel ananinai atona ma amamaga amama, owa'.
49002010	Dei' main, God atona nanda'apa mape. Lagel Krais Jisasi atona nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ma waf bu'unai ape' mailana mafe'.
49002011	Ape' mogawa amama andeande'. Lagof amam Judai atom matopa' alop amamunai. Ea' esis Juda safela esis etis sa'i epes satopa' alop. Ea' ipe' fowa' pape pelolama God owa' Judaipei, sofalepa sa'i, “Owa' petopa' alopi.” Basef amama ma'i waf alopanai ande' atogon.
49002012	Ipe' pegawa nogota anama fowa' ata' pape pelolama God, ipe' ata' pape ande' laogona Krais, pape ande'ma epes hiesi Israel epes Godi, ea' pape ande'ma basef endilisimi atom God na'iam naloma esis. Basef amama na'i endilisimi atom nagiambamapa. Ipe' fowa' ina anom amamaga bu'wami pape pehafam anona nemaf, owa'. Ipe' owa' pembale'efa God.
49002013	Ea' ipe' fowa' pape laogona God, esimbel Kraisi atom ma ga' ananinai mofa'epa dei' makolasepa pafi'i pape felefele'ma Goda lagel Jisasi atona.
49002014	Dei' main, Anan atona ofagonama opaf awanena. Anan nakolasa ape' Juda maloma ipe' anona wambota epes hipei fowa' pelolama God, dei' mataga mape epes etifipa. Anan atona nahape' waf anama nawala ape' Juda maloma ipe' owa' Judaipei. Ea' anan atona natopa' waf anama naumbihinai lopa' fitapanai.
49002015	Ga' Kraisi atona Anan nali'amona basefa mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai maloma anom basef tu'wanim mape mi'uli anama. Anan nanda'am na'ama nokolasa epes wambotagw biam, ape' Juda maloma ipe' owa' Judaipei mataga si'i epen etitin dambainai. Ama mope opalef awanem mope etifigin felefele'ma God.
49002016	Krais naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai nakolasa epes sape wambotagw biam sataga si'i alop atotona. Ea' ga' ananinai natagaha waf asasinai naumbihinai lopa' fitapanai naga' hi'alana.
49002017	Anan dei' nafi'i na'i basef bu'wami nawalapam na'i, “Dei' ipe' pape opalef etifim paloma God naloma epes.” Anan na'ipipa basef amama fowa' pape laogona God pelolamana, paloma ape' Juda ananipai mape felefele'ma Anan wapoti'.
49002018	Lagel Kraisi atona ape' epes hiesi mape wambotagw biam mape eaf alihina mafe'ma Ahalomapa Goda Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona.
49002019	Ipe' dei' ina ata' pape si'i laugunisi dalaisi etap a'asi, owa'. Ipe' pape paloma esis amam nematawa epes hiesi Godi, wambota Ananinai.
49002020	Ipe' pape si'i ipat Godi nape nala'ana. Anan nanda'ana natoma ilifa afa' aposel waloma amam profet nawafa si'i olalefa ipat anama. Ea' Krais Jisas anan atona si'i olaf nali'i la'ifinai endilisi ma ipat anama.
49002021	Faulaga natoma la'ifina ma Krais, ea' la'ifina andeande' nape. Dei' God ata' nanda' ipat anama nala'ana etin nataga lu'una ma nope bo'ona ma Dembinai atona.
49002022	Ipe' wapoti' pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Krais, dei' God nape nakolasipa etifigin la'ela'ef paloma enis Kristen alupusi hiesi. Ea' nanda'epa pataga si'i ipat endilisi God napeinai ma Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona.
49003001	Krais nakolasa epes hiesi wambotagw biam esis Juda saloma esis ina Juda sataga etifis. Amama atom dei' ae' Pol, Krais Jisas nanda'e anda' kalabusa agiambama ipe' epes fowa' pelolama Godi.
49003002	Endilisi, ape' hiapai mape etapi God nagiambamapa na'a. Amama anan nase'e ma imafiam enda' maol ewalapam ewalipipam.
49003003	Maol anama Anan nasi'ianai nape na'ama. Basef Ananimi bu'wami fowa' ata' mandambaho', dei' God nawalapameam alihim anda'am bandam mail pas amama.
49003004	Ama i'i pitalifa basef amama, pegawa okom ae'anai ma basef hiami Kraisi mali' mape mandambaho'.
49003005	Fowa' la'ela'ef God ina nawalapam alihima enis epes, owa'. Ea' dei' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nawalapam alihima afa' aposel waloma amam profet ananifai.
49003006	Basef amama bu'wami Godi mape na'ama. Epes hiesi owa' Judaisi hi'alas fowa' sololama Godi saloma ipe' pataga etifipa paloma ape' Israel. Ea' ipe' hipei paloma ape' Juda mofa' amamaga bu'wami hiami God na'i endilisi nase'apami ma lagel Krais Jisasi.
49003007	God nandandepa ae' anda' maol awalapa basef amama bu'wami. Anan okom nainaili nagiambame na'a nanda'e la'ifiwi, amama atom dei' ape anda' maol anama.
49003008	Endilisi ae' ape falafuwei agi' endilisi ma amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Ea' Anan okom nainaili nagiambame na'a ma anda' maol awalipa esis sololama Godi basef bu'wami ma Krais. Waf anama naloma basef amama bo'om endilisi mikila' gawa epes hiesi, ea' ina la'ifisa sagawa ofagema amama, owa'.
49003009	Ea' God nagiambamas na'a nihi'ambasa okom Ananinai maloma waf hianai Ananinai epes hiesi. Okom anama naloma waf anama ananinai hianai damba damba nape nandambaho' nafi'i nataga dei'. Ea' dei' nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam mataga mape nase'e maol anama awalapa amama mape mandambahi'i alihim.
49003010	Fowa' ata' mandambaho', dei' na'i esis amam nematawa Godi sombale'efanai sihi'ambam amam dembemi agufumi maloma amamaga pepel hianai nape heveni mogawa gawa Godi. Gawa anama hianai ananinai naninani lu'una sa'ona hi'alana.
49003011	Anan nanda'am na'ama etin si'i okom ananinai atona nape la'ela'ef na'iama lagel dembinai ape'inai Krais Jisasi atona.
49003012	Ape' mape la'ifipa maloma anan mombale'efana. Amama atom ape' ina umbamahapa ma mefe'ma God, owa'. Ape' ukup la'ifim endilisi ea' dei' mafe' felefele'ma Anan.
49003013	Ea' dei' a'ipipa a'i nimanimi amama dei' efa'ama igiambamepa, na'ama piti amama ukup aom, pa'i ipe' ina la'ifipa, owa'. Pepe la'ifipa si'i ipe' dembipei. Dei' main, nimanimi amama magiambamepa.
49003014	Ae' okom na'i Krais nakolas ape' Juda maloma ipe' ina Judaipei mataga etifipa, amama atom dei' indiwa nembawa etawa anda' beten anifela Ahalome.
49003015	Ape' hiapai mape etap maloma sape ilif wapoti', ape' amam nematawa wambotagw hiami mofa' agof ape'imi ma Anan atona.
49003016	Ae' anda' beten ahali'ana na'ama. A'i God nigiambamepa ma pepel nafifilili ananinai lu'unai endilisi. A'i pepel Ananinai atona nonda'epa pepe la'ifipama opalef ipe'imi nomona Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona.
49003017	A'i bale'ef ipe'inai atona Krais nope opalef ipe'imi nomon la'ela'ef. Ea' anda' beten ahali' Goda waf ukup maimailasanai nope si'ina ma ipe' ma nonda'epa la'ifipa pila waf anama si'i nombalef lawag nahapila etap nowala la'ifina.
49003018	A'i ipe' pefa' pepel neloma amam nematawa Godi hiesi pegawa okom Kraisi nainailipa, anama lu'una endilisi nafe' laogon endilisi nafe' wa'ol wa'ol nalata gani ilif endilisi ea' nowala nafe' owin endilisi nafe' etin.
49003019	Ea' anda' beten ahali' Goda basef akutaimi na'ama. A'i ipe' pegawa okom anama Kraisi endilisi, anama nikila' gawa epes hiesi. A'i ipe' pegawa okom anama Kraisi ma pepe si'ipa endilisi ma waf bu'unai God okom na'ianai hianai.
49003020	God anan la'ifinai. La'ifimi amama Ananimi dei' manda' maol opalef ape'imi nomon, amama la'ifim endilisi. La'ifimi amama atom anan la'ifinai ma nonda' amamaga hiami mikila' basef hiami manda' beten mahali'anami hi'alam maloma ukup ape' hiapai wapoti'.
49003021	Amama atom dei' ape' epes Godi mombale'efana minifela God mefela agel Ananinai lu'una ma Krais Jisas la'ela'ef mofe' mofe' anona nemaf owagama gani. Endilisi.
49004001	Basef amama mali'i endilisimi atom. Ea' dei' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi ma basef la'ifimi amama. A'i fe' pe ipe'inai nefe' dende'ma waf bu'unai okom Godi na'ianai nofalapa ma milana. Ae' anda' kalabusa maol anama Dembinai dei' a'ipipa na'ama afela ukup ipe'imi.
49004002	Ipe' pepe la'afen endilisi ma epes hiesi penda'as sa'osa'ombemas. Esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, pinindifa ukup ipe'imi la'ifim pepe pitilis. Ipe' ina ukup mohafel aom, owa'. Ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi pigiambamas pefa' nimanimi pelomas.
49004003	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nakolasepa mape opalef etifim. Ea' dei' penda' maol la'ifipa penda' waf anama neloma waf ukup awanemi atom. Waf anama opalef etifimanai nandawalap nape na'ama.
49004004	Alop etifina, Ambal Bu'unai Godi etifina. Amama na'ama etin si'i amamaga etifim, God nali' nofalepa pape pehafana.
49004005	Dembinai atotona, bale'ef etifina, baptais etifim.
49004006	God ahalomapa ape' hiapai anan atotona nape dembinai ma ape' hiapai mombale'efana. Anan nape anama hiagoma, ea' nape nomona ape' hiapai.
49004007	Ape' hiapai atona etin mofa' anom amamaga bu'wami, dende'ma ikwaf Krais nawalogam nase'apam na'a.
49004008	Si'i buk Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, “Nemaf anama anan nafe' gani ilif, nefa' epes hiesi sanda' kalabusi nafe' nalata ilif. Ea' nase'asa presen bu'unai esis.”
49004009	Basef ma'i, “Nalata ilif,” ofagema ma'i main? Amama ma'i Anan nali' nafi'i nowala gani etap owin endilisi.
49004010	Ea' aman anama atona nowala etap owin endilisi dei' notambel nalata ilif wapoti' nafe' gani ilif endilisi nikila' otaga ma nanda' amamaga hiami hi'alam si'im endilisi ma Anan atona.
49004011	Anan atona nase'apa presen bu'unai na'ama. Anom amam nandandepama manda' maol aposel, anom nandandepama manda' maol profet. Ea' anom nandandepama manda' maola mefe' mi'ipasa basef bu'wami Kraisi epes hiesi. Ea' anom nase'ama gawa mope pasto tisa mumafi esis Kristen mawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi ma monda' esis amam nematawa Kraisi sotaga la'ifis.
49004012	Krais nase'apa presen anama bu'unai ma manda' ape' amam nematawa Godi mondondombam mope la'ifipama monda' maol bu'unai Ananinai. Ape' amam nematawa Godi si'i alop Kraisi. God nase'apa presen anama bu'unai ma ape' mefa'ana manda' hiesi amam nematawa Kraisi sataga la'ifisa sanda' maol Godi.
49004013	Ea' mope mefe' mefe' ma anona nemaf ape' hiapai mombale'efana motaga opalef etifim endilisi ma bale'ef ape'inai noloma gawa etifina ma anan Nogalomana Godi. Ape' motaga epes la'ifipa endilisi mombale'efana si'i epes dambes ea', motaga na'ama etin si'i ikwafa waf bu'unai Kraisi atona.
49004014	I'i ape' motaga na'ama, ape' ina ata' mape mundati si'i awasi gawa a'asi wapoti', owa'. I'i epes isima sogawa endilisi sakikipapa ma waf baso'maimi si'ipapa basef hiami mamumami, amama ina mamboma ukup ape'imi mape si'i naoh makoto'ma kanu. Amama ina makoto'mapa manda'apa si'i uf nafapusapa mafe' mafi'i, owa'.
49004015	Ape' ukup la'ifim ea' mi'i basef endilisimi atoma waf ukup maimailasanai. Ape' mi'i basef endilisimi na'ama ma mila waf Kraisi bu'unai hi'ilana. Ea' motaga la'ifipa mikila' waf mali' mailanai. Ape' monda'am na'ama mefe' motaga dende'ma ikwaf Kraisi, Anan dembinai ma ape'.
49004016	Anan atona dembinai ma ape' Kristen hiapai. Ea' ape' Kristen hiapai si'i alop wa'awa'ana nape etifina la'ifipa mandagigiambanama etin si'i gigililimb mowa' nigis hiami lu'wami so'umi motaga la'ifimi. I'i alop wa'awa'ana hianai nonda' maol nondahama ikwaf Anan na'ianai, alop anama si'ina nape na'ama. Ape' amam nematawa Kraisi mandagigiambanama mape la'ifipa mikila' fowa' mape. Alop anama nataga la'ifina etina ukup maimailas sandagigiambanama.
49004017	Dei' a'i i'ipipa anom basef. Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Dembinai dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifima ma agel Ananinai. Ipe' ina ata' pila waf anama sololama Godi sailanai, owa'. Hapainai. Epes isima ukup asasimi mapoma waf falafunai atona.
49004018	Gawa ma ukup asasimi si'i owamb atona. Esis sololama gawa bu'unai, satotopa' basef, opalef asasimi mase'as. Amama atom dei' sape ande' laogona ambal namunai Godi.
49004019	Esis ina ata' ambagof aoma waf anama aonai asasinai, owa'etin. Safe' sawis endilisi ma waf aonai naninani hianai naloma waf aonai so'a waolanai ma saila waf aonai hianai. Saila waf anama la'ela'efa ukup mohafel endilisi ma sanda' waf anama aonai wapoti'.
49004020	Ea' ipe' ina pelafa waf anama ma Krais, owa'.
49004021	Ae' egawa endilisi ipe' pegawa basef Kraisi ea'. Ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Anan, amam mawalipipa ma basef amama endilisimi Jisas nihi'ambapa.
49004022	Fowa' ipe' pelafa basef amama na'ama. Dei' kwahana opaf anama fowa'inai ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Opaf anama ofagonama waf baso'mainai anama dei' nape nahambombagapa. Dei' kwahona opaf anama fowa'inai.
49004023	Ea' ukup ipe'imi motaga dambaim
49004024	pefa' opaf dambainai. God nanda' opaf anama dambainai nataga si'i anan atona ma waf bu'unai endilisinai.
49004025	Ea' ipe' hipei pekwaha waf baso'mainai ma pi'i basef endilisimi atoma epes hiesi. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa ape' hiapai mape alop wa'awa'ana ea' mataga alop atotona.
49004026	I'i opalef ipe'imi aom mope la'ela'ef, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama ipe' penda' waf aonai opalef aom la'ela'ef pefe' aon newala naso'. Na'ama owa'.
49004027	Na'ama piwisi' utama Satan.
49004028	Emi egafis sanda' wali, esis ina ata' sonda' wal wapoti', owa'. Esis dei' sonda' maola lagof asasimi ma atuwasi sotagama amamaga sose'asam epes isima amamaga a'asi.
49004029	Basef awami ina motaga malogof ipe'imi, owa'. Pi'i basef bu'wami atom pi'ipasam mandahama fe' pe ki asasinai. Penda'am na'ama ma pigiambama epes isima some' basef ipe'imi.
49004030	Ipe' ina penda' anona waf aonai ma penda' Ambal Bu'unai Godi aona, owa'. Anan anona ikwaf Godi ma God nandandepepa ma pape ananipei etipa si'ipa ma anona nemaf notagahepa waf aonai nofa'epa petanimani pepan andeande'.
49004031	Ipe' pekwaha waf hianai aonai opalef aomunai migimigah, ukup awomunai basef findiwaimi awami. Waf anama aonai hianai nahambombaga epesi.
49004032	Ipe' penda' waf so'umbilinai ma esis alupusi ea' piti uwahipis. Ipe' pekwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'mepanai, si'i God nakwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ma agel Kraisi.
49005001	Ipe' pila waf God nanda'anai. Anan okom nainailipa pape si'i awasi ananipei.
49005002	Ipe' pila waf anama ukup maimailasanai si'i Krais okom nainaila ape' hiapai nakwaha ambal Ananinai nagiambamapa. Anan nase'ana alop Ananinai God naga' nondolalimana si'i ofa bu'unai alogw bu'wami ma'ami.
49005003	Waf anama hianai so'a waolanai, neloma waf aonai alop atonai neloma kowalasanai, ipe' ina penda'ana, owa'. Basefa waf anama ina mataga la'afena ipe', owa'. Dei' main, ine' andeande'ma ape' amam nematawa Godi manda' waf anama, owa'.
49005004	Ipe' ina penda' basef awami o basef mamumami awami, o basef salamalimi awami, owa'. Waf anama ina andeande', owa'. Andeande'ma ipe' pinifela God.
49005005	Ipe' pegawa ma emi egafis sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai, o emi egafis ukup awami kowalasa amamaga enis epesi si'i saila god baso'omunai, epes isima ina anona nemaf suwis wambota Godi naloma Kraisi, owa'.
49005006	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama peme' basef enis epesi atom somboma ukup ipe'imi penda' waf anama aonai. Dei' main, waf anama God okom wandafuna ma epes isima sanda'anai sosambala basef Ananimi.
49005007	Amama atom dei' ina penda' waf anama pendao'oma pelomas, owa'. Hapainai.
49005008	Dei' main, fowa' ipe' ata' panda waf aonai si'i pape owamb. Ea' dei' pape la'ifipama paloma Jisas Dembinai, amama atom dei' nahaponepa papoma si'i pape howalagoma. Ipe' pefe' si'i epes safe' alip howalagoma.
49005009	Epes safe' alipi sawalapai waf bu'unai, endilisinai hianai.
49005010	Ea' ipe' pendandomba ma pegawa maina waf Dembinai okom na'ianai.
49005011	Ipe' ina peloma epes isima sanda' waf aonai si'i sape owambi pendao'oma atogon etin, owa'. Waf anama wafinai atona ina nola gwa'imi bu'wami, owa'. Ipe' pekwaha epes isima hiesi sanda' waf anama aonai.
49005012	Dei' main, ae' ina ewalapa basefa waf anama aonai epes isima sandambaho' sanda'anai, owa'. Ae' ambal aona ie'iam i'i basef amama.
49005013	Ea' maina waf nagwahis mafifili mawalapanai, ofagena nataga nape nandawalap.
49005014	Dei' main, maim amamaga mataga alihim mandawalap, amama mataga mape howalagoma. Amama atom dei' anom basef mape ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' epes pa'ihi dei' hafel mehip pekwaha koh! Ipe' pehafel hi'agif ea' Krais nese'epa howalagon mififima ipe'.”
49005015	Ipe' pape howalagoma ea'. Ea' pimafia fe' pe ki ipe'inai. Ipe' ina pepe si'i epes isima gawa a'asi, owa'. Ipe' pepe si'i epes isima gawaisi.
49005016	Dei' ipe' nemaf ata' napomepa ma penda' waf Godi. Ea' penda'ana la'ela'ef nemaf anae'. Dei' main, nimeguf amama sanda' waf aonai atona.
49005017	Ea' ipe' dei' ina pepe si'i epes gawa a'asi ukup mese'epa, owa'. Pegawa andeande'ma okom Dembinai na'iami.
49005018	Ea' ipe' ina pea' embel la'ifimi pehaga pegaol, owa'. Waf anama nahambombaga ipe'. Ipe' aho'ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nopaipa si'ipa.
49005019	Ea' pi'i basef bu'wami atom peloma enis epes hiesi ma penda' awalef bu'wami mape Buk Songi moloma awalef lotuwimi moloma awalef manda' epesi sataga la'ifis. Ipe' penda' awalef pefela agel Dembinai la'ifipa maloguf moloma ukup ipe'imi.
49005020	La'ela'ef pendanifela ahalomapa God ama amamaga hiami ma agel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi atona.
49005021	Ipe' pila okom Kraisi ea' pefe' owina esis alupusi ipe'isi.
49005022	Ipe' nematawa pila ukup moloma basef amam wauhiamipei si'i paila okom Dembinai.
49005023	Dei' main, aman nape balaga nali'ma akwa'w, si'i Krais nape balaga nali'ma sios amam nematawa Godi. Ea' esis hiesi si'i alop si'ina Ananinai. Epes isima Anan atona nofa'as sotanimani.
49005024	Epes isima sios safe' owina Krais, ea' na'ama etin ipe' nematawa wapoti', pepe owina amam wahupipa ipe'imi.
49005025	Ipe' amam wapoti', ukup mimila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai, si'i Krais okom nainaila sios amam nematawa Godi, naga' naloma ambal ananinai naho'ofas.
49005026	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma sotaga epes Godi etis bo'wes si'i nasa'opas embel sataga bo'wesa basef ananimi.
49005027	Krais nanda'am na'ama ma sataga bo'wes andeande' sape Ananisi etis ma amamaga awami a'as. Ea' sape bo'wes andeande', amamaga awami a'as.
49005028	Dei' na'ama etina ipe' amam ukup mimila awau wauhiamepa si'i ukup maila alop ipe'inai atona. Emi epen okom naila waulu'mana anani'wi, anan okom naila anan wapoti'. Dei' main, esis sataga etifis.
49005029	Ape' hiapai mogawa ina anona aman atotona nandaiwa'ma alop si'ina ananinai nahana, owa'. Amam amama hiami manda' gwa'aimi mumafiana andeande', si'i Krais numafi sios amam nematawa Godi.
49005030	Dei' main, ape' epes wa'awa'ana alop Kraisi.
49005031	-
49005032	Basef amama fowa' mape mandambahi'i, lu'wami nomonas hiami. Dei' mataga alihim si'i Buk Baibel na'iam na'i, “Aman nekwaha mamasana ananisi nefe' nope la'ela'ef noloma waulu'mana anani'wi, esis bias sataga alop atotona.” Ae' okom na'i basef amama na'i Krais atona naloma sios amam nematawa Godi.
49005033	Ea' basef amama ofagema ma'iam na'ama wapoti' ma ipe' epes atona etin na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' amam hipei ukup mimila wauhiamepa ipe'iwai si'i ukup maimaila ipe' etipa.” Ea' ipe' nematawa hipei wapoti' pefela agofa wauhupipa ipe'imi pinifelom pila basef amamumi.
49006001	Ipe' awasi, ipe' pila basef mamasepa ipe'isi si'i paila basef Dembinai. Waf anama bo'ona andeande'.
49006002	Dei' main, anom basefa mi'uli nape nali'i Godi basef endilisimi atom ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' pila ukup mamasepa ipe'isi ea' pefela agof asasimi.”
49006003	Basef amama ma'i esis sila ukup mamasasi, “Ma ipe' pepe andeande' nimeguf hiami etap anae'.”
49006004	Ea' ipe' ahapas ina penda' ukup awasi ipe'isi aom, owa'. Ipe' pimafias andeande' piwalipasa basef Dembinai pi'ipasa basef amama.
49006005	Ipe' agof a'epa panda' maol na'a pape la'afena agufisi ipe'isi peme' basef asasimi pefe' owina esis umbamehepamas. Ipe' penda' maol anama pila basef asasimi andeande'ma ukup etifim si'i paila basef Kraisi.
49006006	Ipe' ina penda'ama naep asasimi atom pemboma ukup asasimi atom, owa'. Penda' maol anama si'i panda' maol pape owina Krais. Penda'am na'ama etin si'i paila okom Godi ma opalef ipe'imi.
49006007	Ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi penda' maol anama andeande'. Ina panda' maola epes etis, owa'. Ipe' panda' maola Dembinai atona.
49006008	Dei' main, ipe' pegawa, i'i emi egafis sanda' maol andeande', anona nemaf Dembinai notalis nose'as amamaga bu'wami. Ea' nonda'as na'ama etina isima agof a'asi sanda' maol na'ai saloma isima sanda' maol sofa' otambai.
49006009	Ipe' agufipei pimafi isima agof a'asi sape owina ipe'i sanda'mepa maol na'ai, ipe' penda'am na'ama etina esis si'i panda'ama Dembinai atona. Ipe' pekwaha waf anama paumbalisanai. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa Dembinai nape heveni anan Dembinai ipe'inai, asasinai wapoti'. Anan ina nawaloga agof epesi ma naep ananimi, owa'etin. Anan nawaloga hiesi agufisi agof a'asi hi'alasa ikwaf bu'unai atona.
49006010	Dei' a'i enda' basef akutaimi amama. Ipe' pepe la'ifipa peloma Jisas Dambinai, pepe la'ifipama Anan atona ma pepel lagela pipitagel atona ananinai.
49006011	Ipe' pela luwaguf hiami peanda' wandafami God nasi'ipami, ma pitu la'ifipama pili'amona waf aonai baso'mainai Satani.
49006012	Dei' main? Ape' ina manda' wandaf maloma epes, owa'. Ape' manda' wandaf mapa' maloma ambagof gambefah awami mape mali'i maloma amam agufumi awami maloma amam ensel awami maloma pepel hianai aonai mumafi epes sanda' waf aonai etap anae'. Ape' mapa' maloma ambagof awami hiami mape la'afena otaga naloma etap.
49006013	Amama atom dei' pendawisa sosaf anama sanda' wandafanai hianai God nasi'ipanai hi'ilana. Ama nemaf anama aonai notaga, ipe' la'ifipama pitu la'ifipa ma pikila' amamaga meagwambaipei petofam. Ama pikila' waf aonai hi'ilana pitu la'ifipa la'ela'ef.
49006014	Ipe' pitu pendawisa sosaf anama na'ama. Ipe' pihapila basef endilisimi bu'wami si'i anona let ipe' pewahe'ana. Ea' penda' waf bu'unai nope alihina si'i sala siaot la'ifinai sanda' kapa sanda'anai nili'akwa mafatagw ipe'imi.
49006015	Ea' penda' anona waf bu'unai na'ama. Pendandombam pewalapa basef bu'wami Godi na'i epes somboma opalef sope ukup etifim solomana. Ipe' pefa' waf anama la'ifina pitu la'ifipa si'i esis sala su saitu la'ifis.
49006016	Ipe' penda' waf anama si'i amamaga amama sanda' wandafami ea' piwatani anona waf wapoti'. Pembele'efa Krais la'ifipa si'i pefa' walitap panda' wandaf. Walitap anama la'ifinai ma nohagasa amama meagwambipei hi'alimi hiami hi'ilam mafi'i aman anama aonai Satan.
49006017	God nofa'ai ipe' petanimani. Amama ipe' ukup pendanda'mam pefa'am si'i pewalo' hagw kapaimi la'ifimi balagah ipe'imi. Ea' pihapila bainat hi'alinai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasi'ipanai, anama basef Godi atom.
49006018	Ea' la'ela'ef pefa' pepel Ambal Bu'unai Godi ma penda' beten naninani hianai pehali' God. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' penda' beten. Ina pepoma noma'w, owa' Penda' beten la'ela'ef ma God nigiambama esis amam nematawa ananisi hiesi hi'ilas.
49006019	Ea' penda' betena ae' wapoti' ma maina nemaf i'ipasa basef Godi nigiambama malogel ae'anai ma basef ewalipasami. Ama ina umbamahe ewalipasa basef amama bu'wami Godi fowa' mape mandambahi'i.
49006020	Ae' awalapa basef amama, dei' amama atom mowa' lagof ae'ami sen ape anda' kalabus. Maol ae'anai anama. Ae' efa' malogel Kraisi ma ewalapa basef amama Ananimi ma epes hiesi. Ea' penda' betena Goda nohogofa umbameahe etaga la'ifiwi iwalipam si'i okom Kraisi na'iam.
49006021	Aman anama Tikikus anan alupunai endilisi ape'inai, ape' ukup ma'iana. Anan nape la'ifina ma Dembinai nanda' maol Ananinai andeande'. Anan atuwasi nofo'o nowalapa basef ni'ipipa ae' dei' ape a'imama.
49006022	Ae' a'i esapa'ana nefe'mago ipe' ma atuwasi pegawa afa' wape na'ae wape wa'imama ma nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa.
49006023	Ae' a'i God Ahalomepa naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais monda'ago opalef ipe' alupipei hipei pepe etifigin peloma God. Ea' a'i amam mese'epago waf anama ukup maimailasanai neloma bale'ef bu'unai wapoti'.
49006024	Ea' a'i God nigiambamepago na'a nonda' epes isima emi egafis ukup maimaila Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai la'ela'efi sotaga la'ifis. Waf epes isima ukup maimailasanai anama nape la'ela'ef owa' hi'ilanae. Ea' ma'um.
50001001	Ae' Pol aloma Timoti afa' biafa Krais Jisasi atofa wanda' opeh ananimi. Wanda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa Godi pape Filipai. Basef amama mafe'ma ipe' pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas paloma agufumi ipe'imi maloma amam magiambamam wapoti'.
50001002	Afa' biafa wa'i God Ahalomapa ape'inai noloma Dembinai Jisas Krais migiabamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
50001003	Maina nemaf ae' okom napoma ipe', anifela God ae'anai ma ipe'.
50001004	Ae' endanifela maina nemaf anda' betena ipe' hipei.
50001005	Dei' main, ipe' panda' waf bu'unai pagiambame awalipasa basef bu'wami Godi. Fowa' damba damba ipe' pame' basef amama bu'wami pembale'ef pandao'oma pape la'ela'ef palome pafi'i pafi'i pataga dei'.
50001006	Ea' ae' egawa endilisi, God nafela opeh bu'wami nomon opalef ipe'imi, anona nemaf nonda'am nefe' nefe' nembefam nemaf anama Krais Jisas niefi'ianai.
50001007	Ae' ahapila ipe' okom ae'anai, egawa God nigiambamepa dei' anona nemaf wapoti' na'ama etin. Amama andeande'. Dei' main, ape' manda'kolas etin manda' opeh ananimi. Nemaf anae' dei' ape kalabus o nimeguf hiami ali' awalapa basef amama bu'wami epes hiesi agiambamasa sogawa basef amama endilisimi atom, nimeguf amama hiami God nagiambamapa na'a.
50001008	Ae' a'iam endilisi ma naep Godi. Anan nogawa dahowe Krais Jisasi nafela ae' ea' okom nohafel endilisi nainailipa ma iti ipe' hipei.
50001009	Ae' anda' betena ipe' a'i ipe' ukup mimila God pendao'oma pila sahin owan hiesi ma waf anama nataga lu'una ma ipe' neloma gawa hianai neloma nomonas bu'wami pegawa basef Godi andeande'.
50001010	Anda' betena nambimb pewaloga waf hianai andeande' pegawa maina waf bu'unai o aonai. Ama nemaf Krais niefi'ianai pepe bo'wepa ofagema a'epa ma naep Godi.
50001011	Ae' anda' betena waf bu'unai Jisas Krais nawalapanai nambimb nepe si'ina ma ipe', nese'ana agel lu'unai Goda epes hiesi siti pepel nafifili Ananinai.
50001012	Alupipei, dei' a'i ipe' pegawa amamaga mali' matagama ae' ma anda' kalabus, ina masopama basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Amama manda'am mafe' lu'um endilisi ma hiesi seme'am.
50001013	Ea' soldia amama Romi mumafi ipat dembinai gavmani maloma enis epes sape na'ae esis wapoti' sogawa anda' kalabusa agel Kraisi.
50001014	Esis sahin owan hiesi ukup mapoma ae' anda' kalabus. Ea' opalef asasimi la'ifim sape la'ifisa Dembinai, sakwaha umbamahas dei' saitu la'ifis la'ela'ef sikila' fowa' sape sawalapa basef Godi.
50001015	Endilisi, enis epes kowalasa ae' efa' agel aposel ma'i mofa' agof lu'wami sowalapa basef Kraisi. Ea' enis epes saitu la'ifis sa'i sonda' waf bu'unai sagiambame ma owalapa basef bu'wami Kraisi.
50001016	Isima sogawa ae' ape na'ae ma anda' basef bu'wami Godi mataga la'ifim. Ea' esis ukup maimaili sawalapa basef bu'wami.
50001017	Ea' epes isima kowalasa ae'i dei' sawalapa basef Kraisi. Esis ina ukup mohafel endilisi ma sanda' opeh sefela agel Kraisi, owa'. Esis sanda'am na'ama ma sefela agof asasimi atom. Sa'i sowatani anom nimanimi wapoti' ma ae' ape la'ela'ef anda' kalabus.
50001018	-
50001019	Ea' hapaiwei. I'i esis ukup mimila waf endilisimi ma sowalipasa basef Kraisi o i'i enis ukup mimila waf owa' endilisinai ma sowalipasam, andanifel alomas. Dei' main, sawalapa basef Kraisi atom. Ea' nambimb endanifel wapoti' ma amama. Ipe' penda' betena ae' ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi Jisas Kraisi nagiambame. Amama atom dei' egawa nambimb ekwaha kalabus.
50001020	Ae' okom na'i egawa endilisi nambimb ae' ina ambal aona ma ekwaha basef Godi, owa'. Dei' wapoti' ae' okom la'ifina ewalipasa basef Ananimi si'i fowa' anda'am. I'i epe namowe o ega', ae' okom na'i amamaga anda'am alop ae'anai nambimb mefela agel Kraisi lu'una.
50001021	Ofagema ma ape namowe na'ama. Ape namowe ma Krais atona. Ea' i'i ega', epe andeande' elomana efa' amamaga God nese'e pe bu'unai nikila' dei' ape.
50001022	I'i ata' epe namowe la'ela'ef etap anae', nambimb enda' opeh bu'wami Godi. Ea' ae' ata' ila maina eaf? Ae' ina egawa.
50001023	Ae' okom biefina anama. Ae' okom na'i efe' epe eloma Krais. Na'ama andeande' endilisi ikila' pe etapanai.
50001024	Ea' i'i ae' ata' epe etap anae', ae' la'ifiwi ma igiambamepa. Na'ama andeande' ma ipe'.
50001025	Ae' egawa amama endilisi. Ea' egawa nambimb ata' epe la'ela'ef enda' opeh elomepa igiambamepa ma pendanifel pembale'efa Krais pikila' pali' pape.
50001026	Ama nemaf anama efo'o etaga epe elomepa, ipe' pendanifel ma Krais Jisas endilisi.
50001027	Dei' fe' ipe'inai nefe' bo'ona nila basef bu'wami Kraisi. I'i ae' efe'mago ipe', o i'i eme' basef atoma ipe', ea' hapaimi. A'i ata' egawa ipe' paitu la'ifipa opalef etifim pandagigiambanama pafela esisa sembale'efa basef amama bu'wami
50001028	Ma ipe' ina umbamehepa ma naumbih ipe'isi, owa'. Amama mihi'ambas na'ama. Nambimb esis hegililas hi'ilas, ea' ipe' owa'. Anona nemaf God nofa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande'.
50001029	Dei' main, God nase'epa waf bu'unai ma penda' opeh Kraisi. Anan ina nase'epa waf pembale'efana atona, owa'. Anan nase'epa waf anama pefa' nimanimi wapoti' ma agel Ananinai.
50001030	Fowa' efa' nimanimi lu'wami ma agel Kraisi aitu la'ifiwi si'i anda' wandaf. Amama ipe' patolom pegawam. Ea' dei' pame' ae' ata' anda'am etin la'ela'ef. Ipe' pepe pendao'oma pelome ma opeh Kraisi si'i wandaf anama.
50002001	Ipe' pefa' pepel Kraisi? Ipe' pegawa Krais okom nainailipa nanda' opalef ipe'imi mape awanem? Ipe' pape ukup etifim paloma Ambal Bu'unai Godi? Ipe' ukup mapoma pagiambama ipe' atona etin? Endilisi, waf anama napomepa na'ama.
50002002	I'i na'ama, penda' ae' endanifel endilisi ma waf anama. Pepe ukup etifim, mimila God noloma sahin owan ea' pepe opalef etifim endilisi.
50002003	Ipe' ina ukup mopoma ipe' etipa penda' opeha enis epes safela agof ipe'imi lu'um, owa'. Ipe' pefe' owina enis epes ea' ina pi'i pepe ilifa esis, owa'.
50002004	Ipe' ina ukup mopoma ipe' etipa, owa'. Ukup mimila enis epes wapoti' soloma maim amamaga esis ukup ma'iami.
50002005	Ipe' pihapila ukup etifim si'i Krais Jisas okom na'iam.
50002006	Anan nape God endilisinai la'ela'ef, ea' ina okom na'i nohapila waf anama la'ela'ef nope si'i God, owa'.
50002007	Anan nowa' alafuga ma waf anama ea' dei' nataga epen endilisinai nanda' waf anama nataga agel a'ana nanda' opeh nape owina enis epes.
50002008	Esis satolona sati anan nataga epen endilisinai. Ea' nanda' anan nafe' owina God naloma epes. Naila okom Godi atona nafe' nafe' ma naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
50002009	Ea' waf anama atona anan nanda'anai dei' God nafelona nalata ilif endilisi. Ea' nase'ana anona agel nikila' agof hiami.
50002010	Anan nase'ana agel anama Jisasa anona nemaf epes soloma ambagof maim hiami mape heveni maloma anom amama mape etap anae' ilif owini hi'ilam mindiwa nembawa ma anan mafela agel ananinai lu'una,
50002011	mowalapa basef mi'iam na'ama mi'i, “Jisas Krais Anan Dembinai.” Monda'am na'ama mefela agel Ahalomana Godi nolata ilif endilisi.
50002012	Ea' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Fowa' la'ela'ef ape alomepa ipe' paila basef ae'ami. Ea' dei' wapoti' penda'am na'ama etin. Dei' ape laogon, ipe' penda'am la'ela'ef pefe' endilisi pikila' fowa' panda'ami. God nanda' opeh bu'wami nakwahomepa waf aonai nofa'epa pitanimani. Amama atom dei' ipe' umbamehepa endilisi pembefa opeh Anan nanda'mepami.
50002013	Dei' main, anan nanda' opeh opalef ipe'imi nomon. Anan atona nafela ukup ipe'imi ma nagiambamepa panda' opeh si'i Anan atona okom na'iam.
50002014	Amamaga ipe' pa'i penda'ami, pekwaha basef pandahihianamami moloma waf sandahambasefasami.
50002015	-
50002016	Penda'am na'ama ma pepe awasi Godi bo'wepa ma basef o waf aonai a'epa. Dei' pape paloma epes hiesi sape etap anae', esis sakwaha waf bu'unai sanda' waf aonai. Ipe' pape palomas pihi'ambasa basef ambal namunaimi si'i ondowa motawa ilif mafifima epes.
