55001008	Ine' owa' ambal aona ni'ipasa basef Dembinai apa'inai, owa'. Ea' ina ambal aona ma ae' wapoti', owa'. Ae' anda' maola Dembinai dei' anda' kalabus. Ine' nefa' pepel Godi ma netaga la'ifina nefa' nimanimi nelome owalapa basef bu'wami Ananimi.
55001009	God nofa'apa mutanimani mope andeande'. Anan nofalapa amam nematawa ananipai atepa mope bo'wepa andeande'. Anan ina okom napoma waf bu'unai ape' manda'anai nofalapa, owa'. Okom Ananinai atona nainailapa nofalapa nagiambamapa na'a. Fowa' dambadamba ina dei' nanda' etap, ata' owa', Jisas Krais nandahomapa nagiambamapa na'a.
55001010	Ea' dei' nogota anae' Krais Jisas nafi'i nofa'apa motanimani, anan nataga alihina. Dei' maol ananinai God nagiambamapa na'a nanda'apa mataga la'ifipa mataga alihim. Krais Jisas nikila' ga', ea' basef bu'wami Godi mihima'mapa ambal namunai nape andeande' la'ela'ef.
55001011	Anan nali' nandandepe anda' maol anama awalapa basef bu'wami Godi ma epes hiesi. Ae' aposel God nasapa'e awalapa basef Ananimi, ae' tisa dembiwei anda' maol Jisasi.
55001012	Amama atom dei' efa' nimanimi amama. Ea' ae' ina ambal aona ma amama, owa'. Ae' egawa aman anama embale'efanai. Ae' egawana endilisi anan la'ifinai ma numafi amamaga hiami moloma epes hiesi ananisi ae' ase'anas lagof ananimi. Ea' amama mope bo'om andeande' mefe' motagama nemaf anama lu'unai notaga.
55001013	Basef amama bu'wami ine' name'ama malogel ae'anai, basef amama si'i anona ikwaf bu'unai ma nihi'ambena waf bu'unai newalipasa epes. Ine' nembale'efa Jisas Krais endilisi ea' okom ninilana nenda' waf na'ama nembale'ef la'ifina ma basef amama.
55001014	Nimafi basef amama bu'wami endilisimi God nase'enam lagof ine'imi ma nimafiam. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape nomona ape', nigiambamena numafina ma maol anama.
55001015	Ine' negawa epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma Esiai, saloma amam biam Figelus naloma Hermogenes sakwahowe safe'.
55001016	Ae' anda' betena Dembinai ma ata' niti Onesiforus naloma wambota ananinai uwahipis. Dei' main, anan la'ela'ef nanda' okom ae'anai nape andeande'. Anan ina ambal aona ma ae' anda' kalabus, owa'.
55001017	Anan nafi'i Rom nanda' maol lu'unai nagolope nogota laona ea' natolowe.
55001018	Ae' anda' betena Dembinai ma niti anan uwahipina nemaf anama bu'unai. Anan nagiambame nimeguf hiami wambel anama Efesus, amama ine' negawam andeande'.
55002001	Nogalome ae'inai, la'ela'ef ine' nepe la'ifina ma Krais Jisas nigiambamena na'ama pepel anama naso' ape' mape la'ifipa ma Anan.
55002002	Basef hiami ine' name' fowa' awalapama naep epes hiesi, amama newalapama anom amam bu'wami mogawa basef andeande'i ma mi'ipa enis epes andeande'.
55002003	Ine' nepe la'ifina endilisi si'i soldia naitu la'ifina nila Krais Jisas. Nefa' nimanimi amama neloma afa' anofa soldia ananifai ma maol anama Godi.
55002004	Aman anama nape si'i soldia, ina nahapila maol naninani, owa'. Nanda' maol anama soldiai bu'unai atona ni'i dembinai soldia ananinai okom ninila maol ananinai.
55002005	Na'ama etin, emi aman nondondombam noloma enis nosagih, nila waf anama esis sasagihanai. Ama nikila' nofa' amamaga amama bu'wami sasagih sikila' sefa'ami. Ea' i'i anan owa' nigi'ma waf anama sasagihanai andeande', atuwasi ina nofa' amamaga amama, owa'.
55002006	Aman nanda' maol lu'unai aofi ma numafi aof andeande' nambimb nili' nela' gwa'aimi aof anama nisila' enis epes.
55002007	Ine' okokoma basef amama a'iami. Nambimb Dembinai nomboma okom ine'inai, ea' negawa basef amama hiami ofagema.
55002008	La'ela'ef ine' okom nopoma Jisas Krais, anan naga' notanima nohafel wapoti'. Anan wambota anama Deviti, si'i a'iama basef bu'wami Godi.
55002009	Ae' awalapa basef amama bu'wami. Amama atom dei' sa'i ae' aowei, sase'e nimanimi lu'wami mamumami. Sanda'e anda' kalabus wapoti'. Ea' basef Godi ina manda' kalabus mape, owa'etin.
55002010	Ea' anda' okom ae'anai nataga la'ifina ma aitu la'ifiwi la'ela'ef igiambama epes isima God nosahe'as ea' Ananisi. Ae' a'i God nigiambama esisa nofa'as sotanimani ma Krais Jisas soloma howalagon pepel nape la'ela'efi.
55002011	Basef amama endilisimi ape' mombale'efam la'ifipa. Basef amama. I'i endilisi ape' moga' molomana, anona nemaf mohafel mope namepa molomana wapoti'.
55002012	I'i ape' mope la'ifipa mofa' nimanimi lu'wami, anona nemaf mope si'i king molomana. I'i mowa' alafugahana, Anan wapoti' anona nemaf nowa' alafugahapa.
55002013	I'i ape' mi'i ape' alupupai Ananipai milana, ma owa' milana, ea' ape' hapaipai. Ea' Anan atona naila basef Ananimi endilisi andeande'. Ina anona nemaf nokwaham nombaso'mas, owa'.
55002014	La'ela'ef ine' nefela ukup asasimi ma basef amama. Ni'ipasa ma naep Godi amama. Ipe' ina pi'i basef pepa'am pelomasa basef mamumami, owa'. Waf anama ina nigiambamas, owa'. Waf anama nambimb mohambombaga isima some'ami.
55002015	Ine' nenda' maol Godi la'ifina netaga aman nanda' maol endilisi, ma ambal ine'inai ina aona ma maol anama, owa'. Nenda'ana na'ama ma God okom bo'ona ma ine' ma ni'i basef Ananimi bo'om endilisi.
55002016	Ine' nihi'ama basef awami. Amama ina basef Godi, owa'. Basef amama nambimb monda' esis sofe' eaf anama aonai ma sowa' alafugaha God.
55002017	Basef asasimi awami atom nambimb motaga lu'um si'i maselis awami, monda'as motaga lu'um endilisi. Tisa asasimi biam Himeneus naloma Filetus manda' waf anama, ma'i basef mamumami wafimi.
55002018	Amam amama mololama basef endilisimi ea' ma'iam ma'i, “Ape' motanima mohafel hi'agilif ea', ina ata' motanima mohafel wapoti', owa'.” Basef amama atom amam mahambombaga ukup la'ifimi enis epes sombale'efa Godi.
55002019	Ea' dei' God nawa anona olaf la'ifinai dei' notawa. Olaf anama anom amef mailana ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai nogawa andeande'ma epes isima Ananisi.” Ea' anom wapoti' ma'i, “Emi egafis sa'i agel Dembinai, sokwaha waf aonai.”
55002020	Ipat lu'unai nomon dis amama hiami esis sanda' kapa bu'unai gol o siliwa main howalagon sanda'ami, anom sanda' lawah sanda'am, anom sala' etap sanda'ami. Anom sanda'ama maol bu'unai, si'i sanda' gwa'aimi sa'am. Ea' anom sanda'ama maol aonai falafunai, sala alufuta.
55002021	Ea' dei' emi epen nekwaha waf aonai ma nepe bo'wen andeande', inima nambimb nepe si'i dis amama sanda' maol bu'unai atona. Ea' Dembinai nigiambaman nepe andeande' nenda' maol ananinai. Ea' enin nendandombam nenda' maol naninani bu'unai hianai.
55002022	La'ela'ef ine' nendafa'ma ukup amama awasimi mataga ma amam amama awomimi. Nenda' maol bu'unai la'ifina nembale'efa God nila waf bu'unai neloma okom nainaila enis epesanai. Ea' nila waf opaf awaninai, neloma epes isima opalef mape bo'om andeande' sofala Dembinai.
55002023	Ea' ine' newa' alafugama basef amama mamumami awami falafumi ma epes isima ukup mase'asi gawa a'asi. Ine' negawa basef amama atom mawalapa ukup mamumami wandafumi ma'i mandahihianamam.
55002024	Aman anama nanda' maola Dembinai ina ni'i anom basef wafimi nifitapam neloma enis epes, owa'. Anan niti amam nematawa hiesi uwahipis nose'as opaf. Anan nope dembinai tisa, nosopama okom wandafunai, nope niti esis sonda'mana waf aonai.
55002025	Anan nuwalipas sa'ombel nihi'amba andeande' epes isima sandaiwa'manai sosambala basef ananimi. Anan nonda' maol na'ama nigiambamas, anona nemaf somboma opalefa sogawa basef endilisimi andeande'.
55002026	Fowa' Satan naolo'as isag ananinai ma saila basef ananimi. I'i esis sogawa basef amama endilisimi, nambimb ukup asasimi motaga alihim wapoti' ma sokwaha isag anama Satani sifi'mai God.
55003001	Ine' negawa, nimeguf akutaimi nimanimi lu'wami endilisi motaga.
55003002	Nimeguf amama epes ukup mopoma esis etis, ea' ukup mimila otamba atom, sefela agof asasimi atom, sototopa' basef, sonda' epes findiwasa God. Ea' sosambala basef mamasasi ahapas asasisi. Esis ina sinifela Goda waf bu'unai, owa'. Sosambala waf bu'unai.
55003003	Ea' ina ukup mimila enis epes, owa'. Ina sokwaha waf aonai enis epes sanda'masanai, owa'. Esis ina ukup mose'asa lopa' fitap asasinai ma si'i basef awami, owa'. Ea' si'ipa enis epes si'i, “Ape' monda' waf aonai.” Esis ukup mi'i esis etis ina sumafi alop asasinai andeande', owa'. Sohambombaga epes isima bu'wasi, sowa' alafugah sondaiwa'ma waf bu'unai.
55003004	Ea' sonda' alupusi asasisi sofe'ma lagof naumbih. Ea' esis mehip sila waf aonai asas sanda'anai, ukup mopoma esis etis si'i dembesi. Ea' ukup maimaila danifel naninani aonai endilisi ma alop asasinai atona. Esis ina ata' ukup mi'i God, owa'.
55003005	Epes isima saila waf Godi alop atona asasinai ande' atogon, ea' ukup asasimi nomon sandaiwa'ma God sowa' alafugaha pepel ananinai. Ine' nihi'ama epes isima.
55003006	Anom amam si'i amama mandambaho' so'uso'umbel mafe' magi'ma nematawa awama ukup bu'wami owa' meapaiwai mawis ifagw awaumi, ea' momboma ukup awaumi. Nematawa awama waf awaunai nanda' ukup awaumi nimanim endilisi. Ea' ukup awaumi mohafema awami mamumami momboma ukup awaumi.
55003007	Nematawa awama la'ela'ef wanda' maola ofa' basef, ea' ina ogawa basef ofagema endilisimi, owa'.
55003008	Fowa' Janes naloma Jambris manda' naumbih maloma Moses, mowa' alafugahana. Na'ama etin dei' epes isima sanda' naumbiha basef endilisimi sowa' alafugaham. Ukup asasimi aom endilisi, ea' bale'ef asasinai sambaso'am etin. Esis ina sembale'efa God endilisi, owa'.
55003009	Ea' waf anama amamunai ina nataga lu'una endilisi, owa'. Dei' main, nambimb epes hiesi siti waf anama gawa a'anai amamunai si'i fowa' gani sati waf anama gawa a'anai ma amam amama Janes naloma Jambres manda'anai.
55003010	Ine' fowa' nafe' naloma ae', name' basef amama a'ipasam ea'. Ine' negawa fe' pe, ki ma basef hiami ofagema ae'ami. Ine' negawa ae' embale'efa God la'ifiwi, la'ela'ef a'ipasa basef Ananimi so'umbel, okom ae'anai ina wandafuna, owa'. Ine' negawa ae' okom nainaila enis epes, aitu la'ifiwi efa' nimanimi.
55003011	Ine' negawa waf aonai hianai esis sanda'meana ae' ma nimanimi amama efa'am wambel anama wenifina Antiok naloma Aikoniam naloma Listra. Ine' negawa amamaga nimanimi sanda'meam efa'ami. Ea' Dembinai natagahowe ma amamaga amama nimanimi hiami sanda'meami.
55003012	Emi egafis sope la'ifis soloma Krais Jisas ma sila waf Godi andeande', naumbih asasisi anona nemaf sonda'as kwapete'as.
55003013	Ea' amam awami maloma amam mambaso'ami nambimb mombaso'ma epes hiesi. Ea' anom amam mombaso'ma amam atom. Ea' waf amam manda'anai nambimb notaga aona endilisi.
55003014	Ea' ine' nembale'efa basef amama Godi nefa'am la'ifina. Ine' negawa amam nematawa isima fowa' sawalipina basef na'ama.
55003015	Ea' ine' negawa amama wapoti'. Fowa' ine' ata' so'uso'win negawa basef bu'wami Godi mape Buk Baibeli andeande'. Buk anama la'ifina ma nose'ena gawa bu'unai neloma okom bu'unai ma ine' nembale'efa Krais Jisasa God nagiambamena nofa'ena netanimani.
55003016	Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nafela ukup amam profeti manda' basef amama hiami mape Buk Baibeli. Basef amama bu'wami ma mose'apa gawa bu'unai, mih'ambapa waf aonai ma mokwahona, mihi'ambapa fe' ape'inai, muwalipapa ma mila waf bu'unai.
55003017	Basef amama manda' ape' epes Godi la'ifipa endilisi ma monda' maol hianai bu'unai Ananinai.
55004001	Anona nemaf Jisas Krais nowaloga epes hiesi dei' ata' sape namisi, soloma isima saga'i wapoti'. Naep Godi maloma Krais Jisasi dei' a'ipina basef la'ifimi a'i Krais Jisas anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihina naep epes hiesi ea' nope Dembinai wambel Ananinai. Amama atom dei' a'ipina mehip,
55004002	ine' ni'ipasa basef Godi la'ela'ef. Nemaf anama esis sondandombam ma some' basef, ni'ipasam. Ea' maina nemaf esis sandaiwa' ma some'am, ni'ipasam etin. Ni'ipasam ma mohagofa basef amama baso'maimi. Ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi ma sokwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ea' nefela ukup asasimi nenda'as sotaga la'ifisa bale'ef, niwalipasa waf aonai nenda'as so'uso'umbemas. Niwalipasa basef amama si'i okom Godi na'iami.
55004003	Anona nemaf notaga, esis sondaiwa'ma sofa' basef bu'wami Godi, owa'. Ea' sila ukup asasimi atom sofa'ai anom tisa hiami asasimi, ma mi'ipasa basef amama esis isima ukup maimaila some'am aligah asasimi.
55004004	Ea' sowa' alafugaha basef endilisimi seme' basef amama mamumami falafumi wafimi.
55004005	Ea' ine' la'ela'ef okom nopeina andeande' nimafi alop ine'inai andeande'. Nemaf anama nimanimi motagamena nepe la'ifina nenda' maol Godi newalapa basef bu'wami ma esis amam nematawa sololama Godi. Nenda' maol anama ma nigiambamas nenda'ana endilisi nimbefana.
55004006	Ine' negawa, nogota anama nataga ea' ma sehe ega'. Esimbel ae'ami ma'i kolo'olam molo sehe ega' ma indilali eso' ae' efe'ma God. Nemaf nataga ma ae' ekwaha etap anae'.
55004007	Ae' fowa' andondombam asagih andeande'. Ae' embale'efa Krais la'ifiwi asagih andeande', dei' ataga ikwaf.
55004008	Dei' amamaga amama bu'wami sasagih sikila'i sefa'ami sandandombam ma'ome. Amama na'ama. Nambimb Dembinai nofale ni'ipi ni'i, “Ine' aman bu'winai.” Dembinai anan aman bu'unai nowalogas ma nemaf anama. Nemaf anama lu'unai Anan nese'e amamaga amama bu'wami. Ea' ina noso' ae' atowe, owa'. Anan nose'asam emi egafis ukup maimaila Anan notaga nondawalap sotolona.
55004009	Dei' ine' nifi'mai ae' mehip.
55004010	Dei' main, Demas okom na'ina'i waf aonai etapanai ea' nakwahowe nafe' Tesalonaika. Kresens nafe' etap hiagoma Galesia, ea' Taitus nafe' etap hiagoma Dalmesia.
55004011	Dei' Luk atona nape nalome. Ine' ne'wa Mak nolomena nifi'i nehaponameana. Dei' main, andeande'ma anan nigiambame ma maol Godi.
55004012	Ae' asapa' Tikikus nafe' Efesus.
55004013	Ine' nifi'i nifa'mai saket anama launai anama akwahona na'ihi Troas ipat Karpusi. Anama ine' nifa'mianai nifi'i. Ea' anom buk ae'ami wapoti' nifa'miami. Buk amama sanda' agwafuh mafisim sanda'ami. Amama nifa'miam etin nifi'i endilisi.
55004014	Aleksander aman nanda' maola brasi, nanda' megah endilisi. Anona nemaf Dembinai nogwamana nimanimi anan, mondahama waf anan nanda'meanai.
55004015	Ine' wapoti' nindumafuma ma aman anama. Anan nahogofa basef amama afe'imi endilisi.
55004016	Ali' agwa basefa kot anama esis sanda'meanai, ina enin epen etitin naitu nalome nemaf anama nagiambame, owa'. Epes ae'asi hiesi sakwahowe. Ea' anda' betena God na'ama, a'i ina okom nopoma waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai ma sakwahowe nemaf anama anda' kotanai, owa'.
55004017	Ea' Dembinai numafi ae' ape nase'e pepel. Amama atom dei' awalapa basef bu'wami a'iam la'ifiwi endilisi ea' epes isima hiesi owa' Judaisi sogawa basef Godi, dei' same'am hi'alas. Ea' God nagiambame ma malogel mafin anama lu'unai laion.
55004018	Anona nemaf Dembinai nigiambame ma waf anama aonai hianai esis sanda'mianai, ea' nofa'e etanima nohapone epe wambel Ananinai gani ilif heven. Ae' a'i pepel howalagon nopaina la'ela'ef. Endilisi.
55004019	Ine' nese'ago danifel ae'anai ma Akwila naloma Prisila ea' esis isima wambota Onesiforusi.
55004020	Erastus ata' napani etin Korin. Ea' Trofimus awes nanda'ana akwahona napani Miletus.
55004021	Ine' nifi'i mehip. Na'ama ine' nepomai nemaf anama uf lu'unai naluwanai. Yubulus naloma Pudens, Linus naloma Klodia naloma esis alupusi Kristen isima hiesi sanda'menago danifel ma ine'.
55004022	Ae' a'i Dembinai nope nolomago ambal bu'unai ine'inai nigiambamepa na'a. Ea' ma'um.
56001001	Ae' Pol anda' maola Godi, ae' aposel Jisas Kraisi. Anan nandandepe ma eawalipasa basef ananimi. Anan nasapa'e ma igiambama esis amam nematawa nandandepas ea' ananisi ma enda'as sotaga la'ifis sombale'efana sogawa basef endilisimi ma sila waf ananinai.
56001002	Ae' anda' maola agiambama bale'ef asasinai ma esis sogawa ma sondanifel sope sohafa ambal anama namunai nope andeande' la'ela'ef. Fowa' gani God ata' owa' nonda' anom amamaga motaga etap anae', anan nali' na'iam ma nose'apa ambal anama ape'. Anan ina nambaso'ami, owa'.
56001003	Anom nimeguf mafe'ma ea', nogota anama anan atona nandandepana ea', anan nafela amam amama mawalapa basef ananimi alihim. God anan nofa'apa motanimani, anan na'iam dei' nase'e opeh amama ma ewalapa basef amama.
56001004	Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ine' Taitus. Ine' nembale'efa God na'ama etin si'i ape' hiapai mombale'efana. Amama atom dei' ine' nogalome ae'inai endilisi. Ae' a'i God ahalomapa noloma Krais Jisas anan nofa'apa motanimani, amam biam migiambamena na'a okom ine'inai nope awanena.
56001005	Ae' akwahina napani ailan Krita nendondomba opeh amama ata' owa' nimbefama nambimb nendandepa anom agufumi mumafi esis Kristeni wambel hiagoma, si'i fowa' a'ipina. Ea' basef amamumi mape na'ama.
56001006	Anona aman i'i owa' nonda' anona waf aonai ma naep esis amam nematawai ma anan noso' nemata'w atoto'w ma batawisana ananisi sombale'efa Krais esis basef a'as, ina sonda' anona waf aonai, sape andeande' seme' basef. Amam manda' waf anama, ine' nenda'am mope agufumi.
56001007	Ine' negawa agufumi mumafi esis Kristeni, amam mumafi opeh Godi. Ea' amam amama fe' pe amamunai andeande'ma anona nemaf esis amam nematawa ina siti anona waf aonai amam manda'anai, owa'. Anona aman ama amam agufumi, anan ina nonda' waf aonai, o okom wandafuna mehip, owa'. Anan ina nea' embel nohaga nogaol nohas etin, owa'. Anan ina okom nohafel ni'ini'i endilisi ma nonda' waf aonai ma nofa' otamba, owa'.
56001008	Anan nimafi emi egafis sifi'i lauguni anona wambel. Anan okom ni'i waf bu'unai hianai Godi ea' nope andeande'. Anan numafi okom ananinai atona andeande'.
56001009	Anan nombale'efa basef amama bu'wami ape' mawalipasami andeande'. Ea' anan la'ifinama ni'ipa enis epes nefela ukup asasimi ma nonda'as sataga la'ifisa basef amama bu'wami. Ea' la'ifinama ni'ipa isima sosambala basef bu'wami ma someme'ma basef asasimi ina endilisimi, owa'.
56001010	Epes hiesi ina saila basef, owa'. Sosambalom. Esis sanda' basef etin sa'iam sambaso'ma enis epes. Esis hiesi wambota Judai satopa' alop.
56001011	Esis sandandam na'ama, esis sa'i sombaso'mas sofa'asa otamba moni maim enis epesi. Ea' sawalipa enisa waf anama ape' Kristen mandaiwa'manai. Esis sanda' waf anama atona dei' sahambombaga wambotagw epes hiesi. Ea' ine' nesopama malogof asasimi isima sanda'am na'ama.
56001012	Fowa' anona aman Kritinai anan gawainai si'i profet na'im na'ama na'i, “Fowa' gani endilisi esis Krit sape epes sambaso'ami ea' dei' wapoti' ata' sape na'ama etin. Esis si'i mafis mape aolopi awami. Ala'uta nas endilisi, sa'oh etin sa' gwa'aimi hiami.”
56001013	Basef amama endilisimi. Ea' ine' ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi ma seme'am sogawa endilisi waf aonai esis sanda'anai ma ata' somboma opalef. Ama bale'ef asasinai ata' notaga bo'ona.
56001014	Ine' ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi ma esis sokwaha basef mamumami falafumi esis Judai ma mi'uli epes isima sowa' alafugaha basef endilisimi.
56001015	Ukup epes isima opalef bo'oma waf bu'unai, amamaga hiami bo'om andeande' ma esis. Ea' ukup epes isima aom ea' esis owa' sombale'efa Kraisi, opalef asasimi ina bo'om, owa'. Ukup asasimi maloma basef mape opalef asasimi nomoni aom endilisi.
56001016	Malogof asasimi sa'iam na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mogawa God.” Ea' fe' asasinai nawalapa esis sowa' alafugaha God. God anan nandaiwa'ma esis endilisi. Epes isima sosambala basef, ina la'ifisa sonda' anona waf bu'unai, owa'.
56002001	Ea' ine' ni'ipa esis amam nematawa ma basef bu'wami ma waf esis sanda'anai mila basef amama bu'wami. Ine' ni'ipas na'ama.
56002002	Amam hagami owa' mea' embel mohaga mogaol. Amam ukup mope andeande'ma waf bu'unai ea' nomonas mopaim mumafi alop andeande'. Amam mope andeande'ma bale'ef amamunai nope bo'ona atona ma waf anama ukup mila God ea' mila epes wapoti'. Ea' mitu la'ifima nimanimi hiami.
56002003	Ea' awau nematawa hagiwai wapoti' ope andeande'. Awau owa' ohas wi'ipas enis epes, owa'. Awau owa' wea' embel hiami ohaga ogaol. Awau ope si'i tisa nawalipasa waf bu'unai.
56002004	Awau hagiwai wihi'amba nematawa awama awiawai ma onda' waf na'ama. Ukup awaumi mimila amam wahupawa awaumi moloma awasi awausi.
56002005	Ea' awau umafi nomonas awaumi andeande'ma ope bo'owa andeande' endilisi. Ea' umafi ifagw awaumi andeande' ma wigiambama amam moloma awasi awausi. Awau ope owina amam wahupawa awaumi. Awau onda' waf anama hianai bu'unai hi'ilana epes ina siti anona waf aonai awaunai ea' sonda' basef Godi findiwam, owa'.
56002006	Ea' na'ama etin, ine' nefela ukup amam amama awomimi nenda' ukup la'ifim mopaim mumafi alop andeande'.
56002007	Ine' etina nenda' waf bu'unai atona amam mutilina ma milina monda' waf hianai bu'unai. Opeh amama niwalipa epes, ine' owa' ni'iam moloma basef awami, owa'. Ni'ipas basef bu'wami endilisimi atom. Okom ine'inai nopoma waf bu'unai atona nenda' opeh amama niwalipas la'ela'ef.
56002008	Ine' ni'i basef bu'wami atoma enis epes ina siti anona waf aonai ma opeh amama nanda'ami, owa'. Ama esis naumbih nambimb sofa' ambagof awami. Dei' main, esis ina siti anona waf aonai ma afa' ma si'i anom basef awami, owa'.
56002009	Ine' ni'ipa isima agof a'asi sape owina enis epes sanda' opeh atomi ni'ipas ni'i, esis some' basef agufumi sope owina amam. Ea' sonda' opeh bu'wami mamumami hiami amam ukup ma'iami. Esis ina sogwa anom basef agufumi sohahali'am, owa'.
56002010	Esis ina sokowalopa anom amamaga amamumi, owa'. Esis sila basef amamumi andeande'. Ama anona nemaf esis sofela agela basef amama ape' mawalapama epesi lu'um. Basef amama Godi nofa'ai ape' motanimani mope andeande'.
56002011	Ape' mogawa okom Godi lu'unai nainaila ape' ma nigiambamapa na'a anama nataga nandawalap ea', epes hiesi wambota lounai agufisi saloma agof a'asi hi'alas satolona. Ama nofa' amam nematawa nokwahomapa waf aonai mutanimani mofe'ma anan.
56002012	Waf God nigiambama na'ai mawalapa ape' ma mokwaha waf anama mowa' alafugaha Godi, ea' mokwaha ukup amama awami ma waf etapanai, mope andeande' nogota anae'.
56002013	Nogota anama ape' mape mohafa danifela anama lu'unai mape mohafanai. Ape' mape mohafa pepel nafifili God Dembinai ape'inai nofa'apa motanimani, anan Jisas Krais anona nemaf notaga nondawalap.
56002014	Krais anan nakwaha ambal bu'unai ananinai ma natala ape' natagahepa ma waf aonai hianai mosambala mi'uli Godi. Anan na'i nondombasa ape' ma motaga epes ananipai atepa bu'upai, ukup mohafela monda' opeh lu'wami ma mila waf hianai bu'unai.
56002015	La'ela'ef ine' ni'ipasa basef amama. Ea' nenda' epes sataga la'ifisa sila basef amama ni'ipasa basef la'ifimi si'i anona dembinai agel lu'unai. Ea' nesambala waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ae' andaiwa'ma enin epen ni'i ine' aman falafinai, owa'.
56003001	Ine' la'ela'ef la'ifinama nefela esis amam nematawa ma sope owina amam gavman dembemi, amam la'ifimi mumafi esis ma sila basef amamumi. Ea' esis sondandombama sonda' opeh hiami bu'wami.
56003002	Esis owa' sonda' enin epen findiwan ma basef awami. Esis ina sifitap, owa'. Sope opalef awanem. Esis la'ela'ef sope sonda' waf so'uso'umbilinai ma epes hiesi.
56003003	Ine' negawa fowa' ape' wapoti' owa' ukup bo'om, ape' mosambala basef ea' Satan nambaso'mapa. Ape' mape owina waf naninani aonai opalef mohafema waf aonai ma alop nandanifel. Ape' mafe' maloma waf anama ukup aoma enis epes ma kowalapama amamaga asasimi. Esis sofala ape' naumbih asasipai ea' ape' wapoti' manda' naumbih malomas.
56003004	Ea' God, anan nofa'apa motanimani, anan alupunai ape'inai okom nainailapa. Nemaf anama waf anama ananinai nataga nafe' alihina.
56003005	Anan ina okom napoma anona waf bu'unai ape' manda'anai dei' nofa'apai, owa'. Okom dahowinai ananinai atona nofa'apa motanimani. Anan nasa'opapa ea' mataga awasi dambaipai, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nase'apa ambal namunai ma ape'.
56003006	Ama opeh Jisas Kraisi, Anan nofa'apa motanimani, God nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nafi'i hianai endilisi ma ape' si'i nakolo'wai pepel ma ape'.
56003007	Anan nanda'am na'ama ma na'i ape' epes bo'wepa andeande' ma okom anama Jisasi atona lu'unai nainaila ape'. Ea' nandandepapa ma mofa' ambal namunai mope andeande' la'ela'ef. Ea' ape' mombale'efana mape mohafana.
56003008	Basef amama endilisimi ma ape' hiapai mombale'efam. Ae' a'i newalapa basef amama ni'iam mehipa epes isima sombale'efa God ea'i ukup mopoma situ la'ifisa waf bu'unai. Basef amama ma Jisas Krais naloma God, amama bu'wami ma migiambama epes.
56003009	Ea' basef amama mamumami falafumi esis sa'iama sosambala waf bu'unai, sa'i sondahihianama sa'i agof hiami bafasas akupas asasisi etis, sofitapa mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai, amama ine' nindihi'amam. Dei' main, ape' mogawa basef amama ina magimbamepa mawalapa anona waf bu'unai, owa'.
56003010	Emi egafin nanda' esis Kristen sandawal sataga biefisi, inima nesambala basef bu'wami. Ine' nehagofa okom ananinai ni'ipana basef la'ifimi ma nihi'amban, atetef o bif. Ama enin owa' neme' basef ine'imi, nekwahin newa' alafugan.
56003011	Ine' negawa epen inima nakwaha eaf bu'unai ea'. Waf aonai ananinai nihi'ambapa mogawa enin epen awani.
56003012	Anona nemaf ae' i'i esapa' Artemas o Tikikus nofe'mago ine', ine' ulal nifi'mai ae' mehip wambel anama Nikopolis. Ine' negawa ae' ai'am ea' ma ipani Nikopolis nogota anama aonama asaf lu'unai nalai.
56003013	Ine' numafi Senas nogawa mi'uli esis Romi noloma Apolos andeande'. Ea' nigiambamama amamaga amam mofa'am mofe' wambel hiagoma ma nambimb ina amamaga a'am eaf, owa'.
56003014	Ea' esis Kristen amam nematawa ape'isi sonda' waf sope la'ifisa opeh bu'wami mamumami sigiambama epes isima amamaga a'asi. Na'ama esis Kristen sope etin ea' ukup mose'asa sonda' waf bu'unai Godi.
56003015	Amam nematawa sape salome na'ae esis sandanifel salomago ine'. Ine' nendanifel nelomago emi egafis ukup maimaila afa' sombale'efa God salomafa. Ae' a'i God nigiambamepago ipe' na'a nope nolomago ipe' hipei nonda'epa pataga la'ifipa. Ea' ma'um.
57001001	Ae' Pol anda' kalabusa opeh Krais Jisasi. Owalomafa afa'inai Timoti nape nalome na'ae. Ea' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ine' Filemon, alupinai afa'inai ma wanda' opeh atom Godi. Ukup afa'imi maimailina endilisi.
57001002	Ae' anda' basef amama ma ine' naloma amam nematawa Godi sandatama etifigin ipat ine'inai saloma haniti'mafa Apia kwaloma aman anama Arkipus, nanda' opeh Godi la'ifina si'i soldia naloma afa' biafa.
57001003	Ae' a'i ahalomapa God naloma Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais amam migiabamepa na'a monda'epa la'ifipa monda' opalef ipe'imi mope awanem.
57001004	Dendel ae' anifela Goda nimeguf hiami a'i agel ine'inai anda' beten.
57001005	Dei' main, ae' ame'asa ine' nembale'efa dembinai Jisas endilisi ea' okom ine'inai nainaila amam nematawa Godi hiesi.
57001006	Ae' anda' beten ahali' God a'i ine' ni'ipasa bale'ef ine'inai ofagena nenda' enis epes sotaga la'ifis. Ine' nenda'am na'ama ma negawa andeande' amamaga bu'wami ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas Kraisi mofa'ami.
57001007	Owalome ae'inai, ine' okom nainaila amam nematawa Godi ma nenda' opalef asasimi motaga la'ifim. Ea' ae' andanifamena endilisi ma waf anama ine' nanda'anai nanda' opaf ae'anai awanena endilisi.
57001008	Ea' okom ae'anai na'i na'ama. Endilisi, ae' ape aposel la'ifiwi ma agel Kraisi i'ipina nenda' anona waf bu'unai.
57001009	Ea' ae' andaiwa' ma i'ipina, owa'. God okom nainailafa ea' afa' wapoti' ukup maimaila epes hiesi. Amama atom dei' ahali'ina. Ae' Pol, hagewe dei' ape anda' kalabus anda' opeh Krais Jisasi,
57001010	ae' ahali'ina ma nogalome ae'anai Onesimus. Ine' niti anan uwahipina. Nogota anama ape anda' kalabus, ae' a'ipana basef Godi. Ea' nembale'efa Krais nataga nogalome ae'anai.
57001011	Fowa' anan ina nanda' opeh bu'wami ma ine', owa'etin. Ea' nandaiwa'mana. Ea' dei' anan la'ifina ma nonda' opeh bu'wami ma nigiambama afa' biafa.
57001012	Dei' ae' esapa'ana notanima nefe'mago ine'. Ea' okom ae'anai nofo'o nolomanago.
57001013	Ae' anda' opeh awalipasa basef bu'wami Godi sanda'e anda' kalabus. Ea' ae' a'i embalo'a Onesimus nope na'ae nolome dendel noho'ofena ma nigiambame.
57001014	Ea' i'i ine' nindaiwa'ma embalo'ana nope nolome, hapainai. Ae' andaiwa'ma i'ipina. Ae' a'i ine' ni'i aho'ma okom ine'inai atoma anan nope nolome.
57001015	Onesimus nakwahina nogota bandana nafe' anagona anona nemaf nefa'ana notanimani nope nolomena la'ela'ef.
57001016	Ea' dei' anan ina ata' nape owina enis epes agel a'anai, owa'. Anan nataga owalomena endilisi ma Krais dende'ma ukup mimilana endilisi. Ae' okom nailinailana. Ea' ine' nambimb okom ninilana endilisi, ni'i owalomena ine'inai ma agel Dembinai.
57001017	I'i ine' okom nopoma ae', ni'i afa' wandao'oma endilisi wanda' opeh Kraisi, andeande'ma ine' nefa' Onesimus notanimago sondanifelamana si'i na'i nefa' ae'.
57001018	I'i anan nonda' anona waf aonai ma ine' o nonda'mena anona wiaf nopomena, ae' egwamonana.
57001019	Dei' ae' Pol ahapila pen lagel ae'anai atona anda' basef amama bandami atom, ae' nambimb egwamena wiaf anama. Endilisi ine' wapoti' nape si'i newaola anona wiafa ae'. Wiaf anama ina si'i otamba maim, owa'. Anama ambal ine'inai atona. Dei' main, fowa' a'ipina basef bu'wami nembale'efa God nefa' ambal namunai nape andeande'.
57001020	Ea' owalome alupinai, ae' ihali'ina ma agel Dembinai, ine' ninifela Onesimus si'i owalomena nembale'efa Kraisi. Afa' sahin owan wambale'efa Kraisi atofa. Ea' ine' nenda' opaf ae'anai notaga bo'ona nenda'e la'ifiwi endanifel.
57001021	Anda' basef amama, egawa endilisi ine' nambimb nila basef amama ae'ami. Ea' ae' dei' anda'ago basef amama ma ine'. Ae' egawa anom basef wapoti', ine' nambimb nenda' anona waf bu'unai endilisi nikila' amama dei' a'ipina pas amama a'i ine' nenda'am.
57001022	Ea' anom basef wapoti'. Ae' okom na'i God neme' beten ipe'inai nekwaha ae' efe'mago ipe' wapoti'. Ea' dei' ine' nendondomba anagon nopomago ma ae' efo'o epe elomena.
57001023	Epafras anan nape nanda' kalabus naloma ae' ma agel Krais Jisasi. Anan nanda'menago danifel nefe' nelomago ine'.
57001024	Ea' amam manda' opeh malumai, Mak naloma Aristarkus, Demas, Luk, amam wapoti' manda'menago danifel ine'.
57001025	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas Krais nigiambamepa etin nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma waf anama nepe nelomago ambaguf naloma ukup ipe' hipei.
58001001	Fowa' gani God na'ipa akusapa bafasapa ape'isi na'ama, na'ipasa basef ananimi nimeguf atona etin na'ipa amam profeta eaf hianai mawalipas ma'ipasam.
58001002	Ea' dei' nogota anae' si'i nogota anama anona nemaf nigi' neatagai endilisi, nawalapa basef na'ipapa malogel Nogalomana Ananinai. God nandandepana ma nemaf akutainai Anan nope Dembinaima amamaga hiami ma etap anae' moloma esis amam nematawa wapoti'. Anan atona nofa'am numafiam. Fowa' gani God na'i Nogalomana Ananinai nanda' amamaga hiami ambagof mapaimi maloma ambagof a'ami mape ilif etapi hi'alam mataga mape.
58001003	Nogalomana atona nafifili lu'unai Godi nafifimapa endilisi. Anan na'ama etin si'i God endilisinai. Anan na'i basef Ananimi la'ifimi atom ea' dei' amamaga amama hiami maloma amam nematawa hiesi sataga la'ifis. Anan atona nasa'opapa ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai mataga bo'wepa andeande. Nanda'am ea', dei' nape lagel da'isinai Godi gani ilif heven God la'ifinai numafi amamaga hiami.
58001004	Amama atom dei' nataga Dembinai endilisi nikila' amam ensel hiami. Dei' main, agel anama nofa'ana Ahalomana nikila' agof amam enseli bo'ona endilisi.
58001005	Dei' main, fowa' God ina na'ipa anona ensel Ananinai na'i, “Ine' nogalome ae'inai, ae' dei' ataga Ahalomena ine'iwei endilisi,” owa'. Basef amama fowa' God na'ipa Nogalomana Ananinai atona. Ea' God na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' nambimb etaga Ahalomana Ananiwei, Anan nope Nogalome Ae'anai.” God ina na'ipa anona ensela basef amama, owa'. Na'ipa Nogalomana Ananinai atona.
58001006	God na'ipa Nogalomana Ananinai nape nali'ma amamaga hiami. Ea' nemaf anama God na'i Nogalomana Ananinai nataga etap anae' na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Amam ensel Ae'ami hiami monda' lotu ma Anan atona.”
58001007	Ea' basef amama God na'ipa amam ensel na'ama na'i, “Anan nanda' amam ensel mataga si'i uf, nanda'am manda' maol Ananinai mataga si'i nif fandom ilelowa mataga.”
58001008	Ea' God na'ipa Nogalomana Ananinai na'ipana na'i, “God, ine' nape la'ifinai Dembinai numafi amamaga hiami, ea' anona nemaf nepe na'ama etin la'ela'ef hihif. Waf bu'unai atotona ine' dei' nape Dembinai ma wambel ine'inai.
58001009	Ine' okom naila waf bu'unai nandafa'ma waf aonai sosambala basefanai. Ea' dei' God, Anan God ine'inai, nandandepena nase'ena danifel lu'unai endilisi. Ea' epes hiesi ina sandanifel si'i ine', owa'.”
58001010	Ea' God na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Dembinai, fowa' dambadamba Ine' etina nanda' etap nataga lagel ine'inai atona nanda' ilif otaga wapoti' nataga nape.
58001011	Amama anona nemaf higililam, ea' ine' nepe la'ela'ef. Amama mope mefe' mefe' anona nemaf motaga apim si'i luwaguf apimi.
58001012	Anona nemaf ine' nimbomefam si'i sumagwia luwaguf, ea' amam moho'ofam si'i luwaguf. Ea' ine' la'ela'ef nepe na'ama etin, ina anona nemaf hagena nogota ine'inai, owa'.”
58001013	God ina na'ipa anona ensel Ana'i, “Ine' nepe na'ae lagel da'isinai Ae'anai wa'ol. Ine' nepe la'ela'ef nefe' nefe' nemaf anama ae' enda' naumbih ine'isi sefe' owina bo'wagah ine'imi.” God ina na'ipa anona ensela basef amama, owa'. Na'ipa Nogalomana Ananinai atona.
58001014	Dei' amam ensel emi egafum? Amam ambagof bu'wami Godi. Anan nasapa'am mafi'i ma migiambama epes isima dei' God nofa'as sotanimani ma anona nemaf sofa' pe bu'unai.
58002001	Jisas nikila' amam ensel endilisi. Amama atom dei' ape' mombale'efa basef amama Ananimi mame'am bo'om milam endilisi. Na'ama ape' motanima mokwahom.
58002002	Fowa' gani God na'ipa amam ensela basef Ananimi, ea' ma'ipipam mandawalap endilisi mape la'ifim. Basef amama mape la'ifima emi egafis sosambala basef owa' silami, esis sofa' nimanimi amama mondahama waf aonai esis sanda'anai sosambala basef amama.
58002003	God nagwamasa nimanimi lu'wami esis sosambala basef Ananimi ensel amama ma'ipasami. Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama? I'i pewa' alafugaha basef Ananimi dei' nagiambamapa nofa'apa mope andeande', anona nemaf ipe' pefa' pefe' pindihi'ama nimanimi amama pi'imama? Owa'. Pefa' nimanimi pelomas. Dei' main, amama nakwahomapa waf aonai nagiambamapa motanimani, ina so'umi, owa'. Lu'wami endilisi. Dembinai atona nali' nawalapam alihima enis epes. Epes isima sihi'ambapa ma mogawa basef amama endilisimi atom.
58002004	Ea' God nanda' basef amama la'ifima eaf hianai naninani. Anona eaf, nihi'ambasa ikwaf naninani hianai la'ifinai. Ea' anona eaf nanda' pepel lu'unai naninani si'i Anan atona nanda'anai. Ea' anona eaf na'ama, nihi'ambapa amamaga bu'wami Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nase'apami, naila okom Ananinai atona nase'apam atona etin nihi'ambapa basef amama endilisimi atom.
58002005	God ina nanda' amam ensel mape dembemi mumafi amamaga lu'wami maloma waf hianai dambeinai Jisas nawalapam ea', dei' a'ipipami, owa'.
58002006	Ea' anom basef mail Baibeli fowa' anona aman nawalapam na'iam na'i, “God, epes esis emi egafis ma Ine' okom nainailas? Esis falafisi etis, ea' ine' etina nimafias.
58002007	Ine' nanda' amam ensel mape dambem la'ifima esis isima amam nematawa etapasi nogota bandana. Ine' nase'asa agof lu'wami nanda'asa sataga dambes.
58002008	Ea' nanda' amamaga hiami mafe' owina esis isima sumafiam.” Basef amama mail Baibeli ma'i, “God nanda' epes sape etapi sape dambes sumafi amamaga hiami mape etapi.” Basef amama ma'i amamaga hiami mape etapi ofagema ma'i amamaga hiami. Ea' dei' ina mati epes sape etapi sape dambes sumafi amamaga hiami, ata' owa'.
58002009	Ape' dei' mogawa Jisas! Fowa' nogota bandana God nanda'ana nafe' owina amam ensel. God nati ape' uwahipipa nagiambamapa na'a, dei' Jisas nefa' nimanimi lu'wami naga' ma ape' hiapai. Amama atom dei' God nase'ana agel lu'unai nanda'ana nataga Dembinai king nafifili endilisi.
58002010	God anan Dembinai fowa' gani nanda' amamaga hiami mataga mape numafiama pepel Ananinai mape andeande', Ananimi atom. Ea' andeande'ma Anan na'i Jisas nefa' nimanimi nanda' eaf ma nokwahomapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai nofa'apa motanimani. God nanda'am na'ama ma nokolasa ape' hiapai nofa'apa mefe' heven miti nafifili Ananinai.
58002011	Anan atona nanda'apa amam nematawa mataga bo'wepa andeande' malomana wambota atotona Ahalomapa atotona. Amama atom dei' Anan ina ambal aona nofalapa na'i sahin owan Ananipai, owa'.
58002012	Si'i Anan fowa' na'iam na'i, “God, Ae' anona nemaf ewalapa agel Ine'inai ma esis sahin owan ae'asi. Ae' enda' awalef efela agel ine'inai ma esis hiesi sifi'i sondowa'anima etifigin.”
58002013	Ea' na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' embale'efa God la'ifiwi.” Ea' anom basef wapoti' na'iam na'i, “Ae' ape aloma awasi Ae'asi God nasi'iesi.”
58002014	Epes Anan nofalapa awasi ananipai, epes etapasi selapai. Amama atom Jisas wapoti' nataga epen na'ama etin si'i ape' epes etapasi selasi. Anan nataga epen na'ama ma naga' nohambombaga aman anama aonai Satan la'ifina nanda' epes hiesi saga'.
58002015	Jisas natagaha amam nematawa hiesi la'ela'ef umbamahasa ga', nahapilas la'ifis. Ea' Anan natagahisa umbamahas sape andeande'.
58002016	Dei' main, Anan ina naga' nagiambama amam ensel, owa'. Anan naga'ma nagiambama epes sataga wambota Abrahami.
58002017	Amama atom Anan nataga na'ama etin endilisi si'i owasana ananisi ma nataga pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami. Anan aman na'i uwahipisa ape' nanda' maol Godi andeande' endilisi. Ea' Anan nataga si'i owasana Ananisi ma natofa okom wandafunai Godi napoma amam nematawa hiesi sanda' waf aonai.
58002018	Satan nagwambana nimeguf hiami na'i nonda'ana nonda' waf aonai. Ea' Jisas nofa' nimanimi hiami. Na'ama Anan la'ifinai ma nagiambama epes isima Satan nagwambasi.
58003001	Ipe' alupipei epes Godi, Anan nape ilif nofalipei, ipe' peme'. Ipe' okokoma Jisas, Anan aposel nape pris Dembinai ma waf naloma basef ofagema ape' ea' mombale'ef mawalipasami.
58003002	Anan naila okom Godi nanda' maol God nandandepana nanda'ana andeande', si'i fowa' gani Moses nanda' maol Godi andeande' nagiambama epes hiesi Godi.
58003003	Aman anama Jisas, God nase'ana agel lu'unai nikila' agel lu'unai Mosesi, si'i epes sase'ana agel lu'unai aman nanda' ipat bu'unai nala'ana etap anae'. Ea' esis ina safela agela ipat anama lu'una, owa'.
58003004	Endilisi, ifagw hiami epes etis sala'ami. Ea' epen gawainai nanda' amamaga hiami, anan God atona.
58003005	Endilisi, Moses nanda' maola nagiambama epes Godi andeande' nanda'ana si'i nanda' maol Godi, ea' na'i basef nawalapama amamaga hiami anona nemaf owagama Krais nie'ipasami.
58003006	Ea' Krais nape nogalomana Godi naila basef endilisi nanda' maol andeande' ma nape Dembinai numafi epes wambota Godi. I'i la'ela'ef ape' mombale'efana la'ifipa mogawa anona nemaf Krais niefi'i nofa'apa mefe' heven mope andeande', ape' mape wambota Ananinai.
58003007	Ea' dei' ape' meme' basef Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'iami andeande'. Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, “Maina nemaf ipe' peme' malogel Ananinai,
58003008	ipe' ina pesopama opalef ipe'imi la'ifim endilisi, si'i fowa' gani bafasepa sanda'am sosambala basef Godi ma sanda' okom Ananinai wandafuna, owa'. Nogota anama esis sape anama wafiguma fatauguma esis sagwambana endilisi sasopama opalef.
58003009	Esis bafasepa ipe'isi sati pepel hianai Ae' anda'anai anama wafiguma afagof hiami 40-peleim. Owa'. Nimeguf hiami esis sanda' Ae' gwambai gwambae endilisi.
58003010	Esis sanda'e na'ama, Ae' dei' okom wandafunamas endilisi a'i, ‘La'ela'ef ukup asasimi mase'asa eaf bu'unai sololamana. Esis ina ata' saila waf bu'unai Ae'anai, owa'.’
58003011	Ea' Ae' okom wandafuna ma esis a'i basef endilisimi atom la'ifimi a'i, ‘Anona nemaf esis ina ata' sifi'i suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'.’ ”
58003012	Alupipei Ae'ipei, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin sahin owan ipe'isi okom ninila waf aonai nekwaha bale'ef ananinai newa' alafugama God nape la'ela'efi.
58003013	Na'ama owa'. Ipe' pendagigiambanama etin pitu la'ifipa. Penda'am na'ama etin nimeguf hiami atona etin nogota anae' God na'i, “Dei'.” Penda'am pilam ama pilam la'ela'ef. Na'ama enipa opalef ipe'imi la'ifima waf aonai baso'omainai.
58003014	Ape' fowa' mali' mombale'efana, ea' dei' mombale'efana la'ifipa la'ela'ef, mefe' motagama moga'. I'i ape' monda'am na'ama la'ela'ef, ape' amam nematawa endilisi Kraisi, mape la'ifipa malomana.
58003015	Si'i basef mail Baibeli do'ok a'ipipami ma'iam ma'i, “I'i ipe' dei' peme' basefa malogel Ananinai ipe' ina pesopama opalef ipe'imi la'ifim endilisi si'i fowa' pewa' alafugaha Goda panda' okom Ananinai wandafuna, owa'.”
58003016	Fowa' gani emi egafis same' basef malogel Godi sowa' alafugahana sanda' okom Ananinai wandafuna? Epes amama atom hiesi fowa' Moses nofa'asi sakwaha Isip safi'i, amama atom.
58003017	Afagof amama hiami 40-peleim God okom wandafuna ma emi? Anan okom wandafuna ma epes isima sanda' waf aonai saga' hi'alas etap anama wafiguma fatauguma, amama atom.
58003018	God na'i enis epes na'i basef endilisimi atom la'ifimi ma esis ina sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w solomana. Na'i emi egafis? Anan na'i amama atom.
58003019	Ea' dei' ape' mogawa esis ina anona nemaf la'ifisa sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w solomana, owa'. Dei' main, esis ina sembale'efana, owa'.
58004001	Basef Godi la'ifim endilisi dei' ata' mape la'ela'ef. Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pefe' piwis anama pepoma noma'w peloma Ae'.” Ea' ape' umbamohapa. Na'ama God niti enin epen etitin ipe'ini okom nose'an ma basef Godi nefe' higililan, owa'.
58004002	Dei' main, ape' wapoti' mame' basef bu'wami Godi si'i fowa' esis Israel same'am. Ea' esis same'am etin, ina sombale'am sailam, owa'. Ea' basef amama bu'wami same'ami ina magiambamas, owa'.
58004003	Amam nematawa mombale'efa Godi ape' dei' mafe' mawis mapoma noma'w maloma God si'i Anan na'iam na'i, “Ae' okom wandafuna ea' a'i basef endilisimi atom la'ifimi a'i, esis ina suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'etin endilisi.” Fowa' nanda' etap anae' hi'alana ea' napoma noma'w nogota laona nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei'. Anan napoma noma'w nahafa esis suwis sopoma noma'w solomana. Ea' esis ina sawis, owa'.
58004004	Anom basef God fowa' na'iami ma nemaf anama nafe'ma 7i sapoma noma'wanai, ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “God nanda' maol hianai hi'alana ea', nemaf anama nafe'ma 7i nataga, napoma noma'w.”
58004005	Basef amama do'okimi God na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Esis ina sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w solome, owa'etin endilisi.”
58004006	Esis amam nematawa isima fowa' same' basef bu'wami ina safe' sawis, owa'. Dei' main, esis ina sembale'efana endilisi, owa'. Sosombala basef Ananimi. Ea' basef amama ata' mape la'ela'ef ma'i endilisi enis epes anona nemaf sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w soloma God.
58004007	Amama atom dei' God nandandepa anona nemaf wapoti'. Ea' nofala nemaf anama na'i, “Dei' atef”. Ea' afagof hiami mafe'ma ea', God nawalapa basefa nemaf anama na'i basef Ananimi do'okimi ma malogel Deviti na'ama na'i, “I'i ipe' dei' peme' basefa malogel Ananinai, ipe' ina pesopama opalef ipe'imi la'ifim endilisi, owa'.”
58004008	I'i nemaf anama fowa' Josua nonda'as suwis sopoma noma'w, God ina ni'i anona nemaf wapoti', owa'. Ea' owa'. Esis ina sawis.
58004009	Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa waf anama mopoma noma'wanai ata' nape la'ela'efa ape' epes amam nematawa Godi. Waf anama si'i God napoma noma'w nemaf anama nafe'ma 7i.
58004010	Dei' main, emi egafis sefe' suwis sopoma noma'w soloma God, esis sambefa maol asasinai ea' sapoma noma'w si'i fowa' God nambefa maol Ananinai napoma noma'w.
58004011	Ea' dei' ape' monda' maol la'ifipa endilisi ma mefe' muwis mopoma noma'w molomana. Na'ama enin epen ape'ini nesambala basef Godi newa ma waf aonai anona nemaf higililan si'i fowa' esis sanda'ama sowa hegilalas hi'alas.
58004012	Dei' main, basef God na'iami ambal namunai napaim, ea' la'ifim la'ela'ef mape. Amama hi'alim endilisi mikila' bainat hi'alinai wa'owa'ol mapisila epes mawis nomon endilisi. Basef amama mawis mafe' la'afena ukup maloma ambagof asasimi mondowatanimama mafe' mawala nigis maloma gonat la'afen. Ea' mawaloga opalef maloma ukup ape'imi nomon.
58004013	Ina anom amamaga God nanda'ami nambimb mondambaho'ma Anan, owa'. Amamaga amama hiami hi'alam mape mandawalap alihim endilisi ma naep Ananimi. Ea' anona nemaf ape' mi'ipana maina waf ape' mandanai.
58004014	Ape' anona pris Dembinai ape'inai nape nali'ma pris hiami nafe' nawis heven nape naloma God. Anan Jisas Nogalomana Godi. Ea' dei' ape' mombale'efa basef God nawalapami la'ifipa.
58004015	Dei' main, pris anama Dembinai anan la'ifinama niti ape' uwahipipa maina nogota ape' owa' la'ifipama muli'amona waf aonai, ea' alop ape'inai owa' la'ifina ma monda' maol. Amamaga hiami mataga magwamba ape', amama mali' mataga magwamba Anan wapoti'. Ea' Anan ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'.
58004016	Amama atom ape' dei' ukup la'ifim mefe' felefele'ma God, umbamohapa owa'. Anan nigiambamapa na'a ma mape andeande'. Ea' ape' mefe'ma Anona niti uwahipipa nigiambamapa maina nemaf mofa' nimanimi lu'wami.
58005001	Waf anama fowa' sandandepa pris hiami dembemi mape mali'ma pris hiami na'ama. Anona nogota sandandepa anona pris sanda'ana nanda' maol Godi ma nofa' malogof epesi naitu naep Godi. Esis sase'ana amamaga bu'wami naso' God nondolalimanama God nokwaha waf aonai esis sanda'nai.
58005002	Anan pris ina la'ifina ma nonda' waf bu'unai atona nimeguf hiami, owa'. Amama atom sanda'ana dei' la'ifinama nigiambama esis ina sogawa andeande' sakwaha waf bu'unai Godi. Pris anama nagiambamas nonda'as sa'osa'ombemas.
58005003	Anan ina la'ifina ma nanda' waf bu'unai atona nimeguf hiami, amama atom dei' nondolali ma God nali' nakwaha waf aonai anan nanda'anai ea' nagi' nakwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa sanda'anai wapoti'.
58005004	Maol anama nondolalima Godi nofa' agel lu'unai. Ea' ina anona aman la'ifina ma nanda' maol anama na'i okom ananinai atona, owa'. God nali' nofalana, ea' nanda' maol anama, si'i fowa' nofala Aron.
58005005	Krais wapoti' na'ama etin. Anan ina nafela agel ananinai atona nataga pris dembinai ma pris hiami, owa'. God atona nandandepana nanda' maol anama, ea' na'ipana na'i, “Ine' Nogalome ae'inai. Dei' awalapena alihina afela agel ine'inai lu'una.”
58005006	Ea' God na'i anom basef wapoti' mail anona buk na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ine' nepe pris Dembinai la'ela'ef nendolalimei na'ama etin nendahama Melkisedek.”
58005007	Fowa' gani Jisas ata' nape epen endilisinai etap anae', nanda' beten nahali' God la'ifinai ma nofa'ana nokwaha ga' ma nope namunai. Nanda' beten nofalana mehip nalef nape nimeguf hiami. Anan nanda' lotu ma God, nanda' Anan nafe' owina God. Ea' dei' God name' beten ananinai.
58005008	Endilisi Jisas Nogalomana Godi, ea' Anan nefa' nimanimi, amama atom mawalipana endilisi ma waf naila okom Godi.
58005009	Anan nataga Nogalomana Godi bo'ona endilisi. Amama atom dei' Anan ofagonama epes saila basef ananimi mofa'as sotanimani sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
58005010	Ea' God nandandepana na'i, “Ine' nape pris Dembinai nendolalima ae' na'ama etin nendahama Melkisedek.”
58005011	Basef hiami Melkisedeki ata' mape ea' dei' a'i i'ipipam. Dei' ipe' ina pandanifel ma pegawa basef Godi ofagema, owa'. Dei' ae' maol lu'unai endilisi ma ihi'ambepa basef amama ofagema.
58005012	Dei' nogota anae' ea' ma ipe' pepe dembipei tisa piwalipa enis epes. Ea' owa'. Ipe' gawa tu'waninai atona ukup ipe'imi, ea' anona aman ata' nowalipipa wapoti' ma basef mali'i Godi. Ipe' ina la'ifipa pegawa basef lu'wami Godi si'i pagwa' gwa'aimi la'ifimi, ata' owa'. Ipe' dei' pegawa basef mali'i Godi atom si'i pagwa' nomagof atom.
58005013	Ape' mogawa emi egafis sa' nomagof atomi, esis sape awasi etis. Epes isima ina dei' la'ifisa sowaloga waf bu'unai aonai, ata' owa'.
58005014	Ea' gwa'aimi la'ifimi mapoma epes isima sataga dambes la'ifis. Epes isima sawalipa ukup maloma nomonas asasimi atom hihif dei' la'ifisa sowaloga waf bu'unai aonai.
58006001	-
58006002	Ape' ina ata' la'ela'ef mi'i basef amama mali'i Kraisi atom timbi tambel, owa'. Ape' ina mi'i basef amama mali'i mi'i, ape' momboma opalefa God mowa' alafugaha waf hianai aonai manda' epes higililas ea' mombale'efa Goda basef mamumami sapisi'asa embel sanda' beten sawamona lagofa enis epes maloma epes hiesi saga'i sohafel wapoti' maloma anona nemaf God nowaloga epes hiesi ma sope la'ela'ef wambel bu'unai o aonai. Ape' ina mope monda' basef amama atom mi'iam la'ela'ef timbi tambel, owa'. Ape' ata' mofo'o ea' monda' basef amama monda'apa la'ifipa mi'am si'i epes isima sataga dambes ea'.
58006003	I'i okom Godi ni'i monda'am na'ama, monda'am na'ama etin.
58006004	Epes isima sowa ma waf aonai sowa' alafugaha Godi, ina anona eafa esis sotanima sifi'i somboma opalef wapoti', owa'. Esis sali' sofa' nafifili Godi, sofa' presen bu'unai nafi'i heveni ea' sofa' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napais.
58006005	Ea' same' basef Godi, sogawam bo'om sagawa maol la'ifinai dambainai hianai alupusi Kraisi anona nemaf nigi' neatagai seanda'anai.
58006006	I'i esis sowa ma waf aonai sowa' alafugaha God, ina ata' anona eafa esis sotanimani sifi'i somboma opalef wapoti', owa'. Waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai atona, dei' saundana nogalomana Godi nail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai wapoti' ma sahambombagana. Ea' sanda' epes hiesi sanda'ana findiwana ma basef awami.
58006007	Anona etap asaf nalai la'ela'ef nanda'ana nanda' gwa'aimi mataga malo andeande'ma magiambama amam nematawa sanda' maol etap aof anama, etap anama God nanda'ana nataga bo'ona andeande'.
58006008	Ea' anona etap nanda' otalef hiami wandafumi atom mataga, etap anama notaga aona endilisi. Ea' felefele'ma God nonda' etap anama notaga aona. Nemaf akutainai fendona nif lu'wami.
58006009	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, dei' ae' a'ipipa basef amama nimanimi, ea' ae' egawa endilisi anona nemaf ipe' ina awepa higililipa na'ama, owa'. Ae' egawa anona nemaf God nefa'epa pitanimani.
58006010	God ina epen aonai ma nambimb okom nose'ana ma maol hianai ipe' panda'anai, owa'. Ipe' ukup maimailana. Ea' dei' panda' maol anama ma pigiambama amam nematawa Ananisi. Ea' dei' ata' panda'ana na'ama la'ela'ef.
58006011	Ae' okom na'i ipe' hipei atona etin ukup ma'i penda' waf bu'unai pigiambama epes Godi pefe' pefe' petagama nemaf anama Krais niefi'ianai. Penda'am na'ama ma pegawa endilisi anona nemaf Anan nefa'epa pitanimani.
58006012	Ae' andaiwa'ma ipe' ala'uta nepa, owa'. Ipe' pila waf epes isima sombale'efa God endilisi ma esis ina ukup mandasosol, owa'. Ae' a'i ipe' pefa' amamaga bu'wami fowa' God na'iama basef endilisimi atom na'i anona nemaf noso'asam epes Ananisi.
58006013	Fowa' gani God naloma Abraham ma'i basef endilisimi atom. Ea' ina anona aman dembinai nikila' God, ama God nie'i basef amama endilisimi atoma aman anama ma agel ananinai, owa'. Ea' dei' God na'i basef amama endilisimi atom ma agel ananinai atona.
58006014	Anan na'i, “Dei' Ae' a'i endilisi, agiambamena enda' wambota bafasena ine'isi sigi' seatagai sotaga bo'wes hiesi endilisi.”
58006015	Ea' Abraham name' basef amama dei' ina ala'uta nana, owa'. Nape sa'ombel nohafa amamaga bu'wami God fowa' na'i neaso'anami mila basef amama na'i endilisimi atom.
58006016	Waf epes sa'i basef endilisimi atom sa'iam na'ama. Epes sa'i basef amama ma agel anona dembinai nikila' esis. I'i enin epen ni'i basef amama, enin nasopama malogofa emi egafis sa'i sosambala basef ananimi.
58006017	Fowa' gani God na'i nihi'ambas okom Ananinai nape la'ela'ef hihif alihima awasi batausana Ananisi anona nemaf sofa' amamaga bu'wami si'i na'ipasa basef Ananimi endilisimi atom. Na'i nihi'ambasa anona nemaf Anan ina nonda' anom basef dambaimi moho'ofa basef amama Ananimi, owa'. Amama atom. Amama atom dei' na'iam la'ifina endilisi gani ilif ma agel Ananinai atona nanda' basef amama mataga la'ifim.
58006018	Basef amama endilisimi atom na'iam endilisi gani ilif. Basef amama biefim ma'iam na'ama etin dei' mape la'ela'ef, ina anom amamaga maloma enis epes soho'ofam, owa'. Anan na'ipapa basef biefim amama ma nenda' opalef ape'imi la'ifim endilisi, ape' amam nematawa mafa' mafe' mandambaho' felefele'ma Anan. Ape' mombale'efa basef amama la'ifipa mogawa endilisi Anan anona nemaf nigiambamapa ma mope andeande'.
58006019	Gawa anama ma ape' mogawa endilisi anona nemaf Anan nigiambamapa mope andeande' nape na'ama. Gawa anama la'ifinai bu'unai nape mohafanai anama nombalo' opalef maloma ambagof ape'imi si'i anka nembalo' sip lu'unai nahapilana la'ela'ef nala embel ilif. Gawa bu'unai anama nawis nowala gani nomon bo'ogoma lowaf anama lu'unai alafugainama saundana nail si'i uta ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai heven nomon.
58006020	Anama ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai natawa heveni Jisas nali'apa nafe' nawis ipat anama nomon ma nagiambamapa. Anan nataga pris dembinai nape nali' ma pris hiami dei' nape la'ela'ef hihif na'ama etin si'i Melkisedek.
58007001	Aman anama Melkisedek anan king dembinai numafi anona wambel Salem, anan pris nondolalima God Dembinai nape ilif endilisi. Fowa' gani Abraham nanda' wandaf naha anom king dembemi nali'amonam nafe' ma notanima nafe' wambel, Melkisedek natolona nofalo'mana.
58007002	Ea' Abraham nawaloga amamaga nefa'am nafe' nanda' wandafami gwa'aimi maim ananimi hi'alam nawalogam aolef 10-peleimi nase'ana aof atotona Melkisedek. Ape' dei' mamboma agel anama Melkisedek, basef ofagema biefim. Anom ma'i king dembinai nanda' waf bu'unai. Ea' anom ma'i anan king dembinai nose'apa opalef awanem. Dei' main, anan king dembinai numafi wambel anama Salem, dei' mamboma basef amama Salem ma'i opalef awanem.
58007003	Anan Ahalomanai mama'wana a'ana. Anan bafasana wambota ananisi a'ana. Ea' mama'wana kolananai nemaf naloma nemaf naga'anai wapoti' owa' sogawame. Anan nape si'i Nogalomana Godi, nape pris dembinai la'ela'ef hihif.
58007004	Dei' ipe' okokoma Melkisedek, anan agel lu'unai endilisi. Dembinai ahalomapa ape'inai nali'i anan Abraham, anan natembe'am amamaga hiami bu'wami atom nofa'ama wandafi nawalogam ea' aof atotona naso' Melkisedek.
58007005	Amam wambota awasi bafapana Livai anom mofa' maol anama pris. Ea' mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesanai na'ipa amam atom manda' maol anama. Na'ama na'i amam mowaloga amamaga amama hiami esis Israeli mofa'am mase'ana namba ten hap God. Esis Israel sahin owan amamisi endilisi, ea' esis bafasana awasi Abrahami wapoti'. Ea' owa'etin, amam Livai mofa' gwa'aimi maim hiami namba ten hapa esis sahin owan amamisi etis.
58007006	Melkisedek ina nataga wambota Livai, owa'. Ea' anan nofa' amamaga hiami namba ten hap Abraham nowalogami. Ea' Melkisedek nofalo'mana na'ipana basef bu'wami aman anama Abraham. Aman anama Abraham basef bu'wami God na'i endilisimi atom mapomana.
58007007	Ea' ape' mogawa, aman nofalo'manai nape ilifa aman anama nofa' amama bu'wami presen.
58007008	Amam Livai manda' maol mondolalima Godi mofa' amamaga namba ten hap, amam anona nemaf maga'i. Ea' Melkisedek nofa' amamaga sawalogami namba ten hap, anan nape namunai la'ela'ef, si'i buk Baibel na'i.
58007009	-
58007010	Ape' ma'iam na'ama. Fowa' gani Melkisedek natagama Abraham eaf, Abraham nase'ana amamaga amama nowalogami namba ten hap mafe'ma Melkisedek. Ea' Livai bafapana Abraham magi' mataga manda' maol anama mofa' amamaga amama namba ten hap esis Israel sawalogami. Ea' na'ama etin si'i Livai nase'ana namba ten hap Melkisedeka lagel Abrahami. Dei' main, nemaf anama Abraham nase'anam Melkisedek, Livai ata' owa' solanai, ata' nape opalef nomon bafapana Abrahami.
58007011	Fowa' esis amam nematawa sofa' basefa mi'uli anama God naso' Mosesanai. Ofagema mi'uli anama amam wambota Livai manda' maol pris. Ea' i'i maol anama amam pris manda'anai andeande' ma monda' esis amam nematawa sotaga bo'wesa naep Godi, dei' maina ata' anona pris dambainai nataga wapoti' si'i Melkisedek, ea' ina si'i Aron? Owa'.
58007012	God naho'ofa waf amam pris manda'anai. Ea' mi'uli Godi wapoti' naho'ofana na'ama etin.
58007013	Dembinai ape'inai basef amama ma'ianai, anan anona wambota. Wambota ananinai ina fowa' nanda' maola balata amam pris maofa mafis maim mondolalima God, owa'.
58007014	Ea' amama mataga alihim na'ama. Ape' mogawa, Dembinai ape'inai nataga wambota Judai. Ea' Moses ina na'i anom amam wambota anama motaga monda' maol mope pris, owa'.
58007015	Ape' mati anona pris dembinai nataga, naho'ofa amam pris mali'i, Anan si'i Melkisedek. Basef amama ma mi'uli anama mataga maho'ofa mi'uli anama nali'i dei' mandawalap alihim na'ama.
58007016	Anan ina nataga prisa anona mi'uli na'i amam pris mataga wambota Livai, owa'. Anan nataga prisa pepel ambal namunai napainai la'ela'ef hihif.
58007017	Dei' main, basef mail Baibeli ma'iana ma'i, “Ine' nape pris dembinai la'ela'ef si'i Melkisedek.”
58007018	God naho'ofa mi'uli anama naso' Mosesanai ea'. Dei' main, mi'uli anama owa' la'ifina nigiambama ape', owa'.
58007019	Dei' main, mi'uli anama ina nanda' epes sataga bo'wes andeande' ma naep Godi, owa'. Ea' dei' God nandoga anona eaf, anama bu'unai nikila' mi'uli anama, dei' eaf anama atona ape' mogawa endilisi God nagiambamapa ea' mefe' felefele'ma Anan.
58007020	Nemaf anama God nandandepa Jisasa nataga pris Dembinai, ina nanda'ana nosahe'ana etin, owa'. Anan na'i basef la'ifimi na'i endilisi gani ilif ea' nandandepana. Amam pris fowa'imi ina nandandepam na'ama si'i Anan, owa'.
58007021	Ea' God na'i basef amama la'ifimi na'i endilisi gani ilif ea' nanda' Jisas nataga Dembinai pris. Anan nataga pris nemaf anama God na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai na'i basef la'ifimi na'i endilisi gani ilif ma anona nemaf Anan ina noho'ofa okom Ananinai wapoti', owa'. Ine' nape Dembinai pris la'ela'ef hihif.”
58007022	God na'i basef amama na'iam la'ifim. Amama atom dei' Jisas nataga Dembinai ofagonama basef bu'wami dambaimi God na'iam endilisimi atom mikila' basef fowa' nali' na'iami.
58007023	Fowa' amam pris amam hiami. Dei' main, amam anona nemaf moga' ina la'ifima mope la'ela'ef monda' maol, owa'.
58007024	Ea' Jisas dei' nape namona la'ela'ef. Amama atom dei' nape pris Dembinai la'ela'ef endilisi.
58007025	Amama atom dei' Anan la'ifinai ma nefa' esis amam nematawa sotanimani sofe' felefele'ma Goda agel Ananinai ea' sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Dei' main, Anan nape ambal napaina la'ela'ef nanda' betena God nigiambamas.
58007026	Dembinai pris anama la'ifinai endilisi ma nagiambamapa. Anan naila waf Godi bo'ona andeande', waf aonai a'ana. Anan okom bu'unai dei' nape laogona epes sanda' waf aonai. God nase'ana agel lu'unai nikila' ilif endilisi.
58007027	Amam dembemi pris fowa'imi mape mali' ma pris hiami mondolalima God nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef. Mali' ata' mondolalimana ma nakwaha waf aonai amam manda'anai. Ea' magi' mondolalimana ma nakwaha waf aonai esis amam nematawa sanda'anai. Ea' Jisas ina nanda'am si'i amam, owa'. Anan nondolali ma God nemaf atotona nakwahomasa waf aonai epes hiesi sanda'anai ea' ma'um. Naso' Anan atona nafe'ma God.
58007028	Mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai nesaho' amam amama ina la'ifima monda' waf bu'unai nimeguf hiami ea' mape dembemi pris. Ea' basef amama la'ifimi God na'i endilisi gani ilif, amama mataga magi'ma mi'uli anama mandandepa Nogalomana Ananinai, Anan nataga bo'ona andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
58008001	Basef amama anda'ami mape mali'i, ofagema na'ama. Ape' anona Dembinai pris nape nali'ma pris hiami na'ama etin si'i basef mali'i ma'iam. Anan nape sia bu'unai Dembinai lagel da'isinai gani heven ilif.
58008002	Anan nanda' maol anama nondolali ma God ipat lu'unai Ananinai. Ipat anama sanda' lotu endilisinai. Anona aman ina nala' ipat anama, owa'. Dembinai atona nala'ana notawa.
58008003	Fowa' gani God nandandepa amam dembemi pris mofa' amamaga bu'wami gwa'aimi mafis mamumami ma mondolalimana. Ea' Dembinai ape'inai wapoti' God nandandepana ma nofa'ai anom amamaga nondolalimanami.
58008004	I'i Anan etapanai, Anan ina dei' nope dembinai pris, owa'. Dei' main, amam hiami mape pris etap anae' manda' maola mofa'ai amamaga amama hiami mondolalima God, si'i mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'iam. Anan ina nape nanda' maol anama etap anae', owa'.
58008005	Amam pris hiami manda' maol anama mondolalima God manda' maol ipat Ananinai fowa' sanda' lotuwanai nanda' ikwaf atona ma ipat endilisinai bu'unai nape heveni. Amama atom nemaf anama Moses na'i nola' ipat anama sowalo' selanai, God na'ipana na'i, “Ine' nindumafuma umbamehena andeande'ma nambimb nenda' amamaga hiami hi'ilam migi'mam mondahamam endilisi si'i ikwaf anama Ae' ihi'ambenana ea' halaf Sainai.”
58008006	Ea' Jisas nanda' maol anama nondolalima God ea' maol anama nikila' endilisi maol amam pris fowa'imi manda'anai si'i basef amama dambaimi mikila' basef fowa'imi God na'i endilisimi atom naloma Moses. Basef amama dambaimi, Jisas Anan nape la'afena God naloma epes Ananisi ma basef amama mikila' basef amama fowa'imi. Amama atom dei' basef amama dambaimi mataga mawalapai basef bu'wami endilisimi mikila' fowa'imi.
58008007	Basef amama fowa' God na'i endilisimi atom naloma Moses ina mape bo'om la'ela'ef, owa'. I'i mope bo'om la'ela'ef, dei' basef amama God na'i endilisimi magi'i maol a'am.
58008008	Ea' God nawalapa waf aonai epesi na'i, “Ae' Dembiwei a'i, peme! Anona nemaf enda' anom basef dambaimi i'i endilisimi atom eloma esis epes hiesi wambota Israeli ma epes hiesi Judai wapoti'.
58008009	Basef amama dambaimi ina mandahama amama anom fowa'imi a'iam aloma esis, owa'. Fowa' a'i basef amama alomas, nemaf anama ahapila lagof asasimi efa'as sakwaha etap hiagoma Isip safe'. Ea' esis ina saila basef amama a'iam endilisimi atom, owa'etin. Ea' dei' ewa' alafuga ma esis. Ae' Dembiwei a'iam na'ama.
58008010	Nimeguf amama hi'ilam anona nemaf, Ae' i'i anom basef endilisimi atom eloma epes hiesi wambota Israel. Ae' dembiwei a'iam na'ama. Basef amama ofagema na'ama. Anona nemaf enda' mi'uli ae'anai nepe opalef asasimi nomon, ea' enda'ana nepe ukup asasimi nomon. Ea' epe God asasiwei, esis sope amam nematawa ae'asi.
58008011	Nemaf anama esis amam nematawa hiesi atona etin maol a'asa sowalipa esis alupusi asasisi soloma sahin owan asasisi si'i, ‘Ipe' pegawa Dembinai’, owa'. Dei' main, nogota anama epes hiesi sogawa Ae' andeande', awasi dambesi wapoti'.
58008012	Anona nemaf Ae' iti esis uwahipis igiambamas na'a sotanimani sope andeande', ekwahomasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai Ae' ina ata' okom na'iana wapoti', owa'.”
58008013	Basef amama dei' na'i endilisimi atom God nofalam na'i basef amama dambaimi, manda' amama fowa' na'iam endilisimi atom dei' mataga apim ea'. Amamaga mataga apimi amama mope nogota bandana ma higililam hi'ilam.
58009001	Basef mali'i God na'i endilisimi atom Anan nanda' anom basefa mi'uli na'ipasana anona ipat bo'ona andeande' notawa etap anae' ma sonda' lotuwanai.
58009002	Ipat anama sanda' sel sanda'anai. Sawalogon biefigin wa'ol nape nali'i sofalagon sa'i, “Bo'wagoma andeande'”. Amamaga ma'oh anama nomoni, amama biefim. Anom ilelowa mataganai sanda' gol sanda'anai naloma anona balata mawamona bret mondolali maso' Godanai.
58009003	-
58009004	Ea' wa'ol lowaf alafugeinama sowaolana nataol nawalogon nali'a ganima wa'ol momo'w nomon, anama sofalagon sa'i, “Bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi.” Amamaga ma'oh na'ama nomon amama. Balata sanda' gol sanda'anai, pris mondolalima Goda amamaga nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami maloma anom bokis atom basef God na'i endilisimi atom malami. Bokis amama sanda' gol sanda'ami ea' ande'am si'ima gol atona. Bokis amama nomon sala anona botol si'i malep sanda' gol sanda'anai. Anom gwa'aimi esis Juda fowa' sa'am anama wafiguma fatauguma sofalam sa'i mana mala botol anama nomon. Botol anama nala bokis amama naloma bandan Aroni fowa' dahanamb soh mataganai maloma otamba biam batapumi ma God fowa' gani nanda' basef amama na'i endilisimi atom naloma esis Juda mailami. Amama mala bokis amama nomon.
58009005	Ea' amamaga matoma ilifa bokis amama andi'i amama. Anom biam si'i ensel sanda' gol nafifili sanda'am mondola'wifa God nape nalomas. Amama matoma ilifa bokis amama. Bihinagof mandom ensel amama na'ama la'afen mondolali makolo' esimbel mali'amona okom wandafunai Godi. Ea' dei' ae' ina la'ifiwi ma i'i basefa amamaga amama ofagema i'ipipam hi'ilam, owa'.
58009006	Esis sanda' amamaga mape alihima nimeguf hiami amam pris mawis ipat anama nomon rum wa'ana mondolalima God.
58009007	Ea' gani nomon wa'ol nape etina sa'i, “Bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi,” owa'. Rum anama, pris dembinai atona nape nali'ma pris hiami nafe' nawis nemaf atotona afagof hiami. Ea' ina nafe' nawis na'a, owa'. Anan nofa' esimbel atom mafisim nafe' nawis gani nomon nape etina. Esimbel amama nofa'am nondolalima Goda nokwaha waf aonai anan nanda'anai ata' nali', ea' waf aonai esis amam nematawa sanda'anai wapoti'. Waf anama esis owa' sogawa andeande' sanda'anai.
58009008	Pris anama nawis nanda' maol anama ma Ambal Bu'unai Godi nihi'ambapa na'ama. Ipat anama rum wa'ana mondolalima God nimeguf hiami maol ata' nape ma monda'ana. Eaf anama ma ape' mofe' muwis gani sa'i, “Bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi”, anama ina nataga nandawalap alihina, ata' owa'.
58009009	Ipat anama nihi'ambapa nogota anae' dei'inai nihi'ambapa basef na'ama. La'ela'ef epes hiesi sanda' lotuma God sofa'ai amamaga amama bu'wami gwa'aimi mafis mamumami sondolali saso' Goda nakwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ea' amama ina la'ifima sonda' malogof mape opalef esis nomoni andeande'ma mi'iam mi'i esis bu'wasi endilisi, owa'.
58009010	Waf anama sondolalimana ofagema amama. Waf sa' gwa'aimi embel naloma waf sasa'of ma sotofa alogw awami sotaga bo'wesa naep Godi. Amamaga amama alop ando' atona, God nase'as mi'uli anama ma silam la'ela'ef sefe' sotagama nogota anama noho'ofa amamaga dambaimi.
58009011	Dei' Krais nafi'i nataga pris Dembinai nape nali'ma pris fowa'imi hiami. Ea' numafi amamaga amama bu'wami mataga mape ea'. Anan nafe' nawis nomon endilisi ipat anama agel lu'unai bu'unai endilisi nikila' ipat anama selinai fowa'inai notawa etap anae'. Ea' ipat anama dei'inai ina notawa etap anae', epes sanda'ana sala'ana lagof asasimi, owa'.
58009012	Krais nawis nomon ipat anama nafe' gani nomon nape etina sa'i, “Bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi.” Anan nanda'am na'ama nemaf atotona ea' ma'um. Anan ina nofa' esimbel meme maloma bulmakau nogami nawis ipat anama, owa'. Anan nawis nondolalima Goda esimbel maloma alop ananinai atona si'ina, ea' ma'um amama atom. Anan nanda'am na'ama natala ape' natagahepa ma waf aonai nawa'apai ma mope andeande' la'ela'ef.
58009013	Maina nemaf amam nematawa alogw mailasa naep Godi, amam pris maha bulmakau suwafumi maofam mofa' esimbel amamumi maloma agamb bulmakau numai'inai. Ea' meali'amasam epes isima. Manda'am na'ama epes isima sataga bo'wesa alop atona ande' ma naep Godi.
58009014	Ea' esimbel Kraisi mikila' amama endilisi. Krais ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape namunai la'ela'ef nagiambamana ma nondolalima God nase'ana Anan atona hi'alana. Amama atom dei' esimbel ananimi ina mandombasa alop atona ape'inai ande', owa'. Amama mandombasa ukup ape'imi ma basef ma'i opalef nomoni bo'om andeande' endilisi ea' makwaha waf naninani esis sanda'anai owa' seape bo'wesa naep Godi ma ape' dei' manda' maol God nape namunai.
58009015	Amama atom dei' Krais nape la'afen numafi basef amama dambaimi God na'i endilisimi atom. Anan naga' ma natala esis amam nematawa notagahis ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai nogota anama sape owina basef God nali' na'i endilisimi atom. Ea' dei' emi egafis God nofalasa sigi'mana, esis sofa' ambal anama namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Amama ambal namunai si'i fowa' gani God na'i endilisimi atoma sofa'ami.
58009016	Emi egalina okom na'i basef amama la'ifimi ma emi egafis anona nemaf sofa' amamaga ananimi nemaf anama enin neaga'anai, nanda' basef amama la'ifimi mail anona okwatip. Ama nogalomana ananinai ni'i nila basef amama ma nofa' amamaga ahalomanai, anan nili' nihi'ambas endilisi ma ahalomana ananinai naga' ea'.
58009017	Dei' main, i'i ahalomana noga', basef ananimi la'ifimi nanda'am mail okwatip mape la'ifim mandawalap. Ea' i'i anan ata' nope namunai, basef amama ina dei' la'ifim, owa'.
58009018	Amama atom basef mali'i fowa' God na'i endilisimi atom ina mataga mandawap etin, owa'. Amam maha mafis makolo' esimbel amamumi manda' basef amama mataga la'ifim, ea' mape la'ifim mandawalap alihim.
58009019	Moses fowa' gani nali' na'ipa esis amam nematawa Juda hiesi basef hiami mi'uli Godi hi'alam, ea' nofa' esimbel bulmakau nogami maloma meme maloma embel maloma auf sipsipum akwahimi maloma lawag sa'unai sa'i hisop agof nalam dis esimbel amama malami neali'am embela amam nematawa isima hiesi saloma buk anama mi'uli anama Godi napeinai wapoti'.
58009020	Ea' na'i, “Esimbel amama basef amama God na'i endilisimi atom, amama na'ipipama pilam.”
58009021	Moses neali'am esimbel na'ama etin mail ipat anama sanda' lotuwanai naloma amamaga amama hiami hi'alam sanda'am sanda' lotumanam God ipat anama nomon.
58009022	Basef amama ma mi'uli anama na'i felefele'ma amamaga amama hiami mosa'opam esimbel atoma motaga bo'om andeande'. I'i esimbel ina molo, God ina nekwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai, owa'.
58009023	Ipat anama naloma amamaga amama sondolali sanda' lotuma God, amama mondola'wifa amamaga amama endilisimi mape heveni. Mi'uli Godi na'i amamaga amama etapami motaga bo'om andeande'ma esimbel amama atom. Ea' amamaga amama endilisimi mape ilifi mikila' amama etapami. Amama atom dei' God na'i amamaga amama endilisimi mape ilifi motaga bo'om andeande' ma esimbel dambaimi mikila' esimbel fowa'imi.
58009024	Ea' Krais ina nawis ipat anama Godi epes sala'ana lagufi, nondola'wifa ipat anama endilisinai nape heveni, owa'. Anan nafe' nawis heven atogon, anama dei' nataga alihina nape la'ela'efa naep Godi nanda' beten nagiambamapa.
58009025	Nemaf atotona afagof hiami pris dembinai nape nali'ma pris hiami etap anae' nofa' esimbel mafisim nawis nomon nondolali ma God. Nawis nomon wa'ol nape etina sa'i “Bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi.” Esimbel amama ina Ananimi ma alop ananinai, owa'. Ea' Jisas ina nawis nomon naso' Anan atona nondolalima God afagof hiami si'i amam pris manda'am, owa'.
58009026	I'i Anan nonda'am na'ama, Anan nefa' nimanimi nimeguf hiami timbi tambel fowa' dambadamba God nanda' etap anae' nafi'i nafi'i notaga dei'. Owa'. Dei' felefele'ma nogota hi'ilana Krais nataga etap anae' ma nase'ana Anan hi'alana nondolalima Goda nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Nanda'am nemaf atotona ea' ma'um.
58009027	Epes hiesi anona nemaf soga' nemaf atotona owagama situma basef lu'wami God nonda' kotimasami.
58009028	Ea' na'ama etin si'i Krais nase'ana Anan hi'alana nondolalima Goda nemaf atotona nakwaha waf aonai epes hiesi sanda'anai. Anona nemaf wapoti' nigi' notanima nifi'i. Ea' Anan ina nifi'i ma nokwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai, owa'. Nifi'i ma nofa' epes isima sape sohafanai.
58010001	Ape' mati mi'uli fowa' God naso' Mosesanai nondola'wif etina amamaga bu'wami ma'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Amamaga amama apimi ina endilisimi, owa'. Amama mondola'wif etin. Ea' dei' mi'uli anama na'i esis ata' sondolalima God afagof hiami, ina la'ifina nonda'as sifi'i felefele'ma God sondolalimana ma sotaga bo'wes endilisi, owa'.
58010002	I'i mi'uli anama nenda'as bo'wes endilisi, dei' ina ata' sondolalima God wapoti', owa'. Ea' owa'etin. I'i esis sifi'i sonda' lotumana sotaga bo'wes sondolalimana etin, basef mape opalef nomoni ina mihi'ambasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'. Ea' owa'etin.
58010003	Afagof hiami amamaga mafis maim sondolalima Godami mafela ukup asasimi ma sogawa waf aonai esis sanda'anai la'ela'ef napomas.
58010004	Esimbel bulmakau noganai maloma meme ina la'ifima mokwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.
58010005	Ea' nemaf anama Krais nafi'i etap anae' Anan na'ipa God na'i, “Ine' nandaiwa'ma esis soha mafis sofa'ai amamaga maim sifi'i sondolalima ine', owa'. Ea' ine' nandondomba anona alopa nese'eana Ae'.
58010006	Mafis saham afum sondolalima ine' maloma amamaga mafis maim sondolalima ine'ami ma nokwaha waf aonai epes sonda'anai, amama ine' nandaiwa'mam.
58010007	Anom nemeguf mafe'ma ea', Ae' a'i, ‘God, ine' dei' netolowe. Si'i fowa' amam profet manda' basef mail buk ma'iama Ae', dei' afi'i ma ila okom ine'inai atona.’ ”
58010008	Krais nali' ata' na'ipa God na'i, “Ine' nandaiwa'ma mafis maim saham sanda'am sandolalima ine' balata sondolalima ine'anai. Mafis maim amama sondolalima ine', ine' nandaiwa'mam.” Ea' mi'uli God fowa' naso' Mosesanai na'i esis sondolalimana etin sope la'ela'ef.
58010009	Ea' Krais nagi' na'ipa God na'i, “Ine' netolowe. Ae' afi'i ma ila okom ine'inai atona.” Ea' dei' God natofa mafis maim fowa'imi mali'i sondolalima Ananami. Ea' dei' nahapona waf anama Krais naila okom Godi atona nape la'ifina naho'ofa amama fowa'imi.
58010010	Jisas Krais naila okom Godi atona andeande' nase'ana alop ananinai nondolalimana nemaf atotona ea' ma'um. Amama atom dei' nanda'apa mataga bu'upai Ananipai atepa.
58010011	Amam pris hiami maitu manda' maol mondolali ma God manda'ana nimeguf hiami. Ea' ofa anama amam manda'anai ina la'ifina nakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai, owa'.
58010012	Ea' aman anama nonda' ofa nemaf atotona, nase'ana Anan atona nondolalima Goda nakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai, amama mape la'ela'ef. Anan nanda'am na'ama ma ea', dei' nape naloma God lagel da'isinai Ananinai.
58010013	Anan nape na'ama la'ela'ef nape nohafa nemaf anama God nonda' naumbih Ananisi sope owina bo'wagah ananimi.
58010014	Dei' main, Krais nase'ana alop ananinai atona God nondolalimana nemaf atotona, ea' amama atom nanda' epes sataga bo'wes andeande' sope la'ela'ef. Epes isima Anan dei' nape la'ela'ef nanda'as anona nemaf sotaga bo'wes andeande'.
58010015	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi wapoti' nawalapa basefa ape' na'ama nali' na'i,
58010016	“Dembinai na'i, nogota anama ata' hi'ilana nili', ae' i'i anom basef endilisimi. Basef amama na'ama. Anona nemaf ae' enda' mi'uli Ae'anai hianai nepe opalef asasimi ea' enda'ana nil ukup asasimi.”
58010017	Ea' nagi' nowatani basef amama na'i, “Ae' ina anona nemaf okokoma waf aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.”
58010018	God nakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai nakwahona ea'. Dei' maol anama sofa'ai mafis maim sondolali ma Goda waf aonai epes sanda'anai owa' endilisi.
58010019	Ea' dei' ipe' alupipei, esimbel Jisasi atom dei' ape' ukup la'ifim. Ea' owa' umbamehepa ma mofe' muwis nomon anama God napoma bo'wagoma andeande' endilisi.
58010020	Ea' dei' mofe' muwis anama eaf anama dambainai ambal namunai napoma. Eaf anama Jisas atona nawala lowaf anama lu'unai notaol si'i uta nandoga eaf nogal nawis nomon. Lowaf anama alop Ananinai atona.
58010021	Dei' ape' anona dembinai pris numafi amam nematawa Godi. Anama Jisas atona.
58010022	Amama atom dei' ape' mofe' felefele'ma Goda waf anama. Ape' mokwaha waf hianai baso'mainai ma opalef ape'imi ea' mombale'efana endilisi. Ukup mopoma Krais atona, Anan nakolo' esimbel Ananimi nasa'opa opalef ape'imi mataga bo'om. Basef mape opalef nomoni ina ma'iam ma'ipapa basef mihi'ambapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai, owa'. Ea' ape' ukup mopoma Anan nasa'opa alop ape'inai embel galagami.
58010023	Ape' mombale'efana la'ifipa muwalipas alihima amamaga bu'wami ape' mape mohafami. Amama ape' mohapilam la'ifipa, ina motanima, owa'. Dei' main, ape' mogawa maim amamaga God na'i basef endilisimi atom nambimb nigi'mam nonda'am andeande'.
58010024	Ape' mefela ukup esis sahin owan ma ukup mimila esis amam nematawa ea' sonda' waf bu'unai.
58010025	Ape' ina ukup mose'apama waf mandakolas maloma esis alupusi si'i enis epes sanda'am, owa'. Ape' monda' ape' la'ifipa monda'am la'ela'ef mikila' fowa' manda'am. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa nemaf Dembinai niefi'ianai nafi'i felefele'.
58010026	I'i ape' mogawa basef endilisimi ma dei' ape' mila ukup ape'imi atoma mofe' monda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, i'i monda'am na'ama, ina anona nemaf anona ofa nokwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai, owa'.
58010027	I'i ape' monda'am na'ama, nambimb ape' umbamohapa endilisi mope mohafa nemaf anama God nowaloga ape' ma nosapa'apa mofe' nif lu'wami fandumi. Nif amama anona nemaf fendo naumbih Godi.
58010028	Ea' ape' mogawa, emi egafis simbisila' mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai, ma epes bias o wenis sitilis sowalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai, esis ina nambimb siti esis uwahipis, owa'. Esis sola'apas sohas soga'.
58010029	Dei' ipe' ukup mape ma'imama ma emi egafis sowa' alafugaha Nogalomana Godi? Epes isima anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi mikila' epes isima sambisila' mi'uli anama God fowa' naso' Mosesanai. Esimbel Kraisi anona ikwafa basef God na'i endilisimi atom manda' epes isima Ananisi etis bo'wes. Ea' epes isima sanda'am na'ama sa'i esimbel amama Kraisi falafumi atom, sa'i ga' Kraisi falafunai atona. Ea' sanda' basef findiwama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nagiambapa na'a numafiapa.
58010030	Dei' main, ape' mogawa aman anama na'i, “Waf pegwa waf aonai, maol ae'anai. Ae' atowe anona nemaf egwamasam.” Ea' na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' atowe Dembiwei anona nemaf ewaloga esis amam nematawa ae'asi ma basef lu'wami.”
58010031	I'i God la'ifina nape namunai la'ela'ef nohapila ape' la'ifina ma nogwamapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai, amama dei' umbamahepa endilisi.
58010032	Ea' ipe' ukup mopoma nemaf anama fowa', ipe' pati nafifili Godi. Nemaf anama ipe' pefa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Owa'etin. Paitu la'ifipa ma pali'amona wandafa waf aonai.
58010033	Anom nimeguf sanda'epa paitu la'afena naep amam nematawa hiesi sanda' basef awami findiwama ipe', sase'epa nimanimi lu'wami naep asasimi. Ea' anom nimeguf sanda'am na'ama etina enis amam nematawa, ipe' paitu palomas pagiambamas.
58010034	Nemaf anama ipe' pati esis amam nematawa sape kalabusi uwahipis pefa' nimanimi palomas. Ea' nemaf anama esis salo' lagofepa sefa' amamaga ipe'imi, ipe' pandanifel ma faso'mepa pape patilis. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa amamaga ipe'imi bu'wami endilisi ata' ma'omepa, amama anona nemaf mupe la'ela'ef. Amama mikila' endilisi amamaga amama sali' sanda'mepami.
58010035	Ea' dei' ipe' ina pekwaha waf bu'unai paitu la'ifipa, owa'. Waf bu'unai anama atona, God anona nemaf nogwamepa amamaga bu'wami ma ipe'.
58010036	Ipe' pitu la'ifipa ma pila okom Godi ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami fowa' Anan na'iam endilisi ma niesi'ipami.
58010037	Ina ata' nogota laona. Nogota bandana ea', “Ama aman anama na'i niefi'i, anan nambimb nifi'i. Anan ina ata' nupani, owa'.
58010038	Ea' epes bu'wasi Ae'asi ofagema ma sope namis la'ela'ef na'ama. Esis sombale'efa ae'. Emi epen netanima nekwaha nembale'efa Ae', okom Ae'anai ina bo'ona ma enin, owa'.”
58010039	Ape' ina epes umbamahapa matanima mefe' makwaha mombale'efa God ama owagama higililapa, owa'. Ape' epes mombale'efana mofa' ambal namunai mope andeande' la'ela'ef.
58011001	Waf ofagena ma ape' mombale'efa God na'ama. Opalef ape'imi mahapila amamaga amama ape' mombale'efana mape mohafama anona nemaf nigi' neatagai noloma anom amamaga anona nemaf God niese'apami. Amamaga amama naep ape'imi owa' meatilumi, opalef ape'imi mogawa endilisi amamaga amama mape.
58011002	Amam fowa'imi mombale'efa God na'ama, amama atom dei' Anan na'iam na'i, “Waf amamunai bo'ona.”
58011003	Ape' mombale'efa God, amama atom dei' mogawa Anan nanda' amamaga mape ilif etapi matagama basef Ananimi atom. Ea' ape' mogawa amamaga hiami ape' matulumi, amama God nanda'ama amamaga amama ape' owa' meatoloma naep ape'imi.
58011004	Abel nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nefa'ai anom amamaga nondolalima Godami bo'om endilisi mikila' amama Kein nondolalima Godami. Abel nembale'efa God, amama atom God na'i anan epen bu'unai. God na'i aho'ma amamaga Abel nondolalimanami na'i amamaga amama bo'om. Abel naga' ea', waf anan nembale'efa Godanai si'i malogel ata' nihi'ambapa waf bu'unai la'ela'ef nape.
58011005	Enok nembale'efa God dei' God nefa'ana nafe' nalata ilif heven. Anan ina naga', owa'. Epes sagolopana sa'i siti anan, ea' ina satolona, owa'. Dei' main, God nefa'ana. Amama na'ama etin si'i buk Baibel na'iam na'i, “Fowa' God ata' owa' nefa'ana, nemaf anama Enok nali' naila okom Godi.”
58011006	Epes owa' sembale'efa God, esis ina nambimb sila okom Ananinai, owa'. Dei' main, emi egafis si'i sefe' felefele'ma God, esis sombale'efana sogawa endilisi Anan nape namunai la'ela'ef. Ea' sembale'efana ma God nose'as amamaga bu'wami epes isima sagolopana endilisi.
58011007	Noa nembale'efa God dei' nihi'ambana basefa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai, amamaga amama Anan owa' ata' notolom nogowami. Anan naila basef Godi nanda' anona sip lu'unai. Sip anama Noa nao'wa akwa'w kwaloma awasi ananisi safe' sawis sapaina sape andeande'. Ina saga', owa'. Sapan. Anan nembale'efa God. Amama atom si'i nanda'masa basefa esis amam nematawa sape etapi hi'alas. Anan nembale'efa God. Amama atom God nofalana na'i aman bu'unai andeande', si'i nanda'masam emi egafis sembale'efana.
58011008	Nemaf anama God nofala Abraham nakwaha wambel ananinai nafe' etap God na'i nease'anagoma ea' anan nembale'efana. Amama atom naila basef Godi nafe'. Anan ina nagawa anama neafe'ma, owa'. Ea' anan nembale'efana dei' nafe'.
58011009	Anan nembale'efa God ea' nafe' nape etap anama fowa' gani God na'i basef endilisimi atom na'i nease'anagoma. Anan nape etap anama si'i anan anona wambota.
