Nape ifagw selimi naloma Aisak naloma Jekop, amam biam anona nemaf mofa' etap anama molomanai, si'i fowa' God nali' na'i basef amama na'i endilisimi atom.
58011010	La'ela'ef Abraham okom na'i ata' niti wambel taun anama gani ilif olalef maim la'ifimi motawa. God atona gawainai Anan okom na'i nonda' wambel anama, ea' nanda'ana.
58011011	Sara akwa'w asa'w ea' ina kola awasi, owa'. Nemaf kola awasianai nafe' hi'alana. Ea' akwa'w kombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' God nanda'akw la'ifikwa kola awani. Dei' main, akwa'w kombale'efana endilisi ma basef amama anan na'i endilisimi atom, kwa'i anan nambimb nigi'mam nonda'am andeande' si'i na'iam.
58011012	Ea' dei' aman anama atotona, anan hagona ea' felefele'ma neaga' nataga ahalomas awasi ananisi hiesi endilisi anona nemaf sigi' seatagai. Esis sataga hiesi endilisi, sondahama ondowa motawa ilifi, maloma wesan na'oh naoh akata. Epes ina la'ifisa seambam, owa'.
58011013	Epes isima sembale'efa God la'ela'ef sape safe'ma saga'. Ina sali' sofa' amamaga bu'wami amama God na'i endilisi niese'asami nemaf anama sape, ata' owa'. Esis sembale'efana endilisi saitu laogon sandanifel si'i satolom. Ea' sawalapa basef sa'iam sa'i, “Ape' mape etap anae' si'i epes anona wambelipai. Ape' mafi'i mape nogota bandana etap anae' anona wambelipai.”
58011014	Epes sa'i basef amama, ape' mogawas sa'i sogolopa etap asasinai endilisinai.
58011015	I'i ukup asasimi ata' mape ma'i wambel anama fowa' sakwahona safi'i, dei' esis ata' eaf nafe' sotanima sefe'agon. Owa', sandaiwa'.
58011016	Ea' dei' esis ina sanda'am na'ama, owa'. Opalef asasimi mohafa anona etap bu'unai endilisi nikila' anama fowa'iguma. Anama heven atogon. Amama atom dei' God ina ambal aona ma epes isima sa'i, “Ine' God ape' manda' lotumanai, owa'.” Anan nandomba anona wambel taun ma epes isima sembale'efanai sofe' seapoma.
58011017	Abraham nembale'efa God endilisi ma basef amama na'i endilisimi atom nalomanomi. Ea' dei' God nagwamba Abrahama nese'ana Aisak nondolalimana ma God. Endilisi, Abraham nape nohafa noha nogalomana ananinai nondolalimana.
58011018	Ea' God nali' na'ipana na'i, “Esis wambota Aisaki etis anona nemaf sofa' agel wambota ine'inai.”
58011019	Abraham okom na'i na'ama na'i, “I'i ae' ehana afuna, ea' hapainai, nambimb God nefelona wapoti'.” Ea' dei' ape' mi'iam mi'i amama si'i God nafela Aisak netanima nohafel hi'agif wapoti' ma Abraham notanima nofa'ana.
58011020	Aisak nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nefalo'ma Jekop naloma Iso na'i God nonda'am la'ifima amamaga bu'wami na'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai.
58011021	Jekop nembale'efa God, dei' nemaf anama felefele'ma na'i neaga', nefalo'ma nogamana Josepi biam nanda'am mataga la'ifim. Anan nahapila bandan nandaha'amon naitu nandanifel ma God nanda' lotumana.
58011022	Josep nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' felefele'ma na'i neaga' anan na'i basefa anona nemaf esis Israel sokwaha etap hiagoma Isip sefe'. Ea' na'ipasa sowa bihiguf alop ananimi hi'agif gani anona etap esis Israel sefe' seapoma.
58011023	Mamasana Mosesi sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' mama'wana kolana sambahe'ana nape aomb wanom. Dei' main, esis bias satolona bo'ona endilisi. Esis ina umbamahasa King dembinai Fero ma mi'uli ananinai, owa'.
58011024	Nemaf anama Moses nataga dembena, nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' okom na'i nandaiwa'ma esis sofalana si'i nemata'w akwama King Fero nogaloma'w, owa'.
58011025	Na'i nefa' nimanimi na'ama etin neloma esis wambota atona Godi. Nandaiwa'ma nila waf aonai ma nope nondanifel nogota anama bandana.
58011026	Anan okom na'i, i'i anan nofa' ambal aonai ma agel Kraisi, amama bu'wami endilisi mikila' otamba hiami maloma sosaf bu'unai hianai naninani esis Isipi. Dei' main, anan okom napoma amamaga amama bu'wami endilisi anona nemaf God na'i endilisi niese'anami.
58011027	Moses nembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' nohafel nakwaha etap hiagoma Isip. Anan ina umbamahana ma okom wandafunai King Feroi, owa'. Anan si'i nati aman anama esis owa' la'ifisa seatolona naep asasimi. Ea' dei' nape la'ifina.
58011028	Anan nembale'efa God dei' naila basef Ananimi ma gwa'aimi amama lu'wami Pasova, naha sipsip nanda' lotuma God. Ea' nanda' esimbel nandisam utagw ilif wa'owa'ol nemaf anama ensel anama noha awasi amam esis Isipi ina atuwasi noha esis Israel, owa'.
58011029	Esis Israel sombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' satopa' naoh agilima Embel Akwahimi matopa' embel mambo safe' akata si'i etap fatauguma. Ea' esis Isip sati esis saitu la'afen, sagi'mas safe' ea' embel motanima mowambu'as mahas saga' hi'alas.
58011030	Esis Israel sombale'efa God, amama atom dei' safe' tulif sandanogamom endalelemb sanda' otamba sanda'ami wambel Jeriko sape wik si'inai, nimeguf 7-peleim, ea' endalelemb amama mandatal mowa etap.
58011031	Nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a waola amami Rahap, akwa'w kombale'efa God. Amama atom dei' amam biam mandambaho' mafi'i matologini kumafiam andeande'. Ea' dei' akwa'w ina afu'w kwaloma epes isima wambelisi sosambala basef Godi, owa'.
58011032	Ea' dei' ae' ata' iwatani maim basef wapoti'? Owa'. Nogota ina laona ma ata' i'i basefa Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Devit naloma Samuel maloma amam profet, owa'.
58011033	Amam amama membale'efa God. Amama atom dei' maitu la'ifim mikila' wandaf mahagofa soldia amam king dembemi hiami. Mape dembemi mumafiasa waf bu'unai ea' mofa' amamaga bu'wami God na'i niese'amami. Ea' masopama malogofa mafis amama laion wandafumi lu'wami.
58011034	Ea' mahefa nif lu'wami fandumi. Amam mafa' mafe'ma mindihi'ama bainah ea' ina mapisilam, owa'. Amam ina mape la'ifim, ea' nambimb mofa' pepel Godi. Ea' mataga la'ifim endilisi ma wandaf mahagofa amam soldia hiami epes esis anona wambota.
58011035	Anom amam maga'i motanima mohafel wapoti', mamasas amamuwai watolom wao'wam. Enis epes sanda' kalabus ea' esis naumbih sahambombaga alop asasinai endilisi, felefele'ma seaga'. I'i esis sila basef asasimi, nambimb sokwahis sefe' wafifis. Owa', esis ina saila basef asasimi, owa'. Esis ukup mapoma anona nemaf sotanima sohafel hi'agif sofa' ambal namunai, na'ama andeande' endilisi.
58011036	Enis sofa' nimanimi ma esis naumbih sa'i basef findiwaimi ma esis, sahas endilisi. Ea' enis sowa'as sen sanda'as sape sanda' kalabus.
58011037	Enis, naumbih sakwaha otamba sahas afis. Ea' enis, sanda'as awes endilisi. Enis sofa' so satopa'as alop asasinai biefis etis. Ea' enis, sahas bainah saga'. Ea' enis sembale'efa Godi sowaho' alop mafis sipsipi meme si'i luwaguf safe'. Esis amamaga hiami a'asa alop asasinai. Ea' naumbih sanda'mas waf aonai endilisi sase'as nimanimi.
58011038	Ea' dei' safa' safe' ganigani sandambaho' etap wafiguma epes a'agoma. Enis sandambaho' etap magali, halafutagw, enis sandambaho' otamba lu'wami magal mawis nomoni, ea' etap fetauguma. Esis amam nematawa bo'wes endilisi. Amama atom dei' epes etapasi ina bo'wesa sope solomas, owa'.
58011039	Epes isima hiesi sembale'efa God. Amama atom dei' sefa' agof bu'wami ma naep ananimi. Ea' esis ina dei' sofa' amamaga amama bu'wami fowa' God na'iam endilisi niese'asami, ata' owa'.
58011040	Dei' main, fowa' gani God okom na'i nandondomba anom amamaga bu'wami endilisi ma ape'. Amamaga amama mikila' amamaga esis fowa'isi sembale'efanai sa'i sofa'ami. God nanda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf esis sotaga bo'wes endilisi sofa'am solomapa.
58012001	Dei' ape' monda' main? Epes fowa'isi sembale'efa Godi saitu salipapa si'i elagw lu'wami mase'alepa mindiwapapa sihi'ambapa waf sembale'efanai. Amama atom ape' dei' mokwaha amamaga amama manda' ape' nimanipai maloma waf aonai nowa'apai. Ea' monda' opalef ape'imi la'ifima mosagih mehip ma sagih bu'unai anama God nandandepana musagihanai meataga ikwaf.
58012002	Naep ape'imi miti Jisas atona anan ofagonama bale'ef ape'inai, nowataniana netaga andeande'ma mombale'efana la'ifipa la'ela'ef mope. Fowa' Anan okom napoma danifela anona nemaf na'i nofa'anai, dei' naitu la'ifina. Ea' nefa' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai naga'. Anan okom napoma nambimb nofa' nimanimi lu'wami noga' lawag anama, amama falafumi atom. Anan ina umbamahana ma ga' anama, owa'. Ea' dei' nape felefele'ma sia bu'unai Godi lagel da'isinai.
58012003	Ipe' ukup mi'i andeande'ma nimanimi amama fowa' nofa'ami. Epes isima sanda' waf aonai sowa'ana alafugah Jisas endilisi sanda'ana kwapete'ana. Ea' Anan naitu la'ifina endilisi. Ipe' ukup mopoma amama ma ina ala'uta nepa, owa'. Pepe la'ifipa.
58012004	Ipe' papa' paloma waf aonai ma pahagofana, ea' ipe' ina dei' papa' pafe' patagama wandaf lu'unai sahepa esimbel malipa paga', ata' owa'.
58012005	A'i ipe' ukup mase'epa ma basef amama God nanda'ama ipe' ma nefela ukup ipe'imi nenda'epa petaga la'ifipa? Anan dei' nofalepa batausana Ananipei na'i, “Awasi ae'ipei, maina nemaf Dembinai nese'epa nimanimi ma nonda'epa pila basef ananimi, ipe' ina pi'i nimanimi amama anan nase'epami falafumi, owa'. Maina nemaf ni'i nese'epa nimanimi amama, ukup ipe'imi ina aom, owa'.
58012006	Dei' main, emi egafis Dembinai okom nainailas endilisi Anan nanda'as na'ama etina sonda' waf Ananinai bu'unai. Ea' emi egafis Dembinai numafias ni'i awasi ananisi, nahas nonda'as sila waf bu'unai wapoti' ma sogawana andeande' silana.”
58012007	Maina nemaf nimanimi lu'wami meatagamepa, ipe' pitu la'ifipa pi'i aho'ma God nonda'epa pila basef ananimi. Anan nanda'mepa waf anama si'i awasi Ananisi. Dei' main, ahapas amamusi ina mape matilis sanda' waf aonai, owa'.
58012008	Ahapas hiesi mahas manda'asa some' basef silam sope andeande'. I'i ahapepa owa' monda'epa pila basef amamumi, ipe' ina awasi amamupei endilisi, owa'. Ipe' si'i pataga etina amam hiami.
58012009	Ipe' ukup mopoma anom basef wapoti' amama. Ape' etapipai hiapai ahapapa ape'imi manda'apa mila basef amamumi ea' manifelom mefela agof amamumi. Amama atom dei' ape' andeande'ma mofe' owina Ahalomapa nape ilifi numafi ambagof ape'imi ma mofa' ambal namunai.
58012010	Amam ahapapa ape'imi etapami manda'apa maila basef amamumi nogota bandana atona, mandahama ukup amamumi. Ea' God nanda'apa mail basef ananimi ma nagiambamapa endilisi ma mofa' waf bu'unai Ananinai atona andeande'.
58012011	Ahalomapa nase'apa nimanimi ma nanda'apa mail basef ananimi, nemaf anama ape' ina mandanifel, owa'. Ukup ape'imi aom endilisi. Nahapa ma monda' waf bu'unai. Atuwasi monda' waf bu'unai atona, opalef ape'imi mope awanem.
58012012	Ipe' dowa lagof ipe'imi ama nigis la'ifima penda' maol Godi. I'i nembawa bo'wagah ipe'imi ekep pehepa, bo'wagah mokwaepa, ipe' dowam mehip pitu la'ifipa endilisi.
58012013	Ipe' penda' eaf ipe'inai bo'ona nefe'. Ama nambimb epes bo'wagah awomisi ina awes hi'ilas, owa'. Nambimb sotaga bo'wes wapoti'.
58012014	Ipe' dei' penda' maol la'ifipa ma pila waf opalef mope awanem peloma epes hiesi. Ea' pila waf anama bu'unai andeande', pepe Dembinai ananipei etipa endilisi. Epen waf anama a'ani, anona nemaf enin ina niti Dembinai, owa'.
58012015	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin alupini ipe'ini newa ma waf aonai nelolama God nigiambaman etina nefa'an netanimani nepe andeande'. Na'ama enin alupini ipe'ini nenda' waf aonai si'i lawag aonai nail nola gwa'aimi awami, ea' nese'epa nimanimi ipe' nenda' ipe' hipei petaga awepa ma naep Godi.
58012016	Na'ama enin epen atitin nila waf aonai so'a waulanai. Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama enin epen atitin nese'ana alafuga God si'i fowa' Iso nanda'ama natala gwa'aimi nogota bandana ea' nakwaha amamaga bu'wami ahalomana nandondombam ma'omanai.
58012017	Ipe' pegawa, Iso na'i notambel nefe'ma nofa' amamaga amama bu'wami ea' God na'i owa'. Iso napoma lef atona nofa'ai amamaga amama, ea' owa'. Eaf a'ana ma notanima nomboma okom nowa' alafugama waf aonai wapoti'.
58012018	Dei' ipe' ina pataga pape felefele'ma anom amamaga patolom pahapilam lagof ipe'imi, si'i halaf anama Sainai, owa'. Halaf anama nif lu'wami maloma owamb lu'unai endilisi naloma uf lu'unai la'ifinai
58012019	naloma alof nalef naloma anona malogel na'i basef. Esis amam nematawa Juda same' malogel anama nanda' basef, esis umbamahas sa'ipa Moses basef la'ifimi na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mandaiwa' ma meme'ana wapoti'.”
58012020	Dei' main, esis umbamahas endilisi ma basef amama God na'ipasami. Anan na'i na'ama na'i, “I'i enin epen o anona mafin nefe' felefele'ma halaf anama, ipe' pehan otamba ma noga'.”
58012021	Esis umbamahas kwapete' endilisi ma amamaga amama satolomi. Amamaga amama lu'wami endilisi manda' Moses umbamahana kwapete'ana ma natolom. Ea' na'i, “Ae' umbamahe kwapete'e ma atolom.”
58012022	Ipe' ina pataga ma amamaga amama, owa'. Ipe' pataga halaf Saion, wambel lu'unai taun God nape namunai la'ela'ef. Anama Jerusalem dambaiguma nape heven. Ipe' patagama ensel hiami endilisi mandatama mape mandanifel.
58012023	Ipe' pafi'i pandakolas paloma epes Godi, awasi ananisi sali'i. God nanda' agof asasimi mape wambel anama ilif. Ipe' pafi'i felefele'ma God, anan jas nowaloga epes hiesi saloma ambagof epes fowa' God na'i bo'wes andeande'.
58012024	Ea' pafi'i felefele'ma Jisas, Anan nape la'afen numafi basef dambaimi God na'i endilisimi atom. Ea' pafi'i esimbel ananimi fowa' neali'ama ipe', nanda' basef amama mataga la'ifim. Esimbel amama mawalapa anona eaf bu'unai endilisi. Basefa eaf anama nikila' endilisi basef Abeli. Dei' main, basefa esimbel Abeli mofala Goda nogwa waf aonai. Ea' esimbel Jisasi atom God nakwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai.
58012025	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama pewa' alafugaha aman anama dei' na'i. Fowa' gani etap anae' God na'ipasa basef la'ifimi endilisi esis amam nematawa, ea' sesambala basef ananimi. Nogota anama fowa' sesambalom, esis ina la'ifisa sofa' sefe' sindihi'ama okom wandafunai Godi, owa'. Fowa' God na'iam etap anae' ea' dei' nape heven na'i basef la'ifimi endilisi ma ape'. I'i ape' mowa' alafugaha Anan, anona nemaf ape' wapoti' ina la'ifipa ma mofa' mefe' mindihi'ama okom wandafunai Ananinai, owa'.
58012026	Fowa' God nase'ana mi'uli ananinai Moses, malogel ananinai nakoto'ma etap anae'. Ea' dei' na'ipapa na'i, “Owagama anona nemaf ae' ekoto'ma etap wapoti'. Ina ekoto'ma etap atona, owa'. Ekoto'ma etap noloma heven ilif wapoti'.”
58012027	Basef amama ma'i, “Anona nemaf wapoti',” mihi'ambapa na'ama. Amamaga fowa' God nanda'ami anona nemaf nokoto'mam mefe' hegililam hi'ilam. Ea' anom amamaga bu'wami ma pe bu'unai ina mokoto'ami, amama la'ifim mope la'ela'ef.
58012028	Amama atom ape' minifela God. Dei' main, dei' ape' felefele' muwis numafiapa wambel Godi, anama epes ina la'ifisa sokoto'magon, owa'. Ape' monda' lotumana mefela agel ananinai umbamohapa ma mila okom ananinai atona.
58012029	Dei' main, God ape' manda' lotumanai, Anan si'i nif lu'wami fando amamaga awami hi'alam.
58013001	Ipe' Kristen, ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi la'ela'ef.
58013002	Ipe' ina ukup mose'epama pigiambama epes anona wambelisi sifi'i ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' pegawa, fowa' gani enis epes sanda' waf anama ma sagiambama enis epes, esis sofa' anom ensel safe' sumafiam ifagw asasimi. Esis ina sogawa sa'i amam ensel mafi'i, owa'. Sa'i enis epes etapasi.
58013003	Ipe' ukup mopoma esis alupusi sape sanda' kalabusi si'i ipe' panda' kalabus palomas. Ea' ukup mopoma epes isima sofa' nimanimi alop asasinai, pigiambamas si'i ipe' etipa pefa' nimanimi alop ipe'inai pelomas.
58013004	Ipe' amam nematawa pandase'ama ea'i, penda' waf anama notaga nope andeande'. Ipe' ina penda' waf aonai, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa anona nemaf God nogwamipei waf aonai ma amam nematawa sanda' waf so'a waulanai saloma amam nematawa isima sahambombaga waf sandaso'amainai.
58013005	Ipe' ina pila waf aonai anama ukup mohafel endilisi ma otamba, owa'. Amamaga ipe' pahapilami, amama ipe' ukup mopomam na'ama mi'i, “Amama andeande'. Amama nambimb dende'ma ape'.” Dei' main, God na'iam na'i, “Ae' ina anona nemaf okom nose'e ipe' ewa'epa alafuga, owa'.”
58013006	Ea' dei' ape' monda'apa motaga la'ifipa opalef ape'imi mi'iam na'ama mi'i, “Dembinai nagiambama ape'. Ea' ape' ina umbamahapa, owa'. Nambimb epes la'ifisa sonda' maina ape'? Owa'!”
58013007	Ipe' ukup mopoma amam agufumi ipe'imi fowa' mawalapa basef Godi ma ipe'. Ipe' ukup mopoma fe' bu'unai amamunai ea' pefe' pila waf amam membale'efa God.
58013008	Jisas Krais nape na'ama etin si'i nambati', dei' wapoti', ea' nope anona nemaf la'ela'ef hihif.
58013009	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama anom basef hiami mamumami mufi'i momboma opalef ipe'imi ea' pekwaha eaf Godi. I'i ukup ape'imi la'ela'ef mopoma God nagiambamapa na'a, na'ama andeande'. Opalef ape'imi ina motaga la'ifima mila mi'uli epesi ma mea' gwa'aimi mamumami, owa'. Waf anama saila mi'uli anama ina nagiambama amam nematawa sailanai, owa'.
58013010	Ape' anona balata nape sondolalima Goda, anama Krais atona nase'ana alop ananinai si'ina nondolalimana nase'anana God. Ea' amam pris mondolalima God ipat anama selinai sanda' lotuwanai, amam ina la'ifima ma gwa'aimi ma balata anama, owa'.
58013011	Pris anama dembinai nape nali' ma pris hiami anan atona nofa' esimbel amama nawis ipat nomon wa'ol, nape etina bo'wagon andeande' endilisi, nondolalima Goda nokwaha waf aonai epes sanda'anai. Ea' mafis alop si'ina mefa'ana mawisi manda' nif maofam ande'ma anama esis Israel sapoma.
58013012	Amama atom Jisas wapoti' nofa' nimanimi naga' wambel endambel uta ande'ma nasa'opas nanda'as bo'wes andeande' ma esimbel ananimi.
58013013	Ea' dei' ape' wapoti' mefe'ma Anan endalelemb ande', ma monda' ambagof ape'imi aom si'i anan fowa' ambal aona.
58013014	Dei' main, ape' mogawa etap anae' ape' ina anona wambel taun nape la'ela'ef, owa'. Ape' dei' mape manda'am magolopa wambel taun anama anona nemaf na'i neatagai.
58013015	Amama atom dei' ape mefela agel Godi lu'una mose'ana danifela la'ela'efa agel Jisasi, monda'am na'ama si'i amamaga bu'wami mondolalimanami. Ape' mondolalimana na'ama. Mose'ana malogof ape'imi Anan ea' mowalapa basefa agel ananinai.
58013016	Ipe' ina ukup mose'epama penda' waf bu'unai esis amam nematawa, owa'. Ea' amamaga ma'oma ipe' pewalogam pese'ama tu'wanim epes isima amamaga a'asi. Dei' main, God okom na'iam endilisi waf anama si'i amamaga bu'wami ipe' paso'anama pindolalimanami.
58013017	Amam agufumi ipe'imi ma'i migiambamepa ea' mumafi ipe' la'ela'ef. Ama anona nemaf amam mowalapa basefa Goda maol hianai manda'ana mumafi ipe'. Amama atom dei' ipe' pila basef amamumi ea' pepe owina amam. I'i penda'am na'ama ma amam mondanifela monda' maol anama ma ukup amamumi ina aom mupan. I'i amam monda'ana moloma ukup awami, amama nambimb ina migiambamepa, owa'.
58013018	Ipe' penda' betena God nigiambama afa'. Afa' ogawa basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipasa basef mihi'ambafa waf afa'inai ina aona, owa'. Ea' dei' wa'i wila waf bu'unai andeande' nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef.
58013019	Ae' okom na'i endilisi ma ipe' penda' betena God nigiambame ma nambimb etanima efe'mago ipe' mehip.
58013020	God Anan ofagonama okom awanena. Anan nafela Dembinai ape'inai Jisas nohafel hi'agif wapoti'. Esimbel Jisasi malo manda' basef na'i endilisimi atom mape la'ela'ef motaga la'ifim. Esimbel anama atom Jisas nataga Dembinai numafi esis Kristen si'i amam mumafi sipsip.
58013021	Ae' a'i God nonda'epa la'ifipa nese'epa waf bu'unai hianai ipe' ma pila okom Ananinai atona. Ea' a'i Anan nonda' opalef ape'imi nomon ama mowalapa waf hianai bu'unai Anan okom na'inai ma pepel Jisas Kraisi atona. Ea' a'i epes hiesi sefela agel ananinai lu'una la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi.
58013022	Ipe' alupipei, ae' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi, peme' basef anda'ami ma efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa. Dei' main, basef amama ae' anda'ama ipe', amama basef bandami atom.
58013023	Ae' a'i ipe' pegawa esis sakwaha owalomapa ape'inai Timoti, ea' ina ata' nanda' kalabus, owa'. I'i anan nifi'i netagama ae' ulal, nambimb afa' biafa ofo'o etin utilipa.
58013024	Ipe' penda'mago nemaf bu'unai afa'inai ma amam agufumi hiami ipe'imi molomago esis amam nematawa Godi hiesi. Esis Kristen alupusi sape Itali sanda'mepago nemaf bu'unai ipe'.
58013025	Ae' a'i God nigiambamepa na'a ea' nope nolomago ipe' hipei nonda'epa la'ifipa.
59001001	Ae' Jems, ape owina God naloma Dembinai Jisas Krais anda' maola amam atom. Anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' epes hipei Judaipei epes wambotogw loumi 12-peleim. Ipe' pakwaha wambel ofagama ipe'ima ma pafe' pape wambel hiagoma etap anae' pape panda' maol naninani. Ae' anda'mepago danifel nafe'mago ipe'.
59001002	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, maim nimeguf amamaga meagwambipei motagamepa, ukup ipe'imi mi'i andeande' pendanifel etin pepan.
59001003	Dei' main, ipe' pegawa amama mogwamba bale'ef ipe'inai, amama manda'epa pitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi meatagamipei.
59001004	Ea' ipe' pitu la'ifipa ma waf anama neataga bo'ona ma ipe' ma anona nemaf petaga andeande' endilisi, waf aonai a'epa. Ama waf hianai Godi mope ipe', ea' ipe' ina anona waf bu'unai a'epa, owa'.
59001005	Emi egafis gawa bu'unai a'asi, esis sonda' beten sihali' Goda nose'asana. Dei' main, Anan nase'asa amamaga hiami na'a ma epes hiesi, ina ninifalis, owa'.
59001006	Epes isima esis sombale'efana endilisi ma sonda' beten sohali'a God. Ina sope ukup biambiefim, owa'. Esis sombale'efana la'ifis. Emi egafis sape ukup biambiefimi, esis ina sembale'efana la'ifis, owa'. Ukup asasimi si'i embel uf nalo naoh mohafel.
59001007	-
59001008	Epes isima ina ukup mi'i Dembinai nose'as anom amamaga, owa'. Ukup asasimi mandawal biefim mapoma waf hianai esis sanda'anai ea' ina sape ukup etifim, owa'.
59001009	Sahin owan Kristen emi egafis kwahusi esis sondanifel ma God nafelas nigiambamas dei' anona nemaf wapoti'.
59001010	Ape' Kristen emi egafis amamaga hiamisi, esis sondanifel ma God nanda'as safe' owina sembale'efa Krais. Dei' main, epes amamaga hiamisi anona nemaf soga' si'i afis mataga otalef mape nogota bandana ma mandala'of mowa.
59001011	Ipe' pegawa aon alipunai natefi ma owaf naha otalef amama ma ala'um hi'alam. Afis mataga mia'of ea' sosaf afisi nambimb mowa'. Epes isima amamaga hiamisi sonda'am na'ama etin. Nemaf anama sonda' maola bisnisi atom, soga' si'i sosaf afisi mowa.
59001012	Emi egafis saitu la'ifisa hiahaom meagwambasi matagamas, esis sondanifel. Dei' main, nemaf anama esis sikila' amama waf aonai naninani ea' hi'ilana, anona nemaf esis sofa' amamaga bu'wami si'i prais. Amama na'ama. Ambal namunai God na'i endilisi noso'asam emi egafis ukup maimaila anan.
59001013	Emi egalin amamaga meagwambipei motagamen ma nonda' waf aonai, enin ina ni'i God nanda' enin dei' nanda' waf anama. God ina nanda' enin epen nanda' waf aonai, owa'. Ea' ina enis epes la'ifisa sonda'ana nonda' waf aonai, owa'.
59001014	Ea' ukup awami ape'imi atom mafelapa makikipapa ma mafe' matolo'w isalef si'i anona mafin aolupunai nafe' natolo'w esag.
59001015	Ea' ukup ape'imi mohafel manda'apa manda' waf aonai. Anona nemaf waf anama aonai notaga lu'una, nonda'apa moga'.
59001016	Ipe' sahin owan, ae' okom nainailipa. Na'ama ipe' pembaso'ma ipe' etipa.
59001017	Amamaga bu'wami hiami si'i presen, amama ahalomapa ape'inai nase'apam misila'i heven. Anan nanda' mafifili aon alipunai owambunai maloma ondowa motawa ilif otaga. Owaf naluwi, ambagof laom bandam. Ea' God ina nandaho'of na'ama si'i ambogof, owa'. Anan nape na'ama etin la'ela'ef hihif.
59001018	Anan naila okom ananinai atona ma basef ananimi endilisimi ma ape' mataga mape mali'ma amamaga amama Anan nanda'ami.
59001019	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama na'ama. Ipe' hipei pendandombam ulala peme' basef. Ea' ina pi'i anom basef pegwam ulal, owa'. Ea' ina ukup wandafum mehip, owa'.
59001020	Dei' main, waf anama epes ukup wandafumanai nilai waf aonai. Ina nawalapai waf bu'unai Godi, owa'.
59001021	Amama atom dei' ipe' kwahago waf aonai neloma waf aonai hianai hi'ilana. Waf anama aonai epes hiesi sanda'ana la'ela'ef. Ea' pinindifa ipe' pepe owina Goda pefa' basef amama ananimi mope opalef ipe'imi. Basef amama la'ifimi ma mofa'ai ipe' pitanima pifi'mai God.
59001022	I'i peme' basef Godi ina pailam, ipe' pambaso'ma ipe' etipa. Amama hapaimi. Ipe' peme'am pilam, andeande'.
59001023	Emi egafis seme' basef Godi owa' sieliam, esis si'i enis epes safela glas sati amagah asasimi.
59001024	Esis satolom ea', sandamboma safe', ina okokoma amagah asasimi, owa'.
59001025	Ea' basef mi'uli Godi matagahepa makwaha waf aonai, amama andeande'. Emi egalin niti mi'uli anama ofagema andeande' la'ela'ef nilam, epen inima God nofalo'man nonda'an nendanifela maina maol anan nanda'anai.
59001026	Emi egafin ni'i, “Ae' anda' lotu endilisi aila God” ma enin i'i owa' nimafi malogel ananinai andeande', epen inima nambaso'ma okom ananinai atona. Ea' dei' bale'ef ananinai ma lotu main falafunai atona.
59001027	Waf sanda' lotuwanai bo'ona andeande' ofagena a'ana naep Ahalomapa ape'inai Godi, anama na'ama. I'i enis awasi mamasas a'asi esis etis sope, o nemata'w alifi'wi akwa'w ato'w kwape kwahu'wi, ape' migiambamasa otamba gwa'aimi maim. Ea' mumafi pe ape'inai andeande' ma waf aonai etapanai ina nenda' opalef ape'imi motaga aom, owa'.
59002001	Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' pembale'efa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, Anan Dembinai nafifili endilisi. Ea' dei' ipe' ina pigiambama epes isima agufisi etis ea' pewa' alafugaha epes agof a'asi, owa'. Penda'am na'ama etin.
59002002	Basef amama ofagema na'ama. I'i anona aman amamaga hiamunai nonda' trausis siot sosaf bu'wami nola ring gol faf ananinai ma nuwis ipat anama panda' lotuwanai nomon, ma i'i anona aman kwahuna ma otamba luwaguf maim nuwis wapoti', ipe' atuwasi penda' maina anan?
59002003	I'i ipe' penda' aman anama luwaguf maim bu'wami pi'ipana pi'i, “Ine' fi'i balata bu'unai na'ae”, ama i'i aman anama kwahunai nuwisi pi'ipana pi'i, “Ine' nitu gani”, o ni'i “Nepe gani etap felefele'ma bo'wagah ae'ami”.
59002004	I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama, atuwasi ofagema awami ipe'imi. Ipe' pawaloga sahin owan ipe'isi ma ukup ipe'imi, ea' ipe' ina pawalogas paila waf bu'unai na'ama etin, owa'. Ipe' pawalogasa ukup awami atom.
59002005	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' peme'! God nandandepa epes isima kwahusi ma otamba hiahaom maim ma dei' sape la'ifis sombale'efana la'ela'ef sape bo'wes andeande' si'i epes isima amamaga hiamisi. Anan nandandepasa sofa' amamaga bu'wami wambel Ananinai. Amamaga amama na'i basef endilisimi atom la'ifimi noso' emi egafis ukup maimaila Godi.
59002006	Ea' ipe' panda' epes isima kwahusi ambagof aom. Emi egafis sanda' ambagof ipe'imi aom sase'epa nimanimi sanda'mepa basef? Esis amamaga hiamisi.
59002007	God nase'epa agel bu'unai Krais ea' ipe' Ananipei. Epes isima etis sa'i basef awami sanda' findiwama agel anama.
59002008	Dembinai King ape'inai numafi ape' hiapai, anan nase'apa basefa mi'uli Ananinai mape Buk Baibeli. Basef amama ma'iam ma'i, “Ipe' ukup mimila emi egafis sape felefele'ma ipe'i si'i ipe' ukup maimaila ipe' atona etin.” I'i ipe' pila mi'uli anama, penda' waf bu'unai andeande'.
59002009	I'i ipe' pigiambama enis epes, pewa' alafugaha enis, mi'uli anama atona nanda' kotimipa ma panda' waf anama pesambala mi'uli anama.
59002010	Dei' main, emi egafis sila basefa mi'uli hianai hi'ilana ea' sesambala anona mi'uli anama atotona anom basef tu'wanim kwaie'um, epes isima ofagema asasimi si'i sawala mi'uli anama hianai hi'alana.
59002011	Dei' main, anan na'i basef amama na'i, “Ipe' owa' peha enis epes soga'.” I'i ipe' owa' penda' waf anama so'a waolanai, ea' paha enin epen naga', ipe' pataga epes aopei pesambala mi'uli Godi.
59002012	Anona nemaf God nowaloga ape' ma anona mi'uli nanda'apa mope wafifipa. Ea' la'ela'ef ipe' pi'i basef penda' waf nondahama mi'uli anama.
59002013	Dei' main, emi egefis owa' siti uwahipis enis epes, owagama God ina niti epes isima uwahipisa nemaf anama nowaloga esisanai, owa'. Ea' emi egafis siti enis epes uwahipis, God anona nemaf ina nowaloga epes isima ni'i awes, owa'. Waf anama ape' mi'i uwahipisanai nikila' endilisi.
59002014	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i enin epen ni'i, “Ae' embale'efa Krais” ma waf ananinai ina bo'ona, bale'ef ananinai falafunai atona. Bale'ef anama ina la'ifina ma anona nemaf God nofa'an notanimani, owa'.
59002015	Bale'ef anama falafunai nape na'ama. I'i enis sahin owan sape sala luwaguf awami o gwa'aimi a'as, ea'
59002016	enin epen ipe'ini ni'ipa epes isima ni'i, “Ipe' opalef awanem pefe' pefa'ai luwaguf ipe'imi pewahe'am pembaho' alop ipe'inai pefe' pea' gwa'aimi bu'wami!” I'i ipe' pi'iam na'ama, basef amama ipe'imi ina mataga endilisi, owa'. Basef amama ipe'imi migiambamas mi'imama? Owa'etin. Falafumi atom.
59002017	Bale'ef na'ama etin. I'i enin epen nembale'ef etin ina nanda' waf bu'unai naloma bale'ef ananinai, bale'ef anama ananinai falafunai atona.
59002018	Ea' enin epen na'i, “Ine' epen nembale'efa Krais ea' ae' anda' waf bu'unai.” Dei' a'ipa epen inima na'ama a'i, “Ine' nihi'ambe bale'ef anama ine'inai waf bu'unai owa' neataga nelomana. Waf bu'unai ae' anda'anai ihi'ambena bale'ef ae'anai.”
59002019	Ine' nembale'efana na'ama na'i, “God atotona nape.” Ine' na'i na'ama, andeande'. Ambagof awami wapoti' mombale'efana na'ama etin ea' umbamaham bombol etin kwapete'am.
59002020	Ine' aman okom nahaga nagaolinai, ine' nembale'efa Jisas atona, ama ina nanda' waf bu'unai wapoti', bale'ef anama ine'inai falafunai atona. Dei' ine' na'i negawa anama ofagema? Dei' i'ipina.
59002021	Fowa' gani akunamapa ape'inai Abraham na'i nondolali ma nogalomana ananinai Aisak nondolalimana ma Goda balata anama sondolalima Goda. Amama atom dei' God na'ipana na'i anan aman bo'ona andeande'. Anan nanda' waf bu'unai dei' God na'ipana basef amama na'ama.
59002022	Ine' negawa o owa'? Bale'ef Abrahami naloma waf bu'unai anan nanda'anai amama manda' opeh etifigin. Ea' waf bu'unai anan nanda'anai nagiambama bale'ef ananinai nataga alihina andeande'.
59002023	Ea' basef amama mail buk Baibeli mataga alihim mandawalap. Basef amama ma'i, “Abraham nembale'efa God, dei' God nofalana na'i anan aman bu'unai andeande'.” Ea' God nofalana na'i, “Anan alupunai Ae'anai.”
59002024	Basef amama mail buk Baibeli mihi'ambapa dei' ipe' pegawa bale'ef atona God ina na'i epes bo'wes andeande', owa'. Esis sombale'ef endilisi ma sanda' waf bu'unai wapoti', anan nofalas na'i epes bu'wasi andeande'.
59002025	Nemata'w akwama Rahap kwanda' waf so'a waolanai, akwa'w na'ama etin. God nati waf bu'unai akwa'w kwanda'anai dei' okom napoma'w na'i akwa'w nemata'w bo'okw andeande'. Waf bu'unai akwa'unai kwagiambama amam Juda mandambaho' mafi'i ea' kwihi'ambam anona eaf mafe' wafifim.
59002026	Ea' basef amama mape na'ama. I'i alop atona ambal owa' nopaipa, alop anama naga' ea'. Na'ama etina emi egalin nembale'ef etin ma ina nanda' waf bu'unai, bale'ef epen inima falafunai atona.
59003001	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, na'ama ipe' hipei petaga gawaipei tisa etipa, owa'. Dei' main, ipe' pegawa anona nemaf God nowaloga afa' tisa wawalipasa basef bu'wami Ananimi nowalogafa ma basef la'ifimi endilisi. Ea' enis Kristen nowalogas sa'osa'ombel.
59003002	Ape' hiapai anom nimeguf owa' mila basef Godi andeande', owa'. Ape' mowa ma anona waf aonai ape' manda'anai. I'i enin epen ina nanda' waf aonai ma basef ananimi, enin epen bu'wani. Enin la'ifina nimafi alop naloma okom ananinai hi'ilana wapoti'.
59003003	Ipe' pegawa ape' manda' waf anama ma hos. Ape' masape' ain nape malogof hosi nomona monda' hos meme' basef ape'imi maila ukup ape'imi ma hos amama mefe' si'i ape' ma'i meafe'ma.
59003004	Dei' ipe' ukup mopoma sip lu'unai. Sip anama lu'unai ea' uf lu'unai nefa' sip anama ea' stia anama so'una. Kepten numafi sipi nambomana nafe' anama anan na'i neafe'ma. Nanda'am na'ama ma stia anama so'unai.
59003005	Ea' na'ama etina malogof ape'imi sa'om mape alop ape'inai nomon. Malagof amama ma'i basef mamumami hiami endilisi mafela agof epesi ma maol hianai esis sanda'anai. Dei' ipe' okokoma nif. Nif fendom sa'om mataga lu'um la'ifim endilisi fendo aolop lawah lu'wami fendom hi'ilam.
59003006	Malogof amama ape'imi na'ama etin si'i nif fandumi mape la'afena alop ape'inai malogof amama mawalapa waf naninani aonai. Ea' manda' ukup epesi mataga aom sanda' waf aonai. Mawalapa waf hianai ape'inai ma fe' pe ki ape'inai aona endilisi si'i nif fandumi mataga lu'um. Nif amama mataga wambel aonai hel atogon.
59003007	Mafis mamumami aolupumi maloma amiguf maloma iguf maloma amamaga hiami mape naoh embel owini, epes sofa'ami sali'atam sanda'am mogawa mame'as mape owina esis. Dei' wapoti' esis la'ifisa sanda'am na'ama.
59003008	Ea' malogof epesi owa'etin. Ina enin epen la'ifina numafi malogol ananinai, owa'. La'ela'ef malogel nataneam nape la'ela'ef na'i basef awami si'i marasin aonai naha epes saga'i.
59003009	Malogof ape'imi atom mafela agel Dembinai Ahalomapa ape'inai ea' ma'i basef awami wapoti' mahambombaga sahin owan ape'isi God nanda'as sape na'ama etin si'i Anan.
59003010	Malogof amama atom ma'i basef bu'wami mafela agel Godi ea' ma'i basef awami wapoti'. Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, penda'am na'ama, owa'.
59003011	-
59003012	Sahin owan ae'ipei, anom basef womun etin na'ama. Ina embel bu'wami maloma awami motah ifata atotona, owa'. Ea' anona lawag fik ina nail nola anom su'utip oliv, owa'. Ea' anom mandelef su'utip grep mailami ina mail mola anom su'utip fik, owa'. Na'ama etin si'i embel naoh ina mandamboma motaga embel bu'wami, owa'.
59003013	Ipe' emi egafipa gawa bu'unai hianai napaipei, ipe' pepe na'ama. Fe' ipe'inai nihi'ambas gawa ipe'inai enis epesa penda' waf bu'unai noloma maol bu'unai. Maol anama ipe' panda'anai pepe owina epes pila waf gawa bu'unainai.
59003014	Ukup ipe'imi ina kowalepa ma pefa' amamaga hiahaom otamba maim enis epesi, owa'. Ipe' ina pefela agof ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' penda' waf anama pi'i ipe' etipa gawaipei, ipe' pambaso'mas. Na'ama hapaimi. Gawa anama ipe'inai ina endilisinai, owa'.
59003015	Gawa anama ina nafi'i heven, owa'. Nataga etap anae' ma opalef apimi maloma aman aonai Satan atona.
59003016	Emi egafis ukup mopoma esis etis si'i kowalas ma sofa' agof lu'wami ma amamaga maim hiami enis epesi, epes isima ina sape andeande', owa'. Esis ina sandatama sape etifigin saloma enis epes, owa'. Sanda' lopa' fitap etina sanda' waf naninani aonai.
59003017	Ea' gawa nafi'i heveni nawalapa waf bu'unai na'ama. Waf nape nali'i, ukup epesi mope bo'om andeande'. Ea' waf bu'unai hianai wapoti' na'ama. Epes sape opalef awanema opalef etifim maloma enis epes. Ea' sanda' waf so'uso'umbilinai sati uwahipis endilisi ea' sanda' waf bu'unai ma sagiambama enis epes. Esis ina malogof biam sa'i anom basef, owa'. Sa'i basef endilisimi atom. Esis ina sanda' waf biefina sanifela enis sosambala enis, owa'. Esis ukup ma'i epes hiesi na'ama etin.
59003018	Emi egafis sanda' maol sawalipa epesa sope opalef etifim isima si'i ape' mawa gwa'aimi aof. I'i esis sonda' maol anama ma waf opalef mape etifim, maol anama nowalapai waf bu'unai andeande' si'i gwa'aimi mataga bo'om aof.
59004001	Maina waf ofagena ma nanda' ipe' panda' lopa' fitap pape la'afena ipe'? Ukup awami atom mafela ipe' dei' panda' lopa' fitap la'ela'ef opalef nomon, alop ande' wapoti'. Ea' amama atom.
59004002	Ipe' ukup ma'ima'i amamaga hiami mamumami ea' ipe' ina pefa'am, owa'. Ea' dei' ukup aom paha epes saga'. Ipe' gegelalasipa ma amamaga hiami enis epesi, ea' ipe' ina la'ifipa pefa'am, owa'. Ea' ipe' panda' lopa' fitapa pa'i pefa'am. Owa'etin. Dei' main, ipe' ina pahali' Goda amama, owa'.
59004003	Nemaf anama ipe' panda' betena pefa' amamaga amama, ipe' ina pefa'am, owa'. Dei' main, ukup ipe'imi ina mape bo'om etifima pahali' God, owa'. Ipe' ukup ma'i pefa' amamaga penda'am pefa'am pekwahom amama ukup ipe'imi atom.
59004004	Ipe' pakwaha waf Godi ea' pafe'ma waf aonai si'i amam nematawa sakwaha waf bu'unai dase'amainai ma sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai. Ipe' pegawa amama. Emi egafis ukup maila waf etapanai, esis sanda' naumbih saloma God. Dei' pegawam. Emi egafis ukup maila waf etapanai, esis dei' sanda' naumbih saloma God.
59004005	Ipe' ina pi'i basef Godi mail buk Baibeli falafumi, owa'. Basef amama ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Ambal anama napaipai God nase'apana nanda'apa ukup matamea ma mofa' amamaga mamumami hiami.”
59004006	Ea' God nagiambamapa na'a nanda'apa mataga la'ifipa. Waf anama Godi nikila' waf aonai si'i basef mail Baibeli ma'iami, “God nosambala epes isima sasambala basef Ananimi ea' nagiambama epes isima sanda' esis safe owina Anan.”
59004007	Ea' dei' ipe' pefe' owina God. Ipe' pewa' alafugaha Satana anan nokwahipa nofa' nefe'.
59004008	Ipe' pifi'i felefele' endilisi ma Goda Anan nifi'i felefele' endilisi ma ipe'. Ipe' panda' waf aonai, pekwaha waf anama ipe' panda'anai si'i epes sasa'opa lagof asasimi mataga bo'om. Ipe' epes malogof biamipei, ipe' pekwaha waf anama ea' penda' ukup ipe'imi motaga bo'om.
59004009	Ipe' panda' opalef ipe'imi aoma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, pelef mehipa waf anama pekwahona ea' hapainai. Ipe' dei' panda' iafi, pemboma opalef pelef. Ipe' dei' pandanifel, ipe' penda' opalef ipe'imi aoma waf anama aonai.
59004010	Ipe' pefe' owina Dembinai ma Anan nefelepa nenda'epa petaga la'ifipa.
59004011	Ipe' ina piti waf sahin owan ipe'isi sanda'anai pi'i aona, owa'. Epen ni'i basef awamima enin alupini o newaloga sahin owan ananisi, epen inima enin na'i basef awami nawaloga mi'uli Godi. I'i ipe' pi'i basef awami pewaloga mi'uli anama, ina ata' paila mi'uli anama, owa'. Ea' pape si'i dembipei jas pawaloga mi'uli anama.
59004012	God atona nawalapa mi'uli Ananinai ea' Anan atona jas nowaloga epes. Anan atona la'ifina ma nefa'apa mokwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai motanimani ea' la'ifina ma nohapa wapoti'. Ea' dei' ipe' emi egafipa ma pi'i basef pewaloga epes isima sape felefele'ma ipe'? Na'ama hapaimi.
59004013	Enipa ipe' pa'i na'ama pa'i, “Dei' o naman afa' ofe' wambel lu'unai taun ope onda' maola bisnis afagol atotona ofa' otamba hiami.” Ipe' pa'iam na'ama, peme' basef ae'ami.
59004014	Ipe' ina pegawa maim amamaga naman meatagamepa, owa'. Ambagof ipe'imi ata' mape namum la'ela'ef hihif? Ipe' si'i nogoh mataga mape nogota bandana mafe' hi'alam nemaf atotona.
59004015	Ipe' ukup mi'i, “Okom Godi ni'i a'e, ope namofa onda' opeh amama o anom opeh.” Pi'iam na'ama, andeande'.
59004016	Ea' dei' ipe' pa'i diga lu'unai pa'i ipe' etipa la'ifipei pafela agof ipe'imi atom. Waf anama na'amainai aona.
59004017	Ipe' pegawa andeande'. Emi epen negawa ma nenda' waf bu'unai ma enin owa' nonda'ana, enin nanda' waf aonai.
59005001	Ipe' amamaga hiamipei, ipe' peme' ae' dei' a'ipipa! Ipe' ukup mopoma nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf motagama ipe' ea' pelef mehip.
59005002	Amamaga ipe'imi hiahaom sosaf maim ipe'imi pepe'atam mape ea' sopafowa matotopa' luwaguf maim ipe'imi hi'alam.
59005003	Moni ipe'inai gol siliwa nowa'w nasagiham aom. Nowa'w anama si'i enin epen ni'ipipa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai nataga nandawalap. Ea' nowa'w anama nonda' alop ipe'inai si'i nif fandumi. Ipe' piwaniam hiahaom otamba maim ma nimeguf akutaimi motaga felefele'ma God nonda'mepa basef.
59005004	Ipe' peme'. Ipe' ina pase'am otamba amam manda' opeh mala' gwa'aimi aof ipe'inai, owa'. Ipe' pefa' otamba amamumi, pati amam malopa otamba amamumi. Amam malopa otamba amamumi ea' God la'ifinai ma amamaga hiami name' lef amamunai.
59005005	Nogota ipe' pape etap anae', pe ipe'inai bo'ona pefa' amamaga bu'wami endilisi pa' gwa'aimi hiami manda'epa pataga lu'ulu'upa. Ea' nemaf anama si'i saha mafis lu'wami anona nemaf notaga nehepa.
59005006	Ipe' panda' basef baso'omaimi pambaso'ma epes bu'wasi pahas saga'. Ea' epes isima basef a'as. Ina sagwamepa wandaf, owa'.
59005007	Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' pitu la'ifipa opalef awanem pehafa nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai. Ipe' ukup mopoma anona aman nafomona aofi. Anan nohafa anona nemaf gwa'aimi bu'wami sotalom otamba hiami notaga. Anan opaf awanena naitu la'ifina nape nohafa nogota laona ma asaf nilai nonda' gwa'aimi hiami motaga aof ananinai.
59005008	Ipe' wapoti' penda' opalef ipe'imi la'ifim ea' pepe opalef awanem. Dei' main, nemaf Dembinai notanima niefi'ianai felefele' notaga.
59005009	Ipe' ina piti waf sahin owan ipe'si sanda'anai pi'i aona, owa'. Na'ama anona nemaf God nowaloga ipe'. Jas nape felefele'ma uta.
59005010	Sahin owan ae'ipei, ipe' ukup mopoma amam profet fowa' mawalipasa basef Godi ma agel Dembinai. Amam opalef awanem maitu la'ifima nimanimi lu'wami matagamami.
59005011	Ape' ukup ma'i amam maitu la'ifim dei' ma'i amam mandanifel. Ipe' pegawa aman anama Jop. Anan naitu la'ifina opaf awanena ma nimanimi matagamana. Nape la'ela'ef nogota laona, Dembinai nagiambamana. Dembinai na'i uwahipipa ape' endilisi ea' okom nainailapa.
59005012	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, basef mali'i ipe' pielami amama. Ipe' owa' pi'i heven ilif o etap anae' o anom amamaga penda' basef ipe'imi mataga la'ifimi, owa'. Ipe' ina penda' basef ipe'imi la'ifimi endilisimi pi'i gani ilif, owa'. Ipe' ukup mi'i, “A'e” pi'i, “A'e”. Ipe' ukup mi'i, “Owa'”, pi'i, “Owa'”. Ama God ina nowaloga ipe' ma basef amama ipe'imi.
59005013	I'i enin epen ipe'ini nefa' nimanimi, enin nenda' beten nihali' God. I'i enin epen nendanifel, enin nenda' awalefa nefela agel Godi.
59005014	I'i enin epen ipe'ini awen, enin nefala amam agufumi siosi mifi'i monda'man beten mohali' God ea' mokolo'wa wel bu'wami alop ananinai ma agel Dembinai. Ama nonda' epen inima bo'wen.
59005015	I'i amam mombale'ef endilisi ma monda' beten mohali' God, epen inima netaga bo'wen. Dembinai nigiambaman netaga bo'wen. I'i epen inima nali' nenda' waf aonai, God nokwaha waf aonai enin nanda'anai.
59005016	Amama atom dei' ipe' pewalapa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai atona etin ea' penda' beten ama ipe atona etina God nonda'epa bo'wepa. I'i enin epen bo'wen, beten ananinai la'ifina endilisi.
59005017	Aman anama Elaija fowa'inai, anan aman si'i ape' epes mape etapi. Anan okom napoma God ea' nanda' beten nahali'ana ma nasopama asaf, ea' ina nalai etap asasinai nogota laona afagof si'imi wanom tu'waninai.
59005018	Afagof amama mafe'ma ea', nanda' beten nahali' God wapoti', otaga akutina asaf nalai gwa'aimi mataga etap malo andeande' wapoti'.
59005019	Sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i enin epen ipe'ini nekwaha nembale'efa basef endilisimi Godi, ma enin epen nigiambaman nefa'an nitanimani, ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama.
59005020	Emi egafis sagiambama epen nanda' waf aonai ma nekwaha waf enin nanda'anai nitanimani, epes isima sagiambamani sefa'an natanimani nakwaha neaga'. Amama atom God dei' nakwaha waf aonai hianai enin nanda'anai.
60001001	Ae' Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, Anan nasahe'e aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa anan nosahe'epa ea'. Ipe' epes Godi pakwaha wambel ofagama pafe' pailas pape etap hiagoma wenifina biefina agufunama Pontus naloma Galesia, Kapadosia, Esia Bitinia.
60001002	Fowa' gani Ahalomapa God nogawepa nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei. Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai atona nanda'epa pataga Ananipei etipa bo'wepa andeande'. Anan nanda'epa na'ama ma pila waf Jisas Kraisi Anan nasa'opepa esimbel ananimi pataga bo'wepa. Ae' a'i God nigiambamepago na'a nonda'epa petaga la'ifipa ma opalef ipe'imi mope awanema pepe si'ipa la'ela'efa waf anama.
60001003	Ape' mefela agel Godi, Anan God Ahalomana Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai. Anan okom lu'unai nainailapa nati uwahipipa endilisi. Ea' nafela Jisas Krais nohafel hi'agif, amama atom God nanda'apa mataga dambaipa ma mope namepa mogawa endilisi anona nemaf Anan nofa'apa motanimani.
60001004	Ea' dei' mape mohafana anona nemaf nose'apa amamaga bu'wami endilisi. Amama bo'om endilisi, ina anona nemaf aom folo'olam hi'ilam, owa'. Amama mape bo'om la'ela'ef, God nambe'am ma'oh mohafa ipe' otaga ilif.
60001005	Bale'ef ipe'inai atona God nahopepa ma anona nemaf nofa'epa petanimani. Anan na'i notanima nofa'ipei, anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihiguma nemaf akutainai.
60001006	Ipe' pandanifel endilisi ma nemaf anama, ea' dei' nogota ata' bandana hiahaom mamumami meagwambipei matagamepa ma mase'epa nimanimi.
60001007	Nimanimi amama matagamepa ma God nowaloga bale'ef ipe'inai nonda'ana notaga bo'ona la'ifina. Ipe' ukup mopoma otamba gol, amama buwami satalom otamba lu'wami. Ea' bale'ef ipe'inai nikila' gol amama bo'ona endilisi. Gol amama anona nemaf higililam, ea' esis saofam nifa motaga bo'om. Bale'ef ipe'inai na'ama etin anona nemaf notaga bo'ona la'ifina ma nimanimi amama meatagamipei. God nowaloga bale'ef ipe'inai ma nondawalap notaga bo'ona la'ifina. Ama anona nemaf Jisas Krais notaga nondawalap alihina, God nese'epa agof lu'wami moloma basef bu'wami ninifalipamami ma agel lu'unai.
60001008	Ipe' ina dei' pati Jisas, ea' pembale'efana endilisi. Danifel anama bu'unai endilisi nafi'i ilifi nikila' danifel hianai etap anae'. Ea' epes ina la'ifisa sowalapana sa'iana malogof asasimi, owa'.
60001009	Dei' main, ipe' pape pembale'efana dei' bale'ef anama ipe'inai nawalapa amamaga dei' pape pefa'am la'ela'ef. Amamaga amama na'ama. God nofa'epa nokwahomepa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai petanimani.
60001010	Anona nemaf God nofa'apa motanimani, amama fowa' amam profet ma'i basef amama ma Anan dei' nagiambamapa na'a mape andeande'. Amama amam ma'i anona nemaf motagama ipe', God nandandepepa ma pefa'ami. Ea' manda' maol la'ifim ukup mapoma basef amama ma'i anona nemaf anan nofa'apa motanimani.
60001011	Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nomona amam na'i basef alihima anona nemaf Krais nofa' nimanimi hiami mamumami ma nofa' agel lu'unai. Ea' amam magolopa basef Godi mandahahali'ma ma'i, “Maina nemaf amama mifi'i motaga?”
60001012	Ea' God nihi'ambamam ea' amam ina manda' maol magiambama amam atoma basef amama, owa'. Manda' maol magiambama ipe', ma'i basef amama ma amamaga bu'wami anona nemaf meatagai. Ea' dei' amam mawalipipa basef bu'wami Godi ma'ipipa amamaga amama atom. Ma'ipipa ma pepel Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nisila'i otaga ilif. Amam profet amama, ina amam atom ukup ma'i basef amama mogawam, owa'. Amam ensel wapoti' ma'i mogawam.
60001013	Ea' dei' ipe' pendondomba ukup ipe'imi ma penda' maol bu'unai, pimafi alop noloma ukup ipe'imi pepe andeande'. Ea' pembale'efa God pepe ukup bo'om pehafa Jisas Krais anona nemaf notaga nondawalap alihinama nigiambamepa na'a nofa'epa petanimani.
60001014	Ipe' pila waf Godi si'i awasi saila basef mamasasi. Fowa' ipe' gawa a'epa ata' pape waf anama aonai ukup mase'epa. Dei' ipe' ina ata' pila waf anama wapoti', hapainai.
60001015	God nofala ipe', Anan bo'ona andeande'. Ea' ipe' wapoti' pepe na'ama etin si'i Anan, pepe ananipei etipa andeande' ma fe' pe anama ipe'inai hi'ilana.
60001016	Dei' main, Baibel na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ae' ape andeande' bo'awe. Ea' ipe' wapoti' pepe Ae'ipei etipa bo'opa andeande'.”
60001017	Ipe' pefala God pa'i Anan “Ahalomapa”. Ahalomapa anama anan ina okom napoma agof ape'imi lu'um so'um ea' nawaloga ape', owa'. Anan nawaloga ape' na'ama etina ikwaf bu'unai atona ma waf ape' manda'anai. Amama atom ipe' umbamehepama God penda' lotumana pefe' bo'opa nimeguf hiami ipe' pailam pape etap anae'.
60001018	Ipe' pegawa fowa' ipe' ata' pape panda' waf aonai wafinai pefa'ana bafasepa ehasepa ipe'isi. Ea' dei' God natalipa natagahipa ma waf anama aonai. Anan ina natalipa ma amamaga anona nemaf motaga aom higililam si'i otamba bu'wami siliwa gol, owa'.
60001019	Anan natalipa natagahipa ma pepe wafifipa ma esimbel Kraisi atom. Esimbel amama bo'om lu'um endilisi. Krais naga' si'i fowa' gani esis saha sipsip noganai sondolalima God. Sipsip anama bo'ona endilisi ina anona melet natomana, owa'. Anan bo'ona endilisi.
60001020	God owa' ata' nonda' etap anae' notagae, Anan nandandepa Krais ea' ma naga' si'i sipsip anama. Nimeguf amama hiami dei' magi' matagai, Anan nataga nandawalap alihina ma nagiambamepa.
60001021	Anan atona nagiambamepa dei' pembale'efa God. Anan nafela Krais nohafel hi'agif nase'ana agel lu'unai Anan. Amama atom dei' pembale'efa God atona pegawa endilisi anona nemaf anan atona nofa'epa pitanimani.
60001022	Ipe' paila basef amama, amama atom dei' manda' opalef ipe'imi bo'om. Ea' dei' ipe' panda' waf anama ukup maimailasanai panda'ana endilisi. Ipe' ina pembase'am alupupei ma alop atona, owa'. Dei' penda' waf ukup maimailasanai la'ifipa pikila' fowa' panda'anai. Ea' ukup mimila Kristen hiesi pindagigiambanama peloma esis.
60001023	Dei' main? Ipe' ina pataga dambaipa si'i awasi sataga mamasas etapasi saga'i, owa'. Basef Godi atom Anan nanda'epa pataga dambaipa. Basef amama ambal namunai napainai nape namuna la'ela'ef, dei' ipe' pataga dambaipa ea'.
60001024	-
60001025	Si'i Baibel na'iam na'i, “Amam nematawa hiesi si'i otalef ea' sosaf asasinai si'i afis mataga etap. Otalef alimi afis wapoti' mandala'of mowa, ea' basef Dembinai mape la'ela'ef.” Basef amama basef bu'wami esis sawalipipami.
60002001	Ipe' pendombasa ipe' andeande' ma waf hianai baso'omainai pa'i malogof biamipei ukup kowalipamami maloma waf anama pi'i basef awami alafugaha enis epes. Waf anama aonai, ipe' pekwahona.
60002002	Ipe' pepe ukup mila basef Godi si'i awasi ata' solas dambaisi ukup maila sa' nomambeh atomi. Ipe' la'ela'ef eap nese'epama pi'i basef Godi atom bo'om andeande', owa' somboma anom amamaga awami mealomami. Basef amama manda'epa dembepa la'ifipa ma bale'ef ipe'inai bo'ona. Penda'am na'ama ma anona nemaf God nofa'epa pitanimani pepe andeande'.
60002003	Endilisi, ipe' pali' pegawa Dembinai ea' pegawana ma waf Ananinai bu'unai endilisi.
60002004	Anan si'i owap ambal namunai napainai. Ipe' pifi'mai Anan, owap anama esis amam nematawa sandaiwa'mana sanda'ana sagwasi'ana na'oh. Ea' God nosahe'ana na'i owap anama bu'unai endilisi.
60002005	Ipe' wapoti' si'i owah ambal namunai napaimi. God nape nanda'epa la'ela'efa pataga bo'wepa si'i anona ipat bu'unai ananinai dei' nape nanda'anai. Ama ipe' pepe epes bu'upei penda' maol pindalalima God. Ea' pindalali pese'ana ukup ambagof ipe'imi mofe'ma Anan. Ipe' pindalali penda'am na'ama, okom Godi na'i amama andeande'ma maol anama Jisas Kraisi nanda'anai.
60002006	Dei' main, basef fowa' God na'iami mail buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Peme', Ae' anda' anona owap lu'unai na'oh etap. Owap anama bu'unai satalona moni lu'unai nape nali'i ma nonda' ipat la'ifina. Dei' ae' ambe' owap anama na'oh wambel lu'unai Saion. Emi egafis sombale'efa Anan, esis ina anona nemaf ukup aom, owa'.”
60002007	Owap anama bu'unai endilisi agel lu'unai ma ipe' pembale'efanai, ea' epes isima owa' sombale'efanai anom basef mapomas ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Owap anama amam mala' ifagwi mandaiwa'mana melefatana na'ihi, dei' nandamboma nataga owap nape nali'i nanda' ipat anama la'ifina.”
60002008	Ea' anom basef Godi wapoti' ma'iam ma'i, “Anona nemaf owap anama nonda' enis epes sowa.” Esis sondasisi'ip sowa. Dei' main, esis ina same' basef Godi sailam, owa'. Sosambalom si'i fowa' God nali' nandandepasa sondasisi'ip sowa.
60002009	God nosahe' ipe' ea' pape epes Ananipei. Ipe' panda' maola dembinai king Jisas Krais pendilalimana si'i pris. Ea' pape amam nematawa Godi etipa epes hiesi ganima hiagoma. God nosahe'epa ea' Ananipei etipa ma pewalapa pepel bu'unai naloma agel lu'unai Ananinai. Anan nofalepa nanda'epa pakwaha owamb pafi'mai nafifili bu'unai Ananinai.
60002010	Fowa' ipe' ata' pape epes falafipei, ea' dei' pape epes Godi etipa. Fowa' ipe' ina pegawa God nati uwahipipa ma dei' pape andeande', ata' owa'. Ea' dei' pegawa God nati uwahipipa nagiambamepa pape andeande'.
60002011	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef la'ifimi, ipe' si'i epes anona wambelipei pafi'i pailas pape nogota bandana ma etap anae'. Dei' ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf aonai ukup awami mohafamanai, na'i nopa' noloma ambagof ipe'imi.
60002012	Ipe' penda' waf bu'unai andeande' ma naep esis sololama Godi. Penda'am na'ama ma maina nemaf esis si'i basef awamima ipe', atuwasi siti waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai ea' sinifela waf anama si'i bu'unai. Penda'am na'ama, ea' nemaf akutainai Anan niefi'ianai ma esis sefela agel Ananinai lu'una.
60002013	Ipe' hipei pefe' owina agufumi dembemi hiami mape dembemi ma etap anae'. Pepe owinam pila waf Dembinai. Pepe owina dembinai gavman nali'ma esis Romi.
60002014	Amam gavman dembemi wapoti', God atona nanda'am mapoma moha epes isima sanda' waf aonai sofa' nimanimi, ea' mefela agofa isima sanda' waf bu'unai.
60002015	Okom Godi na'i ipe' penda'am na'ama. Anan na'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma nesopama malogofa epes isima ukup mahaga magaoli sa'i basef gawa a'anai.
60002016	Ipe' ina agof a'epa pape owina enis epes, owa'. Ipe' pape wafifipa ea' pape owina God atona. Ipe' pegawa amama pepe andeande' si'i pape wafifipei. Ea' ipe' ina pembaso'am pewalo' waf anama sape wafifisanai bu'unai nese'ala waf aonai pandambaho' panda'anai, hapainai. Ipe' pepe andeande' si'i pape panda' maol Godi.
60002017	Ipe' pendanifel pefela agofa epes hiesi penda'as andeande'. Ea' ukup mimila esis Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi. Ipe' umbamehepama Goda penda' lotumana andeande'. Ea' pefela agel king gavman dembinai nali'ma esis Romi.
60002018	Ipe' panda' maola enis epesi pefe' owina dembemi amama ipe'imi ma maol hianai. Ipe' peme'am ea' umbamehepamam pefela agof amamumi. Ipe' ina penda'am na'ama ma amam bu'wami manda' waf so'umbilinai atom, owa'. Penda'am na'ama ma anom manda' waf aonai wapoti'.
60002019	God anona nemaf nofalo'mepa ma amama i'i ipe' pitu la'ifipa pila okom ananinai ma nimanimi esis sese'epam etini.
60002020	Ea' i'i ipe' penda' waf aonai sohepa ma waf anama ma pitu la'ifipa pitilis, anona nemaf ipe' pefa' maim bu'wami ma waf anama? Owa'. Ea' i'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, God okom ni'i waf anama ea' nofalo'mepa ma amama.
60002021	God nofalai ipe' ma pila waf anama pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai. Dei' main, Krais atona name' nimanimi ma nagiambamapa. Ea' nihi'ambepa waf anama bu'unai ananinai ma pilana.
60002022	“Anan ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'. Ina na'i anom basef baso'maimi ma malogel ananinai, owa'.”
60002023	Nemaf anama esis sanda'ana findiwana Anan ina nagwamasam nanda'as findiwas, owa'. Nemaf anama Anan nefa' nimanimi lu'wami Anan ina naumbelis, owa'. Anan naso' Anan atona hi'alana nafe'ma lagof Aman anama nowaloga epes andeande'i.
60002024	Krais anan atona naga' nail lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai ea' nofa' waf aonai ape' manda'anai ma alop ananinai. Anan nanda'ama ape' mope si'i saga' sakwaha waf aonai hi'alana. Ama ape' mope namepa ambal namunai nupaipa mila waf bu'unai hianai.
60002025	Esis sahambombaga alop ananinai sanda'ana melegw matomana, amama atom dei' nanda'apa bo'opa wapoti'. Fowa' ipe' pelolama eaf si'i sipsip owa' sumafiami. Ea' dei' ipe' petanima pafi'i ma Dembinai numafi ipe' paloma ambagof ipe'imi andeande' si'i anona numafi sipsipi numafiam andeande'.
60003001	Basef amama mali'i ma'i ipe' pepe owina dembemi gavman moloma agufumi ipe' panda' opeha amam. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' nematawa paso' amami pepe owina amam wauhupipa ipe'imi. I'i anom owa' ata' mila basef Godi, ipe' pihi'ambama waf bu'unai atona la'ela'ef. Ipe' ina pi'ipam anom basef, owa'. Ea' pihi'ambama miti waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai, ma amam mila basef Godi mombale'efana.
60003002	Dei' main, amam anona nemaf miti ipe' nematawa umbamahepa ma Goda pila waf bu'unai atona pefe' andeande' ma amam momboma opalefa God.
60003003	Ipe' ina pendefalo'ma sosaf naninani alop atopanai ma monda' ipe' piti bo'opa si'i pefalo'ma balagah ipe'imi, owa'. Ipe' ina pefalo' endilisi sosaf atona wafinai si'i ombahigis maim bu'wami o gol monda' gambigambis o luwaguf sosaf bu'unai nailami ma hiesi sitilipa bu'upei, owa'. Hapaimi.
60003004	Sosaf ipe'inai na'ama, ipe' pefalo'ma opalef ipe'imi nomona ukup ipe'imi ma waf bu'unai endilisinai. Sosaf anama ina anona nemaf aona, owa'. Nope la'ela'ef na'ama. Opalef ipe'imi mope awanem ea' ambagof ipe'imi mope andeande'ma waf so'umbilinai. Sosaf anama bu'unai endilisi ma naep Godi.
60003005	Nematawa Godi fowa'iwai ombale'efana wape wa'i endilisi God anona nemaf nila basef ananimi andeande'. Sosaf awaunai na'ama, wanda' waf bu'unai opalef nomon ea' wafe' owina wauhupawa awaumi.
60003006	Sara kwanda'am na'ama etin. Akwa'w kombale'efa aman akwa'unai Abraham ea' kofalana kwa'i Dembinai akwa'unai. I'i ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma owa' umbamehepama amamaga maim mi'i meatagamepei, ipe' dei' ehamawa ako'uwai.
60003007	Ipe' amam wauhupawa wapoti' pimafiawa ma gawa bu'unai, ukup mopoma alop awaunai ina la'ifina, owa'. Ipe' penda'awa andeande' pefela agof awaumi. Dei' main, awau wapoti' dei' walomepa ofa' ambal namunai God nose'epana. Ipe' penda'mawam na'ama ma ina anom amamaga mili'akwa beten ipe'inai, owa'.
60003008	Basef amama motambel na'ama. Ipe' hipei pepe opalef etifim ea' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi.
60003009	Ipe' ina pegwa waf aonai, owa'. I'i esis si'ipipa basef findiwaimi, ipe' ina pegwamasam, owa'. I'i esis sonda'mepa waf aonai, ipe' pegwamas penda'mas waf bu'unai atona pi'ipas basef bu'wami ma God nofalo'mas. Dei' main, God nofalepa ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami anona nemaf nofalo'mepa.
60003010	Si'i basef Godi mail Buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Emi egafis si'i sendanifela Ambal namunai ma ukup mi'i siti nemaf bu'unai, esis simafi basef nili'akwa malogof asasimi andeande' ma ina si'i basef baso'maimi.
60003011	Esis sondamboma sofa'ma waf aonai, ea' sonda' waf bu'unai atona. Ea' esis ukup mila opalef mope awanem moloma God noloma epes ea' sonda' waf anama nefe' nepe la'ifina.
60003012	Dei' main, Dembinai anan nape naep maila epes isima sope andeande' ma waf bu'unai ea' numafias andeande'. La'ela'ef Anan neme' beten asasinai, ea' isima sanda' waf aonai Anan nanda' okom wandafuna.”
60003013	I'i ipe' ukup mimila endilisi ma penda' waf bu'unai atona, ina enin epen la'ifina nenda'mepa waf aonai nehambombagepa, owa'.
60003014	I'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai ipe' panda'anai, ipe' pendanifel endilisi. Ipe' ina umbamehepama epes ea' ina ukup aom, owa'.
60003015	Ipe' ukup mopoma Krais atona nope Dembinai andeande'ma opalef ipe'imi penda' lotumana. Ea' pendandombam pepe la'ela'ef ma pewalapa basef ofagema alihim pegwamasam emi egafis sohali'ipamami ma amamaga bu'wami pape pehafami.
60003016	Ea' ipe' pegwamasam peloma opalef awanemi ea' penda'as andeande' pinifelis. Ipe' penda' waf bu'unai ma basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipipa basef mihi'ambepa waf ipe'inai ina aona, owa'. Penda'am na'ama ma esis si'ipipa basef awami ma pe bu'unai paila Kraisi ma esis ambagof aoma basef amama awami esis sa'ipipami.
60003017	Dei' main, andeande'ma ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma waf bu'unai. Amama mikila' wafa pefa' nimanimi ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. I'i okom Godi ni'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama ma waf bu'unai, andeande'.
60003018	Ipe' ukup mopoma Krais anan naga' nemaf atotona nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai ea' amama ma'um. Aman atotona bu'unai naga' ma nagiambama epes hiesi sanda' waf aonai ma nofa'as sefe'ma God. Alop ananinai, sahana naga'. Ea' ambal ananinai, nohafel nape namona.
60003019	Ambal ananinai atona nafe' nawalapa basefa ambagof amama sowa'am la'ifim mape, epes isima
60003020	fowa' sosambala basef Godi. Anan nanindifa okom nape nohafa nemaf anama Noa nanda' sipanai. Sip anama epes kwaie'wis sawis sape andeande', 8-peleis ina saga' ma embel lu'wami, owa'.
60003021	Embel amama lu'wami mondola'wifa sofa' baptais migiambamepa pepe andeande'. Amama ina masa'opa alogwa alop atona ande', owa'. Amama anom basef endilisi la'ifimi ape' ma'iam maloma God, amama mataga mape opalef nomoni bo'om andeande'. Amama mofa'epa petanimani ma pepel anama atona Jisas Krais notanima nohafel.
60003022	Anan nafe' nalata ilif otaga nape wa'ol lagel da'isinai Godi. Ea' amam ensel hiami maloma agufumi mumafi ilifi mape owina Anan atona.
60004001	Krais nofa' nimanimi alop ananinai ea' ipe' wapoti' ukup motaga la'ifim na'ama etin si'i Anan. Dei' main, emi egafis ipe'isi sefa' nimanimi ma alop asasinai, esis sakwaha waf aonai.
60004002	Ea' dei' nogota anae' ipe' ata' pape etap anae', ipe' pefe' pila okom Godi atona nahopepa pefe' pefe' petagama pega'. Ea' okom aonai nehafema waf aonai, owa'. Hapainai.
60004003	Fowa' ipe' pape nogota launai ea' pafe' paila waf naninani aonai esis sololama Godi ukup ma'ianai. Waf anama na'ama, waf aonai so'a waolanai, ukup mahaga magaolasanai, ukup mohafela waf aonai ea' sa' embel la'ifimi ma ukup mahaga magaol ea' sa' gwa'aimi embel la'ifimi nogota launai ea' sandatama etifigin sa' embel la'ifimi mamumami sosambala basef Godi ma sanda' waf aonai, sanda' lotuma god baso'omunai. Nogota pafe' paila waf anama dei' hi'alana.
60004004	Dei' epes isima sololama Godi gegelalasis sati ipe' owa' pendao'oma pelomas penda' waf anama hianai aonai. Na'ama dei' sa'ipipa basef awami findiwama ipe'.
60004005	Anan nandandombam nowaloga epes isima sapani soloma saga'i. Esis anona nemaf sowalapa waf aonai esis sanda'anai sogwamana basef Anan ama waf anama ofagena esis sanda'anai.
60004006	Amama atom fowa' basef bu'wami Godi mafe' matagama epes isima saga'i wapoti'. Ama God nowaloga esis si'i anona nemaf nowaloga epes hiesi hi'ilas. Basef amama bu'wami mafe' matagama esisa sope namis ambagof asasimi si'i God nape namona.
60004007	Nogota amamaga amama ma'i hi'ilamanai nafi'i felefele'. Amama atom ipe' ukup mope andeande' ea' pimafi alop ipe'inai andeande'ma ipe' la'ifipa ma penda' beten.
60004008	Basef lu'wami mape mali'ma basef hiami amama. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi la'ifipa endilisi. Dei' main, waf anama ukup mimilasanai nase'ala waf hianai aonai ea' nikila' waf hianai hi'alana.
60004009	Ipe' pi'i aho'ma pigiambama enis alupusi deindei'as sifi'i ifagw ipe'imi pimafias andeande'. Ipe' ina opalef aoma esis, owa'.
60004010	Ipe' hipei atona etin pefa' presen naninani bu'unai hianai Ambal Bu'unai Godi nasi'ipanai. Ea' pimafi presen anama ipe' atona etin andeande' ma pigiambama esis sahin owan. Pimafiana na'ama.
60004011	Emi egafis sowalapa basef, esis si'iam si'i sawalapa basef Godi atom. Ea' emi egafis sonda' maola sigiambama enis epes, esis sonda'ana pepel anama God nase'asanai. Ama epes hiesi siti maol anama hianai bu'unai sondanifel sefela agel Godi ma Jisas Krais atona. Agel lu'unai noloma pepel nafifili hianai Ananinai atona la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi etis.
60004012	Ipe' Kristen alupipei endilisi, anom hiahaom meagwambipei mi'i motagama ipe', ipe' ina pi'i amama anom amamaga awami matagamepa pehafel gegelalasipa ma amama, owa'. Nimanimi amama ipe' pefa'am paloma Krais.
60004013	Ea' ipe' pendanifel pefa' nimanimi amama. Ama anona nemaf agel lu'unai ananinai noloma nafifili ananinai notaga, nemaf anama ipe' pendanifel endilisi.
60004014	I'i enis siti ipe' pitu la'ifipama Kraisa si'ipipa basef awami findiwaimi, andeande', ipe' pendanifel. Dei' main, nimanimi amama mihi'ambepa Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafifili dei' napaipa.
60004015	Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma enin epen ipe'ini neha enin epen nega' o nenda' wal o nenda' waf aonai naninani o ni'i nepe nilinili' ma maol enis epesi, owa'. Ae' andaiwa'ma enin epen ipe'ini nenda' waf aonai ma sose'ana nimanimi. Amama owa', aom.
60004016	Ea' i'i ipe' pefa' nimanimi ma pataga Kristen, andeande'. Ipe' ina ambagof aoma amama pefa'am, owa'. Ipe' pinifela Goda pepan epes Kraisi.
60004017	Nogota anama mataga ea' ma dei' God nowaloga epes hiesi Ananisi ma basef lu'wami. I'i God nili' nowaloga ape' mili', anona nemaf nigi' nowaloga epes isima sosambala basef bu'wami Ananimi sope si'imama? Esis sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.
60004018	Si'i basef Godi mail Baibeli ma'iam ma'i, “I'i ahifima God nofa'ai epes bu'wasi sotanimani, dei' epes isima sowa' alafugaha Godi soloma isima sanda' waf aonai anona nemaf sope si'imama? Esis sope awes sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.”
60004019	Ea' emi egafis sofa' nimanimi ma saila okom Godi, isima sonda'am na'ama. Esis sope sonda' waf bu'unai atona ea' soso' esis sofe'ma God numafias. God nanda' epes hiesi sataga sapan. Ea' naila basef Ananimi andeande' la'ela'ef.
60005001	Ipe' agufipei pimafi esis Kristeni, ae' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa. Ae' wapoti' ae' agiliwei imafi esis Kristen. Fowa' aitu ati Krais nofa' nimanimi egawam. Ea' anona nemaf wapoti' itu elomepa ma miti nafifili lu'unai Ananinai notaga. Dei' a'ipipa basef la'ifimi na'ama a'i,
60005002	ipe' pimafi amam nematawa God nasi'ipasi andeande' si'i amam mumafi sipsipi mumafiam. Ipe' ukup mohafel endilisi ma pimafias si'i okom Godi na'i penda'am. Ipe' penda' maol ananinai andeande', ina penda'ana ukup mopoma pefa' otamba atom, owa'. Opalef ipe'imi mohafel endilisi ma penda' maol Godi.
60005003	Ipe' owa' pepe si'i epes sofa' agof lu'wami ma pepe dembipei pi'ipas basef la'ifimi esis amam nematawa isima Godi ipe' pimafiasi, owa'. Ipe' pepe andeande'ma esis sitilipa sila waf ipe' panda'anai.
60005004	Ama dembinai numafi amam nematawa si'i sipsip Godi notaga nondawalap alihinama ipe', pefa' amamaga bu'wami mope andeande' la'ela'ef, agel lu'unai. Amama ina anona nemaf aom higililam, owa'. Mope la'ela'ef.
60005005	Ea' na'ama etin ipe' amam awomipei wapoti', ipe' pinindifa ipe' pefe' owina amam amama agufumi dembemi mumafi ipe'i. Ea' pefa' waf anama pinindifa ipe' pefe' owina amam sahopepa ipe'imi pigiambama waf bu'unai. Dei' main, basef mail buk Baibeli ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “God nowa' alafuga epes isima sasombala basef sefela agof asasimi atom. Ea' anan nigiambama epes isima safe' owina enis epes ma sape so'umbil.”
60005006	Ea' dei' ipe' penda' ukup ipe'imi pefe' owina God, pepe owina pepel Ananinai. Penda'am na'ama ma maina nemaf Anan okom nie'ianai notaga, nefela agof ipe'imi ninifelipa.
60005007	Amamaga nimanimi monda'epa aopai, pese'anam mofe'ma God atona. Dei' main, Anan bu'unai la'ifinai numafi ipe' andeande'.
60005008	Ipe' pimafi alop ipe'inai pindumafuma andeande'. Satan aman aonai nautamepa ipe'inai anan si'i mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion nape aolopi. Anan nafe' noga na'i mehipa na'i niti enis epes nohas nogwa'as.
60005009	Ipe' pitu la'ifipa ma pewa' alafugahana pili'amonana. Dei' main, sahin owan ipe'isi sape etap hiagomai esis sofa' nimanimi na'ama etin.
60005010	God anan ofagonama waf anama nigiambamepa na'a. Ipe' pepe la'ifipa peloma Jisas Krais, amama atom dei' God nofalepa ma pepe nafifili pepel ananinai nape la'ela'ef. Ea' dei' ipe' pame' nimanimi nogota bandana. Anom nimeguf mofe'ma ea', anan Atona nonda'epa pataga bo'wepa ea' nonda'epa pitu la'ifipa si'i olaf la'ifinai nanda ipat notawa la'ifina.
60005011	La'ifimi hiami ananimi atom la'ela'ef.
60005012	Ae' a'ipa owalome Sailas nanda'ago basef amama ae'ami bandami mafe'mago ipe'. Ae' ati anan nanda' maol Kraisi andeande'. Ea' a'ipipago basef amama endilisimi God nigiambamapa na'a. Dei' pitu la'ela'ef ma amama. Anda' basef amama a'i efela ukup ipe'imi enda'epa petaga la'ifipa.
60005013	Esis amam nematawa Kristen sahin owan ipe'isi sape wambel Babiloni, God nasehe'as salomepa. Esis sasapa'ago danifela basef bu'wami mafe'mago ipe'. Nogalome ae'anai Mak wapoti' nandanifel ma ipe' ea' nasapa'ago basefa danifel ananinai ma ipe'.
60005014	Ipe' Kristen pendase'ama logof alupipei hipei atona etin, ama penda' waf anama ukup maimailasanai. Ae' a'i God nonda'epa opalef awanem, ipe' emi egafipa pape la'ifipa paloma Jisas Kraisi.
61001001	Ae' Saimon Pita anda' maol Jisas Kraisi, anan nandandepe aposel. Ae' anda'ago basef amama ma ipe' amam nematawa pefa' bale'ef bu'unai na'ama etin si'i afa' ofa'anai. Bale'ef anama ipe' pefa'ana waf bu'unai Jisas Kraisi, Anan God ape'inai nofa'apa motanimani.
61001002	God nagiambamepa na'a nanda' opalef ipe'imi mape awanem. Ae' a'i amama mope si'ima ipe' ma eaf anama pegawa God naloma Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai.
61001003	Krais nofalepa ma pefa' pepel howalagon ananimi atom pelomana. Ama pepel God nase'anami atom anan nase'apa pe bu'unai amamaga amama bu'wami hi'alama mope andeande' mila waf Godi. Krais nanda'apa na'ama ma eaf anama mogawa anan atona.
61001004	Pepel Ananinai naloma howalagon amama atom Anan nase'apa basef ananimi na'i endilisi atom. Basef amama lu'wami bu'wami endilisi. Basef amama atom ipe' pataga la'ifipama pefa' ambal namunai ma waf Godi pelomana. Ama pefe' pihi'ama waf aonai naninani nataga nanda' ukup mohafel endilisi ma waf aonai nape etap anae'i nanda' epes sataga awes.
61001005	Ipe' ukup mopoma amamaga amama penda' maol la'ifimi endilisi dende'ma ikwaf pepel ipe'inai piwatania bale'ef ipe'inai penda' waf bu'unai. Ea' piwatania waf anama bu'unai ma pefa' gawa bu'unai.
61001006	Ea' piwatania gawa anama bu'unai ma waf ukup mopeipa pimafi alop andeande'. Ea' piwatania waf pimafi alopanai ma waf pitu la'ifipa nemaf anama nimanimi meatagamipei. Ea' piwatania waf pitu la'ifipa ma penda' waf pefela agel ananinai.
61001007	Ea' waf anama hianai bu'unai nali'i piwataniana noloma waf ukup mimila sahin owan atona etin pigiambamas. Ea' waf anama ukup maimailasanai piwatania waf bu'unai pigiambama sahin owan ipe'isi.
61001008	Ipe' pegawa Jisas Krais dembinai ape'inai anan ofagonama waf anama hianai hi'alana. I'i waf anama nope ipe' la'ifipa notaga lu'una endilisi nikila' pali' panda'anai, gawa anama ipe'inai ina nambimb nepe na'a, owa'. Nambimb notaga nefe' lu'una nowalapai waf bu'unai hianai.
61001009	Emi egafis waf anama a'asi, esis ina nambimb siti anom amamaga mape laogoma, owa'. Esis si'i naep mase'asi ea' ukup mase'asa God nasa'opas nakwahomasa waf aonai hianai esis sali' sanda'anai.
61001010	Ea' ipe' penda' waf bu'unai pepe la'ifipa endilisi pikila' fowa' pali' panda'ana paila basef amama fowa' God nofalepa nosahe'epa ma pape ananipei etipa. Penda'am na'ama ma pegawa endilisi God nofalepa nosahe'epa. I'i ipe' penda'am na'ama la'ela'ef, nambimb ina pewa ma anona waf aonai, owa'.
61001011	I'i ipe' pilam, anona nemaf God nonda' eaf nogal alihina pendanifel pefe' piwis wambel Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai nape la'ela'efa. Anan atona nofa'apa motanimani.
61001012	Endilisi, ipe' pegawa amamaga amama ma basef amama mali'i pembale'efam la'ifipa ma basef amama endilisimi paitu la'ifipamam. Owa'etin, ae' a'i ata' i'ipipa efela ukup ipe'imi ma pilam andeande'.
61001013	Nimeguf hiami ae' ape namowe alomepa etap anae', okom na'i i'ipipa timbi tambela efela ukup ipe'imi ma pila basef amama. Ipe' ina ukup mose'epamam.
61001014	Ae' egawa nogota bandana nape ma nambimb sehe ega' si'i Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nihi'ambe ea'.
61001015	Amama atom dei' a'i enda' maol lu'unai dende'ma ikwafa pepel ae'anai enda' anona eaf ma anona nemaf ae' ega' ea', ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama hiami ae' a'ipipami pepe pegawam.
61001016	Afa' wa'ipipa ea' pegawa pepel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma anona nemaf notanima nifi'i noloma pepel lu'unai Ananinai. Afa' ina waila anom basef numunefin epes gawaisi sa'iami wa'ipipa basef amama Kraisi, owa'. Afa' watolona endilisi nofa' pepel la'ifinai bu'unai Godi ma naep afa'imi, amama atom dei' wa'ipipa.
61001017	Nemaf anama afa' wape walomana halaf anama, wati Anan nofa' agel lu'unai naloma pepel howalagon bu'unai ma lagel Ahalomana Godi. Nemaf anama anona malogel na'i nataga God napoma nafi'mai Jisas na'i, “Anama Nogalome Ae'anai okom nainailana endilisi. Okom Ae'anai bo'ona ma Anan.”
61001018	Afa' wape walomana halaf anama God nandandepagoma bo'wagoma ea' wame' basef amama malogel anama na'i nataga ilif.
61001019	Afa' atofa ukup mapoma basef amama God na'iami wame'am nemaf anama wape halaf anama. Basef amama God na'iami manda basef fowa' amam profet ma'iami mataga la'ifim wahapilam la'ifim wa'i endilisimi atom. I'i ipe' peme' basef amama amam profeti ipe' okokomom pepan, andeande'. Dei' main, basef amama si'i anona nagwapin fandonai nafifil nape la'afena owamb. Ea' howalagon nape la'ela'ef nafi'i nataga lala. Ama ondo'w kuhimbitainai lala'wan mafifil opalef ipe'imi nomon.
61001020	Ea' ipe' ata' pegawa basef amama la'ela'ef. Ina anona profet atotona naila okom ananinai atona dei' na'i anom basef ofagema amam profet fowa' manda'am mail buk Baibeli, owa'.
61001021	Dei' main? Fowa' ina enin epen atitin na'i anom basef mofa'ama Godi ma okom ananinai atona, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Godi atona nafela ukup amam profeti mail okom Godi atona ea' mofa' malogel Ananinai ma'i basef amama.
61002001	Fowa' anom profet mambaso'ami mataga la'afena esis amam nematawa Israel mambaso'masa basef baso'maimi. Dei' na'ama etin anona nemaf anom amam mambaso'ami mohafel la'afena ipe' wapoti' ea' mondambaho' mifi'i mombaso'mepa mi'ipipa basef mamumami hiami baso'maimi mahambombaga epesi. Dembinai Anan fowa' naga' ma natala amam amama natagahoma waf aonai amam manda'anai ma mope andeande'. Ea' owa'. Amam mase'ana alafugah Dembinai. Nambimb monda'am na'ama etin, ea' mehip amam motaga aom.
61002002	Amam manda'am na'ama nambimb enis amam nematawa hiesi sila waf naninani aonai amam manda'anai. Ea' enis siti waf aonai amam mambaso'ami manda'anai ea' sosambala basef bu'wami si'i basef awami atoma waf bu'unai endilisi Godi.
61002003	Amam amama kowalami endilisi, amama atom nambimb monda' basef baso'maimi ukup amamumi atom ma'iami ma mofa' otamba maim ipe'imi. Fowa' gani God nogawa nandandepa anona nemaf mapomam ma nowaloga amam mofe' wambel aonai hel. God nandondomba anom amamaga mohamboga amam endilisi ata' mape la'ela'ef mohafa amam. Ina ma'oh, owa'.
61002004	God ina niambali' amam ensel amama fowa' manda' waf aonai, owa'. Anan nakwahom mowala wambel aonai hel. Ea' nowa'am la'ifim mape la'ela'ef anama mape mohafa anona nemaf God nowalogama basef lu'wami.
61002005	Anan ina niambali' esis amam nematawa fowa'isi saso' alafugahanai sape andeande', owa'. Anan nanda' embel lu'wami matef mahas afis hi'alas. Anan numafi Noa atona nawalipasa basef bu'wami Godi nofa'ana naloma epes 7-peleis wapoti' nofa'as sotanimani sape andeande'.
61002006	Ea' nahambombaga epes hiesi sape wambel biefina lu'unai Sodom naloma Gomora wapoti'. Epes isima wambel anama God nahagon naofagon nif lu'wami dei' agambeh atom ma'oh. Anan nagwamasa waf aonai esis sanda'anai nanda'as si'i anona ikwafa nimanimi lu'wami emi egafis sosambala basef Ananimi anona nemaf seafa'ami.
61002007	God nagiambama aman anama bu'unai Lot numafiana nofa'ana notanimani nape andeande', ina naga', owa'. Anan okom aona endilisima waf aonai so'a waolanai amam Sodom manda'anai, mosambala basef Godi.
61002008	Aman anama bu'unai Lot nape nalomas la'ela'ef name'ama waf aonai amam manda'anai natolom. Okom ananinai aona endilisi ma waf anama amam mosambala basef Godi manda'anai.
61002009	Basef amama ma'ipapa alihim ma'i Dembinai numafi epes bu'wasi saila waf ananinai andeande'. Maina nemaf amama meagwambasi motagamas, anan nogawa ma nili'akwas sope andeande'. Ea' Anan nahapila esis sanda' waf aonai ma nogwamasa nimanimi ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai sape la'ela'ef sofe' sotagama nemaf anama Anan nowalogasanai.
61002010	Basef amama endilisi atom mapoma emi egafis ukup mohafema waf aonai alop atona ma ukup ma'i basef Dembinai sa'i falafumi. Epes isima anona nemaf sofa' nimanimi lu'wami endilisi. Amam mambaso'ami matotopa' basef Godi maila ukup amamumi atom mafela agof amamumi atom. Amam ina umbamahama manda' amam mape ilif heveni findiwam, owa'.
61002011	Ea' ensel bu'wami la'ifimi mikila' amam amama mambaso'ami, amam ina magwam manda' ensel amama awami findiwama naep Dembinai, owa'.
61002012	Amamaga amam mambaso'ami owa' mogawame, amam ma'i basef awami ma amam. Amam mambaso'ami si'i mafis mape aolopi owa' ukup bu'wami miapaimi mape aolop atona. Mafis amama enis epes sagolopam satolom saham afum hi'alam ea' na'ama etina amam amama wapoti' anona nemaf aom hegililam.
61002013	Amam manda' waf naninani aonai mase'as nimanimi enis. Ea' anona nemaf God nogwamam mofa' nimanimi wapoti'. Amam okokoma sa' gwa'aimi embel maim maloma waf aonai so'a waolanai ea' sandanifel endilisi ma sanda' waf anama alip. Nemaf anama ma' gwa'aimi maloma ipe', waf aonai amam manda'anai si'i anona ikwaf aonai la'afena ipe'. Amam mape malomepa mandanifela waf aonai amam manda'anai.
61002014	La'ela'ef naep amamumi mati nematawa wanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef ma monda' waf aonai molomawa ea' amam ina makwaha waf anama, owa'etin. Amam makikipa enis epes mombomefas sonda' waf aonai. Amam mogawa endilisima waf anama aonai kowalasanai ma amamaga enis epesi. Anona nemaf God nohambombagam endilisi.
61002015	Amam maso' alafugaha eaf bu'unai, amama atom dei' ukup mase'ama waf bu'unai. Amam maila waf anona aman Balami, Beor nogalomana. Anan okom nohafela nanda' waf aonai ma nofa' otamba hiami.
61002016	Ea' neme' basef la'ifimi ma'ipana mehipa nokwaha waf anama aonai. Basef amama donki ananinai atona noga na'ipanam si'i epen na'i nasopama eafa waf anama aonai ukup mase'asanai profet anama na'i nonda'anai.
61002017	Amam na'amaimi si'i ifatagw amama magal mowala etap embel a'ami. Amam si'i elagw uf lu'unai nufapusam nawalom mafe' deindei'. God nandondomba akot lu'unai endilisi ma anona nemaf amam mopaigon.
61002018	Amam amama matotopa' basef Godi ma'i ma'oh etina basef falafumi awami amamumi. Amam ma'ipa enis epesa waf ukup mohafemanai ma so'a waola waf naninani aonai alopunai. Amam manda' waf anama ea' mambomefa enis epes ata' dei'aol sataga sa'i sokwaha waf aonai epes isima sololama Godi sanda'anai ea' mambomefas saila amam.
61002019	Amam ma'ipa enis epes ma'i, “I'i ipe' pila basef afa'imi, nambimb ipe' pepe andeande'ma ina anom amamaga mowa'ipai, owa'. Pepe wafifipa.” Ea' owa'. Amam mape owina waf aonai, anama nombalo'am la'ifim. Dei' main, i'i anom amamaga mombomefa enin epen, nambimb epen inima la'ela'ef nape owina amamaga amama mambomefani.
61002020	Emi egafis sokwaha waf aonai etapanai nanda' epes awes ma sogawa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais nofa'as sotanimani, ma i'i waf anama aonai nomboma esis wapoti' ma nombale'as la'ifis, anona nemaf sope la'ela'ef na'ama. Sali' sape la'ifisa sonda' waf aonai, ata' sape awes kwaukwawie'. Ea' dei' satanima sanda' waf aonai wapoti', awes endilisi sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef.
61002021	I'i esis ina sogawa mi'uli bu'unai Godi, ata' sope awes kwaukwawie'. Ea' dei' saso' alafugahana, anona nemaf sope awes endilisi.
61002022	Waf anama natagamas si'i anom basef endilisimi epes gawaisi sa'iami ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Nombat notanima nafe' na' nagu'omi ananimi wapoti'.” Anom basef wapoti' ma'i, “Bol nafe' nasa'of ea', natanima nafe' nasa'of wambu' awagom wapoti'.”
61003001	Ipe' alupipei endilisi, basef amama mafe'ma bifi anda'am mail okwatih mafe'mago ipe'. Basef amama biefim mali'i maloma amama ase'epam ipe' ma mefela ukup bu'wami ipe'imi ma pegawa basef amama andeande'.
61003002	Ae' a'i ipe' ata' ukup mopoma basef amama fowa' gani amam profet Godi mawalapami. Ea' ukup mopoma basef la'ifimi Dembinai nofa'apa motanimani, ipe' pefa'ama lagof afa' aposel ipe'ifai.
61003003	Ipe' ata' ukup mogawa amama muli'. Nimeguf amama akutaimi anom amam monda'iafipei motaga mila ukup awami amamumi ma waf amam manda'anai. Ea' monda'iafipa na'ama
61003004	mi'i, “Anan na'i basef endilisimi atom na'i nifi'i wapoti'. Ea' dei' anan ata' nape eti? Nogota fowa' dambadamba bafasapa saga'anai amamaga amama hiami hi'alam ata' mape la'ela'ef na'ama etin si'i fowa' dambadamba etap anae' nataga mafi'i mataga dei'.”
61003005	Ea' ukup amamumi mandaiwa', dei' owa' mogawa amamaga amama, owa'. Amam ina ukup mapoma ma fowa' gani God na'i etina nanda' etap naloma otaga mataga mape, owa'. Anan nanda' etap nataga nape la'afena embel.
61003006	Ea' God nanda' embel lu'wami mataga etap maofeniagon hi'alagon maha epes maloma amamaga mape etapi hi'alam.
61003007	Basef Godi amama atom dei' mili'akwa amamaga mape ilifi maloma epes maloma amamaga mape etapi hi'alam dei' ata' mape la'ela'ef mohafa nif fandumi nemaf anama God nowaloga epes isima saso' alafugaha anani ma nonda'as hegililas.
61003008	Ipe' alupipei endilisi, ipe' owa' ukup mose'epama anom amamaga atom. Okom Dembinai na'i nemaf atotona si'i afagof hiami 1,000-peleim ea' afagof 1,000-peleim si'i nemaf atotona.
61003009	Dembinai ina nanda' maol so'uso'umbela nowalapai amamaga anan okom na'i endilisi etina nienda'ami si'i enis epes ukup mapoma maol sanda'ana so'uso'umbel, owa'. Anan nandaiwa'ma enin epen atitin higililan. Anan okom na'i epes hiesi hi'ilas somboma opalef sefe'ma Anan. Amama atom dei' Anan okom napoma ipe' dei' nape nohafepa palomas.
61003010	Nemaf Dembinai niefi'ianai anona nemaf nifi'i si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i. Nemaf anama otaga dilulu bugwalagw mehip higililam. Ea' amamaga amama hiami mapeinai wapoti' fendom mefe' hi'ilam. Etap anae' wapoti' neloma amamaga hiami sanda'am mape etapi anona nemaf nif fendom fesopamam hi'ilam.
61003011	Endilisi amamaga amama anona nemaf mefe' hi'ilam na'ama. Ea' ipe' penda' main? Ipe' pepe pila waf bu'unai atona pila waf hianai Godi.
61003012	Ipe' penda'am na'ama ukup mopoma nemaf lu'unai Godi neataga, penda' maol Ananinai la'ifipa pewalapa nemaf anama neataga. Nemaf anama notaga otaga fendona hi'ilana ea' nif lu'wami endilisi fendo amamaga amama hiami mape otagai hi'ilam motaga mumbul mofe' si'i embel.
