61003013	God na'i basef endilisimi atoma nonda' otaga etap dambaimi ma waf bu'unai atona nupe la'ela'ef. Ape' dei' ukup mopoma mohafa amama meataga.
61003014	Alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ipe' ukup mope mohafa amamaga amama meataga. Ea' ipe' penda' maol la'ifipa pimafi ipe' pepe bo'wepa andeande'ma waf aonai a'epa ma naep Godi, pepe opalef etifim peloma God.
61003015	Dembinai ata' nape nohafa ape' epes hiapai hi'alapa. Ea' dei' ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama anan nefa'apa motanimani. Amama si'i basef amama hiami sahalomapa Pol ape' ukup maimailanai nanda'am mafe'ma ipe'. Anan nanda' basef amama ma gawa bu'unai endilisi God naso'ananai.
61003016	Basef hiami anan nanda'ami ma nemaf anama Dembinai niefi'ianai nanda' amama atom. Ea' anom basef nanda'am mail buki ahifim endilisi ma mogawa ofagema. Basef amama ahifimi, epes isima gawa a'asi ma owa' situ la'ifis isima samboma basef amama maloma anom basef hiami wapoti' mail Baibeli. Ea' esis sahambombaga esis etis anona nemaf hegililas hi'ilas.
61003017	Alupipei endilisi, ipe' pegawa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Ea' pindumafuma andeande'. Na'ama amam amama mambaso'ami ma mosambala mi'uli Godi momboma opalef ipe'imi pewa ma waf aonai.
61003018	Ea' ipe' pepe pila waf anama Dembinai Jisas Krais nagiambamapa na'a nofa'apa motanimani. Ea' pitu la'ifipa ma waf anama noloma gawa anama Kraisi pikila' fowa' pali' pape panda'am. Ae' a'i agel bu'unai atona dei' la'ela'ef nopomana nefe' anona nemaf owagama wapoti'. Endilisi.
62001001	Afa' wanda' basef amama ma anona aman agilinama Basef anan nase'apa ambal namunai napaipai. Aman anama fowa' gani damba damba nape. Afa' wame' basef ananimi watolona naep mahapilana lagof afa'imi.
62001002	Ambal anama namunai nataga ea' afa' watolona naep afa'imi. Amama atom dei' afa' wawalipipa ma ambal anama nape la'ela'efi. Ambal anama fowa' nape naloma Ahalomapa dei' nataga alihina watolona.
62001003	Amamaga amama afa' watolom wame'ami dei' wa'ipipam ipe' wapoti' ma pepe ukup etifim pelomafa. Afa' wape wambota atona waloma Ahalomafa naloma Nogalomana ananinai Jisas Krais.
62001004	Afa' wanda' basef amama ma anona nemaf danifel ape'inai notaga lu'una ma ape'.
62001005	Basef amama afa' wame'ama anan na'ama. God anan nafifili afitinai. Ina anona owamb nailana, owa'.
62001006	I'i ape' mi'i mope ukup etifim molomana, ama ape' ata' mape manda' waf aonai si'i mape owamb atona, ape' mambaso'ma ape' atepa ma basef ape'imi maloma fe' ape'inai.
62001007	Anan nafifili afitinai. I'i mope mififil si'i anan waf aonai a'apa, ea' mope ukup etifim moloma sahin owan hiesi. Jisas Nogalomana Godi. Ea' esimbel ananimi masa'opa waf aonai ape' manda'anai hianai hi'alana mataga bo'opa.
62001008	I'i ape' mi'i waf aonai a'apa, ape' mambaso'ma ape' atepa ea' basef endilisimi ina mapaipa, owa'.
62001009	I'i ape' mowalapa waf aonai ape' manda'anai alihina, atuwasi Anan nokwahomapa waf hianai aonai ape' manda'anai nosa'opapa motaga bo'opa andeande'. Basef fowa' na'i endilisimi atom nonda' waf bu'unai andeande'.
62001010	I'i ape' mi'i, “Ape' owa' monda' waf aonai”, ape' mofala God ma'i anan aman na'i basef baso'maimi. Ea' basef ananimi ina mape opalef ape'imi, owa'.
62002001	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa, anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' ma ina penda' waf aonai, owa'. I'i enin epen nenda' waf aonai, enin anan niegiambamani nape. Anan Jisas Krais bo'ona andeande'. Anan nahali' Ahalomana ma nokwahoman waf aonai epen anama nanda'anai.
62002002	Anan atona nahagofa okom wandafunai Godi naga' nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai. Ea' ina nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai atona, owa'. Anan nakwaha waf aonai ma epes hiesi etapasi hi'alas.
62002003	I'i ape' mila basef Godi la'ifipa, ape' mogawa anan endilisi.
62002004	Emi egafis sa'i, “Ape' mogawa God andeande'”, ama esis owa' sila basef Godi, esis sambaso'ami. Ea' basef endilisimi ina mape opalef asasimi, owa'.
62002005	Ea' emi egafis sila basef Ananimi, esis ukup si'im maila God endilisi. Ea' ape' mogawa ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas.
62002006	Emi egafis sa'i, “Ape' mape la'ifipa maloma God”, pe asasinai notaga bo'ona si'i pe Jisas Kraisi.
62002007	Alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Dei' ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe', ina anona mi'uli dambainai, owa'. Ae' a'ipipa mi'uli anama atona fowa'inai, fowa' damba damba pegawana. Mi'uli anama basef ipe' pame' ea'.
62002008	Basef la'ifimi ma mi'uli anama dei' anda'am mafe'mago ipe', amama dambaimi. Ea' mataga alihima Krais nailam dei' ipe' wapoti' pailam. Dei' main, owamb dei' na'i nofe' ea' nafifili endilisinai nataga nape.
62002009	Emi egafis si'i, “Ape' mape nafifili,” ama esis opalef aoma sahin owan asasisi, epes isima ata' sape owamb la'ela'ef.
62002010	Emi egafis ukup maimaila esis sahin owani, esis sape nafifili. Ea' epes isima ina ata' anona waf aonai napais nanda'as sowa, owa'.
62002011	Ea' emi egafis opalef aoma sahin owan asasisi si'i naumbih, epes isima ata' sape owamb ea' safe' owamb atona sasopama naep asasimi. Ea' ina sati eaf sailana, owa'.
62002012	Ipe' awasi ae'ipei, God nakwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai hi'alana ma agel Kraisi. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'.
62002013	Ipe' ahape, ipe' pegawa aman anama andeande' fowa' damba damba nape la'ela'efi. Ea' dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'. Ipe' awomipei, ipe' pali'amona wandaf aman aonai pikila'ana. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe'.
62002014	Ipe' awasi, ipe' pegawa Ahalomapa andeande'. Ea' dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mepago. Ipe' ahape pegawa aman anama fowa' damba damba nape nafi'i nafi'i la'ela'ef nape. Amama atom dei' anda' basef amama mafe'mepago. Ea' ipe' awomipei, ipe' la'ifipei ma penda' waf bu'unai. Ea' basef Godi dei' mape nomon opalef ipe'imi. Ipe' pali'amona wandafa aman aonai pikila'ana.
62002015	Ipe' ina ukup mimila waf etapanai o anom amamaga awami mape etapi, owa'. I'i ipe' ukup mimila waf aonai etapanai, ipe' ina ukup maimaila Ahalomapa, owa'.
62002016	Ape' mogawa epes saloma amamaga hiami mape etapi amama na'ama. Amamaga amama opalef apimi mohafemami maloma epes saloma amamaga amama epes satolom opalef kowalasami maloma amamaga amama enis satilis safela agof lu'umami, amamaga amama ina mafi'i Ahalomapa, owa'. Amama mataga etap anae'.
62002017	Waf etapanai naloma amamaga hiami epes ukup mohafemami anona nemaf hegililam, ea' emi egafis saila basefa okom Godi, epes isima sape la'ela'ef hihif.
62002018	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom maimailipa, dei' nemaf na'i hi'ilana. Fowa' ipe' pame' basefa naumbih Kraisi ma'i motaga. Ea' dei' naumbih Ananimi hiami mataga ea'. Ape' mogawa dei' nogota na'i hi'ilana.
62002019	Enis epes sakwaha ape' ea'. Fowa' epes isima ina ape'isi endilisi, owa'. I'i ape'isi endilisi, esis sope solomapa la'ela'ef. Owa'. Esis sakwahepa ea'. Amama atom dei' ape' mogawas andeande', epes isima hiesi ina epes ape'isi, owa'.
62002020	Ea' ipe' Krais nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Godi ea'. Dei' ipe' hipei pegawa basef endilisimi.
62002021	Ipe' ina pelolama basef amama endilisimi ma dei' enda'mepago basef amama, owa'. Ipe' pegawam. Ea' pegawa basef baso'maimi ina mawalapa basef amama endilisimi, owa'. Amama atom dei' anda'ago basef amama ma ipe'.
62002022	Aman nambaso'masi anan emi? Anan aman anama nambaso'mas na'i Jisas ina Krais, God nasapa'ana nafi'i, owa'. Aman anama naumbih Kraisi. Anan nowa' alafugama Ahalomapa naloma Nogalomana wapoti'.
62002023	Emi egafis sowa' alafugaha Nogalomanai, esis sowa' alafugaha Ahalomana wapoti'. Ea' emi egafis saso' opalefa Nogalomanai, Ahalomapa nape nomona opalef asasimi.
62002024	Basef amama fowa' damba damba ipe' pame'ami, amama hapilam opalef ipe'imi la'ifipa. I'i ipe' pembale'efa basef amama pali' pame'ami opalef ipe'imi la'ifipa, ipe' pepe la'ifipa peloma Jisas Nogalomana Godi noloma Ahalomana mope la'ela'ef molomepa.
62002025	Krais na'ipapa basef endilisimi la'ifimi, Anan anona nemaf nose'apa ambal namunai mope andeande' la'ela'ef.
62002026	Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' awalapa waf epes isima sa'i seambaso'mipei.
62002027	Ea' ipe', Krais nase'epa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai. Ea' Ambal Ananinai nape nalomepa opalef ipe'imi nomon. Amama atom dei' ipe' ina gawa a'epa ma enin epen newalipipa, owa'. Ambal Bu'unai Kraisi nawalipapa ma amamaga hiami ina nambaso'mapa, owa'. Dei' ipe' pembale'efa Krais pape la'ifipa paloma anan.
62002028	Ipe' awasi ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa a'i pepe la'ifipa peloma Anan ama anona nemaf notaga nondawalap, ape' ina ambagof aom, owa'. Ape' mitu la'ifipa ma naep Ananimi.
62002029	Ipe' pegawa Krais Anan bu'unai andeande' endilisi. Ea' pegawa anom basef wapoti', emi egafis saila waf bu'unai andeande', esis awasi Godi.
62003001	Eh! Ahalomapa God okom nainailapa endilisi. Ea' Anan nofalapa awasi ananipai. Endilisi, ape' awasi ananipai atepa. Isima sandaiwa'ma Godi sape etap anae', esis ina sogawa God, owa'. Amama atom dei' esis ina sagawa ape' wapoti'.
62003002	Ipe' alupipei, ae' okom nainailipa. Dei' ape' mape awasi Godi. Ea' anona nemaf mope mi'imama, amama ape' ina dei' mogawam, ata' owa'. Ea' ape' mogawa anona nemaf Krais notaga alihina, nemaf anama motolona notaga nope endilisi si'i Anan nape.
62003003	Emi egafis sape sohafa Anan nufi'i, esis sape sandondombam opalef asasimi la'ela'ef ma sope bo'wes andeande' si'i Krais nape.
62003004	Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, esis sosambala mi'uli Godi. Dei' main, sanda' waf aonai atona dei' satopa' mi'uli anama.
62003005	Ipe' pegawa Krais nataga ma nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai hi'alana. Anan ina nanda' anona waf aonai, owa'.
62003006	Ea' emi egafis sape la'ifis saloma Anan, isima ina ata' sape saila waf aonai, owa'. I'i emi egafis saila waf aonai, ukup asisimi ina mati Krais sogawana, owa'.
62003007	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, pindumafuma andeande'! Na'ama enin epen nembaso'mepa. Emi egafis sanda' waf bu'unai, esis sape andeande' si'i Krais nape.
62003008	Satan nanda' waf aonai fowa' damba damba nafi'i nafi'i dei' ata' nape la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef sapomanai, esis epes Satani. Nogalomana Godi nafi'i nataga nandawalapa main? Ma nohambombaga opeh Satan nanda'ami.
62003009	Emi egafis sape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'. Dei' main, okom Godi nape opalef asasinai ea' esis awasi Godi. Ea' esis ina la'ifisa ata' sonda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'.
62003010	I'i ape' mi'i mogawa epen emi egalin, nogalomana Satani o nogalomana Godi, ape' mogowas na'ama. Emi egalin owa' nanda' waf bu'unai ma owa' okom ninila alupusi ananisi, enin ina epen Godi, owa'.
62003011	Basef fowa' damba damba ipe' pame'ami amama. Ape' ukup mimila esis sahin owan endilisi.
62003012	Ape' ina mila waf Keini, hapainai. Kein wambota aman aonai Satani ea' naha owalomana Abel naga'. Dei' maina nahana naga'? Anan kowalana ma opeh bu'wami owalomana nanda'ami dei' nahana naga'. Ea' opeh ananimi aom.
62003013	Ipe' sahin owan ae'ipei, i'i esis sape etapi sowa' alafugaha Godi sindaiwa'mepa, ipe' ina gegelelesipa, owa'.
62003014	Ape' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan, amama ape' mogawa dei' makwahona waf anama ga'inai mataga mofa' ambal namunai. Dei' main? Ape' ukup maimaila esis sahin owan endilisi. Emi egafis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan asasisi, esis ata' sape la'ela'ef waf ga'inai.
62003015	Emi egafis ukup aoma sahin owan asasisi, esis si'i saha enis amam nematawa saga'i. Ea' ipe' pegawa epes saha enis saga'i, esis ina dei' sefa' ambal namunai sapaina sope andeande' la'ela'ef, owa'etin.
62003016	Waf anama ape' ukup mimila enis epes mogawana na'ama. Krais nakwaha ambal ananinai ma nagiambamapa. Amama atom ape' wapoti' mokwaha ambagof ape'imi ma migiambama sahin owan ape'isi.
62003017	I'i emi egafis amamaga hiamisi ma siti sahin owan amamaga a'ani ma esis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan, epes isima ina ukup maimaila God, owa'. Dei' maina epes isima sa'i, “Ukup ape'imi maimaila God”? Owa', esis sambaso'am.
62003018	Alupipei ae'ipei, ape' ina ukup maimaila esis alupisi ma mi'ipasa basefa malogof atom wafimi, owa'. Ape' ukup mimilas endilisi migiambamas monda' waf bu'unai endilisinai mihi'ambamasana.
62003019	I'i ape' monda' waf anama ma ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi, ape' mogawa maila basef endilisimi. Waf anama nanda' opalef ape'imi awanema mope la'ifipa ma naep Godi.
62003020	I'i basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipapa basef mihi'ambapa waf ape' manda'anai aona, God dembinai nikila' ukup ape'imi ea' nagawa amamaga hiami.
62003021	Alupipei ae'ipei, ae' okom nainailipa. I'i basef mape opalef nomoni ma'iami ma'ipapa basef mihi'ambapa waf ape' manda'anai ina aona, ape' mefe'ma God opalef ape'imi la'ifim.
62003022	I'i ape' mi'i monda' beten mohali'ana ma anom amamaga, anan nose'apami. Dei' main, ape' maila okom ananinai manda' amamaga anan nandanifel ma ape' manda'ami.
62003023	Basef la'ifimi Godi ma'i na'ama ma'i ape' mombale'efa agel nogalomanai Jisas Krais ea' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi si'i Anan na'ipapa basef la'ifimi.
62003024	Emi egafis saila basef Godi la'ifis, esis sope la'ifis soloma God ea' God nape la'ifina nolomas. Anan nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai dei' mogawa God nape la'ifina nalomapa.
62004001	Alupipei ae'ipei, amam profet mambaso'mami mafe'agon anama etap hiagoma. Ipe' ina pembale'efa epes isima hiesi sa'i, “Ae' Ambal Bu'unai Godi napaiwei.” Owa'. Ipe' ata' pegwaloga ambagof amama hiami pendendomam ama pegawa amam mataga mafi'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi o owa'?
62004002	Ipe' pegawa Ambal Bu'unai Godi na'ama. Emi egafis sa'i, “Endilisi, Jisas Krais nafi'i nataga epen endilisinai”, epes isima Ambal Bu'unai Godi napais opalef asasimi.
62004003	Ea' emi egafis owa' si'iam na'ama ma Krais, Ambal Bu'unai Godi ina nape esis, owa'. Ambal nape epes isima anan nanda' naumbih naloma Krais. Fowa' pame' basefa ambal aonai na'i nonda' naumbih noloma Kraisi nifi'i dei' nafi'i nape ea' etap anae'.
62004004	Ipe' alupipei ae'ipei, ipe' epes Godi ea' panda' wandaf paloma amam profet awami mambaso'mami pikila'am. Dei' main, Ambal Bu'unai Godi nape nomon opalef ipe'imi anan la'ifinai nikila' aman aonai nape etap anae'.
62004005	Epes isima saila waf etapanai sa'i basef etapami atom, epes etapasi sembale'efam. Dei' main, esis isima etapasi etis.
62004006	Ea' ape' epes Godi. Emi egafis sogawa God, esis seme' basef ape'imi. Ea' emi egafis owa' epes Godi, isima ina same' basef ape'imi, owa'. Ea' amama atom dei' ikwaf anama nihi'ambapa ma mogawa epes isima. I'i Ambal Bu'unai Godi endilisinai nupais, seme' basef ape'imi. Ea' i'i ambal nambaso'mami nupais, ina seme' ape', owa'.
62004007	Ipe', ae' okom nainailipei, ape' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi. Dei' main, waf anama nafi'i God. Emi egafis ukup maimaila sahin owan, esis awasi Godi ea' dei' segawa God saila basef Ananimi.
62004008	Emi egafis owa' ukup mimila sahin owan, esis ina sogawa God, owa'. Dei' main, God okom nainaila epes hiesi.
62004009	God nihi'ambapa anan okom nainailapa na'ama. Anan nasapa' Nogalomana Ananinai atotona nafi'i etap anae' ma ape' mofa' ambal namunai ma Anan.
62004010	Basef ofagema ma God okom nainaila ape' amama. Ape' ina mali' ukup maimailana, owa'. Anan nali' okom nainailapa ea' nasapa' Nogalomana Ananinai nafi'i ma nanda' okom wandafunai Godi naga' nakwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.
62004011	Ipe' alupipei, waf anama atona nihi'ambapa God okom nainailopa endilisi. Ea' ape' wapoti' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi endilisi.
62004012	Ina enin epen nati God, owa'. I'i ape' atepa ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi, God nope la'ifina ma ape' ea' okom ananinai nainaila ape'i atuwasi nope nolomapa opalef ape'imi nomona monda'am na'ama etin ape' ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi.
62004013	Dei' ape' mogawa ape' mape la'ifipa maloma God ea' anan nape nalomapa. Dei' main? Anan nase'apa Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai nape nalomapa.
62004014	Ea' ape' mogawa Ahalomapa nasapa' Nogalomana ananinai ma nofa'ai epes hiesi sape etapi sotanimani ma anan. Ape' mati amamaga amama ma anan nofa'ai epes sotanimai ma'ipasam.
62004015	Emi egafis sawalapa basef alihiguma sa'i, “Endilisi, Jisas anan Nogalomana Godi”, God nape la'ifina nalomas, esis wapoti' sape la'ifisa Anan.
62004016	Amama atom dei' ape' mogawa mombale'efa God anan okom nainailapa endilisi. God Anan ofagonama okom nainaila epes hiesi. Emi egafis sape ukup maimaila God naloma epes hiesi la'ela'ef, esis sape la'ifis saloma God ea' Anan nape la'ifina nalomas.
62004017	Waf ukup maimaila esis Kristen alupusi endilisi, amama mataga bo'om endilisi ma ape' mitu la'ifipa nemaf anama lu'unai ma God nowalogapa. Dei' main, Anan napaipa nomon, ea' mape etap anae' si'i Krais nape. Ape' ina umbamahapa ma nemaf anama God nowalogapa, owa'.
62004018	God okom nainailapa, ape' wapoti' ukup maimailana. Ea' ina umbamahapa, owa'. I'i waf anama notaga bo'ona endilisi ma ape', anama natofa waf umbamahapamanai nowala hi'alana. Dei' main, epes umbamahasa amamaga nimanimi anona nemaf God nowalogasa waf aonai nose'asami. Emi egafis umbamahas, waf ukup maimaila God ina nataga bo'ona endilisi ma esis, ata' owa'.
62004019	God nali' okom nainailapa endilisi. Amama atom dei' ape' ukup maimaila anan naloma epes hiesi wapoti'.
62004020	I'i enis epes si'i, “Ape' ukup maimaila God,” ama esis ukup wandafuma Kristen alupusi, epes isima sambaso'mami. Dei' main? Ina enin epen atitin nati God, owa'. Emi egafis sati alupusi asasisi ma owa' ukup mimilas, epes isima ina la'ifisa ukup mila God owa' seatolona naepi, owa'.
62004021	Amama Krais na'ipapam la'ifimi amama. Emi egafis ukup maimaila God, epes isima ukup mimila sahin owan asasisi wapoti'.
62005001	Emi egafis sembale'efa Jisas anan Krais God nasapa'ana nafi'i, epes isima awasi Godi. Ea' emi egafis ukup maimaila ahalomas, esis ukup maimaila awasi ananisi wapoti'.
62005002	I'i ape' ukup mimila God ama mila basef la'ifimi Ananimi, anona nemaf ape' mogawa ukup maimaila awasi Ananisi wapoti'.
62005003	Waf ofagema ma ape' ukup maimaila God anama. Ape' maila basef mi'uli la'ifinai Ananinai, ina ahifina endilisi, owa'.
62005004	Dei' main, emi egafis sape awasi Godi nanda'as sataga dambais, epes isima la'ifis sahagofa waf etapanai aonai. Ape' mombale'efa God dei' ape' mikila' wandaf mahagofa waf etapanai aonai.
62005005	Emi egafis sikila' wandafa waf aonai nahagofa waf aonai etapanai? Epes sembale'efa Jisas sa'i anan Nogalomana Godi, esis etis sikila'ana.
62005006	Jisas Krais ma'una aman anama nafi'i. Ea' Anan nefa' baptais embel sahana naga' esimbel Ananimi malo. Anan ina nafi'i ma waf nefa' baptaisa embel atom, owa'. Anan nafi'i ma waf sahana naga' esimbel ananimi malo. Ambal Bu'unai Godi ofagonama waf endilisinai hi'alana. Ea' Ambal anama nawalipasa basef amama ma Krais endilisimi.
62005007	-
62005008	Ambal Bu'unai Godi naloma embel maloma esimbel, amama wenifim mawalapa basef ofagema amama atom.
62005009	Ape' mombale'efa basef epes sawalipasami. Ea' basef God nawalipapami la'ifimi mikila' basef epesi. Dei' main, basef amama ma'i Nogalomana ananinai.
62005010	Ea' emi egafis sembale'efa Nogalomana Godi, basef amama endilisimi mape nomon okom ananinai. Ea' emi egafis owa' sombale'efa God, epes isima na'i God aman nambaso'mami. Dei' main, isima ina sembale'efa basef amama God na'ima Nogalomana Ananinai, owa'.
62005011	Ea' basef amama endilisimi ma'i na'ama. God nase'apa ambal namunai ma mape andeande' la'ela'ef. Ambal namunai anama Anan nase'apana Nogalomana Ananinai atona.
62005012	Emi egafis sape la'ifis saloma Nogalomanai, isima dei' sefa' ambal namunai. Ea' emi egafis owa' sope la'ifisa Nogalomana Godi, isima ina sofa' ambal namunai ma sope andeande' la'ela'ef, owa'.
62005013	Ae' anda' basef mafe'mago ipe' pembale'efa agel Nogalomana Godi. Anda'ama ipe' pegawa dei' pefa' ambal namunai pape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
62005014	Ape' mogawa, i'i ape' mila okom Godi atona monda' betena maim amamaga, Anan nome' beten ape'inai. Ea' maina nemaf mefe' felefele'ma Anan monda' beten, ina umbamahapa ma Anan, owa'. Ukup ape'imi mape la'ifim.
62005015	Ape' mogawa Anan name' betena maim amamaga dei' mahali'anami. Ea' mogawa dei' mape si'i mofa' amamaga amama ea'.
62005016	-
62005017	Epes sanda' waf aonai sawala basef Godi la'ifimi. Ea' waf hianai aonai ina nanda' epes saga', owa'. I'i enin epen niti enin sahin owan ananini nenda' anona waf aonai owa' nenda' epen inima nega' higililan, epen inima nanda' waf anama nenda' betena God, nese'an ambal namunai. Endilisi, anona waf atotona aonai nanda' epes saga' hegilalas. Ae' ina a'ipipa ma penda' betena epes sanda' waf anama, owa'.
62005018	Ape' mogawa emi egafis sape awasi Godi, esis ina sape sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, owa'. Dei' main, Nogalomana Godi numafias andeande'ma pepel ananinai ma aman aonai ina nahambombagas, owa'.
62005019	Ape' mogawa ape' awasi Godi, ea' isima owa' awasi Godi sape owina aman aonai Satan anan dembinai asasinai.
62005020	Ape' mogawa Nogalomana Godi nafi'i ma nose'apa gawa ma mogawa anan God endilisinai. Ape' mape la'ifipa ma Anan endilisinai naloma Nogalomana Ananinai Jisas Krais. God anama endilisinai anan ofagonama ambal namunai napaipa mape andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
62005021	Awasi ae'ipei, ipe' pepe la'ifipa pewa' alafugaha god baso'mainai hianai. Ea' ma'um.
63001001	Ae' agiliwei imafi esis Kristen anda' basef mafe'mago ine', nemata'w God nandandepa'wi kwaloma awasi akwa'usi. Ae' okom nainaila ipe' endilisi. Ina ae' atowe okom nainailipa, owa'. Amam nematawa hiesi sogawa basef endilisimi, esis wapoti' ukup maimailipa.
63001002	Dei' main, basef endilisimi mape ukup ape'imi amama anona nemaf mope la'ifipa ape' la'ela'ef.
63001003	Ae' a'i Ahalomapa God noloma Jisas Krais Nogalomana Ananinai miti uwahipipa migiambamapa na'a monda'apa la'ifipa ea' monda' opalef ape'imi awanem. Amam biam monda'apa na'ama moloma waf endilisinai noloma waf ukup maimaila sahin owananai.
63001004	Ae' andanifel endilisi ma egawa enis awasi ine'isi saila basef bu'wami endilisimi si'i Ahalomapa na'ipapa basef la'ifimima milam.
63001005	Ea' dei' a'ipa ine' nemata'w na'ama. Ape' hiapai ukup mimila sahin owan ape'isi. Ae' ina a'ipina anom basef la'ifimi dambaimi, owa'. A'ipina basef amama atom fowa' gani ape' mogawam mombale'efam.
63001006	Basef ofagema ma ape' ukup maimaila sahin owani amama. Ape' mope mila basef amama Godi la'ifimi la'ela'ef. Basef amama si'i fowa' dambadamba pame'am. Ipe' ukup mimila sahin owan ipe'isi.
63001007	Enis epes sambaso'mami safe' ganigani etap hiagoma. Esis ina sawalipasa Jisas Krais sa'i anan nogalomana Godi nataga epen endilisinai, owa'. Esis sambaso'mami, isima naumbih Kraisi.
63001008	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande'ma pefa' amamaga bu'wami amama panda' maol pa'i pefa'ami. Na'ama ipe' anona nemaf ina pefa' amama, owa'. Andeande'ma pefa'am hiami hi'ilam.
63001009	Emi egafis sakwaha basef Kraisi ma simbisila' sefe' sila anom basef, God ina nape opaf epes isima, owa'. Emi egafis sembale'efa basef Kraisi la'ifis la'ela'ef, dei' Ahalomana naloma Nogalomana wapoti' mape la'ifim maloma epes isima nomon ukup asasimi.
63001010	Emi egafis sifi'mai ipe' ma ina sefa'ai basef amama Kraisi, ipe' ina pigiambama epes isima pi'ipas sofe' solomepa siwis ifagw ipe'imi, owa'. Ina pinifalis pi'ipas penda'mas, “Nemaf bu'unai” esis, hapaisi.
63001011	Emi egafis sinifala epes isima anona nemaf solomas okom atotom sigiambamas sonda' waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
63001012	Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef hiami wapoti', ea' ae' ina enda'am mil okwatip, andaiwa'. A'i efo'o itilipa i'i elomepa ma ape' mondatima mondanifel andeande'.
63001013	God nandandepa owamena ine'ikwi nosahe'akw anani'wi ato'w. Ea' awasi owaminai sanda'menago nemaf bu'unai ma ine'. Ea' ma'um.
64001001	Ae' agiliwei imafi esis Kristen, anda' anom basef mafe'mago ina' alupinai Gaius. Ae' okom nainailina endilisi.
64001002	Basef mafe'mago ine', anda' betena Goda amamaga hiami ine' nanda'ami motaga bo'om andeande'ma awes a'ena nepe andeande' si'i ambal ine'inai nape andeande'.
64001003	Fowa' ae' ame' basefa anom alupumi mafi'i matagame ma'ipi waf ine' nanda'anai ma'i ine' naila basef endilisimi andeande'. Ame' basef amama andanifamena endilisi.
64001004	Ae' andanifel endilisi ma awasi saila basef endilisimi. Ea' ae' ina andanifel ma anom amamaga mikila' andanifela awasi ae'asi saila basef endilisimi, owa'.
64001005	Alupinai ae' okom nanailinai, opeh hiami ine' nanda'ami ma nagiambama amam sahin owan, amama ine' nanda'am andeande' endilisi. Amam ina nati nogonaepima negawam, owa'. Ea' ine' natolom numafiam etin.
64001006	Amam hiami ma'ipa esis Kristen sape na'ae ma okom ine'inai nainailam nigiambamam. Ae' ahali'ina ma nigiambamama gwa'aimi otamba maim mofa'am etin mofe' anagon monda' opeh Godi si'i okom ananinai na'iam.
64001007	Dei' main, amam mafe' manda' maola agel Kraisi, ea' ina mofa' gwa'aimi maima esis isima sololama Godi, owa'.
64001008	Amama atom ape' migiambamama gwa'aimi maima monda' maola basef endilisimi Kraisi molomam.
64001009	Ae' anda' anom basef mafe'mago esis Kristen, ea' Diotrefes anan okom na'ina'i endilisi ma nope dembinai nili'i. Anan ina naila basef ae'ami, owa'.
64001010	Maina nemaf ae' efe'mago ine', ae' ewalapa basefa waf hianai anama anan nanda'anai. Anan nambaso'mas na'i basef mamumami awami findiwama ae'. Ea' ina nanda' waf anama atona, owa'. Nanda' anona waf wapoti' na'ama. Nowa' alafugama amam sahin owan mawalipasa basef Godi ma'i mifi'mai anan. Ea' anona waf wapoti' na'ama. Nasopama enis Kristen sa'i sigiambama amam amama nanda'as safe' sape ande' ma sios.
64001011	Ine' alupinai, ina nila waf aonai, hapainai. Nila waf bu'unai atona. Emi egafis sanda' waf bu'unai, esis epes Godi. Ea' emi egafis sanda' waf aonai, esis ina segawa God, owa'.
64001012	Epes hiesi safela agel Demitriusi. Waf ananinai endilisinai nihi'ambapa anan aman bu'unai. Ae' wapoti' a'i anan bu'unai ea' ine' negawa basef ae'ami endilisimi.
64001013	Ae' a'i i'ipina basef hiami hi'ilam, ea' ae' andaiwa'ma enda' pen enda'am mil okwatip mefe'mago ine', owa'.
64001014	Ae' okom ma'i anona nemaf efo'o itilina, ea' afa' biafa ondatima wi'i basef amama.
64001015	Ae' a'i opaf ine'inai nope awanena nepe andeande'. Alupusi ine'isi sape na'ae sanda'menago danifel nolomago ine'. Ine' da'masago danifela ae'anai wapoti' nefe'mago esis sape wambel ine'imi atona etin. Ea' ma'um.
65001001	Ae' Jut anda' maol ape owina Jisas Krais, ae' owalomana Jemsi. Ae' anda' basef amama mafe'mago ipe' amam nematawa God nandandepepa ea'. Mafe'mago ipe' Ahalomapa God okom maimailipei, ipe' Jisas Krais atona nili'akwapa.
65001002	Ae' a'i God nonda'epa pepe la'ifipama dahowe ananinai opalef awanem pegawa okom ananinai nainailipa. Ae' a'i waf anama nupeipa si'ipa.
65001003	Alupipei endilisi, ae' okom nainailipa. Ae' ali' a'i enda' anom basef mil okwatip mefe'mago ipe' ma God nefa'apa motanimani. Anan nefa' ipe' peloma ae' wapoti'. Ea' owa. Dei' a'i ata' enda' anom basef i'ipipago efela ukup ipe'imi ma penda' maol la'ifipa pimafiago basef endilisimi Kraisi ape' mombale'efami. Ama pehagasa naumbih amama mahagofa basef amama Kraisi. Bale'ef anama God nase'apana ape' hiapai amam nematawa Ananipai nemaf anama atotona mape la'ela'ef.
65001004	Dei' main, anom amam mandambaho' mawisi la'afena ape' Kristen. Fowa' gani basef mail Buk Baibeli ma'i amam amama anona nemaf God nowalogama basef lu'wami ma kot. Amam mowa' alafugaha God maho'ofa basef bu'wami Anan nagiambamapa na'a ma'ipas anom basef manda' waf naninani ukup mohafela waf aonai so'a waolanai nataga la'ifina.
65001005	Endilisi, ipe' pegawa basef amama fowa'imi mail Baibeli. Ea' dei' ae' a'i efela ukup ipe'imi ma pegawam wapoti'. Basef amama mape na'ama. Fowa' Dembinai nofa' esis amam nematawa Ananisi Israel sakwaha etap hiagoma Isip nofa'as safi'i. Ea' Anan naha epes isima owa' sombale'efa Anani saga'. Amam mowa' alafugaha aman anama Jisas Krais Dembinai ape'inai numafi pepel hianai.
65001006	Dei' ipe' ukup mopoma amam ensel amama wapoti', amam ina mumafi maol anama naloma agof lu'wami God nase'amamanai andeande', owa'. Amam makwaha wambel amamunai heven. Ea' dei' God nowa'am sen la'ifinai nape la'ela'efi. Ea' mape la'ela'ef wambel anama akot nape la'ela'efa. Mape mohafa nemaf anama lu'unai God nowalogam moloma epes hiesi wapoti' hi'ilas.
65001007	Dei' ipe' okokoma epes isima fowa' sape Sodom naloma Gomora maloma wambel anama hiagoma mape felefele'ma anama. Esis sanda' waf aonai na'ama etin si'i ensel amama. Amam amama Sodom naloma Gomora manda' waf so'a waolanai ea' ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi ma manda' so'a waola waf aonai maloma amam amama atom. Dei' God nagwamama nimanimi lu'wami amam ma nif lu'wami fandom mape dendel la'ela'ef. Amam mape si'i anona ikwaf ape' motolona mogawa ape' ina mila waf aonai amam manda'anai, owa'. Hapainai.
65001008	Amam amama mandambaho' mawisi malomapa manda'am na'ama etin. Koh nandondo'oh hianai amamunai nafela ukup amamumi ma manda' waf aonai ma alop amamunai. Amam masombala basef Dembinai ape'inai manda' anom ensel dembemi mape heveni wapoti' findiwam.
65001009	Ea' amam ensel mape ilifi, amam ina ma'i basef findiwaimi si'i amam amama, owa'. Ensel anama dembinai nape nali'i Maikel wapoti' ina nanda' basef findiwama enis epes na'ama, owa'. Fowa' anan na'i basef nandahihianamam naloma Satan, ma'i anona nemaf emi nofa' alop Mosesi. Ea' Maikel ina nagwamana basef Satan nanda'ana findiwana, owa'. Anan nagwamana basef na'ipana na'i, “Dembinai atona nogwamenam.”
65001010	Ea' amam amama mandambaho' mawisi malomapa, amam ma'i basef awami ma amamaga hiami amam owa' mogawa ofagema. Waf ukup mohafela migi'ma alop atona inai mogawana andeande'. Waf anama amam manda'ana si'i mafis amama ukup a'emi manda'ami. Amam manda' waf anama atona nahambombagam endilisi.
65001011	Endilisi, nimanimi lu'wami anona nemaf motagamam. Amam mefa' waf aonai fowa' Kein nanda'anai. Ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi ma mofa' otamba atom. Ea' dei' maso' alop amamunai nafe' hi'alana manda' waf aonai si'i fowa' aman anama Balam nanda'anai. Ea' masombala basef Godi si'i fowa' aman anama Kora nanda'am. Amam manda' waf anama, dei' aom higilalam si'i fowa' Kora higilalona.
65001012	Amam amama mandambaho' mawisi malomapa, waf aonai amamunai nape na'ama. Nemaf anama ipe' Kristen ukup maimaila sahin owan ipe'isi pandakolas panda' gwa'aimi ipe'imi o panda' gwa'aimi Jisasi, amam mape malomepa ma' gwa'aimi amama wapoti'. Ea' amam si'i ikwaf aonai la'ifinai nail nanda' gwa'aimi amama aom. Amam ma' gwa'aimi malomepa, ea' ina umbamaham ma waf aonai manda'anai, owa'. Ukup mapoma amam atom. Ina magiambama enis epes mase'asam, owa'. Amam mawalipasa basef, ea' basef amamumi ina magiambamas, owa'. Basef amama wafimi atom si'i otaga wafinai uf nefa'ana nafi'i ina asaf nalai, owa'. Amam mandahama lawah mola gwa'aimi, ea' nogota mailanai ina mola gwa'aimi, owa'. Lawah amama alim sagiam nombalef mapomamam ma'oh.
65001013	Amam manda' waf ambagof awami, anama nataga si'i naoh embel mohafel lu'um endilisi matoma ufun matagam. Ea' mape manda' waf anama aonai mandahama ondowa motawa otagai ina magawa eaf la'ela'ef mafi'i anai. God nandomba anona wambela amam owamb lu'unai napoma anona nemaf mope la'ela'ef.
65001014	Aman anama Enok fowa' nawalapa basefa amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai alihima amam amama manda' waf aonai. Anan nataga nagi'ma wambotagw amama 7-peleim mahafela Adami nawalapa basef amama alihim endilisi ma amam na'i, “Ipe' peme'! Dembinai anona nemaf nifi'i noloma ensel ananimi tausen hiami endilisi
65001015	ma nowaloga epes hiesi nogwamasa nimanimi lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama nihi'ambamas alihisa waf aonai hianai esis sanda'anai ofagema asasimi atom. Epes isima sanda' waf anama aonai na'ama. Esis sowa' alafugaha God endilisi, sosambala basef, sa'i basef sosambalom mamumami awami ma anan.”
65001016	Amam amama mambaso'ami mawisi malomapa ina mape andeande' opalef awanem, owa'. Amam mondowamba' ma amamaga hiami ea' mosambala basef Godi. Ukup amamumi mohafel na'ana'a ma waf aonai ukup mohafemami ea' magi'ma amama. Amam ma'i basef mamumami mafela agof amamumi atom. Amam ma'ipa enis epesa basef usihimi ma mamboma ukup asasimi saila basef amamumi.
65001017	Ea' ipe' alupipei ae'ipei endilisi, ipe' ukup mopoma basef fowa' amam aposel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Kraisi ma'ipipami ma amamaga maim anona nemaf nigi' neatagai.
65001018	Fowa' amam aposel ma'ipipa na'ama ma'i, “Anom nimeguf akutaimi motaga, anom amam monda' iafa waf Godi mifi'i mope. Amam mowa' alafugaha God, ea' ukup amamumi mohafel endilisi na'ana'a ma waf aonai atona ea' mila amama.”
65001019	Amam amama atom manda' ipe' Kristen pandawal. Amam maila ukup epes etapasi etis, Ambal Bu'unai Godi a'am.
65001020	Ea' ipe' alupipei endilisi, la'ela'ef ipe' penda' opalef ipe'imi la'ifim pembale'efa God, Anan ofagonama bale'ef ipe'inai. Ea' la'ela'ef ipe' pihali' Ambal Bu'unai Godi ma nonda'epa la'ifipa numafipa ma beten ipe'inai.
65001021	Ipe' pindumafuma andeande' pila waf Godi andeande'ma Anan nihi'ambepa andeande' okom lu'unai ananinai nainailipei. Ipe' penda'am na'ama pepe pehafa Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais, Anan nati uwahipipa anona nemaf nonda'epa pepe namepa ma pepe andeande' la'ela'ef hihif.
65001022	Enis epes sape ukup biambiefima sombale'efa Kraisi, ipe' piti uwahipis pigiambamas penda'as sotaga la'ifis.
65001023	Enis epes sowa' alafugaha Godi si'i sape nif fandumi la'afen, ipe' mehip gwasi'as sotanimani. Ea' enis epes sanda' waf aonai la'ela'ef, ipe' umbamehepamas. Na'ama sohonde'epa pefe' nif. Ea' piti esis uwahipis pigiambamas. Waf apinai aonai asasinai si'i sowaho' luwaguf alogw la'ifimi mailami. Ea' ipe' pewa' alafugaha waf anama aonai pendafa'mana endilisi.
65001024	Ae' a'i ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una na'ama. Anan la'ifinai ma nili'akwapa andeande'ma anona nemaf ipe' ina pewa ma waf aonai, owa'. Ama anona nemaf nofa'epa nokolasipa pepe andeande' pendanifel endilisi, ofagema ma waf aonai a'epa ma anama Anan nape nafifimagoma.
65001025	Anan atona God, nefa' ape' motanimani ma lagel Dembinai ape'inai Jisas Krais. Nafifili naloma agel lu'unai pepel lu'unai naloma waf anama nape la'ifinai numafi amamaga hiami, amama ananimi atom nafi'i nafi'i nataga dei' anona nemaf owagama wapoti' nope na'ama etin la'ela'ef hihif. Ea' ma'um.
66001001	Fowa' gani basef amama mape mandambaho' ea' dei' Jisas Krais nanda'am mandawalap alihim. God nase'anam Jisasa nowalapam nihi'ambapa anom manda'mana opeh Godi ma mowalapa amamaga mape mandambahi'i motaga ulal. Anan nase'e gawa afa' wanda' opeha Anan ma amamaga amama. Ea' dei' nasapa' ensel ananinai nafi'mai ae' Jon. Ae' dei' anda'mana maol Godi, ea' Anan nase'e basef amama ae' wapoti'.
66001002	Ae' atolom ea' amamaga amama awalapam a'iam alihim basef Godi maloma basef amama endilisimi Jisas Krais nanda'ami mandawalap alihim.
66001003	Emi egafis setalifa basef amama Godi mail buk anama ma malogof asasimi ma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai, esis God nonda'as sondanifel. Ea' emi egafis some' basef amama ma ukup asasimi, esis sondanifel wapoti'. Dei' main, nemafa amamaga amama migi' meatagai felefele'ma motaga.
66001004	-
66001006	Ae' Jon anda' basef amama ma ipe' Kristen pape wambel 7-peleimi etap hiagoma Esia. God fowa' gani nape, dei' nape, anona nemaf owagama nope la'ela'ef hihif. Anan naloma Jisas Krais maloma ambagof bu'wami 7-peleim mape felefele'ma balata bu'unai Godi. Ae' a'i amam migiambamepa na'a monda'epa petaga la'ifipa mose'epa opalef awanem. Jisas Krais Anan naila basef ananimi nanda' maol ananinai andeande'. Ea' nawalapa basef hiami Godi andeande'. God nali' nafelona nohafel hi'agif. Ea' nape nali'ma anona nemaf esis saga'i God nofelas sohafel wapoti'. Jisas Krais Anan atona dembinai numafi amam king Dembemi mape etap. Anan atona okom lu'unai nainaila ape' hiapai, ma esimbel ananimi atom natagahepa ma waf aonai ape' manda'anai mataga wafifipa. Anan atona nanda'apa dei' mape dembipai malomana mumafi epes hiesi si'i amam king. Ea' nanda'apa mape pris si'i mondolalima God manda' opeha God Ahalomana ananinai. Ae' a'i nafifili noloma pepel hianai Ananinai atona nope la'ela'ef hihif. Endilisi.
66001007	Piti, Anan la'ifinai anona nemaf nifi'i noloma otaga esis hiesi sotolona naep asasimi ea' epes isima fowa' sahana wamba'wi sotolona wapoti'. Amama atom esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi sotolona sogawa solopana kwapete'as ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Amama anona nemaf motaga na'ama. Endilisi.
66001008	Dembinai God pepel hiamunai Anan na'iam na'ama na'i, “Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali'i, ape agi'i endilisi.” Ea' Ae' atowe fowa' gani ape, dei' ape, anona nemaf owagama etanima ifi'i.
66001009	Ae' Jon sahalomepa ipe'iwei. Ae' alomepa, ape' hiapai Jisasi atepa mape la'ifipa malomana. Ae' alomepa mandao'oma mofa' nimanimi ma muwis wambota Godi numafiapa. Ape' mape la'ifipa maloma Jisas ea' ape alomepa mandao'oma ape' hiapai mape so'umbel mape maitu la'ifipa na'ama etina mofa' nimanimi. Ae' awalapa basef Godi maloma basef endilisimi ma opeh Jisas nanda'ami. Amama atom dei' esis sandaiwa'me sagalo'me afi'i ape ailan agiliguma sa'i Patmos.
66001010	Anona nemaf Dembinai Sande Ambal Bu'unai Godi numafi ae' ame' anona maf na'i mehip nandame' si'i safapula alof, na'i nataga alafuga ae'anai.
66001011	Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' da'a basefa amamaga amama nambimb neatulumi mil buk. Ea' nenda' basef amama mil buk anama mefe' amam nematawa Godi sios 7-peleim sape wambel anama 7-peleina atona etin. Wambel anama agofuguma amama. Efesus, Smerna, Pergamum, Taiataira, Sardis, Filadelfia, Laodisia.”
66001012	Ea' ae' andamboma a'i iti anama na'ipa ae'i. Ea' ati lamifah 7-peleim matoma gol 7-peleim.
66001013	La'afena gol amama ati anona aman nalomam naitu. Anan nandati si'i anona dembinai nataga epen endilisinai. Nala luwaguf laumi mowala mambaho'wa bo'wagah ananimi ea' nowaho' let sanda' gol sanda'anai mafata ananinai.
66001014	Balaga naloma auf malonai afitim endilisi si'i auf malo sipsipi o si'i elagw amama afitimi. Naep ananimi fandom si'i nif ilelowa.
66001015	Ea' bo'wagah ananimi manda' gambigambis endilisi mandati si'i bras kapa batafunai saofam nif lu'wami. Ea' ame' malogel ananinai nanda'am si'i embel mawis mehip kululu' etin.
66001016	Anan nahapila ondowa 7-peleim nahapilam lagel da'isinai ananinai. Ea' anona bainat hi'alina wa'owa'ili nawisi nape malogel ananinai. Amaga ananinai nafifil endilisi si'i owaf naluwi la'ifina.
66001017	Ae' atolona ea' ewa a'oh felefele'ma bo'wagah ananimi andati si'i aga'i. Ea' anan nasa lagel da'isinai ananinai ma ae' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' umbamehena owa'. Ae' ape dembiwei la'ela'ef ape ali'i ape agi'i endilisi.
66001018	Fowa' aga', ea' dei' ape namowe la'ela'ef hihif. Ae' ape Dembiwei ali' ape agi' ma amamaga hiami maloma epes. Ea' ahapila ki ma wambel saga'i sapoma.
66001019	Ea' ae' a'i ine' nenda' basefa amamaga amama dei' ine' natulumi, nenda' basefa amamaga amama dei' mapani maloma amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai wapoti' nenda'am mil buk.
66001020	Ine' nati ondowa awama 7-peleim wape lagel da'isinai ae'anai waloma lamifah amama 7-peleim matoma gol amama 7-peleim. Amama mondola'wifi atom. Basef ofagema amama. Ondowa mondola'wifa ensel mumafi sios amam nematawa hiesi Godi 7-peleim, ea' gol amama mondola'wifa sios amam nematawa Godi amama 7-peleim.
66002001	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Efesusi. Ae' aman ahapila ondowa amama 7-peleim lagel ae'anai da'isinai afe' la'afena gol amama lamifah matomami 7-peleim. Ae' anda'mepago basef amama ipe'.
66002002	Ae' egawa amamaga maim ipe' panda'ami opeh lu'wami. Nimanimi matagamepa, paitu la'ifipa la'ela'ef, ina patanima, owa'. Ea' ae' egawa ipe' paitu la'ifipa endilisi ma pandaiwa'ma amama manda' waf aonai. Ipe' pawaloga amam amama mambaso'ami ma'i amam aposel, patolom pegawa amam ina aposel, owa'. Amam mambaso'ami.
66002003	Ipe' paitu la'ifipa la'ela'ef ma epes isima sandaiwa'ma agel ae'anai ma sanda'mepa waf aonai, ina patanima, owa'. Ae' egawa ipe' panda' opeh ae'ami lu'wami la'ifipa ea' ina umbamahepa pakwahom, owa'etin. Ipe' paitu la'ifipa pefa' nimanimi amama.
66002004	Ea' dei' anom basef awami mapomepa. Fowa' dambadamba ukup ipe'imi maimaila Ae' pembale'efa Ae' andeande', ea' dei' owa'etin.
66002005	Dei' ukup mi'i' waf anama bu'unai fowa' pali' panda'anai. Ea' pemboma opalef pilana penda'ana pigi'mana wapoti' si'i fowa' dambadamba panda'ana. I'i ipe' owa' pemboma opalef, anona nemaf ae' ifi'i etagamepa ili'amona gol amama ipe'imi lam natamonomi.
66002006	Ea' dei' anona waf bu'unai ata' napaipa. Enis epes hiesi agel sa'i Nikolas Ae' andaiwa' endilisi ma waf esis sanda'anai, ea' ipe' wapoti' pewa' alafugahas pandaiwa' endilisi ma waf esis sanda'anai.
66002007	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama sios esis amam nematawa Godi! Emi egafis situ la'ifis sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf Ae' i'i aho'ma esis sea' su'utip lawag anama epes se'am sofa' ambagof namumi. Lawag anama notawa aof Godi agiliguma Paradais.
66002008	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel numafi sios esis amam nematawa Godi sape Smernai. Ae' ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali', ape agi' endilisi. Fowa' aga', dei' ehafel wapoti' ape namowe ambal napaiwe. Dei' anda'mepago basef amama ipe' a'i,
66002009	Ae' egawa nimanimi amama matagamipei ea' Ae' egawa ipe' pape kwahupei otamba hiahaom maim a'epa. Owa'etin. Ipe' amamaga hiami ma'omepa gani ilif heven. Ae' egawa basef amama awami enis epes sa'iama ipe'. Amam nematawa isima sambaso'mepa sa'i, ‘Afa' Juda.’ Ea' esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'mepa. Esis wambota Satani etis. Ae' egawa amamaga amama.
66002010	Ipe' ina umbamehepama nambimb pefa' nimanimi, owa'. Ipe' peme'! Nambimb Satan nonda' enipa penda' kalabusa nogwamba ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama nimeguf 10-peleim. Ea' kwawie', ipe' pembale'efa Ae' pitu la'ifipa ma enis si'i sehepa pega', pitu la'ifipa pembale'efa Ae'. Ama Ae' anona nemaf ease'epa ambal namunai ipe' si'i amamaga bu'wami esis sasagih sikila' sefa'ami.
66002011	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei, peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf ga' anama neafe'ma bifi ina nohambombagas nonda'as sefe' wambel aonai, owa'.
66002012	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Pergamumi. Ae' ahapila bainat launai hi'alina wa'owa'ili. Ea' anda'mepago basef amama ipe' a'i,
66002013	Ae' egawa wambel ipe'inai. Satan atona ata' nape dembinai ma wambel anama. Ea' ipe' pahapila agel ae'anai la'ifipei pembale'efa Ae'. Ipe' ina pakwaha pembale'efa Ae', owa'. Fowa' aman anama Antipas anan nawalapa basef Ae'ami andeande'. Ea' sahana naga' wambel ipe'inai Satan napoma. Ea' nogota anama ipe' ina pakwaha pembale'efa Ae', owa'.
66002014	Ea' Ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai dei' ata' napomepa. Enis amam nematawa sape salomepa Pergamum, esis ata' saila waf anama si'i anona aman Balam fowa' nanda'anai la'ifis. Waf aman anama na'ama. Fowa' gani anan nihi'amba anona aman Balak nambaso'mana nanda' esis amam nematawa Israelisi sowa sanda' waf aonai. Ea' Balak nafela ukup esis Israeli ma sagwa' mafis maloma gwa'aimi amama saso' god baso'omunai sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai.
66002015	Ea' na'ama etin enis amam nematawa saloma ipe' esis ata' saila waf anama aonai enis epes hiesi sa'i agel Nikolas sanda'anai.
66002016	Ipe' pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. I'i owa', Ae' felefele' a'i etagamepa epa' eloma epes isima owa' somboma opalef sifi'mai ae'i ehas bainat nape malogel ae'anai.
66002017	Ipe' aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' anona nemaf ese'asa gwa'aimi Ae'ami bu'wami mandambaho' mape heveni. Gwa'aimi amama agilima mana. Ea' ese'asa anom otamba bu'wami afitimi atona etin, ea' enda' anona agel namunai nil otamba amama. Ina enin epen negawa agel anama, owa'etin. Epen nefa' otam anama, enin etin negawana.
66002018	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Taiatairai. Ae' nogalomana Godi, naep ae'ami howalagon endilisi si'i nif fandom la'ifim endilisi, bo'wagah ae'ami howalam gambigambis endilisi si'i bras howalagon.
66002019	Ae' egawa ma waf hianai bu'unai ipe' panda'anai. Ae' egawa ipe' ukup maimaila God naloma epes wapoti' pembale'efa Ae' panda' opeh hiami pagiambama epes hiesi. Ae' egawepa paitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi matagamipei. Ae' egawa maol anama bu'unai ipe' fowa' panda'anai. Ipe' dei' panda' maol anama bu'unai hianai pikila' fowa' panda'anai.
66002020	Ea' Ae' anom basefa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai. Ipe' pati nemata'w akwama Jesebel kwape kwalomepa. Akwa'w kwa'i, ‘Ae' profet a'i basef Godi mandambahi'i.’ Owa', kwambaso'mepa kwawalipa ipe' panda' maola ae'i panda' waf so'a waolanai aonai ma pa' gwa'aimi amama sondolali saso' god baso'omunai.
66002021	Ae' a'i akwa'w komboma opaf, amama atom dei' Ae' ata' animbalo'w kwape anom nimeguf, owa'etin. Akwa'w ina kwa'i komboma opaf kowa' alafugama waf anama aonai so'a waolanai, owa'.
66002022	Ea' dei' peme'! Nambimb ikwaho'w kowai balata ese'akwa nimanimi lu'wami moloma bumbilita lu'unai. Ea' esis amam nematawa saila waf aonai akwa'unai wapoti' sofa' nimanimi amama. I'i esis owa' somboma opalefa sowa' alafugaha waf anama sanda'anai, ese'as nimanimi amama lu'wami.
66002023	Esis isima saila basef akwa'umi wapoti', nambimb ehas soga'. Ama esis amam nematawa hiesi Godi sogawa Ae' awaloga nomonas maloma ukup epes hiesi andeande'. Ea' anona nemaf egwamepa amamaga ipe' atona etin, mondahama waf ipe' panda'anai.
66002024	Dei' ae' a'i i'ipipa anom basef ipe' enipa amam nematawa pape wambel Taiatairai, ipe' owa' pila basef amama awami akwa'umi, owa' pila waf anama sofalana sa'i, ‘Basef mandambahi'i ma waf Satani,’ owa'. Ae' a'ipipa na'ama. Ae' ina nambimb ese'epa anom nimanimi wapoti' ma ipe', owa'.
66002025	Waf hianai bu'unai ipe' pagi'manai, anama ipe' pembale'ef la'ifipa pefe' ma petaga nogota Ae' iefi'ianai.
66002026	-
66002027	Ipe' emi egafipa pitu la'ifipama wandafa pili'amona waf aonai ma pila okom Ae'anai pefe' petaga nogota hi'ilana, Ae' anona nemaf ese'epa pepel ipe'. Ama pepe dembipei ma amam nematawa hiesi. Na'ama etin si'i fowa' Ahalome nase'e pepel ma ape Dembiwei imafi epes hiesi. Ipe' wapoti' pepe dembipei pefa' pepel pimafi enis amam nematawa wapoti' na'ama. Ipe' pimafias la'ifipa si'i anona aman nahapila kalamuta sanda' ain sanda'anai, si'i anona aman nawala malep papalalana.
66002028	Ea' ese'epa ondo'w kuhumbitai'wi lala'wan.
66002029	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.
66003001	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Sardisi. Ae' ahapila anom ambagof bu'wami Godi 7-peleim ea' ahapila ondowa amama 7-peleim. Ae' egawa waf hianai ipe' panda'anai. Esis sa'i basefa ipe' na'ama sa'i, ‘Ipe' ambal napaipa.’ Owa'etin. Ipe' si'i saga'i.
66003002	Ipe' hafel pekwaha pa'oh pandondo'ah! Waf hianai aonai ipe' panda'anai ata' napaipa la'ela'ef na'i nehepa pega'. Ea' anona waf bu'unai kwaie'una ipe' penda'ana notaga la'ifina nape. Dei' main? Waf hianai ipe' panda'anai, Ae' ina ati anona ata' bo'ona ma naep Ahalome Godi, owa'.
66003003	Ipe' ukup mopoma basef amama Ae'ami fowa' pali' pame'am pefa'am ea'i. Pigi'mam pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai pifi'mai Ae'. I'i ipe' owa' pehafel ulal pekwaha koh, nambimb Ae' ifi'i endambaho' etagamepa si'i epen nanda' wali nafi'i nataga ea' ina pegawa maina nogota ae' eatagamepa, owa'.
66003004	Ea' ipe' enipa pape Sardisi owa' penda' luwaguf maim ipe'imi aom, anona nemaf pindawisa luwaguf afitimi dambaimi atom pefe' peloma Ae'. Dei' main, ati ipe' epes bu'upei ma pefa'am amama.
66003005	Ipe' paloma enis epes wapoti' sape ambal namunai la'ela'ef agof ipe'imi mail anona buk sa'i buk ambal namunai napainai. Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' ese'as luwaguf amama afitimi solam. Ea' ina anona nemaf egagaha agof asasimi mail buk anama, owa'etin. Mil la'elaef. Ewalapa agof asasimi ma naep Ahalome ae'anai noloma amam ensel Ananimi i'ipam i'i epes isima ae'asi.
66003006	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.
66003007	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Filadelfiai. Ae' bu'uwei endilisi dei' ahapila ki ma uta anama fowa' king Devit nahapilanai. I'i Ae' ewisi'ana, anona aman ina la'ifina ma nowalowana, ea' Ae' i'i ewalowana wapoti', nambimb enin epen ina la'ifina niwisi'ana, owa'. Ae' atowe a'ipipago basef amama ipe'.
66003008	Ae' egawa waf hianai dei' panda'anai hi'alana ea' egawa ipe' wapoti', ata' la'ifipa kwaikwaie' ma enis epes owa' some' basef ipe'imi. Ea' ipe' paila basef ae'ami andeande'. Ea' ina pambaho' agel ae'anai, owa'. Ipe' piti, ae' anda' uta nagal napomepa, owa' anona aman la'ifinama nowalowana, owa'.
66003009	Ipe' peme'! Ipe' pegawa epes isima Satani. Esis sa'i basef sa'i esis epes Judai, owa'etin. Esis ina saila waf Judai, owa'. Esis sambaso'ami. Ae' anona nemaf enda' epes isima sifi'i sindiwa nembawa sotawa felefele'ma bo'wagah ipe'imi ma sogawa ae' okom nainailipa.
66003010	Ipe' paila basef ae'ami andeande' paitu la'ifipa ma nimanimi amama matagamipei. Ea' Ae' dei' imafi ipe' ma nemaf anama amama meagwambipei motagama amam nematawa hiesi etap hiagomai ma God nowalogas waf bu'unai aonai. Amama ina anona nemaf motagama ipe', owa'.
66003011	Ae' ifi'i etagama ipe' mehip. Waf bu'unai ipe' pailanai dei', pilona la'ifapa la'ela'ef. Na'ama anona aman nondalombepa amamaga bu'wami mapoma ipe' ma anona nemaf pefa'ami.
66003012	Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, anona nemaf Ae' enda'as situ la'ifis si'i olaf nombalo' ipat lu'unai Godi Ae'anai. Ea' epes isima ina sokwaha ipat anama lu'unai sotanima suwisi ande' wapoti', owa'. Sope andeande' nomon la'ela'ef. Anona nemaf enda' agel Ahalome Godi nila esis noloma agel wambel anama lu'unai God Ae'anai Jerusalem, wambel namunai bu'unai. Wambel anama anona nemaf nokwaha heven God Ae'anai napoma nisila'i. Ea' agel namunai Ae'anai wapoti' enda'ana nila esis.
66003013	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah mapaipei peme' andeande' basef amama Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.
66003014	Ine' da'a anom basef mofe'ma ensel anama numafi sios amam nematawa Kristen sape Laodisiai. Ae' ofagewe ma basef endilisimi awalapam mafe' andeande' basef hiami Godi. La'ela'ef awalapam andeande'. Ae' Dembiwei ma amamaga hiami God nanda'am mape ilif etapi maloma epes hiesi wapoti'. Ae' a'ipipago basef amama ipe'.
66003015	Ae' egawa waf hianai dei' ipe' panda'anai. Ea' egawa ipe' ina pohalepa, owa'. Ea' ipe' ina nifipa, owa'. Ae' a'i ipe' pepe pohalepa o pepe nifipa.
66003016	Owa'etin. Ipe' nifipa kwaukwawie'. Ipe' owa' nifipa endilisi ea' owa' poholepa endilisi. Ea' Ae' andaiwa'mepa a'i igu'upei malogel ae'anai.
66003017	Ipe' pa'iam na'ama pa'i, ‘Ape' moni hianai naloma amamaga hiami ma'omapa. Ape' ina anom amamaga a'apa, owa'.’ Ea' naep Ae'ami atilipa pape awepa endilisi ma enis epes sati owahipipa. Ipe' pape kwahupa endilisi naep mase'epa alop nape na'a. Ipe' owa' pegawa amama mowalapa waf aonai ipe' panda'anai, owa'.
66003018	Ea' ese'epa gawa ma ipe'. Gol Ae'ami dei' fandom mataga bo'om endilisi. Andeande'ma ipe' petalom petaga bu'upei amamaga hiami endilisi. Andeande'ma petala luwaguf afitimi pelam muli'akwa alop ipe'inai ma esis ina siti alop ipe'inai nope wafifina ea' ambagof aom, owa'. Andeande'ma ipe' petala anona marasin penda'ana naep ipe'imi ma piti andeande'.
66003019	Epes hiesi emi egafis Ae' okom nainailas, isima Ae' enda' megah mohas ehas bolam ma enda' waf asasinai notaga bo'ona. Ea' ipe' wapoti' ukup mopoma waf ipe'inai hianai, pemboma opalef pekwaha waf aonai pifi'mai Ae'.
66003020	Ipe' peme', Ae' aha uta aitu. Emi egafis seme' malogel Ae'anai ma susi' uta, Ae' iwis nomon epe elomas ope atogon wea' gwa'aimi.
66003021	Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, Ae' anona nemaf i'i aho'ma esis sope solome ma sope dembesi balata king Ae'anai. Na'ama etin si'i fowa' Ae' aitu la'ifiwi ali'amona wandafa waf aonai. Ea' dei' ape aloma Ahalome Ae'anai ape balata king Ananinai.
66003022	Ipe' emi egafipa aligah peme' basef amama andeande' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nawalapama esis amam nematawa Kristen.”
66004001	Amama mataga ea', ati gani heven anona uta nandawisi' nape. Ea' maf anama fowa' ae' ame'anai na'i basef amama si'i anona alof nalef ea' na'i, “Ine' lotowi na'ae ilif ihi'ambena amamaga anona nemaf migi' meatagai.”
66004002	Ea' mehip Ambal Bu'unai Godi nataga la'ifina ma ae'. Ati gani heven balata kingi ati anona aman Dembinai natoma balata anama nape.
66004003	Anan howalagon la'ifina si'i otam bu'unai agilina ma jaspa naloma otam akwahinai agilina ma konilian. Ea' anona elelina natoma balata anama king natomanai ea' ati elelina anama goloto'unai si'i anona otam bu'unai agilinama emeral.
66004004	Anom siaifah hiami bu'wami 24-peleim motawa tulif etina balata anama dembinai kingi. Ea' anom agufumi mala luwaguf afitimi atom matoma mandandamam siaifah amama 24-peleim. Mowalo' hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami balagah amamumi sanda' gol sanda'ami.
66004005	Otaga holala natagai balata kingi diwala. Ea' anom amalemb lu'wami mala' wapoti' balata anama nape natologoma bagah 7-peleim fandumi mape mafifimana. Bagah amama Ambagof bu'wami Godi 7-peleim.
66004006	Ea' anama balata kingi notawa natologoma anom amamaga mape. Amama si'i embel naoh lu'wami. Amama mandati si'i mapelaga mati embel mati ambagof. Ea' anom amamaga biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi mape la'afen anama balata kingi maitu. Amam mape naep hiami mapaim hi'alam maso'ala amagah opalef amamumi alafugah hi'alam.
66004007	Nali'i ambal napainai si'i anona mafin lu'unai wandafunai laion. Nagi'i anan si'i bulmakau suwafunai. Nafe'ma wanomi anan amaga nandati si'i amaga epeni. Ea' nafe'ma biamibiami nandati si'i anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' ilifi.
66004008	Ambagof namumi mapaimi bihinagof wanom wanom mape mandandam. Ea' alop amamunai si'ina naep atomana hi'alana. Ea' owamb alip amam ma'i la'ela'ef na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai God Anan la'ifina bo'ona endilisi! Fowa' gani Anan nape dei' nape, anona nemaf owagama wapoti' nope la'ela'ef.” Amam ina mapoma noma'wa ma'i basef amama, owa'. Manda'am la'ela'ef.
66004009	Amam mandanifela God natoma balata kingi nape ambal namunai la'ela'ef. Ea' mafela agel Ananinai manifelona.
66004010	Ama nimeguf hiami maina nogota amam manda'am na'ama, agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa ma naep Dembinai kingi, natoma balata kingi. Ea' amam manda' lotuma Anan nape la'ela'ef. Amam mowali hagw amamumi golim makwahom mondola'wifa mape owina Anan Dembinai amamunai. Hagw amama mafe' mowa felefele'ma balata kingi notawa natologoma ea' ma'i,
66004011	“Ine' God afa'inai Dembinai afa'inai. Ine' la'ifinai bu'unai endilisi ma epes hiesi sondanifela ine' sofela agel ine'inai lu'una. Ine' la'ifinai. Dei' main, ine' nanda' amamaga hiami. Okom ine'inai atona na'iam nanda'am mataga. Ea' dei' amamaga amama hiami mape ambal napaim.”
66005001	Ea' ati aman anama natoma balata kingi nahapila anona buk lagel da'isinai ananinai. Buk anama amef mail nomon ande'. Ea' sanda' tep si'i blasta sowa' buk anama. Tep tu'wanina 7-peleina sowa'ana buk anama.
66005002	Ea' ati anona ensel la'ifinai noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Emi epen bu'wani ma atuwasi la'ifina nehape' tep anama nowa' buk anama?”
66005003	Owa' anin epen atitin nape heveni o nape etap anae'i o nape etap owini la'ifina nehape' tep anama nowa' buk anama nati nomonana, owa'.
66005004	Ae' ati esis ina sati anin epen la'ifina nefa' buk anama niti nomonana, owa'. Ea' ae' dei' okom nimanina amama alef ega a'i mehip.
66005005	Ea' anan agilinai na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Ine' owa' nelef! Neme'! Anona aman natagama wambota anama launai esis Judai, aman anama ma'una Dembinai nataga wambota anama bafalomepa Deviti. Anan si'i anona mafin wandafunai laion, nikila' wandafa waf aonai. Amama atom dei' atuwasi Anan la'ifina ma nehape' tep anama 7-peleina nowa' buk anama naufeniana.”
66005006	Ae' ati amama biamibiam ambal napaimi maloma amam agufumi mape malipa anona mafin sipsip noganai. Anan naitu, nandati si'i sahana afuna. Anan naitu felefele'ma balata anama kingi. Wambawa mataga balagana 7-peleim ea' naep 7-peleim. Naep amama ma'i Ambagof Bu'wami Godi 7-peleim nasapa'am mafe'agon hi'alagon etap anae' hiagoma.
66005007	Sipsip anama noganai nafe' nofa'ai buk anama nape lagel da'isinai Ananinai natoma balata anama kingi.
66005008	Nofa' buk anama ea', amamaga amama biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi maloma agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa motawa felefele'ma sipsip anama noganai. Agufumi amama hiami atona etin mahapila anona musik si'i gitai naloma anom dis gol si'inama sanda amama nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Sanda amama alogw ambul mataga malata ilif si'i beten esis amam nematawa Godi.
66005009	Ea' manda' anona awaf dambainai na'ama ma'i, “Ine' bu'winai endilisi ma nefa'ai buk anama nahape' mandof tep anama hianai mowa'anai. Dei' main, esis sahena naga', esimbel ine'imi matala epes isima wapoti' sotanimani nase'anas God. Ine' natala esis amam nematawa hiesi hi'alasa epes hiesi wambotagw hiami mamumami, diga naninani hianai, alop naninani hianai ma epes sape etap hiagoma wambel hiagoma ma sotanimani.
66005010	Ine' nanda' epes isima hiesi sataga si'i pris mondolalima Godi ma Anan nope Dembinai ma esis numafias sonda' maol Ananinai. Ea' esis anona nemaf sope si'i king sumafi epes hiesi sape etapi.”
66005011	Ae' atologon ame' malogof ensel hiami endilisi siambam namba amamunai hiami handet milian tausen, hiami endilisi. Amam maitu malipa balata anama kingi maloma amamaga amama ambal napaimi maloma amam agufumi.
66005012	Amam ma'i ma'oh mehip ma'i, “Anama ma'una sipsip noganai, fowa' esis sahana naga'i. Anan bu'unai endilisi ma nofa' namba agel lu'unai noloma amamaga hiami bu'wami otamba hiahaom maim moloma pepel lu'unai noloma gawa bu'unai noloma howalagon. Anan bu'unai endilisi ma epes hiesi sefela agel Ananinai sondanifela Anan sinifelona.”
66005013	Amama mafe'ma ea', Ae' ame' diga ma amamaga hiami maloma epes hiesi God nanda'as ambagof mapaisi hi'alas. Hiesi sape heveni sape etap anae' saloma sape etap owini saloma sape naoh embel owini. Ame' amamaga amama hiami maloma epes isima hiesi sape anama hiagomai sanda' anona awaf na'ama sa'i, “Dembinai nape balata anama Kingi naloma sipsip noganai wapoti', amam biam bu'wami ma mofa' danifel anama hianai naloma agel lu'unai naloma pepel naloma howalagon. Amam biam bu'wami ma mofa' amama nimeguf hiami la'ela'ef hihif.”
66005014	Ea' amamaga amama biamibiam mape namumi ma'i, “Endilisi!” Ea' agufumi amama 24-peleim mindiwa nembawa manda' lotuma God naloma sipsip noganai.
66006001	Ae' ati sipsip noganai nahapila buk anama tep 7-peleina nowa'ana nahape' tep nali'i. Ea' ame' anona ma amam amama biamibiami na'i basef diga ananinai ame' si'i otaga diluluwagala. Anan na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”
66006002	Atologon wapoti', ati anona mafin hos afitinai epen natomanai nahapila kopa'w. Esis sase'ana anona hat si'i sanda' wandaf sali'amonana sofa'ami. Ea' anan la'ifina nafe' dei' nali'amona wandaf okom la'ifina nape la'ela'ef na'i nonda' wandaf lu'unai nikila' epes hiesi.
66006003	Sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nafe'ma bifi nowa' buk anama ea' ame' anona ma amama biamibiam nafe'ma bifi na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”
66006004	Ea' anona hos akwahinai howalagon endilisi nataga, anona aman natoma hos anama. Amam amama biamibiam mase'ana pepel aman anama natoma hosi. Ea' la'ifina ma nili'amona nogota bu'unai ma amam nematawa etap anae'isi. Ea' esis lupulupa' so'oh soga'. Ea' mase'ana anona bainat lu'unai ma nonda' wandaf.
66006005	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' anona tep nafe'ma wenifi wapoti' nowa' buk. Ame' anona ma amama biamibiam nafe'ma wenifi na'i, “Ine' fi'i!” Ae' atologon wapoti' ati anona hos alialinai. Aman natomanai nahapila anona skel si'i ikwaf dende'ma nowaloga gwa'aimi nihi'ambasa ikwaf dende'.
66006006	Ea' ame' anona maf si'i anona malogel na'i la'afena amam biamibiam na'i, “Ine' nesaho' anona malep sala su'utip witimi ma 3 kina. Ea' nesaho' maloh sa'umi wanom bali si'i wit napaimi ma otamba 3 kina. Ine' owa' nehambombaga wain noloma wel hi'ilam, owa'!”
66006007	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep nafe'ma bifibifi nowa' buk, ea' ame' malogel anona ma amam ambagof mapaimi nafe'ma biamibiami na'i, “Ine' fi'i!”
66006008	Atologon wapoti' ati anona hos batafunai, aman natomanai agel ananinai ga'. Ea' anona aman numafi wambel esis saga'i sapoma nagi'mana nafi'i. Amam biam mowala amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi sotaga wambotagw biamibiam ea' amam motaga la'ifima moha enis amam nematawa hiesi sape anona wambota atotona soga'. Ea' amam biam moha enis soga' bainat amamunai ea' enis nolomohas soga' ea' enis awes naninani nonda'as soga' ea' mafis amama wandafumi mape aolupi moha enis soga'.
66006009	Sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama wapoti' nafe'ma wenif bifi nowa' buk, ati ambagof enis epes saga'i sape owina balata sondolalima Godi. Fowa' epes isima sombale'efa basef Godi la'ifis sawalapam sa'iam sa'ipasama Jisas Krais nagiambamas. Ea' isima sandaiwa'ma Godi sahas saga'.
66006010	Ea' ambagof amama ma'i mehip na'ama ma'i, “King dembinai nahapila ilif etap, ine' nape bo'wena, ine' endilisinai! Afagof ma'um mefe' hi'ilam muli' ma ine' nenda' kotima esis amam nematawa sape etapi, ma negwa esimbel ape'imi?”
66006011	Ea' God nase'ama anom luwaguf afitimi laumi atona etin na'ipam na'ama na'i, “Ipe' ata' pepoma noma'w nogota bandana. Anona nemaf esis naumbih soha sahin owan isima ipe' pandao'oma panda' maol atonai soga', si'i sahepa paga'. Anona nemaf dohandohama esis naumbih sohas soga' sotaga ma ikwaf ae' a'ianai, egwa esimbel ipe'imi.”
66006012	Ae' ati sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama nafe'ma wenif wenifi nowa' buk dei' atef sowambon lu'unai nakoto'ma etap, aon alipunai nataga nandamboma alialina si'i lowaf alinai apinai. Ea' aon owambunai nataga akwahina hi'alana si'i esimbel.
66006013	Ea' ondowa mape ilifi mowai etap si'i su'utip mail lawah figi owa' ata' akume uf nakoto'mam mowai.
66006014	Ilif wapoti' nafe' hi'alagon si'i samagwia mat sowa'ana. Ea' halafutagw hiami maloma ailan hianai makwaha anama mapoma mindiki'ah mafe' anagon.
66006015	Ea' amam king dembemi etapami maloma agufumi maloma amam kepten dembemi mumafi amam soldia maloma amam amamaga hiamumi maloma amam amama aguf lu'wamumi maloma epes isima hiesi sanda' maola otamba saloma isima hiesi agof a'asi sape owina enis epesi, esis hiesi sawis sandambaho' sape hul maim mape etapi ea' mape nomona owah lu'wami mape halafutagwi.
66006016	Ea' sofala halafutagw amama hiami maloma owah hiami sa'i, “Ipe' mehip kwa'ilipei pewai pepei'apa ma pembahe'apa ma amaga anan natoma balata kingi naloma okom wandafunai ma sipsip noganai.
66006017	Dei' main, nemaf anama lu'unai ma ukup amam biam wandafuma mogwa waf aonai dei' nataga. Atuwasi emi la'ifina nitu nikila' amam? Owa'etin.”
66007001	Amama mafe'ma ea', ae' ati ensel biamibiam maitu wa'owa'ola biefigin biefigin etap nafe' netambela, mahapila uf hianai etapanai ma uf ina la'ifina nehapusa etap o naoh embel lu'wami o nefa' anona lawag nenda' felifal, owa'.
66007002	Ea' ati anona ensel nafe' nalata ilif aon natefima. Anan nahapila ikwaf la'ifinai Godi nape namunai na'i nosaho' epes sanda' maol Godi. Ea' nofala ensel amama biamibiam God nase'ama pepel ma mohambombaga etap naloma naoh.
66007003	Anan na'ipam mehip na'i, “Dei' ipe' ina pehambombaga etap noloma naoh moloma lawah maim, owa'. Ata' owa'. Afa' wa'i osaho' epes isima sanda' maol God ape'inai osahe'as uli'. Nambimb andeande' pehambombaga amamaga amama.”
66007004	Ea' ame' esis sa'i esis amam nematawa isima ma'uma'wis ensel anama nasahe'as. Esis nasahe'as ea'i sataga na'ama 144,000. Esis amam nematawa hiesi wambotagw hiami epes Israeli.
66007005	Dei' esis 12,000 epes hiesi esis wambota Judai saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Rubeni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Gati.
66007006	Ea' esis 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Aseri saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Naptali saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Manasei.
66007007	Ea' 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Simeoni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Livai saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Isakari.
66007008	Ea' 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Sebuluni saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Josepi saloma 12,000 epes hiesi wambota Benjamini.
66007009	Amamaga amama hi'alam, ae' ata' atologon wapoti' ati esis amam nematawa hiesi endilisi safi'i sondowa'anima sape. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina niamba epes isima sataga ma'uma'wis, owa'. Esis hias endililsi. Epes isima sape etap kantri hiagoma ea' epes hiesi sape wambotagw hiami ma alop anama naninani, diga hianai naninani, isima hiesi hi'alas. Esis saitu anama God natoma balata king ma naep sipsip noganai. Sala anom luwaguf afitimi laumi, sahapila bagah lagof asasimi.
66007010	Ea' soga sa'i mehip na'ama sa'i, “God ape'inai Anan natoma balata kingi naloma Sipsip noganai, amam biam mofa'apa motanimani ma makwaha waf aonai ape' manda'anai.”
66007011	Ensel amama hiami mandatama hi'alam maitu anama balata kingi ea' agufumi amama 24-peleim maloma amamaga amama biamibiam mape namumi mape mitimalo' mati etap felefele'ma balata kingi manda' lotu mandanifela God.
66007012	Amam ma'iam na'ama ma'i, “Endilisi! Ape' mandanifel endilisi ma God ape'inai mafela agel ananinai lu'una! Anan Dembinai ofagonama howalagon. Anan nomonas hiami bu'wami mapaina ea' ape' manifelona mafela agel ananinai! Anan pepel hiamunai endilisi! Pepel lu'unai napoma Anan! Amama hiami ananimi atom la'ela'ef. Endilisi!”
66007013	Ea' anona amam agufumi amama 24-peleim nahali'i na'i, “Esis isima sala luwaguf afitimi, esis emi egafis? Esis safi'i enima?”
66007014	Ea' agwamana basef a'i, “Dembinai ae'inai, ine' etina negawas.” Ea' Anan na'ipi na'i, “Epes isima fowa' sape etap sofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma lagof esis naumbih. Esis sasa'opa luwaguf asasimi ma esimbel sipsip anama noganai, dei' mataga afitim.
66007015	Ea' saitu balata king Godi natologoma. Owamb alip sanda' opeh ananimi ipat ananinai. Anan nape balata anama kingi, anan atona anona nemaf nope nolomas nili'akwas.
66007016	Esis ina anona nemaf nolomohas wapoti', ina soga'ma embel iap nose'as wapoti', owa'. Owaf ina anona nemaf la'ifina nohas, ea' ina anom nif lu'wami mihihi'as sope, owa'.
66007017	Dei' main, sipsip noganai naitu felefele' endilisi ma balata kingi, anan nope numafias. Anan no'was safe'ma embel amama mataga anona ifata ma sofa' embel amama ambal namunai napaimi. Ea' God anona nemaf nupati'amasa embif hiami naep asasimi ma esis ina ata' selef wapoti', owa'.”
66008001	Ea' sipsip noganai nahape' tep anama nafe'ma 7i nowa' buk anama ea' ina ata' owa' anom amamaga monda'am, owa'. Ea' ina anom basef mataga heven mape mafe' mafe'ma nogota si'i awa tu'waninai, owa'.
66008002	Amama mafe'ma ea', ati ensel amama 7-peleim la'ela'ef maitu naep Godi mofa' biugel anama 7-pelaina nandandam.
66008003	Ea' anona ensel nafi'i naitu felefele'ma balata sondolali ma Goda. Nahapila anona plet gol ama nonda' nogoh alogw bu'wami ma'ami. Esis sase'ana sanda hiami ma nonda' nogoh amama ma anan nokolasom moloma beten amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Ea' nanda' ofa ma God balata anama sanda' gol sanda'anai notawa felefele'ma balata kingi.
66008004	Ea' nogoh maloma sanda amama alogw ma'ami maloma beten esis amam nematawa Godi, amama mandatama etifigin malata ilifa naep Godi.
66008005	Ea' ensel anama nofa' plet anama do'ok sanda amama malami ea' nofa' nifa balata sondolalima Godanai nowalam plet, ea' nakwahom muwai etap. Anan nakwahom ea', otaga holala, anom amamaga mataga manda'am, howalagon nafe' sowambon lu'unai nasol etin nape.
66008006	Ea' ensel amama 7-peleim mahapila biugel anama 7-pelaina mandandombola mufapula biugel anama.
66008007	Ensel nali'i nofapula biugel ananinai ea' ais afitimi si'i otamba pohalami maloma nif maloma esimbel lola'am mataga heven ea' nokolo' ais maloma esimbel mowai etap. Amam mawaloga etap hiagoma naloma lawah hiami mataga wenifigin. Ea' nif fando etap wa'agon ea' biefigin nape. Ea' otalef hiami maluwi amama wapoti' ea' nif fandom hi'alam.
66008008	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma bifi nofapula biugel ananinai, esis sakwaha anom amamaga si'i halaf fandonai nandegia nafe' nowala naoh. Ea' sawala naoh mataga wenifigin ea' wa'am mandamboma mataga esimbel biefigin nape bo'wagon.
66008009	Ea' sawaloga amamaga amama hiami mape naohi ambagof namumi mapaimi sawalogam mataga wenifigin ea' wa'am maga' biam mape bo'om. Ea' sawaloga sip hiami mafe' naohi wapoti' sawalogam mataga wenifim ea' wa'om aom biam mape bo'om.
66008010	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanomi nofapula biugel ananinai, anona ondo'w lu'unai nandegia heven fandona fofol etin si'i nemba'w fandonai nowai etap. Esis sawaloga walembeh hiami maloma embel hiami motah etapi sawalogam mataga wanom ea' ondo'w anama nafe' nowala embel tu'wanim motah wa'ili. Wa'el aom ea' wa'ol biefigin mape bo'om.
66008011	Ondo'w agili'nama anama sa'i, marasin Anama Numbutinai. Ea' sawaloga walembeh embel hiami sawalogam mataga wanom, ea' wa'om mataga si'i marasin numbutinai. Ea' biefigini mape bo'om. Ea' epes hiesi sa' embel amama awami maofa opalef asasimi saga' hi'alas.
66008012	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma biamibiam nufapula biugel ananinai, esis sawaloga aon owambunai alipunai naloma ondowa sawalogam mataga wanom. Ea' sahambombaga wa'om mataga akutim. Ea' nemaf a'ipanama sowalogana wanom. Etifigin akutigin, biefigin howalgon. Ea' owamb tu'wanina na'ama etin si'i alip.
66008013	Ea' ati anona komon lu'unai nufia' nafe' la'afen gani ilif ame'ana na'i mehip na'i, “Uwahipis uwahipis endilisi esis amam nematawa sape etapi ma nimanimi lu'wami wapoti' motagamas. Dei' main, anom ensel wanom ma'i mufapula biugel amamunai ma nambimb nimanimi amama motagamas!”
66009001	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom biami nufapula biugel ananinai, ati anona ondo'w nakwaha heven ilif nowai etap. Ondo'w anama anona ensel. Ea' esis sase'ana ki utainai ma anona hul nagal nowala etap owin. Hul anama owa' nefe' notambili nowala nafe' etin.
66009002	Anan nawisi' uta hul anama ea' nogoh lu'wami mataga si'i nogoh malo nif lu'wami. Ea' nogoh amama malo mase'ala aon ilif, ea' aon alipunai naloma owambunai mataga akutim.
66009003	Ea' anom asagof si'i kwamu'wis lu'wami makwaha nogoh amama mowala etap. Ea' ensel anama nase'am pepel si'i pepel sipiawa mape etapi maha epesi.
66009004	Ea' mofa' basef na'ama ma'i, “Ipe' ina pehambombaga otalef o amamaga mamumami mataga etapi o anom lawah, owa'. Ipe' pehambombagago epes amama atom ikwaf Godi owa' notoma amagah asasimi.”
66009005	Ea' amam amama la'ifima mose'asa nimanimi epes isima mefe' mondahama aomb wanom biam, ea' ina mofa' pepel ma mohas soga', owa'. Ea' mase'asa nimanimi lu'wami endilisi ma epes isima si'i sipiawa maha epes same' nimanimi lu'wami.
66009006	Nemaf anama epes hiesi sogolopa eafa si'i seaga', owa'. Ina sati anona. Ga' nambimb nondafa'mas sofa' nimanimi lu'wami sope la'ela'ef.
66009007	Ae' ati asagof amama si'i hos mandondombol ma'i mopa'. Balagahima mandati si'i hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami sanda' gol sanda'am matoma balagah amamumi. Ea' amagah amamumi si'i naep epesi sanda'am.
66009008	Balagah amamumi auf laomi si'i balagah nematawai. Nalelef amamumi si'i nalelef mafis wandafumi laionim.
66009009	Mafatagw amamumi mala siaogw si'i dunduwif si'i agofum pepel ea' behenagof amamumi manda'am mehip si'i hos mahondo' wilkar lu'unai hianai masagih mafe'ma wandaf.
66009010	Ahagwalef mailam si'i sipiawa ea' nalelef motawama moha hiesi mose'asa nombot aonai sefa' nimanimi lu'wami. Amama mape ahagwalef. Ahagwalef amamumi pepel ma moha epes aomb amama wanom biam.
66009011	Amam anona king amamunai numafiam. King anama anan ensel numafi hul anama nagal nowala gani owin endilisi, nafe' etini. Diga esis Hibrui sa'i agel ensel anama sa'i, Abadon. Diga esis Griki sa'i, Apolion. Ofagema ma'i, “Aman nohambombaga amamaga hiami.”
66009012	Nemaf aonai ma nimanimi lu'wami mali'i hi'alam. Ea' peme'! Nimanimi biefim ata' mapani nambimb motaga migi'.
66009013	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom wanomi nufapula biugel ananinai, ame' anona malogel na'i natagai balata sondolalima Goda sanda' gol sanda'anai da'malifinama to'wan to'wan notawa naep Godi.
66009014	Malogel anama na'ipa ensel anama nufapula biugeli na'ama na'i, “Ensel amama awami biamibiam manda' kalabusa walemb lu'unai Yufretis, ine' nekwaha amam mofo'o.”
66009015	Ea' nakwahom mafe'ma nambimb meamba esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi mowalogas sotaga wenis ea' moha epes hiesi wa'ol soga', biefis sope bo'wes. God nanda' ensel amama mandondombol mape mohafa aua anama ma nemaf anama ma aon anama ma afagel anama atona ma monda' opeh amama.
66009016	Ae' ame' soldia hiami endilisi 200 milian matoma hos amamumi. Ame' seambam mataga hiami endilisi.
66009017	Ape si'i a'oh andondo'ah ati amam matoma hosi. Amam soldia mala siaogw kapaimi atom. Siaogw amama akwahimi alimi kolotuwaimi maloma batafumi. Balagah hosim si'i balagah mafis wandafumi lu'wami laionim. Ea' nif fandom nogoh mataga otamba batafumi salfa fandom mataga malogof amamumi.
66009018	Amam meamba esis amam nematawa hiesi mawalogas sataga wenis ea' maha wa'ol afisa amamaga amama awami wenifim, nif maloma nogoh maloma otam salfa fandumi mataga malogof hosi. Ea' epes hiesi biefis sape bo'wes.
66009019	La'ifimi hosi mape malogof maloma ahagwalef amamumi. Dei' main, ahagwalef amamumi si'i iguf, balagah mandandam. Ea' dei' maha epesa ahagwalef amama amamumi.
66009020	Enis epes hiesi ina afisa amamaga amama awami wenifim, ina samboma opalefa sakwaha waf aonai, owa'. Esis ina sowa' alafugaha amamaga amama sanda'am lagof asasimi, owa'. Esis ina dei' sakwaha waf anama sanda' lotuma ambagof awami maloma god anama baso'omunai sanda' goli siliwa, bras otamba o lawah hiami maim sanda'ami, amamaga amama ina mati o maitu mafi'i, mame' basef, owa'.
66009021	Epes isima saha enis epes saga'i, sanda' ma'akw sanda' ufiali ea' saila waf so'a waolanai, sanda' wali. Ea' esis ina samboma opalefa sowa' alafugaha waf anama aonai, owa'.
66010001	Amama hi'alam, ati anona ensel la'ifinai nisila'i heven. Anan nandambaho' elagw ea' elelina naloma balaga ananinai. Amaga ananinai nafifil howalagon endilisi si'i aon alipunai nalatawi ea' bo'wagah ananimi si'i nif fandom malata ilif.
66010002	Anan nahapila anona buk so'unai lagof ananimi, nandauf na'oh. Anan nawamona bo'waga ananinai da'isinai natoma naoh ea' aonai nahaponana etap wata'ita.
66010003	Ea' nogal na'i mehip endilisi si'i mafin lu'unai laion nanda'am. Nanda'am na'ama ma ea', otaga dilili bugwalag 7-peleif. Ma'i si'i anona malogel na'i.
66010004	Otaga dilili bugwalagw 7-peleif ma'i basef ea', a'i enda' anom basefa amama, ea' ame' anona malogel na'i nataga heven na'i, “Basef amama otaga dilili bugwalagw 7-peleif, amama ine' nembaho'wam mope okom ine'inai atona. Ina nenda'am mil buk, owa'.”
66010005	Ea' ensel anama ali' atolona naitu naoh maloma etap wata'itai anan nasa'ma lagel da'isinai nalata.
66010006	Ea' na'iam endilisi gani ilifa agel Godi nape namunai la'ela'ef hihif. Anan nanda' ilif naloma etap naloma amamaga hiami ambagof mapaimi maloma amama ambagof a'ami mape ilif etapi maloma naoh embel lu'wami maloma amamaga amama hiami mape naoh owin wapoti'. Ea' ensel anama na'i, “Nogota mape mohafanai dei' hi'alana.
66010007	Nemaf anama ensel anama nafe'ma 7i ni'i nufapula biugel ananinai, amamaga amama God nambahe'ami motaga alihim. God felefele' nonda'am endilisi si'i basef fowa' nase'amam amam profet manda' opeh ananimi.”
66010008	Ea' malogel fowa' ame'ana heveni na'ipi wapoti' na'ama na'i, “Ine' fo'o fa'ai buk anama nandauf nape lagel ensel naitu naoh maloma etapi.”
66010009	Ea' afe'ma ensel anama a'ipana a'i, “Ine' se'e buk anama so'unai.” Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ine' fa'ana nea'ana. Anan atuwasi usihina si'i aupimbel malogel ine'inai, ea' opaf ine'inai numbutina.”
66010010	Anan na'iam ea', afela buk anama so'unai lagel enseli agwa'ana. Ea' malogel ae'anai usihina si'i aupimbel hani. Agwa'ana ame' numbutina opaf ae'anai.
66010011	Ea' ame' anom basef sa'ipi sa'i, “Ine' newalapa basef Godi wapoti' ma amamaga nambimb motagama epes amam nematawa alop naninani hianai ma diga anama hianai naninani ma amam king dembemi hiami wapoti'.”
66011001	Ea' esis sase'e ikwaf ae' ma indila'wifa amamaga dende'am etin sa'ipi sa'i, “Ine' hafel nembe' ikwafa ipat lu'unai Godi noloma balata anama sondolalima Goda. Ea' neamba esis amam nematawa sanda' lotu ma Anani sataga ma'wis.
66011002	Ea' ina nenda' endalelemb amama mape ande'ma ipat anama, owa', hapaimi. Dei' main, endalelemb amama esis amam nematawa sololama Godi sofa'am. Ama esis anona nemaf sotaga sohambombaga wambel lu'wagoma Godi bu'unai sope sefe' sondahama aomb 42-peleim, afagof si'imi wanom tu'waninai.
66011003	Ea' nambimb Ae' God esapa'o amam amama biam ae'ami enda'am la'ifim mowalapa basef Ae'ami. Ea' amam nambimb mowaho' begah wa'ami si'i luwaguf awami ea' mi'ipasa basef Ae'ami mofe' mondahama nimeguf 1,260-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.”
66011004	Amam biam si'i lawah oliv biam maloma lamifah biam la'ela'ef motawa naep Dembinai ma etap hiagomai.
66011005	I'i enis epes si'i sonda' amam biam aom, atuwasi nif motaga malogof amamumi fendo esis naumbih amamisi endilisi. Endilisi, emi egafin ni'i neham, waf anama atona enin nega'.
66011006	Amam biam la'fima mosopama otaga ma asaf owa'etina nimeguf hiami mawalapa basef Godi. Amam agel lu'unai ma momboma embel hiami motaga akwahim si'i esimbel ea' mofa' pepel lu'unai ma moha esis amam nematawa etapasi ma amamaga awami mamumami. Maina nemaf amam mi'i monda'am na'ama, amam la'ifima monda'am.
66011007	Amam mowalapa basef Godi hi'ilam, anona mafin lu'unai aonai nokwaha hul anama nagal nowala etini nolatawi ilif. Ea' okom numbutina nopa' nolomam. Ea' noham nofofo'asom ea' afum.
66011008	Ea' alop amamunai no'oh eaf lu'unai taun anama lu'wagoma, ape' ma'iagon basef womun etin ma'i agel Sodom naloma Isip. Anama taun anama etin fowa' esis saha Dembinai amamunai naga' lawag usi'inai tu'wanainai.
66011009	Enis epes alop hianai naninani sape wambel etap hiagomai saloma esis diga hianai naninani, epes hiesi siti alop amam biami la'ela'ef sondahama nimeguf wanom si'ina tu'waninai. Ea' esis ina si'i aho'ma enis epes sowam hi'agilif, owa'.
66011010	Ea' esis amam nematawa etapasi sondanifel ma amam maga' ea' sonda' gwa'aimi sea'am sealemb ea' sandaso'ama amamaga bu'wami maloma alupisi asasisi. Dei' main, profet amama biam mase'asa nimanimi lu'wami amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi.
66011011	Nimeguf si'imi wanom tu'waninai hi'ilam, God nosapa'i ambip Ananimi mofe' muwis nomona amam biam ea' ambal nopaim mohafel mitu. Ea' epes sotolom umbamahas endilisi.
66011012	Ea' mome' anona malogel ni'i notagai heven nofalam mehip na'ama ni'i, “Ipe' bipa letowi na'ae ilif!” Ea' mofe' heven muwis elagw nomon esis naumbih situ sotolom mofe'.
66011013	Nogota anama atona, sowambon lu'unai nokoto' taun anama lu'wagoma tu'wanigin pe'ogon ea' 9-peleigin ata' nope bo'wagon. Ea' esis amam nematawa 7,000-peleis soga' ma sowambon anama. Ea' esis enis amam nematawa seapani esis umbamahas endilisi, sefela agel God nape heveni.
66011014	Amamaga nimanimi lu'wami mafe'ma bifi amama mafe' hi'alam, ea' peme'! Nogota bandana ma nimanimi lu'wami mafe'ma wanomi motaga.
66011015	Ensel anama nafe'ma 7i nufapula biugel ananinai, anom malogof moga ma'i mehip matagai heven na'ama ma'i, “Dembinai ape'inai naloma Krais Amam biam dei' mefa' pepel mataga king dembemi etap anae' hiagoma mumafiagon. Ea' Anan nope king Dembinai la'ela'ef hihif!”
66011016	Ea' amam amama agufumi 24-peleim natoma balata lu'unai amamunai ma naep Godi mape etap mindiwa balagah amamumi mati etap manda' lotu mandanifel ma God
66011017	ma'i, “Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianainai. Fowa' gani endilisi ine' napani, dei' ine' nape. Ine' dei' nefa' pepel hianai ine'inai nape king Dembinai numafi epes saloma amamaga hiami. Ea' afa' wanifelina.
66011018	Esis sololama Godi opalef aom ukup numbutim, ea' dei' okom ine'inai wandafuna nataga ea'. Dei' nemaf ine' newaloga esis saga'i ma sotagama kot. Dei' nemaf ine' nose'asa amamaga bu'wami ma amam profet manda' opeh ine'imi. Dei' ine' nose'asa amamaga bu'wami esis amam nematawa ine'isi saloma isima hiesi sanda' lotuminai sape owina ine', esis agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi wapoti'.
