Dei' nemaf ine' neha epes isima saha epes sape etapi!”
66011019	Amam ma'iam ea' ipat lu'unai Godi nape heven nandawisi' ea' bokis bu'wami amama mi'uli Godi napaimi amama mataga ma'oh alihiguma nomon ipat Ananinai. Ea' otaga holala pelepele', dilili bugwalagw nafe', etap nalemb etin asaf lu'unai ondowa lu'wamunai si'i otamba mambip mowai.
66012001	Ea' anona ikwaf lu'unai nataga heven nape na'ama. Ano'w nemata'w kwape kowaho' aon alipunai alop akwa'unai si'i lowaf. Ea' aon owambunai nape owina bo'wagah akwa'umi. Ea' anona hat awau agufuwai atowa owalo'omi natoma balaga akwa'unai. Ondowa 12-peleiwa wailana.
66012002	Ea' akwa'w opafu'w kwame' nimanimi amama matagama'wa kola awani. Ea' kwawal kwalef kwa'oh mehip.
66012003	Ea' anona ikwaf nataga heven nape na'ama. Anona kwambon lu'unai nape. Anan akwahinai balagah 7-peleim mandandana, wambawa mataganai 10-peleim. Ea' hagw 7-peleim dembemi atom mowalo'ami matoma balagah ananimi.
66012004	Andep kwambuni nambefa wa'am sawaloga ondowa mape ilifi sawalogom mataga wenifim nambefam mowai etap. Ea' dei' biefim mape ilif la'ela'ef. Ea' kwambon anama nafi'i naitu naep nemata'w kwa'i kola awani, naitu nohafa akwa'wa ata' kolani, mehip nogwa'an.
66012005	Ea' nemata'w akwama kola awani aman. Awani inima anona nemaf owagama la'ifina numafi esis amam nematawa hiesi sape kantri hiagoma. Anan la'ifina nohapila bandan sanda' ain sanda'anai nope dembinai numafias. Akwa'w kolan, mehip esis sofa'an safe'ma balata king Godi nape andeande'.
66012006	Ea' kwasagih kwafe' anagon wafiguma fatauguma. Anama God nandondombagona akwa'w. Ama nambimb enis epes sumafia'w sose'akw gwa'aimi akwa'w dahama dahama nimeguf 1,260-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.
66012007	Dei' wandaf lu'unai nataga heven. Ensel dembinai Maikel naloma amam ensel ananimi mapa' maloma kwambon anama lu'unai. Ea' kwambon anama nao'wa amam ensel awami ananimi magwamama wandaf amam mapa' malomam wapoti'.
66012008	Ea' kwambon naloma ensel ananimi amam ina la'ifima muli'amona wandaf, owa'. Dei' amam ina ata' mapani gani heven wapoti', owa'.
66012009	Ea' amam ensel Godi makwahai kwambon anama nisila'i. Kwambon anama fowa' ganinai dei' esis sa'i aman aonai Satan. Anan aman nambaso'ma esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi. Amam makwahai anan nafi'i etap, makwahai ensel awami ananimi wapoti' misila'i malumanai.
66012010	Ea' ame' anona maf na'i mehip nataga heven na'i na'ama na'i, “Dei' God ape'inai nefa'apa mutanimani pepel ananinai nataga nandawalap alihiguma ma nope Dembinai king! Krais, God nandandepana nasapa'ana nafi'i Anan la'ifinai nefa' agel lu'unai ea'. Dei' main, aman anama nambaso'ma alupusi sahin owan ape'isi owamb alip na'ipa God ape'inai na'i esis sanda' waf aonai. Ea' dei' amam ensel Godi makwahona nisila'i ea'.
66012011	Esis alupusi sahin owan ape'isi sofa' pepel ma esimbel sipsip noganai sawalipasa basef ananimi endilisimi. Esis sanda' waf anama. Amama atom dei' silai'ipa wandaf sali'amona naumbih ma amama. Esis ina ukup ma'ima'i endilisi ma sope andeande' etap anae', owa'. Esis ina umbamahasa naumbih sohas soga', owa'.
66012012	Ipe' hipei pape heveni, ipe' pendanifel! Ipe' pape etapi paloma sape naoh embeli, uwahipipa! Dei' main, nimanimi lu'wami ma'i motagamepa. Satan nisila'o ma ipe', anan okom wandafuna endilisi. Dei' main, anan nogawa nogota bandana ma nope nonda' opeh ananimi, felefele' higililana.”
66012013	Amam ensel makwahai kwambon anama lu'unai nisila'i etap dei' nagawa anan nafi'i nape etap nati nemata'w akwama kola awani aman natofa'w.
66012014	Ea' sase'akw behenagof biam lu'wami komonimi akwa'w la'ifikwa kufia' kofe' wambel akwa'unai etap wafiguma fatauguma. Ama ata' kope laogona kwambon anama lu'unai ma esis sumafia'wa gwa'aimi solaga'w kofe' kofe' kotambel afagof wanom tu'waninai.
66012015	Ea' kwambon anama lu'unai nagu'wai embel malogel ananinai. Embel amama mataga si'i anona walemb lu'unai kolo' etin mafe' magi'ma akwa'w. Kwambon anama na'i embel amama mondahago akwa'w kofe' hegilila'w.
66012016	Ea' owa'. Etap nagiambama'w na'ama. Malogel etapi nagal alihina na' embel amama kwambon nagu'ami malogel ananinai hi'alam.
66012017	Ea' anan okom numbutina endilisi ma akwa'w nafe' na'i nonda' wandaf noloma enis batawisa'w akwa'usi, esis amam nematawa isima saila mi'uli hianai Godi sawalapa basef Jisasi sailam.
66012018	Ea' kwambon anama nafi'i naitu naoh akata.
66013001	Ea' ati anona mafin nape aolupi nataga naoh embel. Wambawa mataganai 10-peleim ea' balagah 7-peleim mapaina. Wambawa amama mowalo' hagw dembemi atom mowalo'ami matoma wambawa mandandam. Balagah ananimi sanda' anom agof mail mandandama balagah amama. Agof amama ofagema na'ama. Basef mamumami awami findiwaimi ma God.
66013002	Mafin anama dei' atolona, anan si'i anom mafis lu'wami wandafumi wanom. Anona mafin agel lepat ea' bo'walelef ananimi si'i bo'walelef anona mafin bea, malogel ananinai si'i malogel anona mafin laion. Ea' kwambon anama nanda' mafin aolupunai nataga la'ifina ma pepel lu'unai ananinai. Anan nanda' mafin anama nataga dembinai ma numafi epes hiesi fowa' anan numafiasi.
66013003	Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim anona melet natomana si'i sahana afuna. Ea' balaga anama nambo'wana dei' wafi'igin, ambo'ona wapoti'. Ea' epes hiesi sape etapi sohafel gegelalasis kwapete'asa mafin anama aolupunai owa' afunae, sailona.
66013004	Kwambon anama nase'ana pepel ananinai mafin anama aolupunai. Ea' esis hiesi sanda' lotuma kwambon anama naloma mafin anama aolupunai wapoti' safela agel ananinai sa'i, “Emi nandati na'ama etin si'i mafin aolupunai anama? Owa'etin. Emi la'ifina nepa' nelomana? Owa'etin.”
66013005	Ea' dei' God nape nati mafin anama na'i mehip na'i basef awami findiwama God. Anan la'ifina nape dembinai ma nanda' waf anama nape nogota laona aomb amama 42-peleim, afagof wanom tu'waninai.
66013006	Malogel ananinai noga na'i basef awami nanda' findiwama God. Anan nanda' agel Godi findiwana wambel Godi naloma wambota anama ananisi sape heveni.
66013007	Ea' God ata' nape nati anan ata' nape la'ifina nefela wandaf nopa' noloma esis amam nematawa Godi ea' naitu nanda' wandaf nahagofas. Anan nofa' pepel ma kwambon anama ea' la'ifina ma nope dembinai la'ifinai ma esis epes hiesi sa'i diga anama hianai ma etap anama wambel hiagoma, alop naninani.
66013008	Anona buk ambal namunai napainai na'oh. Esis sanda' agof epes Godi etis mape buk anama ma nogota anama fowa' gani God nanda' etap anae'. Buk anama sipsip anama noganai fowa' esis sahana naga'. Amam nematawa hiesi etapasi agof asasimi owa' mope buk anama, epes isima hiesi sanda' lotuma mafin anama.
66013009	Ipe' epes aligah magalipei, ipe' peme' basef amama na'ama.
66013010	I'i esis si'i sonda' enin epen nefe' nenda' kalabus, enin nefe' nenda' kalabus. I'i esis si'i soha enin epen noga'ma bainat, enin noga' ma bainat. Endilisi waf anama nimaninai atona anona nemaf notaga. Ipe' amam nematawa Godi pepe la'ifipa pembale'efa God la'ifipa andeande'.
66013011	Ea' ati anona mafin aolupunai wapoti' nohafel nawisi etap owin nalatawi ilif. Wambawa biam matagana si'i wambawa mataga sipsip nogami, ea' basefa diga ananinai si'i malogel diga anona kwambon lu'unai.
66013012	Mafin anama naitu aolupi na'i nafe'ma bifi nefa' pepel ma mafin anama nali'i ma numafi epes hiesi. Ea' nanda' opeh la'ifimi ma naep mafin anama nali'i. Anan nanda' opeh la'ifimi endilisi ma nonda' esis amam nematawa sape etapi sonda' lotuma mafin anama nali'i, fowa' sahana sa'i nombo'ma noga' dei' wafi'ina ea'.
66013013	Mafin anama nagi'i, anan nanda' pepel lu'unai naninani. Pepel anama lu'unai na'ama. Naep esis amam nematawai, nanda' nif makwaha heven misila'i etap anae'.
66013014	God ata' nape nati anan nanda' pepel anama naninani ma naep mafin anama nali'i. Ea' anan nagi'i nanda' waf anama ma nahambombaga esis amam nematawa etapasi. Na'ipas mehip na'ama na'i, “Ipe' pendomba ambala mafin anama nali'i nil anona lawag maina ma pefela agel ananinai lu'una. Mafin anama nali'i ma'una anama fowa' bainat nahana ata' nape namunai la'ela'ef.”
66013015	God nape nati mafin anama nagi'i na'i aho'ma anan nase'ana ambal ambagof mapaimi ma ambal anama mafin aolupunai sanda' lawag sanda'anai. Ea' ambal anama noga na'i basef ea' la'ifina ma noha epes sandaiwa'ma sonda' lotuma anani soga'.
66013016	Ea' mafin anama nagi'i la'ifina nasasapa' epes isima hiesi sonda' anona ikwaf nepe atona etin esis lagof da'isimi o amagah asasimi. Ikwaf epes isima agufisi soloma epes agof a'asi soloma isima otamba hiamisi soloma isima wafisi. Ea' enis agof a'asi sanda' maola enis epes soloma enis agufisi wapoti'.
66013017	Ea' epes hiesi sofa' ikwaf anama ma agel mafin anama nape aolupi. Ea' enis sofa' anona namba ma mafin anama agilinama. I'i emi egafis owa' sefa' ikwaf anama, esis ina nambimb sotala amamaga epesi, ea' esis wapoti' ina nambimb sotala amamaga asasimi, owa'.
66013018	Ape' ukup mope la'ifim andeande'ma amama. Emi egafis segawa, esis seamba namba mafin anama aolupunai andeande'. Namba anama basef womun etina anona aman. Namba anama 666.
66014001	Ae' atologon wapoti' ati sipsip anama noganai naitu halaf Saion ea' amam nematawa hiesi endilisi 144,000-peleis saitu salomana. Agel sipsip noganai naloma agel ahalomana ananinai agof amama mail amagah asasimi.
66014002	Ea' ame' anom amamaaga manda'am mafi'i gani heven si'i embel mowa kululu' etin mafe', si'i otaga dililuwala mehip. Ae' ame' maf anama si'i epes saha gita naloma musik manda'am.
66014003	Esis sanda' anona awaf dambainai ma anama balata lu'unai Godi notawa natologoma, ma naep amamaga biamibiam mape namumi maloma naep agufumi 24-peleim. Amam nematawa isima hiesi endilisi 144,000-peleis, God natalis la'afena epes hiesi etapasi, amama atom la'ifisa sogawa awaf anama. Ina enis epes wapoti' la'ifisa sogawana, owa'.
66014004	Epes isima sape bo'wes endilisi. Amam ina manda' waf aonai maloma nematawa, owa'. Mape bo'om. Wambel anama sipsip noganai na'i neafe'ma, esis sagi'mana same' basef ananimi sanda' maol ananinai. God natalis la'afena esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi sape sali'i si'i ofa bu'unai nali'i God naloma sipsip noganai mofa'anai.
66014005	Esis ina sanda' anom basef kwamaimi baso'maimi, owa'. Esis basef ofagema ma waf aonai a'as.
66014006	Ae' ati anona ensel nufia' nafe' gani ilif. Nofa'ai basef bu'wami Godi mape la'ela'efi nanda' opeh amama ma na'ipasa basef amama esis amam nematawa hiesi sape etapi. Nawalapama epes hiesi sape kantri hiagoma gani etap hiagoma sa'i diga naninani ma alop naninani hianai.
66014007	Anan noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Nogota nataga ea' ma God nowaloga epes hiesi ma kot. Ipe' umbamehepa ma Anan pila basef ananimi, pefela agel ananinai. Ipe' penda' lotuma God, Anan nanda' heven naloma etap naloma naoh embel maloma embel amama hiami mataga etap owini.”
66014008	Anona ensel nagi'mai ensel anama nali'i nafi'i na'i anom basef na'i, “Wambel lu'unai Babilon anama aona ea'! Anan awagon ea'! Epes sape wambel anama sanda' esis amam nematawa hiesi ma saila waf anama sanda' so'a waolanai. Waf asasinai aona si'i wain la'ifinai nanda' epes ukup mase'as. Wambel anama Babilon nase'as embel wainim amama epes hiesi wambel hiagoma sagwa'ami.”
66014009	Ea' anona ensel nagi'ma amam biam nafi'i. Ensel anama nafe'ma wanomi noga na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Emi egafis sonda' lotu ma mafin anama nape aolupi ma ambal ananinai sandombanai ma nefa' ikwaf anama amaga lagof asasimi,
66014010	esis nambimb sope si'i sogwa' anona wain. Wain anama basef womun etina okom wandafunai Godi. God ina nati uwahipis, owa'. Anan okom wandafunai lu'una endilisi. Anan anona nemaf nese'as okom wandafunai epes isima ma nogwa waf aonai esis sanda'anai. Ama epes isima sofa' nimanimi lu'wami ma nif fandumi mahihi'asi ma otamba agel salfa nifimi ma naep amam ensel bu'wami Godi moloma naep sipsip noganai.
66014011	Nogoh mataga nif amama mase'asa nimanimi epes isima sanda' lotuma mafin anama aolupunai naloma ambal anama ananinai. Epes isima ina anona nemaf sopoma noma'w owamb alip, owa'. Nogoh amama molomolata ilif la'ela'ef mopani.”
66014012	Nemaf anama nimanimi amama motaga, enis amam nematawa Godi situ la'ifis. Esis amam nematawa isima saila mi'uli Godi ma sombale'efa Jisas la'ifis andeande'.
66014013	Ea' ame' anona malogel na'i nafi'i heven na'i, “Ine' da'a anom basef na'ama. Esis amam nematawa sombale'efa Dembinai saga'i, dei' nimeguf hiami anona nemaf owagama wapoti' sondanifel!” Ambal Bu'unai Godi wapoti' na'i, “Esis anona nemaf sokwaha opeh lu'wami amama esis sanda'ami sopoma noma'w. Esis ina sope etin, owa'. God nambimb niti waf bu'unai esis sanda'anai ea' nogwamasa anom amamaga bu'wami esis. Waf bu'unai esis sanda'anai anona nemaf nondawalap alihina.”
66014014	Atologon wapoti', ati otaga atotona afitinai nape ea' anona epen ambal napainai nape otaga anama. Enin si'i anona dembinai nataga epen endilisinai. Anan nowalo' hat bu'unai nafifili si'i gol balaga ananinai nahapila anona nogwatop hi'alina endilisi lagel ananinai.
66014015	Ea' anona ensel nape ipat lu'unai Godi nomon nawisi ande' nofala aman anama natoma otagai mehip na'i, “Ine' topa' gwa'aimi amama maufi ma nogwatop anama ine'inai! Dei' main, gwa'aimi hiami etapami maof ea'. Amama atom dei' nogota anae' pela' gwa'aimianai.”
66014016	Ea' aman anama nape otagai nahapila nogwatop ananinai nakwahona etap, natopa' gwa'aimi maufi etap anae'.
66014017	Ea' anona ensel wapoti' nawisi ande' ma ipat anama lu'unai Godi nape heven. Anan wapoti' nahapila nogwatop hi'alinai endilisi.
66014018	Ea' anona ensel wapoti' nakwaha balata anama sondolalima Goda nafi'i. Ensel anama la'ifinai ma numafi nifi. Nofala ensel anama nahapila nogwatopi nofalona mehip na'ama na'i, “Ine' fa'ai nogwatop anama ine'inai hi'alina endilisi, netopa' su'utip gwa'aimi maufi mail mandelef waini etap nekolasom mo'oh! Dei' main, gwa'aimi amama hiami maof ea'!”
66014019	Ea' ensel anama nahapila nogwatop ananinai nakwahona etap, natopa' gwa'aimi su'utip akumi mail mandelef waini natamam motawa. Ea' nafela gwa'aimi amama nakwahom mowala otam tang lu'unai nomona safo'asom wain embel. Amama mondola'wifa okom wandafunai Godi ma epes isima sosambala basef Ananimi.
66014020	Ea' safo'asom waina otam tang anama lu'unai nape ande'ma taun anama wambel lu'unai. Esimbel maluwi tang ande' kolo' etin mafe' laogon si'i 300 kilomita si'i walemb embel mafi'i matef mataga ilif motambel ain nape malogof hosi.
66015001	Ati anom amamaga laifimi matagai heven ea' okom natanea ma amama. Ati ensel 7-peleim mape ea' amam mahapila amamaga awami endilisi mandandama epes. I'i anona nemaf amamaga amama awami hi'ilam, ina ata' anom motaga wapoti', owa'. Dei' main, amamaga amama awami 7-peleim, amama okom wandafunai Godi ea' hi'ilana endilisi.
66015002	Ea' ati anom amamaga si'i naoh embel lu'wami mandati si'i glas amama sanda'am maloma nif. Epes isima saitu la'ifis sali'amona wandafa waf aonai sahagofa mafin anama lu'unai nape aolupi naloma ambal ananinai maloma ikwaf ananinai 666, esis saitu naoh amama da'malifima si'i glas. God nase'as anom musik si'i gita sahapilam.
66015003	Esis sanda' awaf Moses nanda'mana opeh Godi naloma awaf sipsip noganai. Awaf anama na'ama. “Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianainai. Opeh hiami ine' nanda'ami, amama la'ifimi ea' afa' watolom ukup matameamam hiahiam! Ine' king numafi epes hiesi ea' waf ine'inai bo'ona endilisinai hi'alana!
66015004	Dembinai, ine' etina nape bo'wena. Dei' emi egafis owa' umbamahasa ine'? Owa'etin. Hiesi umbamahasa ine' sanda' lotu ma ine' etina. Emi egafis owa' sefela agel ine'inai? Owa'etin. Epes wambotagw hiami ma etap hiagoma anona nemaf sifi'i sonda' lotu ma ine' etina. Dei' main, waf bu'unai ine'inai nataga alihiguma nandawalap.”
66015005	Amama mafe'ma ea', atologon wapoti' ati ipat bu'unai Godi notawa gani heven. Ipat anama nagal alihina ati nomon ipat anama nape sanda' sel sanda'anai God napeinai.
66015006	Ea' ensel amama 7-peleim mahapila amamaga awami endilisi mandandam nohambamboga epes, makwaha ipat anama mawisi ande'. Ea' mowaho' luwaguf afitimi bu'wami endilisi howalagon mafifil endilisi. Mowaho' legw si'i goli managam mefetagw amamumi.
66015007	Ea' anona la'afena amam biamibiam mape namumi nase'ama dis lu'wami 7-peleim sanda' gol sanda'ami mandandama amam ensel atona etin. God nape namunai la'ela'ef okom wandafunai ananinai nape si'inama dis amama 7-peleim.
66015008	Ea' nogoh amama mataga mafifili ma pepel Godi, amama si'ima ipat anama Godi. Ea' ina enin epen la'ifina nefe' nuwis ipat anama nomon, owa'. Esis sape sohafa ensel 7-peleim monda' opeh hi'ilam amamaga amama awami mahapilam mandandami ata' mili'.
66016001	Ame' anona malogel na'i natagai mehip ipat lu'unai Godi nomon. Malogel anama na'i nofala ensel amama 7-peleim na'i, “Ipe' pefe' pekolo'wa dis amama 7-peleim okom wandafunai Godi napaimi ma kolo'olam mofe' etap.”
66016002	Ea' ensel nali'i anama nafe' nakolo'wa dis amama ananimi mafe' etap ea' maselis mamumami lu'wami endilisi mataga etap epes isima ikwaf anama mafin aolupunai nailas ma epes isima sanda' lotuma ambal ananinai.
66016003	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma bifi wapoti' nafe' nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel naoh lu'wami. Ea' naoh amama mandamboma mataga si'i esimbela epes hiesi saga'i. Ea' amamaga mape nomon naohi maga' hi'alam.
66016004	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wenifi nakolo'wa dis ananimi embel walemb lu'wami maloma anama embel motah mahagofowa. Embel amama hiami mandamboma mataga esimbel.
66016005	Ea' ame' ensel anama numafi embel naohi walemb hiami na'i, “Ine' bu'winai endilisi, nanda' kot ine'inai andeande' naila ikwaf bu'unai atona nawaloga esis sanda' waf aonai.
66016006	Dei' main, esis amam nematawa hiesi saha amam nematawa bu'wasi Godi ine'isi afis saloma profet ine'imi wapoti' ea' esimbel asasimi malo. Ea' dei' nase'asa esimbel epes isima sanda' waf aonai ma sogwa' embel. Ine' nagwamasam mandahama waf aonai esis sanda'anai.”
66016007	Ea' ame' anona maf nataga balata anama sondolalima Godanai noga na'i, “Endilisi Dembinai, ine' God pepel hianai napainai. Ine' nowaloga epes ma kot ea' kot ine'inai endilisi bu'unai hi'alana.”
66016008	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma biamibiami nakolo'wa dis ananimi ma aon alipunai ea' God nape nati owaf naofa epes nif.
66016009	Nif amama lu'wami nigisigeim endilisi ma epes isima. Ea' sa'i basef findiwaimi awami ma God numafi amamaga amama awami. Esis ina samboma opalefa sakwaha waf aonai esis sanda'anai ma sefela agel Ananinai, owa'.
66016010	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom biami nakolo'wa dis ananimi balata kingi lu'unai anama mafin aolupunai. Ea' owamb lu'unai nataga anama mafin aolupunai nahopogoma. Ea' esis sail waf ananinai sofa' nimanimi lu'wami. Ea' sogwa afegah asasimi nalelef tilili talala' sondola'wifa sofa' nimanimi lu'wami.
66016011	Esis ukup mapoma nimanimi maloma maselis asasimi, dei' sa'i basef awami findiwaimi ma God nape heveni. Ina samboma opalef sowa' alafugaha waf anama aonai esis sanda'anai, owa'.
66016012	Ea' ensel anama nafe'ma wanom wanomi nakolo'wa dis ananimi walemb lu'unai Yufretis. Ea' walemb embel mafa' hi'alama mondondomba eaf amam king dembemi mufi'i anama aon natefima.
66016013	Ea' ati ambagof awami wanom mandati si'i kwahowa lu'wami matagai malogel kwambon anama lu'unai naloma malogel mafin anama aolupunai naloma malogel profet anama nambaso'ami.
66016014	Ambagof amama awami endilisi manda' ikwaf pepel naninani ma esis sotolona sogawana. Amam mafe'ma amam king dembemi mumafi epes hiesi sape wambel hiagomai. Amam ma'i mokolasa amam atogon monda' wandaf nemaf anama lu'unai ma God pepel hianai napainai.
66016015	“Peme'! Anona nemaf ae' etagamepa si'i sanda' wali safi'i sataga. Atagamepa anona nemaf ipe' owa' pegawa pi'i ae' iefi'ianai. I'i epes ukup matamea sope sowaho' luwaguf asasimi andeande'ma owa' so'oh, esis ina sofe' alop atona wahifina solomas siti alop asasinai ambagof aom, owa'. Isima sondanifel.”
66016016	Ea' ambagof awami makolasa king hiami anagon etap tu'wanina diga Hibrui sa'i Armagedon.
66016017	Ensel anama nafe'ma 7i nakolo'wa dis ananimi ea' uf nofa'am. Ea' anona malogel na'i natagai balata king lu'unai nomon ipat lu'unai Godi na'i mehip na'i, “Amama dei' ea' hi'alam!”
66016018	Ea' otaga holala nafe', pelele'ala nafe' ea' otaga dililu bugwalagw, sowambon lu'unai nakoto'. Sowambon anama anan lu'unai endilisi ma nimeguf hiami epes sape etapi ina same' anona sowambon nakoto' lu'una fowa' si'i anama, owa'.
66016019	Taun anama wambel lu'unai nandawal wenifigin. Ea' wambel hiagoma etap hiagoma kantri awagon hi'alagon. Ea' God okom napoma epes sanda' waf aonai sape taun anama lu'wagoma Babilon, dei' okom ananinai wandafuna nanda' esis sa' embela kap wain nalami nahas kwapete'as. Wain anama womun etina okom wandafunai Godi.
66016020	Ea' ailan hianai nafa' nafe' higilalana hi'alana ea' ina ata' anona halaf atotona nape, owa'.
66016021	Ea' asaf ondowa lu'wamunai si'i otamba ais afitimi mowai mahas. Asaf ondowa lu'wamunai nimanimi endilisi si'i beg kopi lu'unai atona etin. Ea' sa'ipana awagon God ma asaf ondowa lu'wamunai mowai maha esis.
66017001	Anona ensel atotona la'afena amam ensel 7-peleim mahapila dis amama 7-peleim nafi'i na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Ine' fi'i! Nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli kwatoma embel lu'wami ilif anona nemaf kofa' nimanimi lu'wami akwa'umi. Ae' a'i ihi'ambena amama.
66017002	Amam dembemi king etapami manda' waf hianai aonai so'a waolanai maloma nemata'w akwama. Ea' epes etapasi hiesi wapoti' sanda' waf so'a waolanai saloma'w. Ea' sataga sahaga sagaol si'i epes sa' embel wainim la'ifimi ukup mahaga magaol.”
66017003	Ambal Bu'unai Godi nataga la'ifina ma ae' ame' si'i na'oh nandondo'oh. Ensel anama nofa'e afe' etap wafiguma fatauguma. Anama ati ano'w nemata'w kwatoma anona mafin ilif nape aolupi akwahinai. Mafin anama agof hiami mail alop ananinai hi'alana. Agof amama basef awami findiwaimi hiami mamumami ma God. Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim mandandana wambawa 10-peleim matagana.
66017004	Nemata'w akwama kwala luwaguf akwahimi biam ina mandati na'ama etin, ea' sosaf naninani gol maloma sosaf esis sanda' otamba sanda'anai naloma ombahigis salatamam otamba lu'wami. Akwa'w kwahapila kap gol lagel akwa'unai. Waf hianai aonai nape kap anama nomoni anama. Waf naninani aonai hi'epina endilisi ma naep Godi, waf naninani aonai endilisi ma waf anama so'a waolanai ma nemata'w akwama kwaloma amamaga amama hiami awami mape si'ima kap anama.
66017005	Ea' amef akwa'umi ma agel akwa'unai nail amaga akwa'unai. Agel anama basef mandambahi'i ma'i na'ama ma'i, “Taun lu'wagoma Babilon, anama nondofala mama'wawa nematawa hiawai wanda' so'a wauli ma waf hianai aonai endilisi ma etap anae'.”
66017006	Nemata'w akwama kwaha esis amam nematawa Godi sembale'efa Jisasi sawalapa agel ananinai saga'. Ea' ati akwa'w kwa' esimbel asasimi kwataga kwahaga kwagaol. Ati akwa'w gegelalasowe kwapete'e endilisi okom natanea hiahian.
66017007	Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Dei' maina ine' gegelalasina kwapete'ena? Na'ama owa'. Atuwasi ihi'ambena basef ofagema mape mandambaho'ma nemata'w akwama kwaloma mafin anama nofa'akwi. Mafin anama balagah 7-peleim mapainai ea' wambawa 10-peleim mataganai.
66017008	Mafin anama nape aolupi, ine' natolona ea'. Fowa' anan nape, dei' ina ata' nape, owa'. Anona nemaf nokwaha hul anama nowala owa' notambili nolatowi ilif ea' nefe' higililana owa'etin. Enis epes etapasi God ina nanda' agof asasimi mape buk ambal namunai ma nemaf anama fowa' dambadamba anan nanda' etap, owa'. Amam nematawa isima anona nemaf siti mafin anama nape aolupi gegelelesis kwapete'as. Dei' main, fowa' anan nape, dei' owa', anona nemaf, anan notaga wapoti'.
66017009	Epen emi okom bu'unai napainai, enin nogawa amamaga amama andeande'. Balagah amama 7-peleim basef womun etina halafutagw 7-peleim nemata'w akwama kwatomam.
66017010	Ea' balagah amama 7-peleim womun etina anom king dembemi 7-peleim wapoti'. Wanom biam ea' maga', anona dei' nape dembinai numafi amamaga. Ea' anona ina dei' nataga dembinai king, ata' owa'. Anona nemaf notaga, anan atona ata' nope dembinai nogota bandata.
66017011	Mafin anama nape aolupi fowa' napani, dei' owa' nopani, anama si'i king dembinai anama nafe'ma 8i. Anan amam wambota atotona naloma king amama 7-peleim ama anona nemaf higiligalana.
66017012	Ea' wambawa amama 10-peleim ine' natolom ea'i, amama basef womun etina anom king dembemi 10-peleim. Ina dei' mataga king dembemi, ata' owa'. Ea' amam anona nemaf mofa' pepel moloma mafin anama nape aolupi, motaga king mope dembemi nogota bandata si'i awa atotona.
66017013	Amam king amama ma'i basef mandame'mama ukup etifim ma'i anona nemaf moso' pepel amama amamunai hi'ilana mafin anama nape aolupi ma mome' basef ananimi.
66017014	Anona nemaf mopa' moloma sipsip noganai. Ea' sipsip noganai nikila'am. Epes saila fala ananinai naloma basef ananimi andeande', isima nandandepas ananisi etis, epes isima anona nemaf la'ifisa solomana sigikila' wandaf anama.”
66017015	Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' natolom embel amama lu'wami nemata'w kwanda' so'a wauli kwatomami. Embel amama basef womun etina esis amam nematawa hiesi epes afa'isi sandatama etifigin sape ea' esis amam nematawa hiesi alop naninani saloma diga hianai naninani hi'alas.
66017016	Ea' wambawa amama 10-peleim ine' natulumi, amama moloma mafin anama ukup amamumi wandafuma nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli. Anona nemaf mofa' amamaga hiahaom maim akwa'umi ma akwa'w ato'w kope etin alupusi a'akw. Ea' mowalima'w luwaguf akwa'umi moha'w koga' mea' ambegw akwa'umi mofa' alop akwa'unai nif fendona hi'ilana.
66017017	Dei' main, God atona nafela ukup amamumi ma monda' amamaga amama motaga. Fowa' anan na'iam na'i, Anona nemaf amam ukup etifim ea' pepel anama mape dembemi kingi mose'anana hi'ilana nofe'ma mafin anama nape aolupi. Ea' monda'am na'ama etin mefe' motagama nemaf anama God nanda'am mandahama amamaga amama Anan nali' na'iam.
66017018	Nemata'w akwama ine' natolo'wi, akwama basef womun etina taun anama wambel lu'unai nape si'i dembinai nape nali'ma amam king ma etap anama hiagoma.”
66018001	Amama mafe'ma ea', ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anan pepel napainai endilisi, sosaf ananinai howalagon nanda' etap hiagoma mafifil howalagon.
66018002	Anan noga na'i mehip endilisi na'i, “Nemata'w akwama ao'w hi'alakw. Akwa'w basef womun etina wambel lu'unai Babilon agel lu'unainai awagon hi'alagon! Dei' nataga wambel aonai ma ambagof awami maloma amiguf awami mapaigon.
66018003	Dei' main, fowa' esis wambel anama sa'ipa amam nematawa hiesi sasasapa'as sa' wain asasinai numbutinai. Wain anama basef womun etina waf hianai aonai so'a waolanai esis sandanai. Ea' amam dembemi king etapami hiami wapoti' manda' waf anama so'a waolanai maloma esis wambel anama. Ea' epes etapasi sanda' bisnis sofa' otamba hiami ma waf naninani aonai esis wambelisi sanda'anai.”
66018004	Ea' ame' anona malogel na'i natagai heven na'i, “Ipe' amam nematawa ae'ipei, kwaha wambel anama piwisi ande'. Na'ama ipe' nambimb pendao'oma peloma wambel anama pefa' nimanimi lu'wami ma waf aonai esis sanda'anai.
66018005	Waf anama aonai lu'una endilisi si'i mahanip notawa ilif nalata gani heven. Ea' God okom napoma waf anama.
66018006	Ipe' pegawa waf anama nemata'w akwama kwanda' so'a wauli kwanda'anai. Ipe' pegwa waf akwa'unai dende'ana endilisi piwapanima'w waf wamanai wapoti'. Akwa'w kwakolefa waf aonai kwanda'anai nataga endilisi. Ea' pekolefa nimanimi lu'wami hiami mikila' waf akwa'inai ma pegwam mafe'ma akwa'w. Akwa'w kwamboma embel la'ifimi mala kap anama. Ea' na'ama etin ipe' awi pekolefa embel la'ifimi pese'akwam akwa'w kwea'ama kome' nimanimi awami mogwam mofe'ma akwa'w mondogwama.
66018007	Nemata'w akwama kwafela agel akwa'unai atona kwanda' waf hianai naninani ma kope andeande'. Ea' ipe' pese'akw nimanimi hiami akwa'w mondahama aligah mase'akw. Ea' penda' akwa'w konda' kwelef etin. Akwa'w okom na'i na'ama kwa'i, ‘Ae' ataga ape kwin dembiwei. Ae' ina si'i alifiwei, owa'. Nimanimi ina nambimb motagame ma elef, owa'.’
66018008	Ea' amamaga mamumami awami endilisi nambimb motagama wambel anama anona nemaf atotona. Awes lu'unai hianai notaga ea' epes hiesi nambimb selef kwapete' nolomeahas lu'unai notagamas. Ea' nif motaga fendo wambel anama Babilon hi'ilagon. Dei' main, Dembinai God nawaloga wambel anama nagwamasa nimanimi lu'wami esis. Anan pepel lu'unainai la'ifinai endilisi.
66018009	Amam king etapami manda' waf so'a waolanai aonai maloma akwa'w ea' manda' waf hianai aonai maloma'w. Nambimb amam king amama miti akwa'w feando'wa nogoh lu'wami motaga'w ea' melef kwapete'.
66018010	Anona nemaf amam umbamoham kwapete' endilisi ma nimanimi amama akwa'w kofa'ami. Ea' mitu laogona akwa'w mi'iam mi'i, ‘Owahipipa owahipipa endilisi ma wambel Babilon! Ipe' taun wambel la'ifinai! Nogota bandana atona si'i aua atotona mehip ipe' pefa' nimanimi amama ma waf aonai ipe' panda'anai!’
66018011	Ea' epes sape sanda' opeh bisnis etapi ukup mopoma wambel anama ea' solopagon sope opalef nimanimagon sope. Dei' main, ina nambimb enin epen netala hiahaom ananimi wapoti', owa'etin.
66018012	Hiahaom maim amama, gol bu'wami satalom otamba hiami siliwa maloma anom otamba bu'wami, ombahigis bu'wami malatamam endilisi, luwaguf bu'wami akwahimi mamumami maloma anom luwaguf silk sahapilam gogwafim maloma lawah amama amamaga alogw bu'wami ma'ami maloma amamaga hiami esis sanda' nalelef elefanim sanda'ami, amamaga amama hiami sanda' lawah satalom otamba lu'wami sanda'ami maloma amamaga sanda' bras howalagon bu'wami sanda'ami maloma amamaga sanda' ain sanda'ami maloma anom amamaga sanda' otamba bu'wami sanda'ami.
66018013	Ea' hiahaom na'ama. Lawah nembawa sagwa'ami agilima sinamon maloma paura nogoh alogw bu'womumi maloma gris sa'i mer maloma sanda amama bu'wami frankinsens maloma wain naloma wel sanda' su'utip oliv sanda'ami maloma plaua maloma wit maloma bulmakau, sipsip, hos maloma karis si'i wilkar maloma epes wapoti'. Epes isima agof a'asi sanda' maol etini sape owina enis epes. Epes isima anom dembemi ma'i esis ina epes bu'wasi. Ea' maso'asas sotalis si'i satal hiahaom maim. Amamaga amama hiami esis ina nambimb satalom wapoti', owa'.
66018014	Epes sanda' maol bisnis si'ipas na'ama si'i, ‘Gwa'aimi amama opalef ipe'imi mohafema pefa'ami, amama hiami makwaha ipe' mafe' ea'. Amamaga hiami bu'wami atom, otamba maim lu'wami atom maloma sosaf maim ipe'imi amamaga hiami amama makwahipa mafe'. Ama ipe' ina piti amama mope wapoti', owa'.’
66018015	Ea' epes isima sanda' bisnisa amamaga amama ma sofa' otamba hiami wambel anama esis umbamohas endilisi ma nemanimi awami wambel anama sofa'ami. Esis situ laogona anama opalef nimanim selef sope.
66018016	Ea' si'i, ‘Owahipigin, owahipigin endilisi wambel anama lu'unai Baibilon! Fowa' epes sape wambel anama sala luwaguf sosaf bu'unai atona afitimi maloma luwaguf akwahimi mamumami sofalo'ma alop asasinai ma gol maloma otamba bu'wami maloma ombahigis bu'wami salatamam endilisi.
66018017	Nogota bandana atona amamaga amama hiami otamba maloma sosaf maim amama ea' aom hi'alam.’ Ea' kepten hiami mumafi sip, maloma epes hiesi satala sip sofe' anona wambel, saloma epes isima hiesi sanda' boskru ma sipi, saloma epes hiesi sanda' maol bisnisa naoh embeli, epes isima hiesi situ laogona wambel anama.
66018018	Nemaf anama situ siti akwa'w wambel anama fendona nogoh molo, ea' si'i mehip na'ama si'i, ‘Wambel lu'unai enima nape nandati na'ama etin si'i wambel anama? Owa'etin.’
66018019	Ea' esis sela walombuf balagah asasimi sondahomagon selef mehip opalef aoma wambel anama awagon. Ea' si'i, ‘Owahipigin, owahipigin endilisi ma wambel anama lu'unai! Ama amam hiami mumafi sipi maloma amam matala sip mafe' naoh embeli amam mefa' otamba hiami endilisi ma otamba hiami wambel anama. Owahipigin endilisi. Ama nogota bandana atona awagon hi'ilagon!’
66018020	Ipe' pape heven ilifi peloma ipe' amam nematawa Godi paloma ipe' aposel paloma ipe' profet, ipe' hipei pendanifel ma amamaga amama dei' matagama wambel lu'unai anama. Dei' main, God nawaloga wambel anama lu'unai ea' nagwa nimanimi lu'wami ma anama. Anan nagwa waf anama aonai esis sape wambel anama Babilon sanda'anai.”
66018021	Basef amama hi'alam, ati anona ensel la'ifinai nafela anona owap lu'unai si'i owap lu'unai soka'isa witanai. Anan nafela owap anama nakwahona nafe' nowala embel naoh. Ea' na'i, “Ea' na'ama etin anona nemaf esis sefela wambel anama lu'unai Babilon sokwahogon mehip notaga awagon nefe' nowa si'i owap anama nowala naoh ama epes ina sotologon wapoti', owa'etin.
66018022	Ea' gita anama ape' mofala musik anama hianai naninani moloma batagwi alelef, maguf anama ina anona nemaf ata' peme'am wapoti' wambel anama, owa'. Ea' epes isima gawaisi sanda' opeh mamumami, ipe' ina anona nemaf piti epes isima sope wambel anama wapoti', owa'. Maf owap anama lu'unai noka'isa olelemb witi, anona nemaf ina ata' some' anona wapoti' wambel anama, owa'.
66018023	Elelowa lamifah ina anona nemaf ata' mififil mope wambel anama wapoti', owa'. Ea' malogel aman anama na'i neaso' nemata'wi o malogel nemata'wi kwa'i kweaso' amani, ipe' ina anona nemaf ata' peme' esis wambel anama wapoti', owa'. Fowa' epes wambel anama sape sanda' bisnis sape dambesi etapasi. Ea' esis wambel anama sambaso'ma epes hiesi ma aop ufial baso'omunai naninani sanda'ami.
66018024	God nati wambel lu'unai anama naha profet hiami maga' maloma amam nematawa hiesi Godi. Amama atom dei' ofagema mapoma wambel anama. Ea' epes hiesi sape etap anae' esis naumbih sahas saga'i, ofagema amama wapoti' mapoma anama atogon.”
66019001	Amama mafe'ma ea', ame' anom amamaga mame' si'i mif lu'wami esis amam nematawa hiesi sape heven ilifi. Esis sa'i na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una! God ape'inei atona nefa' ape' motanimani. Anan agel lu'unainai, pepel lu'unainai, nafifili napeinai.
66019002	Basef lu'wami ma kot, anan nawaloga epesa waf endilisinai bu'unai andeande' hi'alas. Nemata'w akwama dembe'wi kwanda' so'a wauli kwasapala esis amam nematawa hiesi etapasi ma sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai saloma'w. Ea' God nanda'makwa basef. Akwa'w kwaha esis sanda'mana maol Godi saga'. Ea' dei' God nagwama'wa ofagema amama akwa'umi mafe'ma akwa'w.”
66019003	Ea' esis sakolasa mif wapoti' na'ama sa'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una wambel anama lu'unai fandona nif nogoh malo. Amama malo malata ilif la'ela'ef hihif!”
66019004	Ea' amam agufumi dembemi 24-peleim maloma amama biamibiam ambal namunai napaimi mindiwa nembawa balagah motawa manda' lotuma God natoma balata lu'unai. Amam ma'iam mehip ma'i, “Endilisi, ape' mefela agel Godi lu'una!”
66019005	Ama balata lu'unai Godi anona malogel na'i nafi'i na'i, “Ipe' panda'mana maol Godi ma umbamahepama Anan paila basef ananimi, ipe' epes agof a'epa paloma epes isima agufisi, ipe' hipei pekolasa pefela agel Godi! Anan God ape'inai!”
66019006	Ea' ame' anom amamaga si'i basef hiami matagama epes amam nematawa hiesi sandatama sapani. Sape sa'i mimil si'i embel mowa kululu' etin. Ea' anom amamaga manda'am si'i otaga dilulu bugwalag, maf anama na'iam mehip na'ama na'i, “Ape' mefela agel Godi! Dembinai anan God ape'inei. Anan pepel hianainai! Dei' anan nataga king endilisi ma numafi amamaga hiami hi'alam.
66019007	Dei' ape' mondanifel mefela agel Ananinai. Dei' main, nemaf nataga ea' ma sipsip noganai na'i noso' nemata'w. Ea' nemata'w anani'wi kwandandombol kwape.
66019008	God nase'akw luwaguf afitimi bu'wami mafifili endilisi. Akwa'w kwala amama ma alop akwa'unai.” Luwaguf amama mondola'wifa waf bu'unai esis amam nematawa Godi sanda'anai.
66019009	Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' da'a basef amama. Epes isima God nofalas sofi'mai gwa'aimi lu'wami ma sipsip noganai noso' nemata'w akwama, isima esis sondanifel.” Ea' anan na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Basef amama basef Godi endilismi.”
66019010	Ea' ae' indiwa nembawa balaga etawa felefele'ma bo'wagah enseli ma enda' lotumana, ea' na'ipi na'i, “Ina nenda'am na'ama, owa'. Ae' alupuwei ine'iwei aloma ine' naloma sahopena ine'imi, afa' wandao'oma wanda' opeh Godi atom waloma esis hiesi sembale'efa basef endilisimi Jisas nawalipasami. Ine' nenda' lotuma God atona. Ape' mogawa basef amama endilisimi Jisas nawalapama ipe'ami, amama mafela amam profet mawalipasa basef Godi.”
66019011	Ea' ati otaga heven nandawisi' nogal, ati anona hos afitinai nape. Epen natomanai agel ananinai sa'i, “Epen numafi opeh ananimi andeande', nanda' waf endilisinai atona.” Anan naila waf bu'unai atona nowaloga esis amam nematawa ma basef lu'wami ea' nanda' wandafa waf bu'unai atona.
66019012	Naep ananimi si'i nif fandumi ea' hagw bu'wami hiami si'i dembemi king atom mowalo'ami mape balaga Ananinai. Anom amef mail alop ananinai, anama agel ananinai. Anan atona nogawa agel anama, enis epes owa'.
66019013	Esimbel masa'opa luwaguf ananimi laumi nalami. Ea' esis sofala agel ananinai sa'i, “Basef Godi.”
66019014	Anan nape nali'ma amam soldia mape heveni matoma hos amama afitimi amamumi mailana mafe'. Alop amamunai esis sowaho'mama luwaguf afitimi bu'wami endilisi.
66019015	Ea' anona bainat hi'alina endilisi nape malogel Ananinai nawisi ande'. Anan na'i noha amam nematawa hiesi sape etap hiagomai ma bainat anama. “Anona nemaf Anan numafi epes hiesi sape etap hiagoma. Numafias la'ifina si'i nahapila anona bolam sanda' ain sanda'anai.” Anan nofa'asa su'utip wain ma otam tang anama waini, amama mondola'wifa okom lu'unai wandafunai Godi, Anan la'ifinai ma amamaga hiami.
66019016	Anom amef agel Ananinai mailana nimbe naloma luwaguf ananimi. Agel anama na'ama. Dembinai king ma amam king hiami, Dembinai ma dembemi hiami.
66019017	Ea' ati anona ensel naitu felefele'ma aon alipunai nape natalogoma. Anan na'i mehip na'ipa amiguf hiami mufia' mafe' ilif otagai na'i, “Ipe' pindowa'anima pifi'mai gwa'aimi anama lu'wami Godi!
66019018	Ama pea' alop amam king dembemi noloma mafis amam kepten mumafi amam soldiai moloma mafisa amam amama dembemi la'ifimi moloma mafis hosi moloma mafis epes hiesi satumami wapoti'. Ipe' pea' mafis epes hiesi hi'ilas na'ama. Epes hiesi, enis agof a'asi sanda' opeh sape owina enis epes, enis agufisi sumafi enis epes sanda' opehi, enis dembesi agufisi, enis agof a'asi.”
66019019	Ea' ati mafin anama lu'unai nape aolupi naloma dembemi king amama etapami maloma soldia amamumi mandatama mape. Amam ma'i mopa' moloma aman anama natoma hos afitinai naloma soldia ananimi.
66019020	Aman anama natoma hos afitinai nikila' mafin anama nape aolupi naloma profet anama nawalapa basef baso'maimi nikila'am nanda'am manda' kalabus. Profet anama fowa' nanda' pepel si'i God atona nanda'anai ma naep mafin anama nape aolupi. Waf anama atona nambaso'ma epes sofa' ikwafa mafin anama nape aolupi ea' sanda' lotuma ambal atona ananinai. Mafin anama naloma profet anama nambaso'ami amam biam ata' mape ambagof namumi sokwahom mafe' nif lu'wami fandom otam batafumi agel salfa hul lu'unai nowala owa' notambili.
66019021	Anom soldia maila mafin anama aolupunai maloma profet anama nambaso'masi, amam ata' mape. Ea' aman anama natoma hosi naha amam soldia amamumi maga'. Anan naham bainat anama launai nape malogel ananinai. Ea' amiguf hiami mafi'i ma' alop amamunai ea' opalef amigufi elihim endilisi.
66020001	Ea' ati anona ensel nakwaha heven nisila'i. Anan nahapila ki utainai ma hul anama launai nogal nowala gani ma owa' notambili. Ea' nahapila sen lu'unai wapoti'.
66020002	Anan nahapila kwambon anama du'utinai la'ifinai, kwambon anama fowa'inai endilisi. Anan “Aman nambaso'ma epes hiesi.” Anan Satan. Ea' ensel anama nowa'ana sen nape nanda' kalabus nandahama afagof 1,000-peleim.
66020003	Ensel anama nakwahona nafe' nowala hul anama launai ea' nowalowamana uta ilif la'ifina. Ea' Satan ina anona nemaf la'ifina ma nombaso'ma amam nematawa hiesi wapoti', owa'. Anan ata' nope nohafa afagof 1,000-peleim ama ata' hi'ilam ea', ensel anama notagahona wapoti' nefe'agon ganigani ma nogota bandana.
66020004	Amama mafe'ma ea', ati anom balatagw lu'wami kingi ma'oh ea' enis epes satoma balatagw amama. God nase'asa agel lu'unai ma sowaloga waf esis amam nematawa hiesi sanda'anai ma kot. Ea' ati ambagof epes isima hiesi. Esis owa' sonda' lotuma mafin nape aolupi naloma ambal ananinai sambalonai, ea' owa' sofa' ikwaf aonai mafin anama amagah lagof asasimi. Epes isima sembale'efa basef Godi la'ifis sawalapa basef endilisimi Jisasi. Waf anama atona sanda' opeh bu'wami, dei' esis naumbih satopa' bagafowas afis. Sohafel wapoti' sofa' ambal namunai sope dembesi king soloma Krais sope sondahama afagof 1,000-peleim.
66020005	Nemaf anama nili'i ma esis saga'i sili' sohafel hi'agilif. Ea' epes isima fowa' saga'i ina sofa' ambal namunai nemaf anama, ata' owa'. Esis ata' sope sohafa afagof amama 1,000-peleim mefe'ma hi'ilam.
66020006	Epes isima sotanima sohafel nemaf anama nali'i, esis sandanifel sope bo'wes andeande'. Ea' ga' anama niegi'i ina la'ifina nohagofa epes isima, owa. Esis sope pris Godi sope pris Kraisi sondolalimam. Ea' sope dembesi soloma Kraisa sumafi enis epes afagof 1,000-peleim.
66020007	Afagof amama 1,000-peleim hi'ilam, uta nindausi' ma kalabus ea' Satan nokwaha kalabus ananimi nuwisi ande'.
66020008	Anan nuwisi ande'ma nombaso'ma epes amam nematawa hiesi sape etap anae' hiagoma biefigin biefigin nafe' notambela, esis epes hiesi Gok saloma Magok. Ea' Satan nokolasa esis sonda' wandaf. Epes hiesi asasisi isima hiesi sandahama wesan na'oh naoh akata.
66020009	Ea' sefe' ganima etap hiagoma laogoma sondowasa' saitu tulif sindiwapagon anama amam nematawa Godi sapoma, anama wambel taun anama God okom ma'iana endilisi. Ea' nif misila'i heven fando soldia amama Satani hi'alam.
66020010	Amama mataga ea', God nokwaha aman anama Satan nambaso'masi nefe' hul anama nowala owa' notambili nif fandom lu'um otam salfa la'ela'ef mapani. Amam ensol mali' makwaha mafin nape aolupi naloma profet anama nambaso'ami mowala mape hul anama. Amam biam moloma Satan mope anama la'ela'ef hihif mofa' nimanimi owamb alip anama nif fandumi mapoma.
66020011	Ea' ati balata lu'unai kingi afitinai notawa, anona aman natoma balata anama. Etap anae' naloma otaga ilif mafe'ma Anan ea' owa' anagon ma amam mopaigon, owa'. Epes hiesi ina anona nemaf sotolom wapoti, owa'.
66020012	Ea' ati esis saga'i sape, epes isima agufisi saloma isima agof a'asi saitu naep balata kingi. Ea' aman anama natoma balata anama nefa' anom buk ea' naufam. Ea' naufa anona buk wapoti', agof esis sofa' ambagof namumi mailanai. Ea' nati amef mail buk amama, ma'i maina waf esis sanda'anai nawaloga esis saga'i sandahama waf hianai esis sali' sanda'anai.
66020013	Wambel saga'i sapoma naloma naoh embel makwaha epes isima saga'i sotanimani ma nogota anama. Ea' Anan natoma balata kingi nawaloga esis hiesi atona etin sandahama waf hianai esis sanda'anai.
66020014	Ea' nakwaha ga' naloma wambel saga'i sapoma mafe' mowala hul anama launai nif lu'wami fandumi mapeinai. Hul anama si'i ga' nafe'ma bifi notagama epes hiesi.
66020015	I'i Anan natoma balata kingi owa' nieti agel anin epeni nope buk anama, nefelen nokwahin newala hul anama nif amama fandumi mapeinai.
66021001	Dei' ae' ati etap naloma otaga dambaimi mape. Heven ilif naloma etap apimi mafe' higilalam hi'alam. Ea' naoh wapoti' ina ata' motah, owa'.
66021002	Ea' ati taun wambel bu'unai Godi, anama Jerusalem dambaiguma. Ati taun anama nape naloma God, nakwaha heven ilif nisila'i. Wambel anama nanda' sosaf bu'unai atona nandandombol si'i nemata'w kwa'i koso' amani kwanda' sosaf bu'unai atona ma koso' aman akwa'unai.
66021003	Ea' ame' anona malogel nataga balata kingi na'i mehip na'ama na'i, “Peme'! Dei' ipat lu'unai Godi notawa naloma epes. Ama Anan nope la'afena esis ma sope amam nematawa ananisi ea' Anan nope God esis sanda' lotumanai. Endilisi, God Anan atona nape nalomas.
66021004	Anan anona nemaf nopati'masa embif hiami ma naep asasimi. Ama ina anona nemaf soga' wapoti' opalef nimanim ea' esis ina selef some' nimanimi wapoti', owa'etin. Dei' main, amamaga amama fowa'imi mafe' mowala higilalam hi'alam.”
66021005	Ea' aman anama nape balata lu'unai kingi na'i, “Peme'! Dei' Ae' anda' amamaga hiami mataga dambaim hi'alam!” Ea' na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Ine' da'a basef amama. Dei' main, basef amama endilisimi atom ma sembale'efam endilisi.”
66021006	Ea' na'ipi wapoti' na'i, “Ae' anda' amamaga amama dambaimi hiami mataga hi'alam. Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef hihif ape ali' ape agi' endilisi. Ae' ofagewe ma ahapila amamaga hiami hi'alam ea' ape agi' anda' opeh hiami ae'ami hi'alam. Emi egafis si'i iap nose'as, anona nemaf ese'as embela ifata embel ambal namunai napaimi. Ea' ese'asam na'a si'i presen bu'unai.
66021007	Emi egafis situ la'ifisa sili'amona wandafa waf aonai, esis anona nemaf sofa' amamaga amama hiami bu'wami do'ok a'ipipami. Ea' ae' epe God asasisiwei, esis sope awasi ae'asi.
66021008	Epes isima umbamahasa sotanima, isima owa' sombale'efa Godi, epes sanda' waf naninani aonai endilisi soloma epes isima saha enis saga'i soloma epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai soloma isima sanda' mu'uhupi soloma epes isima sanda' lotuma god anama baso'mainai, soloma epes isima hiesi sambaso'omi, epes isima hiesi sofa' wambel asasinai ma hul anama lu'unai nif lu'wami fandumi otam salfa napoma. Hul anama launai si'i ga' nigi' neatagai.”
66021009	Ea' anona ensel nafi'mai ae'. Ensel anama atotona ma amam ensol 7-peleim mahapila dis amamaga mahambombaga epesi malami mandandam. Amamaga amama awami meagi'i endilisi. Anan na'ipi na'i, “Ine' fi'i, ma ihi'ambena nemata'w sipsip noganai waulu'mana.”
66021010	Ea' Ambal Bu'unai Godi nafela okom ae'anai, ensel anama nofa'e afe' alata anona halaf launai gani ilif. Ea' nihi'ambe taun wambel anama bu'unai Godi Jerusalem, anama nape naloma God ea' nakwaha heven nafi'i ata' nisila'i etin.
66021011	Wambel anama nafifili la'ifinai si'i nagwapin Godi mafifil taun anama. Elelowa nafifili Ananinai anona nafifili si'i otam bu'unai satalona otamba hiami. Endilisi, nafifili anama si'i otam jaspa pelele' endilisi si'i glas.
66021012	Taun anama endalelemb lu'wami laumi endilisi malata ilif. Endalelemb amama utagw 12-peleim ea' ensel 12-peleim maitu felefele' mandandama utagw amama. Ea' agof amama mandahama wambotagw 12-peleim esis Israeli mail mandandama utagw amama.
66021013	Endalelemb wa'am titi gani wa'ol aon natefima utagw wanom. Ea' wa'ol aon natopa' nonafama sanda' utagw wanom ea' gani aon natopa' nomba'ma sanda' wanom ea' wa'ol aon nowalama naso'ma sanda' wanom.
66021014	Endalelemb amama ma taun anama, otamba lu'wami 12-peleim mape mosohapa endalelemb etapama. Ea' agof amam aposel 12-peleim sipsip noganai mail mandanda otamba amama.
66021015	Ea' ensel anama nalome na'i nahapila bandan gol si'i ikwaf nosaho' taun anama ma endalelemb naloma utagw.
66021016	Taun anama lu'wagoma. Endalelemb amama dindiwaisa biefigin biefigin ea' usi'im endilisi. Wambel anama tef wala, wa'ol wa'ol na'ama etin. Ensel nosaho'agon nondola'wifa taun anama ma ikwaf ananinai ea' wambel anama tef wala ikwaf nataga 2,400 kilomita. Ea' wa'ol wa'ol biefigin biefigin tasa ikwaf na'ama etin 2,400 kilomita. Wambel anama dogwala owin nalata nataga ilif, ikwaf anama nataga na'ama etin 2,400 kilomita.
66021017	Anan nandandepa endalelemb nondola'wif wapoti' etap nalata nataga ilif. Ea' ikwaf endalelembi nikila' nataga 144 alogof bandami mita. Mita anama, anan si'i epes sondola'wifa hiahaomanai si'i rula. Ea' ensel nondola'wifa endalelemb amama ma ikwaf anama atona.
66021018	Endalelemb mili'akwa tauni amama God atona nanda'am otamba amama jaspa. Ea' taun anama God nanda' gol atom nanda'ana. Taun anama howalagon nafifil endilisi si'i glas.
66021019	Endalelemb owinama ma taun anama, God nofalo'mama otamba mamumami bu'wami sataloma moni hianai. Otam gologowinai bu'unai nali'i nombalo' endalelemb owinama agel jaspa. Otam nagi'i kolotu'unai agel sapaia. Ea' anona nagi'i ma wanomi afitinai agel aget. Ea' anona nafe'ma biefinai biefina ulitinai agel emeral.
66021020	Ea' anona nafe'ma wanom biefinai agel sandonikis, anama anan nanda' apohi akwahina afitina. Ea' nafe'ma wanom wanom anan akwahinai agel konilian. Ea' nafe'ma 7-peleinai batafunai agel krisolait. Ea' nafe'ma 8-peleinai anama ulitinai anom mandati na'a agel beril. Ea' anona nafe'ma 9-peleinai batafunai nandati na'a agel topas. Ea' anona nafe'ma 10-peleinai agel krisopres anama nanda' apoh batafunai ulilitinai. Ea' nafe'ma 11-peleinai anona kolotu'unai nandati na'a agel haiasin. Ea' anona nafe'ma 12-peleinai anama anona akwahinai agel amatis.
66021021	Utagw amama 12-peleim si'i ombahigis afitimi 12-peleim salatamam endilisi. Anona uta sanda'ana anona bahigin lu'unai atotona. Taun anama eaf atotona. Eaf anama gol atom mafifili howalagon pelele' endilisi si'i glas sanda'ana.
66021022	Ae' ina ati ipat Godi lu'unai sanda' lotuwanai notawa taun anama, owa'. Dei' main, Dembinai God la'ifinai nikila' la'ifimi hiami hi'alami naloma Sipsip Noganai, amam biam mape si'i ipat lu'unai Godi ma taun anama.
66021023	Ea' taun anama aon owambunai alipunai maol nanda'anai owa' ma wambel anama howalagoma, owa'. Dei' main, mafifili lu'wami Godi atom mumafiagon manda'agon howalagon. Ea' Sipsip Noganai anan atona si'i nagwapin anama.
66021024	Epes etapasi hiesi hi'ilas anona nemaf sofa' nafifili atoma taun anama ea' sefe'. Ea' amam king mumafi etapi anona nemaf mofa'ai sosaf otamba maim amamumi mifi'mai wambel anama.
66021025	Alip esis ina sowalo utagwa endalelemb amama, owa'. Magal la'ela'ef mape. Dei' main, owamb ina aonona nemaf notaga taun anama wambel lu'unai, owa'.
66021026	Sosaf bu'unai noloma otamba moni maim ma'oh wambel kantri hiagoma epes hiesi anona nemaf sofa'am suwisa wambel anama sombe'am.
66021027	Ea' amamaga awami moloma epes emi sanda' waf naninani aonai soloma emi egafis sa'i basef baso'maimi soloma emi egafis sanda' waf aonai nanda' epes ambagof aom, epes isima ina sefe' siwisa wambel anama, owa'. Sipsip Noganai nanda' agof enis epesi mail buk anama agof epes sofa' ambal namunai mailanai, epes isima etis anona nemaf sefe' suwis wambel anama.
66022001	Ea' ensel anama nihi'ambe anona walemb lu'unai. Walemb anama howalagon pelele' endilisi si'i glas. Walemb anama nandambe nafi'i balata lu'unai Godi natomanai naloma balata lu'unai Sipsip Noganai natomanai ea' kolo' etin nafe'.
66022002	Walemb anama nafe' la'afena eaf lu'unai ma taun wambel anama lu'wagoma. Walemb fisanai fisana lawah biam ambal namunai motawa. Amam mail mola su'utip danda la'ela'ef mandanda aomb atona etina afagof hiami atona etin. Nohotagw 12-peleim mandahama aomb 12-peleim. Emi egafis sogwa' su'utip amama, esis sofa' ambal namunai sope andeande' la'ela'ef. Soh apulima monda' epes hiesi awes nanda'asi sape kantri hiagoma sotaga bo'wes.
66022003	Wambel anama amamaga hiami God nandaiwa'mam endilisi ma na'i nili'amonami, amama ina nambimb mope wapoti', owa'. God noloma Sipsip Noganai, amam anona nemaf motoma balata lu'wami kingi mope mumafi epes isima. Esis sanda' opeh Godi sope sonda' lotumana sefela agel ananinai.
66022004	Anona nemaf siti amaga Ananinai ma nonda' agel ananinai nil amagah asasimi.
66022005	Anona nemaf owamb ina notaga wapoti', owa'. Ea' ina ata' anom mafifili moloma lam nogwahis o owaf aon alipunai, owa'. Amama opeh a'am. Dei' main, Dembinai God nififima esis, sope si'i king sumafi enis epes la'ela'ef.
66022006	Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'ama na'i, “Basef amama hiami mape buk anae' endilisimi atom andeande'ma epes hiesi sombale'efam. Dembinai God naso' Ambal Bu'unai Ananinai amam profet. God Anan nasapa'ai ensel Ananimi ma mihi'amba esis sanda' maola Anani ma amamaga amama felefele' meatagai.”
66022007	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anona nemaf Ae' ifi'mai ipe' mehip. Basef Godi mape buk anae', basef amama amamaga hiami ma'i anona nemaf migi' meatagai. Emi egafis sila basef amama, esis sondanifel.”
66022008	Ae' Jon ame' basef amama ati amamaga amama ame'am ea'. Ea' indiwa nembawa etawa felefele'ma ensel anama nihi'ambe amamaga amama ma enda' lotuma anan.
66022009	Ea' ensel anama na'ipi na'i, “Ine' owa' nenda'am na'ama, owa'. Ae' ina dembiwei, owa'. Ae' alomena wandao'oma wanda' opeh etini waloma sahopena ine'imi profet fowa'imi maloma epes isima hiesi saila basefa buk anae'. Ine' nenda' lotu ma God atona.”
66022010	Ea' na'ipi na'i, “Basef amama Godi mape buk anama, ina nembaho'am nesapamam mope, owa'. Dei' main, nogota God na'i nonda' amamaga amama, anama felefele'ma notaga hi'ilana.
66022011	Emi egafis sonda' waf aonai, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sonda' waf aonai endilisi, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Emi egafis sonda' waf bu'unai, esis sonda'ana la'ela'ef. Ea' emi egafis sepe epes bu'wasi Godi, esis sope bo'wes Ananisi na'ama etin la'ela'ef.”
66022012	Ea' Jisas na'i, “Peme'! Anona nemaf Ae' etaga mehip. Ea' ifi'i eloma amamaga bu'wami awami, ewaloga esis amam nematawa hiesi egwamasam atona etin mondahama waf esis sanda'anai.
66022013	Ae' atowe ape Dembiwei la'ela'ef, ape ali'i ape agi' endilisi. Ae' ofagewe ma amamaga hiami enda'am efe' efe' embefam andeande' hi'ilam.
66022014	Esis amam nematawa sasa'opa luwaguf asasimi ma sataga bo'wes, esis sondanifel. Esis isima anona nemaf God na'i esis bo'wes ma sefa' gwa'aimi ma lawag anama ambal namunai napainai ea' la'ifisa sefe' suwis uta anama ma wambel anama bu'unai.
66022015	Epes sanda' waf aonai si'i bogof nombagw manda'anai soloma epes isima sanda' mu'uhupi, epes isima sanda' waf aonai so'a waolanai soloma epes saha enis saga'i soloma epes isima sanda' lotuma god baso'mainai soloma epes isima hiesi ukup maila waf baso'omunai maimailana, epes isima anona nemaf sope ande'ma wambel anama Godi.”
66022016	Ea' Jisas na'iam wapoti' na'i, “Ae' asapa' ensel ae'anai nafe'mago ipe' ma nowalapa basef amama ma ipe' sios amam nematawa Godi. Ae' atowe ae' dapana nandala nombaf lawag Deviti, bafalomana ananiwei ataga wambota ananinai. Ae' si'i ondo'w anama lala'wan mafifili endilisi nalatawi kuhimbita.
66022017	Ambal Bu'unai Godi naloma nemata'w Sipsip Noganai nose'akwi esis sa'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i!’ Ea' emi egafis seme' basef amama, esis si'i basef amama atom si'i, ‘Ipe' fi'i.’ Ea' emi egafis iap nose'asa embel, esis sifi'i. Emi egafis sa'i sogwa' embel, esis sifi'i sea' embel ambal namunai napaimi si'i presen bu'unai God nose'asana na'ai, owa' sotalona otambai.
66022018	Ipe' epes emi egafipa pame' basef Godi ma amamaga amama mail buk anae' anona nemaf meatagai, Ae' a'ipa ipe' hipei mehip, ipe' pindumafuma andeande'. I'i emi egafis siwatani anom basef wapoti' moloma basef Godi, anona nemaf amamaga amama aom endilisi God na'iami ma buk anae', amama anona nemaf God nokolefamanam esis.
66022019	I'i emi egafis sogagaha anom basef tu'wanim Godi ma'i amamaga anona nemaf meatagai ma nili'amonama buk anae', anona nemaf God nili'amona epes isima nogalo'mas. Ea' esis ina anona nemaf la'ifisa sefa' gwa'aimi ma lawag anama ambal namunai napaimi, owa'. Anona nemaf ina la'ifisa sefe' sepe andeande' wambel anama bu'unai buk anae' na'iagoma, owa'etin.”
66022020	Ae' Dembiwei a'i basefa amamaga mail buk anae', Ae' a'i amama endilisimi atom. Ea' dei' a'i, “Endilisi, Ae' anona nemaf ifi'i mehip!” Endilisi, Dembinai Jisas, ine' nifi'i!
66022021	Ae' a'i Dembinai Jisas nigiambamepa na'a nope nolomepa, ipe' God Ananipei. Endilisi.
